bonta kelangselet akarjong apenan aphu-thak vang-lo tangte, lapen apenan abang kechepasa-urtang apiso aphan langselet-lo, lapen kelangselet akarjong pinso aphuthak vang-lote, lapen alangli apiso aphan langselet-lo, seta apiso abang ke ingthir-et-lang.”.

“Anke pinso abang apiso aphan kurusar along van nangpo, lapen bangpi aphan akenang adan vanpinangpo, atheke soktipliso ahim aduk elin; la along thangnat ajangthuta dung dun nangnelo, lapen mephik aduk ta bi dun nangnelo, pima lake kelang un-e asok-asang adanlo, mate kelet kechepamathathu adanlo.”
Kurusar abang bangpi aphan aphrang vansi dovan angno parjap po.
Longle aharlung arlo alangli ajehak kangthir alang dungpo lapen
Anke alangli bangpi achu pajirkrapsi arideng him aduk adan pipo. Alangli ari along kurusar ke ahirjuno kevan-i lang keho aharlung otdongpo.
Anke bangpi aphan kurusar abang semepatangpo, “Nang jongsi beisa klemklelang pulote laso alang keho kevanji ahirjuno nangpaphophenang.
Bonta nang jongsi beisa klemtang-lo pulote,
nangrat atum angbong
la ahirjuno kevan alang nang harlung-heihei arlo padamnang, lapen nangbang pakang-onang, lapen nang kengtham pathuvoknang.” Lapen arloso abangta “Amen, Amen” pupo.
Anke kurusar abang lahei ahirjuno loh along tok-etpo, lapen lahei langkeho arlo cham-etpo;
lapen alangli la ahirjuno kevan alang keho bangpi aphan pajunpo, lapen ahirjuno kevan alang bangpi apok arlo dampo, lapen kehodak akeso paplangpo.
Anke kurusar abang arloso ari deng pen kelang-un-e sok-sang adan endetpo, lapen
lapen sok-sang adan chekip isi enchomsi kechematha amar paplangpo, lapen la dovan athak phrinpo, la aphi arloso aphan lang pajunthupo.

Alangli bangpi aphan lang pajundet aphi, bangpi jongsi amethang chepasa-ur lo, lapen apenan aphan kroithipthe akam klemlo, ahirjuno kevan alang bangpi apok arlo lutsi hodak akeso vanpo, lapen bangpi abang kangpringpo, lapen bangpi akengtham thuvokpo, lapen bangpi ke arat atum angbong ahirjuno abang plangpo.
Bonta arloso jongsi amethang abang chepasa-ur-e, lapen ingthirvet, pulote bangpi jokpo, lapen aso chopathe longpo.
Lahelo kelang-un-e kepho alam, piso abang apenan abersi dolo seta, damtapvaret lapen amethang chepasa-urlo,
mate kelangselet akarjong inut amonit aputhak vang-lo lapen alangli apiso aphan langselet-lo; pulote alangli apiso aphan
Pinso abang akelet pen jokpo, bonta arloso abang amethang akelet cheparpupo.
Moses aphan
“Israel arat aphan thannon, mane apinso mate a-arloso jongsi kenangsot aseme, kepanong aseme,
alangli drakha ahorlang pen, arak ahor pen chepahelo nangji; alangli drakha alang-kethor lapen drakha alang ta junje detpo, lapen akecham tame akreng tame drakha choche detpo.
Alangli chepaprekvitik apor an drakha pen keman ason an chochedetpo, achili seta ahu seta chochelo.”
Alangli chepanongtik an aphu chesoilongle. Alangli
Apo along tame, apei along tame, akorte mate angjir along tame, latum thilote, latum pen apot alangli chepangthirthe nangnelo; pima alangli Arnam aphan kechepaprek la ke alangli phu athak si dolo.
Alangli chepaprektik ke alangli

Chepanong abang achu kangthir jongsi menmen kethi amonit adung kedo dunkok pen apot ingthirthe det-lo pulote alangli ni throksi inghong nangji anke alangli chu lapen angmum chesoi nangpo; lasonsi alangli aron ateng pen ingthir-etpo.
Nerkep arni alangli vothung jonni mate thungpharlo jonni kurusar along

Kurusar abang ejon ke pap athok pipo, lapen ajon kaprek ke kephrin athok pipo, la ke aron atang pen chepangthir akam klempipo, pima langli kethi arpum pen chepateboktang-lo. Halaso arni amatsi alangli chu chepangthir-thumi nangpo,
lapen alangli por
Kepanong abang kechechak apor choktang-lote, alangli aron ateng cheklem nangpo. Alangli Pehem amangho along dampo,
lapen
Alangli ton isi thap kavepin ahim dan pinangji: him karthat, aduk pen jit ajangthu kepangvui pen keselam ahim lapen jangthu kevit ahim, lapen abat sok-sang lapen drakha ahorlang athok van nanangji.
Lahei kadokave kurusar abang
Biresak alo ke kejelang athok
Pehem amangho along kechepanong abang achu chesoipo lapen kejelang athok kephrin ame along phrindutpo.
Biresak alo akengthak uptang-lote, kurusar abang la ponpo, lapen him karthat penpen birappetpo, hoton pen himkedok eplang enpo lapen ton pen himkedok eplang ensi kepanong abang arideng bi rappetpo.
Adunthu, kurusar abang lahei
Lahei helo kechepaparek abang-phan aron; bonta kechepanong abang jongsi alangli kepinangji adan apar kepiji chechak-lote, alangli kechechak atengthot chepinangji.
Moses aphan
“Aaron lapen asomar atum Israel arat aphan ahirjume kepi ahut la aber ketokjir alam-heihei kepuji aphansi hukumpilo;
nangtum aphan nang pahirjume nang lapen nangpalana lonang;
nangtum aphan nangpanghon lonang lapen pajinso lonang;
nangtum aphan nangpalang lonang lapen ningkangsam nangpapi lonang.”
Lapen
Anke aro akehoi Israel ajalin atum an, aphai kelakha along adeng kedo-an atum,
along athok-heihei vanlo: hemkonglong hum throk, lapen chainong alo jonkrehini, banghini ajalintin aphan hemkonglong ehumhum lapen ajalintin pen chainong alo ejonjon. Lahei latum pidet aphi,
Anke Moses aphan
“Pehem aphan akenang akam keklem nangji aphan lahei adan dengnon; Levi atum aphan lahei latum keklem nangji akam ateng pen pinon.
Lasi Levi atum aphan hemkonglong-heihei lapen chainong anta Moses pilo.
Gershon aro aphan alangli hemkonglong humni lapen chainong alo jonphli pilo,
lapen Merari aro aphan hemkonglong humphli lapen chainong jonnerkep pilo. Latum akam kedo-an ke Aaron kurusar asopo Ithamar kethan ateng si klemnangpo.
Bonta Kohath aro aphan ke Moses hemkonglong mate chainong alo seta pipedet-lo, pima latum ke kangthir ajohton an aphang pensi ponnangji.”
Dovan kehodaiji aketalon aphan jalin atum athok-heihei vanlo. Latum adan-heihei dovan along kepiji aphan kechesik ahut,
Moses aphan
Kecheng arni dan kepi abang Nashon, la Amminadab asopo, Judah akhei pen;
lapen alangli dan ke rup akasu epak, la alin powapho, rup aharlung ehong la alin powa kethom, la kangthir ahem alin ateng lo, la hinita him aduk pen jangthu keplengset kepangvui sok-sang adan pilo;
Epak hijung plengset ser akasuso alin 100 gram;
chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, biresak aloso ejon ningkan isi arta kephrin athok aphan;
pap athok aphan bi alo ejon;
lapen ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jon pho, bi alo jon pho, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon pho. La helo Nashon, la Amminadab asopo kepi adan.
Hini arni Nethanel, la Zuar asopo, Issakar ajalinsi danpilo;

alanglita amethang adan chepilo epak rup akasu alin powapho, rup aharlung ehong alin powa kethom, la kangthir ahem alin atengsi hinita himkeme aduk lapen jangthu kepangvui paplengsetsi soksang adan aphan pilo;
hijung keplengset aser akasuso alin ke 100 gram;
chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta biresak aloso kephrin athok aphan pilo;
pap athok aphan ke bi alo ejon;
lapen ningkangsam athok aphan, chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jonpho, bi alo jon pho, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon pho pilo. La ke Zuar asopo Nethanel kepi athok-lo.
Kethom arni Eliab, la Helon asopo, Zebulun aro ajalin adeng:
alangli dan ke rup akasu epak ardi powapho, rup aharlung epak ardi powakethom, kangthirhem alin ateng, la hini alongta him aduk keme pen jangthu pangvui plengset asok-sang adan vanlo;
ser akasuso isithup ahijung;
chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso ejon, kephrin athok aphanlo;
pap athok aphan bi alo ejon;
lapen ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jonpho, bi alo jon pho, lapen ningkan isi abiresak alo jon pho. La ke Eliab, la Helon asopo kepi adan lo.
Phli arni Elizur, la Shedeur asopo, Reuben aro ajalin adeng:
La adan rup akasu epak ardi powapho, rup aharlung ehong ardi powa kethom, la kangthirhem alin ateng-lo, la hini along ta mesen ahim aduk pen jangthu kepangvui paplengset sok-sang adan vanlo;
hijung plengset ser akasuso epak ardi 100 gram;
chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta biresak aloso ejon lahei kephrin athok aphanlo;
pap athok aphan bi alo ejon;
lapen ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jon pho, bi alo jon pho, ningkan isi arta abiresak alo jon pho. La helo Shedeur asopo Elizur kepi athok-lo.
Pho arni ke Shelumiel, la Zurishaddai asopo, Simeon ajalin adeng:
alangli kevan adan ke rup akasu epak, ardi powapho, rup aharlung epak ardi powakethom, kangthirhem alin ateng mesen ahim aduk pen jangthu kepangvui sok-sang adan aphan vanlo;
hijung plengset aser akasuso epak ardi 100 gram;
kephrin athok aphan chainong alo ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta biresak aloso ejon;
lapen pap athok aphan bi alo ejon;
lapen ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jon pho, bi alo jon pho, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon pho. La helo Zurishaddai asopo Shelumiel kepi athok-lo.
Throk arni ke Deuel asopo Eliasaph, Gad aro ajalin adeng:
alangli adan ke rup akasu epak ardi powapho, rup aharlung ehong ardi powakethom, la kangthirhem alin ateng, la lata mesen ahim aduk pen jangthu kepangvui sok-sang adan aphan paplengset vanlo;
hijung keplengset ser akasusota vanlo;
kephrin athok aphan chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso ejon pilo;
pap athok aphan bi alo ejon;
lapen ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jon pho, bi alo jon pho, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon pho. La ke Deuel asopo Eliasaph kepi athok-lo.
Throksi arni ke Ammihud asopo Elishama, la Ephraim aro ajalin adeng:
alangli adan ke rup akasu epak ardi powapho, rup aharlung ehong ardi powakethom, la kangthirhem alin ateng, la lata mesen ahim aduk pen jangthu kepangvui asok-asang adan aphan paplengset vanlo;
ser akasuso ardi 100 gram hijung keplengset vanlo;
kephrin athok aphan chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso ejon vanlo;
pap athok aphan bi alo ejon vanlo;
lapen ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jon pho, bi alo jon pho, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon pho. La helo Ammihud asopo Elishama kepi athok-lo.
Nerkep arni ke Gamaliel, la Pedahzur asopo, Manasseh ajalin adeng:
alangli dan ke rup akasu epak, ardi powapho, lapen rup aharlung ehong, ardi powakethom, kangthirhem alin-kevang ateng, la la ta mesen ahim aduk pen jangthu kepangvui paplengset asok-asang adan vanlo;
ser akasuso epak ardi 100 gram along hijung plengset;
kephrin athok aphan chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso ejon;
pap athok aphan bi alo ejon;
ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jon pho, bi alo jon pho, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon pho. La an helo Gamaliel, la Pedahzur asopo adan kepi.
Sirkep arni ke Abidan, la Gideoni asopo, Benjamin aro ajalin adeng:

alangli dan ke rup akasu epak ardi powapho, lapen rup aharlung ehong, ardi powa kethom, kangthirhem alin-kevang ateng, la la alongta mesen ahim aduk pen jangthu pangvuisi paplengset-lo, la soksang adan aphanlo;
ser akasuso ardi 100 gram hijung paplengset-lo;
kephrin athok aphan chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso ejon;
pap athok aphan bi alo ejon;
lapen ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jon pho, bi alo jon pho, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon pho. La an helo Abidan, la Gideoni asopo dan kepi.
Kep arni ke Ahiezer, la Ammi-shaddai asopo, Dan aro ajalin adeng;

alangli kepi adan ke rup akasu ardi powapho, rup aharlung ehong ardi powa kethom, la kangthirhem along alin kevang ateng-lo, la la alongta mesen ahim aduk pen jangthu pangvuisi paplengset-lo, la sok-sang athok aphanlo;
kephrin athok aphan ser akasuso epak ardi 100 gram hijung plengset,
chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso ejon;
pap athok aphan bi alo ejon;
lapen ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jon pho, bi alo jon pho, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon pho. La an helo Ahiezer, la Ammishaddai asopo kepi adanlo.
Kre-isi arni ke Pagiel, la Okran asopo, Asher aro ajalinlo:

alangli dan ke rup akasu epak, ardi powapho, lapen rup aharlung ehong ardi powa kethom, la kangthirhem alin kevang ateng, la la ta mesen ahim aduk pen jangthu pangvuisi paplengset-lo, la sok-sang adan aphanlo;
kephrin athok aphan ser akasuso epak ardi 100 gram hijung plengset;
chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso;
pap athok aphan bi alo ejon; lapen
ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jonpho, bi alo jonpho, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jonpho. La an helo Pagiel, la Okran asopo kepi athok.
Krehini arni ke Ahira, la Enan asopo, Naphtali aro ajalinlo:

alangli dan ke rup kasu epak ardi powapho, lapen rup aharlung ehong ardi powa kethom, kangthirhem alin kevang ateng-lo, la la ta mesen ahim aduk pen jangthu kepangvuisi paplengset-lo, la sok-sang adan aphanlo;
kephrin athok aphan ke ser akasuso epak ardi 100 gram hijung plengset;
chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso ejon;
pap athok aphan bi alo ejon;
lapen ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jonni, biresak alo jonpho, bi alo jonpho, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jonpho. La an helo Ahira, la Enan asopo, kepi athok-lo.
Dovan aphan kehodai athok la helo, la jangthu kepatip arni, Israel ajalin atum arideng pen: rup akasu pak krehini, rup aharlung hongkrehini, ser akasuso pak krehini,
rup akasu apaktin ardi powapho, lapen rup aharlung ahongtin ardi powa kethom, kadokave arup amar lin ingkoira phli, la kangthirhem along kelin ateng-lo,
ser akasuso hongkrehini, hijung plengset, kangthirhem along kelin ateng ahongtin 100 gram, ser akasuso kadokave elin-ra 200 gram;
kephrin athok aphan chainong alo jonkrehini, biresak alo jonkrehini, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jonkrehini halatum asok-asang adan-heihei penpen; lapen pap athok aphan bi alo jonkrehini;

lapen ningkangsam athok aphan chainong alo jon ingkoiraphli, biresak alo jon throk-kep, bi alo jon throk-kep, biresak aloso ningkan isi arta jon throk-kep. La an helo dovan aputhak jangthu patipdet aphi kehodai athok.
Moses aphan
“Aaron aphan punon, alangli melur-archok athak throksi amelur kebat ahut lasonsi alangli bat nangji melur an athengno anat ketur thekjile pabinang.”
Aaron kroisi klemlo, melur archok angno anat pangnosi melur bilo.
Atengri pen achelon anta melur-archok kethip aserlo, la Moses aphan
Moses aphan
“Israel arat pen Levi atum aphan papreknon lapen

latum aphan lasonle pangthirnon: kepangthir alang penle latum aphan pangthirnon lapen latum abang arpum achu angmi do-an pachesoijile lapen latum ape-ari pachechokjile thannon. Anke latum aron ateng pen ingthir-etpo.
Anke latum chainong aloso ejon lapen sok-sang adan aphan kenangji jit ajangthu pen kepangvui ahim aduk ponpo, lapen nanglike pap athok aphan ajon kaprek achainong alo ponpo.
Anke kedo-an Israel arat pangrumnon lapen Levi atum Ne kedo A-pehem athengnole parjapnon.
Israel arat atum ke Levi atum aphuthak ari batpo,
lapen Aaron ke Israel atum pen isi kepanong adan asonsi Nephan Levi atum nehodaipo, anke latum Nekam klem-unpo.
Anke Levi atum ari chainong alo jonni aputhak batpo; ejon ke pap athok aphan lapen ajon kaprek ke kephrin athok aphan, Levi atum aphan aron ateng pen kepangthir akam aphanlo.”
Levi atum ke Nephan isi kepanong adan asonle nehodainon, lapen latum aphuthak kelangji aphan Aaron lapen asomar atum aphan batnon.
Lasonle Levi atum aphan Israel kedo-an pen paprekvinon, anke latum Nemar plangpo.
Levi atum aphan nang pangthir-et lapen hodai-et aphi anke latum Pehem along kam keklemji a-ot dopo.
Israel aso akleng adimsi Ne latum aphan hang-lo, lapen latum Nemarsi plangchot nangji.
Ijip adet asokleng an Ne kepathi ahut, Israel ahemtuntin Neso akleng-lo lapen pi kechingthokcheng Nemarlo pusi Ne pangthirtang-lo.
Israel aso-akleng alar si Ne Levi atum aphan enlo,

lapen Aaron lapen asomar atum arideng Ne Levi atum hodailo, Israel atum pen kepanong adan ason, Israel atum aphan Pehem along kam kepaklemji aphan lapen Israel atum Kangthir Adim latum adung kevang-ra latum kevir nangji pen keparai aphanlo.
La apotsi Moses, Aaron lapen Israel arat kedo-an atum Moses aphan
Levi atum amethang chepangthirlo lapen latum ape-ari chechok-lo, lapen Aaron latum aphan isi kepanong adan asonsi
Levi atum aphuthak akam an Moses aphan
Moses aphan
“Ningkan ingkoirapho arta pen abangphutin a-Levi aso Ne kedo A-pehem along amethang akam adeng cheklempo,
lapen ningkan phokep arta lote latum kam pen jokpo.

Laso aphi alangli aninghangte akorte Levi atum aphan Pehem along halatum keklem nangji adeng akam cherapdun untahai, bonta amethang ke la thangnat akamta klem nangne. Lasonsi nangli Levi atum adeng akam paklem nangji.”
Israel arat atum Ijip adet ke-otang hini aningkan kecheng achiklo Sinai asangti ajo Moses aphan
“Athik apor ahut Israel arat atum Kejok Amei padonang.
Laso achiklo krephli arni arnikangsam nang-tum la athik apor ahut padonangji; la aron lapen la kangsai-i aron ateng pen la padonangji.”
Lasi rat atum aphan Kejok Amei kepadojisi Moses pulo,
lapen Sinai asangti ajo kecheng achiklo krephli arni kangsam latum padolo. Rat atum Moses aphan
Bonta hadak kedo angbong ajehak amonit atum aron ateng pen kangthirthe do pima latum kethi arpum otdet-lo, lapen halabangso arni latum Kejok Amei pado un-edet-lo. Latum Moses lapen Aaron along damlo,
lapen pulo, “Nelitum ingthirthelo pima nelitum kethi arpum otdet-lo, bonta nelitum aphan kopi athesi Israel kedo-an arat pen
Moses thak-lo, “Neli
Moses aphan

“Israel atum aphan thannon, nangtum angbong mane jongsi mate nangso-nangsu atum kethi arpum ke-ot pen ajok ingthirthelo mate heloving adim kedam pen ajok, bonta Kejok Amei kepadoji aninghang-lo pulote,
laso alar nangtum chiklo ejon aphi hini achiklo krephli arnikangsam talon unji. La thapkave ahim lapen han keho penle talonnon.
Puthot adap an thangnat kecho asonta biri lapen pi arrepi ing-lok-ri. Aron atengle Kejok Amei talonnon.

Bonta badutame aron ateng pen ingthir-et, lapen kehelo adim damde lapen Kejok Amei ta talonle, lason abangphan Nerat aso angbong inut-lo pu lakhakhelo pima alangli athik apor ahut Nephan dan Nepipelo. Alangli ke apap anam chechak nangkokpo.”
“Nangtum angbong kedo bang adet aso Kejok Amei kepadoji aning hang-lo, aron atang ateng pen alangli la ke talonji aphan klemvek nangji.”
Lasonsi dobomlo; anerlo ke inghunsi dip-lo, lapen ajo ke me si nangklang-lo.
Inghun kechirung ahut, Israel arat atum mukam chephrilo, lapen inghun nangkesun adimsi latum puthot mukam chekimthupo.
ahukum atengsi rat atum amukam chephrilo, lapen Alangli hukum atengsi latum mukam cheparjap-lo. Pehem athak inghun sa tik ke, latum amukam alongsi chedovetpo.
Pehem athak inghun kesa ajirdingklui ahut, latum
Ahut pen ahut ke Pehem athak inghun kesa malomsonat, lason ahut seta latum mukam along kedo nangji mate kecheterek nangji, la
Ahut pen ahut ke arnikangsam pen ha adap ansi inghun sachot, lapen inghun kechirung lote latum kecheterek-lo. Inghun chirung-lote latum dampo.
La nini non, chiklo ejon non, ningkan isinon, mate la an sose non, Pehem athak inghun satik ke latum damdelo; bonta la chirung lote, latum dampo.
Latum mukam cheparjap lapen chephri, Moses aphan
Moses aphan
“Rat kehangpetji aphan lapen mukam kephriji aphan rup apong-ut hini selamnon.
Pong-ut hini pen kebut ajirding-lote, Ne kedo A-pehem ajakan along nangdung rat atum kompet chingrum nangpo.
Bonta isi apong-ut si arki dochot-lo pulote, arotin ajalin atumsi nangdung komchen pen chingrumchotpo.
Kebut arki thihek lote, nihang kedo akhei atum amukam chephrisi thurnangpo.
Phongni abatai kebut arki thihek lote nitur kedo akhei atum si mukam chephri si thurnangpo. Lasonsi mukam kephriji aphan kebut arki pathihek nangji,
bonta rat kehangpetji aphan ke, kebut arki ajir padinglen nangji.
Pong-ut-heihei ke Aaron, kurusar asopo atumsi but nangji.”
Kevangji arni anta bangso ketok aron-heihei si talon nangji.
Nangdet along jongsi nangtum ron kedo ahut, nangtum aphan nang-ketengkheng ahotur pen kechedan ahut, lahei apong-ut penle butnon. Ne, nang Arnam

Lapen ke ning-arong asek ahut nangtum Chiklo Kemi Arong-aje-heihei lapen nangtum akaprek dhorom, arong-aje-heihei ahut nangtum kephrin athok-heihei lapen kejelang athok-heihei kepi ahut nangtum pong-ut but nangpo. anke Ne nangrappo. Ne nang Arnam
Rat atum Ijip ke-o hini aningkan, hini achiklo ingkoi arni,
lapen Sinai Asangti ajo pen Israel atum kebar pangcheng-lo. Paran akejejangtang ajosi inghun salo.
Moses pen ajok

lapen latum aphongtin kecheterek ahut, latum kai atengthotsi adeng angthun ateng chedamrep-lo. Judah akhei keja aber kedo asong an bar paphrangpo, asong pen asong, Nashon, la Amminadab asopo si ja ponpo.
Nethanel, la Zuar asopo, ke Issakar akhei asong aphan ja ponpo,
lapen Eliab, la Helon asopo ke Zebulun akhei ajalinlo.
Anke Pehem ke phri parunhuppo, lapen la kepon atum Gershon lapen Merari aro pon si bar paphrangpo.
Adunthu, Reuben akhei pen keja aber kedo asong atum barpo, asong pen asong barpo, Elizur, la Shedeur asopo si ja ponpo.
Shelumiel, la Zurishaddai asopo ke Simeon akhei aphan japonpo.
lapen Eliasaph, la Deuel asopo ke Gad akhei ajalinlo.
Anke Kohath a-Levi aro atum kangthir ajohton an pon si barpo. Alanglitum adunthu amukam along nangkele ahut ke Pehem ke puthot parjap et nangpo.
Adunthu, Ephraim akhei pen keja aber kedo asong an barpo, latum asong asong si barpo, Elishama, la Ammihud asopo si ja ponpo.
Gamaliel, la Pedahzur asopo ke Manasseh akhei ajalinlo,
lapen Abidan, la Gideoni asopo ke Benjamin akhei ajalinlo.
Padusi ke, Dan akhei pen keja aber kedo asong atum ke do-an asong aphan aphi kehon atumlo, latumta asong pen asong barpo, Ahiezer la Ammishaddai asopo, si songjalinlo.
Pagiel, la Okran asopo ke Asher akhei asongjalinlo,
lapen Ahira, la Enan asopo ke Naphtali akhei ajalinlo.
Lason helo kebar nangji adeng-lo, asong pen asong, Israel atum mukam phri lote barpo.
A-ongsar Hobap, la Jethro Midian asopo, aphan Moses pulo, “Nelitum aphan
Hobap thak-lo, “Kali, neli rong methangsi ne chedampo.”
Kanghon pen nelitum aphan o-ri non, “Moses pulo.” Nangli chini, nelitum kejejangtang ajo mukam kekim unji adim, lapen nanglike nelitum aphan japon unpo.
Nangli jongsi nelitum along nangdunlote,
Rat atum Sinai, inglong kangthir, ke-o ahut, latum nithom damlo. Latum mukam kechekimji adim kelongji aphan,
Latum amukamtin pen kedambom ahut anerlo ke latum aphuthak
Kechejok Asinduk kebar ahut, Moses pupo, “Thurnon,
Lapen la kesangkok ahut, alangli pupo, “Nang-chevoithu non,
Rat atum akesung alam
Kerap kelongjisi rat atum Moses aphan hangjolo; alangli
La apotsi adim amen Taberah pulo, pima hadaksi latum angbong
Israel atum along ajehak bang adet aso atumta dunlo. Latum ok kecho kehungpik atum do, lapen Israel atum amethang amatta pasimu pangcheng-lo: “Netum jongsi ajehak a-ok cholong asonte!

Ijip along ke netum lang a-ok ninghang aling cholong, lapen netum aphan thangnatta sungse. Thoithe lapen thoithebonghom, arking, jirlang aharsun, harsun ke-er, harsun kelok etum kelong alam chemathadamtha?
Bonta nonke etum ajakong damphak-lo. Non thangnatta kechoji ason ave-jatta ave bonta arnivangta manna le manna!”
(Manna ke chili amu ason, arong kelok-op pen etjo.
Rat atum barpo lapen la humpo, lapen kor along koipo mate long pen tokpo, lapen la phule along uppo, lapen ke la pen him selampo: lapen la chomat lote jangthu pen keselamtang ahim asonpo.
Ajo apor ar-e keklo ahut si manna ta nangklo dunpo.)
Rat atum amethang apehem-heihei ajakan along asong asong kecharjap-rep ahut, latum kepasimu alam Moses arjulong-lo. Alangli mathasungpik-lo, pima latum aphuthak
lapen

Nele latum aphan kepinchong kali mate latum aphan mahang kepathek kali! Kopisi kelana abangphu ason neliphan paklemtoi loma lapen latum aphan aso ason arbaksi aphusar atum aphan nangli kechak alongle anat soding nepapontoi loma?
Lapen
Neli methang ke lahei arat arpu en-un-e; lake neliphan the-ong-lo!
Lasonsi nangli neli phuthak klembomjilang pulote, neliphan jinsora nelipathilot non, anke neli nangli kechenek chechak jokphlotpo.”
Moses aphan

Ne nanghirsi hadak nangpen chingkipo, lapen nangphan ne nangkepitang ajehak akarjong nang pen ponsi latum aphan pipo, anke lahei arat arpu ke-en unji aphan latum nangphan nangrapdun unpo, lapen nang inutnat arpu en nangnelo.
Non rat atum aphan thannon, ‘Penap aphan chepangthirnon; nangtum kechoji aphan ok longji. Nangtum kechiru
Nangtum la arnisi, mate nini mate nipho, mate nikep mate ni-ingkoi ansi chochot nangji lapu kali,
bonta chiklo ajon kangthim, nangtum ano pen la nangbarbetik, kecho milihak-hetik chonangji. La plangji pima nangtum
Latum aphan kepangkrang jile dorphlup achainong lapen abiresak pathi unjima? Talo along kedo alang-ok latum aphan dorphlupjima?”
Nejakong ahoi doma?
Ansi Moses damjuilo lapen rat aphan kopima
Anke

Bang throksi kep angbong banghini ajalin abang ke Eldad lapen Medad, latum mukam arlo sakok-lo lapen Pehem along damdelo. Hadak mukam along amat karjong latum aphuthak vang-lo, latumta montri atum asonsi kehang ase pathelo.
Inut ariso Eldad pen Medad kopisi klemloma katvirsi Moses aphan thanlo.
Anke Joshua, la Nun asopo, Moses along kedodun abang, bihek penta Moses along kecherap dun abang-lo, alangli ningjelo lapen Moses aphan pulo, “Latum aphan khangnon, akehai!”
Moses thak-lo, “Nangli nelining kehang aputhak mathama? Nelining kehangke
Ansi Moses lapen Israel ajalin bang throksi kep atum mukam anat chevoilo.
Menmen amat
Lasi halaso arni kedo-an atumta, jopangthangta, lapen puthot arni anta, rat atum vo-ut chonep-lo; baduta lin suri isi plengpletik ke pangrumbomlo. Kepakrengjisi latum mukam komchen sang-lo.
Kechoji aphan dorphlup a-ok-ke dolang ahut rat atum aphan
Halaso adim ke Kibroth Hattaavah (laso alam-athe ke “Jongboho Athiri,”) pima hadaksi latum ok kechoboho atum aphan pip-lo.
Ladak pen rat atum chetereksi Hazeroth pu adimsi latum mukam chekimlo.
Kushpi a-arloso aphansi Moses chepangrilo, lapen Miriam lapen Aaron laso alam apotsi bok-lo.
Latum pulo, “Moses pen-tong
(Moses ke inut asotdut amonit, pirthe athak kedo-an amonit apar chepabimu.)
Menmen Moses Aaron lapen Miriam aphan
lapen inghun archok along
lapen
Neban Moses pen kechingki ahut ke la prekpo; laphan Nerat Israel kedo-an aputhaksi kelang abang bat-lo.
Lasi laphan ke Ne chepangnolorsi ningjeji, pachinidakji lapen tomo-chepatar ason kali; Ne arje alangli thek-long-lo! Kosonsi nangtum Neban Moses abe thursi lam keningjehailo?”
Latum aphan
inghun ta Pehem olo, Miriam areng menmen si-i keso bonloksi banghamlo, lapen herai asonsi lokphlanlo. Bangpi aphan Aaron cholangphlilo, lapen bangpi aphan keso kebonham thek-long-lo,
Moses aphan alangli pulo, “Kanghon pen, akehai, nelitum akelu apap pen apot laso aduk neli papholongrinon.
Labangpi aphan mahang kethek ahut-le a-ok ebeng an kechotang kethitang abang paplangplenang.”
Ansi
Miriam aphan ni throksi mukam angtan si padolo, lapen bangpi aphan arlo vanvetik-ke rat atum cheterek-relo.
Anke latum Haxeroth olo lapen Paran akejejangtang ajo mukam chekimlo.
Moses aphan
“Khei krehini akheitin pen inut ajalin ingvainon lapen Kanaan adet kepalangjoiji aphanle toinon, laso alongle si Ne Israel atum aphan kepipo.”
Lasi
Latum amen lahei helo: Reuben akhei pen Shammua, la Zaccur asopo;
Simeon akhei pen Shaphat, la Hori asopo;
Judah akhei pen Kaleb, la Jephunneh asopo;
Issakar akhei pen Igal, la Joseph asopo;
Ephraim akhei pen Hoshea, la Nun asopo;
Benjamin akhei pen Palti, la Raphu asopo;
Zebulun akhei pen Gaddiel, la Sodi asopo;
Joseph akhei pen (la ke Manasseh akhei aphanlo) Gaddi, la Susi asopo;
Dan akhei pen Amiel, la Gemalli asopo;
Asher akhei pen Sethur, la Mikael asopo;
Naphtali akhei pen Nahbi, la Vophsi asopo;
Gad akhei pen Geuel, la Machi asopo.
Lahei helo longle kepalangjoiji aphan Moses ketoi pinso amonit atum amenlo. Moses Nun asopo Hoshea aphan amen lar si Joshua pu irlo.
Latum aphan Moses ketoi ahut, latum aphan alangli pulo, “Nirep anat dak pen damra Kanaan adet anitur anat lutdammon lapen laso aphi inglong alongle anat lutdamnon.
Langdam non la kopi adetma, ko-an amonit ke-ongsi hadak kedoma lapen latum ko-an ingtangma?
Longle mesenma mate hingnodakma langnon, lapen rat atum kedo rongsopi arpong cheparpongpe ma mate cheparpong-chen pen tong kedoma langnon.
Longle aho-or doma lapen thengpi dothipma langnon. Lapen chenamsi hadak kepathe athesere ajehak nangtum kevang ahut vanvektu, “ (halaso ahut ke drakha arikang athe kemen pangcheng ahut-lo.)
Ansi pinso atum nirep anat damlo, lapen Rehob atovarsoding nitur anat Zin akejejangtang ajo anat pen longle lang-lo, la nirep anat Hamath atovar akrong adung-lo.

Latum kechengsi ke nitur ahin alongle anatsi lutdamlo lapen Hebron anat vang-lo, hadak Ahiman, Sheshai, lapen Talmai, lake Anakim pu kethe-keding aro asu-aso atum kedo adimlo. (Hebron ke Ijip along Zoan aphan ningkan throksi aphrang si kimlo.)

Latum Eskol pu arlok anat vang-lo, lapen hadak latum drakharikang ethik chorpet-lo, la lapu-an kardik banghini amonit atum phangki pen charchongsi van-nang-lo. Lapen latum ajehak dalim athe lapen thebo atheta vanlo.
(Laso adim amen ke Eskol Arlok pusi amen irlo pima Israel atum hadak drakharikang athik chorlo.)
Ni phlikep longle langdet aphi, kelangjoi atum
Moses, Aaron lapen Israel arat kedo-an ha Kadesh, la Paran akejejangtang ajo along chevoilo. Latum kopisi kethek-long-loma thanlo lapen latum kevan athesere rat aphan paklang-lo.
Latum Moses aphan pulo, “Nelitum longle langdamlo, lapen la mepik lapen aho-orta do-o netum thek-long lo; ladak ajehak athesere do.
Bonta hadak kedo arat atum ingtangrak lapen latum arongsopi-heiheita thepikpak, lapen parpong-chenchan. La apar kehingnonei ke akrom kethepikpak akhei nelitum thek-long-lo.
Amalek atum ke det anitur anatsi kedo; Hitti atum, Jebusi atum, lapen Amor atum ke inglong ajo si kedo; lapen Kanaan aso atum ke Mediterran Atalo akung-kungsi kedo lapen Jordan Aroi sodingsi kedo.”
Moses aphan kethak arat atum aphan Kaleb padojoilo, lapen pulo, “Eli non tengkhengdam nangpo lapen longle cherainangpo; la aputhak kehaidetji aphan eli dorphlup ajakong do.”
Bonta Kaleb along kedun amonit atum pulo, “Kali, latum aphan etum ketengkhengji ajakong ave; hadak kedo amonit atum etum apar ajakong themu.”

Lasonsi latum kelangtang alongle alam aputhak kalile alamsi Israel angbong pachethang-lo. Latum pulo, “Halaso alongle ke hadak kedo arat aphanta kechoji asok pador un-e. Hadak kedo abangphutin amonit ta ajon ding-o-a,
lapen netum akrom kethepikpak amonit aphan thek long-lo, latum Anak aso atumlo. Netum ke phelong asonsi chemathalo latum angno, lapen lapusonsi latum aphan eli lang nangji.”
Jopangthang rat atum aning runsi hangjolo.
Latum Moses lapen Aaron aphan pasimulo, lapen pulo, “La Ijip along kethilotsi akemeji mate ladak kejejangtang ajole thiseta chok!
Kopisi
Lasi latum lahin lahin chepuseroilo, “Etum aphan keja abang ingvaira Ijip chedamthujui lonang!”
Anke Moses lapen Aaron aphu longle patongbak-lo rat atum angno.
Lapen Joshua, la Nun asopo lapen Kaleb, la Jephunneh asopo, kelangjoi atum banghini aning oisi ape chingsek-lo,
lapen rat atum aphan pulo, “Netum kelang alongle ke mepik.
jongsi elitum aphan aningdok pulote, Alangli elitum aphan hadak eponpo lapen elitum aphan longle keme lapen ho-or kedo alongle epipo.
abe thur-rinon lapen hadak kedo arat atum aphan phereri. Elitum joike pen latum aphan hai-unji.
Rat atum kedo-an latum aphan arlong pen kevarbopji pusi paphere lo, bonta pehem athak
Moses aphan
Isi avur Ne toipo, lapen latum aphan pavirdetpo, bonta latum apar ke-ongmuchot lapen kangtangmuchot akhei apo nangphan nangpaplangpo!”
Bonta
latum ladak kedo arat atum aphan pupo. Latum ke nang,
Non Nang jongsi nangrat aso an aphan pathilote, nangnong karjulong akhei atum
puhurpo, la arat aphan kejejangtang ajo pathi-et-lo, pima latum aphan kepiji pu kechak alongle along latum aphan van un-edet-lo.
Lasi,
‘Ne
Lapen non,
Bonta Ne chechak-lo Ne kerenglang ason lapen Ne kedo pirthe keplengset ason,

badutame laso arat atum halaso adet lut long-le-detji. Latum Ne kedo aketurbong akethe-ang lapen Ijip along lapen kejejangtang ajo ne keklem manghumeme akam latum thek-long-lo, bonta latum nening ko-an dingma abatai abatai asat Nelang-lo lapen Nephan kroimolo.
Latum aphusar atum aphan Ne kepiji pu kechak alongle latum kai seta lutdam longlelo. Badutame Nephan kedengmo atum an la lutdam longlelo.
Bonta Neban Kaleb ke kematha prekjek lapen Nephan kroithipver apot alangli kelang alonglelo. Badutame nephan kedengmo atum an la lutdamlonglelo.
lapen non Amalek lapen Kanaan aso atum kedo arlok-heihei alangliso-asu atum chepahemphu longji. Penap chiruira longle komchen Akaba atalo anat kedo akejejangtang ajo anat lut damnon.”
Moses lapen Aaron aphan
“Nephuthak ko-ansi lahei kehingno arat atum pasimubom poma? Lahei kepasimu alam Ne arjudak-lo!
Non latum aphan laso alam thaknon: ‘Ne semetang-lo, Ne rengtik an, nangtum kehangtang asonthotsi Ne klempo. Ne,
Nangtum thiji, lapen nangtum abang arpum laso kejejangtang ajosi hijikchoji. Pima nangtum nephuthak pasimulo, nangtum angbong badu seta arta ningkan ingkoi apar kelit atum an ke lutdun longle detji.
Ne nangtum aphan hadak kepado longji aphan chechak-lo, bonta Kaleb lapen Joshua pen apar inutbakta dunde detpo.
Nangtum pulo, nangsomar atum aphan nepchekpo, bonta nangtum kedomo alongle along Ne latum aphan vanji, lapen hala ke latum ahem plangpo.
Laso akejejangtang ajosi nangtum ke thi-etpo.
Nangsomar atum kejejangtang ajo ningkan phlikep damtappo, nangtum angbong kethi padu abang thithetik an, nangtum kekroithekthe apot kesung chechaknangpo.
Nangtum apap athe apot nangtum ningkan phlikep chechak nangji, nangtum longle kelang ni phlikep, arnisi apharman ningkan isi chechak nangpo. Nebe thur lote kosonma la nangtum chinipo!
Nebe kethurjisi kechingrum kehingno arat aphan Ne la klemvekji pu ne semetang-lo. Laso akejejangtang ajo, abangphutin ta thiji. Ne
Lapen Moses longle kepalangjoitoi amonit atum, kechevoitang atum, longle kehingno alam than si rat atum alangliphan pasimu apot,
longle hingno pu alam kethan atum an,
Bonta Joshua, la Nun asopo lapen Kaleb, la Jephunneh asopo atum ke renglang, latum longle kelangjoi atumlo.

Bonta Moses pulo, “Tangte kopisi nangtum
Nangtum dam nangne.
Amalek lapen Kanaan atum aphan nangtum kechetong ahut, nangtum ron along thipo;
Tebonseta latum inglong ajo karlu damji aphan angthin chepathe lo,
Anke hadak kedo Amalek lapen Kanaan aso atum aphuthak tengkheng-lo lapen latum remdet-lo, lapen Hormah an latum aphan phlungdunlo.
Moses aphan
lahei aron Israel arat atum aphan Alangli kepiji pu alongle along kepatalonji aphan pilo.
Chainong alo ejon, biresak alo ejon, biresak mate bi ejon,
aphan kephrin athok biresak ejon mate bi ejon kepi ajontin api along elin ahim jit ajangthu pen kepangvuitang sok-sang adan
elin adrakha ahorlang pen pen van nangji.
Biresak alo kepi ahut, linni ahim aduk along elin-ra powahini ajit ajangthu kepangvuidun isi asok asang adan ason van nangji.
Laso along elin-ra powa hini adrakha ahorlangta vanrap-pet nangji. Lahei akarkli athok angnim
Chainong alo ejon
isi linni ajit ajangthu pen kepangvui linthom ahim aduk asok-sang athok,
linni adrakha ahorlang penpen pinangji. Laso athok angnim
La helo ajontin achainong alo, abiresak alo, abiresak mate abi along kepinangji lo.
Ejon pen apar api kepi ahut, laso along kepidun nangji amar pachelonchit pensi pidun nangji.
Abangphutin arong aso a-Israel atum him athok kepi ahut keklem nangji akamlo, laso angnim
Nangtum angbong kedo bang aso amonit atum aling ahut aphanle do seta, malomso aphan tame kedoverji aphan tame, him adan pilote,
Kevangji arni an setame, nangtum aphuthak lapen nangtum along kedo bang adet aso atum aphuthak seta lahei aron pensi nangrak-het-tang-lo. Nangtum lapen halatumta
Nangtum aphuthak lapen halatum aphuthak ta isinat aron lapen atang pensi klemnangpo.

Alangli latum aphan kepiji alongle along Israel arat atum kepatalonji aphan aron pilo.
Hadak kelong thesere kecho ahut, halaso angbong ajehak ke
Nangtum him kepaplang ahut sangkemi pen kepaplangcheng ahim aplang ke

Bonta Moses aphan
lapen mo aphi, Moses aphan
rat atum kechinine pen lapen kechokche klemlote, latum chainong alo ejon kephrin athok pinangji, laso angnim
Rat aphan kurusar si aron atengpen kepangthir akam klempo, lapen latum aphan diyadetpo, pima kechokche ke aningkehanghe pen kali lapen latum halatum apap athok isi kecho athok
Israel arat kedo-an lapen bang adet aso nangtum angbong kedo an atum aphanta diya-etpo, pima abangphutinta kechokche along cheto dunlo.
Mane abangphu apap jongsi mathakrang pen klemlote, alangli ningkan isi arta abi api pap athok pinangji.
Dovan along kurusar halabangso amonit apap kepangthirji aphan aron ateng pen kepangthir akam klempo, lapen alangliphan diya detpo.
Lasonthotsi mathakrang pen pap keklem atum aphan lason aron dolo, Israel amethang amonit tame mate bang adet aso tame.
Bonta badutame, det arlo abangphu mate bang adet aso tame pap chinilor pen klembom pulote,
pima
Ehut isi, Israel atum kejejangtang ajo kedo ahut inut amonit aphan Kesang-arni theng-kere thek-long-lok-lo.
Alangliphan Moses, Aaron lapen rat kedo-an along pondet-lo,
lapen la aphan pahonding lo, pima alangliphan kopisi inghoi nangjima la chinidakde.
Anke Moses aphan
La apotsi rat atum do-an la aphan mukam angtan ponsi
Moses aphan
lapen Israel aphan laso alam paputoilo: “Nangtum ape ano abu bu nangji lapen abutin along akelu ahon ari kokdun nangji. Laso akam ke nangtum mo kevangji arni anta klem nangji.

Pe-abu ke isi kechemathaji aphanlo, aphongtin nangtum la kechelang ahut nangtum ne hukum-heihei chematha dampo, lapen lahei kroinon; anke nangtum Ne pen suiselo, lapen nangtum aningkehang lapen kar-i aling klemklelo.
Pe abu ke Ne hukum an kebiji aphan si pachematha po, lapen nangtum Ne mar binong plangpo.
Ne ke nangtum Arnam
Non Korah, la Izhar asopo, la Kohath asopo, la Levi asopo, lapen Dathan lapen Abiram, latum Eliab asopo, lapen On asopo, la Peleth asopo, latum Reuben asopomar atum,
latum pinso amonit ponlo, lapen latum Israel arat bangpharo hinira bangphokep ajalin penpen Moses angno thurkrap-lo, lahei amonit atum kechingrum arat angbong pen kangvaitang arlengkethe atumlo;
latum Moses lapen Aaron along chingrumpet-lo, lapen latum aphan pulo, “Nangtum chepaklang-ong-lo! Rat atum kedo-an
Moses la arjulongsi, alangli domkhrupsi ardomlo.
Anke alangli Korah lapen alangliphi keduntoi atum aphan pulo, “Penap adap eli komat amarloma
La klemnon: mephik aharlung ponnon, Korah lapen alangli ri sangho kedo-an;
lahei along me akri binon lapen
Korah aphan Moses ningje bomlang. “Arjutha, nang Levi atum!
Israel arat pen nangtum aphan Arnam kepaprekdakji la lamso putong nangtum kemathama, anke alangli phan nangtum patebok unpo, lapen
Nangtum aphan Alangli la paklemlong-lo, lapen kadokave a-Levi atum ta laso aman dolo, lapen nonke nangtum kurusarta kechoji nangning hang-lo!
Nangtum Aaron aphuthak kepasimu ahut, la ke chenamsi
Anke Dathan lapen Abiram aphan Moses pahang-lo, bonta latum pulo, “Netum vangve!
Nang netum aphan aho-or kedo a-Ijip pen nevanlo, lapen dak kejejangtang ajo netum aphan kepathiji pu kevan anta dorde langma? Nang netum aphuthakta chepahemphuji aphan pu kalima?

Nang chenamsi netum aphan aho-or kedo alongle along le kevanji lapu kali, mate netum aphan hidi lapen drakha aberi nekepijile nekevan kali, non nang netum aphan nekechobei jisi kebor-ilo. Netum vangve!”
Moses aningthihak-lo, lapen
Korah aphan Moses pulo, “Penap
Nangtum abangphutin amethang me akri aharlung cheponpo, la along mephik batpo, lapen dovan along la pajirpo.”
Lasi abangphutinta amethang ame akri aharlung cheponlo, labangso athak me akri lapen mephik bat-lo, la along mephik bi po, lapen jakan along Moses lapen Aaron penpen pehem ajakan along arjap-lo.
Anke Korah abang do-an arat aphan pangrumlo, lapen latum Moses lapen Aaron aphan pangnosi Pehem ajakan along arjap-lo. Menmen amat
lapen Moses lapen Aaron aphan
“Lahei arat atum pen nangphi chepahelonon, lapen Ne latum aphan pavirklungpo.”
Bonta Moses lapen Aaron longle athak tongbaksi ardomlo, lapen ningjelo, “O Arnam, nang ke kadokave achethe atirilo. Inut amonit pap klemlote, kadokave arat aphan nangning thijima?”
Moses aphan
“Korah, Dathan lapen Abiram apehem-heihei pen rat aphan pacheterektoinon.”
Anke Moses lapen Israel ajalin atum Dathan lapen Abiram along damlo.
Rat atum aphan alangli pulo, “Lahei kehingno amonit atum pen karjap chepahelo non, lapen latum amar aputhak thangnatta ot-ri. Kalite, latum apap-heihei along nangtum amatta virdun-klungpo.”
La apotsi, Korah Dathan, lapen Abiram apehem-heihei pen latum cheterek-lo.
Dathan lapen Abiram, latum apiso asomar atum penpen nangbarsi latum apehem ajakan along arjaphrong-lo.
Rat atum aphan Moses pulo, “Lahei kadokave akam keklemji aphan kosonsi
Lahei amonit atum jongsi Arnam pen aduk kepi ave lapen aron pen si thi-lo pulote,
Bonta
Alangli lam kethan kejut pen amat, Dathan lapen Abiram atum karjap adim alongle chephlakdak-si chingpudang-lo,
lapen Korah aphi kedun atum an lapen halatum amar kedo-an penpen halatum ahem asangho atum aphan longle joilut-lo.
Lasonsi latum kethitang atum apirthe arlo akereng amat, latum amar atar penpen damlo. Latum aphuthak longle angho chinghip-lo, lapen latum avedet-lo.
Latum kehangjo ase hadak kedo a-Israel arat atum arjulongsi bephlung-lo. Latum hang-lo, “Katnon! Longle etum aphan ta ejoiluttahai!”
Anke Kekar ang ame ade
Moses aphan

“Me kechotang amonit atum arideng pen tam amethek aharlung kepaterekjile Aaron kurusar asopo Eleazar aphan punon, lapen along kaprek adimle methek aharlung pen hokvai pavardamnon, pima methek aharlung ke ingthir-et.
Lahei
Ansi Eleazar kurusar abang methek aharlung-heihei ponlo lapen lahei dovan adip paselamlo.
Lake Israel arat aphan isi kepacheretoi alamlo, Aaron aso-asu atum apar ke baduta
Puthot arni rat atum Moses lapen Aaron aphan pasimulo, lapen pulo, “Nangtum ajehak
Latum kedo-an Moses lapen Aaron aphuthak kekhinde aphan chingrumdet aphi, latum Pehem anat chetevarlo, lapen la aputhak inghun kebanglu thek-long-lo, lapen
Moses lapen Aaron atum Pehem athengno arjapding-lo,
lapen Moses aphan
“Lahei arat pen kedo chepahelonon lapen latum karjap adim amat Ne latum aphan pavirdetpo!” Latum banghinita longle athak ardomkhrup-lo,

lapen Aaron aphan Moses pulo, “Nang methek aharlung ponnon, la along dovan pen me akri enra binon, lapen me-akri athak ajehak hijung binon. Anke la pon-ra rat anglum damseraknon lapen latum aphan aron ateng pen kepangthir akam klemdamnon. Seraknon!

Aaron kroilo, lapen alangli amethek aharlung ponsi katvir pen rat atum kechingrum anglum lutdamlo. Avur nanglutang-lo pu alangli chinisi alangli me akri along hijung tailo lapen rat aphan aron ateng pen kepangthir nangji akam klemlo.
Laso amat pen avur salo, lapen alangliphan ke kereng lapen kethi atum angbong si arjapnang-lo.
Kethi atum aphai bang suri krephlira bang pharothroksi, lapen Korah akethurkrap along kethidun atum aphai ke lakha ponpedet-lo.
Avur keklip ahut, Aaron ta Pehem ajakan along kedo Moses along chevoilo.
Moses aphan
“Nangliphan krehini achin nangkepijile Israel arat aphan thannon, akheitin ajalin pen isi si. Achintin alongta amen pachetok-repnon,
lapen Levi ahin pen kechetoi aphan Aaron amen toknon. Abangphutin akhei ajalin atum arideng chin isi donangji.
Lahei Ne kedo A-pehem along ponnon, lapen lahei Kechejok Asinduk, Ne nangliphan kechetong adimle binon.
Lapen Ne kangvai amonit achin la ke chingjokpo. Lasonsi nangtum aphan Israel arat atum kaike kepasimu akam pangtonkokpo.”
Lasi Israel atum aphan Moses pulo, lapen abangphutin ajalin atum alangliphan ehonghong achin pirep-lo, isi pen ehong, kadokave hong krehini, lapen lahei along Aaron achinta bi dunlo.
Kechejok Asinduk athengno Moses lahei achin do-an Pehem arlo pilo.
Puthot arni, Moses Pehem arlo kelutdam ahut, Levi akhei pen ketoi Aaron achin ke chingjoktang-lo la alangli thek-long-lo. La chingjok-lo, lapen pangpharlo lapen badam athe mentang-lo!
Moses kadokave achin an ponsi Israel atum aphan lahei paklangdamlo. Kopi plang-loma latum thek-long-lo, lapen abangphutin ajalin atum amethang achin che-enthulo.
Moses aphan
hukum kepi atengsi Moses klemlo.
Israel arat atum Moses aphan pulo, “Langtha la ke netum aphan kevirlo!
Badutame Pehem adung kevang aling thiveknangji, pu netum kadokaveta thi-et nangjima?”
Aaron aphan
Nangtum adon arap, Levi akhei an nang lapen nangsomar atum Pehem along kangduk ahut nangparapdunjile hang petnon.

Latum nangphan adeng an lapen Pehem along kam arpu an papleng nangji, bonta latum Kangthir Adim amar mate dovan along kangthir-et amar ot-edet nangji. Latum ot-lote, latum lapen nangtumta thirappet nangji.
Latum nangtum pen kam klempo, lapen Pehem along akam an arpu latum papleng nangji, bonta a-ot kave abangphu atum ke nangtum pen kam klemkledetpo.
Nang lapen nangsomar atumsi Kangthir Adim akam arpu papleng unchotji, anke Ne ning kethi Israel arat aphuthak puthot kloklelo.

Ne si nang chephochero Levi atum aphan Israel atum angbong pen kangvai abang-lo, la nangtum aphan isi kepanong adan asonlo. Latum Nephan nehodaitang-lo, anke latum Pehem along akam latum adeng cheklem unpo.

Bonta dovan along kecherap lapen Kangthir Adim along kurusar akam an arpu ke nang lapen nangsomar atumsi klemnangji. Lahei ke nangtum arpulo pima Ne nangtum aphan kurusar adan nangpilo. Badutame kangthir-et amar adung kevang abang aling aphan pathilotpo.”
Aaron aphan

Dovan along kephrinphre kangthirnei athok, lahei ke nangpharmanlo: sok-sang adan-heihei, pap athok-heihei, lapen preng kechetu athok-heihei Nephan kepajir kangthir-et athok anke nang lapen nangsomar atum apharmanlo.
Lahei nangtum kangthir adimsi chonangji, lapen pinsomar atumsi la cholongchotji; lahei ingthir-et pura mathanon.”

La apar, Israel atum kevan kepa-nong adan an ke nangtum apharmanlo. Ne lahei nang, nangsomar lapen nangsopimar atum aphan kaike mo kevangji arni an aphan nangpitang-lo. Nanghemtun angbong badutame aron ateng pen kangthir-et aling abang lahei pachotame.
Aningkanvang Israel atum kepathecheng adan kevan akeme an ke nangtum aphansi Ne nangkepilo: Jit ajangthu, drakha ahorlang, lapen sok.
La kadokaveta nangtum apharmanlo. Nanghemtun angbong badutame aron ateng pen kangthir-et abang aling la pachonang.
Israel atum ke-en kertang amar Nephan kehodai an ke nangtum amarlo.

Anut-tin asokleng, mate pi keching-thokcheng aso Nephan Israel atum nekepi anke nangtum amarlo. Bonta sokleng kechenamji anam ke nangtum dengvek nangji, lapen aron ateng pen kangthirthe kechingthokcheng pi aso kechenamthuji anam nangtum dengvek nangji.
Kejor-kelang anam ateng sokleng chiklo ejon arta ahut rup dumpho kepathik anam ateng pen chenamdunthu un.

Bonta Kechingthokcheng achainong aso, abiresak aso, lapen abi aso ke chenamthu nangnelo; lahei ke Nemarlo lapen arkli vek nangji. Lahei avi dovan anat dungnon, lapen athu ke kecho athok aphan phrinnon, laso angnim Nephan ningpangsamlo.
Lahei along a-ok-ke nangtum apharmanlo, la ke aningthang lapen aphi akeng kepanong athok asonlo.
Nephan Israel atum kepanong pen kevan athok an ke Ne nang, nangsopomar, lapen nangsopimar atum aphan kaike aphansi nangkepilo. La ke nang lapen nangso-nangsu atum pen Ne kephri un-epin akechejok-lo.
Aaron aphan
Kaprek a-Israel atum ke Pehem along vang-ra latum aphuthak kethi chohang nangnelo.
Non penke Levi atumsi Pehem aputhak lanapo lapen la arpu an klempo. La ke nangso-nangsu atum aphan seta kevangji arni anta kepathik aronlo. Israel along Levi atumta kedover amar chepahemphu longlelo,
pima Israel atum kepanong pen Nelong kevan kechirung ason adan aphan kep pen ephan latum kechepahemphu-jisi Ne pitang-lo. La apotsi Ne latum aphan pulo, latum Israel along kedover amar longlelo.”
Moses aphan
lapen Levi atum aphan papulo: “Nangtum kechepahemphuji aphan Israel atum
Laso kepanong adan ke saiketiki atum sok-kemi lapen drakha ahorlang kemi kepi athok pen chingbarchit pusi lakhalo.
Lasonsi nangtumta Israel atum pen kedeng aphan kep pen ephan an pen
Nangtum kelong pen akemeneile pinon.
Kemesen apharman nangtum pilote, ahin ke nangtum chebitamelo, la ke sai ketiki abang dan pi-et aphi amethang ahin an kechebi ason lo.
Nangtum lapen nanghemtun abang-phu atum nahoktame chodamtame, pima la ke nangtum Pehem along kam keklemdun anamlo.
La kecho ahut nangdai avelo, nang akemenei angkleng
Moses lapen Aaron aphan
lapen Israel atum aphan lahei aron pathantoilo: Moses lapen Aaron along ake-ang achainong api la kam paklemklepinlang lapen thangnat akehingno ta ave achainong vannon,
lapen latum Eleazar kurusar aphan pinon. La mukam ingtan pondet si alangli ingno pathi nangji.
Anke Eleazar abang la ajehak avi ensi Pehem anat batai throksi arichimun pen arsipo.
Pi abang arpum kangthim, areng, a-ok, avi lapen aphek-angthin penpen kurusar angno phrinpo.
Anke alangli ajehak kedar athengpi, thengprang abap epeng, arri ke-er, ejeng ensi halahei me arlo varchui nangpo.
Laso aphi alangli pe-ri chechok nangji lapen abang lang chedung masi, ansi alangli mukam lutdam longji; bonta arnikangsam an alangli aron ateng pen ingthirthelang.
Chainong kephrin abangta ape-ri chechok nangji lapen abang lang chedung masi, bonta alangli jokta arnikangsam an aron ateng pen ingthirthelang.

Anke aron ateng kangthir abangphu si chainong amepun pangrumpo, lapen mukam angtang, aron ateng pen kangthir adim, aron ateng pen kangthirthe ason kepakakji le Israel arat ke-enjile kopipi kesik alang kedo adimsi lahei bi po. Laso aron ke pap kepakakji aphanlo.
Thek-lo kepangrum abang ape-ri chechok nangji, bonta la ha arnikangsam anta ingthirthelo. Laso aron ke mo kevangji arni an aphantalo, Israel lapen latum along kedo bang adet amonit atum aphan ta lo.
Komatma kethi arpum ke-ot abang aling la aron ateng pen ni throksi an ingthirthelo.

Alangli kethom arni lapen throksi arni kechepangthir alang pen amethang aphan chepangthir nangji, la ansi alangli ingthirpo. Bonta jongsi kethom lapen throksi arnita alangli chepangthrithelang pulote, la ingthirthelo.
Badutame kethi arpum ot-lo, lapen amethang chepangthirthe pulote la ingthirthe si dolang, pima kepangthir alang la aphuthak dungdelang. Alangli
Mane jongsi pehem arlo thilot-lo, lapen kethi ahut pehem along kedo abang mate hadak kelut abang aling ni throksi an aron ateng pen ingthirthelo.
Pehem arlo kedo Adip alangbong lapen aphule tin ingthirthetang-lo.
Mane jongsi kepathitang amonit aphan ot-lote, mate kethi nangji aron pen ingtan thilot mate monit arrepi thiri along ot-lote, alangli ni throksi an ingthirthelo.
Kangthirthe kepavedetji aphan, pap kepakak aphan kephrin ake-ang achainong amepun ajehak ponsi phule arlo thap nangji lapen la along aroi alang kemi dung nangji.

Aphrangsi ke, mane aron ateng pen kangthir-et abang thengphrang abap abu ensi lang along la nim nangpo, lapen pehem, la arlo kedo amar an lapen hadak kedo amonit an aputhak arsi nangji. Adunthu ke, mane aron ateng pen kangthir-et abang si monit arrepi mate kethi arpum mate thiri ke-ot amonit abangphan laso alang arsi nangji.

Kethom lapen throksi arni kangthirthe abangphu aphuthak aron ateng pen kangthir abangsi lang arsi po. Throksi arni kepho abang ape-ari chechok-et lapen lang abang chedung et aphi alangli la aphan pangthirpo, arnikangsam apor alangli aron ateng pen ingthirpo.
Badutame aron ateng pen ingthirthelang pulote, lapen amethang chepangthirthe-lang pulote, ingthir-et-elang, pima kepangthir-i alang alangli phuthak dungdelang. Alangli
Nangtum lahei aron mo kevangji arni anta talonbom nangji. Kepangthirji alang karsi abang amatta alangli pe-ri chechok nangji; badutame lang ke-ot aling abangta arnikangsam an ingthirthelo.
Kangthirthe amonit ke-ot amar aling ingthirthelo, lapen lahei ke-ot abang aling arnikangsam an ingthirthe lo.
Kecheng achiklo Israel arat kedo-an Zin akejejangtang ajo nang lelo, lapen Kadesh along mukam chekimlo. Hadaksi Miriam thi-lo lapen pip-lo.
Latum mukam kekim adim lang ave, la apotsi rat atum Moses lapen Aaron aphan kompetsi chingrumlo,
lapen pasimulo: “Netum akorte do-an pen
Kopisi nangtum netum aphan laso akejejangtang ajo nekevanloma? Netum kepangreng api penpen ladak kepathi-etji aphanma?
Kopisi nangtum netum aphan Ijip adet pen ladak thangnatta kereng-re adim nangkevanlo? Sok ta ave, thebota ave, drakha atheta ave, dalim atheta ave. Ladak kejunji aphanta lang ave!”
Moses lapen Aaron rat atum pen cheterek-lo, lapen Pehem ajakan along arjap-lo. Longle athak latum amahang patongbak-lo, lapen
Moses aphan

“Kechejok Asinduk athengno kedo achin pon-ra, nang lapen Aaron, do-an arat aphan pangrumnon. Hadak latum angno le hadak kedo arlong aphan ningje non, lapen hadak pen lang ingbopsi nangchonpo. Lasonsi nangtum rat aphan arlong pen lang van pipo, latum aphan lapen latum api kejunji aphanlo.”
Moses damlo lapen
Arlong athengno Moses lapen Aaron atum rat aphan pangrumlo, lapen Moses pulo, “Arjutha, nang kethurkrap atum! Netum laso arlong pen lang nangpalongpi nangjima?”
Anke Moses achin chirung-lo, lapen alangli arlong aputhak batai hini theng-lo, lapen thedung alangjeng alang nangbarlo, lapen kedo-an amonit atum lapen pi atum junlo.
Bonta Moses lapen Aaron aphan
La Meribah alongplang-lo, hadak Israel arat atum
Edom arecho aphan Moses Kadesh pen pherangke atum toilo. Latum pulo, “Laso abirta ke nangli don pen, Israel akhei pen. Nelitum kesung kephonang alam nangli chini,
kopusonsi neliphusar atum Ijip adet kedamloma, hadak nelitum ongdung aningkan dolo. Nelitum aphusar lapen nelitum aphan Ijip aso atum nechenek-lo,
lapen nelitum kerap kelongjisi

Kanghon pen nangli longri kedongputji ahukum nelipitha. Nelitum lapen nelitum api an tovar pen suiselo, mate hidi ajo mate drakha aberi ajo damdelo, lapen nanglitum alangtuk pen lang junjelo. Nangli longri parpetik-ke nelitum tovarpisame alongsi dopo.”
Bonta Edom aso atum thak-lo, “Netum adet angbong kedongputji aphan netum bida thothe! Nanglitum jongsi bor-ilote, nelitum vangpaksi nanglitum aphan tengkhengpo.”
Israel arat atum pulo, “Nelitum tovarpi alongsi dopo, lapen jongsi nelitum mate pi atum jongsi nanglitum alangtuk pen lang junlote, laso anam nelitum pipo, nelitum ke damlongput antame.”
Edom aso atum puthulo, “Netum pipe!” Lapen Israel arat aphan ketengkhengjisi jakong thedung aron-armu pen barlo,
pima Edom aso atum latum alongri angbong Israel atum aphan padongput longle, Israel atum chiruisi akaprek atovar anat chedamlo.
Israel arat atum Kadesh olo, lapen Hor Anglong along nanglelo,
la Edom ahoi akung. Hadaksi Moses lapen Aaron aphan
“Ne Israel aphan kepiji pu kechak alongle along Aaron lutdun longle lo; alangli thipo, pima nangtum banghini Meribah along Ne hukum kroikre lo.
Aaron lapen asopo Eleazar aphan Hor Anglong anat ponnon,
lapen hadak Aaron aphan kurusar achoi phlok si Eleazar aphuthak pangchoi non. Hadaksi Aaron thipo.”
hukum kepi atengsi Moses klemlo. Latum Hor Anglong kadokave arat angno damlo,
lapen Aaron aphan kurusar achoi Moses phlok-lo, lapen la Eleazar aphan pangchoilo. Hadak inglong athak-si Aaron thilo, lapen Moses lapen Eleazar nangchevoilo.
Aaron thitang-lo pu rat atum chinilo, lapen latum kadokave alangliphan ni thomkep chirulo.
Atharim atovar pen Israel atum nitur a-Kanaan ahin anat vangtang-lo pu Kanaan arecho Arad arjulongsi, latum aphan alangli tengkheng-lo, lapen latum ajehak aphan nep-lo.
Anke Israel atum
Latum aphan
Israel atum Hor Anglong olo, lapen Akaba atalo chetok anat kedam atovar pen ajok damsi Edom ahoi akung-kung damlo. Bonta tovar angbong rat atum chepaningding un-edet-lo,

lapen Arnam aphan lapen Moses pasimulo. Latum pasimusi, pulo, “Nangtum netum aphan kopi apotsi Ijip adet pen vansi laso asangtimili ajo nepathijile nekevanlo, ladak an ta ave mate lang ta kave adim nekevanma? Lason keningjoino a-an pen netum arjap pathir un-elo!”
Anke rat atum angbong
Rat atum Moses along vang-lo lapen pulo, “Netum
Anke tasam pen bitoi apherui paselam pen archok athak kepavek-lokjisi Moses aphan
Lasi Moses bitoi apherui selamlo lapen la archok athak vek-lok-lo. Karchu kepholongtang atum an bitoi apherui aphan langpo lapen medetpo.
Israel atum dambomlo, lapen Oboth along mukam chekimlo.
Laso adim odet aphi, latum Abiram keru-heihei anat, la ke Moab alongri nihang akejejangtang ajo along mukam chekimlo.
Anke latum Zered Arlok along mukam chekimlo.
Hadak pen latum puthot cheterekthusi Arnon Aroi anirep anat mukam chekimlo, Amor alongri anat keledam akejejangtang ajo anat-lo. (Arnon lake Moab lapen Amor atum angbong ahoilo.)
La apotsi
“...Suphah alongri
along Waheb arongso, lapen Arnon Arlok-heihei;
lapen arlok-heihei ajeng kele ha Ar arongso
lapen Moab ahoi anat an.”
Hadak pen latum dambomsi Beer pu alanghe adim lelo, hadaksi Moses aphan
Halaso ahut Israel atum laso alun lunlo:
“Chon-kang-kangnon! O langhe-heihei,
La lunnon, Nangli lang palong-lo;
Lapen nelitum Nangliphan lun pen ardomlo-
Recho atum kehut alangtuk
Lapen rat ajalin atum ketuk,
Recho achin pen ketuk
Lapen halatum chin-heihei pen tuk-lo.”
Latum kejejangtang ajo pen cheterek si Mattanah along damlo,
lapen hadak pen latum dambomsi Nahaliel an damlo, lapen Nahaliel pen Bamoth an,
lapen Bamoth pen Moab ahoi arlok an, Pisgah anglong aber, hadak pen sangtimili ajo checharlo.
Anke Israel arat atum Amor arecho Sihon aphan kepathanjisi pherangke atum aphan toilo;

“Nelitum aphan nanglitum adet padam longput tha. Nelitum lapen nelitum achainong tovar pen suiselo, lapen nanglitum ahidi mate drakha aberi bithe damdelo, lapen nanglitum alangtuk-heihei pen lang junjelo; nanglitum adet parpetik ke nelitum tovarpi pen suiselo.”
Bonta Sihon ke Israel arat aphan alangli det angbong padamput longledet-lo. Alangli methang aron-armu pangrum lo lapen ha kejejangtang ajo Jahaz anat damlo, lapen Israel atum aphan tengkheng-lo.

Bonta ron kechedan along Israel atum ongdung ahotur atum aphan pathilo lapen halatum alongle Arnon Aroi pen Jabbok anirep an cheraidet-lo, la Ammon atum ahoi an, pima Ammon atum kecherai pangtangthip-lo .
Lasi Israel atum Amor atum arongsopi an cherailo, Heshbon lapen la komchen arongso an lapen hadak kedo pathir lo.
Heshbon ke Amor atum arecho Sihon, det arongsopi akut-lo, la aphrang Moab arecho pen chedansi la adet Arnon Aroi an kecherai abang lo.
La apotsi lunse atum lunlo,
“Heshbon along vangnon, Sihon Recho arongso along!
Netum la kekimthu lapen kepamethu kelangji ninghang;
La Moab along Ar arongsopi pavirlo
Lapen Arnon athak anglong-heihei cho-et-lo.
Nangphan ko-an kepherememe loma, Moab arat atum!
Nang Kemosh aphan karcho atum an nang pavirtang-lo!
Nang arnam ke monit atum along kapreksi pachepachong-toilo,
Lapen so arlo atum ke Amor arecho arideng abanpi plang-lo.
Bonta non la aso-asu anta pavirtang-lo,
Heshbon pen Dibon atovar-sodingta,
Nashim pen Nophah, la Medeba adung an.”
Lasonsi Israel atum Amor alongri ajo do pathirlo,
lapen Moses ke Jazer arongsopi ketengkhengji akemenei atovar keparijisi monit toilo. La Israel atum cheraidet-lo, lapen la kekomchen aron-aso kedo-anta, lapen hadak kedo Amor atum aphan phlung-et-lo.
Anke Israel atum nangchiruilo, lapen Bashan anat atovar enlo, lapen Bashan arecho Og, Edrei along latum aphan ketengkhengjisi alangli aron-aso atum penpen bar-lo.
Moses aphan
Lasonsi Israel atum Og aphan pathilot-lo, asopomar aphanta pathilo, lapen la arat atum hadak kereng lang atum avedet-lo, lapen latum la adet cheraipidet-lo.
Israel atum dambomlo, lapen Jeriko angno, Jordan anihang Moab athoi along mukam chekimlo.
Israel atum Amor aso aphan kopisi keklemloma lapen Israel atum ko-an ake-ong-loma laso alam Moab arecho, Balak, la Zippor asopo, lahei arjulongsi,
alangli lapen alangli rat atum pherepik-lo.
Midian ajalin atum aphan Moab atum pulo, “Laso ahur ke elitum adung arei kopi doma pavir-etpo, bap ajole chainong alo kechopan asonpo.”

Lasi Balak recho, Beor asopo Balaam aphan kepahangjisi pherangke atum toilo, alangli ke Pethor, la Euphratis Aroi adung. Amaw adet si kedo. Alangliphan Balak pen lason abirta si vanlo: “Ijip adet pen isi akhei vang-lo laso alam nangli pachiniji neli ingtung, laso akhei atum bitheta chehijikthip, lapen nelitum adetta kecheraidetji aphan isi kephere dolo.

Latum aphai netum aphan nelit-lo, lasi kanghon pen vang iktha, lapen neliphan ajok latum aphan ahirjuno pitha. Anke netum latum aphan parem unjimene lapen latum aphan det pen phlung unjimene. Neli chinilo, nangli jongsi ahirjume hang-lote rat atum ahirjume longpo, lapen nangli jongsi ahirjuno hang-lote, latum ahirjuno phopo.”
Lasi Moab lapen Midian ajalin atum ahirjuno kepi anam che-ponsi Balaam along damlo, lapen alangliphan Balak abirta pilo.
Latum aphan Balaam pulo, “Ningve dak-le dokoknon, lapen
Balaam along Arnam vangsi arjulo, “Lahei nanglong kesakok amonit atum komat-lo?”
Alangli thak-lo, “Neliphan kepathanjisi Moab arecho Balak, latum aphan nelilong nangtoilo.

Ijip adet pen isi akhei vang lo lapen det adang bithe dothip-lo si pu. Alangli phan ajok latum aphan neli ahirjuno hangpi nangji si pu, anke alangli latum pen chedan unpo, lapen latum aphan phlung unpo.”
Balaam aphan Arnam pulo, “Lahei amonit atum along dun-ri, lapen Israel arat aphuthak ahirjuno hangpiri, pima latum Ne hirjume dotang-lo.”
Puthot arni Balak apherangke atum along Balaam damlo, lapen pulo. “Hem chedamnon, Arnam nephan nanglitum along nepadun longle.”
Lasi latum Balak along chevoilo, lapen latum along Balaam nangkedunji molo pu alam thanlo.
Anke Balak ongdung ajalin atum aphan nangtoilo, latum ke aphrang apar arleng themuchot atumlo.
Latum Balaam along damlo, lapen alangliphan Balak pen laso abirta pilo: “Kanghon pen nelilong kevangji aphan thangnatta pakhang longrinon!
Nangliphan neli thedung anong-e nangpipo, lapen nangli kepu aling klempo. Kanghon pen vang iknon, neli pharman lahei rat aphan ahirjuno hangnon.”
Bonta Balaam thak-lo, “Balak jongsi neliphan alangli rechohem pen ser lapen rup kedo-an nelipi seta neli ne Arnam
Bonta kanghon pen ningve dokoknon, akaprek atum kedo ason, anke neli nangdun nangjima nangdun nangnema
Halaso aningve Balaam along Arnam vang-lo lapen arjulo, “Lahei amonit atum along dun nangji pu nangpulote, kedunjile chesiknon, bonta ne kopima nangphan nangkethan lale klemchotnon.”
Lasi puthot adap Balaam amethang agadha athak charthang-lo, lapen Moab ajalin atum along dunlo.
Balaam kedun apot Arnam ke aningthilo, lapen Balaam agadha athak charthangsi dambomlo, alanglilong aban atum banghinita dunlo alangli tovar kekhangpet jisi tovar along sining apherangke arjap-lo.
Hadak nokjir otsi sining apherangke karjapther gadha thek-longsi, la tovar suilo, lapen hidi ajo anat damlo. Balaam gadha aphan arbulo, lapen puthot tovar anat vanthudet-lo.
Anke pherangke abang tovarso ajamkebi drakha arong rongni adak arjap-lo, lapen pu pu ahin ta arlong arpong dolo.
Pherangke aphan gadha thek-longsi la arpong anatsi suilo, lapen Balaam akeng padairop-lo. Balaam puthot gadha aphan arbulo.
Puthot aphong pherangke abang aphrang nangcheterek chot-lo; alangli hihi kechingkinnei adim arjap-lo, hadak ahin kaprek anat kesuiji atovar avepin.
Pherangke aphan gadha kethek-long laso aphong ke, la domjoilo. Balaam aning chekhang un-edet-lo lapen alangli chin pen gadha aphan karbuji pangcheng-lo.
Anke Gadha aphan keningje ajakong
Balaam thak-lo, “Pima nang nephan nechongthuilo! Ne jongsi nokjir do pulote nangphan nangpathilotji apot-lo.”
Gadha thak-lo, “Nanglikai isi angbong nangli kardonbom agadha neli kalima? Nangliphan lason neli aphrang klemloma?”
Klemkle, alangli thak-lo.
Anke Balaam aphan pherangke nokjir ke-otdong pathek-long-lo; lapen longle athak Balaam amahang patongbaksi ardomlo.
Pherangke hang-lo, Lason kopi chonghoisi nangli gadha aphan phongthom aphong ketheng-lo? Nangli tovar kekhangjisi neli vang-lo, pima nangli laso atovar dam de det nangji.
Bonta nangli gadha neliphan nangthek-long-lo, lapen batai kethom suilo. La suise pulote, ne nangliphan pathilotji apot-lo lapen gadha aphan ke pajokvongpo.
Balaam thak-lo, “Neli pap klemtang-lo. Nangli neliphan kekhangji si tovar along arjapding-lo pu neli chinine; seta non neli kedambom nangli kematha ateng hingnodak pulote, neli hem chiruijuipo.”
Bonta Pherangke thak-lo, “Lahei amonit atum pen pen dambomnon, bonta neli nangkethan alamsi thanchot nangji.” Ansi halatum penpen Balaam dambomlo.
Balaam vangbomlo pu Balak arjulongsi, Ar along alangli la aphan kechetongdunji damlo, Ar ke Arnon Aroi akung arongsopi, Moab ahoi.
Alangliphan Balak pulo, “Neli nangpahangcheng ahut nangli kopisi nangdunde det-loma? Neli nangliphan dorphlup anong-e nangpi un-e putong nangli kemathama?”
Balaam thak-lo, “Neli vang-lo, kalima? Bonta non neli kopi ajakong doloma? Arnam neliphan kopisi neli kepuma la si neli than unchot ji.”
Lasi Balak along Balaam Huzoth arongsopi,
along dunlo, hadak si Balak ke chainong lapen biresak-heihei thulo, lapen ajehak a-ok Balaam aphan pilo, lapen alanglilong kedo ajalin atum aphanta pilo.
Puthot adap Balaam aphan Balak ha Bamoth Baal pu adim ponlo, hadak pen Israel arat aphan ephar Balaam thek-long-lo.
Alangli Balak aphan pulo, “Neliphan dovan throksi nebuipinon, lapen neliphan chainong jonthroksi lapen biresak alo jonthroksi nevanpinon.”
Alangliphan kepu ateng pen Balak klemlo, lapen Balaam pen alanglitum banghini, chainong ejon lapen biresak ejon alongtin adovan along athok pajirlo.
Anke Balak aphan Balaam pulo, “Nangli kephrin athok pen ladak-le arjapthernon, neliphan
lapen Arnam alangli pen chetong-lo. Alangliphan Balaam pulo, “Neli throksi adovan buitang-lo, lapen alongtin along chainong ejon lapen biresak ejon bilo.”
Balaam kopisi keningje nangjima
Lasi alangli chevoi thulo, lapen Balak amethang kephrin athok pen Moab ajalin atum penpen karjapther thek-long-lo.
Laso kemontri alamsi Balaam ningjelo:
“Moab arecho Balak si nephan nevanlo Siria pen,
nihang anglong anat pen nevanlo.
‘Vang-ra neliphan ningjetha’ pusi alangli kepu.
‘Israel arat aphuthak ahirjuno hangnon.’
Kosonsi ne pahirjunopo, Arnam ta kepahirjunonele,
Mate kevir alam kepupoma, Arnam ta kepupele?
Arlong-heihei akangtui adim pen ne latum aphan thek-long;
Inglong-heihei pen ne latum aphan lang-lo.
Latum ke latumdetsi kedo isi akhei;
Latum chechini akaprek akhei apar latum ahirjume longmu.
Israel aso-asu ke longle aduk ason
Latum aphai kelakhaji aphai ongpik.
Arnam arat atum ason nekai pajangnang;
Dhoromi atum ason nephan pathilongnang.”
Anke Balaam aphan Balak pulo, “Neliphan nangli kopisi keklemloma? Neli nangliphan ladak kevan ke ne hotur atum aphan ahirjuno kepiji aphansi nangkevan, bonta nanglike latum aphan ahirjumesi pilo.”
Alangli thak-lo, “Neliphan
Balaam aphan Balak pulo, “Nelong along kaprek nangdunnon, hadak pen nang Israel atum aphan ajehaksi thek-longchotji. Hadak penle nepharman latum aphan ahirjuno hangnon.”
La alangliphan Zophim ahidi aphuchong lake Pisgah Anglong athak ponlo. Hadakta alangli dovan long throksi builo, lapen alongtinta chainong ejon lapen biresak ejon athok pilo.
Balak aphan Balaam pulo, “Nangli athok-heihei adungle nangli arjapthernon, hadak neli Arnam pen chetong dampo.”
Balaam aphan Arnam chetong-lo, lapen kopima kepu nangji la aphan Alangli thanlo, lapen alangli birta Balak aphan kepathan jisi toithujuilo.
Lasi alangli chevoithujuilo, lapen Balak aphan alangli kephrin athok adung Moab ajalin atum penpen karjapther thek-long-lo.
Balaam laso kemontri alam ningjelo:
“Vangnon, Balak, nang Zippor asopo,
Lapen ne kopisi kepujima arjutha.
Arnam ke monit ason kali, monit ke pachobei;
Alangli ke monit ason aning chelarvoive.
Alangli kechechak aling, la klemlo;
Alangli ningjelo, lapen la klemtang-lo.
Ne pahirjumeji aphansi pinkhat-lo,
Lapen Arnam pahirmelote, ne pachevoi un-elo.
Israel atum mo aphi akai ne thek-long-et-lo,
La akopai palangnonelo mate pasungselo.
Latum a-Arnamsi latum along dolo;
Alangli ke latum arecholo pu latum pachethang-lo.
Arnamsi latum aphan Ijip adet pen vanlo,
Chai asonsi latum aphan Alangli chedanpilo.
Ladak mekbin ave lapen thek-kere amonit ave,
Lahei pen ajok Israel akhei aphan keklem unji ave.
Non rat atum Israel aphuthak pupo,
‘Langtha, Arnam kosontong keklempilone!’
Israel akhei lake jakongkethepik ahingho ason;
La ingsek lapen cholongletik ke sangse.
La kepathitang avi junlongletik ke sangse.”
Anke Balaam aphan Balak pulo, “Israel arat aphan nangli ahirjuno kepiji molo, seta ahirjume anke pi rinon!”
Balaam thak-lo, “
Balak pulo, “Nelilong nangdunnon, lapen neli nangliphan along kaprek nangponpo. Hadak Arnam nelijoine halatum aphuthak nanglipen ahirjuno papilong tahai mene.”
Lasi alangli Balaam aphan Peor Anglong aphuchong ponlo, lapen ha sangtimili ajo anta checharlo.
Alangliphan Balaam pulo, “Neliphan dovan throksi nebui pinon, lapen jon throksi achainong alo lapen jon throksi abiresak nevanpinon.”
Alangliphan kepu atengsi Balak klemlo, lapen adovan alongtin along chainong ejon lapen biresak ejon athok pilo.
Nonke Balaam chinipamelo,
lapen Israel atum akhei akhei mukam kechekim thek-long-lo. Alangliphan Arnam Akarjong si jalo,
lapen laso kemontri alam alangli ningjelo:
“Beor asopo Balaam abirta lahelo,
Kethek-longdak amonit kepu alamthe,
Arnam kopima kepu karjulong abang.
amek-rengjeng pen ne pine kethek-long
Jakongkethe Arnam pen isi akethek-long.
Israel atum amukam-heihei langmepik,
Sotele aren arenle kedinglen ason
Mate langkung apaiberi ason,
Mate langkung ajo a-Kedar athengpi ason.
Latum ongdung arve longji
Lapen latum langkedo pame ahidi-heihei ajo chili varlongji.
Latum arecho Agag apar themuji,
Lapen la heloving lapen ajamkethe adim anta pangriji.
Arnam latum aphan Ijip pen nangvanlo;
Chainong alo asonsi latum aphan Alangli chedanpilo.
Latum ahotur aphan latum pavirlo,
Halatum arrepi parop-lo lapen athai aso ingdilo.
Laso akhei ke ejon kangtangrak ahingho ason;
La amek kejang ahut, laphan baduta ingthur haihe.
Israel aphan ahirjume kepi abang ahirjume doji,
Lapen Israel aphan ahirjuno kepi abang ahirjuno doji.”
Anke Balak jasemetsi aningthihak-lo, lapen Balaam aphan pulo, “Neli hotur aphan ahirjuno kepapijisi neli nanghang-lo, bonta non pen batai kethomlo nangli latum aphan ahirjume kepi.
Non hem chedamnon! Neli nangliphan nong-e kepijisi chechak-lo, bonta nangli nong-e kelongji pen
Balaam thak-lo, “Nangli nangketoi apherangke atum aphan neli thanlo ke, atheke
rechohem kedo-an aser lapen arup nangli neliphan nangpi-et seta nelining kehang ateng keklem pen ajok neli
Balak aphan Balaam pulo, “Non nelirong neli chedampo, bonta neli kedam aphrang, Israel arat atum mo kevangji arni kopisi nangli rat atum aphan keklempoma nangliphan neli than pacheretoilo.”
Anke alangli laso alam montrilo:
“Beor asopo Balaam abirta lahelo,
Amek pen kethek-longdak amonit alam lahelo,
Arnam kepu alam komatsi arju unji
Lapen Kangtuinei Abang pen kevang agian komatsi dengpo?
Mek-rengjeng pen neli eson thek-long-lo
La ke Theparpik Arnam pen kevang akethek-long.
Mo kevangji akai aphan neli lang-lo,
Lapen Israel akhei aphan neli thek-long-lo.
Inut arecho, keklarbong achiklolongso ason laso akhei pen nangklangji.
Kedamvoi achiklolongso asonsi Israel pen la vangpo.
Moab ajalin atum aphan alangli arbupo
Lapen Seth arat kedo-an aphan alangli sappo.
Edom along alangli hotur aphan haidetpo
Lapen halatum alongle amethang amar paplangpo,
Israel atum ke haithorbompo.
Israel akhei atum ke dong patekungbompo
Lapen padusi kerenglang aphanta pavirdetpo.”
Anke Balaam akethek-long along Amalek atum aphan thek-long lo, lapen alangli laso alam montrilo:
“Kadokave akhei angbong pen Amelek atum ke kangtangnei akheilo,
Bonta kejutsi ke latum kaike aphan virdetpo.”
Alangli akethek-long along Ken aso atum aphan thek-long-lo, lapen lason alam alangli montrilo:
“Nangtum kedo adim ke jokvan,
Kangtui a-arlong athak avotar ason jokvan,
Bonta nangtum ken aso atum virdetji
Assiria atum nangtum aphan ban nangkepon ahut.”
Balaam laso kemontri alam ningjelo:
“Nirep anat komat arat atumsi kechingrumpet-lo?
Saipras pen ketengkhengji atum vangvekpo,
Latum Assiria lapen Eber aphan haidetpo,
Bonta latumta, alar kaike aphan virklungpo.”
Anke Balaam chesik-lo, lapen ahem chevoijuilo, lapen Balakta atovarsi chedamlo.
Akasia Arlok along Israel atum mukam kechekim ahut, pinsomar atum hadak kedo Moabpi atum pen beisa klemlo.
Lahei a-arloso atum latum aphan karkli achojun along phalo, hadak Moab arnam aphan archolo. Israel atum an chodunlo lapen Baal arnam aphan,
Peor along archodunlo. La apotsi latum aphan
lapen Moses aphan pulo, “Israel ajalin atum an aphan ponnon, lapen Nephan kekroijile, latum aphan anerlole pathikoinon, anke Ne, rat aphuthak Nening thithelo.”
Jalin atum aphan Moses pulo, “Nangtum abangphutin nangmethang akhei angbong Peor along a-Baal aphan karcho nangkorte atum aphan pathinangji.”
Inut a-Israel aso Midian arloso Moses lapen rat atum angno apehem arlo cheponlo, lapu ke
Phinehas, la Eleazar asopo lapen Aaron kurusar asupo la thekdunlong-lo, alangli thurphlutsi rat kechingrum adim olo. Alangli chir ponsi,
lapen pehem arlo kelutdam apinso lapen arloso aphi hungdunlo, lapen banghini aphanta chir pen jorplot-lo. Lasonsi Israel atum aphan kepavirji avur paklip-lo,
bonta la bang suri ingkoiraphli arat aphan pathitang-et-lo.
Moses aphan
“Phinehas keklem apotsi, Ne Israel arat aphan ning thithelo. Pima alangli ke akaprek arnam aphan karcho ke lang un-e, bonta nephan chot, la apotsi Ne latum aphan pavirve det-lo.
La apotsi alangliphan thannon, atheke Ne alangli pen chechak-lo, la kaike kevangji ahut anta doverpo.
Alangli lapen apoton an mo-mo anta kurusar keplangji aphan pathirtang-lo. Pima Nephan kekroikre atum aphan alangli lang un-e lapen rat apap aphuthak kediya alangli vanlo.”
Midian a-arloso penpen kethi Israel abang ke Zimri, la Salu asopo, la Simeon akhei aro ajalinlo.
Arloso amen ke Kosbi. Apo ke Zur, la Midian asong isi aro ajalinlo.
Moses aphan
“Midian atum aphan tengkhengnon lapen latum aphan pavir-etnon,
pima latum nangtum aphan Peor along nangkechobei pen nangtum aphan akehingno klemlo, lapen Kosbi pen apot, bangpi aphan Peor along avur ahutsi thi-lo.”
Avur aphi, Moses lapen Eleazar, la Aaron asopo aphan
“Adontin lakha pen Israel arat kangthim aphan aphai ennon, pinso atum arta ningkan ingkoi mate la apar arta atum ron kechedan thek an aphan lakhanon.”
Moses lapen Eleazar kurusar rat aphan Moab athoi, Jordan akung Jeriko along thansi pulo.
“Ningkan ingkoi lapen la apar arta apinso an aphan aphai ennon, “ la Moses aphan
Reuben akhei (Reuben ke Jakob aso aklengsilo): Hanok, lapen Pallu,
Hezron, lapen Karmi atum aro.
Lahei aro atum aphai bang suri phlikep-ra kethom-ra pharo throksira thomkep apinsomar dolo.
Pallu apoton atum ke Eliab
lapen la asopomar Nemuel, Dathan, lapen Abiram atum helo latum rat atum kangvai a-Dathan lapen Abiramlo. Latum Moses lapen Aaron aphan kethurkrap atumlo, lapen latum
Longle angho chingpusi latum aphan joilut-lo, lapen latum Korah penpen thilo, lapen la abe kedun atum bang pharohinira phokep me pen virlo; latum rat atum aphan isi kepachere angthek plang-lo.
Bonta Korah asopomar atum ke thithelang.
Simeon akhei: Nemuel, Jamin, Jachin,
Zerah, lapen Shaul aro atum helo.
Lahei aro atum aphai bang suri ingkoirahinira pharo hini apinso amonit dolo.
Gad akhei: Jephon, Haggi, Shuni,
Ozni, Eri,
Arod, lapen Areli aro atum helo.
Lahei aro atum aphai bang suri phlikep-ra pharopho apinso amonit dolo.
Judah akhei: Er lapen Onan aro; Kanaan adet along Er lapen Onan thilot-lo.
Judah aro adon ateng lahelo: Shelah pen Shelah aro Perez pen Perez aro, lapen Zerah pen Zerah aro aso-asu atum dolo.
Perez asomar atum lahei helo: Hezron, Hamul aro-heihei pen apoton atum dolo.
Lahei aro atum aphai bang suri throksi kep-ra throk-ra pharopho apinso amonit dolo.
Issakar akhei: Tola, Puah, aro lapen
Jemhub, lapen Shimron.
Lahei aro atum aphai bang suri throkkep-ra phli ra pharo kethom apinso amonit atum dolo.
Zebulun akhei: Sered, Elon, lapen Jahleel aro.
Lahei akhei atum aphai bang suri throkkep-ra pharopho apinso amonit atum dolo.
Joseph akhei: la ke Manasseh lapen Ephraim atum apo lo.
Manasseh akhei: Makir la Manasseh asopo, la Gilead apo-lo, lapen Gilead apoton la aber helo:
Iezer aro atum, Helek,
Asriel, Shekem,
Shemida, lapen Hepher aro atum helo.
Zelophehad, la Hapher asopo, asopinso ave, bonta asopimar dochot; latum amen ke Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah, lapen Tirzah helo.
Lahei aro atum aphai bang suri phokep-ra hini ra pharo throksi apinso amonit do.
Ephraim akhei: Shuthelah, Becher, lapen Tahan aro helo.
Eran aro ke Shuthelah pensi kevang-lo.
Lahei aro atum aphai bang suri thomkep ra hini ra pharopho apinso amonit dolo. Lahei helo Joseph akhei pen kevang aro-heihei atumlo.
Benjamin akhei: Bela, Ashbel, Ahiram,
Shephupham, lapen Hupham aro atumlo.
Arad aro lapen Naaman aro ke Bela pensi kevang-lo.
Lahei aro atum aphai bang suri phlikep ra pho ra pharo throk apinso amonit dolo.
Dan akhei: Shuham aro,
latum aphai ke bang suri throkkep ra phli ra pharophli amonit dolo.
Asher akhei: Imnah, Ishvi, lapen Beriah aro atum helo.
Heber aro lapen Malkiel aro ke Beriah pensi kevang-lo.
Asher inut asopi amen Serah do.
Lahei aro atum aphai bang suri phokep ra kethom ra pharophli apinso amonit atum dolo.
Naphtali akhei: Jahzeel, Guni,
Jezer lapen Shillem aro atum helo.
Lahei aro atum aphai bang suri phlikep-ra-pho ra pharophli.
Israel pinso amonit atum kadokave pangrumpet bang suripharo throk-ra suri isira pharo throksira thomkep.
Moses aphan
“Khei angbong longle chethaknon, halatum aphan aphai ke-en asonthot-le thaknon.
Kethedung akhei aphan ke nang longle kepekta pathe-muchot nangpo, lapen aphai bi muchot akhei aphan ke longle kepekta pabimuchot nangji. Akheitin aphanta latum aphai atengsi longle thak nangji.
Bonta longle ke khadot pensi thak nangji; latum akheitin aphusar atum amen ateng si latum chepahemphu longji.
Latum kechepahemphu alongle latum aphai ke-ong lapen ong-emuchot angbong khadot kephar atengpensi thakpo.”
Levi akhei ke Gershon, Kohath, lapen Merari aro atum helo.
Halatum apoton aroso atum ke Libni, Hebron, Mahli, Mushi, lapen Korah. Kohath ke Amram apolo,
la Levi asopi Jochebed aphan pangri lo, la Ijip adetsi mahangkethek. Amram aphan bangpi banghini sopomar amahang pathekpilo, Aaron lapen Moses, lapen asopi inut amen Miriam.
Aaron asopomar bang phli dolo, Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, lapen Ithamar.
Nadab lapen Abihu ke

Levi a-oso chiklo ejon arta mate ongmuchot atum aphai bang suri ingkoira kethom. Latum aphan kedo-an Israel atum angbong pen amen tokvet-lo, pima latum aphan Israel angbong pen thangnat alongleta pipelo.
Lahei aro aphai ke Moses lapen Eleazar atumsi Moab athoi along Jordan Arei soding Jeriko pen lakhalo.
Sinai Asangtimili ajo Moses lapen Aaron monit aphai ke-encheng ahut amen kedo atum inutbakta avedet-lo.
halatum aphan putang-lo, atheke latum kejejangtang ajo kadokaveta thi-etji, lapen Kaleb, la Jephunneh asopo, lapen Joshua, la Nun asopo, latumsi dochot-lang.
Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah, lapen Tirzah atum ke Hepher asopo Zelophehad asopimar atumlo. Hepher ke Gilead asopo, la Makir asopo la Manasseh asopo, la Joseph asopolo.
Latum damsi Moses, Eleazar lapen jalin lapen rat atum angno
“Pinsopomar pamomepin pen nelipo atum ha kejejangtang ajo thi-et-lo. Alangli ke Korah aphi kedun abang kali, Korah ke
Nelipo asopomar kavedet pen ajok Israel angbong nelipo amen virdet nangjima? Nelipo adon-arap angbong pen nelitum aphan longle nethaknon.”
Latum alam
lapen alangliphan
“Zelophehad asopimar atum kechoningri alam ke ahok-lo; apo adon-arap angbong pen latum aphan longle thak pinon. Latum along apo kelongji amar padonang.
Israel arat atum aphan thannon, atheke inut amonit jongsi asopomar avepinpen thilot-lo pulote, asopimar atumsi alangli khi chepahemphupo.
Alangli jongsi asopimar ave pulote, la akorte atumsi la chepahemphu longpo.
Alangli jongsi akorte ave pulote, la apo akorte atumsi chepahemphu longpo.
Alangli jongsi akorte mate apunu ave pulote, alangli kechephosap adun abangsi la chepahemphu longpo lapen la amethang amar ason chekrong longpo. Israel arat atum laso aron akenangsot aronlo pu Ne,
Moses aphan
La nang langdet aphi, nang thipo, nang ik Aaron keklem ason,

pima nangtum banghinita Zin akejejangtang ajo Ne hukum abe thurlo. Meribah along kadokave arat atum Nephuthak kepasimu ahut, latum angno Nejakong kangthir nangtum kechinijimolo.” (Meribah ke Zin akejejangtang ajo Kadesh along alangjeng-lo.)
Moses ardomlo,
lapen halatum aphan ron kechedanji hukum pi-unpo, anke Nangli rat kevi abang kavedet abiresak ason kalidetpo.”
Moses aphan
