Eleazar kurusar angno lapen rat atum laphan parjapnon, lapen hadak kadokave angno nangdularlo pu laphan pachethang non.
Laphan ajehak nangjakong pinon, anke kadokave Israel arat atum laphan kroipo.

Alangli ta Eleazar kurusar aphan chikipo, la Urim lapen Thummim a-arlong kerim pen Nening kehang kopima chinipo. Lasonsi Eleazar ke Joshua aphan lapen Israel arat aphan halatum akam an aputhak tovar thanpo.”
Moses aphan hukum kepi atengsi alangli klemlo. Alangli Joshua aphan Eleazar kurusar lapen rat atum angno parjap-lo.
Moses aphan
Moses aphan
lapen Israel atum Arnam aphan akenangsot akecho adan-heihei kevanji aphan papinkhat toilo, atheke alangliphan la aning pangsamlo.
Ejon ke adap lapen ajon kaprek ke arnikangsamsi pinangji,
ajontin along elin ahim aduk, akemenei ajit ajangthu elin pen kepangvui asok-asang adan pidun nangji.
La ke kaike kepinangji athok-lo, lapen la phrin-et nangji, la ke Sinai Anglong along kepi akecho athok asonlo, laso angnim
Kepicheng abiresak athok along kepidun adrakha ahorlang athok ason, dovan along elin adrakha ahorlang dungnon.
Adap kepi athok asonthotsi ajon kaprek abiresak alo arnikangsam pinangji, laso along drakha ahorlangta dung dunpo. La ta isi kecho athok-lo, la angnim

Kesang arnita ningkan isi arta abiresak alo jonni pi nangji, lapen lahei akehingno avepin nangji, linni ahim aduk jit ajangthu pen kepangvuitang asok-asang adan lapen drakha ahorlang adan pidun nangji.
Laso akephrin athok ke kaike kepi athok along drakha ahorlang penpen kepi athok apar Kesang arnitin pi nangji.
Chiklo kecheng arni
Sok-sang athok aphan, jit ajangthu pen kepangvuitang ahim aduk pinangji: la along chainong alo ejon, him aduk linthom; biresak aloso penpen, linni ahim aduk;
lapen ajontin abiresak aloso along, elin ahim aduk. Lahei kephrin athok ke kechoji athok-lo, la angnim

Ahokpet adrakha ahorlang athok ke, linni masi, la chainong alo ajontin along pidun nangji; ajontin abiresak alo along elin-ra powahini pidun nangji lapen biresak aloso ajontin along elin adrakha ahorlang pidun nangji. Ningkan angbong chiklo kecheng arni kepi nangji kephrin athok aron la helo.
Arnivang kephrin athok kepi la drakha ahorlang adan penpen kepi abat pap athok aphan bi alo ejon pinangji.
Krepho arni isi dhorom arong-aje cheng ponsi la ni throksi an doponpo, laso ahut esek ke thap kavepin ahim si chochotnangji.
Rong-aje kecheng arni nangtum karchoji aphan chingrum nangji, lapen thangnat akamta klemlongle.
aphan kecho adan kepijile kephrin athok pajirnon; Chainong aloso jonni, biresak alo ejon, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon throksi, hingnonepin van-nangji.
Ahokpet asok-sang adan jit ajangthu pen kepangvuitang ahim aduk pinon: Ajontin achainong aloso along linthom biresak alo along linni,
lapen biresak aloso ajontin along elin lin.
Lapen pap athok aphan ejon abi alo pajirnon, lapen lasonsi rat atum aphan aron ateng pen kepangthir nangji akam klempo.
Laso athok ke adapvang kepi kephrin athok abat-lo.
Lasonthotsi, ni throksi
Karchoji aphan throksi arni chingrumnon lapen kam klemri.
Sokkerot Arong-aje kecheng arni,
Kephrin athok pajirnon, la angnim
Ahokpet asok-sang adan pajirnon, la jit ajangthu pen pangvui nangji: chainong alo ajontin along linthom, biresak alo along linni,
lapen biresak aloso ajontin along elinlin pi dunnon.
Lapen pap-athok aphan ejon abi alo pajirnon, lapen lasonsi aron ateng pen rat atum aphan kepangthirji akam klempo.
Lahei pajirnon lapen drakha ahorlang athokta pinon, lahei ke arnivang kepi kephrin athok lapen sok-sang athok-heihei abat-lo.
Throksi achiklo kecheng arni nangtum karchoji aphan chingrum nangji, lapen thangnat akamta klemnangne. Halaso arni pong-ut-heihei but nangji.
aphan isi kephrin athok pajirnon, laso angnim Alangliphan aningpadok-lo. Chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon throksi hingnonepin api pinangji.
Ahokpet asok-asang athok jit ajangthu pen kepangvuitang ahim aduk athok pinangji: Chainong alo along linthom ahim aduk, biresak alo along linni,
lapen biresak aloso ajontin along elin lin pidun nangji.
Lapen pap athok aphan bi alo ejon athok pajirnangji, lasonsi rat aphan kepangthir nangji akam klempo.

Labangso sok-sang athok penpen chiklo kechengsi arni aphan lapen labangso sok-sang athok lapen drakha ahorlang athok penpen kaike kepiver kephrin athok along la-heihei abat pinon. Lahei kecho athok ke
Throksi achiklo kep arni karchoji aphan chingrumnon; thangnat ta chori lapen kam klemri.
aphan isi kephrin athok pajir non, atheke laso angnim Alangliphan aning pangsamlo: Chainong aloso ejon, biresak alo ejon, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon throksi hingnonepin nangji.

Ahokpet asok-asang athok jit ajangthu pen kepangvuitang ahim aduk pajir nangji: chainong alo ajontin along linthom ahim aduk, biresak alo along linni ahim aduk, biresak aloso ajontin along elinlin pidun nangji.
Jonthroksi abiresak pen ejontin along phankep pen ephan pinangji.
Lapen pap athok aphan ejon abi alo rat atum aphan aron ateng pen kepangthir ji aphanlo, lapen arnivang kephrin athok, la sok-sang lapen drakha ahorlang athok penpen pi nangji.
Throksi achiklo krepho arni karchoji aphan chingrumnon. Ni throksi an
Kecheng arni
Ahokpet asok-asang athok jit ajangthu pen kepangvui ahim aduk pinangji: chainong alo ajontin along linthom ahim aduk, biresak alo ajontin along linni,
lapen biresak aloso ajontin along elinlin lahei along akenang adrakha ahorlang athokta pidun nangji.
Lapen pap athok aphan bi alo ejon athok pajir nangji. Lahei athok ke arnivang kephrin athok along sok-sang lapen drakha ahorlang athok kepi abat la pinangji.
Hini arni ke jon krehini achainong aloso, biresak alo jonni, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon krephli, kadokaveta hingnonepin pen athok pajir nangji.
Lahei athok along sok-sang lapen drakha ahorlang athok chainong alo aphan, biresak alo aphan, lapen biresak aloso aphan, lahei aphai ateng aron ateng pen pajirnon;
la aparta bi alo ejon pap athok aphan, kaike kepibom kephrin athok lapen la asok-asang, drakha ahorlang athok kepi abat pinangji.
Kethom arni, jon kre-isi achainong aloso, biresak alo jonni, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon krephli, hingnonepin pen athok pajir nangji.
Lahei along sok-sang lapen drakha ahorlang chainong alo aphan, biresak alo aphan, lapen biresak aloso aphan, lahei aphai ateng, aron akenang ateng pidun nangji;
la aparta pap athok aphan bi alo ejon athok pajirnangji, la ke kaike kepibom kephrin athok, sok-sang athok lapen drakha ahorlang athok kepi apar abat pinangji.
Phli arni, jonkep achainong aloso, biresak alo jonni, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon krephli, hingnonepin pen athok pinangji.
Lahei along sok-sang lapen drakha ahorlang athok chainong aphan, biresak aphan lapen biresak aloso aphan, latum aphai ateng lapen aron akenang ateng athok pidun nangji;
la aparta pap athok apharman bi alo ejon, kaike kepibom kephrin athok, sok-sang athok, lapen drakha ahorlang athok kepi abat pajir nangji.
Pho arni, chainong aloso jon sirkep, biresak alo jonni, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon krephli, hingnonepin pen athok pajir nangji.
Lahei along sok-sang athok lapen drakha ahorlang athok chainong aloso aphan, biresak alo aphan lapen biresak aloso aphan, latum aphai ateng lapen aron akenang ateng athok pidun nangji;
la aparta pap athok aphan bi alo ejon athok, kaike kepibom kephrin athok, lapen la along sok-sang, lapen drakha ahorlang athok kepi abat pi nangji.
Throk arni, chainong aloso jon nerkep, biresak alo jonni, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon krephli, hingnone pin pen athok pinangji.
Lahei along sok-sang lapen drakha horlang athok, chainong aloso aphan, biresak alo aphan, biresak aloso aphan latum aphai ateng lapen aron akenang ateng pen pidun nangji;
la aparta pap athok aphan bi alo ejon, kaike kepibom kephrin athok, la along sok-sang, lapen drakha ahorlang athok kepi abat pi nangji.
Throksi arni, chainong aloso jon throksi, biresak alo jonni, lapen ningkan isi arta abiresak aloso jon krephli, hingnonepin pen athok pi nangji.
Lahei along sok-sang lapen drakha ahorlang athok, chainong aloso aphan, biresak alo aphan, biresak aloso aphan latum aphai ateng lapen aron akenang ateng pen pidun nangji;
la aparta pap athok aphan bi alo ejon, kaike kepibom kephrin athok, la along sok-sang, lapen drakha ahorlang athok kepi abat pi nangji.
Nerkep arni, karchoji aphan chingrumpet non, lapen thangnat akam ta klemri.
Isi kephrin athok lake
Lahei along soksang lapen drakha ahorlang athok, chainong aloso aphan, biresak alo aphan, lapen biresak aloso aphan latum aphai ateng lapen aron akenang ateng pen pidun nangji;
la aparta pap athok aphan bi alo ejon, kaike kepibom kephrin athok, la along sok-sang, lapen drakha ahorlang athok kepi abat pi nangji.
Kephrin athok-heihei, sok-sang athok-heihei, drakha ahorlang athok-heihei, kejelang athok-heihei, nangtum
Lasi Moses aphan
Israel akhei ajalin atum aphan Moses lahei alam pinkhat-lo.
Mane jongsi semetang pen
Mane animsopimar apo ahem kechedodun ahut jongsi
alangli kechechak ason klemvek nangji mate alanglipo la arjulong pen khangdundetik ke chechak ason chepapleng nangji.
Bonta bangpi apo abang kechechak alam arjulong pen paplengrinon pu khangdunlote, bangpi la papleng nangnelo.
Jongsi mane pinan-kedode abangpi chinilorpen mate mathakrang pen, semetang-lo, mate pine ason pen chepaheloji aphan chechak-lo lapen aphi penan dokok-lo,
alangli semeketang mate kechechak ateng klem paplengvek nangji, jongsi apenan abang la arjulong pen khangdundetangte.
Bonta jongsi bangpi apenan la arjulong pen seme kechechak ason kepaplengji pen khang-lo pulote, bangpi la papleng nangnelo,
Inut ahemepi, mate inut ketitang a-arloso atum alanglitum seme lapen kechechak asontin klem paplengvek nangji, seme tame mate pine ason pen chepaheloji pu kechechak ason tame.
Inut asarpimar semetang-lo, mate pine ason pen chepaheloji aphan chechak-lote,
alangli semeketang mate kechechak ason klem paplengvek nangji, jongsi laso alam karjulong ahut apenan abang khangdunde tangte.
Bonta jongsi alangli penan abang alangli semeketang alam kepaplengji aphan karjulong ahut alangliphan khangdunlo tangte, alangli la papleng nangnelo.
Bangpi aseme lapen kechechak ason aputhak bangpi apenan abang pathir-un mate hili dun ajakong do.

Bonta bangpo karjulong arni pen thangnatta hili dunde pulote bangpi aseme mate kechechak ason chepaplengvek nangji. Halaso karjulong arni bangpo abang kehili dundedet pen ajok alangli bangpi aseme pathirdunlo.
Bonta jongsi alangli seme phrilo-tangte, seme ketang alam papleng un-e ale alangli chechakvek nangpo.
Lahei helo inut penan-kedode a-arloso apo ahem kedotik ahut mate inut asarpimar semeketang aputhak
Moses aphan
“Israel arat aphan keklem apot Midian asor aphan adukpinon. La klemdet aphi nang thipo.”
Lasi rat atum aphan Moses pulo, “Ron aphan chesiknon, anke nangtum Midian atum aphan tengkheng unpo lapen latum
Israel akheitin pen ron aphan suri isi si pinso amonit nangtoidunnon.”
Lasi akheitin pen suri isi si amonit ingvaisi, kadokave bang suri krehini apinso amonit atum ron aphan chesik-lo.
Eleazar kurusar asopo Phinehas ron kepajaji aphan Moses latum aphan toilo, lapen Phinehas ke kangthir amar-heihei lapen kepachesikji aphan kepabutji apong-ut-heihei kechepahemphu arputa pilo.
Moses aphan
Midian bangpho arecho atum aphanta pathilo: Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, lapen Reba. Latum Beor asopo Balaam aphanta pathilot-lo.
Israel arat atum Midian a-arloso atum lapen asomar atum aphan nep-lo, lapen halatum achainong, api ahur, akhi thisi ponlo,
lapen halatum arongsopi lapen amukam-heihei kedo-an me keilo.
Latum kethipon amar an ponlo, keneppon amonit lapen api anta pon lo,
lapen Moses, Eleazar lapen kedo-an Israel arat angno vanlo, atheke latum Moab athoi Jeriko pen Jordan parai amukam alongsi do.
Ron-armu atum aphan kechetong-dunjisi Moses, Eleazar, lapen rat ajalin atum barlo.
Moses ke ron pen nangkechevoi a-saihemphu atum aphan lapen asong anokbe atum aphan aningthilo.
Latum aphan alangli arjulo, “Kopisi nanglitum arloso atum an aphan akereng kebilang?
Chemathatha, atheke arloso atumsi Balaam kepinkhat alam arjusi Peor along rat atum aphan
Lasi non abangphutin apinsomar lapen a-arlosomar atum vi chepapho an aphan pathilapnon,
bonta arlosomar lapen okarjang atum an ke nangtum aphan chebinon.
Lapen nangtum angbong mane jongsi kethi arpum ke-ot atum anke ni throksi mukam angtan donangji, nithom arni lapen throksi arni nangtum lapen nangtum keneptang a-arloso atum aphan pangthirnon.
Nangtum pe apaktin, lapen ok-reng pen, bi angmi pen mate thengpi pen keselam amar an ta pangthirvek nangji.”
Ron pen nangkechevoithu apinso amonit atum aphan Eleazar kurusar pulo, “Moses aphan
Ser, rup, bitoi, ingchin, ting, lapen ingchin-kangduk,
me kechoche ason an ke nangtum me angkang varnangji, lapensi la ingthirji. Jonghe seta kepangthir iji alang pen pangthir nangjilang; lapen kopi-pima me kecho amar an ke lang along var nangji.
Throksi arni nanglitum ape-ari chechokvek nangji; ansi nanglitum aron ateng pen ingthirji, lapen mukam arlo kelutji aphan ahukum longpo.”
Moses aphan
“Nang lapen Eleazar, akaprek rat ajalin atum penpen, kevantang an amar lakhanon, keneptang a-arloso lapen api setame.
Phanni thakdaknon, ephan ke ron-aso atum lapen aphan kaprek ke rat atumlo.
Ron-aso apharman pen
Lahei Eleazar kurusar aphan
Rat atum aphan kepi apharman pen bangphokep akeneptang amonit angbong pen inut lapen lasonsi chainong, gadha, biresak, lapen bi-heihei penta ennon. Lahei
hukum kepi atengsi Moses lapen Eleazar klemlo.
Non ron along nangkethi amar atheke ron kechedan atum kevan lahei helo biresak jon suripharothrok ra throksi kep ra pho abiresak lapen abi,
chainong jon suri throksi kep-ra hini,
gadha jon suri throk-kep ra isi,
lapen bang suri thomkep ra hini kangthir-et a-okarjang atum dolo.
Lapen achitim ke, ron kechedan kedun atum apharman kelong jon suri pharo kethom ra suri thomkep ra throksi ra pharopho abiresak,
lapen
chainong jon suri thomkep ra throk, lapen
Gadha jon suri thomkep ra pharo pho, lapen
okarjang bang suri krethrok ke ron kechedan atum apharmanlo, laso angbong
Lasi
Israel arat atum achitim kelong amar atheke ron kechedan kedun atum pen Moses kethak dun aphai lahei helo.
Non rat atum apharman ke suri pharo kethom ra suri thomkep ra throksi ra pharo pho abiresak lapen abi long-lo,
chainong jon suri thomkep ra throk,
gadha jon suri thomkep ra pharopho,
okarjang bang suri krethrok,
Israel arat atum achitim kelong angbong
Anke ron-armu aphan hukum kepi a-saihemphu atum Moses along damlo,
lapen thanlo, “Akehai, nelitum aber kedo ron-aso aphai lakha lo, lapen inutta ingbobe.
Lasi nelitum ser adorson, Tai aroi, lek, arnan, nojangsai, lapen chethok alek-heihei nelitum abangphutin kelong ason an vanlo. Lahei nelitum
Moses lapen Eleazar atum ser amar, atheke kadokaveta kechingthang adorson amar saide dengdunlo.
Saihemphu atum kepi adan ardi lin pharohini plengkeilo.
Saihemphu kali atum ke latum nangkethi amar an chebijoilo.
Lasi Moses lapen Eleazar latum Pehem arlo ser ponlo, anke Israel arat aphan
Reuben lapen Gad akhei atum kepangreng api dopik. Jazer lapen Gilead alongle chainong kepangreng aphan mesen thek-longsi latum
Moses, Eleazar, lapen rat ajalin atum along damlo, lapen pulo,
“Ataroth, Dibon, Jazer, Nimrah, Heshbon, Elealeh, Sebam, Nebo, lapen Beon,
Israel atum angno
Lapen latum pulo “Nanglitum amek angden nelitum kangjinso long-lo pulote, lahei along le nangliban atum kechepahemphujile paplanglongtha; nelitum aphan Jordan parai nelipon nangnelo.”
Moses thak-lo, “Nangkorte Israel atum ron kechedan kedamji ahut nanglitum ladak do ingtungma?
Nanglitum kopusonsi Israel atum aphan
Lasonthotsi nangpo atum aphan ne Kadesh Barnea pen longle kepalangdam ahut latum keklem,
Latum ha Eskol Arlok an dambomsi, longle thek-long-lo, bonta latum nangke chevoithu ahut, latum aphan
Halaso arni

‘Pima latum Nephan kroithipthe det apotsi, Ne seme tang-lo, atheke, ningkan ingkoi arta mate akesar atum Ijip pen kevang atum an Ne Abraham, Isaak, lapen Jakob aphan kepiji pu kechak alongle along jongheseta lutdam longlelo!
La ke kadokave aphan talo, atheke Ken aso Jephunneh asopo Kaleb, lapen Nun asopo Joshua apar baduta lutdun longlelo; latum banghini ke
Rat atum aphan
Lapen non nangtum nangpo atum adim dotanglilo, isi pap pen keplengset akemi a-ove amonit atum, Israel aphuthak puthot
Nangtum Reuben lapen Gad arat atum jongsi Alangliphan dun ingtungte pulote Alangli puthot lahei arat aphan kejejangtang ajo otekang-etpo, lapen latum akevir apot nangtumsi adai ennangpo.’”
Latum Moses adung damlo, lapen pulo, “Kechengsi nelitum aphan arlong apai komchen ladak netum abiresak aphan nepabuilongtha lapen paikomchen arongso nesomar atum aphan nepakim longtha.
Anke nelitum akorte Israel atum along ron kedunji chesikpo lapen latum kelongji alongle along dothip longletik ke nelitum ron kechedan japonbompo.
Israel atum aphan kepiji pu alongle along latum chepahemphu longletik netum hem chevangthuthelo.
Jordan parai alongle latum angbong pen netum cheraidundelo, pima netum kelongnangji apharman alongle ladak Jordan anihang along long-lo.”
Moses thak-lo, “Nangtum kopisi kepuma la klempo pulote ladak
Nangtum ron kechedan amonit atum an Jordan Aroi hat nangji, lapen
lapen longle cherai longletik an. Laso aphi si nangtum chevoithu unji, pima nangtum
Bonta nangtum jongsi nangtum kechechak alam chebibe pulote, ne nangtum aphan pacherelo, atheke nangtum
La apotsi nangtum arongso chekimnon, lapen nang-biresak aphan apai chekimnon, bonta kopima nangtum kechechak ason klemnon!”
Gad lapen Reuben amonit atum pulo, “Akehai, nangli hukum kepi ateng nelitum klempo.
Nelitum apiso atum lapen osomar atum, chainong lapen biresak atum ladak Gilead arongso alongsi dopo.
Bonta nelitum kedo-an ke
Lasi Moses lahei ahukum Eleazar lapen Joshua akaprek Israel ajalin atum aphan pilo:
“Gad lapen Reuben amonit atum jongsi Jordan parai kap pen
Bonta latum Jordan hat-he lapen nangtum along ron kechedanji aphan nangdunde pulote, latum aphan Kanaan adet alongle pinangpo, la nangtum kelong asonthot.”
Gad lapen Reuben amonit atum thak-lo, “Akehai,
Alangli hukum ateng nelitum Jordan kappo, lapen Kanaan adet lutdampo, lapen ron chedan dampo, anke nelitum ladak Jordan anihang alongle cherailongpo.”

Lasi Moses ke Gad lapen Reuben akhei atum aphan lapen Manasseh akhei achitim an aphan Amor arecho Sihon alongri an, lapen Bashan arecho Og alongri an, arongso-heihei lapen la kekomchen arong-heihei pilo.
Gad akhei atum Dibon, Ataroth, Aroer,
Atroth, Shophan, Jazer, Jogbehah,
Beth Nimrah, lapen Beth Haran arongro-heihei kimthulo.
Reuben akhei atumta Heshbon, Elealeh, Kiriathaim,
Nebo, Baal Meon (laso amen lardet-lo), lapen Sibmah arongso apaisongkomchen kimthulo. Latum kekimthu arongso-heihei amen kemi irlo.
Makir aro, la Manasseh asopo atum Gilead adet tengkheng-lo, lapen la cheraidet-lo, lapen hadak kedo Amor atum aphan phlung-et-lo.
Lasi Makir aro aphan Moses Gilead pilo, lapen latum hadaksi dolo.
Jair, la Manasseh akhei, tengkhengsi ajehak arong cherailo, lapen “Jair arong-heihei” pusi irlo.
Nobah ta tengkhengsi Kenath lapen la arong-heihei cherailo, lapen la Nobah pu alangli men asonthotsi irlo.
Moses lapen Aaron akeja pen ajok Israel akhei atum Ijip odet aphi latum kodak daksi mukam chekimloma amen lapen adim-heihei aphai lahei helo.
ahukum atengsi, latum mukam kechekim aphongtin adim amen Moses tokdunkrilo.
Ningkan kecheng achiklo krepho arni Israel arat atum Ijip olo, la ke kechengsi Kejok Amei
atheke
Israel arat atum Rameses olo, lapen Sukkoth along mukam chekimlo.
Latum adunthu mukam kechekimke Etham along, la Sangtimili ano along.
Hadak pen latum suisi Pi Hahiroth, la Baal Jephon anihang anat lapen Migdol adung mukam chekimlo.
Latum Pi Hahiroth o-si Talo Ke-er hatput-lo lapen ha Shur asangtimili an damlo; nithom damdet aphi latum Marah pu adim along mukam chekimlo.
Hadak pen latum Elim, ladak mukam chekimlo, pima hadak langjeng krehini do lapen sotele arong rong throksi kep dolo.
Latum Elim osi Suez atalochekom adung mukam chekimlo.
Latum adun mukam kechekim ke Pap asangtimili ajo.
Anke latum Dophakah along mukam chekimlo,
lapen laso aphi Alush along chekimlo.
Puthot ke Rephidim along, hadak latum lang kejunji aphan anta lang kave adimlo.
Anke latum Rephidim pen bar si Sinai akejejangtang ajo mukam chekimlo.
Latum puthot Sinai akejejangtang ajo pen bar si Kibroth-Hattaavah along mukam chekimlo.
Kibroth-Hattaavah pen bar si Hazeroth pu adim mukam chekimlo.
Hazeroth pen latum bar si Rithmah along mukam chekimlo.
Rithmah pen latum bar si Rimmon Perez along mukam chekimlo.
Rimmon Perez pen latum bar si Libnah along latum mukam chekimlo.
Latum Libnah pen bar si Rissah along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Rissah pen bar si Kehelathah along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Kehelathah pen bar si Shepher Anglong along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Shepher Anglong pen bar si Haradah along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Haradah pen bar si Makheloth along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Makheloth pen bar si Tahath along mukam chekim lo.
Latum Tahath pen bar si Terah along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Terah pen bar si Mithkah along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Mithkah pen bar si Hashmonah along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Hashmonah pen bar si Moseroth along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Moseroth pen bar si Benejaakan along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Benejaakan pen bar si Horhaggidgad along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Horhaggidgad pen bar si Jotbathah along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Jotbathah pen bar si Abronah along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Abronah pen bar si Eziongeber along mukam chekim lo.
Latum Eziongeber pen bar si Zin (la ke Kadesh) along mukam chekimlo.
Latum Kadesh pen bar si Hor Anglong along mukam chekim lo, la ke Edom adet akung-lo.
Lapen Aaron Hor Anglong along kethi ahut Aaron arta ningkan pharo isira ingkoira-kethom dolo.
Nitur a-Kanaan anat kedo Arad arechota Israel atum vangbomlo pu arjulong-lo.
Anke latum Hor Anglong pen bar si Zalmonah along mukam chekimlo.
Zalmonah pen latum bar si Punon along mukam chekimlo.
Punon pen latum bar si Oboth along mukam chekimlo.
Oboth pen latum bar si Iyeaberim, la Moab alongri along.
Iyeaberim pen latum bar si Dibongad along mukam chekimlo.
Dibongad pen latum bar si Almon Diblathaim along mukam chekimlo.
Almon Diblathaim pen latum bar si Nebo aphrang Abarim along mukam chekimlo.
Abarim pen latum bar si Moab athoi Jordan akung Jeriko along mukam chekim lo;
Latum Jordan akung Beth-jeshimoth pen ha Abelshittim, la Moab athoi along mukam chekimlo.
Hadak Moab athoi along Jordan akung Jeriko pen Moses
Israel atum aphan papinkhatjisi
nangtum hadak kedo atum an aphan phlung-et nangji. Halatum arlong lapen tasam akumlin an lapen latum karcho adim an pavir-etnangji.
Longle cheraira la along dothipnon, pima Ne nangtum aphan la nangpitang-lo.
Khadot pen ajok akheitin aphan longle thaknon, aphai ke-ong akhei aphan longle kethak pathemuchotnon, lapen aphai ke-ong-e atum aphan kethak pabi muchotnon.
Bonta jongsi nangtum hadak kedo atum aphan phlung-et-e pulote, hadak kedobomlang atum ameksung asonsi nangpasungpo lapen nangtum arep along ingsu ason plangpo, lapen latum nangbethursi chedanpo.
Nangtum jongsi latum aphan phlungphle pulote, Ne amatsi halatum aphan kepavirjipu kemang ason, nangtum aphan pavirpo.”
Moses aphan
Israel atum aphan papinkhatji si pulo: “Nangtum Kanaan adet kelutdam ahut, Ne nangtum aphan nangkepiji pu alongle, ahoi ke lapuson plangpo.
Nitur ahoi Edom ahoi soding Zin akejejang tang atalo anitur anihang pen the ponlo. La Kethi Atalo anitur kejut anihang pen pangchengpo.
Anke la nitur anat damsi Akrabbim atovar anat dampo, lapen Zin arlo soding dongputsi ha Kadesh Barnea anitur anat ledampo. Anke la nirep-nichi anat chetevarsi Hazzar Adar lapen Azmon an lesi,
La Ijip athoi ahoi anat chetevarpo, lapen Mediterran an jutdampo.”
“Nichi ahoi ke Mediterran Atalo helo.”
Nirep ahoi ke Medeteran pen Hor Anglong,
lapen hadak pen ha Hamath Atovar an. La Zedad an dambompo,
lapen ha Ziphron an, lapen Hazar Enan along jutkokpo.
Nihang ahoi ke Hazar Enan pen ha Shepham an eren isi dam thorpo.
Lapen la nitur anat dambomsi Harbel, Ain anihang anat lepo, lapen Galili anihang akung anat kedo anglong anat le dampo,
anke nitur anat damsi Jordan Aroi soding pen ha Kethi Atalo an lepo.
Lahei helo nangtum alongle hinphli ahoilo.
Lasi Israel atum aphan Moses pulo, “Khadot pen ajok nangtum kelongji alongle lahei helo, atheke khei sirkep ra ebeng atum aphan
Reuben lapen Gad akhei lapen Nihang a-Manasseh ebeng akhei atum ke amethang alongle chelongtang-lo, lapen latum adon ateng chethaktang-lo,
Jeriko anung, Jordan anihang anat.”
Moses aphan
“Eleazar kurusar lapen Joshua, la Nun asopo atumsi rat aphan longle thakpo.
Latum aphan longle kethak kerapdunjile akheitin pen inut nut ajalin ponnon.”
kangvai pinso amonit lahei helo: Judah akhei pen Kaleb, la Jephunneh asopo.
Simeon akhei asomar pen Shemuel, la Ammihud asopo.
Benjamin akhei pen Elidad, la Chislon asopo.
Dan akhei asomar pen inut ajalin, Bukki, la Jogli asopo.
Joseph asomar: Manasseh akhei pen inut ajalin, Hanniel, la Ephod asopo.
Ephraim akhei asomar pen inut ajalin, Kemuel, la Shiphtan asopo.
Zebulun akhei asomar pen inut ajalin, Elizaphan, la Parnak asopo.
Issakar akhei asomar pen inut ajalin, Paltiel, la Azzan asopo.
Asher akhei asomar pen inut ajalin, Ahihud, la Shelomi asopo.
Naphtali akhei asomar pen inut ajalin, Pedahel, la Ammihud asopo.
Lahei helo Kanaan adet along Israel arat aphan longle kepathakji
Moab athoi along Jordan akung Jeriko pen Moses aphan
“Israel atum aphan thannon, atheke latum kelong alongle angbong pen kedoji aphan lapen kepachopanji aphan ajehak arongsopi komchen alongle Levi atum aphan pinon.
Lahei arongsopi ke Levi atum amarlo, lapen latum hadaksi dopo. Bap kedo alongle ke latum achainong lapen akaprek api aphanlo.
Bap alongle ke rongsopi apai pen ingrup pharo sirkep an ingtan lepo, la ahintin ta lasonpo,
lasonsi ahintin anat ta ingrup pharo krenerkep dopo, rongsopi abang ke angbong chitimsi dopo.
Levi atum aphan nangtum chepachong arongsopi rong throk pinangji, ladaksi mathathepin pen pran karmut abang damsi chepajokpo. La apar, latum aphan rongsopi phlikep-ra hini arong pinon,
bap kedo alongle pen pen pinon, kadokave rong phlikep-ra nerkep paplangnon.
Levi atum arongsopi aphai kelongji apharman ke latum aro kethe kebi atengsi la arongta longpo.”
Moses aphan
atheke Israel arat aphan kepathanji aphan: “Nangtum Jordan Aroi hatsi Kanaan kelutdam ahut,
nangtum chepachong arongsopi-heihei ingvai nangji, atheke inut amonit matha thepinpen mane apran armut lote la hadak chepachongdam longpo.
Hadak kethitang amonit adon-arap atum alar kehui arideng pen la jokpo. Inut monit kepathi amonit aphan rat ingsaisetik ke laphan pathi longle.
Rongsopi rong throk ingvainon,
kethom ke Jordan anihang anat lapen rongthom ke Kanaan adet along amat.

Lahei ke isi Israel atum aphan kechepachong arongsopi plangpo lapen bang adet aso atum aphan malomso tame kaike kedoverji aphan tame dolongpo. Lahei along elongbak mathakrang pen monit apran karmut abangphu chepachong dam longpo.”
“Jongsi inut amonit mane aphan ingchin amar pen arbu amat thilot-lo, labangso amonit ke pran karmut abang-lo; pran karmut abang phan pathilot nangji.
Jongsi la mane abangphan ari a-arlong pen arbulo, la pen ajok halaso amonit thilot tahai, lapen thilot-lo, la bangso amonit ke pran karmut abang-lo; prankarmut abangphan pathilot nangji.
Mate la thengpi amar pen mane aphan ari pen arbulo, la pen ajok laso amonit thilot-tahai, lapen la thilot-lote, la prankarmut abang-lo; prankarmut abangphan pathilot nangji.
Kethi abang keche phonei adon atumsi prankarmut abangphan pathinangpo. Alanglitum la aphan pathinangpo pu keri pen kethek-long ahut, pathinangpo.”
Inut amonit jongsi mane amonit aphan hijimlo, lapen laphan kangbaichor pen ajok mate pine pen kevar pen ajok pathilot-lo,

mate arikan pen laphan arbulo lapen ajok thilot-lote, la prankarmut adai dolo lapen lason aphan pathilot nangji. Kethi abang chephonei adon-arap atumsi prankarmut abangphan kepathi arpu dolo, laphan thek-long lote, halatumsi pathi nangji.
“Bonta inut amonit kehijimjepin abangphan mathakrang pen pathilot-lote, laphan kangbai pen setame, mate laphan pine pen kevar tame.
Mate langle pin pen inut amonit arlong varlo lapen mane amonit aphan roklok-lo, lason keklemji pu mathathe pin amonit aphan rotet amat thilot-lo, lapen kethi abang ke la ahotur kali.
Lason lote rat atum kepathitoi abangphu abe ingsai nangpo, lapen alar kehuiji pu kerivung kethi amonit adon-arap atum abe kali.

Rat atum kethitang amonit adon-arap pen prankarmut adai bangpo aphan pajok nangpo, lapen alanglitum laphan chepachong arongsopi along voithu nangji, atheke alangli chepajok adim along. Hadak Kurusar Kethenei thithetik an la donangji.
Prankarmut abang jongsi alangli kechepachong arongsopi obup-lo,
lapen kethitang abang adon-arap atum laphan thek-longsi pathilot-lote lason alar kehui akam ke pran-karmut kalilo.
Prankarmut abang chepachong arongsopi along dover nangji ha kurusar thithetik an, bonta laso aphi alangli ahem chevangmelo.
Lahei aron ke nangtum lapen nangpoton atum an aphantalo lapen nangtum nahok-le dosetame aron isinat-lo.”
Inut prankarmut keboktang amonit adai do lapen pathi unji, jongsi hini mate ansose aporman ahaki nep-long-lote; isivet apran-karmut kebok ahaki chot ke dorde.
Inut prankarmut abangphan ke pathilot nangji. Laso adai la tangka kepi pen chepajok un-e.
Inut amonit jongsi chepachong arongsopi along katjuilote, Kurusar thithe aphrang hem kechevang longji aphan tangka papi longledet nangji.

La jongsi nangtum klemlo pulote, nangtum kedo adim alongle nangtum pangthirthetang-lo. Prankarmut abang longle pangthirthetang-lo, jongsi prankarmut abang thithete, inut prankarmut amonit apot longle aron atang pen kepangthirji thangnat atovar avelo.
Nangtum kedo alongle pasa-urri, pima Ne
Gilead along aro ajalin atum, Makir asopo lapen Manasseh asupo, la Joseph asopo, atum Moses lapen akaprek ajalin atum along damlo.
Latum pulo, “Khadot pen ajok Israel arat atum aphan longle kethakji aphan
Bonta chematha iktha, jongsi alanglitum akhei kaprek amonit aphan penan dolote, latum alongleke halaso akhei si cherai longpop po, lapen nelitum aphan nekethak alongleke bihek po.

Kevoithu aningkan, kadokave alongle amar kejortang anta atiri ahemphu aphan voithu-et nangji, atheke Zelophehad asopi atum alongle ke kaike aphan latum penan kedo akhei atum aridengsi doverpo, lapen nelitum akhei aphan ke isi akekonlo.”
Lasi Israel arat aphan Moses
lapen la apotsi
Akheitin alongle amethang akhei alongsi chedochotji.
Abangphutin Israel a-arloso longle chepahemphu-verji pulote amethang akhei angbongsi penan do nangji. Lasonsi Israel atum abangphutinta aphusar atum alongle chepahemphu longvetpo,
lapen longle isi akhei pen akhei kaprek along damdelo. Akheitinta amethang alongle chepahemphu longrepverpo.”
Moses aphan
Mahlah, Tirzah, Hoglah, Milkah, lapen Noah aphan, Zelophehad asopimar atum apo akorte akorte asomar atum aphan si penan do lo.
Latum Joseph asopo Manasseh asopomar atum aphansi penan dolo, lapen latum alongle apo atum akhei ahem alongsi chedovet-lo.
Lahei helo Moses pen ajok

Laso aloh along ke Jordan Aroi anihang akejejangtang ajo Israel atum kedo ahut rat atum aphan Moses keningje alam-heihei tok-lo Latum Jordan a-Arlok, Suph adung, la ke rongso hini adak do, atheke ehin anat ke Paran lapen ahin kaprek anat ke Tophel, Laban, Hazeroth, lapen Dizahab.
(Sinai Anglong pen Kadesh Barnea an Edom anglong atovar pen ni kre isi nangji.)
Latum Ijip odet pen Phlikep aningkan kre isi achiklo kecheng arni, latum aphan kepathanjisi Moses aphan
Laso alam ke Amor arecho Sihon, la Heshbon alongri kepangri abang, lapen Bashan arecho Og, la Ashtaroth lapen Edrei arong kepangri abang-lo, latum aphan
La ke rat atum Moab alongri Jordan anihang anat kedo ahutsi Moses rat atum aphan Arnam aron-heihei lapen akethan-heihei thanjirlo.
Alangli pulo,
“Elitum Sinai Anglong along kedo ahut, etum a-Arnam

Mukam chephrira damnon, Amor atum anglong ariri lapen la kekomchen alongri an damnon-ha Jordan Arlok an, inglong ariri anat, lapen thoi anat, ha nitur ahin anat lapen ha Midianteran akung anat dam non. Kanaan adet anat damnon, lapen ha Lebanon Anglong-heihei apar ha Euphratis Aroipi an damnon.
Lahei alongleke Ne,
Rat atum aphan Moses pulo, “Elitum Sinai Anglong along kedo-un ahut, neli nanglitum aphan nangpulo, ‘Nanglitum aphan nangkejaji akam ke neliphan arpu the-ong-lo. Neli inutpet la klem un-e.
Sining angsong achiklolongso asonsi nanglitum aphan nang Arnam
, nang-phusar atum a-Arnamle nangtum aphan phansuri nangpabat-lonang, lapen alangli kechak tang ateng nang pachingthur lonang!
Bonta neli inutpet kosonsi nangtum kechebohong alam lapu-an akardik arpu keklem unpoma?
Ajehak, kethekser, kemathathekser, lapen keklemlongtang apinso amonit aphan akheitin pen ingvainon, lapen neli latum aphan nanglitum aphuthak batpo.’
Lapen la mesen akamlo pu nanglitum anta nangchedon dunlo.

Lasi ne nanglitum akhei pen kangvaitang kethekser, keklemtang ajalin atum aphan ponlo lapen latum aphan nangtum aphuthak bat-lo. Ajehak atum ke suri arat arpu enpo, ajehak atum ke pharo isi arat arpu enpo, ajehak atum ke bang phokep arat arpu enpo, lapen ajehak atum ke kep arpu enpo. Akheitin penta ajehak asaikhi atum aphan ne batpo.”

Halaso ahut ne latum aphan pinkhat-lo, ‘Arjutha nangtum arat angbong kopine kechebohong alam vanlote, asontin alam ingsaipamenon, la nangtum angbong alam setame, mate nangtum angbong nangkedo dun bang adet aso atum alam setame.

Nangtum kephar alam along thangnatta abe kedun pavedet nangji; laso alam paklong pen abangphutin aphanta ingsai-inon, halabangso abang jok amonit setame. Badu aphanta phereri athema nangtum akephar ke Arnam pensi kevang. Pine nangtum aphan kangsai sungpik pulote la ne long vannon, lapen la ne si pharpo.’
Lasonthotsi ne nangtum kopipima keklem nangji ason an nangpinkhat et-lo.
Netum Arnam
Ne nangpulo, “Nangtum non Amor atum anglong akeng-ri nanglelo, atheke etum Arnam ephusar atum a-Arnam
Langtha, Nangtum Arnam,

Bonta nanglitum nelong vangsi pulo, “Longle kepalangjoiji aphan etum aphrang monit toilonang, anke latum etum aphan kedam nangji akemenei atovar ethanthekpo, lapen hadak kopuson arongsopi-heiheisi kedoma ethanthekpo.”
La mesen akam pusi neli mathalo, lasi akheitin pen inut nut bang krehini amonit ne ingvailo.
Latum inglong ajo damlo ha Eskol Arlok anat an lapen la langpamelo.
Latum elitum aphan ajehak hadak kelong athesere lapen etum aphan ethanlo, atheke etum Arnam
Bonta nangtum Arnam
Nangtum lahin lahin pasimulo: “

Kopisi eli hadak kedam nangpo? Netum phere-ong. Etum ketoi amonit atum ethanlo atheke latum ephan apar ingtang muchot lapen ajon ding muchot, lapen latum kedo ke rongsopi arpong sining lekai arongsopi-heihei alongsi kedo. Latum hadak akromthepik amonitta thek-long!”
Bonta neli pulo, “Lahei amonit atum aphan phereri.
Nang Arnam
lapen kejejangtang ajo kethek-long asonthot. Nangtum chethek-long-lo, koson si Alangli ladak anta nangkevan loma, atheke apole asopo aphan kepon asonsi nangponlo.”
Bonta ne putangdet-lota nangtum
Alangli nangtum aphan mukam kepa chekimji aphan adim ridamsi aphrang aphrang damlo. Tovar nang kepaklang jisi Alangli me archok pen ajo aphrang aphrang damlo lapen inghun archok pen anerlo damlo.
Nangtum kepasimu alam
“La kehingno a-ove pen nangtum inutbakta nangphusar atum aphan ne kepiji aho-or kedo alongle arlo lutdun longlelo.
Kaleb, la Jephunneh asopo si lutdun longchotji. Alangli Nephan kroithipver, lapen laphan lapen la apoton atum aphan la kelang alongle Ne piji.”
Nangtum ajok
Bonta nangphan nangkerap dun abang, Nun asopo Joshua aning pathirthipnon. Israel atum longle pacheraijisi alangli japonpo.”
Anke
Bonta nangtum aphan ke chiruithusi sangtimili ajo damthupo ha Akaba atalo chekom soding atovar pen.”
Nangtum thak-lo, “Moses, netum
Bonta neliphan
kopisi kepuma ne nangtum aphan nangthan lo, bonta nangtum nangno chedendelo. Nangtum Alangli be thurlo, lapen nangtum cheparokasi inglong aren ajo tengkheng damlo.
Anke hadak inglong along kedo Amor atum pijo ahur ason nanghirpaklo. Latum nangtum aphan Hormah an nang arphlung dunlo lapen Edom anglong aren ajo latum nangtum aphan paremdet-lo.
Lasi nangtum
Lasonsi Kadesh along kedo ajirdingklui an ongdung arni nangtum hadak dolo.
Ansi padu elitum chevoisi sangtimili ajo anat damlo, Akaba Atalochekom atovarsoding, atheke
Anke
atheke halahei anglong along dor-phlup apor damtap-lo apotsi etum nirep anat damnangpo.

Lahei alam nanglitum aphan kepinkhatji aphan Alangli nepulo: “Nangtum Edom anglong aren ajo kehatputji nangle dokdok-lo, latum ke nangtum heloving adon atumlo, latum Eso apoton atumlo. Nangtum aphan latum nangpheredukji,
bonta nangtum latum pen kecheng ke ron chedan nangnelang, pima Ne nangtum aphan latum alongle asapbakta nangpipe. Edom alongleke Ne Eso apoton atum aphansi kepilo.
Latum pen nangtum an lapen lang chonamtame.”
Chemathatha, kopusonsi nangtum Arnam
Lasi Eli dambomlo, lapen Elah lapen Eziongeber arong pen ha Kethi Atalo anat kedam atovar obup-lo, lapen eli nirep-nihang Moab anat damlo.
neliphan pulo, “Moab arat aphan pasungri, la Lot apoton atum lo, mate latum pen kecheng ron chedanri, lapen latum aphan Ar arongsopi pilo, lapen latum alongle Ne nangtum aphan asapta nangpipelo.”
(Isi akromkethe ajat Emim pu atum Ar along dolo. Latum akaprek akromkethe ajat Anakim pu atum ason ajonta dingpikpak.
Anakim atum asonsi latum aphan Rephaim pusi chethang-lo; bonta Moab aso atum latum aphan Emim pusi hang-lo.
Hor aso atum ke Edom alongsi dolo, bonta Eso apoton atum latum aphan phlung-lo, latum adet pavirlo, lapen hadaksi latum dothip-lo, atheke Israel atumle
Kadesh Barnea odet pen ningkan thomkep-ra nerkep aphi Zered nanglelo.
Latum ver-et-etik an latum aphan
Latum kadokave thi-et aphi,
etum aphan
“Pini Ar atovar pen nangtum Moab alongri damput nangpo.

Anke nangtum Ammon atum adet keleji tebok-hetpo, latum ke Lot apoton atumlo. Latum aphan pasungri mate latum pen ron chedanri latum pen, pima latum aphan Ne kepitang alongle nangtum aphan asapbakta nangpipelo.”
(Laso alongri aphan Rephaim alongri ta pu, la ke hadak kedo amonit atum amen ateng-lo; Ammon atum ke latum aphan Zamzummim pusi hang.
Latumta Anakim atum asonsi akrom-ajom. Latum aphai do-o, lapen latum ta kangtangrak ajat. Bonta
-ke lasonthotsi Edom aso atum aphanta klemlo, latum Eso apoton atumlo, latum Edom anglong aren ajosi kedo. Hor aso aphan alangli pavirlo, ansi Edom aso atum latum adet cherailo lapen hadak dothip lo.

Mediterran atalo akung soding alongleke Krit alanglom pen kevang arat atumsi nangdolo. Latum Avvim, latum kedo barim atum aphan pavirlo, lapen latum alongle cheraidet-lo ha Gaza arongsopi anitur anat anta.)
Moab hatput aphi, etum aphan
Pini pen Ne kadokave arat atum nangtum aphan nangpapherehurpo. Nangtum amen kepinpurpen abangphutinta a-ok klemhurpo.”
Anke neli Kedemoth akejejang-tang ajo pen Heshbon arecho Sihon aphan lahei ningkangsam alam laso pherangke atum aphan toilo.
“Nanglitum adet nelitum aphan pahat-longput tha. Nelitum kengdet si dampo, lapen tovar pen suiselo.
Nelitum kechoji a-an anam lapen kejunji alang anam nelitum nangpipo. Nelitum akenangsot ke nanglitum adet kehatput,
nelitum aphan
Bonta Sihon recho etum aphan adet dongput epadamlongle det-lo. Nangtum Arnam
Anke
Etum pen kechedanjisi Sihon ke amonit kedo-an pen nangbarlo, ha Jahaz arong adung,
bonta Etum a-Arnam
Halaso ahut amat eli arongtin pavirlo, lapen abangphutin pinso, arlo, lapen osomar aphan pathilo. Badu aphanta eli kereng-et bibedet-lo.
Kepangreng api eli ponlo lapen rong lutsi mar thi pon-et-lo.
Etum Arnam
Bonta Ammon alongri adung netum damdedet-lo mate Jabbok Aroi ariri mate inglong aren ajo mate
Adunthu, etum Bashan alongri nirep anat damlo, lapen Edrei arong along Og recho amonit do-an pen etum aphan kechedanjisi nangbarpak lo.
Bonta neliphan
Lasonsi Og recho aphan
Halaso ahut amat etum kadokave arongso cherai-et-lo, eli kecheraire arong isibakta avedet-lo. Kadokave rong throkkep-an, Argob alongri, Bashan arecho Og kepangri adimlo.
Lahei arongso kedo-an kangtui apaisong inghap, lapen barlon ajakan anghap-heihei pensi parpongchenlo, lapen paisong kavepin arongta do-o.
Heshbon arecho Sihon arong-heihei aphan eli keklem asonthot rongso do-an pavirlo, lapen pinso, arlo, lapen osomar atum aphan pathi-et-lo.
Kepangreng api eli ponpilo lapen rongso an amar thipon-et-lo.
Halaso ahut la Amor recho banghini pen Jordan Aroi anihang alongle lapen Arnon aroi pen ha Harmon Anglong an enlo.
(Harmon Anglong aphan Sidon asor ke Sirion, lapen Amor atum ke Senir pusi irlo.)
Bashan arecho Og alongri an ta eli cheraipi-et-lo: Inglong apam arongsopi-heihei, Gilead lapen Bashan alongri ajo an, ha Salekah lapen Edrei arongso nihang anat anta cherailo.
(Og rechoke Rephaim pen kejutsilo. La kethi ahongplang arlongpen si selamlo, keding ingrup nerkep lapen arpan ingrup phli, la halaso ahut angrup-lo. Amor atum arongsopi Rabbah along thek-longbom.)
Etum longle cheraidet aphi, Reuben lapen Gad akhei atum aphan Arnon Aroi adung Aroer arongso anirep anat alongle ne pilo lapen Gilead alongri anglong aren ajo ephar la arongso-heihei pen pilo.
Manasseh akhei achitim atum aphan neli Gilead ahin an lapen Og kepangri Bashan alongle pilo, la ke Argob alongri kangthimlo.
(Bashan aphan Rephaim adet pu ta pu.
Manasseh akhei pen Jair pu abang Argob mate Bashan alongri kangthim ha Geshur lapen Maakah ahoi an cherailo. Rong amen alangli men aphi che-irlo, lapen lahei Jair arong pusi nonputa chini.)
Manasseh akhei angbong Makir aro aphan ne Gilead alongle pilo.
Reuben lapen Gad akhei aphan Gilead pen Arnon Aroi an neli thak-lo. Arnon Aroi, ajehak ke Ammon atum ahoi anta lelo.
Nichi anat latum alongri ke Jordan Aroi an, Galili alangbi kesun anirep pen Kethi Atalo anitur an lapen ha Pisgah Anglong, kele ano anat.
“Halaso ahut amat, latum aphan lahei alam ne pinkhat-lo: ‘Jordan anihang alongle etum a-Arnam
Nangpisomar, nangsomar atum lapen kepangreng api le ladak ne nangkepi arongso along padochotnon, ne chini nangtum kepangreng api do-o.
Jordan anichi anat nangkorte Israel atum aphan
Anke Neli Joshua aphan pinkhat-lo; “Sihon lapen Og recho aphan kosonsi nang Arnam
Latum aphan phereri, athema nang Arnam
Halaso ahut neli ardompik-lo,
“Keklem-un a-
Neliphan Jordan Aroi nepahat-longtha,
Bonta nangtum pen ajok,
Pisgah Anglong aphuchong damnon, lapen ke nirep, nitur, lapen nihang, nichi anat langnon. Nang kopima kethek-long langpamenon, pima nang Jordan paraike damlonglelo.
Joshua aphan kepinkhat nangji alam thannon. Aning parungra laphan aning pathirthipnon, pima nangkethek-long alongle kepa-cheraijisi rat aphan alangli japonpo.”
Lasi elitum Bethpeor arongso anung anat kedo arlong alongsi dokok-lo.
Rat atum aphan Moses pulo, “Neli nangtum aphan nangkethan aron an kroipetnon, lapen nangtum rengpo, lapen nangtum Arnam,
Neli hukum nangkepi along thangnatta pakamri, lapen pakom nangnelo. Neli nangkepi nangtum Arnam
Peor Anglong
bonta nang Arnam
Kedo-an aron neli nanglitum aphan nangthanlo, neli Arnam
Lahei kroithipnon, lapen ajok akaprek akhei atum aphan nanglitum resetpu pachinipo. Latum lahei aron arjulong pen pupo, “Laso akhei ko-an agian lapen akemathathek ke-ong loma!”
Akaprek akhei atum ko-an theloma etum akenang ahut
Badu akhei ko-an thetame, pini neli nanglitum aphan nangkepi ahok-akangsai aron ason halatum ave.
Nangmethang cherepamenon! Nangtum nangmek hini pen kethek-long an, rengtik an ketengnenedetjile chemathanon. Nangsomar lapen nangsumar atum aphan.
Sinai Anglong along
Nangtum kosonsi inghun karthat kangtingthip amehi lapen sining an keturbong ame pen kedipthip anglong akeng-ri karjap-loma nangsomar atum aphan thannon.
Kosonsi nangtum aphan me pen ningjeloma lapen kosonsi alangli nangtum aphan ningjelo bonta nangtum Alangliphan thek-longle laso alam latum aphan thannon.
Nangtum pen Alangli kopisi kechejok aloh alam nangtum kekroi nangjima Alangli nangthan-et-lo, atheke nangtum Hukum Kep Kroivek nangji pu alam, la ke Alang-lisi plangni a-arlong aplang along tok-lo.
Nangtum ketengkhengji lapen kecheraiji adet along nangtum kopisi kekroi nang jima nangtum aphan kepathanjisi
Sinai Anglong along nangtum aphan
pinso mate arloso arje akumlin nangtum aphan ke selam pen ajok pap klemnangnelo,
pi mate vo arje tame selam nangnelo,
mate pherui mate lang-ok arje tame kumlin selam nangnelo.
Nangtum sining angsong arni, chiklo lapen chiklolongso-heihei kopima kethek-long aputhak karchoji lapen kangdukjira asat chepaklo nangnelo. Nangtum Arnam
Bonta nangtum ke Alangli Ijip adet kekar-ang amede pen kepajoktang arat-lo. Nangtum pini keplang asonsi Alangli nangtum aphan amethang arat kepaplangji si nangtum aphan Alangli nangvanlo.
Nangtum pen ajok Nangtum Arnam
Laso alongle alongsi neli thipo, lapen langroi kaita neli kapke lo, bonta nanglitum ke hatsi aho-or kedo alongle cheraiji dokdok-lo.
Chechininon, nangtum pen
pima nangtum a-Arnam
Nangtum jongsi det along ajirdingklui an do setame nangso lapen nangsu do-olo setame, nangtum methang aphan pine a-arje akumlin keselam pen ajok pap klemrinon. La ke

Pini neli nangtum ahaki kepachojisi sining lapen pirthe aphan hang-lo, atheke nangtum jongsi Nephan kroikrelo pulote, nangtum prapjinpen laso adet pen avedetpo. Nangtum kecheraiji pu alongle Jordan parai along do longverve detpo. Nangtum aphan pavirklungpo.
Akaprek akhei atum angbong nangtum aphan

Hadak nangtum monit ari pen keselam a-arnam atum aphansi ingduk nangpo, lake thengpi lapen arlong a-arnamlo, kethek-longle lapen karjulongle a-arnam atumlo, chota cho thekthe, ingnim ta ingnim thekthe.
Hadak nangtum Arnam
Nanglitum kesung ahut lapen lahei nanglitum aphan keplang ahut, anke nangtum padusi Alanglinat chevoipo lapen Alangliphan kroipo.
Alangli ke kangjinso thepik Arnam. Alangli nangtum aphan o-e lapen pavirdetde, lapen Alangli methang nangtum aphusar atum pen Kechejok Aloh alam tengnene.

Hako alam, nangtum mahang-thekthe aphrang alam chematha damtha, hako ahut pirthe athak Arnam monit aphan kepinchong ahut alam pirthe adang ri-etnon. Lasonthot thedung akam aphrang plang-loma? Lasonthot alam mane aphrang arjulong-loma?
Nangtum non kelong ason monit atum Arnam me pen keningjevoi karjulong arat atum pirthe dolo ma?
Kaprek arnam atum isi arat aphan kaprek akhei angbong pen kevanji aphan damhaijima, lapen nangtum aphan
ke nangtum aphan la paklang-lo, la ke Alangli inutnatsi Arnamlo, lapen akaprek avelo pu aporman nangpilo.

Sining pen Alangli se nangtum aphan parjulong-lo, anke Alangli nangtum aphan pinkhat unpo; lapen ladak pirthe athak nangtum aphan Alangli men kangthir nangpathek-long-lo, lapen Alangli la pen nangtum aphan ningjelo.
Nangtum aphusar atum aphan Alangli chinghon-o apotsi, nangtum aphan Alangli ingvailo, lapen Alangli thedung ajakong pen nangtum aphan Alangli ha Ijip pen nangvanlo.

Nangtum dambom ahut, Alangli nangtum aphan kethedung lapen kangtangrak akhei atum aphan phlung-lo, anke Alangli nangtum aphan nangvansi halatum alongle nangpidetpo, la so alongle helo nangtum kechepahemphuji alonglelo.
Lasi pini chemathanon, lapen kaiseta tengnerinon:
Neli nangtum aphan pini nangkepi aron an kroinon anke nangtum lapen nangpoton atum kaike mesenpo. Nangtum kaike kechepahemphuji nangtum Arnam
Anke Jordan Aroi anihang anat rongthom arongsopi Moses bivet-lo
hadak mane amonit jongsi ahotur kali bonta mathakrang amat mane aphan pathilot-lote, chepachongdam unpo, lapen lahei arongsopi along jokpo, lapen laphan pathithelo.

Reuben akhei aphan Bezer arongsopi ha kejejangtang ajo apam dolo; lapen Gad akhei aphan ke Ramoth dolo, lake Gilead alongrisi kedo; lapen Manasseh akhei aphan ke Golan, la Bashan alongri along dolong-lo.
Israel arat atum aphan Moses Arnam aron-heihei lapen akethan-heihei pilo.
Israel aso-atum Ijip pen kevang ahut Moses halatum aphan kethan ahaki-heihei, aron-heihei, lapen kangsai-i aron-heihei lahei helo.
Lake Jordan parai Bethpeor angdenchit a-arlok, Amor atum arecho Sihon adet, la Heshbon alongsi kedo, laphan Moses lapen Israel aso atum Ijip pen kevang ahut paremdet-lo.
La alongle latum cheraidet-lo, lapen Bashan arecho Og lata anut kaprek Amor atum arecholo, la Jordan anihang anatsi kedo, laso alongleta cherai pidet-lo.
Laso alongle Aroer arongso pen Arnon Aroi an, lapen ha Sirion Anglong anirep an.
La Jordan Aroi anihang alongri anta parlo-lo lapen ha Kethi Atalo anitur lapen Pisgah Anglong akeng-ri anta parlolo.
Israel arat an aphan Moses hangpet-lo, lapen latum aphan pulo, “Israel arat atum, pini nanglitum aphan ne nangkepi aron-heihei an arjutha. Lahei charlinon, lapen lahei kroilo pura chesikthipnon.
Sinai Anglong along etum Arnam
elitum apo atum penchot lapu kali, bonta pini elitum kerenglang atum an penlo.
Me pen hadak inglong along nangtum angnosi
Alangli kopisi kepuma laso alam nanglitum aphan nangkethanjisi neli ke,
“Neke nangtum Arnam
Ne ingno nangtum badu a-Arnam avedet nangji.
Sining mate pirthe athak mate pirthe aber alang arlo, nangtum aphan thangnat akumlin selam nangnelo.
Badu akumlin aphanta ardomri lapen laphan archori, athema Ne ke
Bonta Nephan kechinghon lapen Ne hukum kekroi atum aphan suri suri a-ove anta Ne kanghon paklangji.
Kehingno kematha pen Nemen en nangne, athema Ne,
Kesang arni talonnon, lapen la bi pangthirnon, Ne
Nangtum akam kecheklemji aphan ni throk dolo,

bonta throksi arni ke kesang arnilo la Nephan kehodai tang arnilo. Halaso arni baduta kam klem longlelo, nangtum seta, nangsomar atum, nang ban atum, kepangreng api atum, mate nangtum angbong kedo bang adet aso atum setame klem longlelo. Nangtum kesang ason nang ban atum jokta sanglong nangji.
Chemathatha, Ijip along nangtum jokta ban si donang-lo, lapen Ne
Nangpo nangpei aphan aman pitu, la Ne
Pran armut-ri.
Beisa klemri.
Chonghuri.
Chobei pen badu aphanta boktap-ri.
Bang apiso aphan ar-i-ri: la ahem, alongle, aban atum, achainong, agadha mate la kedo aling amar aputhak ar-i-ri.
Inglong along nangtum keching-rum ahut lahei ahukum helo
Inglong isi me pen kekar-ang ahut kangting pen nangtum ase arjulong-lo, nangtum ajalin atum, lapen khei asar atum nelilong vang-lo
lapen pulo, “Me pen etum Arnam
Bonta nelitum kopisi puthot kethiji aphan phothu nangjilangma? Hala kephere-meme ame si netum aphan pavirdetpo. Jongsi netum Arnam
Me pen Arnam keningje alam arju longdet aphi mane amonit reng-loma?
Moses chemathathunon, lapen netum Arnam
Latum jongsi lason mathaver asonte! Latum jongsi Nephan lason man piver lapen Nehukum an kroiver asonte, latum akai lapen aso-asu atum along jat asonta mesenpo.
Latum apehem-heihei along kechedamjile damra thandamnon.

Bonta Moses, nangke Nelong ladak dokoknon, lapen Ne Aron-heihei lapen hukum-heihei nangphan nangpipo. Rat atum aphan lahei thannon, anke Ne latum aphan kepiji pu alongle along latum lahei kroithekpo.”
Israel arat atum, Nang Arnam
Lahei kedo-an kroipetnon, anke nangtum along jat ta mesenpo lapen nangtum kecheraiji alongle along nangtum dolongver po.
Nangtum aphan kepathanji aphan nang Arnam
Nangtum rengtik an, nang lapen nangpoton atum nang Arnam
Lahei arjupamenon, nang Israel arat atum, lapen lahei kroithipnon! Anke nangtum mesenpo, lapen nangtum isi thedung akhei plangpo, lapen nangphusar atum a-Arnam
Israel atum, laso alam chemathatha!
Nangning do-an pen nang Arnam
Pini laso nangtum aphan ne nangkepi ahukum tengneri.
Nangsomar atum aphan lahei thannon. Lahei nangtum hem kedo ahut lapen ingtan kedam ahut, lapen nangtum kesang ahut, lapen nangtum kam keklem ahut ruibomnon.
Lahei nangri along chekokdong non lapen nangtum kechemathaji aphan nangtum atehang along chekokdong non.
Lahei nangtum ahem anujok-heihei along lapen inghap along-heihei toknon.
Nangphusar Abraham, Isaak lapen Jakob atum aphan
Nangtum bibepin seta mesen amar pen keplengset ahem lapen nangtum hut-hepin alangtuk, lapen nangtum drakha ke-e-epin adrakha aberi lapen jit aberi longpo. Laso alongle along nangtum aphan
seta nangtum Ijip adet ban kedo adim pen nangtum aphan nangkepajok a-
nang Arnam aphan aman pinon, Alangliphanle archo chotnon, lapen Alangli men penle nangtum aseme tangchotnon.
Akaprek arnam aphan archori, nangtum komchen arat atum a-Arnam aphan archori.
Nangtum jongsi akaprek arnam atum aphan archolote, nangtum aphuthak
Nang Arnam
Alangli nangtum aphan nangkepi aron kedo-an kekroithip thekjile nangtum chechakpamenon.
kopima kepu la le klemnon, lake chokpet lapen mesen lapen nangtum akai along la mesenpo. Nangtum aphusar atum aphan
lapen Alangli kechechak ateng pen nangtum ahotur atum aphan nangtum phlung unji.
Mo ahut nangkele ahut nangsomar atum nangtum aphan arjupo, “Lahei aron kopi athesi etum Arnam
Anke latum aphan thannon, “Netum Ijip arecho aber ban donang-lo, lapen thedung jakong pen
Netum amek angden Alangli manghumeme akam keklem thek-long lo, lapen Ijip asor aphan latum arecho lapen asaihemphu atum aphan kepherememe akam keklem thek-long-lo.
Ladak netum aphan kevanjisi Alangli Ijip pen nepajok-lo lapen laso alongle netum aphan nepilo, Alangli ephusar atum aphan pi unji pu kechak ateng-lo.
Anke e-Arnam
Etum aphan Arnam hukum ekepi an ason kroipet-lote Alangli etum aphan aning ingsam-opo ”
Nangtum Arnam
Nang Arnam
Latum pen chepangri-rinon lapen nangsomar atum latum pen pangri pangdonrinon,
pima latum nangsomar atum aphan
Lasi latum adovan phri-etnon, lapen latum kangthir arlong anujok ing-lok etnon, latum arnampi Asherah angthek an chorpi-et nangji lapen akumlin-heihei me keipi-et nangji.
La klemnon pima nangtum
Akaprek akhei atum aphan nangtum aphai ong munak apot-le
Bonta
Chemathatha, nang Arnam
bonta Alangliphan kehijim atum aphan Alangli aduk kepiji mome.
Lasi non, nangtum aphan nangkethantang ason kroinon; lapen pini ne nangtum aphan nangkepi aron an kroinon.
Nangtum jongsi lahei ahukum arjulo lapen lahei kroipamelote, nang Arnam

Alangli nangtum aphan inghonpo lapen pahirjumepo, anke nangtum aphai chan-opo, lapen nangsomar ongdungpo; nanghidi Alangli pahirjumepo, anke nangtum sok, drakha ahorlang, lapen jit ajangthu longpo; nangtum ongdung kepangreng api lapen abiresak kepalong pen ajok Alangli nangtum aphan pahirjumepo. Lahei ahirjume Alangli nangphusar atum aphan chaksi nangtum aphan nangkepiji pu alongle along nangpipo.
Nangtum asonthot pirthe athak badu akheita ahirjume kelong avelo. Nangtum kepangreng api aso phiphedet pupelo.
Keso an pen
nangkepi akhei tin aputhak pavirklungnon, lapen latum aphan thangnat akangjinso paklangri. Latum a-arnam aphan archori athema la ke virdetpo.
Nangtum methang lahei amonit atum aphai nanglitphlot-lo pu chepuri lapen latum aphan nangtum phlung un-elo pu puri.
Latum aphan phereri,
Nangtum nangmek hini pen kethek-long kepherememe avur, manghumeme akam-heihei lapen angthek-heihei lapen alangli thedung ajakong lapen kangtang rak ajakong pen ajok nang Arnam
Latum angbong Alangli paphere-phrat po lapen kejok-lang atum aphan lapen kechepatu atum pavirdetpo.
Lasi lahei arat aphan phereri, Nangtum Arnam
Nangtum dambom ahut asap asap Alangli lahei akhei atum aphan phlungpo. Ephongvet ke nangtum latum aphan pavir-et un-e; athema nangtum klemlote, nampi api nangchanpo, la nangtum aphan pherememepo.
Nanghotur atum aphan nangridengsi
Latum arecho Alangli nangtum arideng nanghodaidetpo. Latum aphan nangtum pathilotpo, lapen latum aphan tengnedetpo. Baduta nangtum aphan khang un-elo; abangphutin aphan nangtum pavirdetpo.
Latum akumlin me keinon, lapen lahei nangtum aphan cheponri. Nangtum jongsi klemlote, la ke nangtum aphan kevirlo, pima
Lahei atum akumlin nangtum ahem arlo vanri, mate latum aphuthak keklo ahirjuno nangtum aphuthak dopo. Lahei akumlin nangtum hijimvek nangji lapen panovek nangji, pima lahei
Pini ne nangtum aphan nangkepi aron-heihei kroipamenon, anke nangtum rengpo, aphai chanpo, lapen nangphusar atum aphan
Nang Arnam

Alangli nangtum aphan an pangchirsi padamlo, anke manna a-an Alangli nangtum kechoji aphan nangpilo, laso a-an nangtum lapen nangphusar atumta aphrang cholonglepinlang. Alangli la klemlo, atheke nangtum aphan kethan nangkepiji aphanlo, atheke monit ke him penle kereng chot kali, bonta
La ningkan phlikep, nangtum ape-ari rak-redet-lo, lapen nangkeng kangkelo.
Chemathatha, nang Arnam
La apotsi
Nang Arnam
isi soktipli, soktipliso, drakha, thebo, dalim, jit, lapen pijo alang-heihei kedo alongle.
Hadak nangtum ingchirchelo, mate ingchirnangnelo. La arlong along ingchin dolo, lapen la anglong-heihei pen nangtum angchin-kelok tuk unji.
Nangtum ko-an ma kechoji ning kehang la an cholongji, lapen nangtum aphan aho-or kedo alongle
Nangtum Arnam
Nangtum kecho ji aphan ning hang an long-lote, lapen kedoji aphan hem keme dolong-lo te,
lapen nang chainong, biresak, rup, ser, lapen akaprek nangmar an chanlote,
nangtum chepindakde detjile cherenon, lapen nangtum ban kedo Ijip adet pen nangkepajok a-

Alangli nangtum aphan ajak keding lapen kepherememe kejejangtang ajo nangjalo, hadak abi kedo apherui lapen chehelangbong apivo-heihei do-o. Halaso kekrengtai lapen langkave alongle ajo Alangli nangtum aphan arlong pen lang pangbop-lo.

Kejejangtang ajo Alangli nangtum kechoji aphan manna nangpilo, la nangphusar atumta cholonglepinlang. Nangtum aphan aporman nangkelangjisi Alangli kesung nangtoilo, anke kejutsi nangtum aphan akeme ason pen Alangli nang pahirjumepo.
La apotsi, nangtum nangmethang ajakong lapen kangtang-kangsak pensi plang-lo pu chematha nangne.
Chemathatha, nang Arnam
Nang Arnam
Nangtum jongsi

Israel arat atum arjutha! Pini ke nanglitum Jordan Aroi kapji dokdok lo lapen nangtum apar themu lapen ingtangmu akhei atum alongle kecheraiji dokdok-lo. Latum arongsopi-heihei thetan, sining phore apaisong do.
Arat atumta ajon dinglen lapen ingtangrak; latum ke akromkethe akhei, lapen latum angno baduta arjap un-epu kepu nangtum arjulong-lo.
Bonta nonke nangtum nangmek hini pen kethurvur ame ason
Nangtum aphan

La ke nangtum kemesen apot lapu kali, lapen kechokpet ason keklem apotsi nangtum aphan halatum alongle pa-enlong-lo laputa kali. Alangli latum aphan phlungji pima latum hingnopik lapen nangphusar Abraham, Isaak, lapen Jakob aphan kechak alam Alangli chebi ingtung.
Nangtum chechini pamenon, nangtum aphan
Kejejangtang ajo kopusonsi nangtum
Sinai Anglong alongta nangtum
Nangtum pen
Anke
Kalang, hala jophlikep niphlikep aphi
Anke neliphan
Neliphan
Nephan ke khangji bor-irinon. Ne latum aphan pavirdetpo, anke baduta latum aphan chematha dam-thuthe detpo. Anke Ne latum apar themu lapen jakong thedung akhei nang pen paplangpo.”
Lasi neli chetevarlo, lapen inglong nanghirlo, kechejok aloh ketok a-arlong plangni ponlo. Inglong pen me ade vang-lo.
Nangtum aphan nangtum Arnam
Lasi hadak nangtum angno arlong aplang arum varlo lapen paphuk-railo.
Anke puthot neli aphrang ason jophlikep niphlikep
aningkethipik aphan neli pherelo, pima nanglitum aphan kepavirdetji an Alangli ningthilo; bonta
-ke Aaron aphanta kepathilotji an aningthilo, lasi halaso amat neli Aaron aphan arnam ardom pilo,

Halaso kehijimmeme apap nesi pondet-lo, la ke tasam achainong aloso, lapen la me along varchorlo. Anke neli la paduk-ilo, longle aduk ason koi-ilo, lapen la inglong pen nangkeli alangjeng along aduk varchuilo.
Taberah, Massah, lapen Kibroth Hattaavah along nangtum
Nangtum aphan nangkepitang alongle kepacherai ji aphan Alangli Kadesh Barnea pen hukum pisi nangpadamtoi ahut, Alangli be nangtum thurlo; Alangliphan nangtum chikikelo lapen kroikrelo.
Ne nangtum aphan nangkechini arni pen nangtum
Lasi ne domkhrup pen
Lapen neli ardomlo, “Keklem-un a-
Nangliban Abraham, Isaak, lapen Jakob aphan chemathadamtha, lapen latum kechingkino, kehingno, lapen laso arat atum apap aputhak nangno chedenrinon.
Kalite, latum aphan nangli kechak alongle along arat aphan pon un-edet-lo, pu Ijip asor pupo. Latum aphan kepathijisi kejejangtang ajo keponlo pu pima latum aphan nang hijimlo, pusi latum pupo.
Jatseta, lahei arat helo Nangmethang aphan Nang kangvaitang arat lapen Nangjakong horang pen Nang latum aphan Ijip adet pen kevan arat-lo.”
Anke
lapen nang kepaphuktang alongplang along ketok ason thot Ne tokpo, lapen nang lahei sinduk arlo thap nangji.”
Lasi neli akasia athengpi pen pira selamlo, lapen aphrang asonthot arlong plangni soilo, lapen lahei ponsi inglong arludamlo.
Anke aphrang ketok alamthe asonthotsi lahei alongplang athak
lapen neli chetevarsi nanghirlo. Anke
(Jaakan arat alangtuk-heihei pen Israel atum bar si Moserah anat damlo. Hadaksi Aaron thi-lo, lapen pip-lo, lapen la sopo Eleazarsi Alangli lar kurusar cholo.
Hadak pen latum Gudgodah damlo, lapen ha Jotbathah damlo, la ke lang kedo adimlo.
Inglong along Levi akhei amonit atum aphan Kechejok Asinduk kechepahemphuji aphan
La apotsi Levi akhei atum ke akaprek akhei atum asonsi longle longdunde; kopima latum kelong lake
Neli inglong along jophlikep niphlikep donang-lo, la neli kechengsi aphong keklem ahut asonlo. Puthot aphong
Anke Alangli nanglitum aphan kepajajisi nepadamlo, anke nanglitum longle cherailongpo, atheke, Alangli nangphusar atum aphan piji pu chechak-lo.
Non, Israel arat atum, nangtum pen
lapen Alangli aron-heihei an kroinon. Nangtum ale aphansi pini ne nangtum aphan lahei nangpilo.
Kangtuinei asiningta
Bonta nangphusar atum aphan
La apotsi, non pen
Nang Arnam
Jangreng lapen hemepi atum aphan kelang pangripet; etum angbong kedo bang adet amonit atum aphan Alangli inghon, lapen latum aphan pe-ri lapen an pi.
La apotsi, halahei bang adet amonit atum aphan kanghon paklangnon, pima nangtumta Ijip adet along bang adet aso plang-lo.
Nang Arnam
Alangliphan ro non, Alangli ke nang Arnamlo, lapen nangtum nangmek hini pen thek-long-lo, Alangli kopusonsi thedung lapen manghumeme akam nangklempilo.
Nangphusar atum Ijip kedam ahut, latum bang throksi kepvet. Bonta non nang Arnam
Nang Arnam
alam nangtum akethektang pen kopisi pini kecharli loma chemathanon. Laso akethektang ke nangtum, nangtum asomar atum kali.
lapen Alangli manghumeme akam-heihei nangtum thek-long-lo. Ijip arecho lapen adet kangthim aphan Alangli kopisi keklemloma nangtum thek-long-lo.
Ijip aron-armu atum aphan kopusonsi alosei lapen aron ahemkonglong penpen pavirdet-lo, nangtum thek-long-lo, pima latum aphan Talo Ke-er along lang pajang-lo.
Nangtum ladak nanglele ako kejejangtang ajo nangtum apharman Alangli kopisi

Dathan lapen Abiram, latum Reuben akhei Eliab aso atum aphan keklem alam chemathatha. Kadokave angno longle angho chingpudang-lo, lapen latum aphan, ahemtun, latum apehem-heihei, latum aban atum lapen kepangreng api penpen joilut-lo.
Kalang-lo, nangtumsi la hei thedung akam
Pini nangtum aphan nangkepi aron an kroipetnon. Ansi nangtum kelutdamji alongle kecheraiji aphan Jordan Aroi hat unpo.
Nang phusar atum lapen apoton atum aphan
Nangtum kecheraiji alongleke Ijip alongle ason kali, hadak nangtum aphrang dolong-lo. Hadak nangtum chili kevar ahut langkeponji aphan kam keklem chepadukpik nangji;
bonta nangtum kelut damji pu alongleke isi inglong-heihei lapen arlok-heihei, alongle, arve kejang pen kelong alang alongle.
Nang Arnam
Lasi, pini ne nangkepi ahukum-heihei kroinon; nang Arnam
La nangtum klemlote, akenang ahut Alangli nangtum alongle along arve nangtoipo, aphrang arve lapen aphi arveta longpo, anke sok athe, drakha ahorlang, lapen jit ajangthu nangtum aphan dopo,
lapen kepangreng api aphanta bap dopo. Kenangji a-an nangtum longpo.
Nangtum methang akaprek arnam-heihei atum aphan karchoji lapen kangdukjira
Nangtum jongsi klemlote,
Lahei ahukum ning chebinon, lapen mon-enon. Lahei nangri along chekokdong non, lapen nangtehang along chehomnon, la nangtum keche mathaji aphanlo.
Lahei nangsomar atum aphan thannon. Nangtum hem kedo ahut lapen ingtan kebar ahut lahei alam chethannon, nangtum kesang ahutta, lapen nangtum kam keklem ahutta chethannon.
Nangtum ahem-heihei lapen anghapi-heihei along lahei toknon.
Anke nangphusar atum aphan nang Arnam
Ne nangkepitang aron-heihei an kroithipnon: Nang Arnam
Anke nangtum kedambom ahut, halahei akhei atum aphan Alangli phlung-etpo, lapen nangtum apar themu lapen kangtangmu akhei-heihei alongle nangtum cherailongpo.

Nangtum kedongput alongle anke nangtum alongle plangpo. Nangtum alongle ahoike nitur akejejangtang ajo pen ha nirep Lebanon Anglong-heihei an, lapen Euphratis Aroi anihang pen ha nichi Mediterran Atalo an.
Halaso alongle along nangtum kedam aling nang Arnam
Pini ne nangtum aphan ahirjume lapen ahirjuno nangpachongvai toilo,
isi ahirjume lake jongsi pini ne nangtum aphan nangkepi nang Arnam
bonta isi ahirjuno, jongsi nangtum lahei ahukum kroimolote, lapen aphrang pen karchoche pinlang a-arnam-heihei aphan karchojile suilote.
Nangtum kecherai ji pu alongle along
(Laso Anglong hinita Jordan Aroi anichi anat Kanaan aso atum alongri, latum Jordan Arlok alongsi kedo. Latum ke nichi anat si kedo, Gilgal arongso adung Moreh athengpi kangthir pen helolelo.)
Nangtum Arnam
pini nangtum aphan ne nangkepi aron-heihei an kekroiji le chesiknon.
Nangphusar atum a-Arnam
Nangtum kecheraiji alongle, inglong kangtui-heihei along, inglongso-heihei along lapen thengpi arong arum-heihei along halatum arat atum karcho adim an pavir-et nangji.
Latum adovan-heihei phri-etnon, lapen kangthir along-e beng-etnon. Asherah arnampi kesoi akumlin an chor-etnon, anke latum lahei along mononphita archochedetpo.
Lahei amonit atum amethang a-arnam aphan karcho ason nangtum nang Arnam
Nangtum kedo-an akhei kedo alongri pen
Hadaksi nangtum athok adan-heihei, kephrin lapen akaprek athok-heihei, phankep pen ephan lapen nangtum adan-heihei,
Hadaksi, nang Arnam
Halaso arni nangkele ahut, nang-tum keklembom ason klemrinon. Non anta nangtum nangning kehang alingsi archobomlo,
pima nang Arnam
Nangtum Jordan Aroi kehat ahut,

-si elong adim Alangliphan karchoji adim ingvaipo, lapen hadaksi ne nangtum aphan hukum nangkepi ason an Alanglilong vanpi nangpo: Nangtum kevang nangji kephrin athok-heihei, lapen akaprek athok-heihei, nangtum kevan nangji phankep pen ephan lapen nangtum adan-heihei, lapen nangtum
Nangsomar atum penpen, nang ban atum penpen, lapen nang rongso along kedo a-Levi atum penpen hadak ning cheparong-ra donon; chininon, Levi atum ke amethang alongle avelo.
Nangtum kechongvai adim aling nangtum kevan athok pilongle;
Nangtum akhei-heihei alongri angbong pen
Bonta nangtum kechopangreng api nangtum nahok-le dotame nangninghang aling pathi tame lapen chotame. Nangtum aphan
Bonta nangtum lahei avi chonangnelo; lang ason nangtum lahei longle athak dung-et nangji.
aphan kepajir adan nangtum kedo adim-heihei along chonangne; nangtum sok-sang, drakha ahorlang, mate nangtum jit ajangthu aphankep pen ephan chonangnelo, kechingthokcheng achainong lapen abiresak,
Nang lapen nang somar atum, nangban atum penpen, lapen nangrong along kedo a-Levi atum pen pen lahei athok nangtum nang Arnam
Chininon nangtum alongle along kedotik ke nangtum Levi atum aphan langkrangri.
Nang Arnam
Jongsi karcho adim heloving pulote, nangtum aphan
Badutame aron ateng pen ingthir-et mate ingthirthe tame, Alangli thijok mate jok-lu a-ok kecho ason ok pachonang.
Ok along Avi kedolang a-ok si chochedet nangji, athema chethe ke vi alongsi kedo, la apotsi ok ke chethe penpen nangtum chonangne.
Kechoji aphan vi en nangne; la alar lang ason la longle thak dung-et nangji.
Laso ahukum jongsi nangtum kroilo te,
Nangtum athok-heihei lapen
adovan along-le kephrin pangthim athok-heihei hadak-le pajirnon. Lapen nangtum kechoji a-ok athok ta hadak-le pinon lapen dovan athak-le avi ke dungnon.
Ne nangkepi ahukum an kekroithip penle kroinon, lapen nangtum lapen nangso-nangsu atumta kaike aphan mesenverpo, pima nangtum kopima kechok lapen
Nangtum khei atum alongle ketengkheng ahut latum aphan nang Arnam
Halahei akhei aphan
Halatum a-arnam-heihei aphan kercho asonthot nang Arnam
Nangtum aphan ne hukum nangkepi ason an klemnon; laso along pakamri lapen la pen thangnatta en-rinon.
Inut amontri mate mang athe kethan abang isi manghumeme mate isi angthek kepiji chechaktahai,
la ke nangtum aphan nangtum aphrang pen karchoche a-arnam-heihei aphan keparchoji lapen kepangdukji aphanlo. La kechak ason chekok seta,
la aphan thangnatta nangno chedendunri, Nangtum aphan aporman nangkelangjisi nang Arnam
aphanle hungnon, lapen laphanle aman pinon; laphan kroinon lapen Alangli hukum-heihei kroinon laphanle archonon, lapen laphanle kroithipnon.
Bonta

Nangkorte tame, nangsopo tame, mate nangsopi tame, mate kechinghon nangpiso tame, mate nang kechephonei ajirpo jongsi akaprek arnam-heihei aphan keparchoji nangchorungjoi pulote, la ke kehingno akamlo, atheke lahei nang lapen nangphusar atum ta kaita archochepinlang.
Latum angbong mane abang nangtum adung kedo arat atum a-arnam-heihei aphan mate kehelo kedo arnam-heihei aphan keparchoji nangchorung tahai.
Bonta la nangtum aphan nangpabai longri; laphan alamta arjuri. Laphan thangnat akangjinso mate inghon meme paklangri lapen laphan raidunri.
Laphan pathilotnon! Laphan arlong kevarcheng abang plangnon, lapen ke abangphutinta laphan arlong pen pavarlonang.
Laphan arlong pen varbopnon! Labangso abang nangtum aphan nangtum ban kedo adim Ijip adet pen nangkepajok nang Arnam
Anke kadokave Israel arat atum kopi plang-loma arjulongpo; latum pherepo, lapen badutame mononphi lapuson kehingno akam choklemhaihelo.
Nangtum rongso-heihei along kedo ahut angthek nangtum aphan nang Arnam
ajehak amokevangve amonit nangkhei angbong pen akaprek arnam aphrang pen nangtum karchochepin arnam-heihei aphan karchojira amethang arongso arat atum aphan keja alam arjulongji.
Lapuson alam arjulong-lote, arjupame nangji; lapen jongsi lason kehingno akam plangtang-lote,
halaso arongso along kedo arat kedo-an, kepangreng api an pathilapnon. Halaso arongso aphan pavirklung nangji.
Haladak kedo amonit atum amar an van et-ra, rongso achetai along pangsomnon. Nangtum Arnam
Kepavirji aphan kepanong an amar nangtum aphan thangnatta chebi ri, lapen
Pini ne nangtum aphan nangkepi ahukum-heihei an kroipet pulote lapen akenang ateng klemlote kechak ateng nangpipo.
Nangtum ke nang Arnam
Nangtum ke nang Arnam
Lahei api nangtum chotame: Chainong, biresak, bi,
thijok, josung, karju, mate jok-lu,
akeng kemo kechephlak api an, lapen ahiso kecheheje api an cho tame.

Bonta akeng kemo kechephlak lapen ahiso kecheheje api kalite chori. Ka-ut, mengserang, mate coney avo-heihei cho nangnelo. Lahei aphan ingthirthe pusi tin nangpo; latum ahiso checho bonta akeng kemo kechephlak ave.
Phak chori. Lahei ingthirthe pusi tin nangji latum akeng kemo kechephlak do, bonta ahiso chechoche. Lahei api angbong chori mate kethi arpum anta ot-ri.
Abeng kedo lapen alip kedo alang-ok an cho tame,
bonta lang along kedo abeng kave lapen alip kave an cho nangnelo; lahei ingthirthe pusi matha nangpo.
Kangthir avo an nangtum cho tame.
Bonta lahei angbong nangtum cho nangnelo: Vomu, takun, vomu along-lopi,
vomu kiso, vomu ajat an,
vo-ak lapen la ajat an,
ostrik, vo hamlam, lang avokek lapen vomu ajat an,
vo inghu, vo dudu, lapen kethoi chobei avo,
lapen vojarong, volongkom arecho, lapen volangjak,
vo chokang , volongkom ajat an, volongkom aso ajat lapen vo-arplak-heihei.
Arveng kedo bilit phelong an nangtum aphan ingthirthelo; lahei cho nangnelo.
Kangthir angki, an cho tame.
Amethang kethi api an a-ok chori. Nangtum angbong kedo bang adet aso atum la pachonang, mate nangtum la akaprek bang adet aso aphan la jor tame. Bonta nangtum ke nang Arnam
Mok kechubom abiresak aso mate abi aso chotun-ri.
Phankep pen ephan ke bivetnon, aningkanvang nang hidi along kepathe athe an phankep pen ephan.
Anke
Jongsi nangphan
Kelongtang amar jorra, tangka le karcho adim along ponnon.
Nang kopima kepadamji nangningkehang aling padamnon, chainong a-ok, biresak aloso, drakha ahorlang, hor-arak tame, nang Arnam
Nangtum arongso along kedo a-Levi atum aphan langkrangri; latum amethang alongle ave.
Kethom aningkan kejut aphongtin nang sok phankep pen ephan vannon lapen la nangrongso along thap-ra bivetnon.

Laso asok ke Levi atum aphanlo, latum alongle ave, lapen bang adet aso atum aphan, lapen nangrongso along kedo jangreng, hemepi atum aphanlo. Latum vang nangpo lapen kenangji an ponpo. La klemnon, lapen nang keklem asontin along nang Arnam
Throksi aningkan kejut aphongtin nangtum along nangkechoram atangka diya det nangji.
Lasonsi la klem nangji. Badutame akorte Israel atum aphan tangka paramlote apreng diya det nangji; alangli tangka hang nangnelo;
Bang adet aso atum pen nang kelongji atangka pangrumtame, bonta nang methang amonit atum nangkepiji pu atangka pangrum nangnelo.
jongsi nangtum Alangliphan kroipamelote lapen pini ne nangtum aphan nangkepi ahukum-heihei an talon pamelote, hirjume longji.

kechechak ateng pen nangtum aphan Alangli nangpahirmeji. Ongdung akhei atum aphan nangtum tangka paramlongji, bonta nangtum badu penta choram jokphlotji; ongdung akhei atum aphan nangtum pangriji, bonta badu akheita nangtum aphan nangpangrirelo.
Jongsi nang Arnam
La lera pajoikenon, lapen la akenang an paramdunnon.

Laphan keparamdunji aphan mori, lapen kediya aningkan nangtebok-het-lo apotsi pipelo pu mathari. Lason kehingno akematha nangning arlo pavanglongrinon. Jongsi nang keparamdunji molote, Alangli nangbe thursi
Laphan pajoike pen pinon lapen chingchomche detnon, lapen ke nang keklem asontin aputhak
Israel atum angbong keduk-keboi atum kaiketa doji, lasi nangtum latum aphan chingchomchera pajoikeji aphan hukum nangpilo.

Pinso tame mate arloso tame, jongsi Israel angbong nangtum aphan ban nangchojor lote, la nangphan ningkan throk nangdodundet aphi pajoknon. Throksi aningkan nangkele ahut ke laphan nang pajoksi toi nangpo.
Nang laphan kepajok ahut ari angse toiri.
Nangphan
Chemathanon, nangtumta Ijip adet along ban donang-lo, lapen nang Arnam
Bonta nangban abang o-ingtungte det tahai; alangli nangphan lapen nanghem asor aphan chinghon lapen kedothuji aninghanglang.
Lason pulote laphan nanghem inghap along ponnon, lapen ano etnon; anke la akai isi nangban plangverpo. Lasonsi banpi aphan ta nangtum lang nangpo.
Nangban atum kejok ahut nangtum pajokmo nangnelo; jat seta la nangphan ning kan throk kam nangklempilo, la ke kerong kepon anam pen ta achitim vet-lo. La klemnon, anke nang Arnam
Nang Arnam
Elongvet karcho adim along
Bonta pi along pine jongsi kechokche do pulote, atheke akeng tekok jok, mate amek selokjok mate pine akechokche do pulote, nangtum nang Arnam
Lason api nangtum nanghem along chechotame. Nangtum kedo-an, aron ateng pen ingthirnon-ingthirthenon, nangtum thijok lapen jok-lu kecho asonthot lahei chotame.
Bonta lahei avi kechoji aphan chonangnelo; la lang asonsi longle athak dung-et nangji.
Abib achiklole nang Arnam
Elongvet karcho adim damnon lapen hadak nangtum kepangreng api angbong ejon abiresak mate achainong Kejok Amei a-an lapen

Laso a-ok nangtum kecho ahut, thap kedo ahim pen chori. Athema nithroksi nangtum thapkave ahimsi chonangji, atheke nangtum Ijip ke-o ahut ketong pen nangtum lasonsi klemlo. Laso ahim chonon, atheke la phan kesung ahim pusi irpo, anke nangtum rengtik an nangtum kesung adim la ke Ijip pen nangkebar ahut alam chemathadampo.
Ni throksi nangtum adet along badu ahemta thap avedet nangji; lapen ke kecheng arni arni kangsam kepathi api halaso aningve amat chodet nangji.
Nang Arnam
bonta nang Arnam
Ok updetnon, lapen la elong karchoji adimle chonon; lapen puthot adap-le hem chevangnon.
Athema la aphi nithrok ke nangtum thap kave ahimsi chonangji, lapen throksi arni ke nang Arnam
Nangtum sok kerot arni pen rui throksi lakhanon,
lapen ke Sok-kerot Arong-aje talonnon, nangtum aphan nang Arnam

angno nangsomar atum penpen, nangban atum penpen, Levi atum lapen bang adet aso atum penpen, lapen nangtum arongso along kedo jangre lapen hemepi atum penpen ning cheparong non. La ke elong karcho adimle klemnon.
Chechininon, nangtum lahei ahukum klemvekpo; nangtumta Ijip adet along ban donang-lo pu alam chetengneri.
Nangtum asok tidet aphi lapen nangtum adrakha sordet aphi, ni throksi an chepachong Arong-aje talonnon.
La nangsomar atum penpen, nangban atum, Levi atum, bang adet aso atum, jangreng atum, lapen hemepi atum, la nangrongso kedo atum penpen ningcheparongnon.
Elong karchoji adim nithroksi an rong-aje ketalon pen ajok nang Arnam
Elong karcho adim nangtum akhei pinso amonit an
la ke Alangli ke-un-an, nang Arnam
Nangtum aphan nang Arnam

Latum ahok-hedet nangnelo mate latum kangsai ahut mane abe kedun paklang nangnelo; lapen latum tangka chodeng nangnelo, athema dan-heihei ke kereset lapen ahokpet amonit atum amekta palu thek-lo, lapen latum aphan ahok-he ason papharthek-lo.
Kaiketa mesen pen lapen ahokpet pen nangji, anke nangtum aphan nang Arnam
Nang Arnam
Kumlin karchoji aphan thangnat along-e parjap-ri; lahei aphan
Pine kechokche kedo achainong mate abiresak
Nangtum arongso-heihei along ajehak apinso mate a-arloso atum
akaprek arnam-heihei mate arni mate chiklopi mate chiklolongsohei hei aphan karcho lapen kangduk pen ajok Alangli pen kechejok aloh ingdilo, lahei ke
Lason alam nangtum arju long-lote arju tarlipnon. La kehingno akam Israel angbong keplang ahok-lo pulote,
halabangso amonit aphan rongso angtan pondetnon lapen arlong pen varpopnon.
Tebon seta lason amonit aphan jongsi banghini mate la-an sose ahaki alangli puthak dolo pu-ansi pathi unji; la aphuthak jongsi haki kecho abang inutvet pulote pathi un-e.
Haki kecho abangsi kecheng a-arlong var nangpo, anke akaprek amonit atumta laso amonit aphan arlong var dunpo; lasonsi nangtum lason akehingno pen jokpo.

Ahut pen ahut ke achom kangsai atum ajehak alam ke kangsaiji aphan sungkrung ta doji, komatsi longle kelongjima lason alam mate areng keso mate pran-karmut lapen monit kepathi angbong kethak kesung alam-heihei. Lason plang-lote, nang Arnam
lapen lason nangtum alam Levi akurusar atum lapen kangsai atum aphan hodai non, latumsi halaso ahut keklem atumlo lapen latumle laso alam aputhak papharlonang.
Latum amethang kephar alam nangthanpo, lapen nangtum ke latum kepu asonthotsi klemnangpo.
Latum keparai alam dengnon lapen latum kepinkhat alam arjunon angton pen.
Mane jongsi halaso ahut adeng kedo akangsai abang mate kurusar alam patepek-lote, halabangso amonit aphan pathilot nangji; lasonsi nangtum lason akehingno Israel pen pavir unpo.
Anke abangphutinta laso alam arjulongpo lapen pherepo, lapen laso akam keklemhaiji abang avedetpo.
Nangtum aphan nang Arnam
Chinipamenon, nangtum kangvai arecho ke
Aron-armu aphan recho ongdung alosei pado nangne, lapen losei kenamjile alangli Ijip adet monit toi nangnelo, pima
Recho ke apiso ongdung donangnelo, pima la alangliphan
Alangli recho kecho ahut Arnam aron-heihei lapen kethan alam-heihei aloh epak alangli donangji, lapen la Levi kurusar atum arideng kedo atiri aloh pen ketokdun apak nangji.
Laso aloh alanglidungsi bi nangji lapen la pen akai isi porhe nangji, ansi alangli la along
Laso alam alangliphan anut kaprek a-Israel akorte apar memu pu kematha pen pahelopo, lapen
Israel angbong Levi kurusar akhei atum ke apharman alongle long dundelo; laso alar, latum dan-heihei lapen athok-heihei
Latum akaprek akhei atum ason longle cherai longlelo;
Chainong mate biresak athok kepi ahut, kurusar atum aphan angjin, akechenghini lapen apok pi nangji.
Latum kechengsi asok, adrakha ahorlang, jit ajangthu lapen ul apharman kelong nangji atumlo.
Kadokave akhei angbong pen
Israel angbong Levi atum nahok arongso pen tame elong karchoji adim vang unlo
lapen hadak kedo akaprek a-Levi kurusar atum ason
Akaprek akurusar atum atengthotsi alanglita kecho amar longpo, lapen alangli hem asor kopi ma nangkechelo ason chebime.
Nang Arnam
Dovan-heihei ame along nangtum asomar atum aphan phrin-ri; lapen nang rat atum paludep toiri mate sangkelang abangphan parirenang mate thek-kere,
mate majakanghoi parirenang, lapen kethitang akarjong pen kechingki atum pen thangnatta parjujenang.
Nang Arnam
aphanle kroithip khangjangnon.
Anke Moses pulo, “Nangtum kecheraiji alongle along, rat atum lodep chelangdunsi kopima keplangji charjupo, bonta lason nang Arnam
Laso alar, ne sonthot inut amontri alangli nangtoiji, alangli ke nangtum methang amonit penlo, lapen alangli lamsi nangtum arju nangji.”
Sinai Anglong along nangtum kechingrum arni,
Lasi
Latum angbong ne nangson thot inut amontri toipo, la ke amethang amonit atum angbong penlo; laphan kopima keningje nangji Ne thanpo, lapen la rat atum aphan ne hukum kepi aling thanpo.
