La nemen pensi lam ningjepo, lapen laso alam karjuje lapen kekroikre abang aling aphan Ne adukpipo.
Bonta badu amontri tame Ne hukum kepipe abirta jongsi Nemen pen ningjedet pulote, laso apot la pathinang, lapen lasonsi akaprek arnam-heihei amen pen keningje atum anta lason paplangnang.”
Nangtum manghu tahai, kosonsi
Inut amontri jongsi
Nang Arnam
Nang Arnam
Nangtum tovar selam nangpo, nang Arnam
Mane abang jongsi mathakrang pen ahotur kali abangphan pathilot pulote, la halahei arongsopi along chepajok dam un lapen jok-longpo.

Atheke mane banghini amonit atum nampi thengpi kepiji aphan damlo, lapen inut abang ke thengpi pibomlo, bonta cho abe pen jokphlotsi ari asangho aphan pathilot-lo, alangli halahei arongsopi along kat pen chepajok unlo.

Jongsi hadak rongsopi erong natsi dochot pulote, la heloving tahai lason ahut alar kehuiji adon atum kepathi apot laphan nepchek tahai lapen aningthisi adai kave abangphan pathi lot tahai. Jat seta, la ke mathakrang pensi ahotur kali aphan kepathi apotsi
Ne nangtum aphan lahei rongsopi rongthom kebivetji aphan hukum nangpilo.
Nangphusar atum aphan
nangtum puthot rongsopi rongthom ingvaithu nangji. (Pini Ne nangtum aphan nangkepi ahukum an nangtum kroipamelote lapen nang Arnam
La klemnon, anke adai kave abang thinangnelo lapen
Bonta inut amonit jongsi ahotur aphan arlenjoi pen pathilot-lo, lapen kechepajokjisi lahei arongsopi erong along katjuilo.
Lason pulote laso abang arongso ajalin atum laphan pahangdet lapen prankarmut alar kehui adon atum arideng laphan hodai po, anke laphan aninghangte pathipo.
Laphan jinsori. Lason aprankarmut pen Israel atum chepajoknon, anke nangtum along kadokaveta mesen bompo.
Nangdung kedo amonit atum ahoi angthek terek-ri, atheke la hako pen nang Arnam
Inut monit kepathi abangphan adai kepadoji aphan isinat ahaki ke dorde; inut amonit adai kedolo pu kehokji aphan hini ahaki anke donangji.
Inut amonit jongsi anut kaprek aphan ahok-hepin pen pathilo pu lambok lote,
banghinita elong karcho adim damnangpo, lapen kurusar atum lapen kangsai atum pen ajok pangsaipo, atheke latumsi halaso ahut saihem along dopo.
Kangsai atum alam angton pen tarlip nangpo; lapen jongsi akorte Israel aphan ahok-he pen lambok lote,
kebok kelong abang kephonangji an lamkebok abang aduk longnangpo. Lasonsi nangtum lason akehingno pen jokpo.
Anke kadokave atumta kopi plang-loma la arjulongpo, lapen latum pherepo, lason akehingno akam baduta mononphi choklem haihelo.

Lason alam along thangnat akangjinsota paklang nangnelo; laso aphan aduk kepi nangji ke apran alar apran, amek alar amek, aso ehong alar aso ehong, ari ehong alar ari ehong, lapen akeng ehong alar akeng ehong.
Nangtum ahotur pen ron kechedanji kedam ahut nangtum apar ronhemkonglong-heihei lapen losei-heihei lapen ron-armu atum bang nang-ong munak thek-long-lo, seta nangtum latum aphan phereri. Nang Arnam
Nangtum ron chedande aphrang, inut akurusar aphrang vang nangji lapen ron-armu atum aphan pu nangji,
“Israel amonit atum, arjutha! Pini nangtum ron chedandampo. Nangtum ahotur aphan phereri, mate ningcheparun-ri mate pratseiri.
Nang Arnam

Anke Saihemphu atum pinso amonit atum aphan pupo, “Ladak angbong mane hem kekim mirak bonta la hodaidelang lason doma? Jongsi do pulote alangli hem pachedamnang. Athema jongsi ron along alangli thilot pulote mane si alangli lar hem hodai nangkokpo.

Ladak angbong mane drakha aberi e-mirak bonta alangli drakha athe kelikji avarsai chelonglelang lason doma? Jongsi do pulote, alangli hem pachedamnang. Athema ronkechedan along alangli thilot-lote mane si drakha ahorlang junlongrongpo.
Ladak angbong mane abang arloso kehangdun doma? Jongsi dolote alangli hem pachedamnang. Athema, ron kechedan along alangli thilot-lote mane si alangli kechehangdun a-osopi aphan enpo.”
Pinso amonit atum aphan Saihemphu atum pupo, “Ladak kedo angbong mane abang ningkerunhup-ra phereju abang doma? Do pulote, alangli hem pachedamnang. Athema, la akaprek atum aning pahaidukpo.”
Ron-armu atum aphan saihemphu abang keningje pajut si ahamphangtin aphan ajalin ingvaipo.
Nangtum rongsopi erong keteng-kheng ahut, kechengsi la arat atum aphan pachehodaiji avarsai pinangji.
Latum jongsi anghap-heihei ingpulo, lapen chehodailo pulote, latum kedo-an nangtum aban plang nangpo lapen nangtum aphan kam klem bor-i nangpo.
Bonta halaso arongsopi asor jongsi nangchehodaide, bonta kechedanji aphan si chongvailo, pulote nangtum aron-armu asong latum aphan kompetnon,
anke nang Arnam
Nangtum methang aphan arloso atum aphan, osomar atum, kepangreng api, lapen rongsopi along kedo-an amar pontame. Nanghotur atum amar an nangtum cherai tame.
Lason helo halahei kehelo arongsopi-heihei aputhak nangtum kedo damji alongle adim pen keklem nangji akam.
Bonta nang Arnam
Kadokave arat atum aphan pavir klungnon: Hitti atum, Amor atum, Kanaan atum, Periz atum, Hivi atum lapen Jebusi atum aphan,
Latum aphan pathinon, anke latum a-arnam-heihei aphan karcho ahut kehijim meme an keklem akethan pen ajok latum nangtum aphan

Isi arongsopi nangtum kecheraiji pu kebor-i ahut, la thesere arong chor nangne, kecherai ajir dingklui setame. Thesere athe cho non, bonta arong ke pavir nangnelo; thengpi arong ke nangtum ahotur kali.
Nangtum akaprek athengpi arong inghan kebuiji aphan chortame ha rongsopi cherairetik an.
Pudamlonang, inut amonit aphan mane pathilot thek-long-lo ha nang Arnam
nangtum ajalin atum lapen kangsai atum damnangpo lapen adung arongso pen kethi arpum along an ko-an helo langma papunlonang.
Anke adungnei arongso atheke kethi arpum kedo adung arong ajalin atum kam paklemklepinlang achainong api animso ejon ingvaipo.
Latum la lang kekrengkrepin lapen alongle ta hai baibepinlang lapen e-epin alangjeng adung ponnangji lapen hadak latum la angphun ingdisut nangji.
Hadak Levi akurusar atum dun nangji, pima kephangno alam aputhak latumsi aron ateng pen ingsai nangji. Nang Arnam
Anke kethi arpum kelong adungnei arongso ajalin atum an chainong aputhak ari charsam nangpo,
lapen pu nangpo, “Laso amonit aphan netumle kepathi kali, lapen la komatsi keklemloma netum chinine.
, nangrat Israel atum aphan diyatha, nangsi latum aphan Ijip pen kevanlo. Netum aphanta diyatha lapen adai kave amonit aphan kepathi arvak netum aphan ne-enrinon.”
Lasonsi,
Nang Arnam
latum angbong inut abangpi arje mesen lapen nang bangpi aphan nangningdokkhak-lo, lapen ke-enji nangninghang-lo tangte,
Bangpi aphan nanghem chepondetnon, hadak bangpi achu chesoilong po, arichimi cheretpo,
lapen ape-ari cheselepo. Bangpi nanghemsi donangpo lapen apei apo aphuthak chiklo ejon bangpi chiru po; laso aphi, bangpi pen chepangri unpo.

Aphi, jongsi nang bangpi aphan akenang avelo pulote, nang bangpi aphan aninghang aling padamlongnon. Nang bangpi pen dim tar pasitang-lo apot si nang bangpi aphan ban ason khang un-elo lapen jordet un-elo.
Pudamlonang, inut amonit apiso banghini dolo, lapen latum banghinita bangpo aphan sopo mahangpathekpilo, bonta sokleng abang ke bangpo aningkedok apiso pen aso kali.
Bangso amonit asomar atum angbong kosonsi akhi kethakji pu kephar ahut, sokleng kelong nangji apharman aningkedok apiso aso abe dun nangnelo.
Asokleng aphan alangli phanni akhi pinangji, la aningkedok apiso asopo kalidet setalo. Inut amonit sokleng komatma chini nangji, lapen laphan la kelong nangji akhi an aron ateng pen pi nangji.
Pudamlonang, inut amonit asopo inut dolo, la chingkinodak lapen thurkrapver, la apei apo alam kecharjuje asolo, laphan adukpi seta arjuje.
La apo-apei atum kedo arongso ajalin atum along laphan pon nangpo lapen laphan parjapsi hut nangpo.
Laphan latum punangpo, “Netum aso ke chingkinodak lapen thurkrapver, lapen netum alam arjuje; la tangka phangho-et lapen horjunpik.
Anke rongsopi amonit atum laphan arlongpen varbop-po, lapen ke nangtum lasonsi lason akehingno pen jokpo. Israel atum abangphutin ta kopi plang-loma la arjulongpo, lapen pherepo.”
Monit kepathi apot inut amonit aphan pathilot-lo pulote, lapen la abang arpum nujok ehong along vek-lok-lote,
hadak la jopangthang pado nangnelo. Halaso arni amat la pipdet nangji. Kalite Arnam ahirjuno dopo. Bang arpum pipnon, anke nangtum nang Arnam
Mane Israel akorte achainong, mate abiresak ari chejokphlot-lo, la dojoi nangnelo; la ahemphu along ponpidetnon.
Bonta jongsi la ahemphu ahem helopik pulote, mate la ahemphu aphan chinine pulote, la nangtum ahem chepondetnon. La ahemphu nangcherilote, la pi dundet non.
Gadha, pe epak, mate nang Israel akorte jat-le pangbo seta, lason long seta lasonthot-le nang klemnon.
Mane Nang Israel akorte agadha, mate achainong jongsi ketirok thek-long-lote, dojoi nangnelo; pi aphan ingthurdunra parjapthu non.
Arloso atum pinso ape-ri chingthang dun nangne, lapen pinso atumta arloso ape-ri chingthang dun nangnelo; lason keklem atum aphan nang Arnam
Nangtum jongsi vo atar thengpi angsong mate longle athak api kepati mate aso penpen kedom thek-long-lote, nangtum laso avo aphan en nangnelo.
Nangtum aso aphan pontame, bonta api avo ke nangtum padam long nangji, anke nangtum achethe ding-opo lapen kai chingthurvurpo.
Nangtum hemkemi kekim ahut, chininon nangtum ahem arlan sarnung akung komchen bi nangji. Anke mane chingthu ra thilot seta nangtum adai avelo.
Nangtum drakha aberi along ason hidi elongvet alongle along kaprek kaprek arong edun nangnelo; nangtum jongsi klemlote, nangtum drakha athe lapen akaprek athengpi atheta cho-enlonglelo.
Chainong alo lapen gadha pachorra hai bai nangne.
Ul lapen pe kanglit pangvuisi kethak ape i-nangne.
Nang keche-um ape anophli apre hom nangji.
Pudamlonang, inut amonit inut a-okarjang aphan pangrilo, aphi alangli mathalo, bangpi aphan la akenang avelo.
Lasi la, bangpi aputhak kalili kalanglang alam boktap-lo, keche-en ahut bangpi ingthir et kali pu bok-lo.
Lason plang-lote, arloso api apo atum bangpi ingthir-et angthek pe along angthek kechebonkung ape rongso ajalin atum angno pon nangji.
Arloso apo abang latum aphan pupo, “Laso amonit aphan nesopi penan chopilo, non bangpi aphan la akenang avelo.

Bangpi aputhak la kalili kalanglang alam boktap-lo, lapen pulo latum kechelang ahut bangpi ingthir-et kali. Bonta ladak aporman dolo, nelisopi ke ingthir-et; kechepangri apelim along angthek nanglitum langtha!”
Anke rongso ajalin atum bangpo aphan pondetpo lapen arbupo.

Latum bangpo aphan dum suri isi arup adai hangpo, lapen laso atangka arloso apo aphan pidetpo, pima bangso amonit Israel a-arloso aputhak kepinrem vanlo. Bangpi ke bangpo apiso ason dobompo, lapen bangpi aphan la achethe dotik ke ti longlelo.
Bonta kebok alam ahok, lapen arloso abang ingthir-et pu thangnat aporman ave pulote,

latum bangpo apo ahem ajakan along ponpo, lapen hadak si rongso apinso atum bangpi aphan arlong pen varbop-po. Chepangri aphrang bang pen keche-en apot bangpi arat atum aphan isi kepatherak akam klemlo, atheke la apo ahem kedo ahutsi bangpi klemlo. Lasonsi nangtum lason akehingno pen jokpo.
Inut amonit jongsi mane apiso pen kehingno akam kechoklem ahut nep-longchek-lo, latum banghini aphanta pathilot nangji. Lasonsi nangtum lason akehingno pen jokpo.
Pudamlonang, inut amonit jongsi bang keraitang a-arloso pen kehingno akam kechoklem ahut nep-longchek-lo.

Nangtum latum banghini aphan rongso angtan ponnangji lapen arlong pen varbop nangji. Arloso abangta thi nangji pima kerap kelongji aphan la hanghedet-lo, bangpi rongso alongsi kedolo apot hangte arjulongji apot-lo. Pinso abangta thi nangji, pima la bang kehangtang a-arloso pen kehingno choklemtang-lo. Lasonsi nangtum lapuson akehingno pen jok-longpo.
Pudamlonang, inut amonit rong anat damlo, mane keraitang a-arloso aphan la chonepchek-lo. Lason pulote pinso abangphansi pathi chot nangji;
arloso aphan ke thangnatta klem nangnelo, pima bangpi ke kethi nangji an apap klemklelang. Laso alam ke inut amonit anut kaprek aphan tengkheng amat apran-armutdet pen isinat-lo.
Pinso amonit bang keraitang a-arloso aphan rong anat chonepdet-lo lapen bangpi abang kerap aphan hang-lo seta, bangpi aphan kerapdun abang avedet-lo.
Pudamlonang, inut amonit kerairelang a-arloso aphan ke chonep ahut nepdun longchek-lo.
Laso amonit arloso apo aphan piso anam rup plangphokep adai pinangji, lapen bangpi aphan envek nangpo, pima bangpi aphan la chonep bor-idet-lo. Alang rengtik an ke bangpi aphan ti longlelo.
Badutame apo apiso atum pen dim-tar kepasi pen ajok apo aphan aman jo nangnelo.
Kasi ke-en amonit mate a-ok kangduk kerotpet amonit
Api apo atum aronre pen chepangri atum mate lason asomar atum ovekep anta
Ammon atum, mate Moab atum, latum apoton atum ove kep anta

Nangtum Ijip pen kevangbom ahut nangtum aphan latum an nangpipe lang nangpipe, lapen nangtum aphan ahirjuno kepi jisi latum Mesopotamia along kedo Pethor arongsopi pen Beor asopo Balaam aphan rong-lo.
Bonta nang Arnam
Nangtum khei dotik ke, laso akhei aphan nangtum thangnatta rap-rinon mate pachingthurrinon.
Edom aso aphan langremri; latum ke nangtum adonlo. Lapen Ijip aso aphanta hijimri, ehut isi latum along nangtum dolo.
Ovekethom aphi penke latum aphan
Ron apor nangtum mukam keche-kim ahut, aron ateng pen kangthirthe ason an ke nangtum chepahelo nangji.
Mane jongsi manglangno pen ajok ajo achili chonlo lapen ingthirthetang-lo pulote, alangli mukam angtan dam nangji lapen hadaksi dodam nangji.
Arnikangsam ahut la amethang langchinglu nangji, lapen arni kechilut ahut la mukam chevang tamelo.
Mukam angtan nangtum kedo adim elongbak donangji hadak nangtum kesangji akenang ahut dam longpo.
Chin ehong isi arisim ason cheponnon, anke nangtum barpi kedam ahut la pen tuk si barpi pipnon.
Aron ateng nangtum amukam pangthir-etnon, pima nangtum aphan nangkeraijisi lapen nangtum ahotur aphuthak kepahaijisi nang Arnam
Inut aban jongsi ahemphu pen katjuilo, lapen nanglong vangsi chepachong-lo, laphan toithu nangnelo.
La kechongvai aling nangtum arongso angbong padonang, lapen laphan nang chenek nangnelo.
Pinso tame arlo tame, Israel angbong kardomhem abeisa plang nangne.
Kechechak chepaplengji aphan lason akam keklem pen nang Arnam
Nangtum tangka paramlote, mate an mate ajat tame nangkorte Israel atum aphan paramlote, abat ale enri.
Bang adet aso aphan nang kopima keparam ason aputhak abat ale entame, bonta nang korte Israel atum pen thangnatta enri. Lason aron kroinon, lapen nangtum kecheraiji alongle along nang Arnam
Nang Arnam
aphan thangnatta chechakchedet lake pap kali,
bonta mane jongsi aningkehang ateng chechak-lote, la keklem unjile chemathanon.
Nangtum jongsi mane adrakha aberi soding damput-lo, nangtum nang ninghang an chotame, bonta kechoponji aphan kethap adim chothappon nangnelo.
Nangtum kedambom ahut tovar mane asok ahidi phoponlote, nangtum nangninghang an nangri pen kangprun asok chotame, bonta nang nokek-rangso pen sok rot nangnelo.

Pudamlonang, inut amonit inut a-arloso pen chepangrilo, lapen aphi bangpi aphan akenang avelo pusi mathalo, pima bangpi aputhak la pine aning kedokde ason long-lo. Lasi la keti aloh tok-lo, lapen lahei bangpi aphan pilo, lapen bangpi aphan amethang ahem pen toijuilo.
Anke pudamlonang bangpi anut kaprek apinso aphan penan dokok-lo,
lapen laso amonit ta keti aloh toksi lahei bangpi aphan pilo, lapen amethang ahem pen bangpi aphan toijuilo. Mate pudamlonang, bangpi aphi apenan abang thilot-lo.
Lasonlo pulote, bangpi aphrangsi apenan abang bangpi aphan enthuthedet nangji; bangpi aphan la ingthirthe pusi matha nangji. Jongsi la bangpi aphan puthot chepangrithu lote, la ke

Inut amonit jongsi chepangri mirak-lang, labangso aphan chesong akam along amen bipon nangnelang mate akaprek rat akam adeng along bi nangnelang; laphan ningkan isi an pajok nangji, anke la alangli hem chedolongpo, lapen apiso aphan aning-parong longpo.
Mane aphan nangtum pine ason paramlote, la sok kekoi-i arlong bondok khang nangnelo. Latum kerengji aphan him kekoiji pen hem isi aphan kekhang-lo.
Akorte Israel aphan jongsi mane nepponchek-lo, lapen laphan aban paplang-lo, mate chojordet-lo pulote lason amonit aphan pathilot nangji. La-sonsi nangtum kehingno pen jokpo.
Nangtum jongsi si-i keso pen chechak nang-lote, Levi akurusar nangtum aphan kopisi nangkepu ma chinipamenon; Ne latum aphan kepi kepinkhat ason an klemnon.
Nangtum Ijip pen kevang ahut nang Arnam
Mane amonit aphan pine amar nangtum paramlote, nangtum aphan la bondok nangkepiji pu ape-ari ke-en damji aphan hem arlo lut damri;
ingtanle inghongra la amethangle nanglong pachevannang.
La jongsi keduk amonit, jopangthang la bidet-ri;
laphan lahei arnikangsamtin voithudetnon, anke la amek kejangji aphan pe chelongpo. Anke la nangtum aphan choropo, lapen nang Arnam
Kerong aban keduk kelak atum aphan chobeiri, la nangkorte Israel tame mate bang adet aso nangtum arong kedo abang tame.
Arnivangta la kam keklem anam arnikangsam apor pidun nangji; la tangka nangji, lapen longpo pusi la lakhalo. Laphan jongsi nangtum anam pipe pulote, la nangbe thursi
Asomar atum prankarmut apot api-apo aphan pathi nangnelo, lapen apo-apei atum prankarmut apot asomar atum aphan pathi nangnelo; inut amonit amethang keklem aprankarmut apotsi pathichot nangji.
Bang adet aso atum lapen jangreng atum kelongji ajakong khang nangne; lapen hemepi ape bondok khang nangne.
Chemathatha, Ijip adet nangtumta ban donang-lo, lapen nang Arnam

Nangtum asok kepamtang ahut, lapen nangtum kerottang asok ajehak hem van un-edet-lote, la kevanji aphan chedamthuri; lahei ke bang adet aso atum aphan lapen jangreng, hemepi atum aphan bi pinon, anke nang Arnam
Nangtum ajit athe ephong humlote, puthot la ahin kehum damji aphan chedamthurinon; lahei ke bang adet aso atum, jangreng atum lapen hemepi atum aphan bi pinon.
Nangtum adrakha athe ephong hum tangdet lote, ahin kehumdamji aphan chedamthurinon; ahin kedo anke bang adet aso atum, jangreng, lapen hemepi atum aphanlo.
Nangtum ta Ijip along ban kedo alam chetengneri; la apotsi ne nangtum aphan laso ahukum nangkepilo.
Pudamlonang, banghini a-Israel atum eson alam chepamit damji aphan kangsaihem damlo, lapen inut abangphan adai ave pu pachethang-lo, lapen anut kaprek abangphan adai hok-lo.
Adai-kedo abang jongsi karbu kecholong nangji pulote kangsai abang laphan angphun arum patongki nangji lapen laphan pasap nangji. La kopi akehingno akamma keklem halaso ateng si sap nangji.
Ake-ong muchotta batai phlikep anbak sap nangji, la apar sap nangnelo; la apar sap lote laphan rat angno patherak ongpo.
Sok kesi ahut nang chainong angtur rak nangnelo.

Banghini akorte atum jongsi elongvet dorapchom ahut, latum angbong inut abang thilot-lo, asopo pamo tekangkepin, pulote la kepaheme apiso abangphan hem isi angtan ke penan padolong nangnelo; la ke kethilot abang akortesi bangpi aphan piso en nangpo.
Latum asokleng ke hala kethitang abang aso pusi matha nangpo, lasonlote la apoton Israel angbong angthun dopo.

Jongsi kethitang abang akorte bangpi aphan ke-enji aninghanghe pulote bangpi ha rongso ajalin atum angno dam nangpo lapen pu nangpo, “Neli penan akorte ke adeng cheklemkle; Israel arat angbong akorte apoton la kepadoji-molo.”
Anke rongso ajalin atum laphan pahangdetpo lapen laphan pupo. La jongsi bangpi aphan ke-enji mobomlang pulote,
la akorte ahemepi abang rongso ajalin atum angno la along dampo, la akeng-op ehong phlokjokpo, amahang ingthokplakpo, lapen pupo, “Akorte aphan apoton kepadode abangphan ke lapuson lo.”
La hemtun Israel angbong ke “Akeng-op kephloktang amonit ahemtun pusi chethangpo.”
Jongsi banghini amonit chebohong-lo lapen inut amonit apiso abang anut kaprek amonit a-ok kangduk ke-otdunthip pen ajok apenan aphan cherapdunlo,
bangpi aphan kangjinso paklangri; ari chorpetnon.
Nangtum ajarong arlo sonni kelin-i arlong pado nangne, isi themuchot lapen isi ke bi muchot.
Nanghem ta sonni athuli bi nangne.
Ahokpet alin a-arlong lapen athuli le ennon, anke nangtum aphan
Kechobei amonit atum aphan
Nangtum Ijip adet pen kevang ahut nangtum aphan Amalek atum kopisi nangkeklemloma chemathatha.
Latum Arnam aphan pherere, nangtum kelak ke-aini ahut nangtum aphan latum aphi anat pen nangtengkheng lo, lapen aphi kedo atum aphan pathilo.
Nang Arnam
Nang Arnam
nangtum abangphutinta nanghoton along kerotcheng asok athe bivet nangji lapen la nangtum elong karcho adim along ponvek nangji.
Halaso ahut adeng kedo akurusar along damnon, lapen punon, “Neli non ne Arnam
Nangpen kurusar abang hoton ponpo lapen nang Arnam
Anke,
Ijip atum nelitum aphan chenekpik-lo lapen ban akam nepaklem bor-ilo.
Anke nelitum aphusar atum Arnam
Alangli ajakong lapen kangtang-kangsak pen ajok Ijip arideng pen nelitum aphan nepajok-lo. Alangli manghumeme akam klemlo, lapen angthek-heihei paklang-lo, lapen kepherememe akam paplang-lo.
Alangli nelitum aphan ladak nevanlo, lapen nelitum aphan keme-o lapen aho-or kedo alongle nepilo.
Lasi Alangli neliphan nekepi kerotcheng asok
Tangte
Nangphan lapen nanghemtun aphan nang Arnam

Ningkan kethom thom aphongtin nangsok kelong angbong pen phankep pen ephan Levi atum, bang adet aso atum, jangreng lapen hemepi atum aphan pinangji, anke arattinta latum do-an kechoji aphan longpo. Nangtum la klemlote,

aphan punon, “Kangthir et aphan kep pen ephan nelihem chebibepinlo; lahei Levi atum, bang adet aso atum, jangreng atum lapen hemepi atum aphan nangli Nephan kepaklemtoi ahukum ateng pen neli latum aphan pilo. Phankep pen ephan aputhak ahukum an neli kroimome lapen tengnene.

Neli ning keduk ahut neli la chochepinlang; neli aron ateng pen kangthirthe ahut seta lahei neli hem pen cho en-epinlang; lapen laso angbong pen kethitang aphan dan neli pipe. Nangliphan neli kroipamelo, O
Nang kedo adim sining angsong pen nanglangra Nangrat Israel aphan pahirjumetha; netum aphusar atum aphan Nang kechak netum aphan nekepi alongle keme lapen aho-or kedo aputhak pahirmetha.”
Pini nang Arnam
Pini nangtum
Pini
Alangli kepinchong angbong an pen akaprek akhei apar nangtum aphan pathe muchotpo, lapen nangtum Alangli men aputhak kero lapen aman vanpipo. Alangli kechak ateng nangtum ke Alangli rat aso plangpo.
Anke Moses, Israel ajalin atum penpen rat atum aphan pulo, “Pini ne nangtum aphan nangkepi kepinkhat alam-heihei kroinon.
Jordan Aroi nangtum kehat arni lapen nangtum aphan nang Arnam
lapen lahei athak lahei aron lapen akethan an tokjirnon. Nangphusar atum a-Arnam
nangtum ke Jordan paraisi kedolo, lahei a-arlong Ebal Anglong pini Ne nangtum aphan nangkepinkhat ateng parjapnon, lapen lahei vit pamenon.
Hadak isi arlong pen keselam adovan buinon seta lahei along ingchin amar pen kethengthepin abang nangji,
pima nang Arnam
lapen hadaksi nangtum athok pajir nangji lapen kejelang athok-heihei chonangji, lapen nang Arnam
Kevittang a-arlong-heihei athak Arnam aron-heihei athe tin paklangdak pen tok nangji.”
Anke Moses, Levi akurusar atum penpen Israel arat kedo-an aphan pulo, “Nephan no chedentha, Israel arat atum, lapen ne arjutha. Pini nangtum nang Arnam
lasi Alangliphan kroinon pini ne nangtum aphan nangkepi aron-heihei an rimpamenon.”
Anke Moses Israel arat aphan pulo,
“Nangtum Jordan hatdet aphi, rat atum aphuthak ahirjume kepi ahut lahei akhei atum Gerizim Anglong along arjapther nangji: Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakar, Joseph, lapen Benjamin akhei atum.
Lapen Ebal Anglong along ahirjuno kepi ahut lahei akhei atum arjap dam nangji: Reuben, Gad, Asher, Zebulun, Dan, lapen Naphtali.
Levi atum lahei alam asekethe pen ningje nangpo:”
Badutame arlong, thengpi, mate tasam pen kumlin keselam abang lapen laphan archojoi abangphan Arnam ahirjuno padonang; kumlin kardom
Lapen kadokave arat atum thakdunpo, “Amen!”
Apo mate apei aphan aman kepipe abangphan Arnam ahirjuno padonang.
Anke kadokave arat atum thakdunpo, “Amen!”
Adung abang ahoi keterek abang-phan Arnam ahirjuno padonang.
Anke kadokave arat atum ta thakpo, “Amen!”
Amekkave amonit aphan kechok-che atovar keja abangphan Arnam ahirjuno padonang.
Anke kadokave amonit atum thakpo, “Amen!”
Bang adet aso atum, jangreng atum, lapen hemepi atum aphan latum kelong nangji pen kekhang abang aputhak Arnam ahirjuno padonang.
Anke kadokave arat atum thakdunpo, “Amen!”
Apo apiso atum pen dim-tar kepasi pen ajok apo aman kejor abang aputhak Arnam ahirjuno padonang.
Anke kadokave arat atum thakdunpo, “Amen!”
Pi atum pen mek-langno akam keklem abang aputhak Arnam ahirjuno paphonang.
Anke kadokave arat atumta thak-dunpo, “Amen!”
Angjirpi apok mate angjir pateng pen dim-tar kepasi abang aputhak Arnam ahirjuno paphonang.
Anke kadokave arat atumta thak-dunpo, “Amen!”
Anipi pen dim-tar kepasi abang aputhak Arnam ahirjuno paphonang.
Anke kadokave arat atumta thak-dunpo, “Amen!”
Prankarmutjoi atum aputhak Arnam ahirjuno paphonang.
Anke kadokave arat atum thakdunpo, “Amen!”
Adai kavepin abangphan kepa-thijisi tangka kechodeng abang aputhak Arnam ahirjuno paphonang.
Anke kadokave arat atumta thak-dunpo, “Amen!”
Arnam aron-heihei lapen akethan-heihei an kekroithekthe abang aputhak Arnam ahirjuno paphonang.
Anke kadokave arat atumta thak-dunpo, “Amen!”
Nang Arnam
Nang Arnam
Nangtum arongso lapen ahidi-heihei
Nangtum aphan ongdung a-osomar, asok, achainong lapen abiresak pen
Nangtum keklem asontin aputhakta
Nangtum aphan nanghotur atum nangketengkheng ahut latum aphan
Nang Arnam
Nangtum jongsi nang Arnam
Anke pirthe athak kedo arat atum an
Nangtum aphan

Alangli keplang apuru ahem sining-inghun pen asek ahut arve nangpajongpo lapen nangtum akam an nangpahirjumepo, anke nangtum ongdung akhei aphan param dun longpo, bonta nangtum ke bang pen choram nangnelo.
Nang Arnam
Bonta nangtum jongheseta lahei kroimorinon mate akaprek arnam-heihei aphan archorinon lapen ingduk-rinon.
Bonta nangtum jongsi nang Arnam
Nangtum arongso-heihei lapen ahidi-heihei
Nangtum asok lapen lahei pen keselam a-an aputhak
Osomar nangtum aphan nang-pichom pen ajok, sok pame-o-edet pen ajok chainong lapen biresak pachanche pen ajok
Nangtum keklem asontinta
Nangtum jongsi kehingno klemlo, lapen
Alangli nangtum aputhak nangtum kecheraiji pu alongle along keso chetangphlup-phletik ke keso aputhak keso nangtoipo
Nangtum aphuthak keche-un akeso
Arve jangjelo, lapen nangtum alongle ingchin asonsi ingtanghetpo.
Arve alar, longle aduk lapen sangti aduk atomon nangtum vir-et-etik nangtoibompo.
Nangtum ahotur atum nangtum aphuthak
Nangtum kethi ahut vo atum lapen marat api atum vangsi nangtum abang arpum-heihei nangchopo, anke latum aphan kepaphere abang avelo.
Nangtum aphuthak ingthum-heihei
Nangtum aphan

Amek kave amonit atum asonsi anerlota nangtum pherairokpo, lapen nangtum atovar chelonglelo. Nangtum keklem aling thangnatta chingthurthelo. Nangtum aphan kaiketa chenekpo lapen thiparohumpo, lapen nangtum aphan nangkerapji baduta avedetpo.

Nangtum mane-a-arloso aphan chehang dunpo, bonta bang kaprek si bangpi aphan chepangripo. Nangtum hem kimpo, bonta la nangtum dolong lelo. Nangtum drakha aberi along arong epo, bonta la athe nangtum cholonglelo.

Nangmek angden nangchainong aphang bang thupo, bonta la a-ok nangtum chechodun longlelo. Nangtum kelangbom ahutsi nang gadha aphan bang sanponpo, lapen latum nangphan nangpithuthelo. Nanghotur atum aphan nang biresak pidetpo, lapen baduta nangtum aphan nangkerapdun abang avelo.
Nangtum kechelangding ahut nangsopomar lapen nangsopimar atum aphan ban chopipo. Nangsomar atum nangchiruijima pu nangtum arnivangta kelang nangmek so-ang po.
Bang adet akhei atumsi nang kechepaduk pen ke-e asok ponpo, laso alar nangtum thangnat ta longle, bonta kaike kechenek lapen keduk akamsi kelong.
Nangtum akeduk si nangtum aning parunhuppo.
Nangkeng
Bang adet along
Nangtum aphan
Nangtum ongdung achili rikpo, bonta kerot longji ke asap natji, pima phelongsi nangtum asok chopo.
Nangtum drakha arong epo lapen lahei lanapamepo, bonta nangtum la athe pangrumrelo mate la pen alang junlonglelo, pima ingki atumsi la cho-etpo.
Nangtum alongle along jit ajangthu arong bithe-bitha arong vangpo, bonta nangtum jit ajangthu longlelo, pima jit athe ingjui-etpo.
Nangtum asomar pinso lapen arlo ta doji, bonta nangtum latum aphan pangbo-etpo, pima latum aphan ron along keneppon atum aphan asonsi neppondetpo.
Nangtum athengpi lapen asok ingki atumsi cho-etpo.
Nangtum alongle along kedo bang adet aso atum ajakong chelong ponbompo, lapen nangtum ajakong nang aveponbompo.
Latum nangtum aphan keparamji ason doji, bonta nangtum ke latum aphan keparamji aphan avelo. Kejut ke latumsi nangtum aphan pangripo.
Lahei an akevir nangtum aphuthak vangpo, lapen nangtum vir-et-etik lahei nangtum along nangdodun-verpo, pima nangtum nang Arnam
Lahei ke nangtum lapen nangpoton atum aphuthak kaike aphan Arnam kangsai apormanlo.
Asontin anatta
La apotsi
Pirthe kejut ahin pen nangtum aphuthak isi akhei pathurpo, laso akhei alam-aki nangtum chinine. Vomu asonsi latum nangtum aphuthak sokvurpo.
Latum ke angthin ave lapen badu aphanta, osomar lapen arlengkesar atum aphan seta akangjinso ave.

Latum nangtum kepangreng api, nangtum asok, cho-etpo, lapen nangtum ke kangchir pensi thipo. Latum nangtum aphan sok, drakha ahorlang, jit ajangthu, kepangreng api mate biresak ejonta bibelo, lapen nangtum thi po.
Nang Arnam
Nanghotur atum nangtum arong-heihei kekompet ahut nangtum lapu-an sungji nangtum aphan nang Arnam
Nangtum angbong areng kangduk lapen jakong kavenei abang ta akorte aphan kecho ason chepipelo, kechinghon apiso aphanta pipelo lapen la along ahin kedo asomar aphanta pipelo;
lasonsi la kechobom asomar a-ok la badu aphanta pipelo, pima la aphan thangnatta avedet-lo, kekomchen pen ajok lapen nangtum aphan nang hotur atum nangtum arong an aputhak nangkepasung pen apot-lo.

Nangtum angbong areng kangduk lapen jakong kave a-arloso, akeng longle dongdepinlang, pima bangpi lapu-an ajakong kave lapen arengkangduk, la bangpi kechinghon apenan aphanta, asopo lapen asopi aphanta aningsopo,

akengdak pen amahang kepathek lapen kepathektang atum aphuthakta aningsopo, pima bangpi latum aphan chojoipo, athema thangnatta avedet apot lapen hotur atum kekompet apot lapen nangtum arong-heihei along hotur atum nangkepasung apot-lo.
Laso aloh along ketok an Arnam akethan kroithipthe pulote, lapen nang Arnam
kaike ingtontepin keme un-e akeso-heihei lapen kepherememe avur nangtum lapen nangpoton atum aphuthak Alangli nangtoibompo.
Ijip along nangtum kethektang akepherememe akeso-heihei Alangli nangtum aphuthak puthot nangtoithupo, lapen nangtum kaita memelo.
Laso Arnam aron-heihei lapen akethan-heihei along ketokte akeso an lapen avur an Alangli nangtoithupo, lapen nangtum virdetpo.
Nangtum aphai sining angsong kedo achiklolongso-heihei ason do-olo seta, nangtum angbong kerengji ong-edetji, pima nangtum nang Arnam
Nangtum aphan
Nahokta nangtum ningkangsam longle, nang methang pu nahokta chepulonglelo;
Nang-tum akai kaiketa phere nangjupo. Ajo anerlota nangtum kepherememe pensi plengsetpo, lapen nangtum kethi aphan kepheretap pensi dokhangjangpo.
Nangtum kethek-long asontinta phereduk po. Adapvangta arnikangsam asonte pusi cholangdingpo, lapen arnikangsam nanglelote adap asonte pusi mathapo.
Nangtum Ijip puthot dam nangnelo pu
Moab adet along Israel lapen
Moses kadokave arat atum aphan hangpetsi latum aphan pulo, “Ijip arecho, a-saihemphu atum lapen adet kangthim aphan kopisi keklemloma nangtum nangmek-hini pen thek-long-lo.
Kepherememe avur, manghumeme akam-heihei, lapen
Bonta pini arni anta nangtum kopima akethektang ason athe nangpachini longlelang.
Ningkan phlikep
Nangtum kechoji aphan him ave, mate drakha ahorlang mate arak kejunji aphan ave, bonta nangtum akenang an
Etum laso adim kevang ahut, Heshbon arecho Sihon, lapen Bashan arecho Og nangbarsi etum pen kechedanjisi vang-lo, bonta latum aphan eli paremdet-lo,
latum alongle cheraipidet-lo, lapen lahei Reuben akhei, Gad akhei, lapen Manasseh akhei ebeng atum angbong thak dak-lo.
Laso akechejok aloh aron an kroithipnon, anke nangtum kopima keklem chunpo.”
Pini nangtum nang Arnam
arloso lapen osomar atum, lapen nangtum along kedo bang adet aso atum lapen nangtum aphan theng, lang keroi atum antalo.
Pini nangtum ladak kedo ke nangtum pen nang Arnam
anke non
La kekroi nangji akechejok aloh along nangtum detle kechejokdun nangji pu
Alangli la keselam ke etum ladak kedo kadokave karjapsar kedo an atum aphan penpenlo.
Ijip along nangtum kedo akai kopusonma lapen bang adet ajo kedamput ahut kosonma chemathadamtha.
Halatum atheng pi, a-arlong, arup lapen aser pen keselam kehijimmeme akumlin-heihei nangtum thek-long-lo.
Chinipamenon, nangtum pini ladak karjap angbong pinso, arlo, hemtun mate badu akhei setame kaprek akhei a-arnam-heihei aphan karchojile e-Arnam
Pini ladak kedo-an atum chinipamenon, lahei alam karjulong atum an chingki-nodak seta thangthe pu chematha pen atovar chedambom abang do pulote, nangtum mesen lapen kehingno pupu aphuthakta virdetpo.
Lason amonit aphan
La ke Israel akhei angno isi arjan
Mononphi kevangji a-ove nangpoton atum, lapen bang adet heloving kedo atum nanglongle aputhak

Hidi isi aho-or kave ningjoinodakpo, meplum lapen ingti si plengsetpo; thangnat enodakpo, bap anta chingjokjedet po. Nangtum alongleke Sodom lapen Gomorrah, Admah lapen Zeboiim arong sopi asonpo, lahei
Anke pirthe adang amonit atum nang arjupo, “Kopisi
Lapen la akethak-ke, “La ke
Latum aphrang penta karchochepin akaprek a-arnam-heihei aphan ingduk-lo, la ke
Lasi arat atum aphuthak
-ke aningthihak-lo, lapen la aningthipiksi, latum aphan alongle pen phurjok-si bang adet alongle along varchorlo, lapen latum hadaksi pini anta dolang.”
Etum Arnam
Ne nangtum aphan ahirjume lapen ahirjuno angbong nangpachongvai toilo. Lahei ason nangtum aphan nangkeplang ahut lapen nangtum aphan Nang Arnam
Nangtum lapen nangpoton atum jongsi
nang Arnam
Nangtum pirthe kehelonei adimle pratseitame, nang Arnam
anke nangtum nangphusar atum ephong kedo alongle chepahemphu longthupo. Lapen nangtum ke nangphusar atum apar chingthurmuchot po lapen aphaita ong muchotpo.
Nang Arnam
Lahei ahirjuno ke nangtum aphan kehijim lapen kechenek ahotur atum anatsi Alangli paklopo,
lapen nangtum puthot Alangliphan kroipo lapen pini ne nangtum aphan nangkepi ahukum-heihei an rimpo.
Nangtum keklem asontin akamta
bonta nangtum Alangliphan kroi nangji lapen laso aloh along ketok aron lapen Alangli akethan an rimpame nangji. Nangning do-an pen nangtum Alanglilong nangchevoi nangji.
Ne nangtum aphan pini nangkepi ahukum-heihei ke kesungpik kali mate nangtum keklem un-e lapu kali.
La ke sining angsongle kedo kali. Nangtum “Komatsi angsong karlupo lapen netum aphan arum nekevanpipo, anke netum arjulongpo lapen kroi unpo?” Pu punangnelo.
Lapen la ke akaprek atalopi paraisi kedo lapu kali. Nangtum, “Komatsi talopi parai kedampo, lapen la netum aphan nekevanpipo, anke netum la arjulongpo lapen la kroithekpo?” pu punangnelo.
Kali, la ke ladak nangtum alongsi dolo. Nangtum la chini lapen jongdamthek, la apotsi non la kroinon.
Pini ne nangtum aphan keme lapen kehingno angbong, chethe lapen kethi angbong nangpachongvailo.
Nangtum jongsi nang Arnam
Bonta nangtum jongsi kroikre lapen karjujimolo, lapen akaprek arnam-heihei aphan karchoji chejalo pulote,
nangtum aphan pavirdetpo, ne ladak non nangtum aphan pacheretoilo. Nangtum keche-raiji pu Jordan parai alongle along nangtum do-o longlelo.

Ne non nangtum aphan chethe lapen kethi angbong, Arnam ahirjume lapen Arnam ahirjuno angbong nangpachongvai toilo, lapen nangtum kechongvai ahaki aphan sining lapen pirthe aphan ne hang-lo. Chethe chongvainon.
Nang Arnam
Israel arat aphan Moses lam thanbomlang,
lapen pulo, “Ne nangtum ajalin plangver un-elo, athema ne arta ningkan pharo isira ingkoilo. La aparta
Nang Arnam
Amor arecho atum Sihon lapen Og lapen adet aphan kepavir asonthotsi halahei arat aphan
Latum aphuthak
Ning chepathirthipnon lapen ning chepathethipnon. Latum aphan phereri. Nang Arnam
Anke Moses Joshua aphan Israel arat kedo-an angno hangsi pulo, “Ning chepathirthip non lapen ning chepathethipnon; nangsi lahei arat atum aphusar atum aphan
Nangphan
Lasi Moses ke Arnam aron tokpilo lapen la Levi akurusar atum aphan pilo, latum
Latum aphan alangli hukumpilo, “Ningkan throksi kepleng aningkan, preng-arvo kediya aningkan nangkele ahut, Kechepachong Arong-aje-heihei ahut la asekethe pen porheparjunon.
Israel arat atum nang Arnam
Pinso, arlo, osomar lapen nangtum angbong arongso-heihei nangkedodun bang adet aso atum an aphan hangpetnon, anke abangphutinta la arjulongpetpo lapen ke nang Arnam
Lasonsi nangsomar atum lapen nang Arnam
Anke Moses aphan
lapen Pehem ajakan along karjapding anghun archok pen latum aphan cheklang-lo.
Moses aphan

La plang-lote Ne latum aphan Nening thipo; Neta latum aphan obuppo, lapen latum aphan pavirdetpo. Ongdung akevir latum aphuthak vangji lapen lahei keplanglong ke Ne, latum a-Arnam latum along dodundedet apotsi lahei plang-lo pu latum chechinipo.
Ne latum aphan kerapjimopo, pima latum kehingno akam klemlo lapen kaprek arnam-heihei aphansi archolo.”
Non, laso alun toknon. La Israel arat aphan thannon, anke la latum aphan isi angthek plangpo.

Latum aphan Ne la longle kemi lapen aho-or kedo adim ponpo, athema Ne latum aphusar atum aphan chechak-lo. Hadak latum aninghang an a-an longpo, lapen latum kedo rengmejirpo. Bonta latum suisi akaprek a-arnam-heihei aphan archopo. Latum Nephan dengmopo lapen kechejok aloh ingdipo,

lapen latum aphuthak ongdung kepherememe akevir vangji. Bonta laso alun ke lunbompo, lapen la ke latum aphansi angthek plangpo. Non Ne latum aphan kepiji pu alongle along ponpe aphrangta latum kopisi kemathama Ne chini.
Halaso arni amat Moses lun tokpilo, lapen la Israel arat aphan thanlo.
Anke Nun asopo Joshua aphan
Epak aloh along Moses Arnam Aron tok-lo, ajatta tengnenedetji aphan langpamelo.
Alangli patang-et aphi, alangli Levi akurusar atum aphan pulo, athema latum
Laso Arnam Aron aloh ponnon lapen la nang Arnam
Latum ko-an kechingkino lapen kethurkrapma ne chini. Latum ne kai arjon
Ne ingno nangtum akhei ajalin an lapen kerapdun aban atum an nangchingrumnon, anke lahei alam ne latum aphan than longpo; latum aphuthak ahaki pachoji aphan ne sining lapen pirthe aphan phalo.
Rat atum ne thidet aphi hingnopikji lapen ne latum aphan kethantang alam kroimoji lapen chini. Lapen kevangji arni latum kevir chetongpo, pima latum klemri pu ason keklem pen ajok
Anke Moses kedo-an alun lunlo lapen Israel arat atum arjudunding-lo.
“Pirthe lapen sining-inghun
ne lam arjutha,
ne kepu alam tebok-het pen arjutha.
Arve asonsi ne kethan alam nangklopo lapen longle athak la ar-e cheplangpo.
Arongso aputhak ne lam klosirpo bap kangduk aputhak keklo arve asonpo.
Alangli tovarke chok-lim lapen ingsaipame;
Nang Arnam ke kekroithirklong lapen ahokpet;
kopisi akechok lapen akeme la klemlo.
Bonta nangtum ke kekroithirklong-kle,
Alangli rat-lo pu kechekrongta chelonle,
isi pap keplengset lapen kechobei akhei.
nang kelu lapen kematha thekthe arat-atum?
Alangli ke nangpolo,
nang pinchong Abang-lo,
Alangli nangtum aphan isi akhei paplang-lo.
Kedamtang alam, hako alam chemathadamtha;
nangpo atum aphan kopi plang-loma charjunon,
kedamtang alam nangke pathanjile arlengkesar aphan arjunon.
Kangtuinei Abang khei atum aphan alongle pilo;
rat atum kodaksi kedo nangjima Alanglisi pathir,
Akheitin aphanta inut arnam Alangli pi,
bonta Jakob apoton ke Alangli methang aphansi chongvailo.”
“Latum aphan kejejangtang ajo kedamtap long-lo,
isi kesampridang, tomon kejapvur akejejangtang ajo.
Latum aphan Alangli railo lapen lanalo,
Alangli methang aphan kecherai ason.
Vomule asomar aphan kangjar kethan ason,
latum aphan jokvan pen arveng pachepur,
Israel atum aphan
“Latum aphan Alangli kangtui alongle pangritoi,
hidi along kopisi arong kevang-loma latum cholo.
Arlong along pijo alang latum long;
arlong ajo alongleta latum ajit arong chanpilo.
Latum achainong lapen abi ongdung achulang long,
latum kemenei abiresak, abi, lapen achainong long-lo,
kemenei asok tepli lapen kechongvai adrakha ahorlang long-lo.”
latum akrom the-o lapen mamrang long-lo.
Latum aphan Kepinchong Arnam aphan olo lapen latum thedung Kepajok abangphan dengmolo.
Latum kumlin kardom latum a-
latum kehingno klemsi Laphan aning pathilo.
Ahok-he arnam-heihei aphansi latum athok pajirlo,
aphusar atum kechininepinlang a-arnam kemi-heihei,
Israel atum kekroikrepinlang a-arnam-heihei,
Latum a-Arnam,
latum thedung Kepajok Abangphan chetengnelo,
latum aphan chethe kepi abang.”
aning thilo lapen asopo lapen asopimar aphan dengmolo.”
“Ne latum aphan rapdundelo, “ Alangli pulo;
“anke latum kopi plang poma Ne langji,
kechingkino, kekroithirthe arat atum.
Latum akumlin pen Nephan ning pathilo,
latum arnam-heihei apot lang un-elo,
arnam-heihei lake athikpet pen arnam kali.
Lasi latum aning kepathijisi Ne khei aphan rimpo;
latum kepalang un-e-jisi kelu akhei aphan selampo.
Ne ning kethi me ade ason karpo lapen pirthe athak asontinta chopo la pirthe aber anta lepo lapen inglongpi angkur-heihei chopo.”
“Latum aphuthak Ne kejutjepin akevir vanpo lapen latum aphan Nethai aso kedo-an appo.
Kangchir lapen keso pen latum thiji;
kepherememe akeso pen latum thiji;
latum aputhak kepatengkhengjisi Ne nampi api toiji,
lapen abi kedo apherui latum aphan parchupo.
Tovarpi-heihei along ron vangsi kethi vanpo;
hem-heihei along kephere lutchokpo.
Risomar lapen okarjang atum thiji;
oso thi-i lapen akesar atumta jokjelo.
Ne latum aphan pavir pamepo,
anke baduta latum aphan chemathathelo.
Bonta latum ahotur aphan Ne pachepindak longle,
latum Ne rat aso aphan paremdet-lo pu;
la ke Ne methangsi latum aphan kesorlerlo.”
“Israel atum ke kematha thekthe akhei;
latum abidi avepin-khangjang.
Latum kopi apotsi keremloma chechinine;
kopi plang-loma latum chechinine.
Kopi apotsi bang suri aphan inut keparemlo lapen surikep aphan banghini paremlo?
latum kangtangnei Arnam latum aphan obup-lo.
Halatum ahotur atum a-arnam ke ingtangte pu latum chechini,
Israel a-Arnam ason ingtangrak-re.
Latum ahotur, Sodom lapen Gomorrah ason kehingno,
lake athe keho lapen abi kedo adrakha athe ason,
pherui abi pen keselam adrakha ason.”
“Latum ahotur kopima keklem
latum kekliji apor nangleji;
latum kevirji apor tebok-het-lo.
Alangliphan kangduk atum aphan Alangli ingjinsoji,
latum kerap kavepin la kethek-long ahut.”
Anke arat aphan
“Nangtum kechiki ajakong kethe arnam-heihei konat-lo?
Nangtum latum aphan athu kedo athok pensi pacholo ke lapen kejunji adrakha ahorlangta pilo.
Latum non pavang-ra nangparap lonang;
Latum nangtum aphan nangpajok lonang.”
“Ne lapen Ne inutpetsi Arnam chot;
akaprek arnam ke ahok kali.
Ne pathi lapen chethe pi,
areng amekta pado lapen pame,
lapen Ne kopima keklem baduta nang hili un-e.
Nechenam kereng et Arnam,
Ne Neri chejarlo lapen chechak-lo
Ne ke Ne kekar-ang anokjir arsopo lapen ahok akangsai kedoji aphan langpo.
Ne hotur atum aphuthak Ne alar huipo lapen Nephan kehijim atum aphan aduk pipo.
Ne thai aso latum avi paklopo,
lapen Nephan kekhang atum aphan Nenokjirsi pathipo.
Ne pen kechedan amonit aphan Ne langdingde;
arengkesochot lapen keneppon atum anta thiji.”
“Khei atum, nangtum
Alangli hotur atum aphuthak alar huilo lapen arat atum apap-heihei diyalo.”
Laso alun Moses lapen Nun asopo Joshua parjulo, ansi Israel arat atum la arjulong-lo.
Rat atum aphan Arnam akethan-heihei Moses thantangdet aphi,
alangli pulo, “Pini ne nangtum aphan nangkepi lahei ahukum kekroi thekji aphan chini pamenon. Nangsomar atum aphan lahei kethan ruibomnon, ansi latum Arnam akethan an kroithip thekpo.
Lahei akethan ke jungjung alam kali; lahei ke nangtum achethebinong-lo. Lahei kroinon anke nangtum kecheraidamji pu Jordan alongle along kedo arni pading thekpo.”
Halaso arni amat Moses aphan
“Abarim Anglong-heihei anat damnon, la ke Moab adet, Jeriko arongsopi chingden lo; Nebo Anglong arludamnon lapen Israel arat aphan Ne kepiji pu Kanaan alongle langnon.
Hor anglong along nangli ik Aaron kethi ason nanglita halaso anglong along si thipo,

pima Israel arat angno nanglitum banghinita Neliphan kroithipthe det-lo. Nangtum Meribah alang-heihei along kedo ahut, la ke Zin akejejangtang ajo Kadesh arong so adung-lo, rat atum angno nangtum Nephan aman pipedet-lo.
Laso alongle nangli ha kehelo pensi langpo, bonta Israel arat aphan Ne kepi alongle along nangli lutdun longlelo.”
Moses, la Arnam amonit, alangli thithe aphrang Israel arat aphuthak kepi ahirjume lahei helo:
Sinai Anglong pen
Edom aputhak arni kethur asonsi Alangli thurlo lapen Paran Anglong pen arat aphuthak turdang-lo.
Surikep apherangke Alanglilong dolo,
ari ar-e ke ketur-ang amede ason.
lapen Alanglilong kedo atum an aphan rai.
Lasi ili Alangli kengri ingphun pangkilo lapen Alangli hukum-heihei kroilo.
Moses ekepi Aron nelitum kroi,
la netum akhei kechibivek nangji akhilo.
Reuben akhei aphan Moses pulo:
“Reuben ke arat ong-edet seta, pathithedetnang.”
Judah akhei aputhak alangli pulo:
Akaprek akhei atum pen latum aphan pangrumpetnon.
Latum aphan chedanpinon,
Lapen latum ahotur abe kethur ahut rapdunnon.”
Levi akhei aputhak alangli pulo:
“Nang,
kekroithirklong nangban atum pen;
Massah along nang latum aphan asat ennon Lapen Meribah alang-heihei along latum ahok pu aporman enlo.
Nangphan latum kekroi-o chepaklang-lo Anke apei-apo aphan, akorte,
mate asomar aphantalo.
Latum nang hukum-heihei kroilo Lapen nang kechejok aloh aputhak kroithip-lo.
Latum Nangrat aso aphan nang Aron thanpo;
Latum nang dovan athak athok pajirpo.
Latum kopima keklem ning ingsamnon.
Latum ahotur an aphan sorlamnon;
anke latum kaita thur un-edetpo.”
Benjamin akhei aphuthak alangli pulo:
“Laso akhei aphansi
Alangli latum aphan joparnita raiver,
Lapen latum angbong Alangli do.”
Joseph akhei aphan alangli pulo:
“Latum alongle aputhak
Latum alongle botor pen kepathe athesere pen paplengset nang,
Abotor tin along kelongdun athesere kemenei palongnang.
Latum hako anglong-heihei kangvaitang athesere pen paplengsetnang.
Akeme ason latum alongle paplengsetnang,
Me kekar ang pen lam keningje Abang.
Lahei ahirjume Joseph akhei along pavangnang,
Pima akorte atum angbong la si ajalinlo.
Joseph ke chainong ajakong do,
la anu chai anu asonlo La anu-heihei ke Manasseh aphan asurisurilo Lapen Ephraim aphanta surikep-lo.
Lahei pen la khei atum aphan tong-lo Lapen pirthe kejut ahoi an phlung-lo.”
Zebulun lapen Isaakar akhei aphan alangli pulo:
“Talo along Zebulun abeha keklem pachingthur nang,
Lapen ahem along Issakar akhi pabatbom lonang.
Bang adet atum aphan latum inglongpi along pha Lapen ahok athok hadak latum pi.
Talo pen latum akhi long Lapen talo akungsoding asangti pen ta longdun.”
Gad akhei aphan alangli pulo:
“Arnam aphan ronang,
athema Alanglisi latum ahoi pathelo.
Gad ke hingho asonsi chonghong Ati mate aphu areng kangsekji aphan.
Latum amethang aphan akemenei alongle si enlo;
Isi jalin akam latum aphan pek-lo.
Latum
Dan akhei aphuthak alangli pulo:
“Dan ke ejon ahinghosolo;
La Bashan pen chonhamlo.”
Naphtali akhei aphuthak alangli pulo:
Latum alongle Galili alangbi pen nitur an le.”
Asher akhei aphuthak alangli pulo:
“Asher ke akaprek akhei apar ahirjume kelong atumlo.
Alangli ke akorte atum aningpadokpik nang,
Lapen alangli alongleke jit arong pen paplengsetnang.
La arongso-heihei ingchin anghap pen parailonang,
Lapen la kaiketa jokvan pen padolongnang.”
Israel arat atum, jat aser tame nangtum a-Arnam ason kali,
sining adang-bithe ahir-asang pen kardon,
inghun bithe nangphan nangkerapjisi kardon.
Arnam ke kaiketa nangphan nangraiverlo;
Alangli kaike kedo ari ke nang archak-lo.
Nangtum dambom ahut Alangli nanghotur aphan phlung-lo;
lapen Alangli latum aphan pavir-etnon pusi nangphan nangpulo.
Lasi Jakob apoton atum Ijip along ingsamjin pen dolong-lo,
sok-sang lapen drakha ahorlang kedo alongle along kedo jokvanlo,
hadak sining pen ar-e vangsi longle pachamlo.
Israel, nang ko-an kerengme!
Nang asonthot baduta ave,
nangphan nangkechedanpiji lapen kepahaiji aphan.
Nanghotur atum vangsi kangjinso chohangpo,
lapen nang latum aphan dongruipo.
Moab athoi pen Moses damsi Nebo Anglong anat arludamlo, Jeriko anihang angdeng Pisgah Anglong aphuchong anat an, lapen hadaksi
Naphtali alongri kangthim; Ephraim lapen Manasseh alongri kangthim; Judah alongri ha nichi an lake Mediterran Atalo an;
Judah anitur alongri; lapen Zoar pen Jeriko athoi, sotele arongsopi an.
Anke Moses aphan
Lasi Moses,
Moab arlok along
Moses kethi ahut alangli arta ningkan pharo isira ingkoi anlo; alangli kaike ta ingtangrak, lapen alangli mekta chechar pame.
Moab athoi along Israel arat atum alangli phuthak niphlikep chirulo.
Nun asopo Joshua abidi pen plengset-lo, pima alangliphan Moses si alangli dular bat-lo. Israel arat atum Joshua aphan kroilo, lapen Moses pen ajok latum aphan
Israel along Moses asonthot montri avepinlang; alangli ke
Ijip arecho, achakri atum, lapen adet kangthim aputhak
Israel atum angno thedung lapen kepherememe akam badu amontri kaprek atum klem un-epinlang.
Hemphu alam Moses, la
“Neban Moses thitang-lo. Nang lapen Israel arat atum kedo-an, non chesiknon, lapen Jordan Aroi hatpet ra Ne halatum aphan kepi alongle arlo damnon.
Ne Moses aphan kepu asonthotsi, Ne, nang lapen Nerat aso kedo-an aphan nangtum kehatput alongle an nangpitang-lo.
Nangtum ahoi-heihei ke keleji sangtimili ajo nitur pen ha Lebanon anglong Nirep anat an; Langpi Euphratis anihang pen Hitti arongsoding, ha Mediterran atalo anichi anat an.
Joshua, nang chethe dotik ke baduta nangphan nangparem un-elo. Ne Moses along kedo dun asonthotsi Ne nanglong nangdodunpo. Ne Nangphan kaita o-elo.
Mathathipnon lapen ning-chethethipnon, pima latum aphusar atum aphan Ne kechak alongle latum kecherai ahut nang labangso arat ajalinbang plangpo.
Muthe mathathipnon, ning-chethethipnon; lapen Neban Moses nangkepi aron an nang kroipetpo pu pachinidaknon. La epharvet klem pa-oiri lapen nang kedam aling nang unji.
Aron aloh kaita nangtum karcho ahut porhevek nangji. Ajo nerlo la ingchapnon, lapen la along ketok an kroipet po pu pachinidaknon. Anke nang plangpo lapen un pamepo.
Chemathathutha, Ne nangphan mathathip nangji lapen ning chethethip nangji pusi hukum nangpilo kalima? Phereri mate ning biri, pima Ne
Ansi Joshua jalin atum aphan hukum pilo,
mukam damsi rat aphan papudamtoilo, “Ajehak anbor siknon, pima nithom ansi nangtum
Reuben lapen Gad lapen Manasseh achitim akhei atum Joshua aphan pulo,
“Chematha-thutha, Moses
Nangtum apiso, nangsomar, lapen pi an ladak pasang-lonang, bonta nangtum aron-aso ron aphan risim ke-ot atum ari asangho Israel atum aphrang hat paphrangpo la halatum aphan kerapji aphan,
lapen halatum
Halatum Joshua aphan thak-lo, “Nangkepu ason an netum klempo lapen nangketoi aling netum dampo.
Netum nangphan kroipo Moses aphan kekroi asonthot lapen
Badutame nang jakong mate nang hukum aputhak kekroikre aling abang aphan pathilotpo. Mathathipnon lapen ning chethethipnon!”

Anke Shittim amukam pen banghini kelangjoi atum aphan dam pen Kanaan adet akenangsot ke Jeriko arongsopi longle kelangjoiji aphan hukum-heihei pisi toilo. Hala-tum rongsopi kevang ahut ajo Rahab, pu inut abeisapi ahemsi pangthang-lo.
Jeriko arecho, ajehak Israel atum ajo vangsi det lang chonghulo pu arjulong-lo,
lasi Rahab aphan lam ethe pathantoilo, “Nanghem kedo amonit atum det isi langjoitang-lo! Halatum aphan ingtan vannon!”
Ajehak amonit nehem vang-lo, labangpi thak-lo. “Bonta halatum konat pen lone kevang neli chinine.
Rongsopi anghap kangkir aphrang arnikangsam ahut latum dam-et-lo. Halatum konattong kedam lone neli chinine, bonta nanglitum jongsi paprapjin pen aphi hungdun lote nepdun unji.”
(Rahab banghini kelangjoi atum aphan sarnung angsong pontang-lo lapen halatum aphan bangpi kebitang ajehak abap pen dipsi patulo.)
Recho rongsopi olo, lapen inghap ingkirtang-lo. Halatum Israel akelangjoi atum aphan Jordan kehat adim anta damsi langdamlo.
Kelangjoi atum ajo kesangji aphrang, Rahab sarnung angsong arludamlo,
lapen halatum aphan pulo, “Neli chini
Nanglitum Ijip ke-o ahut
Nelitum la arjulong-lok pen pherepik-lo; nanglitum ajok nelitum ning ajakong avedet-lo.
Lasi non Alangli men pen semetang iknon, neli nanglitum aphan kangjinso asonthot nanglitumta nelitum hem isi aphan ingjinsopo lapen nanglitum aphan kekroithekjile neliphan angthek nepinon.
Nelipo-nelipei lapen neli-ik nelimumar lapen halatum ahemtun-heihei raipo pura semetang iknon! Nelitum aphan nelipathi longri!”
Bangso amonit thak-lo, “Nelitum jongsi nelitum kechechak ateng klemkle pulote Arnam nelitum achethe papondet-lonang! Nangli jongsi badu aphanta nelitum keklem alam thanthelo pulote,
Rahab ke rongsopi arpong along kekim ahemsi kedo, lasi bangpi arri pensi pinso amonit atum aphan inghapso anat pen pasunlo.
Bangpi pulo, “Inglong ajo anat-le damnon! kalite recho amonit atum nangthek-long-lokpo”, Nithom an latum nang-chevoivetik an hadak-le dojoinon.
Pinso amonit atum bangpi amonit aphan pulo, “Nelitum aphan nangli nangkechak alam nelitum ning chebi pamepo.

Lasonle nangli klemnon. Nelitum nanglitum adet nangtengkheng ahut, nangli nelitum aphan nangkepasun anghapso along laso arri-ke-er kokdongnon. Nanglipo-nanglipei, lapen nangli chekle atum an aphan lapen nanglipo ahem asangho an aphan nanglihem vanpetnon.
Mane jongsi ingtan barra thilot-lo pulote, la amethang adai pensi kethilo, la pen apot nelitum adai ave.
Lapen nelitum keklem alam nangli bang aphan thanser lote, nangli nelitum aphan nangkepachechaktoi alam nelitum chebibelo.”
Bangpi chedondunlo, lapen halatum aphan toijuilo. Latum damjui aphi bangpi inghapso along arri ke-er arri rak-lo.
Kelangjoi atum inglong anat damsi chepatulo. Recho amonit atum nithom halatum aphan rong anat rilo, bonta halatum latum aphan longledet-lo, lasi halatum Jeriko anat chedamlo.
Ansi banghini kelangjoi atum inglong pen nanghirsi langroi hat-lo, lapen Joshua along chedamthulo,
lapen pulo, “Nelitum ning chethepamelo,
Puthot arni Joshua lapen Israel arat kedo-an adapprang thursi, Shittim amukam olo, lapen Jordan anat damsi hadak la kehatji aphan kanghongjisi mukam kimlo.
Nithom aphi jalin atum mukam soding damlo
lapen rat aphan pulo, “Kurusar atum hemphu nang Arnam Akechejok Aloh Asinduk kecharchong pon ahut mukam phrira halatum aphi aphi dunnon.
Nangtum ladak vangvepinlang, lasi halatum nangtum aphan tovar nangpaklangpo. Bonta Kechejok Aloh Asinduk adung patebok-ri; kilumitar isi an pachehelora la aphi donangji.”
Joshua rat aphan pulo, “Nangtum methang chepangthirnon, pima penap nangtum angbong
Ansi kurusar atum aphan la Kechejok Aloh Asinduk parphangtoilo lapen rat aphrang la ponsi damnangpo pu thanlo. Halatum la kepu asonthotsi klemlo.
Joshua aphan
Kechejok aloh Asinduk keparphang akurusar atum aphan thannon, latum langroi kele ahut latum lang akung sangvek nangji.”
Anke Joshua arat aphan pulo, “Dak vang-ra
Nangtum kedam ahut la Kanaan asor, Hitti asor, Hivi asor, Perizzi asor, Girgashi asor, Amor asor lapen Jebusi asor an aphan phlung etpo.
Pirthe adang a-
Non bang krehini pinso amonit Israel akheitin pen inut nut ingvainon.
Pirthe adang ahemphu
Laso ahut sok kerot apor, lapen langroi langthepi pen ingbakset apor.
Rat atum Jordan kehatjisi mukam olo, kurusar atum kechejok aloh Asinduk parphang ponsi latum aphrang damlo. Kurusar atum langroi along kengkam kechejor pen amat
langroi alang liledetsi Zarethan arongsopi adung kedo Adam aroi athak along lang chepangpen pring-lo. Aber alang Thitang Atalo anat pen chebengpet-lo, lapen Jeriko adung arat atum hat pet undet-lo.
Rat atum kekrengdang alongle ajo kedam un ahut,
Rat atum kedo-an Jordan hatdet aphi, Joshua aphan
“Bangkrehini pinso amonit arotin pen ingvainon,
lapen halatum aphan Jordan Aroi achitim pen arlong hong krehini kurusar atum karjap adim pen pahumnon. Latum aphan laso a-arlong papontoinon lapen peningve mukam adim pabidamtoinon.”
Ansi la kangvaitang bangkrehini pinso amonit atum aphan Joshua pulo,
“Nang Arnam
Labangso a-arlong-heihei
nangtum halatum aphan
Ansi monit atum Joshua ahukum-heihei ateng klemlo. Joshua aphan
Joshua jokta kurusar atum Kechejok Aloh Asinduk keparphang lapen karjap adim la Jordan Aroi angbong chittim a-arlong hong krehini elo. (Halahei a-arlong dobomlang.)
Joshua aphan
Lapen rat atum langroi hat serak-rak-lo.
Lapen latum kadokave ta parai si dopet-lo. Kurusar atum
Reuben lapen Gad akhei amonit atum lapen Manasseh akhei pen achitim amonit, ron kechedanjisi chesik-lo, lapen rat kedo-an aphrang si hat-lo, la Moses latum aphan kepu atengthot-lo.
angno bangsuri 40 amonit atum ron kechedanjisi Jeriko adung athoi ajo hatpet-lo.
Halaso arni
Ansi Joshua Kechejok Aloh Asinduk keparphang akurusar atum aphan
Jordan arlo pen ingtan kepavangjisi
Joshua laso ateng klemlo,
lapen kurusar atum langroi parai kele aphijong amat langroi alang puthot chelithusi la akung anta puthot lang ingbak-lo.
Kecheng achiklo, kep arni si rat atum Jordan hatpet-lo lapen Jeriko anihang Gilgal along mukam kimlo.
Jordan pen kepon a-arlong hong krehini Joshua hadak elo.
La Israel arat aphan pulo, “Mo aphi, nangsomar atum laso a-arlong alamthe kopilo pu arjulote,
Israel atum kekrengphun alongle ajo Jordan kehat-lo pu halatum aphan than nangji.
Netum aphan Ikora atalo kehat ahut kepakrengphun ason thak thaksi nangtum a-Arnam
Pima lapen ajok pirthe adang abangphutinta

Jordan anichi anat Amor arecho kedo-an lapen Mediterran atalo anat kedo Kanaan arecho kedo-an Israel arat kehat tangtetik Jordan alang pakrengphunlo pu alam latum arjulong-lo. Halatum pherelo lapen halatum Israel pen ajok aning ajakong avedet-lo.
Anke Joshua aphan
Lasi
Israel arat Ijip adet pen kevang aphi pinso atum anke areng cherot et-lo.

Tebonta ningkan 40 rat atum kejejangtang ajo kehat-loksi apor padamlo, lapen pinsomar atum areng rot longledet-lo, lapen halaso kejut apor Ijip ke-o ahut ron kechedanthek arta pinso amonit atum an thi-et-lo, pima latum
La semeketang ason si halatum aphusar atum aphan kechak kedorphlup lapen aho-or kedo alongle lang longledet-lo.
Lahei amonit asomar atum areng cherot longle pinlang, lapen la ovekemi atum aphansi Joshua areng rot-lo.
Arengkerot jutdet aphi khei kangthim kedo-an amek memetik mukam along dokok-lo.
Joshua aphan
Israel atum Jeriko adung athoi Gilgal along mukam kedo un ahut, halatum Kejok amei arnikang-sam chiklo angbong 14 arni si padolo.
Puthot arni Kanaan adet kepathe athe halatum kecho cheng-lo. Sangkarnu lapen thapkave ahim selamlo.
Manna a-an ke nangklokledet-lo, lapen Israel aso atum cholongle pinlo. Halaso arni pen latum Kanaan adet kepathe athesi chobomlo.
Joshua Jeriko adung kedo ahut, men men la angno inut amonit aphan thek-long-lo, nokjir isi otdong. Joshua la along damsi arjulo, “Nangli nelitum aron-aso ma mate inut ahotur ma?”
Bangso amonit thak-lo, “Pu pu ta kali, ne ladak kedo ke
Joshua longle athak ardomkhrupsi pulo, “Neli nangbanlo akehai, nangli neliphan kopisi paklemtoipoma?”
Ansi
Jeriko anghap-heihei ingkir-pet-lo, lapen Israel atum kelut longledetjisi tonpet-lo. Baduta lut-longle mate rongsopi olongle.
Joshua aphan
Nang lapen nangron aso atum rongsopi komchen arnisi ephong adu pachekomra kongvainon, lasonsi nithrok an klemnon.

Pong-ut ke-ot bang throksi akurusar atum ke Kechejok Aloh Asinduk angnosi dam nangpo. Kurusar atum pong-ut kebut ahut, throksi arni nang lapen nangron-aso atum rongsopi komchen batai throksi adu pachekomsi kongvaira dam nangji.

Anke halatum isi ajirpading muchot pen pong-ut butpo. La nangtum karjulongpen amat, pinso amonit an hangprak nangpo, lapen rongsopi arpong-heihei ru-etpo. Ansi kedo-an aron-armu rongsopi arlo lutdam pakeng-sonpo.”
Kurusar atum aphan Joshua hangsi halatum aphan pulo, “Kechejok aloh Asinduk ponnon, lapen pong-ut-heihei ta ponnon, nangtum bang throksi la angno damnon.”
Anke la amonit atum aphan rongsopi akung soding kepadam pangchengjisi hukum pilo, lapen
Lasi Joshua hukum kepi asonthotsi aphrang kedam kerai atum pong-ut kebut akurusar atum aphrang dam pangcheng-lo,
laso aphi Kechejok Aloh Asinduk keparphang akurusar atum dunlo, laso aphi anung kerai atum dunlo. Pong-ut do-anta laso apor ke arki dorrep-lo.
Bonta Joshua amonit aphan pahangtoite det-lo, lapen la hukum pipetik ke etheta paningje longledet-lo.
Lasi laso asong amonit atum aphan

Puthot arni Joshua thurdap-prang-lo, lapen bataihini aphong kurusar atum lapen ron-aso atum aphrang arni keklem ason rongsopi komchen damlo. Aphrangsi kepaphrang kerai atum, adun bang throksi akurusar, bang throksi apong-ut kebut atum; lapen aphi
Karju anu apong-ut kebut bang throksi akurusar atum
Laso hini arni latum puthot rongsopi komchen ephong kongvai thulo lapen mukam anat chevoilo. Latum lasonsi ni throk klemlo.
Throksi arni latum the-ang prinprele ahut thursi batai throksi rongsopi aphrang asonsi kongvailo lapen laso arni helo batai throksi halatum kekongvai arnilo.
batai throksi kekongvai ahut kurusar atum pong-ut butji dokdok-lo, Joshua amonit atum kehangprakji ahukum pisi la pulo, “Nangtum aphan
Rongsopi lapen la along kedo-an amar angton pen
Bonta kepavir nangji amar an nangtum ponlongle; nangtum jongsi klemlo pulote nang Israel amukam aputhak kesung lapen kevir vanpo.
Rup, ser, tam angchin, mate ingchin pen keselam amar an

Lasi kurusar atum pong-ut-heihei but-lo. La monit karjulong pen amat latum hangprak-lo lapen arpong-heihei ruvang-lo. Anke kedo-an ron-armu atum rongsopi along kelutdam pakengsonsi damlo lapen la cheraidet-lo.
Latum anokjir pen rongsopi kedo abangphutin aphan latum pinso-arlo, oso lapen akesar anta pathilo. Latum chainong, biresak lapen gadha anta pathilo.
Ansi Joshua kelangjoi akam keklem banghini amonit aphan pulo, “Beisapi ahem damra bangpi lapen bangpi ahem asor kedo-an van-etnon, nangtum bangpi aphan kechechak ateng.”
Lasi latum damsi Rahab lapen apo-apei, lapen amumar atum lapen ahem asor kedo-an aphan vandet-lo. Israel amukam adung halatum kedo-an ahem asor lapen aban atum aphan pajokvansi ponlo.
Ansi latum rongsopi me keilo lapen longle anta lapen la along kedo amar asontin ser, rup, tam lapen ingchin pen keselam amar pen apar me pacho-et-lo. Lahei ke ponsi
Bonta Rahab beisapi lapen adon-arap kedo-an achethe pajok-lo. Pima Jeriko anat la ketoi banghini kepalangjoitoi atum aphan bangpi patujoilo. (Non pu arnita bangpi aso-asu Israel adetsi dolo.)
Halaso ahut Joshua isi aseme pathirlo: “Badutame Jeriko arongsopi kekimthuji kebor-i abang aphan
Hemthur kekim abangphan aso akleng pavirnang;
anghap-heihei keselam abang aso kejut pavirnang.”
Lasi Joshua along
Israel atum aphan
Joshua ajehak amonit Jeriko pen Ai, Bethel anihang arongsopi, la Bethaven adung, anat hukum pisi longle palangtoilo. Halatum langdetsi

Joshua aphan kelong alam thanlo, “Anut tin Ai ketengkheng along kedunpetji akam ave. Muthe bang surihini mate bang suri kethom amonit toichot non. Kechedanji aphan kedo-an ron-armu toi-et nangne; la thedung arongsopi kali.”
Lasi bang suri kethom a-Israel atum tengkheng-lo, bonta latum aphi nangchirui nangkok-lo.

Ai amonit atum rongsopi anghap pen latum aphan ajehak a-arlong ajo an kehelo nangphlung dunlo lapen bang 36 anbak latum aphan pathilo ha inglong kehir ahut. Anke Israel atum latum aning ajakong ingbodet-lo, lapen pherelo.
Aningduksi Joshua lapen Israel ajalin atum ape chingsek-lo lapen
Lapen Joshua pulo, “Ningkehang aling Keklem a-
Ne kopisi kepupo, O
Kanaan atum lapen det along kedo abangphutin laso alam arjulongpo. Halatum netum aphan komchensi abangphutin aphan pathi-etpo! Lapen Nangman kechekhangji aphan Nang kopi klempo?”
Joshua aphan

Israel atum pap klemtang-lo! Ne kepi ahukum kekroithekjisi halatum pen Ne kechedon alam ingditang-lo. Kepavir nangji amar latum ajehak entang-lo. Latum lahei chonghutang-lo, la pachobeisi latum amar along birappet-lo. Halatum pen latum aphi chiruinang-lo, pima non latum amethangsi chepavirtoilo! Nangphan hukum nangkepitang pon nangne pu amar pavirvetik ke Ne nanglong nangdodunde!

La apotsi Israel atum ahotur angno arjap un-edet-lo, lapen latum ahotur aphan panungkuk-lo, pima latum isi nangmethang aphan kar-i-pik amar ason plang-lo. Jongsi nangtum angbong pen kar-i amar pavirvetik ke Ne nangtum along nangdundelo,
thurnon! Rat aphan pangthirra Ne ingno kevangji aphan pachesiknon. Penap kechesikjile latum aphan thannon, pima, Ne

Lasi latum aphan thannon, adap latum lahei kevan thekji aphan. Isi akhei pen isi akhei. Ne kejong akhei atum aro pen aro vang nangpo. Ne kejong aro edon pen edon vang nangpo. Ne kejong adon inut pen inut vang nangpo.

Lapen Ne kejong abangphu aphan kepavir nangji amar penpen lapen la hem isi, la kechepahemphu amar an penpen me phrindutpo, pima la Israel aphuthak pherememe aketherak vantang-lo lapen Ne kechejok aloh phritang-lo.’”
Puthot adap Joshua Israel atum aphan isi akhei pen isi akhei vanlo lapen Judah akhei jong-lo.
La, Judah akhei vansi aro pen aro vanlo lapen Zerah si jong-lo. Anke la Zerah aro pen edon edon vanlo, lapen Zabdi adon ahem jong-lo.
La anke Zabdi ahem isi inut pen inut vanlo, lapen Achan, la Karmi asopo lapen Zabdi asupo aphan jong-lo.
La aphan Joshua pulo, “Sopo, Israel a-Arnam
Achan thak-lo, “La ahok-lo, neli

Elitum kevan amar angbong Bebilon ape mesen neli thek-long-lo, lin 2 anbak arup, lapen powa hini anbak ser angkleng ke-enji ar-i-duk amat neli lahei vandet-lo. La neli pe ahem arlo kepip thek-longji, rup ke angbong chit si do.”
Lasi Joshua ajehak amonit pehem anat pakattoilo, lapen latum ke-enmo amar-heihei hadak kepip thek-long-lo, rup ke angbong chitsi kebi.
Lahei latum pehem angtan vansi lahei Joshua along ponlo lapen Israel kedo-an lapen

Joshua lapen Israel arat kedo-an Achan aphan phlung-lo lapen rup, pe, lapen ser angkleng, asopo atum, lapen asopi atum, la achainong, agadha-heihei lapen biresak, la apehem lapen la kechepahemphu amar ason an, lahei latum “Kesung Arlok” pu anatsi ponlo.
Lapen Joshua pulo, “Kopisi nang netum aphan lason akesung kevanlo? Non
La aphuthak latum arlong buithip-lo, la nonputa hadak dolang. La apotsi laso adim Kesung Arlok pusi irlo. Anke
Joshua aphan

Jeriko lapen la arecho aphan nangtum keklem asonthotsi Ai lapen la arecho aphan klemnangpo, bonta non ephong ke la amar-heihei lapen kepangreng api-heihei nangtum aphan chepon tame. Anung anat pen menmen pamanghuhakji aphanle rongsopi ketengkhengji chesiknon.”
Lasi Joshua Ai anat kedo-an aron-aso penpen kedamji chesik-lo. La kemenei suri 30 aron-aso ingvaiponlo lapen halatum aphan ajo laso ahukum penpen toilo:
“Rongsopi parai kaprek anat chepatujoi non, bonta la pen pahelo-o-ri; ketengkhengjile chesikdingnon.
Ne monit lapen ne rongsopi dampo. Ai amonit atum netum abe thur pen nangbarlote, aphrang abatai etum keklem asonthot, netum aphi chiruisi katpo.
Etum halatum aphan rongsopi pen kepon paheloving-vetik ke latum etum aphi aphi ephlungbompo. Aphrang etum keklem asonthot, eli halatum pen kekat-lopu halatum mathapo.
Anke nangtum kechepatu adim pen nangbarpo lapen rongsopi cheraidetpo.
hukum ekepi asonthot nangtum rongsopi me keidutnon. Lahei nangtum aphan ahukum-heiheilo.”
Lasi Joshua toilo lapen halatum kechepatu adim damlo lapen hadak inghongding-lo. Ai anichi anat, Ai lapen Bethel angbong Joshua mukam alongsi ajo pangthang-lo.
Adapprang Joshua thurlo lapen ron-aso an aphan hangpet-lo. Ansi la lapen Israel ajalin atum halatum aphan Ai anat japonlo.
Ron-aso an la along rongsopi kelutdam atovarpi anat damlo lapen nirep anat Ai lapen halatum angbong a-arlok along mukam kimlo.
La bangsuripho anbak amonit ponlo, lapen rongsopi anichi anat halatum aphan patulo, Ai lapen Bethel angbong-lo.
Ron-aso atum kechedanjisi parjap-lo, rongsopi nirep amukam kethe anat lapen ahin amonit ke nichi anat. Arlok alongsi Joshua ajo pangthang-lo.

Ai arecho Joshua amonit aphan kethek-long pen, la klem rok-lo. La lapen amonit an aphrang adimthot Israel atum pen kechedanjisi Jordan arlok anat pen nangbarlo, aphi pen bang nang tengkheng detna pu chechininepin.
Joshua lapen la amonit atum kerem palemlemsi aphi chiruilo, lapen aho-or kave ahidi anat kat-lo.
Rongsopi kedo-an aphan hangpetsi halatum aphi pahungdunpet-lo, lapen halatum Joshua aphi aphi hungdunbomsi halatum rongsopi pen chepahelobomlo.
Ai along kedo abangphutinta Israel aso aphi dunlo, lapen rongsopi aphan keraidunji abang avedetsi tovar thovang-lo.
Anke Joshua aphan
lapen la ari kechirung pen amat kechepatujoi atum adim pen thursi rongsopi anat kat seraksi la cheraidet-lo.

Ai amonit atum aphi kechelang ahut ke mehi angpong sining karlu an halatum thek-long-lo. Halatum kechepajokji atovar nahokta ave, pima Israel aso aho-or kave ahidi anat kekat atum chetevarsi latum aphan tengkheng-lo.
Akaprek atum rongsopi cheraitang-lo lapen la me pacho-et-lo pu Joshua lapen la amonit atum thek-long pen halatum pu pu chetevarlo lapen Ai amonit atum aphan kepathi pangcheng-lo.

Non rongsopi kedam a-Israel aso atum nanghirsi ron kechedan cherapdunthulo. Lasi Ai amonit atum aphan Israel atumsi kekompet chethek-long-lo, lapen halatum aphan pathi-et-lo. Inutnatta jok-longle det-lo, lapen inutnatta latum reng-longledet-lo.
Ai arecho si reng-longchot-lo, la aphan nepcheksi Joshua along pondet-lo.
Halatum aphan kephlung adim aho-or kave ahidi ajo Israel atum ahotur an aphan pathi-et-lo. Ansi halatum Ai anat damsi hadak kedo-an aphan pathilo.
Joshua achir Ai anatsi jongverlo, lapen hadak abangphutin aphan pathilong-et etik ke la arum bibedet-lo.
Ai along kedo-an arat pathitang-lo, halaso arni bang suri krehini apinso-arlo thilo.
Rongsopi along kenep-long api lapen amar-heihei Israel aso atum amethang aphan chebilo, Joshua Ai me keilo, la parulo. La nonputa lasonsi dolang.
Lasi Joshua Ai arongsopi me keilo, lapen pini arni anta isi kerutang abui paplang-lo.

La Ai arecho aphan thengpi erong along vek-lingsi abang arpum arnikangsam anta padolo. Arni kechelut ahut abang arpum kepasunjisi Joshua hukum pilo, lapen la rongsopi kelut anghap angno pavardamlo. Halatum la athak arlong bui pangsomlo, la nonputa dolang.
Ansi
La Moses Aron aloh along kepu asonthotsi, Israel aso aphan Moses,
Hadak Israel atum palangdingsi, Joshua arlong-heihei athak Moses ketoktang Aron epak selamlo.
Israel halatum ajalin atum, achakri atum, kangsai atum, halatum angbong kedo bang adet aso atum pen pen
Ansi Joshua ase pathedung pen Aron kangthim porhe pilo lapen ahirjume lapen ahirjuno kehoron alam halahei Aron aloh along ketok ateng porhe parjulo.
Kechetong kedo-an apar arlosopimar lapen osomar lapen halatum angbong kedo dun bang adet aso atum abangphutin angno Moses kepi ahukum-heihei Joshua porhe parjulo.

Israel atum kehai alam nichi a-Jordan anglong, inglong-heihei akeng-ri Mediterran atalo athoi aklam lapen ha Lebanon anirep lahei ke Hitti arecho, Amor arecho, Kanaan arecho, Perizzi arecho. Hivi arecho lapen Jebusi arecho anta chinipet-lo.
Halatum chingrumpet ajakong pen Joshua lapen Israel aso abe thursi ron kechedanjisi vangpet-lo.
Bonta Jeriko lapen Ai aphuthak Joshua keklem alam Gibeon arat lake Hivi atum arjulong-lo,
ansi latum la aphan pachobeijisi chesik-lo. Halatum damsi ajehak kecho amar lapen halatum agadha-heihei athak thoila-kerak lapen ok-reng aban abong-heihei arthang-lo.

Halatum pe-kerak lapen kengden kevak-heiheisi chingthang-lo. Halatum akekrengtai lapen abeng-achet ahimsi dochot-lo, halatum Gilgal amukam along damsi Joshua lapen Israel aso aphan pulo, “Nelitum heloving adet pensi kevang. Nelitum nelining kehangke nelitum pen kechejok aloh chetok asonte meparji.”
Latum Joshua along Gilgal amukam an damsi, alangliphan lapen Israel arat aphan pulo, “Nelitum heloving adet pensi vang-lo, la apotsi non nelitum pen kechepameji aphan klemtha.”
Bonta Israel atum pulo, “Nanglitum kopisi nelitum pen kechejok aloh keche-tok nangpo, nanglitum adunghetsi kedo atum mene ke.”
Halatum thak-lo, “Nelitum ke nanglitum akamsi klempo.”
Joshua halatum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum komat-lo? Nanglitum konat pensi kevang-lo?”
Anke latum laso atomo thanlo: “Akehai, nelitum heloving adim pensi kevang-lo, pima nelitum
Lapen Jordan anihang anat Amor arecho banghini Heshbon arecho Shihon lapen Bashan arecho Og Ashtaroth along kedo atum aphan kopusonsi Alangli klemloma lata arjulong-lo.
Nelitum ajalin lapen kedo-an nelitum adet arat atum aphan ajehak kecho ahormu pon pen latum isi arsikkrung aseme chechaktang-lo. Laso aphuthak kedo-an arat atum, keja atum aphan khindelo.
Netum ahim nanglangtha. Nanglitum aphan nangkechetongjisi tovar nangkebar ahut ke lahei ar-omluk-lang. Bonta langtha! Non krenghek-lo lapen amusi vang-et-lo.
Lahei ahorlang abong nelitum kethai ahut ke mirak-lang, bonta langtha! Lahei nonke ingrak-i-lo. Nelitum ape-ari lapen kengdenta tovar ajak keding pen ajok rak-i-a-lo.”
Israel amonit atum halatum a-anbor lang-lo, bonta laso alam aputhak
Gibeon arat pen Joshua jirpo ason chepame alam deng-lo, lapen halatum aphan padolong-lo. Israel akhei ajalin atum jirpo chepame alamchak chechak pamelo.
Chepame aloh kechetok nithom damdet aphi, Israel aso atum chinilo je lahei amonit atum ke adung-arei atumchot.
Lasi Israel arat aso atum barsi nithom aphi lahei amonit atum kedo arongsopi-heihei lake Gibeon, Chephirah, Beeroth, lapen Kiriath Jerim along nanglelo.
Bonta Israel atum latum aphan pathi un-e-det-lo, athema Israel a-Arnam
Bonta halatum thak-lo, “Israel a-arnam
Netum chechakdet-lo apotsi latum padolonang; kalite Arnamsi ephan aduk epipo.
Halatum padolongnang bonta etum aphan latum theng lapen lang eparipilonang.” Lasonsi keja atum parelo.

Gibeon arat la Joshua along kepavangjisi la hukum pilo, lapen halatum aphan arjulo, “Kopi athesi nangtum netum aphan nepachobeiloma, nangtum dak adunghetsi kedota heloving pensi kevang pu kepu athe kopi?
Nangtum la keklem apotsi Arnam nangtum aphan khindelo. Nangtum arat aso an ban kaike padovernang. Theng ke-en lapen lang Arnam kangthir ahem aphan kaike paroiver lonang.”
Halatum thak-lo, “Nelitum la klemlo, akehai, nanglitum dambomsi kedo-an det kangthim nangkepiji lapen la kedo-an arat aphan kepathi-etjisi nanglitum a-Arnam
Non nelitum nanglitum ajakong abersi dolo; nanglitum nanglining kehang kematha kekeng alingle nelitum aphan klemnon.”
Lasi lahei helo Joshua keklem: La halatum aphan railo, lapen latum aphan Israel atum pathitoitedet-lo.
Bonta halaso ahut pensi halatum aphan Joshua ban pinchong-lo. Theng ke-en lapen langkeroi-heihei akam Israel arat lapen

Jeriko lapen la arecho aphan keklem asonthotsi Joshua Ai pavirdet-lo lapen la arecho aphanta pathilot-lo pu alam Jerusalem arecho Adonizedok arjulong-lo. Lapen Gibeon arat aso atum Israel atum pen chepangsamsi halatum angbong dobomlo pu ta arjulong-lo.
Jerusalem arat atum areng angmi thurphrok-lo, pima Gibeon ke rongsopi kethe muchot, lapen arechota do, lake Ai aphanta themuchot, la amonit atumta ron chedan theksoi.
Lasi Adonizedok rechoke Hebron arecho Hoham aphan, Jarmuth arecho Piram, Lakish arecho Japhia, lapen Eglon arecho Dabir aphan lahei abirta lo-lo:
“Vang-ra Gibeon ketengkhengjile nephan neraptha, pima la amonit atum Joshua lapen Israel aso atum pen chepangsamtang-lo.”
La bangpho arecho lake Jerusalem, Hebron, Jarmuth, Lakish lapen Eglon Amor arecho atum jakong chelangpetsi Gibeon komchenlo lapen la tengkheng-lo.

Gibeon amonit atum Gilgal amukam along Joshua aphan lamthe isi pathantoilo! “Nelitum aphan ne-ori, akehai! Non amat vang-ra nelitum aphan raptha! Inglong alongri kedo Amor arecho atum ajakong chelangpetsi netengkheng-tang-lo!”
Lasi Joshua lapen ron-armu kang-thim aketheknei asong pen pen Gilgal pen damlo.
Joshua aphan
Jopangthang Joshua lapen la aron-armu Gilgal pen Gibeon anat dambomlo lapen latum Amor atum aphuthak tengkheng paserek-khok-lo.
Israel aron-armu angno Amor atum aphan
Israel aron-armu pen Amor atum inglong atovar kekat ahut Azekah anat atovar ajehak ajak-keding soding halatum aphuthak
Amor aphuthak
Chiklo Aijalon Arlok aputhak padovernon.
Arni arjapverlo lapen chiklota hotur aphuthak Israel atum haihetik ke klemkledet-lo. Laso alam Jasher pu aloh along ketoktang do. Sining angbong chitim arni arjapver lapen losini chelut-ledet-lo.
Aphrang ason kali, lapen aphrang penta avepinlang,
Laso aphi, Joshua lapen la aron-armu atum Gilgal amukam anat chedamthulo.
Bangpho Amor arecho atum chepajokjisi Makkedah alongku arlo chepatudamlo.
Mane halatum aphan thek-long-lo, lapen halatum konatsi kechepatuma Joshua aphan thanlo.
La pulo, “Longku kelut angho along arlong thepo pakong-longra ingthin non lapen hadak ajehak amonit patonnon,
bonta nangmethang hadak sangri. Hotur aphi aphi dunra halatum aphan anung pen tengkhengnon; halatum aphan arongsopi pachedam longledet nangji! Halatum aphuthak kehaiji nang Arnam
Joshua lapen Israel aso atum halatum aphan pathilo, seta ajehak atum ke rongsopi apaisong along chepachongsi jokphlot-lo, lapen pathi longledet-lo.
Ansi Joshua amonit kedo-an, Makkedah amukam la along thangthe pen nangchevoilo.
Det angbong Israel aso aphan keningjeji baduta haihedet-lo.
Ansi Joshua pulo, “Longku kelut angho ingpura hala bangpho arecho nelong vannon.”
Lasi longku angho ingpulo, lapen Jerusalem, Hebron, Jarmuth, Lakish lapen Eglon arecho atum aphan vanlo,

lapen Joshua angno ponlo. Ansi Joshua kedo-an Israel aso aphan angno chehangpet-lo lapen along along kedun achakri atum aphan pavangtoilo lapen recho atum aphu halatum akeng-pen pasaktoilo, halatum lasonsi klemlo.
Anke Joshua achakri atum aphan pulo, “Nangtum phereri mate ning chepabiri, mathathipnon lapen ning chethethipnon, pima kedo-an hotur aphan lasonsi
Ansi Joshua bangpho arecho atum aphan pathilo lapen thengpi rongpho along halatum aphan vek pajangling-lo ha arnikangsam anta, abang-arpum thengpi angsong si padolo.
Arnikangsam ansi Joshua halatum abang arpum pasuntoilo lapen ponsi halatum kechepatu alongku along amat pavardamtoilo. Arlongthepi longku kelut amangho along ingthinsi halatum hadak donangverlo.

Halaso arni amat Joshua. Mak-kedah tengkhengsi la arecho aphanta nepchek-lo. Rongsopi along kedo-an aphan la pathilo; inutta akereng bibedet-lo. Jeriko arecho aphan keklem asonthotsi Makkedah arecho aphanta la klemlo.
Laso aphi, Joshua lapen aron-armu Makkedah pen Libnah anat dambomsi la aphan tengkheng-lo.
Laso arongsopi lapen arecho aphuthak Israel atum kehaiji ajakong
Laso aphi, Joshua lapen aron-armu Libnah pen Lakish anat dambomlo, la komchensi tengkheng-lo.
Kechedan hini arni Israel atum Lakish aphuthak kehaiji aphan
Lakish aphan kerapdunjisi Gezer arecho Horam vang-lo bonta Joshua la aphanta paremdet-lo, lapen aron-armu halatum inut aphanta akereng bibedet-lo.
Adunthu, Joshua lapen la aron-armu Lakish pen Eglon anat dambomlo, la komchenlo, lapen laphan tengkheng-lo.
Halatum la cheraidet-lo halaso arni amat, lapen hadak kedo abangphutin aphan pathilo. Lakish aphan halatum keklem asonthot halatum klemlo.
Laso aphi Joshua lapen la aron-armu atum Eglon pen ha Hebron anglong anat arludamsi la tengkheng-lo

lapen la cheraidet-lo. Latum recho aphan pathilot, lapen rongsopi kedo abangphutin lapen adung-arei arong kedo-an aphanta pathi-et-lo. Rongsopi pavirpameji aphan Joshua phangnolo, Eglon aphan la keklem asonthotsi la along kedo inutbak aphanta akereng bibedet-lo.
Anke Joshua lapen la aron-armu atum aphi chiruisi Debir anat pangnolo lapen la tengkheng-lo.

La cheraidet-lo, la arecho pen pen lapen adung arei arong-heiheita lo. Hadak kedo abangphutin aphan latum pathilo. Hebron lapen Libnah lapen la arecho atum aphan keklem asonthotsi Joshua Debir aphanta klemlo.

Joshua kedo-an alongle cheraidet-lo. La inglong alongri arecho atum aphan paremlo, nihang anglong karleng kedo-an nichi anglong akeng-ri an lapen nitur alongle kekrengtai ajo anta cherailo. Badu aphanta la pajokjedet-lo, abangphutin aphanta pathi-et-lo. Lasonsi Israel a-Arnam
Joshua aketeng-kheng laphan Kadesh-Barnea nitur anat pen talo akung ha Gaza, Goshen alongri anta parlosi ha Gibeon anirep an cherailo.
Joshua lahei kedo-an arecho lapen halatum alongri an ephong ketengkheng pensi cherailo, pima Israel a-Arnam
Laso aphi, Joshua lapen aron-armu Gilgal amukam along chevoithulo.
Israel atum kehai abirta Hazor arecho Jabin arjulong-lok pen la Madon arecho Jobap aphan, Shimron lapen Akshaph arecho aphan
lapen nirep along alongri arecho atum, la Jordan Arlok-Galili alangbi anitur anat kedo talo akung arecho atum aphan lam pathan damtoilo.
La Jordan parai-harai kedo a-Kanaan asor, Amor asor, Hitti asor, Perizzi asor, lapen inglong alongri Jebusi asor lapen Mizpah adet Hermon anglong akeng-ri kedo Hivi atum aphan anta la lam lolo.
Halatum aron-aso penpen vang-lo, isi atalo akung kedo asangtimili ason thakthak ron-armu amonit ongpik. Halatum ron alosei lapen ron ahemkonglongta do.
Lahei arecho atum ajakong chepangrumpetsi vang-lo, lapen Israel pen kechedanjisi Merom pu alangjeng along mukam chekim rappet-lo.
Joshua aphan
