Lasi Joshua lapen alangli amonit an pamanghuhak pen ajok halatum aphan Merom alangso along tengkheng-lo.
Halatum aphuthak
hukum kepi ateng si halatum aphan Joshua klemlo. La halatum alosei akeng palok-lo, lapen ron ahemkonglong-heihei me phrinpi-et-lo.
Joshua aphi chiruisi Hazor che-railo, lapen la arecho aphan pathilot-lo. (Halaso ahut Hazor helo kedo-an adet angbong jakong ketheneilo.)
Latum hadak kedo abangphutin aphan pathilo, lapen rongsopi me keipi-et-lo.
Joshua lahei arongsopi kedo-an cherailo, lapen
Tebonseta longle kangduk athak kedo kekomchen arongsopi-heihei aputhak Israel atum pavirvedet-lo. Hazor aphan Joshua me keichot-lo.
Israel arat atum rongsopi-heihei along kedo ador kesodak kepangreng api an ponsi amethang aphan chebilo. Bonta latum monit abangphutin aphan ke pathi-et-lo, inutbak aphanta akereng bibedet-lo.
Moses aphan
Kedo-an alongle Joshua cheraidet-lo: Inglong alongri lapen inglong akeng-ri-heihei, nirep lapen nitur ahin, Goshen alongri kedo-an lapen kekrengtai alongle la anitur anat lapen Jordan Arlok an.
Longri kerai Edom adung Halak anglong anitur anat pen Baalgad anirep an, Hermon anglong anitur Lebanon arlok an,
Ajirdingklui an lahei arecho atum pen Joshua ron chedan o-lo, bonta la kedo-an halatum aphan paremsi pathi-et-lo.
Ajehak a-Hivi atum Gibeon kedo arongsopisi Israel atum pen kechepamechot. Kaprek kedo-an atum aphan ke ron kechedan pensi kelong.
-si halatum aphan Israel pen kechedanjisi pamathathip-lo, la lote halatum aphan kepavir pameji aphan lapen jinsose pin pen kepathiji aphan honthe longpo. La helo Moses aphan

Halaso ahut Joshua damsi hi-i akhei Anakim, latum ke inglong alongrisi kedo, Hebron along, Debir along, Anab along lapen Judah anglong alongri lapen Israel anglong alongri along kedo-an aphan pavir-et-lo. Joshua halatum aphan lapen arongsopi-heihei pavirpamelo.
Israel alongle along inutbak Anakimta avedet-lo; seta Gaza, Gath lapen Ashdod along ajehak dolang.
Kedo-an alongle Joshua cherailo, Moses aphan
Ansi rat atum ron kechedan pen sanglong-lo.
Israel arat atum ron haisi Jordan anihang alongle cheraidet-lo, Arnon Arlok pen Jordan Arlok karlu an lapen Hermon along anirep antalo. Latum banghini arecho aphan paremlo.
Inut ke Sihon, la Amor arecho Heshbon along kepangri abang-lo. La adet Gilead achitim anta parlolo; Aroer(Arnon Arlok angchun) pen halaso arlok achitim arongsopi lapen Jabbok aroi ha Ammon ahoi an;
La Jordan Arlok pen Galili alangbi anitur ha Beth-Jeshimoth (Thitang Atalo anihang) lapen Pisgah anglong akeng-ri anat an lo.
Bashan arecho Og aphanta latum paremlo, la Rephaim anglong ajutsilo, la Ashtaroth lapen Edrei along pangrilo.
La adet Hermon anglong Salekah, lapen Bashan kedo-an Geshur lapen Maakah achitim an lapen Heshbon arecho Sihon adet an parlolo.
La banghini arecho aphan Moses lapen Israel aratsi paremlo.

Jordan anichi anat kedo adet arecho atum aphan Joshua lapen Israel arat atum keparem lahei helo, la ke Lebanon Arlok along Baalgad pen ha Halak Anglong lake ha Seir anat anlo (lapen Israel arat atum halatum aphan Joshua kethak ateng pen kechepahemphu-toi,

lake inglong ajo, lapen kangdai ajo alongle, Arob alongle, arlengjir ajo alongle, kejejangtang ajo alongle, lapen Negeb alongle, Hitti atum, Amor atum, Kanaan atum, Perizi atum, Hivi atum lapen Jebusi atum alonglelo.):
Jeriko arecho inut, la Bethel adung, Ai arecho inut,
Jerusalem arecho inut, Hebron arecho inut,
Jarmuth arecho inut, Lakish arecho inut,
Eglon arecho inut, Gezer arecho inut,
Debir arecho inut, Geder arecho inut,
Hormah arecho inut, Arad arecho inut,
Libnah arecho inut, Adullam arecho inut,
Makkedah arecho inut, Bethel arecho inut;
Tappuah arecho inut, Hepher arecho inut;
Aphek arecho inut, Lasharon arecho inut;
Madon arecho inut, Hazor arecho inut;
Shimrom-meron arecho inut, Akshaph arecho inut;
Taanak arecho inut, Magiddo arecho inut,
Kedesh arecho inut; Karmel along Jokneam arecho inut,
Naphathdor along Dor arecho inut, Galili along Goiim arecho inut,
Tirzah arecho inut: Pangrumpet bang thomkep ra inut arecho atum aphan paremlo.
Joshua sartang-lo, lapen arta dotang-lo; lapen alangliphan
Kecherai nangji alongle lahei helo: Philistia atum alongri kedo-an, lapen Geshur atum alongle kedo-an

(lake Shihor, la Ijip anihang anat, Ekron atum ahoi anirep anat, lake Kanaan atum alongle pusi puhur; hadak bangpho Philistia arecho dolang, halatum ke Gaza, Ashdod, Ashkelon, Gath, lapen Ekron, lapen Avim atum,)
latum nitur anat Kanaan alongle adang anlo, lapen Mearah lake Sidon aso atum alongle, Aphek anat, ha Amor atum ahoi anat an
lapen Gebal atum alongle, lapen Lebanon kedo-an, la arni kevang anat-lo, Baalgad pen arum Hebron along pen ha Hamath kelutdam atovar anat an,

Lebanon pen inglong ajo kedo pen ha Misrephoth-maim, lapen Sidon asor antalo. Israel atum amek angden pen Ne methang amatsi halatum aphan arphlung pipo, muthe Israel atum kechepahemphujile halatum aphan longle thaknon, la Ne nangphan hukum nangkepi ateng-lo.
Non lasi, laso alongle khei sirkep lapen Manasseh abeng akhei aphan kechepahemphujile thaknon.”
Manasseh abeng akhei atum lapen Reuben akhei, Gad akhei atum amethang apharman longle long-lo, lake Moses si latum aphan kepilo, ha Jordan anihang anat,
Aroer pen, lake Arnon arlok ano, lapen arlok angbong arongsopi, lapen Medeba aphuchong aklam ha Dibon an;
lapen Amor arecho arongsopi-heihei, la Heshbon alongsi pangrilo, lapen ha Ammon atum ahoi an;
lapen Gilead, lapen Gashur lapen Maakath alongri an lapen Hermon Anglong kedo-an, lapen Bashan kedo-an ha Salekah anat an;
Bashan along Og arecho adet an, la Ashtaroth lapen Edrei kepangri abang-lo (Rephaim atum angbong la inutsi ahin do chot-lo); lahei Mosessi paremdet-lo lapen ke phlung-et-lo.
Seta Israel atum Geshur mate Maakah atum aphan phlung-et-esi pini arni anta halatum angbong padolongbomlo.
Levi akhei atum aphan Moses longle pipechot-lo; Israel a-Arnam
Reuben akhei atum ahemtun-heihei atengsi Moses latum aphan apharman alongle pilo.
Lasi latum ahoike Aroer pen, lake Arnon arlok angchun pen, lapen arlok chitim along kedo arongsopi an, lapen Medeba anglong aklam an;
Heshbon pen penlo lapen inglong aklam along kedo-an arongsopi-heihei talo; Dibon, Bamoth Baal, Bethe-baal-meon,
Jahaz, Kedemoth, Mephath,
Kiriathaim, Sibmah lapen Zereth Shahar la arlok aphuchong along,
lapen Beth-Peor, lapen Pisgah a-arlengjir, lapen Beth Jeshimoth,

lake inglong aklam ajo arongsopi-heihei kedo-anlo, lapen Heshbon along kepangri Amor arecho Sihon adet an, laphan lapen Midian ajalin atum, Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur lapen Reba latum Sihon arechoso atum aphan Moses paremdet-lo. Latum halahei alongle alongsi kedo atumlo.
Balaam, la Beor asopo, sangkelang abang aphanta akaprek atum pen pen Israel aso atum anokjir pen pathirap-lot-lo.
Lapen Reuben arat ahoike Jordan aroi helo. Lahei ke Reuben akhei atum ahemtun adon ateng pen arong lapen arongsopi-heihei kechepahemphutoi alonglelo.
Gad atum ahemtun adon ateng pen latum kechepahemphu jisi Moses latum aphan apharman longle pilo.
Latum alongri ke Jazer, lapen Gilead arongsopi, lapen Ammon atum ebeng alongle ha Aroer an la ke Rabbah anihang anlo,
lapen Heshbon pen Ramath-mizpeh lapen Betonim an, lapen Mahanaim pen ha Debir alongri an,
lapen Beth-haram arlok, Bethnimrah, Sukkoth, lapen Zaphon, lapen Heshbon arecho Sihon adet anlo lapen Jordan ke ahoilo, lapen ha arum Chinnereth atalo kangdai an, nihang anat Jordan apar an.
La helo Gad atum latum ahemtun adon ateng pen kechepahemphu arong lapen arongsopi-heihei alonglelo.
Lapen Manasseh ebeng akhei atum aphanta Moses longle pilo; lahei Manasseh ebeng akhei atum halatum ahemtun lapen adon-heihei atengsi pilo.
Latum alongri ke Mahanaim pen, Bashan soding, la Bashan arecho Og adet kangthim an, lapen Jair lake Bashan along arong kedo-an, lapen rongsopi throk-kep anta,
lapen Gilead achitim, lapen Ashtaroth, lapen Edrei, lake Bashan along Og adet arongsopi-heihei; hadak Manasseh asopo Makir lapen la ahemtun adon-heihei Makir ebeng akhei aphanta longle apharman pilo.
Lahei helo Moab aklam along Moses kethak alonglelo, la Jordan anihang apar Jeriko an.
Bonta Levi akhei aphan ke Moses kechepahemphuji aphan longle pipelo. Israel a-Arnam

Kanaan adet along Israel arat atum kechepahemphuji aphan kelong apharman alongle lahei helo, lake Eleazar kurusar, lapen Nun asopo Joshua, lapen Israel arat akheitin apo ahem arlengkesar atumsi latum aphan keronlo.
Khei sirkep ra ebeng arat atum aphan kepathakji ke Moses aphan
Athema Moses kheini ra ebeng arat atum aphan Jordan parai alongle thak-lo. Bonta latum angbong Levi atum aphan ke alangli kechepahemphuji alongle pipelo.

Pima Joseph arat atum kheini dolo, Manasseh lapen Ephraim; lapen det along Levi aso aphan longle pipedet-lo, bonta halatum kedoji aphan rongsopi-heihei, lapen achainong kepachopanji aphan lapen kecho-archeji aphan adim pichot-lo.
Moses aphan

Gilgal along Judah akhei pen ajehak amonit Joshua along vang-lo. Halatum angbong inut Jephunneh asopo Kaleb lapen Keniz abang la aphan pulo, “Kadesh Barnea along kopisi nanglam lapen nelam Moses, Arnam amonit aphan
aban Moses Kadesh Barnea pen laso alongle kelangjoiji aphan nangketoi ahut ne arta ningkan 40 an lo. La aphan athikpet kelong alamsi ne thanlo.
Tebonseta nelong nangkedun amonit atum emonit atum aphan papherelo. Bonta ne kroithipsi
Ne klemlo pima, Moses nephan nechak-lo, ne kedam alongle aputhak ne lapen nesomar atum kecheraiji aphan longle longpo.
Bonta non langtha, Moses aphan
lapen Moses nephan neketoi ahut arni asonsi pini anta ne ingtang-kringlang. Ne non anta ron kechedanji aphan dorphlup ajakong dolang mate jat aphan seta dolang.
Tangte non, nephan inglong alongri ne lapen ne monit atum kelong alam kethan arni
Jephunneh asopo Kaleb aphan Joshua pahirjumelo lapen la aphan Hebron arongsopi pacherailongdet-lo,
Hebron nonputa Keniz asor Jephunneh asopo Kaleb aso-asusi chepahemphubomlo, pima la kroithip pen Israel a-Arnam
Laso aphrang Hebron aphan Arba arongsopi pusi pulo. (Anakim angbong Arba ke ketheneilo.)
Aber kepajirmi asonsi Judah akhei ahem asangho atum aphan longle echet chet pilo:
Longle ha nitur ahin Zin akejejangtang ajo anitur anat, Edom ahoi along an,
laso nitur ahoi ke Talo Kethi anitur angchun pen,
nitur anat damsi Akrabbim anglong atovar lapen ha Zin an chejeng-lo. La Kadesh Barnea anitur chejengsi Hezron par-lo lapen ha Addar anta arlusi Karka anat suilo.
Lapen Azmon anat dambomsi Ijip ahoi alangjeng dunkrisi ha Mediterran atalo ahoi kejut anat an lelo. La ke Judah anitur ahoilo.
Nihang ahoi ke Talo Kethi helo, tovarsoding arlu bomsi ha Jordan Aroi kecheklo la arlo anat an lo.
Nirep ahoi hadak chengsi
Beth-Hoglah anta arlu damlo, lapen akung-kung damsi Jordan Arlok checharlo. Ansi la Bohan Arlong (Bohan ke Reuben asopo) anat arludamlo,
Kesung Arlong pen ha Debir an, lapen Gilgal anirep anat suilo, lake Arlok anitur Adummina anat pangnolo. La ansi Enshemesh pu alangjeng-heihei anat dambomsi ha Enrogel angchun anlo,
lapen Jebusi atum arongsopi Jerusalem kedo adim Hinnom Arlok anitur anglong anta parlodamlo. Ahoi Hinnom Arlok nichi anglong aphuchong anat anta arludamsi Rephaim Arlok kejut anirep anlo.
Hadak pen la Nephtoah alangso lapen Ephron anglong adung arongsopi-heihei anat damlo. Hadak la Baalah (mate Kiriath Jeream pu), anat suilo
la Baalah anichi pen Edom anglong anat, lapen Jearim (mate Chesalon) anirep anat hirdambomsi Beth Shemesh lapen Timnah parsi kongvaichenlo.
Ahoi Ekron anirep anglong anat damsi Shikkern anat suilo, Baalah anglong parsi Jamnia an lelo. La Mediterran atalo alongsi jut-lo,
la nichi ahoi cheplang-lo.
Lahei ahoi arlosi Judah ahem-asangho arat atum dolo.
Joshua aphan
Anak aro Sheshai, Ahiman lapen Talmai atum aphan Kaleb rongsopi pen phlung-et-lo.
Hadak pen la damsi Debir kedo arat aphan tengkheng-lo. (laso arongsopi Kiriath Shepher ta pu.)
Kaleb pulo, “Kiriath Shepher kechepahemphu abangphan nesopi Aksah penan chopipo.”
Kaleb amu Kenaz asopo Othniel rongsopi chepahemphulo, lasi Kaleb asopi Aksah la aphan chopilo.
Kechepangri arni, Othniel bangpi apo pen hidi echet pahangtoilo. La agadha pen chesuntuk-lo lapen Kaleb la aphan kopi nangjima arjulo.
La thak-lo, “Ne lang kedo ahidi nangji. Nangli nekepi alongleke krengtai ajo pinak.” Lasi Kaleb bangpi aphan athak lapen aber lang kedo ahidi pilo.
Judah akhei ahem-asangho atum kechepahemphu alongle lahei helo.
Nitur ahin anat halatum kecherai, lahei Edom ahoi adung ke Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,
Kinah, Dimonah, Adadah,
Kedesh, Hazor, Ithnan,
Ziph, Telem. Bealoth,
Hazor Hadattah, Kerioth Hezron (mate Hazor),
Amam, Shema, Moladah,
Hazar Gaddah, Heshmon, Bethpelet,
Hazar Shual, Beersheba, Biziothiah,
Baalah, Lim, Ezem,
Eltolad, Chesil, Hormah,
Ziklag, Madmannah, Sansannah,
Leboath, Shilhim, Ain, lapen Rimmon: halahei aphan kekomchen arongsopi-heihei lok kadokave rong ingkoira sirkep, lapen rongso-heiheita do.
Inglong akeng-ri arongsopi-heihei ke Eshtaol, Zorah, Ashnah,
Zanoah, Engannim, Tappuah, Enam,
Jarmuth, Adullam, Sokoh, Azekah,
Shaaraim, Adithaim, Gederah, lapen Gederothaim. Akaprek arong-heihei pen pen rongsopi rong 14 halahei adung arei dolo.
Ako Zenam, Hadashah, Migdalgad,
Dilean, Mizpah, Joktheel,
Lakish, Bozkath, Eglon,
Kabbon, Lahmam, Chutlish,
Gederoth, Bethdagon, Naamah, lapen Maakedah; arongso-heihei pen pen rongsopi rong 16 halahei adung arei dolo.
Libnah, Ether, Ashan,
Iphtah, Ashnah, Nezib,
Keilah, Akzib, lapen Mareshah: halahei adung arei arong-heihei pen pen rongsopi rong 9 do.
Hadak Ekron lapen la arongso-heihei lapen arong-heihei dolo,
lapen Ashdad adung arongso lapen arongsopi-heihei Ekron pen ha Mediterran Atalo anta dolo.
Ashdod lapen Gaza lapu arong-heihei lapen arong so-heihei pen Ijip ahoi alangjeng lapen Mediterran Atalo akung ledamlo.
Inglong alongri along Shamir, Jattir, Sokoh,
Dannah, Kiriath Sepher (mate Debir),
Anab, Eshtemoa, Anim,
Goshen, Holon, lapen Giloh: Halahei adung arei arongso-heihei pen pen rongsopi rong 11 dolo.
Arab, Dumah, Eshan,
Janim, Beth Tappuah, Aphekah,
Humtah, Hebron, lapen Zior: lahei adung arei arongso pen pen rongsopi rong 9 dolo.
Maon, Karmel, Ziph, Juttah,
Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoah,
Kein, Gibeah, lapen Timnah: halahei adung arei arongso-heihei pen pen rongsopi rong kep dolo.
Halhul, Bethzur, Gedor,
Maarath, Bethanoth lapen Eltekon: halahei adung arei arongso-heihei pen pen rongsopi rongni dolo.
Kiriath Baal (mate Kiriath Jearim) lapen Rabbah: lahei adung arei arongso pen pen rongsopi rong throk dolo.
Kejejangtang ajo kedo arongsopi ke Beth Arabah, Middin, Sekakah,
Nibshan, Ingti arongsopi, lapen Engedi: halahei adung arei arong pen pen rongsopi rong throk dolo.
Bonta Judah arat aso atum Jebusi, Jerusalem along kedo atum aphan phlung un-edet-lo. Judah arat aso pen pen Jebusi atum hadak dorappet-lo.

Nitur ahoi alongle ke Joseph aso-asu aphansi thak-lo, la Jordan pen Jeriko adung nihang Jeriko alangjeng an lapen ha kejejangtang ajo an damlo. La Jeriko pen arludamsi inglong alongri ha Bethel an damlo.
Bethel pen la Luz damsi Ataroth Addar hadak Arki kedo adim anta par-et-lo.
La ansi nichi Japhlet alongri anat damsi Beth-Horon aber ahavar ledamlo. La dambomsi Gezer anat lelo lapen Mediterran Atalo along jutkok-lo.
Joseph aso-asu lake Ephraim akhei, lapen Nichi a-Manasseh atum laso alongle halatum cherai long-lo.
Ephraim ahem-asangho atum alongle lahei helo: Halatum ahoi Ataroth Addar pen nihang anat damsi Beth-Horon Athak lelo.
Lapen hadak pen Mediterran Atalo anat damlo. Mikmethath ke halatum anirep-lo. Hadak nihang ahoi Taanah Shiloh anat suilo lapen dambomsi Janoah anihang anat la damlo.
La ansi Janoah pen aber hirsi Ataroth lapen Naarah damsi Jeriko lelo lapen Jordan along jutkok-lo.
Nichi ahoike Tappuah pen Kanah alangjeng anat dambomsi Mediterran Atalo along jutkok-lo. La helo Ephraim akhei ahem-asangho atum aphan halatum pachepahemphutoi alonglelo,
laso along ajehak arongso lapen arong-heihei Manasseh ahoi arlo dolo, bonta Ephraim asor aphan pidet-lo.
Bonta halatum Gezer along kedo Kanaan aso aphan phlungphledet-lo. Lasi nonpu anta Kanaan aso atum Ephraim aso angbongsi dobomlang, bonta ban atum asonsi halatum aphan kam paklemtoilo.

Jordan anichi alongle ephar ke Joseph asopo akleng Manasseh ajehak aso-asu ahem-asangho atum aphan pilo. Makir, la Gilead apo ke Manasseh asopo akleng-lo lapen la inut ron apinpolo, lasi Gilead lapen Bashan, Jordan anihang anat la aphan pilo.

Jordan anichi alongleke Manasseh ahem-asangho atum an aphan pek-lo: Abizer, Helek, Asriel, Shekem, Hepher, lapen Shemida. Lahei ke Joseph asopo Manasseh aso-asupomar atumlo, lapen halatum ahem-asangho akesar atumlo.

Manasseh aso Makir, Makir aso Gilead, Gilead aso Hepher, Hepher aso Zelophehad, Zelophehad ke inut nat ta asopo avedet-lo, bonta asopimarsi dochot-lo. Halatum amen ke Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah, lapen Tirzah.
Halatum Eleazar kurusar lapen Nun asopo Joshua lapen jalin atum along damsi pulo, “Pinsomar adan aphan pen pen nelitum aphan longle pacheraijisi Moses aphan
la apotsi Manasseh phankep kelong apar Gilead lapen Bashan Jordan anihang anat alongle
la asopimar aso-asu atum aphan kepi alonglelo. Gilead alongle ke Manasseh ahin aso-asu aphansi thak-lo.”
Manasseh alongle kele Asher pen Milkmethath, Shekem anihang an. Ahoi ke nitur ahin anat damsi Entappuah arat aphan parloponlo.
Tappuah alongle komchen an ke Manasseh alonglelo, bonta Tappuah arong ahoi along ke, Ephraim aso-asusi chepahemphulo.

Lasi ahoike Kanah alangjeng aber an ledamlo. Nitur alangjeng anat kedo arongsopi-heihei ke Manasseh alongri arlo do seta lahei Ephraim chepahemphulo. Manasseh ahoi anirep alangjeng anat damlo, lapen Mediterran Atalo along jut damkok-lo,
Ephraim ke ha nitur anat-lo, lapen Mediterran Atalo ke halatum anichi ahoilo. Asher ke nirep-nichi anat-lo, lapen Issakar ke nirep-nihang anat-lo.

Issakar lapen Asher alongri arlo Manasseh ke Beth Shan lapen Ibleam, lapen adung arei arong-heihei lapen Dor (la isi talo akung alongle), Endor, Taanah, Megiddo, lapen la adung arei arong-heihei chepahemphulo.
Manasseh arat atum halahei arongsopi arlo kedo arat aphan phlung un-edet-lo, lasi Kanaan aso atum hadak dobomlo.
Israel atum ingtangrak ahut seta Kanaan aso kedo-an aphan phlung-et-e, bonta halatum aphan latum jakong pen kam paklemtoilo.
Joseph aso-asu atum Joshua aphan pulo, “Kopisi netum aphan longle ephar nepacherai longchot-lo! Netum aphai do-o pima
Joshua thak-lo, “Nangtum jongsi do-o tangte Ephraim anglong alongrita nangtum aphan bihek pulote ingnam ajo damra Perizzi lapen Rephaim alongle along longle chepangthai damnon.”

Halatum thak-lo, “Inglong alongrita netum aphan dorphlupphle, bonta thoi along kedo a-Kanaan atum ingchin-ahemkonglong-heihei do, Beth shan along kedo atum lapen la adung arei arong-heihei lapen Jezreel Arlok kedo atum antalo.”
Ephraim lapen Nichi a-Manasseh akhei aphan Joshua pulo, “Nangtum abangphu do-o lapen nangtum ingtangrak. Nangtum apharman aparta cherai unji.

Inglong alongrita nangtumlo. La ingnam seta, nangtum la chepangthainon, lapen ehin kecheng pen ha kejut an cherainon. Kanaan aso aphan ke halatum ingchin ahemkonglong do seta lapen amonit atum ingtangrak seta halatum aphan nangtum arphlung et unji.”
Halatum det adang an aphan haidet aphi Israel kedo-an asong Shiloh along chingrumlo, lapen
Israel arat khei throksi aphan halatum apharman alongle thakthelang.
Lasi Israel arat aphan Joshua pulo, “Nangphusar atum a-Arnam

akheitin pen bangkethom amonit nelong pavangnang longri ahoi arjan kepatokjisi ne halatum aphan det adang toipo, lapen halatum aningkehang alongle aling chepahemphu longpo. Ansi halatum nelong chevangthu nangpo.
Halatum angbong longle dak throksi thakdetpo, Judah ke amethang alongri nitur anatsi chedopo, lapen Joseph jokta amethang alongri ha nirep anat chedopo.
Nangtum lahei dak throksi alamjir tok-ra la nelong vannon. Ansi etum Arnam
tebonseta Levi atum ke nangtum ahin anat alongle nangchodeng dundedetpo, pima halatum apharman ke

Longri ahoi arjan ketokjisi pinso atum aphan lahei paklemtoi akam la pinkhatdet aphi halatum atovar chedamlo: Det adang damra longle adang a-arjan tok-ra nelong vanthunon. La ansi dak Shiloh along nangtum apharman
Lasi pinso atum longle adang an damsi kopusonsi halatum dak throksi thak nangjima rongso-heihei amen tokjirlo. Ansi halatum Shiloh along amukam kedo a-
Halatum apharman
Benjamin akhei ahem-asangho atum chepahemphu alongle ahoisi kechengsi thak nangpo. Latum alongleke Judah lapen Joseph akhei angbongsi do.
Nirep anat halatum ahoi Jordan along cheng-lo, lapen arludambomsi Jeriko anirep anat sunjirlo, lapen nichi anat damsi inglong alongri krongplutsi Bethaven akejejangtang ajo an ledamlo.
Ahoi Luz (Bethel ta pu) anitur kehir anat damsi Ataroth Addar, Beth Horon anitur anglong anat sundamlo.
ahoi dambomsi ahin kaprek anat suilo, nitur ahin pen laso anglong anichi anat pakekphak-lo lapen Kiriath Baal(mate Kiriath Jearim) anat damlo, la Judah akheisi chepahemphulo. Lake nichi ahin ahoilo.
Nitur ahoike Kiriath Jearim angchun pensi cheng-lo lapen Nephtoah alangso-heihei anat damlo.
La ansi Hinnom Arlok anglong akeng-ri chechardak Rephaim Arlok anirep kejut along an ledamlo. Hadak pen Hinnom Arlok krongplutsi nitur anat damlo, la Jebusi anitur akung, ha Enrogel anat.
La Enshemesh anirep anat suisi lapen Adummim atovar athengno Geliloth anat damlo lason ahoi Bohan Arlok (la Reuben asopo) anat damlo,
lapen Jordan Arlok checharplot anirep akung anat parlo. La ansi Arlok arlo sundamsi
Beth Hoglah anirep akeng persi Jordan Aroi kechiti adim, Talo-Kethi anirep along jutdamlo. Lake Nitur ahoilo.
Jordan ke nihang ahoilo. Benjamin akhei ahem-asangho atum kechepahemphu alongle ahoi lahei helo.
Benjamin akhei ahem-asangho atum kechepahemphu arongsopi-heihei ke Jeriko, Beth Hoglah, Emek-Keziz,
Beth Arabah, Zemaraim, Bethel.
Avvion, Parah, Ophrah,
Chepharammoni, Ophni, lapen Geba: Halatum adung arei arong pen pen rongsopi rong krehini,
La apar Gibeon, Ramah, Beeroth,
Mizpah, Chephira, Mozah,
Rekem, Irpul, Taralah,
Zela, Haliph, Jebus(mate Jerusalem), Gibeah lapen Kiriath Jearim: Halatum adung arei arong pen pen rongsopi rong 14 dolo. Benjamin akhei ahem-asangho atum kecherai alongle la helo.
Adunthu ke Simeon akhei ahem-asangho atum aphansi longle thak-lo. Latum alongle ahoike Judah akhei aphan kepek alongle an lelo.
La Beersheba, Sheba, Moladah
Hazar Shual, Balah, Ezem,
Eltolad, Bethel, Hormah,
Ziklag. Beth Leboath, lapen Hazar Susah,
Sharuhem anta parloponlo: Halatum adung arei arongso pen pen rongsopi rong krekethom dolo.
Hadak Ain, Rimmon, Ether lapen Ashan: Halatum adung arei arongso pen pen rongsopi rong phli dolo.
La Baalath Beer (mate Ramah) nitur arongsopi-heihei kedo-an ta parlopon-et-lo. La helo Simeon akhei ahem-asangho atum kecherai alonglelo.
Judah aphan kethak alongleke kenangsot apar themuchot apotsi ephlak ke Simeon akhei aphan pidet-lo.
Kethom angdeng ke Zebulun akhei ahem-asangho atum aphan si longle thak-lo. Halatum kechodengdun alongle Sarid anat anta ledamlo.
Hadak pen ahoi Dabbesheth lapen nihang a-Jokneam alangjeng paphoponsi Marala anichi anat damlo.
Sarid parai kaprek anat la Kisloth Tabor anihang ahoi anat damsi Daberath lapen Japhia anat arludamlo.
La nihang anat dambomsi Gath Hepher lapen Ethkazin lapen Rimmon atovar Neah anat suisi damlo.
Nirep ahoi ke Hannathon anat suilo lapen Iphtahel a-Arlok along jut damlo.
La Kathath, Nahalah, Shimron, Idalah, lapen Bethlehem anta parloponlo: Lahei adung arei arongso pen pen rongsopi rongkrehini dolo.
Lahei arongsopi lapen arong-heihei ke Zebulun akhei ahem-asangho atum aphan kechepahemphutoi alongle alongsi dolo.
Phli adun ke Issakar akhei ahem-asangho atum aphan si longle thak-lo.
Latum alongri ke Jezreel, Chesulloth, Shunem,
Hapharnaim, Shion, Anaharath,
Rabith, Kishion, Ebez,
Remeth, Engannim, Enhaddah, lapen Bethpazzez anta parloponlo.
Ahoi ta Tabor, Shahazumath lapen Beth Shemesh paphoponsi Jordan along jut damlo. La halahei adung arei arong pen pen rongsopi krethrok dolo.
Lahei arongsopi lapen arong helo Issakar akhei ahem-asangho atum amethang aphan kechepahemphu alonglelo.
Pho adun ke Asher akhei ahem-asangho atum aphansi longle thak-lo.
Laso alongri Helkath, Hali, Beten, Akshaph,
Allam Melek, Amad lapen Mishal anta parloponlo. Nichi anat la Karmel lapen Shihor Libnath paphoponlo.
Nihang anat la suisi Zebulun lapen Iphtahel Arlok la Bethemek lapen Neiel anirep atovar anat paphoponsi Bethdagon anat ahoi damlo. La nirep pen Kabul anat dambomsi,
Ebron, Rehob, Hanmon, Kanah lapen ha Sidon ajak keding anta lelo.
Ahoi Ramah anat suisi keparponghet rongsopi Tair ledamlo, ansi la Hosah anat suisi Mediterran Atalo along jut damlo. La Mahalab, Akzib,
Ummah, Aphek, lapen Rehob anta parloponlo. Halahei adung arei arong-heihei pen pen rongsopi rong ingkoira hini dolo.
Lahei arongsopi lapen arongso-heihei kechepahemphu alongle along dolo.
Throk angdeng ke Naphtali akhei ahem-asangho atum aphan si longle thak-lo.
Laso ahoi Heleph pen Zaanannim, Adaminekeb, Jamnia, Lakkum anat lapen Jordan along jutkok-lo.
Hadak ahoi nichi pen Aznoth Tabor anat suilo, hadak pen Hukkok anat damsi nitur anat Zebulun anichi anat Asher lapen nihang anat Jordan paphoponlo.
Aphi kedo arongsopi ke Ziddim, Zer, Hammath, Rakath, Chinnereth,
Adamah, Ramah, Hazor,
Kedesh, Edrei, Enhazor,
Yiron, Migdalel, Horem, Bethanath, lapen Beth Shemesh helo: Lahei adung arei rongso-heihei pen pen rongsopi rong kresirkep dolo.
Lahei arongsopi lapen arongso helo Naphtali akhei ahem-asangho atum kechepahemphu alongle arlosi dolo.
Throksi angdeng ke Dan akhei ahem-asangho atum aphansi longle thak-lo.
Laso ahavar ke Zorah, Eshtaol, Irshemesh,
Shaalbim, Aijalon, Ithlah,
Elon, Timnah, Ekron,
Eltekeh, Gibbethon, Baalath,
Jehud, Beneberak, Gathrimmon, Baalath,
Mejarkon, lapen Rakkon lapen Joppa araikom alongri anta parloponlo.

Dan arat atum longle kedorde ahut, halatum Laish damsi la tengkheng-lo. Latum la cheraisi la arat aphan pathilo lapen la amethang pu chepulo. Latum hadak dosi rongsopi amen Laish pen Dan pu halatum aphusar amen ateng irlo.
Lahei arongsopi lapen arongso ke Dan akhei ahem-asangho atum aphan kepacherai alongle alongsi dolo.
Israel arat atum longle kechethak jutdet aphi, halatum Nun asopo Joshua aphan la amethang kepacheraijisi longle ephar pilo.
hukum kepi atengsi halatum la aphan la kehang arongsopi ateng pilo: Lahei ke Timnath Serah, Ephraim anglong alongri along pilo. La rongsopi chekimthusi hadak dolo.
Eleazar kurusar Nun asopo Joshua lapen Israel akhei ahemtun ajalin atum lahei alongle khadot pen ajoksi Shiloh along
Ansi Joshua Israel aphan kepathanjisi
“Ne Moses pen ajok nangtum aphan nangkepu asonle nangtum Chepachong Arongsopi ingvainon.
Mane abang jongsi kechenam kali pen bang aphan pathilot-lote la hadak damsi alar kehui arideng pen jok-longpo.
Lahei arongsopi angbong elong la kat longpo, lapen kangsai adim rongsopi anghap along dampo, lapen jalin atum aphan kopi plangtang-loma chethanjirpo, lapen la hadak dolongpo.

Hadak jongsi alar kehui abang la aphan ri pen hung-lote, rongsopi arat atum la aphan alar kehuiji arideng hodaidedetpo. Halatum la aphan rai nangpo, pima la aningkethi pen kalisi chechininepin pen si pathilo.
Lapen rat amei la aphan ingsaisetik lapen halaso ahut kechobom akurusar thithetik ke la rong angbong dolongpo. La aphi laso amonit nangkekat ahem methang chedam unpo.”
Lasi Jordan anichi anat halatum Galili along Kedesh panong-lo, la Naphtali angbong alongri; Shekem lake Ephraim anglong alongri; lapen Hebron, la Judah anglong alongri panong-lo.

Jordan anihang ahin anat kejejangtang ajo aklam Jeriko anihang, lapen halatum Reuben alongri along pen Bezer, Gilead pen Ramoth, la Gad alongri; lapen Bashan along Golan, la Manasseh alongri pen ingvailo.

Lahei arongsopi Israel arat lapen halatum along kedo bang adet aso an aphan chepachong arongsopi ingvailo. Mane jongsi chechininepin pen bang apran armut lote la hadak alar kehui arideng pen jok-longpo; la aphan amei dodetik ke pathilonglelo.
Levi ahemtun ajalin atum Eleazar kurusar, Nun asopo Joshua lapen Israel akhei ahemtun ajalin atum an along damlo.
Hadak Kanaan adet Shiloh along halatum aphan latum pulo, “Moses aphan
Lasi
Levi ahem asangho atum angbong Kohath aro aphansi kechengsi arongsopi-heihei kethak nang-lo. Aaron Kurusar aso-asu aphan Judah, Simeon, lapen Benjamin alongri pen
Kohath aro atum aphan Ephraim, Dan, lapen Nichi a-Manasseh alongri pen rongsopi rongkep thak-lo.
Gershon aro aphan Asher, Naphtali lapen Nihang a-Manasseh alongri pen rongsopi rong krekethom thak-lo.
Merari ahemtun-heihei aro aphan Reuben, Gad, lapen Zebulun alongri pen rongsopi rong krehini thak-lo.
Moses aphan
Judah lapen Simeon alongri pen
Aaron aso-asu Kohath aro aphan kethak lake Levi atum arongsopi amen lahei helo: Latum aphansi kechengsi thak nangpo.
Halatum aphan Arba (lake Anak apo) arongsopi non Hebron pulo, la Judah anglong alongri lapen la pi kechopan komchen alongle pilo.
Tebonseta, rongsopi ahidi lapen la arongso-heihei ke Jephunneh asopo Kaleb aphansi pacheraitoilo.
Hebron apar(isi chepachong arongsopi) Aaron Kurusar aso-asu aphan aber arongsopi thaktang-lo: Libnah,
Jattir, Eshtemoa,
Holon, Debir,
Ain, Juttah, lapen Beth Shemesh lapen halatum pi kevi alongle: Judah lapen Simeon akhei pen rongsopi rong sirkep pilo.
Benjamin alongri pen rongsopi rong phli pitang-lo: Gibeon, Geba,
Anathoth lapen Almon, lapen halatum pi kevi alongle pen pen rongsopi rong krekethom Aaron aso-asu kurusar atum aphan pekdet-lo.
Kadokave rongsopi kre-kethom, halahei bap-bi ajo penpenlo, lahei Aaron aro akurusar atum aso-asu apharmanlo.
Kohath aro akaprek Levi ahem-asangho atum aphan Ephraim alongri pen ajehak arongsopi thak-lo.
Halatum aphan rongsopi rong phli pek-lo: Shekem, lapen la pi kevi alongle-heihei Ephraim ang-long alongri along (Isi chepachong arongsopi) Gezer,
Kibzain lapen Beth Horon, halahei pi kevi alongle-heihei.
Dan alongri pen halatum aphan rongsopi rong phli pektang-lo: Eltekeh, Gibbethon,
Aijalon, lapen Gathrimmon, lapen halatum pi kechopan alongle-heihei.
Nichi a-Manasseh alongri pen halatum aphan rongsopi rongni pektang-lo: Taanak lapen Gathrimmon lapen halahei pi kechopan alongle-heihei.
Kohath ahem-asangho atum kedo-an rongsopi rongkep, halahei pi kechopan alongle-heihei pen pen long-lo.
Akaprek arong a-Levi, Gershon aro Nihang a-Manasseh alongri pen rongsopi rongni long-lo: Bashan along Golan (isi chepachong arongsopi) lapen Beeshterah, halatum pi kechopan alongle-heihei pen pen lo.
Issakar alongri pen halatum rongsopi rong phli long-lo: Kishion, Daberath,
Jarmuth lapen Engannim, halatum pi kechopan alongle-heihei pen penlo.
Asher alongri pen halatum rongsopi rong phli long-lo: Mishal, Abdon,
Helkath, lapen Rehob lapen halatum pi kechopan alongle-heihei pen pen lo.

Naphtali alongri pen halatum rongsopi alongri pen halatum rongsopi rongthom long-lo: Galili along Kedesh, la pi kechopan alongle-heihei pen pen (isi chepachong arongsopi), Hammoth Dor lapen Karatan, halatum pi kechopan alongle-heihei pen pen lo.
Gershon aro kaprek-kaprek ahem-asangho atum pangrumpet rongsopi rong krekethom halatum pi kechopan alongle-heihei pen pen lo.
Ahin a-Levi Merari aro Zebulun alongri pen rongsopi rongphli long-lo: Jokneam, Kartah,
Dimnah, lapen Nahalal, halatum pi kechopan alongle-heihei pen penlo.
Reuben alongri pen halatum rongsopi rongphli long-lo: Bezer, Jahaz,
Kedimoth, lapen Mephaath, halatum pi kepachopan alongle pen pen lo.
Gad akhei pen halatum rongsopi rongphli long-lo: Gilead along Ramoth halatum pi kechopan alongle pen pen (isi chepachong arongsopi), Mahanaim,
Heshbon, lapen Jazer, halatum pi kechopan alongle-heihei pen pen long-lo.
Lasi pangrumpet Merari aro aphan rongsopi rong krehini thak-lo.
Israel arat kechepahemphu alongle pen pangrumpet rongsopi rong phlikep-ra nerkep, lapen
pi kepachopan aphan halatum kekomchen alongle-heihei Levi atum aphansi pidet-lo.
Lasi Israel aphan longle kedo-an halatum aphusar atum aphan
Halatum aphusar atum aphan kechechak alonglesi
Israel atum aphan
Ansi Reuben, Gad lapen Nihang a-Manasseh akhei atum aphan Joshua hangpetsi
halatum aphan la pulo, “
Non ahut anta nangkorte Israel atum aphan turchorchedet-lo. Nang Arnam
Non alangli kechechak atengsi nangkorte Israel atum aphan nang Arnam
Moses nangkepi nangpaklemtoi Aron an kroipamepo pura pachinidaknon. Nang Arnam
Joshua halatum aphan ahirjume pisi lapen lahei alam pusi hem toilo: “kepangreng api, ser, rup, tam, ingchin ongdung pen lapen pe-ri ongdung pen nangtum kechevoipen paplang-o nang.
Nangtum ahotur pen keponlong amar khei isi nangkorte atum pen pen chethaknon.” Ansi halatum ahem chedamlo.
Jordan anihang alongle Manasseh akhei achitim aphan Moses longle pilo lapen achitim ke Joshua si Jordan anichi alongle akaprek akhei atum aphan longle pilo.
Lasi Reuben, Gad, lapen Nihang a-Manasseh arat atum hem chedamlo. Halatum Kanaan adet Shiloh along kedo-an Israel arat atum aphan otekangsi amethang alongle Gilead alongle Moses pen ajok
Reuben, Gad lapen Nihang a-Manasseh atum Geliloth along nanglesi, Jordan anichi parai arjapding un ahut halatum thedung langmeme adovan hadak langroi akung kimlo.
Ahin a-Israel arat aphan pulo, “Arjutha! Reuben, Gad, lapen Nihang a-Manasseh akhei arat atum Giloth along Jordan parai akung isi adovan kimlo.
Israel arat atum la arjulongsi nihang akhei atum pen ron kechedan damjisi Shiloh along vangpet-lo.”
Lasi Gilead adet Reuben, Gad lapen Nihang a-Manasseh akhei arat along kepadamjisi Eleazar kurusar asopo Phinehas aphan Israel arat toilo.
Bangkep ajalin atum Phinehas along dunlo, nichi akheitin pen inut nut lapen abangphutinta ahemtun aro angbong akethelo.
Halatum Gilead adet Reuben, Gad lapen Nihang a-Manasseh along vang-lo,
lapen kedo-an
‘Chemathatha, Peor along etum apap,
Non nangtum alongle aphan kekroimo loma? Pini jongsi nangtum
Lasi non, jongsi nangtum alongle along karchoji apun kali pulote

Chemathatha kopusonsi Zerah asopo Achan kepavirji kethoktang amar pen hukum kroimolo; laso pen ajok Israel amei kangthim aduk phonang-lo. Achan amethang apap pen ajok la inutvet le kethinang-lo lapu kali.’ ”
Nichi akhei ajalin atum aphan Reuben, Gad lapen Nihang a-Manasseh atum thak-lo, “Ajakongkethe Abang ke Arnamlo. Alangli ke
‘Jakong-kethenei Abang ke Arnam! Alangli ke
Netum jongsi
Kali! Pima mo aphi nangtum aso-asu atum “
Nangtum Reuben lapen Gad arat atum pen netum angbong alangli Jordan Aroi ahoi pinchongtang-lo ke. Nangtum
Lasi netum isi adovan kimdet-lo, kephrin athok-heihei kepiji aphan kali mate dan-heihei kepiji aphan kali,
bonta netum lapen nangtum arat aphan isi angthek-lo lapen netum aphi a-ove atum ke netum athok-heihei pen pen, kejelang athok-heihei pen pen
Lake netum akepharlo jongsi la nangplang-lote, netum aso-asu atum ta pu-unpo, ‘Langtha! Netum aphusar atum
Netum
Phinehas kurusar lapen bangkep mei ajalin atum, nichi akhei ahemtun akesar atum Reuben, Gad, lapen Nihang a-Manasseh akhei atum kopima kepu alam arjulong-lo lapen halatum aning ingsamlo.
Eleazar kurusar asopo Phinehas halatum aphan pulo, “Non netum chinilo,
Ansi Phinehas lapen jalin atum Reuben, Gad arat aphan Gilead along otekangsi ha Kanaan Israel arat anat chedamlo, lapen halatum aphan kelong alam an thanjirlo.
Israel arat atum aning ingsam-o-lo lapen Arnam aphan rolo. Halatum Reuben lapen Gad arat atum kedo alongle ron kechedan kedamji lapen longle kephangnoji alam chethanthe pinlo.
Reuben lapen Gad arat atum pulo, “Laso adovan ke isi etum kedo-an aphan
Israel aphan kekomchen ahotur atum pen
Lasi la Israel kedo-an akesar atum an, ajalin atum an, kangsai atum an, lapen rat achakri atum an aphan hangpet-lo, lapen pulo, “Non ne sartang-lo.
Nangtum aphan
Langtha, lahei ahin adet kedo-an nangtum akhei kechepahemphujisi Jordan anihang pen ne kehai adet atum Mediterran Atalo anichi anat an khadot pen ajok nangtum aphan nangthak-et-lo,
nang Arnam nangtum angno pen halatum aphan nangphlung pipo. Lapen nangtum chedanbom ahut
Lasi kekroi thekjile cherenon lapen Moses Aron aloh along ketok ason an klemnon. La esonbakta klem pa-oiri,

lapen nangtum angbong kedo laso ahin arat atum pen nangtum chelang nangnelo mate halatum a-arnam-heihei amen parno dun nangnelo mate halahei amen pen semetang nangne mate halahei arnam aphan archo nangne mate halatum aphan ardom nangne.
Alar
Nangtum kechedan ahut kethedung lapen kangtangrak akhei atum ta
Nangtum inutbak anta bangsuri aphan phlung unji pima Alangli kechechak asonsi
Nang Arnam
Nangtum jongsi kroikrera lapen nangtum angbong kedo ahin arat akhei kaprek along chelangdun pen piso chepangriseroi lote
nangtum chininon nangtum kechedan ahut seta
Non ne kethi apor nangletang-lo. Alangli kechechak atengsi nang Arnam
Nangtum aphan Alangli kechechak asonthotsi athetinta Alangli klempo.
Jongsi nang Arnam
Shekem along Joshua kedo-an Israel akhei aphan pangrumlo. La akesar atum aphan, jalin atum aphan, kangsai atum aphan lapen Israel achakri atum aphan hangpet-lo lapen halatum
Kedo-an arat aphan Joshua pulo, “La helo Israel a-Arnam
Ansi Ne nangphusar Abraham aphan Euphratis adet apar alongle pen ponsi Kanaan adet soding padamlo. Ne laphan ongdung aso-asu pilo. Nesi Isaak pilo,
lapen Isaak aphan Ne Jakob lapen Iso pilo. Iso aphan Ne Edom Anglong alongri pacheraitoilo, bonta nangphusar Jakob lapen la asomar an Ijip adet dam-et-lo.
Aphi Moses lapen Aaron aphan Ne toilo, lapen Ne Ijip aputhak pasungpik-lo. Bonta Ne nangtum aphan nangpabarlong-lo;
nangphusar atum aphan Ne Ijip pen vanlo, lapen halatum aphan Ijip asor losei ahemkonglong lapen ronhemkonglong pen pen hungdunlo. Bonta nangphusar atum Ikora Atalo ledamsi,

halatum Ne pen kerap kehangjisi hangjolo, lasi Ne halatum lapen Ijip aso atum angbong chitim pangtingsang-lo. Ne, talo alang Ijip aso aphuthak pangbak-lo, lapen halatum langjang-lo. Nangtum chinilo Ne Ijip aphan kopisi klemtang-loma.”
Kejejangtang ajo nangtum penang an ajirkeding apor donang-lo.

Ansi Ne nangtum aphan Jordan akung anihang anat kedo Amor adet nangvanlo, bonta nangtum aphan halatum aphuthak Ne nangpahaidet-lo. Halatum alongle nangtum endet-lo, lapen nangtum paphrangbom ahut Ne halatum aphan pavirdet-lo.
Lapen Moab Arecho Balak, Zippor asopota nangtum pen ron chedanlo. La Beor asopo Balaam aphan pahangdamtoilo lapen nangtum aphuthak pahirjunojisi choningrilo.
Bonta Ne Balaam aphan arjuje, lasi la nangtum aphan pahirmetang-lo, lapen lasonsi Ne nangtum aphan Balak pen nangpajok-lo.

Nangtum Jordan hat-lo lapen Jeriko vang-lo. Amor aso atum, Perizzi aso atum, Kanaan aso atum, Hitti aso atum, Girgash aso atum, Hivi aso atum lapen Jebusi aso atum keklem asonthotsi Jeriko amonit atum nangtum pen ron chedanlo. Bonta Ne nangtum aphan halatum kedo-an aphuthak nangpahailong-lo.
Nangtum paphrangbom ahut Amor arecho banghini aphan kephlungjisi Ne halatum aphan papheresi paprat-et-lo. Nangtum anokjir-heihei lapen athai-heihei thangta la along akam ave.

Nangtum kaita sai ketiki ke pin alongle Ne nangtum aphan nangpilo, lapen nangtum kekimkepin arongsopi-heihei nangpilo. Non nangtum hadak dosi nangtum ke-e-epin adrakha arong lapen nangtum ke-e-epin jit athengpi arong pen nangtum athe cholong-lo.
Joshua pubomlo, “Non lasi,

Jongsi nangtum Alangliphan ingduk ingtungte pulote pini komat aphansi nangtum ingdukjima phar pamenon, Mesopotamia along nangphusar atum karcho a-Arnam atum aphanma mate nangtum non kedobom Amor aso atum a-arnam atum aphanma? Bonta netum hem isi thuke, netum
Rat atum thak-lo, “Kaprek arnam atum aphan kangdukjira
Netum Arnam
Laso alongle along netum nang kelut paphrang ahut ta
Joshua rat aphan pulo, “Bonta nangtum

Jongsi nangtum Alangliphan obup-ra kaprek arnam atum aphan ingduk lote nangtum abe la thurpo, lapen nangtum aphan aduk nangpipo. Aphrang ahut Alangli nangtum aphan mesen seta la nangtum aphan pavirdetpo.”
Rat atum Joshua aphan thak-lo, “Kali! Netum
Halatum aphan Joshua pulo, “
Halatum thak-lo, “Kalang, netum methangsi haki cholo.”
Alangli hang-lo, “Tangte nangtum along kedo bang adet a-arnam atum pen che-onon, lapen nangtum ahokpet akekroi Israel a-Arnam
Rat atum ansi Joshua aphan pulo, “Netum netum a-Arnam
Halabangso arni rat atum aphan Joshua kechejok alam sikpilo, lapen Shekem along halatum aphan la Aron-heihei lapen kekroinangji kepathirtang aron-heihei pilo.
Arnam Aron aloh along Joshua lahei ahukum tok-lo. Ansi la arlongthepi ensi la phongrong athengpi arum
Kedo-an arat aphan la pulo, “Laso a-Arlong ke etum ahakilo.
Anke rat aphan Joshua pachedamtoilo, lapen abangphutin ta amethang alongle anat chedamrep-lo.
Laso aphi,
La aphan halatum la amethang alongle Timnath Serah Ephraim anglong alongri Gaash anglong anirep along pip-lo.
Joshua kerenglang ahut, Israel arat atum
Ijip pen Israel arat atum kevan Joseph arrepi rup angkleng dum 100 Shekem apo Hamor pen Jakob kenam alongle achet Shekem alongsi pip-lo. Laso alongle Joseph aso-asu atumsi chepahemphulo.
Aaron asopo Eleazar thilot-lo. Lapen Gibeah, Ephraim anglong alongri asopo Phinehas aphan kepitang arong alongsi pip-lo.
Joshua thidet aphi Israel arat atum

Judah atum Simeon arat aphan pulo, “Netum aphan nekepi alongle along nangdunnon, lapen Kanaan asor aphan chedanrap-pet lonang. Anke nangtum aphan nangkepi alongle along netumta nangdunpo.” Lasi Simeon akhei lapen
Judah akhei ron aphan damrap-rap-lo.
Halatum hadak Adonibezek aphan long-lo lapen la aber chedanlo.
La katjuilo, bonta latum laphan aphi hungdunlo lapen nepcheksi arimunpo-heihei ingthanpet-lo.

Lapen Adonibezek pulo, “Recho bang 70 halatum arimunpo lapen akengmunpo-heihei ingthansi ne tebul aber a-ok pangrumlo. Ne halatum aphan keklemtang asonsi Arnam nephan non klemlo.” Laphan ha Jerusalem pondetsi la hadak thilot-lo.
Judah amonit atum Jerusalem tengkhengsi la chepahemphudet-lo. Latum laso arongsopi amonit an pathisi me keidut-lo.
Laso aphi latum chedanponbomsi inglong along kedo, inglong akeng-ri kedo, lapen Nitur anat Krengtai alongle kedo a-Kanaan asor pen ron chedanlo.
Latum Hebron kedo a-Kanaan asor aphan Kiriath Arba pu kepu adim anat damsi chedanlo. Hadak latum Sheshai, Ahiman, lapen Talmai aso aphan paremdet-lo.
Hadak pen Judah amonit atum Debir arongsopi abe thursi damlo, halaso ahut laphan Kiriath Sepher si kepu.
Halatum angbong Kaleb pulo, “Ne nesopi Aksah Kiriath Sepher arongsopi aphan kechepahemphu abangphan penan chopipo.”
Kaleb amu Kenaz asopo Othniel laso arongsopi chepahemphudet-lo. Lasi Kaleb amethang asopi Aksah la aphan penan chopilo.
Kechepangri arni Othniel labangpi apo aphan hidi nangji pura pahangtoilo. Labangpi gadha pen suntuk-lo lapen Kaleb aphan kopisi kenangjima arjulo.
La thak-lo, “Ne langkedo ahidi nangji, nang nekepi alongle ke kekrengtai.” Lasi Kaleb athak lapen aber langroiso pidet-lo.
Moses ahupo akhei Ken asor, Judah arat pen Sotele arongsopi, Jeriko pen Kekrengtai anitur Arad, Judah along damlo. Hadak latum Amalek atum angbongsi do pathirlo.
Judah arat atum Simeon arat pen damrap-petsi latum Jephad arongsopi along kedo a-Kanaan asor aphan paremlo. Halatum arongsopi aputhak ahirjuno pisi, la pavirlo, lapen Hormah pusi irtekang-lo.
Judah arat aphan

Bonta halatum Gaza, Ashkelon mate Ekron lapen ongdung arei alongri chepahemphu un-edet-lo. Pima lahei talo arei kedo arat atum ingchin aron ahemkonglong-heihei do, lasi Judah arat latum aphan phlung un-edet-lo.
Moses kepu atengsi Hebron ke Kaleb, la Anak pen keplang akheithom kephlung abang aphan pidet-lo.
Bonta Benjamin akhei arat atum Jerusalem along kedo Jebusi atum aphan phlungphledet-lo, lapen halaso arni pen Jebusi atum Benjamin arat pen dorapverbomlo.
Ephraim lapen Manasseh akhei atum Bethel, halaso ahut laphan Luz pusi kepu arongsopi aphan ketengkhengjisi damlo.
halatum aphan sap-lo. Halatum rongsopi langjoi atum aphan toilo,
Langjoi atum rongsopi pen kebar ahut inut amonit aphan thek-longsi halaphan arjulo, “Rongsopi arlo kelutji atovar nangpaklangtha lapen netum nangphan thangnatta pasungselo.”
Lasi la halatum aphan paklang-lo, lapen Ephraim lapen Manasseh arat atum rongsopi laso amonit lapen ahem asor pen apara kedo-an aphan pathi-et-lo.
La aphi Hitti atum alongle anatsi damjuilo, hadak isi rongsopi kimlo, lapen Luz pusi amen irlo, la nonpu-anta laso amensi dobomlang.
Manasseh akhei atum Beth-Shan, Taanak, Dor, Ibleam, Megiddo, arongsopi-heihei arat lapen adung-arei arong; Kanaan asor aphan phlungphlesi hadak padolongverlo.
Israel atum ingtang muchot ahut, halatum Kanaan pen kam paklemtoilo, bonta halatum aphan phlungphle bomlang.
Ephraim akheita Gezer arongsopi along kedo Kanaan atum aphan phlungphlesi halatum pen pen padolong-rapverlo.
Zebulun akheita Kitron, lapen Nahalal arongsopi-heihei asor aphan phlungphlesi lapen Kanaan atum aphan halatum along padolongbomsi halatum aphan kam paklemtoilo.
Asher akhei ta Ako, Sidon, Ahlab, Akzib, Halbah, Aphek, Rehob arongsopi kedo arat aphan phlungphledet-lo.
Asher arat atum adung kedo a-Kanaan atum pen pen halatum kephlungphle arni pen dorappet-lo.

Naphtali akhei ta Betheshemesh lapen Nethanath arongsopi kedo arat aphan phlungphledet-lo. Naphtali arat atum adung kedo a-Kanaan atum pen pen dorappet-lo, bonta jakong pen halatum aphan kam paklemtoilo.
Amor asor Dan akhei arat aphan inglong alongri anat padoverlo, lapen halatum aphan thoi nangpasun longledet-lo.
Amor atum Aijalon, Shaalbim, lapen Heres anglong dolongverlo, bonta Ephraim lapen Manasseh akhei atum halatum aphan alangtum aron abersi khang-lo lapen jakong pen halatum aphan chotoilo.
Sela anirep, Edom asor ahoi Akrabim inglong atovar anta dolo.
nangtum dak kedo badu arat pentame kechejokji akam ave. Nangtum halatum karkli adovan-heihei phri nangji.’ Bonta ne nangkepu ason nangtum klemklelang. Nangtum kalilesi klemtang-lo!

Lasi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, ne lahei arat aphan nangphlung pipedetpo, nangtum kechanbom ason thakthak latum nangtum ahotur plangpo, lapen latum a-arnam-heihei aphan karcho pen ajok nangtum aphan nangmoipo.”
Pherangke abang laso alam ningjedet aphi, Israel arat kedo-an kechiru pangcheng-lo,
lapen hadak Bokim pu adim, latum
Joshua Israel arat aphan amethang atovar pachedamrep-lo, lapen abangphutinta apharman alongle chepahemphurep-lo.
Joshua rengtik ke Israel arat
aban Nun asopo Joshua ningkan 110 arta ahutsi thi-lo.
La aphan Timnath Serah pu Ephraim anglong alongri Gaash Anglong nirep amethang alongle achet alongsi pip-lo.
Halaso a-ove an thi-et-lo, lapen aphi a-ove atum
Israel arat atum
Halatum
Latum
Lapen
Aphongtinta latum ron kechedanji aphan damlo,
Lasi dokait atum pen Israel aphan kepajok Abang
Bonta Israel arat atum jalin atum alam arjudun long-lo. Israel atum
Israel aphan keja abang kepi ahut
Bonta keja atum thidet aphi rat atum aban atovar-heihei chevoisi aphrang a-ove apar hingnomuchotsi klempo. Halatum akaprek a-arnam-heiheisi ardompo, lapen halatum akehingno atovar keche-oji molo.
Israel aphuthak aningthihaksi pupo, “Laso akhei Ne aphusar atum aphan kepaklemtoi kechejok ahukum ingditang-lo. Pima latum nephan kroikrelo.
Joshua kethi ahut kedobom kaprek akhei aphan laso alongle pen Ne phlungphlelo.
Nephan Israel arat atum kroima kroikrema aphusar atum keklem ason kelangjisi Ne latum aphan rimpo.”
Lasi
Lasi
Alangli la klemlo, ron aputhak Israel a-ovetin kechiniji aphan, jasemet ke aphrang pen ron chedandun longlepinlang atum aphan.
Det along kepadolongtoi ke pho Philistia arongsopi-heihei, Kanaan asor an, Sidon asor an, Hivi asor an Lebanon anglong pen Baal Hermon anglong pen ha Hamath anglong atovar an.
Latum Israel aphan isi asat plangpo, Moses pen ajok halatum aphusar atum aphan kepitang
Lasi Israel arat atum Kanaan atum, Hitti atum, Amor atum, Perez atum, Hivi atum, lapen Jebusi atum angbong donang-lo.
Latum pen halatum piso che-en chedo seroilo lapen halatum a-arnam-heihei aphan ardom dunlo.
Israel arat atum latum a-arnam,
La apotsi
Ansi Israel atum
akarjong la aphuthak vang-lo, lapen la Israel atum ajalin plang-lo. Othniel ron damlo, lapen
Lasi hadak ningkan 40 det along ingsamjin pen dolong-lo lapen aphi Othniel thilot-lo.
Israel arat atum puthot
Eglon, Amor lapen Amalek pen chelangpetsi latum Israel aphan paremdet-lo, lapen sotele arongsopi Jeriko latum cheraidet-lo.
Israel atum ningkan 18 Eglon aber donang-lo.
Ansi Israel atum
Ehud amethang aphan ingrup isi anbak keding arangso-heihei anokjir cheselamlo. La ar-e avam choi arlo la chesek ponjoilo.
Ansi la, Eglon akromthedung amonit aphan dan-heihei ponpilo.
La aphan Ehud dan-heihei kepajir ahut kevan atum aphan la hem padamtoilo.
Bonta Ehud amethang Gilgal adung kekurvon a-arlong anat pangnosi Eglon anat damlo lapen pulo, “Recho, neli nangliphan kepujoi abirta do.”
Lasi recho abang aban atum aphan pulo, “Netumdet padolongtha!” Lapen halatum kedo-an damjuilo.
Ansi recho hadak inutvetsi ingnijoilo ha angsong kangsamjet amethang angdeng along, Ehud damputsi alangliphan pulo, “Neli Arnam pen isi abirta nangliphan do.
Ari arvi pen ar-e avam pen nokjir chesansi recho apok arlo la chut-lut-lo. Nokjir do-an lut-lo,
lapen abe anta athu si dipthip-lo. Recho apok pen Ehud la sansedet-lo, lapen alangli kengdak tokthip-lo lapen akesa-ur ason nangbarlo.
Ansi Ehud ingtan nangbarlo, lapen aphi inghap-heihei ingkirhet-lo, lapen halahei inghap-het-lo,
lapen damjuilo. Ban atum vang-lo lapen inghap-heihei ingkirhet thek-long-lo, bonta rechoke arlo sangjoi tahailo pusi latum mathalo.
Halatum kematha atengsi un an inghong-lo, bonta inghap ingpuperek thek-longsi latum inghap aphlok ponsi ingpulo. Lapen halatum ahemphu longle athak kethitang ketilai thek-long-lo.”
Halatum kanghongbom ahut Ehud damlongjuilo. La arlongkurvon parsi Seirah anat chepajok damlo.
Ephraim anglong alongri la kele ahut, la Israel amonit ron aphan kehangjisi pong-ut but-lo; ansi la halatum aphan inglong pen thoi an japonlo.
La pulo, “Ne phi phi nangdunnon! Etum ahotur Moab aphuthak kehaijisi
Halaso arni latum bang surikep Moab atum akemenei aron aso aphan pathipilo; inutbakta jok longledet-lo.
Halaso arni Israel atum Moab aphan paremdet-lo, lapen ningkan 80 det ningkangsam pen dolo.
Adun ajalin abang ke Shamgar, la Anath asopo, la Israel aphan pajok-lo, lapen chainong kechut-i akaibong pen bang 600 a-Philistia atum aphan pathilo.
Ehud thidet aphi Israel arat atum
Lasi Hazor arongsopi kepangri abang, inut Kanaan arecho, Jabin pen ajok
Jabin ingchin aron ahemkonglong hum 900 do lapen la ningkan 20 Israel aphuthak kesedeng lapen kephangno pensi pangrilo. Ansi kerap kelongji aphan Israel atum
Non Deborah, la Lappidoth apiso, inut montripi lo, lapen halabangso ahut bangpi Israel aphuthak ingsailo.
Labangpi Ephraim anglong alongri Ramah lapen Bethel adak sotele erong arumsi bangpi chongniver, lapen bangpi pen kephar kelongji aphan Israel arat atum hadak dampo.
Arnisi bangpi Barak pu Abinoam asopo, la Naphtali alongri Kedesh arongsopi pen pahang-lo lapen pulo, “Israel atum a-Arnam
Kishon alangroi along Jabin aron apinpo nangpen kechedanjisi Ne nangvanpo. Laso abang ron ahemkonglong-heihei lapen ron aso doji bonta Ne halatum aphuthak nang kehaiji ajakong nangpidetpo.’ ”
Anke Barak thak-lo, “Jongsi nangli nelilong nangdunji pulote neli damji, bonta nangli jongsi nangdunde pulote neli damde.”
Labangpi thak-lo, “Chokpo, neli nanglilong nangdunpo, bonta kehai pen nang thang anong longle pima
Barak, Naphtali lapen Zebulun amonit atum Kedesh along phalo, lapen bang surikep amonit la aphi phi dunlo, lapen Deborah ta la penpen damlo.
Halaso ahut Heber, lapen Ken abang Kedesh adung o-ak athengpi adung Zanannim along la apehem chekimlo. La kaprek a-Ken atum pen chepahelo-tang-lo, Hobap, la Moses a-ongsar aro.
Barak, Tabor Anglong arlutang-lo pu Sisera chinidet aphi,
la alang hum 900 ingchin ronhemkonglong lapen la kedo-an amonit chehang-lo lapen Harosheth pen toilo ha Kishon alangroi an.
Ansi Deborah, Barak aphan pulo, “Damnon!
Barak aron aso pen ketengkheng ahut
Barak ronhemkonglong lapen ron aso aphi hungdunlo ha Harosheth an, lapen Sisera aron aso an thi-et-lo. Inut bakta sasedet-lo.
Sisera Jael pu Ken aso Heber apiso apehem along katjuilo, pima Hazor arecho Jabin pen Heber ahemtun atum cheme-o.

Jael, Sisera aphan kechetongji aphan damlo, lapen laphan pulo, “Vang iknon, akehai; neli pehem arlo vang iknon, phere nangnelo.” Lasi la arlo lutdamlo, lapen labangpi kebeng-ape anungsi laphan patujoilo.
La, bangpi aphan pulo, “Neliphan kejun alang nelipi iktha; neli ingit-olo.” Bangpi pi amok-lang a-ok-reng ajarong ingpusi la aphan pajunlo, lapen patuthulo.
Anke la labangpi aphan pulo, “Pehem anghap along arjapnon, mane jongsi vang pen dak bang amonit doma pu nang arjulote, ave pule thaknon.”
Sisera lapu-an lak-lo, la amek kejang varhet-lo. Anke Jael kibu lapen kurdang isi ponsi la along damjoilo, lapen laphan kurdang pen aphu along saksi longle an kesak paplatsi pathilot-lo.

Barak vangsi Sisera aphan keri ahut Jael damsi laphan chetongdunlo lapen laphan pulo, “Dak vang-iknon! Nangli keri amonit neli nangpaklangpo.” Lasi la labangpi pen pen arlo damlo lapen Sisera longle athak kurdang pen aphu sakplot thek-long-lo.
Halaso arni Arnam Israel aphan Jabin, la Kanaan arecho aphuthak pahaidet-lo.
Latum la abethursi pasungbom pasungbomsi latum la aphan pavirdet-lo.
Halaso arni Deborah lapen Barak, la Abinoam asopo laso alun lunlo:
Israel atum kechedanjisi chesik-lo;
rat atum aningkehang pen nangbarlo.
Arjutha, nang recho atum!
Nangno chedentha, nang kepangri atum!
Ne Israel a-Arnam,
Edom alongri pen kebar ahut, pirthe klemhurlo,
sining pen arve klolo, ahok, inghun-heihei pen langdung-lo.
Sinai a-
Anath asopo Shamgar arni ahut,
Jael arni ahut,
Longri kejor-kelang ahemkonglong chehelat-ledet-lo lapen tovar kedam atum akrong kaprek atovar-heiheisi damlo.
Israel arongso-heihei dohai abang avelo,
Deborah, nang vangvetik ke halahei angsesi arjapphrong-lo,
Israel aphan pei asonsi vang-lo.
Israel atum arnamkemi-heihei kechongvai ahut det ron thurlo.
Bang suri 40 a-Israel amonit atum inutbak achong mate achir cheponma?
Ne ningke Israel apinpo atum alongsi dolo,
lapen aningkehang pen kechesong arat along.
Bangso alam thantha,
nang gadha kelok athak kardon abang kedamjisi kangni abang lapen nahok-le dam seta kevur ponvek nangji abang.
Arjutha! Langhe akung amuluk ase lahei
lapen Israel arat kehai alam!
Ansi
Japonbomnon, Deborah, Japon-bomnon!
Lun kelun pen japonbomnon!
Dam paphrangnon, Abinoam asopo Barak,
keneptang aphan japonnon!
Ansi kekroi thirklong abang amethang ajalin atum along chevang-lo;
kechedanjisi kechesik.
Halatum Ephraim pen arlok anat vang-lo,
Benjamin akhei lapen la arat armu atum Makir pen pinpo atum vang-lo,
Zebulun pen chakri atum vang-lo.
Isaakar ajalin atum ta Deborah pen vang-lo,
ahok-lo, Isaakar lapen Barak ta vang-lo,
lapen latum la aphi aphi arlok an dunlo Bonta Reuben akhei chethakdak-lo,
halatum vang nangjima nangnema phar thekthedet-lo.
Kopisi halatum biresak adung kedoverloma?
Kevi abang ahur aphan kehang karjujima?
Kalang, Reuben akhei chethakdak-lo;
halatum kevang nangji la pharthekthelo.
Gad akhei ke Jordan aroi nihang anatsi do,
lapen Dan akhei ke telongpi-heihei adungsi do,
Asher akhei ke talo akungsi do;
latum longkam sodingsi dolo.
Bonta Zebulun lapen Naphtali arat ke ron chedan adim along apran chesongdut-lo.
Taanak along, Megiddo Aroi akung,
recho atum vangsi chedanlo;
Kanaan arecho atumta chedanlo,
bonta halatum rup ponpe.
Chiklolongso-heiheita sining angsong pen chedanlo,
Halatum sining dambom ahut,
halatumta Sisera abethursi chedanlo.
Halatum aphan Kishon alang thepi pon-et-lo,
Kishon Aroi alang ali.
Ne jakong pen dambom dambomji!
Anke losei vangsi ingplongbomlo,
halatum kemo-akeng-heihei pen longle patekung-lo.
Meroz, aputhak ahirjuno hangnon, pusi
“Hadak kedo atum aphuthak isi ahirjuno.
Halatum vangpen
nokbe ason vangpen alangphan chedan pipelo.”
Akopai kemenei ke Jael helo,
Ken aro Heber apiso
Pehem kedo angbong akopai menei abangpi.
Sisera lang chohang-lo,
bonta bangpi laphan pi mok-lang mesen angkleng aharlung pen la aphan vanpilo.
Bangpi pehem akurdang ari ehong pen otsi ehong anat kam klembang akibu ot-lo,
bangpi Sisera aphan thengsi aphu thengrop-lo;
bangpi aphu sakplot-lo.
La akengphu an chetongdik-si klibub-lo lapen bangpi akeng-risi jot-thorlo.
Bangpi akeng-ri along la akengphu chetongdiksi la krepbup-lo;
la longle along krepsi thilot-lo.
Sisera apei inghapso pen chelang-lo,
bangpi rangkha pen lang-lorlo.
“Kopisi la hemkonglong vangverek-loma?”
pusi labangpi arjulo.
“Kopisi la alosei kevang inglen var-ret-loma?”
Bangpi akerenei a-arloso thak-lo,
lapen bangpi amethang aphansi chethan lemdet-lo,
Halatum kecheraiji lapen keche-thakjisi mar-heihei ribomlang,
inut a-osopi mate banghini ke anut-tin anokbe aphanlo,
adorkeso ape Sisera aphanlo,
keroi-kebutang ape ke rechopi achethok aphanlo.
Nang hotur an lasonthot-le pathinang, O
bonta nangjirpo atum arni kevang atur ason paturbong nang!
Lapen det angbong ningkan 40 ningkangsam pen dolong-lo.
Israel arat atum puthot
Midian atum Israel apar ingtangmuchot lapen latum pen Israel arat atum longku longdang ajo-heihei, inglong arlok-heihei ajosi chepatu nang-lo.
Israel atum pine sai chotiki lote Midian atum, Amalek lapen kejejangtang ajo kedo akhei atum pen pen vangpaksi halatum aphan tengkheng-lo.

Halatum alongle along mukam chekimsi ketiki ason an nitur pen Gaza alongri an pavirlo. Halatum kedo-an abiresak, achainong lapen agadha-heihei ponpi-etpo, lapen Israel atum kerengji aphan thangta bitekangkelo.
Halatum api ahur lapen pehem-heihei pen pen vangpak titi, lapen karthat alongvurle kebonthip ason. Halatum lapen halatum aka-utta dopik, lakha un-e. Latum vangsi longle pavirtekang-lo,
lapen latum abe kethurji Israel atum cherap thekthedet-lo.
Ansi Israel arat atum kerap kelongjisi
lapen latum aphan inut amontri laso abirta

Ne nangtum aphan Ijip asor lapen laso alongle along nangtum abekethurra kechedan atum an penta nangpajok-lo. Nangtum kechedan ahut Ne halatum aphan phlung-lo, lapen Ne nangtum aphan halatum alongle nangpilo.
Ne nangtum aphan nangpulo, Ne ke
Ansi
Hadak
Gideon laphan thak-lo, “Neli nangliphan arjulong pulote, lapen nelitum along
Ansi

Gideon thak-lo, “Bonta, Hemphu, neli kosonsi Israel aphan pajokthekpo? Pima Manasseh akhei angbong pen nelitum aro helo jakong kavenei atumlo, lapen neli ke nelitum ahemtun angbong pen keningjoinonei abang-lo.”
Gideon thak-lo, “Nangli jongsi neliphan ningdok-lo pulote, nangli
Nangliphan neli an adan nanglivan pipe tik damritha.”
Alangli pulo, “Nang chevoivetik Ne inghongpo.”
Lasi Gideon hem arlo chedamsi bi aloso a-ok tun pilo lapen linkep sang aduk ensi thapkave ahim selampilo. La ton arlo si ok thap-lo, lapen ke-up a-ok-lang phuleso arlo bisi lahei
La aphan pherangke hukum pilo, “Laso a-arlong athak-le ok lapen him batnon lapen ke-up alang lahei aputhak dungnon.” Gideon lasonthotsi klemlo.
Ansi
Gideon ansi chinilo, la
Bonta laphan
Gideon hadak
Halaso ajo Gideon aphan
Laso ajakong kedo adim
Lasi Gideon bangkep aban cheponsi
Rong asor puthot adap thurlo lapen Baal lapen Asherah akumlin an kechor-et lapen kekimtang adovan along adun achainong phrintang-lo lahei thek-long-lo.
Halatum lahin lahin charjuseroilo, “La komatsi keklemloma?” Latum ri-arjutonlo lapen Joash asopo Gideonsi la klemtang-lo pu chinilo.
Anke latum Joash aphan pulo, “Netum nangsopo aphan kepathilong jile ingtan vannon! La Baal adovan ingsek-ilo lapen Asherah la adung kedo akumlin an chor-ettang-lo.”

Bonta Joash abang karjappak kedo-an aphan pulo, “Nangtum Baal aphantong choningri poma? Mate nangtum la aphantong raipoma? La aphan kechoningri abangle arni nangklangkle ako papathinang. Jongsi Baal inut arnam pulote, la amethangle pachesong lonang. Laso adovansi kangsekpi-tang-lo ke.”
Halaso penke Gideon aphan Jerubaal pusi chinilo, pima Joash pulo, “Baal amethangle pachesong lonang; laso adovansi kangsekpi-tang-lo ke.”
Anke do-an a-Midian atum, Amalek lapen kejejangtang ajo kedo akhei atum an chingrumsi Jordan Aroi hatpetsi lapen Jezreel arlok along mukam chekimlo.
akarjong Gideon aphuthak vang-lo lapen la Abeezer aro amonit atum aphan kehangpen aphi aphi kepadunjisi pong-ut-but-lo.
Manasseh lahin lahin alongri abeng ta pherangke atum aphan toilo. La Assher, Zebulun lapen Naphtali akhei anatta pherangke toilo, lapen halatum ta vangsi la along chelangdunlo.
Ansi Arnam aphan Gideon pulo, “Nangli kepu Israel aphan kepajokjisi nangli neliphan rimpo pusi pathik-lo.
Mesen, nelitum sok-tipli kesi adim longle athak ajehak biresak angmi bilo. Jongsi ar-e biresak angmi alongsi dochot lapen longle athak ave pulote Israel aphan kepajokjisi nangli neliphan rimpo.”
Lasonthotsi plang-lo. Puthot adap Gideon amek prang-lo, la biresak angmi sorlo lapen harlung plengset ar-e alang la pen long-lo.

Anke Arnam aphan Gideon pulo, “Neliphan nanglining thiri, neliphan lam ethe paningje longtha. Non biresak angmi pen puthot isi asat nelipalang longtha. Non ephong ke biresak angmi pakrengtai lonang, lapen longle ke pachamvok-lonang.”
La kepu asonthotsi halaso ajota Arnam klemlo. Puthot adap biresak angmi krengtailo lapen longle ar-e pen ajok chamsop-lo.
Arnisi Gideon lapen alangli amonit kedo-an thurdap-prangsi Harod alangjeng akung mukam chekimlo. Midian atum amukam ke halatum pen nirep Moreh anglong a-arlok along.
Rat aphan pachininon, Kephere abang aling hem pachedam nang, lapen netum Gilead anglong alongsi dak inghongpo.” Lasi bang suri 22 angbong bang suri 10 ansi sa chot-lo.
Anke Gideon aphan
Gideon monit atum aphan lang anat pahir-et-lo, lapen la aphan
Ari pen lang kechosoksi lang kejun atum hadak bang 300 dochot-lo, kaprek atum anke halatum akengphu patongruisi junlo.
Gideon aphan
Lasi Gideon Israel kedo-an aphan hem toi-et-lo, lapen asonson kepajir kelong lapen pong-ut kerimlong atum bang 300 si dolongchot-lo. Midian amukam ke halatum aber a-arloksi do.
Halaso ajo Gideon aphan
Bonta nangli jongsi ketengkhengji pherelo pulote, nangliban Purah pen mukam anat hirnon.
Halatum kopisi kechethanma nangli arjudun longpo. Lapensi nangli ketengkhengji nangli ingthin thepo.” Lasi Gideon lapen aban Purah hotur amukam ingtan kedai anat hirdamlo.
Midian atum, Amalek atum, lapen kejejangtang ajo akhei atum arlok along longvur asonsi rikthip-lo, lapen talo akung asangti asonsi halatum aka-ut lapen sok ongpik.

Gideon lerok pen inut amonit ajirpo aphan amang alam kechehir arjudun long-lo. La pulo, “Nemang sok-tipliso ahim nangkong-longsi etum amukam arlo vang-lo lapen pehem tongphit-lo.” Pehem krep-hup-lo lapen longle athak jaidak-lo.”
La ajirpo thak-lo, “lake Israel abang Joash asopo Gideon anokjirlo! La apar kaprek thangta kalilo! Arnamsi la Midian lapen etum ron amuluk aphuthak kepahaijisi pitang-lo!”
Gideon monit amang lapen la athe kopima arjulongdet pen la akengphu patongruisi la
Alangli la bang 300 amonit songthom thak-lo, lapen abangphutin aphan isisi apong-ut lapen tibuk, la arlo methengtom pilo.
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Ne mukam angchun kele ahut, nephan langnon lapen ne keklem alingle nangtum klemnon.
Ne song lapen ne pong-ut but lote nangtumta mukam soding butpo lapen hangpo, ‘
Ajo chittimte ako, Gideon lapen la bang 300 amonit prapjin pen mukam angchun keton atum kechelarjong aphi vang-lo. Anke halatum pong-ut but-lo lapen tibuk-heihei panghangsi halatum rung-lo,
lapen hala songni atumta lasonthotsi klemlo. Halatum anut-tinta me thengtom arvi anat otkreilo, lapen halatum ar-e anat pong-ut lapen hang-lo, “
Abangphutinta mukam arei amethang adim chedo-rep-lo, lapen hotur ron amuluk kedo-an kat-et-lo.
Gideon amonit atum halatum apong-ut kebut ahut
Anke Naphtali, Asher lapen Manasseh lahin lahin abeng akhei amonit atum aphan hang-lo lapen latum Midian atum aphi aphi hungdunlo.

Gideon inglong arlok an pahangjisi pherangke atum aphan toisi paputoilo, “Nangtum non Midian atum pen chedannon. Jordan Aroi tondingnon, lapen Bethbarah alangjeng an Midian atum kepar longledetjile tondingnon.”

Halatum Banghini Midian akehoi atum, Oreb lapen Zeeb aphan nepchek-lo; halatum Oreb Anglong along Oreb aphan lapen Zeeb adrakha kesor adim Zeeb aphan pathilot-lo. Halatum Midian atum aphi aphi hungdunbomsi Oreb lapen Zeeb aphu-heihei Gideon angno vanlo, la Jordan nihang anatsi kedo.

Anke Ephraim amonit atum Gideon aphan pulo, “Kopisi nang Midian atum pen kechedandam ahut netum aphan nanghanghe-det-lo? Kopisi nang netum aphan lapuson keklemloma?” Halatum la aning oilak pensi la pujolo.

Bonta la thak-lo, “Ne keklem un ason pen pangbardam lote nangtum keklem thangta kali. Tebonseta nangtum Ephraim amonit atum asap-o klemchot seta nangtum keklemtang ke netum aro kedo-an keklem an sose.
Jat seta Arnam ajakong pensi nangtum banghini Midian akehoi, Oreb lapen Zeeb aphan pathilo. La pen ne thangta pangbar un-e?” La ningjedet aphi halatum aningthiverve det-lo.
Laso ahut Gideon lapen la bang 300 amonit atum Jordan Aroi nanglelo lapen la hatpet-lo. Latum ainipik-lo, seta latum hotur aphi aphi hungdunbomlo.
Latum Sukkoth pu arong nanglesi rong asor aphan la arjulo, “Kanghon pen nemonit atum aphan ajehak ahim pitha. Latum ainipik-lo lapen ne Midian arecho Zebah lapen Zalmunna aphan hungdunlo.”
Bonta Sukkoth arong asar pulo, “Kopi athesi nehem nangron aso atum aphan ne an kepinangpo? Nangtum non anta Zebah lapen Zalmunna aphan nepnedet-lang ke.”
Lasi Gideon pulo, “Toh chokpo!
Gideon dambomsi Penuel lelo lapen hadak arat aphan asonthotsi choningrilo, bonta Penuel amonit atumta Sukkoth amonit atum asonsi thak-lo.
Lasi latum aphan la pulo, “Ne thangthe pen nangchevoilong lote, ne nangtum ahem chardon nangphri pi-etji!”
Zebah lapen Zalmunna atum ke amethang aron aso pen Karkor si do, kejejangtang ajo akhei bang suri 15 an dolang, bang suri 120 aron aso thi-et-lo.
Gideon kejejangtang ajo atovarsi dambomlo Nobah lapen Jogbehah anihang anat, lapen pamanghuhaksi ron aso aphuthak tengkheng-lo.
Banghini Midian arecho, Zebah lapen Zalmunna katjuilo, bonta la hungdunsi halatum aphan nepchek-lo lapen halatum aron aso pheresi pratseilo.
Heres atovar anat pen Gideon ron pen nangkechevoi ahut
Sukkoth kedo inut ariso nepsi arjulo. Riso abang Gideon aphan bang 77 ajalin amen tokpilo.

Anke Gideon Sukkoth amonit along damsi pulo, “Chemathanon, nang nephan nekerap-re aphong? Nang pulo, ne Zebah lapen Zalmunna aphan nep thekthelang apot ne ke-aini amonit aphan an pi-un-e. Chok-lo, lahei helo halatum!”
Anke la thengsudo lapen bapsudo kejejangtang ajo pen ponsi Sukkoth ajalin atum aphan aduk pi-lo.
La Penuel arongsopi ahemchardon phri pi-etsi hadak kedo amonit aphan pathitekang-et-lo.
Ansi Gideon, Zebah lapen Zalmunna aphan arjulo, “Tabor along nangtum kepathi amonit koson?”
Halatum thak-lo, “Halatum nangsonthot, recho asopo ason.”
Gideon pulo, “Halatum nekorte atumlo, nepei apok asolo. Ne semetang-lo, nangtum jongsi halatum aphan pathithe pulote, ne nangtum aphan nangpathithe detji apot-lo.”
Anke la asopo akleng Jether aphan pulo, “Damra pathi-etnon!” Bonta asopo nokjir chesansedet-lo. La chak-hik-lo, pima la inut a-osochot-lang.

Ansi Zebah lapen Zalmunna atum, Gideon aphan pulo, “Vang-ra nangmethangle netum aphan pathinon. Pinso akam pinsosi la klem unji.” Lasi Gideon halatum aphan pathilot-lo, lapen halatum aka-ut-heihei achethok along kedo alek asang pondet-lo,
lapen aphi Israel atum Gideon aphan pulo, “Nang lapen ha nangpoton atum anta netum aphan pangrinon. Nang netum aphan Midian atum pen pajok-lo.”
Gideon thak-lo, “Ne nangtum aphan kepangri abang kalilo, nesomar atumta kalilo.
Bonta la pubomlo, “Ne nangtum aphan eson alam nepar-julongtha. Abangphutinta nangtum kepon ajangsai-heihei nepitha.” (Midian atum, kejejangtang ajo akhei kechingthang aser ajangsai amar.)
Rat atum thak-lo, “Netum ning arong pen nangphan lahei nangpiji.” Latum pe limlo, lapen abangphutin kepon ajangsai-heihei la aputhak bilo.
Ser ajangsai lok Gideon kelong lin 20 anbak do, lapen halatum kepang-e amarso, lek-heihei lapen pe-erring, lapen recho kechingthang amar lapen ka-ut achethok along kehom alek-heihei bikok-lo.
Ser pen Gideon kumlin selamlo lapen la amethang ahem Ophrah along la chebilo.
Israel atum kedo-an Arnam aphan obubsi kumlin aphan karchojisi dampet-lo. Lake Gideon lapen ahemtun isi aphan kepamanghulo.
Lasi Midian atum aphan Israel atum paremdet-lo lapen kepherenangji kalidet-lo. Det lapusonsi ningkan 40 ingsamjin pen dolo, lake ha Gideon thithetik anlo.
Gideon amethang ahem chedamsi hadak dolo.
La asopomar bang 70 dolo, pima la apiso ongdung.
La Shekem alongta enpangtar apiso do; la ta inut asopo chopathelo, lapen la laphan Abimelek pusi amen irlo.
Gideon, Joash asopo kesar ahut an thilongpamelo lapen Ophrah along apo Joash athiri alongsi pip-bup-lo, Abiezer aro arong-lo.
Gideon thilot aphi Israel arat atum Arnam aphan kroithipthe det-lo, lapen Baal-heihei si archorong-lo. Latum Baalsi halatum kechejok a-arnam pinchong-lo,
lapen
Halatum Gideon ahemtun ko-an keme akam la Israel aphan klempilo seta ale pipedet-lo.
Gideon asopo Abimelek Shekem arong along damlo, hadak apei adon-arap kedo adim lapen halatum aphan pulo,

Shekem asor amonit aphan arjulo, “Kolo abangsi nangtum nangninghang-lo? Gideon asopo bang 70 kedo-an nangpangri nangjima mate inut amonit anta chokma? Chemathanon, Abimelek ke nangtum a-ok-avi amonit-lo.”
Apei adon-arap atum Shekem amonit aphan thanpilo, lapen Shekem amonit atum Abimelek aphi kedunjisi pharlo, pima la halatum adonlo.
Kechejok a-Baal akardomhem pen latum rup dum 70 la aphan pilo, lapen laso atangka pen la along kejelang duntoiji aphan amokevangve arikave asong anam pen rong-lo.

La Ophrah along apo ahem damlo lapen ha angsong longpak athak akorte bang 70, lahei Gideon asomar atum aphan pathilo. Bonta Jotham, la Gideon asopo akebinei abang chepatujoi amat laphan pathi-longledet-lo.
Ansi Shekem lapen Bethmillo amonit atum chepangrum-petsi oak athengpi kangthir Shekem along dampet-lo lapen hadak Abimelek aphan halatum recho bat-lo.
Jotham laso alam arjulongsi la Girizim anglong athak arjapsi halatum aphan hangdunlo, lapen Arnamta nang arjutahai!
Ahut isi thengpi atum chingrumpetsi halatum arecho chongvailo. Halatum Jit arong aphan pulo, “Netum arecho plangnon!”
Jit arong thak-lo, “Nangtum aphan pangrilote ne arnam lapen monit man kepi-i ajangthu kepado che-onangkokpo.”
Anke thengpi atum Thebo arong aphan pulo, “Nang vangnon netum arecho plangnon!”
Bonta Thebo arong thak-lo, “Nangtum aphan pangrinangji pulote ne kelangme kedokjok athe kepathe che-onangkokpo.”
Lasi thengpi atum drakha arikang aphan pulo, “Nang vang-ra netum arecho plangnon!”
Bonta drakharikang thak-lo, “Ne nangtum aphan pangri nangji pulote, arnam lapen monit atum aphan aning kepadok ahorlang kepado akam che-onangkokpo le.”
Lasi thengpi kedo-an bapsudo aphan pulo, “Nang vang-ra netum arecho plangnon!”

Bapsudo thak-lo, “Jongsi nangtum nephan nangtum arecho plang nangji pulote, vang-ra nebin along nang chepachong non. Jongsi nangtum klemkle pulote ne ingsu aro pen me akar vansi Lebanon a-Kedar athengpi cho-etpo.”

Jotham pubomlo, “Non lasi, Nangtum Abimelek aphan recho kebat ahut ahokpet lapen chokpet loma? Gideon aphan nangtum aman piloma lapen la ahemtun aphan langpame loma lapen la akam kepaklang ateng-loma?
Chemathatha, nepo nangtum aphansi chedantang-lo. La apran chethongdut-lo nangtum aphan Midian atum pen kepajokjisi.
Bonta pini nangtum nepo ahemtun abe thurlo. Nangtum la asopo bang 70 longpak athak pathi-et-lo, pima Abimelek, la asopo inut banpi pen aso, nangtum adon apot nangtum laphan Shekem arecho bat-lo.
Non tangte, nangtum pini Gideon aphan lapen la ahemtun aphan keklem ahok lapen chokpet-lo pulote Abimelek pen ning cheparongnon.
Bonta kali pulote, Abimelek pen me vang-ra Shekem lapen Bethmillo amonit an aphan pachonang, lapen Shekem pen Bethmillo pen me akar thurra Abimelek aphanta pachonang.”
Anke la a-ik Abimelek aphan phereduk apotsi Jotham katjuilo lapen Beer alongsi dolo.
Abimelek ningkan 3 Israel aphan pangrilo.
Anke Arnam, Abimelek lapen Shekem amonit atum angbong lahin lahin pachelangselet-lo.
La lapusonsi plang-lo, Abimelek lapen la aphan Gideon asomar bang 70 kepathiji aning keparungdun atum Shekem amonit atum, halatum adai anam tu nangpo.
Shekem amonit atum Abimelek aphan kephangnojisi inglong angsong monit patonding-lo, lapen halatum hapu anat kedam aling aphan mar thiponlo. Abimelek aphan bangso alam thanlo.
Ebed asopo Gaal, Shekem anat damlo, akorte ahem pen damlo, lapen Shekem amonit atum alangphan chikilo.

Halatum do-an amethang adrakharikang kelikdamjisi drakha aberi anat chedamrep-lo, lahei pen drakha ahorlang selamlo lapen isi chojun amei dolo. Halatum halatum arnam-heihei akardomhem, hadak halatum chojunlo, lapen Abimelek aphan ingtonjolo.

Gaal pulo, “Etum Shekem amonit atum kopi manloma? Kopisi ili Abimelek aphan ingduk nang-loma? La konat-lo? Gideon asopo! Lapen Zabul la pen hukum hang-lo, bonta ili kopi athe laphan ingduknangji? Nangphusar Hamar, nangtum aro keja abang aphanle kroinon.
Ne laso arat aphan kejaji nening hang-lo! Ne Abimelek pen chepahelo-longpo! Ne laphan pu-unpo , ‘Nang ron aso chepa-ongnon, lapen vang-ra nangchedan non!’”
Zebul, rongsopi pangribang, Gaal kepu alam arjulongsi aningthilo,
la Abimelek aphan Arumah along pherangke atum aphan toilo, “Ebel asopo Gaal lapen akorte atum pen Shekem anat vangbomlo, lapen halatum nangliphan rongsopi arlo nangpalut longle.
Non lasi nangli lapen nangli monit atum ajo amat damsi hidi ajo chepatu damjoinangji.
Penap adapprang thurra, arni kevang ahut rongsopi aputhak menmen tengkheng non. Anke Gaal lapen la amonit nangbe-thurra vang-lote, nang jakong do-an pen halatum aphan arbunon.”
Lasi Abimelek lapen la kedo-an amonit atum halatum ajo amat damlo lapen Shekem arlo songphli chepatulo.
Abimelek lapen la amonit atum Gaal kevang thek-longsi halatum kechepatu adim-heihei pen nangbarlo,
Gaal halatum aphan thek-longsi Zebul aphan pulo, “Langtha! Inglong angsong pen monit nanghirbomlo!”
Zebul thak-lo, “Halatum monit kali, lahei ke inglong-heihei aharchichot.”
Gaal puthulo, “Langtha! Monit atum inglong alum pen nangkehir, lapen esong ke oak athengpi, kopaikethom atovar pensi vang-lo.”

Ansi Zebul aphan pulo, “Konatsi nanglambek kekatjuilo? Non nanghelo bo etum kopi athesi Abimelek aphan ingduk nang-loma pu karju. Lahei helo nangkangton kangthi amonit-lo. Damra non halatum pen chedannon.
Gaal amonit atum aphan japonsi Abimelek pen chedanlo.
Gaal katjuilo, lapen Abimelek laphan hungdunlo. Ongdung atum arengsolo ha rongsopi anghap alongta.
Abimelek Arumah along si dolo. Zebul, Gaal lapen akorte atum aphan Shekem anglong an phlung-lo, lapen halatum hadak do longledetpo.”
Puthot arni Shekem arat atum ahidi kedamji kechesik alam Abimelek chinidunlo,

lasi la amethang amonit cheponsi songthom chethak-lo, lapen hidi ajo chepatujoisi, inghong ding-lo. Rat atum rongsopi nangkebar la kethek-long ahut halatum aphan la kepathijisi la kechepatu adim pen nangbarlo.
Abimelek lapen la asong atum dam paprapsi rongsopi anghap ketondam ahut kaprek songni atum rat aphuthak hidi along tengkhengsi halatum kedo-an aphan pathi-et-lo.
Lasonsi chedanlo. Abimelek rongsopi cheparidengsi la kedo-an amonit pathilo, la ingsek-lo, lapen ingti pen longle dipthip-lo.
Shekem along paisong kedo ne-ne amonit laso alam arjulong pen halatum Baal akechejok akardomhem arum angdeng chepachong damlo.
Halatum hadaksi chingrumlo pu Abimelek aphan thanlo,
lasi la arludamlo Zalmon anglong anat amonit atum pen. Hadak la cho epak ensi thengpi aro chorlo, lapen aphang along aphrang asonthot kepaprap pen paklemtoilo.

Lasi halatum abangphutin ta thengpi eroro chorrep-lo; lapen halatum Abimelek aphi aphi dunlo lapen latum arum angdeng anat buihup-lo. Latum la aputhak me keichok-lo, lapen la arlo kedo arat aphan pen pen lapen arum angdeng kedo arat an thi-et-lo, suri isi anbak apinso-arlo dolo.
Ansi Abimelek, Thebez anat damsi rongsopi komchenlo lapen la cheraidet-lo.
Hadak hemchardon kethe do, lapen rongsopi abangphutin pinso-arlo, jalin atum jokta laso along kat-lo. Halatum arlo pen chingkirhetsi sarnung angsong arlulo.
Abimelek hemchardon aphan ketengkhengjisi vang-lo, la me kekaijisi angsong arlulo.
Bonta inut a-arloso la aphuthak him kekoi-i a-arlong varsi la aphu varrop-lo.

Anke la risim ke-otdun ariso aphan hang paprapsi hukum pilo, “Nang nokjir chesanra ne pathinon. Inut a-arlososi nephan kepathilo pu ne papuji ninghanghe.” Lasi riso abang serak pen chut-lut-lo, lapen la thilot-lo.
Israel atum Abimelek kethi thek-longsi, halatum ahem chedamlo.
Lapusonsi Arnam, Abimelek apo abe thursi bang 70 akorte aphan kepathi keklem kechokche apot alar huilo.
Shekem arat aphanta halatum kehingno apot Arnam pasung-lo. Gideon asopo Jotham kepu ahirjuno kepi asonthotsi halatum plang-lo.
Abimelek thidet aphi Puah asopo, lapen Dodo asupo Tola, la Israel aphan kepajokjisi vang-lo. La ke Isaakar akhei pen lapen Ephraim Anglong alongri Shamir si do.
La ningkan 23, Israel atum ajalin plang-lo. Ansi la thilo lapen Shamir along pip-lo.
Tola aphi Jair Gilead pen vang-lo. La Israel aphan ningkan 22 jalo.
La asomar bang 30 do, lapen jon 30 agadha ardonlo. Halatum Gilead along rongsopi 30 dolo, lahei Jair arong pusi nonputa pu.
Jair thilo lapen Kamon along pip-lo.
Puthot Israel atum Baal-heihei, lapen Astartes lapen Siria, Sidon, Moab, Ammon lapen Philistia atum a-arnam-heihei aphan karchodun pen ajok
Lasi
Ningkan 18 Amor adet kedo Jordan Aroi anihang anat Gilead alongri Israel an aphan chenek-lo, lapen pasung-lo.
Ammon atum Jordan hatsi Judah, Benjamin lapen Ephraim akhei aphan chedanjisi damlo. Israel atum sungpik khangjang-lo.
Ansi Israel atum
Sidon, Amalek, Maon atum aphrang nangchenek-lo, lapen nangtum nephan choningrilo. Ne nangtum aphan nangpajokje langma?
Bonta nangtum non anta ne-o bomlang lapen kaprek arnam aphansi archo bomlang, lasi Ne puthot nangtum aphan nang pajokjelo.
Nangtum kechongvai tang arnam alongle damra choningrinon. Nangtum kesung ahut halatumle nangpajok dunlo nang.”
Bonta Israel arat atum
Lasi halatum bang adet a-arnam che-osi
Anke Ammon aron asong kechedanjisi chesik-lo, lapen Gilead along amukam chekimlo. Israel atum anta chepangrum-petsi Gilead alongri Mizpah along mukam chekimlo.
Hadak Israel arat lapen ajalin atum lahin lahin charjuseroilo, “Komatsi Ammon anat kechedanji kejaponpoma? La keklem aling abang Gilead along kedo-an aphuthak keja abang plangpo.”
Jephthah ke Gilead asor inut angthin kethe amonit lapen la inut beisapi aso lapen apo ke Gilead lo.

La apo Gilead lapen la apiso pen kaprek asomarta dolang lapen latum the-ding-lo, latum Jephthah aphan hem pa-obor-itoilo. Halatum la aphan pulo, “Netum apo pen nang thangta nanglong dundelo; nangke akaprek a-arloso aso ke.”
Jephthah akorte atum pen katjuisi Tob alongrisi dodamlo. Hadak keningjoino esong amonit aphan la ningpadoksi la aphi aphi halatum paduntoilo.
La penang an aphi Ammon atum Israel abethursi ron chedan damlo.
La plangdet aphi Gilead ajalin atum Jephthah aphan Tob alongri pen vandet-lo.
Halatum pulo, “Vangnon, netum aphan janon, anke netum Ammon atum pen chedan unpo.”
Bonta Jephthah thak-lo, “Nangtum nephan lapu-an hijimlo, nangtum nepo ahem pen nephan pache-onang-lo. Nangtum kesung ahut kopisi nelong kevang nangjilang?”
Halatum Jephthah aphan pulo, “Netum nang nat non patebok-lo, pima nang netum along dun pen Ammon pen chedanpo lapen Gilead arat aphuthak japo.”
Jephthah halatum aphan thak-lo, “Nangtum jongsi nephan hem nangpon pen Ammon atum pen chedan nangji lapen
Halatum thak-rappet-lo, “Netum laso along chedonsarlo.
Lasi Jephthah, Gilead ajalin atum along dunlo, lapen rat atum la aphan halatum aphuthak pangribang lapen jalin paplang-lo. Jephthah ke Mizpah along
Anke Jephthah apherangke atum Ammon arecho aphan papudamtoilo, “Kopisi nang netum pen kechebohong-lo? Kopi athesi nang netum adet tengkheng-loma?”
Ammon arecho Jephthah apherangke atum aphan thak-lo, “Israel atum Ijip Aroi pen Jabok Aroi lapen Jordan Aroi an endet-lo. Non la la nangning ingsamjin pen nangvoi nangji.”
Ammon along Jephthah phe-rangke toithulo,
lapen alangliphan laso alam pulo, “Israel atum Moab mate Ammon alongle ke-en pu alam ke ahok kali.
Keplangtang alam lahelo: Israel atum Ijip ke-o ahut halatum sangti mili ajo pen ha Akaba ataloso an lapen Kadesh an vang-lo.

Anke halatum hukum kehangjisi Edom arecho aphan alangli alongle angbong kehatput longji aphan pherangke toilo. Bonta Edom arecho halatum aphan padam longledet-lo. Latum Moab arecho aphanta arjulo, bonta alanglita alongle angbong latum aphan padam longledet-lo. Lasi Israel atum Kadesh along sa nangkok-lo.
