Ansi puthot latum sangtimili ajo angbong damthulo, Edom alongle lapen Moab alongle arei-rei ha Moab alongle anihang anat, la paraike Arnon Aroi anat nanglelo. Hadak latum mukam chekimlo, bonta latum Arnon Aroi hat-hedet-lo, pima la Moab alongle ahoilo.
Ansi Israel atum Sihon, la Amor akhei Heshbon arecho along pherangke toilo, la adet vurput pen ha amethang adet kechedamji aphan parjudamlo.
Bonta Israel atum aphan Sihon la paklem longledet-lo. La kedo-an ron asong vanrap-petsi Jahaz along mukam kimlo, lapen Israel aphan tengkheng-lo.
Bonta Israel atum a-Arnam
Latum Amor atum kedo-an alongri pen nitur Arnon anat pen ha Jabbok anirep an lapen sangtimili ajo pen nihang anat, Jordan anichi anat cheraidet-lo.
Lasi lake Israel a-Arnam,
Nang keche-en thudetji putong kebor-i ma? Nang arnam Chamosh ko-ansi nangphan nangpiloma la ansi nang enlongchotji. Bonta netum ke netum a-Arnam
Zippor asopo Balak, la Moab arecho aphan mute nang memu putong nang chemathama? La Israel abethurthe kalima? La netum abethursi ron nang chedanloma?
Ningkan 300 Israel atum Heshbon lapen Aroer, lapen la adung arei arong lapen Arnon Aroi akung kedo arongsopi kedo-an cherailo. Kopi athesi pu-an arni nang kedojoilo?
Kali, ne thangta nangphan kehingno klemkle. Ne puthot ron kechedan pen ajok nang kehingno klemtang-lo.
Bonta Ammon arecho laso Jephthah abirta aputhak thangnat ano chedendedet-lo.
Anke
aphan Jephthah chechak-lo: “Nang jongsi Ammon aphuthak nephan pahailongdet lote,
nephan nekechetongjira nehem pen nangkebar abangphu aphan ke isi athok asonsi ne nangphan nangpajir-detpo.”
Lasi Ammon atum pen kechedanjisi Jephthah langroi hatpet-lo, lapen
Latum aphan la Aroer pen ha Minnith adung-arei alongri an rong 20 arongsopi an, lapen ha Abel Keramim an pathilo. Hadak thedung akethu-kethat dolo, lapen Ammon atum aphan Israel atum paremdet-lo.
Mizpah along Jephthah ahem kechevoi ahut hadak asopi laphan kechetong damjisi nangkanbomlo lapen prakso nangthipbomsi vangbomlo. Bangpi ke la inutnat asopilo.
Labangpi aphan la kethek-long ahut, la aningke-oi pen ape chingseksi pulo, “Oh Pei! Nang nening paphukdak-lo! La kopi athesi nening paso binong-loma? Ne
Bangpi la aphan pulo, “Nangli jongsi

Bonta bangpi apo aphan arjulo, “La eson neliphan klemnon. Neli inutpet chiklo jonni nepadolongtha, anke nelijirpi atum pen inglong anat damthap longpo, lapen neli penan dode pen kethinang apot ningridampo.”
Alangli bangpi aphan padamtoilo, bangpi lapen bangpi ajirpi atum inglong-heihei arludamsi ningridamlo, pima la penan dode lapen aso avepin pensi thinangpo.
Chiklo jonni aphi bangpi apo along chevang-lo. La
La helo Israel angbong jutang keplang-lo,
okarjang atum niphli aningkanvang ingtan dampo, Gilead along Jephthah asopi aphan keningripidam.

Ephraim amonit atum ron kechedanjisi chesik-lo; halatum Jordan Aroi hatsi Zaphon anat damsi Jephthah aphan pulo, “Ammon atum pen nang ron kechedan kedam ahut netum nanglong kedunji aphan nehanghepin pen kopisi ahoi kehat ponloma? Nangphu athak netum hem kei-etji!”
Bonta Jephthah halatum aphan pulo, Nemonit atum lapen Ammon angbong thedung kechebohong dolo. Ne nangtum aphan nanghang-lo, bonta halatum pen nephan nangtum nepajok unjima?
Nangtum nangdunde pu ne thek-long pen nepran ne chesongdut-lo, lapen halatum pen kechedanjisi ahoi hatpet-lo, lapen
Anke Jephthah Gilead amonit kedo-an pangrumpet-lo, Ephraim atum pen chedansi halatum aphan paremdet-lo. (Ephraim atum pulo, nangtum Gilead asor nangtum Ephraim lapen Manasseh pen kekat atum!)

Ephraim asor kekat longledetjisi Gilead asor Jordan kehat meme adim an cheparideng-et-lo. Ephraim asor lang kehat pen kekatji kebor-i ahut Gilead asor pen kehat longji aphan hukum chohang nangpo, lapen Gilead asor latum aphan arjupo, “Nangtum Ephraim asorma? La jongsi ‘kali’ pu thak-lote,
halatum la aphan ‘Shibboleth’ pu paputoipo”

Bonta la “Sibboleth” pu si puthekchotpo, pima la labangso athe pachondak thekthe. Anke halatum la aphan phlungdunpo lapen laphan elongbak Jordan kehat along pathilo. Halaso ahut bang suri 42 an Ephraim asor thinang-lo.
Jephthah Israel aphan ningkan throk jalo. Ansi la thilo lapen Gilead along ahem methang arongsi pip-lo.
Jephthah aphi, Bethlehem pen Ibzan, Israel atum aphan jalo.

La bang 30 asopomar lapen bang 30 asopimar dolo. La asopimar atum aphan amethang akur angbongsi penan chopilo lapen arloso bang 30 akur angtan pen vansi asopomar atum aphan achor ripilo. Ibzan, Israel atum aphan ningkan 7 jalo,
ansi la thi-lo lapen Bethlehem along laphan pip-lo.
Ibzan aphi, Elon, la Zebulun pen Israel atum aphan ningkan kep jalo.
Ansi la thi-lo lapen Aijalon, la Zebulun alongri along laphan pip-lo.
Elon aphi Abdon, la Hillel asopo, Pirathon pen Israel atum aphan jalo.
La bang 40 asopomar atum dolo lapen bang 30 asumar dolo, latum jon 70 agadha ardonlo.
Abdon Israel atum aphan Ephraim alongri, Amalek atum anglong Pirathon alongsi pip-lo.
Puthot Israel atum
Halaso ahut inut amonit Manoah, la Zorah arong penlo. La Dan akhei inut bangphulo. Alangli piso oso chopathe longlelang.
apherangke labangpi aphan cheklang-lo lapen pulo, “Nang non anta oso chopathe longlelang, bonta nang prapjin pen so pinso inut chopathe longpo.
Che-ora drakha ahorlang ason an junri, lapen kecholongle a-ok an chori;

lapen nangso amahang thekdet aphi, nang laso achu nokso pen soisedet nangji, pima la mahang kethek arni pen Nazir mate Arnam aphan hodaitang-lo. La Israel aphan Philistia atum pen kepajok akam chengpo.”
Anke arloso abang damsi apenan aphan chethandamlo, “Inut Arnam amonit nelong vang-lo, la Arnam apherangke ason kelang pherememe, konat pentong kevang-lone ne arjuje, lapen la amenta nephan nethanthe.

Bonta ne oso chopathepo pu alam nephan thanlo lapen pinso a-ososi longji pu thanlo. La nephan drakha ahorlang mate lason kedo-an lapen kecholongle ason an chori pusi nephan than. Pima laso a-oso achethe dotik-ke Nazir asonsi Arnam aphan hodaitang-lo.”
Ansi Manoah
Arnam Manoah kehang ateng klempilo, lapen la apherangke arloso abang hidi ajo kangnilun ahut vangthulo. Labangpi apenan la along ave,
Lasi bangpi menmen katchong chongsi la aphan pulo, “Langtha! Aphrang arni nelong kevang amonit nephan nang cheklangthu lilo.”
Manoah thursi apiso aphi phi dunlo. La monit along damsi arjulo, Nangli heloma nelipiso aphan kepu abang?
Kalang-lo! Pusi alangli thak-lo.
Ansi Manoah arjulo, “Nangli kepu ateng chekok lote, oso kopisi klemnangji? Lapen kopuson akaisi la do-thak nangji?”
Drakha arikang pen keplang ason an chochedet nangji; horlang mate arak-heihei jun nangne mate kecholongle ason an chonangnelo. Ne keputang ason an la klempet nangji.”
Manoah ke la
Bonta pherangke pulo, “Jongsi sangseta neli nanglitum a-an chochelo. Bonta nangli jongsi la sikji pulote, la
Manoah arju-lo, “Nelitum aphan nanglimen nangchethan iktha, ansi nanglilam chekok lote nangliphan nelitum man pithekpo.”
Pherangke arjulo, “Nelimen chinite kopi chonghoipo? Lake isi manghumeme amen.”
Lasi Manoah bi aloso ponsi ajehak asok lapen lahei arlong adovan along manghumeme akam-heihei keklem a-
Dovan pen me ade thek-longsi, Manoah lapen apiso,
Manoah ansi monit abangphan
Manoah apiso aphan chepulo, “Etum thinangvekpo, pima etum Arnam aphan thek-long-lok-lo!”
Bonta la apiso thak-lo, “Etum a-
Arloso abang pinso a-oso mahang pathek-lo, lapen amen Semson pusi irlo.
A-oso thebomlo lapen Eshtaol angbong Dan amukam along kedo ahut
Arnisi Semson Timnah anat hirdamlo, hadak inut Philistia a-arloso aphan amek bonlok-lo.
La hem chevoisi apei-apo aphan chethan damlo, “Hadak Timnah along inut Philistia a-arloso do, la nemek pabonlok-lo. Nephan nehangpi damnon; ne bangpi pen chepangripo.”

Bonta la apei-apo laphan arjulo, “Piso ke-enji aphan kopisi nang kekroikre a-Philistia atum along kedam nangpo? Nang methang amonit angbong, methang akur angbong nang inutbak a-arloso chelong thekthe detloma?”
Bonta Semson apo aphan chepulo, “Bangpi helo nang nephan nangkevanpi nangji. Ne laphan ningdok-olo.”
La api apo atum Semson aphan
Lasi Semson apo-apei pen Timnah hirdamlo. Latum dambomsi drakha aberi ajo hadak phodamlok-lo, la hingho aloso ejon kangrong arjulong-lo.
Menmen amat
Anke la damsi arloso chingkidamlo, lapen bangpi aphan la aningdok-lo.

Aphi la bangpi aphan kepangrijisi la damlo. Tovar kedam ahut la kepathitang ahingho chelangtekang-lo, lapen thek-longsi manghuhak-lo, pima pijo ahur lapen ajehak pijo alang kethitang arpum arlo thek-long-lo.

La ari chephuthorsi kedambom ahut pijo alang cho ponbomlo. Ansi la apo-apei along chedamlo, lapen ajehak latum aphanta pilo. Latum la cholo, bonta Semson pijo alang hingho akethi arpum pensi entang-lo pu la thanthedet-lo.
La apo arloso ahem damlo, lapen Semson hadak kecho-kejun pilo. Lake risomar atum nimrokomlo.
Philistia atum laphan thek-lok pen latum bang 30 ariso atum la along pasangdunlo.

Semson halatum aphan pulo, “Ne nangtum aphan tomopatar pen ethe nang arjulang. Nangtum jongsi nephanla athe kecho-kejun ni throksi angbong nethan thek pulote abangphutin aphan pe-kanglit lapen keche-um ape nangpiji.
Lapen nangtum jongsi nephan nethan thekthe pulote nangtum anut-tinta pe kanglit lapen keche-um ape epak pak nephan nepinangji.”
Halatum pulo, “Nang tomopatar nethannon, la arjuhur lonang.”
Alangli pulo,
“Kecho abang pen kechome ason nangklang-lo Kangtangnei pen akedok nangbarlo.”
Nithom aphi anta latum tomopatar athe thakthek vangvedet-lo.

Phli arni halatum Semson apiso aphan pulo, “Netum aphan tomopatar athe nangpathanjile nangpenan aphan moinon. Nang jongsi la klemkle pulote, nangpo ahem netum me kaidutji, lapen la along nangphrindutji. Nangtum banghini netum aphan kephangnojisi nekephama?”
Lasi Semson apiso chiru-chirusi la along damlo lapen pulo, “Nang nephan ne inghonhe! Nang nephan hijimlo! Nang nephan la athe alam nethanthepin pen nangjirpo atum aphan tomopatarlo!”
Alangli pulo, “Ne nepei nepo aphanta la thanthelang. Kopi athesi ne nangphan nangkethan nangpo?”
Bangpi chojun ni throksi arni anta laso aputhak chirulo. Bonta ni throksi arni labangpi aphan tomopatar athe thanlo, pima bangpi laphan nir-e-khangjang-lo. Anke bangpi Philistia atum aphan thanserlo.
Lasi throksi arni, Semson mek-kejang angdeng damde aphrang, rongsopi amonit atum laphan pulo,
“Pijo alang pen apar kedokmu kopisi kedolang?
Hingho pen apar kopisi kangtangnei kedolang?”
Semson thak-lo,
“Nangtum jongsi ne chainong api pen haibaibe pulote,
Non anta nangtum nangthak thekthejilang.”
Men men amat
lapen apiso ke kepangri arni kecheri ajirpo aphansi halatum pidet-lo.
Penang an aphi sok-tipli kerot ahut Semson apiso along chedamlo lapen bi aso ejon bangpi aphan ponpilo. La ahupo aphan pulo, “Ne nepiso angdeng kedamji nening hang-lo.”
Bonta laphan arlo padam longledet-lo.
Alangli Semson aphan pulo, “Nangli bangpi aphan hijimlo, pusi mathathip-lo, lasi neli bangpi nangjirpo aphan pidet-lo. Bonta bangpi amu akebi abang jat seta memuchot. Alar nangli halaphan en tame.”
Semson pulo, “Non ephong Philistia atum aphan ne kopima keklem nedai ave!”
Lasi la damlo lapen jon 300 aserung nep-lo. Jonni-ni arme ingnangsi thengtom-heihei kokdunlo.
Anke la thengtom along me keidunlo lapen Philistia atum ahidi-heihei ajo lodampak-lo. Lasonsi la kerottang asok me pacho-et lapu anchot kali hidi adang asok lapen jit aberi anta me pacho-et-lo.

Philistia atum charjulo, la komatsi keklemloma pu, aphi Semsonsi la klemlo pu halatum chinilo. Pima la ahupo, Timnah amonit, Semson ajirpo aphan Semson apiso pidet-lo. Lasi Philistia atum dampaksi arloso aphan me phrindut-lo, lapen labangpi apo ahemta me keidut-lo.
Semson halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum lason keklem apot, laso alar ne nanghui longletik ne nang-o-e!”
Halatum aphan la aningthihak si tengkheng-lo lapen ongdung halatum aphan pathilo. Ansi la chedamlo lapen Etam alongku athak chepatudamlo.
Philistia atum vang-lo lapen Judah along mukam chekimlo lapen Lehi pu arong tengkheng-lo.
Judah amonit atum halatum aphan arjulo, “Nangtum kopi athesi netum aphan ketengkheng-lo?”
Halatum thak-lo, “Netum Semson aphan nepsi kebengchokji aphan vang-lo, lapen la netum aphan keklem asonthotsi laphanta klempo.”
Lasi bang suri kethom a-Judia amonit atum Etam alongku along damsi Semson aphan pulo, “Philistia atum ke etum aphuthak kepangri atumlo pu nang chininema? Nang netum aphan kopisi keklempor loma?”
La thak-lo, “Latum nephan keklem asonthotsi neta latum aphan klemlo.”
Halatum pulo, “Netum ladak kevangke netum nangphan nangkok pontansi halatum arideng nang kehodaijipu.”
Semson thak-lo, “Nangtum nephan nepathithe pura nephan lam chechaknon.”
Chechak-lo, netum nangphan nang ingnangchotji lapen halatum arideng nang hodaichotji. Netum nangphan nang pathithelo; pusi halatum thak-lo,
Lasi halatum laphan arri akemi rini pen ingnang-lo lapen longku pen vandet-lo.
La Lehi alongle sok pen Philistia atum la anat nangkatsi la aphan hangprak-lo. Menmen
Anke la nonhet kethitang agadha akecheng thek-long-lo. La ingkupsi humlo, lapen la pen bangsuri isi amonit pathilo.
Lasi Semson lunlo,
Ejon agadha akecheng pen ne bangsuri isi amonit pathilo;
Ejon agadha akecheng pen ne lahei abui builo.
Laso aphi la akecheng arrepi varchorlo. La keplang adim ke Ramath Lehi pusi irlo.
Ansi Semson lang ingitpik-lo, lasi la
Lasi Lehi along
Philistia atum Israel aphuthak kepangri ahut Semson ningkan 20 Israel aso aphan jalo.
Arnisi Semson Philistia arongsopi Gaza damlo, hadak inut abeisapi chetong-lo lapen la pen irap-rap-lo.

Semson hadaksi dolo pu Gaza arat atum chinilo, lasi halatum adim komchen lo lapen rongsopi anghap along jopangthang laphan inghongding-lo. Halatum jopangthang dojoijailo, lapen mathalo, “Arnikevang an etum inghong-lonang, anle etum la aphan pathilonang.”

Bonta Semson hadak jirlo achitim ansi dochot-lo. Anke la thursi rongsopi anghap ot-loksi la angsong rungtang-lo, inghapso-heihei, anujok-heihei, kangkir ason kedo-an penpen la halahei aphan athak batkoksi halahei inglong angsong atovar soding Hebron anglong angdenchit anglong an ponlo.
Laso aphi, Semson inut a-arloso Delilah pu amen pen aningchedok-lo, la Sorek arloksi kedo.

Philistia arecho bangpho labangpi adung damsi pulo, “Semson kopisi pu-an kangtangma nangkepathan-jile moinon lapen etum laso aphuthak chepahai pen la aphan ingnanghetsi thangta pacheplang un-edet lonang. Netum abangphutin ta nangphan rup angkleng dum pharokre-isi nangpiji.”
Lasi Delilah Semson aphan pulo, “Kanghon pen nang kopisi lapu-an kangtangthek loma nethantha. Jongsi mane nangphan ingnanghet pen thangta nangphan paklem un-edetji pulote, la kopusonsi keklemnangpo?”
Semson thak-lo, “Halatum jongsi ri throksi thai arri kemi kekrengkre kepacherop pen ne ingnanghet lote neta bang asonthakthak jakong avedetpo.”
Lasi Philistia arecho atum Delilah aphan thai arri ri throksi vanpilo, la kekrengkre, lapen labangpi Semson aphan ingnanghet-lo.

La bangpi kaprek angdeng along ajehak amonit padolo; lasi bangpi hangchirlo, “Semson! Philistia atum vangtang-lo!” Bonta thai arri-heihei me kephole kechingtopet asonsi la padakprup-prup-lo. Lasi halatum la ajakong kepatu alam chininedet-lo.
Delilah, Semson aphan pulo, “Langtha, nang nephan nechongthuisi ahok alam nethanthe lilo. Kanghon pen kopusonsi bang nangphan nang-ingnang unjima? Nethantha.”
La thak-lo, “Mane jongsi nephan ke-en-epin arri pen ne ingnang lote, neta bang kaprek atum ason thak-thaksi jakong avedetpo.”

Lasi Delilah mirak arri lang-lo lapen la aphan ingnanghet-lo. Ansi labangpi hangchirlo, “Semson! Philistia atum vangtang-lo!” Monit atum angdeng kaprek si dopet-lo. Bonta ari kerak-i arri honjengso asonsi padakprup-lo.
Delilah Semson aphan pulo, “Nang non anta nephan nangchong-thui bomlang lapen ahok alam nethanthe lilo. Nangphan kopusonsi bang kaprek atum nang ingnanghet thekpoma nethantha.”
La thak-lo, “Nang jongsi nechu klei throksi therang pen thak raphet-ra kurdang pen la rak-rap-het lote neta bang kaprek atum asonsi jakong avedetpo.”

Delilah la aphan padoksi amek pajang-lo, lapen chu klei throksi ensi lahei therang pen thak rap-het-lo. Bangpi la kurdang pen rak-hetsi hangchirlo, “Semson! Philistia atum vangtang-lo!” Bonta la amek prang-lo lapen achu therang pen chepajok-lo.

Lasi laphan bangpi pulo, “Nang nephan chinghonlo pu kopusonsi kepu unpo, nang la angthek nepaklangkle-det-lang. Nang nephan batai kethom nechongthui tang-lo, lapen non anta nang kopusonsi ingtanglong loma nephan nethanthe-lang.”
Bangpi la aphan arnivangta arjuverlo. Laso aputhak bangpi la aphan arjuver amatsi la dosojolo,

kejut ke labangpi aphan la ahok alam thanserlo, “Nechu kaita ingtipte pinlang, “ la pulo, “Ne mahang kethek arni pen Nazir asonsi nephan Arnam arideng hodaidet-lo. Nechu jongsi ingtip-lo pulote, nejakong avedetpo lapen bang atum ason thakthak nejakong avedetpo.”

La ahok alamsi thangtang-lo pu Delilah chinidet aphi bangpi Philistia arecho atum aphan birta pathandam toilo, lapen pulo, “Vangnon puthot ephong, la nephan ahok alam nang chethandet-lo.” Ansi halatum vang-lo lapen tangka ta halatum along chevanlo.
Semson aphan Delilah padoksi amek pajang-lo arbak-het-lo, lapen inut amonit aphan hangsi achu aklei throksi ingtip-lo.
Ansi bangpi hangchirlo, “Semson! Philistia atum vangtang-lo!” La amek prang-lo lapen mathalo, “Aphrang ason thak-thaksi ne chepajokphlotsi dampo.”
Philistia la aphan nepchek-lo lapen amek hini hor-et-lo. Halatum laphan ha Gaza pondetsi tam-angchin pen ingnanghet-lo, lapen kebeng angdeng along la aphan sok-ketok akor along sok patok-lo.
Bonta la achu chingjokthulo.
Philistia arecho atum an halatum a-arnam Dagon aphan isi thedung athok kepiji lapen ketalonjisi chingrumlo. Halatum lunlo, “Netum a-arnam netum ahotur Semson aphuthak kehaiji ajakong nepilo.”

Halatum amethang aning chepajangsi halatum pulo, “Semson aphan hangnon, lapen la etum aphan ening-parongjile paklem nang!” Semson aphan kebeng angdeng pen kevan ahut halatum aphan aning-parongjisi halatum Semson aphan paklemtoilo, lapen nujokpi hongni adak parjaptoilo.

La aphan rat atum kethek-long pen halatum a-arnam aphan chorolo: “Netum alongle kepavir abang lapen ongdung netum aphan kepathi abang, netum ahotur aphuthak kehaiji ajakong netum a-arnam nepitang-lo!”
Ari otding pen kejapon a-oso aphan Semson pulo, “Hemthengsong aphan karchak anujokpi adung nebinon, Ne hadak charchunglang.”
Hem thengsong pinso arlo pen plengset-lo. Hadak bangpho Philistia arecho atum dolo, lapen sarnung angsong pinso arlo bang suri kethom anbak dolo, halatum aning keparong a-Semson aphan lang-lo.

Anke Semson ardomlo, “Keklem un Arnam, kanghon pen ne mathatha, kanghon pen Arnam, nephan non ephong jakong nepitha, anke ne ephong akangbai pen nemek hini nekehor a-Philistia atum aphan alar huilongpo.”
Lasi Semson hem karchak angbong anujokpi hini aphan pu pu ari ehong-hong lahei aphan ingbailo

lapen hangserlo, “Philistia atum pen pen pathinang!” La ajakong kedo-an pen ingbailo lapen hem recho bangpho lapen akaprek kedo-an aphuthak krep-lo. Kerenglang akai ahut mute kethi ahutsi Semson rat aphan kepathi ongmulo.

La a-ik atum lapen la adon arap nanghirsi la abang arpum keponjisi vang-lo. La aphan latum pondet-lo lapen la aphan Zorah lapen Eshtaol angbong, apo Manoah athiri along pip-lo. La ningkan 20 Israel atum aphan jalo.
Ephraim anglong alongri inut Mikah pu amonit ihut isi dolo.
La apei aphan pulo, “Nangrup angkleng dum 1100 mane nangpen kechonghu ahut, kanghu aphan nang ahirjuno hangpilo. Ne arjulong-lo nang la klemlo. Langtha, nelong tangka dolo. Nehelo kepon abang-lo.”
La apei pulo, “Arnam nangpahirjume nang, po!”
La apei aphan tangka voithulo, lapen bangpi pulo, “Ahirjuno nesopo aphuthak keklokledetji aphan, ne ning aklong pen
Ako la apei aphan lahei pithudet-lo. Bangpi ingkleng 200 ponsi kepachor abang aphan lahei pilo, la thengpi akumlin soi pamesi athak rup top-het-lo. La Mikah ahemsi bilo.
Laso a-Mikah amethang kardomji adim do. La ajehak akumlin-heihei lapen arlo-achoi selamlo, lapen osomar angbong inut aphan kurusar bat-lo.
Halaso ahut Israel atum arecho avelang; abangphutin ta aningkehang alingsi klemlo.
Halaso ahut inut a-Levi ariso Judah alongsi kaprek kedojisi Bethlehem arong along dolo.
La along kaprek kedojisi Bethlehem otekang-lo. Kedambom un ahut la Ephraim anglong alongri Mikah ahem nanglelo.
Mikah laphan arjulo, “Nangli konat pensi kevang-lo?”
Alangli thak-lo, “Neli ke Judah adet Bethlehem pensi kevang. Neli along kaprek kedojisi kechori.”
Mikah pulo, “Nelitum along nangdo dunnon. Neli Thanparebang lapen kurusar plangnon, lapen ningkan isi nangliphan neli rup angkleng dumkep lapen ajehak pe-ri, lapen an nangpipo.”
Riso a-Levi Mikah along kedo dunji chedon dunlo lapen la asopo ason cheplang-lo.
Mikah la aphan kurusar bat-lo, lapen la Mikah ahemsi dolo.
Mikah pulo, “Non neli inut a-Levi akurusar dolo, lapen neli chini

Halaso ahut Israel atum arecho avelang. Halaso ahut Dan akhei ta amethang alongrilo pu kechepu longji aphan ribomlo, lapen kecheraiji aphan pima Israel akhei angbong halatum amethang alongle pu chepudun longlelang.

Lasi Dan akhei ahemtun kedo-an angbong pen bangpho kethekser atum ingvailo lapen halatum aphan longle keparijisi Zorah lapen Eshtaol arong pen toilo. Halatum Ephraim anglong alongri nanglesi Mikah ahem nanglesi sang-lo.
Halatum hadak kedo ahut Levi riso ase halatum chinidet-lo, lasi latum la along damlo lapen arjulo, “Nangli ladak kopisi keklemlo? Nangliphan ladak komatsi nangkevanlo?”
La thak-lo, “Neli Mikah pen chechak-et-lo, la neliphan akurusar asonsi tangka nelipipo.?”
Laphan halatum pulo, “Kanghon pen Arnam aphan ne-arjupitha, neli-tum kedambom akam chunji mene?”
Kurusar thak-lo, “Nanglitum thangta mathanangne.

Lasi bangpho amonit atum osi Laish arong anat damlo. Halatum hadak kedo arat atum aphan ko-an jokvan pensi dolong-loma thek-long-lo, Sidon kedo atum asonthak-thak-lo. Latum ning ingsamjinjan, dojoijai arat, kaprek penta kecharvo ave; latum kenangji ason an latum do. Latum Sidon asor pen kedo helovinglang lapen kaprek atum pen thangnat akecherap ave.
Bangpho amonit Zorah lapen Eshtaol nangkechele ahut, halatum dorap-rap atum arjulo, halatum kopisi kelong-loma pu.
“Vangnon,” halatum thak-lo, “Etum Laish tengkheng-lonang. Netum longle thek-long-lo, la mepik. Dak thangta kavepin adim donangne; paprapnon! Damra la cheraidam lonang!
Nangtum hadak lelote nangtum thek-longpo halatum jat ason aputhakta ningbi nangne. La thedung adet, inut amonit kopima kenangji la dolo lapen Arnam nangtum aphansi la nangkepilo.”
Lasi bang pharo throk Dan akhei Zorah lapen Eshtaol olo, latum kechedanjisi chesik-lo.
Judah alongri Kiriath Jearim along halatum damsi mukam chekimlo. La apotsi nonputa laso adim Dan Amukam pusi pubomlo.
Halatum hadak pen dambomsi Ephraim alongri anglong Mikah ahem vang-lo.

Ansi Laish adung arei alongle kelang bangpho atum ari asangho atum aphan pulo, “Ladak hem-heihei angbong ehum ahem along isi thengpi akumlin, rup pensi ketop, nangtum chinima? Hadak kaprek kaprek akumlin-heihei lapen kurusar achoita epak do. Nangtum ateng ke etum kopisi klem nangji?
Lasi latum Mikah ahem Levi riso kedo adim damlo lapen Levi aphan arjulo, la kosonsi dobomma pu.
Halaso ahut amat Dan akhei pen bang 600 ron aso atum ron kechedanjisi inghap along arjapding-lo.

Laso ahut kurusarke bang 600 arisimkedo amonit atum along kedo un ahut bangpho kelangjoi atum hem lutdamthorsi rup pen ketop athengpi akumlin, kaprek akumlin-heihei lapen kurusar achoi anta ponpi-et-lo.”
Monit atum Mikah ahem arlo lutdam pen kepangthir ahormu kepon ahut, kurusar halatum aphan arjulo, “Nanglitum kopisi keklemlo?”
Halatum thak-lo, “Dojoi! Itheta ningjeri, netum along nangdunra netum akurusar lapen netum thanparebang plangnon. Edon ahem kurusar keplang tangdet ke Israel akhei akurusar keplang un-e-detji ma?”
Laso alam kurusar aphan aningpadok-lo, lasi la kepangthir ahormu-heihei ponsi halatum along dunjuilo.
Halatum pupu chelangsi kedamji pangcheng-lo, halatum apiso aso, kepangreng api lapen halatum ahormu-heihei paphrang-lo.
Mikah kechedanjisi adung arei aphan kehang un ahut halatum Mikah ahem pen kedam heloving an lo. Seta latum Dan amonit atum along phodunrok-lo.
Lapen latum Dan amonit atum aphan aningthilo, lapen halatum chetevarsi Mikah aphan pulo, “Kopi athesi la an kechebohong amonit kevanpak-lo?”
Mikah thak-lo, “Nangkopisi kepulo, ‘Kopi athelo pu kepu?’ Nangtum ne kurusar aphan lapen ne keselam a-arnam aphan pontang-lo! Nephan kopi asonsi ke-o ason kedolang?”
Dan amonit atum pulo, “Nang ethebakta ningjejedetsi akeme, kalite lahei amonit atum aningthisi nangphan tengkhengpo. Anke nang lapen nanghem isita thinang-etpo.”
Anke halatum dambomlo. Mikah thek-long-lo laphan mute halatum ingtangmu, lasi la chiruisi hem chedamjoilo.

Dan amonit atum kurusar lapen Mikah keselam ahormu-heihei pondet aphi, halatum damsi Laish, ingsamjinjan, kedojoijai arat la Beth-Rehob arlok arong asor aphan tengkheng-lo. Latum rong aso atum aphan pathilo, lapen rongsopi me keidut-lo.
Halatum aphan kepajokdunji baduta ave, pima Laish ke Sidon pen kedo cheheloving lang, lapen latum akaprek atum pen thangnatta kecherap ave. Dan amonit atum rong kimthusi hadak dolo.
Latum Laish aphan Dan pusi amen irlo, Jakob asopo Dan, halatum aphusar amen atengthot irlo.

Dan amonit atum karchojisi kumlin bat-lo lapen Jonathan, la Gershom asopo lapen Moses asupo dan akhei aphan Kurusar plang-lo, lapen la aso-asu atum latum aphan ban ponpetik an halatum akurusar asonsi ingduk-lo.
Lasi Arnam kardom apehem Shiloh along Mikah akumlin kaita doverlo.
Halaso ahut Israel atum arecho kedoji aphrang, inut a-Levi Ephraim anglong anosi dolo. La Judah alongri Bethlehem pen inut asopi ke-enpangtarji aphan ponlo,
bonta bangpi la aphan aningthisi Bethlehem apo ahem chedamjuilo, lapen hadak chiklo jonphli dolo.

Ansi pinso abang bangpi aphan kangthumdunjisi chesik-lo, lapen bangpi aphan hem kecheponjisi bor-ilo. La aban cheponlo lapen gadha jonni ta ponlo. Arloso abang Levi aphan hem arlo ponlo, lapen arloso apo la aphan thek-longsi aning arongpen kardom chepilo.
La aphan ajo kepadojisi apo abang khang-lo, lapen lasi la nithom salo. Penansota latum an chorap-rap-lo lapen ajo hadak dokok-lo.
Niphli adapprang latum thursi kedamji aphan chesik-lo. Bonta arloso apo Levi aphan pulo, “Kechengsi kecho ason chotha. La nangliphan mesenji. Laso aphile dam seta chok.”
Lasi banghini amonit ingnithujoilo lapen chorap-rap-lo, junrap-rap-lo. Anke arloso apo abang la aphan pulo, “Kanghon pen paningveta sakoknon lapen kedo ning chepajangtha.”
Levi abang kedamjisi thurlo, seta ahupo abang la aphan khangdunlo, lasi aningve kaprekta la hadak sakok-lo.
Pho adapprang la kebarjisi chesik-lo, bonta arloso apo abang pulo, “Kanghon pen pinene ason chotha. Penang an aphile damnon.” Lasi banghini amonit chothurap-rap-lo.

Pinso, la enpangtar apiso lapen aban atum puthot ke-oji aphan kechesik ahut ahupo abang pulo, “Langtha, non arni ingsamtang-lo; paningveta sathukoknon. La ingtingdappo, dak sakok-ra do cheparengme non. Penap adapprangle thurra hem chedamthunon.”
Bonta pinso abang puthot ajo kesangji aninghanghesi, la lapen la enpangtar apiso, halatum aban lapen agadha jonni athak hormu atilup pen pen halatum atovar chedamlo.
Halatum Jebusi (lake Jerusalem) adung nangkele ke keningvelo, lasi aban abang ahemphu aphan pulo, “Ilitum Jebusi arongsopi along-le ajo sadamkok-lonang.”
Bonta la ahemphu pulo, “Israel arat kalite etum badu arongsopi seta sanangnelo.
Etum damchot pen Gibeah anat Ramah along ajo sa lonang.”
Lasi latum Jebusi parsi halatum atovar chedamlo. Gibeah ke Benjamin alongri, along nangkele ke arni kangsamlo.
Latum hadak dam pen ajo kesangjisi tovar suilo. Halatum rongsopi arlo damlo lapen thedung atikup alongsi chongnidamlo, bonta baduta latum aphan ajo kepasangji aphan ponpelo.
Latum hadak kedo un ahut, inut asarbura hidi akam keklem pajutsi nangchevoilo. La ta aphrangke Ephraim anglong akeng-ri kedo abang-lo. bonta nonke la Gibeahsi dolo, (akaprek atum ke Benjamin akhei.)
Rongsopi atikup along arleng kesar abang dampri-dampro atum aphan thek-long-lo lapen arjulo, “Nanglitumke konat pensi kevang-loma? Konatsi kedampo?”

Levi abang thak-lo, “Nelitum Judah alongri Bethlehemsi kedo, lapen non nelitum methang ahem anatsi chedamji pusi Ephraim Anglong akeng-ri nanglerok-lo. Baduta nelitum aphan ajo kesangji aphan nehangponpe,
nelitum kecho ahormuta do, lapen ne ke-en-pangtar nelipiso, neliban aphan jokta him dolang. Nelitum kenangji ason an nelitum do.”
Arlengkesar pulo, “Nanglitum aphan nelihem ning aklong pen nanghang-lo! Neli nanglitum aphan langpo; nanglitum tikup along ajo pangthang nangnelo.”
Lasi la latum aphan amethang ahem cheponlo lapen halatum agadha aphanta pacholo. La alohi atum ari akeng chingroisi an cholo.

Halatum aning arong chepibom ahut menmen ajehak amek-kelangno atum rong pen vangpaksi hem kompet-lo lapen inghap theng-lo. Halatum akesar aphan pulo, “Nanglong nanghem nangkedun amonit ingtan vannon! Netum la pen kehingno akam choklempo!”
Bonta akesar abang ingtan nangbarsi halatum aphan pulo, “Kali jirpo atum! Kanghon pen lapuson kehingno a-ot kave akam klemri! Laso amonit ke nehem alohilo.

Langtha! Ladak la enpangtar apiso lapen nesopi inut okarjang dolo. Ne halatum aphan ingtan nangtoipo, lapen halatum aphan nangtum enlongpo. Halatum aphan nangtum kopima nangning kehang alingle klemnon, bonta lason kehingno akam laso amonit aphuthak klemri!

Bonta la aphan monit atum arjudun long-lo. Lasi Levi abang enpangtar apiso aphan ingtan halatum along bidunkok-lo. Jopangthang halatum bangpi aphan un an chonep-lo lapen chenek-ot-lo, ha ingthangthe tik an.”
Adapprang arloso abang apenan kedo adim akesar ahem anghap along charvak-o-lo. Arni kevang ahut anta bangpi hadaksi dolang.
Bangpi apenan adapprang thurlo, lapen hem kechedamjisi inghap ingpulo, lapen enpangtar apiso inghap angno tithorsi ari inghap ajakan along ke-otding thek-long-lo.
La pulo, “Thurnon! Etum damlonang.” Bonta la thakthedet-lo. Lasi bangpi abang arpum la agadha athak arthangsi ahem chedamlo.
La kechele ahut hem arlo damsi nokso epak endamlo. La enpangtar apiso abang arpum ensi, la beng krehini ingthanlo, lapen la athan Israel khei krehini aphan lolo.
Kethek-long abangphutin atum pujolo, “Netum lapuson arjulongle pinlang! Israel atum Ijip obub pen lapuson plangplepin lang! Laso aputhak etum pine klemvek nangji! La kopi apot-loma?”
Israel arat atum Dan anirep pen ha Beersheba anitur lapen Gilead anihang anta kehang atum an vangpet-lo. Mizpah along
Arnam arat kechingrum amei along Israel kedo-an akhei ajalin atum dopet-lo, lapen hadak lak-phli aron-aso do.
Halaso ahut Benjamin arat ta kaprek Israel kedo-an Mizpah along chingrumlo pu arjulong-lo.
Israel atum arjulo, “Kopusonsi laso kehingno akam keklem longpop loma netum aphan nethantha?”
Kepathitang enpangtar a-arloso apenan, Levi thak-lo, “Ne lapen enpangtar nepiso Gibeah, Benjamin alongri ajo kesadamjisi damlo.
Gibeah amonit atum neliphan ketengkhengjisi vangpak-lo lapen hem ajo kompet-lo. Latum neliphan kepathijisi aninghang-lo; la klemklesi enpangtar nepiso aphan latum chonep-lo lapen la thilot-lo.
Neli la abang arpum vandetsi beng-ilo, lapen Israel khei krehini aphan ebeng beng lorep-lo. Lahei amonit atum etum angbong isi kehingno lapen a-ot kave akam klemtang-lo.
Nanglitum dak kedo-anta Israel atumlo. Laso aputhak etum kopisi keklem nangji?”
Kedo-an arat atum thurpetsi puhurlo, “Etum kedo-an pehem tame, hem keme tame, ehem chedam nangnelo.
La helo etum keklem nangpo: Etum khadot pathulonang lapen ajehak amonit ingvaira Gibeah tengkheng lonang.
Israel angbong phankep pen ephan amonit ke ron armu amonit aphan an sik pipo lapen kaprek atum anke Gibeah damsi aduk pidam nangji, pima la a-ot kave akam Israel atum angbong latum klemtang-lo.”
Lasi kedo-an Israel amonit atum rong ketengkhengji esonnat athe pen chingrumpet-lo.
Israel atum Benjamin akhei alongri an pherangke toilo, “Kopisi lason kehingno akam nangtum keklemloma?

Gibeah along amek kelangno atum an nanghodainon anke netum halatum aphan pathilongpo, lapen Israel pen laso akehingno pakak longpo.” Bonta Benjamin arat atum kaprek Israel atum alam anocheden vangvedet-lo.
Kaprek Israel atum pen kechedanjisi rongsopi kedo-an pen Benjamin atum vangpak-lo.
Halaso arni latum arongsopi kedo-an pen bang suri 26 aron-aso hang-lo. Lapen apar Gibeah arongsopi kedo atum bang 700 keparvi amonit invailo.
Abangphutin ta halatum phamri pen arlong chujeng athek aphan varparothek lapen la kaita paroverthek.
Israel akhei kedo-an pen bang Lak phli kethantang aron-aso dolo.
Bethel, karcho adim Israel atum damlo lapen halatum hadak Arnam aphan arjulo, “Koloso akheisi ketengkheng cheng nangjima pu?”
Latum damsi Benjamin aron-aso armu ketengkhengjisi damlo lapen ron-aso atum rongsopi anatsi pangnolo.
Benjamin aron-aso armu rongsopi angtan nangbarsi arni chiche ako bang suri 22 Israel aron-aso aphan pathilo.
Ansi Israel atum karcho adim chedamsi
Latum alangliphan arjulo, “Netum akorte Benjamin abe kethur pen netum ron chedan damthu nangjima?”
Lasi Israel aron armu aning che-thelo lapen latum aron-aso atum aphan aphrang arni asonthot padolo.
Latum bataihini aphong Benjamin aron armu abethursi damlo.
bataihini aphong Benjamin aron armu atum Gibeah pen nangbarlo, lapen laso aphongta latum bangsuri 18 Israel kethantang aron-aso aphan pathilo.
Ansi kedo-an Israel arat atum Bethel along damsi ningri damlo.
Halaso ahut Arnam Kechejok Aloh amarjong Bethel alongsi do,
lapen Eleazar asopo, lapen Aaron asupo Phinehas si la chepahemphulo. Rat atum
Lasi Israel aso atum ajehak aron-aso Gibeah kompetsi chepatulo.
Ansi puthot nithom arni latum Benjamin aron-armu abethursi damlo lapen halatum aron-aso Gibeah anat pangnosi padolo, aphrang latum keklem asonthot klemlo.

Benjamin aso atum kechedanjisi vang-lo lapen rongsopi angtan nangbarlo. Aphrang asonsi halatum Israel aso aphan ajehak Bethel atovar anat lapen Gibeah atovar anat rong angbong pathi pangcheng-lo. Halatum bang 30 Israel aso aphan pathilo.
Benjamin aso atum chepulo, “Aphrang keklem asonthotsi etum halatum aphan sap-lo.”
Bonta Israel aso atum kecheruijisi lapen halatum aphan rongsopi pen tovar-heihei anat kejaponjisi mang-lo.
Lasi ongdung a-Israel aron-aso atum aphi chiruisi Baaltamar along chingrumlo, lapen Gibeah kekomchen amonit atum halatum kechepatu arongsopi komchen adim a-arlong-heihei pen damserak-lo.
Bang suri 10 Israel angbong kangvaipame amonit atum Gibeah tengkheng-lo lapen ron kechedan sikpik-lo. Benjamin aso atum virrang-lo pu chechininelang.
Benjamin atum aphuthak kepahaijisi
lapen Benjamin aso atum remtang-lo pu chechinilo.
Israel ongdung aron-armu Benjamin aso pen aphi chiruilo, pima halatum Gibeah komchen kechepatu amonit aphansi chikilo.
Lahei amonit Gibeah anat kat serak-lo; rongsopi arlo chethakjam-jamsi hadak abangphutin aphan pathilo.
Ongdung Israel aron-armu atum lapen kechepatu armu atum angthek chepilo. Halatum rongsopi pen mehi angpong kethek-long pen,
rong angkang kedo a-Israel atum chepangnolo. Halaso ahut Benjamin atum bang 30 a-Israel aphan pathitang-lo. Halatum chepulo, “Chenamsi etum aphrang asonthotsi halatum aphan sap-lo.”
Anke angthek klang-lo; rong, Benjamin aso atum halatum aphi chelang-lo lapen manghuhak-lo lapen rongsopi me kecho ade saidelo.
Anke Israel atum chepangnohamlo, lapen Benjamin aso atum sungkrung-lo, pima halatum chechinilo, latum virrang-lo pu.
Halatum Israel atum pen aphi chiruilo lapen hidi ajo kat-lo, bonta halatum chepajok un-edet-lo. Halatum ongdung aron-armu lapen rongsopi nangkebar ateng angbongsi dokok-lo, lapen halatum virdet-lo.
Israel atum hotur aphan padanchek-lo, lapen sangse pin pen latum ha Gibeah anihang anat halatum aphan hungdunlo, dambomsi latum pathiponbomlo.
Bang suri 18 kemenei a-Benjamin aron-aso aphan pathilo.
Kaprek atumta chepangnosi hidi ajo kat-lo ha Rimmon Arlong akejejangtang ajo anat. Tovar along halatum aphan bang suri 5 pathilo. Ahin an Israel atum Gidom anat hungdunsi, bang suri 2 pathilo.
Pangrumpet halaso arni bang 25 a-Benjamin aso aphan latum pathilo. Kethi nang atum anta angthin kethe aron-aso saidelo.
Bonta Rimmon Arlong anat bang 600 an hidi pen jok-lo, lapen hadak latum chiklo jonphli dolo.
Israel atum kedo-an a-Benjamin aphuthak pangnokhrap-lo lapen pinso-arlo lapen osomar lapen pi anta pathilo. Halatum kelong arongtin me keilo.
Israel atum Mizpah along kechingrum un ahut halatum
Lasi Israel arat atum Bethel along damlo, lapen arnikangsam an Arnam angno ingnilo. Asekethe lapen aning hodaksi chirulo:
“Israel a-Arnam
Puthot adapprang rat atum isi adovan hadak builo, kechingrum athok-heihei pilo, lapen ajehak athok-heihei phrinlo.
Halatum arjulo, “Israel akhei kedo-an angbong
Israel arat atum, Benjamin atum aphan keklem apot aning che-oilo lapen pulo, “Pini Israel atum angbong la isi akhei avetang-lo.
Kedo-an a-Benjamin aso aphan kopusonsi ili piso ripipo? Etum
Halatum angbong jongsi Israel akhei angbong Mizpah akechingrum along kedunde asong doma pu karju ahut, halatum thek-long-lo, Gilead alongri Jabesh pen inutbakta ave;
ron armu amen kehang ahut Jabesh pen baduta thakdun abang ave.
Lasi mei pen suri krehini halatum angthin kethenei amonit toisi hukum pilo, “Damra Jabesh along abangphutin amonit aphan pathidamnon, arlosopimar lapen osomar atum aphanta pathi-etnon.
Pinso kedo-an lapen arloso okarjang kali an aphanta pathinon.”
Jabesh arat angbong bang 400 a-okarjang halatum long-lo. Lasi Kanaan adet Shiloh amukam along halatum aphan vandet-lo.
Ansi mei adang Rimmon Arlong along kedo a-Benjamin aso aphan lamthe ithe toilo, lapen ron chedandelo pu abirta papitoilo.
Benjamin aso atum vangthulo, lapen kaprek Israel atum halatum kepathithe Jabesh a-arloso halatum aphan pilo. Bonta lahei halatum aphan dordelang.
Rat atum Benjamin aso aphan jinsolo pima
Lasi kechingrum ajalin atum pulo, “Benjamin akhei along arloso avelo. Ahin atum aphan kopusonsi ili piso keripipoma?
Israel atum angbong isi akhei chepangbo nangne. Benjamin akhei keparengji aphan pine atovar ripivek nangji,
bonta etum asopimar latum aphan pa-enlong nangne, pima etum angbong badutame esopimar angbong Benjamin atum kepa-en long abangphan ahirjuno pitang-lo.”
Anke latum mathalo, “Shiloh along ningkan esek
Benjamin aso aphan halatum pulo, “Damra drakha aberi ajo chepatu klipnon.

Lapen langnon. Shiloh a-arloso atum chojun amei ahut kekanji aphan vang-lote, nangtum drakha aberi-heihei pen nangbarnon. Jakong pen abangphutin piso inut ennon arlosomar angbong pen lapen bangpi aphan Benjamin alongri anat nangtum along chepondet nangpo.

Jongsi halatum apo mate a-ik atum nanglongvang-ra kroikre lote, nangtum pudunnon, ‘Kanghon pen latum aphan netum pabilongtha, pima netum apiso keplangji aphan netum nanglitum pen ron chedan along penle halatum aphan kepon kali, lapen nanglitumta halatum aphan lapuson pen nelitum aphan nekepi kalidet apot nanglitum aseme kephri adai avelo.’”

Benjamin aso atum la klemlo; Shiloh along kekanji aphan kevang a-arloso atum angbong pen apiso abangphutinta chongvaiponlo; lapen hem chepondet-lo. Ansi halatum amethang alongri chedamlo, halatum arong-heihei chekimlo lapen dolo.
Halaso ahut amat Israel atum kedo-anta osi abangphutin ta amethang akhei anat lapen amethang ahemtun anat chedamrep-lo.
Halaso ahut Israel atum arecho avelang. Abangphutinta aningkehang atengsi klemrep-lo.
Kangsai atum det kepangri ahut akhim thurlo, lapen Judia adet Bethlehem asor inut amonit apiso pen asopo banghini ha Moab adet damlo.

Bangso amonit amen ke Elimelek lapen alangli piso amen ke Naomi lapen asopo banghini amen ke, Mahlon lapen Chilion, halatum Judia adet Bethlehem asor Ephrath aro. Halatum Moab adet damsi hadak dodunlo.
Bonta Elimelek, la Naomi apenan thilot-lo lapen bangpi aphan osomar banghini pamotekang-lo.
Latum Moabpisi piso enlo; inut abangpi amen Ruth lapen akaprek abangpi amen ke Orpah. Latum hadak ningkan kep anbak dolo.
Lapen Mahlon lapen Chilion banghinita thilot-lo, lasi arloso aphan osomar banghini lapen apenanta thilotsi pamotekang-lo.
Anke amunpimar pen Moab adet pen kechevoithuji aphan Naomi chesik cheng-lo, pima
Lasi bangpi kedo adim pen che-osi amunpimar banghini atum pen chepadisi Judah adet anat kechevoijisi damlo.
Bonta Naomi amunpimar banghini aphan pulo, “Nanglitum bangphutinta nanglipei ahemle chedamnon. Nanglitum kethitang atum lapen neli phanta kangjinso asonthot-le
nanglitum amethang methang apenan ahemle ehum ahem kelongji aphan nangpapilonang!” Ansi alangli halatum aphan ingjup-lo lapen halatum ase pathedung si chirulo.
Lapen halatum alangliphan pulo, “Kali, nelitum nangli rat anat nanglilong chevoidunpo.”
Bonta Naomi pulo, “Pei atum chetavarnon, kopisi nanglitum nelilong nangdun nangpo? Nelipok arlo nesopo dokok pen halatum nangli penan plang-unjilangma?
Pei atum chetevarnon, nangmethang atovarle damnon athe neli penan kedoji a-arta ta lit tang-lo. Jongsi neli ning kethe dolang puseta lapen paningve amat penan dora sopo pado seta,
halatum kethe an nanglitum chonghong unjima? La pen apot nanglitum penan dodedet apot loma? Kali pei atum, nanglitum ajoine la nelining padukpik athe
Lapen halatum ase pathedung pen un an chiruthu lo, lapen Orpah ke anipi aphan ingjup-lo, lapen apei-apo ahem chedamjui lo, bonta Ruth abang ke anipi aphan ot-het-lo.
Lapen alangli pulo, “Langtha, nangli korpike amethang amonit lapen amethang a-arnam anat chevoitang-lo, nangli korpi aphile chevoithunon.”

Bonta Ruth pulo, “Nangliphan o-nangji mate nangli phi kedunkri pen chevoi nangji pu nepurinon; athe nangli konatma kedam nelita nangdun po, lapen nangli konatma kedo nelita nangdo dunpo; nangli ratke neli rat lo, lapen nangli Arnam ke neli Arnamlo;
nangli konatma kethi nelita hadaksi thipo, lapen hadaksi neli chepip-po.
Lapen Naomi along dunvekpo pu mathathip thek-longsi alangli thangta pupedet-lo.
Anke latum banghini Bethlehem leletik dambomlo. Lapen latum Bethlehem nangle si latum pen apot rong isi chethanseilo, lapen sarpimar atum pulo, “La Naomi kalima?”
Alangli halatum aphan thak-lo, “Nephan Naomi pu nehangri, Mara pule nehangnon, athe Jakong Theparpik a-Bang nekai pahodak-lo.
Ne kedam ahut dorphlup, bonta
Lasi Naomi lapen amunpi Ruth, la Moabpi, Moab adet pen kevang abang chevoilo. Lapen alanglitum sok tipliso kerot kecheng ahut Bethlehem nanglelo.
Non Naomi, alangli penan adon inut dolo, la plang-o amonit, lapen Elimelek aro, amen Boaz.
Lapen Ruth, la Moabpi, Naomi aphan pulo, “Neliphan nelikangjinsoji abang arit sok tipli abu kehumjile nelipadam long iktha.” Lapen alangli bangpi aphan thak-lo, “Damnon pei.”
Lasi bangpi rit dam lo lapen kerot atum aphi aphi humlo lapen humbomsi Elimelek aro, ha Boaz arit adang anat nanglerok-lo.
Lapen langtha, Boaz Bethlehem pen vangsi, kerot atum aphan alangli pulo, “
Ansi Boaz kerot atum keja abangphan pulo, “La komat a-osopilo?”
Lapen kerot atum keja abang thak-lo, “La ke Moabpi, Naomi along Moab adet pen nangkedun abangpilo.”
Labangpi pulo, “Neliphan ingjinsora sok tipli apeng adak keklo abu kerot atum aphi aphi neli pangrumlong iktha.” Lasi bangpi vang-lo lapen adapprang pen non an sangse pin pen humbomlang.
Anke Ruth aphan Boaz pulo, “Non nelilam arju iktha pei, along kaprek arit humdamrinon lapen dak orinon, bonta neli banpi atum adungle do iknon.

Halatum kerot arit aputhak le nangmek chebinon lapen aphi phi dunnon. Neli banpo atum nangliphan ke-ot-edetji aphan ne hukum pitang-lo kalima? Lapen nangli lang kang-it ahut risomar atum kesoktang alang tebuk-hei hei adung damra lang jun damnon.”
Ansi bangpi amahang longle paphosi ardomkhrup-lo, lapen alangliphan pulo, “Nangli neliphan kopi athesi pu-an ingjinsoloma? Neli adet kaprek amonit aphan kopisi la an lang nangjima?”

Bonta Boaz alangliphan thak-lo, “Nangli penan thilot pen nanglinipi aphan nangli ko-an klem loma lahei neliphan than-et-lo, lapen nangli kosonsi nanglipo nanglipei lapen methang mahang kethek adim che-osi aphrang pen chininepinlang arat atum along vang-lo.
nangli keklemtang akam ale nangpapi lonang, lapen nangli Alangli vengkong arum vang pen kechepachong a-
Ansi bangpi pulo, “Nangli neliphan kangjinso thepik-lo, hemphu, athe nangli neliphan ning pangsamlo, neli nangli banpi atum angbong inut kalidet seta nanglibanpi aphan kanghon pensi ningjelo.”

An kecho apor Boaz alangliphan pulo, “Dak vang-ra him ajehak nang-chotha, lapen nangli him ta hanthor alang along chonimtha.” Lasi bangpi kerot atum adung chongnidunlo, lapen alangli sang-karnu bangpi aphan pachonlo lapen bangpi ingkrangkretik an, cholo lapen asap-o ahin dolang.
Lapen kehumthujisi alangli thurlo, lapen Boaz risomar atum aphan pinkhatsi pulo, “Labangpi apeng pen seta pahumnang lapen nangtum bangpi aphan patherak-ri.
Lapen ajehak apeng pen san-ra bangpi kehum jile otekangnon lapen bangpi aphan ingchek-ri.”
Ansi bangpi arni ingsamsetik an rit along sok tipli humlo; lapen kehumtang an pamlo lapen edang anbak soktipli long-lo.
Lapen alangli la ponsi rongsopi chedamlo, lapen soktipli kehumtang an anipi aphan paklang-lo lapen ingkrangling aphi kecho un-e ahin asang-karnuta van pisi pajirlo.

Anipi alangliphan pulo, “Pini nangli konatsi soktipli kehum lo? Lapen nangli kodaksi kam keklemdunloma? Nangliphan kelang abang ahirjume atheng paplang-lonang.” Ansi anipi aphan alangli komat pensi kam klem loma la chethanlo, lapen pulo, “Neli pini kam keklemdun abang amen lake Boaz.”
Lapen Naomi amunpi aphan pulo, “
Lapen Ruth, la Moabpi pulo, “La anchot kali, alangli neliphan pulang, ‘Neliban atum soktipli kerot tangtetik an nangli halatum pen che-ori.’”
Lapen Naomi amunpi Ruth aphan pulo, “Alangli abanpi atum along kedun lake mesenlo, pei, along kaprek arit ke bang nangliphan nang otdet tahai.”
Lasi alangli Boaz abanpi atum along soktipliso lapen soktipli rottangtetik an dunlo lapen anipi alongsi dobomlo.
Lapen alangli nipi Naomi alang-liphan pulo, “Nangli keme aphan nanglihem neli nangripi nangnema, pei?”
Non nangli kedunbom abanpi atum ahemphu Boaz, la ilitum kechepho amonit kalima? Langtha, paningve alangli sok keti adim tipliso asok jappo.
Lasi lang chingroira jangthu chehinon lapen nangli akemenei chingthang-ra sok keti adim damnon, bonta bangso amonit kecho-kejun tangtetik ke cheklangri.
Bonta la kodak si ke-ima, ke-i adim langdunnon, anle damra akeng athak ape oira idunnon; lapen nangli kopisi klem nangjima alangli nangthanpo.
Lapen bangpi thak-lo, “Nangli kepu ason an neli klempo.”
Lasi alangli sok keti adim damlo, lapen anipi kepu asonthot si klemlo.
Lapen Boaz kecho lapen kejun patangsi aning arong-lo, lapen sok-bui akung damsi ilo. Anke bangpi vang-joisi akeng athak ape oisi idunjoilo.
Lapen jirlo chitim apor bangso amonit kechepharlep ahut thirikjok-lo, lapen inut a-osopi akeng-ri ke-i thek-long-lo.
Alangli pulo, “Nangli komat-lo?” Lapen bangpi thak-lo, “Neli Ruth, nanglibanpi; nangli pe ade nanglibanpi aphuthak sangjaitha athe nanglike neli kechephonei abang-lo.”
Alangli pulo, “
Lapen pei, non phere nangnelo, nangli kehang ason an neli klempo, athe nelijirpo rong asor nangli mesen a-arlosolo pu chinipet.
Lapen non ne helo adung kechephonei pu la ahok-lo, seta ne apar kechepho muchot abang dolang mene.

Paningve dak-le donon lapen penap adap jongsi alangli nangliphan kechephonei abang keklem nangji akam klem lote mesen la le paklemnang, bonta jongsi la kechephonei abang keklem nangji akam keklemji aninghanghe, pulote
Lasi bangpi the-ang-etik alangli kengri ikok-lo, bonta monit pu-pu amahang chechini thek aphrang thurlo, lapen alangli pulo, “Arloso sok keti along kevang alam baduta pachini longledet nangji.”
Lapen alangli pulo, “Nangli keche-um ape vanra nangchodeng dunnon.” Lasi bangpi chodeng dunlo lapen alangli ton throk tipliso asok tengsi aphu athak batdunlo; ansi arongsopi chedamlo.
Lapen bangpi anipi along kechevang un ahut anipi pulo, “Pisi keplang-loma pei?” Ansi Ruth halabangso amonit alang phan keklem ason an than et-si pulo,
“La ton throk atipliso asok alanglisi neliphan pilo, pima alangli pulo, ‘Nangli nipi along nangliri angse dam nangne.’”
Anipi thak-lo, “Bangso alam pi plangjima la chini ne tik inghongtha pei, athe bangso amonit dojoije bonta pini amat bangso akam patangvekpo.”
Lapen Boaz rong anghap damsi hadak ingnilo; lapen langtha, Boaz kepu kechephopik halabangso abang vang-lo. Lapen alangli pulo, “Pu vang-ra dak nang chongnitha;” lapen alangli vangsi chongnilo.
Lapen Boaz bang kep rongsopi arlengkesar pangrumsi pulo, “Dak chongnihurtha;” lasi halatum chongnilo.
Ansi kechephonei abang phan alangli pulo, “Naomi, la Moab adet pen nangkechevoi abangpi edon Elimelek alongle echet jorpo.

Lapen ne bangso alam nangphan thanpo, pusi mathalo, atheke dak kangnisar atum lapen ne kechepho arleng kesar atum angnole nang namnon. Nang jongsi lang jite lang detnon; kalite nephan thannon, kechiniji nening hang-lo, athe nang pen apar kelangji baduta avelo, lapen nangdun abang ke ne helo.” Lapen alangli pulo, “Ne langdetpo.”
Ansi Boaz pulo, “Nang Naomi arideng pen longle kenam arni pen nang Ruth , la ke Moabpi, la kethitang abang ahemepi aphanta namlo; lapusonsi kethitang abang apoton amen pareng longpo.”
Bonta kechepho nei abang pulo, “Ne la methang aphan langthekthelo, la klemlote nemethang ahem angthun avedetpo. Ne kepajok nangji adeng nang le ennon, athe ne la lang un-elo.”
Hako ahut Israel adet mar kechelang lapen kechelar ajutang lahelo; alam kepathirji aphan kejor abang akeng-op chephloksi abang kaprek aphan pipo, lapen lasonsi Israel adet haki kepi ajutang do.
Lasi kechephonei abang Boaz aphan “Nang methang aphanle chenamnon” pu kepu ahut alangli methang akeng-op chephlok-lo.
Ansi Boaz akesar lapen rat atum an aphan pulo, “Nangtumsi hakilo, pini ne Elimelek amar an lapen Chilion lapen Mahlon amar an Naomi arideng pen nampet-lo.

La an chot kalilang, Mahlon ahemepi, la Ruth, Moab-pita nepiso keplangjisi namtang-lo lapen ajok mar-tar kethitang abang ahemsi chedothotpo lapen alangli ro ke methang akorte-murti along lapen mahang thekvek adimsi dovetpo; pini nangtum hakilo.”
Ansi inghap along kedo arat atum an, lapen akesar atum puhurlo, “Netum hakilo.
lapen nanghemta Perez ahem ason pamannang, pima Perez ke Tamar pen Judah asopolo, lason le bangpi pen ajok
Lasi Ruth aphan Boaz pondet-lo lapen bangpi alangli piso plang-lo; lapen bangpi pen dim-tar pasilo lapen
Ansi bangpi Naomi aphan pulo, “
La nangphan chethe pareng abang lapen nang kesar ahut kelanaji abang-lo, athe nang phan kechinghonnei nangmunpi la nangsomar bang throksi an sose abangsi laso a-oso aphan amahang pathek-lo.”
Ansi Naomi oso ensi arbak-lo lapen a-obokpi cheplang-lo.
Lapen tebok-terei a-arloso atum laphan amen irsi pulo, “Naomi inut a-oso amahang thekpilo.” Halatum laphan Obed pusi irlo; alangli ke Jesse apo, Jesse ke David apolo.
Perez akhei apoton la helo: Perez ke Hezron apo,
Hezron ke Ram apo, Ram ke Amminadab apo,
Amminadab ke Nashon apo, Nashon ke Salmon apo,
Salmon ke Boaz apo, Boaz ke Obed apo.
Obed ke Jesse apo, lapen Jesse ke David apo.
Ephraim akhei pen Elkanah pu amen inut amonit Ephraim Anglong alongsi Ramah arongsopi along dolo. La Jeroham asopo lapen Elihu asupo, lapen Tohu ahemtun asor, Zuph aro-abeng-lo.
Elkanah apiso banghini do, Hannah lapen Peninnah. Peninnah asomar do, bonta Hannah ke inut-ta ave.
Elkanah aningkan vangta Shiloh along Jakong Kethenei
Elkanah athok kepi aphongtinta apharman isi ke Peninnah lapen pharman isi ke la asomar abangphutin aphan ok pilo.
La Hannah aphan chinghon-o seta pharman isi ansi la aphan pichot-lo, pima
Peninnah, bangpi aphan panopo lapen pinrem po,
Pima
Lasonsi aningkan ningkan dambomlo; halatum
Bangpi apenan Elkanah bangpi aphan arjupo, “Hannah, nang kopi athesi kechiruma? Nang kopisi chochedet loma? Nesomar bang kep apar ne nangphan nang chinghonhe det-loma?”
Arnisi, Shiloh along halatum
Halaso ahut inghap adung Eli, kurusar amethang adim chongnilo.
Hannah isi chechakthip-lo: “Jakong Kethe
Penang an ajirkeding
Bangpi dojoisi ardombomlo, bangpi angtur paklemchot bonta ase ave. Lasi bangpi hor kangrilo pusi Eli mathalo,
lapen bangpi aphan pulo, “Nangli hor kangri chepaklang var-ret-rinon! Hor kejun che-ora do pamenon!”
“Kali, neli, hor junje akehai,” bangpi thak-lo. “Neli hor junjepinlang! Nelining oipik, lapen neli
Amovangve arloso pu neli phan mathari. Neli lasonsi ardomlo pima nelining dukpik.”
“Ningkangsam penle damnon,” Eli pulo, “Lapen nangli kehang ason Israel a-Arnam nangli papilonang.”
“Neliphan akemele nangli pama-thaverlonang,” bangpi thak-lo. Ansi bangpi aning ke-oi hamlo.
Puthot adap Elkanah lapen ahem asor adapprang thursi
Lasi bangpi aso dolo lapen inut amahang pathek-lo. La aphan Samuel pusi bangpi amen irlo, lapen thanlo, “
Elkanah lapen la ahem-asor Shiloh kedamra
Bonta non aphong abang ke Hannah dundedet-lo. Bangpi apenan aphan pulo, “Oso an chothek lote ne la aphan
Elkanah thak-lo, “Chokpo nangning kehang akeme alingle klemnon; la an chothek-lo pupe tik ke hemle donon. Lapen nang kechechak ason

La aphan bangpi an chothek-lo pu pen bangpi la aphan Shiloh along pondet-lo, lapen ningkan kethom achainong-alo , him aduk lin kep, ok-reng ajarong isithup drakha ahorlang ponlo. Bangpi oso bihek Samuel aphan
Halatum chainong thudet aphi oso Eli angno halatum pondet-lo.
La aphan Hannah pulo, “Neliphan neli diya tha, akehai. Neliphan nanglining dolangma? Neli helo ladak karjapther pen
Laso a-oso kelongji aphan
Lasi
Anke halatum hadak
Hannah ardomlo:
Ning arong pen
la keklem apot ne ko-an rengme!
Ne hotur atum aphan ne ingnekchoilo,
Arnam nekerap apot ko-an ne nening arong!
Baduta
La ason baduta ave,
netum a-Arnam ason keraithek abang ave.
Nang kechepindak ingtonnon,
nangtum kecheparoka alamtang padojoinon.
Pima
lapen rat atum keklem an kangsai Abang-lo.
Nokbe kangtang athai ching-loktang-lo,
bonta komane atum nang ingtangbomlo.
Kecholongpame atum,
non an kecholongji aphan kechorek nang-lok-lo!
Bonta kangchir atum ingchir nangnelo.
Aso kave abang bang throksi asomar dolo,
bonta aso ke-ong abang inut-ta sa pipe det-lo.
kethi apirthe anat la rat toilo lapen halatum aphan vanthulo.
La ajehak amonit aphan paduk-lo lapen kaprek aphan paplang-lo;
la ajehak aphan pabilo,
lapen akaprek aphan pathelo.
La keduk aphan longle aduk pen rung-lo,
lapen keboi atum aphan halatum akesung pen ingthurlo.
Latum aphan rechoso asangho paplang-lo lapen halatum aphan anong anghoi bilo.
Pirthe ahemthur ke
laso athak-si Alangli pirthe kimlo.
Alangliphan kekroithip arat achethe rai bonta kehingno atum kangting ajo vir-et,
inut amonit amethang ajakong pen hai un-e.
halatum aphan la sining pen cheter paklopo.
la arecho aphan la ajakong pipo,
la kangvaitang recho aphan la pahaipo.
Anke Elkanah ahem Ramah anat chevoithulo, bonta oso Samuel ke Shiloh alongsi sa kok-lo, lapen Eli, kurusar aber
Eli asomar atum ajat langno-o. Latum
lapen rat atum kurusar atum pen keri aron-heihei ta ano chevarve. Lasi, kethokji aphan inut amonit vang-lote, kurusar aban abang tok-phrok chevanpo. Ok ketun bom ahut,
phule arlo ok athak tokpo lapen tok-phrok along nangkedun an ke kurusar apharmanlo. Israel atum Shiloh along kethokji ra kevang atum an aphan lasonsi klemlo.
La aparta athu kedo a-ok kephrinji aphan ponpe aphrang kurusar aban abang vangsi, pupo, “Kurusar aphan karnupijile ajehak a-ok nepitha; la ok ke-up nangtum pen chodengde, ok kevaisi dengchot.”

Monit abang jongsi “Kopima akeme ne paklem longtha lapen athu kedo abang kechengsi nepaphrin longtha; anle nangning kehang aling ponnon,” pu thak-lote, kurusar aban abang pupo, “Lason kali, nonle nephan nangpidunnon! Nang jongsi nangpipe pulote ne jakong pen pon bor-idetji!”
Eli asomar laso apap apot
Halaso ahut oso Samuel,
aningkanvangta la apei choiso epak thak pipo lapen bangpi apenan pen ningkan esek athok kepidam ahut la aphan ponpipo.
Anke Elkanah lapen la apiso aphan pahirjumesi Elkanah aphan pupo, “Laso a-arloso aphan
Hannah aphan
Eli non sarpik-lo, la asomar atum Israel atum aphan kopi pi klemloma la charjulongbomlo lapen
Lasi halatum aphan la pupo, “Lahei nangtum kopisi keklemloma? Nangtum keklem akehingno alam kadokaveta nethan-prelo.
La ington non, O po atum! Lake
Inut amonit jongsi anut kaprek abe thur pen pap klemlote Arnam la aphan cheraidun-un; bonta
Bonta latum apo alam arjujelo, pima latum aphan
Oso Samuel thebomlo lapen
Arnam amonit along

Israel kedo-an pen Ne la ahemtun aphansi nekurusar keplangji aphan Ne ingvailo, dovan along Nephan kangdukji aphan, mephik kethorji aphan lapen Nephan karjujile arlo-achoi pachingthangji aphanlo. Ne halatum aphan dovan athak athok isi apharman ke-enji ajakong pilo.

Tangte kopi athesi, nerat atum pen Ne ke-en athok ajir-heihei aputhak nang kecho ar-i-varret loma? Eli, kopisi nang nephan mute nangsomar aphan man kepivarret-langma? Halatum, nephan nerat aso atum nekethok akemenei angsi kepachotoi pen palenglim-lamlo?

Israel lapen nangtum arosi Ne-kurusar plangsi Nephan kaiketa ingdukpo pusi Ne semetang-lo. Tebonseta, non Ne kepuji ke lahelo, nangphan la paplanglongdetpo, mo aphi seta, la alar, Nephan man nekepiji abangphansi Ne man pipo lapen Nephan kelangrop atum aphan Neta langrempo.
Arjutha, nanghemtun lapen nangtum aro ariso kedo-an aphan Ne jakong kepavedetji arni nangletang-lo, anke nanghemtun pen inutbakta sar longledetpo.
Nang kesung phopo, lapen kaprek Israel atum aphan Ne kepi ahirjume apot nang langdun un-epo, bonta nanghemtun angbong inutbakta sar-ru an sar longledetpo.

Seta nangso-nangsu angbong inutbak aphan Ne parengji, lapen lasi nephan kurusar ason ingdukpo. Bonta la amek selokjokpo, lapen aningkethe an avedetpo, lapen akaprek nangso-nangsu atum ke kehingno akethi pensi thipo.
Nangsomar banghini Hophni lapen Phinehas arnisi angbong thirappetpo, lapen nang chinipo, Ne kepu athetin alam ahok.
Nephan kekroithirklong lapen la aphan Ne kepaklemtoi aling keklem abangphan Ne kurusar ingvaiji, la aphan Ne aso-asu piji lapen la Ne kangvaitang arecho angno ingdukpo.

Nangso nangsu kereng-long abang halabangso akurusar along damsi tangka lapen an chohang nangkokpo, lapen kurusar aphan kerapdun longji aphan choningri nangsetpo, lake pine apok kechepangkrang longji aphan.”
Oso Samuel, Eli aber
Ningve isi, Eli, la nonke amek kave asonlo, amethang angdeng amekjang-lo;
Samuel ke kangthir-et kechejok aloh asinduk kedo adimsi amekjang-lo. Theang-e aphrang melur ame karbomlang,
Samuel aphan
lapen Eli along katsi pulo, “Nangli neliphan nangkehangma? Lasi neli kevang-lo.”
Bonta Eli thak-lo, “Ne nangphan nanghang longle! Nanghongplang anat chedamthunon.” Lasi ahongplang anat Samuel chedamthulo.
Samuel aphan
Lasi la thursi Eli along damlo, lapen pulo, “Nangli nehangma, lasi neli kevang-lo.”
Bonta Eli thak-lo, “Ne nangphan hanghe, po! Da, hongplang anat chedamnon.”
Batai kethom aphong Samuel aphan
Ansi Eli chinilo, la
lasi la aphan alangli pulo, Hongplang along chedamnon, lapen Alangli nangphan nanghangthu lote thakdunnon,
Nethannon,
La aphan
Halaso arni Eli ahemtun aphuthak Ne keputang alam an kecheng pen kejut an pachekok-vekpo.

Ne la aphan putang-lo, la ahemtun aphan Ne aduk-pivekji kaiketa, pima la asomar atum nebe thursi kehingno alam-heihei ningjelo. Latum lahei klemtang-lo pu Eli chini, bonta latum aphan la pangtonkok ke det-lo.
Lasi Ne ahokpet pen Eli ahemtun aphan pathiktang-lo, laso kephere-meme apap ale kechamji aphan jat athok-ajir pen seta pakak un-elo.”
Adap anta Samuel hongplang alongsi dolang; anke la thursi
La aphan Eli hang-lo, “Sopo, Samuel!” “Kopilo, akehai,” Samuel thak-lo.
“Nangphan
Lasi la aphan kedo-an alamta Samuel than-et-lo; la pen ajat asonta patute det-lo. Lapen la pulo, “La
Samuel thebomsi la along
Lasi Israel atum kedo-an det ehin pen kejut ahin anta Samuel ke
Shiloh along Samuel aphan kecheklang lapen kethan adim

Halaso ahut Philistia atum chingrumpetsi Israel pen ron kechedanjisi damlo, lasi Israel atum halatum pen kechedanjisi barlo. Israel atum Ebenezer pu adimsi mukam chekimlo, lapen Philistia atum ke Aphek pu adimsi chekimlo.
Philistia atum tengkheng-lo lapen ron chedan-o aphi halatum Israel aphan paremdet-lo, lapen ron aklam along bang suriphli amonit pathilo.
Ahin kerenglang atum mukam chevangsi Israel ajalin atum pulo, “Pini
Lasi halatum Shiloh along pherangke toilo, lapen Jakongkethe
Kechejok Asinduk lesi, Israel atum pu-an asekethe pen hang-lo lapen pulo,
“Ibri amukam along kehang ase arjutha! La kopi aphanlo?”
halatum pherelo, lapen pulo, “Inut Arnam halatum along vangtang-lo! Etum kevirlo! Lason etum aphan aphrang plangple-pinlang!
Komatsi la Jakong-kethenei a-Arnam atum pen epajok unpoma? Halahei arnam atum helo kejejangtang ajo Ijip atum aphan kepathi abang-lo!
Nangthin chepathenon Philistia atum! Pinso ason chedannon, kalite latum etum aban keplang ason etum Ibri atum aban plang nangpo; pinso ason chedannon.”
Philistia atum kechedan pasikpik-lo, lapen Israel atum aphan paremdetsi ahem pachekat-et-lo. Halaso arni thipik-lo: Bangsuri 30 Israel aron-aso atum thinang-lo.
Arnam kechejok Asinduk ta cheraidet-lo, lapen Eli asomar Hophni lapen Phinehasta thilot-lo.

Benjamin akhei pen inut amonit ron aklam pen tovarsoding Shiloh anat nangkat-lo, lapen halabangso arni amat nanglerok-lo. Aningke-oi kechepaklangjisi la ape chingsek-lo lapen aphu athak longle chebat-lo.
Eli, Kechejok Asinduk alam kechiniji ingtung-olo, la tovar akung ingnisi cholangding-lo. Bangso amonit rong adang an birta pachethang-lo, lapen abangphutinta pheresi chirulo.
Kehangjo ase Eli arjulong-lo, lapen arjulo, “Lahei kehangjo athe kopilo?” Bangpo amonit Eli aphan birta kethanjisi la along kat paprap-lo.
(Eli arta non ningkan 98 tang-lo lapen amek checharchepin asonlo.)
Bangso amonit pulo, “Ron pen chepajoksi ne ladak an pini tovarsoding nangkat-lo.”
La aphan Eli pulo, “Kopi cheplang-lo asopo!”

Pherangke thak-lo, “Philistia atum pen Israel atum kat-et-lo; la etum aphan kepherememe akeremlo! La aparta nanglisomar Hophni lapen Phinehasta thidunlot-lo, lapen Arnam kechejok Asinduk ta pondet-lo!”

Pherangke abang Kechejok Asinduk alam kethan ahut eli inghap adung inghoi pen aphi chiruilo. La pu an sarlo lapen akromthelo la klibup-lo lapen achethok ching-loksi thilot-lo. La ningkan 40 Israel atum aphan jalo.

Eli amunpi, Phinehas apiso ke aso aphili-lo, lapen oso amahang pathekji dokdok-lo. Arnam kechejok Asinduk pontang-lo lapen bangpi alok-hei lapen apenanta thitang-lo pu arjulong-lok pen bangpi damsi menmen oso amahang pathek-phlot-lo.
Bangpi kethipo pu ahut bangpi aphan kerapdun a-arloso atum bangpi aphan pulo, “Nangthin chepathenon! Sopinso inut long-lo!” Bonta bangpi thangta arjudun long-ledet-lo, lapen thakthedet-lo.
Bangpi oso aphan “Ikabod” pusi amen irlo, lake “Arnam ahir-asang Israel aphan otang-lo.” La kechejok Asinduk kepapon-long lapen alok-hei lapen bangpi apenan kethi aphansi kepudamlo.
“Arnam ahir-asang Israel aphan otang-lo, “ Bangpi pulo, “pima Arnam kechejok Asinduk pontang-lo.”
Kechejok Asinduk Philistia atum cheraidet aphi, latum Ebenezer pen halatum arongsopi Ashdod anat la pondet-lo,
lapen halatum a-arnam Dagon ahem arlo pondet-lo, lapen la akumlin arei si la pangnilo.
Puthot adap Ashdod arat atum
Puthot adap ta kechejok Asinduk angno laso akumlin kekrepthor thek-long-lo. Non aphong abang ke aphu lapen la ari hongnita ching-lokpet-lo lapen jakan alongsi tilailo; abangsi dochot-lo.
(Lasi nonputa Dagon akurusar atum lapen la karcho atum Ashdod along la athok athak arkanverlo, lapen laso adim dongdelo.)
Ashdod arat aphan
Lahei keplangbom thek-longsi halatum pulo, “Israel atum a-Arnam etum aphan lapen etum a-arnam Dagon aphan adukpilo. Kechejok Asinduk ladak etum along padobom nangnelo.”
Lasi halatum pherangke atum aphan toisi Philistia arecho bangpho pachingrumlo lapen halatum aphan arjulo, “Israel a-Arnam Kechejok Asinduk aphan eli kopi klemnangjima?”
La Gath along pondet-non, pusi halatum thak-lo; lasi halatum la Gath along pondet-lo, la Philistia atum akaprek arongsopilo.
Bonta la hadak lerok pen rongsopi asor aphan

Lasi halatum Ekron along kechejok Asinduk thon-damkok-lo, lata Philistia arongsopilo, bonta la hadak lerok pen amat rat atum kechiru hangjolo. “Netum kedo-an aphan kepathijisi latum Israel a-Arnam kechejok Asinduk ladak vanlilo!”

Lasi puthot Philistia arecho kedo-an aphan pahangdamtoisi pulo, “Israel akechejok Asinduk la adimthot voithunon, anke la etum aphan lapen ehemtun aphan epathithelo.” Rongsopi adang an keso hangjolo pima halatum aphan
Lapen kethithe atum seta ingthum akeso long-lo lapen kerap kelongjisi halatum a-arnam aphan rat atum kechiru hangjolo.
Philistia atum along
rat atum, kurusar lapen mekbin keklem atum aphan hangpetsi arjulo, “
Halatum thak-lo, “Nangtum Israel a-Arnam
La aphan kopi adan pensi thondun nangji? Rat atum arjulo.

Halatum thak-lo, “Ingthum asonthot ser angkleng pho lapen jukingso asonthot aser angklengpho, la asitinta abangphutin Philistia arecho apharmanlo. La isinat avur nangtum kedo-an aphan lapen recho bangpho apharman nangtoilo.

Ingthum lapen jukingso asonthot nangtum selam nangji lapen la nangtum adet pavirlo lapen nangtum Israel a-Arnam aphan man pinangji. Lalote nangtum, nang arnam atum, nangdet aputhak la aduk-kepi hamji mene.
Nangtum kopisi Ijip arecho lapen Ijip asor ason ning chepabuklui bomlangma? Israel atum aphan Ijip pa-otoite halatum aphan Arnam chongthuilo, pu nangtum tengnedet-loma?
Lasi hemkonglong ahum kemi siknon, lapen arthangthepin achainong api jonni siknon; lahei hemkonglong parthangnon lapen aso ke aroi toiphitnon.

kechejok Asinduk ponnon, lapen hemkonglong athak batnon, lapen nangtum apap apharman la aphan dan kepidunjile ser adum-heihei Asindukso Sinduk adungle bidunnon. Hemkonglong la atovar padamra la amethang padamtoinon.

Anke la langdunkrinon. La jongsi Beth Shemesh arong anat damlote la Israel a-Arnamsi laso kepherememe akevir etum aphan etoilo. Bonta jongsi la kali pulote, la le avur nangketoi kali pu chinipo, la ke lapu amatsi keplang-lo.”
Latum aphan kopisi kethan loma halatum la klemlo; Halatum chainong api jonni ponsi hemkonglong parthang-lo lapen aroi along aso aphan beng-lo.
Halatum kechejok Asinduk lapen jukingso asonthot aser angkleng lapen ingthum asonthot aser angkleng Asinduk penpen hemkonglong athak batdunlo.

Chainong api tovar kedam pangcheng-lo ha Beth Shemesh anat lapen la anatsi kedam pakengsonlo, la pu pu atovar suisepinlo. Halatum dambom ahut halatum langcharidunlo. Bangpho Philistia arecho atum anta latum aphi phi Beth Shemesh ahoi anta dunlo.
Beth Shemesh arat atum arlok along soktipli kerotbom ahut halatum men men angsong cholang-railo, lapen Kechejok Asinduk thek-long-lo. thek-lok pen halatum aning arongpik-lo.
Hemkonglong vangsi Beth- Shemesh along kedo Joshua pu amonit ahidi along arlongpi adung nangsakok-lo. Rat atum Thengpi ahemkonglong pu et-lo lapen chainong api thusi halahei
Levi atum
Philistia arecho bangpho lahei keklem achar pen langdunlo halaso arni amat Ekron chedamjuilo.
Philistia atum ingthum ason ser angkleng dumpho

Halatum jukingso ason ser angkleng ta arongsopitin along keparecho a-Philistia paisong arongsopi lapen paikave arong arecho apharman lodunlo. Beth Shemesh along kedo Joshua ahidi a-arlongpi alongsi halatum
Beth Shemesh asor aphan
Lasi Beth Shemesh amonit atum pulo, “Komatsi laso Kangthir Arnam
Kiriath Jearim arat aphan kepapujisi halatum pherangke toilo, “Philistia atum
Lasi Kiriath Jearim arat atum
Penang an arni, ningkan ingkoi anbak
Israel arat aphan Samuel pulo, “Nangtum jongsi nangning aklong pen
Lasi Israel atum halatum Baal lapen Astarte akumlin-heihei chevar-etsi
Anke Israel kedo-an aphan Mizpah along Samuel pachingrum-toilo, lapen pulo, “Nangtum aphan hadak ne Arnam nang ardompipo.”
Lasi halatum kedo-anta Mizpah along chingrumpet-lo. Halatum
Mizpah along Israel atum chingrumtang-lo pu Philistia atum arjulongsi bangpho Philistia arecho halatum aphan ketengkhengjisi amonit cheponpak-lo. Laso alam Israel atum arjulong-lo lapen pherepik-lo,
lapen Samuel aphan pulo, “Philistia atum pen kejokjile etum Arnam
Biresak aloso Samuel thusi la arpum amat
Samuel athok kepi un ahut Philistia atum ketengkhengjisi vang-lo, bonta halaso ahut amat halatum aphan
Israel atum Mizpah pen nangbarsi Philistia atum aphi phi hungdunlo ha Bethkar pu adim an, lapen tovarsoding halatum aphan un an pathilo.
Anke Samuel arlong isi ensi Mizpah lapen Shen angbong la elo lapen pulo, “Tovarsoding anta
Lasonsi Philistia atum aphan paremdet-lo, lapen Samuel achethe dotik an Israel alongri ketengkhengji pen

Philistia atum kecherai Ekron pen Gath angbong Israel arong kedo-an Israel aphan voi nang-et-lo, lapen Israel atum la longri kedo-an chelong-et-lo. Lapen Israel pen Kanaan atum angbong ningkangsam dolo.
Samuel rengtik an Israel aputhak pangrilo.
Aningkanvang ta Bethel, Gilgal lapen Mizpah anat ephong vurdamverlo, halahei adim la kechedansai alam pangsamlo.
Anke la amethang ahem Ramah along chedampo, hadak kangsai-abang akam klemlo. Ramah along
Samuel kesar ahut, la asomar aphan Israel adang kangsai-abang pinchong-lo.
Aso-akleng amen Joel lapen akebi amen ke Abijah; latum Beersheba along kangsai atumlo.
Bonta latum apo atovar damdedet-lo; latum tangka kelongji aphan aninghang-o, lasi latum tangka chodeng chonghulo, lapen ahokpet pen lam ingsaiselo.
Anke Israel ajalin atum kedo-an chingrumsi Samuel along Ramah anat damlo,

lapen la aphan pulo, “Langtha, nanglike sarbomlo, seta nanglisomar atum ke nangli tovar en-edet-lo. Lasi recho bat-ra netum aphuthak papangrinang, anke netum inut arecho dopo, ha akaprek adet atum kedo ason.”
Latum inut arecho kehang apot Samuel aning dokdelo, lasi la
lapen
Ne halatum aphan Ijip pen kevan arni pen kaita halatum Ne pen suiver lapen akaprek a-arnam-heihei aphansi archoverlo; lapen Nephan keklem asonthotsi halatum non nangphanta klemlo.
Lasi halatum alam arjunon, bonta pasodak pen halatum aphan pacheretoinon lapen halatum arecho halatum aphan kosonsi kelangponpoma than pajirminon.”
Samuel aphan recho nangji pu kehang arat aphan

“Lason helo nangtum arecho nangtum aphan kelangpo, La nanglisomar atum aphan ron-aso pinchongpo, halatum angbong ajehak atum ke ronhemkonglongsi ardonnangpo, akaprek atum loseisi ardonnangpo, lapen akaprek atum ke ron ahemkonglong aphrangsi kat nangpo.

La ajehak atum aphan bang suri aphuthak ahemphu batpo, ajehak atum bang 50 aphuthak ahemphu batpo. La ahidi along nangsomar atum haibai nangpo, asok rotpi nangpo, risim, lapen ronhemkonglong ajohton selamnangpo.
Nangsopimar atum nangpo lapen la antunbang lapen himselambang plang nangpo.
La nang kemenei ahidi nang-enpidetpo, drakha aberi, jit aberi-heihei anta enpo lapen la achakri atum aphan pidetpo.
La nangsok lapen nang drakha phankep pen ephan nang enpidetsi la kangsai atum lapen akaprek achakri atum aphan pidetpo.
Nangban atum aphan lapen kemenei nang chainong , gadha pondetpo lapen la aphan paklemtoipo.
Nangpi ahur pen jonkep angbong ejon pondetpo, lapen nang methangta la aban cheplang nangpo.
Halaso apor kevang ahut, nangtum ninghodak pen khindejopo pima nangtum arecho nangtum kangvaitang abang apot, bonta nangtum kekhinde alam
Rat atum Samuel alam ano chevarvedet-lo, bonta pulo, “Kali! Netum recho inut nangvekji,
la lote netumta bang kaprek adet atum asonpo, netum emethang arecho pen netum aphan pangripo lapen netum aphan ron kechedan aklam-heihei along nejaponpo.”
Halatum kepu athetin Samuel arjulo lapen damsi
la aphan thak-lo, “Halatum kehang alingle klemnon lapen halatum aphan inut arecho batpinon.” Ansi kedo-an Israel amonit atum aphan Samuel hem pachedam toilo.
Benjamin akhei keplang lapen anong kedo inut amonit dolo, alangli men Kish; la Abiel asopo lapen Zeror asupo, Bekorath akur, la Aphiah aro abeng.
Alangli sopo inut do, amen Sol, la ke athok dojot amonit-lo. La kethe-keding lapen athok kedo Israel angbong lason inutnat ta avelang.
Kish agadha ajehak ingbodet, lasi la Sol aphan pulo, “Inut aban nangri cheponra gadha ridamtha.”

Latum Ephraim anglong alongri damput-lo lapen Shalishah alongri anta damlo, bonta lahei longledet-lo, lasi halatum Shalim alongri ajo damthulo, seta gadha thek-longledet-lo. Anke Benjamin alongri damlo, tebonseta halatum thek-longledet-lo.
Halatum Zuph alongri nangkelut ahut, Sol amethang aban aphan pulo, “Etum hem chedam lonang, nepo gadha alam bikoksi etum aphan mathathu var-ret tahailo.”

Ban abang thak-lo, “Thalang! Laso arong along inut montri kangthir do lapen la aphan man pi-o pima la kepu aling chekok-lo. La along elitum damlonang, lapen gadha kodaksi kelongdamjima alangli etum aphan ethan thek tahaimene.”
“Jongsi la along ilidamlote. ili kopi la aphan kepinangji?” Sol arjulo. “Etum abor along ta thangnat a-anta ave, etum kepiji aphan thangnat ta avelo, kalima?”
Aban abang thak-lo, “Nelilong rup adumso dolang. La neli la aphan pidetpo, lapen anke kodaksi halahei kelongjima ephan la ethanthekpo.”
Sol thak-lo, “Kemesen alamlo! Etum damlonang.” Lasi latum kangthir amonit kedo arong damlo.
Latum rong anglong karlu ahut, lang kesok ajehak a-okarjang chetong-lo.

Okarjang atum aphan latum arjulo, “Sangkelang abang rong doma? (Halaso ahut montri aphan sangkelang abang pusi kehang, lasi mane jongsi pine alam Arnam pen karjuji aninghang pulote, la pupo, ‘Sangkelang along damnang.’)”

La abang do, pusi okarjang atum thak-lo. “Alangli nanglitum aphrang nonjonglang kedam. Nanglitum dam paprap lote alangliphan nanglitum chephodunji. alangli pini rong vang-lo, pima inglong angsong rat atum dovan athak kethokji do.

La aphan kepha atum la hadak-le letik ke rat atum kecho cheng-longle, pima athok aputhak la pahirjume paphrangvek nangji. Nanglitum jongsi non amat damlote, la inglong angsong kecho damji aphan arlule aphrang chetongdun unji.”
Lasi Sol lapen la aban rong anat dambomlo lapen latum arlo kelutdam ahut Samuel karcho anat kedamjisi latum anat vang-lo.
Non arnisi aphrang Samuel aphan

“Penap laso apor Ne Benjamin akhei pen inut amonit nanglong nangtoipo, la nerat aso Israel aphan kepangrijile aphuthak jangthu patipnon, lapen la halatum aphan Philistia atum pen pajokpo. Nerat aso atum akesung Ne thek-long-lo, lapen halatum kerap kelongjile kehangjo Ne arjulong-lo.”
Sol aphan Samuel thek-longsi la aphan
Anke Samuel along Sol damlo, la inghap adung lelo lapen arjulo, “Neliphan neli-thantha, kodaksi sangkelang abang kedoma?”

Samuel thak-lo, Neli helo sangkelang abang, karcho adim neliphrang dambomnon. Nanglitum banghinita pini neli pen chorap-rap-lonang. Penap adap nangli karju alam neli thakpo, lapen nanglitum aphan padamlongpo.
Nithom aphrang kangbo agadha aphan mathari, halahei long-et-tang-lo. Bonta komat aphansi Israel arat atum la pu-an aning kehangma? La ke nangli helo lapen nanglipo ahemtun helo.
Sol thak-lo, neli ke Benjamin akhei, Israel angbong akebineilo, lapen nelikhei angbong neli hemtun helo anong kavenei lo. Tangte nangli kopisi lapuson neli kepuloma?
Ansi Sol lapen la aban aphan angdengthepi along Samuel japonlo, lapen alohi atum kedo-an bang 30 anbak kangni un atebulthepo along latum aphan adim pilo.
Tundang abangphu aphan Samuel pulo, “Ne nangliphan salajong kepabitoi a-ok vannon.”

Lasi tundang-abang kangvaitang a-ok-keng vanpisi Sol angno la bipilo. Samuel pulo, “Langtha! La nangliphan kebipitang a-ok-lo. La cho-iknon. Neli kephatang arat atum kechorap-rapjisi neli la nangliphan panongsi bivet-lo.”
Lasi Sol ta Samuel penpen halaso arni chorap-rap-lo.
Karcho adim pen ha rong anat latum nanghirlo lapen Sol aphan isi ahongplang sarnung (aklam asarnung) angsong sikpilo,
lapen alangli hadak amekjang-lo.
Adapprang Sol aphan Samuel ingthurlo, “Thurnon, lapen nangliphan neli nanglitovar nangtoipo” Sol thursi la lapen Samuel tovarpi anat dam rap-rap-lo.

Halatum rong akung nanglesi Sol aphan Samuel pulo, “Nangliban aphan eliphrang padamtoinon.” Ban abang damjuilo lapen Samuel ningjebomlo, “Ladak malomso do iktha lapen Arnam keputang alam neli nangliphan nangthanpo.”
Anke Samuel jit ajangthu abong ponlo, lapen Sol aphu athak dung-lo, lapen la aphan ingjup-lo, lapen pulo, “Alangli Israel arat aphuthak kepangriji aphan

Pini neliphan odet aphi, nangli banghini amonit Rachel athiri, Zelzah adung Benjamin alongri chetongji. Nangli keri agadha longtang-lo pu halatum nangthanpo, ansi nangli po halahei aphan ningriredetpo bonta nangliphan la arjubompo, ‘Nesopo aphan ne kopi klem nangpoma?’

Hadak pen nangli dambomnon ha kangthir athengpi arong Tabor leletik, hadak bang kethom amonit aphan tovar chetongpo, halatum Bethel along Arnam aphan kethokjilo. Halatum angbong inut abang bi jonthom ponpo, akaprek abang him plangthom lapen inut abang drakha ahorlang ajarong ponpo.
Halatum nangliphan ardompo lapen him plangni nangliphan nangpipo, hala nangli chodeng nangpo.

Anke nangli Gibeah along Arnam anglong arludam nangpo, hadak Philistia atum amukam dolo. Rong anghap along esong amontri inglong adim pen nangkehir nangli chetongpo. Latum kum beleng, cheng, pongsi lapen kumbeleng-chongdeng rotpo. Halatum hangsi kanpo.
Menmen amat
Lahei plang-lote nangliphan Arnam nangkeja alingle nangli klemnon.

Gilgal along neli mute nanglisi le paphrangpo, hadak neli nangchetongpo lapen kephrin athok lapen kejalang athok thokpo. Neli vangvetik-ke lapen kopisi keklem nangjima pupetik nangli ni throksi neli inghong nangji.”
Samuel aphan Sol ke-ojipu kechetevar ahut Sol aphan Arnam isi a-ot kemi pilo. Lapen halabangso arni Samuel kepu alam an chekok et-lo.
Sol lapen aban Gibeah along kele pen esong amonit atum laphan chetong-lo. Menmen Arnam akarjong la aphan jalo, lapen halatum akekan, akehang along lata chelangdunlo.
La aphan aphrang kechini atum la lahei keklem thek-longsi lahin lahin chepulo, “Kish asopo kopi cheplangdet loma? Sol inut amontri cheplang-loma?
Hadak kedo inut amonit arjulo, ‘Hala akaprek amontri atum kopusonlo-halatum apo komat mat-lo. nethantha?’ Lason si lam chethanseilo, ‘Sol inut amontri plang-loma?’
Sol chechininepin akeklem lapen akehang pajutsi la inglong angsong dovan along damlo.”
Sol a-ong lapen aban aphan thek-lok-lo, lapen alangli latum aphan arjulo, Nangtum konatsi kedamlo?
Gadha keridam, pusi Sol thak-lo. “Nelitum lahei longle-ong amat Samuel along damjuilo.”
Alangli nangliphan kopisi nangkethanlo? Sol a-ong arjulo.
Alangli nelitum aphan neli kethanke, pi-heihei longtang-lo pu, Sol thak-lo bonta amethang arecho keplangnangji alam ke la a-ong aphan chethanthedet-lo.
Mizpah along dhorom amei kechingrumpetjisi rat aphan Samuel hang-lo,
lapen halatum aphan pulo, “Israel a-Arnam
Ne nangtum a-Arnamlo, nangtum kepachoi lapen akesung-heihei an pen nangkepajok Abang-lo, bonta nangtum pini Nephan Ne-otang-lo, lapen inut arecho nangtum aphan nangji pusi nehang-lo. Mesen, tangte
Anke Samuel akheitin pavangtoilo, lapen
Anke Samuel Benjamin akhei ahemtun kedo-an pavangtoilo. Matri ahemtun isi pavangpet-toilo lapen Kish asopo Sol aphan ingvailo. Halatum la aphan cholang-lo bonta laphan longledet-lo,
halatum
Lasi halatum katsi Sol aphan rat angbong vandet-lo lapen halatum thek-long-lo, la helo kedo-an angbong ajon kedingnei.
Rat aphan Samuel pulo, “La helo
Kedo-an arat atum hang-lo, “Recho achethe padingnang.”
Rat atum aphan recho ajakong lapen keklem nangji arpu alam Samuel thanlo, lapen lahei isi aloh along tokdet-lo, la kangthir adimsi alangli bilo. Ansi kedo-an arat aphan la ahem toirep-lo.
Solta Gibeah anat ahem chedamlo, lapen Arnam aningkeparung ajehak jakongkethenei amonit atum la along dunlo.
Bonta ajehak amokevangve amonit atum pulo, “Kopusonsi laso amonit etum aphan akeme akam eklempi thekpoma?” Halatum Sol aphan pinremlo lapen la aphan thangnat adanta vanpipedet-lo.

Chiklo ejon aphi, Ammon arecho Nahash, la amethang aron-aso aphan jasi Gilead alongri Jabesh arong tengkhengsi la cheraidet-lo. Jabesh amonit atum Nahash aphan pulo, “Nelitum pen chepamenon lapen nelitum aphan kepangri abang-lo pu dengpo.”
Nahash thak-lo, “Eson alamthe pen ne nanglitum pen chepame aloh chetokji: Nanglitum amek ar-e nanghor-etpo lapen lasonsi Israel kedo-an aphuthak kelangrem vanpo.”
Jabesh ajalin atum pulo, “Israel adet adang an pherangke ketoiji aphan ni throksi apor nelipi nangji. Jongsi baduta nelitum aphan kerap abang avelo pulote, nangliphan nelitum chehodai-etpo.”
Pherangke atum Sol kedo adim nanglelo, lapen halatum birta arjulong-lok pen rat atum aningdukpik-si chiru pangcheng-lo.

Sol ke achainong penpen ha hidi pen nangchevoichit anchot-lang, lapen la arjulo, “Kopi cheplang-lo? Kopisi anut-tinta kechiru nang-loma?” Jabesh pen kevang apherangke atum pen karjulong atum la aphan than-et-lo.
Sol la arjulong-lok pen Arnam akarjong la aphan jalo.
