La chainong ponsi halahei aphan kethu pachet-ilo, lapen ithe nang kepachere alam pen athan tin Israel adet adang an pherangke atum aphan papontoilo. Sol lapen Samuel aphi ron kedunde abangphan halatum achainong aputhak lasonthotsi klempo.
Israel arat atum
Bezek along Sol halatum aphan pangrumlo. Israel pen bang suri 300 lapen Judah pen bang suri 30 vang-lo.
Jabesh pen kevang apherangke atum aphan latum pulo, “Nangrat atum aphan punon, penap anerlo chittim aphrang halatum jok-longpo.” Jabesh arat atum laso abirta arjulongsi aning arongpik-lo.
Lapen Nahash aphan pulo, “Penap nanglipen nelitum chedanpo; lapen nanglining kehang alingle nelitum aphan klemnon.”

Halaso aningve Sol amonit aphan songthom thak-lo lapen adapprang halatum hotur amukam dam paprapsi Ammon atum aphan tengkheng-lo. Anerlo chitim apor halatum kedo-an aphan latum pathilo. Kerenglang atum pratjamsi amethang kechepajokji aphan kat-lo.
Anke Israel arat atum Samuel aphan pulo, “Sol recho chonangnepu kepu atum konat-lo? Nelitum arideng nehodainon, lapen halatum aphan nelitum pathi-etpo!”
Bonta Sol pulo, “Pini badu aphanta pathilongle, pima pini arni ke Israel atum aphan
Samuel halatum aphan pulo, “Elitum kedo-an ta Gilgal anat damlonang lapen non ephong Sol helo elitum arecholo pu pachethang-lonang.”
Lasi halatum kedo-anta Gilgal dam-et-lo, lapen hadak kangthir-et adim along Sol helo recholo pu pachethang-lo. Halatum kejelang athok-heihei pilo, Sol lapen Israel arat anta laso arni talonlo.
Anke Israel arat aphan Samuel pulo, “Nanglitum nangpaklemtoi akam neli klemtang-lo. Nanglitum aphan kepangrijisi recho inut nanglitum aphan nangpitang-lo,
non alangli nanglitum aphan pajalongnon. Neli ke sartang-lo lapen nelichu lokpup-lo, lapen nelisomar nanglitum along dolo. Neriso ahut pen non pu anta neli nanglitum ajalinlo.
Neli ladak dolo. Jongsi neli kechoklem chokche pulote non nedinnon
Rat atum thak-lo, “Kali, nangli cho-beibe lapen nechenekne, nangli badu penta thangnat amar ta pondetde.”
Samuel thak-lo,
Kalang!
Samuel ningjebomlo, “
Non nanglitum kedo adim arjapnon, lapen nanglitum aphan pachemathathu pen ajok neli nangdinlang, kosonsi
Jakob lapen la ahemtun atum Ijip damlo lapen Ijip asor latum aphan chenek-lo, kerap kelongjisi nangliphusar atum
Bonta rat atum halatum a-Arnam
Ansi halatum kerap kelongjisi
Lapen Gideon, Barak, Jephthah lapen kejutsi neliphan
Bonta Ammon arecho Nahash nanglitum aphan ketengkhengji thek-long-lo, nanglitum
Non nanglitum kangvaitang arecho ladak dolo, la aphan nanglitum hang-lo, lapen non
Kadokaveta mesen pen dampo, jongsi nanglitum nang Arnam
Bonta nanglitum jongsi
Lasi nanglitum kedo aling ladak arjapnon lapen
Non ningkreng asek-lo, kalima? Bonta neli Arnam ardompo lapen
Anke Samuel arnam ardomlo, lapen halaso arni
Anke kedo-an arat atum Samuel aphan pulo, “Nelitum kethithedetjile
Anke rat atum aphan Samuel thak-lo, “Phereri; nanglitum lapuson kehingno akam klemlo seta,
Ahok-he a-arnam-heihei aphi dunrinon, halatum nanglitum aphan thangnatta nangrap thekthe, athema halatum ahok kali.
nanglitum aphan chechakthip-lo, Alangli nanglitum aphan nang-o-elo, athema la nanglitum aphan amethang arat aso kepaplangjisi phartang-lo.
Neliphan ke
Nanglitum aning kedo-an pen
Bonta nanglitum jongsi pap klemverlote nanglitum lapen nanglitum arecho aphan pavirdetpo.”
Sol arta ningkan 35 anbak dolo, la recho kecho ahut; lapen la recho cholo lapen Israel aputhak ningkan phlikep-ra hini pangrilo.

Sol bangsuri kethom amonit ingvailo, bangsuri hini halatum Mikmash alongri lapen Bethel anglong alongri anat amethang along monit cheponlo lapen bangsuri isi ke asopo Jonathon, Gibeah anat Benjamin akhei alongri toilo. Sol ahin amonit anke hem toi-et-lo.

Geba along Philistia anokbe aphan Jonathon pathilot-lo, lapen laso alam Philistia kedo-an atum arjulong-et-lo. Anke Sol pherangke atum aphan toisi ron kechedanji aphan pong-ut kebut pen ajok Ibri adet kedo-an aphan hangpet-lo.
Sol si Philistia apinpo aphan pathilo, lapen Philistia atum halatum aphan hijimtang-lo pu Israel kedo-an aphan thanlo. Lasi Gilgal along Sol pen kejelangdunjisi rat atum dunpet-lo.

Philistia atumta Israel pen kechedanjisi chingrumpet-lo; halatum bangsuri 30 ron ahemkonglong do, bang suri throk losei kardon atum do, lapen talo asangti ajo sangti amu asonsi ongdung aron-aso dolo. Halatum Mikmash anat damlo, la Bethaven anihang anat, lapen hadak mukam chekimlo.

Anke halatum Israel aphuthak ketengkheng chepangtang-lo, lapen halatum aphan aning pabiremlo. Ajehak a-Israel atum longku ajo lapen angthor along chepatulo, lapen arlong-heihei along mate hilik arlo lapen langtuk-heihei arlo chepatulo.
Akaprek atum Jordan Aroi hatsi Gad lapen Gilead alongri damlo.
Sol ke Gilgal alongri dobomlang. lapen la along kedo arat atum kepheresi a-ok klemhurlo.
La ni 7 Samuel aphan inghong-lo, la aphan keklem nangji Samuel kepinkhat ateng-lo; bonta Samuel ke Gilgal along nonpu anta nanglelelang. Rat atum Sol pen pratseilo.
La apotsi halatum aphan la pulo, “Nelong kephrin athok-heihei vannon lapen kejelang athok pilo,
lapen lahei la pajutsi Samuel nanglelo. La aphan kechetongjisi Sol damlo, lapen laphan ingthumlo,
bonta Samuel pulo, ‘Nangli kopisi la keklemloma?’”
Sol thak-lo, “Rat atum neliphan ne-obomlo; lapen nangli kevangji pu ateng nanglita nangleledet-lo ke, la aparta Philistia atum Mikmash along chingrumpet-lo.
Lasi neli mathalo, ‘Philistia atum ladak Gilgal along neliphan tengkhengdetpo, lapen
Samuel thak-lo, “La ke kelu akamsi keklemlo, Nangliphan nangkepi
Bonta nonke nangli pangrilong-o-elo, pima nangli alangliphan kroikredet-lo.

Samuel Gilgal olo, lapen amethang atovar chedamlo. Sol aron-aso along kejelangdunjisi damlo lapen ahin arat anta la aphi phi dunlo. Halatum Gilgal pen Gibeah, Benjamin alongri damlo, Sol amethang aron-aso aphan langcharilo, bang 600 anbak amonit dolang.
Sol, lapen la asopo Jonathon, lapen halatum amonit Geba Benjamin alongri alongsi mukam chekimlo. Philistia atum ke Mikmash alongsi mukam chekimlo.
Philistia aron-aso atum amethang amukam pen pasongthom kethidamjisi barlo: esong abang ke Ophrah, la Shual alongri anatsi damlo,
akaprek asong atum ke Beth-Horon anatsi damlo, lapen akaprek asong ke Zeboim arlok lapen kejejangtang ajo kechecharplot ahoi anatsi damlo.
Israel adet hemai atum ave, pima Ibri atum nokjir lapen chir keselam longledetjisi Philistia atum klemlo.
(Israel atum amethang alangnoi aphal, ku, cho, lapen nokek-rangso karsoji aphan Philistia atum along damnang-lo.
Cho karso lapen sat karsoji aphan poisa adumso isi, phal lapen ku karsoji aphan poisa adumso hini anam pinang-lo.)
Lasi ron ahut anta Sol lapen la asopo Jonathon pen apar baduta nokjir lapen chir avedet-lo.
Mikmash atovar keraijisi Philistia atum esong aron-aso toilo.
Arnisi Jonathon amethang arisim kepon ariso aphan pulo, “Ha Philistia amukam anat hatdamput lonang.” Bonta apo Sol aphan Jonathon chethanthedet-lo.
Apo ke Migron along dalim arong arumsi mukam kimlo, la Gibeah pen helo-o-e; la along bang 600 amonit dolo.
(Kurusar arlo-achoi kepon abang ke Ahijah, la Ikabod a-ik Ahitub mate Phinehas asopo lapen Shiloh along
Mikmash atovarsi Philistia amukam keleji aphan Jonathon damnangji, hadak longchongthepi hini do, asitin atovar akrong along la dolo: Isi abang ke Bozez lapen akaprek abang ke Seneh pulo.
Isi abang ke nirep ahin Mikmash anatsi pangnolo, lapen akaprek abang ke nitur ahin Geba anatsi pangnolo.
Riso amonit aphan Jonathon pulo, “Ha kekroikre a-Philistia atum amukam anat hatput lonang.
Riso abang thak-lo, “Nangli jat-le klem seta, nanglilong neli dolo.”
“Mesenlo.” Jonathon pulo, “Etum hatput lonang, lapen Philistia atum epalangdun lonang.
Etum along kevangji aphan halatum epanghongtoi lote, etum karjap adim along amat inghongkok lonang.
Bonta jongsi etum aphan halatum along damnangji pulote, etum damlonang pima lahelo etum aphan halatum aphuthak
Lasi latum aphan Philistia atum palangdunlo, lapen Philistia atum pulo, “Langtha! Ajehak a-Ibri atum kechepatu angthor pen nangbarlo,
anke halatum Jonathon lapen riso amonit aphan hang-lo, ‘Ladak angsong an vangtha! Netum pen eson nangkethanji alam dolang!’”
Riso amonit aphan Jonathon pulo, “Nephi phi nangdunnon, halatum aphuthak kehaiji aphan

Tovar angsong Jonathon ari akeng patongruisi karkum pen arlulo, lapen riso amonit ta la aphi phi dunlo. Philistia atum aphan Jonathon tengkhengsi halatum aphan arum tengphit-phit lo, lapen riso abang halatum aphan pathilo.
Kechengsi kepathi ahut Jonathon lapen riso amonit chiri isi ra ebeng adang angbong bang 20 anbak amonit pathilo.
Rongkedo a-Philistia atum ke pherepik-lo; kethipon atum lapen ron-aso atum kepheresi a-ok klemhurlo; pirthe klemhurlo lapen hadak hangjoja lo.
Benjamin alongri Gibeah along Sol amonit kehon atum Philistia atum manghu mangram pen kekat thek-long-lo.
Lasi amethang amonit aphan Sol pulo, “Ron-aso lakhanon lapen komat abangsi kavema langnon.” Halatum la klemlo lapen Jonathon arisim kepon amonit pen Jonathon aphan thek-longledet-lo.
“Kurusar arlo-achoi ladak vannon, “ pusi Sol ke Ahijah kurusar aphan pulo. (Halaso arni Ahijah Israel arat angno la ponlo.)
Kurusar aphan Sol kepu ahut Philistia amukam along kehurisei litponbomlo, lasi la aphan Sol pulo, “
Anke la lapen amonit atum pen pen Philistia atum amethang hijan kechedan kehorisei anat dampaksi kechedanji aphan barlo.
Ajehak a-Ibri atum Philistia atum anatsi dolo lapen halatum pen pen mukam anat damsi abe kedun chelarsi Sol lapen Jonathon along chelangdunlo.
Ephraim anglong-heihei along kechepatu akaprek atum Philistia atum kattang-lo pu arjulong-lo, lasi halatum anta chelangdunpetsi Philistia atum aphan tengkheng-lo,
lapen tovarsoding chedansi Bethaven apar anta hungdunlo. Halaso arni

Halaso arni Israel atum an kangchir si aini-ainalo, pima Sol semetangsi pulo, lapen hukumpilo, “Ne hotur aphuthak alar kehuitangte aphrang mane abang jongsi pini arni an cholote ahirjuno paphonang.” Lasi baduta losini thangnatta chochedet-lo.
Latum kedo-an thengpi ajo vang-lo lapen pijo alang alongtin ta thek-long-lo.
Thengpi ajo pijo alangsi dothip, bonta baduta la junjedet-lo pima halatum Sol ahirjuno aphan pherelo.
Bonta rat aphan kepi ahukum Jonathon arjulonglelang; lasi kepon achin pen pijo alangbong arlo an chut-lo lapen ajehak pijo alang junlo. La amat la rengme muchot-lo.
Bonta inut abang pulo, “Nelitum kedo-anta kangchirsi thininalo, bonta nanglipo nelitum aphan papheresi pulo, ‘Badutame pini an kecho aling abang ahirjuno paphonangpu.’”
Jonathon thak-lo, “Kopi akephere meme akamsi ne rat aphan nepo klemloma?”
Langtha neli ko-an ingtang-lo, pima neli ajehak pijo alang junlo!
Hotur aphan paremdet aphi nerat atum jongsi halatum kechepon a-an pini checholong asonte ko-an akemeji, mathatha, ko-an a-Philistia aphan latum pathi unjilang apot-lo!
Halaso arni Philistia aphan Israel atum paremlo, Mikmash pen Aijalon atovar soding an chedanlo. Halaso ahut an Israel atum an kangchir thininailo,
lapen halatum lasi hotur kepon kelongpon biresak, chainong-heihei hadak amat thusi avi dokok-lang seta, la chodet-lo.
Laso alam Sol aphan thandet-lo. Langnon, avi kedolang a-ok kecho pen ajok Israel arat
Nangtum chobeichot abang! Pusi Sol hangcharbulo. Nedung an arlongpi pakong-long non.

Ansi la akaprek ahukum pilo, “Nerat atum along damra lapen halatum aphan thandamnon, halatum kedo-an achainong lapen biresak an ladak pavanpetnon. Halatum lahei ladak thusi chonangji; avi kedo a-ok kecho halatum
Lapen Sol kekim cheng adovan
Amethang amonit aphan pulo, “Eli hirdamlonang, lapen Philistia atum aphan ajo tengkheng-ra arni kevang an halatum amar thidam et-lonang lapen kedo-an aphan pathilonang.”
Nanglining kehang akeme alingle klem iknon, pusi halatum thak-lo.
Bonta kurusar pulo, Aphrangsi
Lasi Arnam aphan Sol arjulo, “Philistia atum aphan ne tengkheng nangjima? Netum aphan nang-pahaijima?” Bonta halaso arni Arnam thakthedet-lo.
Ansi rat ajalin atum aphan Sol pulo, “Vang-petnon lapen pini kopi apapsi klemtang-loma ri lonang.
Israel atum aphan kepahai
Lasi halatum aphan Sol pulo, “Nanglitum kedo-an ladak vangpet-ra arjapsarnon, Jonathon lapen nelita hadak arjappo.” “Nanglining kehang akeme alingle klem iknon, “ pusi halatum thak-lo.
Israel a-Arnam
Ansi Sol pulo, “Nesopo Jonathon lapen ne angbong ingsaithunon,” lapen Jonathon amensi klang-lo.
Anke Jonathon aphan Sol arjulo, “Nang kopisi keklemloma?”
Jonathon thak-lo, “Ne ke-otdong achin pen asap-o pijo alang cholo. Ne daksi dolo ne kethiji aphanta chesikding-lo.”
La aphan Sol thak-lo, “Nangphan jongsi nangpathithe pulote Arnam nephan nepathengbop-lonang!”
Bonta Sol aphan rat atum pulo, “Israel aphan kepahaidet a-Jonathon aphan pathilot nangjima? Kali! Nelitum
Lasi aphi Philistia atum aphan Sol kehungdun ingtonkok-lo, lapen halatum amethang alongri anat chevoithulo.

Sol, Israel arecho plangdet aphi la kedo-an ahotur atum pen adang bithe chedanlo. Moab atum pen, Ammon atum pen, lapen Edom atum pen, Zebah lapen Ammon atum pen lapen Philistia arecho atum pen chedanlo. Kechedan alongtin ta la haithorlo.
Nokbe ason chedanlo lapen Amalek arat aphan anta paremlo, la Israel aphan kedo-an aketengkheng pen pajok-lo.
Sol asomar ke Jonathon, Ishvi lapen Malki Shua. La asopi akleng amen ke Merab lapen akebi abang ke Mikal.
La apiso ke Ahinoam, bangpi Ahimaaz asopilo; Alangli ron-armu apinpo ke Abner, la Sol a-punu Ner asopolo.
Sol apo ke Kish lapen Abner apo Nerke Abiel asopolo.
La rengtik an, Sol ke Philistia atum pen kethi-kerengpin an chedan nang-lo. Lasi kangtang-kangsak lapen angthin kethe amonit kelong an la aron-armu along amen thappon-lo.
Sol aphan Samuel pulo, “
La Amalek arat aphan adukpipo, pima Israel atum Ijip pen kevang ahut halatum aphusar atum khamkhedunlo.

Damra Amalek atum aphan tengkhengnon, lapen halatum kedo ason an pavirklungnon. Isibak amarta pajok-longri. Kedo-an pinso-arlo, osomar, kethi-ivok; chainong, biresak, ka-ut kedo-an lapen gadha kedo-an lahei pathi-etnon.”
Sol kedo-an kechedan asong aphan hangpet-lo lapen Telem along halatum aphan lakhalo. Israel pen ron-aso suri 200, lapen Judah pen suri kep dolo.
Anke la lapen la amonit kedo-an Amalek arongsopi damsi langkung kekrengtai ajo chepatuklipsi inghongding-lo.

Israel atum Ijip pen kevang ahut aphusar atum kangjinso dun Ken asor aphan pacheretoilo: “Damnon lapen Amalek atum pen che-onon anke ne halatum pen pen nangtum aphan nangpathirap petpe detpo.” Lasi Ken aso atum kat-et-lo.
Amalek aphan Sol paremdet-lo. Havilah pen Shur, la ha Ijip anihang an chedanlo;
la Amalek arecho Agag aphan akereng nepchek-lo lapen kedo-an arat aphan pathilap-lo.

Bonta Sol lapen la amonit atum Agag achethe pajok-lo, lapen akemenei abiresak lapen achainong, chainong aso lapen biresak aloso, mate akeme amar an pathithedet-lo; ale kave lapen amokevangve amar an si halatum pavirchot-lo.
Samuel aphan
“Sol aphan Ne recho kebat apot ningduk-lo; la nepen suitang-lo lapen Ne hukum-heihei kroikrelo.” Samuel aningthilo, Jopangthang la
Puthot adap Sol aphan kechetongjisi la damlo. Sol ke Karmel arpongso anat damtang-lo pu la arjulong-lo, hadak amethang anong kechekimo ahem kekim adimlo, lapen la Gilgal anat damlo.
Samuel Sol along an arludamlo lapen la Samuel aphan pulo, “
Samuel arjulo, “Tangte kopisi chainong lapen biresak kangreng ase ne karjulong nangkok-lo?”
Sol thak-lo, “Ne monit atum lahei Amalek atum pen vanlo. Halatum nangli Arnam
“Do joinon.” Samuel hukum pilo, “Lapen kopisi
“Nangthannon, “ Sol pulo.
Samuel thak-lo, “Nangmethang aphan thangta kali pu jonghe chepu seta nangli Israel ajalin lo. Nangliphan
lapen kehingno Amalek atum aphan kepavirjisi nangliphan hukum pisi toitang-lo. Halatum aphan pathi-et-etik ke chedanbom nangji pusi alangli hukum pitang-lo.
Tangte kopisi la aphan nangli kroikredet-loma? Kopisi nangli kethipon amar aputhak anat lapen
“Neli
Bonta nelimonit atum kemenei abiresak lapen achainong halatum kelong an pathithedet-lo; la vivesi halatum lahei ladak Gilgal along nangli Arnam
Samuel pulo, “
La abe kethur ke maja kanghoi atum kehingno asonsi hingnolo, lapen ane chepathe ke kumlin kardom apap asonlo. Alangli hukum nangli dengdelo apotsi; la nangliphanta recholo pu dengdelo.”
“Kalang-lo, neli pap klemtang-lo,” Sol thak-lo. “Neli
Bonta neli nangliphan choningrilo, neli pap kedo-an diyara nelilong nangduntha, anke neli
“Neli nanglilong nangdunde,” Samuel thak-lo. “Nangli
Anke Samuel ke-ojisi chetevarlo, bonta Sol la ape otdunhet-lo, lapen la chingsek cherlo.
La aphan Samuel pulo, “Pini nangli pen Israel Recho-arat ingsektang-lo, lapen nangli par keme muchot anut kaprek aphansi la pidetpo.
Israel adak-atur Arnam chobeibe mate aning chelarle. La monit kali, alangli aning chelarle.”
“Ne pap klemtang-lo,” Sol thak-lo. “Bonta ne rat ajalin atum lapen Israel angno asap-o aman nepitha. Nelilong nangduntha anke neli nangli Arnam
Ansi la along Samuel dunlo, lapen
“Agag recho nelilong ladak vannon, “ Samuel hukum pilo. La angno Agag recho vang-lo, pheresi a-ok klemhurlo, amethang aphan chemathalo, “Kethi la ko-an akeho!”
Samuel pulo, “Nangnokjir pen ongdung apei aphan aso pavelo, lasi non nangpei ta asopo avedetpo.” Lapen la Agag aphan Gilgal adovan athengno ingthan-i-ilo.
Ansi Ramah anat Samuel damlo, lapen Sol Recho ahem Gibeah anat chedamlo.
Samuel rengtik an, la arecho aphan cheklangkledet-lo; bonta la aphuthak la aningdukpik-lo. Sol aphan Israel arecho kebat aputhak
Samuel Aphan
“Ne la kopusonsi klemthekpo?” Samuel arjulo, “Jongsi la arjulong lote, la neliphan pathilotpo!”
Jesse aphan ta phanon, lapen nang kopima keklemnangji Ne nangthanpo. Nangphan Ne kepachiniji abang aphanle nang recho kebat ajangthu hi non.”
“Kalang.” La thak-lo. “Neli
Halatum nanglesi, Jesse asopo Eliab aphan Samuel thek-lok-lo, lapen amethang chepulo, “Labangso amonit ladak
Bonta la aphan
Ansi Jesse asopo Abinadab aphan hangsi la Samuel angno vanlo. Bonta Samuel pulo, “Kali
Jesse anke Shammah aphan vanlo, “Kali, la aphanta
Lasonsi Jesse asomar bang throksi Samuel angno vanlo. Lapen Samuel laphan pulo, “Kali, latum angbong pen
Ansi la aphan alangli arjulo, “Nanglisopo dolangma?”
Jesse thak-lo, “Akebisi abang dolang, bonta la biresak kelangjisi damjui.”
“La aphan ladak pavangtha,” Samuel pulo, “La vangvetik-ke Etum athok pajirjelo.”
Lasi Jesse la aphan pahangdamlo. La kelang athok do-o, a-ok-mesen ariso, lapen amek langmesen. Samuel aphan
Samuel jit ajangthu ponsi la a-ik atum angno David aphan jangthu patip-lo. La amat
Sol aphan
La aphan aban pulo, “Nelitum chinilo,
Lasi nelitum aphan hukum pinon, akehai, lapen nelitum inut amonit kumbeleng kerotthek abang ripo. Karjong-langno nangli phuthak kevang ahut laso amonit akumbeleng rotpo, lapen nangli methudetpo.”
Halatum aphan Sol hukum pilo, “Inut kerot theknei amonit rinon lapen la aphan nelong vannon.”

La aphan kangduk angbong inut abang pulo, “Jesse, la Bethlehem asor inut asopo do la inut thekser aduhuidilo, la angthin the-o lapen athok kedo amonit, inut mesen aron-aso, lapen inut lamthan-thekpo. La along
Lasi Sol, pherangke atum aphan toisi Jesse aphan laso alam paputoilo, “Nelong nanglisopo David, biresak kevi abang nangtoitha.”
Jesse, David aphan Sol along toilo, bi ejon paponlo, gadha ejon athak him lapen ok-reng ajarong isithup drakha ahorlang panghorponlo.
Sol along David vang-lo, lapen la along kam keklemjisi lutdamlo. La aphan Sol aning dok-o, lapen la ron-arisim kepon abangphu ingvailo.
Anke Jesse aphan Sol isi abirta lolo: “Neli David aphan ning dok-olo, ladak nelong-le kam paklem lonang.”
Halaso arni pen Sol aphuthak karjong-langno
Judah arong Sokoh pu along Philistia atum ron kechedanjisi chingrumpet-lo; lapen ajehak adak Ephis Dammim adimsi halatum mukam chekimlo.
Sol lapen Israel atum Elah Arlok alongsi mukam chekimlo, lapen hadaksi Philistia atum pen ron kechedanji aphan chesik-lo.
Philistia atum ehin anat anglong along aren arjapsarlo, lapen Israel atum akaprek anat arjapsarlo, latum angbong arlok isi dolo.
Gath arongsopi pen Goliath pu inut amonit Israel atum pen kechedanjisi Philistia amukam pen nangbarlo.
La ajon ingrup throk ra echak lapen tam-angchin ke-er aphutup ta chekup.
Akeng-heihei ta tam angchin apindeng pen chebang-lo, lapen la tam angchin achir aphang athak an chevek-lo.
La achir harpi abe asonsi arthat-lo, lapen chir aplang kardik lin throksi anbak do. Inut aron-aso la angno damsi la achong ponpilo.

Goliath arjapthersi Israel atum aphan hang-lo, “Nangtum hadak kopisi keklemlo, ron kechedanji aphan aren arjapnon? Ne inut a-Philistia, nangtum Sol aban! Ne pen kechedanjile nangtum angbong pen inut chingvainon.
Hala jongsi haidet-lo, pulote, nephan pathipo lapen netum nangtum aban plangpo; bonta ne jongsi haidet-lo pulote, nangtum kedo-anta netum aban plang nangpo.
Ladak ne nangtum Israel aron-armu aphan ladak kechedanji aphan phalo. Ne pen pachedan-rappetji aphan nangtum angbong pen inut aphan ne hang-lo.”
Sol lapen la amonit atum arjulongsi halatum pherelo.
David ke Judah along Bethlehem pen Ephrath asor Jesse asopo. Jesse asomar bang nerkep do, lapen Sol recho kecho ahut la sarru amonit-lo.
Ron kechedanjisi la asomar bangkethom ke Sol alongsi dunlo. Aklengsi ke Eliab, adun abang Abinadab lapen kethom adun abang Shammah.
David ke aso akebineilo, lapen a-ik atum bangkethom Sol along kedodun ahut,
David Sol pen ha Bethlehem apo abiresak kelangjisi ahut adak helatbom.
Goliath arnivang adap lapen arnikangsam ni 40 an Israel atum kechedanji aphan phalo.
Arnisi David aphan Jesse pulo, “La sangkarnu lin 10 lapen him plang 10 lahei ponserak ra mukam kedo nang-ik atum along damseraknon.
Lapen la chulang athu plang kep hukum kepi ahemphu aphan ponpinon.”
Nang-ik atum mephun-langma pura arjunon, lapen halatum aphan nang mesenlang pu thek-longvek-lo pulote, laso angthek pini amat nang birta vannon.
Sol recho lapen nang-ik atum lapen Israel kedo-an atum Philistia atum pen kechedanjisi Elah Arlok alongsi dolo.

Puthot adap David thurdap-prangsi biresak kelang akam mane aphan pektekangsi an ponlo lapen la aphan Jesse kepu atengsi damlo. Israel atum kechedan damjisi aren karjap lapen ron kechedan akehang hangjo ahut David ledunlo.
Philistia lapen Israel aron-armu atum kechedanjisi kedo adim charjap-rep-lo, pu pu chepangno phrong-lo.
An kepador ahemphu aridengsi David an tekang-lo, lapen ron karjap adim kat-lo, lapen a-ik atum along damlo lapen halatum kopusonma arjulo.
Halatum pen chingkibom ahut Goliath vangchotsi aphrang asonthot Israel-atum pen kechedanji aphan phalo. Lapen David la arjulong-lo.
Israel atum Goliath aphan thek-longsi pherelo lapen kat-lo.

“Laphan langtha!” Pusi halatum lahin lahin chepulo. “La ron kechedan akepha arjutha! La aphan kepathi un aling abangphan Sol recho isi thedung anong-e kepiji chechak-lo, lapen recho asopi la bangphan penan chopidetpo, lapen la abang apo ahemtun pen midu ta pinangnelo.”

Adung abangphan David arjulo, “Laso a-Philistia aphan kepathi abang lapen Israel aphan non ason kepinrem pen kepajok abang kopi longji? Jat seta la kereng aron-armu Arnam aphan kepinrem akekroikre a-Philistia komat-lo?”
Goliath aphan kepathi abangphan kopi pipoma, la aphan than-et-lo.

David a-ik akleng Eliab, halaso amonit pen David kechingki alam arjudun long-lo. La David aphan aningthisi pulo, “Nang ladak kopi akamlo? Kejejangtang ajo ingtan along halahei abiresak komatsi kelang-lo? Nang ke oso! Nang ron arong kelangjitong kevangma?”
“Non ne kopisi keklemlo?” David arjulo. “Ne lam etheta arju kartangma?”
La anut kaprek aphan chetevarsi lasonthot arjulo, lapen aphongtin akarjuta la esonnat akethaksi la long-lo.
Ajehak amonit atum David kopisi keningjema arjudun long-lo, lapen halatum Sol aphan thanserlo, lapen alangli laphan pahangdet-lo.
Sol aphan David pulo, “Recho badutame laso a-Philistia aphan phere nangne! Neli damsi la pen chedanpo.”
“Kali” Sol thak-lo, “Nangli kosonsi la pen chedanpoma? Nangli inut osohek-lang, lapen hala ke bang akai arjonsi ron aso keplang!”
“Recho,” David pulo, “Nelipo abiresak neli kelang ahut, hingho lapen thokvam biresak chonep-lo,
neli la aphi dunsi la aphan tengkhengpo lapen biresak aphan pajokpo, lapen hingho lapen thokvam jongsi nelinat pangnokhrap lote, neli la achethok ingkep-hetpo lapen la aphan arbusi pathipo.
Neli hingho lapen thokvam pathitang-lo, lasonthotsi la kereng-et aron-armu Arnam aphan kepinrem akekroikre a-Philistia aphanta klempo.
Hingho lapen thokvam atum pen
“Mesenlo,” Sol thak-lo, “Damnon,
Alangli methang ron kechedan apindeng David aphan pachepindengjisi la aphan pilo: tam ingchin aphutup isi, la David aphu athak kup-lo, ron apindeng achoi,

Sol anokjir ron apindeng athak David chesek-lo lapen kengkam kechejorji bor-ilo, bonta la un-edet-lo, pima lahei la kaita chepindengde pinlang. “Lahei pen neli chedan-i thekthe,” Sol aphan la pulo, “Neli lahei rimre pinlang.” Lasi lahei la chephlok-et-lo.
La biresak kevi achin cheponsi longkoiso akenaibot mupho langso pen humponlo lapen ajarong arlo lahei chethap-lo, lapen phamri pen kevar abathuli chesiksi Goliath pen kechetongjisi damlo.
Philistia abang David anat kevang pangcheng-lo, la angno ron arisim kepon abang pen vangbomsi patebok-lo,
lapen la David aphan langpamesi la aphan inghon pangtung-lo, pima la bihek a-osolang, kelang langmechit a-osolang.
David aphan la pulo, Halaso achin ke kopi aphanlo ko? Ne methan putong nang kemathama? David aphuthak a-arnam amen pen ahirjuno hang-lo.
“Vangnon,” la David aphan phalo, “Lapen nang-ok ne vo lapen marat api aphan pisi pachodetpo.”
David thak-lo, “Nang nokjir, chir, lapen kejor achir pensi nelong kevang, bonta neke nang kepinremtang Israel aron-armu Arnam, Jakong kethe
Pini arni nephuthak
Lapen ladak kedo abangphutin ta
Goliath puthot David anat kedam pangcheng-lo, lapen Philistia pen ron aren kechedanjisi David la anat kat paprap-lo.
La ajarong arlo ari chephusi longkoiso emu enlo, la pen Goliath anat ap-lo. Halaphan la atehang rosi aphu ap-dak-lo. Lapen Goliath longle athak kreptak-lo.
Lasi nokjir avepin pen David paremsi Goliath aphan phamri pen kevar abathuli lapen longkoiso emu pen pathilot-lo.
La adung la katvirsi la athak ardontanlo, lapen Goliath anokjir ahom pen nokjir satsi la aphu ingthanpong-lo lapen la aphan pathilo.
Philistia atum halatum anokbe kethi thek-longsi latum kat-lo.

Israel lapen Judah amonit atum hangjolo, lapen halatum aphi aphi hungdunlo, Gath lapen Ekron anghap anat an tovarsoding halatum hungdunlo. Shaar-aim adovan anat kedam Gath lapen Ekron atovarsoding Philistia atum chingkoisi akeng so-olo.
Philistia atum aphan kehungdun pen Israel atum nangchevoisi halatum amukam along latum mar thiponlo.
Goliath aphu David humsi la Jerusalem anat pondet-lo, bonta Goliath aron-arisim la amukam along chebilo.
Goliath pen David ron kechedan kedam ahut ron-armu hukum kepi abangphu, Abner aphan Sol arjulo, “Abner, la komat asopolo?”
“Neli chinine, Recho,” Abner thak-lo.
“Tangte damra arjudamnon,” Sol hukum pilo.
Lasi Goliath aphan David pathidetsi amukam kechevoi ahut, la aphan Abner, Sol along pondet-lo. Halaso ahut anta Goliath aphu David otdinglang.
La aphan Sol pulo, “Riso nangli komat asopolo?”
“Neli ke Bethlehem asor nangliban Jesse asopo,” David thak-lo.
Sol lapen David latum kechingki pajut-lo. Laso aphi David aphan Sol asopo Jonathon aning dok-khak-lo. La aphan amethang asonthot kanghonjisi vang-lo.
Halaso arni pen David aphan la along Sol padodunlo, lapen ahem pachedam toitedet-lo.
La aphan aning kedok ongsi David aphan Jonathon kejutje pin pajirpo aseme tang-lo.
La kechekok vamri chephloksi la David aphan ron arisim pen pen pilo, lapen la anokjir, athai lapen vamkok ta pilo.
Sol ketoi akam an David keklem pachunpilo, lapen la aphan la aron-armu achakri Sol bak-lo. Laso akam Sol achakri lapen amonit atum an la aphan aningdok-hurlo.

Goliath aphan pathidet aphi, David lapen ron-aso atum hem kechevoi ahut, arlosopimar atum Israel arongtin pen Sol recho aphan kechetongjisi nangbarlo. Halatum aning karong alun lunsi kanlo, lapen mirdong-prakso-heihei thip-lo.
Halatum ketalon ahut arlosopimar atum lunlo, “Sol ke suri pathilo, bonta David ke suri kep pathilo.”
La Sol aningdokde det-lo, lapen la aning thipik-lo. La pulo, “David aphan halatum bangsurikep hok-lo, bonta nephan ke suri isi vet. La aphan latum nedun recho batpo!”
Lapen halaso arni pen la David aphan lang-un-elo lapen hontheverlo.

Arnisi Arnam pen karjonglangno Sol along vangsi plengset-lo, lapen la amethang ahem ingcham amonit asonsi ningjetap-lo. David abang ke kai asonthak-thaksi kumbeleng ardengbomlo, lason ahut, Sol abang chir otdongsi,
“Ne la aphan arpong along jor pacherap-hetji,” pusi amethang chepulo, lapen bataihini la anat chir jorlo; bonta aphongtinta David cheseraichorlo.
David aphan Sol pherelo, pima la along
Lasi la aphan Sol angno pen toisi bangsuri isi anokbe ahemphu bat-lo. Anke alangli la angno pen damjuilo lapen rat atum alongsi dolo.
Lapen la keklem alingta chunlo, pima la along
David kepachun akam Sol thek-long-lo lapen la aphan aphi-ong phere-ong-lo.
Israel lapen Judah along abangphutin amonit David aphan inghonlo, pima la inut kepachunthek ajalinlo.

Anke David aphan Sol pulo, “Nelisopi akleng Merap ladak dolo. Bangpi nangliphan neli piso nangchopipo, bangpi nangli piso plangpo, jongsi nangli neliphan inut angthin kethe lapen kekroithirklong aron-aso ason neliphan ingduk-lote.” (Sol mathalo, lason pen David aphan Philistia atum pathilotpo, laso akam amethang klemvek nangnelo.)
David thak-lo, “Neli lapen nelihemtun kopilo, neli recho a-osa keplang nangji?”
Bonta David aphan Merab kepi apor nangkele ahut ke la aphan pipesi anut kaprek amonit Meholah pen Adriel pu aphan penan chopidet-lo.
Tebonseta, Sol asopi Mikal ke David pen aningchedok-lo, lapen laso alam Sol arjulong-lo, la aning dok-olo.
La amethang chepulo, “David aphan ne Mikal si chopipo, bangpi pen ne la aphan moipo lapen Philistia atum pen ajok la aphan pathitoipo.”
La achakri atum aphan hukum pisi David aphan papujoitoilo, “Recho nangliphan aning nangdok-o lapen la achakri atum anta; non helo la asopi pen kechepangri apor kemelo.”
Lasi laso alam halatum David aphan thanlo, lapen la thak-lo, “Recho a-osa kemanlong ke isi aman kethe-o anong-lo, neli son ningjoino lapen keduk aso aphan the-ongchot-lo.”
David keputang alam Sol aphan achakri atum than-et-lo,

lapen David aphan kepathanjisi halatum aphan Sol hukumpilo. “Piso anam nangli pen recho kenangjike bangpharo a-Philistia kethitang atum a-ok kangduk achet vanpinangji, la ahotur aphuthak alar kehui ason manpo.” (Lasonsi Philistia atum arideng Sol ke David aphan pathitoilo.)
Sol, keputang alam achakri atum David aphan thanlo, lapen recho a-osa kemanjisi David aning cheparong lo.

Anke David thursi amethang amonit atum pen damsi bang pharohini a-Philistia amonit aphan pathilo; lapen David halatum achelek angchun vanlo, lahei aphai ateng Recho aphan pi pamelo. Lasi David aphan Sol ke asopi Mikal penan chopi nangkok-lo.
David along
Lasi David aphan ansose la pherelo, lapen la rengtik an ahotur ason plang-lo.
Philistia aron-armu vangsi chedanpo, bonta akaprek achakri atum apar ta David aphongtin hailo. La apotsi David anong kejume chethanghulo.
Asopo Jonathon lapen kedo-an achakri atum David aphan kepathiji kemang alam than-et-lo. Bonta David aphan Jonathon aningdokpik,
lapen la aphan la pulo, “Nelipo nangliphan kepathijisi bor-ilo. Penap adap cherepametu; pine kechininepin adim chepatu damra hadak dokoknon.
Neli damsi nangli kechepatu arit ajo nelipo adung arjappo, lapen nanglilam nelipo aphan nelithanpo. Jongsi pine neli long-lote neli nangliphan than pachinipo.”

Sol angno David aphan Jonathon rolo, lapen pulo, “Akehai, nangliban David aphan thangnat akehingno klemri. Alangli nangphan thangnat akehingno klemklelang; seta la keklem asontin nangphan akerap ketheneisi klemlo.
La Goliath aphan kepathi ahut amethang apran chesongdut-lo, lapen Israel aphan
Jonathon kepu alam Sol kroilo, lapen
Lasi David aphan Jonathon hang-lo. Lapen kadokave alam laphan than-et-lo; anke laphan la Sol along pondet-lo, lapen aphrang asonthak thaksi Sol aphan David ingduk-lo.
Philistia atum pen puthot ron thurthulo. Halatum aphan David tengkhengsi parempamelo, lapen halatum kedo-an kat nang-et-lo.
Arnisi
David aphan Sol achir pen kejorbopji bor-ilo, bonta David cheseraisi chir arpong along jorchok-lo, David katjuisi chepajok-lo.

Halaso ajo amat Sol ajehak amonit David ahem toisi la aphan puthot adap kepathijisi patondamlo. David apiso Mikal la aphan pacheretoilo, “Nang jongsi paningve damde pulote, penap ke nang kethitangpo.”
Bangpi la aphan inghapso pen arum pasunjoilo, lapen la katjuilo, lapen chepajok-lo.
Anke bangpi hem kumlin ponsi hongplang athak la bat-lo, puhui isi bisi la aphu along bi angmi bilo, lapen la aputhak harlup pamelo.
David aphan Sol amonit atum keri ahut Mikal halatum aphan la aphu keso pusi thanlo.
Bonta halatum aphan Sol toithusi halatum methang amat David aphan palangdamtoilo. Halatum aphan la hukum pilo, “Ahongplang pen la aphan ladak vandet-non, lapen ne laphan pathilotpo.”
Halatum arlo damsi hem kumlin ahongplang athak lang-lo lapen la aphu along bi angmi apuhui long-lo.
Mikal aphan Sol arjulo, “Kopisi nang lapuson nechongthui loma? Lapen nehotur aphan pajok-loma?”
Bangpi thak-lo, “La neliphan pulo, jongsi ne laphan kepajokji rapdunde pulote nephan la pathilotpo.”
David katjuisi Ramah anat Samuel along damlo, la aphan Sol keklem an angton pen thanlo. Anke la lapen Samuel Naioth anat damsi hadak sakok-lo.
David, Ramah along Naioth si dopu thanlo,

lasi la aphan kepangnang jisi ajehak amonit toilo. Halatum esong amontri atum kekan hangjo thek-long-lo, lapen Samuel halatum ajalinlo. Anke Sol amonit atum aphanta Arnam akarjong pen plengset-lo, lapen halatum anta kansi hangjolo.
Laso alam Sol arjulongsi la ongdung apherangke atum aphan toilo batai kethom aphong, lapen lasonthotsi halatum aphanta plang-lo.
Ansi la amethang amat Ramah anat vang pangcheng-lo. Seku along langtukpi alang la nanglesi, Samuel lapen David konat-lo pu la arjulo, lapen halatum Naiothsi do pu halatum thanlo.
Hadak la damsi latum aphan ta Arnam akarjong si jalo, lapen latum kansi hangdunjolo, ha Naioth atovarsoding anta.
La apindeng chephloksi Samuel angno kansi hangdunlo, lapen halaso arni ape-ari avepinlo ha jopangthang antalo. (Lake aphrang kechethan kepu alam ateng-lo, “Sol ta inut amontri plang-loma pu.”)

Anke Ramah along Naioth pen David katsi Jonathon along damlo, “Neli kopilo keklem?” La arjulo, “Kopi pran karmut akamsi neli klemloma? Nanglipo neliphan kepathiji pu kopi akechokche akamsi neli klemtang-loma?”
Jonathon thak-lo, “Nangli kethinangji pen Arnam paklemkle nang. Neli po kopima keklem neliphan than-et-lo. Lamkethe, lamso tame lapen la nelipen patu un-e. La ahok kalima!”
Bonta David thak-lo, “Nangli neliphan chinghon-o pu alam nanglipo chinipame, lapen la kopisi keklemji mang-loma nangliphan pachininelo pu chesik et-lo, pima nangliphan la ning aduk pipo. Kereng-et
Jonathon pulo, “Nanglining kehang aling neli klempo.”
“Penap ke chiklo kemi achojun,” David thak-lo, “Lapen neli recho pen chorap-rap nangjilo. Bonta jongsi la nangliphan mesen pulote, neli damsi hidi ajo penapdik arnikangsam anta chepatudam-joipo.
Nanglipo jongsi kecho atebul along neli ave pu chinilote, alangliphan thannon, nelihem Bethlehemsi kechevur damjisi choningrilo punon, athe neli hemtun isi aphan ningkan esek hadak kethokji aporlo.
Alangli thak-lo, ‘mesenlo’ pulote, neli jokpo; bonta jongsi alangli ningthilo pulote, nangli chininangpo, neliphan kepasodakjisi alangli mathathip-lo.

Kanghon pen la, neliphan klem iktha, lapen nangli neliphan kechechak alam kangthir chebi vetnon. Bonta neli jongsi adai do, pulote nangli methangle neliphan pathinon! Kopisi nanglipo along ponsi neliphan pathi nangjilangma?”
“Lason matha ajat mathari!” Jonathon thak-lo, “Jongsi nelipo nangliphan kepathiji kemathathip alam neli chini pulote nangliphan neli thanthedetji apot-loma?”
Ansi David arjulo, “Nangliphan nanglipo aningkethi pen nangthak lote komatsi neliphan birta nelipipo.?”
“Eli hidi ajo damlonang,” Jonathon thak-lo. Lasi halatum damlo.
Lapen David aphan Jonathon thak-lo, “Israel Arnam
Jongsi nangliphan kepasodakji aninghang lapen laso alam nangliphan neli nangthanthe lapen pajokvanve pulote,
Lapen jongsi reng-et-lang pulote, kanghon pen nangli kechechak kangthir chebi pamenon, lapen nelilam kroinon; bonta neli thi-lo pulote,
lason isinat akangjinso nelihemtun aphan kaike paklangtha. Nangli hotur kedo-an aphan
nangli pen neli kechechak ason pachephriphre nang. La jongsi chephridak pulote,
Puthot aphongta David aphan Jonathon chinghonji pu chechak-lo. Pima amethang apar Jonathon David aphan chinghonlo.
Anke la aphan Jonathon pulo, “Penap ke chiklo Kemi achojun apot kecho amei along nangli ave pulote, nangliphan mathavekji.
Penapdik abang nangliphan mathamuchotpo , lasi aphrang kechepatu adimthot damra chepatu non lapen longbui anungle chepatumon.
La along batai kethom thai aso ap-po la isi kejong adim asonpo.
Anke neliban aphan kepariji aphan neli thanpo. Jongsi la aphan neli, ‘Langtha, lapen nanglinatsi do, damra endamnon,’ pu thanlote, nangli jokvanlo pu chininon, nangli nangbar unpo. Neli kereng-et
Bonta jongsi neli la aphan, ‘thai aso nangli paraisi do’ pu thanlote, o non, pima
Elitum lahin lahin kechechaktang asonthot
Lasi hidi ajo David chepatujoilo. Chiklo Kemi achojun ahut Sol Recho an kecho aboha along vang-lo,
lapen kai ason arpong kedaisi chongnilo. La adung Abner chongnilo, lapen Jonathon ke la angnosi chongnilo. David adim ke ingthaivang-lo,
bonta Sol thangta pupe halaso arni ke, pima la mathalo, “Laphan pine cheplangtang-lo, lapen la aron ateng pen ingthirthe.”
Puthot arni Chiklo-Kemi aphi, David adim puthot ingthaivang, lasi Jonathon aphan Sol arjulo, “Kopisi an kecho along David atum pinita vangvedet-loma?”
Jonathon thak-lo, “Alangli Bethlehem kedamjisi nephan cho-ningrilo.

‘Kanghon pen neliphan padamlongtha pusi la pulo, pima neli hemtun isi rong along kethok kepajir ketalon ahut neli ik atum anta hadak dodun nangji pusi hukum nepilo. lasi nangli jongsi neli jirpo pulote, neliphan nelidonrap nepachelangdam longtha.’ La apotsi nangli kecho atebul along alangli avedet-lo.”
Jonathon aphan Sol aningthisi pulo, “Nang kehingno asolo, nangpei ko-an nebethurlo lapen akekroi kave a-arlosolo! Non ne chini nang David anatsi do lapen nangmethangsi chepinremlo nangpei asonthot!
Nang chemathathema David rengtik ke laso adet recho cholonglelo pu? Non damra laphan dak vandet-non, la thivek nangji!”
Anke apo Sol aphan Jonathon thak-lo, “Kopisi alangliphan kepathi nangpo? Alang kopilo kechokche?”
Laso ahut Jonathon aphan kepathijisi Sol achir pen jorlo, lapen Jonathon chinipamelo, apo ke David aphan kepathijisi mathathip-lopu.
Jonathonta aningthisi tebul pen thurphlut-lo, lapen Chiklo-Kemi achojun adun arni thangta chochedet-lo. La David aphuthak aningdukpik-lo, pima la aphan Sol pinremlo.
David aphan kechetong damjisi Jonathon hidi ajo puthot adap damlo, aphrang halatum kechechak ateng. La along inut ariso ponsi
la aphan la pulo, “Kat ra thai aso ridamnon, ne appo, “ Riso kat-lo, la apar Jonathon thai aso ap-lo.
Thai aso keklo adim, riso abang kele ahut, la aphan Jonathon hang-lo, “Thai aso ha aphrang an lang!
Hadak arjapver nangnelo! Dam seraknon!” Riso abang thai aso humsi ahemphu along chevoilo,
la kopi aphan loma chininepin, Jonathon pen Davidsi chinichot.
Arisim an riso aphan Jonathon pisi lahei ha rong paponthutoilo.

Riso abang damjui aphi longbui anung pen David nangbarsi batai kethom akengphu patongruisi longle athak angphun patongkilo. Jonathon lapen David banghini lahin lahin kechingjup ahut banghinita chirulo; Jonathon aphan mute David aning aduk ong muchot-lo.
Ansi Jonathon pulo, “Arnam nanglilong padovernang. Elitum lahin lahin aseme kangthir eli lapen eso-esu atum an aphan
Nob along kedo Ahimelek pu kurusar along David damlo. Ahimelek kephere a-ok chepaklemhursi la aphan kechetongjisi nangbarlo, lapen arjulo, “Nangli kopisi ladak an nangli methang vang nangjilangma?”

“Neli ladak recho akamsi kevang,” David thak-lo. “Alangli neliphan kepaklemtoi alam badu aphanta pachini nangne pusi neliphan thanlo. Neli monit atum aphan along kapreksi neli halatum aphan pachetongtoilo.
Lasi non nangli kopi pi ason doloma? Neliphan him plangpho mate nangli kopima kedo aling nelipitha.”
Kurusar thak-lo, “Nelilong jung jung ahim ave, bonta him kangthirsi dochot; jongsi nangli monit atum nonjong arloso pen irap-relang pulote nangli la pontame.”

“Latum la klemklelang,” pusi David thak-lo. “Neli monit atum pine jung jung akam aphan kedam ahut seta halatum aron ateng pen chepangthir-et; non abatai ke isi kepanong akam aphansi kebar apot hala an soselo!”
Lasi David aphan kurusar him kangthir pilo, atheke la along kedo ke Arnam aphan kepitang ahim kangthir anchot-lo, la tebul kangthir pen ensi puthot him kemi bithulo.
(Sol api ahur ahemphu Doeg, la Edom pen, halaso arni hadak dolo, pima la dhorom akam chepachok nangji dolang.)
Ahimelek aphan David pulo, “Nangli chir mate nokjir doma? Recho neliphan lapusonsi hukum pi paprap-lo, neli nokjir mate kaprek arisim keche-en damji apor longlelo.”

Ahimelek thak-lo, “Nangli Elah Arlok along kepathi Philistia aso Goliath anokjir do; la sangkelang a-arlong anungsi do, pe pen phunghet. Nangli jongsi la nangji pulote la pon tame lahelo ladak kedo arisim puke.”
“La neliphan nelipidetnon,” pusi David pulo. “Nahokta akemi anokjir long athai avelo!”
David osi Sol pen kat-lo, lapen Gath arecho Akish along damlo.
Recho aban atum Akish aphan pulo, “La David, amethang adet arecho kalima? Laso amonit aphan arloso atum halatum kekan ahut lunlo, ‘Sol bangsuri pathilo, bonta David ke bangsuri kep pathilo.’ ”
Halatum alam David aphan aning palutchok-lo, lapen Recho Akish aphan la pherelo.
Lasi halatum komjailo, lapen laphan latum nepponpo pulote David chepatersi ingcham ason cheplangpo; la rongsopi anghap-heihei along ketoktap lapen angmum an angkroi palilenpo.
Lasi aban aphan Akish pulo, “Langtha! Laso amonit pangchamlo! Lason amonit nelong kopisi kevanlangma?
Kopisi nephan pasiksakjile nemethang ahem ladak lason keklemtap amonit kaprek van nangjilangma?”
Gath arongsopi pen David katsi Adullam arong adung alongku along damlo. Haladak David do pu a-ik atum lapen ahemtun asor arjulongsi kedo-anta la along chelangdunlo,
Kechenek kepho arat atum, mate kepinangji kedo mate aning kangsamse arat an la along damlo, kadokave bang 400 amonit dolo lapen la halatum ajalin plang-lo.
David hadak pen barsi Moab adet Mizpah anat damlo, lapen Moab arecho aphan pulo, “Neliphan Arnam kopisi keklemjima la neli chininetik kanghon pen nelipo nelipei pavanglongra nanglilong padonang.”
Lasi recho arideng David apo-apei otekangsi longku arlo chepatu nangtik an halatum hadak dolo.
Anke Gad amontri David along vangsi pulo, “Ladak dori, Judah adet non amat dam iknon.” Lasi David osi Hereth anampi ajo damlo.

Arnisi Sol, Gibeah along kedo un ahut alangli inglong angsong tantuli arong arum kangni un ahut alangli rideng chir do lapen alangli chakri atum alangliphan komjaisi do. David lapen la amonit atum aphan thek-long-lo pu la aphan than pachinilo,

lapen achakri atum aphan la pulo, “Arjutha, Benjamin amonit atum! Nangtum kedo-an aphan David longle lapen drakha aberi nangpiji lapen nangtum aphan la achakri nang paplangpo putong nangtum kemathama?

La apottong nangtum nebethurloma? Nangtum inutbakta David pen nesopo isivet pu nethanthe. Nangtum baduta nephan mathathe lapen nemonit inut non amat nephan kepathijisi David kerivung-lo lapen nesopota la aphan aning pathedunlo pu nethanthe!”
Sol achakri atum pen Doeg ta arjapdunthersi la pulo, Nob along kedo Ahitub asopo Ahimelek along David kedam neli thek-long-lo.
David kopisi keklem nangjima
Kurusar Ahimelek lapen la adon arap kedo-an aphan Sol recho pahangtoilo lapen halatum Nob along kurusarlo, lapen halatum la along vangpet-lo.
Ahimelek aphansi pulo, “Arjutha, Ahimelek!” “Nangli kepu atengsi chesik-lo, akehai,” pusi la thak-lo.

La aphan Sol arjulo, “Kopisi nangli lapen David neliphan kephangnojile nelibe kethurloma? Kopisi la aphan ajehak a-an lapen nokjir kepidunloma? Lapen laphan Arnam karjupiloma? Non la nebe thurlo lapen neliphan kepathijisi asai rilo.”
Ahimelek thak-lo, “Nangli kelong angbong David helo inut kekroithirklong achakrilo! La nangli osalo, nangli ingphun kerai anokbelo, lapen nangli kangsai amei along kadokaveta man kepihur abangpolo.
Ahok, la aphan neli Arnam arjupilo, lapen la nonchot kali. Nangliphan kephangno alam ke, recho nangli neliphan lapen nelihemtun aphan lambok nangne. Laso alam aphuthak neli thangta chinine!”
Recho pulo, “Ahimelek, nang lapen nangli donrap atum thinangji,”
Anke la adung karjap tonbang aphan pulo, “

Lasi Doeg aphan Sol pulo, “Nangle latum aphan pathinon!” Lapen halatum kedo-an aphan Doeg pathi-et-lo. Halaso arni la bang 85 akurusar atum aphan pathilo. Halatum sangkelang amar keponji a-ot kedo atumlo.
Nob along kedo kurusar arongsopi arat pinso-arlo, kebi-kethi, chainong, gadha lapen biresak kedo-an aphan Sol pathitoilo.
Bonta Ahimelek asopo inut Abiathar abang chepajoksi David along damlo, lapen chelangdunlo.
La aphan kosonsi Sol ke
La aphan David pulo, “Neli Doeg aphan halabangso arni kethek-long ahut la Sol aphan thanvekpo pu la neli chinipame. Lasi nanglitum adon arap kethinangke nelisi adailo.
La apot nelilong donon, lapen phere-nangne. Sol ke nangli lapen neliphanta pathiji aninghang, bonta nelilong nangli jokji.”
Philistia atum Keilah arong tengkheng-lo, kerotmi asok chonghu et-lo pu David arjulong-lo.
Lasi la
“Damnon, “ pusi
Bonta David amonit atum laphan pulo, “Ladak Judah along eli kephere nangji ason do-o, Keilah dam pen Philistia asong aphan tengkheng lote, la an sose nanghingno muchotpo.”
Lasi
Lasi David lapen amonit atum Keilah damlo, lapen Philistia atum aphan tengkheng-lo, halatum aphan pathi-o-lo, lapen pi lapen amar latum ponpi-et-lo. Lapen lasonsi David rong aphan pajok-lo.
Ahimelek asopo Abiathar chepajoksi Keilah along David asong kechelang dun ahut, la sanglang arlong cheponlo.

David ke keilah anat damtang-lo pu Sol aphan thanlo, lapen la pulo, “Arnam la aphan nerideng nepitang-lo. Keparpongkling arong lapen apaisong kedo anghap hadak la kedam pen amethang aphansi la chingnang-damlo.”
Lasi Sol asong aphan ron kechedanji aphan hang-lo, Keilah damsi David lapen la amonit atum aphan nepdampo.
Sol ke David aphan ketengkhengji kemang alam la arjulongsi, la Abiathar kurusar aphan pulo, “Sanglang-arlong ladak vantha.”
Anke David pulo, “
Keilah asor neliphan Sol arideng hodaidet poma? Ne karjulong ateng pen Sol vangvekjima? Israel Arnam,
“Lapen Keilah asor nemonit lapen nephan Sol arideng nehodaijima?” David puthot arjuthulo.
“Halatum hodaipo,”
Lasi David lapen la amonit kedo-an bang 600 Keilah o si dambomlo. David Keilah pen chepajok-tang-lo pu Sol arjulongsi la kemang akam obup-lo.
Ziph adung kejejangtang ajo inglong alongri David chepatusi dolo. La aphan kaiketa Sol rivung-lo, bonta David aphan Arnam, la arideng hodaidedet-lo.
David aphan kepathiji si Sol bartang-lo, pu la chechinilo.
Ziph adung kejejangtang ajo Horesh alongri David dolo.
Hadak la along Jonathon damsi Arnam nangraiji pusi la aphan aning pathelo,
laphan pulo, “Phereri. Nelipo Sol nangliphan thangnat ta pasung un-e. Nangli si Israel atum arecho kemanji abangphulo la chinipamelo lapen neli ke nangli dunlo.”
Latum banghini lahin lahin jirpo aseme kangthir chechak-lo, David Horesh along dosi Jonathon hem chedamlo.
Ziph pen ajehak arat atum Sol along Gibeah damsi pulo, “David ke nelitum alongri Hakilah anglong Horesh alongsi chepatulo, la Judia akejejangtang ajo anitur anat.
Recho nelitum chini nangli ko-ansi la aphan nep ingtung-loma; lasi nelitum alongri vang-ra nangli la aphan nep-longvekji.”
Sol thak-lo, “Neliphan kangjinso apot
Damra non ephong langdamtha la konat adimsi kedoma lapen la aphan komatsi kethek-long-loma? La reset pu neli arjulong-lo.

La kechepatu adim pangthek pamenon, lapen paprapjin pen neliphan laso akelong alam nethan thuvektha. Anke neli nangdunpo, lapen jongsi la halaso ahavar dobomlang pulote, ha arlok an la aphan neli ridunpo, laphan kerilok Judah adang bithe dam nang-et seta ripo.”
Lasi latum o-si Sol aphrang Ziph anat chevoilo. David lapen la amonit atum Maon akejejangtang ajo si kedo, la ke-otang arlok Judia akejejangtang anitur ahin anat.

Sol lapen la amonit atum David aphan keridunjisi barlo, bonta laso alam la charjulong-lo lapen Maon akejejangtang ajo longbui anglong anat damlo, lapen hadak sa-lo. Sol la arjulongsi la David aphi aphi dunlo.

Sol lapen la amonit atum inglong anat dolo, lapen ahin kaprek anat kedo David lapen la amonit atum pen kedo chepaprek-lo. Halatum Sol lapen la amonit atum pen chepahelojisi paprap-lo pima latum tebokpik khangjang-lo lapen nep-long dapprangpo.
Halaso amat pherangke vangsi Sol aphan pulo, “Non amat vang iknon! Philistia atum det tengkhengtang-lo!”
Lasi David aphi Sol kehungdun ingtonkok-lo, lapen Philistia atum pen kechedanjisi damlo. La apotsi laso anglong aphan kechekak anglong pusi irlo.
David osi Engedi ahavar anat damlo, hadak la chepatu damlo.
Philistia atum pen kechedan Sol nangchevoisi, David Engedi adung akejejangtang ajosi do pu Sol aphan thanlo.
Israel angbong bang 3000 kethantang aron-aso Sol cheponsi karju alongbui anihang anat David lapen la amonit atum aphan ridunlo.
La biresak aroi-heihei tovar adung alongku vangsi sang-lo. La David lapen la amonit atum kechepatu alongku acharchot athengnosi donang-lo.
David aphan halatum pulo, “La nangliphan avarsai kemelo!
Bonta David aning pachakchedet-lo,
lapen la amonit aphan la chepulo, “Nehemphu aphan kephangno akam pen
Lasi la amonit aphan David pakroilo lapen halatum Sol aphan tengkhengkhe-det-lo.
Sol thursi longku olo, lapen atovar kedam pangcheng-lo.
Anke David la aphi phi dunsi laphan hang-lo, “Recho!” Sol chetevarlo, lapen David angphun patongkisi man pilo,
lapen pulo, “Nangliphan kephangnoji aphan neli kebor-ipu nangli bang alam kopisi karjulo?
Nangli methang chelangtha, non aphrangjong amat

Lang iktha, ong, la nanglipe achet nanglang iktha! Neli nangliphan pathilotjita long-lo, bonta la klemklesi la bengchot-lo. Lapen neli nangliphan pachinilo, neli nanglibe kethurji mathathe mate nangli phangnone. Neliphan kepathiji nangli neridunbom, neli nangliphan thangta kechokche ason klemkle seta
elitum angbong komatsi kechokchema
Sar-lar atum kepu alam nangli chini, ‘Kehingno akam ke kehingno amonit atumsi keklem.’ Lasi neli nangliphan phangnonelo.
Lang iktha! Israel arecho kosonsi kepathiji bor-iloma! Lang iktha! Kopi athesi aphi kehungbom langma! Kethitang amethan aphima, mate bitu ejon aphima!
ingsaipo, lapen elitum angbong komatsi kechokchema alangli pharpamepo. Laso alam aputhak la langsi neliphan raitahai lapen neliphan nanglipen pajok tahai.”
David kepu pajutsi, Sol pulo, “La nanglima, Osa, David?” Lapen la kechiru pangcheng-lo.
Ansi David aphan la pulo, “Nangli kepu alam ahok-lo, lapen nelisi kechokchelo. Neli nangliphan pu-an kehingno klem seta nangli neliphan akemesi klemlo!
Nangli ko-an keme amonit lo pu pini paklangdak-lo, pima
Inut amonit ahotur aphan nep-long-lote, areng pasosepin pen padamlongjima? Nangli neliphan pini keklem apot
Non neli chinipamelo, nanglisi Israel arecho manpo lapen nangli kepangri arum recho arat doverpo.
Bonta nelipoton atum aphan nangli pathithelo pu
David la chechak-lo.
Ansi Sol ahem chedamlo, lapen David ta amonit atum pen halatum kechepatu adim chedamlo.
Samuel thilot-lo, Israel kedo-an vangpetsi la aphan ningduk-lo. Ansi la aphan ahem Ramah along halatum pipbup-lo.
Laso aphi, David Paran akejejangtang ajo damlo.
Kaleb aro Nabal pu amen inut amonit hadak dolo, la Karmel arong adung longle cherailo.
La inut keplang-o amonit-lo. Biresak jon 3000 do lo lapen bi jon 1000 chepahemphulo. La apiso Abigail arje mepik lapen reset, bonta la abang ke chingkinodak lapen aning sedengkak amonit.
Nabal ke Karmel along amethang abiresak angmi ingtipbomlang, lapen kejejangtang ajo kedo David la arjulong-lo,
lasi la bangkep ariso Karmel padamsi Nabal aphan kepariji ahukum pilo lapen la aphan kardom papidamtoilo.
La halatum Nabal aphan kepunangji alam pinkhat-lo: “David aning aklong pen, nangliphan, nanglihemtun lapen nangli kedo-an aphan kardom pilo, jirpo.

Alangli nangli biresak angmi kangtip alam arjulong-lo lapen alangli nangliphan pachini kangtung alam ke lahelo: Nangli biresak kebi atum nelitum alongsi do, lapen nelitum latum aphan thangnat pasungsedet-lo. Halatum amar ason an inghu pipedet-lo, Karmel along kedotik anke.

Halatum aphan arjunon, anke halatum nangliphan nangthanpo. Nelitum kecho kejun arni nanglilong vang-lo, lapen nelitum aphan kedeng pameji aphan David nangliphan choningrilo. Kanghon pen nangliban atum aphan kopi asonma kedo nelipidun iktha, lapen nangli kechinghon ajirpo David aphan seta.”
David amen pensi Nabal aphan labangso abirta David amonit atum pilo. Anke latum hadak inghongkok-lo,
kejut thu Nabal thak-lo, “David! La komat-lo? La aphan ne arjulongle-pinlang! Non malom kekat aban atum si det plengset!
Ne him, lang lapen pi angmi kangtip atum aphan kethupi a-ok keponpiji nekam kali, lapen kechinine adim pen kevang amonit atum aphan kepiji akam ave!”
David amonit la along chevoilo, lapen Nabal keputang alam an than-et-lo.
“Nangtum anokjir chehomnon!” La hukum pilo, lapen halatum kedo-an la klemlo. David amethangta nokjir chehomsi bang 400 la amonit pen pen cheponsi bang 200 ke mar-heihei pahonlo.

Nabal aban inut abang Nabal apiso Abigail aphan pulo, “Nangli arjulong-loma? Neli hemphu aphan David kejejangtang ajo pen kardom kepajirjisi pherangke nangtoilo, bonta halatum aphan alangli patherak-dunlo.
Halatum elitum aphan me-o; halatum elitum aphan pasungse, lapen halatum alangli hidi nelitum kedo esek kaiketa elitum amar latum thiponpelo.
Ajo-anerlo halatum kaiketa halatum pen pen elitum api ahur langsi railo.
Laso alam aputhak kanghon pen mathathutha, lapen latum kopi nangjima phar iktha. La ehemphu lapen ahemtun kedo-an aphan isi akevir vantahai. La phak aphu ason la-an kebuiklui, la bang alamta arjuje!”

Abigail paprapjin pen plang 200 ahim lapen ok-reng ajarong plengthup drakha ahorlang, jon 5 abiresak a-ok karnu lapen lin 17 asang-karnu, drakha athekreng abitung 100, thebo ahim plang 200 pangrumsi lahei gadha athak arthang-lo.
Ansi bangpi ban atum aphan pulo, “Nangtum nephrang dambomnon, lapen ne nangtum aphi aphi nangdunbompo.” Bonta bangpi apenan aphan thangnata putekang ke det-lo.
Bangpi amethang agadha chardonsi inglong akung-kung damlo. Bangpi David aphan menmen chetongmamlo, lapen la amonit atum bangpi anat vangbomlo.
David mathalo, “Kopisi ne ladak kejejangtang ajo laso amonit amar keraipiloma? La amar esonnatta chonghu pipe lapen laso akerap alar la nephan lasonsi klem-rong-lo!
Penap adap an laso amonit atum aphan pathi pajut-et longletik Arnam nephan nepathilot-nang!”
David aphan Abigail thek-longsi bangpi sunlo, lapen longle athak
David akeng-ri ardomphrup-lo, lapen alangliphan bangpi pulo, “Kanghon pen akehai, neli arjutha! Neliphanle akoi neti iknon.
Kanghon pen Nabal aphan ning chebiri, lake inut amokevangve abang, inut akelu sarpolo! Nangliban atum nangkele ahut hadak nelibang ave, akehai.
lake
Kanghon pen akehai, laso anong-e deng iktha, neli nanglivanpilo, lapen nangli monit atum aphan la pi iknon.
Akehai, neli jat akechokchele klem seta kanghon pen neli diya iktha.
Nangliphan jongsi mane tengkheng seta, lapen kepathiji bor-i-seta inut tonbang ador keso akhi kerai ason thak-thaksi
Lapen
anke nangli ning ke-oi mate ning siksak nangnelo, akehai, ason avepin pen nangli methang alarkehui pen kepathi aphuthak seta. Lapen
Bangpi aphan David pulo, “Israel Arnam
Nanglining kemathathek apot Arnam aphan chorolo, lapen pini pran-karmut lapen neli alarkehui pen nangli neliphan kepahelo apot.

nangliphan kephangnoji pen neliphan khang-lo. Bonta neli kereng-et Israel a-Arnam amen pen semetang-lo, nangli jongsi neliphan kechetong paprapre asonte Nabal amonit kedo-an penap adap an thinang-etpo.!”
Ansi bangpi kevan ason an David chodeng-lo, lapen bangpi aphan pulo, “Mathari, hem chedamnon. Nanglining kehang aling neli klempo.”
Abigail puthot Nabal along chedamthulo, labang recho atum kecho achojun hem isi pathik-lo. Hor kangri pen aning cheparong-lo, lasi adap the-ang-e tik la aphan bangpi thanthedet-lo.
Anke la kangri hamdetsi la aphan bangpi than-et-lo. La achethe vang nodak-lo, lapen ephar thi-klak-lo.
Nikep aphi Nabal aphan
Nabal thi-et-lo pu alam David arjulongsi, la pulo, “
Anke David Abigail aphan kepangri alam pathantoilo.
La aban atum Abigail along Karmel damlo lapen bangpi aphan pulo, “Nangliphan David apiso keplangjisi alangli netoilo.”
Abigail longle athak ingkupdisi pulo, “Neli alangli banpi chot, alangli ban atum aphan akeng kechamji aphan seta chesik-lo.”
Bangpi thur paprapsi amethang agadha chardonlo. Bangpi along bangpho abanpi atum dunlo, bangpi David aban atum along dunsi alangli piso plang-lo.
David, Jezreel pen Ahinoam aphan piso enlo, lapen non Abigailta apiso plangtang-lo.
Halaso ahut David apiso Mikal aphan Galim arong Sol penan chopidet-lo.
Ajehak amonit Ziph pen Sol along Gibeah vang-lo lapen David Hakilah anglong, Judia akejejangtang ajo angchun si chepa-tulo pu alam thanlo.
Sol tongsekotsi Ziph kejejangtang ajo anat David aphan keridunjisi Israel anglong angbong akangtangnei aron-aso bang 3000 cheponsi damlo,
lapen Hakilah anglong atovar kejejangtang ajo si dolang, David ta hadaksi dolang lapen Sol vangsi la aphan keri alam chinisi
la kelangjoi atum aphan toilo lapen Sol hadak amatsi kedolang pu pangthek tekang-lo.
Tongsekot la damsi Sol lapen Ner asopo, Abner, Sol aron-armu ahemphu amek kejang adim ledamlo. Sol abang mukam arlosi amek kejang lapen la amonit atum la aphan kompetsi mukam chekimlo.
Hitti asor Ahimelek aphan lapen Joab akor Abishai (Latum apei Zeruiah) aphan David arjulo, “Sol amukam along nangtum banghini komatsi nelong nangdunpo?”
Neli nangdunpo! Abishai thak-lo.

Lasi halaso aningve David lapen Abishai atum Sol amukam arlo lut damlo, lapen Sol abang mukam angbong chittimchit si amek kejang, achir ke phutang adung longle along somdong-lo. Abner lapen asong atum ke la adung kompetsi amekjang-lo.
David aphan Abishai pulo, “Paningve nangli hotur aphan Arnam nanglirideng hodaitang-lo. Non la achir pen la aphan toksi longle along krongplotpo, ephong anta chok ne bataihini klem nangnelo.!”
Bonta David thak-lo, “Nang la aphan papho nangne!
Kereng-et a-
kangvaitang arecho aphuthak neri kechirungji pu kebor-i
Lasi David la aphutang pen Sol achir lapen alangbong ponlo lapen Abishai damjuilo. Baduta la thekdun longledet-lo, mate kopi plang-loma chini dundedet-lo lapen amek prangpredet-lo, pima
Anke David arlok kaprek ang-long anat kapsi chepahelolo lapen chepajokvanlo,
lapen Sol asong lapen Abner aphan hang-lo, “Abner! Nang nephan arjulong-loma?”
Recho aphan amek kepaprangdak ase la komat ase lo? Abner arjulo.

David thak-lo, “Abner, nang Israel angbong kangtangnei amonit kalima? Tangte nang kopisi nanghemphu recho aphan cherai thekthe det-loma? Nonjong amat nanghemphu, recho aphan kepathijisi mane mukam lutchok-lo.
Nangkam nang cheklem thekthetang-lo, Abner! Ne kereng-et a-
David aselo pu recho chinisi arjulo, “David nanglima sopo?”
Kalang, Recho, David thak-lo.
Lapen la puthulo, “Kopilo, akehai, neli nangliban aphan nangli hungdunbom jilangma? Neli kopisi keklemloma? Kopi apransi neli karmut-loma?
Recho arju iktha, neli kepu alam asontin nangli nelibe kethur
pen pahelora neliphan bang adet alongle along nepathirinon. Kopisi Israel arecho vangsi chikli aso ason thakthak amonit nephan kepathiji hung-loma? Ingnam avo ason kopisi la nephan hung-loma?”
Sol thak-lo. “Nelisi kechokchelo. Sopo David vangtha! Neli nangliphan paphophelo, pima paningve nangli neliphan pathithedet-lo. Neli kelu abang-lo! Neli kepherememe akamsi klemtang-lo!”
David thak-lo, “Ladaksi nangli chir do Recho. Nangli monit pavang-ra la nangpa-ennon.
Kekroithip lapen kekengset atum aphan
Neli nangliphan pran-karmutme asonthot-le
David aphan Sol pulo, “Arnam nang-pahirjumenang, osa! Nangli keklem aling asontin ta chunji!”
Anke David amethang atovar che-damlo, lapen Sol ta ahem chevoilo.

David amethang chepulo, “Non malom angbong arnisibak Sol nephan pathilotji. Nephan akemenei ke Philistia atum along kekat helo kejokji. Anke Israel angbong Sol nephan keriji obuppo, lapen ne jokvan po.”
Lasi David lapen la bang 600 amonit tongsekot pen Ma-ok asopo, Akish, la Gath arecho along damlo.
David lapen la amonit atum apiso-aso pen pen Gath alongsi dolo. David apiso banghini la along dolo, Jezreel pen Ahinoam lapen Nabal ahemepi Abigail, la Karmel pen abangpi talo.
Gath anat David kattang-lo pu Sol arjulongsi la aphan keridun obup-lo.
Akish aphan David pulo, “Nangli jongsi nelijirpo pulote, neli kedoji aphan rong nelipitha. Det arongsopi kethe alongle along neli kedoji akam ave, akehai.”
Lasi Akish la aphan Ziklag arong pilo. Laso apotsi nonpu anta Ziklag ke Judah arecho atum arideng dolongverlo.
Philistia adet chiklo jon 16 an David dolo.
Halaso ahut David lapen la amonit atum aphrang pen kedo Geshur, Girzi, lapen Amalek atum aphan tengkheng-lo.
Ijip atovar Shur anta halatum alongle pinso-arlo pathisi biresak, chainong, gadha, ka-ut lapen pe-ri-heihei thiponlo. Anke la Akish along vangpo,
la arjupo, “Non ephong nangli konatsi mar kethidamlo?” Anke David thakpo, la Judah adet anitur ahin anat mate Zerahmeel aso alongri mate Ken atum kedo alongrisi kedamlo pu thakpo.
David ke abangphutin pinso-arlo aphanta pathilappo, la lote, baduta Gath damsi la pen la amonit kopi klemtang-loma than dam thekthelo. Lahei helo David Philistia alongri kedo un ahut keklem akam.
Bonta David aphan Akish kroipamelo lapen amethang chepulo, “La aphan amethang arat Israel atum pu-an hijimlo, la akai isi nephansi ingduk nangpo.”
Penang an aphi Israel pen kechedanjisi Philistia asong chingrumpet-lo, lapen David aphan Akish pulo, “Nangli chini, nangli lapen nangli monit atum nelibe dosi chedan nangpo.”
“Kalang-lo,” pusi David thak-lo. “Neli nangliban, lapen neli kopi klem thekjima nangli methang thek-longpo.”
Akish pulo, “Mesenlo! Neli nangliphan neli ingphun kerai abang pinchongpo.”

Non Samuel thilot-lo, lapen la aphan kedo-an Israel atum ningduk-lo, lapen la amethang arong Ramah along la aphan pipbup-lo. Sangkelang kedo-an aphan, paludep kedo-an aphan Israel o-et nangji pusi Sol jakong pen hukumpilo.
Philistia aron-asong chingrumsi Shunem arong adung mukam chekimlo; Gilboa anglong along Israel atum aphan Sol pangrumsi mukam chekimlo.
Philistia aron-armu aphan Sol thek-longsi la phereduk-lo,
lapen la kopi klem nangjima pusi la
Anke aban atum aphan Sol hukum pilo, “paludeppi neliphan inut neliripi damtha lapen neli damsi bangpi aphan arjudampo.”
“Endor along inut do,” halatum thak-lo.

Lasi Sol amethang chepatu parjesi la pe-ri akaprek chingthang-lo, lapen bangpi aphan kelangdamjisi kangting-kuk ahut, la monit banghini atum along dunlo. “Karjulong atum pen neli arjupi iktha lapen kopi plang poma neliphan nelithan iktha,” bangpi aphan la pulo.
“Neli kepu amen karjong aphan hangnon.”

Arloso abang thak-lo, “Sol recho keklem alam nangli chinipame tahai, alangli kopusonsi sangkelang atum lapen paludep atum aphan Israel pa-otoima. Tangte, nangli kopisi nangli neliphan pachevurcheksi neli kepathiji bor-iloma?”
Ansi Sol isi seme kangthir tang-lo, “Kereng-et a-
“Koloso aphansi nangli hangpi nangpo?” Arloso abang arjulo.
“Samuel,” la thak-lo.
Arloso abang Samuel aphan thek-longsi, bangpi hangchirlo, lapen Sol aphan pulo, “Nangli kopisi neliphan pachobeiloma? Nangli helo Sol Recho!”
“Nangli thangta phere-nangne!” Bangpi aphan recho pulo, “Nangli kopisi kethek-long-lo?”
“Neli kethek-longke inut akarjong pirthe pen kethur thek-long-lo,” bangpi thak-lo.
“La kelang kopusonlo?” la arjulo.
“La inut akesar amonit asonsi thurlo,” Labangpi thak-lo.
“La pe-keding che-umlo.”
Anke la Samuel lo pu Sol chinilo, lapen la aphan man kepijisi longle anat tongkilo.
Sol aphan Samuel pulo, “Nangli kopisi neliphan pasungthuloma? Nangli kopisi neliphan pavangthu nang-loma?”

Sol thak-lo, “Neli non sungpik-lo, Philistia atum nelibe ron thurlo, lapen Arnamta neliphan obup-lo. La montri atum pen, mate mang-heihei pen seta neliphan thakthepinlo. La apotsi neli kopi klem nangjima nelipathanji aphan nangliphan hang nangkok-lo.”
Samuel pulo, “
ke nelipen keputang akam si klemlo: Nanglipen alangli recho arat pontang-lo, lapen David aphansi la pidet-lo.
Nangli
La nangli lapen Israel aphan Philistia arideng hodai detpo. Penap nangli lapen nangli sopota nanglilongsi nangdunpo lapen Israel aron-armu
Menmen Sol longle athak klithorsi ari-akeng phajongting-lo. Samuel keningje alam arjulongsi pherepik-lo. La ainitilo, pima la losini, jopangthang thangnatta choche.
Arloso abang la adung damsi la kechephere thek-long-lo, lasi laphan bangpi pulo, “Akehai, kanghon pen nangli karju ason nelipran chethongdutsi klemlo.
Non neli kepu ason klem iknon. Nangliphan neli asap-o an dangpilang. Kedam unji aphan nangli la chovek nangji.”
Sol kechoji molo, lapen pulo, la ajat asonta cho un-elo. Bonta la achakri atum la aphan pachojisi choningrilo. La aphi kroilo, lapen longle pen thurlo lapen hongplang along ingnilunlo.
Bangpi kepangtubom achainong aso ejon thulo, anke bangpi ajehak him aduk ensi la tunlo lapen thapkave ahim selampilo.
Sol lapen la achakri atum bangpi lahei inglelo, lapen halatum la cholo, lapen halabangso ajo amat halatum damjuilo.
Israel atum Jezreel Arlok alangmek along mukam kechekim ahut Philistia atum kedo-an asong Aphek along pangrum et-lo.
Bangpho Philistia arecho atum halatum amethang methang pharo asong, suri asong amonit pen bar rep-lo. David lapen la amonit atum Akish recho aphi phi dunlo.
Philistia atum ron ahemphu halatum aphan thek-longsi arjulo, “Lahei a-Ibri atum dak kopi akamlo kedo?”
Akish thak-lo, “Lake David, Israel arecho Sol achakrilo. La nelong kedo penang ajirding-lo. La nelong kevang arni pen ne la aphan thangnat adai thek-longle.”

Bonta Philistia aronhemphu Akish aphan aningthisi pulo, “La aphan nangli kepi aron-aso arat toithunon. Elitum along laso amonit ron nangpadun nangnelo; ron kechedan ahut la etum abe thur-rong tahai. Etum amonit mute ahemphu aphan aningkepadok helo la aphan atovar kemenei la kopi dolang?
Jat seta lake David, laso abang aphansi arloso atum lunlo, la halatum kekan ahut, ‘Sol ke suri isinatsi pathichot, bonta David ke surikep an sosesi pathilo.’”

David aphan Akish hangsi laphan pulo, “Israel kereng-et a-Arnam amen pensi neli semetang-lo, nangli neliphan kroipamelo; lapen ron along nelilong nangkedunji aphan nelining dok-olo. Nelilong nangli kevang arni pen nangliphan neli thangnat adai thek-longle. Bonta akaprek arecho atum nangliphan dengmolo,
lasi ingsamjin penle hemdam iknon, lapen latum aphan aning kedokde akam klemrinon.”

David thak-lo, “Neli kopi akechok-che klemloma, akehai? Jongsi nangli kepu ateng, nangliphan kangduk arni pen nelidai thangnatta thek-longle pulote, kopi athesi neli nanglilong nangli hotur pen ron chedandun longledet-loma, hemphu lapen recho?”
“Neli kroilo, “ Akish thak-lo, “Neli nangliphan Arnam apherangke ason kekroi lo pusi thek long-lo. Bonta akaprek arecho atum pulo, nangli nelitum along dun longle pu.
Lasi, David, penap adapprang nanglitum Sol aphan ke-o atum nelilong kevang atum an adapprang thursi kethe-ang pen damnangpo.”
Lasi David lapen la amonit atum adapprang barsi Philistia adet anat chedamlo, lapen Philistia atum Jezreel anat dambomlo.
Ni ni aphi David lapen la amonit atum Ziklag nangchelelo. Amalek atum Judah anitur anat mar thiponlo, lapen Ziklag aphanta tengkheng-lo. Halatum rong me keisi
arloso kedo-an aphan neppon-et-lo; lapen badu aphanta halatum pathithe, bonta abangphutin halatum along dunnang-lo lapen adim otekang-lo.
David lapen la amonit atum nangkechele ahut ke rong me kecho halatum thek-long-lo, lapen halatum apiso aso anta ponpi-et-lo.
David lapen la amonit atum kechiru pangcheng-lo, lapen latum ainilak-letik kechiru hamhedet-lo.
David apiso banghini, Ahinoam lapen Abigail aphanta pondet-lo.
David non sungpik-lo, pima la amonit atum, asomar chepangbo nang-etsi aning hodak-lo lapen la aphan arlong pen varbopji pusi papherelo; bonta la a-Arnam la aphan aningparung-lo.
Ahimelek asopo Abiathar, kurusar aphan David pulo, “Sangkelang a-arlong nelong vantha,” lapen la alanglilong vanpilo.
aphan David arjulo, “Hala kethiparohum atum aphi ne duntame ma? Lapen halatum aphan ne nep-unjima?”
La thak-lo, “Halatum aphi dunnon, halatum aphan nang nepdun unji lapen ban kepontang atum aphan nang pajok unji.”
Lasi David lapen la amonit atum bang 600 barlo lapen halatum Besor alangjeng along nanglelo lapen ajehak atum ke hadaksi padolo.
David la amonit bang 400 atum pen dambomlo; akaprek bang 200 atum ke aini-ong amat langroi kap un-esi langkung sakok-lo.
David along kedun amonit atum inut Ijip asor a-oso rong along chetong-lo lapen la aphan David along vandet-lo. Halatum la aphan ajehak lang lapen an pilo,
lapen ajehak thebo akreng, drakha athekreng bitung hini la chodet aphi, la jakong chevangthulo, nithom akangthim la cholongle-jun longle pinlo.
La aphan David arjulo, “Nang hemphu komat-lo, lapen nang konat penlo?”
“Neli inut Ijip asor, lapen Amalek inut abanlo,” la thak-lo. “Nithom aphrang neli hemphu ladak ne-otekang-lo pima neli sodet.
Chereth alongri lapen Ziklag ta me keilo.”
“Hala kethiparohum atum along nephan nejapon thekjima?” pusi David la aphan arjulo.
La thak-lo, “Nangli jongsi Arnam amen pen nepathithe lapen nelihemphu arideng hodaidelo pu semetang-lote nangthanji.”
Anke halatum along la David aphan japonlo.
Kethiparohum atum bithe-bitha chehijikjam si cholo junlo lapen talonlo, pima Philistia lapen Judah atum pen ongdung amar latum thipon long-lo.
Adapprang halatum aphan David tengkheng-lo, lapen arnikangsam an chedanlo. Bang 400 arisomar atum ka-ut ardon pen kekat atum apar baduta jokjedet-lo.
Amalek atum kepon abangphutin lapen asontin amar, lapen apiso banghini aphanta pajok-et-lo.
Thangnatta kangbo ason avedet-lo. David amonit atum asomar lapen Amalek atum kepontang kedo-an amar chelong-et-lo.
Kepangreng api lapen vo kedo-anta la chelong-et-lo; halatum angno la amonit atum kepangreng api kedo-anta phlung pilo, lapen pulo, “Lahei David amar.”

Anke Besor alangjeng akung kedo bang 200 ke-ainipik David along kedun un-e atum along alangli chedamthulo. David lapen la amonit atum aphan halatum kechetongjisi nangbarlo, lapen David halatum along arludamsi halatum aphan ning aklong pen kardom pilo.
Bonta David along kedun ajehak amo-kevangve amonit atum pulo, “Latum etum along nangdundedet apot eli kelong amar latum aphan pinangne. Latum apiso aso cheponsi damnangpo.”
Bonta David thak-lo, “Korte atum,
Nangtum keningje alam along baduta nangchedondun thekthe! Abangphutinta apharman chelongrep nangji! Kecho amar kehon atum seta ron kedun atum seta apharman isinatpo.”
La isi aron David pathik-lo, lapen la Israel angbong halaso ahut pen nonputa nangdobomlo.
Ziklag anat David kechevoithu ahut, la ajehak kelong amar ajirpo atum Judah ajalin atum aphan birta pen lolo, “
Bethel arat aphan, Judah anitur ahin kedo Ramah arat aphan, lapen Jattir arong arat aphan,
Aroer, Siphmath, Eshtemoa,
lapen Rakal; Jerahmeel aro aphan, Ken aro,
lapen Hormah, Borashan, Athak, lapen
Hebron arong arat aphan lahei alangli lolo. La lapen la amonit atum kejui adim alongtin anta la lopet-lo.
Gilboa anglong along Philistia atum Israel pen isi aron chedanlo. Hadak ongdung a-Israel atum thinang-lo, lapen ahin halatum Sol recho lapen la asomar anta katnang-lo.
Bonta Philistia atum halatum aphan kehungdun paphodunsi Sol asomar bangkethom, Jonathon, Abinadab lapen Malkishua aphan pathilot-lo.
Sol adung arei ron kechedan sikpik-lo, lapen la amethang amat ta hotur athai aso alanglibang apchok-si areng pasodak-lo.

Alangli ron arisim kepon ariso abangphan pulo, “Nang nokjir chesat-ra nepathilotnon, anke arnam kechinine a-Philistia atum neborsi nephan nepathi longledetpo.” Bonta riso abang la keklemji phereduk-lo. Lasi Sol amethang anokjir chesansi laso athak krepsi chetarplut-lo.
Riso abang Sol kethitang thek-longsi la ta amethang anokjir athak krepsi chetarplut-lo lapen Sol along thidunlot-lo.
Lasonsi Sol, lapen la asomar bangkethom lapen riso abangta thilo; halaso arni Sol amonit atum an thi-et-lo.

Jezreel Arlok lapen Jordan Aroi parai anihang anat kedo a-Israel atum aron-armu kekat alam lapen Sol, la asomar atum kethi alam arjulongsi halatum amethang arong che-otekangsi kat-lo. Anke Philistia atum vangsi halahei adim cherailo.
Ron kechedan puthot arni Philistia atum hidi ketiki asai inghudamlo, lapen Sol lapen la asomar bangkethom kethitang abang arpum thek-long-lo.
Halatum Sol aphu ingthanpet-lo lapen ron arisim an phlok-et-si halatum akumlin-heihei aphan lapen rat aphan kehai abirta-keme alam kethan pachinijisi Philistia adang kedo-an pherangke toilo.
Lapen la arisim Astarte arnampi akardomhem along latum bilo, lapen la abang arpum Beth Shan arongsopi apai arpong along tarlok-lo.
Gilead along kedo Jabesh arat Philistia atum Sol aphan keklemtang alam arjulongsi,
angthin kethenei amonit atum barlo lapen Beth Shan anat jopangthang damlo. Halatum Sol lapen asomar abang arpum pai arpong pen pasunsi Jabesh along halatum vanlo, lapen hadak halatum me phlong-lo.
Anke latum arrepi-heihei ponsi lahei rong along kedo tantuli arong arum pip-lo lapen nithroksi an humlo.
Sol kethi alam David arjulongdet aphi la Amalek atum aphan kehai along pen nangchevoisi Ziklag along nini sang-lo.

Puthot arni Sol amukam pen inut ariso vang-lo. La aningke-oi chepaklangsi ape chingsek-lo, lapen aphu athak longle chebat-lo. La David along damlo lapen man kepijisi akengphu longle athak patongruilo.
La aphan David arjulo, “Nang konat pensi kevang-lo?”
“Ne Israel amukam pen jok-lo,” la thak-lo.
Kopi plang-loma nephan nethantha, David pulo.
Alangli thak-lo, “Ron pen netum ron-aso an kat-et-lo,
Lapen netum amonit ke-ongdung atum thi-lo. Sol lapen asopo Jonathonta thilot-lo.”
Sol lapen Jonathon thitang-lo pu nang kosonsi kechinilo? La aphan David arjulo.
La thak-lo, “Gilboa anglong along ne kedo ahut Sol amethang achir aputhak kecharchakding neli thek-long-lo lapen ingchin aron ahemkonglong lapen losei kardon hotur atum la adung patebok-bomlo.
Ansi alangli adung chelangsi neliphan nethek-lok-lo lapen nehang-lo. Neli thak-lo, ‘Kopilo, akehai!’
Neli komatma pu alangli ne-arjulo lapen neli inut Amalek-lo pusi alangliphan thak-lo.
Anke alangli pulo, ‘Vang-ra nephan pathinon! Ne thedung amek dotang-lo lapen thiji dokdok-lo.’

Lasi neli arludamsi la aphan pathilot-lo, pima neli chinilo krep lote alangli thivekpo. Ansi la aphu athak pen neli recho aphutup lapen ari ke-i asang, ari pen enlo, lapen la ne nanglilong vanlo, hemphu.”
Aning oisi David ape chingsek-lo, lapen alangli amonit atum anta lasonsi klemlo.
Halatum aningduksi chiru-charnap-lo lapen arnikangsam an Sol lapen Jonathon lapen
David aphan birta kevan ariso aphan la pulo, “Nang konat penlo?”
La thak-lo, “Neli inut Amalek amonit bonta neli nanglitum alongrisi kedo.”
La aphan David arjulo, “Nang kopusonsi
Ansi David amethang amonit angbong inut abangphan hangsi pulo, “Laphan pathinon! Laso amonit Amalek amonit aphan arbubopsi pathilot-lo,
lapen Amalek aphan David pulo, ‘Nang la nang methang aphansi chevanlo. Nang
Sol lapen la asopo Jonathon aphuthak David laso keningri alun lunlo,
Judah arat aphan la kepathantoijisi hukum pilo, (La Jemhar pu aloh along ketoktang kebi do.)
Israel alang-heihei along nejalin atum thitang-lo!
Angthin kethenei ne nokbe atum klitang-lo!
Gath along la pachethangsi mate Ashkelon atovarpi alongta.
Philistia a-arloso atum pachehok-longri;
kekroikre animsopimar atum seta aning parong longri.
Gilboa anglong along arve lapen ar-e paklokledetnang.
Laso ahidi an kaike pakrengtainang!
Pima angthin kethe achong-heihei
hadak langremsi hadak tichelo.
Sol achong ta jangthu patip abang ave det-lo.
Jonathon athai ke pherememe
Sol anokjir ta monit langle,
nokbe aphan paphosi hotur an pathilo.
Sol lapen Jonathon ko-an manghumeme
lapen inghon meme;
reng rappet-lo, thirappet-lo;
Vomu an sose keprap,
teke an sose kangtang.
“Israel arloso atum, Sol aphan chirunon!
La nangtum aphan adorkeso ape ke-er pen nangpa-ilo lapen ser asang pen nangpachingthang-lo.
‘Angthin kethe anokbe atum klitang-lo,
Halatum aphan ron along pathitang-lo.
Inglong along Jonathon ta thitang-lo.’”
O bong Jonathon, nangphan nening duk-lo,
nang ko-an nephan kanghon meme!
Nang kanghon nephan ko-an manghumeme la arloso akanghon apar memu.
“Angthin kethe anokbe atum klitang-lo halatum arisim-heihei enmolo lapen ale avetang-lo.”
Laso aphi
“Damnon”!
“Koloso arong-lo?” David arjulo.
“Hebron,” Pusi
Lasi David Hebron anat damlo, lapen apiso banghini cheponlo; Ahinoam, bangpi ke Jezreel pen lapen Abigail, la Nabal ahemepi, bangpi ke Karmel pen.
La amethang amonit, lapen ahem asor anta ponlo, lapen halatum Hebron adung arei arong-heihei dolo.
Anke Judah amonit atum Hebron vangsi David aphuthak jangthu patipsi Judah arecho bat-lo.
Judah arat atum Gilead along Sol aphan piptang-lo pu David arjulongsi,
la hadak ajehak amonit toisi birta lolo: “Nangtum arecho aphan kepip pen ajok kangjinso kepaklang apot
lapen
Chepangtang ra nangthin chepathenon! Nangtum arecho Sol thitang-lo, lapen Judah arat atum ne phuthak jangthu patipsi halatum arecho nebat-lo.”
Sol aron-armu apinpo Ner asopo, Abner, Sol asopo Ishbosheth aphan Jordan parai ha Mahanaim anat katponlo.
Abner hadak Ishbosheth aphan Gilead, Asher, Jezreel, Ephraim lapen Benjamin alongri aputhak recho paplang-lo lapen abinong ke kedo-an Israel aphuthak arecholo.
La aphan Israel aphuthak recho kepacho ahut arta ningkan 40 dotang-lo, lapen ningkan hini la recho cholo.
Bonta Judah akhei atum David aphan kroipamelo,
lapen la Judah aputhak Hebron along ningkan 7 ra ebeng pangrilo.
Ishbosheth aban Abner, Mahanaim pen Gibeon arongsopi anat damlo.
Joab, Zeruiah lapen David aban atum an langteng along chetongpet-lo.
Joab aphan Abner pulo, Etum ajehak arisomar pu pu asong pen ingvaira isi kechemarkot pachepatelonang.
Paklemnang! Joab thak-lo.
Lasi Ishbosheth lapen Benjamin akhei pen bang 12 amonit atum David amonit bang 12 pen chemarkot-lo.
Abangphutin ta ahotur aphan ot-repsi arep anokjir pen chechut-repsi halatum bang 24 amonit klipetsi thirappet-lo. Ansi Gibeon along laso adim “Nokjir Anglong” pusi irlo.
Anke isi aning-kecheso ason thurlo, lapen Abner lapen Israel aphan David amonit atum paremdet-lo.
Zeruiah asomar bang kethom Joab, Abishai lapen Asahel ta hadak dolo. Asahel ke ingnam athijokpi ason kekat chatpik abang-lo,
Abner aphi hungdunlo, lapen la angden kat-lo.
Abner aphi chelangsi pulo, La Asahelma?
Kalang! pusi la thak-lo.
Nephi kehung onon! Abner pulo. Ron-aso angbong inut aphan hungdunra la along kopi doma endunnon! Bonta Asahel la aphi hungdunbomlo.
Puthot la aphan Abner pulo, “Nephi kehung onon! Kopisi ne nangphan pathi nangjima? Ne kosonsi nang ik Joab angno cheklang poma?”

Bonta Asahel o-esi Abner abang amethang achir che-otsi Asahel apok tok-plutsi anung anta achir paplat-lo. Asahel longle klibupsi thilot-lo, lapen la ketilai adim kele abangphutin hadak sakoksi arjapdingdang-lo.
Bonta Joab lapen Abishai, Abner aphi phi hungdunlo lapen arnikangsam apor Ammah anglong along latum nanglelo, la Giah anihang lapen Gibeon akejejangtang ajo atovar anat-lo.
Benjamin akhei amonit atum Abner aphan komchensi inglong angsong along halatum Abner abe arjapdingdang-lo.

Joab aphan Abner hang-lo, “Etum kaiketa ron chedanverpoma? Kejut ke thangta longle, bonta ning kehosi longchotpo pu nang chininema? Netum ta nang korte murti atumlo. Nang monit atum netum aphi phi kehung dundedetji aphan hukum kepi aphrang la ko-ansi ajir padingjilangma?”
Joab thak-lo, “Kereng-et Arnam amen pen ne semetang-lo, nang jongsi pupe tangte ne monit atum penap adap anta nangtum aphan nanghung dunbomjilang!”
Ansi Joab pong-ut but-lo, Israel aso aphan aphi pahungdunde detjisi amonit aphan pachinilo; lapen ron hamlo.
Abner lapen la amonit atum jopangthang Jordan Arlok angbong dam nang-lo; halatum Jordan Aroi hatpet-lo, lapen puthot adap anta halatum dambomsi Mahanaim along nanglelo.
Joab, kehungdun osi la amonit an pamgrumlo, lapen halatum angbong bang 19 avedet-lo, la apar Asahel ta avedet-lo.
