David amonit atum bang 360 Abner amonit Benjamin akhei aphan pathilo.
Joab lapen la amonit atum Asahel abang arpum ponsi Bethlehem along laso ahemtun athiri along pip-lo. Ansi halatum jopangthang damsi adap kangthang Hebron along nangchelelo.
Sol ahemtun aphan kerai asong lapen David aphan kerai asong angbong penang an ajirkeding ron chedan bomlang. David abang ingtangbom ahut la abe kethur atum ajakong nang avebomlo.
David aphan aso bang throk amahang thekpilo, Hebron along kedo ahut: Amnon, apei ke Ahinoam la Jezreel pen;
Chileab, apei ke Abigail, la Nabal ahemepi, Karmel pen; Absalom apei Maakah, la Geshur arecho Talmai asopilo;
Adonijah, apei ke Haggith; Shephatiah, apei ke Abital;
Ithream, apei ke Eglah. La kedo-an asomar Hebron alongsi mahang thek-lo.
David asong lapen Sol ahemtun aphan kekroibom atum angbong ron chedam bom un ahut, Sol asangho atum angbong Abner ajakong nangthebomlo.
Arnisi Sol asopo Ishbosheth Abner aphan Sol enpangtar apiso Rizpah, la Aiah asopi pen ke-i rap-rap apot lam bok-lo.

Laso alam Abner aphan aningpathihak-lo. “Neli Sol aphan pachobeidetpo putong nangli kemathama? Neli Judah aphantong ingduk-rong-lo pu nangli matha-binong-loma?” Alangli pulo. “Kecheng arni pen nanglipo aphan, akorte atum aphan lapen ajirpo atum aphan neli ingduk pamelo, lapen neli David arideng keremdet pen nangliphan pajok-lo; seta pini inut a-arloso pen neliphan nangli kechokche thek-long-lo!
David aphan
Non labangso alam jongsi chekok ke pulote, Arnam nelipran pa-endet-lonang!”
Abner aphan Ishbosheth phere-ongsi la etheta lam ningje haihedet-lo.

David along Abner pherangke atum toilo, la halaso ahut Hebron alongsi do, lapen paputoilo, “Komatsi labangso adet pangripoma? Neli pen isi kechejok aloh chetok-lote Israel kedo-an aphuthak kehaiji lapen nanglinat kevung ponji aphan neli nangrap unji.”
David thak-lo, “Mesenlo! Neli nangli pen ethe alam pen kechejok aloh nangchetok dunji: Nangli nelilong kevang ahut Sol asopi Mikal nangli van nangji.”
Lapen Ishbosheth aphan kepapujisi David pherangke atum aphan toilo, “Nelipiso Mikal neliphan nevoithunon. La aphan ke-en longji aphan neli bang 100 Philistia a-ok-kangduk pen anampilo.”
Lasi la aphan apenan Laish asopo Paltiel pen Ishbosheth pondet-lo.
La aphi phi Bahurim arong atovar anta Paltiel chirudunkongsi dunbomlo. Bonta Abner “Hem chedamnon,” pu kepu ahut la chedamjuilo.
Israel ajalin atum along Abner damsi halatum aphan pulo, “David aphan nanglitum arecho kepamanji nanglitum aningkehang ajirding-olo.
Non helo nanglitum aphan avarsai kemelo.
Benjamin akhei arat aphanta Abner lam thanlo, ansi Benjamin lapen Israel arat atum kekroidun alam David aphan kethan damjisi Hebron damlo.
Hebron along David aphan Abner, kechetong dam ahut bang 20 amonit aphan pen pen David kecho kejun amei sikpilo.

David aphan Abner pulo, “Non neli dampo lapen nanglinat Israel kedo-an aphan pakroi dampo. Halatum nangliphan recho pusi dengpo, lapen nangli kopisi nanglining kehang ma longpo lapen det adang an pangrilongpo.” Abner aphan David isi kejok longji alam chechak-lo, lapen padampamelo.

Aphi Joab lapen David atum lapen akaprek aban atum pen pen mar kethidam pen nangchevoilo, halatum arideng ongdung amar vanlo. Hebron along David pen Abner dorapchomchelo, pima David laphan kedam kejok-longji alamchak pen toi-et-lo.
Joab lapen la amonit atum nangkele ahut la aphan Abner ke David recho along kevang lapen isi kejok alamchak pen toitang-lo pu alam thanlo.
Lasi Joab, recho along damsi alangliphan pulo, “Nangli kopisi keklemloma? Abner nanglilong vang-lo, nangli kopisi lapusonle laphan padamlongtoiloma?
La dak kevangke nangliphan kepachobeiji lapen nangli kopi klemloma lapen konatsi kedampoma la kechinijisi vang-lo. La nangli chinipamelo!”
David aphan osi Joab ke Abner aphan kepahangjisi pherangke toilo, lapen halatum Sirah alanghe pen vandet-lo; bonta David laso alam chininepin.

Hebron along Abner nangkele ahut, Joab la aphan inghap ehin anat pondet-lo, pima kenangsot alam la pen kechingkiji kedo asonthotsi klemlo, lapen hadak la aphan apok arlo an chutbop-lo. Lasonsi Abner aphan pathilot-lo, pima alangli Joab amu Asahel aphan pathilo.
David laso abirta arjulong-lok pen alangli pulo, “
Laso aduk Joab lapen la ahemtun kedo-an aphuthak paklonang! A-ove tinta ajehak thirengjeng akeso mate arloso akamsi keklem a-ot kedochot, kalite kecho dorphlup-phle laso ahemtun aputhak padonang!”
Lasi Joab lapen la akorte Abishai halatum amu Asahel aphan Gibeon aron along kepathi apotsi Abner aphuthak alar huilo.

Ansi Joab lapen la amonit atum ape pachingseksi pe thoila pache-umjisi David hukum pilo, lapen Abner aphuthak pachirutoilo. Lapen Kethi arpum kepon ahut David Recho amethang amat thengjon arep arep dunlo.
Hebron along Abner aphan pip-lo, lapen thiri along asepathesi recho chirulo, lapen lasonsi kedo-an arat atumta chiruhurlo.
Abner aphan David lasonsi ningrilo:
Inut akelu ason, Abner kopisi kethinang-loma?
La ari anta ingnanghet-he.
Lapen akeng ta ingnangne;
Inut pran karmut arideng kethinang asonsi la thinang-lo!
Lapen rat atum puthot chiruthuhurlo.
Penang an arni rat atum David aphan an kepachoji bor-ilo, bonta alangli isi seme karsik deng-lo, “Arni chiche ako jongsi ne an chodet pulote, Arnam nephan pathengbop nang!”
Halatum la ning chebilo, lapen aningdok-lo. ahokpet pen Recho keklem an ason rat aphan aningpadok-lo.
David arat kedo-an lapen Israel arat kedo-an chinilo, “Abner kethi along recho thangnat kecherapdun ave.
Aban atum aphan recho pulo, ‘Nanglitum chechinine langma, pini arni Israel akethenei ajalin thitang-lo pu?
Ne recho aphan Arnamsi nekangvailo, seta pini ne jakong avelo. La Zeruiah asomar nephan aning ingtang-ong. Latum kepho nangji a-ot ateng
Abner aphan Hebron along pathilot-lo pu Sol asopo arjulong-lok pen alangli pherelo, lapen kedo-an Israel atum anta pherelo.

Ishbosheth banghini achakri do, banghinita mar kethipon asongjalinlo, latum ke Baanah lapen Rekab, latum Rimmon asomarlo, Beeroth pensi kevang, Benjamin akheilo. (Beeroth ta Benjamin arlo pusi lakhaponlo.
La kedo barim atum ke Gittaim, anatsi kat et-lo, lapen hadaksi doverlo.)

Sol akaprek aso ke Jonathon asopo Mephibosheth. Sol lapen Jonathon kethi ahut ke la arta ningkan pho vet-lang. Jezreel pen halatum kethi abirta long-lok pen laphan a-obok humpondetsi kat-linjuilo, bangpi ketong amat laphan otphlutsi longle paklodup-lo, amat akeng tekokjok-lo.
Rekab lapen Baanah atum, Ishbosheth ahem kedamji chesik-lo, lapen anerlo kesang ahut halatum nanglelo.
Inghap along kedo a-arlosota soktipli keroi kelak pen amek kemek-i-si amek jang-lot-lo, lasi Rekab lapen Baanah arlo vangjoilo.

Ephong latum Ishbosheth ke-i angdeng lut damlo, hadaksi la amekjang pamelo, lapen laphan pathilot-lo. Anke latum la aphu ingthanpet-lo, halatum la pondet-lo, lapen jopangthang Jordan Arlok angbong damlo.

Halatum David Recho angno Hebron along aphu hodailo lapen la aphan pulo, “Lahelo nangli hotur nangliphan kepathiji kebor-i Sol asopo, Ishbosheth aphulo. Pini nangliphan Sol lapen aso-asu aphuthak alar kehuiji aphan
Halatum aphan David thak-lo, Kereng-et a-

Ziklag along nelilong kevang apherangke Sol kethi alam neliphan nethanlo, la mathalo birta kemesi vanpilo. Ne laphan phlungdunsi laphan pathilot-lo. La helo la birta keme kevan anam ne laphan anong-e pilo!
Amethang ahem amek kejangjoi adai kave abangphan kepathi abang ko-an kehingno amonit plang poma! Nangtum la aphan kepathi apot ne nangtum aphuthak alar huipo lapen pirthe adang pen nangpavir-etpo!

David hukum pilo lapen la aron-aso atum Rekab lapen Baanah aphan pathilot-lo lapen ari, akeng bengsi Hebron adung alangteng along halatum aphan var-lo. Halatum Ishbosheth aphu ponsi Hebron along Abner athiri arlo pipdunlo.
Anke kedo-an Israel akhei atum David along Hebron vangpetsi la aphan pulo, “Nelitum nangli-ok nanglivi asonthot-lo.
Kedamtang Sol nelitum arecho kechobom ahut seta nanglisi Israel arat aphan ron japonlo, lapen
Lasi kedo-an ajalin atum David Recho along Hebron vang-lo. Halatum pen alangli isi kangthir-et aloh chetok-lo, halatum alangliphan jangthu patip-lo lapen la Israel arecho plang-lo.
David recho kecho ahut arta ningkan thomkep anlo lapen alangli ningkan 40 recho cholong-lo.
Judah aputhak la ningkan 7 ra ebeng an rat pangrilo, lapen Israel lapen Judah aputhak Jerusalem along ningkan 33 an rat pangrilo.

David recho lapen la amonit atum Jerusalem ketengkhengji apor nanglelo. Jebusi atum hadak dolo lapen mathalo, David laso arongsopi aphan kechedan pen hai un-e, lasi latum la aphan pulo, “Nang ladak jonghe seta nanglut longle, amek keselok lapen akeng ketekok atum jokta nangphan ingtan nangbiver un.”
(Bonta David chepahaidetsi halatum Zaion araikom cheraidet-lo, lapen la “David Arongsopi” pu chethang-lo.)

Halabangso arni amethang amonit aphan David chepulo, “Ne sonthot ladak kedo Jebusi atum aphan kehijim abang doma? Latum aphan pathi dorphlup doma? Pulote arludamra lang ahor keng keng dunnon lapen hala amek kave lapen akeng ketekok an aphan tengkheng damnon.” (La apotsi la putang-lo, “Amek keselok lapen akeng ketekok atum
Pairaikom cheraidet aphi David ladak dolo lapen “David Arongsopi” pusi amen irlo. La adung arei la rongsopi kimlo, lapen nihang anglong longle keplengset anat pen pangcheng-lo.
Kaiketa la ingtang ponbomlo, pima Jakong kethenei Arnam
Tair arecho Hiram kekim kerang akam David anat pherangke toilo; la kedar athengpi lapen kimbang atum rechohem aphan Rok-kimbang atum sikpilo.
Lasi David chechinilo,
Hebron pen Jerusalem damdet aphi, David ongdung enpangtar arloso lapen piso enlo, lapen ongdung asomar lapen asopimar dolo.
Lahei asomar aphan la Jerusalem along amahang thekpilo: Shammua, Shobap, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishua, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada lapen Eliphelet.
Philistia atum aphan thanlo, Israel aputhak David aphan recho battang-lo pu, lasi halatum aron-armu la aphan kenepjisi damlo. David la arjulongsi keraikom adim hir damlo.
Philistia atum Rephaim Arlok nanglesi la cheraidet-lo.
aphan David arjulo, “Ne Philistia atum aphan tengkheng nonma? Nang nephan pahaijima?”
Lasi David Baal Perazim anat damlo lapen hadak Philistia atum aphan la paremdet-lo. La pulo, “Isi alangthepi ason nehotur atum aphan
Philistia atum kat-et aphi, halatum akumlin-heihei otekang-lo, lapen David lapen la amonit atum halahei pon-et-lo.
Anke Philistia atum Rephaim Arlok chevoithusi la cheraithudet-lo.
Puthot aphong David
Thengpi arong angsong kedam arki nang arjulong lote anle tengkhengnon pima Philistia aron-armu keparemji aphan Ne nangtum aphrang dampo.”
kepu atengsi David klemlo, lapen Geba pen Gezer atovar soding Philistia atum aphan phlung undet-lo.
Israel angbong kemenei aron-aso atum aphan David hangpet-lo, pangrumpet bang suri 30 amonit
lapen Jakongthepik
Halatum inglong angsong kedo Abinadab ahem pen la pondetsi hemkonglong kemi athak la thap-lo. Abinadab asomar Uzzah lapen Ahio si hemkonglong jalo,
lapen Ahio ke aphrangsi jalo.
David lapen Israel kedo-an atum kanlo, lapen
Halatum asok kesi adim nanglelo. Chainong patekung-lo lapen Uzzah ari Kechejok a-Sinduk ot-lo.
Laso amat Uzzah aphan
lasi laso adim Perez Uzzah pusi halaso arni pen nonputa pubomlo. Uzzah aphan
Anke
Lasi Jerusalem anat la keponpejisi chesik-lo; lapen tovar kaprek anat suilo, lapen Gath arongsopi asor Obed-Edom ahem along la pondet-lo.
La hadak chiklo jonthom salo, lapen Obed-Edom lapen la ahem ahemtun aphan
Kechejok Asinduk pen ajok Obed Edom ahemtun lapen la kedo-an aphuthak
Kechejok Asinduk kepon amonit atum kengkam throk chejordet aphi, David halatum aphan pasang si chainong alo ejon athu kedo chainong aloso
David ape kanglit la avam ansi chingthang chot-lo,
Lasonsi la lapen Israel kedo-an atum Kechejok Asinduk Jerusalem anat ning arong akehangjo lapen pong-ut arki pen pen arlu damlo.
Rongsopi along Sinduk kevan ahut Sol asopi Mikal inghapso pen ardik dunlo, lapen bangpi la aphan thek-long-lo lapen bangpi la aphan aning so-uilo.
Halatum Sinduk vansi la kebi adim la David kekimtang apehem along bilo.
Ansi la athok-heihei lapen
lapen kedo-an halatum aphan an ronlo. Israel aso abangphutin pinso arlo aphan la him eplang ok karnutang ethan, lapen ajehak drakha athekreng pidunrep-lo. Anke abangphutin hem chedamrep-lo.
Paduke ahem asor aphan ahirjume kepijisi David hem kechedam ahut alangliphan kechetongjisi Mikal nangbarlo. “
David thak-lo, “Ne
lapen ne apar ne nemethang chepalang-meme jilang. Nang matha tahai ne thangta kali pu, bonta halahei a-arloso atum nephan man pilo!”
Sol asopi Mikal akai isi osomar avedet-lo.
David rechoke amethang rechohemsi dolo, lapen la aphan
Anke Nathan montri aphan David pulo, “Langtha! Ladak ne ke kedar pen kekim ahemsi dolo, bonta Arnam kechejok Asinduk ke Pehem arlosi bibomlang!”
Nathan recho aphan thak-lo, “Nanglining kehang alingle klemnon, pima
Bonta halaso aningve Nathan aphan
“Damra Neban David aphan nesi la aphan kepulo pura than damnon, Ne kedoji aphan Kardomhem kekim nangji ke nang kali.
Israel arat aphan Ijip adet pen kepajok arni pen non an ta Kardomhem dodepinlang. Ne pehem alongsi do dunbomlo.
Israel arat pen Ne kedambom ahut jokta kedar athengpi pen kekim akardomhem kopi athesi ne kim pipedet-loma pu inutbak Ne kangvaitang ajalin atum aphan hanghe pinlang.”
Lasi Neban David aphan, Ne kangtangnei a-Hemphu-si kepulo, pura than damnon. “Ne nangphan hidi ajo biresak kevi pen nangponsi Israel arat aputhak pangribang nang paplang-lo.

Nang kedam aling Ne nanglong nangdodunlo, lapen nang paphrang bom ahut kedo-an nang hotur aphan Ne nangparempilo. Nangphan pirthe angbong akethenei ajalin atum angbong anong kethe ason nang paplangji.
Ne rat Israel aphan Ne isi kangvaitang adim sikpilo, lapen hadak halatum aphan padolo, lapen hadak halatum aphan baduta chenekne pin pen dolongpo.
Laso alongle nangkelut ahut pen kehingno arat latum aphan tengkheng-olo, bonta lason plangthuthedetpo. Nang hotur kedo-an pen kepangraijisi Ne chechak-lo, lapen nangphan nangso-nangsu nangpipo.
Nang kethi lapen nangphusar atum pen pen kepip ahut nangsomar angbong inut abangphan recho paplangpo, lapen laso adet pangtangrakpo.
La abangsi Ne Kardomhem kimpo, lapen la recho angthun padoverjisi ne pachinilorpo.
Ne ke la apo plangpo lapen la ke Nesopo plangpo. La keklem kechokche ahut, la aphan apo le asomar atum aphan aduk kepi asonthot aduk pipo.
Bonta Sol aphan keklem asonthot la aphan Ne akerap panonelo, pima Sol aphan neke-o-epin akanghon nang ingno kepondet ason ke la pen ke ponpelo.
Nang kaiketa nangso-nangsu doji, lapen nang recho arat kaiketa doverji. Nang recho anghoi kaiketa thirklongji.”
Nathan aphan Arnam kepaklem an ason alangli David aphan than et-lo.
Ansi David recho
Tebonseta nang non an sose si klemlo, ninghang alin klem un a-
Kopisi ne nangphan pujilang! Nangban aphan nang chini.
Lake nangning kehang-lo, la keklemji kemang nephan than pachinijisi nang lahei akethe akam klemtang-lo.
Nang ko-an kethe, ning kehang aling keklem un a-

Pirthe athak Israel ason adet nahokta ave, la aphan nangrat kepaplangjisi nang latum aphan ban pen pajok-lo. Latum aphan nang manghumeme lapen thedung thedung akam keklem pen ajok nang pirthe adang chethang-lo. Nangrat atum paphrang bom ahut akaprek akhei-heihei lapen halatum a-arnam-heihei aphan nang phlung-et-lo, lake nang methang arat kepaplangjisi latum aphan nang Ijip pen pajok-lo.
Israel arat aphan nangmethang arat pu kaike aphan nang paplangtang-lo, lapen nang
Lapen non,
“Nang, thepik po, lapen rat atum kaiketa pupo, jakong kethenei
Jakong kethenei Israel a-Arnam
Non lasi ning kehang aling keklem-un a-
Ne nangphan neso-nesu aphuthak kepahirjumejisi choningrilo, anke halatum kaita nang pen akerap longverpo. Nang la ninghang aling keklem un a-
Penang an arni aphi, David Recho Philistia aphuthak tengkhengthulo, lapen halatum aphan paremdet-lo, lapen det aputhak halatum kechepahemphu ajakong pavedet-lo.
Ansi la Moab aphan paremlo. Longle athak keneptang atum aphan la bilo, lapen halatum bangkethom angbong banghini aphan ke pathilo. Lasonsi Moab atum la aber donang-lo, lapen la aphan midu pinang-lo.
Lapen la Siria atum Zebath pu adet aphan paremlo. Rehab asopo Hadadezer det aputhak kelangjisi Euphratis athak tovar kedam un ahut,
bang 1700 losei kardon aron-aso aphan lapen bang suri 20 akeklim aron-aso aphan nep-lo. Ron ahemkonglong alosei hum 100 dorphlup aphan losei bisi ahin kedo anke akeng patekok-et-lo.
Hadadezer Recho aphan kerapjisi Damaskas a-Siria atum esong ron-armu toilo, seta la aphan David tengkhengsi suri 22 amonit pathilo.
Ansi halatum alongri along la ron amukam kimlo lapen alangliphan midu pinang-lo. David aphan
Hadadezer achakri atum kerim ser achong-heihei David cherailo lapen lahei Jerusalem anat pon-et-lo.
Betah lapen Berothai, la Hadadezer kepangri arongsopi pen tam angchin pon-olo.
Hadadezer aron-armu kedo-an aphan Davidsi paremtang-lo pu alam Hamath arecho Toi arjulong-lo.

Lasi la asopo Joram aphan Hadadezer aphuthak David kehai apot kardom kechepidunjisi toilo, pima la pen Toi penang an abatai ron chedan nang-lo. David aphan Ser-rup lapen tam angchin pen keselam anong-e Joram ponpilo.
David Recho lahei ser, rup lapen alangli keparemtang kaprek adet pen kelong amar pen pen
halahei ke Edom, Moab, Amor. Philistia, Amalek atum pen lapen Hadadezer, la Rehob asopo, lake Zobah arecho, pen kevan amar anlo.
Ingti Arlok along Edom asor aphan bangsuri 18 kepathi pen kechevoi ahut David anong aphrang an sose chethang muchot-lo.
La Edom adet angbong ron-armu amukam seng-lo, lapen hadak kedo arat atum la aber donang-lo.
Israel adang an David pangrilo, lapen arat aso aphan kaita mesen lapen ahokpet pen pachoklemtoilo.
Zeruiah asopo Joab ke ron-armu anokbelo; Ahilud asopo Jehoshaphat ke ketok-heihei kebi ahemphulo;
Ahitub asopo Zadok lapen Abiathar asopo Ahimelek atum ke kurusarlo; Seraiah ke kangsaihem achunbang-lo;
Jehoiada asopo Benaiah ke David angphun kerai atum ahemphulo. Lapen David asomar ke kurusar plang-lo.
Arnisi David arjulo, “Sol ahemtun pen inutbak dolangma? Jongsi dolang pulote, Jonathon ajok ne la aphan kangjinso paklang ingtung.”
Sol ahemtun aban Ziba pu inut amen do, lapen la aphan David along pavangtoilo. “Nangli Ziba ma?” Recho arjulo. “Nangli kepu akam aling aphansi chesik-lo akehai,” la thak-lo.
Recho la aphan arjulo, “Sol ahemtun aphan kanghon lapen kangjinso kepaklangji amonit mane doma, athe ne Arnam aphan chechakdet-lo.”
Ziba thak-lo, “Jonathon asopo inut dolang, seta la akeng tekokjok-lo.”
La konat-lo? Recho arjulo. Lodebar along Ammiel asopo Makir ahemsi do, Ziba thak-lo.
Lasi David recho la aphan toijuilo.
Jonathon asopo, lapen Sol asupo Mephibosheth, vang-lo lapen David angno man kepijisi angphun patongkilo. David pulo, “Mephibosheth,” lapen la thak-lo, “Pu iknon, akehai.”

David pulo, “Nangli phereri! Nanglipo Jonathon ajok ne nangli-phan inghonji. Nangliphu Sol kechepahemphu alongle kedo-an neli nangvoithu-etji, lapen neli tebul athak an kechorapji aphan nangliphan kaiketa inghap ingpudang-lo.”
Mephibosheth, angphun patongkisi puthulo, “Kethitang amethan pen apar neli ningjoino mulo, akehai! Nangli kopi neliphan lapu-an inghon nangpoma?”
Ansi Rechoke Ziba, Sol aban aphan hang-lo lapen pulo, “Nanghemphu asupo, Mephibosheth aphan Sol lapen la ahemtun kechepahemphu ason an ne pitang-lo.

Nang, nangsomar atum lapen nangban atum nanghemphu Sol ahemtun aphan longle sai-tiki nangpo, lapen sok vanpisi halatum aphan an sikpi nangpo. Bonta Mephibosheth ke an kecho atebul along kaiketa inut alohi asonsi dopo.” (Ziba bang 15 asomar lapen bang 20 aban dolo.)
Zeba thak-lo, “Nangli kepu atengsi neli klem-etpo, Recho.”
Lasi Recho asomar atum asonsi Mephibosheth ke Recho an kecho atebul along chodunlo.
Mephibosheth aso akebi inut do, amen Mika. Ziba ahemtun abangphu atum an Mephibosheth aban plang-lo.
Lasi Mephibosheth, akeng hongnita ketekok abang, Jerusalemsi dolo lapen la recho atebul alongsi an chodunverlo.
Penang an arni aphi Ammon arecho Nahash thilot-lo, lapen la asopo Hanun si recho cholo.
David Recho pulo, “Ne Hanun aphan ahok ajirpo pu paklang nangji atheke apo Nahash nephan lasonsi klemlo.” Lasi David kangjinso kepaklangjisi pherangke atum aphan toilo.
Halatum Ammon nanglesi,

Ammon ajalin atum recho aphan pulo, “Nangli mathama la nanglipo aphan aman kepaklang lapen nangliphan kangjinso kepaklangjisi David lahei amonit nanglinat nangketoilo? La kali! Latum aphan ladak la nangketoi ke rongsopi kelang chonghu pen kechiniji aphan lo, anke la etum aphan ehai longdetpo.”
David apherangke atum aphan Hanun phlungjuilo lapen halatum aphan angmum ehin soivangsi halatum amilumbong ape rotdunchet-lo, lapen toiphlot-lo.

Halatum hem kechedamji aphan therakpik-lo. David laso keplangtang alam arjulongsi, halatum Jeriko along dokok nangji pu lam ethe pathan damtoilo, lapen angmum vangthu pamemetik halatum vangthu nangnelo pu pathanlo.

Ammon asor chinilo, latum David aphan hotur chekamlo pu, lasi halatum Beth-Rehob lapen Zobah pen suri 20 a-Siria aron-aso chohang-lo lapen Top pen suri 12 amonit ponlo, lapen Maakah arecho ta suri isi amonit rapdunlo.
David la arjulong-lok pen halatum abe kethurjisi kedo-an aron-armu pen Joab aphan toilo.

Ammon asor nangbarsi halatum amethang kedonangji adim charjap-lo ha Rabbah pu halatum arongsopi anghap along, lapen Siria amonit Tob lapen Maakah pen kevang atum rong angtan aklam along si arjapphrong-lo.
Hotur asor Joab aphan angno lapen anung anat pen tengkheng dettahai pu chechinisi la Israel aron-aso akemenei ingvaisi Siria atum angno parjap-lo.
Ahin an la asong ke akorte Abishai aridengsi pilo, latum ke Ammon atum anatsi pangnotoilo.
La aphan Joab pulo, “Jongsi Siria atum nephan keparem thek-long lote nang vang-ra nephan nerapnon, lapen Ammon atum jongsi nangphan paremlo pulote, ne nangphan nangrap po.
Chepangtang non lapen nangthin chepathenon! Erat aphan lapen e-Arnam arongsopi-heihei aphan etum jasemet chedanpilonang, lapen
Joab lapen la amonit atum ketengkheng jisi damlo, la amat Siria atum bephlung-lo.
Ammon asorta Siria atum kekat thek-longsi halatumta Abishai pen kat-lo lapen rongsopi anat chiruilo. Ansi Joab Ammon atum pen kechedan che-osi Jerusalem anat vangjuilo.
Latum Siria atum aphan Israel atum paremdet-lo pu chechinisi, halatum kedo-an asong chehangpetsi chingrumlo.
Euphratis Aroi anihang kedo a-Siria atum aphan Recho Hadadezer pahangtoilo, lapen halatum Shobak arideng Helam along vang-lo. La Zobah arecho Hadadezer aron-armu apinpolo.
David la arjulongsi Israel asong-heihei pangrumlo, lapen Jordan Aroi hatsi Helam, Siria atum kechingrum anat kepangno phrong adim la damlo, lapen rong chedan pangcheng-lo.

Lapen Israel atum Siria aron-armu aphan phlung-et-lo. David lapen la amonit atum losei ahemkonglong kardon bang 700 a-Siria lapen bang suri 40 losei kardon amonit aphan pathilo, lapen latum Shobak, hotur anokbe aphan arengpasolo, lapen la ron along thilot-lo.

Hadadezer aber kedo arecho atum chechinilo, latum aphan Israel atum paremthu bomlo pu, lasi latum halatum pen chepangsamlo, lapen halatum aber dolo. Lapen Siria atum ta Ammon atum aphan mo aphi kerapdunji aphan pherephrat-lo.

Recho atum ron kechedanver asek apor, David amethang achakri atum lapen Israel ron-armu pen pen Joab aphan toilo, halatum Ammon atum aphan paremdet-lo, lapen Rabbah arongsopi cheraidet-lo. Bonta David amethang ke Jerusalem alongsi dokok-lo.
Arnisi, penang an arnikangsam ahut David anerlo kesang pen thurlo lapen recho ahem asarnung angsong arludamlo. La angsong karlu un ahut, la inut a-arloso lang kechinglu thek-lok-lo. Bangpi langmepik.
Lasi bangpi komat-loma la kechinijisi pherangke aphan toilo, lapen bangpi Bathsheba pu chinilo, la Eliam asopi lapen Hitti asor Uriah apiso.
Bangpi aphan kepavandetjisi David pherangke atum aphan toilo; halatum labangpi aphan alanglilong vandet-lo. (Bangpi achiklo chepangthir jutchit anchot-lang.) Ansi bangpi hem chedamlo.
Aphi bangpi chechinilo la aso kedolo, lasi David aphan laso alam kepathanjisi la aphan birta pilo.
Anke Joab aphan David birta lolo: “Hitti aso Uriah aphan nelong nangtoitha!” Lasi Joab la aphan David along toilo.
Uriah nanglelo, lapen David la aphan Joab lapen asong-heihei alam mesenlangma pu lapen ron kechedan kosonloma lahei arjulo.
Ansi Uriah aphan la arjulo, “Hem chedam non lapen malomso sangdamtha.” Uriah hadak pen damjuilo lapen la ahem asor nong-e lodunlo.
Bonta Uriah ahem chedamdedet-lo; la rechohem anghap kehon atum alongsi amekjang dunlo.
Uriah ahem chedamdedet-lo pu alam David arjulongsi la aphan alangli arjulo, “Ajirdingklui aphi si nang hem kechevangle kopisi nang hem kechedamdedet-loma?”

Uriah thak-lo, “Israel amonit atum lapen Judah amonit atum ron kechedanjisi dam-et-lo; lapen kechejok Asindukta halatum pondet-lo. Neli nokbe Joab lapen la achakri atum anta aklam ajo kechedanjisi chesik-lo. Neli kopusonsi hem chedam pen cho, jun lapen nelipiso pen mekkejang thekpoma? Neli la kedo-an pen seme kangthir tang-lo, lason akam neli kai seta klem un-elo.”
Lasi David pulo, “Tangte dak pini sakoknon, lapen penapsi ne nangphan nangtoithupo.” Lasi halaso arni Uriah Jerusalem along sakok-lo, lapen puthot arnita salo.
La aphan David ajo kecho hang-lo lapen la aphan hor pangrilo. Bonta puthot halaso ajota Uriah ahem chedamdedet-lo; la lesi amethang keche-um ape athak Rechohem honbang angdeng alongsi amekjang-lo.
Puthot arni Joab aphan David isi aloh toksi Uriah arideng la lodunlo.
La tok-lo, “Ron kechedan kesiknei adimle Uriah aphan aphrang aren binon anke chiruira la aphan pathitoi lonang.”
Lasi Joab rongsopi kecheraiji ahut Uriah aphan hotur atum kangtangnei pu kechini adim toilo.
Hotur asong rongsopi pen nangbarlo lapen Joab asong pen chedanlo; ajehak David achakri atum lapen Uriah amatta thinang-lot-lo.
Ansi David aphan ron kechedan abaha Joab kelong alam pathantoilo,
lapen la pherangke aphan pinkhat-lo, “Ron alam nang recho aphan thandet aphi,
la aning thisi nangphan nang arjutahai, ‘kopisi nangtum halatum pen kechedanji aphan rongsopi adung pu-an patebok-loma? Halatum paisong pen thai aso nang ap tahai pu nangtum chechininema?

Nangtum matha damdema kopusonsi Gideon asopo Abimelek kethinang-lo? La Thebez along inut a-arloso paisong pen arlong arum paklosi la aphan pathilo. La apotsi nangtum kopi athesi paisong adung kedamloma?’ Lason jongsi recho nangphan nang arjulote, la aphan thannon, ‘Nangli chakri Uriahta thinang-lot-lo.’”
Lasi pherangke abang David along damsi la aphan Joab kepinkhat ateng thanlo,

la pulo, “Netum ahotur nelitum aphan mute halatum ingtang muchot lapen nelitum pen kechedanjisi rongsopi pen nangbarlo, ha aklam along an, bonta halatum aphan ha rongsopi anghap an nelitum phlungdunlo.
Anke latum paisong pen nelitum anat thai aso nang ap dunlo, lapen recho nangli chakri Uriah ta thidunlot-lo.”

Pherangke aphan David pulo, “Joab aphan aning parungnon lapen la aphan ning chepa-oi nangnelo pu ra thannon, pima nang chinine komattong ron along kethipone! Isi akangtangnei aketengkheng kedamjile lapen la kecheraidetjile la aphan thannon.”
Apenan aphan pathitang-lo pu Bathsheba arjulong-lok pen, bangpi la aphan chiru charnap-lo.
Kechiru apor jutdet aphi, bangpi aphan David Recho ahem along pavangtoilo; bangpi la apiso plang-lo lapen la aphan sopo inut mahang pathekpilo, Bonta David keklem aputhak
Keplang-o abang chainong lapen biresak do-o,

seta ejonnat kenamchot abiresak aso do. Laso aphan la lanalo, lapen la ahem along asomar atum pen pen the dunbomlo. La abang amethang ajehak a-an pen la aphan phinlo, amethang aharlung pen lang tung-lo, lapen la aphan arbakpo. Biresak aso ke la aphan asopi asonlo.

Arnisi inut alohi keplang ahem vang-lo. Keplang amonit la aphan keru-kethaira an kepachoji aphan amethang api angbong ejonbak anta that pi ingtungte; la klemklesi, la keduk abang abiresak asosi ponpidet-lo lapen la ahem kevang alohi aphan esan tun pilo.”
Keplang amonit aphuthak David aningthisi pulo, “Kereng-et a-
Pima lason kangjinso kave akam keklem apot la kepon pen phanphli pachetu lonang”
David aphan Nathan pulo, “Halaso amonit ke nangli helo, Lapen La helo Israel a-Arnam
La arecho anghoi lapen la apiso atum nangphansi nangpidet-lo, lapen nangphan Ne Israel lapen Judah aputhak recho nangbat-lo. La jongsi dorde pulote, Ne nangphan ansose phanni nangpidetji apot-lo.

Tangte kopi apotsi nang Ne hukum-heihei kekroikre det-loma? Nang kopisi la kehingno akam keklemloma? Ron along nang Uriah aphan pathitoilo. Ammon atum la aphan pathitoilo, lapen la apiso ta nang enpidet-lo!
Non nang Nephan nekroikredet apot ajehak nangso-nangsu atum ovetinta kechethu-kechethat pensi thinangpo.

Ne nangphan semetang-lo, nang hemtun angbong pen inut aphan otsi nangputhak pasungpo. Nangpiso Ne nangpen ponsi halatum aphan anut kaprek amonit aphan kepi ahut nang la thek-longpo, lapen la halatum pen pen anerlo amat irap-rappo.
Nang chopapjoilo, bonta kadokave Israel atum la pathek-longjisi Ne la anerlo amat paklempo.”
Ne
Nathan pulo, “
Bonta nang la keklem pen
Ansi Nathan hem chedamjuilo.
Uriah apiso David aphan mahang kepathek a-oso aphan
Oso keso kemeji aphan David Arnam ardomlo, la ajatta kechoji molo, lapen aningvevangta la amethang angdeng arlo chedamlo lapen longle athak tilaisi ajo pangthang-lo.
La kangsai achakri atum alanglilong damsi kepathurji aphan bor-ilo, bonta alangli molo, lapen halatum pen alangli thangnatta cho dundedet-lo.

Erui aphi oso thilot-lo, lapen laso abirta David achakri atum la aphan than haihedet-lo. Halatum pulo, “Oso kerenglang ahut eli arju seta David ethakthe tangte kopusonsi alangli sopo kethi alam kethanpoma? La amethang a-ok chepasung det tahai!”
Halatum kechepalamso thek-longsi oso thitang-lo pu David chinilo. Lasi halatum aphan la arjulo, “Oso thitang-loma?”
Kalang! La thitang-lo, pusi halatum thak-lo.
David longle athak pen thursi lang chinglulo lapen la achu chingsok-lo, lapen ape-ari cheselelo. Ansi la
“Nelitum la chinine,” pusi la achakri atum alangliphan arjulo, “Oso kerenglang ahut la aphuthak nangli chirupik-lo lapen an ta chothekthedet-lo; bonta la kethi pen amat, nangli thursi an cholo!”
David thak-lo, “Kalang-lo, la kerenglang ahut neli an humlo lapen chirulo. Neli mathalo
Bonta nonke la thitang-lo, apotsi neli an kehumji akam avelo. Neli laso a-oso achethe vanthu-thek jilangma? Nelita arnisi laso a-oso kedo along damnangji, bonta la nelilong kaike seta vangthekthelo.”
Ansi apiso Bathsheba aphan David aning pangsamlo. Bangpi pen irap-rap-lo, lapen bangpi inut sopo amahang pathekpilo, la aphan David ke Solomon pusi amen irlo. Oso aphan
Lapen Nathan montri aphan hukum pisi oso amen Jedidiah pu amen pa-irtoilo, pima la aphan
Halaso ahut Rabbah abethursi Joab ron chedanbomlo, la Ammon adet arongsopi kethelo lapen la kecherai longji dokdok-lo.
Kepathanjisi la David along pherangke atum aphan toilo: “Neli Rabbah tengkhengsi la alang-keron adim cheraidet-lo.
Non nangli ron asong ahin kedo-an pangrumra rongsopi tengkhengnon lapen la nanglimethang aphan cherainon. La cheraipen neli anong en-elo.”
Lasi David la aron-asong pangrumsi Rabbah damlo, lapen la tengkheng-lo, lapen la haidet-lo.

Ammon a-arnam Molek akumlin aphu pen David lin 35 aser aphutup lapen la along kaprek kechingthang alek-aroi-heihei vandet-lo. Kechingthang alek aroi vansi la amethang recho aphutup along bilo. La anchot kali, la ongdung kethipon amar rongsopi pen ponlo

lapen halaso arat aphan korot pen kephlak akam, ingchin aku-heihei akam, ingchin acho-heihei akam, lapen ita keselam akam-heihei jakong pen paklemtoilo. Ansi la lapen la amonit atum an Jerusalem chevoilo.
David asopo Absalom inut langmesen penan kedode angjir dolo, amen Tamar. David asopomar inut kaprek abang bangpi aphan aningchohang-lo.
La lapu-an bangpi aphan aningdok-lo, la sodet anpinlo, pima la bangpi aphan kelongji la atovar thek-longledet-lo; okarjang apotsi bangpi aphan pinso amonit pen pachetong longledet-lo.
Bonta la inut kereset ajirpo dolo, amen ke Jonadab, la David a-ik Shammah asopo.
Amnon aphan Jonadab pulo, Nang recho asopolo, seta arnivangta nangning ke-oisi ne nangthek-long. La kopi apot-lo?
Ne Tamar aphan ningdok-lo, la nemupabeng Absalom angjirlo, pusi la thak-lo.

La aphan Jonadab pulo, “Nang keso chekrongnon lapen hongplang along chedamnon. Nangpo nangphan nanglang-lote la aphan punon, ‘Kanghon pen nemu Tamar aphan nangtoitha lapen an nepaphintha. La nephan an kepatunpiji aphan ne neninghang-lo, lapen la amethang arideng pen nephan keru-kethaiji aphan ne ninghang-lo, anke ne laphan thek-long pen ning ingsampo.’”
Lasi Amnon keso chekrongsi hongplang along chedamlo.

David Recho la aphan kelangjisi damlo, lapen Amnon la aphan pulo, “Kanghon pen Tamar pavanglongtha lapen ajehak ahim dak paselam lonang, anke la nephan amethang arideng pen keru-kethai ne la aphan thek-longpamepo.”
Lasi Recho ahem lamthe lolo: “Amnon ahem damra ajehak kecho ason la aphan dang pitha.”
Bangpi hadak damlo lapen la aphan hongplang athak thek-long-lo. Bangpi ajehak kechinir ahim aduk ponpisi selampilo,

lapen bangpi aphan la kethek-longdak adim ajehak ahimta selampilo. Ansi bangpi him pangvuilo, lapen la aphan kepachojisi phule along pen pajoi-et-lo, bonta la un-edet-lo. La pulo, “Kedo-anta ingtan dam-et tha,” lapen halatum kedo-anta dam-et-lo.
Ansi bangpi aphan la pulo, “Ne hongplang along him vannon lapen nang methangle him nephan nephinnon.” Bangpi him ponsi la along damlo.
Halahei la aphan bangpi kepi ahut, la tumcheksi bangpi aphan pulo, “Hongplang athak nelong nang-i-dunnon!”
Bangpi pulo, “Nangne, Lason enong kejunodak akam keklemji aphan nesanponrinon! La ne phere-ong!
Ne kopusonsi puthot nemahang rat angno chepaklang haipoma? Lapen nangke Israel angbong langmemedetpo, kanghon pen Recho aphan punon, ne chini la nangphan nangpa-enlongji mene.”
Bonta bangpi aphan la arjujedet-lo lapen bangpi aphan la chepahaidetsi chonep bor-i-det khangjang-lo.
Anke bangpi aphan Amnon kehijim pen plengset-lo; bangpi aphan kanghon aphan mute nonla hijim muchot-lo. Bangpi aphan la pulo, “Damnon!”
Bangpi thak-lo, “Damde, Nonjong nang keklemtang akam mute nephan lapuson neketoi nangdai themu!”
Bonta bangpi aphan Amnon arjujedet-lo;
la amethang aban aphan hangsi pulo, “Laso arloso aphan nemek angden pen pondetnon! Bangpi aphan ingtan pondet-ra inghap ingkirhetnon!”
Aban abang bangpi aphan ingtan pondetsi inghap ingkirhet-lo.
Tamar-ke arikeding lapen akeng an dingthor achoisi chingchoi; lason ape ke recho asopi atumsi halaso ahut chingthangchot.
Bangpi aphu athak thek-lo chehisi athak ape chingsek-lo lapen amahang ari pen chedip-hopsi kechiru pen hem chedamlo.

Bangpi a-ik Absalom la thek-longsi arjulo, “Amnon nangphan pine nangpasungma? Kanghon pen lapu-an nangning chepa-oi nangne, ka. La punu-posar a-ik-lo, lasi badu aphanta laso alam thanrinon!” Lasi Absalom ahemsi Tamar aning ke-oi lapen jirpo-jirpi che-osi dokok-lo.
David Recho laso alam arjulongsi aningthihak-lo.
Lapen angjirpi aphan kechoneppi apot Amnon aphan Absalom pu-an hijimlo la ingkikedet khangjang-lo.
Ningkan hini aphi, Baal Hazor, la Ephraim arong adung Absalom amethang abiresak angmi kangtip patang-lo, lapen la hadak recho asomar kedo-an aphan phalo.
David Recho along la damsi pulo, “Recho, ne ne biresak angmi ingtip et-lo. Lasi nang lapen nang chakri atum vang pen kecho kejun amei along nangduntha?”
Recho thak-lo, “Lapu kali, po! Netum jongsi kedo-an nangdunlo pulote nang chepasung nang-opo.” Absalom choningri-olo, bonta recho kroidunde det-lo, lapen la Absalom aphan padamtoilo.
Bonta Absalom pulo, “Mesenlo, seta nang netum along ne-ik Amnon nangpadun longnon!” “La kopi athelo,” pusi recho arjulo.
Bonta Absalom along Amnon lapen recho asomar kedo-an atum toi dundetik David aphan choningri varret-lo.
Recho atum kecho apun a-an Absalom sik-lo,
lapen aban atum aphan pinkhat-lo, “Amnon kejun-ojilangle langpamenon, lapen ne hukum nangkepi ahut le pathinon. Phere nangne. Nemethangsi arpu enpo. Nangthin chepathenon lapen klem haiherinon!”
Lasi ban atum Absalom kepinkhat ateng pen klemsi Amnon aphan pathilot-lo. Kedo-an David asomar atum halatum agadha athak charlusi kat-et-lo.
Halatum ahem kechedam un ahut David aphan thanlo, “Absalom nangsomar kedo-anta pathi-et-lo, inutbakta bibedet-lo!”
Recho thurphlutsi aning keduk pen ape chingsek-lo, lapen longle athak klidup-lo. La along kedodun aban atum anta halatum ape chingsek-lo.

Bonta David a-ik Shammah asopo Jonadab pulo, “Recho, halatum nangsomar kedo-an aphan pathithe. Amnonsi thichot. Absalom aphan langding penta nangli pu unji, la angjirpi Tamar aphan Amnon kelangrem ahut pensi lason keklemji la aning chesiktang-lo.
Lasi nanglisopo atum kethi et-lo pu abirta nangli kroiri; Amnon si thichot.”
Halaso ahut amat Absalom katjuilo.
Laso aphi kehon abang ake-ongpi amonit atum Horonaim pen kevang atovar anglong pen nangkehir thek-long-lo. La recho along damsi la kethek-long alam thanlo.
David aphan Jonadab pulo, “Halahei nanglisopo atum kevang-lo, halatum vangji pu neli kepu ateng-lo.”
Laso alam kepu la jutdet aphi David asomar atum arlo nanglut-lo; halatum chiru pangcheng-lo, lapen David lapen achakri atum anta un an chirulo.
Absalom katsi Geshur arecho Ammihud asopo Talmai along damlo, lapen hadak ningkan kethom dolo.
David amethang asopo Amnon aphuthak penang an arni ningduk-lo.
Bonta la Amnon kethi aphuthak tengnesi la Absalom aphan chinghonpik-lo.
Absalom aphan David recho chingtung-olo pu Joab chinilo.

Lasi Tekoa along kedo inut kereset abangpi aphan la hang-lo. Bangpi nanglesi bangpi aphan la pulo, “Nangli ningdukpik ason chekrong non; nanglining keduk ape ari chingthangnon lapen nanglichu chingsok-rinon. Inut ajirkeding aningkeduk a-arloso asonle cheplangnon.
Anke recho along damnon lapen la aphan neli nangkethan asonthot-le punon.” Anke bangpi kopi punangjima la Joab thanlo.
Arloso abang recho along damlo, aman pisi angphun longle patongkilo, lapen pulo, “Recho, neliphan nerap iktha!”
Nang kopisi kenangji? Bangpi aphan la arjulo.
Akehai, neli ke keduk ahemepi, pusi bangpi thak-lo. “Neli penan thi-et-lo.
Akehai, nelisopo banghini do, arnisi halatum aphan kepachekak dunji abang avepin adim latum latum rit along chebohong-lo, lapen inut abangphan anut kaprek abang pathilot-lo.

Akehai, non kedo-an nedon-nerap atum nelibe thurlo, lapen nelisopo halatum arideng pinangji pusi neliphan hang-lo, ansi akorte aphan kepathi apot halatum la aphan pathi unpo. Halatum jongsi la klemlote, nelisomar avepinpo. Halatum ke nelining kechethe ajutsi aphan pavirpo lapen neli penan apoton pavepinsi amen pavirpo.”
Hem chedamnon, Laso abaha ne langpo, pusi Recho thak-lo.
Bangpi pulo, “Recho, Nangli keklem aling seta nelihemtun lapen neliphanle adai patinlonang, nangli lapen recho ahemtun ke adai pavenang,”
Recho thak-lo, “Nangphan jongsi mane paphere pulote la aphan nelong vandet-non lapen la mononphi nangphan kaita pasung un-edetpo.”
Bangpi pulo, “Recho kanghon pen nangli Arnam
Kanghon pen, Recho, neliphan eson alam nelipathan longtha, pusi bangpi choningrilo.
“Punon” pusi la thak-lo.

La aphan bangpi pulo, “Arnam arat aphan nangli kopisi laso kechokche akam klemloma? Nangli nanglisopo bang adet pen pavang longlelang, lapen nangli non kepu asonthot nangli methang aphan kehingno pusi hok-lo.

Elitum kedo-an ta thinangji; la kepangrumno alongle athak kebu alang ason. Arnam seta kethi abangphan parengthuthelo, bonta rechoke inut amonit aphan anke bang adet ban kedo pen kevanji atovar long unlang.
Non, Recho nangliphan neli kepuji kevang athe ke rat atum neli papherelo, lapen neli methang chepulo, neli kehang ason nangli klemji pu ning chethesi neli nangliphan pupo.
Neli mathalo, nangli nelilam arjupo, lapen nelisopo aphan lapen neliphan kepathiji pu kebor-i atum arideng pen pajokpo lapen nelitum aphan Arnam amethang amonit aphan thiri alongle pen neli pajoktha.
Neli methang aphansi neli chepulo, akehai nangli kechak asonsi neliphan pajokpo, pima rechoke Arnam apherangke ason lapen me-hingno pharthek. Arnam
Recho thak-lo, “Nangphan ne eson alam nang arjulang, lapen nang nephan ahok alam nethanvek nangji!”
“Ajat ason ta neli arju tame, Recho,” bangpi thak-lo.
Joab tong nangphan lahei paklemtoiloma? bangpi aphan la arjulo.
Bangpi thak-lo, “Recho, neli seme-tang-lo, la kepatu alam an nangli karju kethaktheji un-e. Ahok-lo, nangli chakri Joabsi lahei keklem nangji lapen kopisi keningje nangjima neliphann thanlo.
Bonta alangli la keklem ke kechethantang alam aputhak kepangtangji aphan. Recho nangli ke Arnam apherangke asonsi reset lapen kopi plangtang-loma la chini.”
Aphi Joab aphan recho pulo, “Nangli ningkehang ason keklemjisi nelita chesik-lo. Damra Absalom riso aphan chetongdamnon, lapen la aphan ladak vandet-non.”

David aphan aman kepijisi Joab ke David angno longle athak angphun patongkilo, lapen pulo, “Arnam nangliphan pahirjumenang, Recho! Non neli chinilo, nangli neliphan ningdok-lo, pima neli kechoningri ason nangli thak-lo.”
Anke la thursi Geshur damlo lapen Jerusalem along Absalom aphan vandet-lo.
Tebonseta, recho hukum pilo, “Absalom ke rechohem dolongle. Ne laphan lang ingtungte,” pusi recho pulo. Lasi Absalom amethang ahemsi dolo, lapen recho angno cheklangkledet-lo.
Israel angbong Absalom asonthot athok kedo amonit avelang; la aphu pen akeng an thang akelangno ave.
La achu inglum-o, lapen la dinglen lapen arthat-o, lapen la ningkan isi pen ephong si chingtip chot. Rechohem alin pen lin lote, la linni an sosechot do.
Absalom asopo bangkethom do lapen asopi inut do, amen Tamar pu,
Recho aphan cheklangklepin pen Absalom Jerusalem along ningkan hini dolo.
Ansi la Joab aphan hang-lo; la apharman recho along kepadamji aphan arjulo, bonta Joab vangpipedet-lo. Puthot la aphan Absalom hang-lo, lapen puthot ta Joab kevangji molo.

Lasi amethang aban atum aphan Absalom pulo, “Langtha, Joab ahidi ke ne hidi adung-lo, lapen la along soktipliso arong menlo. Damra la me keidamchoknon.” Lasonsi latum damlo lapen hidi me kei damchok-lo.
Absalom ahem Joab damsi hang-lo, “Kopisi nangban atum nehidi me kekeichok-lo?”

Absalom thak-lo, “Pima ne nangkehang ahut nang vangvedet ke. Recho along nepharman nepadam pitoijisi nening hang-lo: Ne kopisi Geshur keche-onang-lo, lapen ladak kevang nang-loma? Nephan hadak kedokoksi akemeji apot-lo,” lapen Absalom ningjebomlang, “Recho pen ne kechetongji aphan kepasikjisi ne nangphan ninghang-lo, lapen jongsi nedo do pulote alangli nephan nepathilot-nang.”

Lasonsi David Recho along Joab damlo lapen la aphan Absalom kepu alam an than-et-lo. Absalom aphan Recho pavangtoilo, la damsi angno longle athak angphun patongkilo, la aphan recho kangjup pen deng-lo.
Labangso aphi, Absalom amethang aphan ingchin ahemkonglong lapen losei-heihei lapen kethondun amonit bang 50 chesik-lo.

La adapprang thursi damlo, lapen rongsopi anghap atovar adung arjaptherlo. Monit atum kangsaiji aphan recho along kevang abangphan Absalom la aphan hangsi konat pensi kevang-loma la arjupo. Kopi akhei pensi kevangma halabangso abang chethan et aphi,
Absalom pupo, “Langtha, aron ke nanglihin anat, bonta nangli lam kedengji recho along ketoi abangphu avelang.”
Lapen la pulo, “Neli kangsai abang asonte neli ko-an ingsai ingtung-loma. Anke lam kepho an mate kehangji ateng nelilong vanglongpo, lapen neli halatum aphan ahok-akangsai pidun longpo.”
Absalom aphan angno angphun patongki abangphan la ari-otsi ingjuppo.
Lasonsi abangphutin a-Israel kangsai kelongji aphan recho along kevang an atum aphan Absalom klemlo lapen halatum aphan la aningpadok-lo.
Ningkan phli aphi David Recho aphan Absalom pulo, “Akehai, nephan Hebron along padamlongtha, lapen
Ne Geshur, Siria along kedo ahut, ne
Ingsamjin penle damnon, pusi recho pulo. Lasi Absalom ha Hebron anat damlo.
Bonta la Israel akhei kedo-an aphan “Nangtum pong-ut arki arjulong-lote, Absalom Hebron along recho chotang-lo!” pu kepaputoiji aphan birta lolo.
Jerusalem pen Absalom along kedun bang 200 amonit atum la akepha dunlo, halatum kehingno kemang alam chininepin lapen kedo-anta kekroi pensi dunlo.
La athok kepajir ahut Ahithophel, la David Recho thanparebang aphan kehangjisi Gilo arong anat la toilo. Recho abekethur kemang atum ingtangmuchot-lo lapen Absalom abe kedun armu nangbatbomlo.
Inut apherangke David aphan thanpachinilo, “Israel atum Absalom aphansi aningdok-tang-lo.”

Lasi Jerusalem along kedo achakri atum aphan David pulo, “Absalom pen kejoknangji pulote non amat ili damnangji! Paprapnon! Kalite la dak nangle-dapprangpo lapen rongsopi kedo bangphutin aphan pathi-etpo!”
Kalang-lo Recho! Halatum thak-lo, Nangli kepu aling nelitum keklemjisi chesik-lo.
Lasi recho olo, la ahem asor lapen achakri atum, bang kep enpangtar a-arloso atum, recho ahem kehon atum pen apar dun-et-lo.
Recho lapen la kedo-an amonit atum rongsopi ojapsi, halatum ajutsi ahem chingtonlo.
Achakri atum arjupet-lo, la adung lapen la angphun kerai abang la angno damlo. Gath pen bang 600 aron-aso atum la aphi aphi dunlo,

lapen Ittai, halatum ajalin aphan recho pulo, “Nangli kopisi nelitum along nangkedun nangpoma? Cheruira recho kemi along do dunnon. Nang ke bang adet asor, inut kechepachong abang; nangmethang adet pen heloving.

Nangli ladak ke malomso aphansi dolongchotji, lapen kopi athesi nelihem along nangli nangdunthap nangpoma? Neli methang amatta chechinine, konat-tong neli kedam nangjilone. Chevoira nanglirong asor aphanta nanglilong chepon-non lapen
Bonta Ittai thak-lo, “Recho, neli
Mesenlo, David thak-lo. Nangdunbomnon! Lasi Ittai amonit kedo-an pen lapen halatum ahem asor an pen pen dunlo.
David asong ke-o thek-longsi rat atum ase pathesi chirudunjolo. Recho Kidron alangjeng hatsi la amonit atum anta aphi aphi dunlo, lapen halatum kejejangtang ajo atovar anat damrappet-lo.

Zadok kurusar jokta hadak dolo, lapen la along Levi atum kechejok Asinduk kangthir parphang ponlo. Halatum longle athak lunkoksi rat kedo-an rongsopi ke-o tangtetik la humhedet-lo. Abiathar kurusar ta do.
Anke Zadok aphan recho pulo, “Kechejok Asinduk rongsopi arlo ponthunon.
Bonta jongsi alangli ne ingjinsose pulote, mesen, la aningkehang aling neliphan paklem lonang.”

Alangli Zadok aphan pubomlang, “Langnon, nangli lapen Abiathar lapen nanglitum asopomar banghini Ahimaaz nanglisopo lapen Abiathar asopo Jonathan pen pen pon ra rongsopi anat ningkangsam pen dam iknon.
Neli ha kejejangtang ajo langroi kehat along nangli pen birta longletik inghongverpo.”
Lasi Zadok lapen Abiathar Kechejok Asinduk Jerusalem anat ponthusi hadak dokok-lo.
David kechiru pen Oliv Anglong arlubomlo; la akeng angse lapen ningkeduk angthek aphu pe charkulunlo. La aphi kedun atum anta aphu pe charkusi chirudunlo.
Ahithophel ke Absalom kehingno kethur along chelang-duntang-lo pu David arjulongsi la ardomlo, “Kanghon pen
Arnam aphan karcho adim, aphuchong an David chebat damlo, langtha hadak Arki aso kekroi-thirklong abang ajirpo Hushai aphan chetong-lo, la ape chingseksi aphu longle chebat-lo.
La aphan David pulo, “Nelilong nangli nangdun seta thangta nangrapdun thekthe,

bonta nangli rongsopi kecherui pen neliphan nerapthekji lapen Absalom aphan punangpo, la apo aphan nangli kekroithirklong pen kangduk asonthot non nangli la aphanta ingdukpo. Lapen Ahithophel kepare ason an nangli un an pen khindedunnon.
Zadok lapen Abiathar kurusar atum hadaksi dolo; nangli rechohem along karjulong ason an halatum aphan than-etnon.
Halatum along asopo atum Ahimaaz lapen Jonathan dolo, lapen nangli kelong alam an halatum aphan nelilong nangtoinon.”
Lasi David ajirpo Hushai rongsopi anat Absalom nangkele ahut an ke chiruitang-lo.

David inglong aphuchong alum damchot aphi alangli men men Mephibosheth aban Ziba aphan chetong-lo. La along ajehak agadha dolo him dum pharohini, drakha athe akreng abitung 100, thesere abitung 100, ok-reng ajarong plengset drakha ahorlang gadha athak arthang-lo.
La aphan David Recho arjulo, “Lahei nangli kopi aphanlo?”
Ziba thak-lo, “Gadha ke Recho ahemtun asor kardonji aphan, him lapen thesere ke pinso atum kechoji aphan lapen drakha ahorlang ke kejejangtang ajo halatum ainiti ahut kejunji aphanlo.”
Nangli hemphu Sol asupo, Mephibosheth ke konat-lo? Halaphan recho arjulo.
Alangli ke Jerusalem alongsi do, Ziba thak-lo, “Pima la chechinilo, aphu recho arat Israel atum non la aphansi hodaipo.”
Ziba aphan recho pulo, “Mephibosheth amar an nangli cheraipetnon.”
Neli ke nangli banchot, Ziba thak-lo, “Recho aphan ne aning padok-vernang!”
David Recho Bahurim along nangkele ahut, Sol adon angbong inut Gera asopo Shimei la aphan kechetongjisi nangbarlo, la vangsi David aphan ingthokdunlo.
David lapen achakri atum aphan Shimei arlong kevar pangcheng-dunlo, David aphan la amonit atum lapen angphun kerai atum kompet seta varlo.
Alangliphan Shimei ahirjuno pilo, lapen pulo, “Damnon! Chetar seraknon! Kethu abang! Kepathi abang!
Nang Sol arecho-arat thidet-lo, la apotsi
Abishai, la apei Zeruiah, recho aphan pulo, “Recho, kopisi labangso amethan nangliphan pahirjunolongma? Neliphan hadak padam longra labangso aphu pavanlongpet non!”
La nangkam kali, Recho ke Abishai lapen la a-ik Joab aphan pulo. “
Abishai lapen la achakri kedo-an aphan David pulo, “Nelimethang aso neliphan kepathiji bor-ilo; tangte kopi athesi la Benjamin aso aphan nanglitum kemanghu nangji?
neli kesung chinisi la ahirjuno adim ajehak ahirjume nelipiji mene.”

Lasi David lapen la amonit atum tovar-soding dambomlo. Shimeita halatum along dunbomlo, inglong akung kung dunbomsi ingtondunbomlo, arlong lapen longle angkleng-heihei la kedambom ahut halatum aphan vardunbomlo.
Jordan along kele ahut anke Recho lapen la amonit kedo-anta ainiti-ta lo, kelak-ong latum hadak sang-lo.
Absalom lapen la along Israel arat atum kedo-an ta Jerusalem arlo lutdamlo, lapen Ahithophel ta halatum along do dunlo.
Absalom aphan David kechikinei ajirpo Hushai kechetong ahut la asepathesi hang-lo, “Recho achethe padingnang! Recho achethe padingnang!”
Nangjirpo David aphan akekroi kopi cheplang-lo? pusi la aphan Absalom arjulo. “Kopisi nangli halalong kedundedet-loma?”
Hushai thak-lo, “Neli kopusonsi kedunpo? Neli ke
Jat seta nelihemphu asopo aphan kalite akaprek komat aphansi neli ingdukthekpoma? Nanglipo aphan kangduk asonthotsi non neli nangliphan ingdukpo.”
Ansi Ahithophel anat pangnosi pulo, Non elitum ladak dolo, nangli nelitum aphan kopisi thanpare poma?

Ahithophel thak-lo, “Damra rechohem kepangtangjile ke-otekang nanglipo ke-enpangtar a-arloso atum pen irap-rapnon. Ansi Israel abangphutin ta nangli nanglipo aphan nangli hotur asonsi chekamlo pu chinipo lapen nanglibe kedun atum anta aning rungphompo.”
Lasi halatum isi apehem Absalom aphan rechohem asarnung athak kimpilo, lapen rat angno Absalom pehem arlo lutdamsi apo ke-enpangtar a-arloso atum pen pen irapsi che-enlo.
Halaso ahut Ahithophel kepare alam an Arnam alam asonsi la dengpet-lo; David lapen Absalom ta la kroilo.
Ajirding-o-elang, Absalom aphan Ahithophel pulo, “Neliphan bang suri krehini amonit pangvailongtha lapen paningve David aphi neli hungdunpo.
La kelak lapen aning kerun ahut neli laphan tengkhengpo. La pheredukpo, lapen la amonit atum anta kat-etpo,
lapen arloso apenan along kechevoi ason thak-thaksi la amonit kedo-an ke nanglilong van-etpo. Nangli inutnatsi pathilongchotji; ahin arat anke jokji.”
Laso akepare Absalom lapen Israel ajalin atum aphan mesen asonsi thek-long-lo.
Absalom pulo, “Non Hushai aphan hangtha lapen la kopitong kepujine arjudun lonang.”

Hushai nanglesi la aphan Absalom pulo, “Lahelo Ahithophel netum aphan nekepare alam, La netum kroidun nangjima? Jongsi kroidun nangne pulote, nangli nelitum aphan kopisi keklem nangjima nethan iknon.”
Hushai thak-lo, “Non aphan Ahithophel nang keparedun ke me-o-e.

Nangli chini nanglipo, lapen la amonit atum ron kechedan unpik atum saide lapen latum aso keponpidet athokvam api ason pherememe. Nanglipo ke inut asai kethektang anokbe, la ajo amethang amonit atum along dodunde.
Non amat la konatne alongku mate akaprek adim chepatu-et-lo tahai. Nangli monit aphan David tengkheng-lo pu karjulong abang, nangli monit atum remtang-lo pu si la pupo.
Hingho ason angthin kethe anokbe seta pherepo pima nanglipo inut anokbepo lapen la amonit atum anta ron kechedan unpik atum pu Israel kedo-anta chinipet.
Neli keparejike nangli kedo-an Israel aso aphan kecheng ahin pen kejut ahin an vanra pangrumpetnon, talo akung asangti amu ason an ake-ong, lapen nangli methang amat halatum aphan ron japonnon.
David nahok-le do setame elitum longpo lapen kopi plang-loma pu kechini aphrang la aphan tengkheng lonang. Alangli lapen la amonit atum inutbakta jok un-elo.
La jongsi rongsopi anat chiruilo pulote, elitum amonit atum kedo-an phamri vansi arlok aber halaso arongsopi anat vungpo. Anke arlong isinatta inglong angsong dolongledetpo.”
Absalom lapen Israel kedo-an atum pulo, “Ahithophel kepare mute Hushai akepare memu.” Ahithophel akeme kepare ke padengmolo, la
Anke Zadok lapen Abiathar kurusar atum aphan Hushai kopu-sonsi Absalom lapen Israel ajalin atum aphan thanparedun loma lapen Ahithophel kopisi keparedunloma than-et-lo.

Hushai la ingthum dunlo, “Paprapnon! David aphan isi abirta papinon, kejejangtang ajo alangroi kehat along ajo padolongrinon, bonta non amat Jordan pakapnon, anke la lapen la amonit atum aphan nep longlelo lapen pathilonglelo.”

Abiathar asopo Jonathan lapen Zadok asopo Ahimaaz Jerusalem angtan Enrogel pu alang amek alongsi inghongding-lo, pima rongsopi kelutdam atum nangthek-lok na pu latum pherelo. Inut kam keklem asopisi damverlo lapen kopi plang-loma halatum aphan thanpibomlo, lapen halatum damsi David Recho aphan thanpo.

Bonta arnisi inut a-oso latum aphan thek-lok-lo lapen la Absalom aphan thanserlo; lasi latum Bahurim along edon ahem chepatu serak-lo. Labangso amonit ahem adung langtuk isi do, lapen halatum laso arlo lutchok-lo.
Arloso abang langtuk amahang dipthipsi la athak sok sangjailo, lalote baduta ning mathadamdelo.
Absalom achakri atum laso ahem vangsi arloso aphan arjulo, Ahimaaz lapen Jonathan konat-lo?
Latum langroi hat-et-lo, pusi bangpi thak-lo. Halatum aphan latum ribomlo, bonta thek-longlesi latum Jerusalem chevoithujuilo.

Halatum dam-et aphi Ahimaaz lapen Jonathan langtuk pen nangbarlo lapen damsi David aphan kelong alam an thanlo. Halatum la aphan Ahithophel la aphan kephangnojisi kopi mang-loma thanlo lapen pulo, “Paprap-ra langroi kap seraknon.”
Lasi David lapen la amonit atum Jordan kehat pangcheng-lo, lapen arni kevang an halatum kedo atum anta parai kap long-et-lo.

Ahithophel chethek long-lo la kepare ateng kroi abang avedet-lo, lasi la amethang agadha athak chardonsi amethang arongsopi chedamjuilo. Amethang keklem nangji akam klem et aphi la amethang chekokthat-ot-lo. La aphan ahemtun athiri alongsi pip-lo.
Absalom lapen Israel atum Jordan kehat ahut ke David Mohanaim le-et-lo.
(Joab adim Amosa aphan ron-armu apinpo Absalom bat-lo. Amosa ke Ishmail akur Ithra asopolo, apei ke Abigail, la Joab apei Zeruiah, amu Nahash asopilo.)
Gilead alongri alongsi Absalom lapen la amonit atum mukam chekimlo.

David Mohanaim along nangkele ahut, la Nahash asopo Shobe, la Ammon alongri Rabbah arongsopi pensi kevang, lapen Ammiel asopo Makir la Lodebar pen, lapen Barzillai, la Gilead alongri Rogelim pen kevang atum aphan chetong-lo.

Halatum harlung-heihei, longle atibuk-heihei, pe-ri-thui, lapen David lapen la amonit atum aphan an vanpilo; soktipli, soktipliso, sangkarnu, thengbon, thepak, pijo alang, chulang angkleng, chulang athu lapen ajehak abiresak-heihei vangpilo.
David lapen la amonit atum ingchir-opo, ingit-opo lapen kejejangtang ajo la-opo pu halatum chini.
David Recho amonit kedo-an vangsi chepangrumpet-lo, bangsuri isi asong, bangpharo isi asong, lason thaksi halatum aphuthak inut hukum kepi abang bat-lo.

Ansi la halatum aphan songthom thaksi toilo, Joab lapen Joab amu Abishai lapen Ittai, la Gath pen, abangphutin isi asong pachehemphutoilo. Lapen amonit atum aphan recho pulo, “Nangtum along nemethangta nangdunpo.”

Nangli nelitum along nangdun nangnelo, pusi halatum thak-lo. “Nelitum kat seta hotur atum nelitum aphan thangnatta mathathelo. Jongsi nelitum kedo-an chirui-et seta lapen kat seta mate achitim anbak nelitum thi-et seta; nanglike nelitum bangsuri kep an sose adorkeso abang-lo. Nangli ladak rongsopi dokok pen nelitum aphan nekerap abang nangtoidun bomsi akemeneilo.”
Nanglitum kopima akeme kematha lasi neli klempo, pusi recho thak-lo. Ansi la amonit atum suri isi asong, pharo isi asong, dambomsi la inghap adung arjapdunding-lo.
La Joab, Abishai lapen Ittai aphan hukum pilo: “Neliphan ajok Absalom riso aphan paphori!” Lapen achakri atum aphan David hukum kepi alam kedo-anta arjulongpet-lo.
Rong anat David aron-armu lapen Israel aso atum pen ron chedanlo ha Ephraim a-ingnam ajo.
David amonit atum Israel aso aphan paremdet-lo; la isi kepherememe akeremlo, halaso arni bangsuri 20 amonit thilo.
Ron kechedan rong ajo anta prat-lo, ron ahidi along kethi mute ingnam ajo kethisi ke-ong.

Absalom men men amat ajehak David amonit atum pen chetong mamlo. Absalom losei alososi kardon, lapen lason dambomsi phongrong arongpi arum kedam amat Absalom aphu thengpi aro hini adak chingkep-lok-lo. Losei aloso katsi Absalom aphan otekangsi pajangling-lo.
David amonit inut abang thek-longsi la Joab aphan thanlo, “Akehai, phongrong athengpi aro hini adak Absalom kechingthangling neli thek-long-lo!”
Joab thak-lo, “Nang jongsi thek-long lote kopisi nang hadak amat la aphan pathilot-ledet-lo? Ne nangphan rup adum kep lapen vamchekok epak nangpi longpopji apot-lo.”

Bonta halaso amonit thak-lo, “Nangli jongsi rup adum suri isi nepi seta neli recho asopo aphan rimunjong ehongta chirung-re. Nangli Abishai lapen Ittai elitum kadokave Recho ahukum alam arjulong-lo, ‘Neliphan ajok, Absalom riso aphan paphori.’
Bonta jongsi recho aphan kroikrera Absalom aphan pathilote, lapen recho la arjulong-lote, la asontin nangli neliphan neraidun un-edetji.”
Ne nangpen apor kepadamji nening hanghe, Joab pulo. La chir pakthom ponsi Absalom thengpi arong along kechevek-ling kereng-et-lang ahut aning along lahei jorplut-lo.
Anke Joab bangkep amonit Absalom adung pateboksi la aphan kepathi patangdet-lo.
Ron kechedan kepangtonjisi Joab pong-ut pabut-lo, lapen la asong atum Israel aphi kehungdun pen nangchiruilo.
Halatum Absalom, abang arpum ponsi ingnam ajo ahilik karnuk ajo varchorlo, lapen la amangho arlong thepi pen dipthip-lo. Abangphutin a-Israel atum kat-etsi amethang ahem chedamlo.

Recho Arlok along la kereng-etlang ahut Absalom angthek ehum ahem amethang aphan kimlo, pima la amen keparengji aphan la asopo ave. Lasi la amethang amen che-irlo, lapen pini anta la Absalom angthek ahem pusi chinipet-lo.
Anke Joab aphan Zadok asopo Ahimaaz pulo, “Birta keme recho aphan kethan damjile neliphan recho along pakat longtha, pima la aphan hotur atum arideng pen
Lapukali, Joab thak-lo, “Pini nangli thangnat abirta keme pon nangnelo. Mo nonphi klemtame, bonta pini kali, athe recho asopo thitang-lo.”
Anke la Sudan asor aban aphan pulo, “Damra nang kethek-long ason an recho aphan thandamnon.” Aban abang angphun patongkisi laso aphi la kat-lo.
Ahimaaz choningrithulo, “Kopi plangjima neli pherere; kanghon pen neliphanta birta nepapon longtha.”
Sopo nang kopisi la keklemji nangning hang-loma? Joab thak-lo. “Labangso aputhak nang thangnat anong-e longle.”
Jat plang seta, Ahimaaz ningjethulo, “Neli kedamji nelining hang-lo.”
Tangte damnon! Joab thak-lo. Lasi Ahimaaz katsi birta ha Jordan Arlok atovar anat lapen ban aphan mute la lit phlot-lo.
David ke arlo lapen ingtan rongsopi anghap adaksi kechongni. Honbang paisong athak arlusi tovar anghap sarnung athak arjap-lo; la langbomsi inut ariso nangkekat thek-long-lo.
La arum asor aphan hang-lo, lapen recho aphan thanlo, lapen recho pulo, “La jongsi inutpet pulote la birta kemesi vanlo.” Kekat abang adung nanglebomlo.
Honbang puthot anut kaprek amonit nangkekat thek-long-lo, “Langtha! Anut kaprek amonitta nangkat bomlang!” Recho thak-lo, “La ta birta kemesi kevanlo.”
Honbang pulo, “Neli kethek-long aphrang amonit ke Ahimaaz nangnak.”
Recho aphan Ahimaaz ardomsi la angno i-parlipbak-lo, lapen pulo, “Nangli Arnam
Absalom riso mesenlangma? Pusi recho arjulo.
Ahimaaz thak-lo, “Akehai, Joab neliphan nangketoi ahut anke monit atum hangjo, la kopi apot lone neli nangthan thekthe.”
Hadak arjapthertha, recho pulo; lapen la hadak damsi arjaptherlo.
Anke Sudan aso aban nanglesi recho aphan pulo, “Neli nangliphan birta keme do Recho! Pini nanglibe kethur atum kedo-an aphuthak
Absalom riso mesenlangma? pusi recho arjulo.
Ban abang thak-lo, “Neli kematha ke nangli hotur atum kepho asonthotsi la ta pholo, akehai, lapen nanglibe kethur atum antalo.”
Ningke-oi pensi recho aning plengset-lo. La angsong angdeng arludamsi anghap along chirulo. La kedam ahut ta chirulo, “O po! Po Absalom! Po Absalom! Nesi nangdim thinangji apot-lo, po! Po Absalom!”
Absalom apot David Recho chiru charnap-lo pu Joab aphan thanlo.
David aron-asong halaso arni kehai aning arong ke ning ke-oi cheplangdet-lo, pima recho abang asopo aphuthak chirulo pusi halatum arjulong-lo.
Ron pen kekat ketherakju aron-aso ason thak-thaksi halatum rongsopi arlo chiruijoilo.
Recho amahang chedip-hopsi kechiru ase pathelo, “O nesopo; po Absalom! Absalom neso!”
Recho ahem Joab damsi la aphan pulo, “Pini nangli monit atum aphan nangli chethe lapen nangliso, nanglisopi, nanglipiso, atum aphan kepajok amonit atum aphan patherak-lo.

Nangliphan kanghon abangphan nangli khindelo, lapen nangliphan kehijim atum aphan nangli chedondunlo! Nangli chakri atum lapen nangli monit atum nangli thangta kali pu nangli pachinidak-lo. Neli thek-long-lo Absalom jongsi pini reng-et-lang lapen nelitum kedo-an thi-et-lo pulote, nangli ning arong pikji.
Non dam ik-ra nangli monit atum aphan aning pathe dam iknon. Neli
Ansi recho thurlo lapen damlo, rongsopi anghap adung arjaptherlo. Alangli monit atum la adung halatum kedo-anta chingrumpet-lo.
Halaso ahut kedo-an a-Israel atum kat-et-lo, abangphutinta methang ahem anat chekat-rep-lo.

Dat adang bithe latum amethang angbong chebohong pangcheng-lo. “David Recho ehotur pen etum aphan epajok-lo,” pusi halatum lahin lahin chepusailo. “La Philistia atum pen epajok-lo, bonta non la Absalom pen katsi det otekang-lo.
Etum Absalom aphan etum arecholo pu bat-lo, bonta ron along la aphan pathilot-lo. La apotsi mane inutbak David Recho aphan vanthuthedet-poma?”

Israel atum kechethansai abirta David Recho along lelo. Lasi alangli Zadok lapen Abiathar kurusar aphan toisi Judah ajalin atum aphan parjudamtoilo, “Kopisi nangtum Recho ahem kevangthuji aphan kerapdun kepaphisi abang keplang nangpoma?
Nangtum nedon-nerap-lo, lapen ne-ok nevilo; nephan nekangthumji aphan nangtum kopisi kepaphi nangpoma?”
Amasa aphan kepaputoijisi David halatum aphan thanlo, “Nang nedonlo. Non pen Joab alar nangsi neron-armu chepahemphuji aphan nangbat-lo. La ne klemklete Arnam nephan nepathilot-nang!”
David alam Judah amonit atum aphan pakroilo, lapen la aphan achakri atum pen pen kechevoi nangji aphan lamthe toilo.
Recho kecherui ahut Jordan Aroi along inut Judah amonit chetong-lo, la Gilgal vangsi alangliphan langroi parai an kethondun abang-lo.
Halaso ahut amat Gera asopo Shimei, Benjamin aro, Bahurim pen Jordan along David Recho aphan kechetongjisi vang-lo.

Alanglilong Benjamin akhei pen bangsuri isi amonit dolo. Lapen Ziba, la Sol ahemtun aban ta asomar bang 15 lapen bang 20 aban pen pen vang-lo, lapen recho nangkele aphrang Jordan along latum nanglelo.
Halatum recho asong aphan kethondunjisi recho kepu aling keklemjisi langparai kap-lo.
Recho lang kehatji pu kechesik ahut, Shimei la angno iparlipbaksi la aphan pulo,
“Nangli Jerusalem ke-o arni nangliphan kechokche keklem apot kanghon pen tengne ikdetnon. Neli be thur ik-rinon lapen asapta la nanglining van nangnelo.
Neli chini akehai, neli pap klemtang-lo, lasi nirep akhei angbong pen pini nangliphan nangli kechetongcheng abang-lo.”
Zeruiah asopo Abishai ningjelo, “Shimei aphan pathilot nangji, pima la

Bonta Abishai lapen la a-ik aphan David pulo, “Nangtum ningje nangji pu komatsi nangkarjulo? Nangtum nephan pasung jilangma? Ne non Israel aputhakta parecholo, lapen inutbak a-Israel aphanta pini pathilongle.”
Alangli Shimei aphan pulo, “Neli nangliphan chechak-lo, nangliphan pathithelo”

Anke Mephibosheth, Sol Asupota recho aphan kechetong dunjisi nanghirlo. La akengta chingroire, angmumta chesoise mate recho Jerusalem ke-o arni penke ha kechevoithu arni an ape-arita chechokchedet-lo.
Recho aphan kechetongjisi Mephibosheth Jerusalem pen nangkele ahut, recho la aphan arjulo, “Mephibosheth, nangli kopi athesi nelilong nangdundedet-lo?”
La thak-lo, “Nangli chini, Recho, neli ke kengkok. Neliban aphan neli gadha paripontoilo, la lote, neli ardon unpo, bonta la neliphan nepachobeidet-lo.
La nelilam nangliphan than pachobeilo, Recho, bonta nanglike Arnam apherangke ason, lasi nangli akeme alingle klem iknon.
Nelipo ahemtun kedo-an nangli kepathi nangji a-ot do, bonta nangli neliphan nangli tebul along an kechoji ajakong nelipidet-lo. Neli Recho pen thangnat asonta kehangji ajakong ave.”
Recho thak-lo, “Nang kepu nangji ason avelo. Ne phar-et-lo, nang lapen Zibasi Sol akhi chethakpo.”
Zibale la kedo-anta pacherai-et-lonang, pusi Mephibosheth thak-lo, “Nangli Rechohem thangthe pen chevangthulong-lo, la anta neliphan dorlo.”
Gilead pen Barzillai ta Rogelim pen nanghirsi Jordan parai an recho aphan kethondunjisi vang-lo.
Barzillai inut kesarpik amonit-lo, la arta ningkan 80 anlo. La plangpik lapen Mohanaim along recho kedo ahut la recho aphan kecho ason padordunlo.
La aphan recho pulo, “Jerusalem along nelong nangdunnon, nangliphan neli nanglangpo.”
Bonta Barzillai thak-lo, “Neli pirthe dolong o-elo; neli kopi athesi Jerusalem nangdun nangpoma, Recho?

Neli arta ningkan 80 anlo, lapen thangnat asonta neliphan ning padokdetang-lo. Neli kopisi kechoma la athu avak longletang-lo, kelun atum ase neli arjulongle-tang-lo. Recho nangliphan isi anghor paplangchotpo.
Lapuson anong-e kethe neli kelongji a-ot ave. Lasi Jordan parai an asap-o nanglilong nangdunchotpo.

Anke neliphan nelipadam longnon lapen nelipo nelipei athiri adungsi neli thipo. Ladak nelisopo Chimham dolo, la nangliphan pangduk-lonang, laphan nangli pondetnon, Recho, lapen nangli akemele la aphan klempi iknon.”
Recho thak-lo, “La aphan neli pondetpo lapen nanglining kehang aling la aphan klempipo. Lapen nangli kehang aling nangliphan neli nangklem pipo.”
Anke David lapen amonit atum kedo-an Jordan hat-lo. Barzillai aphan alangli ingjup-lo, lapen la aphan ahirjume pilo, lapen Barzillai ahem chedamphit-lo.
Judah amonit lapen Israel achitim amonit atum kethondun pen ajok recho Jordan kehat ahut, la Gilgal anat dambomlo, lapen Chimhamta alanglilong dunbomlo.

Anke Israel atum kedo-an recho along damlo, lapen pulo, “Recho, kopi athesi nelitum akorte Judah amonit atum nangliphan nangli hemtun lapen nangli monit atum aphan Jordan parai an pon unchot lapen nanglithondun unchotji pu kematha loma?”

Judah amonit atum thak-lo, Nelitum la klemlo, pima Recho nelitum angbong pen inut-lo, la apotsi laso alam chot pen kopisi nangning kethi nangjima? La nelitum a-an aphan anam pipe lapen nelitum aphan thangnat nepipelang.

Israel atum thak-lo, “David Recho aphuthak nanglitum phankep kecheraiji athe do, la nanglitum angbong inut-lo seta, kopi athesi nanglitum nelitum aphan nekelangrop-loma? Tengneri, Recho aphan kangthumji pu nelitumsi kechingki paphrangcheng atumlo!”
Bonta Israel amonit atum aparta Judah amonit atumsi amethang-lo pu kechepu tirkhring-lo.
Gilgal along amokevangve amonit Sheba pu Bikri asopo, la Benjamin akhei inut dolo. La pong-ut but-lo, lapen hang-lo, “David paremnang! Netum la aphi dunde! Israel amonit atum hem dam-et-lonang!”
Lasi David aphan Israel atum otekangsi Sheba along dunlo, bonta Judah amonit atum David aphan kroisi Jordan pen Jerusalem an aphi aphi dunlo.

David amethang rechohem nangkechele ahut, rechohem kepalangjisi ke-otekang ke-enpangtar apiso bangkep aphan enlo lapen halatum aphan honbang arideng hodailo. Halatum kenangji ason an alangli pilo, bonta halatum pen la irap-rap-redet-lo. Hemepi atum asonsi halatum akai arjon lapusi donang-lo.
Amosa aphan recho pulo, “Judah amonit an pangrumra penapdik halatum pen dak vang rap-petnon.”
Halatum aphan kehangjisi Amosa damlo, bonta recho kesik apar ateng pen la nangle un-edet-lo.
Lasi Abishai aphan recho pulo, “Absalom apar Sheba ephan epasung-oji. Ne monit ponra la aphi hungdunnon, kalite pairaikom arong-heihei la cheraidet tahai lapen eli pen katjui tahai.”
Lasi Joab amonit recho angphun kerai abang, lapen akaprek aron-aso atum Sheba aphan kehungdunjisi Abishai pen pen Jerusalem olo.
Halatum Arlongpi Gibeon along lesi Amosa halatum aphan chetong-lo. Joab ke ron aphansi chingthangkoilo. La anokjir isi ahom along chesek pamelo. La kevanbom ahut la anokjir pen pen nangchonphlut-lo.
Amosa aphan Joab pulo, “Mesenlangma jirpo?” La aphan kangjupjisi ari ar-e pen angmum tumchomlo.
Ari ahong kaprek pen ke-otdong Joab anokjir aphan Amosa langlepin, lapen Joab la aphan apok chutplut-lo, lapen la avi longle athak lidung-lo. La men men thilot-lo, lapen Joab laphan arbujokphlot-lo.
Ansi Joab lapen la amu Abishai, Sheba aphi hungdunbomlo.
Amosa abang arpum adung Joab amonit inut arjapthersi hang-lo, “Abangphutin Joab lapen David aphi kedun abang Joab aphile dunnon!”

Amosa abang arpum avi aphik pen tovar angbong chitimsi tilailo. Joab amonit kethek-long abangphutin kedam atum laphan langtekangding titilo, lasi la bang arpum chethursi ha hidi anat ponlo lapen la athak pe-um harlup-lo.
Bang arpum tovar pen saidet aphi Sheba aphi kehungjisi abangphutin ta Joab aphi aphi dunlo.
Israel kedo-an akhei alongri Sheba damsi Abel Beth Maakah pu arongsopi nanglelo, lapen Bikri akur kedo-an abangphu chingrumsi la aphi aphi rongsopi arlo lutdamlo.
Hadak Sheba dolo pu Joab amonit atum arjulong-lo, lasi latum damsi rongsopi cheraidet-lo. Halatum paisong athak longle builo lapen la kepakrepjisi paisong aber alongle hut-lo.
Laso arongsopi along inut kereset a-arloso dolo, la paisongpen nanghang-lo, “Arjutha! Arjutha! Joab aphan dak pavangnon; alangli pen neli kechingkiji neninghang-lo.”
Joab damlo, lapen bangpi arjulo, “Nangli Joab ma?” “Kalang, neli helo,” la thak-lo. “Neliphan arju iktha, akehai,” bangpi pulo. “Neli arjuding-lo,” pusi la thak-lo.
Bangpi pulo, “Hako ahut halatum ekepu alamdo, ‘Abel arongsopi along damra nangli kethak longdampo’ lapen lasonthotsi halatum klemlo.
Nelitum arongsopi thepik, Israel angbong kangsamjinnei kekroinei arongsopilo. Nangli la kopisi kepavirji aphan kebor-iloma?
Kali! Joab thak-lo, “Neli nanglitum arongsopi phangnone mate pavirve!
La le nelitum kemang kali. Inut amonit amen Sheba pu Bikri asopo, la Ephraim anglong alongri pen David Recho abethurlo. La inut nehodaidetnon, lapen neli rongsopi pen dampo.”
La aphu nanglinat paisong angsong pen nangpavarpo, pusi bangpi thak-lo.

Bangpi akemang pen rongsopi arat along bangpi damlo, lapen halatum Sheba aphu hevatpetsi Joab anat paisong angsong pen aphu varlo. Joab amonit atum rongsopi ke-ojisi la pong-ut but-lo, lapen halatum hem chedamlo. Lapen Jerusalem recho along Joab chevoilo.
Joab ke Israel aron-armu aphuthak chepahemphulo; Benaiah ke Jehoiada asopo la David angphun kerai atum aphuthak chepahemphulo;
Adoniram ke jakong akam keklem atum aphuthak chepahemphulo;
Sheva ke kangsaihem achunbang-lo; Zadok lapen Abiathar atum ke kurusarlo,
Jair arong pen Ira ta David akurusar atum angbong pen inut-lo.
David recho kecho ahut ningkan kethom akhim thurlo. Lasi laso abaha aputhak
(Gibeon arat atum Israel aso kali, latum Amor asongso, latum aphan Israel atum raipo pusi chechak-lo, bonta Israel lapen Judah aphan aning kepadokjisi Sol kepavirdetjisi bor-itang-lo.)
Lasi Gibeon arat atum aphan David hangsi halatum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum aphan neli kopisi keklem nangpoma? Nanglitum aphuthak kehingno apreng kesaiji aphan neli keklemji ninghang, anke nanglitum

Halatum thak-lo, “Sol lapen la ahemtun pen kechebohong alam ser-rup pen nelitum aphan pangsam un-e, lapen Israel atum aphan pathi-et nangji puta nelitum ninghanghe.” “Tangte neli kopisi keklem nangpo pu nanglitum kemathaloma?”
Halatum thak-lo, “Sol nelitum aphan pavir-etjisi aninghang-lo, lapen Israel angbong nahokta pareng-et longledetjisi mathalo.
Lasi aso pinso apoton bang throksi nanghodainon, lapen halatum aphan
Bonta la lapen Jonathon angbong seme kangthir kechechak lahin lahin dokok apotsi Jonathon asopo Mephibosheth aphan David pajok-lo, la Sol asupolo.

Tebonseta Sol pen Rizpah, la Aiah asopi, kechopathe asomar banghini Armoni lapen Mephibosheth aphan la ponlo, lapen Sol asopi Merap asopo bangpho aphan la ponlo, bangpi lahei Barzillai asopo Adriel pen chopathelo, la Meholah arong pen
Gibeon arat atum arideng halatum aphan David hodaidet-lo. Halatum aphan inglong along

Anke Sol ke-enpangtar apiso Rizpah, la Aiah asopi, kethitang bang arpum kedo adim arlongthepi along amethang chepachongdam jisi pe thoila enlo, bangpi hadak soktipli kerot kecheng pen ha barla arve nangkesun ahut anta dolo. Halaso ahut kethitang arpum pen anerlo ke vo hungpo, ajo ke ingnam api hungpo.
Rizpah la klemtang-lo pu David arjulongsi,

alangli damlo, lapen Sol lapen asopo Jonathon arrepi-heihei Gilead alongri Jabesh arat pen vanlo. (Beth Shan aklam along pen halatum chonghu ponlo, la Philistia atum Gilboa anglong along Sol aphan pathisi kevek adimlo.)
Sol lapen Jonathon arrepi David pangrumlo, lapen bang throksi amonit aphan kekokthattang arrepi ta pangrumlo.
Anke Sol lapen Jonathon arrepi ke Sol asopo Kish atipit along halatum pip-lo. Benjamin alongri Zela along recho kepu-an halatum klemlo, lapen laso aphi det adang aphan halatum akardom Arnam arjulo.
Philistia lapen Israel atum angbong isi akaprek aron dolo. David lapen la amonit atum damsi Philistia atum pen ron chedanlo. Labangso aron ahut David lakpik-lo,
Ishbibenob, pu amen inut la tam angchin achir kardik lin throk-ra ebeng lapen anokjirta akemi si ke-en. La David aphan pathi unpo pusi mathathip-lo.

Bonta Zeruiah asopo Abishai ke David kerapjisi vang-lo, la arlengthepo aphan tengkhengsi pathilot-lo. Anke David amonit atum David aphan pachechaktoilo, la halatum along ron kechedanji aphan dundelo pu pachechak-lo. “Nanglike Israel atum ning kechethe atirilo, lapen nelitum nangliphan kethek-longledetji ninghanghe,” halatum pulo.
Laso aphi Gob along Philistia atum pen ron chedanlo, laso ahut Hushah pen Sibbekai inut Saph pu amen amonit thepo aphan pathilo.
Gob along Philistia atum pen akaprek aron dothulo, lapen Jair asopo Elhanan, la Bethlehem pen Gath lapen Goliath aphan pathilo. La achir pe kethak kejor-i aharpi ason kangchim.
Anke Gath along isi aron dolo, hadak ron kechedan aning kehangpik amonit do. La ari hongni alongta arichimunso hongthrok do, lapen akeng ahongtin alongta akeng-chimunso hongthrok do.
La Israel atum aphan pinremlo, lapen Jonathon, David a-ik Shamah asopo, la aphan pathilo.
La bangphlita Gath amonit thepo aso-asu atumlo, lapen halatum aphan David lapen alangli amonit atumsi la pathilo.
David ahotur kedo-an lapen Sol arideng pen
la neli paisong kethir.
Ne Arnamsi nekerai a-Bang,
la pensi ne jok-lo.
Chong asonsi la nephan railo,
la nephan railo, nepajok-long-lo.
La nekepajok abang-lo;
kephangno ajakong pen la nephan railo lapen pajok-lo.
Ne
lapen la nehotur pen pajok-lo;
Kethi angring nephan kompet-lo.
Kevir angring nephuthak kong-long-lo.
Kethi akesung nekompet-lo,
lapen tipit nephan tonding-lo.
Ne kesung ahut ne
Keparapjisi ne Arnam aphan hang-lo;
la kardomhem along la nethak-lo.
Ne kerap kechohang la arjulo.
Ansi pirthe pherelo lapen klemhurlo
sining ahemthur hijuksi doidaitang-lo,
pima Arnam aning thitang-lo.
La anokan pen amehi pavang-lo,
isi kechodetji amede la angho pen kekar-ang.
La sining ingsekdak-lo, lapen nangsunlo,
la akengber isi anghun ke-ik pen.
La arveng kedo api pen kangjar pachat-lo,
la tomon arveng pen damlo.
Kangting pen la amethangsi chepabinlo,
lang keplengset anghun karthatsi laphan kompet-lo;
Kekar-ang akoila amede sining kebirlak pen la angno vang-lo.
Ansi
lapen jakongthepik abang ase arjulong-lo.
La athai aso ap-lo lapen ahotur paprat-lo,
isi sining kebirlak atur pen la halatum aphan pakat-lo.
Talopi aklong achetai pangthai-dang-lo
lapen pirthe ahemthur dipde det-lo;
halatum aningkethi pen ingrong-lo.
Angsong pen
lapen nephan ne-ot-lo;
lang karnuk pen la nesanthorlo.
Kangtangnei nehotur pen la nepajok
lapen nephan nekehijim atum pen lapen halatum nephan ingtang ongchot-lo.
Ne kesung ahut halatum nephan netengkheng-lo,
bonta
Kepherememe pen la nepajok-lo;
la nephan nepajok-lo,
pima la nephan aning ingsam-olo.
La nephan pahirjume, pima ne nedai ave.
La ahukum an ne klemlo,
la ahukum-heihei ne kekroikre ave.
Ne kechokche ave pu la chini
lapen ne kechokche akam pen chepahelotang-lo pu.
Lasi la nong-e nepilo, pima
kopisi akechokpetma ne klemlo,
athe la chini ne adai ave.
O
lapen kechok-lim atum aphan nang mesen.
Kangthir-et atum aphan nang ingthir-et,
bonta kehingno atum aphan nang thurkrap.
Chepabihek atum aphan nang pajok,,
bonta kechepindak atum aphan nang pabihek.
Nang
ne kangting nang pakak-lo.
Nehotur aphan ketengkhengji aphan nang jakong nepilo,
lapen halatum kechevoi aphuthak kehaiji ajakong nepilo.
Laso Arnam, la akam-heihei ko-an kechok-lim,
la alam ko-an chikimeme!
Arnam inutvetsi ekerai.
Laso Arnam ke kethirklong ne kechepachong adim,
netovar la pajok-van.
Nekeng jok-lu akeng ason, la nepaplang-lo;
inglong along la ne kebi pajok-van.
Ron aphan la kam nethanlo,
ansi ne kangtangnei athai rim unpo.
O
nang kerap nephan pathelo.
Bang pacheraidetji pen nang nebilo,
lapen ne kaiketa klikledet-lo.
Ne hotur aphan ne hung-lo,
lapen halatum aphan paremlo.
Halatum aphan pavirlongletik ne sangsedet-lo.
Halatum aphan ne areng pasolo,
lapen halatum thur un-edet-lo;
halatum remdetsi ne ingno tithorlo.
Ron aphan nang jakong nepilo,
lapen hotur aputhak kehaiji ajakongta nepilo.
Ne hotur ne pen pakat-lo,
nephan kehijim abangphan ne pavirlo.
Halatum kerap-rilo,
bonta baduta halatum aphan kerapdun abang ave.
Halatum
bonta la thakthe.
Halatum aphan ne sorlamlo,
lapen halatum la longle aduk ason plang-lo;
tovarpi anghan asonsi ne halatum aphan sak-lo.
Kethurkrap nerat aso pen nang pajok-lo,
lapen det aputhak nephan pangrilongtoilo;
ne kechinine arat an ta neber dolo.
Bang adet atum ne ingno angphun patongkilo,
nese arjulong-lote, halatum nephan kroilo;
Halatum angthin thehaihelo,
lapen halatum apairaikom pen a-ok klemhursi vang-lo.
Nephan nekepajok a-Arnam kangtang kethe alam pachethangnon!
Nehotur atum aphuthak la nepahailo;
det atum nebersi la bilo.
Lapen nehotur atum arideng pen la nepajok-lo,
Lapen det-heihei angbong ne nangroji;
nangphan ne nanglunji.
Amethang arecho aphan Arnam kepahai pathepik
kangvaitang abangphan la akanghon kaike paklangver,
David aphan lapen la aso-asu aphan kaiketa paklangver.
Jesse asopo David aphan helo
la abirta ne ingtur alongsi dolo.
Israel aphan kerai abang nephan ningjelo:
“Ahok-akangsai pen kepangri arecho,
la Arnam aphan kekroi pensi pangri,”
La inghunkave adap ketur arni ason
arve jangdet pen arni bap-bi kepathur ason.
Lapen lasonsi neso-nesu atum aphan
Arnam pahirjumepo,
pima la ne pen kejutjepin aloh chejok-lo,
phri-un-epin isi akechechak,
kelar un-epin aseme.
Lahelo nening kedokneilo;
lasi ne kehai plangpo,
lapen Arnamsi la paplangvekpo.
Bonta Arnam kave amonit atum ke
kevartang a-ingsu ason;
ari angse ke baduta papho un-e.
Nang ingchin arisim kalite chir rim nangji;
halahei phrin-et khangjangpo.

David anokbe atum amen lahei helo: Kechengsi ke Josheb Basshebeth, la Takemon pen, la “Bangkethom” atum angbong ajalinlo. La chir pen ron chedansi isivet aron along bangpharo nerkep amonit atum aphan pathilo.
Bangkethom, angbong adun abang anongkedonei ke Eleazar, la Dodo asopo, Ahohi aro pen. Arnisi la lapen David, Philistia keche-pangrumpet atum pen ron aphan chedanlo. Israel atum aphi chiruinang-lo,
bonta la alongle along charjapthip-lo lapen ari harjakjetik ke anokjir aripen cherap-het asonsi Philistia atum pen chedanbomlo. Halabangso arni
Kethomadun anongkedohu abang ke Agee asopo Shammah, la Harar pen. Thepak hidi Lehi along Philistia atum chingrumpet-lo. Philistia atum pen Israel atum bephlung-lo,
bonta hidi along Shammah arjapthip-lo, chedandunlo lapen Philistia atum aphan pathilo. Halaso arnita
