Halatum aphan kevanpi achainong alo latum ponlo lapen la sik-lo, lapen Baal aphan anerlochitim an ardomlo. Halatum hang-lo, “Netum aphan nethaktha Baal!” lapen halatum kekim adovan komchensi kanbomlo. Bonta thang akethak angthek vangvedet-lo.

Anerlo chitim halatum aphan Elijah chongthuilo! “Ase pathe muchot-ra ardomtha! La inut arnamlo! La dojoimene mate kesangmene, mate la konatne damtang-lo mene! Kalite amekjang-lot mene lapen nangtum laphan ingthur nangpo!”
Lasi montri atum asepathesi ardomlo lapen tariso, nokso-heihei pen amethang abang cherot-lo, halatum ajutang ateng pen, avi bubetik an klemlo.
Halatum un an hang charbulo lapen pangchamjamsi anerlo chitim anta klemlo; bonta thangnat akethak nangklang-kledet-lo. Ethenat aseta arju longledet-lo.
Rat atum aphan Elijah pulo, “Nedung vangpetnon,” lapen halatum kedo-an la adung chingrumpet-lo. Kehingnotang
Arlong krehini enlo,
Laso a-arlong-heihei pen la
lapen la theng athak bat-lo. La pulo, “Tibuk phli lang papleng-ra athok lapen theng athak la dungnon.” Halatum la klemlo,
lapen la pulo, “Lasonthot klemthutha,” lapen halatum la klemlo. “Puthot ephong klemthutha,” la pulo, lapen halatum la klemlo.
Lang dovan akung kung anta lesi dong paplengset-lo.
Anerlo chitim karkli apor Elijah montri dovan adung damsi ardomlo, “Abraham, Isaak lapen Jakob a-Arnam
Nethaktha,
Rat atum la thek-longsi halatum longle tongbaksi pulo, “

Elijah hukum pilo, “Baal amontri atum aphan nepnon, halatum inutbak aphanta padam longri!” Halatum kedo-an aphan rat atum nep-et-lo lapen Elijah halatum aphan Kishon Aroi paponsi halatum aphan pathi-et-lo.
Anke Ahab Recho aphan Elijah pulo, “Non damra an chodamnon. Arve kevangji arki ne arjulong-lo.”
Ahab kechedam ahut Elijah Karmel anglong aphuchong arludamlo, hadak la angphun longle patongkisi aphu akengphu adak chebilo.
La aban aphan la pulo, “Damra talo anat langdamtha.”
Aban abang damlo, lapen nang chevoisi pulo, “Neli jatta thek-longle,” batai 7 la aphan Elijah palangdam toilo.
Batai throksi aphong nangchevoi ahut ke la pulo, “Neli asap-o monit ari apak athek inghun thek-long-lo, la talo anat pensi kevang.”
Aban aphan Elijah hukum pilo, “Ahab Recho along damra la aphan thandamnon aronhem-konglong pacharlura arve laphan kekhang aphrang hem pachedamtoi non.”
Malomso aphi sining inghun binthipsi pangting sang-lo, tomon kejap pangcheng-lo, lapen arve kejang pangcheng-lo. Ahab amethang ronhemkonglong athak arlusi Jezreel anat chevoi pangcheng-lo.
Elijah aphuthak
Ahab Recho apiso Jezebel aphan Elijah keklem asontin alam lapen la kosonsi Baal amontri atum aphan pathi-et loma lahei than et-lo.
Bangpi Elijah aphan isi abirta papitoilo: Montri atum aphan nang keklem asonthotsi penap laso aporchit nangphan nang pathi thekthete arnam atum nephan nepathengbop nang.
Elijah pherelo, lapen apran chepajokjisi kat-lo. La aban aphan cheponsi Judah adet Beersheba anat damlo.
Aban aphan hadak otekangsi,
Elijah kejejangtang ajo arnikangthim damlo. La sangsi erong athengpi abin along chongnilo lapen kethijisi aninghang-lo. “La an sung-ong-lo,
La thengpi arum tilaisi amekjang-lot-lo. Menmen amat inut Arnam apherangke laphan abang paphosi pulo, “Mek prangra chonon.”
La adung arei chelang-lo lapen him eplang lapen langbong isi aphutang adung thek-long-lo. La chosi junlo, lapen che-ithujoilo.
Bataihini aphong
Elijah thurlo, lapen cholo-junlo, lapen kepi an chosi Sinai, Kangthir Anglong anat ni 40 kedamji ajakong long-lo.
Ajo kepangthang jisi hadak kedo alongku arlo la lutdamlo.
Menmen laphan
La thak-lo, “Arnam Kethe
Damra inglong aphuchong along Ne ingno arjapnon, laphan
Chikli aphi hadak me akar dolo, bonta me alongta
Elijah la arjulongsi ape pen la amahang chedip-lo lapen damsi longku amangho along arjap damlo. Laphan ase pen pulo, “Elijah, nang ladak kopisi keklemlo?”
La thak-lo, “Arnam Kethe
Nimshi asopo Jehu aphan Israel arecho kebatjile jangthu patipnon, lapen Abel Meholah pen Shaphat asopo Elisha aphan nangdular montri keplangjile jangthu patipnon.
Hazael kepathiji pen kejok atum an Jehu pathipo. Lapen Jehu arideng pen kejok atum an aphan Elishasi pathipo.
Seta Israel along bang suri 7 arat Ne pareng-longji la kedo-an atum Nephan kekroithip atumlo lapen Baal aphan angphun patongkike lapen la akumlin aphan kangjupje atumlo.”
Elijah osi Elisha aphan chainong pen hai kebai asong thek-long-lo; la aphrang hai kre isi do lapen la kebaike aphisi lo. Elijah ape chephloksi aphang la bat-lo.

Anke Elisha chainong ahai osi Elijah aphi aphi kat-lo, lapen pulo, “Nelipei nelipo aphan kechekak akangjup nepangjup damlongtha, anke neli nanglilong nangdunpo.” Elijah thak-lo, “Damtame, chedamnon, ne nangphan nang khangkhelo!”
Ansi Elisha la ahai along chedamthulo, halahei thusi, a-ok tunlo, arphang me thekdet-lo. Rat aphan ok pachophruilo, lapen halatum la cholo. Anke la Elijah arapbang cheplangsi aphi phi dunlo.
Siria arecho Benhadad aron-asong kedo-an pangrumlo, lapen alosei, ronhemkonglong pen bang 32 kepangri atum rapdunlo, la barlo lapen Samaria ketengkheng jisi damlo, lapen la aputhak tengkheng-lo.
La rongsopi anat Israel arecho Ahab aphan pherangke atum toisi papulo,
“Benhadad Recho nanglipen ser, rup, nang arloso atum lapen nangsomar angbong kangtangnei abangphan pachehodai jisi hang-lo.”
Ne hemphu, Benhadad Recho aphan punon, ne kroilo; ne lapen ne chepahemphu asontinta alanglilo, pusi Ahab thak-lo.
Aphi pherangke atum Ahab along vangsi Benhadad pen akaprek hangthulo: “Ser, rup, nangpiso, nangso, nephan nehodai nangji pu nangphan nangpulo.
Non jat seta, ne chakri atum nang rechohem lapen nang chakri atum ahem arlo hormu kepariji aphan nangtoipo, lapen halatum adorkeso amar aling ponpo. Halatum hadak penap nonpu apor nanglepo.”

Ahab Recho det adang kedo-an ajalin atum aphan hangsi pulo, “Nanglitum thek-long-lo, laso amonit ephan epavirji aninghang-lo. La birta nepilo nepiso neso neser, nerup nehang-lo, lapen neta kroidunlo.”
Keja atum lapen rat atum pulo, “Laphan nanglino chedenri; kroidunri.”
Lasi Benhadad apherangke atum aphan Ahab thak-lo, “Ne hemphu recho aphan thannon la aphrang akehang alam ne kroilo, bonta aphi akehang abang ke ne kroithekthe.”
Pherangke atum dam et-lo lapen akaprek abirta Benhadad pen vanthulo:
“Laso nang-rongsopi kepavirji aphan ne dorphlup amonit vansi halatum arideng arlongso papon-repji. La klemthekthe pulote arnam atum nepathilot nang!”
Ahab Recho thak-lo, “Benhadad Recho aphan thannon inut ahok aron-aso la ron aphi si chepindakji, la aphrang kali.”

Benhadad lapen la kecherap asong kepangri atum pen hem-heihei along kecho-kejun ahut Ahab pen kethak aloh long-lo. La amonit atum aphan rongsopi kepatengkheng jisi pachesiktoilo, lasi halatum chesiksi adim chedorep-lo.
Halaso ahut inut amontri Ahab Recho along damlo, lapen pulo, “
Ketengkhengji aphan komat-lo kejapo? Ahab arjulo.
Montri abang thak-lo, “Longri a-Govornor ahukum aber kedo riso aron-aso atumsi la klempo pusi
“Asongpi aphan komatsi japonpo?” recho arjulo.
“Nangli” montri thak-lo.
Lasi Recho abang riso aron-aso atum aphan hangpet-lo halatum longri anokbe aberlo. Pangrumpet bang 232. Anke la Israel aron-armu aphan hang-lo, pangrumpet bang suri throksi pinso amonit dolo.
Anerlo chitim ahutsi tengkheng-lo, halaso ahut Benhadad lapen la bang 32 kejelang ajirpo atum amethang apehem arlo kangri kangkrang pensi dolo.
Kechengsi riso aron-aso atum patebok-lo. Benhadad ketoi hotur kelang atum laphan Samaria pen ron-aso asong nangbarlo pu thanlo.
La hukumpilo, “Halatum aphan akerengle nepnon, halatum kechedanjile vang tame mate kepangsam aphanle vang setame.”
Riso aron-aso atum ketengkheng jalo, aphi Israel aron-aso atum dunlo,

lapen abangphutinta la kechedan abangphan pathirep-lo. Siria atum kat-et-lo lapen Israel atum kehung padikhrimlo, bonta losei athak ardonlongsi Benhadad kat-longjuilo, la aphi losei kardon atum ta chedunlo.
Rong ahidi kedo losei ronhemkonglong-heihei Ahab Recho cheraisi penang an a-Siria atum aphan areng pasolo.
Ansi Ahab Recho along montri damlo lapen pulo, “Hem chedamnon, lapen ron-asong pangtangnon, lapen mang pamenon, pima non kevangji thengpi arvo kechingjok apor Siria arecho nang tengkheng-thuji.”
Benhadad Recho achakri atum laphan pulo, “Israel arnam atum ke inglong a-arnam atumlo, la apotsi ephan latum eparemdet-lo. Bonta jongsi eli halatum pen thoi along chedanlote eli parem unvekji.
Non bang 32 kepangri atum aphan pavedet-ra halatum adim hidi aron ahemphu atum bi iknon.

Anke hala keremdet aron-armu an thakthak, aphrang ateng ke-ongdung alosei lapen aronhemkonglong-heihei hangpetnon. Thoi along Israel atum pen eli chedan lonang lapen non aphong abang ke halatum aphan eli paremlongpo.”
Benhadad Recho kroisi halatum kepare ateng klemlo.
Thengpi arvo kechingjok apor la amonit atum hang-lo lapen Israel atum aphan ketengkhengjisi Aphek arongsopi anat halatum pen pen nangbarlo.

Israel atumta chehangpet-lo, lapen chesik pamelo; halatum barsi palongni Siria atum aphan pangnosi mukam kimlo. Rong ahidi bithe kehijikjam a-Siria atum pen pangbarlote Israel atum ke bi asomar ahurhini ason plang-lo.
Inut amonit Ahab Recho along damsi pulo, “La helo
Siria lapen Israel atum ni 7 an pupu chepangno-phrongsi amukam-heihei along chedonang-lo. Throksi arni halatum ron kechedan pangcheng-lo, lapen Israel atum Suri 100 a-Siria aphan pathilo.
Ahin kerenglang atum Aphek arongsopi anat katsi hadak bang suri 27 aputhak rongsopi arpong krep-lo.
Benhadad ta rongsopi anat chepachong damlo, lapen hem anung angdengsi chepachong-lo.

La achakri inut damsi laphan pulo, “Neli arjulong-lo Israel arecho atum kangjinso the-o. Nelitum Avam bithe pe-thoila lapen chethok bithe arri pen chekok-ra Israel arecho along nepadam longtha la nangli pran pareng-long tahai mene.”

Lasi halatum avam bithe pethoila chekok-lo lapen halatum achethok bithe arri chekoksi Ahab along damlo lapen pulo, “Nangliban Benhadad achethe kereng-longji aphansi nangli choningrilo.” Ahab thak-lo, “La reng-et-langma? Mesenlo! La nephan nekorte asonlo!”

Benhadad achakri atum ahut kemesi cholangding-lo, lapen Ahab “Korte” kepu ahut latum men men puphit-lo, “Nangli kepu asonthotsi Benhadad ke nangli kortelo!” “Lapen nelong vantha, “ Ahab hukumpilo. Benhadad nanglesi, Ahab laphan ahemkonglong along karlu rap-rapji aphan hang-lo.
Laphan Benhadad pulo, “Nanglipo pen nelipo kepon arong-heihei nangliphan nangvoi-etpo, lapen Damaskas along beha keklemji adim cheselamtame, la nelipo Samaria along keklem asonthot.”
Ahab thak-lo, “Lahei akechejok ajok neli nangliphan pajok-lo.” La pen kechejok aloh chetoksi laphan la padamlong-lo.
lasi laphan la pulo, “Nang
Anke laso amontri amat anut kaprek amontri along damsi pulo, “Neliphan arbutha.” Laso amonit la klemlo, la jasemet arbulo, lapen laphan pasodak-lo.
Montri abang pen amahang chephung-lo, chepachinine pin si tovar akung arjapdam-therlo, lapen Israel arecho tovar anat kevangji aphan chonghong-ding-lo.

Recho vang-lo, montri abang alangliphan hangsersi pulo, Recho neli elong arong chedamlo, lapen keneptang ahotur aron-aso nelilong vangsi pulo, “Laso amonit langtha; la jongsi katjui lote nangpran chepinangpo kalite rup dum suri kethom adai tu nangpo.”
Bonta neli kaprek akam klemrong amat laso amonit katjuilo.
Recho thak-lo, “Nangmethangsi nangho pen chepuvek-lo apot nang adai tu nangpo.”
Amahang pen montri abang pe ingsekdaksi menmen laphan recho pangthekdet-lo.
Montri abang anke recho aphan pulo, “Ne nangphan pathinonpu hukum nangkepi amonit aphan nang pajokphlot apot nang ron-armu pavirdetpo, halaso aron-armu aphan kelangding apot.”
Aningke-oi lapen ning kerun pen Recho Samaria anat chevoilo.
Ahab arechohem Jezreel arong adung Naboth pu amen amonit adrakharikang aberi dolo.

Arnisi Naboth aphan Ahab pulo, “Nang drakha aberi nepacherai longtha; la nehem pen tebok-het-lo, lapen laso alongle han aberi aphan ne klem ingtung, Laso alar isi akemenei adrakha aberi ne nangpiji, mate nang jongsi nangning hangte isi mesen ador ta nangpidetji.”
Nephusar atum pensi ne la chepahemphulo, Naboth thak-lo. “Ne nangphan la pacherai longdetji aphan
Naboth laphan kepu alam aputhak aning ke-oi lapen aningkethi pen si Ahab hem chedamlo. La amethang ahongplang athak tilailo, lapen an chochesi arpong anat pangnolo.
La apiso Jezebel la along damsi arjulo, “Nang kopi apotsi la-an ning keduk-loma? Kopi athesi an choche-junjeloma?”
La thak-lo, “Naboth nephan nekepu apot. La adrakha-beri ne kenamji aphan hang-lo, kalite laphan akaprek adrakha-beri pidetpo pulo bonta la puthip-lo, ne la cherai un-e!”
Mesenlo! Nang recho kalima mate kelangma? Jezebel thak-lo, “Hongplang pen thurnon, chepangtang non lapen an chonon. Naboth adrakha aberi nangphan nang palongpipo.”
Anke bangpi ajehak aloh Ahab amen pen toksi, la angthek pen halahei aputhak theng-lo, lapen lahei chakri atum lapen Jezreel asanchom asor kethe-keding aphan lolo.
Loh-heihei along tok-lo, “Arnisi an kehum arni pachethang-lo, rat atum aphan hangpetnon lapen Naboth aphan man anghoi pinon.
Arnam aphan lapen recho aphan ahirjuno pitang-lo pu amahang angno kebokji abangphu kehingno atum banghini anbak rinon, anke laphan rongsopi angtan pondet ra laphan arlong pen varbopnon.”
Chakri atum lapen Jezreel asanchom arong kethe-keding atum Jezebel hukum kepi ateng klemlo.
Halatum arnisi an kehum arni pachethang-lo, rat aphan hangpet-lo lapen Naboth aphan aman anghoi pilo.
Banghini ajat kelangno atum rat angno Arnam lapen recho aphan pahirjuno-tang-lo pu laphan bok-lo, lasi laphan rongsopi angtan pondet-lo lapen arlong pen varbop-lo.
Laso abirta Jezebel aphan pachinilo; “Naboth aphan pathilot-lo.”
Jezebel birta long-lok pen bangpi Ahab aphan pulo, “Naboth thitang-lo. Non damra la nangphan nangkejormo drakharikang aberi cheraidamnon.”
Men men la kecherai damjisi Ahab damphit-lo.
Anke Elijah Tishbe amontri aphan
“Samaria arecho Ahab along damnon lapen nang Naboth adrakha aberi along thek-longpo, la kecheraiji dokdok-lo.
Laphan Ne,
Elijah aphan Ahab thek-longsi la pulo, “Nang nelong tong kevang loma, hotur?”
Kalang-lo, nanglong-lo, Elijah thak-lo. “
Lasi
Nanghemtun ke Nebat asopo Jeroboam Recho lapen Ahijah asopo Baasha Recho ahemtun asonpo, pima Israel atum aphan pap anat kejapon pen ajok nang nening papung-lo.’”
Lapen Jezebel aphuthak
Nangdon nangrap angbong mane jongsi rongsopi angbong thilote, methan atumsi la chopo, lapen rong angtan kethi atum aphan ke takunsi chopo.
(Apiso Jezebel kepaklemtoi an
Kumlin-heihei karcho, Israel arat atum kethebom ahut

Elijah kepu, kepajut ahut Ahab amethang achoi chingsek-lo lapen lahei chephlok-lo, lapen pethoila che-umlo. La an kechojimolo lapen pethoila pensi amekjang-lo, lapen amahang ikkui lapen aningkeduk pensi damlo.
Elijah montri aphan
“Nang thek-long-loma Ne ingno Ahab ko-an chepabiloma? La laso keklem apot, la akai isi la aphuthak akevir Ne vanvelo; Ahab ahemtun aphuthak ke la asomar akai ahutsi akevir vanpo.”
Ningkan hini an Israel lapen Siria atum angbong ingsamjin pen dolo.
Bonta kethom aningkan Judah arecho Jehoshaphat, Israel arecho Ahab aphan langdamlo.
Ahab la kepangri atum aphan arjulo, “Siria arecho pen Gilead alongri Ramoth kebengthuji aphan kopisi eli thangta klemkledet-lo? La etum alongleke!”
Lapen Jehoshaphat aphan Ahab pulo, “Ramoth ketengkhengji aphan nangli nangdunjima?”
Nangli damlote neli chesikvensi kedolo, Jehoshaphat thak-lo, “Lapen ne ron-aso atum lapen losei kardon atum antalo.
Bonta eli
Lasi Ahab bang 400 anbak amontri atum aphan hang-lo lapen halatum aphan arjulo, “Ne Ramoth tengkheng dam nangjima nangnema?”
La tengkhengnon, pusi halatum thak-lo. “Nangliphan
Bonta Jehoshaphat arjulo, “
Ahab thak-lo, “Inut dolang, Imlah asopo Mikaiah. Bonta ne laphan hijimlo, pima la nephan kaita akeme alam montritre; la kaita akehingno saide.”
Lason nangli pu nangne! Jehoshaphat thak-lo.
Ansi kangsaihem kepangri atum aphan Ahab phasi Mikaiah aphan non amat pavandetji aphan toilo.
Recho banghinita recho apesi chingthang-lo lapen halatum amethang anghoi sarnung angsong Samaria pai anghap angtanchot chongnilo. Lapen halatum angno kedo-an amontri atum montri bomlo.
Halatum angbong Chenaanah asopo Zedekiah ingchin anu selamsi pulo: “La pensi nangli Siria atum pen chedanpo lapen halatum aphan parempamepo.”
Kadokave amontri atumta ethenatsi pulo, “Ramoth abethurra barnon lapen nangli haiji,” halatum pulo, “
Halaso ahut amat Mikaiah aphan kepahangdam achakri abang laphan pulo, “Kedo-an amontri atum Recho kehaiji alamsi montri pet-lo, lapen nanglita lason akeme alamsi thanpo.”
Bonta Mikaiah thak-lo, “Kereng-et a-
La Ahab Recho angno kecheklang ahut laphan recho arjulo, Mikaiah, Jehoshaphat Recho lapen ne Ramoth tengkhengdam nangjima nangnema?
Tengkhengnon! Mikaiah pulo, “Lapen nangli haiji,
Bonta Ahab thak-lo, “Nang
Mikaiah thak-lo, “Biresak ahur kevibang avedet ason-thak-thaksi Israel aron-armu inglong-heihei adang pratsei ne thek-long-lo, lapen
Ahab, Jehoshaphat aphan pulo, “Neli nangpuloke la akeme ason nephan kaita montritre! La kaita kehingno saidelo!”
Mikaiah pubomlo, “Non
arjulo, ‘Ahab aphan Ramoth padamra kethilotji aphan komatsi laphan pachobeidam poma?’ Ajehak apherangke atum eson pulo, lapen akaprek atum ason kaprek pubomlo,
Isi akarjong
‘Kosonlo?’
Lapen Mikaiah pajut-lo: la helo keplangjilo. Lahei nangli montri atum nangliphan kepachobeijisi
Anke Zedekiah montri Mikaiah along damhamsi akecheng ardepphrat-lo, lapen arjulo, “Komantu pensi
Kechepatujisi ajehak anung angdeng arlo kedam ahut nang chechinipo, Mikaiah thak-lo.
Anke inut achakri aphan Ahab hukumpilo, “Mikaiah aphan nepchek-ra Amon anat pondetnon ha rongsopi a-Govornor along, lapen rechoso Joash along.
Laphan kebeng angdeng arlo pavarthotnon lapen laphan him lapen lang ne nangchevoilong pamemetik pichotnon.”
Nangli jongsi nangchevoi pamelong pulote
Anke Israel arecho Ahab lapen Judah arecho Jehoshaphat Gilead alongri Ramoth arongsopi ketengkhengjisi damlo.
Jehoshaphat aphan Ahab pulo, “Elitum ron kedam ahut, neli arje chepatupo, bonta nanglike recho apesi chingthangpo.” Lasonsi Israel arecho Ahab arje chepatusi ron damlo.
Siria arecho la bang ronhemkonglong-heihei ahemphu aphan hukum pilo badu aphanta tengkheng-ri bonta Israel arecho aphansi tengkhengchot nangji pulo.
Lasi halatum Jehoshaphat recho aphan thek-lok pen halatum mathalo, la helo Israel arecholo, pu lapen laphan ketengkhengjisi latum la anat suilo, bonta la hangser amat,
halatum la Israel arecho kali pu chinisi halatum ketengkheng ingtonkok-lo.
Kopusonlone, Siria aron-aso inut thai apsi Ahab Recho bang adip kechechu adak aplut-lo. “Nephan ne apchok-lo!” pusi ronhemkonglong kardon abangphan hangserlo. “Suira ron kechedan adim pen neponnon!”
Ron kechedan sikchit ahut Ahab Recho amethang ronhemkonglong along chethapsi Siria atum anat pangnolo. Amek pen avi busi ronhemkonglong aklong palidung-lo lapen arnikangsam ahut la thilot-lo.
Arni chiji dokdok Israel aron-aso ehin pen ahin kaprek an hukum chethang-lo, “Abangphutin amonit amethang ahem arongsopi chedamreppo!”
Lasonsi Ahab Recho thilot-lo. La abang arpum Samaria pondetsi pipbup-lo.
La aronhemkonglong Samaria alangteng alongsi pangthirlo, hadak methan atumsi la avi chonglek-rip-lo lapen beisapi atum hadak chechamlo, lasonsi
Ahab Recho keklem ason an la rechohem alon kepi ingnar aso alongsi tok-et-lo.
La thidet aphi asopo Ahaziah si la alar recho cholo.
Israel arecho Ahab recho kecho phli aningkan ahut Asa asopo Jehoshaphat si Judah arecho plang-lo,
laso ahut la arta ningkan 35, lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 25 pangrilo. La apei Azubah, Shilhi asopi.
Apo Asa asonsi la
Jehoshaphatke Israel arecho pen chepameverlo.
Jehoshaphat keklem akam an la angthinkethe lapen la ron kechedan-heihei Judah arecho atum Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
Karchotap adovan along kangduk abeisapi, abeisapo atum an la apo ha Asa arni pen kedo atum aphan padolongledet-lo.
Edom adet arecho avedet; la Judah arecho kebat ator abangsi pangrilo.
Ser kepavan Ophir adet kedamji talopi atelong Jehoshaphat Recho selamlo; bonta lahei Eziongeber along rurailo, lapen kai aphan vekvedet-lo.
Aphi Israel arecho Ahaziah la amonit pen Jehoshaphat amonit atum pavek-rappet toilo, seta Jehoshaphat laso alam dengdedet-lo.
Jehoshaphat thilot-lo lapen recho athiri David Arongsopi alongsi pip-lo, lapen la asopo Jehoramsi la alar recho cholo.
Judah arecho Jehoshaphat recho kecho krethroksi aningkan ahutsi Ahab asopo Ahaziah, Israel arecho plang-lo, lapen la Samaria along ningkan hini pangrilo.
La
La Baal aphansi archolo lapen ingduk-lo, la aphrang apo asonthot, lapen Israel Arnam
Israel arecho Ahab thilot aphi Moab aso atum Israel abe thurkrap-lo.

Israel arecho Ahaziah, Samaria along amethang rechohem asarnung angsong pen nangchingthulo lapen areng jasemet sodak-lo. Lasi la ajehak apherangke atum aphan Baalzebub, la Philistia arongsopi Ekron a-arnam aphan karjujisi toilo, la mejima memema karjuji aphan lo.
Bonta
Recho aphan thannon
lapen pherangke atum recho along chevoijuilo. “Nangtum kopisi nangchevoijui loma?” la arjulo.
Halatum thak-lo, “Nelitum inut amonit chetong-lo lasi nelitum aphan pachevoitoilo lapen nangliphan
Laso amonit kelang kopusonlo? Recho arjulo.
La pi areng pen keselam apesi kechingthang, lapen ok-reng avamkok pen cheperhet, pusi halatum thak-lo.
La Elijahlo! recho puserlo.

Anke la inut achakri along bang 50 amonit toidunsi Elijah aphan pahang damlo. Inglong athak kangnilun laphan chakri abang thek-longsi laphan pulo, “Arnam Amonit, arum nangkesunji aphan recho nangphan hukum nangpilo.”
Ne jongsi Arnam Amonit pulote, Elijah thak-lo, “Sining pen me pavang-ra nang lapen nang monit atum an pathi-etnang!” Menmen amat me vangsi chakri lapen la amonit atum aphan pathi-et-lo.
Recho puthot anut kaprek achakri along bang 50 amonit toithulo, latum angsong arludamsi Elijah aphan pulo, “Arnam Amonit, recho kepu non amat nangsunnon pusi nangphan hukum pilo!”

Ne Jongsi Arnam Amonit, pulote; Elijah thak-lo, “Sining angsong pen me pavang-ra nang lapen nang monit atum an pathi-etnang!” Menmen amat Arnam ame vangsi chakri lapen la amonit atum an aphan pathi-et-lo.

Puthot inut achakri lapen bang 50 amonit Recho toithulo. La inglong angsong arlu damlo, Elijah angno akengphu patongruisi choningrilo, “Arnam Amonit, neli lapen nelimonit atum aphan ingjingsotha. Nelitum achethe nepajoktha!
Banghini achakri atum lapen halatum amonit atum aphan sining ame pen thi-et-lo; bonta kanghon pen neliphan ingjinsotha!”
lapen laphan pulo, “
Elijah pen
Ahaziah Recho keklem asontin akam an Israel a-Recho atum Aphurkimo alongsi tok-et-lo.
Mongve atomon pen Elijah aphan Sining kepondetji apor
lapen tovar kedambom ahut Elisha aphan Elijah pulo, “Non dak donon;
Bonta Elisha thak-lo, “Ne kekroi
Hadak kedo montri esong atum Elisha along damlo lapen laphan arjulo, “Nangli hemphu aphan
Kalang, ne chini, Elisha thak-lo. “Bonta laso alam elitum chingki nangne.”
Anke Elisha aphan Elijah pulo, “Non ladak donon;
Bonta Elisha thak-lo, “Neli kekroi
Hadak kedo montri esong Elisha long damsi laphan arjulo, “Pini nang-lipen nangli hemphu aphan
Kalang, neli chini, Elisha thak-lo, “Bonta laso alam elitum chethan nangne.”
Anke Elisha aphan Elijah pulo, “Non ladak dotha;
Bonta Elisha thak-lo, “Neli kekroi a-
lapen bang 50 amontri atum Jordan an halatum aphi phi dunlo. Langroi along Elijah lapen Elisha sakok-lo, lapen bang 50 amontri atum asap-o chepahelochotsi arjap-lo.
Anke Elijah keche-um ape chephloksi, la arhet-lo lapen lang theng-ilo, lang chephlakdak-lo lapen Elisha pen la longle krengtai ajo hatsi ha parai kap-lo.
Hadak Elisha aphan Elijah pulo, ‘Nephan nepondetde ako nethannon ne nangphan kopisi nangklempi nangjima?’
“Neli, nangli dular keplangji aphan nanglijakong phanni neliphan nethak tekangtha,” pusi Elisha thak-lo.

“Lake kepi kesungkrung akecho-ningrilo,” Elijah thak-lo. “Bonta nang la deng longji jongsi nangpen nephan nekepon ahut nangthek dunlong lote; jongsi nang nethekdun longle pulote la nang chodeng longlelo.”
Latum dambom ahut seta chingki-bomlo; anke menmen amat ehum me alosei pen kevang me ahemkonglong halatum angbong vang-lo lapen Elijah aphan mongve atomon pen sining pondet-lo.
Elisha la thek-longsi Elijah aphan hangserlo, “O po, O po! Israel aphan keraitheknei abang! Nang damtang-lo!” lapen la Elijah aphan puthot thek-longledet-lo.
Aningduksi, Elisha amethang keche-um ape achitim ingsekdak-lo.
Anke la Elijah pen keklo ape-um humsi chevoithulo lapen Jordan akung arjaptherlo.
La Elijah ape-um pen lang athak theng-lo, lapen pulo, “Elijah a-Arnam
Jeriko pen bang 50 amonit atum laphan thek-long-lo lapen pulo, “Elijah ajakong Elisha aphuthak satang-lo!” La aphan kechetongjisi halatum damlo lapen la angno angphun patongkilo,
lapen pulo, “Ladak netum bang 50 do, kadokaveta ingtangrak amonit saide. Netum aphan padamlongra nangli hemphu aphan paridam longnon.
Kali, nangtum dam nangne, Elisha thak-lo.
Bonta halatum la aphan padam longletik choningrilo. Bang 50 amonit atum damlo lapen nithom inglong kangtui kangdai Elijah aphan ridamlo, bonta laphan longledet-lo.
Anke latum Elisha anat chevoilo, la Jeriko along inghongding-lo, lapen halatum aphan la pulo, “Ne dam nangnepu nangtum aphan nangpupe langma?”
Jeriko pen ajehak amonit atum Elisha along damlo lapen pulo, “Nangli chinilo, akehai, la isi mesen arongsopi bonta alang meme lapen alongle ta meme.”
Harlung kemi along ajehak ingti binon, lapen la nelong vannon, la hukum pilo. Halatum la along lahei vanlo,
lapen la ha lang amek along damlo, ingti lang along varlo lapen pulo, “Lasonsi
Halaso arni pen nonpu anta laso along ingthirverlo, Elisha plangji pu kepu ateng la plang-lo.
Bethel anat kedamjisi Elisha Jeriko olo, lapen isi arongso pen ajehak pinsomar atum vang-lo lapen la aphan chongthuilo, “Ladak pen damnon, O phukoi!” pusi halatum hang-lo.
Elisha adung arei chelang-lo, halatum aphan lang-lorlo, lapen
Karmel anglong anat Elisha dambomlo lapen aphi Samaria anat chevoithulo.
Judah arecho Jehoshaphat Recho kecho 18 aningkan ahut Ahab asopo Joram Israel arecho plang-lo, lapen la Samaria along ningkan 12 pangrilo.
La
Seta la aphrang Nebat asopo Jeroboam Recho asonsi la Israel aso aphan pap keklem japonlo lapen khang un-edet-lo.
Moab arecho Mesha biresak pangreng-lo, lapen aningkanvangta la Israel arecho aphan biresak aso jon suri 100 lapen jon suri 100 abiresak angmi amidu pilo.
Bonta Israel arecho Ahab thilot aphi, Mesha Israel abe thurkrap-lo.
Tongsekotsi Joram Recho Samaria osi la ron-asong kedo-an pangrumlo.
La Judah arecho Jehoshaphat aphan lamthe isi lolo: “Moab arecho nebe thurtang-lo; lapen kechedanji aphan nangli nangchelang dunjima?”
Dunji, pusi Jehoshaphat Recho thak-lo, “Ne lapen ne-monit, ne losei anta nangrideng-lo.
Ketengkhengji aphan koloso atovar ke-ensi kemejima?”
Tovar keding Edom akejejangtang ajo sodingle damlonang, Joram thak-lo.
Lasi Joram Recho lapen Judah arecho, lapen Edom arecho atum barlo. Ni throksi dambom aphi, halatum lang dordedet-lo, lapen monit lapen pi aphanta lang avedet-lo.
“Cheplang-lo!” Joram Recho hangserlo, “Etum bangkethom aphan Moab arecho arideng
Jehoshaphat Recho arjulo, “Ladak
Joram Recho aron-armu achakri inut thak-lo, “Shaphat asopo Elisha ladak do. La Elijah arapbang-lo.”
La inut ahok amontrilo, Jehoshaphat Recho pulo. Lasi bangkethom arecho atum Elisha along damlo.
Neli kopisi nanglirap nangpo? Israel arecho aphan Elisha pulo, “Nanglipo lapen nanglipei karju amontri atum along dam iknon.”
Kali! Joram thak-lo, “la
Elisha thak-lo, “Ne kangduk kereng-et a-
seta non neli inut aduhuidi neripitha.”
Duhuidi abang la akumbeleng ardengsi Elisha aphuthak
lapen la pulo, “
Nanglitum arve mate tomon thek-longledet seta laso alangjeng langsi plengsetpo, lapen nanglitum, nanglitum api kedo-an lapen nanglitum karthang api kedo-an jun dorphlupji.’”
Elisha ningje bomlo, “Bonta lahei ke

Halatum kedo-an akelangme pairaikom arongsopi-heihei nanglitum hai unji, halatum thesere arong-heihei anta teng longetji, langmek-heihei khang unji lapen aho-or kedo ahidi ajo arlong-heihei kerikthip pen ajok halatum ahidi pavir unji.”
Puthot adap kaike adap athok ahut apor, Edom anat pen lang nanglesi longle dithip-lo.
Bangkethom arecho atum ketengkhengjisi vang-lo pu Moab arecho arjulongsi akesarnei pen akebinei latum ron arisim kerimthek atum an aphan hangpetsi ahoi along chington damlo.
Puthot adap halatum thurlo, lang athak arni atur tursi la vi ason prung-ang-lo.
“La vi saidelo!” pusi halatum hangserlo. “Bangkethom hotur aron-armu atum halatum hijan chedansi chepathi-et-lo tahai! Etum damra halatum amar mukam along thidam lonang!”
Bonta halatum mukam kele ahut Israel aso atum halatum aphan tengkheng-lo lapen phlungsi pachevoilo. Israel atum hungdun bomsi Moab aso aphan pathi-et-lo,

lapen halatum arongsopi kedo-an pavirlo. Halatum aho-or kedo alongle lesi laso athak abangphutin a-Israel aso arlong hidi plengsetsetik varlo; halatum lang amek ta khangchek-lo lapen thesere arong-heiheita chorpi-et-lo. Kejutsi det arongsopi Kir Heres an chot-lo, lapen bathuli ke-ap atum la kompetsi laphan tengkheng-lo.
Moab arecho ron keremlo pu chechinisi la bang 700 nokjir kerim amonit cheponsi hotur aren anat atovar cheselam bor-isi Siria arecho anat katjuiji pulo, bonta la chunchedet-lo.
Lasi la alar recho kechoji abang aso akleng aphan rongsopi apai along Moab arnam aphan arklidet-lo. Israel atum pheresi rongsopi pen chiruilo lapen adet methang chevoi-et-lo.

Montri esong abangphu ahemepi Elisha along damsi pulo, “Akehai, neli penan thi-et-lo! Nangli chini, alangli inut Arnam kephere abang, bonta inut abangphan preng kepi nangji dolang apotsi la non neliphan apreng alar nelisopo banghini ban keponjisi vang-lo.”
Nangliphan neli kopilo keklem nangpo? la arjulo. “Neli thantha nanglilong hem kopi ason dolo?”
Thangnat ta ave, jit ajangthu abong along asap-o ajangthu pen apar avelo, bangpi thak-lo.
“Nanglidung edon ahem damra bong angse un an pangrumdamnon,” bangpi aphan Elisha pulo.
“Anke nangli lapen nanglisopomar atum pen hem damra inghap chingkirhetnon lapen bong-heihei arlo jangthu dungnon. La pleng-lote ehin anat bivetnon.”
Lasi bangpi asomar penpen hem chelutdamlo, inghap chingkirsi jit ajangthu abong enlo lapen asomar halahei bangpi along kevan abong kedo-an along jangthu thailo.
Kedo-an abong jangthu kethai patangsi bangpi arjulo abong dolangma pu, “Lahelo ajutsilo.” Bangpi asomar angbong thak-lo.
Bangpi Elisha montri along damthulo, bangpi aphan la pulo, “Jit ajangthu jorra nangli preng kedo-an chetu damnon, nangli lapen nanglisomar atum kerengji aphanta la ahin atangka pen dorphlup nangji.”
Arnisi Elisha Shunem anat damlo, hadak inut keplang-o a-arloso dolo. Bangpi laphan an esan kepachojisi hang-lo, lapen halaso arni pen la Shunem kedam aphongtin bangpi ahemsi la an chodampo.
Bangpi apenan aphan chepulo, “Ne mathalo, ladak kevangver laso amonit chenam inut kangthir amonit tahai.
Sarnung angsong eli angdengso isi kimpihop lonang, hongplang, tebul lapen inghoi kangtui isi lapen melur isi la along bilonang, elilong la nangkevur ahut la hadak sanglongpo.”
Arnisi Elisha Shunem anat chevoisi la kesang adim chedamlo.
La aban Gehazi aphan padamsi arloso aphan pahangtoilo. Bangpi vangsi

Gehazi aphan la pulo, “Eli kenangji ason an bangpi epadorphlup apot bangpi kopi kenangjima arjutha. Bangpi nephan recho along mate ron-armu apinpo along ne padamsi bangpi aphan choningripi nangji tahai mene.”
Neli kenangji ason an nelirat atum angbong neli longpet-lo, pusi bangpi thak-lo.
Gehazi aphan Elisha arjulo, “Tangte ne bangpi aphan kopi klem nangpo?”
La thak-lo, “Mesen, seta bangpi asopinso ave lapen bangpi apenan sarpik-lo.”
Bangpi aphan ladak pavangtoitha, Elisha hukum pilo. Bangpi vangsi inghap ajakan along arjapding-lo,
bangpi aphan Elisha pulo, “Moning nonpu apor nangli sopo inut charbak longpo.”
Pe-oi! pusi bangpi hangserlo. “Kanghon pen akehai, nelipachobeiri. Nangli inut Arnam amonit!”
Bonta Elisha kepu ateng puthot aningkan halaso aporchit bangpi inut asopo mahang pathek-lo.
Penang an aningkan aphi, soktipli kerot ahut apo along kedunjisi oso abang adap isi barphlot-lo, apo abang soktipli kerot atum along hidisi dolang.
Menmen amat la apo aphan chehangserlo, “Nephu nangroklok-lo! Nephu nangroklok-lo!”
Oso aphan apei along pondetnon, aban aphan apo abang pulo.
Aban abang oso aphan apei along ponthudet-lo, bangpi ha anerlochitim anta arbak-het-lo, halaso ahut amat la thilot-lo.
Bangpi laphan Elisha angdeng an pondet-lo, laphan hongplang athak pa-ilo, lapen bangpi anung anghap ingkirtekangsi olo.
Anke apenan aphan bangpi pulo, “Gadha ejon pen ban inut ladak nangtoitha. Ne Elisha montri along damnangji. Ne un an prapjin pen nangchevoithuji.”
Kopi athesi nang pini kedam nangjima? Bangpi apenan arjulo. “La kesang arnita kali lapen chiklo kemi arong-aje ta kali.”
Jat setalo, bangpi thak-lo.
Anke bangpi agadha ardontanlo lapen aban aphan hukumpilo, “La kedam paprap un an gadha padam non lapen panglenri, ne nang pupetik ke.”
Lasi bangpi barlo lapen Elisha kedo adim Karmel anglong anat damlo.

Bangpi kevangbom ahut ephar pen Elisha thek-long-lo lapen aban Gehazi aphan pulo, “Langtha! Shunem pen bangpi vang-lo! Bangpi anat damseraknon lapen bangpi apenan, asopo mephun langma kosonma birta endunnon.”
Bangpi Gehazi aphan thanlo kado-kaveta mephunlang pu,

bonta bangpi Elisha along nangkele ahut ke angno bangpi angphun arum patongkisi la akeng otthip-lo. Bangpi aphan Gehazi ketoiphitjisi kethailo, bonta Elisha pulo, “Bangpi aphan inutvet-le padolongnon. Bangpi aningkeduk nang thek-longlema? Lapen bangso alam aputhak
Laphan arloso abang pulo, “Akehai, neli pinso a-oso nangli hanghelangma? Neli nangliphan nelining pathinangne pu nanglipu pe langma?”

Gehazi anat Elisha pangnosi pulo, “Paprapnon! Ne chin ponra damnon. Nang kechetong badu aphanta kardom piri lapen mane jongsi nangphan kardom pilote kethak dunji aphan apor padamri. Hem anat dam pakengsonnon lapen oso aphuthak ne chin batnon.”
Elisha aphan arloso abang pulo, “Ne kekroi
Gehazi dam paphrangsi Elisha achin oso aphuthak bat-lo, bonta thang ase ave mate achethe kedo angthek thek-longle. Lasi la Elisha aphan kechetongjisi chiruithulo lapen pulo, “Oso burbepin.”
Elisha nanglesi la inutvet angdeng arlo damlo lapen hongplang athak oso kethi tilai thek-long-lo.
La inghap ingkirhetsi
Anke la oso athak abang chebat-lo, la angtur, amek, ari oso aphuthak ithor amat oso abang kar-om cheng-lo.
Elisha thursi angdeng arlo helat-lo lapen chedamthusi oso athak abang ithorlo. Oso abang batai 7 pase-erlo, lapen amek chingpulo.
Gehazi aphan Elisha hang-lo, lapen oso apei aphan pahangtoilo. Bangpi arlo vangsi bangpi aphan la pulo, “Nangso che-ennon.”
Bangpi Elisha akeng-ri amahang longle paphosi ardomkhrup-lo; anke bangpi asopo cheponsi damphit-lo.
Ephong, det adang akhim kethur ahut Elisha Gilgal anat chevoilo. La esong amontri atum aphan kethan ahut la aban aphan phulethepo me along halatum aphan han padangtoilo.

Ajehak ahanparvo keridamjisi halatum angbong inut abang barlo. La ingnam adrakharikang long-lo lapen la untik an athe likponlo. La halahei ponpisi ingthan-ilo lapen lahei kopima chinine pinpen han along jokdunlo.
Han bak-lo, kepachojisi, bonta la chomat-det pen Elisha aphan halatum hangserlo, “La bikar cheplangtang-lo!” lapen la chonotang-lo.
Elisha ajehak a-an hang-lo lapen la phule arlo jokdunlo, lapen pulo, “Halatum aphan ako han hekthunon.” Anke la thangta cheplangpledet-lo.

Aphong kaprek, inut amonit Baal Shalishah pen vang-lo, Elisha aphan atikong asoktipliso pen keselam ahim dum 20 vanpilo, lapen ajehak ahan kemeta vanpilo. Elisha aban aphan pulo, “lahei pen montri asong aphan kepachoji aphanlo,”
bonta la thak-lo, “Bangpharo amonit aphan la dor ikjima?”
Elisha thak-lo, “Kepachojile halatum aphan la pinon, pima
Lasi aban abang kecho amar halatum angno ingle pilo, lapen
Naaman ke Siria atum ron apinpolo, lapen man pi-o lapen Siria arechota aningdok-olo pima Naaman pen ajok Siria aron-asong aphan
Ephong Israel aputhak ketengkheng ahut Siria atum inut Israel a-osopi pondet-lo lapen bangso a-osopi Naaman apiso aban plang-lo.
Arnisi osopi abang ahemphi aphan pulo, “Neli hemphu Samaria along kedo amontri along dam asonte pusi neli ningkehang! Alangli akeso halaso abang pame-unji.”
Naaman laso alam arjulongsi, la recho along damlo lapen osopi kepu alam than-et-lo.
Recho pulo, “Israel arecho along damnon lapen laso aloh halaphan pinon.”
Lasi Naaman barlo, arideng rup dum suri 30, ser dum suri 6, lapen pe-ri sele akemenei ape chorkep.
La kepon aloh along lasonsi tok-lo, “Laso aloh pen ne chakri Naaman aphan pachinilo. Neningkehang lahelo nangli la akeso pamepo.”

Israel arecho la porhesi aningkethi pen la ape chingsek-lo, lapen hang-lo, “Kosonsi Siria arecho laso amonit aphuthak ne kepameji ning chetheloma? Ne Arnam putong la kemathama? Kethi kereng ajakong nelong doma? Ladak pen chinilo la kechebohongjisi athe kerilo.”

Kopi plang-loma lahei alam Elisha montri arjulongsi la lamthe isi recho aphan birta pilo; “Nangli kopi athesi lapu-an ningduk nangjima? Laso amonit nelilong nangtoinon, lapen laphan neli paklangpo Israel adet inut amonit do pu alam!”
Lasi Naaman alosei lapen ahemkonglong pen pen damlo lapen Elisha ahem thengno along sakok-lo.
Elisha ban inut toisi laphan Jordan Aroi along batai throksi lang pachinglu damtoilo lapen la akeso medet khangjangpo.
Bonta aningthihaksi damjuilo lapen pulo, “Ne mathalo la nangbarsi nelong vangpo, lapen a-Arnam
La apar Abana lapen Pharpar Aroi Damaskas along avema? Lahei Israel Aroi apar memulang; lapule chinilorte halahei along chinglupen chepame unji apot-lo!”

Alangli ban la along an damsi pulo, “Akehai, montri abang jongsi nangliphan akesung akam paklemtoi lote la nangli klemvekji, kalima? Tangte non nangli kopisi la kepu ateng chinglu un-edetjima lapen chepame un-edetjima?”
Lasi Naaman Jordan sundamsi Elisha kepu ateng batai throksi lang arlo parbip-lo lapen la akeso medet-lo. La areng oso areng asonsi mesen lapen lengbong-lo.
La Elisha along chevoithulo, la amonit atum pen pen lapen pulo, “Non neli chinilo nahokta arnam ave bonta Israel a-Arnamchot; lasi kanghon pen akehai, neli pen dan chodeng iktha.”
Elisha thak-lo, “Ne kangduk
La kepadengji aphan Naaman bor-ilo, bonta la un-edet-lo.
Lasi Naaman pulo, “Nangli jongsi neli dan dengde pulote, neliphan losei jonni kepon un a-longle hem nepapon longtha, pima non pen neli
Lasi neningthelo ne Recho aphan Rimmon akardomhem, la Siria a-arnam lapen laphan karcho adim along japon seta
Ningkangsam penle damnon, pusi Elisha pulo. Lapen Naaman damlo.
La asap-o damchot anchot-lang,
Elisha aban amethang chepulo, “Nehemphu Naaman thangnat papilonglepin pen toijuilo! Laphan Siria aso kepajir ason chodeng nangji apot-lo.
Lasi la Naaman aphi phi dunlo. Naaman inut amonit aphi aphi kekat thek-longsi, laphan kechetongjisi la ahemkonglong pen suntuk-lo lapen arjulo, “Pine kelet dolangma?”

“Ave,” Gehazi thak-lo. “Bonta neli hemphu nangliphan kepathanjisi neketoi; nonjong Ephraim alongri along kedo amontri asong pen banghini nanglelo nangli halatum aphan rup dum suri kethom, lapen pe-sele akeme chorni la nangli papitoilo.”
Kanghon pen rup dum suri throk ponnon, Naaman thak-lo. La lodun bomsi jarong hini arlo rup thapsi sak-het-lo, lahei pilo lapen pe ri chorni la aban banghini aphan pisi halatum Gehazi aphrang padamlo.
Halatum Elisha kedo anglong lesi Gehazi jaronghini ponsi lahei hem arlo pondet-lo. Anke la Naaman aban atum aphan toilo.
La hem arlo chelutdamlo lapen Elisha laphan arjulo, “Nang konatsi kedamlo?”
Oh, ne nahokta damde, akehai, la thak-lo.

Bonta Elisha pulo, “Halaso amonit nangphan kechetongjisi ahemkonglong pen kesun ahut ne hadak avema nekarjong pen? Non tangka, pe-ri, jit arong-artu lapen drakharikang, biresak lapen chainong mate ban-heihei kedengdun apor kali!
Lapen non Naaman akeso nangphuthak vangpo, nang lapen nangso-nangsu anta la kaike longverpo!”
Gehazi odet aphi, la areng akeso cholongsi areng ar-e kelok ason lokpok-lo.
Arnisi Elisha amontri asong atum laphan choningrilo, “Elitum kedo adim bi-ong-lo!
Nelitum aphan Jordan kedamjile bida tho iknon lapen ajehak athengpi pi damsi eli kedo adim ehum ahem kimlongpo.”
Mesenlo, pusi Elisha thak-lo.
Halatum angbong inut abang la aphan halatum along kepadunjisi choningrilo, la kroidunlo,
lapen halatum barrappet-lo. Halatum Jordan nanglesi, kam keklem pangcheng-lo.
Inut abang thengpi pibom ahut, menmen ingchin acho aphu lang arlo klochuilo, “Ne kopi pensi keklemjilangma akehai?” la Elisha aphan hangserlo. “La kerongchot acho pinak!”
La kodaksi keklolo? Elisha arjulo. Bangso abang laphan adim paklang-lo lapen Elisha kaibong chorpetsi la lang arlo varchorlo lapen cho aphu panglang-lo.
“La endetnon,” la hukum pilo, lapen bangso amonit abang chejotsi la humdet-lo.
Israel pen Siria arecho ron chedanlo, la achakri atum pen chingvailo lapen elong adim mukam chekimjisi chongvailo.
Bonta Elisha abang Israel arecho aphan birta pilo, pima Siria aso atum hadak chepatujoisi inghongding-lo.
Lasi Israel arecho ta haladak kedo amonit atum aphan pacheretoilo lapen halatum aphan patonsi railo. Lason aphong do-olo.
Laso aputhak Siria arecho aning jangjelo; la achakri atum aphan arjulo, “Nangtum angbong komat abangsi Israel arecho anat-lo?”
Halatum angbong inut abang thak-lo, “Baduta ave Recho. Elisha montri si nangli angdeng arlo kedip alam anta Israel arecho aphan thanlo.”
La konatsi doma ridamnon, recho hukum pilo, “Ne laphan nepchekpo.”
Elisha Dothan alongsi do pu laphan thansi
la losei lapen ronhemkonglong-heihei ongdung ron-asong hadak toilo. Halatum rong ajo lelo lapen la kompet-lo.

Puthot adapprang Elisha aban thurlo, lapen hem angtan barlo, lapen Siria aron asong thek-long-lo, halatum alosei lapen ronhemkonglong-heihei pen rong kompet-lo. La Elisha along chedamthusi hang-lo, “Etum kevirlo, akehai, eli kopisi keklempoma?”
Phereri, Elisha thak-lo.
Etum abesi ke-onglang halatum abe aphan mute.
Anke la ardomlo, “O
Siria atum ketengkheng ahut Elisha ardomlo, “O

Anke halatum along Elisha damlo, lapen pulo, “Nanglitum kalile atovarsi dolo; lake nanglitum keri arong kali. Neliphi phi nangdunnon, lapen nanglitum keri amonit anat nangja ponpo.” Lapen la halatum aphan Samaria anat japonlo.
Halatum rongsopi kelut pen amat Elisha ardomthulo, “Latum amek ingputha,
Israel arecho Siria aso atum aphan thek-longsi, la Elisha aphan arjulo, “Latum aphan neli pathi-etnonma, akehai? Latum aphan pathi-etnon ma?”
Nangne, la thak-lo, “Nangli kechedan pen kehailongra kenep-long kali atum aphan nangli pathi unjima? Latum aphan kecho-kejun ason pinon, lapen latum arecho along pachevoi-thu lonang!”

Lasi Israel arecho latum aphan kecho-kejun Ameipi sikpilo; lapen halatum chodet-jundet aphi, la latum aphan Siria arecho along pachevoi-thulo. Halabangso arni pen Siria atum Israel adet thiparohumhe det-lo.
Penang an aphi Siria arecho Benhadad Israel abe thursi la kedo-an aron-armu japonlo, lapen Israel ketengkhengjisi Samaria arongsopi komdampet-lo.
La kekompet pen ajok sok-sang kedorde rongsopi along pu-an akhim thurlo gadha aphu ejon anam rup dum 80, lapen powa isi avothung ahi anam rup dum pholo.
Israel arecho rongsopi apaisong athak keteroi ahut inut a-arloso hangserlo, “Neraptha recho!”
La thak-lo, “
Nangtum kopi akesung-lo?”
Bangpi thak-lo, “Patumi ladak kedo arloso pinkhat-lo, etum nangsopo chonang, lapen puthot arni ke nesole cholonang.
Lasi neso aphan netum chotundetsi chodet-lo. Puthot arni bangpi aphan ne pulo, etum nangsopo chonang, bonta laphan bangpi patujoilo!”
La arjulongsi recho aning jangjesi ape chingsek-lo, lapen la adung arei arpong kedo atum la ape aber pethoila ke-i thek-long-lo.
La hangserlo, “Nephan Arnam nepathilot-nang jongsi arni chiche ako ne Elisha aphan pathilonglete!”
Elisha aphan kepathijisi la pherangke toilo.

Halaso ahut Elisha la along kevang ajehak arleng kesar atum pen pen hem si do. Recho apherangke nanglele aphrang akesar atum aphan Elisha pulo, “Hala monit apran karmut abang nephan kepathijisi anut kaprek nangtoililo! Non ladak la nanglelote inghap ingkirhetnon lapen arlo laphan nangpalut longri. Recho amethang amat laso aphi doji.”
Laso alam kethan jutchit anchot-lang, recho nanglesi pulo, “La
Elisha thak-lo, “
Recho along kehonbang Elisha aphan pulo, “La plang un-e non amat
La keplang nang thek-longpo, bonta halaso a-an nang cholongledetji, Elisha thak-lo.
Si-i keso bang phli amonit atum Samaria anghap angtansi do, lapen halatum lahin lahin chepulo, “Etum thithetik dak kopisi chonghong nangjima?

Rongsopi kedam la thangnat ale ave, pima hadak seta kecholongle pensi thinangpo; lapen ladak-le do seta eli thiji. La apotsi etum Siria amukam anat damlonang; jonghe kehingno seta ephan epathi unchotji, bonta epran e-armutmedet tahai mene.”
Lasi arnikangsam apor latum Siria amukam anat damlo, latum hadak lesi badu aphanta thek-longledet-lo.

Siria aso aphan losei-heihei, ronhemkonglong-heihei pen ongdung aron-armu kevang arki parjulong-lo, lapen Siria aso atum mathalo, Israel arechosi Hitti lapen Ijip arecho lapen halatum aron-armu rongsi ketengkhengji vang-lo.
Lasi arni kangsam Siria aso atum apran achethe aphan kat-lo, halatum apehem-heihei, losei-heihei lapen gadha-heihei lapen amukam kedo-an ason otekang-lo.

Bang phli amonit atum mukam akung lesi halatum pehem arlo lutdamsi cholo, junlo, hadak kedo amar, an, ser, rup lapen pe-ri longsi arbak-hup-lo, lapen lahei kepatu damjisi damlo; anke halatum nangchevoilo, along kaprek apehem arlo lutsi aphrang asonthot klemlo.

Bonta aphi latum lahin lahin chepulo, “Lason etum klembom nangnelo! Etum birta keme dolo lapen la etum aphan bijoi nangnelo. La kethanji aphan penap adap an inghong-lote etum aduk phovekji. Non amat dam lonang lapen recho achakri atum aphan thanlonang!”

Lasi halatum Siria atum amukam obup-lo, lapen Samaria anat damlo, lapen inghap-heihei along kedo tonbang atum aphan hang-lo: Netum Siria amukam damlo seta badu aphanta thek-longle lapen thang arki ta arjulongle; losei-heihei lapen gadha-heihei kokdong-dang lang lapen pehem-heihei, Siria atum ke-o asonthotsi halahei dokok-lang.
Laso abirta tonbang atum pachethang-lo lapen la rechohem ta lam palelo.

La ajo lang bonta recho ahongplang pen thursi achakri atum aphan pulo, “Siria atum kopisi kemangma ne nangthanlang! Halatum chini ladak akhim thurlo pu, lasi latum amukam che-obupsi rong anat chepatu damjoilo. Halatum mathalo etum an keridamjisi rongsopi opo anke latum etum aphan reng-et-et enep-longsi rongsopi cheraidetpo.”

La achakri inut abang thak-lo, “Jat seta laso arongsopi arat atum ke vir nangpo, hala kethitang atum ason-thakthak. La apotsi kesatang alosei jon pho pen pen ajehak amonit eli toilanglang lonang, anke kopisi plang-lo ma eli chinilongpo.”
Halatum ajehak amonit ingvailo lapen Siria aron-armu kopi cheplang-loma la kechiniji aphan recho ajehak amonit lapen aronhemkonglong humni toisi pinkhatdun pamelo.
Pinso atum Jordan an damlo, lapen halatum kekat ahut Siria aso kevar tekang ape-ari lapen risim tovar soding thek-long-lo. Anke halatum nangchevoisi recho aphan halatum kelong alam pachinilo.
Samaria arat atum damprup-lo lapen Siria amukam amar kedo-an van-et-lo.

La lapuson plang-lo Israel arecho ahonbang aphansi rongsopi anghap ahemphu bat-lo. Laso achakri aphuthak Elisha laphan recho pen kelangdam ahut kemontri atengsi rat atum laphan sak-rin rin amat dongbop-lo.
Recho aphan Elisha pulo, halaso ahut an puthot arni akemenei asoktipli lin thom mate soktipliso lin throk anam Samaria along rup edum anam pen jorlongji,
laso aputhak chakri abang thak-lo, “La plang un-e,
Lasonsi laphan plang-lo la thilot-lo rongsopi anghap along rat atum dongbop-lo.
Shunem along kedo a-arloso asopo aphan Elisha parengthulo lapen bangpi aphan pulo, “Det adang ningkan 7
La kepinkhat alam bangpi kroilo lapen ahemtun pen pen Philistia adet ningkan 7 dodamlo.
Ningkan 7 jutsi, bangpi Israel anat nangchevoilo lapen hem-rit kechelangthujira lapen kehangdamjisi recho along bangpi damlo.
Bangpi recho abang Elisha aban Gehazi pen kechingkibom thek-long-lo; recho ke Elisha manghumeme akam alam kechiniji ninghang-lo.

Kosonsi Elisha kethi abangphan keparengthu loma laso alam recho aphan Gehazi kethanbom ahut, bangpi abang recho aphan choningrilo. Laphan Gehazi pulo, “Recho lahelo a-arlosolo, lapen Elisha keparengthu abangpi asopo lahelo!”
Recho akarju thaksi bangpi Gehazi alam pathirlo, lasi recho kepangri abangphan hangsi la aphan pulo, “Bangpi amar an lapen bangpi ke-o ningkan 7 ahut longle pen kelong asok athe anam an voi nangji.”
Siria arecho Benhadad aphu keso ahut Elisha ephong Damaskas anat damlo. Elisha hadak do pu alam recho aphan pachinisi,
Hazael, la achakri aphan la pulo, “Isi adan montri aphan ponpira ne mejima memema

Lasi ka-ut jon 40 athak Damaskas along akemenei kelong an amar arthangsi Elisha along damlo. Laphan Hazael chetongsi pulo, “Nangliban Benhadad Recho alangli akeso mejima memema karjujisi neliphan nanglilong toilo.”
Elisha thak-lo, “
Anke Elisha laphan pherememe akelang pen Hazael amahang chetevarvetik lang-lorlo. Menmen Elisha amekkri busi chirulo.
“Nangli kopi apotsi kechirulo, akehai?” Hazael arjulo.

Pima nang Israel arat aphuthak akechenek pherememeji, la ne chinilo, Elisha thak-lo, “Halatum apairaikom-heihei nang me kaiji, halatum akemenei ariso atum aphan pathiji, halatum a-osomar atum aphan varbop-bopji lapen reng angsese a-arloso atum apok siridakji.”
Lapu-an ajakongkethe neli kosonsi keplangpo? Hazael arjulo. “Neli thangta kali!”
Benhadad along Hazael chevoi-thulo, lapen laphan arjulo, “Elisha kopisi kepulo?”
La neliphan nethanlo nangli mevekji, Hazael thak-lo.
Bonta puthot arni Hazael pe epak ensi lang nimlo lapen recho amahang dipsi pathilot-lo.
Hazael lasi Benhadad alar Siria arecho plang-lo.
Israel arecho Ahab asopo Joram recho kecho pho aningkan ahut, Jehoshaphat asopo Jehoram Judah arecho plang-lo,
ningkan 32 arta ahut, lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 8 pangrilo.
La apiso ke Ahab asopilo, lapen Ahab ahemtun kehingno atovarsi rimlo. La
bonta Judah aphan
Jehoram kepangri ahut Edom atum Judah abethurlo lapen isi recho-arat kangthim plang-lo.

Lasi Jehoram la kedo-an aronhemkonglong pen Zair anat barlo, hadak Edom aron-aso atum latum aphan kompet-lo. Ajo angbong la lapen la aronhemkonglong kardon abang kat bor-isi chepajok-lo, lapen la aron-aso atum anta ahem anat chepratseilo.
Halaso arni pen Edom, Judah arideng pen kaita jokvanlo. Laso aningkan amat Libnah arongsopi asor ta thurpak-lo.
Jehoram keklem akam asontin Judah Arecho Atum Aphurkimo aloh along tok-et-lo.
Jehoram thilot-lo, lapen David Arongsopi recho athiri alongsi pipbup-lo, lapen la asopo Ahaziahsi la alar recho cholo.
Israel archo Joram, la Ahab asopo recho kecho krehini aningkan ahut Jehoram asopo Ahaziah, Judah arecho plang-lo,
la arta ningkan 22 ahut lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan isi pangrilo. La apei Athaliah, Ahab asopi lapen Israel arecho Omri asupi.
Piso ke-en pen ajok Ahab Recho pen Ahaziah chephotang-lo. La Ahab ahemtun keklemtang asonthotsi
Ahaziah Recho ta Israel arecho Joram pen chelangsi Siria arecho Hazael abethursi ron chedanlo. Gilead alongri Ramoth alongsi ron chedanlo, lapen Joram abang ron along areng sodak-lo.
La areng keso pen kemeji aphan la Jezreel arongsopi chevoilo, lapen hadak Ahaziah laphan kelangjisi damlo.
Halabangso ahut montri atum angbong inut ariso aphan Elisha montri hang-lo lapen laphan pulo, “Chesik-ra Gilead alongri Ramoth along damtha. Laso jit ajangthu nanglong cheponnon,
lapen hadak lelote Jehoshaphat asopo lapen Nimshi asupo Jehu aphan rinon. Ajirpo atum pen kedovet angdeng anat pondet-ra,
aphu athak laso jit jangthu dungnon lapen punon; ‘Nangliphan Israel arecho keplangji aphan
Lasi montri riso Ramoth damlo,
hadak ron ahemphu atum amei kedo thek-long-lo. La pulo, “Akehai, neli nangliphan birta isi do.”
Jehu arjulo, “Nelitum angbong komat aphansi nangli kehang-lo?”
Nangliphan, akehai, la thak-lo.
Anke halatum banghini arludamlo, anke montri riso abang Jehu aphuthak jit ajangthu dung-lo lapen laphan pulo, “Israel a-Arnam
Nang hemphu recho aphan pathi nangpo, hala Ahab asopo aphan anke Ne montri atum aphan lapen akaprek Neban atum aphan kepathi alar Jezebel aphuthak aduk pilongpo.
Ahab ahemtun kedo-an atum thi nangji; la ahemtun pinsomar kedo-an kebinon kesarnon.
Israel arecho Jeroboam ahemtun lapen Israel arecho Baasha aphan Ne keklem asonthotsi laphan ta Ne inghoipo.
Jezebel aphan papippelo; bangpi abang arpum ke Jezreel along methan atumsi pachodetpo.’” La pudet aphi, montri riso angdeng osi katjuilo.
Jehu ari-sangho achakri atum along chedamthulo, halatum arjulo, “Kemesen abirta ma? Laso aningklui ariso nang pen kopi akamlo?”
La kopisi kemangjima nangtum chinilo, pusi Jehu thak-lo.
Kali, netum chinine! halatum thak-lo, “la kopisi kepuma nethantha!”
La nephan pulo,
Menmen Jehu asangho chakri atum pe athak keparjapjisi dongkam athaksi halatum ape-heihei limjamlo, pong-ut but-lo, lapen hang-lo, “Jehu recholo!”
Joram Recho abe Jehu thurlo, la Jezreel along keso chelangdamlo, Siria arecho Hazael pen Ramoth aron along kechedan ahut kepho amek.
Lasi Jehu achakri atum aphan pulo, “Nangtum jongsi nebe pulote, Jezreel arat kepachereji aphan baduta Ramoth pen pakatkedet nang.”
Anke la amethang ron ahemkonglong charlusi Jezreel anat barlo. Joram keso memelang, lapen Judah arecho Ahaziah ta hadak laphan kelangdamsi dolo.
Inut tonbang Jezreel along kelang apaisong pen langsi Jehu lapen amonit atum kevangbom thek-long-lo. “Ne ajehak amonit atum losei pen kevang thek-long-lo!” pusi la hang-lo.
Joram thak-lo, “Losei kardonbang toira latum jirpoma hotur atum ma birta pa-ennon.”
Pherangke abang Jehu anat losei ardonponsi laphan pulo, “Nangli jirpo asontong kevangma, recho chini ingtung-lo.”
La nangkam kali! Jehu thak-lo, Nephile nangdunnon.
Kelang apaisong along kedo atonbang than pachinilo pherangke abang lelo seta nangchevoive-det-lo.
Anut kaprek apherangke toithulo, lapen aphrang abang asonthotsi arjulo. Ako Jehu thak-lo, “La nangkam kali! Nephile nangdunnon.”

Puthot tonbang than pachini thulo pherangke abang lelo, seta nang-chevoive-det-lo. Lapen la puthulo, “Songjabang amethang aronhemkonglong pangchamjam asonsi hemkonglong pangplong-lo lapen la Jehu asonthot!”

Ne ron-hemkonglong siktha, Joram Recho hukum pilo. La klemlo, la lapen Ahaziah rechota ardonsi barlo, abangphutinta amethang aronhemkonglong chardonrep-lo, Jehu aphan kechetongjisi damlo. Naboth ahidi alongsi laphan halatum chetong-lo.
Nangli akeme akam aphantong kevangma? laphan Joram arjulo.
Kopusonsi akeme akam aphan jilangma, Jehu thak-lo, “Elitum adet majakanghoi atum lapen nanglipei Jezebel kecheng tekang akumlin kardom keburuipile?”
La pacherailo, Ahaziah! pusi Joram hangser amat ahemkonglong chetevarsi kat-lo.
Jehu athai aso che-ensi ajakong kedo-an pen Joram anung ap plotsi angthin an palengplot-lo. Ahemkonglong along amat Joram krepbupsi thilot-lo,
Jehu adun rapbang Bidkar aphan pulo, “La abang arpum enra Naboth ahidi ajo la vardam chornon. Chemathatha nang pen ne Joram Recho apo Ahab aphan

‘Patumi amat vi kethek-long ason thak-thaksi, Naboth lapen la asopo atum aphan apran karmut Ne thek-long-lo. Ne semetang-lo nangphan aduk-pivekji ladak laso ahidi along amat.’ Lasi Joram abang arpum ponnon, “ adun rapbang aphan Jehu hukum pilo, “Lapen Naboth ahidi along la var-dam chornon, anke

Kopi plang-loma Ahaziah Recho thek-longpamelo, lasi Beth Haggan arong anat la ahemkonglong chardonsi kat-lo, aphi aphi Jehu hungdunlo. “La aphanta pathilotnon!” amonit aphan Jehu hukum pilo, lapen halatum laphan Ibleam arong adung Gur atovar karludam anat la ahemkonglong kepangplong ahut areng pasolo. Bonta la Megiddo arongsopi leletik dambomlo, hadaksi la thipinlo.
La achakri atum la abang arpum hemkonglong ehum pen Jerusalem anat pondet-lo, lapen David Arongsopi recho athiri along laphan pip-lo.
Israel arecho Ahab asopo Joram recho kecho kre isi aningkan ahutsi Ahaziah Judah arecho plang-lo.
Jezreel along Jehu nanglelo. Kopi plangtang-loma Jezebel arjulongsi, amekkung chehilo achu chingsok-lo lapen rechohem anghapso pen tovar anat arum langsi arjapding-lo.
Jehu inghap pen kevang thek-longsi bangpi hang-lo, “Nang Zimri! Prankarmut abang! Nang kopisi ladak kevang-lo?”
Jehu angsong langsi hang-lo, “Nebe komatma?” Inghapso pen chakri atum laphan arum lang-lo,

lapen halatum aphan Jehu pulo, “Bangpi aphan arum nangvarchor non!” Halatum bangpi aphan arum nangvarlo, lapen bangpi avi arpong lapen losei anat chingdat-lo. Bangpi abang arpum athak Jehu alosei lapen ahemkonglong pakoisi
rechohem lut damlo lapen an esan cholo. La an aphi si la pulo, “Ahirjuno kepho a-arloso aphan ponra bangpi aphan pipnon; jat seta bangpi inut recho asopilo.”
Bonta bangpi aphan kepip damji atum bangpi aphu-bongkorok lapen ari-akeng arrepi pen thangnatta longledet-lo.
Halatum Jehu aphan laso alam than pachini ahut, la pulo, “Lason helo keplangjipu
Hadak bangpi abang achet hi asonsi hijikchoji, anke baduta halahei pangthek thekthedetpo.”
Samaria arongsopi along Ahab Recho aso-asu bang 70 do. Jehu loh toksi rongsopi pangribang aphan sanchom asor ajalin lapen Ahab aso-asu ahemphu atum aphan la loh pilo. Loh lasonsi tok-lo:
Nanglitum recho aso-asu ahemphulo lapen nanglilong losei, ronhemkonglong, risim-heihei, lapen pairaikom arongsopi cheparideng-lo. Lasi laso aloh long-lok pen,
nanglitum recho kebatjile recho aso-asu angbong apun abangphan ingvainon lapen laphan keraijile chedandun non.
Samaria pangribang atum kephere thirikjok-lo, “Kopusonsi eli Jehu aphan khamkhedunpoma,” halatum chepulo, “Joram Recho lapen Ahaziah Recho amatta khang un-etang-lo?”

Lasi rechohem ahemphu lapen rongsopi ahemphu sanchom asor ajalin lapen osomar kelang ahemphu atum pen pen chepangrumpetsi Jehu aphan laso abirta lolo; “Nelitum nanglibanlo, lapen nanglining kehang akam nangketoi alingsi klempo. Bonta badu aphan nelitum recho batbelo; nanglining kematha akeme alingle klem iknon.”
Halatum aphan Jehu akaprek aloh tokthulo; “Nanglitum jongsi nelinat lapen neli hukum-heihei keklemji chesik-lo pulote, Ahab Recho aso-asu aphu kedo-an nelilong Jezreel penap laso apor van nangji.”
Ahab Recho aso-asu bang 70 inut Samaria asanchom asor ajalin aridengsi lapen alanglisi lanalo.
Jehu aloh longdet aphi, Samaria ajalin atum Ahab aso-asu kedo-an bang 70 pathi-et-lo, lapen aphu-heihei khangra arlo thap-lo lapen Jehu along Jezreel halahei lophlot-lo.
Ahab aso-asu atum aphu-heihei Jezreel along van-et-lo pu Jehu aphan than pachinilo, lapen la puthot adap an rongsopi anghap adung pabuini angsom hadak kepipji aphan la halatum aphan hukumpilo.
Adapprang la inghap anat damlo, lapen hadak kedo arat atum aphan la pulo, “Neli helo Joram Recho abe thursi laphan pathilo; laso apot nanglitum thang adai ave. Bonta komatsi lahei pathi-et-lo?
Lapen ajok chini iknon
Anke Jezreel along kedo Ahab adon arap atum aphanta Jehu pathi-et-lo, lapen la achakri atum kechini ajirpo lapen akurusar atum an aphanta pathi-et-lo; inutbak aphanta pareng-longledet-lo.
Jehu Samaria anat kedamjisi Jezreel olo. Tovar ebeng “biresak kevi Amukam” pu adim,
Judah kethitang arecho Ahaziah ajehak adon arap atum aphan la chetong-lo, lapen halatum aphan arjulo, “Nanglitum komat-lo?”
Ahaziah adon-arap-lo, pusi halatum thak-lo, “Nelitum ha Jezreel anatsi kedamji Jezebel rechopi asomar lapen ahin kedo-an recho ahemtun aphan kelangdamji.”

Amonit atum aphan Jehu hukumpilo, “Latum aphan akereng nepnon!” Latum halatum aphan phlung-lo, lapen hadak isi ahilik adung halatum aphan pathi-et-lo. Kadokave bang 42 an do lapen inutbak aphanta akereng bibedet-lo.
Jehu puthot barthulo, lapen tovar along Rechab asopo Jonadab pen la chetong-lo. Laphan Jehu kardompisi Jehu pulo, “Nang pen ne isivet tahai! Nang nelong nangdunjima?”
Nangdunji, Jonadab thak-lo.
Tangte eri che-ot lonang, Jehu thak-lo. Halatum pupu ari che-otthip-lo lapen laphan Jehu aronhemkonglong athak parlulo,
lapen pulo, “Nelong nangdunnon, lapen ne ko-an
Latum hadak lesi Ahab adon-arap kedo-an aphan Jehu pathilap-lo, inutbak aphanta akereng bibedet-lo, lasonsi plangpo pu Elijah pen ajok
Samaria arat kedo-an aphan Jehu hangpet-lo, lapen pulo, “Ahab Recho Baal arnam aphan asap-o si ingdukchot-lo, bonta neli ke un ansi archoji.

Baal amontri kedo-an lapen laphan karcho an atum aphan lapen la akurusar kedo-an aphan hangpetnon. Baduta chepajok longle; neli Baal aphan isi thedung athok karkliji lapen nangkedunde atum an aphan ke pathilap-po.” (Lake Jehu ahin pen isi Baal karcho atum an aphan kepathilongji aphan kechongthuilo.)
Anke Jehu hukumpilo, “Baal aphan man kepijile karcho arni pachethangnon!” Pachethang akam tang-lo,
lapen det adang an Jehu lamthe pachethang-lo. Baal aphan karcho atum an vangpet-lo. Halatum kedo-an ta Baal kardomhem arlo dampet-lo, kecheng ahin pen kejut ahin anta plengchenlo.
Anke karcho atum aphan pe-ri keron ahemphu kurusar aphan Jehu hukum pilo.
Laso aphi Jehu amethang ta kardomhem arlo Rechab asopo Jonadab pen lutdamlo, lapen hadak kedo arat atum an aphan pulo, “Baal aphan karchoji atumsi vangchot-lo pu chinipame nangji lapen

Anke la lapen Jonadab Baal aphan athok kepijisi damlo, la bang 80 amonit atum aphan kardomhem ingtan padotoilo lapen halatum aphan pinkhat-lo: “Latum angbong inutbakta pakat longpopte la apran chepi nangji!”

Jehu athok pajirdet aphi la tonbang lapen achakri atum aphan pulo, “Arlo damra halatum kedo-an aphan pathidamnon; inutbakta pakat longri!” Halatum kesantang anokjir pen damsi kedo-an aphan pathilo, lapen abang arpum an ingtan chethur pon-et-lo. Anke halatum arlo kangthir adim damlo,
hadak kedo kangthir anujok ingtan vandet-lo lapen la me thordut-lo.
Lasonsi latum kangthir anujok lapen kardomhem pavirlo, lapen kardomhem barpi kedo adim pinchongdet-lo, la non puta dolang.
Lasonsi Israel adet Baal aphan karcho Jehu pavirlo.
Bonta la Jeroboam Recho apap charlidunlo, atheke la Bethel lapen Dan along keparjap ser achainong aloso akumlin aphan archosi Israel aso aphan pap anat japonlo.
Jehu aphan
Bonta Jehu aning aklong et pen Israel Arnam
Israel adet adang
Jordan anihang pen, nitur Aroer arong ha Arnon Aroi an, laso arlo Gilead lapen Bashan alongri hadak Gad, Reuben lapen nihang a-Manasseh akhei atum dolo.
Jehu keklem akam lapen la angthin kethe akam-heihei Israel Arecho atum Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
La thisi Samaria along pip-lo, lapen la asopo Jehoahaz la alar recho cholo.
Jehu Samaria along ningkan 28 Israel arecho plangsi pangrilo.
Ahaziah Recho apei Athaliah asopi apran karmut alam arjulongsi, recho ahemtun abangphu kedo-an aphan bangpi kepathiji hukumpilo.

Ahaziah asopo Joash inutvetsi jok-longchot-lo. Akaprek atum along lata thidunlotjong-lo, bonta la ani Jehoram Recho asopi lapen Ahaziah angjir aron Jehosheba si laphan raidet-lo. Bangpi lapen a-obok laphan ponsi Kardomhemthepi mekkejang angdeng arlo ponlo lapen laphan Athaliah arideng pen patujoilo, lalote laphan pathilongledetpo.
Oso aphan Jehosheba ningkan throk lanalo lapen Athaliah Rechopi kepangri ahut laphan Kardomhemthepi arlosi patujoilo.

Bonta throksi aningkan Jehoiada Kurusar recho angphun kerai atum an ahemphu lapen rechohem tonbang ahemphu aphan hang-lo lapen halatum aphan Kardomhemthepi along pavangtoisi hadak la halatum aphan la kemang akam aputhak pachedonsar jisi semepatang-lo. Halatum aphan la Ahaziah Recho asopo Joash paklang-lo,
lapen aber ahukum-heihei halatum aphan pilo: “Nangtum kesang arni kehonji kevang ahut phanthom pen ephan rechohem hon nangji;
akaprek ephan atum ke Sur Anglong along honding nangji lapen kaprek ephan atum ke inghap along kedo akaprek kehon atum anung honding nangji.
Kesang arni kesanglong akam kave pasongni atum ke kardomhem along hondingsi recho aphan rai nangji.
Nanglitum Joash Recho aphan nokjir otdongsi hon nangji lapen la kedam aling dunkri nangji. Nangtum adung kevang aling abangphan pathilot nangpo.”
Jehoiada kepinkhat alam chakri atum kroilo lapen halatum amonit kesang arni kesanglong atum lapen kehon atum la along vangpet-lo.
Kardomhemthepi along kebitang David Recho achir lapen achong la chakri atum aphan pilo,
lapen recho aphan keraijisi nokjir ke-ot amonit atum Kardomhemthepi athengno patonthip-lo.

Anke Joash aphan Jehoiada ingtan japonsi la aphu athak recho aphutup kup-lo lapen laphan epak recho kecho aron-heihei aloh pilo. Anke Jehoiada jangthu patipsi recho kebat pachethang-lo. Rat atum halatum ari chardepsi hang-lo, “Recho achethe padingnang!”
Kehon atum lapen rat atum kehangjo arki Athaliah Rechopi arjulongsi bangpi Kardomhemthepi along armu kechingprom anat damlo.

Jutang ateng recho kemi Kardomhemthepi athengno anujok adung karjapding bangpi thek-long-lo. Laphan chakri atum lapen pong-ut kebut atum kompet-lo lapen rat atum aning cheparongsi pong-ut but-lo lapen hangjolo. Aning chepa-oisi Athaliah amethang ape chingsek-lo, lapen hangserlo, “Pachobei! Pachobei!”

Kardomhemthepi angkang arlo Athaliah aphan kepathiji Jehoiada aninghanghe, lasi ron-armu achakri aphan la hukumpilo, “Kehon atum renni angbong bangpi aphan ingtan pondetnon lapen bangpi aphan keraiji kebor-i abangphan badutame pathilotnon.”
Halatum bangpi aphan phlungsi ha rechohem anat pondet-lo, lapen hadak Losei Anghap along halatum bangpi aphan pathilot-lo.
Jehoiada kurusar Joash aphan recho bat-lo lapen rat atum
Anke rat atum Baal kardom ahem damsi la ingsek dam-et-lo: halatum dovan-heihei lapen kumlin-heihei pangje-ilo, lapen Baal akurusar Mattan, dovan athengno pathilot-lo.
Jehoiada Kardomhemthepi along kaita pahonver,

lapen la, chakri atum recho angphun kerai atum, lapen rechohem kehon atum pen pen recho aphan Kardomhemthepi pen rechohem anat thondunlo, lapen aphi aphi rat atum dunlo. Joash Tonbang Anghap pen lut damlo, lapen amethang recho anghoi chongnilo.
Kedo-an arat atum aning arong pensi plengset-lo, lapen rongsopi ingsamjinlo, athema Athaliah aphan rechohem along pathitang-lo.
Ningkan throksi arta ahut Joash Judah arecho plang-lo.
Israel recho Jehu recho kecho throksi aningkan ahut, Joash Judah arecho plang-lo lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 40 pangrilo. La apei Zibiah, Beersheba arongsopi asor.
La akai arjon kopisi
Tebonseta karchopangtar adim-heihei pavirvelang, lapen halahei along rat atum athok ajir pibomsi methek thorbomlang.
Kurusar aphan Joash hangsi Kardomhemthepi along kaike athok lapen ninghang adan-heihei kepi atangka halatum aphan hukum pisi pabirtitoilo.
Abangphutin akurusar atum la kangduk abangphu kevan atangka arpu ensi laso atangka akenang ahut Kardomhemthepi keselam aphan rim nang-lo.
Bonta Joash Recho kecho ningkan 23 anta kurusar atum Kardomhemthepi selamlelang.

Lasi Jehoiada lapen akaprek akurusar atum aphan hangsi halatum aphan arjulo, “Nanglitum kopi athesi Kardomhemthepi selam-ledet-loma? Non pen apar nanglitum kedeng atangka nanglitum bi longlelo; la nanglitum hodai nangpo, lalote selam longpo.”
Laso alam along kurusar atum chedondunlo lapen Kardomhemthepi selamlelo pu halatum chedondunlo.
Anke Jehoiada isi Asinduk ponlo, adip athak angkok bilo, lapen la dovan adung Kardomhemthepi kelut ar-e anat bilo. Karcho atum kepi atangka an kelut along kedo akurusar atum sinduk arlo thap-etpo.
Sinduk arlo tangka ongdung lote recho achunbang lapen kurusar kethe vangsi rup kedo-an pangjirpo lapen la linpo .
Aphai tokdet aphi halatum Kardomhemthepi akam keklem abangphu aphan rup hodaipo, lapen ajok thengpi akam keklem lapen kekim abangphu atum aphan
arlong kepangni lapen arlong kehong, thengpi kenam, arlongso lapen akaprek kaprek kenangsot aphan an pilo.
Rup aharlung-heihei mate melur kangtip-i ajohton, mate akaprek rup, ser ajohton-heihei aphan laso atangka en-edet-lo.
La kedo-an kam keklem atum aphan lapen keselam along kenangsot ason amung kenangji aphansi enchot-lo.
Kam keklem ahemphu abang angthikpet pensi kepi apot halahei aphai hangjokphlot-lo.
Kechetu adan-heihei lapen pap adan-heihei ke sinduk arlo jokje det-lo; la kurusar atum apharmanlo.
Siria arecho Hazael Gath arongsopi tengkhengsi la kecherai ahut; la Jerusalem ketengkhengji aphan mathalo.
Judah arecho Joash kedo-an la aphusar Jehoshaphat, Jehoram lapen Ahaziah atum lapen lahei along amethang kepidun
Joash Recho keklem akam an Judah Arecho atum Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.

Joash Recho achakri atum la abethurlo, kepathiji mang-lo, lapen halatum banghini Shimeath asopo Jozakar lapen Shomer asopo Jehozabad atum laphan Silla kehirdam atovar Jerusalem anihang anat kepapleng alongle along kekim ahem along pathilot-lo.
Joash aphan David Arongsopi recho athiri alongsi pip-lo, lapen la alar asopo Amaziah si recho cholo.
Judah arecho, Ahaziah asopo Joash recho kecho 23 aningkan ahut Jehu asopo Jehoahazsi Israel arecho plang-lo, lapen la Samaria arong ningkan 17 pangrilo.
La aphrang Jeroboam Recho ason la
Lasi Israel aphuthak
Ansi Jehoahaz
Siria arideng pen kejokji aphan
Bonta latum Jeroboam Recho Israel aphan keja apap che-o-elang, bonta lahei un-an klemthurong-lo ; lapen arnampi Asherah akumlin Samaria along doverlo.

Jehoahaz aron-asong ave-o khang-jang. Bang 50 losei kardon atum, ronhemkonglong hum kep lapen akeng pen kedam atum bang suri kep vet helo, pima Siria arechosi la ahin an halatum aphan longle aduk kepatekung asonsi pavir-et-lo.
Jehoahaz keklem asontin akam la kedam angthin kethe akam-heihei Israel Arecho atum Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
La thisi Samaria along pip-lo, lapen la alar asopo Jehoash si recho cholo.
Judah arecho Joash recho kecho 37 aningkan, Jehoahaz asopo Jehoash Israel arecho plang-lo, lapen la Samaria along ningkan 16 pangrilo.
La ta
Jehoash keklem, la Judah Arecho Amaziah pen ron kechedan angthinkethe akam an Israel Arecho Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
Jehoash thisi recho athiri Samaria along pip-lo, lapen la asopo Jeroboam-II si la alar recho cholo.
Elisha montri padu akeso pen sodet-lo, lapen la kethipo pu ahut Israel arecho Jehoash la along vurdamlo, “O po, O nepo!” hangsi la chirulo. “Nang Israel aphan keraiver abang-lo!”
Thai isi lapen ajehak aso ennon, pusi laphan Elisha hukum pilo. Jehoash halahei enlo,
la pen laphan ke-apjile chesiknon pusi Elisha pulo. Recho abang la klemlo, lapen Elisha ari recho ari athak bat-lo.

Anke montri kepinkhat alam ateng recho abang Siria anat kepangno anghapso ingpulo, “Thai aso ap-non!” Elisha hukumpilo, Recho thai aso apdet aphi montri abang hang-lo, “la pen ajok la Siria aphuthak haidetpo. Aphek along Siria aphan paremretik nangli chedanpo.”
Anke recho aphan Elisha akaprek athai aso pa-entoilo, lapen halahei pen longle athak pa-ap toilo. Recho abang longle athak batai kethom ap-lo, lapen ingtonkok-lo.

La Elisha aphan aning pathilo, lapen la recho aphan pulo, “Nangli batai pho, throk ap nangji apot-lo, anke nangli Siria aphuthak haiverji apot-lo; bonta non nangli halatum aphan batai kethom anbaksi paremchotpo.”
Elisha thilot-lo, lapen pipbup-lo.
Aningkan-vangta Moab akanghu atum Israel adet tengkhengbom.

Ephong, monit kethi ahut inut amonit aphan kepipji pura halatum angbong kanghu atum aphan thek-lok amat kethi arpum Elisha athiri arlo vartekang chorlo, lapen kat-et-lo . Laso kethi arpum Elisha arrepi-heihei kepho dam pen amat cherengthu-aksi arjap-lunlo.
Siria arecho Hazael abong, Jehoahaz recho kecho esek Israel atum aphan chenekpik-lo,
bonta halatum aphan
Siria arecho Hazael kethi ahut la asopo Benhadadsi recho plang-lo.
Anke Israel arecho Jehoash, Benhadad batai kethom paremlo lapen apo Jehoahaz arni Benhadad kecherai arongsopi an che-enthulo.
Israel arecho Jehoahaz asopo Jehoash recho kecho hini aningkan ahut, Joash asopo Amaziah Judah arecho plang-lo,
ningkan 25 arta ahut, lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 29 pangrilo. Apei Jehoaddin, Jerusalem pen.
La
La karchotap adim-heihei parure, lapen monit atum halahei along athok ajir pibomlo lapen mephik thorbomlo.
Amaziah ajakong chepathesi la apo Recho aphan kepathi abangphu atum aphan pathilot-lo.

Bonta, halatum asomar atum aphan la pathithe lapen Moses Aron aloh ahukum atengsi klemlo: “Asomar keklem apap apot api apo aphan pathi nangnelo lapen api apo apap apot asomar atum aphan pathi nangnelo! Inut amonit amethang keklem kepathi apap apotsi la thinangji.”
Ingti Arlok along Amaziah bang surikep Edom aron-aso atum aphan pathilo, la ron chedansi Sela arongsopi cheraisi laphan Joktheel amen irlo, la nonputa dolang.
Anke Israel arecho Jehoash aphan Amaziah apherangke atum chetoilo, hala pen kechedanji aphan.

Bonta Jehoash Recho lasonsi thak-lo: “Ephong Lebanon Anglong kedo bapsudo kedar athengpi aphan isi abirta pilo; ‘nesopo aphan nangsopi penan nangchopinon.’ Marat api hapu anat damsi bapsudo aphan dong-ilo.

Amaziah non nang Edom aso aphan paremlongdet apotsi nangning kechepindak pen plengset-lo. Nang non kelongtang an pen nangning chepangsam non lapen hem dojoinon. Kopisi nang lapen nangrat aphuthak kevirji aphan kesung chonghongbom langma?”
Bonta Amaziah karjujimolo, lasi Jehoash Recho la pen ron kechedanjisi amethang amonit pen pen barlo ha Beth Shemesh, pu Judah along.
Amaziah aron-armu remdet-lo, lapen la aron-aso kedo-anta halatum ahem anat chekat-et-lo.
Amaziah aphan Jehoash bengchek-lo, Jerusalem anat damsi Ephraim Anghap pen atok Anghap an rongsopi apaisong parulo, la ajak-keding ingrup 400 an dolo kephri.
La kedo-an aser, arup kelong an, Kardomhemthepi amar kedo-an, recho akhipuru along kedo-an lahei Samaria pon-et-lo. La ban nepponlo.
Jehoash keklem asontin akam lapen la Judah arecho Amaziah pen ron kechedan angthinkethe alam anta Israel Arecho Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
Jehoash thilot-lo lapen recho athiri Samaria along pipbup-lo, lapen la asopo Jeroboam II si la alar recho cholo.
Israel arecho Jehoash thilot aphi Judah arecho Amaziah ningkan krepho an renglang,
Amaziah keklem akam an Judah Arecho aphurkimo aloh along tok-et-lo.
Amaziah aphan kepathiji aphan Jerusalem along abethurlo, lasi la Lakish arongsopi anat kat-lo, bonta la ahotur laphan hungdunsi laphan pathilot-lo.
La abang arpum ejon alosei athak arthangsi Jerusalem vandet-lo, lapen recho athiri David Arongsopi along pip-lo.
Ansi Judah arat atum la ningkan krethrok arta asopo Uzziah aphan recho bat-lo.
Apo thidet aphi Uzziah puthot Elath cheraithusi kimthulo.
Judah arecho Joash asopo Amaziah recho kecho krepho aningkan ahutsi Jehoash asopo Jeroboam-II Israel arecho plang-lo, lapen la Samaria along ningkan 41 pangrilo.
La
La Israel alongri an che-enthulo, Hamath atovar nirep anat pen Talo Kethi anat anitur an. Bangso alam Gath Hepher pen Amittai asopo Jonah montri pen ajok Israel a-Arnam
Israel arat aso atum kesungpik kechechaknang
Bonta Israel kaike aphan pavirdetji la
Jeroboam-II keklem akam an lapen la angthinkethe aron-heihei kechedan lapen la kopusonsi Damaskas lapen Hamath Israel adet parlo thuloma lahei kedo-an Israel arecho Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
Jeroboam II thilot-lo lapen recho athiri alongsi pip-lo, lapen la asopo Jekaariah la alar recho cholo.
Israel arecho Jeroboam II recho kecho 27 aningkan ahut, Amaziah asopo Uzziah arta ningkan krethrok ahut Judah arecho plang-lo,
lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 52 pangrilo. La apei Jekoliah, Jerusalem pen.
Apo arjan ensi kopima
Bonta karchotap adim-heihei pavirvelang, lapen hadak rat atum athok ajir lapen mephik thordambom-lang.
Uzziah areng si-i akeso pabonsi la akai arjon anta dolo. La amethang ahem chedolo, kedo-an akam pen asopo Jotham det kepangri ahut sang-lo.
Uzziah keklem akam asontin Judah Arecho Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
Uzziah thilot-lo, lapen recho athiri David Arongsopi alongsi pip-lo, lapen la asopo Jothamsi la alar recho cholo.
Judah arecho Uzziah recho kecho 38 aningkan ahut Jeroboam-II asopo Jekaariah Israel arecho plang-lo, lapen la Samaria along chiklo jonthrok pangrilo.
La ta la aphusar atum ason
Jabesh asopo Shallum la abe thursi Jekaariah Recho aphan Ibleam along pathilot-lo lapen la alar recho cholo.
Jekaariah keklem asontin ta Israel Arecho Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
Lasi Jehu Recho aphan
Judah arecho Uzziah Recho kecho 39 aningkan ahut Jabesh asopo Shallum Israel arecho plang-lo lapen la Samaria along chiklo ejon pangrilo.
Gadi asopo Menahem tirzah pen Samaria damlo, lapen Shallum aphan pathilotsi la alar recho cholo.
Shallum keklem asontin la kechorung akam anta Israel Arecho Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.

Menahem Tirzah kecherai ahut Tappuah arongsopi asor laphan chehodai-dedet amat la rongsopi amonit pen pen adung arei alongri anta pavirlap-lo. Aso anghor kedo a-arloso atum aphanta apok siridaksi pathilo.
Judah arecho Uzziah Recho kecho 39 aningkan ahut Gadi asopo Menahem Israel arecho plang-lo, lapen la Samaria along ningkan 10 pangrilo.
La ta
Tiglath Pileser, Assiria arechokethe, Israel tengkheng-lo, lapen det aputhak Menahem ajakong kepangtangji lapen akerap kelongji aphan laphan la rup lin suri 34 pilo.
Menahem laso atangka Israel angbong keplang amonit atum pen anutin rup dum 50 papi bor-ilo. Lasi Tiglath Pileser amethang adet chevoijuilo.
Menahem keklem asontin akam Israel Arecho Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
La thilo lapen pip-lo, lapen la asopo Pekaniah la alar recho cholo.
Judah arecho Uzziah recho kecho 50 aningkan ahut Menahem asopo Pekaniah Israel arecho plang-lo, lapen la Samaria along ningkan hini pangrilo.
Israel atum aphan pap keja abang Nebat asopo Jeroboam Recho akehingno arjan endunsi lata

Pekaniah aron-asong inut achakri Remaliah asopo Pekah Gilead asor, bang 50 amonit pen pen Samaria along rechohem akut chepachong angdeng arlosi along Pekaniah aphan pathilot-lo, lapen la alar recho cholo.
Pekaniah keklem asontin akam Israel Arecho Aphurkimo aloh along tok-et-lo.
Judah arecho Uzziah recho kecho 52 aningkan, Remaliah asopo Pekah Israel arecho plang-lo, lapen la Samaria along ningkan 20 pangrilo.
Israel atum aphan pap keklem kejapon abang Nebat asopo Jeroboam recho akehingno arjan endunsi lata

Pekah recho kecho ahutsi Assiria Rechokethe Tiglath Pileser, Ijon, Abel Beth, Maakah, Janoah, Kedesh, Hazor arongsopi-heihei lapen Gilead, Galili lapen Naphtali alongri-heihei cheraidet-lo, rat atum aphan Assiria adet neppon-et-lo.
Judah arecho Uzziah asopo Jotham recho kecho 20 aningkan ahut Elah asopo Hoshea abang Pekah Recho abethursi laphan pathilot-lo, lapen la alar recho cholo.
Pekah keklem asontin akam an Israel Arecho Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
Israel arecho Remaliah asopo Pekah recho kecho hini aningkan ahut, Uzziah asopo Jotham ningkan 25 arta ahut Judah arecho plang-lo,
lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 16 pangrilo. La apei Zadok asopi Jerusha.
Apo Uzziah arjan ensi
Bonta ahok-he karchotap adim-heihei pavirve, lapen rat atum hadak athok-ajir pibomsi mephik anta thorbomlo. Jothamsi la Kardomhemthepi Anirep anghap kimlo.
Jotham keklem asontin akam an Judah Arecho Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
La recho kecho ahutsi Siria arecho Rezin lapen Israel arecho Pekah kechengsi aphong Judah adet patengkheng jisi
Jotham thilo lapen recho athiri David Arongsopi alongsi pip-lo, lapen la asopo Ahaz si la alar recho cholo.
Israel arecho, Remaliah asopo Pekah recho kecho 17 aningkan ahut Jotham asopo Ahaz si Judah arecho plang-lo,
ningkan 20 arta ahut, lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 16 pangrilo. La aphusar David Recho akeme a-arjan en-esi; la Arnam
lapen Israel arecho a-arjansi enlo. Israel atum kethe ahut
Inglong-heihei along ahok-he karchotap adim-heihei lapen thengpi abin kedo alongtin Ahaz thok-lo lapen mephik thorlo.
Siria arecho Rezin lapen Israel arecho Pekah Jerusalem tengkheng-lo, lapen la kompet-lo, bonta Ahaz aphan parem un-edet-lo.
(Halaso ahut Edom arecho Elath arongsopi che-enthudet-lo, lapen hadak kedo a-Judia atum aphan nangphlung et-lo. Elath along Edom aso atum dothipsi nonpu anta hadak dobomlo.)
Laso abirta hadak Ahaz, Assiria arechokethe aphan lolo: “Neli nangli kangduknei abanlo. Vang-ra neliphan Siria lapen Israel arecho atum arideng pen nepajoktha, latum neliphan tengkheng-lo.”
Kardomhemthepi lapen rechohem khipuru pen ser, rup Ahaz ponsi Rechokethe aphan isi adan lolo.
Ahaz Recho kechoningri thaksi Tiglath Pileser, Damaskas abethursi aron-aso pen barlo, lapen la cheraidetsi Rezin Recho aphan pathilot-lo, lapen rat aso aphan Kir anat ponsi beng-lo.

Rechokethe Tiglath Pileser aphan kechetong damjisi Damaskas anat Ahaz Recho kedam ahut, hadak la dovan thek-long-lo, lapen Uriah kurusar aphan pachevoisi la asonthot arjan (angrup achak) aboron alirchi-alircha anta palang-et-lo.
Lasi la asonthot Uriah isi adovan selamlo lapen Ahaz kechevoi aphrang la selampatang-lo.
La Damaskas pen nangkecherui ahut dovan kekimtang Ahaz thek-long-lo,
