Alangli bang adet adovan lapen karchotap adim-heihei pavedet-lo, kangthir a-arlong archok-heihei beng-et-lo, lapen Asherah arnampi akumlin-heihei chor-et-lo.
La Judah arat aso aphan halatum aphusar a-Arnam
Pima la karchotap adim-heihei lapen mephik kethor adovan-heihei Judah kedo-an arongsopi along pen pavir-et-lo, la kepangri esek det ingsamjin pen dolong-lo.
Laso ahut alangli Judah arongsopi-heihei apaisong kimlo, lapen penang an aningkan det ron avedet-lo, pima alangliphan
Alangli Judah arat aphan pulo, “Kangkirthip un kedonghet un anghap kedo apaisong-heihei, lapen hemchardon-heihei eli kim lonang. Etum det khang unlo, pima elitum a-Arnam

Judah ahin pen Asa Recho suri pharo kethom armu, chong lapen chir kedo lapen Benjamin pen bang suri 280 amonit chong lapen chir kedo lapen thai ke-apthek aron-armu dolo. Kedo-an ta angthin thedung atum lapen kecharlitang atumlo.
Inut Sudan-aso amen Zerah pu abang lak 10 aron-armu pen lapen ronhemkonglong hum 300 vansi Judah ketengkhengjisi Mareshah adim an vang-lo.
La pen ron kechedanjisi Asa barlo lapen pu pu ta Mareshah adung Jephathah Arlok along adim chedo-rep-lo.
La a-Arnam
Asa lapen Judah aso atum hala-tum aphan ketengkhengdam ahut
Asa lapen la aron-asong atum latum aphi aphi ha Gerar an hungdunlo. Lasi ongdung a-Sudan aso atum thinang-lo, lapen kechedanji aron-armu arjap-un-edet-lo. Latum aphan
Anke Gerar adung-arei arongsopi latum pavir undet-lo, pima hadak kedo arat atum
Halatum ajehak biresak Kevi amukam tengkhengsi ongdung abiresak lapen aka-ut cherailo. Ansi latum Jerusalem chevoilo.
Obed asopo Azariah aphu-thak Arnam akarjong vang-lo,
Alangli Asa Recho aphan kechetongjisi alangli damlo. Alangli hang-lo, “Nelilam arjutha, Asa Recho, lapen Judah lapen Benjamin arat kedo-an! Nanglitum
Penang an aningkan Israel atum ahok Arnam ave pin pen dolo, halatum aphan kethanji abang kurusar avedet-lo, lapen Aron ta avelo.
Bonta kesung vang-lote halatum Israel Arnam
Halaso ahut jokvan pen chedam-chevang longle, pima adet tinta akesung dorep-lo.
Isi adet akaprek adet aphan chenek-lo, lapen erongsopi akaprek arongsopi aphan chenek-lo, pima Arnamsi halatum aphuthak lapuson akesung vanlo.
Bonta nanglitum chepangtangrak-ra ning bibedetnon. Nanglitum keklem akam apot nong-e nangpidetji.”

Obed asopo Azariah kemontri alam Asa arjulongsi, la aning arong-olo. Judah lapen Benjamin alongle along kedo akumlin an lapen la kecherai Ephraim anglong along arongsopi-heihei akumlin pavir-et-lo. Kardomhem atikup along kedo
Ephraim, Manasseh lapen Simeon pen ongdung arat atum Asa anatsi vangpet-lo, lapen la adetsi dodunlo, pima la along
Latum Jerusalem along Asa Recho kecho 15 aningkan kethom achiklo chingrumpet-lo.
Halatum kethidam kelong amar pen
Halatum aning aklong pen, karjong ajakong kedo-an pen lapen halatum aphusar atum a-Arnam
Badu ariso tame, kesar tame, pinso-arlo tame,
Halatum kechejok ateng dopo pura
Judah arat-aso an aning arong-lo, pima laso akechejok latum aning aklong pensi klemlo. Halatum
Asa Recho aphi Maakah aphan Pei-rechopi anghoi pen pasuntuk-lo, pima bangpi Asherah arnampi akumlin paselamlo. Asa kumlin chorpetsi, chordak-dak-lo, lapen la-heihei Kidron Arlok along me keidut-lo.
Det adang kedo-an karchotap adim-heihei Asa pavir-et-e seta akai dingpi an alangli
Alangli po Abijah
Alangli recho kecho ningkan 35 an det ron avedet-lo.
Judah arecho Asa recho-kecho 36 aningkan, Israel arecho Baasha Judah adet tengkheng-lo, lapen tovar kekhangjisi Ramah apaisong kimlo.
Lasi Kardomhemthepi lapen rechohem akhipuru-heihei arup, aser, Asa ponsi la ha Siria arecho Benhadad aphan Damaskas pen losi laso abirta pilo:
Elitum apo atum ason elitum ta chelangpet-lonang. Laso arup, aser ke nangliphan isi adanlo. Non lasi Israel arecho Baasha pen kechelang nangli che-onon, anke la nelongle pen aron-asong cheponpo.

Asa alam along Benhadad chedondunlo, lapen Israel arongsopi ketengkheng jisi aron apinpo lapen halatum aron-armu toilo. Latum Ijon, Dan, Abel Beth Maakah, lapen kecho amar kedo apuru Naphtali arongsopi-heihei an cherai-et-lo.
Keplangtang alam Baasha Recho arjulongsi, la Ramah kekim ingtonkok-lo, lapen akam obup-lo.

Anke Asa Recho Judah pen amonit kedo-an pangrumsi Ramah along Baasha ke-en a-arlong-heihei lapen athengpi-heihei keparoi-etji aphan hukumpilo, lapen latum lahei Geba lapen Mizpah arongsopi apaisong kekimji aphan enlo.
Halaso ahut Hanani montri, Asa Recho along damlo, lapen pulo, “Pima nang nang Arnam
Sudan lapen Libia atum ronhemkonglong-heihei pen ongdung aron-armu lapen losei kardon atum avema? Bonta nang
Pirthe adang aputhak
Laso alam Asa aphan aning pathisi la montri aphan ingchin arri pen ingnang-lo. Laso ahut pen amat Asa ajehak arat aphan pasungpik-lo.
Asa recho-kecho kechengpen ha kejut an keklem akam Judah lapen Israel Arecho-atum Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
Asa recho-kecho 39 aningkan ahut la akeng keso cholongsi akeng kengkokjok-lo; bonta la kerap akelongji aphan
Ningkanhini aphi la thilot-lo, lapen David Arongsopi along la amethang aphan kechehong arong athiri alongsi pip-lo.
Kepip ahut halatum la abang arpum aphan mosala, jangthunempru-heihei sik-lo, lapen la kethi aning duksi me kethor abui pathelo.
Jehoshaphat apo Asa alar la recho cholo, lapen Israel abethursi la ajakong chepangtang-lo.
La Judah apaisong kedo arongsopi-heihei along lapen Judia arong-heihei anat ron-asong bilo, lapen Asa kecherai Ephraim alongri bithe ta bilo.
Jehoshaphat aphan
La apo a-Arnam aphan ingduk-lo, Arnam ahukum-heihei kroilo, lapen Israel atum keklem akam klemkledet-lo.
si Jehoshaphat aphan Judah adet adang aputhak pathirdet-lo, lapen rat atum alanglilong dan-heihei pavanpilo, anke la plangsi man atheng paplang-lo.
La
Alangli recho-kecho kethom aningkan Judah arongsopi-heihei along kepathanjisi lahei amonit toilo: Benhail, Obadiah, Jekaariah, Nethanel lapen Mikaiah.

Halatum along bang sirkep a-Levi atum lapen bang hini akurusar atum dunlo. Levi atum ke Shemaiah, Nethaniah, Zebadiah, Asahel, Shemiramoth, Jehonathan, Adonijah, Tobijah, lapen Tobadonijah; lapen kurusar atum ke Elisham lapen Jehoram.
Latum
Adung-arei adet atum Jehoshaphat pen ron kechedanji aphan
Ajehak Philistia atum Jehoshaphat aphan ongdung arup lapen akaprek adan-heihei ta vanpilo, lapen ajehak Arab atum jon 7,700 abiresak lapen jon 7,700 abi vanpilo.
Lasi Jehoshaphat ajakong the ponbomlo. Judah bithe-bitha la apaisong arongsopi-heihei kimlo,
hadak ongdung kecho-amar bilo.
Jerusalem along alangli anong keche-thanghu achakrisi bilo,
halatum aro atengsi bilo. Adnah ke Judah aro aron apinpolo, lapen la bang suri pharokethom aron-aso la aber dolo.
Adun aphai angthun ke Jehohanan, la along Laknira bang suri 80 aron-aso dolo,
lapen adun ke Amasiah, la Zikri asopo along lakni do (Amasiah ke amethang aning kehang pen
Benjamin aro aron-asong apinpo ke Eliada, la inut anong kechethang aron-asolo, lak ni amonit chong-heihei lapen thai-heihei kedo atum apinpolo.
La adun apinpo ke Jehozabad, bang suri 180 amonit do, ron aphan chesikpame atumlo.
Lahei amonit atum recho aphan Jerusalem alongsi ingduk-lo, la pen apar la ajehak aron-asong aphan Judah angbong paisong arongsopi-heihei along bilo.
Judah arecho Jehoshaphat plangsi anong chethangpik ahut, la ahemtun abangphu angbong pen Israel Arecho Ahab ahemtun angbong pache-en pachedolo.

Penang an aningkan aphi Ahab along kevurdamjisi Jehoshaphat, Samaria arongsopi damlo. Jehoshaphat lapen la along nangkedun atum aphan man kepijisi kecho aphan Ahab abiresak lapen achainong ake-ongdung that pilo. Gilead along Ramoth arongsopi ketengkhengji aphan la Jehoshaphat aphan kepakroiji bor-ilo.
Alangli arjulo, “Ramoth ketengkhengji aphan nangli nelilong nangdunjima?”
Jehoshaphat thak-lo, “Nangli damlote nelita chesikding-lo, lapen neliron-armuta-lo. Nelitum nanglilong nang jalangdunpo.”
Anke alangli pulo, “Bonta kechengsi eli
Lasi Ahab montri atum aphan hang-lo, latum bang 400 do lapen latum aphan arjulo, “Ne Ramoth damsi tengkheng nangjima mate nangnema?”
La tengkhengnon, halatum thak-lo. “Arnamsi nangliphan pahaipo.”
Bonta Jehoshaphat arjulo, “Dak
Ahab thak-lo, “Ladak inut dolang, Imlah asopo Mikaiah. Bonta ne laphan langselet-lo, pima la nephan kaita akeme ason montritrelo; la kaita kehingno si montrilo.”
Lapuson nangli puri! Jehoshaphat thak-lo.
Lasi Ahab Recho inut aban aphan hangsi Mikaiah aphan non amat kepavanji aphan pulo.
Banghini arechota halatum recho achoi chingchoisi sarnung angsong halatum amethang anghoi chongnirep-lo, la Samaria anghap angtanchot, lapen halatum angno kedo-an montri atum montrijolo.
Halatum angbong inut Chenaanah asopo Zedekiah, ingchin anu selamsi Ahab aphan pulo, “La pensi nangli Siria pen ron chedanpo lapen halatum aphan parempamepo.”
Akaprek amontri atumta lasonthotsi ningjelo. “Ramoth abe thurra damnon, lapen nangli haivekpo.” pusi halatum pulo. “
Halabangso ahut Mikaiah aphan kepahang damtoi aban abang laphan pulo, “Kedo-an amontri atum recho kehaiji alamsi montrilo, lapen nanglita isinatsi akeme ningjepo.”
Bonta Mikaiah thak-lo, “
La Ahab Recho angno kecheklang ahut, laphan recho arjulo, “Mikaiah, Jehoshaphat Recho lapen ne Ramoth tengkheng nangjima nangnema?”
Tengkheng non! Mikaiah thak-lo,. “Nangli haiji.
Bonta Ahab thak-lo, “Nang nephan
Mikaiah thak-lo, “biresak atum kevi abang kave asonsi Israel aron-armu atum inglong adang bithe kepratsei neli thek-long-lo. Lapen
Jehoshaphat aphan Ahab pulo, “Neli nangthan lok ke, la kaita nephan akeme ason montritrelo; la kaike akehingno saidelo!”
Mikaiah ningjebomlo, “Non
arjulo, ‘Ahab aphan komatsi pachobeidampo, anke la dampo lapen Ramoth along thidamlotpo?’ Ajehak apherangke atum eson alam pulo, lapen akaprek atum akaprek ason ningjelo,
inut akarjong nangbarsi
Karjong thak-lo, ‘Ne damsi Ahab amontri kedo-an aphan kechobei alam paningjepo.’”
Mikaiah keningje pajut-lo! “Lahelo keplang nangjilo.
Anke Zedekiah montri Mikaiah anat arludamsi amahang ardep-lo, lapen arjulo, “Komantusi
Nang ajehak arlo angdeng anung anat kechepatudam ahut thek-longpo, Mikaiah thak-lo.
Anke Ahab Recho achakri inut aphan hukumpilo, “Mikaiah aphan nepchek-ra rongsopi a-Govornor, Amon lapen Joash Rechoso along pondet-non.
Halatum laphan kebengchekjile thannon, lapen ne nangchirui pamemetik an him lapen lang laphan pichotnon.”
Nangli jongsi nang-chiruilong pame lote, Mikaiah pu-thip-lo, “Tangte
Anke Israel arecho Ahab lapen Judah arecho Jehoshaphat, Gilead along Ramoth arongsopi ketengkheng jisi damlo.
Jehoshaphat aphan Ahab pulo, “Elitum kedam ahut neli arje chepatupo, bonta nanglike recho apele chingthang non.” Lasi Israel arecho arje chepatusi ron damlo.
Siria arecho aronhemkonglong apinpo aphan hukumpilo, Israel arecho pen apar badu aphanta tengkheng-ri.
Lasi latum Jehoshaphat aphan thek-longsi la Israel arecholo pu kadokaveta mathapet-lo, lapen laphan ketengkheng jisi halatum chetevarlo. Bonta Jehoshaphat hangserlo, lapen laphan
Ronhemkonglong apinpo thek-long-lo, la Israel arecho kali, lasi latum laphan kephlung ingtonkok-lo.

Chininepin pen inut a-Siria aron-aso Ahab Recho tam-achoi kechechu adak along thai pen apchok-lo. “Nereng sodak-lo!” pusi la aronhemkonglong kardon abangphan hangserlo. “Chelangra ron pen nephan ingtan neponnon!”
Ron kechedan sik muchot ahut Ahab Recho aronhemkonglong athak charchaksi Siria atum anat pangnoding-lo. Arni kangsam ahut la thilot-lo.
Judah arecho Jehoshaphat Jerusalem along rechohem thangthesi nangchelelo.
Inut amontri, Hanani asopo Jehu damsi recho aphan chetong-lo, lapen alangliphan pulo, “Kehingno atum aphan kerapdun mesenlo putong nangli kemathama lapen
Nangli keklem akam
Jehoshaphat Recho Jerusalem along do seta la rat atum angbong dambom, nitur anat Beersheba pen ha Ephraim anglong arong angchun anirep anat, la rat atum aphan halatum aphusar atum a-Arnam
Alangli Judah apaisongkedo arongsopi alongtin along kangsai abang bat-lo:
“Kangsai ahut cherepame nangji; nangtum monit ajakong aputhak-le keklem kali, bonta
aphan man pinon, lapen kechere pen klemnon, pima etum a-Arnam
Jerusalem along Jehoshaphat do seta, Levi atum, kurusar atum, alangli pen ajehak arlengkethe atum aphan
Halatum aphan alangli lahei alam pinkhat-lo: “
Mane nangdon-nangrap rongsopi pen lam-kepho alam mate aron mate hukum kangdi alam vanlote, lam karju ahut halatum kosonsi kedo nangjima pacherera halatum aphan pinkhatnon, anke latum

Amariah kurusar kethesi dhorom alam an aputhak kerip ajakong dopo, lapen Ishmael asopo Zebadiah, Judah a-Govornorsi rat atum an kerip ajakong dopo. Levi atum ke kangsaitang alam ateng klemloma klemklema langdun nangpo. Nangthin chepathera lahei kepinkhat an klemnon; lapen ke ahokpet anat-le
Penang an aphi Moab lapen Ammon aron-armu chelangpet pen a-Meuni atum Judah tengkheng-lo.

Ajehak apherangke atum vangsi Jehoshaphat Recho aphan parjulo: “Isi ongdung aron-armu Edom atum nangliphan ketengkhengjisi Talo Kethi ahin pen vang-lo. Halatum Hazazon Tamar cheraitang-lo.” (La Engedi akaprek amenlo.)
Jehoshaphat pheresi
Judah arongsopitin pen
halatum lapen rat atum Jerusalem Kardomhemthepi atikup-hini along chingrumpet-lo. Jehoshaphat Recho halatum along damsi arjap damlunlo,
lapen asekethe pen ardomlo, “Nephusar atum a-Arnam

Nangli netum a-Arnam. Nanglirat aso Israel atum laso alongle along kevang ahut, Nangli ladak kedo arat aphan phlung-et-lo, lapen Nanglijirpo Abraham aso-asu aphan kaike halatum kepacheraijisi pidet-lo.
Halatum ladak dolo, lapen Nangliphan man kepijisi ehum a-Kardomhemthepi kimlo, halatum chinilo,

jongsi latum aphan kevir pen aduk pilote, ron , avur, akhim tame, anke halatum vangsi Nangliphan karcho adim laso a-Kardomhemthepi angno arjappo. Halatum akesung ahut halatum Nangliphan ardom longpo, lapen halatum aphan arjusi pajokpo.”

Non Ammon, Moab, lapen Edom arat atum nelitum aphan tengkhengtang-lo. Nephusar atum Ijip adet pen kevang ahut Nangli halatum aphan lahei adet pavurlongledet-lo, lasi neliphusar atum latum adung-arei akung-kungsi damlo, lapen halatum aphan pavirvedet-lo.
Bonta latum netum aphan lason klemlo.

Nangli netum a-Arnam! Halatum aphan aduk pinon, pima netum aphan nang ketengkheng ke-ongdung aron-armu angno netum kecheklangji aphan nahok penta akerap longlelo. Netum kopisi keklem nangjima chechininedet-lo, bonta netum Nangli pensi akerap chohang-lo.
Judah amonit kedo-an halatum apiso-aso penpen Kardomhemthepi along arjapphrong-lo.
akar-jong inut a-Levi aphuthak nanghirlo, la rat armu alongsi dolo. La amen Jahaziel, Jekaariah asopo; la Asaph aro bangphulo, lapen Asaph pen, Mattaniah, Jeiel, lapen Benaiah aso-asulo.
Jahaziel pulo, “Recho lapen Judah lapen Jerusalem arat kedo an,
Ziz atovar halatum kevang ahut halatum aphan penap tengkhengnon. Jezreel adung ingnam arong anat kedam a-arlok angchun along nanglitum halatum aphan chetongpo.
Nanglitum laso aron aphan chedan nangnedetji. Nanglitum adim-heihei chedorepnon, lapen inghongnon; nanglitum thek-longpo,
Anke Jehoshaphat Recho angphun patongkisi, amahang longle papholo, lapen alanglilong kedo-an arat atumta alanglilong angphun patongkilo, lapen
Kohath lapen Korah aro a-Levi atum arjapphrongsi jasemet kehangser pen Israel a-Arnam
Puthot adap rat atum ingnam arong Tekoa adung damlo. Halatum kedam pangchengsi laso alam pen Jehoshaphat halatum aphan pulo, “Judah lapen Jerusalem amonit atum! Nang Arnam
Rat pen chingkidet aphi, ajehak alunsepo atum aphan halatum kangthir akam ahut kechingthang ape pachingthangji aphan recho hukumpilo, lapen “
Latum kelun pangchengsi ketengkheng aron-armu aphan
Ammon aso atum lapen Moab aso atum, Edom aso aron-armu aphan tengkheng-lo, lapen la pavirdet khangjang-lo, lapen halatum angbongta lahin lahin ron pachedan seroilo.
Judah aron-armu atum sangti ajo ahemchardon lesi halatum hotur aphan lang-lo, lapen halatum longle athak kethi ketiche thek-long-lo. Inut bakta jok-longledet-lo.

Jehoshaphat lapen la aron-asong mar ke-endamjisi damlo, lapen latum ongdung achainong , kecho-amar, pe-ri lapen akaprek adorkeso amar long-lo. Lahei kethipon amar latum kepangrumji aphan latum nithom en nang-lo, bonta hadak lapu-an ake-ong latum asontin pon-et un-edet-lo.
Phli arni halatum Berakah Arlok along chingrumsi
Jehoshaphat aron-asong-heihei kehai pen Jerusalem chevoilo, pima halatum ahotur aphan
Halatum rongsopi kele ahut latum Kardomhemthepi kumbeleng lapen pong-ut arki penpen lutdamlo.
Kosonsi Israel ahotur aphan
lasi Jehoshaphat ingsamjin pen pangrilo, lapen ahintin pen ta Arnam laphan pajokvanlo.
Arta ningkan 35 ahutsi Jehoshaphat Judah arecho plang-lo lapen Jerusalem along ningkan 25 pangrilo. La apei Shilhi asopi Azubah.
Apo Asa asonsi la kopima
bonta karchotap adim-heihei pavir-et-edet-lo. Rat atum aphusar atum a-Arnam aphan aning aklong pen archochedet-lo.
Jehoshaphat Recho kecho kecheng pen kejut an la keklem ason an Hanani asopo Jehu Aphurkimo aloh along tok-et-lo, la Israel arecho atum Aphurkimo pabeng-lo.
Ephong Israel arecho Ahaziah kehingno akam keklem-abang, pen Judah arecho Jehoshaphat pajirpolo.
Eziongeber along latum talopi kedam atelongpi-heihei kimlo.
Bonta Dodavahu asopo Eliezer, Mareshah pu abang Jehoshaphat aphan pacherelo, “Pima nangli Ahaziah pen kepajirpo apot nangli kekimtang an
Jehoshaphat thilot-lo, lapen David Arongsopi recho athiri along pip-lo, lapen la asopo Jehoramsi la alar recho cholo.
Judah arecho Jehoshaphat asopo Jehoram akorte bang throk do: Azariah, Jehiel, Jekaariah, Azariahu, Mikael lapen Shephatiah.

Latum apo latum aphan ongdung aser-arup lapen kaprek kecheraime adorkeso amar pilo, lapen latum abangphutin aphanta Judah apaisongkedo arongsopi along bisi pachehemphulo. Bonta Jehoram abang sokleng apotsi Jehoshaphat laphan apoton pinchong-lo.
Jehoram det chepahemphu pame ahut la akorte kedo-an aphan lapen ajehak Israel aban aphan pathilo.
Ningkan 32 arta ahutsi Jehoram recho plang-lo, lapen Jerusalem along ningkan nerkep pangrilo.
La Ahab Recho lapen akaprek kehingno a-Israel arecho atum a-arjan endunlo, pima la Ahab asopi angbong inut aphan piso pangrilo. La
bonta David aro aphan kepavirdetji
Jehoram Recho kecho ahut, Edom, Judah abethurlo, lapen isi kejok adet plang-lo.
Lasi Jehoram lapen la achakri ronhemkonglong penpen damsi Edom tengkheng-lo. Hadak Edom aron-armu latum aphan kompet-lo, bonta ajo ahut latum kat-longsi chepajok-lo.
Halaso ahut, pen amat Edom, Judah ator donangnedet-lo. Laso ahutsi Libnah arongsopi thurlo, pima Jehoram aphusar atum a-Arnam
La Judah alongle kangtui adim-heihei along karchotap adim kimlo, Judah lapen Jerusalem arat-atum aphan
Elijah montri Jehoram aphansi isi aloh lolo, la lasonsi tok-lo, “Nangphusar David a-Arnam

La kalilesi nang Israel arecho atum a-arjan enlo lapen Judah lapen Jerusalem arat aphan Arnam anat kekroikre anat jalo, la Ahab lapen la aphi atum Israel aphan kepakroikre anat keja asonthot-lo. Nangphan kememuchot amonit nangkorte kedo-an aphanta nang pathi-et-lo.
La athesi
Nangmethang amat ke nangphek akeso cholongsi arnivangta nang hingnobompo.”
Ajehak a-Philisitia lapen Arab atum, ajehak Sudan atum adungsi talo akung dolo. Latum aphan
Latum Judah tengkheng-lo, rechohem amar thipon-et-lo. Lapen Ahaziah la aso akebi pen apar recho apiso an lapen asomar an, bengpon-et-lo.
Laso aphi recho aphek along
Ningkan hini anbak keso nangkhaibomsi padu recho sopik pen thinang-lo. La arat atum la aphusar atum aphan keklem asonthot laphan amebui pipedet-lo.

Jehoram ningkan 32 arta ahutsi recho plang-lo, lapen Jerusalem along ningkan 8 pangrilo. La kethi ahut baduta aning dukdedet-lo. Laphan halatum David Arongsopi along pip-lo, bonta recho athiri along kali.
Aso akebisi Ahaziah pen apar ajehak Arab atum thiparohumsi Jehoram asomar kedo-an aphan pathilap-lo. Lasi non Jerusalem arat atum apo alar Ahaziah aphansi recho bat-lo.
Ahaziah arta ningkan 22 ahutsi recho plang-lo, lapen ningkan isi Jerusalem along pangrilo.
Ahaziah ta Ahab Recho ahemtun a-arjansi endunlo, thangbakma, la apei Athaliah ke Ahab Recho asopi lapen Israel arecho Omri asupisi laphan parelo lapen laphan kehingno anat jalo.
La
Halatum kepare arjusi la Israel arecho Joram pen chelangsi Siria arecho Hazael abe ronthurlo. Ron-armu Gilead along Ramoth pu adim chedanlo, lapen ron along Joram areng sodak-lo.
La Jezreel arongsopi anat areng keso pen chepamejisi chevoilo, lapen Ahaziah hadak laphan kelangdamjisi vurdamlo.
Ahaziah aphan kepavirjisi
Arnam ahukum Jehu laso ahemtun aphuthak keponbom ahut, la Judah ajalin along lapen Ahaziah along kevurdun a-osa atum chetong-lo. La kedo-an aphanta Jehu pathi-et-lo.
Ahaziah aphan rilo, lapen la Samaria along kechepatu thek-long-lo. Laphan Jehu along halatum pondet-lo, lapen pathilot-lo. Bonta
Det kepangriji aphan Ahaziah ahemtun pen inutbak abangphuta avedet-lo.
Ahaziah Recho apei Athaliah asopo aphan pathitang-lo, pu abirta karjulong amat pen bangpi recho ahemtun abangphu kedo-an aphan kepathi-etji ahukum pilo.

Ahaziah angjir pabeng, Jehosheba, bangpi Jehoiada pu amen inut akurusar aphansi penan dolo. Bangpi Ahaziah asomar angbong inut Joash aphan pajoksi kethi nangji recho asomar atum pen pondetsi laphan patujoilo. Lapen Kardomhemthepi kedo angdeng arlo lanalo. Laphan patujoisi, bangpi laphan Athaliah arideng pen pajok-lo.
Ningkan throk Athaliah Rechopi kecho ahut la chepatu nang-lo.

Ningkan throk inghongsi kurusar Jehoiada kam keklem nangji aporlo pusi la mathathip-lo. La bangpho ron-armu achakri atum pen kechejok aloh Jeroham asopo Azariah, Jehoahanan asopo Ishmael, Obed asopo Azariah, Adaiah asopo Maaseiah, lapen Zikri asopo Elishaphat atum pen chepathik-lo.
Latum Judah arongsopi an damlo, lapen Levi atum aphan lapen aro ajalin kedo-an halatum aphan Jerusalem van-et-lo.

Kadokave Kardomhemthepi along chingrumlo, lapen hadak latum recho asopo Joash pen kechejok alo chepathik-lo. Halatum aphan Jehoiada pulo, “Kethilot arecho asopo ladak dolo! David aso-asu si recho cholongji pu
Laheisi cheklem nangpo. Kesang arni kurusar atum lapen Levi atum kam angdeng kecheklem ahut, phanthom pen ephan ke Kardomhem anghap-heihei ton nangpo.
Akaprek ephan bang ke rechohem tonpo, lapen ahin atum an ke putah anghap along dopo. Kadokave arat anke Kardomhem atikup along chingrumpo.
Adeng kedo akurusar atum lapen a-Levi atum pen apar baduta Kardomhem lut longlelo. Latum lut-longji pima, latum chepangthir-tang-lo, bonta ahin arat atum ke
Levi atum recho adung arei halatum kesattang anokjir pen arjappet nangpo lapen recho kedam aling dun nangpo. Badutame Kardomhemthepi arlo kelutji kebor-i abangphan pathilotpo.”
Levi lapen Judah arat atum Jehoiada kepinkhat-heihei klemlo, kesang arni pinso atum adim avedet seta halatum aphan toitedet-lo. Lasi hukum kepi atum kam kevang lapen kedam atum aphan seta lang-lo.
chakri atum aphan Kardomhemthepi along kebi David Recho achin lapen achong-heihei Jehoiada pilo.
La Recho aphan keparaijisi pinso atum aphan Kardomhemthepi athengno adung arei kesat-tang anokjir pen patonding-lo,

anke Joash aphan Jehoiada japonlo. Aphu athak recho aphutup kup-lo, lapen recho kecho ason aloh pilo. Lasonsi laphan recho paplang-lo. Jehoiada kurusar lapen la asopo Joash aphan jangthu patip-lo, lapen abangphutinta, “Recho achethe padingnang!” pusi hang-lo.
Recho aphan kehangjo ase Athaliah arjulong-lo, lasi bangpi Kardomhemthepi rat atum kechingrum adim anat damserak-serak-lo.

Hadak recho kemi kardomhem amangho along recho aphan kepanong a-archok along karjap lapen adung arei ron-armu achakri atum lapen pong-ut kebut atum kekompet bangpi thek-long-lo. Kedo-an arat atum aning arong pen hang-lo lapen pong-ut but-lo, lapen kardomhem alunse atum halatum kelun-i ajohton ketalon jalo. Bangpi aning ke-oi pen ape chingseksi hangserlo, “Chobeilo! Chobeilo!”

Athaliah aphan kardomhem angkang Jehoiada kepathiji aning-hanghe, lasi ron-armu achakri aphan hangsi pulo, “Tonbang atum karjap-ren adak pen bangpi aphan ingtan pondet non, lapen bangpi aphan kepajokji kebor-i abangphan pathilotnon.”
Latum bangpi aphan rechohem an phlung-lo, lapen hadak Losei Anghap along latum bangpi aphan pathilot-lo.
Jehoiada kurusar ta Joash Recho long-lo lapen laphan rat atum chelangdunsi latum
Anke latum Baal akardomhem sansi la phridam-et-lo. Latum hadak kedo adovan-heihei lapen akumlin-heihei theng-rairaisi dovan athengno Baal akurusar Mattan aphan pathilot-lo.
Kurusar atum lapen Levi atum aphan Kardomhemthepi akam arpu Jehoiada pilo. Latum David Recho kepi akam adeng klemnangpo lapen Moses aron atengsi latum latum
Mane aron ateng pen kangthirthe doma la kepalangjisi Kardomhem anghap-heihei along Jehoiada tonbang atum patonlo.

Ron-armu achakri atum arlengkethe, ban atum lapen ahin kedo-an arat atum Jehoiada along chejengduntoisi recho aphan Kardom-hemthepi pen rechohem vanlo. Latum abinong anghap pen lutsi recho amethang recho anghoi chongnilo.
Kadokave arat atum aning arong pen plengset-lo, lapen Athaliah aphan pathilot aphi rongsopi ingsamlo.
Joash ningkan throksi arta ahutsi Judah arecho plang-lo, lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 40 pangrilo.
La apei Jebiah, Beersheba arongsopi pen Jehoiada kurusar rengtik an la
Joash Recho aphan Jehoiada piso banghini ingvaipilo, lapen latum laphan pinsomar lapen arlosomar mahang pathekpilo.
La recho chobom ahut, Kardom-hemthepi keselamthuji aphan chesik-lo.

La kurusar atum lapen Levi atum an aphan Judah arongsopi an padamsi rat kedo-an pen Kardomhemthepi ningkan esek keselamji aphan dorphlup atangka keparungji ahukumpilo. Halatum aphan la paprapjin pen klemnangji pusi pulo, bonta Levi atum paderlo,
lasi halatum ajalin Jehoiada aphan hangsi athe kopima arjulo, “
(Kehingno a-arloso , Athaliah atoi atum Kardomhemthepi phangnolo lapen kangthir amar Baal aphan karchoji enlo.)
Tangka kerungji aphan isi Asinduk keselamji si Levi atum aphan recho hukumpilo, lapen la kardomhem anghap along pabilo.
Latum Arnam aban Moses kejejangtang ajo kerungcheng asonsi abangphutinta
Laso akam rat lapen halatum ajalin atum aphan aningpadok-lo, lapen halatum amidu atangka vansi sinduk la pen paplengset-lo.

Arnivangta Levi atum sinduk la hemphu recho aban along ponlo. La plengset lote recho achunbang lapen kurusarkethe atoi tangka ensi sinduk adimthot voisi la bi thupo. Lapen lasonsi latum ongdung atangka pangrumlong-lo.
Recho lapen Jehoiada, Kardom-hemthepi kekim ahemphu aphan tangka pipo, lapen latum arlong kerokbang lapen thengpi akam klembang atum lapen ingchin akam klembang atum keselamji aphan rong-lo.
Kam keklem atum kedo-an klem chepaduk-lo, lapen latum Kardomhemthepi aphrang arje asonthot selamthulo.
Keselam patangsi, ahin aser lapen arup recho lapen Jehoiada aphan pilo, lapen latum Kardomhemthepi ke-enji aphan harlung-heihei lapen akaprek aphule-phukok paselamlo.
Jehoiada rengtik an Kardomhemthepi along athok-heihei pibomlo.
La arta ningkan 130 lesi, alangli thilot-lo.
Alangli rat aphan, Israel aphan lapen Kardomhemthepi aphan kam keklem apot halatum laphan David arongsopi recho athiri alongsi pip-lo.
Bonta Jehoiada thilot aphi, Judah ajalin atum Joash Recho aphan halatum alamsi parjutoilo.
Lasi rat atum halatum aphusar atum a-Arnam
Latum la along pachiruithuji aphan
Anke Arnam akarjong Jehoiada kurusar asopo Jekaariah aphuthak nanghirlo. La rat atum kethek-long phrong adimsi arjap-lo, lapen hang-lo, “Arnam
Joash Rechota Jekaariah aphan kephangnoji chelang-dunlo, lapen recho ahukum pen kardomhem atikup along Jekaariah aphan rat atum arlong varlo.
Jekaariah apo Jehoiada ko-an recho aphan rap-loma, la chetengnebup-lo, la Jekaariah aphan papthilot-lo. Jekaariah kethipo ahut la hangserlo, “Nangkopima keklem
Halaso aningkan ningkreng nangleji dok-dok Siria aron-armu Judah lapen Jerusalem tengkheng-lo, lapen kadokave ajalin an aphan pathi-et-lo, lapen ongdung amar thiponsi Damaskas chedamlo.
Siria aron-armu ke ong-e bonta Judah aron-armu ongdung seta

La arengsopik-lo, lapen ahotur atum dam-et aphita la aban atum banghini Jehoiada kurusar asopo aphan kepathi alar kehuijisi laphan amek kejang angdeng along pathilot-lo. Laphan David Arongsopi alongsi pip-lo, bonta arecho athiri along kali.
Laphan kepathi abang Ammonpi Shimeath, asopo amen Zabad lapen inut a-Moabpi amen Shimrith asopo Jehozabad.
Kechok alam recho atum aloh along Joash asopo atum atomo alam laphan kemontri alam lapen la kopusonsi Kardomhemthepi kimloma, aketok do. La asopo Amaziah si la alar recho cholo.
Ningkan 25 arta ahutsi Amaziah recho plang-lo, lapen alangli Jerusalem along ningkan 29 an pangrilo.
Alangli
Alangli ajakong chelongdet aphi alanglipo aphan kepathi achakri atum aphan la pathilo,
bonta halatum asomar atum aphan la pathithedet-lo, bonta Moses Aron aloh along kopisi

Judah lapen Benjamin akhei kedo-an pinsomar amonit pen Amaziah Recho esong ron-armu seng-lo, lapen halatum aro atengsi bilo, lapen bangsuri isi amonit angbong inut apinpo, lapen bangpharo isi angbong inut apinpo bat-lo. La inut apinso amonit arta ningkan 20 pen ha akesar an pangrumpet lak kethom do. Latum kehumjok aron-asong, ron aphan chesikven atumlo, chir-heihei lapen nokjir-heihei ke-otthek atumlo.
La apar alangli lak isi aron-aso Israel adet pen rup lin 3,400 pisi rong-lo.
Bonta inut amontri recho along damsi alangliphan pulo, “La Israel aron-aso atum aphan nanglilong cheponri.
Ron along latum nangliphan pangtang muchotpo pu nangli matha tahai, bonta
Montri aphan Amaziah arjulo, “Bonta ne halatum aphan kepitang arup ke kopusonpo?”
Montri thak-lo, “La an sose
Lasi Amaziah kerong aron-asong toi-et-lo, lapen halatum aphan ahem pachedamtoilo. Laso alam apot halatum Judah arat aphuthak un an aningthisi hem chedam-et-lo.
Amaziah angthin chepangtangsi Ingti Arlok anat aron-armu japonlo. Hadak latum ron chedansi bangsuri kep a-Edom aron-aso atum aphan pathilo,
lapen akaprek bangsuri kep aphan nep-lo. Latum Sela arongsopi alum athak ponsi halatum aphan longchong alum pen nangvarchor lo, anke halatum aber kedo a-arlong along klophratsi thilo.

Halaso ahut Amaziah along ron kepadun longle a-Israel aron-aso atum Samaria lapen Beth Horon adak Judah arongsopi-heihei tengkheng-lo, lapen bangsuri kethom apinso amonit aphan pathilo, lapen ongdung amar thiponlo.
Amaziah Edom aso aphan paremsi nangkechevoi ahut, la along halatum akumlin-heihei vandet-lo, lahei parjapsi archolo lapen lahei along mephik thorlo.
Laso akam
Komantulo, Amaziah lam beng-pet-lo, “Netum nangphan recho aphan keparebang nangbatma? Lam ingtonnon mate ne nangpathi nangkokpo!”
Montri abang keningje ingtonkok-lo, bonta ethe ningje bor-idet-lo, “Non neli chinilo, Arnam nangliphan kepavirjisi chesik-lo, pima nangli lahei klemlo, lapen neli kepare arjuje-lo.”
Judah arecho Amaziah lapen laphan parebang atum Israel abe thurlo. La anke Israel arecho Jehoash aphan isi abirta lolo, la Jehoahaz asopo lapen Jehu asulo, lapen ron-kechedanji phalo.

Jehoash laso abirta pen Amaziah aphan thak-lo, “Ephong Lebanon anglong abapsudo kedar athengpi aphan isi abirta lolo: ‘Nesopo aphan nangsopi penan chopinon.’ Marat api hapu damsi bapsudo arong donglamlo.
Non Amaziah Edom aphan paremdet apotsi nang cheparoka ilo, bonta ne nangphan hem kedojoiji aphansi nangparelo. Kopi athesi nangphuthak lapen nangrat aphuthak akevir kevangji akesung chopha loma?”
Bonta Amaziah karjuji molo. Amaziah keremdet nangji ke Arnam aning kehang-lo, pima la Edom aso atum akumlin-heihei aphan ardomtang-lo.
Lasi Israel arecho Jehoash ta Judah arecho Amaziah abe ron thurlo. Latum Judah along Beth Shemesh pu adim chetong-lo.
Judah aron-armu atum remdet-lo, lapen ron-aso atum halatum ahem chekat-et-lo.
Amaziah aphan Jehoash nepchek-lo, lapen laphan Jerusalem pondet-lo. Haladak la rongsopi apai Ephraim Anghap pen ha Ano Anghap an phri-et-lo, ajak-keding mitar 200 an.

La Kardomhemthepi along aser, lapen arup an lapen Obed Edom aso-asu atum keton Kardomhem amar an, lapen rechohem akhipuru-heihei amar la Samaria pon-et-lo. La along keru-kethai a-arloso aphanta ponlo.
Israel arecho Jehoash thidet aphi Judah arecho Amaziah ningkan 15 an reng-lo.
Amaziah akeprek keklem akam an kecheng pen kejut la recho kecho an Judah lapen Israel arecho atum aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
La
La abang arpum losei athak batsi Jerusalem vandet-lo, lapen laphan David Arongsopi recho athiri-heihei along pip-lo.
Judah arat kedo-an Amaziah alar la ningkan krethrok arta asopo Uzziah aphansi recho ingvailo.
(La Amaziah thidet aphi si Elath che-enthulo, lapen rongsopi kimthulo.)
Ningkan krethrok arta ahutsi Uzziah Recho plang-lo, lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 52 pangrilo. La apei Jekoliah, Jerusalem pen.
Apo arjan endunsi la
Jekaariah, la dhorom anat pare abang rengtik an la kekroithip pen
Uzziah damsi Philistia atum pen ron chedanlo. Alangli Gath, Jamnia lapen Ashdod arongsopi-heihei apaisong lapen ahin Philistia adang an kimlo.
Philistia atum Gurbaal kedo Arab aso lapen Meuni aphan keparemjisi laphan Arnam rapdunlo.
Ammon aso atum Uzziah aphan midu pinang-lo, lapen la anong lapen ajakong thelo, la anong Ijip adet anta chethang-lo.
Ano Anghap along, Arlok Anghap along lapen paisong kekek adim along an hemchardon-heihei kekim pen ajok Jerusalem apaisong Uzziah pangtang-lo.

Rong ahidi ajo ta alangli hem chardon-heihei kimlo, lapen ongdung alangtuk-heihei tuk-lo, pima la nichi anglong akeng-ri-heihei along lapen thoi ajo ongdung kepangreng api dolo. Pima la sai ketiki aning dok-o, la rat atum aphan inglong akeng-ri drakha arikang arong pa-etoilo, lapen aho-or kedo alongle along sai kepaklemji aning parung-lo.
Ron kechedanji aphan la ongdung aron-armu kesiktang do. Lahei la achunbang atum Jeiel lapen Maaseiah si tokdunlo, lahei akam langcharibang, Hananiah si langdunlo.
Ron-armu ke bang 2,600 achakri atumsi chepahemphulo.
Latum aber lak thomra bang suri throksi ra pharopho aron-aso recho ahotur pen chedan pamethek atumlo.
Ron-armu aphan Uzziah chong-heihei, chir-heihei, phutup-heihei ron achoi-heihei, thai lapen thai-aso lapen phamri kevarji aphan long koiso-heihei pilo.

Jerusalem along la keplangmi atum thai aso-heihei lapen hemchardon angsong pen lapen rongsopi apaisong ano-heihei pen nang kevar aphan arlong angkleng selamlo. La anong bithe-bitha ta chethang-lo, lapen la ajakong thepik-lo, pima Arnam pen akerap kelong apot.
Bonta Uzziah Recho ingtangrak ahut la bang alam arjujebomlo, la si laphan pavirlo. La Kardomhemthepi along damsi mephik kethor adovan along mephik kethor pen ajok amethang a-Arnam
Azariah kurusar along bang 80 kangtangrak lapen angthinkethe akurusar atum recho aphan kekhamkhe dunjisi aphi aphi dunlo.
Latum pulo, “Uzziah!
Mephik Adovan adungsi Uzziah Kardomhemthepi along arjaptherlo lapen mephik kethor aphule otdong-lo. La kurusar atum aphan aningthilo, lapen menmen amat atehang along si-i akeso nangchithit-ronlo.
Azariah lapen akaprek akurusar atum kephere pen recho atehang along lang-lorlo, lapen alangliphan Kardomhemthepi pen pa-o-bor-idet-lo. Alangli barserak-serak-lo, pima alangliphan

Ahin akai an Uzziah Recho aron-ateng pen ingthirthedet-lo, pima la akeso apot. Kardomhemthepi arlo puthot lutdam longledet-lo, la amethang ahem along donang-lo, kadokave akam pen sangsi la asopo Jotham si det palang-lo.
Amoz asopo Isaiah montrisi Uzziah Recho kecho esek ahut keklem akaprek akam an tok-lo.
Uzziah thilo lapen recho aphan kepip alongle along pip-lo, bonta la akeso apot alangliphan recho athiri-heihei along pippedet-lo. La asopo Jothamsi la alar recho cholo.
Ningkan 25 arta ahutsi Jotham recho plang-lo, lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 16 pangrilo. La apei Jerushah, Zadok asopi.
La apo keklem ason
La Jothamsi Kardomhemthepi a-Nirep Anghap kimlo, lapen Jerusalem angkang Ophel pu adim rongsopi apaisong akampi klemlo.
Judah anglong-heihei along la rongsopi-heihei kimlo, lapen nampi ajo chepachong ahem lapen hemchardon-heihei kimlo.

La Ammon arecho lapen la aron-armu pen chedanlo, lapen halatum aphan paremdet-lo. Anke Ammon atum aphan la aningkanvang lahei ningkan kethom an midu alangliphan papinang-lo: Lin 3,400 arup, mon 2000 athengthe, lapen mon 2500 asoktipli,
Jotham nang ingtangbomlo, pima la a-Arnam
Akaprek ason la keparcho ahut, la aron-heihei, lapen kam keklem akaida-heihei Judah lapen Israel a-recho atum Aphurkimo along kedo-an tok-lo.
Jotham Recho keplang ahut arta ningkan 25 vet-lang, lapen Jerusalem along la ningkan 16 pangrilo.
La thilo, lapen David Arongsopi alongsi pip-lo, lapen la asopo Ahaz si la alar recho cholo.
Ningkan 20 arta ahutsi Ahaz recho plang-lo, lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 16 pangrilo. Alangli aphusar David Recho akam arjan endundedet-lo; lapen
lapen Israel arecho atum a-arjansi endunrong-lo. Alangli Baal akumlin kangtangrak amar pen paselamlo,
Hinnom Arlok along mephik thorlo, lapen Israel aso kethe ahut
Karchotap-heihei adim-heihei along, inglong-heihei athak, thengpi abin arum along, athok-heihei lapen mephik-heihei Ahaz thorlo.
Ahaz pap keklem apotsi, alangli a-Arnam
Halatum aphusar atum a-Arnam
Inut Israel aron-aso amen Zikri pu abang Ahaz Recho asopo Maaseiah, rechohem kelang abang Azrikam, lapen Elkanah, recho adun hukumpibang aphan pathilot-lo.
Judah aso atum halatum chepho-chero saide lo seta Israel aron-armu atum lakni a-arloso lapen osomar atum aphan beng ponsi kethipon ongdung amar penpen Samaria pondet-lo.
Inut amonit amen Oded, inut
Lapen non Jerusalem lapen Judah apinso-arlo aphan nangtum ban kebiji nangninghang-lo. Nangtum chechininema nangtumta nangtum a-Arnam
Ne lam arjutha! Lahei kebengtang atum nangkorte lapen nang ingjir atum saidelo. Latum aphan pachevoi longnon, kalite aning kethi pen
Nirep adet bangphli ajalin atum Jehohanan asopo Azariah, Meshillemoth asopo Berekiah, Shallum asopo Jehizkiah, lapen Hadlai asopo Amasa atum ta ron-armu atum akam khindedunlo.
Latum pulo, “Lahei kebengtang amonit ladak vanri! Ephan eduk ekepiji aphan dorphlup apap
La ansi ron-armu atum kebengpon amuluk atum lapen kethipon amar an rat lapen halatum ajalin atum arideng hodai-et-lo,

lapen bangphli amonit atum kethipon amar ensi latum aphan pe-ri pilo. Halatum latum aphan pen lapen kengden pa-i-lo, kecho-kejun dorphlup pilo lapen halatum amek keso adim jit ajangthu hilo. Kedam ke-un-e, ke-aini atum aphan gadha-heihei athak pardonlo, lapen kebengpon amonit an aphan Judah alongri Sotele arongsopi Jeriko along thondunlo. Ansi Israel aso atum ha Samaria ahem anat chevoithulo.
Puthot Edom aso atum Judah tengkhengsi ongdung amonit aphan bengponlo,
lasi Ahaz Recho, Assiria Arechokethe Tiglath Pileser akerap chohang-lo.

Halaso ahut amat Philistia atum nichi angbong akeng-ri arongso-heihei lapen Judah anitur anat Philistia atum nichi anglong akeng-ri arongsopi-heihei lapen Judah anitur anat tengkheng-lo. Latum Beth Shemesh, Aijalon lapen Gederoth, Soko, Timnah, Gimzo arongsopi-heihei halahei arong penpen cheraidet-lo, lapen hadak doverlo.
Pima Judah Ahaz Recho arat ajakong ingdilo, lapen
Assiria Arechokethe, Ahaz aphan kerapji kali laphan khindesi pasung thurong-lo.
Lasi Ahaz Kardomhemthepi, rechohem lapen rat ajalin atum ahem-heihei pen ser ponsi rechokethe aphan pidamlo, bonta la-jokta akerap longledet-lo.
La akesung tanpiksi laso amonit Ahaz

Laphan keparem Siria atum a-arnam-heihei aphan la athok-heihei pilo. La pulo, “Siria atum a-arnam-heihei, Siria arecho atum aphan rap-lo, lasi ne jongsi latum aphan athok pilote, latum nephanta nerap tahai.” La laphan lapen adet aphan akevir vanlo.
La aparta, la kardomhem amar an ponsi beng-ilo. La Kardomhemthepi ingkir-het-lo, lapen Jerusalem bithe-bitha adang dovan-heihei parjap-lo.
Judah arongsopi lapen arongtinta, la karchotap adim-heihei kimlo, hadak bang adet a-arnam-heihei aphan mephik thorlo. Lasonsi la aphusar atum a-Arnam
La recho-kecho akaprek ongdung an kecheng pen kejut an Judah lapen Israel Arecho atum Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
Ahaz Recho thilotsi Jerusalem along pip-lo, bonta recho athiri-heihei along kali. La asopo Hezekiah si alanglilar recho cholo.
Ningkan 25 arta ahutsi Hezekiah, Judah arecho plang-lo, lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 29 pangrilo. Alangli pei Abijah ke Jekaariah asopi.
Alangli phusar David Recho arjan endunsi,
Hezekiah Recho keplang anin-gkan kecheng achiklo, alangli Kardom-hemthepi anghap-heihei ingputhulo, lapen selamphruilo.
Alangli Kardomhemthepi nihang atikup anat isi kurusar atum lapen Levi atum arong pachingrumlo,
lapen hadak halatum aphan thanlo. Alangli pulo, “Nangli Levi atum, nangphusar atum a-Arnam
Ephusar atum
Latum Kardomhemthepi anghap-heihei ingkirphlup-lo, melur ame thorthe det-lo lapen mephik thorthe mate Israel a-Arnam Kardomhemthepi along kephrin athok-heihei pi thek-thedet-lo.
Pima, laso apotsi Judah lapen Jerusalem aphuthak
Epo atum ron along thi-et-lo, episo atum, esomar atum aphan bang pon et-lo.”
Ne lasi Israel a-Arnam
Sopo atum apor padamrinon. Nangtum aphan mephik kepathorji aphan lapen Alangliphan rat atum karchojile kepajaponji aphansi
Lahei a-Levi atumsi hadak dolo: Kohath aro pen Amasai asopo Mahath, lapen Azariah asopo Joel.
Merari aro pen Abdi asopo Kish lapen Jehallel asopo Azariah.
Gershon aro pen Zimnah asopo Joah lapen Joah asopo Eden.
Elizaphan aro pen Shimri lapen Jeuel. Asaph aro pen Jekaariah lapen Mattaniah.
Heman aro pen Jehuel lapen Shimei.
Jehuthun aro pen Shemaiah lapen Uzziel
Lahei amonit atum, halatum chepho-chero a-Levi atum aphan pangrumlo, lapen halatum kedo-an amethang chepangthirlo. Anke halatum aphan recho kepaklemtoi asonsi halatum

La kepangthirji aphan kurusar atum la arlo lutdamlo, lapen aron ateng pen kangthirthe amar an ingtan vansi kardomhem atikup arlo van-et-lo. Hadak pen Levi atum rongsopi angtan la ponsi ha Kidron arlok anat lahei kedo-an pondet-lo.

Kecheng achiklo, kecheng arni kam cheng-lo, lapen nerkep arni latum kam kedo-an lapen Kardomhemthepi amangho anta patang-et-lo. Ansi puthot ni nerkep aphan klemsi chiklo ejon angbong krethrok arni an Kardomhemthepi karchoji aphan sik-lo.

Levi atum Hezekiah Recho aphan lahei alam-pachinilo: “Nelitum Kardomhemthepi kephrin athok-heihei aphan adovan, kangthir ahim aphan atebul lapen la kenang amar an aron ateng kepangthir akam papleng-et-lo.
Lapen Ahaz Recho la Arnam aphan kekroithekthe aningkan-heihei angbong kepon kedo-an amar-heihei nelitum vanthulo, lapen nelitum halahei hodaithudet-lo. Lahei kedo-an
Paderdesi Hezekiah Recho rongsopi ajalin atum aphan pangrumsi halatum penpen Kardomhemthepi anat dam rap-rap-lo.

Recho ahemtun lapen Judah arat kepaponji athok aphan lapen Kardomhemthepi kepangthirji aphan latum jonthroksi achainong alo, jon throksi abiresak, jon throksi biresak aloso, lapen bi jon throksi enlo. Aaron asu akurusar atum aphan dovan athak pi athok kepapijisi recho pulo.
Aphrang si kurusar atum chainong that-lo, laso aphi biresak, lapen biresak aloso, lapen athoktin avi dovan athak arsilo.
Padu si kurusar atum, recho lapen akaprek karcho atum along bi ponlo, halatum lahei aputhak ari bat-lo.

Anke kurusar atum bi thulo, lapen lahei avi rat kedo-an apap kepaponji athok asonsi dovan athak vi arsilo, pima kedo-an a-Israel aphan kepathok athok lapen kephrin athok-heihei kepapiji aphan recho hukum pitang-lo.
Recho amontri Gad lapen Nathan montri pen ajok David Recho aphan
David arni ahut kerim ajohton pen pachingtonlo. Kurusar atumta pong-ut-heihei penpen arjapdun-phrong-lo.
Kephrin athok kepapiji aphan Hezekiah hukumpilo; lapen athok kepi cheng si, rat atum
Hadak kedo abangphutinta karcho lapen kelun along cheto dunlo, lapen athok kephrin cho-et-etik lunbom, lapen kerot padobomlo.
Anke Hezekiah Recho lapen rat kedo-an akengphu patongsi Arnam aphan archolo.
David lapen Asaph montri ketok alun-heihei
Rat aphan Hezekiah pulo, “Non nanglitum aron ateng pen ingthir-et-lo,
Halatum jon 70 achainong alo, jon 100 abiresak, lapen jon 200 abiresak aloso
halatum jon 600 achainong alo lapen jon 3000 abiresak rat kechoji athok vanlo.

Lahei api kethatji aphan dorphlup akurusar avedet apotsi akam plengpletik halatum aphan Levi atum rap dunlo, la pen ajok ongdung akurusar atum aron ateng pen amethang chepangthirlo. (Kurusar atum an aphan mute Levi atum aron ateng kekroi pen chepangthir muchot.)
Arpum pen kephrin athok-heihei kepi pen aparta rat atum kecho angbong pen kepi athu kephrin athok along kepidun adrakha ahorlang kedungdun ke kurusar atum arpulo.
Lasi Kardomhemthepi karcho chechengthulo.
Hezekiah Recho lapen rat atum aning arong-o, pima lahei Arnamsi paprapjin keklem thekji aphan rapdunlo.

Kechengsi achiklo, athik apor ahut rat atum Kejok Amei Arong-aje talon thekthelang. Pima kedorphlup akurusar aron ateng pen keche-pangthirtang avelang, lapen ongdung arat Jerusalem along chetong-petpelang.
Lasi Hezekiah Recho alangliban atum aphan, lapen Jerusalem arat atum aphan la hini achiklosi ketalonji aphan cheparailo,
lapen Recho alam Israel arat kedo-an lapen Judah arat aphan pachinipet-lo, la Ephraim lapen Manasseh akhei aphan loh kepaleji aphan akenangsot ake-ora pen loh palolo, lapen Israel a-Arnam
Halatum akemang akam along recho lapen rat atum anta aning dok-hurlo,
lasi latum kedo-an a-Israel aso aphan Nirep anat Dan pen Nitur anat Beersheba pen Jerusalem along vangsi aphrang pen aphai ong muchot aron pen Kejok Amei ketalon thekji aphan phalo.
Recho lapen la aban atum ahukum apot pherangke atum lahei kepha alam penpen Judah lapen Israel adang an damlo:
Israel arat atum, det Assiria aron pen kejok atum an. Non Abraham, Isaak lapen Jakob a-Arnam
Halatum a-Arnam
Halatum ason bang alam arjujeri, bonta
Nanglitum jongsi
Pherangke atum Ephraim lapen Manasseh akhei, lapen ha nirep Zebulun akhei alongri arongsopitinta damlo, bonta rat atum latum aphan ingnekchoisi pinremdunlo.
Tebonseta, hadak Asher, Manasseh lapen Zebulun akhei pen Jerusalem kevangji aninghang-lo.
Arnamta Judah along kam klemsi recho lapen la aban atum ahukum-heihei pachedondun pen ajok la aningkehang kepakroithipjisi rat aning isipet-lo.
Thapkave a-Him Arong-aje ketalonjisi ake-ongpi arat atum hini achiklo Jerusalem along chetongpet-lo.
Halatum athok-heihei kepiji aphan, lapen mephik kethor-i aphan Jerusalem along ke-en adovan-heihei kedo-an pensi lahei Kidron arlok along vardam-et-lo.
Lapen chiklo angbong krephli arni latum Kejok Amei athok aphan biresak alo-heihei thulo. Aron ateng pen kangthirthe akurusar atum lapen a-Levi atum therak-ongsi latum amethang-methang
Arnam amonit Moses aron along kepinkhat ateng Kardomhemthepi along latum adim-heihei chedolo. Levi atum athok-heihei avi kurusar atum aphan pilo, latum lahei dovan athak arsilo.
Pima ongdung arat atum aron ateng pen kangthir-et kalidet apotsi, latum Kejok Amei abiresak alo-heihei thu longledet-lo, lasi halatum alar Levi atum si la klempilo, lapen biresak alo-heihei

La aparta, Ephraim, Manasseh, Issakar, lapen Zebulun akhei angbong pen kevang ongdung amonit atum aron ateng pen chepangthirthedet-lo, lapen latum Kejok Amei ahokpet pen talon thekthedet-lo. Halatum aphan Hezekiah Recho laso akardomsi ardom pilo:
“O nephusar atum a-Arnam
Hezekiah Recho akardom
Ni throksi an rat atum Jerusalem along chingrumsi Thapkave a-Him Arong-aje ning arongpik pen talonlo, lapen ajakong kedo-an pen arni arni la Levi lapen kurusar atum
anat halatum asaikedo pen karcho kejathek apot Levi atum aphan Hezekiah chorolo.
Ni throksi halatum aphusar a-Arnam
latum puthot ni throksi aphong salajong ketalonthuji aphan cheparailo. Lasi latum aning arong pen talonlo.

Rat atum kethatji lapen kechoji aphan Hezekiah Recho jon 1000 achainong alo lapen jon 7000 abiresak pilo, lapen aban atum halatum aphan jon 1000 achainong alo lapen jon 10,000 abiresak pilo. Ongdung akurusar atum aron ateng pen chepangthirlo.
Lasi abangphutin Judah arat atum lapen nirep pen kevang arat atum lapen Israel lapen Judah adet kedo bang adet aso atum anta chehokpik-lo.
Jerusalem arongsopi ta ning arong pen plengset-lo, pima David asopo Solomon Recho arni pen nonpu-an lason avepinlang.
Kurusar atum lapen Levi atum rat aphuthak ahirjume hangpilo. Alangli sining ahem pen halatum akardom Arnam thak-lo, lapen latum aphan deng-lo.

Rong-aje jutsi, kedo-an Israel arat atum Judah arongsopitin damsi arlong archok-heihei bengdamlo, arnampi Asherah akumlin-heihei chorpet-pet-lo, lapen dovan-heihei lapen karchotap adim-heihei pavirlo. Judah adang an, lapen Benjamin, Ephraim lapen Manasseh alongri anta lasonsi halatum klemlo; anke kadokave atum ahem chevoilo.

Kurusar atum lapen Levi atum asong Hezekiah Recho sengthulo, laso along halatum abangphutin kechinidak adeng pirep-lo. Lahei angbong kephrin athok-heihei, kardomhem akarcho along kechetodun, lapen Kardom-hemthepi akaprek kaprek ongdung along akero kepi-heihei ta parloponlo.
Amethang api ahur pen si la adapvang lapen aningvevang kephrin athok-heihei akenang api padorlo, lapen kesang arni akepi, Chiklo kemi Arong-aje, lapen
La aparta kurusar atum lapen Levi atum kelang nangji an Jerusalem arat aphan athok-heihei kepavanjisi pulo, anke latum
Hukum kepi pen amat Israel arat atum halatum akemenei asok, adrakha ahorlang, jit ajangthu, pijo alang, akaprek ketiki asai atum, adan-heihei, phankep pen ephan pen vanlo,
lapen halatum kelong amar pen phankep pen ephan vanlo, lapen halatum ongdung adan-heihei ta vansi halatum a-Arnam
Dan-heihei kethom achiklosi nangkelecheng-lo, lapen phli achiklo anke nanglebomsi pangsomdup-lo.
Hezekiah Recho lapen alangliban atum lapu-an kepi thek-longsi latum
Dan-heihei alam kurusar atum aphan lapen Levi atum aphan recho thanlo,
lapen Azariah kurusarkethe, inut Zadok asu laphan pulo, “Rat atum halatum adan-heihei kevan chengbomlo apot, kechoji aphan dorphlup dolo lapen aparta ahin ongdunglang. Elitum a-an long-lo, pima
Recho ahukum pen latum marpuru-heihei Kardomhemthepi angkang angbong selamlo,

lapen kedo-an adan lapen phankep pen ephan-heiheita lahei arlo thap-et-lo lake kangbobedetji aphanlo. Latum Konaniah pu a-Levi aphansi pachehemphu toilo lapen alangli korte Shimei ke alangliphan kerap abang-lo.

Halatum aber bang kep a-Levi kam paklemlo: Jehiel, Azariah, Nahath, Asahel, Jerimoth, Jozabad, Eliel, Ismakiah, Mahath lapen Benaiah. La kedo-an Hezekiah Recho lapen Azariah kurusarkethe atum ajakong pensi paklemlo.
Imnah asopo Kore, inut a-Levi Kardomhemthepi Nihang Anghap tonbang akethe, si

Kurusar atum kedo akaprek arongsopi along lapen akaprek a-Levi atumsi kroipame pen laphan cherapdunlo: Eden, Miniamin, Jeshua, Shemaiah, Amariah, lapen Shekaniah. Aro ateng langlesi halatum akam ateng pen akorte a-Levi atum aphan latum kecho amar kethak pachingbarpet-lo.
Halatum anghoi ateng langsi ningkan 30 lapen ongmuchot apinso atum arnivang Kardomhemthepi along arpu kedo atum aphan apharman pirep-lo.
Kurusar atum aphan halatum adeng aro atengsi kam bak-lo, lapen Levi atum ningkan 20 lapen sosechot atum aphan asonsi kam bak-lo.
Latum kedo-an apiso-aso lapen latum along kedodun abangphu atum penpen amen chetok-rappet-lo, pima latum keklem nangji kangthir akam akenang do lote aling apor seta klem nangji.

Aaron asu atum aphan kepi arongsopi-heihei along kedo akurusar atum mate laso arongsopi-heihei api kechopan adim along kedo akurusar atumsi kurusar ahemtun-heihei along pinso amonit an lapen Levi aso akam kedo abangphutin aphan kecho amar keron arpu kurusar atum en-nang-lo.
Judah adang an, Hezekiah Recho Kopisi akeme lapen a-Arnam
La keklem pachunlo, pima la keklem Kardomhemthepi aphan mate Aron ateng keklem seta la karjong pen chehodai pamesi a-Arnam aphan klempilo.
Lahei aphi Hezekiah Recho,
Senacherib, Jerusalem aphanta ketengkhengji aninghang-lo pu Hezekiah Recho thek-longsi,
alangli lapen alangli aban atum rongsopi angtan alang akrong kethanpetjisi chesik-lo, anke Assiria atum Jerusalem adung vang-lote, latum lang longledetpo.
Aban atum ongdung aron-aso ponsi lang amek kedo-an khang-etsi lahei alang palilongledet-lo.

Rongsopi paisong keselam pen ajok, lapen hemchardon kekim pen ajok lapen athak apaisong kekim pen ajok recho ajakong chepangtang-lo. La aparta, Jerusalem-ban anihang anat longle kepapleng pen ajok la cherangkhalo, lapen la ongdung achir, anok-heihei paselamlo.
Inut ron-armu ahukum aber rongsopi along kedo-an amonit bilo, lapen rongsopi anghap athengno aklam kethe alongsi kepachingrumji aphan hukumpilo. Latum aphan alangli pulo,
Mathathip lapen ning chepathenon, Assiria Arechokethe aphan mate la kejapon aron-armu aphan phereri. La arideng kedo aphan mute etum anatsi jakong ke-ongmuchot-lang.
La monit ajakongsi dochot, bonta etum aphan ekerapji abang e-Arnam
Penang an aphi, Senacherib lapen la aron-armu atum Lakish along kedo un ahut, Jerusalem along kedo Hezekiah lapen Judah arat aphan laso abirta pilo:
“Ne, Assiria arechokethe Sennacherib si nang karjulo, kopisi nangtum rat atum ning chethesi Jerusalem along kedo pen bang atum patengkheng jilangma.
Hezekiah tong nangtum aphan nangkeparema nangtum a-Arnam
La si
Akaprek adet-heihei atum aphan nephusar atum lapen ne keklem-heihei nangtum chininema? Akaprek adet-heihei a-arnam atum Assiria Arechokethe pen halatum arat aso aphan pajokthek-loma?
Netum pen halatum adet kedo-an a-arnam atum amethang adet aphan pajok unpo pu nangtum aphan Hezekiah nangpachobei longri, mate lason nang paklem longrinon.
Laphan kroiri! Badu a-arnamta amethang arat aphan Assiria Arechokethe arideng pen pajok un-epinlang. Lasi nangtum a-arnam jokta nangtum aphan nangpajok un-elo!”
Assiria aban atum la an sose Arnam
Rechokethe ketok aloh Israel a-Arnam
Ban atum la Ibri alam pen ningjelo, Jerusalem arongsopi apaisong athak kedo arat aphan kepaphereji lapen aning kepabijisi hang-lo, anke rongsopi kecheraiji joimuchotpo.
Latum Jerusalem a-Arnam aphuthak ningjelo lapen lasonsi akaprek adet atum a-arnam ari pen keselam akumlin aputhak ta ningjelo.
Anke Hezekiah Recho lapen Isaiah montri, Amoz asopo Arnam aphan ardomsi kerap kelongji aphan hangcharbulo.

inut apherangke nangtoisi Assiria aron-armu aron-aso lapen chakri atum aphan pathi-et-lo. Lasi Rechokethe amahang jangrem pen Assiria chedamnang-lo. Arnisi la kardomhem arlo Arnam along kedo ahut, alangli sopo ajehak anokjir pen laphan pathilot-lo.
Lasonsi Hezekiah Recho lapen Jerusalem arat aphan Assiria Arecho-kethe, Sennacherib ajakong pen lapen halatum ahotur atum pen
Ongdung amonit atum Jerusalem vangsi
Laso apor ahut Hezekiah sodet-lo, lapen thiji dok-dok-lo. alangli ardomlo, lapen alangliphan
Bonta laphan
Padu Hezekiah lapen arat aso atum chepabihek-hak-lo, Hezekiah thithetik an

Hezekiah Recho plangpik-lo, lapen abangphutin ta alangliphan aman pilo. Alangli aser, arup, adorkeso a-arlong-heihei, mosala-heihei, achong-heihei, lapen akaprek adorkeso amar-heihei aphan alangli puru-heihei kimlo.
La aparta, la asok, adrakha ahorlang, lapen jit ajangthu-heihei aphan puru ahem-heihei kimlo, la achainong aphan aroi-heihei, lapen abiresak kebeng aroi-heihei kimlo.
Alangli kedo-an apar ta alangliphan Arnam abiresak lapen achainong pisi la lapu-an akaprek akhi dolo, la ongdung arongsopi kim-ilo.
La Hezekiah-si Gihon alang amek tengsi kurdang pen lang palisi Jerusalem apaisong arlo la palidamlo. Hezekiah keklem akam asontin ta chunlo,
lapen Bebilon apherangke atum det angbong keklemtang angthek arjulo, seta, Hezekiah a-ot asat ke-enji si Arnam la atovar aning hang aling paklemtoilo.
Hezekiah Recho Keklem asontin akam lapen la
Hezekiah thi si laphan recho atum athiri-heihei alongsi pip-lo. La kethi ahut Judah lapen Jerusalem arat atum alangliphan aman pilo. Alanglilar asopo Manasseh si recho cholo.
Manasseh Judah arecho kecho ahut la arta ningkan 12 vet-lang, lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 55 pangrilo.
Arat atum kepaphrang ahut
La apo Hezekiah kepavirtang karchotap adim-heihei kimthulo. La dovan-heihei Baal karcho aphan kimsi, arnampi Asherah akumlin-heihei aphan archolo.
Kardomhemthepi
Kardomhemthepi atikup-heihei along chiklolongso-heihei karchoji aphan dovan-heihei kimlo.
La Hinnom Arlok along asopo atum aphan kephrin athok pinchong-lo. La kepaludep klemlo, lapen kemoitap akam klemlo, lapen ripak ang-ang kethan atum aphan lapen lasonthakthak atum aphan rilo. La

La Kardomhemthepi arlo isi akumlin bilo, laso adim along helo Arnam David lapen la asopo Solomon aphan kepu: “Ladak Jerusalem laso a-Kardomhemthepi alongsi Israel khei 12 alongri angbong pen Nephan kaita keparchoverji aphan kangvaitang adimlo.
Jongsi Israel arecho atum Ne hukum-heihei lapen halatum aphan Neban Moses kepi Aron rimlote, aphusar atum aphan Ne kepi alongle pen latum aphan paphlung longledetpo.”
Manasseh, Judah arat aso aphan japonsi la arat aso atum kepaphrang ahut
Manasseh lapen la arat aphan
Lasi
La sungsi chepabihek-lo, la a-Arnam
Arnam Manasseh akardom deng-lo, lapen laphan Jerusalem pachedam longthusi puthot pangrithulong pen ajok Manasseh akardom thak-lo. La pensi

Laso aphi, David Arongsopi nihang apai Manasseh pangtuilo, arlok adung Gihon alang amek anirep anat pen Ok Anghap an lapen Ophel arongsopi angkang an. Alongtin ta Judah arongsopi along esong aron-asong bisi inut hukum kepi abang alangli bilo.

Adet kaprek a-arnam-heihei lapen la keselam hadak kebi akumlin, Kardomhemthepi pen terek et-lo, lapen Kardomhemthepi karjap anglong along kedo karchotap adovan-heihei lapen Jerusalem along kaprek adim anta; lahei la pon-etsi lahei amar rongsopi angtan vardamchorlo.
aphan karcho adim adovan la paselamthulo, lapen la kejelang athok-heihei lapen kero kepi athok-heihei la athak pilo. Israel a-Arnam
Rat atum along kaprek athok-heihei pilo, seta latum
Manasseh keklem asontin akam an la a-Arnam aphan kardom, Israel a-Arnam

Recho akardom lapen la aphuthak Arnam kethak, lapen la aning kecheruire aphrang la keklem apap lapen kehung akam-heihei karchotap adim-heihei lapen la keselam arnampi Asherah akumlin-heihei lapen la karcho akumlin-heihei montri atum aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
Manasseh thilot-lo, lapen rechohem alongsi pip-lo, lapen la asopo Amon si la alar recho cholo.
Judah arecho kecho ahut Amon arta ningkan
lo lapen la Jerusalem along la
Bonta apo ason kalisi la chepabibedet-lo, lapen
La aphan achakri atum kepathiji thurlo, lapen rechohem arlo laphan pathilot-lo.
Judah arat atum Amon aphan kepathi abangphan pathilo lapen la asopo Josiah aphansi recho paplang-lo.
Judah arecho kecho ahut Josiah arta ningkan 8 vet-lang, lapen la Jerusalem along ningkan 31 pangrilo.
aphan aning kepadok akam si la klemlo; la aphusar David Recho a-arjan endunsi Arnam aron an kemon-e pen kroipamelo.
Josiah recho ningkan 8 ahut la bihek-lang, la aphusar David Recho a-Arnam aphansi archolo. Ningkan 4 aphi, la karklitap akarcho adim-heihei arnampi Asherah lapen kaprek kesoi akumlin-heihei pavirlo.

La kepinkhat atengsi la amonit atum Baal aphan karcho adovan lapen halatum adung mephik kethor adovan-heihei ta phri-et-lo. Asherah kechor akumlin lapen akaprek kesoi akumlin-heihei pangje-isi aduk pacheplang-lo, lapen laphan karkli arat atum atipit along aduk hijik damlo.
Karklitap akurusar atum areppi halatum karcho adovan-heihei along phrinlo. La kedo-an keklem pen ajok, la Judah lapen Jerusalem aron ateng pen pangthirtang-lo.
Rongsopi-heihei alongta lasonthot klemlo, lapen Manasseh, Ephraim lapen Simeon arongman angkang ajo pen ha nirep anat Naphtali anta klemlo.

Nirep adet alongri adang an la dovan-heihei lapen Asherah kesoi akumlin an longle athak patep-i si longle aduk paplang-lo, lapen mephik kethor adovan-heihei kedo-an pangje-ilo. Ansi la Jerusalem chevoilo.
La recho kecho ningkan 18 ahut, karklitap karcho kepajut pen ajok la det lapen Kardomhemthepi pangthirlo, Josiah Recho,

Levi atonbang atum Kardomhemthepi along kerung atangka Hilkiah kurusarkethe aphan hodaidet-lo. (La Ephraim lapen Manasseh arat pen si kerung-lo, lapen ahin Nirep Adet pen lapen Judah arat pen Benjamin lapen Jerusalem.)
Laso atangka bangkethom amonit kardomhem keselam ahemphu arideng hodaidet-lo,
lapen halatum thengpi akumbeleng aphan lapen kekim atum arlong pen thengpi kenamji, hem-heihei keselamji aphan Judah arecho atum kepathutoi apot.

Kam keklem abang athikpet, latum aphan kepalangdun bang phli a-Levi dolo: Gahath, lapen Obadiah, latum Merari aro pen, lapen Jekaariah lapen Meshullam, atum Kohath aro pen. (Levi atum kethekser aduhuidi atumlo.)
Akaprek a-Levi ke hormu kepon kevan lapen ason ason akam kelang dun, lapen akaprek atum ketok kerim mate ketondun akam chepahemphulo.
Mar puru pen tangka kepon ahut Hilkiah Moses aphan Arnam kepi Aron
La Shaphan aphan pulo, “Ladak Kardomhemthepi along ne Aron aloh long-lo.” Loh la Shaphan aphan pilo,
lapen Shaphan la ha recho along pondet-lo. La thanlo, “Nangli hukum kepi ateng nelitum klem patang-et-lo.
Kardomhemthepi along kebi atangka nelitum ponlo, lapen la kam klembang lapen halatum aphan kelang atum arideng pidet-lo.”
La ningjebomlang, “Hilkiah neliphan kepi aloh ladak do.” lapen recho aphan alangli asekethe pen porhe parjulo.
La keporhe recho arjulongsi alangli mong-loisi ape-ari chingsek-lo,
lapen Hilkiah aphan lapen Shaphan asopo Ahikam aphan lapen Mikaiah asopo Abdon aphan kangsaihem achunbang lapen Asaiah, recho along honbang aphan lahei ahukum pilo:
“Damra nepharman lapen Israel, Judah along kedo arat aphan

Recho ahukum pen Hilkiah lapen akaprek atum Huldah pu a-arloso, inut amontripi Jerusalem kemi alongsi kedo along damlo. (Bangpi apenan Shallum, Tikvah asopo lapen Harhas asu Kardomhem ape achoi ahemphu.) kopi plang-loma, latum bangpi aphan than-et-lo,
lapen latum recho along pachedamthusi laso abirta recho aphan bangpi paputoilo:
“Ne Jerusalem lapen la kedo-an arat aphan, recho aphan keporhepi loh ketoktang ahirjuno ateng adukpipo.
Latum Nephan ne-obup-lo, lapen akaprek arnam-heihei aphan athok-heihei pilo, lapen halatum keklem an aphan akam pen ajok Nening papung-lo.
Recho amethang aphan ke Ne Israel a-Arnam,
lapen nangning chiruilo, lapen Ne ingno chepabihek-lo, nang pe-ri chingsek-lo, lapen Ne kosonsi Jerusalem lapen la arat aphan aduk kepiji pu kether nang arjulong-lo,
lapen Jerusalem aputhak aduk kepiji ke nang thithetik pavangvelo. Nangphan ke Ne ningkangsam pen nangmek pachilongji.”
Laso abirta pen monit atum Josiah Recho along chevoilo.
Judah lapen Jerusalem ajalin atum an aphan Josiah Recho hangpet-lo,

lapen halatum penpen la Kardomhemthepi damrappet-lo, halaso along kurusar atum lapen Levi atum lapen ahem kedo-an arat atum, keduk, lapen keplang anta dolo. La kadokave angno, asekethe pen recho Kardomhem, thepi arlo kelong kechejok aloh kangthim porhe pilo.
La recho archok alongsi arjap-lo; lapen

Kechejok alam kechechakthekji aphan la Benjamin arat lapen abangphutin Jerusalem along pavangtoilo. Lasi Jerusalem arat atum kechejok aloh halatum aphusar atum a-Arnam pen chepathik akehang an kroilo.
Israel arat alongri angbong kedo-an kehijimmeme akumlin-heihei Josiah Recho pavir-et-lo, la rengtik an rat aphan halatum aphusar a-Arnam
Josiah Recho,
Kardomhemthepi along kurusar atum keklem nangji adeng la pilo, lapen kemesen pen keklem ponthekji aphan la aning parung-lo.
Levi atum Israel athanbang,
David Recho lapen la asopo Solomon Recho nangkepitang akam arpu-heihei ateng, Kardomhemthepi along aron atengle nangdim-heihei chedonon,
lapen nangtum methang Israel arat ahemtuntin aphan nangtum ajehak kerap thekverjile chesengnon.
Nangtumsi kejok abiresak-heihei lapen bi-heihei thu nangpo. Non nangtum methang aron pen chepangthir non lapen Moses pen ajok
Kechejok amei along rat kepa-enji aphan, Josiah Recho amethang kechopangreng api suri 30 abiresak, biresak aloso lapen bi aso lapen jon suri kethom achainong alo danpilo.

La aban atumta rat aphan, kurusar atum aphan, lapen Levi ke-enji aphan danpilo. Kardomhemthepi chepahemphu atum, Hilkiah, kurusarkethe Jekaariah, lapen Jehiel, kurusar atum aphan jon 2,600 abiresak aso lapen bi aso lapen rong-aje ahut kethatji achainong jon 300 pilo.

Levi ajalin atum Konaniah, Shemaiah, lapen la akorte Nathanel, Hashbiah, Jeiel lapen Jozabad atum jon suri pho abiresak aso lapen abi aso, lapen jon 500 achainong alo Levi atum athok-heihei kepapiji aphan dan pilo.
Kejok Amei aphan asontin siktang-et si, kurusar atum lapen Levi atum recho ahukum ateng halatum amethang adim-heihei chedorep-lo.
Biresak aso lapen bi thudet aphi Levi atum lahei areng lumlo.
Anke latum rat angbong ahemtun asontin chethak-lo, kephrin athok aphan pi-heihei chethaksi latum Moses Aron aloh kepinkhat ateng pajirthekpo.
Me along Kejok Amei athok-heihei Levi atum me phrinlo, la aron ateng-lo, lapen prapjin pen rat aphan ok ronlo.

La klemdet aphi, Levi atum amethang aphan ok cheronlo lapen Aaron aro pen kevang akurusar atum an aphanta bak-lo, athema kurusar atum aningve anta klemnangvoi, pi kephi, lapen arpum pen kephi lapen athok-heihei athu kephrin nang akam do-o.
Asaph aro pen Levi atum Lunse David Recho halatum aphan kepinkhat adim-heihei chedorep-lo: Asaph, Heman, lapen Jeduthun, pima akaprek a-Levi atum halatum aphan Kejok Amei sikpilo.
Lasi Josiah Recho hukum kepi ateng
Ni throksi kedo-an Israel arat atum Kejok Amei lapen thapkave a-Him Arong-aje talonlo.

Samuel arni ahut pen lason Kejok Amei talonle-pinlang. Josiah Recho ason Kejok Amei ketalon aphrang badu arecho atum ta talonle-pinlang. Kurusar atum, Levi atum lapen Judah, Israel lapen Jerusalem arat atum nangdunlo.
Laso a-Kechejok Amei Josiah Recho kecho 18 aningkansi dolo.
Kardomhemthepi aphan Josiah Recho lahei klemtang-et aphi, Ijip arecho Neko, Euphratis Aroi, Karkemish adim ron kechedanjisi aron-armu nangjalo. Laphan Josiah kekhangji bor-ilo,

bonta Josiah aphan Neko bangso abirta lolo: “Laso aron ne kechedan nangphan thang akam ave, Judah arecho. Ne nangpenle kechedanji kali, lapen nephan paprapnon pu Arnamsi nephan nekepulo. Arnam ke nenatsi do, lasi nephan khangri, kalite nangphan pavirdetpo.”
Bonta Josiah ke kechedanjisi chesikding-lo. Neko Recho pen ajok Arnam keningje alam la arjumolo, lasi Megiddo aklam along la arje chepatusi ron damlo.
Ron kechedan bom un ahut, Josiah Recho aphan Ijip aso, athai aso apchok-lo. La aban atum aphan pulo, “Nephan ingtan nangpondet-non; nereng sodak-lo!”

La aronhemkonglong pen laphan rungtang-lo, lapen akaprek aronhemkonglong alongsi bilo lapen laphan Jerusalem pondet-lo. Hadak la thilot-lo, lapen recho athiri-heihei alongsi pip-lo. La kethi apot Judah lapen Jerusalem arat atum ningduk-lo.

Jeremiah montri Josiah Recho aphuthak ningduk alun tok-lo. Laphan aningduk lote Israel apinso-arlo atum alunse atum laso alun lunsi isi aron cheplang-lo. Laso alun ke ningduk-heihei alun kepangrum aloh alongsi longji.
Josiah keklem akam an la
lapen la kecheng pen kejut aphurkimo, Israel lapen Judah Arecho atum aphurkimo along tok-et-lo.
Josiah asopo Joahaz aphansi Judah arat atum ingvailo, lapen Jerusalem arecho lo pusi jangthu patip-lo.
Joahaz, Judah arecho kecho ahut arta ningkan 23 vet-lang, lapen alangli Jerusalem along chiklo jonthom pangrilo.
Ijip Arecho Neko laphan bengpondetsi, Judah atum lin 3,400 arup, lapen lin 34 aser amidu patulo.
Joahaz a-ik Eliakim aphansi Judah arecho Neko bat tekang-lo, lapen amen larsi Jehoiakim irlo. Joahaz aphan ke Neko Ijip adet pondet-lo.
Jehoiakim, Judah arecho-kecho ahut arta ningkan 25 anlo, lapen Jerusalem along ningkan 11 pangrilo. La a-Arnam
Bebilon arecho Nebukadnezzar, Judah tengkheng-lo, Jehoiakim aphan nepchek-lo, lapen ingchin arri pen ingnang si laphan Bebilon pondet-lo.
Nebukadnezzar, Kardomhemthepi ajehak akhi pongdetsi Bebilon arechohem arlo chebilo.
Jehoiakim keklem asontin akam, la kehijimmeme akeseke lapen kehingno akam keklem-heihei, Israel lapen Judah arecho atum Aphurkimo along tok-et-lo. La alar asopo Jehoiachin si recho cholo.
Judah arecho-kecho ahut Jehoia-chin arta ningkan 18 vet-lang, lapen la Jerusalem along chiklo jonthom ra nikep pangrilo. La jokta

Chung-phang-ok ahut Jehoiachin aphan Nebukadnezzar Bebilon pondet-lo, lapen Kardomhemthepi akhi-heihei pon-et-lo. Ansi Jehoiachin apunu Zedekiah aphan Judah lapen Jerusalem arecho pu Nebukadnezzar bat-lo.
Judah arecho kecho ahut Zedekiah arta ningkan 21 vet-lang, lapen alangli Jerusalem along ningkan 11 pangrilo.
La ta
Recho Nebukadnezzar abe Zedekiah thurlo, lapen laphan
La aparta, Judah ajalin atum, akurusar atum, lapen rat atum, latum adung-arei adet-heihei arjansi endunlo, lapen kumlin-heihei archolo, lasi
Latum aphusar a-Arnam
Bonta latum Arnam apherangke atum aphan pinremlo, Alangli alam arjujesi Alangli amontri atum aphan ingnekchoilo, padu ke arat aphuthak
Lasi latum aphan kepateng-khengjisi
Bebilon arecho Kardomhemthepi, kardomhem khi-puru, recho lapen la aban atum akhi pon-et-lo.
La Kardomhemthepi keidut-lo, lapen rongsopi ta, la arechohem lapen la akhita me pacho-et-lo, lapen rongsopi apaisong phri-et-lo.
Kerenglang atum an aphan alangli Bebilon pon-et-lo, hadak latum Parsi Adetpi nang-klangkletik alangliphan lapen alangli aso-asu atum aphan ban ingduknang-lo.
Lasi Jeremiah pen ajok
Sairas, Parsi Arechokethe keplangcheng aningkan, Jeremiah montri kepu alam
La Sairas, Parsi Arechokethe ahukumlo. Sining a-Arnam
Parsia a-Rechokethe Sairas kecheng aningkan recho kecho ahut
Lake Parsi arechokethe Sairas ahukumlo. Sining a-Arnam
Nangtum, Alanglirat aso an aphuthak Arnam nangpadodun lonang. Nangtum Jerusalem damsi

Jongsi Alangli rat aso ban-kedam atum kechevoiji akerap akenang do pulote halatum adung abang laso akerap halatum aphan pidun nangji. Halatum ser, rup lapen pi atum, Jerusalem along adan athok kepiji aphan nangji.
Ansi Judah lapen Benjamin aro keja atum lapen kurusar atum lapen Borwa mate Levi atum lapen Arnam aning keparung atum an kedamjisi lapen Jerusalem along Kardomhemthepi kekimthujisi damlo.
Ongdung amar halatum aphan adung atum pen kerap long-lo: Ser, rup akasu-harlung-heihei lapen kaprek ador keso amar Kardomhemthepi along dan kepiji aphan longponlo.
Recho Nebukadnezzar, Jerusalem Kardomhemthepi pen kevan lapen amethang a-arnam atum ahem kepitang aharlung lapen langbong-heihei Sairas halatum aphan voi dunlo.
Halahei nangli Mithredath pu recho akhipuru kelangbang akethenei, arideng pen pachonsi Judah adet a-Govornor Sheshbazzar la lakhasi alangliphan hodailo,
lahei helo aphai: Ser akasu pak 30, rup akasu pak 1000, kasuso pak 29,
Ser aharlung hong 30, rup aharlung hong 410, kaprek ketun-kedang ajohton 1000 dolo.
Kadokave ser-rup ajohton 5,400 Sheshbazzar kaprek bandamtang atum penpen Bebilon pen ha Jerusalem ponlo.

Ongdung ban-kedam atum Bebilon alongri pen Jerusalem lapen Judah abangphutin ta amethang arongsopi chevoilo. Recho Nebukadnezzar halatum aphan ban kepon arni pen halatum ahem asangho atum Bebilon adet si ban donang-lo.
Halatum asongja atum ke Jerubbabel, Joshua, Nehemiah, Seraiah, Reelaiah, Mordekai, Bilshan, Mispar, Bigvai, Rehum, lapen Baanah.
Israel akhei aro-heihei amen lahei helo: Bankedam pen kechevoitang atum arotin pen aphai lahei helo:
Parosh aro pen bang 2,172,
Shephatiah aro pen bang 372,
Arah aro pen bang 775,
Pahath-Moab aro aphan Jeshua lapen Joab asomar pu ta pu, la bang 2,812.
Elam aro pen bang 1,254.
Zattu aro pen bang 945.
Zakai aro pen 760.
Bani aro pen bang 642;
Bebai aro pen bang 623.
Azgad aro pen bang 222.
Adonikam aro pen bang 666.
Bigvai aro pen bang 2,056,
Adin aro pen bang 454.
Ater mate Hezekiah aro pen bang 98.
Bezai aro pen bang 323.
Jorah aro pen bang 112.
Hashum aro pen bang 223.
Gibbar aro pen bang 95.
Aber ketok arongsopi-heihei along kedo aphusar atumta nangchevoilo:
Bethlehem asor bang 123.
Netophah asor bang 56.
Anathoth asor bang 128.
Azmaveth asor bang 42.
Kiriatharim, Chephirah lapen Beeroth asor bang 743.
Ramah lapen Geba asor bang 621.
Mikmash asor bang 122.
Bethel lapen Ai asor bang 223.
Nebo asor bang 52,
Magbish asor bang 156,
Kaprek a-Elam asor bang 1,254.
Harim asor bang 320.
Lod, Hadid lapen Ono asor bang 725.
Jeriko asor bang 345.
Senah asor bang 3,630.
Kurusar akhei aro bankedam pen nangkechevoi atum lahei helo: Jedaiah mate Jeshua aro bang 973.
Immer aro bang 1,052.
Pashur aro pen bang 1,247.
Harim aro pen bang 1,017.
Levi mate Borwa aro bankedam pen nangkechevoi atum: Jeshua lapen Kadmiel mate Hodaviah aro pen bang 74.
Lunse atum: Asaph aro pen bang 128.
Kardomhem kehon atum: Shallum, Ater, Talmon, Akkub, Hatita lapen Shobai aro pen bang 139.
Kardomhem keklem aban, ban kedam pen nangkechevoi atum: Ziha, Hasupha, Tabba-oth,
Keros, Siaha, Padon,
Lebanah, Hagabah, Akkub,
Hagab, Shamlai, Hanan,
Giddel, Gahar, Reaiah,
Rezin, Nekoda, Gazzam,
Uzza, Paseah, Besai,
Asnah, Meunim, Nephisim,
Bakbuk, Hakupha, Harhur,
Bazluth, Mehida, Harsha,
Barkos, Sisera, Temah,
Neziah, lapen Hatipha.
Solomon aban atum: Sotai, Hassophereth, Peruda,
Jalah, Darkon, Giddel,
Shephatiah, Hatil, Pochereth-Hezzebaim lapen Ami.
Kardomhem keklem atum lapen Solomon aban aro atum ban kedam pen nangkechevoi atum pangrumpet bang 392.
Delaiah, Tobiah lapen Nekoda aro Tel-Melah, Tel-Harsha, Chirub, Addan, lapen Immer arongsopi pen kevang aphai bang 652.
Bonta halatum Israel akhei arolo pu angthek chepaklang thekthedet-lo.

Habaiah, Hakkoz lapen Barzillai kurusar aro atum amethang aphusar angthun chingthum thekthedet-lo. (Barzillai aro Gilead kedo a-Barzillai a-osopi pen chepangrilo lapen a-ong akur aro si amen che-irdundet-lo.)
Laso amat halatum akurusar angthek chepaklang thekthedet ajok, halatum aphan kurusar aro pu dengpon un-edet-lo.
Judia a-Govornor halatum aphan pulo, Urim lapen Thummim mate Arnam aningkehang kechiniji ason kerim abang kurusar avetik ke halatum Arnam aphan kehodai-i a-an cholongle.
Kedo-an asong pangrumpet bang 42,360.
La apar halatum abanpo atum bang 7,337 lapen lunsepo-lunsepi bang 200 an dolo.
Halatum alosei jon 736, gadha jon 245,
ka-ut jon 435, gadhakethe jon 6,720.
Ban kedam atum
Halatum labangso akam aphan un an pidunhurlo lapen pangrumpet lin 500 aser, lin 2,800 arup, lapen pe pak 100 kurusar atum kechingchoi aphan pilo.
Kurusar atum, Levi atum, lapen ajehak arat atum Jerusalem arlo kalite adung arei arongsi dolo, lapen ahin a-Israel atum aphusar atum kedo adimsi chedopet-lo.
Throksi achiklo, Israel arat atum halatum amethang arongsopi-heihei along chedorep-lo. Ansi halatum Jerusalem along chingrumpet-lo,

lapen Jehozadak asopo Joshua lapen Shealtiel asopo Jerubbabel, la adon arap penpen Israel a-Arnam adovan kimthulo, lasi halatum Arnam amonit, Moses ketok aron ateng pen la aputhak kephrin athok pilongpo.

Nangkechevoi bankedam atum kedobomlang arat aphan pherelo, seta halatum aphrang kedo adimthotsi dovan kimthulo. Ansi halatum adap lapen arnikangsam akephrin athok la aputhak chemitmepin pen phrin longverlo.
Latum Chepachong Achojun amei aron ateng pen talon ponlo; arnivang halaso arni aphan akenangsot athok halatum pilo;
lapen la apar ta halatum chemitmepin athok kephrin etji lapen chiklokemi achojun ahut athok lapen kaprek chemitmepin akechingrum ahut
Rat atum Kardomhemthepi kekim chengthujilang seta, throksi achiklo kecheng arni halatum

Longrokbang lapen kimbang atum aphan kepinangji atangka rat atum chepilo lapen an, lang pilo lapen Lebanon pen kedar athengpi kevanjisi kelarji aphan jit ajangthu Tair lapen Sidon arongsopi lodet-lo, lahei Joppa along talo pensi vanpo. La kedo-an akam Parsi arechokethe Sairas pen hukum hangnangji.

Lasi halatum Jerusalem Kardomhemthepi along ban kedampen kevang aningkan hini achiklo si kam klem pangcheng-lo. Jerubbabel, Joshua lapen halatum arong asor kedo-an, kurusar atum, lapen Levi atum ahokpet pen pulote kedo-an ban kedam pen Jerusalem kevang atum an, kam cheto dunlo. Levi atum ningkan ingkoi arta mate ake-ong atum Kardomhemthepi kekimthuji aphan arpu pilo.
Levi aso Joshua lapen alangli sopo, adon-arap atum, lapen Kadmiel lapen asomar (Hodaviah aro) Kardomhemthepi kekim arpu enlo. (Latum aphan Henadad aro a-Levi atumsi raplo.)

Monit atum Kardomhemthepi ahemthur kekim kepangcheng ahut kurusar atum halatum apindeng chingthang pamesi abangphutinta pong-ut ot-repsi adim chedolo, lapen Asaph aro a-Levi atum prakso-heihei otsi arjap-lo. David recho arni kethantang atengsi latum
Ruibomsi latum
Anut-tinta un an hang-lo,

Ongdung akurusar, Levi atum lapen arotin akejalin atum Kardomhemthepi kethek-longcheng-lo lapen la Kardomhemthepi ahemthur kecham akam kelangbom un ahut latum chiru lapen charnap lo. Bonta ajehak atum ke chehoksi hangjolo.
Baduta kechehok lapen kechiru ase pangthek thekthedet-lo, pima halatum pu-an ase pathelo la heloving anta arjulongji.
Judah arat lapen Benjamin arat ahotur atum arjulong-lo, atheke bankedam pen nangkechevoi atum Israel a-Arnam

Lasi latum Jerubbabel lapen aro-heihei ajalin abangphu atum aphan kechehangjisi damlo, lapen pulo, “Netum aphanta Kardomhemthepi kekim nangpachelang longtha. Nangtum karcho Arnam inut nat aphansi netumta archolo, lapen Assiria arechokethe Esarhaddon dak netum aphan kepadotoi arni pen netum athok-heihei alangliphan pibomlo.”
Jerubbabel, Joshua lapen aro-heihei ajalin atum halatum aphan thak-lo, “Netum a-Arnam
Ansi kedo barim arat atum Judia atum aphan aningpabilo lapen hem pakimkedetjisi pappherelo.
Parsi asorkar kepangri atum Judia atum abe-kepathurjisi halatum rosopot pilo. Laso akam latum Sairas lapen Darias recho kechobom ahut anta klembomlang.
Rechokethe Ahasuras recho kechocheng aningkan, Judia lapen Jerusalem kedo-an arat ahotur atum abethursi bok-lo.

Puthot Artaserses, Parsi arecho-kethe ahut Bishlam, Mithredath, Tabeel lapen halatum kam-klemrap-rap atum rechokethe aphan isi aloh tok-lo. Loh Aramaik alam pensi tok-lo lapen keporhe ahut lam larnang-lo
Lapen Rehum, la govornor lapen Shimshai lake longri achunbang, Jerusalem aputhak Artaserses aphan lasonsi tok-lo.
Rehum govornor pen, Shimshai, longri achunbang pen latum kam klemrap-rap atum penpen, kangsai atum lapen Erek asor, Bebilon asor, lapen Elam adet Susa asor kepangri atum pen,
kethenei lapen kangtangnei Ashurbanipal amethang ahem pen Samaria lapen adung-arei Nichi a-Euphratis alongri kepadotoi arat atum penpen.
La helo ketok aloh alam:
Rechokethe Artaserses aphan aloh, alangli ban atum, Nichi a-Euphratis amonit atum pen.

Nelitum recho aphan kepachini kangtung alam la helo, kaprek alongri-heihei pen dak kevang a-Judia atum Jerusalem along nangdolo lapen hala bang abe-kethurver arongsopi kimthutang-lo. Halatum apaisong-heihei kekimthu chengtang-lo, lapen paplengdappo.
Rechokethe, laso arongsopi jongsi kimthulote lapen la apaisong tang-lote, laso arat atum midu-heihei pipedetji, lapen nangli midu kelongji kamkedetpo.
Non, pima nelitum anta nanglibersi do lapen nelitum lapuson kepaplangji ingtungte, lasi nelitum choningrilo,

Nangli phusar atum kebi alam-heihei kepariji hukum pinon. Nangli klemlote labangso arongsopi kaita bang abe-thurver lapen hako ahut penta recho atum lapen kepangri atum aphan pasungverlo, pu thek-longpo. Labangso arat aphan kepangri kaita sung-o. La apotsi bangso arongsopi kepavir nang-lo pu chinipo.
Lasi nelitum chinilorlo, laso arongsopi lapen la apaisong jongsi kimtang lote, recho, nangli Nichi Euphratis alongri kepangri sungkrungji.
Recho kethe labangso alam thak-lo:
Rehum, govornor aphan, Shimshai, longri achunbang aphan lapen alangli kam klemrap-rap Samaria lapen Nichi a-Euphratis kedo-an aphan kardom.
Nanglitum nangkelo aloh lamlar si neli ingno paporhelo.
Neli kepariji hukum pitang-lo lapen labangso alam long-lo, latum hako ahut penta Jerusalem ke recho alam kroikreverlo lapen la kaita abe-thurversi kepasung abang cheplang-lo.
Kangtangnei arecho laso a-Nichi a-Euphratis alongri aputhak pangrilo lapen midu-heihei ta rung-lo.
La apotsi nangtum latum amonit aphuthak ne pen hukum-heihei longletik rongsopi kekimthu akam kepasangji aphan hukum pinon.
La non amat klemnon, ansi ne kam-heihei aputhak thang akesung avedetpo.

Labangso aloh Artaserses pen Rehum, Shimshai lapen halatum kam klemrap-rap atum aphan porhedet aphi, latum Jerusalem anat damphit-lo lapen Judia atum aphan rongsopi kekimthu akam jakong pen pasangkok-lo.
Darias, Parsi arechokethe recho kecho hini aningkan nangleletik Kardomhemthepi kekim akam sangkok-lo.
Halabangso ahut banghini amontri lake Haggai lapen Zakariah, Iddo asomar, Israel a-Arnam amen pen Judah lapen Jerusalem along kedo a-Judia atum aphan kemontri pang-cheng-lo.

Shealtiel asopo Jerubbabel lapen Jehozadak asopo Joshua latum abirta arjulong-lok pen latum Kardomhemthepi Jerusalem along kekimthuji aphan cheng-lo lapen la banghini amontri atum halatum aphan rapdunlo.

Menmen asonsi Nichi a-Euphratis a-Govornor, Tattenai, Shethar-Bozenai, lapen halatum kam klemrap-rap atum Jerusalem vangsi pulo, “Komatsi nangtum aphan labangso a-Kardomhemthepi kekimji lapen kepaplengji ahukum ketholo?”
Halatum Kardomhemthepi kekim kerap dun atum an amonit amen hang-lo.
Bonta Judia asongja aphuthak Arnam langkribom, lapen Parsi achakri atum Darias aphan loh toktetik lapen alangli pen kethak longletik ke thang panonelo pusi chesik rong-lo.
