Rechokethe aphan ketok kelong alam lahelo:
Darias rechokethe aphan, nangli ningkangsam pen pangri-longnang.

Nangli recho kechininangji alam ke la helo, nelitum Judah alongri damlo lapen Arnam kethe Kardomhemthepi arlongpi pen kekimthu lapen arpong athak kapat kepangni thek-long-lo. Labangso akam klempamesi penang an klemtang-lo.
Rat kejalin atum aphan komatsi Kardomhemthepi kekimthuji lapen kepaplengji ahukum kepima pu nelitum aphan nethantha pusi arjulo.
Labangso akam along kechetodun asongja atum aphan nangli kepachini thekji aphan amen anta arjulo.
Halatum nethak-lo, “Netum ke pirthe lapen sining a-Arnam aban lapen netum Kardomhemthepi kekimthu ke Israel arecho kang-tangnei abang aphrang kekimthot adimsi non kekimthulo.

Bonta netum aphusar atum Sining Arnam aphan aning pathihak amatsi Chaldia akhei inut arecho, Bebilon a-Nebukadnezzar, Arnam halatum aphan patengkheng long-lo. Kardomhemthepi pavirdet-lo, lapen rat aso aphan Bebilon adet ban pondet-lo.
Ansi Bebilon arechokethe Sairas recho kecho kecheng aningkan, Sairas Kardomhemthepi kekimthujisi hukum-heihei tholo.

Alangli Kardomhemthepi aser, arup ajohton-heihei Nebukadnezzar, Jerusalem along a-Kardomhemthepi pen kepontang ason lapen Bebilon akardom ahem along kebitang ason an pavoithulo. Lahei ajohton Judah a-Govornor Sheshbazzar pu amen arideng Sairas hodailo.
Rechokethe alangliphan hala-hei paponsi Jerusalem along Kardomhemthepi along kevoithuji lapen kardomhemthepi aphrang keparjap adimthot kekimthuji aphan pulo.
Lasi Sheshbazzar vang-lo lapen ahemthur elo; halabangso arni pen kekim akam nonta klembomlo, bonta Kardomhemthepi kekim tangtelang.”

Non la jongsi recho aphan aningpadok-lo pulote Sairas Recho labangso a-Kardomhemthepi Jerusalem along kekimthuji aphan hukum-heihei pitang-loma pipelangma alam kechiniji aphan Bebilon along ketok-kebi along parilonang, anle nanglining kehang kopima nelitum aphan pachinithunon.
Lasi Bebilon along ketoktang kebi alam-heihei kepariji aphan Darias rechokethe hukum-heihei pilo.
Bonta la Ekbatana pu arongsopi Media alongri bangso aloh athui long-lok-lo, kebi alam lahei helo:

Sairas rechokethe recho kecho kecheng aningkan Kardomhemthepi aphrang athok kepi adim lapen kephrin adan-heihei kepi adim Jerusalem along kepakimthuji aphan hukum pilo. Kardomhemthepi kangtui ingrup throk-kep, lapen arpan ingrup throk-kep nangji.
Arpong ke arlong pharthom athaktin kapat athengpi ephar donangji. Kenangji an akhorot recho akhipuru pen padam nangji.
Lapen ke ser, rup ajohton-heihei recho Nebukadnezzar, Jerusalem Kardomhemthepi pen Bebilon kevan amar anta Jerusalem Kardomhem along lahei aphrang adimthot voithu-et nangji.
Ansi Darias aber ketok alam thak-lo:
Nichi a-Euphratis a-Govornor, Tattenai, Shethar Bozenai, lapen nanglong kam klemrap-rap ari atum Nichi a-Euphratis asor.
Kardomhem pen chepahelo non
lapen la kekim akam along khamkheduntap-ri. Judah a-Govornor lapen Judia asongja atum Arnam Kardomhem aphrang adimthot pakimthunang.

Neli nangliphan hukum pilo, la kekimthujile halatum aphan nang rapdunnon. Kam kesangsedetjile Nichi a-Euphratis along kerung pen kelong amidu recho apuru-heihei pen prapjin pen halatum akhorot pinangji.

Arni arni pachimitmepin kurusar atum Jerusalem along halatum amar nangphan nangkehang an pidun nangji. Chainong asomar, biresak mate biresak asomar, Sining Arnam aphan kephrin-i athok-heihei mate thengthe, ingti, drakha ahorlang mate jit ajangthu jokta pinangji.
La keklem nangji atheke halatum sining a-Arnam kedengme athok-heihei kepi thekji lapen ne lapen nesomar aphuthak alangli ahirjume kedoji aphan ardompo.
Ne puthot hukum pilo, mane jongsi labangso ahukum kekroikre abangphan ahem akapat sanjoksi, angchun pangchim pamepo lapen abang kronglutpo. Lapen la ahem paruhappo.

Jerusalem along keparchoji aphan kechingvaitang a-Arnamle laso ahukum kepinrem lapen Kardomhem kepavirji pu kebor-i arecho mate adet aphan pavirnang, ne Darias si laso ahukum kepilo. La kadokaveta kroipet nangji.
Ansi Tattenai govornor, Shethar Bozenai, lapen halatum keklem-rappet ari atum rechokethe ahukum kepitang atengthot klemlo.

Judia asongja atum rechokethe kardomhem kekim pachun long-olo, atheke Haggai lapen Jekaariah montri atum aning keparungdun apot. Halatum aphan Israel Arnam lapen Sairas, Darias lapen Artaserses Parsi arechokethe atum hukum kepi ateng Kardomhemthepi paplengdet-lo.
Latum Darias rechokethe throk aningkan recho kecho ahut Adar achiklo kethom arni Kardomhemthepi papleng-lo.
Ansi Israel arat atum, kurusar atum, Levi atum lapen kedo-an ban kedampen nangkechevoi-tang atum aning arong pen Kardomhem hodailo.
Kehodai aphan halatum jon 100 achainong alo, jon 200 abiresak, jon 400 abiresak aso kethokji aphan dan-heihei pilo, lapen bi jon 12 pap athok aphan, Israel arotin aphan ejon jon pilo.
Halatum kurusar lapen Levi atum Jerusalem Kardomhem along kepaklemji aphan bat-lo, Moses aloh along kethan ateng-lo.
Kecheng achiklo, 14 arni, ban kedam pen kechevoi arat atum Kejok Amei talonlo.
Kurusar kedo-an lapen Levi atum kedo-an chepangthirlo lapen aron ateng pen ingthir-et-lo. Kechevoitang arat aphan kurusar lapen amethang aphan Kejok Amei kethokjisi Levi atum pi-heihei that-lo.
Kedo-an Israel ban kedam pen kechevoi atum, lapen kedobom arat kaprek arnam kardomthap ke-o atum lapen Israel a-
Halatum ni throksi an thap-kave ahim achojun amei talonlo. Halatum aning arongpik-lo, pima

Ongdung aningkan aphi, Artaserses, Parsi arechokethe recho kecho ahut Ezra pu amen inut amonit dolo. Alangli phusar angthun ha Aaron kurusarpo an ingthumlo: Ezra ke Seraiah asopo, la Azariah asopo, la Hilkiah asopo,
la Shallum asopo, la Zadok asopo, la Ahitub asopo,
la Amariah asopo, la Azariah asopo, la Merioth asopo,
la Zerahiah asopo, la Uzzi asopo, la Bukki asopo,
la Abishua asopo, la Phinehas asopo, la Eleazar asopo, la Aaron asopo.
Ezra inut loh ketok abang, lapen Israel atum a-Arnam, Moses pen kepi

Artaserses throksi aningkan recho kecho ahut Ezra Bebilon pen Jerusalem anat esong Israel arat pen damlo laso along kurusar atum, Levi atum, Kardomhem alunse atum, Kardomhem kehon atum, lapen kam keklem atum do.
Kecheng achiklo, kecheng arni si halatum Bebilon otekang-lo,
lapen Arnam akerap pen latum pho achiklo, kecheng arni Jerusalem nanglelo.
Ezra
Artaserses aber ketoktang kebi ason kurusar lapen tok-bang, Ezra aphan pilo, alangli ke Israel atum aphan
Rechokethe Artaserses pen Sining Arnam aron ketok abang kurusar Ezra aphan.
Ne hukum pilo, nedet angbong kedo-an Israel arat, kurusar atum lapen Levi atum aningkehang abang aling nanglong Jerusalem nangpadun nang.
Ne pen bang 7 thanpare atum Jerusalem lapen Judah kopusonloma kelangji aphan nangliphan nangtoilo, nang Arnam aron ko-an akeme kekroipet thekji aphansi nangliphan arpu pitang-lo.
Nanglilong ser, rup adan-heihei neli lapen neli thanpare atum Israel a-Arnam aphan Jerusalem along Kardomhemthepi along kepiji ning kehang ason pon iknon.
Nangli ako Bebilon alongri kerungtang aser-arup kedo-an lapen Israel arat lapen akurusar atum Jerusalem along kedo halatum a-Arnam Kardomhemthepi aphan kepi an ta pon-etnon.
Labangso atangka nangli padam pamenangji lapen chainong aloso, biresak aloso, biresak aso, a-ok, lapen drakha ahorlang lapen Jerusalem a-Kardomhemthepi along lahei thok-non.
Ser-rup, him an nang lapen nangri sangho atum aningkehang ateng penle rimnon.
Nangrideng nangkepi ajohton an Jerusalem along Kardomhemthepi akam aphan Arnam angno hodainon.
Lapen nang akenang ason an recho akhipuru pen enlongpo.
Nichi Euphratis alongri khipuru akam keklem atum aphan ne hukum pilo, Ezra, kurusar lapen Sining Arnam aron tok-bang, kehang alingle prapjin pen pidunnon,
isi ahoi lake rup lin 3,400 an, lapen thengthe lin 10,000 an, drakha ahorlang lin 2,000 an, Jit ajangthu lin 2,000 an, lapen ingti kenang an.
Mathapamera Sining Arnam amethang Kardomhemthepi aphan kenangji amar an pinon, lapen ne lapen nephi kepangri atum aphuthak Alangli aning kethithe detjile akeme klemnon.
Kurusar atum, Levi atum, lunse atum, kehon atum kam keklem atum pen pen mate laso a-Kardomhemthepi pen kecherap badu pen tame nangli midu rung-longle.

Ezra, nangli nang Arnam nangliphan nangkepi abidi lake jalin atum aphan lapen kangsai atum nangli Arnam aron pen kedo, kedo-an Nichi Euphratis arat kepangriji aphan kebatjile rimnon. Aron kechini abangphan nang thanvek nangji.
Mane jongsi nang Arnam aron-heihei mate rechokethe aron-heihei kroikrelote prapjin pen aduk pinangji kepathi pen tame, mate ban ketoi tame, mate amar kekuruk tame, mate kebeng setamelo.
Ezra pulo, “
Arnam kangjinso pen ajok neli rechokethe, alangli thanpare atum, lapen jakongthepik ajalin atum pen kangjinso long-lo;
Lahei helo Bebilon along ban-kedam aro-heihei ajalin atumlo; lapen Artaserses rechokethe kecho un ahut Ezra along Jerusalem anat nangkechevoi dun atum:
Phinehas aro pen Gershom, Ithamar aro pen Daniel David aro pen Shekaniah asopo Hattush.
Parosh aro pen Jekaariah along bang 150 amonit amethang aro pen. (Latum aphusar angthun kebi-alam do.)
Pehath Moab aro pen Jekaariah asopo Eliahonai along 200 amonit do.
Zattu aro pen Jehaziel asopo Shekaniah along bang 300.
Adin aro pen Jonathon asopo Ebed along bang 50 amonit do.
Elam aro pen Athaliah asopo Jeshaiah along bang 70 amonit do.
Shephatiah aro pen Maikel asopo Zebadiah along bang 80 amonit do.
Joab aro pen Jehiel asopo Obadiah along bang 218 amonit do.
Bani aro pen Josiphiah asopo Shelomith along bang 160 amonit do.
Bebai aro pen Bebai asopo Jekaariah along bang 28 amonit do.
Azgad aro pen Hakkatan asopo Johanan along bang 110 amonit do.
Adonikam aro pen Eliphelet, Jehuel, lapen Shemaiah along bang 60 amonit do. (Latum aphi adihusi kevang.)
Bigvai aro pen Uthai lapen Zakur along bang 70 amonit do.
Ahava arongsopi anat keli adong along song do-an ne pangrumlo, lapen nithom mukam alongsi netum hadak dolo. Ne thek-long-lo song along kurusar atum do bonta Levi atum ave.
Ne bang sirkep songja atum aphan toilo; Eliezer, Ariel, Shemaiah, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Jekaariah, lapen Meshullam lapen banghini thanbang Joiarib lapen Elnathan.
Halatum aphan ne Iddo, Kashiphia arong keja abang along toilo, alangli lapen ri asangho Kardomhemthepi kam-klembang, netum along rat nangketoi pen Kardomhem along Arnam aphan kangdukji aphan.
Arnam akanghon pen halatum Sherebiah, inut klem-unbang, Mahli aro a-Levi, lapen bang 18 asomar lapen amumar alanglilong nangdunlo.
Halatum Hashabiah lapen Jeshaiah, Merari aro along bang 20 adon-arap nangdunlo.
La apar ta bang 200 Kardomhemthepi klembang atum David recho lapen arisangho atum latum aphan aphu arni pen kepathiktang atum dolo. Halatum kedo-an amen tok-et-lo.

Ahava adong along kedo-an aphan ne hukum-heihei pilo, an-kehum lapen emethang a-Arnam angno chepabihek nangji aphan lapen tovar kedam ahut akeja kelongji aphan lapen netum lapen netum asomar lapen kedo-an amar kerai kelongji aphan pardomtoilo.

Rechokethe pen ne kerai asong hotur atum pen tovar kedam un ahut kechedan ron-aso kehang therak-hik-lo, pima ne alangliphan pulo, netum a-Arnam ke Alangliphan kechiki atum aphan pahirme, bonta Alangliphan aning padokde abang badu setame Alangli pen kesui atum aphan aduk pi.
Lasi netum Arnam pen kerai longji aphan an-humlo lapen ardomlo, lapen Alangli netum akardom-heihei thak-lo.
Anong kedo akurusar atum angbong pen ne Sherebiah, Hashabiah, lapen kaprek bang kep atum aphan ingvailo.
Ansi ne ser, rup, lapen ajohton-heihei rechokethe, alangli thanpare atum, lapen chakri atum, lapen Israel arat Kardomhemthepi aphan keparimtoi amar an linlo lapen la kurusar atum arideng hodaidet-lo.
Lahei helo ne halatum aphan Kepi: Rup mon 550, Son 100 rup ajohton-heihei pangrum pet lin 70, Ser mon 85,
Ser aharlung lin 8 ra gram 400, 2 kenaibot tam aharlung, ser aharlung ador pen chingbar.
Ne latum aphan pulo, “Nang nangphusar atum a-Arnam,
Kardomhemthepi leletik lahei hon pamenon. Kurusar atum angdeng lahei linnon lapen kurusar atum lapen Levi atum ajalin atum lapen Jerusalem along kedo Israel arat asongja arideng hodainon.”
Lasi kurusar atum lapen Levi atum Jerusalem a-Kardomhemthepi along ser, rup lapen ajohton-heihei keponji aphan arpu deng-lo.
Kecheng achiklo, krehini arni, netum Ahava osi Jerusalem damlo. Netum Arnam netum along dolo, lapen netum kedambom ahut hotur ketengkheng pen lapen tovar ketonding atum pen pajok-lo.
Netum Jerusalem kele ahut, netum nithom sang-lo.

Lapen phli arni netum Kardomhemthepi damlo, ser, rup ajohton-heihei linlo, lapen Uriah asopo Meremoth pu akurusar aphan lahei hodailo. Alanglilong Phinehas asopo Eleazar lapen banghini a-Levi Joshua asopo Jozabad lapen Binui asopo Noadiah.
Asontin ta lakhapet lapen lin et-lo, lapen laso ahut amatsi isi kechok-lim alam toksi bipamelo.

Bankedam pen kechevoi atum an Israel a-Arnam along kephrin athok-heihei kepijisi vanlo. Halatum jon 12 achainong aloso Israel aphan, biresak aloso jon 96, lapen biresak aso jon 77; lapen bi jon 12 amethang apap pen kechepangthirji aphan vanlo. La kedo-an api
Halatum aphan rechokethe kepitang lamtok aloh cheponlo, lapen Nichi a-Euphratis a-Govornor atum lapen achakri atum arideng la hodailo, ansi latum ta rat along kerap lapen Kardomhem karcho chetodunlo.

La kadokave klemtangdet aphi, ajehak Israel arat kejalin atum nelilong vangsi pulo, rat atum, kurusar atum, lapen Levi atum adung-arei adet Ammon arat, Moab lapen Ijip mate Kanan asor, Hitti asor, Perijit asor, Jebusi asor lapen Amor asor pen chepaprekpre. Latum bang atum kehijimmeme akam-heihei keklem asonthotsi klemlo.
Judia atum bang adet a-arloso aphan piso enlo, lapen lapusonsi Arnam kangthir-et arat pangthirthelo. Jalin atum lapen chakri atum helo kechokche akethenei.
Neli la arjulong-lok pen ning-oisi neli pe-ri chingsek-lo, nelichu lapen neli ingmum chephulo, lapen ning runhupsi ingnijoilo.

Arnikangsam athok kethokji apor nangleletik an neli hadak ningke-oi pen ingnilunverlo, lapen rat atum nekompetsi chingrumlo, la kephere atum an, pima ban kedam atum apap alam Israel a-Arnam putang-lo.

Arnikangsam athok kepiji apor nangkele ahut neli ningduk pen kangnilun adim pen thurphlut-lo, seta kangsektang achoisi neli chingchoi bomlang, neli kengphu patongrui lo lapen neliri chirungsi ne Arnam
Neli pulo, “O Arnam, Nang ingno ne ingphun kechirungji aphan therak-lo. Netum apap-heihei chebuihup-lo, netum aphu kangtui an soselo; lahei sining-heihei kangtui asonsi ingtuilo.

Netum aphusar arni pen nonpu anta netum Nangrat asolo, lapen thedung apap klemtang-lo. Pima netum apap apot recho atum arideng donang-et-lo, lapen netum aphan thu-that-et-lo, thiparohumlo, lapen kebengjisi nepondet-lo. Non netum kedonang asonthotsi netum aphan langrempik khangjang-lo.
Non thihek apor aphan anchot, O

Netum ban donang-lo bonta Nang netum aphan ban padovervedet-lo. Nang Parsi arechokethe netum aphan pajinsosi kerutang Nang Kardomhemthepi along padolong-lo lapen pakimthulong-lo, lapen Judah lapen Jerusalem along akerai long-lo.”
Bonta non, O Arnam, kedo-an klemtangdet aphi kopisi netum puthekjilangma?

Netum puthot nangban, montri atum pen netum aphan kepitang ahukum-heihei kroikretang-lo. Halatum nepulo, etum kecheraidamji alongle ke isi kangthirthe alongle pima ladak kedobom arat atum kangthirthe akamsi isi angchun pen ha kejut angchun an plengset-lo.

Halatum netum aphan nepulo, bang ajat pen kaita che-en chedori lapen halatum jongsi aningjangtik an longle kechingthurji mate ke-unji aphan ninghang-lo lapen laso alongle mo aso-asu aphan kaike epiverpo pu seta rap dun nangne.

Netum apap-heihei lapen kechokche pen ajok kephonangji an aduk netum phonang-lo seta netum chini, nang netum a-Arnamsi aduk netum aphan pilo, seta netum kephonangji ateng an pipedet-lo, lapen netum aphan kerengthuji avarsai pilo.

Lasi kopusonsi netum Nanghukum-heihei abatai batai longledet poma lapen lahei kehingnodak arat pen keche-en-kechedo poma? Jongsi netum klemlote, Nangning thihaksi netum aphan pavirdet khangjangpo lapen badu aphan seta pareng longledetpo.
, Israel a-Arnam, Nang ahokpet lapen netum aphan pareng-lo. Netum ado Nangphan chekobirlo; netum Nang ingno kevangji a-ot ave.
Ezra Kardomhemthepi athengno kechiru lapen pap-heihei kechekobir kardom tongdik ahut, asong thedung pinso-arlo, lapen osomar a-Israel atum alanglidung kompetsi chingrumlo, lapen un an chirudunjolo.
Ansi Jehiel asopo Shekaniah, Elam aro, Ezra aphan pulo, “Netum kaprek ajat aphan piso-ke-en, pinan-kedo la pen ajok Arnam aphan kroikredet-lo. Seta Israel aphan isi ningkethe dolang.

Non etum e-Arnam angno thirklong ason chechak lonang, etum keche-en, kechedo bang ajat an, osomar an cheti-et lonang. Netum nangli lapen kaprek Arnam ahukum aphan man kepi atum netum aphan kepare aling netum klempo. Arnam aron-heihei kehang aling netum klempo.
Lake nanglisi keklem nangji, nangli arpulo. Netum nangli phi dolo, la apotsi nangli klemra la patangdet non.”
Lasi Ezra, kurusar atum, Levi atum lapen kedo-an rat ajalin atum aphan Shekaniah kepu ateng klemdunpo pu seme pa-en pen cheng-lo.

Ansi la Kardomhemthepi athengno pen damjuisi Eliashib asopo Jehohanan kedo angdeng arlo lutdamsi jopangthang akekroi kave bankedam atum aphuthak ningduksi pangthang-lo. La thangnat asonta choche-junjedet-lo.
Isi abirta Jerusalem lapen Judah alongri bankedam pen nangkechevoi atum an aphan Jerusalem along kechetong-petji aphan
rat ajalin atum ahukum pen pachethang-toilo. Jongsi mane abang nithom angbong nangchetong dun thekthe pulote, labangso amar an thipon-etpo, lapen la rat amei abangphu keplangji ajakong en-edetpo.

Nithom angbong, sirkep achiklo, 20 arni, Judah lapen Benjamin alongri kedo-an amonit atum Jerusalem vang-lo lapen Kardomhemthepi achetai along chingrumpet-lo. Laso ahut arve jangpik lapen botor lapen akenangsot amei apot rat atum anut-tinta klemhurlo.
Ezra, kurusar arjapsi halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum akekroi kave lapen bang adet a-arloso aphan ke-en pen Israel aputhak ado vanlo.
Non lasi nangphusar atum a-Arnam,
Rat atum thakdunpet-lo, “Nang kepu aling netum klempo.”

Lapen halatum ingthunthulo, “Armu ongpik, lapen arveta jangpik. Lapuson ingtan netum arjapver un-e. Lake arnisi mate nini angbong keklem un akam kali, pima ake-ongpi netum laso apap along cherapdunlo.

Netum achakri atum Jerusalem padolonang lapen akam arpu padeng-lonang, lapen bang adet apiso kedo abang apor kethiktang ateng pen la arongsopi ajalin lapen kangsai atum pen pen pavang-lonang. Lasonsi laso ahut aputhak Arnam aningkethi hamji mene.”
Asahel asopo Jonathan lapen Tokvah asopo Jahzeiah pen apar baduta laso akemang along khinde abang avedet-lo, latum Meshullam lapen Shobbethai, a-Levi pen abe chelong-lo.

Bankedam pen nang kechevoi atum bangso akemang deng-lo, lasi Ezra kurusar arotin jabang atum angbong pen pinso ingvailo , lapen halatum amen tokdetsi bikoilo. Kep achiklo, kecheng arni halatum keri pangcheng-lo,
lapen chiklo jonthom angbong pen latum bang adet apiso kedo abangphu alam an ri patang-lo.
Bang adet apiso kedo amonit atum amen aber ketok helo: Kurusar atum aro pen amen: Joshua aro lapen la amumar atum Jehozadak asomar atum: Maaseiah, Eliezer, Jarib lapen Gedaliah.
Latum apiso atum aphan kechetiji aphan chechak-lo, lapen halatum apap-heihei aphan biresak aloso athok pilo.
Immer aro: Hanani lapen Zebadiah,
Harim aro: Maaseiah, Elijah, Shemaiah, Jehiel, lapen Uzziah.
Pashhur aro: Elionai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethanel, Jozabad, lapen Elasah.
Levi atum: Jozabad, Shimei, Kelaiah, (Kelita pu ta pu), Pethahiah, Judah lapen Eliezer.
Lunse atum: Eliashib, Kardomhemthepi honbang atum: Shallum, Telem, lapen Uri.
Kaprek atum: Parosh aro: Ramiah, Izziah, Malkijah, Mijamin, Eleazar, Malkiah lapen Benaiah.
Elam aro: Mattaniah, Jekaariah, Jehiel, Abdi, Jeremoth lapen Elijah.
Zattu aro: Elioenai, Eliahib, Mattaniah, Jeremoth, Zabad lapen Aziza.
Bebai aro: Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, lapen Athlai.
Bani aro: Meshullam, Malluk, Adaiah, Jemhub, Sheal lapen Jeremoth.
Pahath Moab aro: Adna, Chelal, Benaiah, Maashiah, Mattaniah, Bezalel, Binnui lapen Manasseh.
Harim aro: Eliezer, Isshiah, Malkiah, Shemaiah, Shimeon,
Benjamin, Maluk, lapen Shemariah.
Hashum aro: Mattenai, Mattattah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Menasseh, lapen Shimei.
Bani aro: Maadai, Amram, Uel,
Benaiah, Bedeiah, Cheluhi,
Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliashib,
Mattaniah, Mattenai, Jemsu.
Binnui aro: Shimei,
Shelemiah, Nathan, Adaiah,
Machnadebai, Shashai, Sharai,
Azarel, Shelemiah, Shemariah,
Shallum, Amariah, lapen Joseph.
Nebo aro: Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jaddai, Joel lapen Benaiah.
Lahei amonit atum bang adet apiso dorep. Latum halahei chiti et-lo, lapen halatum aphan lapen halatum asomar an aphan toi et-lo .
La helo Hakaliah asopo Nehemiah kepachuntang alamjir.
Parsi arecho kethe Artaserses ningkan 20 recho kecho ahut Kislev achiklo, neli Nehemiah, Susa, la det arongsopi alongrisi dolo.
Neli korte angbong pen inut, esong amonit atum pen pen Judah pen nanglelo, lapen neli halatum aphan Jerusalem alam lapen Bebilon ban kedam pen nang kechevoitang, a-Judah akorte atum alam arjulo.

Halatum neliphan nethanlo, amethang alongle hem kechevangtang kerenglang atum ke sungpiksi kedo lapen adung arei kedo bang adet aso atum halatum aphan langrop khangjang-lo. Jerusalem arpong-heihei ta ru-et-lo, lapen halahei me kekai arni pen anghap-heihei selamle pinlang pusi halatum nelithan thulo.
Neli la arjulong-lok pen ingnijoisi chirulo.
Penang an arni neli chirulo lapen an chochelo. Neli Arnam aphan ardomlo.
“Sining Arnam

Neliphan nelangtha, Hemphu, ne Nangban Israel arat atum aphan ajo lapen anerlo kardomver asonthak thak ne kardom arjutha. Ne chekobirlo, netum Israel arat pap klemtang-lo. Nephusar atum lapen ne, pap klemtang-lo.
Netum Nangbe thursi kehingno akam klemlo lapen Nang kepaklemtoi akam klemkledet-lo. Nangban Moses pen Nang kepi aron-heihei netum ot-edet-lo.
Moses aphan Nang kepu alam chemathatha: ‘nangtum Israel arat jongsi kroithipthe pulote kaprek adet atum angbong nangpadamjamji.
Bonta nangtum Ne rat vang-lote lapen Ne kepaklemtoi ateng klemlote, Nephan keparchoji adimthot Ne nangvanthuji, nangtum pirthe kejut an hijikjam seta.’”
Hemphu lahei atum Nangbanlo lapen Nang-rat asolo. Nang latum aphan Nang jakong kethe lapen kangtang pen pajok-lo.
Ne kardom lapen nangban man kepiji nangban atum an akardom-heihei non arjutha. Nephan pini pa-un longtha lapen rechokethe nephan pajinso longtha.
Halaso ahut ne rechokethe aharlung kepon abang-lo.
Chiklo jonphli aphi, ansi recho-kethe Artaserses an kecho ahut, neli horlang alangli anat ponlo. Nelining ke-oi alangli aphrang nethek-longle pinlang,
lasi neliphan arjulo, “Nang kopi athesi pu-an ning kechepa-oiloma? Nangphu kesoma, nangning arong avedet?”
Neli manghuhaksi thak-lo,
“Rechokethe achethe padingnang! Nephusar atum aphan kepip arongsopi virtang-lo lapen la anghap-heihei anta me pen pavir-tang-et ahut neli kopusonsi ning cheparong-thek poma?”
Rechokethe neli arjulo, “Tangte, la nang kopisi keklemji ning kehang-lo?”
Neli sining Arnam aphan ardomlo,

lapen neli rechokethe aphan pulo, “Rechokethe jongsi neliphan ningdok-lo pulote lapen neli kechoningri ason kepiji ninghang pulote, neliphan neliphusar atum aphan kepip arongsopi neli kekimthuji aphan Judah adet nelitum aphan padamlongtha.”

Rechokethe, rechopikethe pen alangli dung ingni rap-rap ahut neli kechoningri ason deng-lo. Alangli neliphan ni ko-an do damjima lapen komantusi nang chevoithujima arjulo lapen neli arjulo, lapen neli alangliphan thanlo.
Ansi neli alangliphan pulo, Judah adet kedam longji aphan Nichi a-Euphratis alongri a-Govornor kedamlong aloh-heihei nang paloduntoilo.

Kardomhemthepi kehon atum apaisong anghap-heihei aphan, rongsopi arpong-heihei aphan lapen neli kedoji ahem aphan thengpi nang kepathonjile recho a-ingnam kehon abang Asaph aphanta loh nangpalo duntoilo. Arnam neliphan kerap apot neli kehang ason an rechokethe nelipi dun-et-lo.

Rechokethe nelilong ron apinpo atum lapen losei kardon esong amonit atum nangtoi dunlo, lapen neli Nichi a-Euphratis anat kedam pangcheng-lo. Govornor atum aphan hadak rechokethe aloh-heihei neli pajirlo.
Bonta Beth Horon arong pen Sanballat lapen Tobiah, Ammon alongri achakri atum Israel arat aphan keme akam keklemjisi inut amonit vangtang-lo pu arjulongsi, halatum aning dokdedet-lo.
Neli Jerusalem damlo, lapen

Jerusalem aphan kopisi keklem nangjima laphan Arnam nelining parung-lo, bangso alam nithom anbak neli badu aphanta thanthedet-lo, lapen jirlo apor neli thurphlutsi ajehak neri sangho nelilong cheponsi damjoilo. Nelitum kepon api ke neli kardon agadhachot.
Rongsopi Nichi anat Ruiphe Alangbop apar damsi Phelo aberi Anghap anat nanglelo. Dambomsi kerutang arpong-heihei lang-lo.
Ansi rongsopi a-Nihang pen Nitur kangbop Anghap anat lapen Recho Alangteng anat damlo. Bonta neli kardon agadha vang-ui-ai atovar angbong damthekthe det-lo.
Lasi neli Kidron Arlok anat sunsi arpong langponbomsi damlo. Ansi neli kevang atovarthot chiruithusi Arlok Anghap anat pen rongsopi arlo damlo.

Neli konatsi kedamloma mate kopisi keklemloma la badu achakri atumta chininedet-lo. Neliri asangho a-Judia kurusar atum, jalin atum, chakri atum mate laso akam along nangkecherap dunji atum badu aphan seta laso alam neli thanthe pinlang.

Bonta non neli halatum aphan thanlo, langnon, pima Jerusalem lapen anghap-heihei keru-et pen ajok etum ko-an sungnang-loma! Etum rongsopi arpong-heihei kimthulonang lapen etum aphan akelangrem pajut lonang.
Lapen nelilong Arnam nangdodunsi ko-an nelirap loma lapen rechokethe kopisi neliphan pu loma neli halatum aphan thanlo.
Halatum thak-rappet-lo, “Etum kekimthuji cheng-lonang!” Lapen halatum kam kechengji chesik-lo.
Sanballat, Tobiah lapen inut Arob amonit amen ke Geshem pu nelitum keklemji alam arjulongsi halatum nelitum aphan ingnekchoilo, lapen pulo, “Nangtum rechokethe abe-tong kethurjima?”

Neli thak-lo, “Sining Arnamsi nelitum aphan pachun longpo. Nelitum Alangliban lapen nelitum kekimji aphan chengpo. Bonta Jerusalem akhi aputhak nangli thangnat jakong ave lapen la Nim-rokom-heihei along nangli pharman ave.”

Lasonsi rongsopi arpong kimthulo Kurusar Eliashib lapen alangliri asangho kurusar atum Biresak Anghap kimthulo, lapen la pangthir-et-lo, lapen anghap-heihei aphrang adimthot bilo. Halatum Pharo ahemchardon lapen Hananel ahemchardon anta pangthir-et-lo.
Jeriko amonit atum adunthu angdengsi kimlo.
Imri asopo Zakur adun angdengsi kimlo.
Hassenah aro Lang-ok Anghap kimlo. Halatum ajakan-heihei lapen anghap-heihei adimthotsi padolo, lapen inghap kangkirji asak-thepo-heihei lapen abarlon-heihei bilo.
Uriah asopo Meremoth lapen Hakkos, asupo, adun angdeng kimlo.
Berekiah asopo Meshullam lapen Meshezabel asupo atum adun angdeng kimlo.
Tekoa amonit atum adun angdeng kimlo, bonta kamkelang atum kopisi halatum aphan kepaklemtoi kechepaduk akam rongsopi keja atum keklemji molo.

Paseah asopo Joiada lapen Besodeiah asopo Meshullam, Jeshanah Anghap kimthulo. Halatum ajarbop-heihei lapen anghap-heihei adimthotsi bilo, lapen inghap kangkirji aphan asak-thepo-heihei lapen abarlon-heihei bilo.
Gibeon pen Melatiah, Meronoth pen Jadon lapen Gilbeon lapen Mizpah amonit atum Nichi a-Euphratis a-Govornor ahem dairai an adung angdeng kimlo.
Harhaiah asopo Uzziel, la inut ser pachorbang, adung angdeng kimlo.
Hananiah jangthunemso pinchong-bang, Arpan keding arpong an adung angdeng kimlo.
Hur asopo Rephaiah, Jerusalem ebeng anglong pangribang, adun angdeng kimlo.
Harumapha asopo Jedaiah amethang ahem adung an angdeng kimlo.
Hashabneiah asopo Hattush, adun angdeng kimlo.
Harim asopo Malkijah lapen Pahath Moab asopo banghini atum pherang pu ahemchardon anta kimlo.
Hallohesh asopo Shallum, Jerusalem ebeng anglong pangribang adung angdeng an kimlo. (Alangli sopi atum kekim akam rap dunlo.)

Hanun lapen Zanoah arongsopi kedo atum Arlo Anghap kimthulo. Halatum anghap-heihei adimthotsi bilo, asak-thepo-heihei lapen inghap kangkirji aphan abarlon bilo, lapen Phelo-abui Anghap an ingrup 1000 rangthulo.
Rekab asopo Malkijah, Beth Hakerem anglong pangribang, Phelo-abui Anghap kimthulo. Alangli inghap-heihei adimthotsi bilo, lapen abarlon-heihei inghap kangkirji aphan bilo.

Kolhozeh asopo Shallum, Mizpah anglong pangribang lang-amek Anghap kimthulo. Alangli asarnung dip-lo, adimthotsi anghap-heiheita bilo lapen asak-thepo-heihei lapen barlon-heihei bilo. Shelah Alangteng along alangli Recho aberi adung arpong an ha David arongsopi kedam adongkam an kimlo.
Azbuk asopo Nehemiah, Bethzur anglong ebeng pangribang, adun angdeng David athiri, alangteng nokbe ahem-heihei anta kimlo.
Aber a-Levi atum helo arpong adung angdeng-heihei kimthulo:
Bani asopo Rehum adung angdeng si kimthulo;
Hashabiah, Keilah anglong ebeng pangribang, amethang anglong apharman angdeng kimdet-lo.
Henadad asopo Bavvai, Keilah anglong kaprek abeng anglong pangri-bang, adun angdeng kimlo;
Jeshua asopo Ezer, Mizpah pangribang, arpong ano chirnok apuru angno adung angdeng si kimlo;
Zabbai asopo Baruk, kurusarpo Eliashib ahem kedam atovar an adun angdeng kimlo.
Uriah asopo lapen Hakhoz asupo Meremoth atum Eliashib ahem an adung angdeng kimlo.
Aber akurusar atum helo arpong adung angdeng-heihei kimthu lo: Jerusalem adung arei akurusar atum adung angdeng kimlo;
Benjamin lapen Hasshub, latum ahem adung angdeng kimlo; Maaseiah asopo lapen Ananiah asopo Azariah alang methang ahem athengno angdeng si kimlo.
Henadad asopo Binnui, Azariah ahem pen arpong ano angdeng kimlo.
Palal arpong ano pen cheng-lok Recho Angsong ahemchardon, recho angphun-raibang atikup adung adun angdeng kimlo.
Parosh asopo Bedaiah, Nihang anat Lang Anghap lapen Kardom-hemthepi kerai ahemchardon adung adun angdeng kimlo. (Ophel pu arongsopi ebeng adung, hadak Kardomhemthepi kamklem atum kedo adim.)
Tekoa amonit atum adun angdeng kimlo, halatum hini angdeng abang Kardomhemthepi kerai ahem-chardon-thepo angden ha Ophel anat arpong anta kimlo.
Esong akurusar atum Losei Anghap pen amethang ahem athengnotin adun angdeng kimrep-lo.
Immer asopo Zadok, amethang ahem athengno adun angdengsi alangli kimlo.
Shekaniah asopo Shemaiah, Nihang Anghap honbang adun angdeng kimlo.
Shelemiah asopo Hananiah lapen Hanun, la Zalaph asopo kebi adakvam throk abang, halatum adun angdeng kimlo.
Berekiah asopo Meshullam ahemthengno adun angdeng kimlo.
Malkijah inut serpachorbang, adun angdeng kardomhem kekim atum lapen beha keklem atum, la rong-aso pangrum Anghap akung, Nirep-nihang a-arpong ano angsong angdeng kimlo.
Ser-pachor atum lapen Beha keklem atum kejutsi angdeng ano angdeng pen ha Biresak Anghap an kimlo.
Judia atum arpong kekim cheng-tang-lo pu Sanballat arjulongsi, alangli ning thihak-lo lapen nelitum aphan tamlo.

Alangli risangho atum lapen Samaria ron-asong angno la pulo, “Labangso a-Judia langno atum kopi akam keklemlo putong kechematha lone? Latum rongsopi kekimthujitong kemathama? Athok-heihei kepi pen latum kam arnisi angbong patang unji putong latum chemathama? Kerutang a-arlong abui lapen me kepachotang alongbui-heihei pen latum kim unjima?”
La adung Tobiah ta arjapding lapen lata lam ingthundunlo, “Kopi arpongsi latum kimthek poma? Laphan serung atum anta ardak-rai un!”

Neli ardomlo, “Netum aphan latum kelangrem arjutha, O Arnam! Halatum akangnekchoi halatum amethang aphuthak paklo nang. Halatum kedo an ason bang atumle pathi-et-lo nang, bang adet atum latum aphan pakokpon-et lonang.
Halatum kehingno keklem apot diyari lapen halatum apap-heihei diyari pima latum netum kekim an atum aphan pinremlo.”
Lasi netum arpong kimthubomlo, lapen la ebeng an lo ketang, pima rat atum kam keklemji aninghang-lo.
Sanballat, Tobiah, Arob asor, Ammon lapen Ashdod atum netum Jerusalem arpong kekimthu lapen kangthim pen pachinghip-tang-lo pu arjulongsi halatum aningthipik-lo,
lasi latum kedo-an chelangpet pen Jerusalem vangsi ketengkhengji aphan mang-lo, lapen pahuriseilo,
bonta netum a-Arnam aphan ardomlo, lapen ajo-nerlo halatum aphan ketondingji amonit bilo.
Judah arat atum kelun alun ejir do:
Anghor koibomsi netum do-olang
Kosonsi netum pini arpong kimthek-poma?
Netum ahotur atum mathalo netum halatum aphan thek-longle mate halatum netum along nangle hamhetik kopi plang-loma netum aphan pathisi netum akam keklem pasangkok-ketik ke netum chinine lo pu.
Bonta aphong aphongta hotur angbong kedo a-Judia atum vangsi netum aphan hotur kemang pen pacheretoilo.
Lasi rat atum aphan Nokjir, chir lapen thai-heihei pen pachesik-lo lapen kam ketangte adim arotin arpong anung halatum aphan padotoilo.

Rat atum aning ke-oi thek-longsi neli halatum aphan lapen halatum ajalin atum aphan lapen chakri atum aphan pulo, “Elitum ahotur aphan phereri, chemathanon etum a-Arnam ko-an kethe lapen kepherememe a-
Netum ahotur atum keklemji alam netum chinitang-lo pu hotur atum arjulong-lo, lapen Arnamsi halatum akemang paremtang-lo pu chechinilo, lapen nelitumta arpong kekimthuji aphan chedamthurep-lo.

Halaso ahut pen neli monit achi-tim atum kam klemlo, lapen achitim atum kechedan achoi chingchoisi tondingdang-lo, lapen chir-heihei, chong-heihei, thai-heihei che-ot-rep-lo. Lapen rat ajalin atum arpong kekim arat atum aphan un an cherapdunlo.
Hala herim-jintak keroi atumta ari ehong pen kam klemlo lapen ehong ke risim che-ot-lo,
lapen kekim abangphutinta avam along nokjir chesek nang-lo. Kepachereji aphan pong-ut kebut abang nelilongsi dolo.
Nelirat atum aphan, halatum achakri atum aphan lapen jalin atum aphan pulo, “Kam lapu-an chesang-lo, etum pu pu arpong pen kedo cheheloving-vang-lo.
Nangtum Jongsi pong-ut arki arjulong-lote neli dungle nang chingrum-petnon. Etum aphan Arnamsi echedanpipo.”
Lasonsi netum adapprang pen ajo chiklolongso lokbong-bang an achitim amonit atum arnivang arpong akam klemlo, lapen achitim atum ke chir-nok-heihei pen tonlo.
Laso ahut monit atum kelang abangphu aphan pulo, halatum rapbang atum an ajo Jerusalemsi padotoilo, anke ajo netum Jerusalem hon longpo lapen anerlo ke kam klem-longpo.
Neli, neliri sangho atum, neliban atum mate neliraibang atum anta ajo pe-ri cheseleledet-lo. Kedo-anta risim erideng chebirep-lo.
Penang an aphi ongdung arat atum, pinso arlo halatum akorte Judia atum abe thursi pujolo.
Ajehak atum pulo, “Netum ahemtun-heihei the-o, netum kerengji aphan sok-sang nangji.”
Kaprek atum pulo, “Netum kangchir pen kejokji aphan, dorphlup asok-sang kelong thekji aphan, netum ahidi, drakha aberi lapen hem-heihei kechelang nangji do-o.”
Kaprek atum anta pubomlo, “Netum ahidi-heihei lapen drakha aberi-heihei amidu kepiji aphan tangka choram nangji.

Netumta Judia akorte atum asonsi isivet akheilo. Halatum asomar ason netum asomar ta mesen kalima? Bonta netum asomar aphan ban paplang nang-lo. Ajehak netum asopimar atum aphan banpi ason chojor nang-lo. Netum thang avarsai avetang-lo, pima netum ahidi-heihei lapen drakha aberi-heihei bang aridengsi do-et-lo.”
Ne halatum kepujo arjulongsi, nening thilo
lapen keklemjisi chesik-lo. Ne rat angno, rat ajalin atum lapen chakri atum alam kroikredet-lo, lapen neli pulo, “Nanglitumke nangli korte atum aphansi chechenek-lo!”
Labangso akesung kangsaijisi ne isi rat amei phalo,

lapen pulo, “Elitumke un an ekorte atum bang adet aso aphan kejortang kenam dunthu pen langdun pibom nangji. Non nanglitum nangli methang akorte atum nangtum aphan nang pachojorji bor-ilo, halatumta akorte Judia atum saidelo!” Keja atum doklip-lo lapen kethakji alamthe chelongle det-lo.
Ansi neli pulo, “Nanglitum keklem kopima, la chokche! Nanglitum Arnam aphan kroinangji lapen kopisi kechechakma klem nangji. La pensi khei kaprek atum etum aphuthak epangnekchoi longledetpo.
Neli rat atum aphan tangka lapen sok nelipen pachoram long-lo, lapen nerisangho atum, kam keklem atum an aphanta lo. Non lasi elitum apreng kechevoi nangji kedo-an matha nangnelo.

Nanglitum aphan halatum nangkepi nangji apreng kedo-an hanghedetnon, tangka tame, sok tame, drakha ahor tame mate jit ajangthu tame. Halatum aphan ahidi-heihei, drakha aberi-heihei, jit ajangthu aberi tame, mate hem-heihei tame non amat halatum aphan voithu-et nangji!”
Keja atum thak-lo, “Nangli kepu ateng nelitum klempo. Longle-phelang nelitum voipo lapen preng-heihei hangthuthelo.”
Neli kurusar atum aphan arlo hang-lo, lapen latum angno keja atum malomso aphrangjong kechechak ateng keklem thekji aphan seme patang-lo.

Anke neli vamkok ason achoiso chephlok-lo, la nelivam alongsi kechekok lapen la hijuk-lo. “Lasonthotsi nanglitum angbong seme kechebibe atum aphan nanghijukpo” neli pulo, “Nanglitum ahem lapen nanglitum kechepahemphu amar an Arnam pon-etpo, lapen nangtum aphan thangnatta bitekangke-detpo.”
Kechetong abangphutinta purrep-lo, “Amen!” lapen

Judah a-Govornor ningkan krehini neli kecho esek, Artaserses Rechokethe kecho ningkan ingkoi aningkan pen ha alangli recho kecho ningkan thomkep-ra hini an, nelitum adon mate neli seta neli Govornor apot neliphan nekepanongpi a-an neli chochedet-lo.

Neliphrang Saihem along kedo abangphutin a-Govornor atum ke rat aphan isi arpu plang-lo, latum kechoji lapen kejunji aphan arni isi si rup dum phlikep hang-lo. La anchot kali, halatum aban atumta rat atum aphan chenek-lo. Bonta neli ke keklem paprekdak-lo, athema neli Arnam aphan aman pilo.
Neli jakong kedo-an paisong kekimthuji aphansi chepidet-lo, lapen nelimethang aphan thangnatta cheriredet-lo. Neliphan kam nekeklempi atum anta paisong akam alongsi chetodunpet-lo.
Neli arnivangta neli tebul along bangpharo isira bangphokep a-Jihudi amonit atum lapen ajalin atum aphan an pacholo, lahei ke adung arei adet pen nelilong kevang atum aphan batdet-lo.

Arnivang neli ejon achainong, akemenei jon throk abiresak, lapen ongdung avo, pinang-lo, lapen nikep chok-lote drakha ahorlang kemi padorlo. Bonta neli chini rat atum ko-an kardik arpu inghornang loma, lasi Govornor apot kelong nangji nelipharman neli hanghedet-lo.
Neli nangliphan ardomlo, O Arnam, asontin labangso arat aphan neli keklem apot nangli nechemathatha.
Sanballat, Tobiah, Geshem lapen netum ahotur kedo-an netum arpong kekim patangtang-lo lapen la angkrak-heihei pavepinlo pu arjulong-lo, tebonseta anghap-heihei, inghap atovar-heihei along bibelang.
Lasi Sanballat lapen Geshem neliphan birta ethe nang-lolo, Ono pu alongklam along kechetongji aphan tok-lo. Lake neliphan kepasungji isi abidilo.
Neli pherangke atum halatum aphan kepathanjisi toilo, “Neli akenangsotnei akamsi keklem, lapen neli arum nangsun un-e. Dan pen nangtum aphan nangkelangchot pen neli kam keklem ington un-e.”
Lasonsi esonnat abirta bataiphli neliphan pilo, lapen aphongtinta neli halatum aphan isinatsi thakdunlo.
Ansi Sanballat amethang inut aban pen ajok bataipho aphong birta nepilo, laso aphong abang ke angthek kethengthe pen abirta .
Lasonsi tok-lo: “Geshem neliphan thanlo, nangli lapen Judia arat atum recho abekethurjisi laso arpong kepakimthutoilo pu alam adung-arei arat atum chethanjolo.

La anta alangli nethanlo, nangli methang recho kechoji aphansi ajehak montri atum Jerusalem along nangli helo Judah arecholo pu kepachethang-jisi siktang-lo. Rechokethe bangso alam arjulong-tahaipo, lasi neli nang pinkhat-lo, labangso alam aputhak kechingkiji aphan elitum chetongvek nangji.”
Neli alangliphan ethe thak-lo, “Nangli kepu esonnatta ahok kali, lahei nangli kepinchong alamchot.”
Kam kepasangkokji aphansi halatum neli papherelo. Neli Arnam ardomlo, “Arnam nephan jakong nepitha!”

Delaiah asopo lapen Mehetabel asupo Shemaiah along halaso ahut kevurdamjisi chesik-lo, alangli hem che-o un-e. Alangli neliphan pulo, “Nangli lapen neli Kardomhem kangthir-et adim damsi chepatu dam nangji lapen inghap-heihei ingkirhet-lonang, pima halatum nangliphan kepathijisi vangpo. Nonke aling aningve seta vangsi nangli pathipo.”
Neli thak-lo, “Neli ke kekatji lapen kechepatuji abang kali. Neli chethe kechepajokji aphan neli chepatuji putong nangli kemathama? La neli klem un-e.”
Neli la chemathathulo, neli chinilo, Shemaiah aphan Arnam kethan alam kali, bonta Sanballat lapen Tobiah si neli nepacheretoiji aphan alangliphan tangka pilo.
Halatum nepaphere pen nepachopapjisi alangliphan rong-lo, lapen ajok latum nenong pajunopo lapen bang nangpangthok-ripo.

Neli Arnam ardomlo, “Arnam kopisi Sanballat lapen Tobiah keklem-tang-loma, mathatha lapen latum aphan aduk pinon. Chemathatha Nodiah arloso lapen kaprek kedo-an amontri atum nephan papherejisi bor-ilo.”
Ni phokep-ra hini an arpong akam klemsi Elul pu achiklo nikhap 25 arni kam keklem patang-lo.
Adung-arei adet kedo netum ahotur atum la arjulong pen halatum chechinilo, halatum amahang chepaklangji therak nangpo, athe baduta chinilo, laso akam Arnam akerap pensi patanglong-lo.
Labangso ahut an Judia ajalin atum Tobiah pen loh chelobomlang.
Ongdung a-Judia arat atum alangli be si dun pima alangli ong lake Arah asopo Shekaniah, inut a-Judia. La pen apar alangli sopo Jehohanan, Berekiah asopo Meshullam asopi aphan pangrilo.
Tobiah keklem akeme alam rat atum neli ingno chethanji lapen neli kepu alam anta la aphan than. Alangli neliphan papherejisi birta-heihei nang-lobom.
Lapen non arpong kekimthu patang-lo, lapen inghap-heihei adimthotsi bilo, lapen kardomhem honbang atum, kangthir luncheto abangphu atum lapen kaprek a-Levi atum aphan kam adeng pilo.

Neli banghini amonit Jerusalem arongsopi kepangriji akam pilo: Nelimu Hanan lapen kut ahemphu, Hananiah aphan bat-lo. Hananiah ke inut kekroithirklong abang lapen Arnam aphan kephere abang lasonthot baduta avelo.

Adap nerlo-ang-etik ke Jerusalem anghap-heihei ingpuri pusi neli halatum aphan pulo, lapen halahei kangkir nangji arnikangsam honbang atum akam che-o-e aphrang. Neli halatum aphan puthulo, Jerusalem kedo arat angbong pen honbang atum kangvaiponji aphan lapen halatum ajehak aphan isi kechinilor akam kepaklemji aphan lapen akaprek atum aphan ahem adung-arei kepahonji aphan kam pabat-toilo.
Jerusalem ke kethedung arongsopi, bonta ladak kedo arat ong-e, lapen ongdung ahem non anta kimpetpelang.

Arnam neliphan rat atum lapen jalin atum lapen chakri atum aphan kepangrum-toijisi halatum ahemtun atirim ketok-kebi-heihei kelangji aphan nelining parung-lo, ban pen kevangcheng halatum aketok-kebi neli long-lo, lapen lahei helo neli kelong akechini:

Ongdung bankedam atum Bebilon alongri osi Jerusalem lapen Judah along abangphutin ta amethang arongsopi chevoirep-lo. Halatum ahemtun-heihei recho Nebukadnezzar kenep-pon arni pen halatum Bebilonsi donangbomlo.
Halatum ajalin atum Jerubbabel, Joshua, Nehemiah, Azariah, Raamiah, Nahamani, Mordekai, Bilshan, Mispereth, Bigvai, Nehum lapen Baanah.
Israel akhei aro lahei helo, ban pen kevang arotin akhei:
Parosh aro bang 2,172
Shephatiah aro pen bang 372
Arah aro pen bang 652
Pahath Moab (Jeshua lapen Joab apoton) aro pen bang 2,818
Elam aro pen bang 1,254
Zattu aro pen 845
Zakai aro pen bang 760
Binnui aro pen bang 648
Bebai aro pen bang 628
Azgad aro pen bang 2,322
Adonikam aro pen 667
Bigvai aro pen bang 2,067
Adin aro pen bang 655
Ater (Hezekiah ta pu) aro pen bang 98
Hashum aro pen bang 328
Bezai aro pen bang 324
Hariph aro pen bang 112
Gibeon aro pen bang 95
Aphusar atum aber ketok arongsopi kedo atum anta nangchevoi-et-lo:
Bethlehem lapen Netophah asor bang 188
Anathoth asor bang 128
Beth Azmaveth asor bang 42
Kiriath Jearim, Chephirah lapen Beeroth asor bang 743
Ramah lapen Geba asor bang 621
Mikmash asor bang 122
Bethel lapen Ai asor bang 123
Kaprek a-Nebo asor bang 52
Kaprek Elam asor bang 1,254
Harim asor bang 320
Jeriko asor bang 345
Lod, Hadid lapen Ono asor bang 721
Senaah asor bang 3,930
Bankedam pen kechevoi akurusar atum aro lahei helo:
Jedaiah (Jeshua apoton atum) aro pen bang 973
Immer aro pen bang 1,052
Pashur aro pen bang 1,247
Harim aro pen bang 1,017
Bankedam pen kevang a-Levi atum: Jeshua lapen Kadmiel (Hadariah apoton atum) aro pen bang 74
Kardomhem alunse atum (Asaph aro) aro pen bang 148
Kardomhem honbang atum (Shallum, Ater, Talmon, Akkub, Hatita lapen Sobai) aro pen bang 138
Bankedam pen nangkechevoi Kardomhem klembang atum aro:
Ziha, Hasupha, Tabba-oth,
Keros, Sia, Padon,
Lebana, Hagaba, Shalmai,
Hanan, Giddel, Gahar,
Reaiah, Rezin, Nekoda,
Gazzam, Uzza, Paseah,
Besai, Meunim, Nephushesim,
Bakbuk, Hakupha, Harhur,
Bazlith, Mehida, Harsha,
Barkos, Sisera, Temah,
Neziah, lapen Hatipha.
Badam pen kevang Solomon aban atum aro:
Sotai, Sophereth, Perida,
Jaalah, Darkon, Giddel,
Shephatiah, Hattil, Pohereth, Hazzebaim lapen Amon.
Kardomhem klembang atum aro lapen Solomon aban atum aro bankedam pen nang kechevoi pangrumpet bang 392
Tel Melah, Tel Harsha, Cherup, Addon lapen Immer arongsopi pen nangkechevoi Delaiah, Tobiah, lapen Nekoda aro kadokave bang 642,
bonta halatum Israel akhei lo pu angthek chepaklang thekthedet-lo.

La aber ketok kurusar halatum aphusar atum ketok-kebi angthek longle: Hobaiah, Hakos, lapen Barzillai, (Barzillai kurusar aphusar aro ke Gilead kedo Barzillai aro a-osopi aphan pangrilo lapen la ahupo akur dunjuilo.)
Aphusar atum komat-loma halatum chepu thekthedet ajok latum aphan kurusar ason dengthek-thedet-lo.
Judia a-Govornor halatum aphan pulo, Urim lapen Thummim mate Arnam aningkehang kechini-iji ason kerim abang kurusar avetik ke halatum Arnam aphan kehodai a-an cholongle.
Kedo-an asong bankedam pen kevang atum pangrumpet bang 42,360
Halatum abanpi lapen banpo atum bang 7,337 lapen lunsepo lapen lunsepi atum bang 245
Losei jon 736, lapen gadha aso jon 245,
Ka-ut jon 435 lapen gadha jon 6,720.
Ongdung atum Kardomhem kekim atangka pidunlo:
Govornor pen lin nerkep aser, hong phokep karcho aharlung-heihei, pak 530 kurusar avam arri ape-heihei.
Aro kejalin atum pen lin 168 aser, lin 1,250 arup.
Kedo-an arat pen lin 168 aser, lin 140 arup, pak 67 kurusar avam arri ape-heihei.
Kurusar atum, Levi atum, Kardomhem honbang atum, Lunse atum, ongdung jung-jung arat atum, Kardomhem klembang atum, Israel arat kedo-an, Judia arongsopi-heihei lapen arong-heihei alongsi dolo.

Throksi achiklo Israel arat atum halatum arongsopi-heihei along chedorep-lo. Chiklo kecheng arni halatum Jerusalem Lang Anghap atikup arlo chingrumpet-lo. Halatum kurusar lapen Moses pen kepi Arnam Aron kethekpame Ezra aphan Aron aloh kelongji aphan arjulo.
Lasi pinso-arlo, osomar karjuthek an rat kechingrumpet adim la vanlo.
Hadak inghap atikup along halatum aphan Aron adap pen ha nerlo-chittim an porhe-parjulo lapen halatum kedo-an ta arjudun pamelo.

Laso aphan kekimtang thengpi ahongplang athak arjapding-lo. Mattithiah, Shema, Ananiah, Uriah, Hilkiah lapen Maaseiah atum alangli ar-e arjap-lo; lapen Pedaiah, Mishael, Malkijah, Hashum, Hashbaddanah, Jekaariah, lapen Meshullam atum alangli arvi si arjap-lo.
Rat aphan kangtuimuchot ahongplang athak Ezra karjap un ahut halatum amek alangliphansi lang-lorlarlo. Alangli loh purdet pen halatum kedo-an thurpet-lo.
Ezra pulo, “

Ansi latum thurlo lapen latum amethang adim charjap-rep-lo, lapen Jeshua, Bani, Sherebiah, Jamin, Akub, Shabbethai, Hodiah, Maaseiah, Kelita, Azariah, Jozabad, Hanan, lapen Pelaiah a-Levi atum Aron alam halatum aphan than pachinilo.
Latum Arnam Aron lam-larlo lapen monit atum la kechinipetji aphan than pachinilo .

Rat atum Aron ateng kedo nangji alam arjulongsi aning donolo, lapen latum chiru pangcheng-lo. Lasi Nehemiah Govornor, lapen Ezra kurusar lapen Aron kethekpame abang, lapen thanpachini a-Levi atum, rat kedo-an aphan pulo, “Pini arni ke nang Arnam
Non hem damra kecho-kejunle klemnon. Kedorde atum pen nang an, nang drakha ahorlang chepinon. Pini ke etum a-Arnam aphan kangthir arnilo, lasi ning chepa-oiri.
Levi atum damsi rat aphan lason kangthir arni ning-oiri pu than pangsam damlo.
Lasi kedo-an arat atum hem chedamsi kecho-kejun ahut halatum kedo-an ason kaprek aphan pilo, pima halatum aphan kopisi porhe parjuloma latum chinilo.
Puthot arni aro ajalin atum kurusar atum lapen Levi atum penpen Aron kethan kecharlijisi Ezra along damlo.
Latum Moses pen

Lasi latum aphan toisi aber ketok klem angdeng-heihei Jerusalem lapen kaprek arong lapen arongsopi kedo-an aphan pathantoilo! “Inglong-heihei anat damra jit athengpi aro, lapen ingnam ajit athengpi aro lapen thengplum aro lapen sotele aro lapen kaprek athengpi arong-heihei pen pharla-heihei Aron along kethan ateng vannon.”
Lasi rat atum Lang Anghap along, lapen Ephraim Anghap along amethang methang ahem asarnung-heihei ahem along halatum atikup along aro-heihei pen pharlahehei kimlo.
Kedo-an bankedam pen kevang atum an pharla-heihei chekimsi hadak dolo. Nun asopo Joshua arni pen lahelo keklemcheng-lo, lapen anut-tinta chonkarkursi chehokpik-lo.
Chojun Amei kecheng arni pen ha kejut arni anta arnivang Arnam Aron ingdeng isi porhepiverlo. Halatum ni throksi talonlo, lapen nerkep arni Aron kenangji ateng isi kepajut amei dolo.

Halaso achiklo amat, ingkoira phli arni, Israel arat atum halatum apap-heihei aputhak aning ke-oi chepaklangji aphan an kehumjisi chingrumpet-lo. Latum bang adet amonit atum pen chepaprekdak-lo. Latum aning ke-oi angthek ason pethoila lapen latum aphu-heihei longle aduk chinglulo.
Ansi halatum thurpet-lo, lapen halatum aphusar atum keklemtang apap-heihei chekobir pangcheng-lo.
Pima porphai kethom halatum a-Arnam
Hadak isi ahongplang Levi atum aphan dolo, lapen laso along Jeshua, Bani, Kadmiel, Shebaniah, Bunni, Sherebiah, Bani, lapen Chenani thurlo. Latum a-Arnam
Aber ketok a-Levi atum karchoji aphan hang-lo: Jeshua, Kadmiel, Bani, Hashabneiah, Sherebiah, Hodiah, Shebaniah, lapen Pethaliah. Latum pulo:
“Thurpet-ra Nang Arnam
Kaiketa Alangliphan ronon!
Monit akerokethe padorphlup un-e seta,
Anut-tin ta Alanglinong kethe amen paropet lo nang.”
Lapen Israel arat atum
bangso akardomsi ardomlo:
“Nang
Nang sining-heihei lapen sining achiklolongso pinchong-lo.
Nangsi longle lapen talo
lapen la along kedo-an amar pinchong-lo;
Nangsi kedo-an aphan chethe pilo.
Sining ajakong kedo-an
Nangliphan ingduk-lo,
lapen archolo.
Nang
lapen Bebilon adet Ur pen pabarlo;
Nang laso amen larsi Abraham irlo.
La Nangphan kekroithirklong Nang long-lo,
Nang lapen la angbong
Nang kechejok aloh pathik-lo.
Kanaan asor alongle laphan Nang kepiji chechak-lo,
Hitti, lapen Amor, Perizzi, Jebusi lapen Girgashi alongle-heihei la aso-asu atum aphan kepadolongjisi pipo.
Nang kechak alam chebilo,
pima Nang kekroithirklong.
Nang thek-long-lo, nephusar atum Ijip adet ko-an kesung chechak Nang-loma;
Ikora atalo along halatum kerap kechohang Nang arjulong-lo.
Recho abethursi Nang manghumeme akam klemtang-lo,
alang asaihemphu la adet kedo-an arat abe Nangthurlo,
pima Nang chini ko-an latum
Nangrat aphan chenek-loma.
Nang chepahaisi pini anta
Nangnong dolo.
Talo angbong Nang rat aphan
Nang tovar pinchong pilo lapen krengdang alongle athak padam long-lo.
Adihu kethe atalo along arlong kanglim asonsi latum aphan kehung dun atum langjang nang-lo.
Inghun pen Nang halatum aphan anerlo japon lo,
latum ajo Nang halatum atovar me pen pathe-ang-lo.
Sinai Anglong along Nang sining pen vang-lo;
Nang rat aphan Nang ningjelo,
lapen halatum aphan mesen aron-heihei lapen karsik akethan-heihei pilo.
Nang kesang kangthir arni kebiji aphan halatum aphan thanlo,
lapen Moses pen ajok halatum aphan Nang Aron-heihei pilo.”
“Halatum kangchir ahut,
Nang halatum aphan sining pen him pilo,
lapen kang-it ahut arlong pen lang pilo.
Nang kepiji kechechak alongle pacherai longjisi halatum aphan thanlo.
Bonta netum aphusar atum ane chepathe bomlo lapen arjuje lo,
lapen Nang hukum-heihei kekroiji aphan molo.
Halatum kekroiji molo;
halatum Nang keklempi ason an tengnetang-lo;
halatum Nang kepaklang kemanghumeme akam-heihei tengnedet lo.
Ane chepathesi halatum inut ajalin chingvailo halatum aphan Ijip adet ban kedodamjisi.
Bonta Nang inut kedin a-Arnam;
Nang jinsopik lapen inghonpik,
ningkethi derklui a-Bang.
Nang kejinso thepik,
Nang halatum aphan o-e det-lo.
Chainong aso thipsi halatum kumlin pinchong-lo lapen la helo Ijip adet pen ekevan a-arnam lo pu!
Ko-ansi latum Nangphan langrem loma
Bonta hadak kejejangtang ajo
Nang halatum aphan otekangke det-lo,
pima Nang akangjinso thepik.
Ajo-anerlo tovar halatum aphan kepaklangbom a-inghun lapen ame Nang pavedetde det-lo.
Nang mesen pensi halatum kopi klem Nangji ma Nang than lo;
Nang halatum aphan Manna ahim pacholo lapen kejun alangta pilo.
Kejejangtang ajo ningkan 40 halatum kenangji ason an Nang-pilo;
halatum ape ingrak long nangne det-lo,
lapen halatum keso pen akeng kang nangnedet lo.”
“Det-heihei lapen recho arat-heihei aputhak halatum aphan pahaidet toilo,
lapen halatum ahoi alongle an aputhak seta.
Sihon kepangri Heshbon alongle lapen Og recho kecho Bashan alongle aputhak seta pahailo.
Sining achiklolongso-heihei ason thak thaksi Nang halatum aphan ongdung asomar pilo,
lapen halatum aphusar atum aphan Nang kepiji pu kechak alongle along
kepalongjisi Nang halatum aphan det aputhak pahaitoilo.
Kanan adet lapen hadak kedo arat aphuthak Nang pahai toilo.
Kanan arat lapen recho atum aphuthak aning kehang aling latum keklemji ajakong Nang rat aso aphan pitang-lo.

Apaisong kedo arongsopi-heihei ho-or kedo alongle lapen akhi plengset ahem-heihei lapen ketuk alang tuk-heihei jit arong-heihei thesere arong-heihei lapen drakha aberi-heihei Nangrat aso aphan pachehemphu toilo.
Halatum un an cholongsi the-o-a lo;
Nang kepi akeme ason an pen latum aning chepajang-lo.”
“Bonta Nangrat atum Nangbe thursi lapen Nang kroikredet lo;
Nang Aron-heihei latum panung-lo.
Nangnat kepangnotoi kepu abang halatum aphan kepacheretoi montri atum aphan latum pathilo.
Aphong aphong ta latum Nangphan pinremlo.
La apotsi Nang halatum ahotur atum halatum aphuthak pahaidet-lo lapen papangri longdet-lo.
Kesung ahut halatum Nang pen kerap hang-lo lapen Nang sining angsong pen halatum aphan thak-lo.
Nang kangjinso thepiksi halatum aphan halatum ahotur pen kepajokjisi jalin atum toilo.
Ningkangsam longthulo,
puthot halatum pap klemthutang-lo,
lapen Nang halatum ahotur latum aphuthak pahaithulo.
Tebonseta latum aning chiruilo pulote lapen kejokji akerap halatum Nangchohang lote,
sining angsong pen Nang aphong aphong ta arju Nang kangjinso pensi Nang halatum aphan pajok lo.
Nang akethan-heihei pakroijisi Nang halatum aphan pacheretoilo,
bonta ane chepathesi latum Nang Aron kerim ke chethe atovar seta Nang Aron-heihei latum dengde lo.
Kebuiklui lapen karjuje,
halatum kekroiji molo.
Aningkan-ningkan ta Nang halatum ning chepaningding pen pacheretoilo.
Nang montri atum pen Nang pathantoilo,
bonta Nangrat atum ano ingthong-het,
lasi Nang latum aphuthak kaprek adet atum pahaitoilo.
Lapen pima Nang kangjinso thepik apotsi Nang latum aphan o-e mate pavirvedet-lo.
Nang inut kangjinso parpik lapen kediya thepik a-Arnam!”
“O Arnam, netum a-Arnam, Nang ko-an kethe!
Ko-an pherememe, ko-an jakongkethe!
Nang kekroithirklong pen Nang kechejok kechechak-heihei chebi,
Assiria arecho netum aphan kechenek arni pen non anta netum kesung chechak nangbomlang!
Netum arecho atum netum ajalin atum netum akurusar atum,
lapen montri atum,
netum aphusar atum lapen kedo-an netum rat aso atum ke sung-chechak Nang-lo.
Mathatha, netum ko-an sung chechak Nang-loma!
Netum aphan Nang aduk kepi ke mesen lo;
netum pap klem seta Nang ke kekroi thirklong.
Netum aphusar atum, netum
arecho atum, jalin atum,
lapen kurusar atum Nang Aron ot thekthe det lo.
Halatum Nang hukum-heihei lapen pacheretoi anta arjuje det lo.
Nang hirjume pensi recho atum Nangrat pangri lo halatum aphan adang kethe ho-or alongle pisi padolong-lo,
bonta halatum pap pen che-osi Nangphan ingdukde det-lo.
Lapen non Nang, Nangkepi adet la ho-or kedo alongle netum aphan an nekepiji alongle along netum ban do Nang-lo.
Longle kepathe ason an Nang netum aphuthak kebat arecho alongsi dam et-lo,
pima netum pap klemlo.
Halatum netum lapen chopangreng api aphuthak aninghang atengsi latum klemlo,
lapen netum thi rengjeng lo.”
Lahei kadokave keplang apotsi, netum Israel arat isi thirklong aloh chetokdut-lo, lapen netum ajalin atum netum a-Levi atum, lapen netum akurusar atum, halatum lalong angthek theng-lo.
Kechengsi ke Hakaliah asopo Nehemiah, govornorsi amen chetok nang-lo, lapen aphi Zedekiah si tok-lo, ha aber atum anta chetok rep-lo.
Seraiah, Azariah, Jeremiah,
Pashhur, Amariah, Malkijah,
Hattush, Shebaniah, Malluk,
Harim, Meremoth, Obadiah,
Daniel, Cinnethon, Baruk,
Meshullam, Abijah, Mijamin,
Maaziah, Bilgai, lapen Shemaiah.
Azaniah asopo Joshua,
Henadad aro pen Binnui, Kadmiel,
Shebaniah, Hodiah,
Kelita, Pelaiah, Hanan,
Mika, Rehob, Hashabiah,
Zakur, Sherebiah, Shebaniah,
Hodiah, Bani, lapen Beninu.
Parosh, Pahath Moab, Elam, Zatu, Bani,
Bunni, Azgad, Bebai,
Adonijah, Bigvai, Adin,
Ater, Hezekiah, Azzur,
Hodiah, Hashum, Bezai,
Hariph, Anathoth, Nobai,
Magpiash, Meshullam, Hezir,
Meshezabel, Zadok, Jaddua,
Pelatiah, Hanan, Anaiah,
Hoshea, Hananiah, Hasshub,
Hallohesh, Pilha, Shobek,
Rehum, Hashabnah, Maaseiah,
Ahiah, Hanan, Anan,
Malluk, Harim, lapen Baanah,

Netum Israel arat, kurusar atum, Levi atum, Kardomhem honbang atum, Kardomhem alunse atum, Kardomhem klembang atum lapen kaprek kedo-an Arnam Aron kekroi atum, amethang bang adet atum pen chepaprek netum alongle along kedo-an atum, netum apiso atum pen pen lapen osomar atum kechinithek an,
Jalin atum pen chelangpetsi la kephri abang phuthak hirjuno paklonang pusi semetang-lo, Arnam aban Moses pen kepitang Aron ateng pen netum rengpo, lapen netum a-
Netum alongle along kedo bang-adet atum pen chepangri chepangdonde lo.
Jongsi bang-adet abang vang-ra sok kejorji aphan kesang arni mate kaprek kangthir arni van lote netum halatum pen nam dunde lo.
Throksi aningkan netum sai tikike lo, lapen preng do-an hanghe lo.
Aningkanvang netum anut-tinta Kardomhem akhorot kepiji akerap rup gram 5 chirung po.

Aber ketok ason Kardomhem karchoiji aphan netum pipo; Kangthir ahim arnivang asok adan, arnivang kephrinji athok-heihei, Kesang-Kangthir adan-heihei chiklokemi achojun amei, lapen kaprek achojun amei-heihei, Israel apap kepakak adan-heihei, lapen Kardomhem akenangji ason an pipo.
Netum, rat atum, kurusar atum, lapen Levi atum ason kenangji ateng athok adan-heihei
Aningkanvang netum alongle pen kelong atikong asok, atikong athe kemen Kardomhem along dan vanpo.

Lapen soklengpo netum along mahang kethek an Kardomhem arlo kurusar atum along netum ponpo lapen hadak Aron kehang ateng Arnam aphan hodaipo. Netum achainong apitin pen kelong aso akleng, lapen netum abiresak mate abi pen kelong aso akleng anta hodaipo.
Netum him kangthir lapen ke akaprek drakha ahorlang adan-heihei, jit ajangthu, lapen thesere an adan-heihei Kardomhem arlo kurusar atum along vanpipo.
Netum rong-ahidi-heihei pen kerung aphan kep pen ephan longle pen kelong athe-heihei Levi atum along vanpipo.

Phankep pen ephan kerung ahut Aaron aro akurusar atum Levi atum along dodun nangji, lapen Kardomhem akenang aphan Levi atum kerung pen phankep pen ephan angbong pen ako phankep pen ephan Kardomhem khipuru-heihei along ponpo.

Israel arat lapen Levi atum Kechirung asok, drakha ahorlang, lapen jit ajangthu Kardomhem ajohton-heihei kebi adim khipuru along pon nangpo, lapen Kangdukbom akurusar atum, Kardomhem honbang atum, lapen Kardomhem kelun abangphu atum phanphli pen ephan halatum cherai longpo.
Netum Arnam ahem langmomelo.
Jalin atum Jerusalem dolo, lapen rat atum angbong donkep pen edon rongsopi kangthir along kedoji aphan khadot pathulo, lapen kaprek an ke along kaprek arong mate arongsopi-heihei alongsi donang-lo.
Aning keme pen Jerusalem dopo pu atum an aphan rat atum rohurlo.
Akaprek arong-heihei lapen rongsopi-heihei Israel arat, kurusar atum, Levi atum, Kardomhem klembang atum, lapen Solomon aban aro atum amethang arong amethang akhi pensi donang-lo.
La aber ketok Judah alongri Jeru-salem along kedo ne det-asor atum amen dolo:
Uzziah asopo lapen Jekaariah asu, Athaiah. Alangli phusar atum Amariah, Shepatiah, lapen Maahalalel, Judah asopo Perez aro, parloponlo.
Baruk asopo lapen Kolhozeh asupo, Maaseaiah. La aphusar atum Hazaiah, Adaiah, Joiarib, lapen Jekaariah, Judah asopo Shelah aphanta parlo ponlo.
Perez aro pen bang 468 ne-ne amonit atum Jerusalem dolo.
Mashullam asopo lapen Joed asupo Sallu. La akaprek aphusar atum Pedaiah, Kolaiah, Maaseaiah, Ithiel, lapen Jeshaiah parlo ponlo.
Gabbai lapen Sallai, Sallu adon-arap .
Do-an bang 928 a-Benjamin aso Jerusalem along dolo.
Joel, Zikri asopo si ajalin lapen Hassenuah asopo Judah ke adun rongsopi a-saihemphu lo.
Joiarib asopo Jedaiah lapen Jachin.
Hilkiah asopo lapen Mashullam asupo Seraiah. La aphusar atum Zadok, Meraioth, lapen Ahitub kurusar aphanta aro parlo ponlo.
Do-an bang 822 abangphu atum laso aro pen Kardomhem along ingduk lo.
Adaiah lake Jeroham asopo lapen Pelaliah asupo. La aphusar atum Amzi, Jekaariah, Pashhur lapen Malkijah aphan parlo ponlo.
Do-an bang 242 abangphu bangso aso ahemtun ajalin atum.
Amashsai, la Azarel asopo lapen Ahzai asupo. La aphusar atum Meshillemoth lapen Immer aphan parlo ponlo.
Hadak 128 abangphu laso aro pen ne ahemtun ron aso dolo. Halatum ajalin ke Zabdiel, inut ajalin ahemtun abangphulo.
Hasshub asopo lapen Azrikam asupo Shemaiah. La aphusar atum Hashabiah lapen Bunni aphan parlo ponlo.
Shabbethai lapen Jozabad anong thedung a-Levi atum Kardomhem angtan akam ahemphulo.
Mika asopo lapen Zabdi asupo Mattaniah inut Asaph aso. La Kardomhem lunse asong kardom lapen kechoro kelun keja abang-lo.
Bakbukiah ke Mattaniah arapbang-lo.
Abda lake Shammua asopo lapen Galal asupo lo, inut Jeduthun aro.
Do-an bang 284 a-Levi atum Jerusalem rongsopi kangthir along dolo.
Akub, Talmon, lapen halatum adon-arap, bang 172 an.
Israel arat ahin an lapen ahin akurusar atum lapen a-Levi atum Judah alongri akaprek kaprek arong-heihei, arongsopi-heihei along halatum amethang-methang akhi pensi chedolo.
Ophel pu Jerusalem ebeng along Kardomhem klembang atum dolo lapen Ziha lapen Gishpa abersi kam klemlo.

Levi kam langbang Bani asopo lapen Hashbiah asupo, Uzzi, la Jerusalem alongsi dolo. La aphusar atum Mattaniah lapen Mika, la Asaph aro pen lo, laso aso Kardomhem ardom karcho apor kelun nangji atum lo.
Arnivang Kardomhem along kopusonsi laso aro lun chari nangjima, Recho aron do.
Meshezabel asopo Pethahiah, Zerah aro pen lapen Judah akhi, Parsi akut along Israel arat pen aketoi dunlo.
Ongdung arat atum amethang ahidi-heihei adungsi chedolo. Judah akhei atum Kiriath Arba, Dibon, lapen Jekabzeel lapen lahei arongsopi adung-arei arong-heihei alongsi dolo.
Lapen halatum Jeshua, Moladah, Bethpelet,
lapen Hazarshual, lapen Beersheba arongsopi adung-arei arong alongta do.
Halatum Ziklag, Mekonah arongsopi lapen la arong-heihei,
Enrimmon along, Zorah along, Jarmuth along,

Zanoah along, Adullam along, lapen lahei adung-arei arong along dolo. Halatum Lakish along lapen adung ahidi along lapen Azekah lapen la arong-heihei alongta dolo. Lasi pulo, Judah arat ke Beersheba nitur alongri anat pen Hinnom-Nirep arlok angbongsi do.
Benjamin akhei ke Geba, Mik, Ash, Ai, Bethel, lapen adung-arei-hei-heisi dolo.
Anathoth, Nob, Ananiah,
Hazor, Ramah, Gittaim,
Hadid, Zeboim, Neballat,
Lod, lapen Ono, lapen bipan klembang atum arlok anta dolo.
Ajehak a-Levi asongatum Judah alongri alongsi dolo lapen Benjamin akhei anat pen padorap-rap lo.
La aber ketok akurusar lapen a-Levi atum bandam pen Shealtiel asopo Jerubbabel lapen Joshua Kuru-sarpo pen nang kechevoidun atumlo:
Seraiah, Jeremiah, Ezra,
Amariah, Malluk, Hattush,
Shekaniah, Rehum, Meremoth,
Iddo, Ginnethoi, Abijah,
Mijamin, Maadiah, Bilgah,
Shemaiah, Joiarib, Jedaiah,
Sallu, Amok, Hilkiah, lapen Jedaiah.
Joshua arni ahut lahei amonit atum halatum arisangho kurusar atum angbong kejalin atum lo.
La aber amen atum kechoro alun kelun chepahemphu pon atum lo: Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Sherebiah, Judah, lapen Mattaniah.
Aber amen atum ke luncheto kelun keseng atumlo: Bakbukiah, Unno, lapen arisangho a-Levi atum.
Joshua ke Joiakim apolo, Joiakim ke Eliashib apolo, Eliashib ke Joiada apolo;
Joiada ke Jonathan apolo; lapen Jonathan ke Jaddua apolo.
Joiakim Kurusarpo kecho ahut, la aber akurusar atum amen an kurusar aro-heihei pen jalin atum lo:
Meraiah
Seraiah
Hananiah
Jeremiah
Meshullam
Ezra
Jehohanan
Amariah
Jonathan
Malluki
Joseph
Shebaniah
Adna
Harim
Helkai
Meraioth
Jekaariah
Iddo
Meshullam
Ginnethon
Zikri
Abijah
Miniamin
Piltai
Moadiah
Shammua
Bilgah
Jehonathan
Shemaiah
Mattenai
Joiarib
Uzzi
Jedaiah
Kallai
Sallai
Eber
Amok
Hashabiah
Hilkiah
Nathanel
Jedaiah
Aber akurusarpo kedo ahut Levi lapen Kurusar atum kejalin ahemtun-heihei toksi bilo: Eliashib, Joiada, Jonathan, lapen Jaddua. Darias Parsi Rechokethe ahut labangso atok-bi jutkok lo.
Levi atum ahemtun-heihei kejalin atum amen Eliashib asupo Jonathan arni ansi saihem along ketok-bi longchot lo.

Hashabiah, Sherebiah, Jeshua, Binnui , lapen Kadmiel atum kepaklemtoisi Levi atum songni seng-lo. Songni ta angdi isi apai-apai Arnam aphan Kero lapen Alangliphan kechoro kepi Arnam amonit David Recho pen kepi aron atengsi klemlo.
Aber amen an Kardomhem honbang atum Kardomhem anghap-heihei adung akhipuru-heihei kehon chepahemphulo: Mattaniah, Bakbukiah, Obadiah, Meshullam, Talmon, lapen Akub.
Lahei amonit atum Joshua asopo lapen Jehozadak asupo Joiakim lapen Nehemiah govornor arni ahut lapen Ezra kurusar, halaso ahut aron thekpame abang-lo.
Jerusalem arongsopi arpong kehodai ahut Levi atum aphan halatum kedo adim-heihei vanlo ansi latum kero alun pen latum lun musi prakso, kumbeleng pen lunsi kehodai ketalon along cheto dun thek po.
Levi lun kelun ahemtun-heihei atum halatum kedo adim pen lapen Netophah arong akung bonren kedo arong-heihei pen vangsi chingrum lo,
lapen Bethgilgal pen, Geba, lapen Azmaveth penta vang-lo.
Kurusar atum lapen Levi atum dhorom chepangthir akam amethang aphan rat aphan, inghap-heihei aphan lapen rongsopi arpong aphan klemlo.

Ne Judah ajalin atum aphan arpong kangtui along pachingrum lo lapen halatum aphan asongkethe songni atum rongsopi akung-kung Arnam aphan kechoro pen kejengtoiji aphan pachehemphu toilo. Aphrang asong atum ar-e arpong athak damsi Phelo-abui Anghap anat damlo.
Hoshaiah lunse atum aphi dunlo, aphithu Judah ajalin achitim atum dunlo.
Azariah, Ezra, Meshullam,
Judah, Benjamin, Shemaiah lapen Jeremiah kurusar;
lapen latum pong-ut vut lo. Adunthu vang-lo Jonathan asopo lapen Shemaiah asupo Jekaariah. (La aphusar atum Mattaniah, Mikaiah lapen Zakur, Asaph aro atum anta parlo ponlo.)

La aphi ta aro kaprek abangphu atum; Shemaiah, Azarel, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethanel, Judah, lapen Hanani atum Arnam amonit David Recho kerim kelun ajohton-heihei ahuttinta ponrep lo. Thekpame a-Ezra laso asong kedam japon lo.
Langmek Anghap along halatum David arongsopi aphrang David Rechohem anat kedam adongkam-heihei arludamsi puthot Lang Anghap arpong, rongsopi nihang anat chevoithulo.
Adun asong kechoro alun pen kelun atum arpong athak arlusi arvi anat damlo, lapen achitim arat pen ne damlo. Karnu Ahemchardon pen Ajamkeding Apaisong,

lapen hadak pen netum damsi Ephraim Anghap, Jeshanah Anghap , Ok Anghap, Hananel Ahemchardon lapen Pharo Ahemchardon pen ha Biresak Anghap an damlo. Kardomhem anat Anghap along an netum kedam sakok lo.
Lasi Arnam aphan kero pasongni ta Kardomhem adung an nanglelo.
Nelong kedo jalin atum apar,
nesong along pong-ut-heihei kebut akurusar-heihei atum ta dolo: Eliakim, Maaseiah, Minianim, Mikaiah, Elioenai, Jekaariah, lapen Hananiah
lapen halatum aphi Maaseiah, Shemaiah, Elezar, Uzzi, Jehohanan, Malkijah, Elam lapen Ezer dolo. Lunse atum aphan Jezrahiah si ase pathedung pen lun kelun jalo.
Halaso arni ongdung athok-heihei pilo, lapen rat atum aning arongpik pachehok lo. Arloso lapen osomar atum ketalon along chelang dunlo, lapen halatum akehorisei ase heloving anta arjulong.

Halaso ahut pinsomar aphan phankep-pen-ephan, lapen ningkan esek pathe cheng asok lapen thesere akemen Kardomhem aphan kechirung kebi adim khi-puru-heihei arpu pilo. Laso amonit atum Aron akenang ateng kurusar lapen Levi atum pen pen apot chehok-o-lo,

pima halatum kepangthir akam angdeng lapen dhorom angdeng Arnam kepi ahukum klemlo. David Recho lapen asopo Solomon kepi keklem nangji ateng pen Kardomhem alunse atum lapen honbang atum anta amethang-methang arpu cheklem rep-lo.
David Recho arni pen lapen Asaph lunsepo ahut pen Arnam aphan kechoro lapen kero alun-heihei lunse atum jalo.

Nehemiah arni ahut lunse atum aphan lapen Kardomhem honbang atum aphan Israel arat do-an arnivang dan-heihei pen rap lo. Rat atum Levi atum aphan kangthir adan pilo lapen Levi atum akenangsot apharman kurusar atum aphan pilo.
Moses Aron, rat aphan asepathedung pen keparju ahut Ammon atum lapen Moab atum Arnam arat along akaita chelang dun longle pu kepu angdeng nanglerok lo.

La atheke Ijip adet pen Israel atum tovar kevang un ahut Ammon lapen Moab atum an lapen lang pi dunde det apot. La kalisi Israel aputhak hirjuno kepadojisi halatum Balaam aphan tangka pilo, bonta netum a-Arnam ahirjuno alar hirjume paplangdet-lo.
Labangso aron Israel arat atum arjulongledet aphi kedo-an bang-adet asor aphan rat-amei pen ingtan bilo.
Kardomhem khi-puru-heihei ahemphu Eliashib kurusar, Tobiah pen chepame ajirding-o lo.

La Tobiah aphan sok adan-heihei lapen methek Kardomhem ajohton, kurusar ahem aphan kepi adan-heihei lapen phankep-pen-ephan, drakha ahorlang, lapen jit ajangthu Levi atum aphan, Kardomhem alunse atum aphan lapen Kardomhem ahonbang atum aphan kepi adan-heihei kebi thedung angdeng pidet lo.
Lasonsi dobom ahut, ne Jerusalem ave, pima Artaserses ningkan 32 Bebilon Arecho kecho ahut alangliphan kelong alam kethanjisi damjuilo.
Aphithu ne alangli pen hukum chehangsi Jerusalem chevoithulo. Hadak Kardomhem aro Tobiah aphan Eliashib isi angdeng kepadotoi thek longsi ne mong-loilo.
Ne ningthihaksi Tobiah ahormu an varthailo.
Ne angdeng aron ateng pen kepangthirjisi hukum-heihei pilo lapen Kardomhem ajohton, sok-sang adan-heihei, lapen methek pabithutoilo.
Ne ako chinithulo Kardomhem alunse atum lapen Levi atum Jerusalem o-etsi amethang ahidi-heihei along chedamrong-lo, pima rat atum halatum kerengji aphan dorphlup ason pipe det lo.
Ne saihemphu atum aphan Kardomhem kelangle apot ingchek-lo. Lapen Levi atum aphan lapen lunse atum aphan Kardomhem pachevang-thulo lapen halatum aphan kam paklemtoi lo.
Ansi kedo-an Israel arat atum halatum phankep-pen-ephan asok, drakha ahorlang, lapen jit ajangthu Kardomhem khi-puru-heihei along kevan pangcheng-lo.

Ne Shelemiah, inut akurusar, Zadok, Aron thekpamebang; lapen Pediah, inut a-Levi amonit atum aphan khi-puru-heihei pachehemphu toilo. Zakur asopo, lapen Mattaniah asupo Hanan, halatum aphan kerap abang-lo. Ne chini lapen lahei amonit aphan chiki un lapen halatum klemrap-rap atum aphan keron-kepajirji aphan angthikdut.
Mathatha, Ne Arnam, lahei kedo-an asonta nang Kardomhem lapen la karchoji aphansi ne klempet-lo.

Halaso ahut Judah arat-aso atum Kesang-arni ta drakha-athe kesor thek-long-lo. Akaprek atum ke halatum agadha api-heihei athak sok, drakha ahorlang, drakha-athe, thebo-heihei lapen kaprek ason arthang lo lapen lahei Jerusalem cheponlo; Ne halatum aphan Kesang-arni thangnatta kejor longle det aphan pachere lo.
Jerusalem along kedo Tair arongsopi pen ajehak amonit atum lang-ok lapen ason ason amar rongsopi arlo vansi Kesang-arni halatum rat aphan jorlo.
Ne Judia ajalin atum aphan ingcheksi pulo, “Nangtum kehingno keklem chelangtha! Nangtum Kesang-arni pangthirthelo,

lasonthotsi Arnam nangphusar atum aphan aduk pilo lapen Alangli laso arongsopi aputhak kevir vanlo. Lapen Kesang-arni pangthirthesi lason keklembom pen ajok Arnam aningkethi Israel aphuthak van bomlo.”

Lasi rongsopi anghap-heihei Kesang-arni kecheng aphongtin lapen arni kangsam kecheng aphongtin kepangkir-hetji ahukum-heihei ne pilo lapen Kesang-arni jutjetik pangpupelo. Kesang-arni thangta rongsopi arlo vanve pu kechinilorjisi ne monit atum anghap-heihei along paton lo.
Ephong-phongni ason-ason kejor-kelang atum Bhomta ajo rongsopi arpong-heihei angtansi dopo.

Ne halatum aphan pacheretoilo, “Adap kevangji aphan hadak kechonghong-dingji thang ale ave. Nang jongsi lason puthot klem bor-i lote, ne nangbe jakong pen thurpo.” Laso arni pen halatum Kesang-arni vangve det lo.
Ne Levi atum aphan amethang chepangthirji ahukum pilo lapen damsi Kesang-arni kangthir-et pen kerimthekji aphan anghap-heihei paton damtoilo.
Nemathatha, O Arnam, lata nang kanghon kethe lapen nepajoktha.
Halaso ahut ne long-lo ongdung Judia apinso atum Ashdod, Ammon, lapen Moab arloso pen chepangrilo.
Halatum achitim asomar atum Ashdod alam mate kaprek alamsi ningje lapen netum alam ningje lapen netum alam keningjeji thekthe det lo.

Pinso atum aphan ingcheksi ahirjuno hang-lo, theng-lo lapen halatum achu phu lo. Ansi ne halatum aphan Arnam amen pen halatum mate halatum asomar atum bang-adet atum pen piso-pangrire lo pu seme pa-en lo.

Ne pulo, “La bang-adet a-arlososi Solomon Recho aphan pap paklemtoilo. La kaprek adet a-recho-heihei atum an sose amonit lo. Arnam laphan chinghonlo, lapen Israel do-an aputhak recho bat-lo, seta la laso apap klodet lo.
Bang-adet a-arloso piso-pangri pen ajok netum a-Arnam aphan kroikrera netumta nangtum a-arjan nang endun nangjima?”
Eliashib asopo Joiadasi Kurusarpo, bonta Joiada asopo inut abang ke Sanballat asopi aphan pangrilo, Beth Horon pu arong pen. Lasi ne Joiada aphan Jerusalem pa-o toilo.
Mathatha, O Arnam, kopusonsi lahei arat atum kurusar anghoi lapen kurusar atum lapen Levi atum angbong kechechak aronta pangthirthe-tang-lo.
Rat atum aphan ne bang-adet ason pen pangthirlo; ne, kurusar lapen Levi atum aphan aron-heihei selam pilo. La pen ajok halatum amethang akam-angdeng chechinipo;
Dan-heihei apor pen kepavanthek-jisi kethorji aphan theng thikpikoilo, lapen rat atum halatum atikong adan-heihei lapen pathecheng athesere kementang kevanthekji aphan pathik lo.
Lahei do-an mathatha, O Arnam lapen nephan lason kemele pithunon.
Ahasuras arni ahut, Ahasuras India pen Ethiopia an 127 alongri aputhak recho cholo,
halabangso ahut Ahasuras recho methang recho anghoi Susa pu det arongsopi kethe alongsi chingnilo,

alangli recho kecho un kethom aningkan alangli rechoso do-an lapen kepangri atum do-an aphan atheke Parsia lapen Media adet ron apinpo atum lapen arlengkethe atum lapen longri-heihei a-Govornor atum anta alangli ingno dosi alangli kecho-kejun pilo,
alangli det adak atur akeplang lapen ahir asang lapen alangli recho apun akepaklang penang an arni aphan atheke ni 180 an paklang-lo.
Lahei arni plengdet aphi recho Susa det arongsopi kethe kedo-an armu, kethe lapen kebi atum an aphan recho ahem aberi arlo atikup along kecho-kejun ni 7 an pilo.

Hadak kebeng ape kelok-heihei lapen pe kelir-heihei pajangnoisi linen kanglit lapen hepi arje ari pen ha rup avaikang along lapen ha marbol anujok along thit-het-lo, lapen ser lapen rup ahongplang-heihei ke kangtangrak checharphlot a-arlong ke-er, marbol, chopi abor lapen adorsopik a-arlong-heihei pen keselam aklong athak bilo.
Akaprek kaprek ser aharlung-heihei pen pajunlo lapen recho ahorlang ke-ongdung atengsi aninghang an papitoilo.
Aron pensi pajuntoilo, lapen badu aphanta pabor-itoite det-lo pima ahem kepangri atum an aphan bida thosi pulo, abangphutin amethang aningkehang an pajun nang.
Lapen ke Vashti rechopita Ahasuras recho ahem kedo arloso atum an aphan kecho-kejun pilo.
Throksi arni recho drakha alang pen ning arong ahut alangli ingno kam keklem bang throksi kasi-entang atum atheke Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, Abagtha, Zethar lapen Karkas aphan bida thosi pulo,
rat atum lapen rechoso atum aphan rechopi a-arjekeme kepaklangji aphan la ser aphutup pen pen Vashti rechopi recho angno pavannang, pima la arje langmepik.
Bonta Vashti rechopi kasi-entang atum pen kepi recho ahukum kroikresi vangvedet-lo. La amat recho aning thihak-lo, lapen alangli ning arlo aningkethi hamhedet-lo.
Ansi ahut kechini kethek-kere atum aphan recho pulo, (pima aron lapen kangsaithek atum aphan keklem angdeng recho lasonsi arju

lapen alangli dun atum, Karshena, Shethar, Admatha, Tarshish, Meres, Marshena, lapen Memukan helo la Parsia lapen Media adet arechoso bang throksi recho amahang thek-longver lapen det angbong kechengsi anghoi kelong atum.)
“Aron ateng pen Vashti rechopi aphan pisi klem nangjima? Athe kasi-entang atum pen kevan recho Ahasuras ahukum kroikredet-lo.”
Ansi Memukan recho aphan lapen rechoso atum angno pulo, “Vashti rechopi recho aphanchot kali bonta Ahasuras recho alongri kedo rechoso an lapen rat atum an aphansi kechokche klemlo,

pima rechopi keklem bangso akam kadokave a-arloso atum an aphan pachethangpo lapen halatum apenan aphan langrempo, pima ‘Ahasuras recho amethang angno Vashti rechopi vantu pusi hukum pilo bonta la vangvedet-lo’ pusi pupo.
Bangso arni amat Parsia lapen Media adet a-arloso akethe atum rechopi a-ot arjulongsi recho arechoso atum aphan thanpo, lapen kelangrem dopo lapen ning kethi plengsetpo.

Jongsi recho aning dok pulote alangli hin pen recho ahukum papinang lapen la pharlep un-e detjile Parsia lapen Media atum aron-heihei angbong patok nang, atheke non pen anpar rechopi puthot Ahasuras recho angno pavang longle nang lapen la rechopi aman la apar kememu abangpi kaprek aphanle recho papinang.
Ansi recho kepi ahukum det adang la an akethe seta pachethang lote kadokave kangtui lapen akangdai arloso atum an apenan aphan aman chepipo.”
Labangso kepare alam recho lapen rechoso atum aning dok-hurlo lapen Memukan alam atengsi recho klemlo.

Alangli det longri do-an alongritin amethang methang amek lapen akheitin amethang methang alam pen ketok aloh losi pulo, pinso abangphutin amethang ahem ahemphu cheplang nangji lapen amethang arat alam chelangsi ningje nangji.
Lahei aphi, Ahasuras recho aning kethi jon si alangli Vashti lapen la keklemtang lapen la aphan kesengtang ahukum chemathathulo.
Ansi recho aphan kepare atum alangliphan pulo, “Recho aphan langmepik ingthir-et animsopimar pari lonang.

Lapen arje langmepik nimsomar kangthir kedo-an Susa det arongsopi kethe arloso ahem along kepangrumjile recho adet adang longri do-an keri-abangphu-heihei pabatnang lapen recho akasi-entang Hegai pu arlosomar kehon abang aridengle papinang lapen halatum aphan jangthu nempru-heihei ta papilonang.
Lapen recho aning kedok animsopi kangduk abangle Vashti alar rechopi paplangnang.” Lapen recho bangso alam aning dok-lo lapen lasonsi klemlo.
Lapen arongsopi kethe Susa along inut Judia amonit dolo, amen Mordekai pu, apo ke Benjamin akhei Jair asopo, Jair asopo ke Shimei, Shimei ke Kish asopo,
Bebilon arecho Nebukhadnezzar Jerusalem pen kenep pon Judah arecho Jekoniah penpen keneppontang atum angbong alanglita inut-lo.

Lapen ke alangli punu asopi Hadassah atheke Esther aphan pangreng-lo pima la api apo ta avedet lapen bangso animso kangduk arje mesen lapen inghonmeme lapen api apo thidet aphi Mordekai si amethang akur ponsi asopi chekamlo.

Lapen recho ahukum lapen pathirtang aron pachethang-lo, nimso kangduk ongdung atum Susa det arongsopi kethe along Hegai arideng kechingrum ahut Esther aphanta recho ahem pondet-lo lapen arlosomar kehon abang Hegai arideng hodaidet-lo.

Lapen bangso animso kangduk alangli ning padok-lo, lapen alangli akangjinso long-lo lapen alangli jangthu nempru-heihei lapen apharman kecho asonta prapjin pen vanpilo lapen recho ahem pen la aphan kangvaitang bang throksi aban pi pilo lapen latum alangliphan kemenei arloso ahem angdengso padolo.
Esther amethang akhei mate chepho-chero atum aphan alangli lam pachinine det-lo, pima Mordekaisi thanri pusi pukoilo.
Lapen Esther mesenlangma lapen alangli pisi plang-loma la kechinijisi arnivang Mordekai arloso ahem atikup angno helatbomlo.

Arlosomar atum aphan chiklo jonkrehini an kepang-e aron kepathik do. La chiklo jonthrok hijung aphik ajangthu lapen chiklo jonthrok ke kepang-e ason-heihei lapen nemprujin abap-heihei alang pen abang kechihi abangphutin animso kangduk Ahasuras recho along kedamji ahut nanglelo.
Lasonsi nimso kangduk recho along kedam ahut aningkehang alingsi arloso ahem pen recho ahem kedamji aphan pidet-lo.

Arnikangsam apor la damsi adap arloso ahem hini ahum Shaashgaz arideng kedojisi chevangthulo, bangso abang recho akasi-entang abang-lo, lapen en-pangtar arloso atum aphan alangli honlo. Arloso abang aphan recho aning dokdera amen hanghete bangpi recho along damthuthelo.

Lapen Mordekai apunu Abihail asopi Esther atheke Mordekai akur kepon asopi recho along kelut damji adeng nanglesi recho akasi-entang Hegai, la arloso atum aphan kehon abang kepathik apar Esther ke thangta hanghedet-lo. Lapen non Esther aphan kethek-long atum an pen kangjinso long-lo.
