Longle kekreng pen ajok chili sek-lo.
Puru kethapji asok avelo,
lasonsi puru-heihei sok avedet-si ru-et-lo.
Pi atum dono si ingrong-lo!
chainong chelong ahur manghulo pima latum kechopan adim ave;
biresak ahur aduk dolo.
Ne nangphan nanghang-lo,
pima kechopan adim lapen thengpi thengphang kreng-et-lo,
lahei aphan me le kechodet ason.
Marat api atum anta nangliphan hang-lo pima langjeng anta krengtailo.
Zaion along athak pong-ut but non;
Ne inglong kangthir athak kepachere arki padonon!
Judah arat atum, ok klemhurnon,
pima
Lake isi kangtingkuk lapen ke-ik-kui arni,
isi inghun ke-op lapen kangting ik arni,
kethedung aron-armu asonsi longvur kevang,
inglongpi-heihei athak-le kangting kedipthip ason thakthak.
Lason aphrang penta avepinlang,
lapen mo nonphita avedetji.
Me ason si latum thengpi arong-heihei cho,
latum angno, longle ke Eden a-Beri asonlo,
bonta latum anung ke kangthaidang ajo plang-lo,
latum pen thangnat-ta chepajok un-e.
Latum losei atum ason,
ron alosei asonsi latum kat.
Inglong-heihei athak latum kechon ahut latum ronhemkonglong ason arki padolo;
latum kekreng abap me kecho arki ason.
Latum ron kechedanji kechesik-koi isi kethedung aron-armu karjap-ren ason.
Latum damlote anut-tinta pherelo;
abangphutin amahang ikkuilo.
Latum kechedan atum asonsi tengkheng-lo;
ron aso atum asonsi latum paisong arlulo.
Latum kadokaveta aphrang pakengson si dambom lapen kedam atovar chelarle mate akaprek atovar suise.
Keraikom anat latum dampak lapen thangnatta latum aphan khang un-e.
Rongsopi anat latum dampak;
latum paisong athak kat-lo;
hem-heihei angsong latum arlu lapen kanghu atum asonsi inghapso pen lutdamlo.
Latum kedam ahut longle klemhur;
sining-inghun klemhurlo.
Arni lapen chiklopi ingtingkuk-lo lapen chiklolongso-heihei turte det-lo.
Alangliphan kekroi asong ongdung lapen jakongthepik.
Komatsi kereng-longpo?
Tebonseta non,
“Ning chiruipamenon lapen an-kehum,
kechiru-kecharnap pen Ne nat nangchiruinon.
Nangtum aning ke-oi chepaklangnon;
nangpe kechingsek chot ke chokche.”
Nang Arnam
Alangli pi, inghon lapen kangjinso plengset;
Alangli aningding-o lapen kechechak ason chebi;
Alangli kaike kediyajisi chesik lapen aduk pipe.
Mat chini
Anke nangtum Alangliphan sok-sang lapen drakha-ahorlang adan pi-unpo.
Zaion anglong athak pong-ut butnon;
isi an-kehum lapen dhorom akechingrum aphan kepha ahukum-heihei pinon!
Rat pangrumnon;
latum aphan isi kangthir amei sikpinon;
arleng kesar atum aphan vannon;
osomar lapen osothi-i atum pangrumnon.
Kechepangri mirak atum ta angdeng che-o-si pavangveknang.
Dovan lapen Kardomhemthepi ajakan adak
“Nangrat aso aphan ingjinsotha
Akaprek akhei atum nelitum aphan palangrop lapen pachongthuirop long nangne.
‘Nangtum a-Arnam konat-lo?’ pu papu longledet nangji.”
Ansi
arat aso aphan Alangli ingjinsolo.
Latum aphan Alangli thak-lo:
“Non nangtum aphan Ne, sok,
drakha-ahorlang lapen jit ajangthu nangpiji,
lapen nangtum nangning ingsamjin po.
Akaprek adet atum nangtum aphan nangpinremrelo.
Nirep pen kevang longvur aron-armu Ne pavedetpo lapen kejejangtang ajo latum aphan ajehak ne phlung-lo.
Halatum aphrang aren atum aphan Kethi a-Talo anat phlungjuipo,
Latum aphi aren atum aphan ke ha Mediterran atalo anat toijuipo.
Latum kethi abang-arpum nemthuprungpo.
Ne latum aphan pavirklungpo pima latum nangtum aphan klempik-lo.”
“Hidi-heihei phereri,
bonta ning cheparong-ra chehoknon pima nangtum aphan
Pi atum phereri,
kechopan adim lirseng-lo;
thengpi-heihei athe pathelo,
lapen dorphlup athebo lapen adrakha dolo.”
“Zaion arat atum, chehoknon,
nangtum aphan
Nangtum aphan Alangli kecheng arveta nangpilo,
lapen nangtum aphan ningkreng arve nangpilo,
lapen aphrang asonsi kepadu arveta nangpilo.
Sok kesi achetai sok plengsetji;
tebuk thepo-heihei drakha alang lapen jit ajangthu si plengsetpo.
Nangtum asok longvur kecho aningkan kevir an Ne nangpithudetji.
Laso aron-armu Ne si nangtum anat nangtoilo.
Non nangtum kechoji aphan dorphlupji,
lapen ingkranglingpo.
Nangtum aphan manghumeme akam nangkeklempi
Ne rat atum aphan puthot pinrem abang avedetpo.
Anke Israel, Ne nangtum angbong do pu chinipo,
lapen Ne helo nangtum a-Arnam
lapen akaprek baduta avelo pu chinipo.
Ne rat aso aphan puthot baduta pinremre detpo.”
Laso aphi abangphutin aphan Ne karjong dungpo;
nangsopomar lapen nangsopimar atum Ne birta montripo;
nang arleng-kesar atum mang hemanpo,
lapen nang riso atum akethek-long thek-longpo.
Halabangso arni Ne ban atum aphuthak Ne karjong dungpo!
Pinso, arlo aphanta.
“Halabangso arni sining-inghun angsong lapen pirthe athakta Ne kepacheretoi angthek-heihei paklangji.
Halaso ahut vi buji,
me lapen tokmon amehi doji.
Arni ingtingkukji,
lapen vi asonsi chiklopi prung-angji,
thedung lapen pherememe
Bonta
‘Jerusalem along ajehak atum jokji;
Ne kangvaitang atum rengji.’ ”
“Halabangso arni Judah lapen Jerusalem Ne keplang-kephi ingthurthuji.
Khei atum an aphan Ne pangrumji lapen latum aphan Kangsai Arlok along vanji.
Latum Nerat aphan keklem an apot hadak Ne latum aphan ingsaiji.
Israel aphan latum bang adet papratseilo,
lapen Ne det Israel latum thakdak-lo.
Komatsi ban kelongjima la kepharjisi latum khadot pathulo.
Beisa lapen hor anam kepijisi latum pinso lapen arlosomar ban chojorlo.”
Tair, Sidon lapen Philistia alongri kedo-an atum, nangtum Nephan kopilo keklem? Nangtum Nephan pine alar ketuji putong kebor-ima? Kalang-lo pulote Ne nangtum aphan alar pithu serakji!
Nangtum Ne ser lapen Ne rup pontang-lo, lapen nangtum akardomhem-heihei arlo Ne khi an pontang-lo.
Nangtum Judah lapen latum aphan Grik atum along jordamlo.
Non latum aphan nangtum kejordam adim pen Ne van detpo. Latum aphan nangtum keklem asonthot Ne ta nangtum aphan nangklempo.
Judah arat along nangsopo lapen nang-sopimar nangpachojor-toiji; latum aphan kehelo Sabea atum along latum jorpo. Ne
“Khei atum angbong laso alam pachethang non:
‘Ron aphan chesiknon;
nangron aso aphan phanon;
nangron aso an pangrumra damnon!
Nangtum alangnoi aphal kebu pen theng-ra nokjir-heihei paplangnon lapen nangtum kangprunji anokek chir pinchongnon.
Ke-ainilak atum anta chedanvek nangji.
Serak-ra vangnon,
nang kekompet akhei atum an,
lapen arlok along chingrumnon.’ ”
Latum aphan ketengkhengjile, O
nangron-armu nangtoinon.
Khei atum chesikvek nangji lapen Kangsai Arlok along vangvek nangji.
Hadak kekompet akhei atum aphan kangsaijisi Ne ingnipo.
Latum akehingno thepik;
sok-kerot ahut kerotpet asonle;
latum aphan rotpetnon;
drakha alang plengpletik drakha kesor asonle latum aphan sornon.
Suri suri atum Kangsai Arlok along dolo.
Hadaksi
Arni lapen Chiklopi ingtingkuk-lo,
lapen chiklolongso atur khelanledet-lo.
Zaion anglong pen
Jerusalem pen Alangli se pathelo,
pirthe lapen sining-inghun klemhurlo.
Bonta Alangli rat aphan raipo.
“Ansi, Israel, Ne
nang Arnam lo pu chinipo.
Ne Zaion athak,
Ne inglong kangthir si do.
Jerusalem ke isi kangthir arongsopi plangpo;
la aputhak bang akhei atum puthot nang cheraidetdelo.
Halaso ahut inglongpi-heihei drakha aberi si dipthip-po, lapen inglong alongtinta chainong thek-longpetpo;
Judah adang bithe alangroi alangjeng dorphlup alang dopo.
lapen la Akasia Arlok aphan lang padorpo.”
“Ijip isi kejejangtang ajo plangpo,
lapen Edom isi keruhup akeningjoino plangpo.
pima latum Judah adet tengkheng-lo lapen la adaikave arat aphan pathilo.
Bonta Judah along ke kaike ta monit doverji,
lapen Jerusalem alongta a-ove ove anta doji.
Kethitang atum apot Ne alarhuiji ,
adai apot Ne pajokje.
athema Zaion along
Judah arecho Uzziah ahut lapen Joash asopo Jeroboam Israel arecho ahut, chikli kevang ningkan hini aphrang Tekoa arong biresak kevi atum angbong Amos alamjir-heihei Israel aputhak alangli thek-longsi
lapen alangli pulo:
lapen Jerusalem pen Alangli ase pathelo;
biresak-kevi atum pachopan adim-heihei chiru lapen Karmel anglong chekedulo.”
“Damaskas sonthom aron kangdi apot,
lapen phli apot, Ne aduk kepiji pavedetdelo;
pima latum Gilead aphan sok kesi-i ingchin adang pen silo.
Lasi Hazael ahem aphuthak Ne si ame toipo,
lapen Benhadad apaisong-heihei me pachodetpo.
Ne Damaskas angkir ing-lokpo,
lapen kedo atum Aven arlok pen pavirpo lapen Betheden pen ke-otdong recho achin abang aphanta pavirpo;
lapen Siria arat Kir arong anat ban damnangpo,”
pusi
“Pima Gaza sonthom aron kangdi apot,
lapen songphli apot, Ne aduk kepiji pavedetdelo;
Pima latum Edom atum arideng kehodaijisi do-an arat ban nepponlo.
La apotsi apai aphuthak Ne isi ame toipo lapen la labangso apaisong-heihei me chodetpo.
Ne Ashdod asor atum lapen Ashkelon arecho achin ke-otdong abang aphanta pavirpo;
Ne Ekron abe thursi Ne ri jarhampo lapen ahin kedolang Philistia atum virdetpo,”
pusi
“Tair sonthom aron kangdi apot,
lapen sonphli apot,
Ne aduk kepiji pavedetdelo;
pima latum kedo-an arat Edom anat hodai et apot,
lapen akorte hijan kechepajok alam chematha-thuthedet-lo.
La apotsi Ne Tair apai aphuthak isi ame toipo,
lapen la labangso apaisong-heihei chodetpo.”
“Edom sonthom aron kangdi apot,
pima sonphli apot, Ne aduk kepiji pavedetdelo;
pima alangli nokjir pen akorte aphi phi hungdunlo,
lapen akangjinso pavedet-lo,
lapen alangli ningkethi tengnenepinsi chingsek-lo,
lapen kaiketa alangli ning kethi biverlo.
La apotsi Ne Teman aphuthak isi ame toipo,
lapen la Bozrah apaisong-heihei me chodetpo.”
“Ammon atum sonthom aron kangdi apot,
lapen pima sonphli apot,
Ne aduk kepiji pavedetdelo;
pima latum det ahoi keparlojisi Gilead along aso kedo a-arlosomar atum apok latum siridak-dak-lo.
La apotsi Ne Rabbah apai aphuthak me keipo lapen la labangso apaisong me chodetsi ron kechedan arni ahut kehang pen hangjopo,
bangso tomon hanchove arni ahut tomon tipri dopo.
Lapen latum arecho ban dam nangpo,
alangli lapen alangli rechoso atum pen pen dam rappetpo,” pusi
“Pima Moab sonthom aron kangdi apot,
lapen sonphli apot, Ne aduk kepiji pavedetdelo;
Pima Edom arecho arepi-heihei me pachodetsi saini paplang-lo.
La apotsi Moab aphuthak isi ame Ne toipo,
lapen la Kerioth apaisong-heihei me chodetpo,
lapen Moab hurisei angbong,
kehangjo angbong lapen pong-ut arki angbongsi thipo;
Ne latum angbong pen kepangri abang pavedetpo,
lapen alanglilong la arechoso an pathikoipo,” pusi
“Pima Judah sonthom aron kangdi apot,
lapen sonphli apot,
Ne aduk kepiji pavedetdelo;
pima latum
bonta latum kopu-an kechobei arnamsi latum aphan pasuipo,
latum aphusar atum aphi phi kengkam chejorlo.
La apotsi Ne Judah aphuthak isi ame toipo,
lapen la Jerusalem apaisong me chodetpo.”
“Pima Israel sonthom aron kangdi apot,
lapen sonphli apot, Ne aduk-kepiji pavedetdelo;
pima latum kengset atum aphan rup pen chojorlo,
lapen keboidet abangphan keng-op echor pen chojorlo.
Latum keduk atum aphu pirthe alongle aduk along donglam lam lo lapen kedukdet atum atovar pen pasuilo;
inut amonit lapen la apo inutnat a-arloso along damsi Ne kangthir amen pangthirthedet-lo;
Latum keduk atum pen kevan ape limsi adovantin adung ithorlo;
lapen adai ketu atum ahorlang latum a-Arnam ahem junlo.”
“Tebonseta Ne latum angno Ammon aphan pavirlo.
La kangtui kedar arong kangtui ason,
lapen kangtang phongrong longpoh arong-heihei ason Ne la angsong athe lapen la arum angkur pavirtang-lo.
Lapen Nesi nangtum aphan Ijip adet pen nangvanlo,
Ammon atum alongle kechepahemphu-jisi lapen ningkan phlikep kejejangtang ajo jalinlo.
Lapen Ne nangsomar atum aphan manene montri atum lapen nangrisomar atum kechepanong abang Arnam aphan kekroi kechebi abang paplang-lo.
O Israel arat atum, lapuhelo kalima?”
pusi
Bonta Arnam aphan kechepanong kekroi kechebi abangphan nang horlang pajuntoilo,
lapen montri atum aphan nang montri-ri pusi hukum pilo.
“Chininon, sok ahemkonglong sokpeng pen kesit-het ason thak-thaksi Ne nangphan arum nangberhetpo.
Kangjar un atum prapjin pen virpo,
lapen kangtang atum ajakong chelonglelo jakong kethenei abangta amethang akai chepajok thekthelo.
Lithai kejo abang arjapthip un-edetpo lapen akeng kechat abangta amethang chepajok thekthelo,
lapen jakong kethenei angbong
aning kangtangrak abang seta
halabangso arni reng angse si
katjuipo,” pusi
Labangso alam arjutha, O Israel arat atum
Ne Ijip adet pen kevan akhei an aphuthak alam:
“Pirthe adang akhei an angbong Ne nangphansi chinichot;
La apotsi nangtum adai-heihei apot Ne nangtum aphan aduk pipo.”
Aphrang pen chepathikthete banghini amonit atum kosonsi kengkam kechejorrap thekpo?
Kechonep api avedet ahut hingho nampi ajo ingrongpoma?
Hingho aloso thangta chochedet ahut angthor pen ase pathepoma?
Keparhi amar avete ejon avo longle athak phamsek along kloham poma?
Thangnatta dandete phamsek longle athak pen phirpoma?
Rongsopi along pong-ut but lote,
rat atum phereredet poma?
Chenamsi
Hingho ingrongtang-lo,
matsi phereredetpo!
matsi montritre detpo?
Assiria apaisong-heihei anat pachethangnon,
Ijip lapen Ashdod adet apaisong-heihei anatta,
lapen punon, “Samaria Anglong-heihei along nangtum chingrumnon,
lapen la along kethenei akehorisei lapen la angbong akechenek-heihei thek-longpo.”
“Latum kechokpet akam kosonsi keklem nangjima chinine” pusi
Kehingno kepangrum abang lapen latum apaisong-heihei along kethipon amar kebi atum.
La apotsi
“Hotur det kompetpo lapen nang kechesong nangpen pavedetpo lapen nangpaisong-heihei lapen kedo adim anta phangno-etpo.”
Lasonsi
“Arjunon lapen Jakob abe thurra haki chonon,”
pusi muluk a-
“Ne Israel atum la aron-heihei kangdi pen apot aduk kepiji arni Ne Bethel adovan-heihei aphanta aduk pipo lapen dovan anu an chorpetsi longle athak klopo.
Ne barla ahem pen ningkreng ahem parupo;
lapen ingnar aso pen kekim ahemta pavirpo,
lapen hem kethe-heihei jutdetpo;”
pusi
“Bangso alam arjutha, nang Bashan adet achainong api atum,
Samaria Anglong kedo atum keduk abangphan kechenek abang lapen keboi abangphan keberrop abang apenan atum aphan,
‘Netum kejunjile, vannon’ pu kepu abang!
Chininon, nangtum aphuthak ahut arni vangpo,
latum arhi-heihei pen nang pondetpo,
kejutsi nangtum aphan ok arhi-heihei pen pondetpo.
Lapen kephri adim-heihei angbong abangphutin kengson pen la aphrang lapen nangtum aphan Harmon arlo varchorpo, ”
pusi
Bethel anat vang-ra aron ingdinon;
Gilgal anat, lapen aron kangdi pachannon;
arnivangta nang athok-heihei vannon;
nang phankep pen ephan nithom pen ephong vannon;
Thap ahim pen kero athok dan vannon lapen ningkehang adan-heihei pachethangra lahei paklangnon;
pima nangtum lahei keklem nangning dokpik-lo,
O Israel arat atum! pusi
“Ne nangrongsopi kedo-an aputhak akhim kevan abang-lo,
lapen nangtum adim an him padordelo,
seta nangtum Nelong vangvedet-lo,”
pusi
“Lapen sok kerot kerim apor chiklo jonthom dolang seta
Ne nangtum aphan arve pajang longledetpo;
Ne isi arongsopi aphan arve pajangtoipo lapen akaprek arongsopi aphan ke arve avelo;
rit ejai aphuthak arve jangpo,
lapen arve kejangje ajai ke thikhraipo.
La apotsi rongsopi hini kethom asor lang kejunjisi elong arongsopi dampo lapen aning kehang plengplelo;
Seta nangtum Nelong vangvedet-lo.”
pusi
Ne prisam pen sok pathikhrai pen nangtum aphan pasung-lo;
nangtum aberi lapen drakha aberi-heihei Ne pangsamrilo:
Nangtum athebo arong lapen ajit arong-heiheita longkoi cholap-lo;
Seta nangtum nelong vangvedet-lo,
Pusi
Ne Ijip adet asonsi Ne nangtum angbong mavur nangtoilo;
Ne nokjir pen nangtum arisomar aphan pathilo;
Ne nang-losei-heihei pondet-lo;
lapen Ne nangtum amukam kenemthu angnim pangnimlo;
seta nangtum Nelong vangvedet-lo,
pusi
Arnam, Sodom lapen Gomorrah kepavir asonthotsi nangtum angbong ajehak aphan pavirlo,
lapen nangtum me angkang pen kevungphit athengtom abeng nangnak-lo;
Seta nangtum Nelong vangve det-lo.
pusi
La apotsi, O Israel,
Ne lasonsi nangtum aphan klempo;
Pima Ne la nangtum aphan klempo,
Nang Arnam pen kechetongjile chesiknon, O Israel!
Pima langtha, inglong-heihei lapen tomon kepinchong abang lapen monit aphan Alangli kematha la pachinilo;
adap pen ajo kepinchong a-Bang lapen pirthe athak kangtui adim-heihei kedo a-Bang;
Ne nang phuthak keklemji ningduk alun
labangso alam arjutha,
O Israel akhei atum:
“Kangthir-et Israel adet kreptang-lo thurthedetpo;
Baduta kangthirjir abang avesi la alanglilong otekangbup-lo.”
Pima
“Bang suri isi kedam arongsopi,
bang pharo isi si rengchotji,
lapen bang pharo isi kedam atum bangkep si Israel akhei aphan dochotji.”
Pima
“Nephan rinon lapen rengnon;
bonta Bethel along rinangne,
lapen Gilgal arlo lutdam nangne mate Beersheba anatta paririnon.
Pima Gilgal ban damnangvekpo,
lapen Bethel thangta kalidet plangpo.”
kalite Alangli Joseph ahemtun angbong me asonsi klangpo mene,
lapen la chopo Bethel aphan la kepamep abang avedetpo.
O nangtum ahok-kangsai alar Riho pamanlo,
lapen bang kelongji amar kekhang abang.
Vosokpi lapen Hingchong-patherang kepinchong a-Bang lapen kangtingpik pen adap pathe-ang a-Bang lapen anerlo pangtingsi ajo pamanlo,
talo alang-heihei aphan kehang a-Bang,
lapen lahei pirthe athak dung-lo
Kangtangrak aphuthak prapjin pen pavirdet a-Bang,
la apotsi paisong aputhak kevir vang-lo.
Inghap along kangchek abangphan latum hijim,
lapen ahok keningje abangphan latum kehijim pen mathalo.

La apotsi keduk atum aphuthak nang chenek-ot lapen latum pen thengthe anghor nang endun nangtum kesoi a-arlong pen hem-heihei chekimtang-lo bonta lahei along nang dolonglelo nang langmesem adrakha aberi che-etang-lo bonta lahei ahorlang nang jun longlelo.
Pima Ne chini nang ko-an aron-heihei ingdilo,
lapen ko-an nangpap kethe,
nang athikpet aphan pasungsi tangka kecho-en abang,
lapen keduk aphan inghap along kelongji ajakong thi-lo.
La apotsi kecherethek abang lason ahut dojoipo;
pima la kehingno ahut.
Kemele rinon lapen kehingno kali,
la pen nang rengji;
lasonsi
nanglong padonang.
Kehingno hijimnon lapen akemele inghonnon,
lapen inghap along ahok akangsai pathirnon;
La apotsi
“Rong adim kethe an chiru charnap dopo;
lapen rongsopi tovar alongtin latum pupo,
‘ba pi anset-lo!’
latum aning padukjisi sai ketiki abangphan,
lapen lunse atum aphan pachiru pacharnapjisi hangpo,
lapen drakha aberi an hadak kechiru kecharnap dopo,
pima Ne nangtum angbong damputpo,”
pusi
Nangtum tangte kopi athesi
lake kangting-lo, lapen kethe-ang kali;
inut amonit ejon ahingho pen kekat ason,
lapen ejon athokvam laphan chetong-lok-lo mate hem arlo damsi arpong athak ari chevek-ling ahut lapen ejon apherui laphan archudap-lo.
lapen kethe-ang kali,
lapen ingtingrimsi lake la an kekhelanlelo?
“Ne hijim, nang chojun Ne langremlo,
lapen nangtum kangthir amei-heihei kechingrum along Ne thang Nening arong ave.
Nangtum Nephan me kephrin-i athok-heihei lapen sok-sang athok pi seta Ne lahei dengde detpo.
Lapen nangtum kepangtu api ningkangsam athok-heihei anta,
Ne langledetpo.
Nangtum kehangkong alun ingtonnon,
nangtum akumbeleng arki Ne arju ingtungte.
Bonta lang-heihei ason ahok-akangsai palinang lapen kaike keliver alangso ason kechokpet padonang.”
Nangtum ningkan phlikep kejejangtang ajo Nephan athok ajir-heihei lapen sok-sang adan-heihei Nelong vanloma, O Israel akhei?
Nangtum arecho Sakkuth lapen Kaiwan la nangtum achiklolongso a-Arnam, la nangtum keselam akumlin-heihei rungpo;
la apotsi Ne Damaskas parai bang adet nangtum aphan ban bidampo pusi
“Zaion along sungsepin pen kedo
atum paphonang,
lapen Samaria anglong along kephere avelo pu kematha atum paphonang,
Det atum angbong aphrangsi amonit atum latum along Israel akhei vang-lo.
Kalneh arong damra, lapen langtha;
lapen hadak pen Hamath Kethe damnon,
lapen Philistia atum Gath along hir damnon.
latum bangso adet-heihei apar memuma?
Mate nangtum alongle apar halatum alongle themuma?
Kehingno aron kedengmo abang, O nangtum,
lapen kevir arni kevan kepatebok atum?”
“Ingnar aso ahongplang-heihei
athak ke-ithor abang,
lapen api ahur pen biresak chainong aso kecho abang paphonang;
Kumbeleng arki pen langmeme alun kelun abang,
lapen David ason amethang aphan lun kelun ajohton keselam atum;
Harlung-heihei ahor kejun abang lapen kemenei ajangthu-nempru-heihei pen amethang chehi bonta Joseph kevir aputhak aning duk-dunde!
La apotsi latum helo ban kedam nangji atum angbong kedam nangcheng atum plangpo.
Lapen aning arong kechepisi chephajeng atum avedetpo.
“Jakob anekethe Ne hijimlo,
lapen la apaisong-heihei ta hijimlo lapen rongsopi lapen la along kedo-an Ne hodaipo.”
Lapen bangkep amonit jongsi ehumpet ahem along dorappet seta latum thipo.

Lapen Edom amonit, la me kephrin abang, hem pen areppi kevanjisi laphan angsong ponpo, lapen hem arlonei kedo abangphan pupo, “Nanglong anut kaprek dolangma?” Alangli thakpo, “ave;” lapen alangli pupo; “Dojoinon!
Pima chininon,
lapen hem thepo parusi pabeng-lo lapen hemso pachet-ilo.
Losei-heihei longpak-heihei athak ingplong ma talo athak chainong pen haibai ma?
Bonta nangtum ahok-akangsai bikar lapen athe riho pamanlo,
Lodebar along ning cheparong atum,
“Etum methang ajakong pen Karnaim etum aphan endet lo kalima?” pu kepu abang,
“Pima chininon,
Ne nangbe pathurjisi isi akhei ingthurpo,
O Israel akhei”
pusi muluk a-Arnam
lapen latum Hamath kecheng pen Arabah alangso anta nangtum aphan nangchenekpo.

Latum det abap chodet ahut ne pulo,
“O
Kosonsi Jakob arjapthek poma? lake bihek!”
“La plangpledetpo,” pusi
Lasonsi
Ansi ne pulo,
“O
Kosonsi Jakob arjuthek-poma? Pima alangli bipik”
“La plangpledetpo,” pusi
Alangli nephan paklang-lo: Chininon,
Lapen
Isaak akangtui adim-heihei rongman paplangpo lapen kangthir-et adim-heihei pangsampo, lapen Ne nokjir pen Jeroboam ahem abe thurpo.”
Ansi Amaziah Bethel akurusar Jeroboam, la Israel arecho anat toisi pulo, “Amos nangbe thursi Israel akhei angbong bidi klemlo, det alang lam an chechak un-edet-lo.
Pima Amos lasonsi pulo, ‘Jeroboam nokjir pen thipo, lapen Israel atum methang alongle pen kehelo ban damnangpo.’”
Lapen Amaziah, Amos aphan pulo, “O sangkelang abang, damra ha Judia adet kehelole damnon, lapen hadak-le him chonon, lapen hadak-le montrinon,
Dak Bethel along mo nonphi seta montri-ri, lake recho karcho adim, lake det a-Kardomhemthepi lo.”
Ansi Amos, Amaziah aphan thak-lo, “Ne montri kali, lapen montri asopota kali; bonta ne inut pi ahur kevi abang, lapen inut ingle arong-heihei kangprun abang,
lapen
Non la apotsi
Nang pulo, “Israel aputhak montrinon,
lapen Isaak ahem aphan than pachethang nangnelo.”
La apotsi
“Nangpiso rongsopi along abang chejorpo,
lapen nangsopo lapen nangsopi atum nokjir pen klicheipo,
lapen nang longle adak pen phlakdak-dak po;
nangmethang ke kangthirthe adetsi thipo,
lapen Israel atum methang adet pen kehelosi ban dam nangvekpo.”
Lasonsi
Lapen Alangli pulo, “Amos, nang kopi thek-long-lo?” Lapen neli thak-lo, “Barla ahut eton athesere.” Ansi
Ne latum aphan diyathuthelo.
Halabangso arni kardom ahem alun chiru-charnap-heihei plangpo,”
pusi
“Kethitang abang arpum ongdungpo;
halatum aphan alongtin adimta var pangsamripo .”
La arjunon, nang keboidet atum aphan kedongsit,
lapen keduk atum alongle kepajutdet abang,
Chepulo, “Ili sok kejor longji aphan chiklo kemi mantusi dampoma?
lapen thengthe kejorji pura ketirvaji aphan mantusi Kesang Arni kedam poma,
lalote ili ton pabin pen lapen ador parlulongpo lapen ahok-he alin-heihei en-longpo.
Anke elin arup pen keduk atum lapen keng-op echor pen keboidet atum aphan kenamthekjile lapen kenangne athengthe jorlonang?
“Chenamsi Ne latum akam-heihei isita tengnenedetpo.
Labangso pen apot det klemhurpo kalima,
lapen la along kedo an anut-tin ningripo kalima,
lapen kadokave Nil Aroi asonsi dampo lapen inglimthuchokpo.”
“Lapen halabangso arni”
“Nerlo-chittim apor Ne arni pachipo,
lapen nerlo kethe-ang ahut pirthe pangtingsangpo.
Nangtum rong-aje Ne ningduk paplangpo,
lapen nangtum alun-heihei do-an ningri paplangpo;
Ne kedo-an avan pethoila pa-umpo,
lapen aphutin paphukoipo;
Po epumpet asopo aphan kecharhe asonsi Ne la paplangpo,
lapen la kejut ke isi hodak arni asonpo.”
“Chininon, arni vangbomlo,”
pusi
“Ne pirthe athak akhim nangtoipo;
him akhim kali, lang kang-it akhimta kali,
bonta
Halatum talo pen talo an damthap-po,
lapen Nirep pen Nihang anta;
halatum
bonta halatum la longledetpo.”
Halabangso arni langmesen a-okarjang atum lapen arisomar atum lang kang-itsi thirengjengpo.
Samaria a-Ashimah pen semeketang atum pulo,
“Nang arnam kereng ason, O Dan,”
lapen Beersheba kereng-i atovar ason,
latum kreppo, lapen kaike seta thurthuthekthe detpo.
lapen rat kedo-an aphu-heihei theng-rop rop-non;
lapen latum ahin an Ne nokjir pen pathipo;
latum inut bakta kat longlelo,
latum inut bakta jok longlelo.”
“Halatum chom arlo hut seta hadak Ne ri si latum aphan vandetpo;
latum sining arlu seta hadak pen ne ri si latum aphan vandetpo;
Latum ongsi Karmel anglongpi along chepatu seta,
Ne latum aphan riji lapen nepchekji.
Latum ongsi talo along arlo chepatu seta Ne talo alang api aphan hukum pisi latum aphan parchutoipo.
Lapen latum latum ahotur along ban dun-et seta hadak Ne nokjir aphan hukum pipo lapen la latum aphan thupo;
lapen akeme aphan kali, kehingno aphansi Ne latum aphuthak nemek bilorpo.”
lapen la along kedo atum an ningduk lapen la kedo-an Nil aroi ason thurpak lapen inglimthupo, Ijip a-Nil ason;
Alangli sining angsong-heihei kangtui kedo adim kechikim abang,
lapen pirthe athak longle arlo ahem chepinchong abang;
talo alang-heihei kehang abang lapen pirthe athak halahei dung-lo,
Ne ingno nangtum Ethiopia atum ason kalima,
O Israel arat atum,
“Israel aphan Ne Ijip adet pen vanvelangma,
lapen Philistia atum Caphtor pen lapen Siria atum Kir pen kalima?
Chininon,
lapen la Ne longle athak pen pavirdetji;
Muthe Ne Jakob akhei pavirdet khangjangje,”
“Pima chininon, Ne hukum pipo,
lapen det kedo-an angbong Ne Israel akhei aphan inut ingkrung pen sok kepajang asonsi hijukpo,
bonta longkoiso imuta pirthe athak klokledetpo.
Ne rat papi atum an nokjir pensi thipo,
komatsi pulo, kehingno atum aphan phophe mate vangve detji pu.”
Halabangso arni kekreptang lapen kedak-heihei la keselamthuji aphan David ahem Ne ingthurji,
lapen la kerutang an ingthurji,
lapen hako ahut asonsi la kimthumipo;
Anke latum Edom ahem chepahemphu longpo lapen Ne men pen kehang adet anta lo,
la keklem abang
Chininon, arni nanglebomlo,
“Hai kebai abang kerot abang phopo lapen drakha athe kedonglam abang chili chili kerik abang phopo;
inglong-heihei pen drakha alang klo dopdop po lapen inglongso an la pen ingbakpo.
Ne rat Israel akopai-heihei Ne parengthupo,
lapen latum kerutang arongsopi chekimthusi dopo:
latum drakha arikang epo lapen lahei alang junpo,
lapen latum beri choklemsi lapen lahei athesere chopo.
Ne latum adet aputhak e-po,
lapen latum aphan kaiseta Ne kepitang alongle pen kaike seta phujokje detpo,”
Obadiah kemontri alam lahelo: La ke Edom adet aputhak
Khei atum anat
lapen Alangli birta netum arjulong-lo:
“Chesiknon! Edom abethurra ron chedan damlonang!”
Edom aphan
Nangphan Ne pa-ainihakji.
abangphutin ta nangphan nang pinremhurpo.
Nangnekethe nangphan nangpachobeilo.
Nangdet arongsopi ke isi alongpai;
nanghem ke ha inglongpi-heihei akangtuisi do,
lasi nangmethang chepulo,
“Komatsi nephan arum nesanthor unpo?”
Vomu atar ason kangtui nanghem cheselam seta,
la chiklolongso-heihei angbong kedo nangnak seta,
Ne nangphan arum nangsanthorji.
“Ajo kanghu kevang ahut,
latum aning kehang alingsi ponchotji.
Monit atum drakha athe pangrumlote,
latum asap-o ke otekangji.
Bonta nang hotur atum nangpavir pilortang-lo.
Iso aso-asu atum, nangtum akhipuru-heihei kedo-an pontang-lo.
Nang kechelang atum nangphan nangchobeitang-lo;
latum nangdet pen nangphan nangphlungtang-lo.
Nang pen kechepangsam arat atum nonke nangphan nangtengkheng tang-lo.
Nang pen kechorap-rap nangjirpo atum nangphan pham nangtot-lo;
latum nanglam chethansi pulo,
‘La akeresak an konat-lone?’”
“Ne Edom aphan aduk kepi ahut,
halatum arlengkere an aphan Ne pavir-etji
lapen halatum abidi an pavedetji,
lapen Edom along kedo abangphutin aron aso aphan pathilapji.”
Pima nang korte atum,
Jakob aso-asu aphan nang thiparohumlo lapen pathilo,
nangphan pavirdetpo lapen kaike aphan nangpinremdetpo.
Halatum anghap-heihei hotur atum kephangno ahut halaso arni achar si nang arjap-joisi do.
Jerusalem akhi keroipon lapen halatum angbong la kechethak bang adet aso atum ason an nangta hingnolo.
Judah along nang korte atum aphuthak kesung kevang arni nang cholangding nangnedetji apot-lo.
Halatum kesung ahut nang ingnekchoidun nangnedetji apot-lo.
Halatum kevir arni halatum kesung aputhak kehiringdunjile lapen halatum akhi-heihei kecheraidunji pura Nerat arongsopi arlo nang lutdam nangnedetji apot-lo.
Kechepajokji kekat atum aphan kenepdunji pura tovar chetok along nang arjapdunther nangnedetji apot-lo.
Halatum kesung arni hotur arideng nang halatum aphan hodaidedet nangji apot-lo.
Khei atum aphan Ne,
Edom aphan kopima keklemtang asonthotsi nangphanta nangklemdetpo.
Nang kopisi pitang-loma la nangphan nangpidetpo.
Ne inglong kangthir athak Nerat atum keho-kephik aduk-kepi aharlung juntang-lo.
Bonta adung arei adet kedo-an la apar keho-kephik aharlung junpo;
halatum la kedo-an junpetpo lapen virdetpo.
“Bonta Zaion Anglong athak ajehak atum jok-lo,
lapen la isi kangthir adim plangpo.
Jakob arat atum laso alongle cherai longpo,
lake halatum kelong nangji apharmanlo.
Jakob lapen Joseph arat atum me ason plangpo;
sok anar me kecho asonsi latum Iso aso-asu atum aphan pavirdetpo.
Iso aso-asu inutbakta reng-longledetpo.
Ne,
Judah angkang arlo nitur ahin pen rat atum vangsi Edom cheraipo;
nichi anglong akeng-ri-heihei pen vangsi Philistia adet cheraipo;
Israel aso atum Ephraim lapen Samaria alongri cherai longpo;
Benjamin arat atum Gilead endetpo.
Nirep a-Israel aron-armu ban kedam pen chevangthusi Philistia lapen ha nirep anat-thu Zarephath anta cheraidetpo.
Sardis along kedo Jerusalem ban kedamtang atum vangsi Judah arlo anitur arong-heihei cheraidetpo.
Jerusalem kehaithor arat atum
Edom tengkhengsi la aputhak pangripo.
Lapen
Arnisi
“Thurra Nineveh rongsopikethe along damnon, lapen laso aputhak asekethe pen hangnon, pima halatum ajat kelangno Ne ingno klangtang-lo.”
Bonta Jonah thursi Tarshish anat
Bonta

Telong kevek atum pheresi anut-tinta amethang a-arnam aphan chehang-rep lo; lapen halatum aphan keparjang muchotjisi telong arlo kedo amar-atar talo arlo varchuilo . Bonta Jonah ke telong arlonei angdeng damtang-lo lapen i-joi-lo, lapen amek jangphit-lo.
Lasi songjalin abang vangsi alangliphan pulo, “Nang kopi athesi nangmek kejang-lo? Thurra arnam aphan hangnon! Arnam etum kevirvedetji aphan isi mathaji mene.”

Lapen halatum lahin lahin chethan-seilo, “Vangnon komat abang pen apotsi ili bangso akesung kephonang-loma, la kechinijile ili khadot pathulonang.” Lasi latum khadot pathulo, lapen khadot along Jonah amen klang-lo.

Ansi latum alangliphan pulo, “Nelitum aphan nethantha, komat abang pen apotsi ili bangso akesung phonang-loma? Nangli kam kopi? Lapen konat pensi nangli kevang? Nangli det konat? Lapen nangli khei kopi?”
Lapen alangli latum aphan thak-lo, “Neli ke Ibri; lapen neli sining a-Arnam talo lapen longle kepinchong abang
Anke halabangso amonit atum pherepik-lo lapen alangliphan pulo, “Nangli la kopisi keklemporloma !” Pima alangli
Anke halatum alangliphan pulo, “Talo nelitum aphan kehamjile nangliphan nelitum kopilo nang keklem nangji?” Pima talo atomonpi thethubomlang.
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Neliphan neponra talo along nevarchuinon; anke talo nanglitum aphan hamdetpo; pima neli chini, la tomon tipri nanglitum aphuthak kevang lake neli pen apot-lo.”
Jonghesetta puthot telong longle anat kevangthuji aphan monit atum jasemetsi vek-lo, bonta halatum un-e pima halatum aphuthak tomon thethubomlang.
La apotsi latum
Ansi latum Jonah aphan ponlo lapen talo varchuilo; lapen talo la lang adihu pen hamdet lo.
Anke monit atum
Lapen Jonah aphan kepajoilutjisi lang-okthepi
Ansi Jonah lang-a-ok apok arlo pen alangli Arnam
“Ningduk pen ne
lapen Alangli ne-thak-lo;
Chom apok arlo pen ne hang-lo,
lapen Alangli nese arjulo.
Pima arnuk-krung arlosi Nang nephan varlo,
talo-heihei angbong arlo,
langthepi nekomchenlo;
Nang lang adihu an lapen Nanglang angring an
nephuthak damtang-lo.
Ansi ne pulo, ‘Nephan Nang ingno pen vartang-lo,
kopusi ne puthot nang kardomhemthepi kangthir thek-longpoma?’
Lang-heihei nephuthak vangpet-lo,
karnuknei alang nephan komchenlo;
lang abap-heihei nephu ingnang-lo.
Inglong-heihei akeng-ri along
ne longle anat hirtuk-lo
la kaike aphan nerangkhapet-lo seta hilik pen Nang neparengthulo,

Ne karjong ne-ok arlo thirengjeng un ahut,
ne
lapen ne kardom Nanglong vang-lo,
nang kardomhemthepi kangthir arlo.
Ale kavedet akumlin-heihei aphan kekroi atum halatum ahok akekroithip che-olo.
Bonta neke kechoro ase pen
Nangphan karkli athok pipo;
ne kechechaktang ason tupo.
Kejok ke
Lapen
Ansi batai hini aphong
“Thurra Nineveh rongsopi kethe along damnon lapen Ne nangkepu abirta hadak pachethang damnon.”
Lasi Jonah thurlo, lapen
Jonah arnisi atovar rongsopi nanglut si kedam cheng-lo. Lapen alangli ase kethe pan hang-lo; ni phlikep an dolang, lapen Nineveh pavirdetpo!
Lapen Nineveh arat atum Arnam aphan kroilo; halatum isi an-kehum pachethang-lo, lapen akethe pen ha akebi an pethoila latum che-umlo.
Ansi birta-heihei Nineveh arecho along lelo, lapen alangli recho anghoi pen thursi alangli methang ape chephloksi pethoila che-umlo lapen thek-lo aduk ajo ingnilo.

Lapen alangli pachethang-lo lapen Nineveh pen pachinilo, “Recho lapen arlengkethe atum ketoi alam; monit tame, aroi api ahur tame, kevi api ahur tame, thangnata pachomatme nang; latum cholongle, lapen jun longle,
bonta monit lapen pi ta pethoila pache-um nang, lapen Arnam aphan jasemet-le pahangnang; ahok abangphutin amethang kehingno atovar lapen arideng-heihei kephangno akam pen pache-o nang.
Komatchini, Arnam aning chirui tahai mene lapen Alangli aningkethipik pen chetevarsi ilitum vir jokphlot tahai mene?”
Halatum kopi klemtang-loma, kosonsi halatum kehingno atovar pen halatum che-olo, la Arnam thek-long-lo, Arnam aning chiruisi Alangli halatum aphan kehingno keklemji pu kepu la Alangli klemledet-lo.
Bonta la Jonah aphan aning padokdedet-lo, lapen alangli aning-thihak lo.
Lapen alangli
La apotsi non, O
Lapen
Ansi Jonah rongsopi angtan damsi lapen rongsopi anihang anat ingnilo, lapen hadak pharla chekimlo. Alangli laso arum abin along rongsopi aphan keplang nangji ason thek-longle tik chongnilo.
Lapen
Bonta puthot arni kevang ahut, Arnam ejon a-ingki pathik-lo, la arong cholo amatsi la chekedulo.
Arni kethur ahut sopik atomon Arnam pathik-lo, lapen arni Jonah aphu athak turlo lapen amat la thirengjeng-lo; lapen alangli kethijisi chohang-lo, lapen pulo, “Kereng aphante nephan kethi memulo.”
Bonta Arnam Jonah aphan pulo, “Nang bonglang arong aphan ningkethi me-oma?” Lapen alangli pulo, “Ne ningkethi mesenlo, lapen thipin an tame ning thiji.”
Lapen
Tangte suri pharo isira ingkoi amuluk kedo lapen ongdung achainong kedo, halatum ar-e pen arvi kedo atum chechinine arongsopi kethe Nineveh aphan Ne jinsosedet nangjima?”
Judah arecho Jotham, Ahaz lapen Hezekiah atum arni ahut Moresheth asor Mikah along
Arjutha, nangtum rat kedo-an;
no chedennon, O pirthe, lapen la along kedo-an;
Lapen
Athe chininon,
Lapen inglong-heihei Alangli ber ingjirpo lapen arlok-heihei jo-ir me angno kangjir asonsi chinghangpo lang-heihei arleng ajo kedung asonsi dungpo.
La kadokave Jakob apap apot-lo lapen Israel atum apap-heihei apot.
Jakob apap kopi?
La Samaria kalima?
Lapen Judah ahem apap kopi?
la Jerusalem kalima
La apotsi Ne Samaria aphan isi thek-phrong abui adet pinchongpo isi drakha ke-e adim-heihei pinchongpo.
Lapen arlok ajo la arlong-heihei Ne thokpo lapen la ahemthur dipdedetpo.
La kumlin arje-heihei theng-let-let po la kerong ason an me pen pacho-etpo,
lapen la akumlin-heihei Ne pangsamripo:
Pima abang kechojor abang pen kerongsi la halatum aphan pangrumlo,
lapen abang kechojor abang kerong anatsi halatum voithupo.
La apotsi Ne ningduk lapen chiru ne pe chelumsi lapen reng angsesi dampo
Sirung atum asonsi ne ningduk lapen Ostrik avo atum asonsi ningripo.
Athe la reng-amek me un-elo;
lapen la Judah along vang-lo,
la Nerat aso anghap an nangletang-lo ha Jerusalem anat anta.
La Gath angbong than rinon,
asapta chiruri,
Beth-le-aphrah angbong longle aduk along nangmethang kong-longnon.
Shaphir kedo atum reng-angsele,
ketherak penle damnon;
Zaanan kedo atum vangvedet-lo;
Bethezel akechiru la karjap adim nangtum along pen pondetpo.
Pima Maroth kedo atum akeme aphansi chonghongding-lo,
athe
Lakish kedo atum ronhemkonglong-heihei alosei along ok-reng arvaknon;
Zaion asopi aphan nanghelo chopap cheng abang pima Israel apap-heihei nanglongsi long-lo.
La apotsi nang More-sheth-gath aphan kechekak adan-heihei pipo:
Akzib ahem-heihei Israel arecho atum aphan isi chobeichot plangpo.
Mareshah kedo atum nangphan kehaidet abang Ne puthot vangthupo;
Israel adak atur Adullam along an vangpo.
Nangning kehang asomar aphan nangtum methang phukoi cheplangnon lapen nangchu chesoi-etnon.
Vo takun asonle nangtum methang phukoijoinon,
pima halatum nangtum pen
bang adet pondetpo.
Kehingno keklemji kemang atum
Lapen ahongplang-heihei athak kehingno akam keklem atum paphonang!
Adap kangthang ahut latum la klemlo,
athe lake latum arideng kedo ajakong-lo.
Latum hidi-heihei kelongji aphan aninghangpik lapen longletik latum aphi hung-lo;
lapen ahem-heihei latum en bor-i-det;
Halatum amonit lapen la ahem abangphu aphan lapen apoton aphan akejok ave.
La apotsi
Chininon, labangso ahem aputhak Ne kehingno mang-lo,
La pen nangchethok-heihei chephlok un-elo;
Lapen nang cheparoka pen dam nangnelo,
pima la isi kehingno ahut plangpo.
Halabangso arni latum nangphan isi kepinrem alun lunpo,
lapen aningkeduk hodak pen chirupo,
lapen pupo, “Netum ru-et khangjang-lo,
alangli nerat apharman larlo;
la kopusonsi ne pen phloktang-lo!
Netum aphan ban kepon atum angbong la netum ahidi-heihei thak-lo.”
La apotsi
“Than pachethangri” pusi halatum pachethang-lo-
“jokta lason pachethang nangne;
kelangrem netum aphuthak vangvelo.”
Lason punangjima, O Jakob ahem?
Lahei alanglitong klemloma?
Athikpet pen kengkam kechejor abang aphan nelam akeme klempipema?
Bonta isi ahotur asonsi nangtum nerat abe thurlo;
nang kangsamjin atum aphan pe oilo,
ron mathathe pin kekroi pensi tovar kedam atum aphanta klemlo.
Nangtum Nerat a-arlosomar atum aphan halatum do rengmejir ahem-heihei pen phlung-lo;
nangtum kaike aphan halatum a-osomar pen Ne nong pondet-lo.
Thurnon lapen damnon,
Pima la ke kesang adim kali;
athe kangthirthe apotsi isi kepavirklung pensi pavirlo.
Mane abang jongsi damra lapen tomon angbong hang lapen chobeisi pupo,
“Ne nangtum aphan hor lapen arak pachethangpo,”
labangsi bangso arat pachethangbang cheplangpo!
O Jakob, Ne chenamsi nangtum aphan pangrumpo,
Ne Israel atum ahin pangrumpo;
arai kedo abiresak atum asonsi ne halatum aphan chopan adim angbong pi ahur asonsi monit hangjo armu pinchongpo.
Komatma kephri-kangpu abang aphrang halatum dungpo;
halatum ing-loksi lapen inghap lutpo la pen ajoksi chedamthupo.
Lapen Ne pulo;
Arjunon Jakob ajalin atum lapen Israel akhei kepangri atum!
Nangtum ahok akangsai kechini nangji atum kalima?
Nangtum akeme kehijim atum lapen kehingno kanghon atum,
nangtum nerat aso areng ke-oi atum lapen halatum arrepi pen a-ok kelir atum;
Nangtum nerat a-ok cho,
lapen arrepi-heihei beng-ilo,
lapen phule ephu along karsak a-ok ason,
Ok isi aphule thepo along kedo ason.
Ansi halatum
bonta Alangli halatum aphan thakthelo;
halabangso ahut halatum pen amahang chepatupo,
pima halatum kehingno akam klemtang-lo.
Lasonsi Nerat kehingno anat keja amontri atum aphuthak
halatum pine ason kecholangding ahut “Ningkangsam” pu hang,
bonta angho chephinphe-pinlang atum aphuthak la ron pachini.
La apotsi thek-longlesi,
la nangtum aphan ajo plangpo,
lapen ning arjan avepinsi nangtum aphan kangting plangpo.
Montri atum aphuthak arni chi po,
lapen anerlo halatum aphuthak ake-ik plangpo.
Sang kelang atum aphan anong pavedetpo,
lapen ludep atum aphan patherakpo;
halatum kedo-an angbip-heihei chedippo,
pima Arnam pen akethak ave.
Bonta neke Nejakong pensi plengset,
Jakob la aron kangdi lapen Israel la apap kepachiniji aphan.
La arjunon, nangtum Jakob ahem keja atum lapen Israel ahem kepangri atum,
ahok-akangsai kehijim atum lapen ahokpet akangsai an pakek-lo.
Zaion vi pen kekim atum lapen Jerusalem kechokche pen.
Latum ahemphu atum tangka chosi ingsai latum akurusar atum kethan chongdat,
latum amontri atum tangka aphan sanglang tebonta halatum
Thangnat kehingno etum aphuthak vangvelo.”
La apotsi nangtum ajoine Zaion aphan hidi asonsi haibaidetpo,
Jerusalem keru-heihei abui plangpo,
lapen hem inglong isi thengpi kangtui ason plangpo.
Mo aphi arni lahei plangvekpo
lapen inglongso-heihei apar rung pangtui muchotpo;
lapen rat atum la along dampetpo,
lapen adung adet atum vangpo, lapen pupo:
“Vangnon,
Jakob ahem a-Arnam anat;
Alangli etum aphan tovar-heihei ethanji mene lapen etum Alangli atovar-heihei along kengkam chejor dun thekji mene.”
Pima Zaion pensi aron dampo,
lapen
Alangli ongdung arat-heihei angbong ingsaipo lapen akehelo adet kangtang-heihei aphan pharpo lapen halatum anokjir-heihei thengsi halatum alangnoi aphal lapen halatum achir-heihei arhi selampo.
Det atum nokjir rungsi det abe thurthelo,
halatum ron chinine detpo.
Bonta halatum anut-tin ta amethang drakha aberi arum lapen amethang athebo arumsi ingnipo lapen baduta halatum aphan paphererelo;
pima muluk a-
Pima rat kedo-an la amethang a-arnam amen pensi kengkam chejorpo bonta etum ke
Halabangso arni,
Ne kengkok pangrumji lapen kephlungtang atum lapen Ne kepasungtang atum aphan pangrumpo;
lapen kengkok Ne ahin arat lapen kevarchor atum isi jakong kethe adet pinchongpo;
lapen Zaion anglong along
Lapen nang O pi ahur hemtap kangtui,
Zaion asopi anglongso,
nanglong la vangpo,
aphrang kepangri ajakong vangpo,
Jerusalem asopi recho arat.
Non nang kopi apotsi kehang ase patheloma?
Nangtum angbong recho avema?
Nangtum kepare abang vir-et ma,
lasi aso mahang kepathek a-arloso kesung asonsi kesung nangphi phi dunloma!
Inut oso mahang kepathek a-arloso ason,
chardak-ra lapen ingrongnon O Zaion asopi;
pima non nang rongsopi pen damnangpo lapen rit-lo-si donangji nang Bebilon dam nangpo.
Hadak nangphan pajokpo hadak
Non ongdung adet atum chingrumsi nangbe thursi pulo, “La pangthirthenang;
lapen etum amek Zaion aphuthak-le lang-lor lonang.”
Bonta halatum
latum Alangli kemang ason chini dunde Alangli latum aphan sok keti adim sok apeng-heihei pangrumtang-lo.
Thurnon lapen sok sinon,
O Zaion asopi,
pima Ne nangnu ingchin pinchongpo lapen nangkeng kemo ingchin-ke-er top-po;
Ongdung arat-heihei aphan pangjepo,
lapen halatum ale
latum akhi pirthe adang Ahemphu aphansi panongpo.
Non nang isi arpong pensi parpong-lo;
ketengkhengjisi ili be thurtang-lo;
Isi angchin pen halatum halatum Israel atum ajalin abang ang-om theng-lo.
Bonta nang, O Bethlehem Ephrathah,
Judah aro angbong akebinei abang,
nang pensi Israel atum inut kepangri a-Bang nephan vangpo la atiri ke phusar arni ahut pen.
La apotsi oso kechopathe abang la oso amahang pathethetik apor an la halatum aphan hodaipo;
ansi kedo-an alangli korte ha Israel arat anat chevoithupo.
Lapen la arjapsi lapen amethangsi
pima pirthe kejut anta Alangli nong thepo.
Assiria atum etum alongle along vangpen lapen etum alongle aphuthak nangdong seta etum la abe bang throksi abiresak kevi atum lapen bang nerkep arechoso atum pathurpo;
lapen la ningkangsam plangpo.
Nokjir pen halatum Assiria adet pangripo,
lapen Nimrod alongri kesat-tang anokjir pen pangripo.
Lapen la etum adet kevang un ahut lapen elong ahoi arlo kedong ahut halatum Assiria pen epajokpo.
Ansi Jakob ahin atum, ongdung arat-heihei atum angbong
monit aphan kanghonghe kalite monit asopo aphan kanghong abap athak arve kejangphro ason.
Lapen Jakob ahin arat-atum det-heihei angbong,
ongdung arat-heihei angbong,
nampi api atum angbong ahingho asonpo,
biresak ahur angbong hingho aloso ason la hatpet lote dongrop-ropsi ingsek-i lapen kepajokdunthek abang avedet ason.
Nangsi nang hotur atum aphuthak ri chirungpo,
lapen nang hotur kedo-an virdetpo.
Lapen halabangso arni,
“Nang losei an nangtum angbong pen virpo lapen nang ron ahemkonglong-heihei pavirpo;
lapen nang det arongsopi-heihei pavirpo lapen nang kut-heihei phangno-etpo;
lapen nangrideng pen lodep akam pavedetpo lapen nang thek-kere atum avedetpo;
lapen Ne nang kesoi kumlin-arjan-heihei pavirpo lapen nang arlong anujok-heihei
ta pavirdetpo,
lapen nangri asai aphan nangkengphu patongte detpo:
Lapen Ne nang angbong pen nang Asherah helangpo lapen nang rongsopi-heihei pavirpo.
Lapen Nephan kekroikre adet-heihei aputhak Nening kethi lapen ningsedeng pen Ne alar huipo.”
Thurnon, nangtum kekhinde alam inglong aphan choningrinon,
lapen inglongso-heihei nangtum ase parjunang,
Arjutha, nang inglong-heihei
lapen nang pirthe ahemthur chepaningding bom pima
lapen Alangli Israel pen lam chedanpo.
“O Ne rat atum, nangtum aphan Ne kopi klemtang-loma?
lapen Ne kopusonsi nangpalak loma?
Ne thantha.
Pima Ne Ijip adet pen nangvanlo,
lapen kebeng ahem pen nanglangtang-lo;
lapen nang ingno Moses, Aaron lapen Miriam nangtoilo.
O Ne rat atum, chemathatha Moab arecho Balak kopuson abidi mang-loma,
lapen Beor asopo Balam kopisi laphan thak-loma,
lapen Shittim pen Gilgal kopi plang-loma la pen nang
“Kopi pensi ne
lapen ne methang angsong Arnam angno ardomkhrup poma?
Ne me kephrin athok-heihei pen ningkan isi arta achainong aso-heihei pen Alanglilong vang poma?
Ne aron kangdi apot ne so-akleng,
Ne karjong pap apot ne bang athe pipoma?
Kopisi keme, Alangli nangphan paklang-lo, O monit,
lapen
bonta ahok akangsai akam,
lapen kangjinso aphan inghonnon,
lapen nang Arnam pen chepabihek-ra kengkam chejornon.”
“Arjutha, O khei lapen rongsopi kedo asong atum!
Jat-langno ahem akhi kehingno-heihei ne tengne unjima,
lapen kelele aketeng lake ahirjuno?
Jat-langno alindang -heihei lapen chobeichot ajamborong alin-heihei Ne aron pen ingsai nonma?
Nang keplang amonit atum kephangnosi plengset;
nangtum asor an chobei alam ningje,
lapen halatum angho arlo pachoreichot ade si do.
La apotsi Ne nangphan kechok pangcheng-lo nangpap-heihei apot nangphan rongman pamanpo.
Nang choji bonta ingkrangkre detpo,
lapen nangpok arlo-heihei kangchir dopo;
nang chebi seta cherai thekthedetpo,
lapen nang kecherailong an ke Ne nokjir aphan pipo.
Nang rikpo, bonta rot longledetpo;
nang jit athe sorpo, bonta ajangthu pen nang methang chepatip longledetpo;
nang drakha athe-heihei dong lam lampo,
bonta alang jun longle detpo.
Pima nang Omri kangsai-i aron-heihei rimlo,
lapen Ahab ahem akam do-anta rimlo;
lapen nang halatum kepare-heihei ensi kengkam chejorlo,
lasi Ne nangphan isi parongmanpo:
lapen nang rong-asor atum isi kepinrem abanvak plangpo lasi rat atum atam nang inghor nangpo.”
Ne paphonang, pima ne barla athesere kepangrum ahut ason,
Drakha athe keherek ahut ason plangtang-lo:
Thesere abitung kechoji aphan ave.
Pirthe pen kekroi thirklong atum virtang-lo,
lapen monit atum angbong athikpet abang ave;
halatum pachobei petsi vi kepabuji aphan inghongding,
lapen anut-tin alan pen akorte aphan ridam.
Halatum hingno akam keklemjisi ari pen la otthip;
rechoso lapen kangsai kehingno aning kehang alam hangser;
lasonsi halatum la thak rappet.
Halatum angbong mane abang ingsu top-het abap ason; halatum angbong athikpetnei abang ingsu arong aren ason,
Halatum kehon atum aphan aduk kepi arni nangletang-lo;
halatum manghudappo.
Nangdung aphan chikiri,
jirpo aphan ning chetheri;
nanglong ke-i charbak abangpi pen nangho anghap-heihei chingkirnon;
Pima asopo apo aphan langropsi lang-lo,
asopi la apei abe thurlo,
amunpi anipi abe thurlo;
monit ahotur amethang ahem asangho atum thurpo.
Bonta neke ne
Ne ne kepajok Arnam aphansi chonghongpo;
Ne Arnam ne arjupo.
Ne phuthak nang chehok-ri, O ne hotur atum,
Ne chingkoi seta Ne thurthuji;
Ne kangting ajo ingni,
Pima ne Alangli be thursi pap keklem apot Alangli nephan nehang pipetik lapen nephan ingsai pipetik an
Alangli kethe-ang anat ne vangpo;
Ne Alangli kepajok thek-longpo.
Ansi ne hotur atum thek-longpo,
lapen “
pu kepu abangphan ketheraksi dip-hetpo,
ne mek la aphuthak meng po;
non tovar-heihei anghan asonsi laphan donglam-lam po.
Arnisi nang paisong-heihei kekimji aphan halabangso arni ahoi pakamdetpo.
Halabangso arni Assiria pen Ijip anta,
lapen Ijip pen ha langroi an,
talo pen talo an lapen inglong pen inglong an halatum nanglong vangpo.
Bonta pirthe pangsamripo,
pima ladak kedo halatum kechoklem athe apot-lo.
Nangchin pen nangrat vinon,
nang poton ahurlo,
Mir aberi alongle angbong inutpet ingnam ajo kedo abang;
hako ahut asonle halatum Bashan adet lapen Gilead adet pachopan nang.
Ijip adet pen nangtum nangkebar arni ahut ason Ne halatum aphan manghumeme akam-heihei paklangpo.
Det-heihei atum ajakong the-o seta thek-longsi therakpo;
latum ari-heihei angho-heihei athak chebatpo;
lapen latum ano-heihei ingthongpo.
Pherui asonsi latum longle aduk inglekpo,
keklimjam pirthe api atum asonpo;
latum a-ok klemhursi akut-heihei pen latum nangbarlo,
latum
lapen nang pen apot latum pherepo.
Nangson kehingno adai kediya lapen alangli apoton ahin kedolang atum aron kangdi ado kelangle a-Arnam komat dolang?
Pima Alangli kaike kedover akanghon kepaklangji aning dokpik apotsi Alangli ning thiverve.
Alangli puthot etum aphan ingjinso thupo,
etum kehingno adai-heihei akengber donglam lampo,
etum apap do-an talo arlo Alangli varchorpo.
Hako ahut pen phusar atum aphan alangli kechak asonsi,
Alangli Jakob aphan kekroi thirklong lapen Abraham aphan larle akanghon paklangpo.
Nineveh aputhak abirta lahelo, Elkosh asor Nahum kethek-long pen ketokdun alam.
Abekethur atum aphan
Alangliphan kekhang abangphan Alangli adukpilo.
bonta Alangli ke jakongthepik lapen ado kedo atum aphan aduk pipepin pen padamlongle,
inghun-heihei ke Alangli keng kechejor aduk-lo;
Talo aphan Alangli hukum pilo, lapen la krengtailo!
Langroi-heihei alang pakreng-lo.
Bashan ahidi-heihei krengrolo,
Karmel anglongpi etjolo,
lapen Lebanon amir-heihei chekedulo.
Alangli ingno inglong-heihei ingjirlo.
Pirthe lapen la amonit kedo-anta klemhurlo.
Alangli aningthi lote komatsi reng unji?
Alangli kepherememe aning thilote komatsi reng unji?
Alangli aningkethi amede dung-lo;
Alangli ingno longchong ingjelo.
kesung ahut Alangli rat aphan Alangli railo;
Alanglinat kesui atum aphan Alangli lanalo.
Langthepi ketui asonsi Alangli hotur aphan pavirlo;
Alangliphan kekhang atum aphan kethiji anat Alangli toilo.
Alangli nangpavirdetpo.
Ephong pen apar baduta Alangliphan khang-un-e.
Ingsu lapen kekrengtai asok anar asonsi,
nangtum aphan me pachodetpo !
Nineveh, nanglong pensi kehingno akemang pen keplengset amonit vang-lo, la
Arat aso Israel aphan
Nangtum aphuthak Assiria ajakong non Ne pajutkokpo, lapen nangtum aphan nangkekok-het angchin ari vungpruppo.”
Assiria aputhak

Langtha, inglong-heihei athak birta keme kevan abang vangbomlo! Kehai abirta pachethangjisi Alangli tovar chevangbomlo! Judah arat atum, nang rong-aje chetalonnon, lapen Arnam aphan kopisi chechak-loma chepaplengnon. Kehingno atum nangdet puthot tengkheng thuthelo. Latum aphan pavir pametang-lo!
Nineveh, nangphan nangtengkheng tang-lo!
Nangphan kepangje-iji ajakong vangtang-lo.
Monit pacherai-komnon!
Tovar tonnon!
Kechedanjile chesiknon!
bangpi aphan ahotur atum thipon-et-e aphrang ahut ason.)
Hotur aron-aso atum chong ke-er cheponlo.
Latum ketengkhengjisi chesik-lo!
Latum aronhemkonglong me asonsi tur-ang-lo latum alosei akeng chirung-lo!
Tovarpi-heihei soding ronhemkonglong kekong-long pasedengkot-lo,
rongsopi achetai-heihei kangplong helatvoivailo.
Latum thengtom asonsi turphlak lapen sining kebirlak asonsi lengphit.
Chakri atum aphan hangpet-lo;
latum dambom ahut patekung-lo.
Ketengkheng atum arpong anat kat-lo lapen kerangkhajisi achong-heihei tot-lo.
Langroi akung anghap-heihei chingkodang-lo;
rechohem kepherememe pensi plengset-lo.
Rechopi aphan bengponchek-lo;
bangpi aban atum vothung asonsi kurjolo lapen ning duksi aning cheteng-lo.
Langteng pen lang keli asonsi Nineveh pen rat atum bephlung-lo!
“Sangtha! Sangtha!” pu hang-lo bonta baduta aphi chelangle det-lo.
Rup thipon non! Ser thiponnon!
Rongsopi akhi plengset!
Nineveh virtang-lo, samphridang-lo,
parongmandet-lo!
Kephere pen aning ingduk-ruilo;
Kengphu klemhurlo, jakong avedet-lo; mahang ikkuilo.
Hingho asomar aphan kepacho adim,
hadak hingho alo lapen api dampo lapen latum asomar hadak jokvanpo lason hingho angthor ason arongsopi non konat-lo?
Hingho marat api pathilo api aphan lapen asomar aphan la ingsekpi-ilo,
la angthor kangsektang a-ok pensi plengset-lo.
Ne nangtum ahoturlo, pusi Jakongthepik
Kechobeichot pran karmut arongsopi pavirnang,
kethipon nangji lapen kephangno nangji akhi pensi plengset!
Arjutha! Sabuk kesap arki,
Adang-heihei kekong-long arki losei atum kangplong arki,
ronhemkonglong-heihei kedam arki!
Losei kardon atum pangplong-lo,
nokjir doiplarplur, chir turplaipluilo!
Kethi arpum angsom ingtuihailo,
kethitang aphai lakha un-e lahei athak monit patekungruilo!
Akhat-kave a-Nineveh aphan aduk pitang-lo,
ar-i-meme lapen pherememe akelangme pensi plengset,
bangpi det atum aphan moilo lapen halatum aphan ban pamanlo.
Jakongthepik
“Nineveh, nangphan Ne aduk inghoiji,
nangreng angsesi nangphan nangbiji;
anke det atum nangpathek-long nang,
nang ketherak an nangpathek-long nang.”
Ne nangphan nanglangroppo,
lapen kehijimeme ason pen nangdippo.
Rat atum kephere pensi nangphan nanglang phrongpo.
Nangphan nang kethek-long an atum aphi chiruipo.
Latum pupo, “Nineveh ruhup-lo!
Bangpi aphan komatsi jinsopoma?
Komatsi bangpi aphan than pangsampoma?”
Nineveh, nang Ijip adet arongsopi-kethe, Thebes aphan memulangma? Bangpi aphan ta keparaiji aphan arpong ason langroi dolo, Nil Aroi ke bangpi aphan kechedanpi abang-lo.
Bangpi Sudan lapen Ijip pangrilo, lapen bangpi ajakong ahoi ave; Libia ke bangpi pen kejelang adet-lo.

Tebonta Thebes arat atum aphan ban pondet-lo. Tovarpi akung alongtin halatum asomar atum aphan chokbop-lo. Halatum a-arlengkethe atum aphan ingchin ari pen kokponsi pondet-lo lapen kebengpon atum angbong chethaksi ponlo.
Nineveh, nang ta hor kangri cheputhekthe pin cheplangpo, Nang amat ta nang hotur arideng pen kekatji aphan bor-ipo.
Nang pai raikom kedo-an athe kemen thebo arong asonpo: Arong hijuknon, anke athe nangho angden nangklo thot thotpo!
Nang ron-aso atum ariso atum ason, lapen nang hotur atum angno nangdet kecheraiji aphan arjap un-e. Inghap-heihei adai an me cho-etji.
Kekompet aphan lang soknon, lapen pairaikom-heihei chepangtangnon! Ita keselamjile inghan dong patipnon, lapen ita arjan sikkoinon!
Nang ajat-le klem seta, nangphan me nangphrindutpo mate ron along thinangpo. Longvurle sok kecholap ason thak-thaksi nangphan pavedetpo.
Longvur atum asonsi nang chepachan-olo!
Sining-inghun chiklolongso-heihei apar kejor-kenam atum nang mahang pathek-pa-ongmulo! Bonta latum non longvur atumle arveng chejarsi kangjar asonsi dam-et-lo.
Nang chakri atum kangsam ahut arpong bithe kebonhet longvur atum ason. Bonta arni atur nangle lote latum ingjarphlorpo lapen latum konattong kedamlone la baduta chinidun un-e!

Assiria arechokethe, nang govornor atum kethitang saide, lapen nang arlengkethe atum kaike aphan mekjangtang-lo! Nang rat aso atum inglongpi-heihei athak pratseilo, lapen latum aphan baduta ahem methang kevanthuji abang avelo.

Nang kechero amek keme-iji ason ave, lapen nangreng amek me-un-elo. Nang kevir abirta karjulong abangphutin aning arongsi halatum ari chardep-po. Nang kejut un-epin akechenek pen mane inutbak kejok-long doloma?
Habakkuk montri aphan
O
lapen Nang ne arjujebom jilangma?
Mate Nangnat chirupo, “Phangnotang-lo!” pu lapen Nang pajokjedetjima?
Nang kopi athesi nephan kechokche-heihei pathek-longbom langma lapen kesung aputhak palangbomma?
Kevir lapen kephangno ne ingno dolo;
kechebohong lapen kechedan thurlo.
La apotsi aron ajakong ave lapen ahok-akangsai kaita aphrang damde.
Athe kehingno atum athikpet atum aphan komchen,
la apotsi ahok akangsai kekdangsi dambomlo.
Det-heihei angbong langtha, lapen langnon;
Manghura lapen chepamanghu-haknon.
Pima nangtum adin Ne eson akam klempo anke nangthan setta nangtum kroikredetpo.
Pima chininon,
Ne Chaldia atum aphan paprungji anke hodak lapen prappik akhei amethang kalidet ahem kethi ponjisi latum pirthe arpan an damdet-lo.
Pherememepik lapen paphere thekpik atumlo;
latum ahok-akangsai lapen ahok anam latum methang pensi barlo,
Latum alosei-heihei bongkruiso apar prapmu,
arnikangsam amahar apar aning sedenglang;
latum alosei kardon atum un-an pangplong-lo.
Kalang, latum alosei kardon atum kehelo pensi kevang vomu ejon kangchir pen kechoji asonsi latum ingjarlo.
Latum kedo-an kephangnojisi kevang;
latum akepherememe latum aphrang si damlo.
Sangti ason thak-thaksi latum ne pangrumlo.
Recho atum aphan latum pinrem lapen det kechari atum aphan pathilo,
latum rong apaisong asitin ingnekchoilo,
pima latum longle buisi endetpo.
Ansi latum tomon asonsi arkok-lo lapen dambomlo,
ado kedo amonit, la amethang ajakong helo latum a-arnamlo!
Nang hako ahut pen dolang kalima,
O
Netum thithe.
O
lapen nang, O Arlong, aduk-kepijisi latum aphan pavirtang-lo.
Kehingno aphan kelang apar Nang aju-kavepin amek-heihei kedo Abang lapen kechokche ason langle Abang,
Kopi athesi Nang kekroi-kave amonit aphuthak kelangdingma?
lapen alangpar athikmuchot amonit aphan jat-langno atum kejoi ahut Nang kedojoilangma?
Pima talo alang-ok asonsi monit aphan paplang-lo,
lapen kepangri abang kavedet keklimjam api ason thak-thak.
La isi arhi pen latum do-an vanlo,
alang alanvar pen latum aphan sanlo,
alang alanjeng pen latum aphan pangrumlo;
la apotsi alang chehoksi aning arong chepilo.
La apotsi alang alanvar aphan arkli,
lapen alang alanjeng aputhak mephik thor;
Pima lahei pen ajok la kerengme pen reng-lo lapen alang kecho ahormuta ongdung.
Tangte alang alanvar herekversi do poma,
lapen det-heihei aphan inghonhesi kaiketa pathibompoma?
Ne kehon adimsi karjap,
lapen paisong kangtui athak Nemethang dopo,
lapen Alangli nephan pi pujima chonghongdingsi cholangpo lapen ne kekhinde aputhak ne kopisi kethak nangji.
Lapen
“Kethek-long an toknon;
longle aplang athak paklangdaknon lasi keporhe abang prapjin pen porhe thekpo.
Pima kethek-long alam keklangji ahut chonghonglang;
Kejut an la prapjin je, la chobeibe.
Jongsi la inglenhui lote laphan inghongnon;
la vangvekji, la derdelo.
Chininon, athik ave abang akarjong along chunchedetji,
bonta athikpet abang alang akekroithip pen ajok rengji.”
Lapuchot kali, horlang kepacherei abang;
kecheparoka abang doverve.
La aning kehang kethe chom angkang kethe ason;
kethile kaita dorlo pupe ason.
La amethang aphan det do-an pangrum,
lapen methang arat asonsi kedo-an chopangrum.
La kadokave ensi alang be latum thursi pinremredet poma,
alangphan chongthuisi ingnekchoiche detpoma, lapen pupo,
“Paphonang, amethang amar kalidet pen mar chepa-ong abang athe ko-an ajirdingjima?
lapen preng papi bor-i pen chepaplang bomjima?”
Nang keparam atum menmen thurthejima.
lapen amek keprang abang nang ok paklemhurpo kalima?
Anke nang latum kethipon amar plangpo.
Nang ongdungsi adet amar kethipon apot ahin kedolang atum an nangmar thiponpo pima monit avi lapen pirthe, lapen rongsopi-heihei lapen hadak kedo-an aphan phangnolo.
Paphonang! amethang ahem aphan kehingno pen kepalong abang kehingno kepho pen kejokjisi amethang atar angsongsi chepatarlo!
Nang methang ahem aphan ketherak pinchong-lo ongdung arat atum aphan kepavir pen ajok nang nangmethang akai aphan chepasung-lo.
Pima arpong pen arlong hangserpo,
lapen archok athengpita thengpi angbong pen thakpo.
Paphonang! Vi pen rongsopi kekim abang,
lapen akehingno akam pen rongsopi keseng abang!
Chininon, la muluk a-
lapen khei-heihei atum thang kalidet aphan chepalak?
Pima lang-heihei talo keplengset ason,
pirthe
Paphonang! bangso abang,
la ketherak kelangjisi aning kesedeng aharlung pen pajunsi tebok abang aphan hor pangri.
Nangdak nangtur alar bang nanglangrop pensi nang donangpo.
Nang junra therak-non!
Lebanon aputhak kephangnotang apot nangphan pavirpo,
marat api kepavir apot nangphanta pavirpo.
Pima monit avi lapen pirthe aphan rongsopi-heihei
lapen la kedo-an aphan kephangno apot.
Isi akumlin, la keselam abang soi seta isi kepachor arje,
inut chobei kethan abang pen ale kopi?
Pima alam kave akumlin keselamchot abang la aphan kechiki athe kopi?
Thengpi ahormu aphan mek prangnon pu,
lapen alam kave a-arlong aphan thurnon pu abang paphonang!
La paklang thekjima?
Chininon, la ser-rup pen ketop lapen la arlo asapta achethe ave.
Bonta
pirthe adang Alangli ingno padoklipnang.
Habakkuk montri akardom; Shigionoth ateng pen.
O
lapen nangkam ne phere, O
Ningkan angbong la paminon;
ningkan angbong la pachininon;
ningkethe ahut kangjinsojile chematha thunon.
Arnam Edom pen vang-lo,
lapen kangthir Abang Paran anglong pen vang-lo.
Alangli adak-atur sining binlo lapen pirthe Alangliphan kero plengset.
Alangli akephlan ke kethe-ang ason thakthak Alangli ri pen atur khelanpik;
lapen Alangli jakong hadak chepatu.
Alangli ingno mavur damtang-lo;
lapen aphi phi avur-akrem dun,
Alangli arjapsi pirthe punlo;
Alangli lang si det-heihei pachingdat-tang-lo,
dover anglongso-heihei aklong inglimtang-lo Alangli atovar hako ahut ason.
Ne Kushan ape ahem-heihei kesung thek-long-lo,
Midian adet kebeng ape klemhurlo.
Nang langroi-heihei aphan jasemetsi ning thitang-loma, O
Langroi-heihei aphantong Nangning thiloma?
mate losei-heihei athak lapen Nang kehaisi ronhemkonglong athak kardon ke talo aphantong Nangning thiloma?
Nangthai pen Nang thai-aso-ahom adip ingpulo,
lapen thai ari along aso-heihei bilo.
Nang langroi-heihei pen pirthe phlak-lo.
Inglong-heihei Nangphan thek-longsi, chardak;
sang thekthe alang-heihei arbok ponbom;
Lang-lom la ase chepadolo,
la ari-heihei angsong chirung-lo.
Nang thai-aso kangjar latum prap-piksi pathe-ang,
lapen Nang nokjir keplirplar atur arni lapen chiklo latum kedo adim sa kok-lo.
Nang jasemet ningthisi pirthe helat-lo,
ning kethi pen khei-heihei aphan akeng pen silo.
Nang Nangrat kepajokjisi damlo,
Nang jangthu kepatiptang abangphan kepajokji athesi Nang kehingno abang aphu paropsi akengtham pen achethok an areng angse bilo.
Nang ron-kechedan atum aphan Nang dinglep anokjir pen aphu tok labang nephan pachingdat-jisi mongve ason vang-lo,
keduk aphan kechojoiji asonsi ning cheparong.
Nang Nang-losei pen talo aphan Nangkeng pen silo,
anke lang-heihei adihu thepik-lo.
Ne arjulong lapen ne-ok klemhur,
arki apot ne ingtur klemhur;
kethu ne reppi arlo lut;
ne karjap adim thirthe etum aphan ketengkheng arat aphuthak kevangji kesung arni aphan ne chonghongjoipo.
Thebo arong pangpharphe rikanghei hei athe pathethe,
jit arong athe pathedunde lapen hidi-heihei athe longle;
aroi pen pi ahur avedet,
lapen chainong ahur aroi-heihei along avekoi seta
Ne
Ne kepajok a-Arnam along ning cheparongji.
Arnam
Alangli kangtui-heihei athak ne padong-long.
Amon asopo Josiah, Judah arecho ahut Hezekiah asopo Amariah, la asopo Gedaliah, la asopo Kushi, la asopo Jephaniah along
Ne pirthe athak pen kadokave amar an pavirkoipo;
pusi
Ne monit lapen pi pavedetpo;
Ne tomon avo-heihei lapen talo alang a-okta pavedetpo.
Ne kehingno paremdetpo;
Ne pirthe athak pen monit pavir-etpo pusi
Ne Judah abethursi neri chirungpo,
lapen Jerusalem asor abeta thurpo;
lapen bangso adim pen Baal aphan karcho akurusar atum lapen akumlin-heihei pavir-etpo.
Hem asarnung athak pen sining achiklopi, arni,
chiklolongso-heihei aphan kardomkhrup atum;
kardom lapen
Pima
lapen Alangli alohi pangthirtang-lo.
Lapen
lapen bang adet ape kechingchoi aphan ta lo.
Halabangso arni hongthu athak kechon abangphutin aphan Ne aduk pipo.
Halatum ahemphu ahem kehingno ajakong akam lapen chobei pen paplengset atum aphan ta lo.
adun ahem pen keru arki thedung vangpo.
Chiru-charnapnon, O rongsopi aber kedo atum:
pima kadokave kejor-kelang atum vir-et-lo,
rup kelin atumta virtang-lo.
Halabangso ahut Ne melur-heihei pen Jerusalem aphan ripo,
lapen halatum ahor alingtai apo kecheparthat aning kedok atum lapen aning arlo
Halatum amar-atar thi-etpo,
lapen hem do-an donodakpo.
Halatum ahem chekim seta chedo longledetpo;
Halatum drakha aberi e-po seta drakha alang jun longledetpo.
tebok-het lapen paprapbomlo;
Halaso arni ke aningkethi arni,
sungpik lapen ningdukpik arni,
kephangno lapen kevir arni kangting lapen ningkethethe arni,
Inghun lapen klolin arni.
Apaisong kedo arongsopi-heihei lapen hem kangtui abe kethurjisi pong-ut arki lapen ron kechedan arki kedo arni plangpo.
Ne monit aphan kesung vanpo,
anke halatum amek kave asonsi kengkam chejorpo,
athe halatum
halatum avi longle aduk asonsi dung-etpo,
lapen halatum a-ok hi ason,
Halatum arup tame aser tame halatum aphan pajok un-elo,
Alangli kelang un-e aningkethi ame pen pirthe adang an pacho-etpo.
Pajutdetpo, la men-men amat pajutdetpo la pirthe athak kedo-an atum aphan klempo.
Vang-rap-petnon, lapen chingrumnon,
ketherak-re akhei,
nangtum aphan kephere ason kepangjar pondetde aphrang,
nangtum aphuthak
det adang chepabihek atum an,
Alangli hukum keklem atum an;
Akechokpet-le rinon, asotdut-le rinon,
pima
Pima Gaza ojappo,
lapen Ashkelon ingsamripo;
Ashdod aphan nerlo chitim amat phlungjuipo,
lapen Ekron aphan phur-etpo.
Pei pei, talo akung kedo atum Nang Cherethi akhei,
Kanaan, Philistia atum adet;
lapen kepado abang kepavedetjisi Ne nangpavirdetpo.
Nang, O talo akung, biresak kevi adim plangpo lapen biresak kevi ahem,
lapen biresak aroi hadak dopo.
Talo akung lake Judah akhei ahin atumsi cheraipo,
laso aphuthak halatum pachopanpo,
lapen Ashkelon asor halatum arnikangsam lote chongnikurpo.
Pima
“Moab atum kepinrem lapen Amon atum kepano-heihei Ne arjulong-lo,
latum kosonsi Ne rat aphan pinremloma lapen latum ahoi abethursi ane chepathelo.”
La apotsi, “Ne dotik,” pusi muluk a-
“Moab ke Sodom ason thak thak plangpo,
lapen Amon atum Gomorrah ason plangpo,
Angsu abap langno lapen ingti ahilik pen keplengset along-le,
lapen kaike aphan ingsamri adim plangpo.
Nerat kedolang ahin halatum amar-atar thiponpo lapen Nedet angbong pen kedolang atum halatum aphan chepahemphupo.”
Halatum kechepindak ale halatum akopai lasonsi plangpo,
pima halatum muluk a-
Kalang, Alangli pirthe adang a-arnam atum aphan pangchirpo,
lapen Alangliphansi amethang methang adim ardom-khruppo,
Talo akung det kedo-an.
Nangta, O Ethiopia atum,
Ne nokjir pen thinangpo,
lapen Alangli nirep anat abe thursi ari chephejengpo,
lapen Assiria adet pavirji,
lapen Alangli Nineveh rongman paplangpo,
isi krengtai donopin, ingsamri ajo plangpo.
Pi ahur la angbong domkurpo,
hidi a-ingnam api kedo-anta votakun lapen jok-hi bonghom atum latum arongsopi akut-heihei along dopo;
Vo inghuta inghapso amang along ingrengpo,
Vo-ak hongthu athak ingrengpo,
pima la Kedar akam avedetpo.
Lake ning arongpik arongsopi thangnat kephere avepinpensi dolo pusi aning arlo chepulo,
“Ne lapen nepar baduta avelo.”
Kopi apotsi la isi rongman ason cheplangnang-lo,
isi ingnam api kedo adimlo!
Tovar kedam atum an chi-chi pusi pulo lapen ari chikipsi chehijirpo.
Abe kethurkhrap lapen kangthirthe abang,
kechenek-ot arongsopi!
La bang alam arjujelo,
la bang kepakeng dengdelo.
Ne
la a-Arnam adung patebokbelo.
La angbong kam keklempi atum
kangrong ateke atumlo;
la kangsai atum ke arnikangsam amahar atumlo latum adap an aphan thangta bibelo,
La amontri atum adeng kechinine atumlo,
akekroi kave amonit atumlo.
La akurusar atum kangthir ason, seta ingthirthelo,
halatum aron jakong pen ingdilo.
Alangli kechokche klemkle,
Adapprangta Alangli ahokpet paklang-lo.
Arni keklang aphongtinta Alangli chinipamelo;
Bonta ahok-he atum ketherak chinine.
“Ne det-heihei pavedet-lo;
halatum apaisong rutang-lo;
Ne halatum atovar-heihei baduta dam abang pavedet-an phangnolo;
latum arongsopi-heihei rongman paplang-lo,
inutnatta ave, edonbakta kedo abang ave.”
Ne pulo, “Chenamsi la nephan pherepo,
labangpi kepakeng alam deng-lo;
latum ne kethan ason an tengnenedetpo bangpi Nehukum kepi ason an langkrangkre detpo bonta kehingno akam latum keklem pa-ongmuchotjisi aninghang-lo.”
Asap inghongtha, pusi
Anke Ne det kedo an arat atum aphan larpo, lapen latum Nephansi ardomchotpo, lapen akaprek arnam-heihei atum aphan kalilo. Latum kedo-an Nephan kroipo.
Kehelo Sudan kedo kepratsei Nerat aso atum Nephan dan-heihei vanpo.

Halaso ahut, nang Nerat aso atum Nebe kethur apot therakjok phlotpo. Kechepindak lapen kecheparoka abangphutin aphan Ne terek phlotpo, la pen ajok nangtum Ne inglong kangthir along nebe thurkrapkrelo.
Ne hadak asotdut lapen chepabihek arat aphansi padochotpo, latum ke Nelong kerap kelongji aphansi vangpo.
Israel arat kerenglang atum lahin-lahin kehingno akam klemkledetpo, chobeibedetpo lapen pachoreire-detpo. Latum chingthurji lapen jokvanji, badu aphanta phereredetpo.
Asekethe pen lunnon, O Zaion asopi;
hangnon O Israel!
Chehok-ra lapen nang kedo-an pen nangning arong chepinon O Jerusalem asopi!
Alangli nang hotur-heihei arphlung-lo.
Israel arecho,
nang puthot kehingno phere nangnelo.
Halabangso arni Jerusalem aphan lason pupo,
“Phere nangne, O Zaion;
Nang ri jakong pavebom nangne.
inut kechedan abang, la nangpahai longji;
Alangli kanghon pen nangliphan chethe pamithupo,
Asekethe alun pen Alangli nangphuthak ning cheparongpo.
Kecho-kejun arni ason.”
“Ne nang pen kesung pakakpo lasi nang laso pen ajok kepinrem chechak nangnelo.”
Chinitha, halabangso ahut Ne nangtum aphan kechenek atum an aphan keklem nangji akam klemvekpo.
Lapen kengkok atum aphan pajokpo lapen karphlungtang atum aphan pangrumpo,
lapen Ne halatum aketherak kechoro anat paprekji lapen pirthe adang an anong thepo.
Halabangso ahut hem Ne nangvanthupo,
Halabangso arni Ne nangpangrumpet ahut;
ahok, Ne nangtum anong pathepo lapen kechoro paplangpo Ne nangtum akopai-heihei pirthe arat atum angbong kechevangthu ahut nangtum amek angden pachingthurthuji,
pusi
Darias Recho hini aningkan, throk achiklo kecheng arni
“Muluk a-
Ansi
“Nehem keru virrang ahut nangtum kimpamesen ahem kechedo nangtum aphan aporloma?
Non lasi muluk a-

Nangtum rik olo, lapen acherso natsi rot-longchot; nangtum cholo bonta kaike nangtum ingkrangkrelo, nangtum junlo bonta la kaiketa dorde, nangtum pe che-umlo seta inutbakta ar-om-e; lapen chongdat abang pangrum seta kerak athia along kethapjisi pangrumchot-lo.”
Muluk a-
Inglong-heihei arludamnon lapen thengpi vannon lapen Nehem kimthunon, la Nening dokpo lapen Nenongta thepo, pusi
Ake-ong kerot-longjisi nangtum cholang-lo, lapen langtha, la chersonat-lo, lapen nangtum hem la vandet ahut, Ne vutphit-lo. Kopi apot? Muluk a-
La apotsi sining angsong pen ar-e khang-lo lapen longleta kepatheji pen khang-lo.

Lapen longle aputhak, lapen inglong aputhak, sok aputhak, drakhakemi aputhak, jangthu lapen longle pen athe kelongji an aputhak, monit lapen kepangreng api aputhak lapen halatum kam keklem-heihei aphuthak akhim phalo.”
Ansi Shealtiel asopo Jerubbabel lapen Zehozadak asopo Joshua, kurusarpo rat kedo-an pen Bebilon adet ban kedo pen nangchevoilo, la ke amethang atum a-Arnam
Ansi Haggai, la
Lapen Shealtiel asopo Jerubbabel, la Judah a-Govornor, lapen Jehozadak asopo Joshua, la kurusarpo lapen rat kedo-an aning
La throk achiklo, ingkoiraphli arni, Darias Recho kecho hini aningkan.
Throksi achiklo, ingkoira isi arni
“Shealtiel asopo, Judah a-Govornor Jerubbabel lapen Jehozadak asopo Joshua kurusarpo, lapen kedo-an arat atum aphan punon,
‘Bangso ahem aphrang ahir asang kethek-long abang nangtum angbong mane doma? Non nangtum la kosonsi kethek-long? Nangtum amek angden thangta kali ason, kalima?
Seta non ning chepathenon, O Jehozadak asopo Joshua, kurusarpo, ning chepathenon, kedo-an arat atum
Ijip pen nangtum kevang ahut Ne nangtum aphan kechechak ateng, Ne Karjong nangtum angbong doklung-lo; phererinon.
Athe lasonsi muluk a-
lapen khei kedo-an Ne hijukpo; anke khei kedo-an akhi vangpo, lapen labangso ahem ahir-asang pen Ne paplengsetpo, pusi muluk a-
Rup lapen serta Ne marlo pusi muluk a-
Bangso ahem ahir-asang aphrang apar aphi abang themuchotpo pusi muluk a-
Sirkep achiklo, 24 arni, Darias recho-kecho hini aningkan
“Lasonsi muluk a-
Mane abang jongsi Sator ade kepanong a-ok kepon abang a-Sator ade pen him mate han mate kecho ason alingle ot lote la ingthirpoma?” Kurusar atum thak-lo, “Kali.”
Ansi Haggai pulo, “Mane abang jongsi kethitang arpum-heihei ason ke-ot ajok ingthirthedet-tang-lo, la inghthirthe cheplang poma?” Kurusar atum thak-lo, “La ingthirthe cheplang-lo.”
Ansi Haggai pulo, “Lason helo bangso arat atumta, lapen Ne ingno bangso akhei atumta lo, la
Non ardomnon, non pen anpar kopi plangjima la mathanon.

kosonsi nangtum atovar chelang-loma? Halabangso ahut inut abang sok mon 20 abui along damlote hadak mon 10 dochotpo, lapen inut abang mon 50 adrakha alang sokpo pura drakha kesor adim damlote mon 20 dochotpo.

Labangso arni pen apar matha-enon, sirkep achiklo, 24 arni pen.

“Ne ajosi thek-long-lo, lapen chininon, inut amontri losei ake-ang ardonlo! Alangli mir-herai arong-heihei angbong arjapdingsi do, lapen Alangli nung anat losei ke-ang erring lapen losei kelok ta do.”
Ansi ne pulo, “Lahei kopilo?” Nelipen kechingki apherangke neliphan pulo, “Lahei kopi piloma, neli nangliphan nang paklangpo.”

Lasi neliphan kechingki apherangke neliphan pulo, “Ase pathera hangnon, muluk a-
Lapen dorengme adet atum aphan neningthilo; pima Ne chersosi ningthichot bonta halatum an sose Ne monit atum aphan phangnolo.
La apotsi,
Ase pathera hangthunon, muluk a-
Neli ingphun chingthursi lang-lo lapen thek-long-lo, lapen chini iktha, anu hongphli dolo!
Lapen neli nelipen kechingki apherangke aphan pulo, “Lahei kopilo?” Lapen alangli nethak-lo, “Lahei anu-ke Judah, Israel lapen Jerusalem aphan kepapratsei atum lo.”
Ansi

Lapen neli pulo, “Lahei atum kopi keklemjisi kevang-lo?” Alangli thak-lo lahei anu-ke Judah atum aphan kepapratsei atumlo, lapen ajok badu amonit ta aphu chingthurthedet-lo, lapen latum ke halatum aphan kepaphereji lapen Judah atum kepapratsei-jisi Judah adet aphan anu kechirung adet-heihei anu kepavirjisi vang-lo.
Lapen neli ingphun chingthursi lang-lo, lapen thek-long-lo, lapen chininon, inut amonit ari along kepun-i arri do!
Ansi neli pulo, “Nangli konatsi kedamlo?” Lapen alangli neliphan thak-lo, “Jerusalem arpan lapen arjon ko-an dingma la kepunji.”
Lapen chini iktha, nelipen kechingki apherangke nangbarlo lapen alangliphan kechetongjisi anut kaprek apherangke vang-lo,
lapen alangliphan pulo, “Kat-ra halabangso ariso aphan thannon, ‘Jerusalem apaisong kavedet arong-heihei asonsi monit atum dopo, athe ke-ongpi amuluk lapen ongdung achainong kedo apot.
Pima Ne la komchen me apaisong cheplangpo pusi
Oh rat atum! Nirep anat pen nangkat hurnon pusi
Oh Bebilon arongsopi kedo atum Zaion anat kat-hurnon.

Lunra ning cheparongnon, O Zaion arongsopi; pima chininon, Ne vang-lo lapen nangtum angbongsi Ne dopo pusi

Joshua kesa-ur ape chingchoisi pherangke angno arjapding-lo.

Lapen hadak karjaphrong atum aphan pherangke pulo, “Kesa-ur ape alangli pen phloknon.” Lapen Alangli alangliphan pulo, Chini iktha, Ne nangpap nang pen pahelo tang-lo, lapen adorkeso ape pensi nang pangchoipo.
Lapen neli pulo, “Halatum alangli phu athak poho kangthir epak paphungnang.” Lasi halatum alangli phu athak poho kangthir epak phung-lo lapen pe-ri kemi-heihei pangchoilo; lapen
Lapen

Nang jongsi ne tovar-heihei ateng kengkam chejor lote lapen ne kepu aling klemlote, nang nehem aphuthak chepahemphu longpo lapen ne tikup-heihei lang longpo, lapen dak karjapsar angbong pen nangphan kelut long ajakong nangpidetpo.
Non arjutha, O Joshua kurusarpo, nang lapen nang ingno kangni nangjirpo atum an, pima halatum mesen angthek-lo, chininon, Ne neban aro pu abangphan vanpo.
Pima, Joshua angno ne kebitang arlong isi lep throksi do. Ne laso aphuthak tokpo pusi muluk a-
Muluk a-
Lapen nelipen kechingki apherangke vangthusi neli ingthurlo, lake amek kejang abang aphan kangthur ason thakthak.

Lapen alangli neliphan pulo, “Nang kopi thek-long-lo?” Neli pulo, “Ne thek-long-lo, lapen chininon, ser amelur archok lapen athak harlung ehong lapen la athak melur throksi do lapen asitin amelur along throksi achechilut la athak dolo.
Lapen hadak jit arong rongni adung do, erong harlung ar-e anat lapen erong abang arvi anat.”
Lapen nelipen kechingki apherangke aphan neli pulo, “Lahei kopilo, hemphu?”
Ansi nelipen kechingki apherangke neliphan thak-lo, “Lahei kopima nang chininema?” Neli pulo, “Chinine Hemphu.”
Ansi Alangli neliphan pulo, “Lake Jerubbabel aphan
Nang komatma O inglongthepi? Jerubbabel angno nang thoi plangpo; lapen ‘Kangjinso, laphan kangjinso pu hangsi alangli thaksi a-arlong vanpo!’”

Komatma bihek arni ason aphan kepinrem abang aling chehokji pima Jerubbabel arideng hem kekim-i apholong thek-longji.”

Ansi neli alangliphan pulo, “La melur archok ar-e lapen arvi kedo jit athengpi rongni kopilo?”
Lapen neli bataihini aphong alangliphan pulo, “Jangthu kedung-i ser achutchilut hini adung kedo jit aro hongni kopi?”
Neliphan alangli pulo, “Lahei kopilo nangli chininema?” Neli pulo, “Chinine hemphu.”
Ansi alangli pulo, “Pirthe adang ahemphu adung karjapphrong la banghini
Neli puthot ingphun chingthursi lang-lo lapen chini iktha kangjar alohthui!
Lapen neliphan alangli pulo, “Nang kopi thek-long-lo?” Neli thak-lo, “Neli kangjar alohthui thek-long-lo, la arjon ingrup 20 lapen arpan ingrup 10.”
Ansi neliphan alangli pulo, “Lake det adang aphuthak kedam ahirjunolo, pima kechonghu abangphutin aphan la atengsi pavedetpo lapen seme chobei kedeng atum an aphanta la atengsi pavedetpo.
Muluk a-
Ansi neliphan kechingki aphe-rangke vangsi neliphan pulo, “Nang ingphun chingthur-ra langtha, la kopisi kedamma?”
Lapen neli pulo, “La kopilo?” Alangli pulo, “La kedamvoi ke kethap-i amarjong-lo.” Lapen alangli pulo, “Lake det adang an halatum apap-lo.”
Lapen langtha, hi angchin adip ingpulo, lapen hadak inut arloso pe-marjong arlo kangnilun dolo!
Lapen alangli pulo, “La ke kehingno akam.” Lapen alangli pe-marjong arlo dailapsi amangho along adip kardik kupthip-lo.

Ansi neli ingphun chingthursi lang-lo lapen thek-long-lo, lapen chininon, banghini arloso vang-lo! Lapen halatum avengkong tomon do; halatum avengkong ke vochokang avengkong ason, lapen halatum sining pen longle adak pemarjong rungtang-lo.
Lapen neli pen kechingki apherangke aphan neli pulo, “Halatum pe-marjong konatsi keponlo?”
Alangli neliphan pulo, “lake ha Shinar adet anatsi keponlo, ahem kekimpiji aphan, lapen la patangdetsi la hadak amethang ahemthur athak laso ape-marjong pangnidetpo.”

Lapen puthot ingphun chingthursi neli thek-long-lo, lapen chininon, inglong kangtui hini angbong pen ron kechedan-i losei ahemkonglong humni nangbarlo; lapen la inglong kangtui hini angbong, lake bitoi anglong.
Aphrangsi ahemkonglong ke losei ke-ang, lapen hini ahemkonglong ke losei morok hei hei.
Kethom abang ke losei kelok ahemkonglong, lapen phli abang ke atokbor kedo alosei ahemkonglong,
Ansi neli pen kechingki apherangke aphan arju-lo, “Akehai, lahei ron-ahemkonglong ke kopi aphan lo.
Lapen pherangke nephan thaksi pulo, lake pirthe adang a-
Losei ke-ik ahemkonglong ke Nirep adet anat dampo, lapen losei kelok ahemkonglong ke Nijang adet anat lapen losei morok ahemkonglong ke Nitur adet anat si dampo.”
Losei ke-ang ahemkonglong nangkebar ahut, halatum pirthe kelang damjisi dothekthedet-lo. Lapen Alangli pulo, “Damnon, pirthe lang damnon.” Ansi halatum pirthe langdamlo.
Ansi Alangli neliphan hangserlo, chininon, hala Nirep adet anat kedam atum Ne karjong Nirep adet anat pasanglong-lo.

lapen me laphan pachopo.

Lapen Gaza aphanta adukpi po;

kehai aning karong, lapen Alangli haitang-lo,

gadha aloso athak ardonlo.
Neli Ephraim pen ron alosei ahemkonglong lapen ron athai pavedetpo lapen alangli det-heihei aphan ningkangsam alam toipo.
Alangli talo pen talo an lapen langroi pen ha pirthe kejut anta recho chopo.
Nangphan ke, nangpen Ne Kechejok Aloh avi pen apot Ne nangtum angbong pen kepontang ban atum aphan lang kave ahilik pen lo-etpo.
Paisong anat chiruithunon, O ningkethe keneptang atum;
Pini nangtum aphan phanni nangkepithujisi pachethang-lo.
