Ansi Pitor alangliphan thaksi pulo, “Hemphu, jongsi la chenam tangte, lang athak kedamji ahukum nepitha.”
Alangli pulo, “Vangnon.” Ansi Pitor telong pen hirsi lang athak kengkam chejorsi Jisu along damlo.
Bonta tomon thek longsi alangli pherelo, lapen lang jangji dokdoksi alangli hangsersi pulo, “Hemphu, nepajoknon.”
Hala mamat Jisu ari chirungsi alangliphan otsi pulo, “O nang kekroi kekom abang, nang kopi apotsi nang ning aberbu kedo langma?”
Lapen latum telong chethapdet anke tomon hamdet-lo.
Ansi telong arlo kedo atum alangliphan ardom-khrupsi pulo, “Ahok-lo, nangke Arnam a-Sopolo.”
Ansi latum parai kapsi Gennesaret alongri nanglelo.
Halabangso alongri amonit atum alangliphan chini pamesi latum det adang an monit toisi kadokave akeso alangli dung pavanlo.
Halatum ape abu ke-ot chotji ahukum chohang-lo, lapen la ke-ot long atum an medet-lo.
Ansi Jerusalem pen Pharisi lapen aron thekser atum Jisu along vangsi pulo.
“Nangli sangho atum kopi apotsi ephusar atum ekepitekang aron kroikredet-loma? Pima latum ari chersamsesi cholo.”
Bonta alangli thaksi halatum aphan pulo, “Nanglitumke tangte kopi apotsi nanglitum a-ove ove pen kevang aron pen apot Arnam ahukum kroikredet-loma?
Pima Arnam hukum pisi pulo, ‘Nangpi lapen nangpo aphan anong pathenon,’ lapen ‘Api apo aphan kehingno kepu abang aling aphan pathi vek nangji.’
Bonta ‘Badutame, alangli pen kelong nangji ale alangli Arnam aphan pitang-lo pule api lapen apo aphan thanlote, alangli api, apo anong pathe nangnelo.’ pusi nanglitum pulo.
Lasi a-ove ove pen kevang aron pen apot nanglitum Arnam alam ale pavedet-lo.
Nangtum angthin ke-ik atum! Isaiah nanglitum alamjir montri pamesi pulo,
‘Labangso arat atum angtur pen nenong pathelo,
bonta latum aning ke ne pen heloving-lo;
latum nephan kangduk thangnat ale ave,
Pima latum kethan alam hei hei ke monit kepinchong aron chot-lo!’ ”
Ansi Jisu armu atum aphan alang-lidung hangsi halatum aphan pulo, “Arjura chinitha! Ingho pen kelut amar ke ephan pahijimje,
bonta ingho pen nangkebar amarsi ephan pahijimlo.”
Ansi asangho atum alangli long vangsi alangliphan pulo, “Nang labangso alam kepu apot Pharisi atum aning oihurlo, lake nang chiniloma?”
Alangli thaksi pulo, “Sining athak kedo nepo ke-e-edet athengpi arong an phu-etji.
Halatum aphan thangta mathari. Latum ke amek kave atum aphan kejapon amek kave atumlo. Inut amek kave abang jongsi akaprek abang aphan japon lote latum bang hinita hilik jang rap-rapji.”
Ansi Pitor thaksi alangliphan pulo, “La lamlir alam athe netum aphan nethantha.”
Jisu latum aphan pulo, “Nangtum jokta non anta thangta chinine langma?
Nangtum chinine langma, ingho arlo pen kelut amar an epok arlo dampo, lapen barpi nangkebar ahor pen nangbarpo.
Bonta ingho pen nangkebar ason an ening arlo pensi vang-lo, lapen la hei hei ephan pangthirthelo.
Pima ning arlo pensi kehingno akematha vang-lo atheke pran ke-en, beisa keklem, arloso aphan kelangrem, kechonghu, chobei ahaki kepi, kepinrem hei heisi
monit aphan pangthirthelo; bonta ari kecharsamse pen kechoke monit aphan pangthirthe pupe.”
Jisu hadak pen ha Ta-ir lapen Sidon alongri damjuilo.
Lapen chini iktha, inut a-Kanaanpi halabangso alongri pen vangsi hangsersi pulo, “O Hemphu, David a-Sopo; neliphan ne ingjinsotha. Neli sopi pherememe ahi-i pholok-lo.”
Bonta alangli labangpi aphan thangnatta thak dundedet-lo. Sangho atum alangli long vangsi, choningrisi pulo, “Labangpi aphan toinon, pima la etum aphi phi nangdunsi hangkong-lo.”
Alangli thaksi pulo, “Neliphan Israel akhei kangbotang abiresak atum along ansi netoichot-lo.”
Bonta labangpi vangsi alangliphan ardomkhrupsi pulo, “Hemphu, neliphan neliraptha.”
Ansi alangli thaksi pulo, “Osomar atum ahim enra methan atum angno kevar, lake kemesen akam kali.”
Labangpi thaksi pulo, “Ahok-lo Hemphu, tebonta methan atum ahemphu a-an kecho anghoi pen keklo abeng achet anta cholo.”
Ansi Jisu thaksi labangpi aphan pulo, “O pei, nangli kekroi thedung-lo! Nangli ning kehang asonthot-le paplangnang.” Halabangso ahut pen mamat alangli sopi keso medet-lo.
Jisu halabangso adim che-osi Galili atalo akung soding damlo, lapen alangli inglong arlu damsi hadak ingnilo.

Armu ake-ongpi alangli long vang-lo lapen halatum along akeng ketekok, ari ketekok, amek kave, alam kave, lapen akaprek kaprek ake-ongpi atum aphan vansi alangli kengri nangbilo, lapen alangli kadokave aphanta pamedet-lo.

Lasi armu atum alam kave abang keningje, ari-akeng ketekok atum kemethu, akeng kehonghap atum kechejor lapen amek kave atum kechecharthu thek longsi manghuphrong-lo, lapen Israel a-Arnam anong pathelo.

Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan adung chehangsi latum aphan pulo, “Ne armu atum aphan ingjinsolo, pima latum nelong nangkedodun nithomlo, lapen latum kecho ason thangnatta avelo. Latum aphan an pipepin pen kepadamji ne ning hanghe, pima latum hem kedam ahut aini ponruipo.”
Lapen asangho atum alangliphan pulo, “Ladak monit kavedet, akangsamri adim armu atum aphan ke dorphlup a-an kepachoji aphan konatsi kelongpidam poma?”
Jisu latum aphan arjulo, “Nangtum along him plang ko-an do?” Halatum thakdunsi pulo, “Him Plang throksi lapen oksomar asap.”
Jisu armu atum aphan longle athak kepangniji ahukum pilo,
lapen alangli hala him plang throksi lapen ok ensi Arnam aphan rolo. Alangli la bengsi asangho atum aphan pilo, lapen asangho atum la armu atum aphan pilo.
Kadokave atum chosi ingkrangpet-lo lapen asangho atum kechotang abeng achet pangrumthusi ton throksi paplengset-lo.
La kecholong atum arlosomar lapen osomar atum aphan lakhakhedetta pinsomar atum lok bang suri phli anbak dolo.
Armu atum aphan padamtoisi alangli telong pen ha Megdala alongri damjuilo.
Pharisi lapen Saduki atum Jisu along vang-lo. Latum Jisu aphan asat kelangjisi sining pen angthek kepaklangji aphan choningrilo.
Bonta alangli thaksi latum aphan pulo, “Arni kangsam ahut nanglitum pupo, ‘Botor mesenji; pima sining erhang-lo.’
Lapen adapprang ahut nangtum pupo, ‘pini botor hingnoji; pima sining ingting-olo.’ Nanglitum sining angthek ke chini lapen thanthek, bonta labangso akai angthek ke thangnatta pu thekthe.
Kehingnodak lapen adur kave a-ove atum ke angthek ribomlo, bonta Jonah angthek pen apar ke pipedetpo.” Ansi alangli latum aphan otekangsi damjuilo.
Asangho atum ha parai nangledet aphi latum him van tengnedet pu thek long-lo.
Jisu latum aphan pulo, “Pharisi lapen Saduki atum athap aphan lang pamera cherenon.”
Latum angbong chethanseisi pulo, “Etum him vanvedet-lo.”
Bonta Jisu la chinisi pulo, “Nangtum him kavedet apot-le kopisi chethansei loma? O kekroi kekom atum!
Nangtum chinine langma? Hala him plangpho pen bang suri pho aphan kepi alam chematha-thuthema? Lapen nangtum ton ko-an pangrumthu loma?
Kalite hala him plang throksi pen bang suri phli aphan pidet aphi nangtum ton ko-an pangrumthu loma, la nangtum chematha-damdema?
Tangte ne nangtum aphan him alamjirle kepudam kali pu nangtum kopusi kechininedet-loma? Pharisi lapen Saduki atum athap aphanle cherenon.”
Ansi latum him athap aphanle kepacheretoi kali, bonta Pharisi lapen Saduki atum kethan alam pensi kepacheretoilo pu chinilo.
Ansi Jisu Kaisaria Philipi alongri vangsi asangho atum aphan arjulo, “Monit atum, ‘Monit a-Sopo’ aphan komat pusi pudamma?”
Lapen latum thaksi pulo, “Manene atum pulo, Jon Baptist, manene atum pulo, Elijah; lapen akaprek atum pulo, Jeremiah, kalite Arnam amontri atum angbong inut abang.”
“Tangte nangtum ke?” alangli latum aphan pulo. “Ne komat abang pusi nangtum mathalo?”
Simon Pitor thaksi pulo, “Nang ke Khristo, kerengver Arnam a-Sopolo.”
Ansi Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Ahok-lo, Jona asopo Simon! Pima ok lapen vi pen kali, bonta sining athak kedo ne-Posi nangphan la paklang-lo.
Lapen ne nangphan nangpulang, nang ke Pitor, labangso a-arlong athaksi ne nemondoli kimpo lapen chom ajakongta laphan hai un-e detji.
Ne sining athak aphlok nangphan nangpiji, lapen pirthe athak nang kekok aling sining athakta la kokji, lapen pirthe athak nang kephlok aling sining athakta la phlokdetji.”
Lapen alangli helo Khristolo pu alam badu aphanta thanri pusi asangho atum aphan sodak ahukum pilo.

Halabangso ahut pen anke Jisu Jerusalem dam nangji lapen akesar atum, kurusar kethe atum lapen aron thekser atum arideng kesung chechakpik nangji, thi nangji lapen nithom arni alangliphan pathurji pusi alangli asangho atum aphan kepaklangji pangcheng-lo.
Ansi Pitor alangliphan elong adim ponsi alangliphan kangchekji pangchengsi pulo, “Arnam la pakhang nang, Hemphu! Lapuson nangphan paplangplevek-nang.”
Bonta alangli chetevarsi Pitor aphan pulo, “Nemek angden pen damnon, Soitan! Nang ne kedamji atovar kekhang abang-lo; pima la nang akematha ke Arnam penle kevang kali, bonta monit pensi vang-lo.”
Ansi Jisu asangho atum aphan pulo, “Mane abang jongsi ne phi phi kedunji aning hang-lo tangte, alangli amethang aphan pachetengnedet-ra, lapen amethang athengparpan cheponra ne phi phi padunkrinang.
Pima badutame amethang apran kechepajokji aning kehang abang aling ke la pangbodetji, bonta badutame ne pen apot apran kechepangbodet abang ke la longthuji.
Pima mane abang pirthe adang longpet setta amethang akai pavirdet lote alangli kopi ale doma? Kalite inut amonit apran kopi pensi amethang achethe namthu unjima?
Pima Monit a-Sopo amethang a-Po adak atur lapen ame-thang apherangke atum pen vangji dokdok-lo, lapen halabangso ahut alangli anut-tin aphan amethang akam atengsi anam piji.
Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, ladak karjapphrong atum angbong manene atum Monit a-Sopo amethang arat pen kevang thek longle tik ke thithejilang.”
Nithrok aphi Jisu Pitor, Jems lapen akorte Jon aphan ha monit kavedet adim, kangtuiving Anglong athak japonlo.
Alangli latum angno arje kaprek chepharlolo. Alangli mahang ke arni ason tur-ang-lo, lapen alangli pe ke kethe-ang ason thakthak lok kling cheplang-lo.
Lapen la bangkethom asangho atum Moses lapen Elijah Jisu pen lam kechingki thek long-lo.
Lasi Pitor Jisu aphan pulo, “Hemphu, etum ladak kedo ke me-olo! Nang jongsi nangning hangte ne ladak hem-pharla humthom kimpo; ehum ke nangphan, ehum ke Moses aphan lapen ehum abang ke Elijah aphan.”

Alangli keningjebom ahut, chini iktha, kethe-angdang anghun ephar vangsi latum aphan binthip-lo, lapen inghun pen ase pulo, “Labangso abang ke ne kechinghon a-Sopolo; ne laphan ning dok olo; alangli lam arju non.”
Sangho atum la arjulongsi pherepik-lo, lasi latum longle athak domkhrup-lo.
Bonta Jisu latum adung vangsi, lapen latum aphan otsi pulo, “Thurnon, phere nangne!”
Latum angsong anatthu langsi Jisu aphan apar badu aphanta thek longledet-lo.
Lapen latum inglong pen nangkehir ahut Jisu latum aphan hukum pisi pulo, “Monit a-Sopo kethi pen thurthetik-ke nangtum labangso aning arjan alam badu aphanta thanri.”
Asangho atum alangliphan arjusi pulo, “Tangte aron thekser atum pisi aphrangsi Elijah vangji pu puloma?”
Alangli thaksi pulo, “Ahok-lo, Elijah aphrangsi vangpo,” lapen alangli kadokave sik pamepo.

Bonta ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, Elijah vang-et-tang-lo, bonta monit atum alangliphan chininedet-lo; lapen halatum aning kehang alingsi alang-liphan klemlo. Lapusonthotsi halatum Monit a-Sopo aphanta pasungpo.
Ansi asangho atum la Jon Baptist alamjirsi alangtum aphan pulo pu chinilo.
Latum armu atum along nangke-chevoithu ahut, inut amonit Jisu along vangsi, alangli ingno akengphu patongruisi
pulo, “Hemphu, neli sopo aphan ingjinsotha, pima la klibup akeso pen ajok dukparlo; lapen abatai batai la me lapen lang alongta klilo.
Neli nangli sangho atum alongta laphan ponlo, bonta latum pame un-edet-lo.”
Jisu thaksi pulo, “O kekroi kave, lapen kechingkino a-ove! Ne nangtum along kopu-an ajir keding donang jilangma? La nedungle vannon!”
Ansi Jisu la hi-i aphan ingchek-lo lapen oso along pen la damjuilo. Halabangso ahut pen mamat kesota medet-lo.
Ansi asangho atum Jisu along vangjoisi pulo, “Kopi apotsi netum la phlung un-edet-loma?”

Alangli latum aphan pulo, “Lake nangtum kekroi kekom apot-lo. Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, nangtum akekroi jongsi hanjang emu anbak-le dote labangso aphan ‘Ladak pen hadak chetereknon!’ pusi nangtum pudetji apot-lo; lapen la cheterek po. Nangtum thangnatta ake-un-e avedetji apot-lo.”
Bonta lapuson aphan ke Arnam kardom lapen an kehum pensi phlung unchotji; ason kaprek pen ke un-e.
Asangho atum an ha Galili kechepangrum ahut, Jisu latum aphan pulo, “Monit a-Sopo aphan monit atum arideng hodai vekji,
lapen halatum alangliphan pathivekji, lapen nithom arni alangli thurthuvekji.” Asangho atum aning duk parpik-lo.
Jisu lapen alangli sangho atum Kapernaum nangledet aphi kardom hemthepi amidu kerung atum Pitor along vangsi pulo, “Nangtum athanbang kardomhemthepi amidu pima?”

Alangli thaksi pulo, “Pi,” Alangli hem kechevoi ahut Jisu alangliphan arjuphit-lo. “Simon, nang kematha kopuson? Pirthe arecho atum komat mat along pensi midu, kalite khajona rung-loma? Amethang arat aso atum penma, mate adet akaprek atum along penlo?”
Pitor pulo, “Akaprek adet atum along pen.” Jisu arju longsi alangliphan pulo, “Tangte hala amethang arat aso atum ke jokphlot-lo.

Tebonta etum latum aphan aning kepa-oi-edetji aphan nangtum ha talo along damra ok parhi damnon. Lapen nang kelongcheng a-ok ennon, lapen la angho along nang sika kethom longji. Nang la ennon lapen halatum aphan etum bang hini apharman pi damnon.”
Halabangso ahut asangho atum Jisu along vangsi pulo, “Sining arat komat theneilo?”
Ansi Jisu inut a-oso aphan ame-thang adung hangsi latum angbong parjaptherlo,
lapen pulo, “Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, nang-tum chelarlera osomar atum ason thakthak cheplangplete jonghe setta nangtum sining arat lutdun longledetji.
Badutame, labangso a-oso ason thakthak kechepabihek abang helo sining arat angbong akethenei abang-lo.
Lapen badutame ne men pen apot lason a-oso inut aphan kechak abang aling, lake nephan chak-lo.”

“Badutame la bihek a-osomar atum angbong inut abang aphan nephan akekroi pavirra pap paklem lote, labangso abang aphan him kekoi-i a-arlong akethepi achethok along vek-ra talo akarnukpi along pajangchok, la alangliphan memu.
Pirthe, monit atum aphan pap hei hei kepaklem apot nang ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo! Lapuson ke kaita doji, tebonta pap hei hei kepaklem abang ko-an akesung pho nangpo!

“Jongsi nangmethang ari, kalite akeng nangphan pap paklemlo tangte, nang la thanpet-ra varchornon! Nangri hongni, kalite nangkeng hongni pen nang hala kemep mepin ame along keklodam apar nangri ehong, kalite nangkeng ehong pen nang kejut un-e achethe angbong kelutdun nangphan memu.

Lapen nangmek jongsi nangphan pap paklem lote, nang la hekjok-ra varchornon. Nangmek hilolo pen nangphan Chom ame angkang along nangkevar-chorji apar nangmek isivet pen nang kejut un-e achethe angkang kelutdun, nangphan memu.

“Lahelo la kebinei atum angbong inutnat aphanta kehijimjedetjile cherenon; pima ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, sining athak kedo halatum aphan kerai apherangke atum kaiketa sining athak kedo ne-Po angnosi do.
Kangbotang atum aphan kepajokjisi Monit a-Sopo ke kevang.

Nangtum kopisi mathama? Inut amonit jongsi jon pharo isi abiresak ahur dolote lapen labangso angbong pen ejon abang ingbodet lote alangli la jon throksirkep ra sirkep aphan inglong athak otekangsi laphan ridamji, kalima?
Alangli la longdam lote, chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, alangli la jon throksirkep ra sirkep kedo pen apot apar hala ejon pen apot chehok muchotji, kalima?
Lasonthotsi sining athak kedo nang-tum a-Pota la kebinei atum angbong inut nat aphanta kepavirdetji aning hanghe.
“Nang korte jongsi nangphan pap klemlote, nangli alangli long damra alangli akechokche ason paklang damnon. Alangli jongsi nanglam arjulo tangte, nang korte chelongthu tang-lo.
Bonta alangli jongsi nanglam arjujete bang hini kethom ahaki angno alam athetin kepathirji aphan nanglong inut, kalite bang hini nangri cheponnon.

Alangli jongsi halatum alamta arjuje tangte mondoli aphan thannon. Lapen alangli jongsi mondoli alamta arjuje tangte, alangli nang ingno adet kaprek abang, kalite midu kerung abang ason thakthak paplangnang.”
Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, nangtum pirthe athak kekok aling sining athakta kokdetji, lapen nangtum pirthe athak kephlok aling, lake sining athakta phlokdetji.
“Puthot ne nangtum aphan nang-pulang, pirthe athak nangtum bang hini ning isipet pen kopine chohang lote, sining athak kedo ne-Po nangtum aphan la nangklem piji.
Pima ne men pen bang hini kethom atum kechepangrum aling hadak ne latum angbong dodunji.”
Ansi Pitor Jisu along vangsi pulo, “Hemphu, ne korte nephan pap klemlote ne alangphan batai ko-an diya nangjima? Batai throksima”?
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Kali, batai throksi anchot kali,” bonta batai throksi kep ra batai throksi.
Pima sining arat ke lapuson helo: Ahut isi inut arecho amethang aban atum apreng alakha kelangji aning hang-lo.
Alangli la keklem kepangcheng ahut alangli long suri kep atangka ketu nangji abang aphan vandet-lo.
Bonta aban abang apreng chetu movedet-lo. Lasi apreng kechetuji aphan recho alangliphan alangli methang amar, apiso, asomar aphan lapen akhi do-an kechejorji ahukum pilo.
Anke labangso abang domkhrupsi alangliphan choningrisi pulo, “Hemphu, nangli ning chepaningding ik chottha; neli nangliphan la kadokave tupetji.”
Recho alangliphan kangjinso pen ajok alangliphan lophlot-lo, lapen aprengta diyadet-lo.

“Bonta labangso abang damsi alangli ban hijan inut abang aphan chetong-lo. Labangso abang alangliphan pharo isi atangka apreng ketu nangji dolang. Alangli laphan otthipsi, achethok tumkaksi pulo, ‘Nangpreng nangchetunon.’
Alangli domkhrupsi alangli ban hijan aphan choningrisi pulo, ‘Nangning chepa-ningding ik chottha; ne nangphan la tuvekji.’
Bonta alangli la arjujedet-lo, lapen apreng tutetik-ke alangliphan phatek bengthot-lo.
Akaprek aban atum la keplangtang akam thek longsi aning dukpik-lo, lapen recho angno damsi lahei hei kadokave alam thandamlo.
Ansi alangli la aban aphan hangdetsi pulo, ‘O nang kehingno aban! Nang nephan choningrisi nangpreng kedo anta ne diyadet-lo;
lapen ne nangphan nangkangjinso asonthot nangta nangban hijan aphan ingjinso nangji apot-lo, kalima?’
Recho aning thipik-lo, lapen apreng do-an chetupetpetik ke alangliphan aduk kanghoijisi phatek arlo papondet-lo.
“Lasonthotsi nangtum abangphu-tinta nangning aklong pen nangkorte aphan diyajedette, sining athak kedo ne-Pota lapusonsi nangtum aphan klemji.”
Jisu lahei hei alam ningje tangdet aphi alangli Galili adet che-osi ha Jordan alangroi parai, Judia alongri damlo.
Armu ake-ongpi atum alangli phi phi dunlo, lapen hadak alangli latum akeso pamelo.
Manene a-Pharisi atum alangliphan asat kelangjisi alangli long vang-lo, lapen pulo, “Ajat adai apot tame, mane abang jongsi apiso kecheti aning hang lote, kechetiji aron doma?”
Alangli thaksi pulo, “Kecheng ahut penta kepinchong abang latum aphan pinso lapen arloso pinchong-lo,
lapen pulo, ‘La apotsi pinso abang api apo che-osi apiso pen do rap-rappo, lapen latum bang hini a-ok isinat cheplangpo;’ lake nanglitum porhehe pin langma?
Lahelo latum halabangso ahut pen bang hini kali, bonta a-ok isinat-lo. Tangte Arnam kepachortang, monit la pachekakke nang.”
Latum alangliphan pulo, “Tangte kopi apotsi kecheti aloh pira pacheti nang pu Moses hukum piloma?”
Jisu thaksi latum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum aning kangtang ong apotsi Moses nanglitum aphan piso kechetiji ahukum pilo, bonta kecheng penke lapu kali.
Lapen neli nanglitum aphan nangpulang, badu tame beisa pen apot apar amethang apiso chetira akaprek pen chepangri lote, alangli beisa klem tang-lo.”
Asangho atum alangliphan pulo, “Lapuson jongsi pinso lapen arloso angbong alam dokok-lo tangte, piso en-edet abang memu.”
Alangli latum aphan pulo, “Kadokave atum labangso alam kroithek lapu kali. Arnam pen labangso adan kelong atum ansi la kroithekchotji.

Pima monit atum kopi apotsi piso en-edetma, lake ason do-o: manene atum ke pirthe kehache ahut penta lapuson keman do; akaprek atum ke monit-le kepinchongta do, lapen manene atum ke sining Arat aphan ajok piso en-edetta do. Mane abang laso kethan alam deng un tangte padengnang.”
Jisu ari kebat-ra Arnam kardompiji aphan manene atum alangli long osomar vanlo. Bonta asangho atum rat atum aphan ingchek-lo.
Lasi Jisu pulo, “Osomar atum nedung pavang longnon, latum aphan khangri, pima sining arat ke lapuson thakthak atum arat-lo.”
Alangli latum aphuthak ari batsi damjuilo.
Lapen chini iktha, inut amonit alangli long vangsi pulo, “Thanbang, neli kejut un-e achethe kelongji aphan kopi akam kemesi klem nangjima?”
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Nangli neliphan kopi athesi akeme alamjir ne arjuloma? Akeme abang ke inutnat. Nangli jongsi kejut un-e achethe kelongji nangli ning hang tangte hukum hei hei kroinon.”
Alangli alangliphan arjulo, “Kopi ahukum?” Jisu pulo, “Nang bang apran enri, nang beisa klemri, nang chonghuri, chobei ahaki piri,
nangpi nangpo anong pathenon, lapen nangmethang aphan asonthot-le tebok abang aphan chinghonnon.”
Riso abang alangliphan thak-lo, “La kadokave neli kroipet-lo, neli keklem nangjilang kopi dolangma?”

Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Nangli kechokpetji nangli ning hang tangte damra nangli khi do an jor-et-ra keduk kelak atum aphan pinon, Anke sining athak nangli khi dopo, lapen vang-ra neli phi phi nangdun non.”
Bonta halabangso ariso labangso alam arjulongsi aning aduk pen damjuilo, pima alangli akhi do-o.
Jisu asangho atum aphan pulo, “Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, keplang-o abang sining arat kelut dunji akesung do.
Lapen puthot ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, keplang-o abang Arnam arat kelut dun apar ka-ut ingprim arme kelutdam joimu.”
Asangho atum la arjulongsi, manghu phrongsi pulo, “Tangte matsi jokthekpoma?”
Jisu latum aphan langdingsi pulo, “Monit atum ke la un-e tema, bonta Arnam penke la kadokave unpetji.”
Ansi Pitor alangliphan pulo, “Langtha, netum kadokave che-o tekangsi nang phi phi nangduntang-lo, tangte netum kopisi long poma?”

Jisu latum aphan pulo, “Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, mo kai kemi ahut, Monit a-Sopo amethang adak atur anghoi athak kangni ahut nangtum, atheke ne phi phi nang kedun atumta hala inghoi krehini athak ingniji, lapen Israel kur kre hini atum aphan kangsai atum plangji.

Lapen abangphutinta ne pen apot amethang ahem arit, kalite akorte atum, angjirmar atum, kalite api apo, asomar atum lapen alongle-phelang keche-o tekang abang ke phan pharo longji, lapen kejut un-e achethe chepahemphuji.
Bonta non kepaphrang atum paphiji lapen kepaphi atum paphrangji.
“Pima, sining a-Rat ke lapuson helo: Inut amonit amethang adrakha aberi arlo kam kepaklemji aphan adapprang kam kechongdat atum aphan ridamlo.
Lapen arnisi ‘denari’ isi kepiji aphan kechongdat atum pen cheparaisi alangli latum aphan amethang aberi arlo toilo.
Lapen baji sirkep anbak apor alangli damthusi hithi along karjapphrong, thangta keklemkle atum aphan thek-long-lo.
Alangli latum aphan pulo, ‘Nangtumta neli drakha aberi arlo damtha, neli athikpet ador nanglitum aphan nangpiji.’ Ansi latum damlo,
lapen puthot nerlo chetim anbak apor, lapen baji kethom aporta alangli damsi lapusonthot klemlo.
Lapen puthot baji pho anbak apor alangli damthusi karjapphrong atum aphan thek long-lo, lapen alangli latum aphan pulo, ‘Kopi apotsi nangtum losini thang klemklera ladak arjapphrong loma?’
Latum alangliphan pulo, ‘Baduta netum aphan kam nepipelang.’ Ansi alangli latum aphan pulo, ‘Tangte nanglitumta kam keklem damjile neli beri arlo damnon.’
“Arni kangsam ahut drakha aberi ahemphu kam keja abang aphan pulo, ‘Kechongdat atum aphan hangpet-ra anam pirepnon. Aphi atum aphan pi paphrangra aphrang atum aphan pajutnon.’
Ansi baji pho apor anbak kevang atum ‘denari’ isi longrep-lo.
Hala adapprang kevang atum ke kelong ong muchotpo pusi mathalo, bonta latum ‘denari’ isi si ansi longchot-lo.
La long-lok pen latum ahemphu aphan adai ketinjisi pulo,
‘La kevang paphi atum porphai isi ansi klemchot-lo, lapen nelitum ke losini arni keso ajo klemlo setta nangli kepi pachingbarpet-lo.’
“Bonta alangli halatum angbong pen inut aphan pulo, ‘Jirpo, neli nangliphan thangnat akechokche akam klemklelo, nangli neli pen denari isi ador cheparailo, kalima?
Nangli kelongji an enra damnon, neli nangliphan asonthot aphi kevang atum aphanta kepiji neli ning hang-lo.
Neli methang akhi pen neli neli ning kehang aling klem un, kalima? Kalite, neli keklem mesen apotsi nangli neliphan ne langdun un-e loma?’
“Lasonthotsi aphi atum paphrangji lapen aphrang atum paphiji.”
Jisu Jerusalem karludam ahut alangli long asangho bang krehini atum aphan cheponlo, lapen tovar kedambom ahut alangli latum aphan pulo,
“Chini iktha, etum ha Jerusalem an dampo; lapen Monit a-Sopo aphan kurusar kethe lapen aron thekser atum arideng hodai detji, lapen halatum alangliphan ingsaisi kepathiji ahukum piji,
lapen alangliphan Jihudi kalidet atum arideng hodaisi papinremji lapen champre abu pen pachokji, lapen thengparpan athak pathiji, bonta nithom arni alangliphan pathurji.”
Ansi Jebedi apiso amethang asopo bang hini atum pen Jisu along vangsi, ardomkhrupsi akerap chohang-lo.
Alangli labangpi aphan pulo, “Nangli kopisi kenangjima?” Labangpi alangliphan pulo, “Nangli rat angbong la neli sopo bang hini aphan nangli ar-e anat inut lapen nangli arvi anat inut pangnilongtha.”
Bonta Jisu thaksi pulo, “Nangtum kopisi kehang, lake nangtum chinine. NE KEJUNJI AHARLUNG NANGTUM JUN UNJIMA?” Latum thaksi pulo, “Netum un.”
Alangli latum aphan pulo, “Nangtum ne harlung pen jun vekji, bonta ne ar-e lapen ne ar-vi anat kepangniji, lake nejakong ave, nepo kepathiktang atumsi la longji.”
Hala bangkep atum la arjulongsi la bang hini akorte atum aphan aning thi-lo.
Ansi Jisu latum aphan amethang adung chehangsi pulo, “Nangtum chinilo, Jihudi kalidet atum arecho halatum aphuthak ajakong do, lapen keja atum ajakong do pame.
Bonta nangtum angbong ke lapuson paplangple nang, lapen badutame nangtum angbong akethe kecheplangji aning hang-lote, alangli nangtum aban cheplang nangji,
lapen nangtum angbong badutame aphrangsi kecheplangji aning hang lote alangli nangtum aban cheplang nangji,

lake Monit a-Sopo ason thakthak-lo, atheke alangli bang arideng pen keru kethai kelongji aphanle kevang kali, bonta keru kethaiji lapen ongdung atum aphan kepajokji aphan amethang apran kechepijisi vang-lo.”
Jisu lapen asangho atum Jeriko pen kebar ahut armu ake-ongpi atum alangli phi phi dunlo.
Lapen chini iktha, bang hini amek kave atum tovar alongsi ingnilo, lapen latum Jisu labangso atovarsi vangji pu arjulongsi latum hangjosi pulo, “O Hemphu, David a-Sopo; nelitum aphan ne ingjinsotha!”
Bonta armu atum doklip non pusi ingchek-lo, bonta latum aphrang apar kehang ase pathemuchotsi pulo, “O Hemphu, David a-Sopo; nelitum aphan ne-ingjingsotha!”
Jisu sangkoksi, latum aphan hangsi pulo, “Neli nanglitum aphan kopisi nangklempi nangjima?”
Latum thaksi pulo, “Hemphu, nangli nelitum amek pachecharjisi netum ning hang-lo.”
Jisu latum aphan ingjinsosi latum amek ot-lo, lapen hala mamat latum amek checharlo, lapen alangli phi phi dunlo.
Jisu lapen asangho atum Jerusalem leji dokdok ahut Oliv anglong arei kedo Bethphage arong vang-lo. Ansi Jisu asangho bang hini atum aphan toisi pulo,
“Nangtum aphrang kengdet arong damnon, lapen nangtum kele pen ejon agadha aphan kekokdong lapen la aso aphan thek longpo. La phlok dam-jok-ra nelong vannon.
Mane jongsi nangtum aphan kopine alam pulote, ‘Hemphu latum aphan nangji’ pule punon lapen hala mamat alangli nangtum aphan nang-lo dunpo.”
Arnam amontri keputang alam kepachekokjisi la plang-lo. Atheke alangli pulo,
“Zaion arongsopi aphan thantha,
Langtha, nang recho nanglong vang-lo!
Alangli ke asotdut,
lapen mar kepon agadha lapen aso athak ardonlo.”
Ansi asangho atum Jisu kethan asonthotsi klemlo:
latum gadha lapen aso vanlo lapen amethang ape latum athak limlo lapen Jisu la athak ardonlo.
Lapen armu ake-ongpi atum amethang kechingthang ape a-ri tovar athak limlo, lapen akaprek atum thengplum chorsi tovar athak limlo.
Lapen alangli phrang kedam lapen alangli phi kedun atum hangjosi pulo,
“Hosana! David a-Sopo!
Hemphu amen pen kevang abang ahirjume atheng!
Hosana! Kangtuinei a-Bang!”
Jisu Jerusalem nanglesi rong isi a-armu hangjosi pulo, “Labangso abang komat-lo?”
Armu atum thaksi pulo, “Labangso abang ke Galili adet, Nazareth amontri, Jisu lo.”
Jisu Kardomhemthepi lutdamsi hadak kejor lapen kenam atum an aphan ingtan phlung-lo, lapen tangka kelar atum ahongplang lapen vothung kejor atum anghoi tharlepi-et-lo,
lapen alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nehem aphan ke Kardomhem pusi pupo pusi Arnam pulo, lake hastro along tok-lo, bonta nangtum ke la dokait angthor pinchongtang-lo!”
Amek kave lapen akeng ketekok atum Kardomhemthepi arlo Jisu adung vang-lo, lapen alangli halatum aphan pamelo.

Bonta kurusar kethe atum lapen aron thekser atum alangli keklemtang akemanghumeme akam hei hei lapen osomar atum Kardomhemthepi arlo hangjosi, “David a-Sopo anong pathenon!” pu kepu thek-longsi aning oi-lak-lo.

“Nangli latum kepu alam arjulong-loma? Lasi latum alangliphan pulo, ‘Osomar lapen oso thi-i atum kero kepachok-limji aphan nangtum halatum aphan thantang-lo,’ pu alam nangtum hastro along porhehepin langma?”
Jisu halatum pen chekaksi rong-sopi pen barlo, lapen Bethani arongsopi damsi ajo hadak dokok-lo.
Puthot arni, adapprang Jisu rong-sopi nangkechevoi ahut an ingchirlo.

Alangli tovar akung thebo arong thek long si adung damlo. Bonta arvo pen apar thangta thek longledetsi alangli la aphan pulo, “Non pen apara nang kaiketa athe pathethedetji,” Hala mamat thebo arong chekedulo.
Asangho atum la thek longsi, manghuphrongsi pulo, “Thebo arong kopisi la an akeprap pen chekedu loma?”

Jisu latum aphan thaksi pulo, “Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, nangtum jongsi nangning bibera kroite la thebo arong aphan keklem ason thakthak anchot kali, bonta nangtum inglong aphanta ‘Thurra nang methang amat talo along chevar damnon’ pusi nangtum pudetji, lapen la plangdetji.
Lapen nangtum kekroi pen ardomlote nangtum kehang alingta longji.”

Jisu kardom ahem thepi arlo lutdamlo, lapen alangli kethanbom ahut kurusar kethe atum lapen akesar atum alangli long vangsi pulo, “Nangli kopuson ajakong kelongsi lahei hei klem bomloma, lapen matsi nangliphan labangso ajakong nanglipi loma?”

Jisu thaksi halatum aphan pulo, “Neli nanglitum aphan eson alam nang arjulang, nanglitum jongsi neliphan thak-lo tangte nelita kopuson ajakong kelongsi lahei hei klemloma, lake nanglitum aphan thanpo.

Jon baptisom kepiji ajakong konat pensi kelongma? Sining pen ma, mate monit pen ma?” Ansi halatum angbong lam chedanseisi pulo, “Etum jongsi ‘Sining pen’ pule pulote alangli etum aphan pupo, ‘Tangte nanglitum kopi apotsi alangliphan kroikredet-loma?’
Bonta etum jongsi ‘Monit pen’ pu pulote, etum armu atum aphan pherelo; pima kadokave atum Jon aphan Arnam amontri pusi puhurlo.”
Ansi latum Jisu aphan thaksi pulo, “Nelitum chinine.” Lapen alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nelita kopuson ajakong kelongsi lahei hei klemloma, lake nanglitum aphan nangthanthedetpo.”
“Nanglitum kopisi mathalo? Inut amonit asopo banghini dolo. Alangli akleng along damsi pulo, ‘Po pini nang damra ha drakha aberi arlo kam klemdamtha.’
Alangli thaksi pulo, ‘Ne damde;’ bonta aphi aning chiruithusi la damlo.
Lapen alangli akebi abang along damsi lapusonthot pudamlo, lapen alangli thaksi pulo, ‘Ne dampo,’ bonta alangli damdedet-lo.

Latum banghini angbong komat abangsi apo aning kehang ason klemloma?” Latum thaksi pulo, “Akleng abang.” Ansi Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, midu kerung atum lapen akhat kave arlosomar atum nanglitum aphrang Arnam Arat lutdampo.

Pima nanglitum aphan ahok atovar nang-kepaklangjisi Jon Baptist vang-lo, bonta nanglitum alangliphan kroikredet-lo, bonta midu kerung lapen akhat kave arlosomar atum alangliphan kroilo; lapen nanglitum ke la thek-long-lo setta aphi ning chiruiredet-lo lapen kroikredet-lo.

“Akaprek alamlir arjutha. Inut ahem ahemphu dolo; alangli drakha arong e-lo lapen la ingpaichenlo. Drakha alang aphan alonghong rok-lo lapen ahemtap kimlo lapen sai ketiki atum aphan pektekangsi adet kaprek damjuilo.
Drakha athe kelikji apor nanglesi alangli kelong nangji athe kepa-en damji aphan aban atum aphan ketiki atum along nangtoilo.
Ketiki atum alangli ban atum aphan nepcheksi inut abang aphan areng pasolo, inut abang aphan ke pathilot-lo lapen inut abang aphan ke arlong pen arbulo.
Puthot alangli aphrang atum apar ong muchot, akaprek aban atum aphan toilo, lapen hala ketiki atum aphrang ason thak-thaksi latum aphanta klemlo.
Aphisi alangli halatum along amethang asopo aphan toisi pulo, ‘Latum nesopo aphan aman pivekpo.’
Bonta ketiki atum alangli sopo aphan thek-longsi latum angbong chepulo, ‘Lake kechepahemphuji abang-lo; vangnon, etum laphan pathi lonang, lapen alangli sar arni akhi an chepahemphu lonang.’
Halatum alangliphan nepcheksi drakha aberi angtan varchorsi pathilot-lo.
“Tangte drakha aberi ahemphu kevangji ahut, alangli hala ketiki atum aphan pisi klemjima?”

Halatum alangliphan thaksi pulo, “Alangli la kehingnodak atum aphan akepherememe akesung pen pathiji, lapen abotor ahut drakha athe alangliphan apharman kepiji, lason akaprek ketiki atum aphan pekdetji.”
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Hastro along nanglitum la porhehe pin langma? Atheke hadak tok-lo,
‘Hem kekim atum kevartang a-arlongsi hem kepathir-i akenangsotnei a-arlong cheplang-lo.
Lake Hemphusi klemlo;
La kelang ko-an akemanghumeme plang-lo?’
“Lasi neli nanglitum aphan nangpulang,” Jisu puthulo, “Arnam Arat nanglitum along pen pondetji, lapen hala athikpet athe kepathe, adet kaprek atum aphan pidetji.”
Labangso a-arlong athak keklo abang aling ke klorup rupdetji, lapen labangso a-arlong jongsi komane abang athak klo lote, labangso abang ke padukniji.
Kurusar kethe atum lapen Pharisi atum alangli kethan alamlir hei hei arjulongsi, Jisu alanglitum alamjirsi ningjelo pu chinilo,
ansi latum alangliphan kenepchekjisi abidi ribomlo. Bonta latum armu atum aphan pherelo, pima rat atum alangli-phan Arnam amontri pusi mathalo.
Puthot Jisu halatum aphan lamlir pen thansi pulo,
“Sining Arat ke inut arecho asopo aphan piso kepangri amei kesik pen pangbar me.
Alangli piso kepangri amei along kephatang atum aphan kepahang damjisi aban atum aphan toilo, bonta latum nangkedunji aning hanghedet-lo.

Puthot alangli akaprek aban atum aphan toisi pulo, ‘Damra kephatang atum aphan than damnon, chini iktha, ne kechopi sik tang-lo, ne chainong alo lapen kepangtutang achainong anta thutang-lo, lapen kadokave ason anta siktang-lo, piso kepangri along nangduntha.’
Bonta halatum thangta arjujedetsi amethang akam chedam rep-lo; inut ke arit chedamlo, akaprek abang ke kulat damlo,
lapen hala akaprek atum ke alangli ban atum aphan patherak-lo, lapen pathi-et-lo.
Recho aning thisi, aron-aso atum aphan toilo, lapen hala apran ke-en atum aphan pathikoilo, lapen arongsopi me pacho-et-lo.
Ansi alangli aban atum aphan pulo, ‘Piso kepangri akechopi siktang-lo, setta kephatang atum la kecho longji a-ot avedet-lo.
Tangte nangtum tovarpi along damra nangtum kepholok abang aling aphan kechopi amei along nangkedunjile hangdamnon.’
Alangli ban atum tovar akrongtin along damsi kepholok atum an aphan pangrumdamlo, akehingno lapen akeme atum aphan pangrumlo. Ansi piso kepangri ahem ke alohi atum pensi paplengset-lo.
“Recho abang alohi atum aphan kelang damjisi arlo damlo lapen alangli hadak inut piso kepangri ape kechepindengde abang aphan thek-long-lo.
Lapen alangli laphan pulo, ‘O jirpo, nangli kopi apotsi piso kepangri ape avedet-le ladak nangkelut dun loma?’ Alangli thangta ningjejedetsi dojoilo.
Ansi recho amethang aban atum aphan pulo, ‘Laphan ari akeng kok-ra ha ingtan akangtingle vardamnon, lapen hadak latum chiru chenapsi aso chardengji.’ ”
Lapen Jisu pulo, “Ake-ongpi atum aphan phalo, bonta penang an atum aphansi ingvaichot-lo.”
Ansi Pharisi atum damsi Jisu amethang keningje alam pen apot alangliphan adai kenepji abidi rilo.

Halatum amethang asangho lapen Herod abe kedun atum aphan alanglilong toisi papulo, “Thanbang, nangli ke ahok, lapen ahok pensi Arnam atovar thanbomlo, lapen nangli badu aphanta pherere, thangbakma nangli monit atum aman aphan langdamde.
Tangte nangli kopusi mathalo, nelitum aphan thantha: Koisor Recho aphan midu ketu aron doma avema?”
Bonta Jisu halatum akehingno akematha abidi chinisi pulo, “Kopi apotsi neliphan asat nelang-loma? Angthin ke-ik atum!
Midu ketu-i atangka neliphan nepaklangtha. Lapen halatum ‘denari’ isi alanglilong vanlo.”
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Labangso amohor lapen amen komat-lo?”
Halatum pulo, “Koisor Recho.” Ansi Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Tangte mesenlo, Koisor Recho amar an Koisor Recho aphan tunon, lapen Arnam amar an Arnam aphan tunon.”
Halatum la arjulongsi manghu phrong-lo, lapen alangliphan otekangsi damjuilo.
Halabangso arni mamat Saduki atum alanglilong vang-lo, lapen kethitang atum thurthuthe pusi latum pulo. Lapen latum alangliphan arjusi pulo,
“Thanbang, Moses pulo, ‘Mane abang jongsi aso ave ako thilot lote akorte abang la akorte apiso aphan patengvek nangji, lapen akorte asomar paplang nangji.’
Non hadak nelitum along korte bang throksi dolo; aklengsi abang piso ensi thilot-lo, lapen alangli asomar avedet-lang apotsi alangli piso amu aphan otekang-lo.
Lapusonthotsi adakvam abang lapen adakvam adun abang lapen ha bangthroksi atum anta plang-lo.
Kadokave aphisi arlosota thilot-lo.
Tangte mo kethur arni labangpi la bangthroksi angbong komat abang apiso cheplangjima? Pima kadokave labangpi aphan enpet-lo.”
Jisu thaksi halatum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum akechokche thedung-lo, pima nanglitum hastro alamthe lapen Arnam ajakongta chininedet-lo.
Pima mo kethur arni halatum pisota en-e lapen penanta dode, bonta halatum sining athak kedo apherangke atum ason thakthakpo.
Bonta kethitang atum kethurji alam ke nanglitum porhehe pin langma? Atheke, Arnam nanglitum aphan putang-lo,
‘Nelisi Abraham a-Arnam, Isaak a-Arnam lapen Jakob a-Arnam.’ Alangli ke kethitang atum a-Arnam kali bonta kereng-et atum a-Arnamlo.”
Lapen armu atum la arjulongsi alangli kethan alam apot manghu phrong-lo.
Jisu Saduki atum aphan padoklip-lo pu Pharisi atum arjulongsi latum chingrumpet-lo.
Ansi halatum angbong pen inut aron thekser abang alangliphan asat kelangjisi arjulo,
“Thanbang, aron along akethenei ahukum kolo abang-lo?”
Ansi alangli alangliphan pulo, “‘Nang ning ajakong an penle, lapen nangpran ajakong an penle lapen nang kematha ajakong an penle nang Arnam aphan chinghon non.’
Lahelo aphrangsi lapen akethenei ahukumlo.
Adun abang lahelo, ‘Nang methang aphan asonthot-le tebok abang aphan chinghon non.’
Aron an lapen montri atum kethan alam hei hei ke la sonni ahukum pensi patirpilo.”
Manene a-Pharisi atum keching-rum ahut Jisu halatum aphan arjusi pulo,
“Nanglitum Khristo alamjir kopisi kemathama? Alangli komat asopoma?” Halatum alangliphan thaksi pulo, “David asopo.”
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Tangte Karjong pen ajok David kopusonsi alangliphan Hemphu pusi puloma? Atheke, alangli pulo,
‘Hemphu ne Hemphu aphan pulo,
Ne nang hotur atum aphan nang kengpak arum bibetik ke,
Ne ar-ele ingnitha.’
David jongsi alangliphan Hemphu pusi hang-lo tangte alangli kopusonsi David asopopoma?”
Baduta alangli-phan ethe natta thak thekthedet-lo, lapen halabangso arni penke baduta alangliphan alam kaprek arju haihedet-lo.
Ansi Jisu armu lapen asangho atum aphan pulo,
“Aron thekser lapen Pharisi atum Moses anghoi ingni.
Tangte halatum nanglitum aphan kethan aling tame nanglitum la klemra kroipetnon, bonta halatum keklem ason ke klemri, pima halatum ke kethan ateng klemkle.
Halatum anghor kardik rak-hetsi monit aphang athak batkokji, bonta latum ari chimun ehong pen anta kerapdunji aning hanghe,
lapen monit atum kepalangphrongji akam an halatum klembomlo. Langtha hastro alamjir ketok a-ok-reng achui halatum atehang lapen ari along kechingthang kopu-an akethenei!
Latum kecho kejun amei along kangni adim akemenei lapen Sinagog ahem hei hei along kethik pitang kethenei anghoi along kangniji aning dok-lo,
lapen hithi borwa along man kepi akardom lapen ‘Thanbang’ pu kepahangji aphan latum aning dok-lo.
Bonta nanglitum aphan ke ‘Thanbang’ pu nang pahang longri, pima nanglitum ke korte saidelo, nanglitum athanbang ke inutnat.
Pirthe athak badu aphanta ‘Po’ pu hangri, pima lake inutnat; sining athak kedo abangsi nanglitum a-Polo.
Kalite nanglitum aphan ‘Keja abang’ pu nang pahang longri, pima nanglitum aphan keja abang inutnat, lake Khristo helo.
Bonta nanglitum angbong akethenei abang ke nanglitum aban cheplang nangji.
Lapen amethang kechepathe abang aling aphan ke pabihekji lapen amethang kechepabihek abang aphan aling patheji.

“Nangtum Pharisi lapen aron thekser atum! Nangtum ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo! Nangtum angthin ke-ik atum! Pima nangtum monit atum angno sining a-Rat anghap inghap-lo; pima nanglitum methang methangta lutdamde, lapen kelutji kematha atum aphanta palut longle!

Nangtum Pharisi lapen aron thekser atum! Nangtum ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo! Nangtum aning ke-ik atum! Nangtum hemepi atum aphan langrem rok-lo, lapen halatum ahem kurukpilo; lapen palem lemsi Arnam ardom varet-lo! Labangso apot nangtum ado themuchotji.

“Nangtum Pharisi lapen aron thekser atum! Nangtum angthin ke-ik atum! Nangtum ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo! Pima inut amonit aphan nangtum adhorom kepa-enjisi talo lapen pirthe adang anta ridamlo, lapen labangso abang nangtum adhorom amonit plang-lote, nangtum alangliphan nangtum apar phanni Chom kedamji a-oso pinchong-lo!

“Ko-an akepherememe pho nang-poma, nangtum amek kave keja atum! Atheke nanglitum pulo, ‘Badutame Kardom ahem kangthir penle seme tang lote alangli thangta kali, bonta badutame Kardom ahem thepi aser penle seme tang lote, alangliphan adai do.’
Nanglitum amek kave, kelupik atum! Kolo abangsi kethemulo, ser ma, mate ser aphan kepangthir a-Kardom ahemthepi ma?
Lapen nanglitum puthulo, ‘Badutame dovan pen seme tang-lote, alangli thangta kali, bonta badutame dovan athak adan pen seme tang-lote, alangliphan adai do.’
Nanglitum amek kave atum! Kolo abang themulo, dan abang ma, mate dan aphan kepangthir adovan abangma?
Tangte dovan pen seme ketang abang ke dovan lapen la athak kedo amar an pensi seme tang-lo.
Lapen badutame Kardom ahem thepi angdeng kangthir penle seme tang lote alangli la lapen la arlo kedo abang, Arnam pensi seme tang-lo.
Lapen sining pen seme ketang abang ke Arnam anghoi lapen la athak kangni abang penta seme tang-lo.

“Ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpoma, nangtum aron thekser lapen Pharisi atum! Nangtum angthin ke-ik atum! Pima nanglitum Podina, ahom-abirik lapen jira phan kep angbong pen ephan Arnam aphan pibomlo, bonta aron angbong acho alam, atheke athikpet akangsai, kangjinso lapen kekroi kethirklongji aphan ke nanglitum mathathedet-lo. Hala hei hei nanglitum ketengnedet asonthotsi nanglitum la hei heita klemvek nangji apot-lo.
Nanglitum amek kave keja atum, nanglitum kejunji ahut timsik anta ingsirsi junlo, bonta ka-ut aphan ke joiponlut-lo!

“Ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo, nangtum aron thekser lapen Pharisi atum! Nangtum angthin ke-ik atum! Pima nanglitum harlung lapen kasu angtan anat ingthilo, bonta la arlo ke nanglitum akar-i lapen jakong pen kelong ahormusi plengset-lo.
Nanglitum amek kave a-Pharisi atum! Harlung angtan anat kepangthirjile aphrangke la arlo ingthi pamenon.

“Nangtum aron thekser lapen Pharisi atum ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo! Nanglitum aning ke-ik atum! Pima nanglitum ke kelokphlan atipit asonlo: la angtan pen kelang ke mesen, bonta la arlo ke monit kethitang arepi lapen a-ok kethusi plengset-lo.
Nanglitumta angtan anat ke dhoromi asonsi monit atum angno cheklang-lo, bonta nanglitum aning arlo ke angthin ke-ik lapen akehingno akamsi plengset-lo.

“Nanglitum aron thekser lapen Pharisi atum ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo! Nanglitum angthin ke-ik atum! Pima nanglitum Arnam amontri atum atipit selamlo, lapen dhoromi atum atipit alon padolo,
lapen nanglitum pulo, ‘Etum jongsi ephusar atum a-arni ahut dodun asonte etum halatum pen Arnam amontri atum aphan kepathi akam klem dunde detji apot-lo.’
Tangte nanglitum ke hala Arnam amontri atum aphan kepathi atum asomar atumlo pu nanglitum methang amatsi haki chodunlo.
Tangte nanglitum nanglitum aphusar keklemtang akam kepaplengji aphanle klemnon!
Pherui atum, lapen pherui asomar atum! Chom arlo nangkepavarji ahukum pen nanglitum kopusonsi jokthekjima?

La apotsi neli nanglitum along Arnam amontri atum lapen giani atum lapen aron thekser atum aphan nangtoilang. Nanglitum halatum angbong pen manene atum aphan pathiji lapen thengparpan athak pathiji, lapen Sinagog hei hei arlo halatum angbong pen manene atum aphan areng pasoji lapen cheneksi elong arong pen akaprek kaprek adim arphlungji.

Labangso apotsi nanglitum dhoromi amonit atum aphan kepathi apot, atheke dhoromi a-Abel ha Berakiah asopo Jekhariah aphan nanglitum Kardom ahem thepi pen dovan adak along kepathi avi adai nanglitum aphuthaksi dokokpo.
Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, la kadokave kepathi adai apot akesung ke labangso a-ove aphuthaksi klopetji.

“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Nang Arnam amontri aphan kepathi lapen nanglong nang ketoitang atum aphan arlong pen karbu abang! Vopile amethang asomar atum aphan aveng-kong arum kepangrumpet pen kebi ason ne batai ko-ansi nangsomar atum aphan kepangrumchomji ingtung-loma? Bonta nangtum ke la ingtungtedet-lo.
Chini iktha, nanglitum ahem ingsamri lapen ingthaidangpo.
Lapen neli nanglitum aphan nangpulang, mo ‘Hemphu amen pen kevang abang ahirjume atheng-lo’ pu nanglitum pupetik ke nanglitum non pen apara neliphan thek longledetji.”
Jisu Kardomhemthepi o-tekangsi kedam bom ahut asangho atum alangliphan Kardom hemthepi kekim alon kepaklangjisi alangli long vang-lo.
Bonta alangli latum aphan pulo, “Nangtum lahei hei thek long-lo, kalima? Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, ladak a-arlong isinat aphanta non adim bibedetji; kadokave aphanta varthaiji.”
Jisu Oliv anglong athak kangni ahut asangho atum alangli long vangjoisi pulo, “Netum aphan nethantha, lahei hei komantu plangjima? Lapen nang kevangthuji lapen labangso akai kejut angthek kopima?”
Jisu latum aphan thaksi pulo, “Baduta nangtum aphan kepamanghu longledetjile nangtum cherenon.
Pima ake-ongpi atum ne men pen vangsi neli helo Khristo pusi chekrongji, lapen halatum ake-ongpi atum aphan pamanghuji.
Lapen nangtum ron kechedan alamjir lapen ron kechedanji abirta arju longvekji. Bonta nangtum aning chepasiksak-ri; pima lahei hei plangvek nangji. Tebonta hala mamat ke kejut kalilang.
Pima isi adet akaprek adet pen ron chethurji, lapen isi arat akaprek arat aphan tengkhengji, lapen adim pen adim akhim thurji lapen ke chiklita vangji.
La kadokave ke arlosomar osomar pirthe kepahache ahut kecheng akesung ason thakthak-lo.
“Ansi halatum nangtum aphan nepsi aduk nangkanghoiji aphan nanghodaiji, nangtum aphan nang-pathiji lapen ne men pen apot kadokave amonit atum nangtum aphan hijimpetji.
Halabangso ahut ake-ongpi atum pap klemthurongsi lahin lahin aphan hotur arideng cheho-daiji lapen lahin lahin chehijimji.
Kechobei amontri ake-ongpi atum thurji lapen latum ake-ongpi atum aphan pamanghuji.
Akehingno kelit-bom apotsi ongmuchot atum akanghon ingsamji.
Bonta kejut anta kechechak abang ke jokji.
Lapen labangso a-Rat a-Birta Keme alam pirthe adang, kadokave adet amonit aphan haki kepijisi alam pachethangpetji: labangso aphisi kejut vangji.
“Ansi nangtum ‘kevirthek akehijim meme amar,’ Pu Daniel montri keputang ateng thek longji. La kangthir-et adimsi arjapdingji.” (keporhe abang pachini nang)
Anke Judia adet kedo atum ha inglong pakat nang.
Ahem asarnung athak kedo abang, alangli ahem amar nangkeche-enji aphan pahirhenang;
lapen rit kedo abang achoi nangkeche-enji aphan pachevoivenang.
Ai! Halabangso arni oso kechopathe, kalite mok kechu a-oso kedo asarpimar atum ko-an akepherememe akesung pho poma!
Ningkreng ahut, kalite Sabbath arni kekat nangnedetjile nangtum Arnam cho-ardom non.
Pima halabangso ahut akesungpik doji; lasonthot akesung pirthe kecheng ahut pen non anta avelang, lapen ke mo aphita avedetji.
Lapen halabangso a-arni hei hei pakomke asonte baduta jokjedetji apot-lo, bonta kangvaitang atum pen apotsi halabangso a-arni hei hei pakomdetji.
“Halabangso arni jongsi komane abang nangtum aphan ‘Langtha, ladaksi Khristo do!’ Kalite, ‘Alangli hadaksi do!’, pu pulote la kroiri.
Pima kechobai a-Khristo atum lapen kechobei amontri atum thurji lapen halatum kangvaitang atum aphanta unte kepamanghujisi angthek kethepik hei hei, lapen kemanghumeme akam kethe hei heita klemji.
Chini non ne aphrang pen nangtum aphan nangthanlo.

Lahelo, halatum jongsi nangtum aphan, ‘Langtha, Alangli kejejangtang ajosi do!’ pu pulote nangtum ingtan damri; kalite halatum jongsi nangtum aphan, ‘Langtha, Alangli sirkut arlosi do!’ pule nangpu setta la kroiri.
Pima sining kebirlak-le nihang anat klangsi nichi anatta kelengphit asonthot, lason thak-thaksi Monit a-Sopo kevangta plangji.
Kethitang abang arpum kedo adim aling, hadaksi takun atum chepangrumji.
“Halabangso arni akesung jutdet aphi pen mamat arni ingtingthipji, chiklo khelanledetji, sining achiklo-longso ingjuipreji lapen sining ajakong hei hei klemhurji.
Monit a-Sopo angthek sining athak klangji, lapen pirthe athak monit akhei an chiru chernapji, lapen Monit a-Sopo aphan ajakong lapen adak atur pen inghun athak kevang thek-longji.
Alangli pong-ut arki akethepi pen apherangke atum aphan toiji lapen latum kona phli adang angbong, atheke pirthe adang an pen monit pangrumpetji.
“Thebo arong pen lamlir charli non. Mo aro ingdukvok lapen arvo kechingjok ahut lote barla nanghirji dokdok-lo pusi nangtum chiniji.
Lasonthotsi nangtum la kadokave angthek thek longlote alangli inghap amahang an nangle tang-lo pura chini pamenon.
Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, la kadokave chekokpet petik ke labangso a-ove dobomjilang.
Sining lapen pirthe avedetji, bonta nelam hei hei kaiketa doverji.
“Bonta Po apar ke sining aphe-rangke atum tame, lapen Sopo tame, labangso arni lapen apor baduta chinine.
Pima Noah arni ahut asonthot, lason thak-thaksi Monit a-Sopo kevang ahut plangji.
Pima lang thepi vangve ako pen ha Noah telongpi kelutdam a-arni anta halatum kecho-kejun, piso ke-en lapen penan kedo akamsi klem bomlang,
lapen langthepi vangsi halatum do-an aphan kepondet ahut anta halatum kechinine asonthot; lason thak-thaksi Monit a-Sopo kevang ahut ta plangji.
Halabangso ahut bang hini atum ritsi doji, inut abang aphan ke pondetji lapen inut abang aphan ke otekang bupji;
bang hini arloso atum arlong pen him koi rap-rapji, inut aphan ke pondetji lapen inut aphan ke otekangbupji.
“Tangte no kang-ar penle donon, pima kolobangso arnisi nangtum a-Hemphu kevangji, lake nangtum chinine.
Bonta kechonghu abang kolobangso apor vangji, lale hem ahemphu chini asonte, alangli inghong-dingsi hem nangpalut longledetji apot-lo, lale chininon.
La apotsi nangtumta chesik-etle donon, pima vangvejibon pu nangtum kematha ahutsi Monit a-Sopo vangji.

“Tangte kekroi kethirklong lapen giani aban komat-lo? Lake alanglitum aphan athikpet apor ahut an kepapiji aphan akaprek aban atum aphan kepalangdunji aphan ahemphu pen akam anghor kelong aban abang helo.
Ahemphu kevang ahut jongsi ahemphu labangso abang aphan lapuson keklembom thek long-lote, labangso aban abang ko-an akerengme!
Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, ahemphu amethang amar atar do-an kepalangji aphan labangso abang aphuthak akam hodaidetji.
Bonta halabangso aban jongsi hingno tangte aning arlo chepuji, ne hemphu kevang paderji,
lapen keklem rap-rap aban atum aphan kechok pangchengji lapen hor kangri atum pen cho rap-rap jun rap-rapji.
Ansi alangli vangvedet jibon pu kematha arni lapen kechininedet apor ahutsi halabangso aban ahemphu vangji,
lapen ahemphu abang alangliphan areng pasoji lapen angthin ke-ik atum pen pado rap-rapji. Ansi hadak latum chiru chernapsi aso chardengji.
“Ansi sining Arat ke bangkep animsopimar atum amethang methang athengtom cheponrepsi piso kechepangriji apinso aphan kangthumjisi kedam atum ason plangji.
Halatum bangpho ke kelu lapen bangpho ke abidi kedo atumlo.
Kelu atum ke amethang methang athengtom kechepon ahut akaprek ajangthu cheponpedet-lo.
Bonta abidi kedo atum ke amethang methang athengtom along jangthu paplengsetsi damlo.
Bonta hala kechepangri apinso abang kevang padersi halatum kadokave ta amek jangklip-lo.
“Ansi jirlo apor kehon abang hangsi pulo, ‘Langtha, piso kechepangriji apinso nangletang-lo! Alangliphan kangthumjile nangbarra vanghurnon.’
Ansi halabangso animsopimar atum thurpetsi amethang methang athengtom chesik-lo.
Ansi kelu atum abidi kedo atum aphan pulo, ‘Nangtum ajangthu netum aphan asap nepitha, pima netum athengtom mepji dokdok-lo.’
Bonta abidi kedo atum thaksi pulo, ‘Pi thekthe, pima netum lapen nangtum aphan ke la dordedetji. La alar nangtum ha kejor atum along damra nangtum methang methang aphan chenam damnon.’
Halatum kenamdam ahut piso kechepangriji apinso abang vang-lo, lapen kechesiktang atum alangli pen pen piso kepangri akechopi adim lutdun rap-rap-lo, lapen inghap inghap-het-lo.
“Aphisi halabangso animsopimar atum vangsi pulo, ‘Hemphu, Hemphu! Nelitum aphan inghap nang ingputha.’
Bonta alangli thaksi pulo, ‘Chenamsi neli nanglitum aphan nangpulang, neli nanglitum aphan nangchinine.’
“Lahelo nangtum no kechepang-ar penle donon, pima nangtum halabangso arni, kalite apor chinine.
“Halabangso ahut sining Arat keplangji lapuson helo. Ephong inut amonit adet kaprek damji dokdok-lo. Ansi alangli aban atum aphan hangpetsi alangli khi kedo-an latum arideng hodai tekang-lo.

Alangli abangphutin aphanta amethang methang ajakong ateng pensi pilo: inut abang aphan ser atangka suri pho pilo, akaprek abang aphan suri hini, lapen anut kaprek abang aphan suri isi atangka pilo. Ansi alangli adet kaprek damjuilo.
Hala mamat suri pho atangka kelong abang damsi la pen bepar klemlo, lapen akaprek suri pho ale long-lo.
Lapusonthotsi suri hini kelong abangta akaprek suri hini ale long-lo.
Bonta suri isi kelong abang ke damsi longle along hilik tuksi ahemphu aser patujoilo.
“Ajir dingklui aphi labangso aban atum ahemphu vang-lo, lapen latum pen chelakha rep-lo.

Hala suri pho atangka kelong aban alangli long vangsi ansose suri pho atangka alangli ingno vansi pulo, ‘Hemphu, nangli neliphan suri pho atangka nepi tekang-lo. Langtha neli ansose suri pho atangka longtang-lo.’

Ahemphu alangliphan pulo, ‘Me-ongchot-lo, keme lapen kekroithirklong aban.’ Nangli asapnat atangka pen klem-ipamelo. Neli nangliphan ake-ongpi amar ahemphu nangbatpo. Nangli nangli hemphu pen chehok rap-raptha.
“Lapen suri hini atangka kelong abangta alangli long vangsi pulo, ‘Hemphu, nangli neliphan suri hini atangka tekang-lo. Langtha, neli ansose suri hini atangka longtang-lo!”

Ahemphu alangliphan pulo, ‘Me-ongchot-lo, keme lapen kekroithirklong aban. Nangli asapnat atangka penta klem-ipamelo. Neli ake-ongpi amar ahemphu nangbatpo. Nangli nangli hemphu pen chehok rap-raptha.’

“Lapen suri isi kelong abangta alangli long vangsi pulo, ‘Hemphu, neli chinilo, nanglike ning ingtangrak abang-lo, atheke nanglike sok ke-e-e adimsi sok kerot lapen chili kerik-re adimsi sok kepangrum abang-lo.
Neli la pherelo, lasi neli damsi suri isi atangka longle arlosi patudamjoilo. Langnon, lahelo nangli tangka-lo.
“Bonta ahemphu abang thaksi alangliphan pulo, ‘O nang kehingno lapen keselet aban! Neli ke sok ke-e-e adimsi sok ke rot lapen kerik-re adimsi sok pangrumlo, lake nang chiniloma?
Tangte nangli neli tangka tangka-apuru alongle bidamkok asonte neli kevangthu ahut la neli tangka lapen aleta longji apot-lo.
Ansi alangli long pen atangka endetsi hala suri kep atangka kedo abang aphansi la pithudet-lo.
Pima akhi kedo abang aphan pithuji, lasi alangli akhi do-oji, bonta thangta kavedet abang along pen kedo-anta thi pondetji.
La keningjoino aban aphan ingtan akangtingkuk adimle varphitnon; hadak chiru charnapsi aso chardengji.’
“Bonta Monit a-Sopo adak atur pen lapen apherangke atum do-an pen kevangji ahut, alangli adak atur kethe anghoi along ingniji.
Lapen kadokave arat atum aphan alangli ingno pangrumpetji lapen biresak kevi abangle bi lapen biresak ahur aphan kepaprek asonthotsi alanglita inut pen anut kaprek aphan paprekji.
Alangli dhoromi atum an aphan ke alangli ar-e anat chebiji lapen akaprek atum aphan ke arvi anatsi biji.
Anke Recho alangli ar-e anat kedo atum aphan pupo, ‘Vangnon, ne-Po ahirjume kelong atum, pirthe kepinchong ahut pen nangtum aphan nang kesikpi arat chepahemphu non;
pima ne an kangchir ahut nangtum nephan an nepilo, ne lang kang-it ahut nangtum nephan lang ne pajunlo, nephan chininedet setta nangtum nephan chak-lo;
ne reng angse ahut nangtum nephan pe-ri nepindeng-lo, ne sodet ahut nangtum nephan nelanalo; nephan phatek kebeng ahut nangtum nelong vang-lo.’
“Ansi dhoromi atum alangliphan thaksi pupo, ‘Hemphu, mantusi netum nangphan an kangchir thek-longsi an nangpacho loma? Kalite lang kang-it ahut lang nangpajun loma?
Lapen mantusi netum kechinine abang aphan, atheke la nangphan alohi chak-loma? Kalite nangreng angse ahut nangphan pe-ri nangpindeng loma?
Lapen netum mantusi nang kesodet, kalite phatek kejang ahut nangphan langdam loma?’
Ansi Recho halatum aphan thaksi puji, ‘Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, la ne korte akebinei abang aphan setta la son keklem abang aling ke nephansi klemlo.’
“Anke alangli arvi anat kedo atum aphan pupo, ‘Nedung pen damnon, ahirjuno kelongtang atum; Hi-i Sarpo lapen apherangke atum aphan kesikpitang, kejut un-e ame along damnon.
Pima ne an ingchirlo setta nangtum an nepachochelo, ne lang ing-it-lo setta nangtum lang nepajunjelo;

ne alohi kedoji aphan vang-lo setta nangtum nephan chakchedet-lo; ne reng angselo setta nangtum nephan pe-ri nepindengde-det-lo, lapen ne sodet-lo lapen phatek jang-lo setta nangtum nelong vangvedet-lo.’

“Ansi halatum alangliphan thaksi pulo, ‘Hemphu, netum mantusi nang an kangchir, kalite lang kang-it kalite alohi kedoji aphan kevang, kalite reng angse, kalite kesodet, kalite phatek kejang thek longsi nangphan ru-thaithedet-loma?’
Ansi alangli halatum aphan thaksi pupo, ‘Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, la kebinei abang aphan setta keklemkledet aling ke nephanta klemkledet-lo.’
Ansi latum kejut un-epin akesung angbong lutdamji, bonta dhoromi atum kejut un-e achethe angbong lutdamji.”
Jisu la kadokave alam ningje tangdet aphi asangho atum aphan pulo,
“Nangtum chinilo, non nini aphi Kejok kechematha-dam akechopi a-Mei doji lapen Monit a-Sopo aphan thengparpan athak kepathijisi hotur atum arideng hodaiji.”
Anke kurusar kethe atum lapen akesar atum ha Kaiaphas pu kurusar akethenei ahem chingrumsi,
Jisu aphan kenepjoiji lapen kepathiji abidi chingvai damlo.
Bonta latum pulo, “Chojun ahut etum klem nangne, pima rat atum huriseiji.”
Bethani arongsopi along Simon pu inut si-i kelong abang ahem Jisu dodamlo.
Alangli an kecho ahut inut arloso ador kesopik ajangthu nempru Alabastar pu a-arlong abong pen vansi alangli long vang-lo, lapen labangpi alangli phuthak la dungjirlo.
Ansi asangho atum la thek longsi aning thisi pulo, “Pisi la kepavirthap varet-loma?
Pima la jor asonte penang atangka longsi keduk kelak atum aphan pi thekji apot-lo.”
Bonta Jisu latum akematha chinisi latum aphan pulo, “Labangpi aphan kopi athesi pasung-loma? Pima alangli nephan kam kemesi klemtang-lo.
Atheke keduk kelak atum ke kaiketa nangtum along doverji, bonta neke nangtum along kaike doverve.
Pima alangli la kenempru ajangthu nebang athak kedung pen ajok nephan kepipji aphan sik tang-lo.
Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, pirthe adang labangso abirta keme kepachethang adim aling labangpi aphan kechemathathu-ji aphan la alangli keklemtang akamta thandetji.”
Ansi asangho bangkrehini angbong pen Judas Iskariot pu inut abang kurusar kethe atum along damsi
pulo, “Ne nangtum arideng Jisu nanghodaite nangtum nephan kopi nepijima?” Ansi latum rup atangka thomkep lakhasi alangliphan pilo.
Lapen halabangso ahut pen mamat alangli Jisu aphan halatum arideng kehodaijisi asoi keme ribomlo.
Thap kave ahim akechopi amei aphrang arni asangho atum Jisu along vangsi pulo, “Kejok a-Mei a-an kechoji aphan netum nangphan kodaksi adim sik dam nangjima?”
Alangli latum aphan pulo, “Ha rongsopi damra inut amonit aphan pudamnon, ‘Thanbang pulo, neliphan apor chok tang-lo, neli nangli hemsi neli sangho atum pen Kejok a-Mei a-an chopo.’”
Jisu latum aphan hukum kepi asonthotsi asangho atum klemlo lapen Kejok a-Mei a-an sik-lo.
Arni ingsamsi alangli asangho atum pen pen an kechojisi ingnilo.
Latum an kecho ahut alangli pulo, “Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, nangtum angbong inut abang nephan hotur arideng hodaipo.”
Asangho atum aning dukpiksi abangphutin kepuhurji pangcheng-lo, “Neke kali, Hemphu, kalima?”
Bonta alangli thaksi pulo, “Ne pen kasu along kecharvang abangsi nephan hotur arideng hodaipo.

Chenamsi alangli lamjir ketoktang asonthotsi Monit a-Sopo dampo, bonta Monit a-Sopo aphan hotur arideng kehodai abang ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo! Alangli amahang thekthedet asonte alangliphan memuji apot-lo.”
Alangliphan hotur arideng kehodai abang, Judas thaksi pulo, “Ne ma, Hemphu?” Jisu alangliphan thaksi pulo, “Nang putang-lo.”
Jisu lapen asangho atum kecho ahut, Jisu him eplang ensi ahirjume hang-lo, lapen la bengsi asangho atum aphan pisi pulo, “La enra chonon, lake nebang arpumlo.”
Ansi alangli harlung ehong ensi Arnam aphan rosi latum aphan pisi pulo, “Nangtum kadokave la juntha;
pima lake kechechak Aron kemi aphan, nevilo. Pap hei hei kediyaji aphan nevi ongdung atum apharman dung-lo.
Ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, ne pini pen mo ne-Po arat angbong nangtum pen drakha ahorlang kemi jun rap-rap longletik ke, ne labangso adrakha ahorlang nangtum pen jun rap-rap-relo.”
Ansi latum kero alun lunsi ha Oliv anglong damjuilo

Ansi Jisu latum aphan pulo, “Paningve ajo amat nangtum do-an katkoiji, lapen nephan inutpet nang-o tekangbupji; pima, la toktang-lo, ‘Ne biresak kevi abang aphan thengbopji, lapen biresak ahur pratseiji.’
Bonta ne thurdet aphi nangtum aphrang ne ha Galili adet damji.”
Ansi Pitor thaksi alangliphan pulo, “Kadokave atumle nangphan nang-obup setta neke nangphan nang o-edetji.”
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Chenamsi ne nangphan nangpulang, paningve ajo mamat, vo ejon kuke ako nang nephan batai kethom chinine pusi pudetji.”
Pitor alangliphan thaksi pulo, “Ne nang pen thirap-rap nangji setta nangphan chekobirbe be vekji.” Lapen asangho atum anta lasonthotsi puhurlo.
Ansi Jisu amethang asangho atum pen ha Gethsemane pu adim damlo, lapen alangli latum aphan pulo, “Ne hadak Arnam kardom dam ahut nangtum ladak-le ingni-phrongtha.”
Alangli Pitor lapen Jebedi asopo bang hini aphan ari cheponlo, lapen alangli aning keduk lapen kematha kesung pangcheng-lo.
Ansi alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Kethiji dokdok an ne ning duk-lo. Dak-le dora no kang-ar penle donon.”
Alangli penang an akehelo damsi longle athak domkhrupsi Arnam ardomlo, “O Po, jongsi unte labangso aharlung ne long pen pahelotha! Bonta ne ning kehang kali, nang ning kehangle papleng nang.”
Alangli asangho atum along vangsi latum aphan amek kejangklip thek long-lo, lapen alangli Pitor aphan pulo, “Nangtum porphai isi anta ne pen inghongding un-e det-loma?
Nangtum asat kepho nangne detji aphanle inghongdingra Arnam ardomnon. Chenamsi karjong ke aning hang, bonta okke ajakong ave.”
Puthot batai hini aphong alangli damsi Arnam ardomsi pulo, “O ne Po, ne la junjete labangso kesung aharlung pahelo un-e, tangte, nang ning kehangle papleng nang.”
Lapen alangli puthot vangthulo lapen asangho atum aphan amek kejangklip thek long-lo, pima latum mek-i parlo.
Jisu latum aphan otekangsi puthot damthulo, lapen esonpet alamthe pensi batai kethom aphong Arnam ardomlo.
Ansi alangli asangho atum along vangsi pulo, “Nangtum non anta mek jangbomsi sangbom-langma? Langtha! Monit a-Sopo aphan papi atum arideng kehodaiji apor nangletang-lo.
Thurnon, dam lonang. Langtha, nephan hotur arideng kehodaiji abang nangletang-lo.”

Jisu la keningjebom ahut asangho bang krehini atum angbong pen inut Judas pu abang vang-lo, lapen alangli penpen kurusar kethe atum lapen akesar atum nangketoidun a-armu ake-ongpi atum nokjir lapen kaibong chevansi vang-lo.
Lapen alangliphan hotur arideng kehodai abang halatum aphan angthek pisi pulo, “Ne kangjupji abang aling helo, alanglilo; laphanle nepnon.”
Hala mamat alangli Jisu along kengdet damsi pulo, “Kardom, Hemphu!” Ansi Judas Jisu aphan ingjup-lo.
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Jirpo, nang keklemji akam klem seraknon.” Ansi halatum vangsi Jisu aphan otthipsi nepchek-lo.
Jisu along kedun inut abang ari chirungsi anokjir chesat-lo lapen akethenei akurusar aban aphan thusi ihi ano chorphlak-lo.
Ansi Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Nang nokjir la adim methang alongle chebi thunon. Pima nokjir ke-en atum an nokjir pensi virdetji.
Ne Po nelong ongdung apherangke nangketoiji aphan ne choningri thekthe pusi nangtum mathaloma?
Bonta lapu lote lason plang nangji pu Hastro along ketok alam kopusonsi chekok un poma?”

Halabangso ahut Jisu armu atum aphan pulo, “Dokait aphan ason thak-thaksi nokjir lapen kaibong vansi neliphan kenepjisi vang-loma? Arnivang neli Kardomhemthepi along ingnisi lam thanbomlo, bonta nanglitum neliphan nepnedet-lo.
Bonta la kadokave ke Hastro along Arnam amontri atum kethantang alam kepachekokji aphanlo.” Ansi asangho atum an alangliphan otekangsi katkoilo.
Ansi Jisu aphan kenep atum alangliphan ha Kaiaphas pu kurusar akethenei angno ponlo. Hadak aron thekser lapen akesar atum chepangrum pet-lo.

Pitor achar achar pen alangli phi phi dunsi ha kurusar akethenei ahem kesang angdeng along an dunlo. Lapen kangsai kejut an kechini dunji aphan alangli ha arlo an lut dunsi chedanbang atum along ingni dunlo.
Jisu aphan kepathijisi kurusar kethe atum lapen kangsai amei atum anta alangli bethursi chobei ahaki ribomlo.
Ansi kechobei ahaki ake-ongpi atum vang-lo lapen kechobei ahaki pilo, setta thangnat adai ketinji alamthe long thekthedet-lo. Aphisi bang hini atum vangsi
pulo, “Labangso abang pulo, ‘Ne Kardomhemthepi phrisi nithom angbong kimthusi patangji.’ ”
Kurusar akethenei abang thursi alangliphan pulo, “Nangli thangta kethak dunji alam avema? Latum adai ketin alamthe kopusonma?”
Bonta Jisu dojoilo. Lapen kurusar akethenei abang alangliphan pulo, “Kerengver Arnam amen pen ne nangliphan seme pilang: Tangte punon, nangli heloma, Arnam a-Sopo, Khristo loma?”

Jisu alangliphan thaksi pulo, “Nangli la putang-lo. Tebonta neli nanglitum aphan nangpulang, non pen apara nanglitum Monit a-Sopo aphan ha Jakong Kethenei abang ar-esi kangni, lapen sining anghun pen kevang thek longpo.”
Ansi kurusar akethenei abang amethang keche-um ape chingseksi pulo, “Alangli Arnam aphan pinremlo. La apar ilitum kopi ahaki nangjilangma? Alangli non Arnam aphan kepinrem nanglitum arjulong-lo.
Nangtum kopisi kemathama?” Lapen halatum thaksi pulo, “Alangli kethi nangji adai do.”
Ansi halatum alangli mahang along ingthok-lo, lapen alangliphan chok-lo lapen akaprek atum alangli kecheng ardepphratsi pulo,
“Montri tha, Khristo! Nangliphan matsi nangkechokma, putha?”
Kurusar akethenei abanpi inut abang kevang ahut Pitor kangsai ahem atikup alongsi ingnilo lapen labangpi alanglilong vangsi pulo, “Nanglita Galili a-Jisu along dolo.”
Bonta alangli kadokave angno chekobirbedetsi pulo, “Nangli kepu alam neli chinine.”
Lapen Pitor ha kangsai ahem atikup anghap along an kedam ahut akaprek abanpi alangliphan thek long-lo lapen hadak karjapphrong atum aphan thanlo, “Labangso abang Nazareth a-Jisu along dolo.”
Alangli puthot chekrongkredet-lo, lapen seme tangsi pulo, “Neli labangso abang aphan chinine.”
Malomso aphi hadak karjapphrong atum Pitor adung vangsi pulo, “Ahok-lo, nanglita halatum angbong inut abang-lo; pima nangli keningje pensi la klangdak-lo.”
Ansi Pitor athikpet pen seme tangsi pulo, “Ahokpet pen neli nangliphan nangthanlang, nephuthak adai padonang! Neli labangso abang aphan chininevek-lo.” Halabangso ahut mamat vo ejon ku-lo,
lapen alangliphan Jisu kepu, “Vo ejon kuke ako nang nephan batai kethom chekobirbedetji,” pu alam Pitor chemathadamlo. Pitor ingtan damsi jasemet chirulo.
Adapprang kurusar akethe atum lapen akesar atum kedo an Jisu aphan kepathiji abidi chingvailo,
lapen latum alangliphan kok ingnangsi Pilat govornor along ponsi hodai damlo.
Ansi Jisu aphan kepathiji ahukum pipo pu chinisi Jisu aphan hotur arideng kehodai abang, Judas aning chiruisi hala rup atangka thomkep kurusar akethe lapen akesar atum along vangthulo, lapen
alangli pulo, “Ne pap klem tang-lo.” Latum alang-liphan thaksi pulo, “Nelitum la thangta chinine. Lake nangli kam methang.”
Judas la rup atangka Kardomhemthepi arlo vartekang chorsi damjuilo lapen chekokthat damlo.
Kurusar akethe atum la rup atangka humsi pulo, “Laso atangka Kardomhemthepi atangka apuru arlo kebiji aron ave, pima lake vi anamlo.”
Ansi latum chingvaidetsi kechinine amonit atum aphan kepipji adim aphan longle ahormu kethip abang alongle labangso atangka pen namdet-lo.
Lasi pini arni anta labangso alongle emo aphan “Vi alongle” pusi pulo.
Ansi Jeremiah montri kethan alam chekok-lo, atheke alangli pulo, “Manene a-Israel atum inut amonit aphan anam pathik-lo, halabangso kepathiktang anam,
rup atangka thomkep ensi halatum neli Hemphu nephan hukum nekepi asonthotsi longle ahormu kethip abang alongle anam pidamlo.”
Govornor angno Jisu arjaptherlo, lapen alangli Jisu aphan arjusi pulo, “Jihudi atum arecho pu nangli heloma?” Jisu thaksi pulo, “Nangli la putang-lo.”
Lapen kurusar akethe atum lapen akesar atum alangliphan adai ketin ahut alangli thangta chethak dundedet-lo.
Ansi Pilat alangliphan pulo, “Latum nangliphan lapu-an adai tinlo setta nangli thangta arjulongledetma?”
Bonta Jisu ethenatta thak dundedet-lo, lasi govornor ke manghuhak-lo.
Kejok Achojun a-Meipi aphong-tinta armu atum aning kehang aling phatek kedo atum angbong pen inut aphan kepajokji aron do.
Halabangso ahut inut kehingnopik, amen keklangdong abang do; alangli menke Jisu Barabbas puhelo.
Ansi armu atum kechingrumpet ahut Pilat halatum aphan pulo, “Neli nanglitum aphan komat abang aphansi pajok nangjima? Jisu Barabbas aphanma, mate Jisu Khristo pu abang aphanma?”
Pima Jihudi atum angbong keja atum alangliphan kelang un-e pensi hodailo pu alangli chini pamelo.
Pilat kangsai anghoi kangni ahut apiso alangliphan birta losi pulo, “La dhoromi abang aphan nang thangta klemri, pima alangli pen apot tove nemang along ne sungpik-lo.”
Bonta Barabbas aphan pajok nangji lapen Jisu aphan pathi nangji pu kepahangjojisi kurusar akethe atum lapen akesar atum armu atum aphan chorung-lo.
Ansi Pilat armu atum aphan arjulo, “La bang hini angbong ne komat abang aphansi pajok nangjima? Nanglitum aning kehang komat abangma?” Latum thaksi pulo, “Barabbas.”
Pilat halatum aphan arjulo, “Tangte Khristo pu a-Jisu aphan ne kopisi klem nangpo?” Latum kadokave thaksi pulo, “Alangliphan thengparpan athak pathinon.”
Ansi Pilat thaksi pulo, “Kopi akehingno akamsi alangli klem tang-loma?”
Anke latum an sose ase kethe pen hangjosi pulo, “Thengparpan athak pathinon.”

Pilat la thangnat ale thek longle detsi, bonta la alar ansose kehuriseiji angring thek longsi alangli armu atum angno lang ensi, ari chersamsi pulo, “Labangso amonit avi kepabu apot ke neli dai thangta ave! Lake nanglitum akamlo.”
Kedo an arat atum thaksi pulo, “La alangli vi adai nelitum lapen nelitum asomar atum aphuthak padonang.”
Ansi alangli halatum aphan ajok Barabbas aphan lophlot-lo, lapen Jisu aphan champre abu pen pachoksi thengparpan athak kepathiji aphan latum aphan hodailo.
Ansi Pilat aron-aso atum Jisu aphan govornor ahem arlo ponlo lapen asong isi aron-aso alangli dung do dunlo.
Latum alangli pe phloksi ake-er ape pindeng-lo.
Ingsu avaikang arhetsi alangli phu athak kup-lo, lapen ari ar-e pri achin pa-otsi, alangli ingno akengphu patongruisi alangliphan pinremlo, lapen hangjosi pulo, “Kardom, Jihudi atum arecho!”
Latum alangliphan ingthok-lo lapen hala achin pensi aphu along thengbomlo.
Latum alangliphan pinremdetsi, hala ake-er ape phloksi amethang ape pindeng-lo, lapen thengparpan athak kepathijisi alangliphan ponlo.
Latum tovar kedambom ahut Kireni arongsopi amonit, Simon pu abang aphan chetong-lo, lapen latum alangliphan Jisu athengparpan kepa-ponji aphan sodak ahukum pilo.
Ansi latum ha Golgotha, atheke “Phu bongkok adim” nanglelo, lapen
latum Jisu aphan akehodak ason pen kepangvui adrakha ahorlang kepajunjisi alangliphan pilo, bonta Jisu la chomatsi junjedet-lo.
Latum alangliphan thengparpan athak sak-lo, lapen khadot pathusi alangli pe chethak-lo.
Labangso tangdet aphi latum hadak ingniphrongsi alangliphan honding-lo.
Alangliphan adai ketin alamthe, atheke “LABANGSO ABANG KE JISU, JIHUDI ATUM ARECHO,” pu alamthe toksi ha angsong, alangli athak tardong-lo.
Banghini akanghupi atum aphan Jisu ar-e anat inut lapen arvi anat inut aphan thengparpan athak sak-lo.
Tovar kevang kedam atum aphu chehejuksi alangliphan pinremsi pulo,
“O Kardom ahem kephrira nithom angbong kekim kepatangthek abang, nangli jongsi Arnam a-Sopo tangte nangli methang chepajok-ra thengparpan pen nanghirnon.”
Lapuson thak-thaksi kurusar akethe atum, aron thekser atum lapen akesar atum do-anta alangliphan pinremsi pulo,

“Alangli bang kaprek atum aphan ke pajokthek bonta amethang ke chepajok thekthe! Israel a-Recho alangli helo, kalima? Alangli jongsi non amat thengparpan pen nanghir asonte nelitum alangliphan kroiji apot-lo.
Alangli Arnam aphan chikilo lapen Arnam a-Sopo pusi chekrong-lo. Tangte ili lang lonang, non alangliphan Arnam pajokjima, pajokjema!”
Alangli penpen thengparpan athak kesak rap-rap akanghu atumta lasonthotsi alangliphan pinremlo.
Nerlo chitim pen ha baji kethom apor an det adang ingtingkuk-lo.
Lapen baji kethom anbak ahut Jisu ase kethe pen hangsersi pulo, “Eli, Eli lama sabakthani,” atheke, “Ne Arnam, ne Arnam, kopi athesi nang nephan obup-loma?”
Hadak karjapphrong, manene atum la arjulongsi pulo, “Labangso abang Elijah aphansi kehang-lo.”
Lapen hala mamat halatum angbong pen inut abang katvirsi tula endamlo lapen la drakha ahor akethor along nimsi, lapen arpik ehong pen krongdongsi alangliphan kepajunjisi pilo.
Bonta akaprek atum pulo, “Thalang, inghongsinang, alangliphan kepajokji aphan Elijah vangjine vangvene, lale langdun sinang!”
Jisu puthot ase kethe pen hangsersi achethe chevung-lo.
Chini iktha, kardomhemthepi along kebeng ape athak pen ha aber an chingsekdak-lo, lapen arlonghei-heita inghang-lo,
lapen tipit hei hei ta chingpudang-lo, lapen kethitang akangthir atum ake-ongpita thursi reng-lo,
lapen latum tipit che-olo, lapen Jisu kethi pen thurdet aphi latum Rongsopi Kangthir angbong lutdamsi ake-ongpi atum aphan cheklangdamlo.
Chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu lapen Jisu along kehondun atum chikli kevang lapen keplangtang akam hei hei thek-longsi jasemet pherelo lapen pulo, “Chenamlo, labangso abang ke Arnam a-Sopolo!”
Hadak achar pen kelangdun arlosomar atum ake-ong pi dolo. Halatum Jisu aphan keru kethaijisi Galili adet pen alangli phi phi dunlo.
Halatum angbong Megdala arong a-Meri, Jems lapen Joseph apei Meri lapen Jebedi asopo atum apeita dolo.
Arni kangsam apor Arimathea asor Joseph pu inut keplang-o abang vang-lo. Alanglita inut Jisu asangholo.
Alangli Pilat along damsi Jisu abang arpum hangdamlo. Ansi Pilat Joseph aphan hukum pilo.
Joseph la abang arpum ensi linen ape akemirak pen perlo.
Lapen alangli methang keroktang atipit kemi along pa-i-damlo, lapen tipit amahang along arlong akethe pakong-long tekangthipsi alangli damjuilo.
Hadak Megdala a-Meri lapen akaprek a-Meri abang ingniphrongsi thiri anat langphrong-lo.
Puthot arni, lake kesang arnilo. Kurusar akethe atum lapen Pharisi atum Pilat along damsi pulo,
“Hemphu, labangso kechobei abang kereng ahut keningjetekang, atheke ‘Ne nithom aphi thurthuji’ pu alam nelitum chemathadam-thulo.

Tangte nithom arni anta athikpet-le tipit kehonji ahukum pitha. Lapu kalite asangho atum vangsi alangli bang arpum inghu pondetji, lapen alangli kethitang atum angbong pen thurtang-lo pusi rat atum aphan thanji tahai. Lapulote aphrang apar la hingno muchotpo.”
Pilat halatum aphan pulo, “Keton atum aphan ponnon, Damra latum paton damnon.”
Latum damlo, lapen tipit kepathirjisi arlong along asap theng-lo, lapen keton atum aphan pahonlo.
Sabbath arni aphi hithi arui aphrang arni, the-ang prinprele apor Megdala asor a-Meri lapen akaprek a-Meri ha tipit langdamlo.
Lapen chini iktha, chikli vang-lo, lapen Hemphu apherangke sining pen nanghirsi halabangso a-arlong pakong-longsi terek-lo, lapen labangso athak ingnilunlo.
Alangli arje sining kebirlak ason lapen ape ar-e kelok asonsi lok kling-lo.
Alangliphan pheresi hadak keton atum a-ok klemhurlo, lapen latum kethitang atum asonsi cheplang-lo.
Hala pherangke arlosomar atum aphan pulo, “Nangtum thangta phereri. Pima ne chinilo, hala thengparpan athak kepathitang a-Jisu aphansi nangtum rilo.
Alangli ladak avelo. Keputang asonthotsi alangli thurtang-lo. Ladak vang-ra alangliphan kepa-i adim nanglangtha.

Nangtum dam serak-ra alangli sangho atum aphan alangli kethitang atum angbong pen thurtang-lo, lapen alanglitum aphrang ha Galili adet dam patenolo, hadak nanglitum alangliphan thek dam longji pura thandam non.”
Latum kephere pen lapen aning arongpik pen thiri pen dam serak-rak-lo, lapen katsi asangho atum aphan kethandamjisi damlo.
Lapen chini iktha, Jisu latum pen chetongsi pulo, “Kardom!” Latum alanglidung an vangsi akeng otsi alangliphan ardomlo.
Ansi Jisu latum aphan pulo, “Phereri, damra ne korte atum aphan ha Galili dam nangji pura than damnon, lapen hadak latum nephan thek longpo.”
Arlosomar atum tovar kedambom ahut thiri along keton penang aron-aso atum ha rongsopi damsi kurusar atum aphan keplangtang alamjir than damlo.
Ansi kurusar akethe atum lapen akesar atum do-an chingrumsi bidi rilo, lapen rup atangka ake-ongpi ensi chedanbang atum aphan pisi pulo,
“Asangho atum ajo amat vangsi netum amek kejang aphi la inghu pondet-lo pule rat atum aphan thannon.
Labangso alam jongsi govornor arjulong-lote netum alangliphan pakroi thekpo, lapen nangtum akesung pen jokpo.”
Ansi latum rup atangka dengsi latum kethan ateng klemlo, lapen labangso alam pini arni anta Jihudi atum angbong pachethanglang.
Jisu latum aphan keputang asonthotsi bang kre isi asangho atum ha Galili damsi inglong arlu damlo.
Latum alangliphan thek long-lok pen ardomkhrup-lo, bonta latum angbong mane atum ke la kroithip thedet-lo.
Ansi Jisu latum adung vangsi latum aphan pulo, “Sining athak lapen Pirthe athak kadokave ajakong nephan nepitang-lo.
Lahelo nangtum damra pirthe adang akhei kedo-an aphan sangho paplangra Po lapen Sopo lapen Karjong Kangthir amen pen halatum aphan baptisom pinon,
lapen Ne nangtum aphan nangkethan alam kedo-an kepakroijile halatum aphan than petnon; lapen chininon, Ne nangtum along labangso apirthe kejut anta nangdo dunverji.”
Jisu Khristo, atheke Arnam a-Sopo alamjir a-Birta Keme kecheng lapu helo.
Lake Arnam amontri, Isaiah ketok asonthot-lo, atheke alangli tok-lo:
“Arnam pulo, ‘Chini iktha,
ne nepherangke nangphrang toipo,
alangli nangphan tovar nang sik pipo.’
Komane abang kejejangtang ajo hangkongsi pulo,
‘Hemphu aphan tovar sikpinon,
alangli kedamji aphan isi kengset atovar thikpinon!’”

Lasi Jon kejejangtang ajo cheklangsi baptisom pibomlo lapen pachethang bomlo. Alangli monit atum aphan pachethangsi pulo, “Pap pen nanglitum aning chiruira baptisom ennon; anke Arnam nanglitum apap hei hei diyapo.”
Judia adet amonit atum an lapen Jerusalem arongsopi kedo atum an alangli dung dambomsi Jordan alangroi along alangli rideng baptisom enbomlo.
Jon ke ka-ut angmi apesi chepindeng-lo, lapen ok-reng achepansi avam chekok-lo, longvur lapen nampi apijo alangsi chobom-junbomlo.
Alangli monit atum aphan pachethangsi pulo, “Nepar ajakong kethemu abang nephi vangjilang; alangli keng-op ari kephrijira kangkupdiji aphan anta ne-ot ave.
Neke nanglitum aphan lang pensi baptisom nangpilo, bonta alangli ke Karjong Kangthir pensi nanglitum aphan baptisom pipo.”
Halabangso arni ahut malom Jisu Galili adet kedo Najareth arongsopi pen vangsi Jordan alangroi along Jon arideng baptisom enlo.
Lapen alangli lang pen nang arlukrak pen mamat sining kangpudang lapen vothung ason Karjong alangli long nangkehir alangli thek-long-lo.
