Lapen sining pen ase vangsi pulo, “Nang ke ne kechinghon a-Sopolo. Nangphan ne ningdok-olo.”
Lapen hala mamat Karjong alangliphan kejejangtang ajo padamlo.
Hadak alangli jo phlikep ni phlikep dolo, lapen Soitan alangliphan asat lang-lo. Hadak alangli nampi api atum pen dorap rap-lo, lapen sining apherangke atum alangliphan ruthaibomlo.
Jon aphan phatek bengdet aphi Jisu Galili alongri vang-lo, lapen Arnam pen kevang a-Birta Keme pachethangsi pulo,
“Ahut choktang-lo, lapen Arnam a-Rat vangtang-lo! Nangtum apap hei hei pen ning chiruira Birta Keme kroinon.”
Jisu Galili atalo akung kung kedam un ahut alangli Simon lapen akorte Andriu aphan talo along lan pen ok kenep thek-long-lo; pima halatum ke ok kenep amonit atumlo.
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Ne long nangdunnon, ne nangtum aphan monit kenep atum nangpaplangpo.”
Halabangso ahut mamat halatum alan hei hei che-otekangsi alangli phi phi dunlo.
Lapen alangli aphrang anat asapso damchotsi Jebedi asopo, Jems lapen akorte Jon aphan thek-long-lo; halabangso ahut halatum telong arlo lan thik bomlo.
Hala mamat halatum apo Jebedi aphan hadak telong arlo kedo kechongdat atum along otekangsi alangli phi phi dunlo.
Jisu lapen asangho atum Kapernaum arongsopi damlo, lapen halatum keledam pen puthot a-Sabbath Arni alangli sinagog arlo dunsi lam thanlo,

lapen halatum alangli kethan alam pen apot manghuphrong-lo; pima alangli aron thekser atum asonthak thaksi thanlo, lapu kali, bonta hukum kepiji ajakong kedo abang asonthak thaksi alangli halatum aphan thanlo.
Halabangso ahut mamat kangthirthe ahi-i kepho abang sinagog arlo vang-lo, lapen alangli hangsersi pulo,
“Najareth a-Jisu, nang netum along kopi akam doma? Nang netum aphan kepavirjisi ladak netum along vang-loma? Nang komatma, lake netum chinilo. Nang ke Arnam pen kevang kangthir-et abang-lo.”
Jisu la aphan ingcheksi pulo, “Dojoinon, lapen alangli long pen nangbarnon.”
Ansi kangthirthe ahi-i halabangso amonit aphan jasemet heveng-lo, lapen ase kethe pen hangsersi alangli long pen nangbarlo.

Kadokave amonit atum manghuphrong-lo; lasi halatum lahin lahin charju seroisi pulo, “La kopi plang-loma? Kopine akaprek kethanmi alamma? Pima labangso amonit kangthirthe ahi-i atum aphan anta hukum kepi un ajakong dolo, lapen halatum alangli lam kroilo.”
Halabangso ahut pen mamat Galili alongri adang bithe bitha adimta alangli nong chethangphlup-lo.
Jisu sinagog pen nangkebar pen mamat Jems lapen Jon atum pen pen Simon lapen Andriu atum ahem damphit-lo.
Halabangso ahut Simon anipi aphu keso pen pangjilo, lapen Jisu nangkele pen halatum Alangliphan labangpi alamjir thanlo.
Alangli labangpi adung vangsi labangpi aphan ari pen ingthurlo. Ansi labangpi aphu keso medet-lo, lapen labangpi halatum aphan ru-thailo.
Arni chidet aphi, ingtingte aphrang halatum Jisu along keso atum an lapen hi-i kepho atum an vanlo.
Rong isi amonit inghap athengnosi chingrumpet-lo.
Akaprek kaprek akeso kelong ake-ongpi atum aphan Jisu pamelo, lapen ongdung ahi-i phlung-lo. Alangli hi-i atum aphan paningje longledet-lo, pima halatum alangliphan chinihurlo.
Adap the-ang prinprele apor Jisu thursi hem pen nangbarlo, lapen monit kavedet adim damsi Arnam ardomdamlo.
Bonta Simon lapen ari asangho atum alangliphan ridunlo.
Halatum alangliphan chetongsi alangliphan puhurlo, “Kadokave atum nangliphan riphrailo.”
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Neli tebok terei arongta kepachethangthekji aphan ili dak pen damlonang; pima ne labangso akam aphansi vang-lo.”
Ansi alangli sinagog hei hei along pachethang ponbomsi Galili adet adang an damtup-lo, lapen hi-i atum aphan phlungbomlo.
Inut si-i akeso kelong abang Jisu adung vang-lo, lapen alangli akengphu patongruisi Jisu aphan choningrisi pulo, “Nangli jongsi nanglining hangte, nangli neliphan nepangthir un.”
Jisu alangliphan ingjinsolo, lasi alangli ari chirungsi abang ot-lo, lapen pulo, “Nening hang-lo, ingthirnon.”
Hala mamat alangli si-i akeso pen medet-lo, lapen alangli ingthirlo.
Ansi Jisu alangliphan padamlo, lapen kepu pasodak-lo,

“Nang labangso alam badu aphanta thanri, bonta nangphrang kengdet damra kurusar aphan chepaklang damnon; lapen nang metang-lo pu kadokave atum aphan angthek kepaklangjile Moses hukum kepi asonthot athok thok-damnon.”

Bonta alangli damsi bithe bitha adimta labangso alam than pachethang-lo. Lasi Jisu damjoijete nohok arongsopita lutdam thekthedet-lo, bonta monit kavedet ajosi do damlo, lapen bithe bitha adim pen monit atum alangli long vangpet-lo.
Penang arni aphi Jisu puthot Kapernaum arongsopi chevangthulo, lapen alangli hemsi do pu alam chethangphlup-lo.
Ansi monit chingrumpik-lo; lasi inghap athengno anta adim chejangjedet-lo, lapen alangli halatum aphan lam thanbomlo.
Halabangso ahut bangphli amonit atum inut thi-klak abang aphan nang-charchongrinsi Jisu adung vanlo.
Bonta hadak armu ongpik-lo apotsi halatum labangso amonit aphan Jisu adung ponthekthedet-lo. Lasi Jisu kedo angdenchit hem asarnung phrivongsi thi-klak abang aphan atar pen pasunlo.
Jisu halatum akekroi thek-longsi thi-klak abang aphan pulo, “Nangpap hei hei diyatang-lo, po.”
Ansi hadak kangniphrong manene atum amethang methang aning arlo mathalo,
“Labangso amonit kopusi lason ningje hailoma? Lake Arnam aphan kepinremlo. Inutnat, atheke, Arnam apar matsi pap diya unjima?”
Jisu hala mamat halatum aning arlo kematha alam chinisi halatum aphan pulo, “ Nangtum kopi apotsi nangtum aning arlo lason alam mathaloma?
La thiklak abang aphan, ‘Nangpap hei hei diyatang-lo,’ pu keputong kejoima, mate, ‘Thurra, nang tar cheponra kengkam chejornon,’ pu keputong joimuma?
Tangte pirthe athak Monit a-Sopo pap hei hei kediyaji ajakong do pu angthek nang paklangpo.” Lasi alangli hala thi-klak abang aphan pulo,
“Ne nangphan nangpulo, thurnon, lapen nangtar cheponra nanghem chedamnon.”
Alangli thurlo, lapen hala mamat atar cheponsi kadokave angno damlo. Kadokave atum manghuphrong-lo, lapen Arnam anong pathesi pulo, “Netum lason ke thek-longle-pinlang!”
Jisu puthot Galili atalo akung-kung damlo. Armu atum alangli long vangbomlo, lapen alangli halatum aphan lam thanbomlo.
Alangli dambom dambomsi Alpheus asopo, Levi aphan midu kerung ahem amaro along kangnilun thek-long-lo, lapen Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Ne long nangdunnon.” Levi thursi alangli phi phi dunlo.
Aphi Levi ahemsi Jisu an cholo. Midu kerung ake-ongpi atum lapen papi atumta Jisu lapen asangho atum along ingni-dunphrong-lo, pima ake-ongpi atum Jisu along dunlo.

Pharisi abe atum angbong aron thekser atum Jisu aphan papi atum lapen midu kerung atum pen an kechorap rap thek-longsi asangho atum aphan pulo, “Alangli kopi apotsi midu kerung lapen papi atum pen chorap-rap-loma?”

Jisu la arjulongsi halatum aphan thakdunlo, “A-ok apran kemesen atum ke daktor nangne, bonta kesodet atumsi daktor nangji. Dhoromi atum aphan kephajisi ne vang-lo, lapu kali, bonta papi atum aphan kephajisi ne vang-lo.”

Halabangso ahut Jon asangho atum lapen Pharisi asangho atum an humlo. Manene atum Jisu adung vangsi alangliphan arjulo, “Kopi apotsi Jon asangho atum lapen Pharisi asangho atum ke an humlo setta nang sangho atum ke an humhedet-loma?”
Jisu halatum aphan thakdunsi pulo, “Piso kepangri along nangkedun atum an hum nangjima? Lapu kali. Piso kechepangri apinso abang halatum angbong dotik ke halatum an humhe.
Bonta mo lason arni vangji, halabangso arni piso kechepangri apinso aphan halatum angbong pen pondetji. Anke halatum an humhurji.
“Baduta kechetuttelang ape kemi pen pe ban bang-i-e. Lapuson bang-lote, hala akemi ape chetutsi aban ape aphan vungphlinji, lapen kerak adim thethumuchotji.

Lapen baduta ok-reng abong aban along drakha ahorlang kemi pangpenpe. Lapuson pangpen lote, drakha ahorlang ok-reng abong pangbopdakji. Anke drakha ahor lapen abongta virdetji. Drakha ahorlang kemi ke ok-reng abong kemi alongsi pangpen nangji.”
Sabbath Arni Jisu sok ajo dongponputsi damlo. Alangli sangho atumta alangli long dunlo, lapen halatum sok abu ingthon ponbomlo.
Ansi Pharisi atum Jisu aphan pulo, “Langtha, nangli sangho atum ke kopi apotsi Sabbath Arni keklem longle akamta keklem loma?”

Jisu halatum aphan thakdunsi pulo, “David akenang kedo ahut lapen alangli an kangchir ahut alangli kopi klem loma, labangso alam nangtum porhehe pin langma? Alangli lapen alangli long kedo amonit atum an ingchirlo;

lasi alangli Arnam ahem arlo lutdamsi Arnam aphan kethok ahim cholo. Lake Abiathar Kurusar Kethenei keplang ahut-lo. Ilitum Aron ateng ke kurusar atum apar ke baduta la cholongle. Bonta David ke la cholo, lapen ari asangho atum aphanta pilo.”
Lapen Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Arnam ke Sabbath Arni aphansi monit pinchong-lo, lapu kali, bonta monit aphansi Sabbath Arni pinchongpilo.
Lasi Monit a-Sopo helo Sabbath arni anta a-Hemphulo.”
Jisu puthot sinagog arlo damthulo. Hadak inut ari ehong ke krenghak amonit dolo.
Hadak kedo manene atum ke alangliphan adai ketinji abidi risi, alangli Sabbath Arni labangso amonit aphan keso pamejima pusi alangliphan langdunding-lo.
Alangli hala ari ke krenghak abang aphan pulo, “Thurra ladak mei angbong vangnon.”
Lapen alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Sabbath Arni ke keme akamsi klemlongma, mate kehingno akamsi klemlongma? Apran keraima, mate apran kepavirtong longma?” Bonta halatum doklip-lo.

Alangli aning kethi pen halatum aphan talavir lang-lo; bonta halatum aning buiklui-hak-huk apotsi alangli ning dukparlo. Ansi alangli halabangso amonit aphan pulo. “Nangri chephejeng non.” Alangli ari chephejeng-lo, lapen ari medet-lo.
Pharisi atum sinagog pen barsi hala mamat Herod abe atum pen chetongdamlo, lapen halatum alangliphan kepathiji abidi chingvailo.
Jisu amethang asangho atum pen pen Galili atalo anat damlo, lapen armu ake-ongpi atum alangli phi phi dunlo. Latum Galili adet, Judia adet,
Jerusalem arongsopi, Idumia adet, Jordan hapu parai adet, Tair lapen Sidon arongsopi adung arei ahavar hei hei pensi vang-lo, pima latum Jisu keklem akam alam arjulong-lo.
Armu ongpik apotsi armu atum Jisu aphan kepet-het-hedetji aphan Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan telongso isi pathiktoilo.
Pima alangli penang atum aphan keso pamelo. Lasi keso atum an alangliphan ke-otjisi jasemet chepetdunlo.
Lapen kangthirthe ahi-i kepho atum alangliphan thek-long-lote, halatum alangli ingno krepthorsi lapen hangsersi, “Nang ke Arnam a-Sopolo,” pu pupulo.
Bonta alangli komatma, la halatum badu aphanta kethanthe-detjisi alangli hi-i atum aphan hukum pi pasodak-lo.
Ansi Jisu inglong arludamlo, lapen alangli kenangji amonit atum aphan amethang adung hang-lo, lapen halatum alangli dung vang-lo.

Alangli bang krehini aphan ingvailo, lapen latum aphan alangli ketoitang atum pusi pulo. Alangli halatum aphan pulo. “Nangtum nelong nangkedodunji lapen nangtum kepachethang-damji aphanta ne nangtum aphan nangketoijisi ne nangtum aphan ingvaitang-lo,
lapen nangtum hi-i atum aphan kephlungji ajakong longpo.”
Alangli kangvai bang krehini atum lahelo: Simon, (Jisu alangliphan Pitor pusi amen irlo.)
Jebedi asopo Jems lapen Jems akorte Jon, (Jisu la banghini aphan Bonerges pusi amen irlo; Labangso alam atheke sining kangder asonthak thak amonit, puhelo.)
Andriu lapen Philip, Bartholomeu lapen Mathiu, Thomas lapen Alpheus asopo Jems, Thadeus lapen Kanaan a-Simon,
lapen Jisu aphan hotur arideng kehodai abang, Judas Iskariot.
Ansi Jisu ahem chedamlo. Lapen puthot armu ake-ongpi atum chingrumlo. Lasi Jisu lapen asangho atum an kechoji anta apor longledet-lo.
Jisu ahem asangho atum la arjulongsi alangliphan kekhangjisi vang-lo; pima monit atum, “Alangli ke ingchamlo,” pusi Jisu aphan puhurlo.
Jerusalem pen kevang manene aron thekser atum pulo, “Alangli Beelzebul pu ahi-i pholok-lo; lapen alangli hi-i atum aphan kephlungji aphan hi-i atum arechosi alangliphan jakong pilo.”
Lasi Jisu halatum aphan amethang adung chehangsi lamlir hei hei pen pulo, “Kopusi Soitanle Soitan aphan phlung unjima?
Lapen isi arat abe abe dosi charvolote, labangso arat ke do thekthedetji.
Lapen ihum ahem amonit atum abe abe dosi halatum angbong chebohong lote, labangso ahem ke thirthedetji.
Lasi Soitanta amethang abe chethursi abe abe dolote, alangli dover thekthedetji, bonta la jutdetji.
“Jakong kangtangrak abang aphan kok paphrangphrete, la jakong kangtangrak abang ahem lut dam un-e, lapen amar atar thipon un-e; bonta alangliphan kokdet aphisi ahem kuruk pon-unji.
“Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, monit atum apap an lapen Arnam aphan kepinrem apot anta diyadetji,
bonta badutame, Karjong Kangthir aphan pinrem lote, alangli kaiketa diya longledetji, pima alangli kaiketa diya kelong un-epin apap klemtang-lo.”
Manene atum Jisu aphan, “Alangli kangthirthe ahi-i pholok-lo,” pu kepu apotsi Jisu labangso alam pulo.
Ansi Jisu apei lapen akorte atum hadak nanglelo. Halatum hem angtan arjapphrongsi Jisu aphan pahangdamtoilo.
Armu atum Jisu aphan komsarsi ingniphrong-lo, lapen halatum alangliphan pulo. “Langtha, nangli pei, nangli korte atum lapen nangli ingjir atum ingtansi do, lapen halatum nangliphan rilo.”
Alangli halatum aphan thakdunsi pulo. “Nepei lapen nekorte atum komatma?”
Alangliphan komsarsi kangniphrong atum aphan alangli talavir langsi pulo. “Langtha, neli pei lapen neli korte atum ke latumhelo.
Ne-Po kepaklemtoi ateng keklem abang aling helo neli korte, neli ingjir lapen nelipeilo.”

Jisu puthot talo akung lam kethanji pangcheng-lo. Armu ake-ongpi atum alangli long chingrumlo. Lasi alangli telong chethapsi ingnilo, lapen talo akung pen asapso akehelo an dodamlo, lapen armu kadokave atum ke talo akung lang areisi arjapphrong-lo.
Alangli halatum aphan lamlir pen penang alam thanlo.
Alangli thansi pulo. “Arjutha! Ahut isi inut amonit chili kerikjisi damlo.
Alangli chili rik-lo, lapen penang achili ke tovar akungsi klolo, lapen vo atum vangsi la chongthok-et-lo.
Lapen penang achili ke longpak athaksi klolo. Hadak alongle kedo asapnat-lo. Hala mamat la arong vang-lo, pima lake alongle kedo ing-ar-olo.
Ansi arni vang-lo, lapen sok aklim angkur kedam arnuk-o-edet apotsi arni angtang pen ajok la thikhrailo.
Penang achili ke ingsu kethe ajosi klolo, lapen ingsu arong thesi labangso aklim aphan pet-het-lo, lapen la athe pathethedet-lo.

Bonta penang achili ke longle keme ajosi klolo. La arong vang-lo lapen arong thesi athe pathe-olo. Arong pen arong ke thomkep, arong pen arong ke throk-kep lapen arong pen arong ke pharo anta athe pathelo.”
Lapen alangli pulo. “Karjuji ano kedo abang parjunang.”
Jisu inutpet kedo ahut alangli long kedo atum hala bang krehini atum pen pen vang-lo, lapen lamlir alam athe hei hei kechinijisi alangliphan arjulo.
Jisu halatum aphan thakdunsi pulo. “Arnam a-Rat alamjir akepatu alam nangtum aphan nangpitang-lo, bonta hala ingtan kedo atum an aphan ke lamlir pensi kadokave alamta putang-lo.
Lasi,
‘Latum langbom langbom setta thek-longle,
latum arjubom setta chinine.
Lapu kali asonte, latum aning chiruisi,
Arnam pen diya longji apot-lo.’ ”
Ansi Jisu halatum aphan arjulo, “Nangtum labangso alamlir chininema? Tangte nangtum kopusi akaprek alamlir chinijima?
Chili kerik abang ke Arnam alamsi rik-lo.
Penang amonit atum ke tovar akung keklo achili asonthak thak-lo. Halatum la kepachethang alam karjulong pen mamat Soitan vangsi halatum aning arlo kerik alam an ponpo.
Lasonthak thaksi akaprek penang atum ke hala longpak athak keklo achili asonthot-lo. Halatum la kepachethang alam karjulong pen mamat aning arong pen la dengpo;
bonta halatum angkur kedam arnuknedet apotsi malomso ahut ansi la dochotpo. Ansi labangso alam pen apot kesung, kalite, kechenek vang-lote, halatum hala mamat la obuppo.
Lapen akaprek atum ke ingsu arong kethe ajo keklo achili asonthak thak-lo. Latum la kepachethang alam arjupo,
bonta labangso akai aningbi hei hei, lapen keplang kar-i lapen akaprek kaprek ason akar-i dosi kepachethang alam aphan petthippo, lapen la athe pathethedetpo.

Bonta akaprek atum ke longle keme ajo keklo achili asonthak thak-lo. Latum la kepachethang alam arjupo, lapen dengpamesi athe pathepo. Abang pen abang ke thomkep, abang pen abang ke throk-kep, lapen abang pen abang ke pharo anta athe pathepo.”
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Melur vansi hoton arum, kalite hongplang arum bijima? Lake melur archok athaksi batji, kalima?
Kepatu amar an aphan paklangdetji, lapen kedip ason an aphan paklangdakji.
Karjuji ano kedo abang parjunang!”
Alangli halatum aphan puthulo, “Nangtum karjulong alam matha-pamenon. Nangtum keteng atengthotsi nangtum aphanta tengthudetji, lapen nangtum aphan la apar ta pithudetji.
Pima mar kedo abang aling aphan ansose pithudetji, lapen thangta kavedet abang pen do-an amarta thiponthudetji.”
Jisu puthulo, “Arnam a-Rat lapuson helo: Inut amonit amethang arit ajo chili rik-lo.
Ajo anerlota, alangli amek jang-lotsi do tame kalite thurphlutsi do settame, chili ke arong vangsi thelo. Bonta la kopusonsi plang-loma, lake alangli chinidundelo.
Longle amethangsi la aklim aphan pathebomsi athe padolo; aphrangsi ke la arong vangsi chingjok-lo, ansi la philo, lapen aphisi ke la athe pathelo.
Bonta sok athe mensi alangli nokek rangso pen la kerotji pangcheng-lo; pima sok kerot apor nangletang-lo.”
Jisu arjusi pulo, “Etum Arnam a-Rat aphan kopi pensi pangbar unjima? Kalite kopi alamlir pensi than pajirmidamjima?
Lake hanjang amu asonlo. Longle athak kerik ahut ke la pirthe athak kadokave amu apar bimulo.
Bonta rikdet aphi la arong vangsi han arong an angbong kethenei arong plangpo, lapen la aro kethe kethe dopo. Lasi nampi avo atum vangsi labangso aro along atar chepatarpo.”
Lasonthak thak akaprek kaprek penang alamlir pensi Jisu halatum aphan pachethang-lo. Alangli halatum kechini unchit alamsi thanlo.
Alangli lamlir penpete halatum aphan thanthedet-lo; bonta bang kaprek atum kavedet ahut ke alangli amethang asangho atum aphan kadokave alamta than pachinidak-lo.
Halabangso arni, arni kangsam ahut Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan pulo. “Ili ha parai damlonang.”
Halatum armu atum pen chekaksi Jisu kechethap atelong along hala-tumta chethapdunlo, lapen halatum alangliphan ponlo, lapen akaprek atelongso atumta alangli long dunlo.
Ansi tomon thepi vangphlut-lo, lapen lang angsum thursi telong aphan arvakthip-lo. Lasi halabangso ahut telong ke lang pen plengrang-lo.
Jisu ke telong aphi akandar anat puhui chepuhuisi amek jang-lot-lo. Ansi halatum alangliphan ingthursi pulo. “Kuru, netum virklungpo pu nang mathathema?”
Jisu amek prangsi thurlo, lapen tomon aphan ingchek-lo, lapen talo aphan pulo, “Dojoinon, huriri!” Anke tomon hamsi ingsamklip-lo.
Ansi Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan pulo. “Nangtum kopi apotsi phere loma? Nangtum akekroi avelangma?”
Bonta halatum jasemet pherelo, lasi halatum lahin lahin chepulo, “Labangso amonit komatma? Tomon lapen talota alangli lam kroilo.”
Ansi Jisu lapen asangho atum Galili atalo parai lelo. Lake Geresa atum adet-lo.
Jisu telong pen keche-o pen mamat kangthirthe ahi-i kepho abang thiri ajo pen vangsi alangli pen chetong-lo.
Labangso abang thiri ajosi dolo, lapen anpar ke alangliphan baduta kok un-edet-lo, ingchin ani pen anta kok un-edet-lo.

Pima alangliphan abatai batai ingchin ani pen ari lapen akeng kok-lo setta alangli ari along kekok angchin arri ke vung prop propdet titi, lapen akeng along kekok angchin arri ke turpong pongdet titilo. Baduta labangso abang aphan kekhangji ajakong avedet-lo.
Labangso abang ajo anerlota thiri ajo lapen inglong ajosi dolo, lapen kaiketa hangkong-lo, lapen arlong pen amethang abang chesirilo.
Labangso abang Jisu aphan achar pen thek-longsi alanglidung katvirlo, lapen Jisu aphan ardomkhrupsi,
lapen hangcharbusi pulo, “Kangtuinei Arnam a-Sopo, Jisu! Nang nelong kopi akam doma? Arnam amen pen ne nangphan choningrilo, nang nephan pasungri.”
Pima Jisu labangso abang aphan pulo. “Kangthirthe ahi-i, nang labangso amonit along pen nangbarnon!”
Jisu alangliphan arjulo. “Nang men kopilo?” Labangso abang chethakdunsi pulo, “Nemen ke Legion puhelo; pima netum do-olo.”
Alangli Jisu aphan jasemet choningrisi pulo. “Netum aphan labangso ahavar pen netoiri.”
Hadak inglong athak ake-ongpi aphak ahur chopanlo.
Hi-i atum alangliphan choningrisi pulo. “Netum hala phak ahur along kelutdamjile netum aphan netoinon.”

Lasi alangli halatum aphan hadak kedamji ahukum tholo. Kangthirthe ahi-i atum halabangso amonit pen nangbarsi phak ahur along lutdamlo. Halabangso aphak ahur ke jon suri hini anbak dolo. Labangso aphak ahur inglong kangcheng anat ingplongphitsi talo along klodamlo lapen latum hadak jangkoilo.
Phak kevi atum katvirsi rongsopi lapen rit ajo labangso abirta than pachethang damlo. La keplangtang alam kopima pusi monit atum langdamlo.
Halatum Jisu adung vangsi, hala hi-i, atheke Legion kepho abang kangnilun lapen pe chepindengsi aning binong pen kedo thek-long-lo; lapen halatum pherehurlo.
La kethekdunlong atum rat atum aphan hala hi-i kepho abang alamjir lapen phak alamjirta than pajirmilo.
Lasi halatum Jisu aphan halatum alongri kepa-oji aphan choningrilo.
Hala hi-i kepho abang Jisu along kedunjisi, Jisu telong kechethap ahut Jisu aphan choningrilo.

Bonta alangli kroikredet-lo. Alangli pulo. “Nangli methang ahem chedamra, Hemphu nangliphan kopi klemtang-loma, lapen alangli nangliphan ko-an ingjinso loma, lale nangli methang adon arap atum aphan thandam non.”
Lasi alangli damlo, lapen Jisu alangliphan keklemtang akam an alam Dekapolis alongri than pachethang-lo, lapen la karjulong atum an manghuphrong-lo.
Jisu telong pen talo hapu parai chedamthulo, lapen armu ake-ongpi atum alangli long chingrumlo. Alangli talo akungsi dolo.
Ansi Jairos pu inut sinagog kechepahemphu abang hadak vang-lo, lapen alangli Jisu aphan thek-longsi alangliphan ardomkhrup-lo,
lapen jasemet choningrisi pulo. “Ne sopi bihek abang thiji dok dok-lo. La nesopi kerengjile vang-ra aphu athak nangli ri battha.”
Ansi Jisu alangli long dunlo, lapen armu ake-ongpi atum alangli phi phi dunsi alangliphan petkling-lo.
Hadak ningkan krehini pen avi kebuver arloso dolo.
Sekelang penang atum labangpi aphan se lang-olo, lapen labangpi kedo an atangkata chepi-et-lo setta alangli kemeji kali keso nangtanthu muchot-lo.
Labangpi Jisu alam arjulongsi alangli phi anat pen armu angbong vangsi ape ade ot-lo.
Pima alangli pulo, “Ne ape anle ot-long anta ne mepo.”
Lapen hala mamat alangli vi kebu hamdet-lo, lapen alangli keso metang-lo pu amethang chechinilo.
Hala mamat Jisu ajakong damtang-lo pu alangli chechinilo. Lasi alangli armu angbong chetevarsi pulo, “Ne pe komatsi nangke-ot-loma?”
Jisu asangho atum alangliphan pulo, “Armu atum nangliphan nangpetkling-lo, lake nangta thek-long-lo. Tangte nangphan matsi ot-loma pu nang kopusi kepulangma?”
Bonta la matsi klemloma, la kechinijisi Jisu talavir langbomlo.
Bonta labangpi aphan kopi plang-tang-loma, la chechinisi labangpi pherelo, lapen a-ok klemhur pensi vang-lo, lapen alangli ingno domkhrupsi ahok alam an than-et-lo.
Jisu labangpi aphan pulo, “Nangli akekroi kedo apotsi nangli medet-lo, pei! Damra ningkangsam penle donon. Nangli keso pen me pametang-lo.”
Jisu la keningje un ahut Jairos ahem pen manene atum vangsi pulo, “Nangli sopi thitang-lo. Kopisi la kuru aphan pasiksak bomlangma?”
Bonta Jisu halatum keningje alam thangta arjujedetsi Jairos, atheke sinagog kechepahemphu abang aphan pulo, “Phereri, kroile kroinon.”
Ansi Jisu, Pitor, Jems lapen Jems akorte Jon aphan apar ke badu aphanta alangli long padun longledet-lo.
Halatum la sinagog kechepahemphu abang ahem nanglesi hadak kehorisei lapen ase kethe pen kechiru keteram Jisu thek-long-lo.
Alangli hem arlo lutdamsi halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum kehorisei lapen kechiru athe kopima? Labangso a-osopi ke kethi kali, ameksi kejangchot!”
Halatum Jisu aphan ingnekchoilo. Bonta alangli hala kadokave atum aphan ingtan nangtoi-et-lo, lapen halabangso a-osopi apei, apo lapen amethang asangho atum aphan cheponsi oso kedo angdeng lutdamlo.
Alangli halabangso a-osopi ari otsi pulo. “Talitha Kum!” Labangso alam atheke “Ne nangphan pulo, kaso, thurnon!” puhelo.
Hala mamat halabangso a-osopi thursi kengkam chejorlo. Pima alangli arta ningkan krehini an dolo. Lapen hala mamat halatum kematha abidi jutdet khangjang-lo.
Lapen badu aphanta labangso alam thanri pusi Jisu halatum aphan hukum pi pasodak-lo. Lapen halabangso a-osopi aphan kopine kecho ahormu pitha pusi alangli halatum aphan pulo.
Jisu hadak pen nangbarsi amethang arong chevang-lo, lapen asangho atum alangli long dunlo.

Sabbath Arni alangli sinagog along lam kethanji pangcheng-lo. Hadak monit do-olo, lapen alangli kethan alam arjulongsi halatum manghuphrong-lo. Lasi halatum pulo. “Labangso abang lahei hei alam konatsi long-loma? Alangliphan kopi agiansi pitang-loma? Alangli kopusi la kemanghumeme akam hei hei klemloma?

Labangso abang ke hala kapat akimbang-lo, kalima? Alangli ke Meri asopo lapen Jems, Joseph, Judas lapen Simon akortelo, kalima? Lapen alangli ingjir atum ke ladak etum alongsi dolo, kalima?” Lasi halatum alangliphan chakchedet-lo.
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Arnam amontri ke kadokave adimta aman do, bonta amethang arong, adon arap, lapen ahem asangho atum angbong ke aman ave.”
Hadak keso manene atum aphu athak alangli ari batsi halatum aphan kepame pen apar ke thangnat kemanghumeme akamta klem un-edet-lo.
Halatum akekroi kave apot alangli manghuhak-lo.
Ansi alangli hadak tebok terei arong damsi lam thandamlo.
Alangli amethang asangho atum aphan amethang adung chehang-lo, lapen halatum aphan bang hini ni pajalangsi toilo, lapen kangthirthe ahi-i aphan kephlungji ajakong pilo.
Alangli halatum aphan hukum pisi pulo, “Nangtum chin pen apar ke thangta ponri: him tame, jamborong tame, kalite tangka athia arlo poisa settame, nangtum ponri.
Bonta keng-op chethonnon, lapen choi asele cheponri.”
Lapen alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum nohok adimle dam settame, halabangso adim pen barbe tik ke nangtum kelutdam ahemle donon.

Jongsi nangtum elong adim vangsi monit atum nangtum aphan chakchelo, lapen nangtum alam arjujelo tangte, hadak pen barra, halatum angno nangtum akengpak aduk cheho tekangnon. Lake halatum aphan kepacheretoi aphanlo.”
Ansi halatum barsi monit atum pap pen aning kecherui nangji alam than pachethang-lo.
Halatum penang ahi-i phlung-lo, lapen keso amonit penang atum aphan jangthu patipsi keso pamelo.

Herod recho la kadokave alam arjulong-lo; pima Jisu anong bithe bithata chethangphlup-lo. Manene atum pulo, “Jon Baptistsi rengthulo, lasi alangli la kemanghumeme akam hei hei keklemji ajakong long-lo”.
Bonta akaprek atum pulo, “Alangli ke Elijahlo.” Lapen akaprek atum pulo, “Alangli ke Arnam amontri inut-lo, hakoko ahut Arnam amontri atum asonthak thak inut Arnam amontrilo.”
Herod labangso alam arjulongsi pulo, “Alangli ke Jon Baptist-lo. Ne labangso abang angphun pangthantang-lo. Bonta non alangli rengthutang-lo.”

Pima amethang amat toisi Jon aphan panep-lo, lapen ingchin ani pen pakoksi phatek pabeng-lo. Akorte akebi, Philip apiso Herodias pen apotsi Herod alangliphan lapuson klemlo. Pima Herod labangpi aphan enlo.
Atheke Jon Baptist Herod aphan pulo, “Nangli nangli korte apiso aphan en kertang.”
Lasi Herodias Jon aphan aning solo, lapen alangliphan kepathiji aning hang-lo, bonta un-edet-lo.

Pima Herod Jon aphan pherebomlang, atheke Jon ke dhoromi lapen ingthir-et amonit-lo pu alangli chinilo. Lasi Herod alangliphan raibomlang. Alangli Jon alam arju long-lote aning siksakpik titilo setta alangli lam karjuji aning dok-lo.

Aphisi Herodias asoi keme long-lo. Atheke Herod amahang kethek arni chojun amei bisi detpangri amonit thedung atum aphan, chedanbang ahemphu atum aphan lapen Galili adet thedung amonit atum aphan phalo.
Halabangso ahut Herodias asopi hem arlo damsi kanlo, lapen Herod lapen alohi atum aning dok-hurlo. Lasi alangli halabangso a-osopi aphan pulo, “Nang ning kehang alingle hangnon, ne la nangpipo.”
Alangli seme tangsi pulo, “Ne seme tangsi pulo, nang nerat achitimle hang setta, ne la nangphan nangpidetpo.”
Labangpi ingtan damsi apei aphan charjudamlo, “Ne kopisi hang nangjima?”
Herodias thakdunsi pulo, “Jon Baptist aphu.”
Hala mamat halabangso a-osopi recho along damseraksi pulo, “Jon Baptist aphu non mamat kasu pen vanra nepinon; ne ning kehang lahelo.”
La arjulongsi recho aning aduk doparlo, setta alangli seme tang-lo apotsi lapen alohi atum pen apotsi kroikre haihedet-lo.
Lasi alangli hala mamat keton aron-aso inut aphan toisi Jon aphu kevanji ahukum pilo.
Chedanbang abang ingtan damsi phatek arlo Jon angphun ingthan damlo, lapen kasu pen aphu vansi halabangso a-osopi aphan pilo, lapen osopike apei aphan la pidamlo.
Jon asangho atum labangso alam arjulongsi hadak vang-lo, lapen abang arpum ponsi atipit along bidamlo.
Ansi ketoitang atum nangchevoisi Jisu along chingrumpet-lo, lapen halatum keklemtang akam an lapen kethantang alam an alangliphan thanlo.

Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Etum konatne kangsamri, monit kavedet adim damlonang; hadak nangtumta malomso sanglongpo.” Pima hadak kehelatpit atum do-o apotsi halatum an kechoji apor anta longledet-lo.
Lasi halatum telong pen kangsamri adim kedamjisi barlo.

Ake-ongpi amonit atum halatum nangkebar thekdunlong-lo, lapen halatum aphan chinilo; lasi kadokave arongsopi pen vangsi kekat pen halatum hadak dam patenolo, lapen Jisu lapen asangho atum aphan apar alanglitum hadak le paphrang-lo.

Jisu telong pen che-osi armu ake-ongpi atum aphan thek-long-lo, lapen halatum aphan ingjinsosi aning munduk-lo, pima halatum kevi abang kavedet abiresak atum asonthak thak-lo, lapen alangli halatum aphan penang alam kethanji pangcheng-lo.
Anke apor do-olo apotsi Jisu asangho atum alangli long vangsi pulo, “Ladak ke monit kavedet adimlo, lapen aporta do-olo.
Lasi latum aphan padamnon. Hala adung arei arong hei hei along lapen arit along padamra halatum amethang methang kechoji aphan kopinene amar pachonamdam lonang.”

Bonta alangli halatum aphan thakdunsi pulo, “Latum kechoji aphan nangtumle kopine pinon,” Jisu thak-lo. Halatum alangliphan pulo, “Netum denari pharo hini ador an ahim namdamsi latum aphan pacho nangjima?”
Bonta alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum along him plang ko-an do? Damra langdamtha!”
Halatum langdamsi pulo, “Him plang pho lapen ok jonni do.”
Ansi kadokave amonit atum bap kereng ajo kangni chom chomji aphan alangli hukum pilo.
Halatum bang pharo, lapen bang phokep, lason jalangsi ingnichom chomlo.

Alangli him plang pho lapen ok jonni enlo, lapen sining anat langdingsi ahirjume hang-lo. Lapen him beng-lo, lapen la asangho atum aphan pisi monit atum aphan parontoilo. Ok jonnita alangli kadokave amonit atum aphan paronlo.
Halatum la chosi ingkrangpet-lo.
Lapen halatum ke-ik un-e ahim lapen a-ok ahin pangrumsi ton krehini papleng-lo.
Hala him kecho atum aphai pinso amonit bang suri pho dolo.
Jisu hala mamat amethang asangho atum aphan telong pachethapsi hapu parai, Bethsaida arongsopi anat padam patenobomlo. Lapen alangli methang ke armu atum aphan ahem pachedamtoilo.
Alangli halatum pen chekaksi Arnam kardomdamji aphan inglong arludamlo.
Arni kangsam ahut Telong ke talo angbongsi dolo, lapen alangli methang ke talo akungsi inutpet dolo.

Jisu asangho atum telong vekbom vekbomsi dukpik-lo, lake Jisu thek-long-lo. Pima halatum aphan tomon khang-lo. Lasi alangli voku anbak apor ahut talo athak kengkam chejorsi halatum anat vang-lo. Alangli halatum aphan kelitphlotjisi mathalo.
Bonta halatum Jisu aphan talo athak kengkam kechejor thek-longsi, alangliphan chamburukso tinkok-lo, lapen hangjolo.
Pima kadokave atumta alangliphan thek-longsi pherelo. Bonta hala mamat alangli ningjesi halatum aphan pulo, “Ning thirklong non; ne lema, phereri!”
Ansi Jisu halatum along telong chethapdunlo, lapen tomon hamdet-lo. La thek-longsi Jisu asangho atum manghuphrong-lo,
pima bang suri pho amonit atum aphan him kepacho alam athe halatum chininelang; halatum aning buikluihak-huk-lo.
Halatum talo kapsi Gennesaret alongri nanglelo. Hadak latum telong kokdong-lo.
Halatum telong pen keche-o ahut pen mamat monit atum Jisu aphan chinilo.
Lasi halatum halabangso alongri bithe bitha adim damserak-lo; lapen Jisu hadaksi do pu karjulong alingsi alangli long keso atum aphan amethang atar pen rungponlo.

Lapen alangli kedam aling, rong tame, rongsopi tame, rit-lo tame, halatum keso atum aphan hithi adim bisi, halatum alangli pe abu anchot setta kepa-ot longji aphan choningrilo. Lapen la ke-ot atum an medet-lo.
Jerusalem pen kevang manene a-Pharisi lapen aron thekser atum Jisu along vangsi chingrumlo.
Ansi Jisu asangho atum kangthirthe ari pen, atheke ari charsamsesi an kecho halatum thek-long-lo.
Pima Pharisi lapen akaprek a-Jihudi atumta aphusar atum a-ove ove pen kevanbon aron kroilo: atheke, ari charsam pamemete choche,

lapen hithi pen kevan amarta cham paphrang det matik ke choche, lapen la aparta halatum hako ahut pen kelong akaprek kaprek aronta kroilo, atheke harlung, langbong lapen bongkati hei hei champame nangji.
Lasi Pharisi lapen aron thekser atum alangliphan arjulo, “Nangli sangho atum ke kopi apotsi ephusar atum kebitekang aron kroikresi keche-pangthirthe ari pen an cho loma?”
Jisu halatum aphan thakdunsi pulo, “Isaiah nangtum alamjir kemontri alam ahok binong-lo. Atheke alangli ketok asonthotsi nangtum ke nangning ke-ik atumlo! Atheke alangli tok-lo,
‘Labangso amonit atum angtur pen nenong pathelo,
bonta halatum aning ke ne pen heloving-lo.
Halatum nephan kangduk thang ale avelo,
pima halatum monit atum kepinchongchot aronsi Arnam aron asonthak thak thanlo!’
“Nangtum Arnam ahukum osi monit atum a-ove ove pen kevanjir aron kroibomlo.”
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum a-ove ove pen kevanjir aron kekroiji aphan nangtum resakjaksi Arnam ahukum kroikre pamelo.
Pima Moses pulo, ‘Nangpi, nangpo aphan aman pinon; lapen apo, kalite apei aphan kangton abang aphan ke pathilot nangji.’
Bonta inut amonit jongsi apo kalite apei aphan kerapji aphan kopine amar dolo setta ‘Lake Kurbanlo,’ (Labangso alam atheke, Lake Arnam aphan kepanongtang adan, puhelo), pule pulote
alangli ke api-apo atum aphan rap-redet-ta chok-lo pusi nanglitum thanlo.
Lasonsi nangtum a-ove ove pen kevanjir aron bang atum aphan kethan pen ajok Arnam alam thangta kalidet paplang-lo. Lasonthak thak nangtum keklem akam akaprekta do-olo.”
Ansi Jisu armu atum aphan amethang adung puthot hangsi halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum kadokaveta nelam arjura, chinitha.
Ingtan pen monit arlo damsi alangliphan kepangthirthedet un amar thangta ave. Bonta monit arlo pen ingtan nangkebar amar hei heisi monit aphan pangthirthelo.
Ano kedo abang parjunang.”
Jisu armu atum pen chekaksi hem arlo damdet aphi asangho atum labangso alamlir athe kopima pusi alangliphan arjulo.
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Tangte nangtumta thangta chininelangma? Ingtan pen monit arlo kelutdam amar ke alangliphan pangthirthedet un-e, lake nangtum chininelangma?
Pima ingtan pen kelut amar ke aning arlo kali, bonta apok arlosi dampo, lapen la abang pen nangbarthupo.”
Alangli puthulo, “Monit arlo pen nangkebar amarsi alangliphan pangthirthelo.
Pima arlo pen, atheke monit aning arlo pensi kehingno akematha nangbarlo: lapen lasi beisa, chonghu, pran ke-en, bang apiso kalite apenan pen beisa kecheklem,
mek plengple, kehingno akam, kechobei, kechelang un-e, anong kejo, ane kechepathe, kelu hei hei plang-lo.
La kehingno ason an monit arlo pensi nangbar lapen la alangliphan pangthirthelo.”
Ansi Jisu thursi Tair arongsopi adung kedo alongri damlo. Alangli komane ahem lutdamlo, lapen baduta la kechininedetjisi alangli ning hang-lo, bonta alangli chepatujoi un-edet-lo.
Inut arloso alangli lamjir arjulong-lo. Labangpi asopi hi-i pholok-lo. Lasi alangli la karjulong pen mamat alangli kengri domkhrup-lo.
Bonta labangpi ke Grik adet kedo Sairophonik asorlo. Labangpi asopi along pen hi-i kepaphlungjisi alangli Jisu aphan choningrilo.
Ansi Jisu labangpi aphan pulo, “Aphrangke osomar atum aphan pangkrang longtha, pima osomar atum ahim ensi la methan atum aphan kevar ke mesen kali.”
Bonta labangpi thakdunsi pulo, “Lake ahok-lo, Hemphu; bonta hong-plang arum kedo amethan atum ke osomar atum along pen keklo a-an choresi chobomlo!”
Lasi Jisu labangpi aphan pulo, “Labangso alam pen apot-le chevoinon; nangsopi pen hi-i nangbartang-lo!”
Ansi labangpi ahem chedamlo, lapen thek-long-lo, asopi ke kepa-i adimsi ijoilo, lapen alangli long pen hi-i nangbar binong-lo.
Ansi Jisu Tair arongsopi kethe tebok terei alongri pen nangbarlo, lapen Sidon alongri lapen Dekapolis alongri dongponputsi Galili atalo an vang-lo.
Penang amonit atum alangli long inut ano kangthong lapen alam kave amonit aphan vanlo, lapen labangso abang athak Jisu ari kepabatji aphansi halatum alangliphan choningrilo.
Jisu halabangso amonit aphan armu angbong pen inutpet ponsi ari chimun pen ano hilolo chut-lo, lapen ingthe ingthoksi ade ot-lo.
Jisu sining anat langdingsi ar-emlo, lapen halabangso amonit aphan pulo, “Ephphatha.” Labangso alam atheke, “Chingpunon,” puhelo.
Hala mamat labangso amonit ano arjulong-lo, lapen ade kerapta chephridet-lo, lapen alangli lam ningje pamethek-lo.
Ansi labangso alam badu aphanta thanri pusi Jisu monit atum aphan hukum pilo; bonta alangli thanri pu-ong halatum ansose than pachethang thu-ong-lo.
Labangso alam karjulong atum anta jasemet manghuphrongsi pulo, “Alangli kadokave klem pamelo; ano kangthong atum aphanta ano parjulong-lo, lapen alam kave atum aphanta alam paning-jethek-lo!”
Halabangso ahut ake-ongpi armu atum hadak chingrumthulo. Halatum kechoji aphan thangta avedet-lo. Lasi Jisu asangho atum aphan amethang adung chehangsi pulo,
“Ne la armu atum aphan ingjinsosi neningduk-lo, pima halatum nelong nangkedodun nithom dotang-lo, lapen nonke halatum kechoji aphan thangta avelo,
lapen ne halatum aphan thang pachochepin pen ahem toilote, halatum tovar ebeng a-ok ainitisi klibupji tahai, atheke halatum penang atum ke heloving pensi vang-lo.”
Asangho atum Jisu aphan thakdunsi pulo, “Komatsi ladak kejejangtang ajole la kadokave atum kechoji aphan kedorphlup a-an longthek poma?”
Ansi Jisu halatum aphan arjulo, “Nangtum along him plang ko-an doma?”
Halatum pulo, “Plang throksi.”

Armu atum longle athak kangniji aphan Jisu hukum pilo. Alangli him plangthroksi enlo, lapen Arnam aphan kero pisi la beng-lo; lapen armu atum aphan keparonjisi la sangho atum aphan pilo, lapen halatum la armu atum aphan ronlo.
Halatum along oksota asapso dolo. Jisu Arnam aphan kero pisi lata rontu pusi asangho atum aphan pulo.
Halatum la chosi ingkrangpet-lo, lapen ahim achet ahin humsi halatum ton throksi papleng-lo.
Hadak bang suri phli anbak amonit dolo.
Ansi Jisu hala monit atum aphan toilo. Lapen hala mamat alangli amethang asangho atum pen telong chethapsi Dalmanutha alongri damlo.

Manene a-Pharisi atum Jisu along vangsi alangli pen lam kechedanji pangcheng-lo. Halatum alangliphan asat kelangji aning hang-lo; lasi alangli jakong sining pensi vang-lo pu angthek paklangtha pusi halatum alangliphan pulo.

Alangli aning aduk pen achethepi chetiphunsi pulo, “Kopi apotsi labangso a-oveke kemanghumeme akam angthek riverloma? Chenamsi neli nanglitum aphan nangpulang: labangso a-ove aphan thangnat akemanghumeme akam angthekta paklangkledetji.”
Ansi alangli halatum aphan otekang-lo, lapen telong chethapsi talo hapu parai damjuilo.
Jisu asangho atum him ponteng-nedet-lo. Telong arlo halatum along him kedo eplangnat-lo.
Jisu halatum aphan pacheretoisi pulo, “Pharisi atum athap lapen Herod athap aphan langpamera cherenon.”
Ansi halatum angbong lam chethanseisi pulo, “Ilitum along him avedet apotsi alangli la pulo.”
Jisu halatum kepu alam chinilo. Lasi alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum kopi apotsi nangtum along him kavedet alamle chethanseiloma? Nangtum non anta thek-longle lapen chinidunde langma?
Nangtum nangmek do setta thek-longlema? Nangtum ano do setta arjulonglema?
Hala him plangpho bengsi la bang suri pho amonit atum aphan pidet aphi nangtum labangso ahim achet ahin humsi ton ko-an papleng-loma?”
Halatum pulo, “Ton krehini.”
Jisu halatum aphan puthulo, “Lapen hala him plang throksi bengsi la bang suri phli amonit aphan pidet aphi nangtum ahin ahim achet humsi ton ko-an papleng-loma?”
Halatum thakdunsi pulo, “Ton throksi.”
Alangli halatum aphan pulo,
“Nangtum non anta chininelangma?”
Ansi halatum Bethsaida arongsopi vang-lo. Monit atum Jisu along inut amek kave abang aphan vansi, labangso abang aphan ottha pusi choningrilo.
Jisu la hilolo amek kave abang aphan ari otsi rong angtan ponlo; lapen amek along ingthoksi lapen ari bisi arjulo, “Nang kopine thek-long-loma?”
Halabangso amonit aphu chingthursi lang-lo, lapen pulo, “Ne monit thek-long-lo. Halatum thengpi arong nangnak-lo, lapen dambon banlo.”
Jisu puthot labangso amonit amek along ari bat-lo. Nonke labangso amonit langdingsi dolo; alangli mek checharlo, lapen kadokave amarta thek-long pamelo.
Ansi Jisu labangso abang aphan ahem toisi pulo, “Rong anat lutponri.”
Ansi Jisu lapen asangho atum Sijeria Philipi alongri kedo arong hei hei damlo. Halatum tovar kedam un ahut Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan arjusi pulo, “Monit atum nephan komat pusi puma?”
Halatum thakdunsi pulo, “Manene atum pulo, nanglike Jon Baptist-lo; akaprek atum pulo, nanglike Elijahlo; lapen hala akaprek atum pulo, nanglike Arnam amontri inut-lo.”
Bonta alangli halatum aphan arjulo, “Tangte nangtum ke? Nangtum ke nephan komat pusi pujima?”
Pitor thakdunsi pulo, “Nang ke Khristolo.”
Ansi Jisu halatum aphan hukum pisi pulo, “Nangtum badu aphanta la nelamjir thanri.”

Ansi Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan lam kethanji pangcheng-lo, “Monit a-Sopo kesung pho-o nangji; lapen akesar atum lapen kurusar kethe atum, lapen aron thekser atum alangliphan chakchedetji. Alangliphan pathilotji lapen nithom aphi alangli rengthusi thurji.”
Alangli halatum aphan labangso alam than pachinidak-lo. Pitor alangliphan ihi anat ponsi alangliphan kangchekji pangcheng-lo.

Bonta Jisu chetevarsi asangho atum aphan langding-lo, lapen Pitor aphan ingcheksi pulo, “Ne mek angden pen damnon, Soitan! Pima nang Arnam aning kehang akam aphan mathathesi monit aning kehang akam aphansi mathalo.”

Ansi Jisu armu lapen amethang asangho atum aphan amethang adung chehangsi halatum aphan pulo, “Mane abang jongsi nelong kedunji aning hang-lo tangte, alangli amethang aphan chemathathedet-ra, lapen amethang athengparpan cheponra nephi phi nangpadun nang.
Pima amethang apran kechepajokji aning kehang abang aling ke la pangbodetji, bonta ne lapen nebirta keme pen apot amethang apran kepangbodet abang aling ke la chelongji.
Pima mane abang pirthe adang an long-et setta amethang achethe pangbodet-lote, alangli kopi ale doma?
Pima inut amonit kopi pensi amethang achethe chenamthu unjima?

Mane abang jongsi la kekroikre lapen papi a-ove angbong, ne lapen ne kethan alam pen apot therakduk-lo tangte, Monit a-Sopota a-Po adak atur pen lapen kangthir apherangke atum pen kevangji ahut halabangso abang pen apot therakdukji.”
Lapen alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Ne nangtum aphan ahok alamsi pupo, ladak karjapphrong atum angbong manene atum Arnam a-Rat jakong pen kevang thek-longletik ke thithedetji.”
Nithrok aphi Jisu hala Pitor, Jems lapen Jon aphan cheponsi baduta kavedet adim, kangtuiving anglong athak damlo. Halatum angno Jisu arje chepharlolo.
Alangli pekelok klingsi klarbong cheplang-lo; pirthe athak baduta lapuson chok palok thekthe.
Ansi Moses lapen Elijah halatum angno cheklang-lo; halatum Jisu pen lam chingkilo.
Pitor Jisu aphan pulo, “Rabbi, etum ladak kedo ke mesenlo! Netum pharla humthom kimpo. Nangphan ehum, Moses aphan ehum, lapen Elijah aphan ehum kimpipo.”
Pima alangli pisi puloma, lake chininedet-lo; atheke halatum phere-olo.
Ansi inghun ephar thursi halatum aphan binthip-lo, lapen inghun angbong pen ase vangsi pulo, “Lake ne kechinghon a-Sopolo, alangliphan arjuphrongnon.”
Lapen halatum tongsekot pen talavir lang-lo, bonta Jisu aphan apar ke badu aphanta thek-longledet-lo.
Halatum inglong pen nangkehir un ahut Jisu halatum aphan hukum pisi pulo, “Monit a-Sopo kethi pen rengthusi thurthetik-ke nangtum la kethek-long alam badu aphanta thanri.”
Halatum la alangli kepu alam asonthotsi klemlo, bonta kethi pen thurthuji pu alam athe kopima pusi halatum angbong chethanseibomlo.
Ansi halatum alangliphan arjusi pulo, “Aron thekser atum kopi apotsi aphrangke Elijah vang nangji pu puloma?”

Alangli halatum aphan thakdunsi pulo, “Chenamsi Elijah kadokave alam kesikjisi aphrang vangji; bonta Monit a-Sopo kesung pho-o nangji, lapen monit atum alangliphan langremriji pu hastro kopi apotsi puloma?
Tebonta ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, Chenamsi Elijah ke vang-et-tang-lo, lapen hastro alangli lamjir kepu asonthotsi monit atum aning kehang aling alangliphan klemtang-lo.”
Halatum sangho atum along vangsi, armu atum sangho atum aphan kekomjai, lapen aron thekser atum halatum pen lam kechedansei thek-long-lo.
Armu atum Jisu aphan thek-longsi manghuphrong-lo, lapen alangli dung katvirsi kardom chepilo.
Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan arjulo, “Nangtum latum pen kopi alamsi chedanseiloma?”
Armu angbong pen inut abang thakdunsi pulo, “Kuru, neli nangli long neli sopo vanlo, pima alangli hi-i pholoksi lamta ningje un-edet-lo.

Lapen hi-i alangliphan kenep aling hi-i alangliphan longle athak pakrepthor titilo. Anke angho angpip suphlongsi aso pachingkrit titilo, lapen abang chekenghek-titilo. Nangli sangho atum la kepaphlungji aphan neli choningrilo, bonta halatum la phlung un-edet-lo.”

Ansi alangli halatum aphan thakdunsi pulo, “Mai, O kekroikre a-ove! Ne nangtum along kopu ansi nangdodunbom nangjilangma! Ne nangtum aphan kopu ansi ning chepadingbom nangjilangma! Halabangso a-oso aphan nelilong vannon.”
Ansi halatum alangli long labangso a-oso vanlo.
Hi-i ke Jisu aphan kethek-long pen mamat oso aphan heveng-lo, lapen osoke longle athak krepthorlo lapen angho angpip suphlongsi chardak-lo.
Jisu labangso a-oso apo aphan arjulo, “Komantu ahut pensi lason keplang-lo?”
Alangli thakdunsi pulo, “Bihek ahut pen.
Hi-i labangso a-oso aphan kepavirjisi abatai batai me along lapen lang along pakrep-lo. Bonta nangli jongsi un tangte, nelitum aphan ingjinsora neraptha.”
Bonta Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Jongsi un tangte, puha! Kekroi kedo abang ke kadokaveta unlo.”
Hala mamat oso apo abang hangsersi pulo, “Neli kroilo. Neli akekroikre an pavetha.”

Bonta armu atum kekat pen alanglinat kevangbom thek-longsi Jisu hala kangthirthe ahi-i aphan ingcheksi pulo, “O alam kave lapen ano kangthong ahi-i, ne nangphan hukum pilo, nang labangso a-oso pen nangbarnon lapen labangso a-oso along non pen apara lutdamthuri non.”
Halabangso ahi-i hangsersi oso aphan jasemet heveng-lo lapen oso along pen ingtan nangbarlo. Ansi osoke kethitang ason cheplang-lo.
Bonta Jisu labangso a-oso aphan otsi ingthurlo, lapen labangso a-oso thurlo.
Jisu hem arlo damdet aphi asangho atum alangliphan arjusi pulo, “Netum kopi apotsi labangso ahi-i aphan phlung un-edet-loma?”
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Lason ahi-i aphan ke Arnam kardom lapen an-kehum pensi phlung unchotji.”
Jisu lapen asangho atum hadak pen barsi Galili adet dongponputsi damlo, lapen baduta la kechininedetjisi Jisu aning hang-lo. Pima alangli amethang asangho atum aphan thanbomsi pulo.
“Monit a-Sopo aphan monit arideng hodaidetji, lapen halatum alangliphan pathilotji, bonta nithom aphi alangli rengthusi thurji.”
Bonta halatum labangso akethan alam athe chininedet-lo, lapen alangliphan karjujita phereduk-lo.
Ansi halatum Kapernaum arongsopi nanglelo. Hem arlo damdet aphi Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan pulo, “Mo tovar kevang un ahut nangtum kopi alamsi chedansailo?”
Bonta halatum thangta thakdundesi doklip-lo. Pima matsi theneiloma pusi halatum tovar kevang un ahut lam nangchedanseilo.

Jisu ingnisi asangho bangkrehini atum aphan amethang adung chehang-lo, lapen pulo, “Mane abang jongsi kethenei abang keplangji aning hang-lo tangte, alangli kebinei abang, lapen kadokave atum aban cheplang nangji.”
Ansi alangli inut a-oso ensi halatum angno parjap-lo; lapen la aphan arbaksi halatum aphan pulo,
“Badu tame, nemen pen lasonthak thak a-oso inut aphan chak-lote, alangli ke nephan chak-lo; lapen nephan kechak abang aling ke, nephan kali, bonta nephan neketoi abang aphan chak-lo.”
Jon Jisu aphan pulo, “Inut amonit nangmen pen hi-i atum aphan kephlung netum thek-long-lo. Alangli ke netum asong amonit kalilo. Lasi netum alangliphan, ‘Nang lason klemri,’ pusi pulo.”
Bonta Jisu pulo, “Alangliphan khangri. Pima nemen pen kemang-humeme akam keklem abang ke malomsopet aphi nephan kehingno alam puji, lapu kali.
Pima ehotur kalidet abang ke ebelo.
Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, nangtum ke nesangholo apotsi nangtum aphan lang harlung isi nangkepi abang aling ke jonghe setta anong-e longledetji, lapu kali.
“Badutame la nephan kekroi a-osomar angbong pen inutbak aphan pap paklemlote, alangliphan ke achethok along him kekoi-i a-arlong kethe homra talo along varchui memulo.
Lasi nangri jongsi nangphan pap paklemlo tangte, la thanpetnon. Ri hongni pen Chom along, atheke kaita kemepmepin ame herang along kedamnang apar, ri longjong setta chethe angbong kelutdun memu.
Hadak halatum aphan kecho angthan atum kaita thithe, lapen halatum aphan kecho ame kaita mepme.
Lapen nangkeng jongsi nangphan pap paklemlo tangte, la thanpetnon. Nangkeng hongni pen nangphan Chom arlo kevarchor apar, nang keng-longjong setta chethe angbong kelutdunlong memu.
Hadak halatum aphan kecho angthan kaita thithe, lapen halatum aphan kecho ame kaita mepme.
Lapen nangmek jongsi nangphan pap paklemlo tangte, la hekjok-ra varchornon. Nangmek hini pen nangphan Chom arlo kevarchor apar nangmek isipet setta nang chethe angbong kelutdun memu.
Hadak halatum aphan kecho angthan kaita thithe, lapen halatum aphan kecho ame kaita mepme.
“Arnam aphan kethok athok ingti pen kepangthir asonthotsi abangphutin aphanta me pen pangthirji.
“Ingti ke mesen, bonta la lamdak-lo tangte, la aphan kopusonsi padokthuthekjima? Nangtum aning arlo ingti chepadora ning kangsam penle dorap-rapnon.”
Ansi Jisu halabangso adim otekangsi Judia alongri damlo, lapen Jordan hapu parai kap-lo. Armu atum puthot alangli long chingrumdunpet-lo, lapen alangli kai kethan asonthotsi halatum aphan lam thanlo.
Manene a-Pharisi atum Jisu along vangsi alangliphan adai kenepji abidi rilo. Lasi halatum alangliphan arjulo, “Inut amonit apiso chetilongma?”
Jisu halatum aphan thakdunsi pulo, “Moses nangtum aphan kopi ahukumsi pilo?”
Halatum thakdunsi pulo, “Kecheti aloh tok-ra pachetinang pusi Moses pulo.”
Bonta Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum aning kangtang-ong apotsi alangli nangtum aphan labangso aron tok-lo.
Bonta Arnam pirthe kepinchongcheng ahut penta pinso-arlo pinchong-lo.
Labangso apotsi pinso abang api apo che-osi apiso pen dorap-rapji,
lapen latum banghini inutpet plangji. Lasi hala pen apara latum ke banghini dojilang, lapu kali, bonta inutpetpo.
Tangte Arnam kepachortang aling monit la pachekak nangnelo.”
Halatum hem arlo chelutdamthudet aphi sangho atum Jisu aphan labangso alam arjuthulo.
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Badutame, apiso chetira akaprek arloso enthulo tangte, alangli ke aphrang apiso abethursi beisa klemtang-lo.
Lapen badutame, apenan chetira akaprek apinso aphan penan dothulo tangte, labangpi ke beisa klemtang-lo.”
Jisu kepa-otjisi manene amonit atum alangli long osomar vanlo. Bonta Jisu asangho atum halabangso amonit atum aphan ingchek-lo.
Jisu la thek-longsi aning thi-lo, lapen halatum aphan pulo, “Osomar atum aphan nedung pavanglongnon; latum aphan khangri. Pima Arnam a-Rat ke lapuson atum arat-lo.
Ne nangtum aphan ahok alamsi nangpupo, badutame, oso asonthot-le Arnam a-Rat dengde tangte alangli jonghe setta labangso arlo lutdun longledetji.”
Ansi alangli osomar atum aphan arbak-lo, lapen halatum athak ari batsi ahirjume pilo.

Ansi Jisu puthot kedamthujisi hadak pen kebar ahut inut amonit nangkatvirsi Jisu along vang-lo, lapen alangli ingno akengphu patongruisi alangliphan arjulo, “Kuru, nanglike inut mesen amonit-lo; kejut un-e achethe kelongji aphan ne kopi klem nangjima?”
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Nangli neliphan kopisi mesen pu puloma? Arnam inut apar ke baduta mesen kali.
Pran enri, beisa klemri, chonghuri, chobei ahaki piri, pachereiri, nangpi nangpo anong pathenon pu hei hei ahukum an nangli chinipet-lo.”
Ansi alangli Jisu aphan pulo, “Kuru, neli oso chedap ahut penta lahei hei kadokave ahukum kroipet-lo.”

Bonta Jisu alangliphan langding-lo, lapen alangliphan ingjinsosi pulo, “Nangli eson keklem nangji dolang. Damra nangli mar do-an jorra atangka keduk kelak atum aphan pinon, anke sining athak nangli khi dopo, lapen vang-ra neli long nangdunnon.”
Bonta alangli labangso alam arjulongsi amahang jang-ik-lo, lapen aning duksi damjuilo; pima alangli akhi do-olo.
Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan talavir langsi pulo, “Akhi kedo-o atum Arnam a-Rat kelutdun ko-an akesung!”
Sangho atum alangli lam pen apot manghuphrong-lo. Bonta Jisu halatum aphan puthot pulo, “Osomar atum! Arnam a-Rat kelutdun ko-an akesung!
Ka-ut ingprim arme kelut akesung apar keplang-o abang Arnam a-Rat kelutdun sungmu.”
Bonta sangho atum manghudetsi lahin lahin charjulo, “Tangte komatsi jok unjima?”
Jisu halatum aphan langdingsi pulo, “Monit atum ke la un-e tema, bonta Arnam ke un. Arnam ke kadoka-veta klem un.”
Ansi Pitor pulo, “Mathatha, netum kadokave che-o-etsi nang long nangdunlo.”

Jisu pulo, “Ne nangtum aphan ahok alamsi nangpupo, badutame, ne pen apot lapen birta keme pen apot, ahem, kalite akorte, kalite angjirmar atum aphan, kalite api-apo, kalite asomar, kalite arit hei hei keche-otekang abang ke la apar kelong ongthu muchotji.

Alangli labangso akai angbongta aphrang apar phan pharo ahem, lapen akorte, lapen angjirmar, lapen apei, lapen asomar lapen arit longthuji, lapen alangli la hei hei pen pen kechenekta phoji; lapen mo kevangji akai ahut alangli kejut un-e achethe longji.
Bonta non kepaphrang penang atum paphiji, lapen non kepaphi penang atum paphrangji.”

Jisu lapen asangho atum Jerusalem kedamjisi tovar dambomlo, lapen Jisu ke halatum aphrang aphrang damlo. Jisu asangho atum manghuphrong-lo, lapen aphi aphi kedun amonit atum ke pherelo. Alangli puthot asangho bangkrehini atum aphan cheponsi amethang aphan keplangji dok dok alam halatum aphan thanlo.

Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Ili Jerusalem arludampo, lapen Monit a-Sopo aphan kurusar kethe atum lapen aron thekser atum arideng hodaidetpo. Halatum alangliphan ado padosi kepathiji ahukum pipo, lapen alangliphan Jihudi kalidet atum arideng hodaipo.
Halatum alangliphan pinremji, abang athak ingthokji, champre abu pen sapji lapen pathilotji; bonta nithom aphi alangli rengthusi thurji.”
Ansi Jebedi asopo Jems lapen Jon Jisu adung vangsi pulo, “Kuru, netum nang pen kehang aling nang netum aphan nekepijisi netum ning hang-lo.”
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Ne nangtum aphan kopisi nangklempi nangjima?”

Halatum alangphan pulo, “Nang nangmethang adak-atur a-Rat angbong recho anghoi athak kangniji ahut, nang netum aphan nang ar-e anat inut lapen nang arvi anat inut nekepangnilongjisi netum ning hang-lo.”
Bonta Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum kopisi kehang, lake nangtum chinine. Ne kejun aharlung pen nangtum jun unjima? Kalite ne ke-en abaptisom asonthot abaptisom nangtum en-unjima?”
Halatum pulo, “Netum un.”
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Ne kejun aharlung pen nangtum junji, lapen ne ke-en abaptisom asonthot abaptisom nangtum enji,
bonta neke ne ar-e kalite ne arvi anat kepangniji aphan kangvaiji ajakong ave; kesikpitang atum aphansi Arnam labangso adim hei hei pidetji.”
Hala akaprek sangho bangkep atum la arjulongsi Jems lapen Jon aphan aning jangjedung-dang-lo.
Lasi Jisu halatum kadokave aphan amethang adung hangpetsi pulo, “Honghari atum aphan kepangri atum ke halatum aphuthak ajakong do, lapen keja atum hukum kepiji ajakong do pame, lake nangtum chinilo.
Bonta nangtum angbong ke lapuson kalidet nangji. Nangtum angbong badutame hukum kepiji ajakong kedo abang keplangji aning hang-lo tangte, alangli ke nangtum aban plangvek nangji.
Lapen badutame nangtum angbong aphrangsi abang keplangji aning hang-lo tangte, alangli ke kadokave atum aban plangvek nangji.
Chenamsi, Monit a-Sopota bang arideng pen keru kethai kelongjile kevang kali, bonta keru kethaiji, lapen ake-ongpi atum aphan kepajokjisi amethang apran kechepiji aphan vang-lo.”

Ansi halatum Jeriko arongsopi nanglelo. Jisu amethang asangho atum lapen armu ake-ongpi atum pen pen Jeriko arongsopi pen nangkebar ahut Timaeus asopo Bartimais pu inut hilolo amek kave lapen kechohang chorek abang tovar akung ingnilunsi dolo.
Alangli lake Najareth asor a-Jisulo pu arjulongsi ase kethe pen hangsi kepuji pangcheng-lo, “O David asopo, Jisu! Nephan ne-ingjinsotha!”
Ake-ongpi atum alangliphan dojoinon pusi ingchek-lo. Bonta alangli aphrang apar kehang ase pathemuchotsi pulo, “O David asopo, Jisu! Nephan ne ingjinsotha!”
Jisu chingtonkoksi pulo, “Alangliphan ladak vannon.”
Lasi alangliphan hangsi pulo, “Ning cheparongnon, lapen thurnon, alangli nangliphan nangkehang-lo.”
Ansi labangso amonit achoidingpo chevar-tekangphitsi lapen thurjetsi Jisu adung vang-lo.
Jisu labangso abang aphan arjusi pulo, “Neli nangliphan kopisi klem nangjima?”
Amek kave abang thakdunsi pulo, “Kuru, neli nelimek kechecharjisi ning hang-lo.”
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Damnon, nangli methang akekroisi nangliphan pametang-lo.” Lapen hala mamat alangli mek checharlo, lapen alangli Jisu along tovar dunlo.
Halatum Jerusalem arongsopi leji dok dok ahut, atheke Bethphage lapen Bethani arongsopi adung nanglesi Oliv anglong ari ri vang-lo.

Jisu amethang asangho bang hini aphan toisi pulo, “Hala nangtum kepangno arongle damnon, lapen haladak kelut dam pen mamat baduta kardondepinlang agadha aso ejon kekokdong nangtum thek-longpo. Nangtum la phlok-ra ladak vannon.
Lapen komane abang jongsi nangtum aphan, kopi apotsi nangtum la klemloma pule nang arjulote, Hemphu la nangji tangho, lapen prapjin pen nang-chethonthudetji pule thakdunnon.”
Lasi halatum damlo, lapen hem athengno tovar along ejon agadha aso kekokdong thek-long-lo, lapen halatum la phlok-lo.
Ansi hadak karjapphrong atum angbong pen manene atum halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum kopi apotsi labangso agadha aso phlok-loma?”
Jisu halatum aphan kethan asonthotsi halatum thakdunlo, lapen halatum aphan la paponlong-lo.
Halatum labangso agadha aso Jisu along vansi amethang methang ape labangso agadha athak limlo, lapen Jisu la athak ardonlo.
Ake-ongpi atum ke amethang methang ape tovar athak bisi sangjirlo.
Jisu aphrang lapen aphi kedun atum hangjo josi pulo, “Hosana! Hemphu amen pen kevang abang ke ahirjume atheng-lo.
Ephusar David Recho kevangji arat ke ahirjume atheng-lo! Hosana kangtuinei adim!”
Jisu Jerusalem nanglesi Kardom-hemthepi arlo damlo, lapen kadokave amar aphan talavir lang-lo. Bonta arni thihek-lo apotsi alangli amethang asangho atum pen pen Bethani arongsopi damjuilo.
Puthot arni halatum Bethani arongsopi kevang un ahut Jisu an ingchirlo.

Alangli achar pen arvo kedo-o athebo arong thek-long-lo; lapen la athe dojibon pusi langdamlo. Bonta Alangli adung lesi arvo apar thangta thek-longle-det-lo pima lake thebo athe kepathe abotor kalilo.
Ansi Jisu labangso athebo arong aphan pulo, “Non pen apara baduta nangthe kaiketa chochedetji.” Asangho atum labangso alam arjudun long-lo.

Ansi halatum Jerusalem nanglelo. Jisu ke Kardomhemthepi arlo damsi hadak kejor-kenam atum aphan hadak pen kephlungji pangcheng-lo. Alangli tangka kelar atum atebul hei hei lapen vothung kejor atum anghoi hei hei tharlepi-et-lo,
lapen badu aphanta Kardomhemthepi angbong thangnat amarta papon longledet-lo.
Alangli halatum aphan thansi pulo, “Nehemke kadokave adet amonit atum akardom ahem pusi puji pu hastro along tok-lo, kalima? Bonta nangtum lake dokait atum kechepatu alongku pinchongtang-lo.”

Kurusar kethe atum lapen aron thekser atum labangso alam arjulong-lo; lasi halatum alangliphan kepathiji abidi ribomlo, pima armu atum alangli kethan alam pen apot manghuhurlo apotsi halatum alangliphan pherelo.
Arni ingsamtang-lo apotsi halatum rongsopi pen damjuilo.
Puthot adap halatum tovar kedam un ahut halabangso athebo arong angkur penta kethikhrai thek-long-lo.
Pitor hala keplangtang alam chemathathusi pulo, “Kuru, langtha! Nang ahirjuno kepitekang athebo arong ke thikhraitang-lo.”
Jisu halatum aphan thakdunsi pulo, “Arnam aphan kroinon.

Che-namsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, labangso anglong aphan, ‘Cherungkok-ra talo along chevardam-chuinon,’ pu kepu abang aling aning bibera alangli kepu alam plangvekji pule kroilote, lake alangliphan klempidetji.
La apotsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, nangtum kechoningri pen kopine amar kechohang ahut, nangtum la longtang-lo pule kroinon; anke la nangtum aphan nangpidetji.
Lapen nangtum Arnam kardomjisi karjap ahut sining athak kedo nangtum apota nangtum akelet hei hei kediyajile, nangtum komane aputhak abekethur kopine alam do tangte, alangliphan diyanon.
Nangtum jongsi anut kaprek atum aphan diyaje tangte, sining athak kedo nangtum a-Po ta nangtum akelet hei hei diyajedetji.”
Halatum Jerusalem vangthulo. Jisu Kardomhemthepi arlo kehelatvoi ahut kurusar kethe atum lapen aron thekser atum lapen akesar atum alangli long vangsi,
arjulo, “Nangli lahei hei keklemji aphan kopi ahukum long-loma? Komatsi nangliphan la keklemji ajakong nangpi loma?”

Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Neli nanglitum aphan eson alam nang-arjulang. Nangtum jongsi neliphan la nethanlo tangte, nelita, neli lahei hei keklemji aphan kopi ahukum long-loma, la nangtum aphan nangthanpo.
Jon baptisom kepiji ajakong konat pensi long-loma? Sining pen ma, mate monit penma?”
Ansi halatum angbong lam chedanseisi pulo, “Etum kopisi pu apot-loma! Etum jongsi, ‘Sining pen,’ pule pulote alangli pupo, ‘Tangte nangtum kopi apotsi alangliphan kroikredet-loma?’
Bonta ilitum jongsi ‘Monit pen, pule pulo tangte...’” (Halatum armu atum aphan pherelo, pima kadokave atumta Jon ke inut Arnam ahok amontrilo pusi mathalo.)
Lasi halatum Jisu aphan thakdunsi pulo, “Nelitum chinine.”
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Tangte neli kopi ahukum longsi lahei hei klemloma, lake nelita nanglitum aphan thanthelo.”

Ansi Jisu halatum aphan lamlir hei hei pen kepuji pangcheng-lo. “Ahut isi inut amonit drakha arikang esi la pai ingkaichenlo. Alangli drakha alang kesor ahilikta tuk-lo, lapen kehonji aphan ahemtapta kimlo. Ansi alangli la drakha ketiki atum aphan pektekangsi adet kaprek damjuilo.
Drakha athe kepangrumji abotor nanglesi, alanglipharman adrakha athe alangli halatum pen kelongji aphan ketiki atum along inut aban nangtoilo.
Bonta hala ketiki atum labangso aban aphan nepcheksi chok-lo, lapen thangta pidundepinsi toijuilo.
Ansi alangli aban kaprek aphan nangtoithulo. Halatum la aphan aphu along thengsi amek padolo, lapen patherak-lo.

Alangli puthot anut kaprek aban aphan toithulo. Halatum la aphan pathilot-lo. Lapusonthotsi halatum akaprek penang atum aphanta klemlo; manene atum aphan ke chok-lo, lapen akaprek atum aphan ke pathilo.
Alangli anut kaprek inutnat dolang. Lake alangli kechinghon asopolo. Kepadusi ke alangli, ‘Halatum nesopo aphan ke aman piji,’ pu mathasi amethang asopo aphan halatum along nangtoilo.
Bonta hala ketiki atum chepulo, ‘Lake kechepahemphuji abang-lo, vangnon, la aphan pathilonang. Anke alang kechepahemphuji amar an etum chepahemphu longpo.
Lasi halatum la aphan nepsi pathilot-lo, lapen abang arpum ke drakha aberi angtan varchorlo.
“Tangte drakha aberi ahemphu pisi klempoma?” Jisu arjulo. “Alangli vangsi ketiki atum aphan pavirji, lapen drakha aberi anut kaprek atum arideng pitekangji.
Chenamsi nangtum labangso ahastro alam porhelongtang-lo, kalima? Atheke hastro along tok-lo,
‘Hem kekim atum kekhindetang a-arlongsi hem kepathir-i,
akenangsotnei a-arlong cheplangtang-lo.
Lake Hemphusi klemlo;
la kelang ko-an akemanghumemelo!’ ”

Jihudi atum angbong keja atum alangliphan kenepji abidi rilo, pima alangli halatum pen apotsi labangso alamlir thanlo pu halatum chinilo. Bonta halatum armu atum aphan pherelo; lasi halatum alangliphan otekangsi damjuilo.
Jisu aphan adai kenepjisi alang-liphan kopinene alam keparjuji aphan alangli long manene a-Pharisi lapen Herod abe manene atum aphan toilo.

Halatum alangli long vangsi alangliphan pulo, “Kuru, netum chinilo, nanglike kaiketa ahokpet abang-lo, lapen badu aphanta phererelo; pima nanglike monit amahang langle, bonta Arnam atovar ahokpetsi thanlo. Tangte Rom a-Recho aphan ili midu kepi nangji aron doma avema? Nelitum halatum aphan la pinangjima, pinangnema?”
Bonta halatum aning arlo akematha abidi alam chinisi Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum kopi apotsi neliphan adai kenepji bor-iloma? Rup atangka isi vantha, neli la langlang.”
Halatum la vanlo, lapen alangli halatum aphan arjusi pulo, “Lake komat arjanlo, lapen la komat alamjirsi tok-lo?”
Halatum thakdunsi pulo, “Recho arjan lapen amenlo.”
Ansi Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Recho amar Recho aphan, lapen Arnam amar Arnam aphanle pinon.”
Ansi halatum alangli kepu alam pen apot manghuphrong-lo.
Ansi Saduki atum Jisu along vang-lo. Halatum ke kethitang atum thurthe pusi pulo. Halatum alangliphan eson alam arjusi pulo,

“Kuru, Moses etum aphan labangso aron tok-lo, atheke ‘Inut amonit jongsi apiso pamotekangsi thilot-lo, lapen aso inutta avelo tangte, akorte akebi abang la atepi aphan patengsi akorte apoton paplangvek nangji.’
Ahut isi korte bang throksi dolo. Akleng abang piso enlo, lapen asomar avepin pen alangli thilot-lo. Akorte adakvam abang la a-ik apiso aphan pateng-lo, lapen alanglita asomar ave pin pen thilot-lo.
Lapen akorte adakvam adun abangta lasonthot plang-lo; lapen korte bangthroksita labangpi aphan enlo, lapen asomar avepin pen thilo.
Kadokave aphi arloso abangta thilot-lo.
Tangte mo kethi pen rengthusi kethurji ahut labangpi halatum angbong komat apiso plang poma? Pima halatum bangthroksita labangpi aphan enpet-lo.”
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum kechokdam-i-e ason lahelo, kalima? Pima nangtum hastro alamta chinine, lapen Arnam ajakongta chininelo.
Pima mo kethitang atum thur lote, halatum pisota en-e, penanta dodedetpo; bonta sining athak kedo apherangke atum asonthak thakpo.

Kethitang atum rengthusi kethurji alam ke nanglitum hala Moses ketok aloh along, atheke hala ingsu angplum along me kekar-ang alamjir ketok angdeng along nangtum Arnam Moses aphan kepu alam, atheke, ‘Neke Abraham a-Arnam, lapen Isaak a-Arnam lapen Jakob Arnamlo,’ pu hei hei alam porhehelangma?
Alangli ke kethitang atum a-Arnam kali, bonta kereng-et atum a-Arnamlo. Nanglitum kechokche binong-lo.”

Inut aron thekser abang hadak vangsi halatum lam kechedansei arjudun long-lo, lapen Jisu hala Saduki atum aphan thakdun pamelo, lake alangli thek-long-lo. Lasi alangli Jisu along vangsi arjulo, “Kadokave ahukum angbong akethenei ahukum kolo abangma?”
Jisu thakdunsi pulo, “Kethenei ahukum lahelo, ‘Arjunon, O Israel atum! Hemphu inutnat, Hemphu helo etum a-Arnamlo.
Nangtum Hemphu aphan, atheke Arnam aphan nang ning ajakong an pen lapen nang karjong ajakong an pen, lapen nang ning kematha ajakong an penle lapen nang jakong ke do-an penle chinghonnon.’
Adun kethenei ahukum lahelo, ‘Nangmethang aphan kechinghon asonthot-le tebok abang aphan chinghonnon.’ La sonni apar akethemu ahukum avelo.”
Aron thekser abang Jisu aphan pulo, “Ahok-lo kuru, nangli ahok pensi pu pamelo, Hemphu helo Arnamlo, alangli pen apar ke akaprek Arnam avelo.

Lapen alangliphan ning ajakong an pen, lapen ning kematha ajakong an pen, kedo-an ajakong pen kechinghon, lapen amethang aphan kechinghon asonthotsi tebok abang aphan kechinghon ke me kephrin-i athok hei hei lapen akaprek athok hei hei apar memulo.”
Alangli abidi pensi thakdun pamelo la thek-longsi Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Nangli Arnam a-Rat pen helolelo.”
Labangso pen aphi ke baduta alang-liphan thang alamta arjuhaihedet-lo.
Jisu Kardomhemthepi arlo lam kethan un ahut pulo, “Khristo ke David asopolo pu aron thekser atum kopusi keputhekma?
Karjong Kangthir ketoi atengsi David amethang mamat pulo,
‘Hemphu ne-Hemphu aphan pulo,
nang hotur atum aphan nangkeng pak arum bibetik ke,
nang ne ar-e anat-le ingninon.’
David amethang amatsi alangliphan ‘Hemphu’ pu pulo, tangte Khristo ke kopusonsi David asopo plang unjilangma?”
Armu ake-ongpi atum aning arong pen Jisu kethan alam arjudunlo.

Alangli lam kethan un ahut halatum aphan pulo, “Aron thekser atum aphan cherenon, latum choi keding chingchoisi bithe bitha kedamji lapen hithi borwa hei hei along monit atum latum aphan aman kepi pen kardom kepapiji aphan latum aning hang-lo.
Latum sinagog arlo kethenei anghoi lapen chojun amei along aman kedo anghoi kangni longji aphan aning dok-lo.
Latum hemepi atum ahem kuruk-et-lo, lapen Arnam aphan palem-lem pensi ardom varet-lo. Latum aphan aduk ahukum so muchotji.”
Jisu tangka apuru athengno along ingnilunsi monit atum tangka apuru along tangka nangkethap langdun ding bomlo. Keplang-o ake-ongpi atum ke tangka thap-olo.
Ansi inut kedukdet ahemepita hadak vangsi tam atangka paini thap-lo. Lake poisa isi anta komchet-lo.

Alangli amethang asangho atum aphan chehangpetsi halatum aphan pulo, “Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, ladak tangka Asinduk along tangka nang-kethap atum angbong la kedukdet ahemepile kethap ongneilo.
Pima kadokave atum ke amethang kedortang atangka angbong pensi pilo, bonta labangpi ke amethang akedorde angbong pen kedo an atangka, atheke amethang choche selesi pidet-lo.”
Jisu Kardomhemthepi pen nangkebar ahut asangho inut abang alangliphan pulo, “Langtha kuru! Lahei hei a-arlong lapen ahem ko-an akelangme!”
Jisu alangliphan thakdunsi pulo, “Nang la hem hei hei thek-long-lodi? Ladak kedo a-arlong isinat aphanta non kebi adim bibedetji; kadokave aphanta var-etji.”
Kardomhemthepi athengno kedo, Oliv anglong athak Jisu ingnilunsi kedo ahut alangli long baduta avedetsi Pitor, Jems, Jon lapen Andriu vangsi Jisu aphan arjujoilo,
“Lahei hei komantu plangjima, lapen lahei hei kechekokji dok dok angthek kopijima, la netum aphan nethantha.”
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Baduta nangtum aphan kepamanghu longledetjile, nangtum cherehurnon.
Ake-ongpi amonit atum nemen pen vangsi pupo, ‘Neli helo alanglilo!’ Lapen halatum ake-ongpi atum aphan pamanghuji.
Bonta ron kechedan lapen ron kechedan dojibon pu alamjir nangtum karjulong ahut nangtum matha-it-atri. La plangvek nangji, bonta lake kejut kalilang.
Pima det ahotur det, lapen rat ahotur rat che-thurji. Bithe bitha adim chikli vangji lapen akhim thurji. Lahei hei ke oso pirthe kepahache ahut arlosomar atum akesung kepangcheng ben asonlang.

“Bonta nangtum methangle chere-hurnon. Pima halatum nangtum aphan panepsi nangtum aphan arong arong kangsai amei hei hei arideng hodaiji. Sinagog hei hei along nangtum aphan areng pasoji; lapen ne pen apot halatum angno haki kepijisi nangtum det kechepahemphu atum lapen recho atum angno arjapji.
Lapen aphrangke kadokave amonit atum angno birta keme than pachethangpet nangji.

Lapen nangtum aphan nepsi kangsai anghoi angno nangkepon ahut nangtum kopisi ningjejima, lake aphrang pen ning biri, bonta hala-bangso apor ahut nangtum aphan nangkepi alam alingle nangtum ning-jenon. Pima nangtum keningjeji alam ke nangtum methang alam kalidetji, bonta lake Karjong Kangthir pensi vangji.
Lapen akortesi akorte aphan kepathiji aphan, lapen aposi asopo aphan kepathiji aphan hodaiji; lapen osomar atum api-apo atum ahotur cheplangsi halatum aphan pathiji.
Lapen ne men pen apot kadokave atum nangtum aphan hijimji, bonta kejut anta kechechakthek abang jokji.”

“Bonta hala ahirketanjit, akephere-meme amar karjaptherthedet nangji adim nangkarjapther nangtum thek-long-lote, (Keporhe abang labangso alam athe pachininang), halabangso ahut Judia adet kedo atum inglong hei hei anat pakatnang.
Lapen amethang ahem asarnung angsong kedo abang ke amethang amar keche-endamji aphan hem arlo kedamjile pahirhenang.
Lapen rit angbong kedo abangta achoi keding keche-endam-ji aphan ahem pachevoivenang.
Bonta pei pei! Halabangso ahut oso kechopathe lapen mok kechu a-oso kedo a-arloso atum ko-an sungpoma!
Bonta lake ningkreng ahut keplangpledetjile nangtum Arnam aphan choningrinon.
Pima halabangso ahut monit atum kesung pho-oji. Arnam kepinchong apirthe ha kecheng pen non anta lason akesung avepinlang, lapen mo aphita avedetji, lason akesung pirthe athak doji.”
Hemphu halabangso arni hei hei pa-ong-e-edet asonte baduta jokjedetji apot-lo. Bonta alangli kangvaitang amonit atum aphan ajok hala hei hei arni pa-ong-edet-lo.
“Halabangso ahut mane abang jongsi nangtum aphan, ‘Langtha, ladaksi Khristo do, kalite langtha alangli hadaksi do,’ pule pu lote, nangtum alangli kepu alam kroiri.

Pima kechobei a-Khristo atum, lapen kechobei amontri atum thurji, lapen jongsi un tangte, kangvaitang atum aphanta kepamanghuji aphan halatum akemanghumeme angthek lapen kematha abidi kejutdet akam hei hei klemji.
Nangtum cherehurnon. Halabangso ahut nanglele ako pen ne nangtum aphan la nangthanpet-lo.”
“Bonta halabangso arni hei hei ahut, atheke halabangso akesungpik ahut jutdet aphi, arni ingtingthipji, lapen chiklota khelanledetji,
lapen chiklolongso atum sining pen ingjuipreji, lapen sining athak kedo ajakong hei hei aphan terekji.
Ansi halabangso ahut Monit a-Sopo aphan ajakong kethe pen lapen adak-atur pen inghun angbong kevang thek-longji.
Halabangso ahut alangli pherangke atum aphan toisi kangvaitang atum aphan pirthe adang pen, atheke, pirthe kejut, sining kejut pen pangrumji.”
“Thebo arong pen lamlir charlitha. La aro ingdukvok cheplangsi arvo kechingjok pangcheng-lote barla nanghirji dokdok-lo pu nangtum chinilo.
Lasonthotsi nangtum lahei hei kechekokbom thek-long-lote la tebok-het-lo, inghap amahang an nangletang-lo pule chinipamenon.
Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, la kadokave kechekokji ahut non kerenglang amonit atum thi-et-ejilang.
Sining lapen pirthe avedetji, bonta nelam hei hei ke doverji.”
“Bonta Po apar ke, sining apherangke atum tame, kalite Sopo settame, baduta halabangso arni lapen apor chinine.
Inghongdingnon, lapen no kang-ar penle donon, pima labangso apor komantu vangjima, lake nangtum chinine.

Lake amethang ahem che-o tekangsi adet kaprek kedam amonit asonthak thak-lo. Atheke alangli kedamji ahut aban atum aphan alangli hem palangtoilo. Alangli aban abangphutin aphan amethang methang keklem nangji akam pektekang-lo, lapen inghongding masi pusi inghap keton abang aphan hukum pitekang-lo.
Tangte nangtum inghongdingnon, pima hem ahemphu komantusi vangjine, lake nangtum chinine. Lake arni kangsam ahutta thek, jirlo ahutta thek, voku ahutta thek, kalite adapprang ahutta thek.
Alangli tongsekot pen kevang ahut, alangli nangtum aphan mekjangklip nangthek longledet nangji.
Tangte ne nangtum aphan nangkepu alam ke kadokave aphantalo: nangtum inghong dingnon!”
Kejok Achojun a-Meipi lapen Thap Kave a-Him Achojun Ameipi nangkeleji nini dolang. Kurusar kethe atum lapen aron thekser atum kepacherei abidi pen Jisu aphan kenepji lapen kepathiji abidi ribomlo.
Halatum pulo, “Chojun Ameipi ahut ke ilitum la klem nangne, pima monit atum huriseiji tahai!”

Bethani arongsopi kedo Simon pu inut si-i akeso kelong abang ahem Jisu dodamlo. Jisu an kecho kangni un ahut inut arloso kenemprujin athengpi arong pen kesor, adorsopik ajangthu nempru Alabastar pu a-arlong kelok abong pen vansi hadak vang-lo, lapen la arlong kelok abong paphukdaksi Jisu aphu athak dungjirlo.
Bonta hadak kedo amonit atum angbong manene atum aning oilaksi lahin lahin chepulo, “Kopi athesi labangso ajangthu nempru thangbakbele phalangnoloma?
Pima rup atangka pharo kethom sose ador pen labangso ajangthu nempru jorsi, atangka keduk-kelak atum aphan pi unji apot-lo!” Lapen halatum alangliphan jasemetsi sorsarrip-lo.
Bonta Jisu pulo, “Alangliphan thangta klemri! Nanglitum alangliphan kopi athesi pasung-loma? Alangli neliphan mesen akamsi klemtang-lo.
Pima keduk-kelak atum nanglitum along kaiketa doverji, lapen nanglitum aning kehang aling nanglitum halatum aphan rap unji; bonta neli ke nanglitum along dovervedetji.
Labangpi ke un an klemtang-lo. Neli bang arpum kepipji aphansi alangli aphrang pen la neli bang jangthu nempru patiptang-lo.
Lapen chenamsi neli nanglitum aphan nangpulang, pirthe adang birta keme kepachethang adim aling labangpi aphan kechepamathathuji aphan la alangli keklemtang akamta thanpondetji.”
Hala sangho bangkrehini atum angbong pen Judas Iskariot pu inut abang Jisu aphan kurusar kethe atum arideng kehodaijisi halatum along damlo.
Ansi halatum la arju longsi chehok-lo, lapen alangliphan tangka kepiji chak-lo. Lasi alangli Jisu aphan halatum arideng kehodaijisi asoi keme ribomlo.

Thap Kave a-Him Achojun a-Meipi aphrangsi arni, atheke Kejok Achojun a-Meipi aphan biresak aso kethu arni Jisu asangho atum Jisu aphan arjulo, “Kejok Achojun a-Meipi a-an kechoji aphan netum konatsi sikdam nangjima? Nang ning kehang kopima?”
Alangli asangho bang hini atum aphan toisi pulo, “Rongsopi damnon. Hadak tebuk pen lang kepon inut amonit nangtum pen chetongji. Nang-tum alangli phi phi dunra,
alangli kelutdam ahem ahemphu aphan punon, ‘Kuru pulo, neli neli sangho atum pen Kejok a-Mei a-an kechoji aphan alohi kedo angdeng konatma?’
Anke alangli mamat nangtum aphan hala kesiktang lapen kenangji amar an kedo angsong akethe angdeng nangpaklangpo. Etum an kechoji aphan hadak-le sikdamnon.”
Ansi sangho atum nangbarsi rongsopi damlo, lapen alangli halatum aphan kethan asonthotsi halatum kadokave longdamlo; lapen halatum Kejok Achojun a-Meipi a-an sikdamlo.
Arni kangsam ahut Jisu amethang asangho bangkrehini atum pen vang-lo.
Halatum ingnisi an kecho un ahut Jisu pulo, “Chenamsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, nangtum angbong inut abang, atheke ne pen an kecho rap rap abang nephan hotur arideng hodaiji.”
Sangho atum aning aduk dolo, lapen inut pen aphi inut Jisu aphan karjuji pangcheng-lo, “Lake neli kali, kalima?”
Jisu halatum aphan thakdunsi pulo, “Alangli ke nangtum bangkrehini angbong pen inut abang-lo; atheke ne pen kasu ehong along him kenim rap rap abang helo.

Hastro along ketok asonthotsi Monit a-Sopo thiji; bonta pei pei! Hala Monit a-Sopo aphan hotur arideng kehodai abang ko-an akesung pho nangpoma! Halabangso abang amahang thekthedet asonte alangliphan meparji apot-lo.!”
Halatum kecho un ahut Jisu him eplang ensi hirjume hang-lo, lapen la bengsi asangho atum aphan pilo, lapen pulo, “La entha, lake nebang arpumlo.”
Labangso aphi alangli harlung ehong enlo, lapen Arnam aphan kero pisi halatum aphan pilo; lapen halatum la junlo.
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Lake nevilo; ongdung atum aphan ajok kedung avilo; lake Arnam akechechak kepathir-i avilo.
Ne chenamsi nangtum aphan nangpulang, mo Arnam a-Rat angbong drakha ahorlang kemi kejunji arni nangleletik ke ne kaiketa drakha ahorlang junjelo.”
Ansi halatum kero alun lundetsi Oliv anglong along damlo.
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nang-tum do-an nephan otekangsi katkoiji; pima hastro pulo, ‘Biresak kevi abang aphan Arnam pathipo, lapen biresak atum an pratseipo.’
Bonta nephan neparengthudet aphi ne nangtum aphrang ha Galili adet dampatenoji.”
Pitor thakdunsi pulo, “Kadokave atumle nangphan nang-ote-kang-et setta neke nangphan kaita nang-o-e.”
Jisu Pitor aphan pulo, “Chenamsi ne nangphan nangpulang, peningve mamat vo batai hini kuke ako nang nephan chinine pusi batai kethom puji.”
Bonta alangli abatai batai ningje-thipsi pulo, “Ne nanglong nangthidun nangkokji setta ne lason kaita pupedetji.”
Lapen sangho kadokave atumta lasonsi pupet-lo.
Halatum Gethsemane pu elong adim vang-lo, lapen Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan pulo, “Ne Arnam kardomdam ahut nangtum ladak-le ingniphrongtha.”
Alangli Pitor, Jems lapen Jon aphan ari cheponlo. Alangli aning oise lapen aning dukpik-lo.
Ansi alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Ne ning dukpik-lo; la pen ajok ne kethithuji anbak-lo. Dak-le dora no kang-ar pen dotha.”
Alangli asapso damchotsi longle athak domkhrup-lo, lapen unte halabangso akesung apor alangli pen kepaheloji aphan alangli Arnam cho-ardomlo.
Alangli choningrisi pulo, “O Po, O ne-Po! Nang ke kadokaveta klem un. Labangso aharlung ne long pen pahelotha. Bonta ne ning kehang kali, nangning kehangle paplengnang.”
Alangli vangsi halatum amek kejangklip thek-long-lo. Alangli Pitor aphan pulo, “Simon, nang nangmek kejangma? Nang porphai isi anta honding un-edetma?”
Lapen alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum asat keklokledetjile no kang-ar pen dora Arnam ardomvernon. Chenamsi karjong ke aning hang, bonta ok ke ajakong ave.”
Alangli damthulo, lapen aphrang alamthethot pen Arnam ardomlo.
