Alangli puthot vang-lo, lapen sangho atum aphan amek kejangklip thek-long-lo, pima halatum kemek-i saidelo, lapen halatum alangliphan thakdun-thekthe det-lo.
Alangli batai kethom aphong vangthusi halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum non anta nangmek jangbomsi sangbom langma? Chok-lo! Apor nangletang-lo! Langtha, Monit a-Sopo aphan papi atum arideng hodaitang-lo!
Thurnon, ili damlonang! Langtha, nephan hotur arideng kehodaiji abang nangletang-lo!”

Jisu lam keningje un ahut Judas pu sangho bang krehini angbong pen inut abang hadak vang-lo. Kurusar kethe atum, aron thekser atum lapen akesar atum nangketoidun a-armu atumta alangli long nangdunlo. Halatum arideng nokjir lapen kaibong dolo.
Ansi Jisu aphan hotur arideng kehodaiji abang halatum aphan angthek paklangsi pulo, “Ne kangjupji abang aling helo, nangtum kenangji abang-lo. Alangliphan nep-ra paton pame pen ponnon.”
Judas nangkele pen mamat Jisu adung damsi pulo, “Kuru!” Lapen alangli Jisu aphan ingjup-lo.
Ansi halatum Jisu aphan nepsi ot-het-lo.
Bonta hadak karjapphrong atum angbong pen inut abang anokjir chesatsi kurusar kethenei aban ano ehi chorphlak-lo.
Lasi Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum neliphan kenepji aphan dokait aphan asonthak thaksi nokjir lapen kaibong vansi vang nangkok-loma?
Neli arnivang Kardomhemthepi arlo lam kethan ahut neli nanglitum pen dorap rap-lo, lapen nanglitum neliphan nepnedet-lo. Bonta hastro alam chekokvek nangji.”
Ansi asangho atum an alangliphan oprupsi katkoilo.
Jisu aphi phi inut ariso dunlo. Alangli linen ape epaknat pindeng-lo. Halatum alangliphan kenepji bor-ilo.
Bonta alangli ape che-otekangsi areng angse kat-lo.
Ansi halatum Jisu aphan kurusar kethenei akeng-ri ponlo. Kurusar kethe atum an, akesar atum lapen aron thekser atum hadak chingrumpet-lo.
Pitor achar achar pen Jisu aphi aphi dunsi kurusar kethenei atikup arlo anta dunlo, lapen keton aron-aso atum pen ingni rap rapsi me chinghipdunlo.
Ansi kurusar kethe atum lapen kangsai Ameipi amonit atum an Jisu aphan kepathi longji aphan alangliphan adai kepado ahaki ribomlo, bonta halatum long thekthedet-lo.
Ake-ongpi atum alangli bethursi kechobei ahaki pilo setta halatum kepi ahaki chetontedet-lo.
Ansi manene atum Jisu abethursi kechobei ahaki pisi pulo,
“‘La monit ari pen kekim a-Kardomhemthepi parudetsi nithom angbong monit atum ari pen kekim kalidet akardom ahemthepi ne kimpo.’ pu labangso amonit kepu netum arjudun long-lo.”
Tebonta halatum kepi ahaki chetontedet-lo.
Lapen kurusar kethenei abang mei angbong arjapsi Jisu aphan arjulo, “Latum nangli bethursi kepu alam nangli kechethakdunji alam avema?”
Bonta Jisu dojoisi thangta chethak-dundedet-lo. Puthot kurusar kethenei abang alangliphan arjulo, “Ahirjume atheng a-Arnam a-Sopo Khristo nangli heloma?”
Jisu thakdunsi pulo, “Neli helo, lapen Monit a-Sopo Jakong Kethenei a-Bang ar-e kangni, lapen sining anghun athak kevang nanglitum kadokave thek-longji!”
Kurusar Kethenei abang amethang achoi keding hei hei ching-seksi pulo, “La apar ilitum kopi ahaki nangjilangma!
La Arnam aphan kepinrem nanglitum arjulongtang-lo. Nanglitum kopisi kemathama?”
Alangli kethi nangji a-ot do pusi halatum kadokaveta pupet-lo.

Lapen manene atum alangliphan kangthokji pangcheng-lo, lapen amahang dipsi, alangliphan tengsi pulo, “Nangphan nangketeng abang komatma, putha!” Lapen keton aron-aso atum alangliphan tengsi pondet-lo.
Aber atikup along Pitor kedo un ahut Kurusar kethenei abanpi inut vang-lo,
lapen Pitor aphan hadak me kechinghip thek-longsi alangliphan langdingsi pulo. “Nanglita hala Najareth asor a-Jisu along kedodun abang-lo.”
Bonta alangli chekrongkredetsi pulo, “Neli chinine, nangli kopisi kepu-ma, lake neli chinine,” Lapen alangli thekup anghap amahang anat damlo, lapen hala mamat vo ejon kulo.
Halabangso abanpi alangliphan hadak thekthu longsi hadak karjap-phrong atum aphan pulo, “Labangso amonitta halatum angbong inut-lo!”
Bonta Pitor puthot chekrongkredet-lo.
Malomso aphi hadak karjapphrong atum Pitor aphan pulo, “Ahok-lo, nanglita halatum angbong inut-lo. Pima nanglita Galili amonit-lo.”
Lasi Pitor semetangsi puthulo, “Neli seme tangsi pulo, neli ahok alamsi thanlo! Jongsi kali tangte Arnam neliphan aduk nepapinang. La nanglitum kepudam amonit aphan neli chinine binong.”

Ansi hala mamat vo ejon batai hini aphong kulo, lapen Jisu kepu, “Vo ejon batai hini aphong kuke ako nang nephan batai kethom aphong chinine pusi puji.” Pu alam Pitor chemathadamlo. Lapen alangli jasemet chirulo.

Adap kangthang pen mamat kurusar kethe atum hala akesar atum, aron thekser atum lapen kangsai Ameipi amonit atum aphan chetongdamsi chingvailo, lapen alam parailo. Halatum Jisu aphan kokponsi Pilat arideng hodailo.
Pilat alangliphan arjulo, “Nangli Jihudi atum arechoma?”
Jisu thakdunsi pulo, “Nanglisi pulo.”
Kurusar kethe atum alangliphan adai tin-olo.
Lasi Pilat alangliphan arjuthulo, “Nangli thangta chethakdun movema? Halatum nangliphan ko-an adai tinloma, lale chemathatha!”
Bonta Jisu thangta chethak-dun-dedet-lo. Lasi Pilatke manghuhak-lo.
Kejok Achojun a-Meipi ahuttin rat atum kehang aling phatek kejang atum angbong pen inut aphan Pilat pajokbom.
Ansi Barabbas pu inut amonit hala recho abekethur atum pen pen phatek jang-lo. Halatum recho abekethur ahut monit apran enlo.
Armu atum vangsi Pilat kai keklembom ateng keklemji aphan choningrilo.
Bonta Pilat thakdunsi pulo, “Neli nanglitum aphan Jihudi atum arecho nangpajokpi nangjima? Nanglitum aning kehang laheloma?”
Pima kurusar kethe atum kelang un-e apotsi Jisu aphan alangli rideng hodailo pu alangli chinipamelo.
Bonta Jisu alar Barabbas aphan kepalophlotji aphan Pilat aphan kepa-choningrijisi kurusar kethe atum rat atum aphan chorung-lo.
Pilat puthot armu atum aphan pulo, “Tangte nanglitum Jihudi atum arecho pu kepu abang aphan neli kopi inghoi nangpoma?”
Halatum puthot hangjosi pulo, “Alangliphan thengparpan athak saknon!”
Pilat halatum aphan pulo, “Kopi apot-lo? Alangli kopi akehingnosi keklemlo?”
Bonta halatum ansose kehang ase pathethumuchotsi pulo, “Alangliphan thengparpan athak saknon!”
Ansi Pilat armu atum aning kepangsamji aning hangsi halatum aphan Barabbas pajokpilo; lapen champre abu pen Jisu aphan pachoksi thengparpan athak kepasakji aphan hodaidet-lo.
Chedanbang atum Jisu aphan govornor ahem atikup arlo ponlo, lapen chedanbang amokha isi an aphan chehangsi pangrumpet-lo.
Halatum alangliphan hepi arje ape pindeng-lo, lapen ingsu aro pen phu avaikang selamsi alangli phu athak kup-lo.
Lapen, “Kardom, Jihudi atum arecho!” pusi halatum alang-liphan kepalemlem pen kardom kepiji pangcheng-lo.
Lapen halatum arpik ehong pen alangli phu athak theng-lo, lapen abang athak ingthok-lo, lapen akengphu patongruisi alangliphan palem lem pen ardomlo.
Halatum alangliphan ingnekchoidet aphi hala hepi arje ape phlok-lo lapen ape methang pindengthulo. Anke halatum alangliphan theng parpan athak kesakji aphan ingtan ponlo.

Ansi Simon pu abang havar pen kevang un ahut tovar chetongsi chedanbang atum alangliphan toi bor-isi Jisu athengparpan paponlo. Alangli ke Alekjendar lapen Raphas apolo, lapen Sairen arongsopi asorlo.
Halatum Jisu aphan Golgotha, atheke “Phubongkok” pu adim ponlo.
Halatum alangliphan Mirh pu araki kedo abap keho pen kepang-vuitang adrakha ahorlang pilo, bonta Jisu la junjedet-lo.
Ansi halatum alangliphan thengparpan athak sak-lo; lapen komat abang kopi longjima, la kepatiniji aphan halatum khadot pathusi alangli pe chethak-lo.
Halatum alangliphan thengparpan athak kesak ahut apor adap baji sirkep-lo.
Alangliphan adai ketin alamthe kepachini ke, “JIHUDI ATUM ARECHO,” puhelo.
Halatum Jisu along akaprek bang hini aphanta thengparpan athak sakdunlo. Inut abang aphan Jisu ar-e anat lapen akaprek inut aphan ke Jisu arvi anat sak-lo.
Lapen hastro along ketok, “Alangliphanta hala adai kedo atum aphan pen pen lakha ponrap-pet-lo,” pu alam chekokpet-lo.
Tovar kevang-kedam atum aphu chehejuksi lapen alangliphan ingnekchoisi pulo, “Ai! Kardomhemthepi kephrira nithom angbong kekimthuthek abang!
Nonke thengparpan pen nanghirra nangmethangle chepajoktha!”
Lasonthak thaksi kurusar kethe atum lapen aron thekser atumta Jisu aphan ingnekchoisi lahin lahin chepulo, “Alangli bang aphan ke pajokthek, bonta amethang ke chepajok thekthe!

Ilitum kethek-longra alangliphan kekroithekji aphan la Khristo, atheke Israel atum arecho nonke theng parpan pen nangpahirnang.” Lapen alangli long thengparpan athak kesak dun atumta alangliphan putot-lo.
Nerlo chitim ahut pen arni kangsam baji kethom ahut an det adang ingtingkuk cheplang-lo.
Arni kangsam baji kethom apor Jisu ase ke-the pen hangsersi pulo, “Eloi, Eloi lama sabakthani?” Labangso alam atheke, “Ne Arnam, ne Arnam! Nang nephan kopisi ne-obup loma?” puhelo.
Hadak karjapphrong manene atum la arjulongsi pulo, “Arjutha, alangli Elijah aphansi kehang.”

Ansi halatum angbong inut abang katvirsi sponj isi drakha ahorlang kethor along nimlo lapen arpik ehong pen la krongsi la alangli ingtur along bat-lo lapen pulo, “Thaho! Alangliphan thengparpan pen kepahirji aphan Elijah vangjima, vangvema, lale langdun sinangho!”
Ansi Jisu Jasemet hangsersi thilot-lo.
Kardomhemthepi arlo kangthir angdeng angno anat kehing ape, athak pen aber anta chingseksorlo.
Hadak alangli ingno karjapther, chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu abang Jisu lapuson kethi thek-longsi pulo, “Ahok-lo, labangso abang Arnam a-Sopo binong-lo!”
Hadak achar pen kelangdun arlosomar atumta dolo. Halatum angbong Megdala asor a-Meri, Jems akebi lapen Joseph apei Meri, lapen Salomita dolo.
Jisu Galili adet kedo ahut latum alangli long dunlo, lapen alangliphan ru-thailo. Alangli pen pen Jerusalem kedam rap rap akaprek ake-ongpi arlosomar atumta hadak dolo.
Arni ingsamlo, lapen lake Kesik Kedang arni, atheke Sabbath Arni pen aphrang arnilo apotsi,

Arimathea asor a-Joseph angthin chepathesi Pilat along damlo, lapen Jisu abang arpum kepon longji aphan choningrilo. Alangli ke kangsai amei amonit atum angbong inut aman kedo abang-lo, lapen alangli methangta Arnam a-Rat aphan inghongding-lo.
Bonta Jisu thitang-lo pu arjulongsi Pilatke manghuhak-lo. Lasi alangli chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu aphan hangsi Jisu thi-ettang-loma pusi arjulo.
Lapen Chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu pen Jisu thi-ettang-lo pu chinisi alangli Joseph aphan Jisu abang arpum paponlong-lo.
Joseph linen ape keme epak namlo, lapen abang arpum pasunsi la pen perhetsi arlong kehongtang atipit along bidamlo. Ansi alangli atipit amangho along arlong pakong-long thip-lo.
Megdala asor a-Meri, lapen Joseph apei a-Meri atum langdun pamesi Jisu abang arpum kebidam adim thek-long pamelo.
Sabbath arni aphi Megdala asor a-Meri lapen Jems apei Meri lapen Salomi atum Jisu abang arpum kepatipji aphan kenemprujin amar namdamlo.
Hithi arui kecheng arni adapprang, arni kevang pen mamat halatum thiri along damlo.
Halatum lahin lahin chepu ponlo. “Tipit amangho pen matsi etum aphan arlong epakong-longpi poma?”
Ansi halatum aphu chingthursi arlong kepakong-longtang thek-long-lo. Halabangso a-arlong thepik-lo.
Halatum tipit arlo lutdamlo, lapen hadak inut ariso choi kelok chingchoisi ar-e anat kangnilun halatum thek-long-lo. Lapen halatum jasemet pherelo.

Bonta alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Phereri. Ne Chinilo, hala thengparpan athak kethi Najareth asor a-Jisu aphansi nangtum rilo. Alangli thurtang-lo. Alangli ladak avelo. Langtha halatum alangliphan kebi adim lahelo.

Bonta damra alangli sangho atum aphan lapen Pitor aphan labangso abirta thandamnon. Alangli nanglitum aphrang dam patenosi Galili adet dampo, lapen alangli nanglitum aphan kepu asonthotsi hadak nanglitum alangliphan thek damlongpo”.
Lasi halatum thiri pen nangbarsi kekat pen damlo, pima halatum a-ok klemhurlo, lapen manghuphrong-lo. Halatum badu aphanta thangta pupedet-lo, pima halatum phereduk-lo.
Jisu kethi pen thurdet aphi, hithi arui aphrangsi arni adapprang alangli Megdala asor a-Meri aphan aphrangsi cheklang-lo. Ha aphrang ahut alangli labangpi along pen hi-i bang throksi phlung-lo.
Labangpi damsi ari asangho atum aphan thandamlo. Halabangso ahut halatum chiru chernapsi dolo.
Bonta alangli reng-lo lapen labangpi alangliphan thek-long-lo pu labangpi kethan alam halatum kroikredet-lo.
Labangso aphi halatum angbong bang hini atum rong anat kedam un ahut Jisu arje prekjek pen halatum aphan cheklang-lo.
Latum vangsi akaprek atum aphan labangso alam thanlo, bonta halatum latum kethan alam kroikredet-lo.

Aphisi sangho bang kre isi atum an kecho un ahut Jisu halatum aphan cheklang-lo. Ansi halatum akekroikre lapen aning buiklui hak huk apot alangli halatum aphan ingchek-lo, pima alangli kethi pen thurdet aphi alangliphan kethek-long atum kethek-long alam halatum kroikredet-lo.
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Pirthe adang damra kadokave amonit aphan birta keme thandamnon.
Kekroira baptisom ke-en abang aling jokji, bonta kekroikre abang aling aphan ado padoji.
Kekroi atum aphan kemanghumeme akam hei hei keklemji ajakong piji. Halatum ne men pen hi-i atum aphan phlungji, lapen halatum adet kaprek kaprek alam pen ningjeji,
halatum pherui hei hei otji, lapen bikar alangle jun setta halatum aphan phangnonedetji, halatum kesodet atum athak ari batji lapen halatum medetji.”
Hemphu Jisu latum aphan la pudet aphi alangliphan sining athak rungpondet-lo, lapen hadak alangli Arnam ar-e anat ingnilo.
Ansi sangho atum damsi bithe bitha pachethangdamlo. Hemphu halatum pen klem rap rap-lo, lapen kemanghumeme akam hei hei klemsi halatum kepachethang alam ahok pu aporman paklang-lo.
Kecheng pen amethang methang kethekdunlong lapen lam pache-thangbang keplangtang atum nelitum aphan kethan asonthotsi,
nelitum angbong keplangtang ason an ketokjisi penang atum bor-i tang-lo.
Lahelo, Theophilas akehai, nangliphan kethan alam ke ahok alam, nangli la kechini pameji aphan
nelita kecheng pen kadokave alam lang pamesi nangliphan athikpet aloh tok lote mesenpo pusi neli mathalo.
Judia adet, Herod recho arni Abijah adeng inut akurusar dolo. Alangli menke Jekariah lapen apiso amen ke Elizabeth. Alangli ke Aaron akhei a-arlosolo.
Halatum banghini Arnam angno dhoromi, atheke, Hemphu aron lapen ahukum an kroipetbomlo.
Bonta halatum aso avedet-lo, pima Elizabeth aso manme lapen bang hinita sar ru-ralo.
Bonta arnisi, alangli deng nanglesi, Arnam angno kurusar akam keklem ahut,
kurusar atum ateng pen, alangli Hemphu Kardomhemthepi kangthir lut damsi hijung methek kekaiji apharman long-lo.
Lapen hijung methek kekai ahut rat atum ke ingtansi Arnam ardombomlo.
Lapen hijung methek kekai adovan ar-e anat Hemphu apherangke arjapthersi alangliphan cheklang-lo.
Lapen Jekariah alangliphan thek-longsi kethirik pen pherelo.
Bonta pherangke alangliphan pulo, “Phere ri, Jekariah! Pima, nangli kechoningri alam arju tang-lo, lapen nangli piso Elizabeth asopo pirthe pahacheji lapen nangli amen Jon pusi irnangji,
lapen nangli chehoksi ning arong pikji lapen penang atum alangli mahang kethek apot ning arongpikji.
Pima alangli Arnam angno inut thedung abang cheplangji lapen alangli drakha ahorlang lapen arak junjedetji lapen amahang kethek pen mamat alangli Karjong Kangthir pen plengsetji
lapen alangli Israel atum aphan halatum a-Hemphu, Arnam anat penang atum aning pachiruiji.

Lapen apo atum aphan asomar anat aning kepachiruira, kekroi thekthe atum aphan dhoromi atum abidi kepa-enra Hemphu aphan kesikpitang arat kepathikjisi alangli, Elijah ason ajakong kethe pen Hemphu aphrang dampatenoji.”
Lapen Jekariah pherangke aphan pulo, “Neli kopusonsi la chini poma? Pima neli ke sar-rulo lapen neli pisota arta dopik-lo.”
Lapen pherangke alangliphan thaksi pulo, “Arnam angno karjapther a-Gabriel neli helo. Lapen nangliphan labangso abirta keme kepathanjisi neliphan netoitang-lo.
Lapen mathanon, labangso alam chekok ketik ke nangli dojoiji lapen thangta ningje thekthedetji, pima athikpet ahut kechekokji alam, la neli kethan alam hei hei nangli kroikredet-lo.”
Lapen rat atum Jekariah aphan inghongbomlo, lapen alangli Kardom ahem thepi arlo kepader apot halatum manghuphrong-lo.

Lapen alangli nangkebar ahut halatum aphan thangta pu thekthedet-lo, lapen Kardom ahem thepi arlo alangli ning arjan thek-long-lo pusi halatum chini pamelo. Lapen alangli angthek paklangbomsi lapen alam avedetsi dobomlo.
Lapen alangli kardom ahem arlo kangduk akam patangdetsi hem chevoilo.
Lapen labangso aphi apiso Elizabeth aso pathelo, lapen chiklo jonpho chepatulo.
Alangli pulo, “Hemphu lapusonsi neliphan klemlo, atheke, monit atum angbong neli ketherakduk alam Alangli kepakakjisi non ahut nemathatang-lo.”
Lapen Elijabeth chiklo jonthrok oso aphili ahut Galili adet Nazareth arongsopi, David akhei,
Joseph pu abang pen keraitang a-okarjang along Arnam Gabriel pu apherangke aphan nangtoilo. A-okarjang amen ke Meri.
Pherangke lut damsi alangliphan pulo, “Kardom, kangjinso kelongtang arloso! Hemphu nangli long do.”
Bonta alangli labangso alam pen apot thirik o-lo lapen aning arlo manghusi la kardom kepi athe kopiloma pusi chemathalo.
Lapen pherangke alangliphan pulo, “Phereri Meri! Pima Arnam nangliphan ingjinsolo
lapen nangli so pathepo lapen sopo inut pirthe pahacheji, lapen nangli amen Jisu pusi irnangji.
Alangli arleng kethe cheplangji lapen alangliphan Kangtuinei a-Bang a-Sopo pusi pudetji lapen Hemphu Arnam alangliphan aphusar David recho anghoi piji.
lapen alangli kai apar kai anta Jakob ahem recho choji lapen alangli rat jutjepinji.”
Bonta Meri pherangke aphan pulo, “La kopusonsi plangjima? Pima neli ke neli penan avelang.”
Pherangke thaksi alangliphan pulo, “Karjong Kangthir nangli phuthak vangji lapen Arnam ajakong nangli phuthak sakokpo. La apotsi la kangthir a-oso aphan Arnam a-Sopo pusi pudetji.
Nangli don Elizabeth aphan chemathadamtha. Bangpi aso avelo pusi bang atum puhurlo, bonta bangpi sarru lo seta non oso chopathe aphili chiklo jonthrok an dotang-lo.
Pima Arnam keklem un-e ason ave.”
Meri pulo, “Chini iktha, neli ke Hemphu abanpilo, nangli lam asonle neliphan paplang nang.” Lapen pherangke alangli pen chekak-lo.
Lapen halabangso ahut Meri thursi Judia adet, inglong athak arongsopi along damseraksi
lapen Jekariah ahem lutdam seraksi Elizabeth aphan kardom pilo.
Meri kepi akardom Elizabeth karjulong pen mamat apok arlo kedo a-oso kanlo lapen Elizabeth Karjong Kangthir pen plengsetsi
hangcharbusi pulo, “Arlosomar atum angbong nangli helo ahirjume atheng-lo. Lapen nangli pok arlo a-osota ahirjume atheng-lo!
Mai! Hemphu apei neli long vang-lo, labangso aman kopi athesi neliphan piloma?
Pima chini iktha, nangli kardom kepi ase neli no kelut pen mamat osoke neli pok arlo aning arongpiksi kanlo.
Lapen kekroitang abangpi rengme-pima Hemphu alangliphan keputang alam chekokji!”
Lapen Meri pulo,
“Neli Hemphu anong pathelo,
Lapen neli karjongta ne-Kepajok a-Bang,
Arnam pen apot chehok-olo.
Pima Alangli neliphan,
atheke thangta kalidet abanpi aphan nemathalo, pima mathanon,
non pen apara kadokave atum neliphan,
kerengme abang pusi puji,
pima a-Jakong Kethe Arnam neliphan kam kethe klemtang-lo.
Lapen Alangli menke Kangthir.
Alangliphan kephere atum aphuthak a-ove oveta Alangli akangjinso dover.
Ari pen Alangli kam kethe klem tang-lo,
lapen ane kechepathe atum aphan halatum akemang-heihei pen papratseitang-lo.
Jakongkethe arecho atum aphan Alangli halatum anghoi pen paklotang-lo,
lapen thangta kalidet atum aphan rung pangtuilo.
Alangli mesen amar pen kangchir atum aphan pangkrang tang-lo,
lapen keplang-o atum aphan ari angsesi padamjuilo.
Alangli ephusar atum aphan kechak alam paplengtang-lo,
Alangli aban Israel aphan raptang-lo,
Alangli Abraham aphan lapen la aso asu atum an kaike aphan kangjinso kepaklangjisi mathalo.”
Elijabeth along Meri chiklo jonthom anbak dosi amethang ahem chevoilo.
Lapen Elizabeth aso pirthe kepahacheji apor choksi alangli sopo inut pirthe pahachelo.
Lapen alangli tebok terei lapen donrap atum alang-liphan Hemphu kepaklang akangjinso kethe alam arjulongsi alangli long aning arong chepidunlo.
Lapen arta ni nerkep arni oso aphan reng-rot kepijisi halatum vangsi apo amen ason thak-thaksi alangli men Jekariah pu ke-irji mathalo.
Bonta apei thaksi pulo, “Lapu kali, alang menke Jon pusi ir nangji.”
Lapen halatum alangliphan pulo, “Nangli kechepho atum angbong lason amen kedo abang avedet ke!”
Lapen alangli men ke-irjisi apo aning kehang kopi, la kechinijisi halatum alangliphan angthek pen arjulo.
Lapen lo hangsi alangli la athak tok-lo, “Alangli menke Jon.” Lapen kadokave atum manghuphrong-lo.
Bonta halabangso ahut mamat alangli ingho ingpudet-lo lapen ade athit phridet-lo lapen alangli ningjesi Arnam aphan rolo.
Lapen hala tebok terei atum an pherelo. Lapen Judia anglong adet adang an rat atum labangso alam an chethan o-lo,
lapen karjulong atum an la aning arlo chebisi chepuhurlo, “Labangso a-oso pisi plangjima?” Pima Hemphu ajakong alangli phuthak dotang-lo pu la chinilorlo.
Lapen Jon apo Jekariah Karjong Kangthir pen plengsetsi Arnam alam montrisi pulo:
“Israel a-Arnam, atheke, Hemphu-ke ahirjume kelong atheng pacheplang nang! Pima alangli vangsi arat atum aphan pajoktang-lo.
Lapen alangli amethang aban, David akhei angbong pen etum aphan ajok inut a-Jakongthepik, Kepajok a-Bang paplangtang-lo.
Lake hako ahut alangli amethang amontri kangthir atum pen ajok keputang asonthot-lo, atheke,
Ephusar atum aphan kangjinso kepaklangjisi alangli ehotur lapen ekehijim atum arideng pen ilitum aphan epajokji.
Lapen Alangli amethang Kechechak alam chemathathulo.
Atheke, Ephusar Abraham aphan seme ketang do.
Atheke, ehotur atum arideng pen epajoksi,
Etum phere-redetsi,
kangthir-et lapen dhoromi pen rengtik an alangli ingno dosi Alangliphan ingduk-longji.
Lapen Nang ke nesopo, monit atum nangphanta Kangtuinei a-Bang amontri pusi puji.
Pima a-Tovar kesikpijisi nang Hemphu aphrang damji;
Atheke lahelo, halatum apap hei hei kediya pen ajok halatum kejok longji pu alam nangrat atum aphan pachiniji.
Pima e-Arnam ke chingkimesen lapen kangjinsothek a-Bang-lo, alangli pen ajok ephan angsong pen arni turji.
Lake kangting lapen kethi abin kangni atum aphuthak sining angsong pen atur turji, lapen ning kangsam atovar anat ephan ejadunji.”
Halabangso a-oso thelo, lapen karjong anatta ingtangrak-lo, lapen Israel angno cheklangkletik ke alangli kejejangtang ajosi dolo.
Halabangso ahut Agastas Recho Roman adet adang monit aphai ke-enji ahukum pilo.
Siria adet Kuirinias govornor kecho ahut kechengsi aphai-en la helo .
Lapen amen kepatokjisi kadokave atum amethang methang arong chedamrep-lo.
Lapen Josephta amen kechetok-damjisi Galili adet Najareth arong pen Judia adet Bethlehem pu David amahang kethek arongsopi arlu damlo. Pima alangli ke David ahem asangho lapen akheilo.
Alangli keraitang abangpi, Meri aphanta cheponlo. Halabangso ahut alangli areng-angsesedet-lo.
Lapen halatum hadak kedobom ahut labangpi aso pirthe kehache apor chok-lo.
Ansi asopo akleng abang pirthe hachelo, lapen oso pe pen telomsi longhong arlo pe-i-lo. Pima halatum aphan alohi ahem adim jangjedet-lo.
Lapen halabangso alongri Biresak kevi atum dolo. Halatum ajo mamat arit angbong apai pai biresak ahur honlo.
Lapen Hemphu apherangke inut halatum adung arjaptherlo, lapen Hemphu adak atur halatum bithe bitha turdang-lo. Halatum phere-olo,
bonta pherangke halatum aphan pulo, “Phereri, pima mathanon, neli nanglitum aphan ning arong abirta keme vanlo. Lake kadokave arat atum aphanlo,
pima pini David arongsopi along nanglitum aphan Kepajok a-Bang pirthe hachetang-lo. Hemphu Khristo alangli helo.
Lapen nanglitum aphan angthek lahelo, hala oso thi-i aphan pe pen ketelom lapen la longhong arlo ke-i nanglitum thek dam longpo.”
Lapen tong sekotsi pherangke along sining armu ake-ongpi atum dosi Arnam aphan ro si pulo,
“Kangtuinei adim Arnam adak atur lapen Kangtuinei asining athak Arnam adak atur lapen pirthe athak alangli ning kedok amonit atum angbong ning kangsam padonang!”
Lapen pherangke atum halatum adung pen sining athak damdetsi kevi atum chepuhurlo, “Hemphu ekethan, la keplangtang alam Bethlehem arongsopi along non mamat-le langdam lonang.”
Halatum damserak-lo lapen risi Meri lapen Joseph lapen longhong arlo ke-i a-oso thi-ita long-lo.
Lapen langdamsi halatum aphan kethan ateng, labangso a-oso alamjir halatum aphan than phlirlo.
Lapen karjulong atum an, kevi atum halatum aphan kethan alam pen apot manghu phrong-lo.
Meri labangso alam an aning arlo chebi pamesi mathading bomlo.
Lapen aphrang pen halatum aphan kepu tekang asonthotsi kevi atum karjulongtang lapen kethek-longtang alam an pen apot Arnam aphan kero lapen anong kepathe pen chevoilo.
Lapen alangliphan reng-rot kepiji aphan arta ni nerkep choksi alangli men Jisu irlo. Apei aso pathethe ako pen pherangke alangliphan labangso amen irlo.
Lapen Moses aron ateng pen halatum aphan kepangthirji a-arni choksi, Arnam aphan kepanongjisi halatum alangliphan Jerusalem ponlo.
Lake Hemphu aron along ketok asonthot-lo, atheke hadak tok-lo, “Pinso a-oso akleng an aphan ke Hemphu aphan kepanongtang abang-lo pusi pudetji.”
Lapen Hemphu aron kepu asonsi vothung echor, kalite thungpharlo aso jonni se karkli-iji aphan halatum vanlo.

Lapen chini iktha halabangso ahut Simeon pu inut amonit dolo. Labangso abang ke dhoromi lapen Arnam aphan kangduk abang-lo. Alangli Israel akejok kethek-longji aphan inghongding-lo lapen Karjong Kangthir alangli phuthak dolo.
Lapen alangli Hemphu Khristo aphan thek-longletik ke thithedetji pusi Karjong Kangthir alangliphan paklang-lo.
Karjong japonsi Simeon Kardomhemthepi arlo damlo. Aron kepathik ateng keklemjisi apo a-oso aphan kevan ahut
alangli oso aphan arbaksi Arnam aphan rosi pulo,
“Hemphu, Jakong Kethe Parpik a-Bang,
nang lam asonsi,
nang non nangban aphan aning kangsam pen padam long-lo.
Pima nemek-hini pen nang akejok thek-longtang-lo,
nangli labangso akejok kadokave
amonit angno bitang-lo:
Lake kethe-ang, atheke, Jihudi kalidet atum aphan kepaklang alamlo,
lapen lake nang rat, Israel atum adak aturlo.”
Lapen api apo atum alangli lamjir keningje alam pen apot manghuphrong-lo.

Lapen Simeon halatum aphan ahirjume pisi apei Meri aphan pulo, “Chini iktha, Israel angbong penang atum kevirji lapen penang atum kethurji aphansi lapen lam kechedan-i angthek aphansi labangso a-oso aphan battang-lo.
Lapen lapusonsi penang atum aning kematha kepatujoi alam klangdakji, lapen nokjir pen ketok asonsi nangli ning keduk lutchokji.”
Lapen Anna pu inut amontripi dolo. Alangli ke Asher akhei, Phanuel asopilo. Alangli sarpi-olo, pima apenan pen ningkan throksi an dorap-lo,
lapen alangli arta ningkan throknerkep ra phli anta pahemebomlo. Alangli ajo anerlota an kehum lapen kechoningri pen Arnam aphan ingduksi Kardom a-Hem thepi pen nangbarbedet-lo.
Lapen alangli halabangso ahut mamat nangcheklangsi Arnam aphan chorolo, lapen Jerusalem kejokji aphan kanghong atum an aphan alangli halabangso a-oso alamjir pulo.
Lapen Hemphu aron asonthotsi kadokave klemdet aphi Jisu lapen Meri aphan ha Galili adet amethang arong Najareth chevoithulo.
Lapen oso thelo, lapen ingtangrak-lo, lapen gian pen pleng muchot muchotbomlo lapen Arnam akangjinso alangli long dolo.
Lapen api apo atum aningkantinta Kejok Achojun a-Meipi ahut Jerusalem dunbom.
Lapen Jisu arta ningkan krehini choksi halatum kai atengsi chojun amei along kedunji aphan Jerusalem arlu damlo.
Lapen kenangji arni an hadak dokoksi hem kechevoi ahut la oso Jerusalemsi dobomlo. Jisu api apo atum laso alam chininedet-lo.
Bonta alangli armu angbongsi do pu mathasi halatum arnisi atovar damlo lapen halatum chepho chero lapen jirpi jirpo atum angbong ri pamelo.
Lapen long thekthedetsi halatum alangliphan ri ponbomsi Jerusalem chevoithu phak-lo.

Lapen nithom arni halatum alangliphan long-lo. Alangli Kardomhemthepi arlosi Jihudi athanbang, atheke kethan atum angbong ingnidunlo, lapen halatum kethan alam arjudunlo lapen halatum aphanta lam arjubomlo.
Lapen alangli kethan alam karjulong atum an alangli bidi lapen kethak alam pen apot abidi jutdet-lo.

Lapen alangliphan thek-longsi api-apo atum manghuhak-lo, lapen apei alangliphan pulo, “Nangli kopi apotsi lapusonle nelitum aphan klemloma, po? Mathanon, nangli po lapen neli ke matha dukpiksi nangliphan rilo.”
Lapen alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum kopi athesi nephan riloma? Neke nepo ahemsi do nangji pu nangtum chininedetma?”
Bonta alangli halatum aphan kepu alamthe halatum chininedet-lo.
Lasi Jisu halatum along hirdunsi ha Najareth chedunlo lapen hadak api-apo alam kroipet-lo. Asarpi la kadokave alam aning arlo chebilo.
Lapen Jisu agian lapen arta ta plengbomlo lapen Arnam lapen monit atum alangliphan aning dokmuchot muchotbomlo.

Ansi Tiberias Recho kepangri ningkan krepho kechok ahut Pontias Pilatsi Judia a-Govornor lo, lapen Herod ke Galili adet Agovornorlo lapen akorte, Philip ke Iturea lapen Trachonitis, la detni Agovornorlo, lapen Lisanias ke Abilene Agovornorlo.
Lapen Annas lapen Kaiaphas, la banghini atum ke kurusar aketheneilo. Halabangso ahut kejejangtang ajosi Arnam alam Jekariah asopo Jon along vang-lo.
Lapen alangli Jordan akung arei alongri adang an damsi pap kediya kelongji aphan ning kecherui abaptisom alam pachethangdamlo.
Lake Isaiah montri alam aloh along ketok asonthot-lo, atheke hadak tok-lo:
“Komane abang kejejangtang ajo hangkong-lo:
‘Hemphu atovar sikpinon;
atovarso an pakengpinon.
Arlok an papleng-et nangji,
lapen anglongtin lapen anglongsotinta paklamchen nangji.
Kekdang adim pakengset nangji lapen likbuk likvor adim an paklamchen nangji.
Lapen kadokave amonit atum Arnam kopusonsi pajokthek,
lake thek-longhurji.’ ”
Lasi Jon arideng pen baptisom ke-enji aphan kevangbom armu atum aphan alangli pukong-lo, “Pherui akhei! Kevangji dokdok Arnam aning kethi pen kekatji aphan matsi nangtum aphan pareloma?

Tangte ning kecherui a-ot hei hei paklangnon. Nangtum hijan angbong ‘Ephusar ke Abraham lo’ lale kepuji pangchengri. Pima ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, labangso a-arlong hei hei pen Arnam ke Abraham aphan aso-asu paplang-un.
Thengpi hei hei kepiji atengri alongsi acho bi tekang-lo. Tangte Athe keme kepathethe athengpi an aphan ke pipetpo lapen me phrindutpo.”
Lapen armu atum alangliphan arjubomsi pulo, “Tangte netum pisi klem nangjima?”
Alangli thaksi halatum aphan pulo, “Choi pakni kedo abang kavedet abang aphan epak papinang, lapen an-han kedo abang lapu thakthak-le paklem nang.”
Lapen penang midu kerung atumta baptisom ke-enjisi vang-lo, lapen alangliphan arjulo, “Thanbang netum kopisi keklem nangjima?”
Lapen alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Detpangri ahukum ateng pen apar ake-ong ke bor-i bor-a pen rungri.”
Lapen penang an chedanbang atum alangliphan arjusi pulo, “Netum pisi klem nangjima?”
Lapen alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Kepaphere pen tangka cho-enri lapen kechobei alam bok-ri lapen nangtum kechongdat anam kelong an penle ning chepangsam-ira donon.”
Lapen rat atum kanghong phrongbom ahut lapen kadokave atum aning arlo Jon alam, atheke alangli Khristo ma;

la kechemathahur ahut Jon kadokave aphan thaksi pulo, “Ne nangtum aphan lang pen baptisom pibomlang, bonta nepar ajakong kethemu abang vangjilang. Alangli keng-op ari kephriji anta ne-ot ave. Alangli nangtum aphan Karjong Kangthir pen baptisom nangpiji.
Alangli jimtim kepangthei-etji aphan lapen asok keroiji aphan alangli aso hongthrok akongvek otdongsi do; bonta Alangli aphe-e ke kemep un-epin ame along phrindutji.”
Lasi akaprek kaprek penang alam pen aning parungsi alangli rat aphan birta keme pachethang-lo.
Bonta Herod govornor ke akorte apiso Herodias aphan ke-en pen apot lapen Herod kehingno akam hei hei keklem apot Jon alangliphan ingchek-lo.
Lapen Herod Jon aphan phatek bengsi kehingno muchot akam klem-lo.
Lapen kadokave arat atum bap-tisom endet aphi, Jisuta baptisom enlo. Alangli kardom ahut sining ingpudang-lo,
lapen Karjong Kangthir, vothung ason nanghirsi alangli phuthak inghulo lapen sining pen “Nang helo ne kechinghon asopo, nangphan ne ning dok-olo” pu ase vang-lo.
Lapen kam keklem kepangcheng ahut Jisu arta ningkan thomkep anbak dolo. Apo ke Joseph pusi monit atum mathalo. Joseph apo ke Heli helo.
Heli apo ke Matthat, Matthat apo ke Levi, Levi apo ke Melki, Melki apo ke Jannai, Jannai apo ke Joseph.
Joseph apo ke Mattathias, Mattathias apo ke Amos, Amos apo ke Nahum, Nahum apo ke Esli, Esli apo ke Naggai,
Naggai apo ke Maath, Maath apo ke Mattathias, Mattathias apo ke Seme-in, Seme-in apo ke Josek, Josek apo ke Joda.
Joda apo ke Joanan, Joanan apo ke Rhesa, Rhesa apo ke Jerubbabel, Jerubbabel apo ke Shealtiel, Shealtiel apo ke Neri.
Neri apo ke Melki, Melki apo ke Addi, Addi apo ke Kosem, Kosem apo ke Elmadam, Elmadam apo ke Er.
Er apo ke Joshua, Joshua apo ke Eliezer, Eliezer apo ke Zorim, Zorim apo ke Matthat, Matthat apo ke Levi.
Levi apo ke Simon, Simon apo ke Judas, Judas apo ke Joseph, Joseph apo ke Jonam, Jonam apo ke Eliakim.
Eliakim apo ke Melea, Melea apo ke Menna, Menna apo ke Mattatha, Mattatha apo ke Nathan, Nathan apo ke David.
David apo ke Jesse, Jesse apo Obed, Obed apo ke Boaz, Boaz apo ke Sala, Sala apo ke Nahshon.
Nahshon apo ke Amminadab, Amminadab apo ke Admin, Admin apo ke Arni, Arni apo ke Hezron, Hezron apo ke Perez, Perez apo ke Juddah, Juddah apo ke Jakob,
Jakob apo ke Isaak, Isaak apo ke Abraham, Abraham apo ke Terah, Terah apo ke Nahor.
Nahor apo ke Serug, Serug apo ke Reu, Reu apo ke Peleg, Peleg apo ke Eber, Eber apo ke Shelah.
Shelah apo ke Kainan, Kainan apo ke Arphaxad, Arphaxad apo ke Shem, Shem apo ke Noah, Noah apo ke Lamek.
Lamek apo ke Methuselah, Methuselah apo ke Enok, Enok apo ke Jared, Jared apo ke Mahalaleal, Mahalaleal apo ke Kainan.
Kainan apo ke Enos, Enos apo ke Seth, Seth apo ke Adam, Adam apo ke Arnam.
Jisu Karjong Kangthir pen pleng-setsi Jordan pen chevoilo, lapen Karjong alangliphan kejejangtang ajo padamlo
lapen hadak alangliphan ni phlikep Diabol sat lang-lo. Halabangso arni ahut alangli thangnatta chochelo lapen la jutdetsi alangli an ingchirlo.
Diabol alangliphan pulo, “Nangli jongsi Arnam asopo tangte, him cheplang non pura labangso a-arlong aphan punon.”
Bonta Jisu alangliphan thak-lo, “Him pen lok ke monit atum reng-i-edetji, ‘lapusi tok tang-lo.’”
Lapen Diabol alangliphan angsong parlu ponsi amek siripsi pirthe adang arat an alangliphan paklangpet-lo.
Lapen Diabol alangliphan pulo, “Neli nangliphan la kadokave ajakong lapen adak atur do-an nangli pipo, pima lahei neli rideng hodai tang-lo, lapen neli ning kehang aling abang aphan pi un.
Tangte nangli neliphan ardom lote la kadokave nangli mar cheplangpo.”
Jisu thaksi alangliphan pulo, “‘Hemphu nang Arnam aphanle ardomkhrup-ra alangli phanle ingduk-chot nangji,’ lake tok tang-lo.”
Lapen alangli alangliphan Jerusalem ponlo, lapen Kardom a-Hem thepi angsong achele athak parjap-lo, lapen alangliphan pulo, “Nangli jongsi Arnam a-Sopo tangte, ladak penle nangli chingthu bupnon.
Pima nangliphan kerai pamejisi alangli apherangke atum aphan ahukum piji.
Lapen ‘nangli keng kopine kepatekungke pinjisi halatum amethang ari pen nangli rung ponphomji,’ lapusonsi toktang-lo.”
Jisu thaksi alangliphan pulo, “ ‘Nang Hemphu, atheke Nang Arnam aphan asat lang nangne,’ lapusi pulo.”
Asat do-an langdetsi Diabol malomso ahut an alangli dung pen damjuilo.
Ansi Karjong ajakong pen Jisu Galili adet chevoilo, lapen alangli lam det adang chethangpet-lo.
Lapen alangli halatum asinagog ahem hei hei arlo than bomlo lapen kadokave atum alangliphan rojolo.
Jisu amethang kethe keding adim, atheke Najareth vang-lo, lapen kai atengsi Sabbath arni alangli Sinagog along dunlo, lapen Alangli keporheji aphan thurlo.
Alangliphan Isaiah montri aloh pidet-lo lapen la pursi hadak labangso alam ketok long-lo,
“Hemphu a-Karjong ne phuthak do,
pima ne keduk kelak atum aphan birta keme kepachethangjisi alangli nephuthak jangthu patip-lo;
phatek kebengkoi atum aphan kelophlot-ra keselok atum aphan kepachecharthujisi birta kethanji;
bang aduk kanghoi kechechak atum aphan kepajokji;
Hemphu ekangjinso aningkan alam kepachethangji,
la kadokave akam aphansi alangli nephan toitang-lo.”
Alangli aloh thuisi pherangke arideng pithulo, lapen ingnilo. Sinagog along kedun atum an alangli-phansi langphrong-lo.
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Pini nanglitum labangso ahastro alam karjuphrong pen ajok alam chekoktang-lo.”
Kadokave atum alangliphan haki pidunhurlo, lapen alangli ingho pen nangkebar akangjinso alam pen apot manghuphrongsi pulo, “Labangso abang ke Joseph asopolo, kalima?”

Ansi alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nangmethangle chepametha daktor, pu asarlamthe pen nangtum nephan puji, lapen netum karjulong, Kapernaum along keklemtang akam an dak nangmethang adet alongta klemtha puta nangtum nephan puvekji.”
Alangli puthulo, “Ame-thang ahavar angbong ke Arnam amontri atum aphan baduta chak abang ave.
Bonta ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, ningkan kethom ra chiklo jonthrok sining ingkirthipsi det adang akhim kethe kethur ahut Israel adet Elijah a-arni ahut hemepi atum do-o, lake ahok-lo.
Bonta Sidon adet Zarephath arong inut ahemepi along apar badu alongta Elijah aphan toitedet-lo.
Lapen Elijah ahut Israel adet si-i akeso kelong atum do-o, bonta Siria adet kedo Naman aphan apar ke badu aphanta pangthirthedet-lo.”
Ansi Sinagog along alangli kethan alam karjudun atum ke jasemet aning thilo,
lapen thurpaksi alangliphan rongsopi pen doilap lap-lo. Halatum arongsopi ke inglong athaksi dolo. Lasi halatum alangliphan inglong athepai pen kevarji aphan akung an ponlo.
Bonta alangli halatum anglum lutchoksi damjuilo.
Ansi Jisu Galili adet Kapernaum arongsopi nanghirtuk-lo. Kesang mate Sabbath arni alangli halatum aphan lam thanlo,
lapen halatum thirikhurlo, pima alam ajakong dolo.
Sinagog arlo kangthirthe ahi-i langno kepho abang dolo, lapen alangli ase kethe pen hangsersi pulo.
“Oh Najareth a-Jisu, nangli nelitum along kopi akam doma? Nangli nelitum aphan kepavirjisi kevang-loma? Nangli komatma, lake neli chinilo: Nanglike Arnam pen kevang Kangthir abang-lo!”

Bonta Jisu laphan ingcheksi pulo, “Dojoi! Lapen alangli long pen nangbarnon.” Hi-i alangliphan longle athak halatum angbong paklibupsi, alangliphan thangta phangnone pin pen alangli long pen nangbarlo.

Lapen rat kedo-anta manghuphrong-lo lapen chepuhurlo, “Lake kopuson alam loma? Pima alangli kelong ajakong lapen amethang ajakong pen kangthirthe ahi-i atum aphan hukum pilo, lapen halatum ingtan nang barlo.”
Lapen alangli lam det adang bithe bitha chethang-lo.
Ansi Jisu Sinagog ahem pen damsi Simon ahem lut damlo, bonta Simon anipi Jasemet aphu solo lapen halatum labangpi pen apot Jisu aphan choningrilo.
Alangli labangpi adung arjapthersi phu keso aphan ingchek-lo, lapen aphu keso hamdet-lo. Lapen labangpi hala mamat thursi halatum aphan ru-thailo.
Arni kechi ahut amethang methang along kedo akaprek kaprek akeso atum aphan Jisu adung vanpet-lo. Alangli abangphutin aphuthak ari batsi halatum aphan pamethulo.
Hi-i atumta penang atum along pen nangbarsi hangjosi pulo, “Nanglike Arnam a-Sopo!”
Bonta Jisu halatum aphan ingcheksi ningjeri pusi hukum sodak pilo, pima alangli ke Khristolo pu halatum chinilo.
Puthot adap the-angsi alangli monit kavedet adim damlo. Monit ake-ongpi alangliphan ridamlo lapen alangli long vang-lo lapen halatum adung pen alangliphan kepadam longledetji aphan klem bor-i-olo.
Bonta alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Akaprek kaprek arongsopi alongta ne Arnam arat a-Birta Keme than nangji, pima labangso akam aphansi nephan Arnamsi netoilo.”
Lapen alangli Judia adet Sinagog hei hei arlo pachethang ponbomlo.
Arnisi armu atum Jisu aphan petklingsi Arnam alam karjudun ahut Jisu ke Gennesaret atalo akung arjap-lo.
Alangli talo akung telong humni thek-long-lo. Pima ok kebeng atum la otekangsi alan hei hei lang jolo.
Lapen telong ehum, atheke Simon atelong chethapsi telong kora pen asap vektu pusi alangli Simon aphan choningrilo. Alangli ingni lunsi armu atum aphan thanlo.
Lapen keningje pajutsi alangli Simon aphan pulo, “Lang karnuk krung adimle telong vek-ra ok ahur akethepi kebengji aphan nangtum alan hei hei jengtha.”
Simon thaksi pulo, “Hemphu, netum jo pangthang jasemet chepaduk-lo setta thangta longledet-lo, bonta nangli hukum kroisi neli lan hei hei jengpo.”
Latum la klemdetsi ok ahur akethepi beng-lo. Lapen halatum alan chingsekji dokdok-lo.
Lasi atelong kaprek along kedo halatum ari asangho atum aphan angphun pakisi nang keparapdunji aphan angthek pilo. Halatum vang-lo, lapen ok thap-o apotsi la telong humnita inglim rang rung-lo.
Simon Pitor la thek-longsi Jisu akeng-ri domkhrupsi pulo, “Ne dung pen damnon, Hemphu, pima neke papi amonit-lo.”
Halatum kebengtang a-ok ahur akethepi apotsi Pitor lapen ari atum an thirik-olo.

Lapen ke Zebedi asopomar, Jems lapen Jonta lapu thakthak-lo. Halatum ke Simon pen kam keklem rap rap atumlo. Lapen Jisu Simon aphan pulo, “Phere nangne, non pen apara nang monit kenep abang cheplangji.”
Lapen atelong kora vanpetsi halatum kadokave amar che-o tekang-lo lapen alangli phi phi dunlo.

Lapen arni isi alangli erong arongsopi along dolo. Hadak abang bithe bitha si-i kecho, pinso amonit inut dolo. Alangli Jisu aphan thek-longsi domkrupsi alangliphan choningrisi pulo, “Hemphu, nang ning hang-lote, nang nepangthir un.”
Lapen ari chephajengsi lapen abang otsi alangli pulo, “Ne ning hang-lo, ingthirnon.” Lapen hala mamat si-i alangli bang along avedet-lo.
Lapen badu aphanta thanri, bonta damra kurusar aphan chepaklang-ra nang kepangthirjile Moses kepi aron thot halatum aphan haki kepijile athok thok damnon pusi Jisu alangliphan hukum pilo.
Bonta Jisu lamjir chethangmuchot-lo lapen armu ake-ongpi karjuji lapen akeso pen kemedetji aphan chingrumlo.
Bonta Jisu ke abatai batai kejejangtang ajo damjuisi hadak Arnam ardomlo.

Lapen arni isi alangli kethan ahut Pharisi lapen aron thekser atum hadak ingniphrong-lo. Halatum Galili adet lapen Judia arong an lapen Jerusalem penta vang-lo. Lapen bang atum aphan kepameji aphan Hemphu ajakong Jisu along dolo.
Lapen chini iktha, monit atum inut kethiklak apinso aphan ahongplang pen nangcharchongsi vanlo lapen Jisu angno kebiji aphan hem kelutji abidi rilo.
Monit ongpik apotsi lut pon thekthedetsi halatum hem asarnung athak arlu damsi sarnung kedip a-ita tereksi atar pen abang pen monit atum angbong Jisu angno nang pasunlo.
Halatum akekroi thek longsi alangli pulo, “O monit, nang pap hei hei diya tang-lo.”
Lapen aron thekser atum lapen Pharisi atum lam kechedan pangchengsi pulo, “Arnam aphan kepinrem alam kepu abang, la komatma? Arnam apar baduta pap diya un-e, kalima?”
Bonta Jisu halatum kechedansei alam chinilorlo lapen thaksi halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum aning arlo kechedan-sei alam kopi?
‘Nangpap hei hei diya tang-lo,’ kalite ‘thurra kengkam chejortha,’ la sonni alam angbong kolo abangsi kepu kejoimuchotma?

Bonta pirthe athak pap hei hei kediyaji monit asopo ajakong do, nangtum la kechinijisi aporman nangpaklangpo.” Alangli thi-klak abang aphan pulo, “Ne nangphan nangpulang, thurra nangtarthui cheponra nanghem chedamnon.”
Lapen hala mamat halatum angno thursi alangli ke-i atar cheponsi Arnam anong pathesi ahem chedamlo.
Lapen halatum manghuphrong-lo, lapen Arnam anong pathelo, lapen thirik-hursi halatum pulo, “Pini etum manghumeme akam thek-long-lo di komarli!”
Lapen labangso aphi Jisu ingtan barlo, lapen Levi pu inut midu kerung abang aphan amaro along keching-nilun thek-longsi langding-lo. Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Ne phi phi nangdun non.”
Lapen Levi amar atar che-o-etsi, thursi alangli phi phi dunlo.
Ansi Levi amethang ahemsi Jisu aphan kecho-kejun ameipi pathikpilo. Halatum along midu kerung ake-ongpi atum lapen akaprek atumta ingni-dunlo.
Pharisi atum lapen halatum abe kedun, aron thekser atum alangli sangho atum aphan pasimuhursi pulo, “Nangtum pi apotsi la midu kerung atum lapen papi atum pen cho rap-rap jun rap-rap ma?”
Jisu thaksi halatum aphan pulo, “Apran mesen atum kali, kesodet atumsi daktor nangji.
Dhoromi atum kali, bonta papi atum aning kecheruiji aphan kephajisi ne vang-lo.”

Bonta halatum alangliphan pulo, “Jon asangho atum abatai batai an humlo, lapen choningrisi Arnam ardombomlo lapen Pharisi atum asangho atumta lapu thakthak-lo, bonta nangsangho atum ke chobom lapen junbom.”
Bonta Jisu halatum aphan thak-lo, “Piso kechepangri apinso abang dotik ke nangtum piso kepangri kedun atum aphan an pahum un-e, kalima?
Bonta halatum adung pen kechepangri apinso abang aphan pon-detji, lapen halabangso ahut halatum an hum hurji, lason ahut vangji.”
Lapen halatum aphan Jisu lamlir penta pulo, “Baduta achoi kemi pen achet ingseksi achoiban bangbe, bonta la klem lote alangli akemi ingsekji lapen achet kemita peban pen chingli-tledetji.
Lapen baduta drakha ahor kemi ok-reng abong ban pen pangpenpe, kalite la klemlote drakha ahor kemi ke ok-reng abong pangbopsi amethang buphakji lapen ok-reng abongta virdetji.
Bonta drakha ahorlang kemi ke ok-reng abong kemi pensi pangpenvek nangji.
Lapen baduta drakha ahorban junversi akemi hanghe, pima ‘aban alang memu,’ pusi alangli puji.”
Lapen kesang mate Sabbath arni Jisu sok ajo atovar kedong ponput ahut asangho atum sok abu ingthonsi, chohenotsi cho ponbomlo.
Lapen manene a-Pharisi atum pulo, “Nangtum kesang arni aronre akam pi apotsi klemloma?”
Jisu thaksi halatum aphan pulo, “David lapen ari asangho atum kang-chir ahut alangli keklem akam alam nangtum porhehepin langma?
Atheke, alangli Arnam ahem lut damsi, Arnam aphan kepitang ahim ensi cholo lapen ari asangho atum aphanta ronpet-lo, bonsetta kurusar atum apar ke labangso amar cho kertang-lo.”
Lapen alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Monit a-Sopo ke kesang arni a-Hemphulo.”
Akaprek akesang arni alangli ha Sinagog along damsi thanlo. Lapen ari ar-e anat kethiklak inut amonit hadak dolo.
Lapen alangliphan adai ketinji abidi risi aron thekser lapen Pharisi atum alangli Sabbath arni keso abang aphan pamejima pusi langphrong-lo.
Bonta Jisu halatum kematha alam chinilo lapen ari thi-klak amonit aphan pulo, “Thurra mei angbong arjaptha.” Lapen alangli thursi arjaptherlo.

Lapen Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Ne nangtum aphan karjuji ethe alam do, atheke, Sabbath arni keme akam tong klem longma, mate kehingno akam tong klem longma? Apran tong rai longjima, mate kepavir tong longjima?”
Lapen alangli kadokave atum aphan talavir langsi alangliphan pulo, “Nangri chephajengtha.” Lapen alangli la klemlo, lapen ari medet-lo.
Halatum aning jangjepik-lo, lapen Jisu aphan pisi klem thekjima pusi chethan ponbomlo.
Halabangso arni ahut alangli Arnam kardomji aphan ha inglong arlu damsi jo pangthang Arnam ardomlo.
Adap the-angsi alangli amethang adung asangho atum aphan chehangkoilo, lapen halatum angbong pen alangli bang krehini ingvailo, lapen ketoitang atum pusi amen irlo.
Latum helo, Simon, (Jisu alangliphan Pitor pusi amen irthulo), Lapen akorte Andriu lapen Jems lapen Jon, Philip lapen Bartholomeu;
Mathiu lapen Thomas, Alpheus asopo Jems lapen Zealot pu abang a-Simon;
Jems asopo Judas lapen Judas Iskariot, Kechobeidet abang.
Lapen ketoitang atum pen pen nanghirsi Jisu asangho ake-ongpi pen klamchen adim arjap-lo. Lapen Judia adet adang, Jerusalem lapen talopi akung kedo Tair lapen Sidon alongri pen rat atum ake-ongpi
alangli lam karjujisi lapen akeso kepameji aphan vang-lo. Karjonglang-no kepho atumta vang-lo lapen keso medunlo.
Lapen armu atum an alangliphan ke-otjisi bor-ilo; pima alangli pen jakong nangbarlo, lapen halatum mepet-lo.
Jisu aphu chingthursi asangho atum aphan langdingsi pulo,
“Nangtum keduk atum rengme,
pima Arnam Arat ke nangtum arat-lo!
“Non nangtum an kangchir atum rengme,
pima nangtum ingkrangji!
“Non nangtum kechiru atum rengme,
pima nangtum ingnekji!
“Monit atum nangtum aphan kehijim lapen nangtum aphan mei angbong pen karphlung, nangtum aphan nang kepinrem, lapen Monit a-Sopo pen apot nangtum anong kejo ahut nangtum rengme!
Halabangso arni chehok-ra ning arong pen kannon, pima sining athak nangtum anong-e the-o. Pima halatum aphusar atum lasonthotsi montri atum aphan klemtang-lo.
“Bonta nangtum, atheke non keplang-o atum ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo!
pima nangtum aning plitang-lo;
“Non nangtum, atheke kangkrangling atum ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo!
“Non nangtum kangnek atum ko-an akephere meme pho nangpo!
Pima nangtum ningdukji lapen chirujoji.
“Kadokave atum nangtum aphan mesen pu kepu ahut lake nangtum aphan ko-an akephere meme alamlo! Pima halatum aphusar atum lasonthotsi kechobei amontri atum aphan rojolo.
“Bonta non nelam nang karjudun atum, nangtum aphan ne nangpulang: Nang hotur atum aphan chinghon non, nangtum aphan kehijim atum aphan keme le klemnon;
nangtum aphan ahirjuno kepi atum aphan ahirjume pithunon, lapen nangtum anong kejobom atum aphan Arnam ardom pibomnon.
Nang kecheng ihi nangkardep abang aphan ahi kaprekta chepinon. Lapen nangchoi keding kepon abang pen nangchoi khangthip-ri.
Kehang abang aling aphanle pirepnon, lapen nang mar kethi pon abang arideng pen chehangthuri.
Lapen monit atum nangtum aphan kepaklemji nang ning kehang asonthot-le halatum aphanta klemvernon.
“Jongsi nangtum aphan kanghon atum aphan chinghonchot lote nangtum kopusi ahirjume longjima? Pima papi atum setta alangtum aphan kanghon atum aphan chinghon seroithek.
Lapen ke nangtum aphan akeme akam keklem atum aphan nangtum akeme akam klemchot lote, nangtum kopusi ahirjume longjima? Papi atum setta lake klembomlo.
Lapen nangtum halatum pen longjibon pusi halatum aphan paramlote, nangtum kopusi ahirjume longjima? Papi atum setta netum amar chelongthuji pusi parambom.

Bonta nangtum ahotur atum aphan inghonra akemele klemnon, lapen kelongthuji aphanle ning thethera parambomnon. Anke nangtum anong the-opo, lapen nangtum kangtuinei a-Bang asomar cheplangji. Pima Alangli ke kechingkino lapen kehingno atum aphanta mesen.
Nangtum a-Po kangjinsothek asonthot-le nangtumta ingjinsonon.
“Bang aphan ingsairi, lapen nangtum aphanta Arnam ingsaisedetji. Bang aphan ado padori, lapen nangtum aphanta Arnam ado padodedetji. Diyanon, lapen nangtum diya longji.
Pinon lapen nangtum aphan nangpidetji, teng pamesi, sitsi, hijuksi, tengchorsi nangtum angnosi nangthokji. Pima nangtum ke-en ateng, labangso atengthot pen nangtum aphan tengthudetji.”
Lapen Jisu halatum aphan lamlir pen thanlo, “Amek kave abang amek kave abang aphan tovar japonthekjima? Halatum bang hinita hilik jangrup-re-detjima?
Athanbang apar asangho themu, lapu kali. Bonta kecharli tangdetsi asangho abang phutin amethang athanbang ason thakthak cheplangrepji.
Lapen nang kopi apotsi nang korte amekber aphan langding-lo, lapen nangmek along kedo athengpi achet aphan chemathathe-det-loma?

Mate nangmethang amek arlo kedo athengpi achet alam ke chemathathedetsi, nang kopusonsi nangkorte aphan, ‘O bong, nang mekber nepahek longtha,’ pusi puthekma? Angthin ke-ik abang! Aphrangke nangmethang amek arlo athengpi achet-le chehekjok non, ansi nang korte amekber kehekjokji aphan nang checharpo.
“Pima thengpi keme ke ningjoino athe pathethe, lapen ke ningjoino athengpike athe keme pathethe.
Pima thengpi arongtin aphan athe pen chinidetji, pima ingsu pen thebo athe lik-le, thesobai arong pen drakha athe lik-le.
Akeme amonit aning keme akhi angbong pen akeme vanbom, lapen kehingno abang ke kehingno aning akhi angbong pen kehingno vanbom. Pima aning arlo keplengset pen ajoksi angho pen ningjelo.
“Nangtum kopi athesi nephan ‘Hemphu, Hemphu’ pu hangjo setta ne kepu akam klemkledet-loma?
Nelong kevang lapen nelam karjulongsi keklem abangphutin komat pen chingbar, lake ne nang paklangpo.

Alang ke hem kekim abang ason thakthak-lo. Bangso abang longle parnukkrungsi tuk-lo lapen arlong athaksi ahemthur pangnilo. Lapen lang thepi vangsi lang ali ingplongdung pen lang adihu hem arvak-lo, bonta la paklem un-elo, pima la kim pamelo.
Bonta arjutangdetsi klemkledet abang ke inut amonit ason thakthak-lo. Bangso amonit ahem ahemthur avedetsi hem kimlo. Lang ali ingplongsi lang atarthui hem arvak-lo, lapen hala mamat hem krep-railo!”
Lapen lahei alam an thandetsi Jisu Kapernaum damlo.
Lapen inut Roman aron-aso ahemphu kechinghonpik aban sodetsi thiji dokdok-lo.
Lapen Jisu alamjir arju longsi alangli Judia asarmar atum angbong pen manene atum aphan choningrisi alangli dung toisi papulo, “Vang-ra alangli ban pamethutha.”
Lapen halatum Jisu adung nanglesi jasemet choningrisi pulo, “Bangso amonit nangli akerap kelong nangji a-ot do,
pima alangli amethang ajat aphan chinghonlo, lapen netum aphan sinagogta nekimpilo.”

Lapen Jisu halatum along dunlo. Bonta alangli hem leji dokdok ahut chedanbang ahemphu ajirpo atum aphan toisi papulo, “Hemphu, chepasungri, pima neli hem asarnung arum nangli kevangji aphan neli ot ave,
Lapen la apotsi nangli long kevangji neli ot ave pusi neli ning mathalo, bonta nangli lam ethe ningjera neli ban pamelonang.
Pima nelita bang aber amonit lapen neli berta chedanbang atum do: neli halaphan, ‘Damnon!’ pulote la dampo lapen neli ban aphan, ‘La klemnon’ pulote, la klempo.”

Lapen lahei hei arjulongsi Jisu alangliphan manghuhak-lo lapen alangli phi phi kedun armu atum anat chetevarsi alangli pulo, “Ne nangtum aphan nang pulang, Israel adet angbong setta ne lason akekroi thek-longle pinlang.”
Lapen ketoitang atum Saihemphu ahem chevoisi aban apran mesen thek damlong-lo.
Malomso aphi Jisu Nain pu arongsopi damlo. Asangho atum lapen armu ake-ongpi atumta Alangli long dunlo.
Bonta alangli rongsopi anghap an nangkele ahut rat atum kethitang abang arpum vansi nangbarlo. La kethitang abang ke hemepi asopo po epumpet-lo.
Hemphu la thek-longsi aningmonduk-lo, lapen pulo, “Chiruri!”
Anke alangli damsi kethitang abang arpum kepon-i araptap paphodamlo, lapen hala kecharchongpon atum chingtonkok-lo. Ansi Jisu pulo, “O riso, ne nangphan nangpulo, nangmek prangnon.”
Hala kethilot abang thursi lapen ingnilunsi lam keningjeji pangcheng-lo lapen Jisu labangso abang aphan apei arideng hodailo.
Kadokave atum pherehurlo, lapen Arnam adak-atur pathesi pulo. “Ilitum angbong Arnam amontri kethe inut nangklangtang-lo! Arnam amethang arat aphan kepajokjisi vangtang-lo!”
Judia adet adang lapen bithe bitha alongrita labangso alam chethangpet-lo.
Jon asangho atum alangliphan lahei kadokave alam thandet aphi,
alangli banghini asangho aphan chehangsi Hemphu along alam parjudamtoilo, “kevangji abang alangli heloma, mate anut kaprek aphan inghong nangjilangma?”

Halatum Jisu along vangsi pulo, “Nelitum nangliphan eson alam nangkarjujisi vang-lo. Labangso akam aphan Jon Baptistsi nelitum aphan nangli long nangtoilo. Alam ke lahelo, kevangji abang nangli heloma, mate anut kaprek aphan inghong nangjilangma?”
Halabangso ahut Jisu penang atum aphan keso lapen mavur pen pamelo, hi-i kepho atum aphan pamelo lapen amek kave penang atum aphan pachecharlo.

Jisu la Jon asangho atum aphan pulo, “Nangtum damra kethek-long lapen karjulong alamle Jon aphan thannon, atheke amek kave atum aphan pachecharlo, kethitang atum aphan pathurlo, lapen keduk kelak atum angno birta keme pachethang-lo.
Ne pen apot aning kebibe abang aling rengme!”
Jon apherangke atum chevoidet aphi Jisu armu atum aphan Jon alamjir kethanji pangcheng-lo. Alangli pulo, “Nangtum kejejangtang ajo Jon along kedam ahut kopi thek damloma? Tomon kejap a-arpikma?
Nangtum kopisi kelangdamma? Phirsoni ape keche-um abang aphanma? Chini tha, ahir kechepiji lapen rengdok rengni pen kedo atum ke recho ahemsi dochot.
Tangte nanglitum kopisi kelangdamma, nephan nethantha. Arnam amontri inut aphanma? Kalang-lo, bonta nangtum montri apar akethemu abang aphan thek-longtang-lo.
Pima Jon alamjirsi hastro along tok tang-lo, atheke, Arnam pulo, ‘Ne nepherangke nang phrang toiji, alangli nangphrang nangphan tovar sikpiji.
Ne nangtum aphan nang pulang, “Arlosomar asomar atum angbong Jon theneilo. Bonta Arnam Arat akebinei abang ke alangli par themulo.”
Lapen kadokave arat lapen midu kerung atumta alangli lam arjulongsi Arnam dhoromi ahukum kroilo lapen halatum Jon arideng pen baptisom enlo.
Bonta Pharisi atum lapen aron thekser atum ke Arnam kethikpitang, Arnam aning kehang ason dengdedet-lo, lapen Jon arideng pen baptisom ke-enji molo.
Jisu puthulo, “Tangte ne labangso a-ove amonit atum aphan kopi pensi pangbar poma? Latum kopi pen chingbarma?

Halatum ke hithi kangnira lahin lahin kechehang varet a-osomar atum ason thakthak-lo. Ihi anat atum hangpo, ‘Netum nangtum aphan pongsi but-lo, bonta nangtum kanke! Netum nangtum aphan charhelo, bonta nangtum chirure!’
Jon baptist vangsi an-humlo, drakha ahorta junjelo, lapen nangtum pulo, ‘alangli ke inut hi-i kepholok abang-lo!’
Monit asopo vangsi cholo, junlo, lapen, ‘langtha, choboho lapen drakha ahor kangri abang, midu kerung lapen papi atum ajirpo!’ pusi nangtum pulo.
Tebonta giani atum anke Arnam agian aphan ahok pusi puhurlo.”
Pharisi inut amethang ahem an kepachojisi Jisu aphan phalo, lapen alangli Pharisi ahem damsi an kechojisi chongnilo.

Chini iktha, rongsopi angbong papi arloso inut dolo. Lapen Jisu Pharisi ahem an kecho pu chinisi alangli nung anat kenemprujin ajangthu, arlong kelok abong pen vansi akengtir anat arjapsi chiru bomlo.
Lapen amekkri pen Jisu akeng kepachamvokjisi pangcheng-lo lapen amethang achu pen venbomlo lapen kechinghonpik asonsi akeng ingjup-lo, lapen kenempru ajangthu patip-lo.
Pharisi la thek longsi aning arlo chepulo, “Labangso amonit jongsi montri tangte, alangli phan ke-ot arloso komatma, lapen kopuson apapi abangpi ma, lake alangli chiniji apot-lo!”
Jisu thaksi alangli phan pulo, “Simon, ne nangphan kepuji ethe theni alam dolang.” Lapen alangli thak-lo, “Pu iktha, Thanbang.”
“Inut tangka keparam abang along banghini amonit apreng dolo. Inut apreng ke sika pharo kethom lapen akaprek abang ke sika thomkep.
Halatum apreng kechetuji thangta avedetsi alangli ingjinsosi banghini aphanta diyadet-lo. Tangte, kolo abangsi alangliphan inghon muchotji?”
“Kediya kelong ongmuchot abangbo,” pusi Simon thak-lo. Lapen Jisu alangli phan thak-lo, “Nangli athikpetsi thak-lo.”

Lapen arloso anat chetevarsi alangli Simon aphan pulo, “Nang labangso arloso thek long-loma? Ne nang hem vangsi lutlo, lapen nekeng kechechamji aphan nangke lang nepipedet-lo; bonta labangpi amekkri pen ne keng chamlo lapen achu pen venlo.
Nang nephan kangjup pen kardom ne pipedet-lo; bonta labangpi vangsi ha hem kelut pen ne keng ingjupbomlang.
Ne phu athak nang ke jangthu patiptedet-lo bonta labangpi ke kenempru ajangthu pen ne keng patip tang-lo.
Lahelo ne nang pulang, ‘alangli pap do-o setta diyatang-lo, pima alangli akanghon the-o. “Bonta cherso kediya kelong abang ke cherso nat inghonlo.”
Lapen Jisu labangpi aphan pulo, “Nang pap hei hei diyatang-lo.”
Lapen kangni rap-rap atum aning arlo chepuhurlo, “Pap hei hei anta kediya un abang la komatma?”
Bonta Jisu labangpi aphan pulo, “Nang kekroisi nangphan nangpajoktang-lo; ningkangsam penle damnon.”
Lapen malomso aphi Jisu rongsopi lapen arong arong damsi Arnam arat abirta keme than pachethang ponbomlo. Bang krehini asangho atum alangli long dunlo,
lapen manene arlosomar atumta dolo. Atheke, keso hei hei keme lapen hi-i langno atum pen kejoktang penang arlosomar atum, Megdala a-Meri, (labangpi pen hi-i bangthroksi nang bartang-lo,)
lapen Herod ahemaripi, Chuza apiso, Joanna, lapen Susana lapen akaprek penang atumta dolo. Labangpi atum amethang methang amar pen Jisu lapen asangho atum aphan rap dunlo.
Armu ake-ongpi chingrumbomsi lapen arongsopitin pen monit atum Jisu along vangbomsi, alangli lamlir pen thanlo.
“Ahut isi inut chili kerik abang chili rik damlo. Alangli chili kerik ahut penang achili ke tovar akungsi klolo, lapen la aphan dongpon long-lo lapen nampi avo atum vangsi chongthok-et-lo.
Lapen akaprek achili ke longpak athak klolo, lapen lake kechingjok pen mamat chekedulo, pima hadak longle kecham avedet-lo.
Akaprek achili ke ingsu kethe arong ajosi klolo, lapen ingsu kethe arong la pen the rap-rapsi la aphan petthip-lo.
Lapen ajehak achili ke longle keme ajosi klolo, lapen arong thesi athe phan pharo pathelo.” Lapen labangso alam kepu ahut Jisu hangkongsi pulo, “Ano kedo abang parju nang!”
Labangso alamlir athe kopima pusi asangho atum Jisu aphan arjulo.

Jisu halatum aphan thak-lo, “Arnam Arat akepatu alam kechiniji, lake nangtum aphan nangpitang-lo, bonta akaprek atum aphan ke lamlir pensi thanlo. Lasi latum thek longbom setta thek longledetji lapen arjubom setta chini nedetji.”
“Bonta Lamlir athe lahelo: Chili ke Arnam alamlo.
Tovar akung keklo achili ke karjulong atumlo; latum kroikredetsi kejok kelongledetji aphan Diabol vangsi halatum aning arlo pen alam pondet-lo.
Longpak athak keklo achili ke lahelo, arjulongsi aning arong pen alam deng-lo, bonta latum angkur avelo; malomso aphan kroipo, bonta asat kevang ahut aphi chiruiphakpo.

Lapen ingsu kethe arong ajo keklo achili ke la helo: latum ke arjulo, bonta bangso akai aphan akeningbi, akhi lapen pirthe aning arong hei hei latum aphan petthip-lo, lapen latum athe pathe thekthelo.
Lapen longle keme ajo keklo achili ke la helo: latum ke keme lapen kechingki me-o aning pen arjulo, lapen alam otthip bomsi kechechakthek ajakong pen halatum kaiketa athe patheverlo.
“Baduta melur keira phule pen parkupke lapen hongplang arumta bibe, bonta kevang atum an akethe-ang kethek longjisi melur archok athaksi la batji.
Pima keklangkledetji, lason akepatu amar thangnatta ave, lapen bang atum chininedetji lapen kethe-ang angbong kevangvedetji, lason akepatu amarta ave.
Tangte kopusonsi arjuji; lale langpame non; pima amar kedo abang aling aphan ansose pidetji, bonta thangta kavedet abang along penke, la ne mar pu kechepu amar setta pondetji.”
Apei lapen amumar atum Jisu along vang-lo, bonta armu ke-ong pen apot adung pale thekthe det-lo.
Mane abang alangli phan alam thanlo, “Nangli pei lapen nangli mumar atum ingtansi arjapphrong-lo. Halatum nangliphan kethek longji aning hang-lo.”
Jisu thaksi halatum aphan pulo, “Arnam alam karju lapen kekroi atum helo ne pei lapen nemumar atumlo.”

Arni isi Jisu amethang asangho atum pen pen telong chethap rap-rapsi halatum aphan pulo, “Talo parai kap lonang.” Lasi halatum telong ari phrisi nang barlo. Halatum kedambom ahut Jisu amek jang-lot-lo.
Lapen men men amat tomonpi adihu dihu vang-lo lapen telong arlo lang chethapvursi phere memelo.
Halatum Jisu adung damsi, ingthursi pulo, “Hemphu, Hemphu, etum acham dampo.” Lapen alangli mek prangsi tomon lapen lang adihu aphanta ingchek-lo. Tomon lapen lang adihuta hamsi ingsamrilo.
Anke Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum akekroi konatlo?”
Bonta halatum phere hursi manghu phrong-lo, lapen chepuhurlo, “Bai! labangso abang komatma? Pima alangli tomon lapen lang aphanta hukum pilo, lapen latum alangli lam arjulo!”
Jisu lapen ari asangho atum Gerasene adet, Galili angdenchit, paraisi atelong che-olo.
Jisu telong pen kehir pen mamat rong asor inut hi-i kepho abang alangli pen chetong-lo. Ajir dingklui pen alangli pe che-um-edet-lo lapen hem dode detsi thiri ajosi dolo.

Lapen Jisu aphan thek longsi alangli hangchirlo, ansi akeng-ri domkhrupsi hangsersi pulo, “Kangtuinei Arnam a-Sopo, Jisu; neli long nangli kopi akam doma? Neli kechoningri athe lahelo, neli phan pasung-ori.”
Pima bangso amonit pen nang barnon pusi Jisu hi-i langno aphan hukum pilo.
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Nangli men kopilo?” Alangli thak-lo, “Neli men ke ‘Legion’ ” pima hi-i ake-ongpi alangli long lut damlo.
Hi-i atum Jisu aphan choningrilo, atheke halatum aphan aklong chechar un-epin aherangpi arlo ketoitedetji aphansi halatum mathalo.
Hadak inglong athak phak ahur akethe kechopan do. Lasi hi-i atum alangliphan choningrisi pulo, “Latum angbongle netum aphan palut longtha.” Lapen alangli hukum tholo.
Lapen hi-i atum halabangso amonit pen nangbarsi phak ahur angbong lut damlo. Lapen phak ahur ingchengdeng arleng anat ingplong phitsi talo arlo klosi lang jangkoilo.
Phak kevi atum la keplangtang alam thek longsi katphlung-lo, lapen arongsopi angbong lapen rit ahavar anta labangso abirta pachethang-lo.

Lapen halatum la keplangtang ason kelangjisi nangbarlo, lapen Jisu along vangsi hi-i atum alangli pen nangkebar, halabangso abang ape kechepindengra aning binong pen Jisu akeng-ri kangnilun thekdam long-lo, lapen halatum pherehurlo.
Hi-i kepho abang kopusonsi medet-lo, lake kethekdun atumsi halatum aphan thanlo.
Ansi halatum angbong pen kepadamjisi Gerasa lapen akung arei arat anta alangliphan choningrilo, pima halatum jasemet pherelo. Lasi telong ehum chethapsi Jisu damjuilo.
Hi-i atum ke-o tekang abang ke Jisu along kedunjisi choningri-olo. Bonta Jisu alangliphan toisi pulo,
“Nang hem chedamra Arnam nangphan keklemtang akam an chethan damnon.” Bangso amonit damsi arongsopi adang an Jisu alangliphan keklemtang akam alam pachethang ponbomlo.
Jisu kechevoi ahut rat atum aning arong pen alangliphan chak-lo, pima halatum do-an alangliphansi inghongphrong-lo.
Ansi inut amonit Jairos pu abang vang-lo; alangli ke Sinagog ahemphulo. Lapen Jisu akeng-ri domkhrupsi alangli hem kedunji aphan choningrilo.
Pima alangli inutnat asopi, keso pen thiji dokdok-lo. Alangli arta ningkan krehini anbak dolo.
Jisu tovar kedam ahut rat atum alangliphan pet het-lo.
Lapen anung anat pen inut arloso vang-lo; ningkan krehini alangli vi buverlo, lapen kedo-an pen se chelang pik-lo, bonta baduta alangliphan pame thekthedet-lo.
Alangli vangsi Jisu ape ade ot-lo, lapen halabangso ahut mamat avi kebu hamdet-lo.
Jisu arjulo, “Matsi ne-ot loma?” Kadokave atum chekrongkresi Pitor pulo, “Hemphu, armu atum nangliphan bithe bitha komjailo, lapen chingbei saidelo.”
Bonta Jisu pulo, “Mane abang nephan otvek-lo, pima nelong pen jakong bar tang-lo pusi ne chinilo.”

Labangpi chepatu un-elo pu chinisi, a-ok klemhursi vang-lo, lapen alangli ingno domkhrupsi kadokave arat angno alangli ke-ot alam athe kopi, lapen kopusonsi halabangso ahut mamat medet-lo, la chethan-et-lo.
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Nang akekroisi nangphan pametang-lo, pei. Ningkangsam penle damnon.”
Jisu keningje ahut Sinagog ahemphu ahem pen inut abang vangsi pulo, “Nang sopi thitang-lo.” Jairos aphan thanlo; “Thanbang aphan pasungbom nangnelo.”
Bonta Jisu arjulongsi Jairos aphan pulo, “Nangli phere nangne; kekroile kroinon, lapen nangli sopi mepo.”
Hem lesi arlo lut damlo lapen Pitor, Jon, Jems lapen a-osopi api apo apar badu aphanta alangli long palutdun longledet-lo.
Kadokave atum chiru charnap-lo; halabangso a-osopi pen apot aning cheteng bomlo. Bonta Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Chiruri; bangso a-osopi thithe, amek kejangchot.”
Halatum kadokave alangliphan ingnek choilo, pima a-osopi thitang-lo pu halatum chinilorlo.
Bonta Jisu ari otsi, hangsi pulo, “Thurnon, Pei!”
Ansi achethe dothulo, lapen halabangso ahut mamat alangli thurlo, lapen alangliphan kopine kecho ahormu pitu pusi Jisu hukum pilo.
Api apo atum abidi jutdet-lo, bonta keplangtang alam an badu aphanta thanri pusi Jisu halatum aphan hukum pilo.
Jisu hala bangkrehini atum aphan hangpetsi pangrumlo, lapen kadokave ahi-i atum aphuthak lapen keso hei hei kepameji ajakong pilo.
Anke Arnam Arat alamjir kepachethangji lapen keso atum aphan kepameji aphan alangli halatum aphan toilo, lapen pulo,
“Tovar aphan thangta ponri: chin tame, kechorek ajamborong tame, an tame, tangka tame lapen choita akele pon nangne.
Nangtum kelut damji ahem aling, halabangso arongsopi pen barthuthetik ke hadak-le dobomnon.
Lapen nangtum aphan kechakche arongsopi pen nangtum kebarji ahut, halatum aphan kepachere angthek ason, nangtum akeng alongle aduk cheho tekangnon!”
Sangho atum nangbarlo, lapen arong arong Birta Keme pachethang-lo, lapen monit atum akeso hei heita pame ponbomlo.
Herod, atheke Galili a-Govornor, la kadokave keplangbom alam an arjulong-lo; alangli abidi jutdet-lo. Thangbakma manene atum ke Jon kethi pen rengthutang-lo pusi pulo,
lapen manene atum ke Elijah nangcheklang tang-lo pusi pulo, lapen akaprek atum ke hako ahut amontri inut rengthutang-lo pusi pulo.
Herod pulo, “Ne Jon angphun pangthantang-lo; bonta ne lahei hei alamjir arju longbomlang, labangso abang komatma?” Lapen alangli Jisu aphan kethek longjisi bor-ibomlo.
Ketoitang atum nangchevoithulo, lapen halatum kopi pisi klemtang-lo, lake Jisu aphan chethanlo. Lapen alangli halatum aphan ponsi, chepapreksi Bethsaida pu arongsopi damjuilo.
Bonta armu atum labangso alam arjulongsi Jisu aphi phi dunlo. Jisu halatum aphan aning arong pen chak-lo, lapen Arnam Arat alamjir ningjebomlo, lapen akeso kepame nangji atum aphan alangli pamethulo.

Arni kangsam ahut sangho bangkrehini atum vangsi Jisu aphan pulo, “Latum dak adung arei arong hei hei lapen ahavar padamra kechoji amar lapen ke-iji adim kelongjile armu atum aphan toi iknon, pima dak ke kangsamri adimlo.”

Bonta Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum methang amat-le halatum aphan kopine kecho ahormu pinon.” Latum thak-lo, “Netum along him plangpho lapen lang a-ok jonni ansi dochot. Netum damra la kadokave armu aphan him nam damnangji putong nangli kepuma?”
Pima hadak bang suripho an bak amonit do. Jisu asangho atum aphan pulo, “Bang phokep, phokep thak-ra, asong asongle halatum aphan papangni chom-chom non.”
Sangho atum lapuson klemdet aphi,
him plangpho lapen lang a-ok jonni Jisu ensi sining anat langsi Arnam aphan chorolo lapen ahirjume hangsi beng-lo, lapen armu atum aphan keparonjisi sangho atum arideng pilo.
Halatum chosi ingkrang-lo, lapen halatum kepahin achet-abet hum etsi ton krehini papleng-lo.
Arni isi Jisu inutpetsi Arnam ardombomlo, lapen asangho atum alangli long vang-lo. Jisu halatum aphan arjulo, “Ne matma, lake armu atum pisi puloma?”
Ansi halatum thak-lo, “Nanglike Jon Baptist pusi manene atum pulo, manene atum ke Elijah, manene atum ke hako ahut amontri inut rengthutang-lo pusi kepu.”
“Bonta ne komatma? Nangtum pisi pujima?” Lapen Pitor thak-lo, “Nanglike Arnam kebattang Abang-lo.”
Ansi badu aphanta thanri pusi Jisu halatum aphan sodak ahukum pilo.

Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Monit asopo kesung chechak-o nangji lapen sarmar atum, Kurusar atum lapen Aron thekser atum alangliphan chakchedetji lapen alangli bang arideng thiji, bonta nithom arni alangli thurji, la kadokave plangvek nangji.”

Ansi alangli halatum do-an aphan pulo, “Mane abang jongsi nephi phi kedunji aning hang-lo tangte alangli amethang aphan chemathathedet-ra lapen arnivang amethang athengparpan cheponra nephi phi padunkrinang.
Pima amethang apran kecheraiji aning kehang abang aling ke la pangbodetji, bonta ne pen apot amethang apran ingbodet lote alangli ke amethang apran cheraisi pajokji.
Pima mane abang pirthe adang long-et setta amethangle ingbodette, mate asap vir-lote alangli kopi ale doma!

Mane abang jongsi ne lapen ne kethan alam pen apot therakduk lote, alangli pen apot Monit a-Sopota mo amethang adak atur pen lapen Po lapen pherangke Kangthir atum adak-atur pen kevangji ahut therakdukji.
Bonta ne nangtum aphan athikpetsi nangpulang, ladak karjapphrong atum angbong manene atum Arnam arat thek longletik ke thithedetji.”
Jisu lahei hei alam pudet pen ni nerkep anbak aphi alangli Pitor, Jon lapen Jems aphan cheponsi Arnam kardom damji aphan inglong arludamlo.
Alangli Arnam kardom ahut alangli mahang a-arje chepharlolo lapen alangli keche-um ape lokphlansi sining kebirlak ason thakthak turbong-lo.
Ansi banghini amonit alangli pen chingkilo. Latum ke Moses lapen Elijahlo.
Latum adak atur pen cheklang-lo, lapen Arnam kemang akam Jerusalem along kechekokji dokdok alam hei hei atheke, Jisu kethiji alamjir hei heisi chingkilo.
Pitor lapen ari asangho atum amek jangklip-lo, bonta halatum amek prangdaksi alangli dak atur lapen alangli long karjapphrong banghini amonit thek long-lo.

Halatum alangli pen kechekak ahut Pitor Jisu aphan pulo, “Hemphu, etum dak kedo ko-an akeme! Mandu humthom ili kimlonang; nangli phan ehum, Moses aphan ehum lapen ehumke Elijah aphan.” (Alangli kopisi kepuma, lake alangli chininedet-lo.)
Bonta alangli keningje ahut inghun ethan vangsi halatum aphan binthip-lo; lapen halatum aphan inghun kebinthip ahut sangho atum pherelo.
Inghun athan pen ase vangsi pulo, “Labangso abang ke ne-Sopolo, ne kangvaitang abang-lo, alangphan arju phrongnon.”
Lapen ase jutdet aphi, halatum Jisu aphan inutpetsi thek long-lo, Sangho atum doklipsi halabangso ahut badu aphanta kethek long alam chethanthedet-lo.
Puthot arni halatum inglong pen nanghirlo, lapen armu akethepi atum Jisu pen chetong-lo.
Armu angbong pen inut amonit hangsersi pulo, “Thanbang, ne sopo aphan langtha; ne sopo po epumpet.
Ahut pen ahut hi-i alangphan nepbom lapen hangser titi. Hi-i alangphan hevengpo, angho angpip pasupo; lapen avi pachethai longletik ke alangphan o-edet ason.
Bangso ahi-i aphan kephlungji aphan neli nangli sangho atum aphan choningrilo, bonta alanglitum un-edet-lo.”
Jisu thaksi pulo, “O, Nang kekroithekthe lapen kechingkino atum! Komantu an ne nangtum along do nangji langma?” Jisu halabangso amonit aphan pulo, “Nangli sopo dak-le vannon.”
Halabangso a-oso kevang ahut hi-i alangphan hevengbupsi pacherdak-lo. Jisu hi-i langno aphan ingchek-lo, lapen oso aphan pamethusi apo arideng pithulo.
Kadokave atum Arnam ajakong pen apot manghuhak-lo.
Kadokave atum Jisu keklembom akam aphan kemanghuphrong ahut alangli asangho atum aphan pulo.
“Ne nangtum aphan nangkethanji alam arju pamenon! Pima Monit a-Sopo aphan ke monit atum arideng hodaidetji.”
Bonta sangho atum labangso alam kopima, lake chininedet-lo. Kechini thekthedetji aphansi halatum angno pen la patu tang-lo, lapen la athe kopima pura karjuji aphanta halatum haihedet-lo.
Sangho atum angbong matsi theneima pu alam kechedansei dolo.
Jisu halatum kematha alam chinisi, inut a-oso ensi amethang adung parjap-lo,

lapen halatum aphan pulo, “Ne men pen labangso a-oso aphan kechak abang ke nephanta chak-lo; lapen nephan kechak abang aling ke nephan nangketoi abang aphanta chak-lo. Pima nangtum kadokave angbong akebinei abangsi aketheneilo.”
Lapen Jon pulo, “Hemphu, inut amonit nangmen pen hi-i atum aphan kephlung netum thek long-lo, lapen netum alangliphan kekhangji bor-ilo, pima alangli ke netum along nangkedun abang kalilo.”
Jisu alangliphan lapen akaprek asangho atum aphan pulo, “Nangtum kekhangji bor-iri, pima nangtum abekethurthe abang ke nangtum abelo.”
Alangliphan sining keponji ahut nangleji dokdoksi Jisu Jerusalem kedamji pangcheng-lo.
Alangli aphrang amethang apherangke atum aphan toilo, lapen halatum damsi Jisu aphan kesik pijisi Samaria arong lut damlo.
Bonta halatum Jisu aphan chakchedet-lo, pima alangli Jerusalem kedamji pu chinilorlo.
Lapen sangho atum, Jems lapen Jon, la thek longsi pulo, “Hemphu, latum aphan kepavirdetjile sining ame nang pahir lonang, lake nangning hangma?”
Jisu chetevarsi halatum aphan ingchek-lo.
Ansi Jisu lapen asangho atum arong kaprek damjuilo.
Alangli tovar kedambom ahut mane abang alangliphan pulo, “Nangli kedamji aling neli nangli phi phi dunkripo.”
Jisu alangliphan thak-lo, “Sirungta angthor do, lapen vo atumta atar do, bonta Monit a-Sopo ke aphu kebira kesangji adim ave.”
Alangli anut kaprek aphan pulo, “Nephi phi nangdun non.” Bonta alangli pulo, “Hemphu, aphrangke neli po aphan nepapip longtha,”
Jisu alangliphan thak-lo, “Kethitang atumle amethang kethitang atum aphan pachepip nang, bonta nangke bithe bitha Arnam arat alamjir pachethang damnon.”
Anut kaprek amonit pulo, “Ne nangphi phi dunkriji Hemphu; bonta aphrangsi neli hem chedamsi neli hem asor aphan kechepadi damji ahukum neli pitha.”
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Badutame, langnoi otdetsi aphi anat kechelang abang ke Arnam Arat aphan ale ave.”
Labangso aphi Hemphu akaprek amonit bang throksi kep atum aphan ingvailo, lapen alangli kedamji arongsopi tin lapen adim an aphrang halatum aphan bang hini-hini pajalangsi toilo.
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Sok kemen do-olo bonta kepangrumji atum ong-e. Tangte, alangli sok kepangrum akam keklem atum aphan nangketoijile ahemphu aphan cho-ardom hurtha.
Da! Damnon da! Mahar atum angbongle biresak aso atum kedam asonsi ne nangtum aphan nangtoilo.
Tangka athia, kalite kechorek ajamborong, kalite keng-op ponri; tovar kedambom ahut badu aphanta sangkokra kardom chepiri.
Nangtum kelut damji ahem aling aphrangke, ‘Bangso ahem ning kangsam padonang’! pule punon.
Hadak jongsi ning kangsam aning kedok abang dolote nangtum aning kangsam alangli phuthak doji; ave tangte ningkangsam nangtum along chiruiji.
Lapen edonpet-le dora halatum nangkepi alingle chorap rap, jun rap rapnon. Pima kam keklem abang anam kelong nangji a-ot do. Edon pen adon kaprek damri.
Lapen nangtum kelut damji arong alingle, halatum nangtum aphan chak lote, nangtum aphan kepi alingle chonon.
Hadak keso atum aphan pamenon, lapen halatum aphan, ‘Arnam Arat nangtum adung an vangtang-lo,’ pule punon.
Nangtum kelut damji arongsopi aling, halatum jongsi nangtum aphan chakche tangte,
ha tovar damra punon, ‘Nangtum arongsopi alongle aduk netum akeng kebon akengtak anta nangtum abe pathurjisi netum chehotekang-lo. Bonta chematha non, Arnam Arat nangtum adung vangtang-lo!’
Ne chenamsi nangtum aphan nangpulang, halabangso a-Kangsai Arni labangso arongsopi aphan apar Sodom aphan Arnam akangjinso paklang muchotji!

“Chorazin, nang ko-an kephere meme akesung phonangpo! Bethsaida, nang ko-an kephere meme akesung pho nangpo! Pima nangtum angbong keklemtang akemathadam un-edet akam kethe hei hei jongsi Tair lapen Sidon angbong plang asonte, halatum hako ahut penta aning chiruisi pe-thoila che-umsi thek-lo ajo ingniji apot-lo!
Mo Kangsai Arni ahut Arnam nangtum aphan apar Tair lapen Sidon aphan akangjinso paklang muchotji.
Lapen nang, Kapernaum; nangke sining athak anta kerungkokji aphan nang ning hanglangma? Nangphan kethitang atum adim an nang pahirtukji!”

Jisu alangli sangho atum aphan pulo, “Nangtum alam karju abang ke nephansi arjulo; nangtum aphan kechakche abang ke nephansi kechakchelo; lapen nephan kechakche abang aling ke nephan neketoi abang aphanta chakchelo.”
Bang throksi kep atum aning arong pen nang chevoisi pulo, “Hemphu, nang men pen hi-i atumta netum alam kroilo!”
Jisu halatum aphan thak-lo, “Cheter keklo ason Soitan sining pen nang keklo ne thek long-lo.
Arjutha! Pherui lapen chehe langbong apivo athak kedongji lapen hotur an aphan kehaiji ajakong ne nangtum aphan nangpitang-lo, lapen thangta nangtum aphan phangno un-e.
Bonta hi-i atum nangtum alam kekroi apot-le chehok-ri, bonta sining athak nangtum amen toktang-lo apot-le chehoknon.”

Halabangso ahut Jisu Karjong Kangthir pen plengsetsi chehok-olo, lapen pulo, “Ne nangphan chorolo, Po, Sining lapen pirthe ahemphu! Pima nang lahei hei ke giani lapen thekser atum angno pen patutang-lo, lapen kethek kere kave atum aphan paklangtang-lo. Chenamlo Po, lake nang ning kehang akamlo.
“Ne Po nephan kadokave amar nepitang-lo. Baduta, Po apar ke Sopo komatma, lake chinine, lapen Po komatma, lake Sopo lapen Alangli kepaklangji aning kehang atum apar ke baduta chinine.”
Lapen sangho atum anat chepangnosi bang kaprek atum kave ahut Jisu pulo, “Nangtum kethek dunlong ason kethek dunlong amek hei hei rengme!

Pima ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, penang amontri lapen recho atum nangtum kethek long ason kethek longji aning hang-lo, bonta halatum thek longledet-lo, lapen nangtum karjulong alam karjuji aning hang-lo, bonta arju longledet-lo.”
Inut aron thekser abang Jisu aphan asat kelangjisi vang-lo. Alangli thursi pulo, “Thanbang! Kejut un-e achethe kelongji aphan ne kopi klem nangjima?”
Ansi Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Aron kopusonsi tok tang-lo? Nangli kopusonsi porhe long loma?”

Halabangso amonit thaksi pulo, “‘Nang ning ajakong an penle, nang pran ajakong an penle, nang jakong do-an penle lapen nang kematha ajakong an penle Hemphu, nang Arnam aphan chinghon non; lapen nang methang aphan kechinghon asonthotsi tebok abang aphanta chinghon nangji.’ ”
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Nang athikpetsi pulo, lasonle klemnon, lapen nang rengpo.”
Bonta aron thekser abang dhoromi pu kecheklangjisi Jisu aphan arjulo, “Tangte ne aketebok abang komat-lo.?”
Jisu thak-lo, “Inut amonit Jeru-salem pen Jeriko nanghirlo, lapen alangli dokait atum pen chetong-lo. Latum alangli pe lumsi alangliphan chokpiksi damrup-lo.
Ansi kopai keme asonsi mane akurusar halabangso atovar mamat vang-lo, lapen alangliphan thek longsi tovar suiphaksi damjuilo.
Lason thak-thaksi Levi inutta hadak vang-lo; bonta tovar suiphaksi damjuilo.
Bonta inut tovar kedam, Samaria amonit alangli dung vang-lo, lapen thek longsi aning arlo alangliphan kangjinso pen plengset-lo.
Alangli dung an vangsi areng amek along jangthu lapen drakha ahorlang dungsi perhet-lo. Anke amethang kardon api athak pardon ponsi alohi ahem along ponlo, lapen hadak alangliphan lanalo.
