Puthot arni alangli sika isi thiya pen ensi alohi ahem ahemphu aphan pitekangsi pulo, ‘Alangliphan lananon, lapen la apar akhorot an mo neli kechevoiji ahut nanglipi tekangpo.’”
Lapen Jisu pulo, “La bang kethom angbong pen kolo abangsi dokait arideng kepho abang aphan tebok abang cheplang loma? Nang pisi mathalo?”
Aron thekser abang thak-lo, “Alangliphan kangjinso abang helo.” Jisu alangliphan thakthulo, “Ante, damra lapusonle klemnon.”
Jisu lapen asangho atum tovar kedambom ahut alangli elong arong lut damlo. Hadak Martha pu inut arloso dolo. Alangli amethang ahem Jisu aphan chak-lo.
Alangli korte Meri pu do lapen Meri Hemphu akeng-ri ingnilunsi alangli lam kethan arjudunlo.

Bonta Martha keru kethai akam ong-osi aning chepasiksak-lo lapen vangsi Jisu aphan pulo, “Ne korte ke neliphan inutpetsi keru kethai akam nang-o tekang-lo, nangli lahei mathathema? Kam nangkepacherap dunji aphan Meri aphan putha!”
Hemphu alangliphan thak-lo, “Martha, Martha! Nang penang alam pen apot matha chepasiksak-lo, lapen arki dohang-lo,
bonta akenang ke esonnat. Meri akangvai ke kechok pamelo, lapen lake alangli rideng pen ponpedetji.”

Arni isi Jisu elong adim Arnam kardom dam ahut, alangli kardom pajut det aphi sangho angbong inut abang alangliphan pulo, “Hemphu, Jonle asangho atum aphan kardom kechethan ason thakthak netum aphanta kardom nethantha.”
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum kardom ahut lasonle punon:
‘O Po, nangmen pangthir nang;
Nang rat pavangnang.
Netum arnivang kenangji a-an,
netum aphan nepitha.
Netum apap hei hei nediyatha,
pima netumta netum aphan kehingno keklem atum aphan diyalo.
Lapen sat kelangjile netum aphan neponri non.’”
Lapen Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan pulo, “Bisar alam, nangtum angbong inut abang ajirpo dolo, lapen jirlo apor alangli ajirpo along damsi pulo, ‘Oh ko! nephan him plangthom ne paramtha.
Pima nejirpo nelong vang-lo, lapen alangliphan keru kethaiji aphan nelong thangnatta ave!’
Lapen bisar alam, halabangso abang hem arlo pen thaksi pulo, ‘Nephan nepasungri! Nonke inghap ingkir tang-lo lapen nesomar nelong amek jangtang-lo. Ne thursi nangphan thangta nangpi thekthe.’
Ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, ajirpo aphan langledetsi thurthedetji apot-lo setta alangli hang varet apotsi alangli thursi kenangji an ason pidunji.
“Lasi ne nangtum aphan nangpu-lang, hang bom non lapen nangtum aphan nangpidetji; ri bom non lapen nangtum longji; pacheng bom non lapen nangtum aphan nang ingpudetji.
Pima kehang abangphutin longrep, lapen keri abang aling long, lapen kepacheng abang aphan inghap ingpudetji.
Nangtum angbong mane abang po plangsi asopo lang a-ok hang-lote pherui pirongji,
kalite voti hang-lote chehe langbong apivo pithu-rongji, lason abang dojima?
Lahelo nangtum hingno setta nangtum asomar aphan akeme amar kepiji chinilo, tangte, la apar sining athak kedo a-Po ke Alangli long kehang atum aphan Karjong Kangthir piji!”
Jisu alam kave abang along pen hi-i phlung-lo; lapen hi-i bardet aphi alam kave abang ningjelo. Armu atum manghuphrong-lo,
bonta manene atum pulo, “Lake hi-i atum ahemphu, Beelzebul pen ajoksi hi-i kephlungji ajakong long-lo.”
Akaprek atum ke asat langsi sining pen angthek hang bomlo.
Bonta Jisu halatum aning kematha alam chinisi halatum aphan pulo, “Badu adet tame, amethang kechethak-et arat ke kedo ajir dingde; lapen kechethakdak ahem ke kedo chepaprekjampo.
Lasi Soitanta amethang jongsi chethakdak lote arat kopusonsi dothekjima? Nangtum nephan pulo, neke Beelzebul ajakong pensi hi-i atum aphan phlung-lo.

Ne jongsi Beelzebul pen ajoksi hi-i atum aphan phlung-lo tangte, nangtum aphi phi kedun atum ke komat ajakong pensi halatum aphan phlung-loma? Nangtum aphi phi kedun atumsi nangtum akechokche aporman paklangdak-lo!
Bonta neke Arnam ajakong pensi hi-i atum aphan phlungbom, lapen lake Arnam Arat nangtum angbong vangtang-lo pu angthek-lo.
“Kangtangrak abang chir, nok pen ahem kechehon ahut ke amar thangta virve.
Bonta alangli par ingtang muchot abang vang-ra alangliphan haidet lote alangli aning kechethe anokjir ponpo lapen kethi pon amar an thak-etpo.
“Ne be kalidet abang ke ne bethurlo; nelong nang kepangrum dunde abang ke hijikverlo.
“Kangthirthe ahi-i monit pen nangkebar aling, la lang kavedet adim kesangji adim ribom. Jongsi long athai avete la pupo, ‘Chu ne nangkebartang ahem along ne chelut damthupo.’
Lapen hi-i chevangsi ahem arkok-et lapen sai-et thek-longpo.
Ansi hi-i chedamsi amethang apar kehingno muchot bang throksi ahi-i chevansi lutdampo lapen hadaksi dopo. Lapen kejutsi halabangso abang aphrang apar hingnomuchotpo.”
Jisu la kepubom ahut armu angbong pen inut arloso ase pathesi alangliphan pulo, “Nangliphan pirthe kepahache, lapen mok nangkepachu abang ko-an rengme!”
Bonta Jisu thak-lo, “La putame, tebonta Arnam alam karju lapen kekroi atumsi rengme!”
Armu atum kechingprompik ahut Jisu lam ningjebomsi pulo, “Labangso a-ove atum ko-an adur kave! Latum angthek ribom, bonta Jonah angthek apar ke isinat angthekta pipedetji.
Nineveh asor aphanle Jonah angthek kecheplang asonthot, lason thak-thaksi labangso a-ove aphan ke Monit a-Sopo helo angthek kecheplangji.

Mo Kangsai Arni Sheba arechopi labangso a-ove amonit atum aphan adai nepji, pima alangli Solomon agian pen kethan alam karjujisi ha amethang adet pen vang-lo; lapen chini iktha, Solomon apar kopine kethe muchot ladak do.
Mo Kangsai Arni Nineveh asor thursi labangso a-ove amonit atum aphan adai nepji, pima halatum Jonah kepachethang pen ajok aning chiruilo; lapen chini iktha, Jonah apar kopine kethe muchot ladak do!
“Baduta melur keira patute, mate phule arlo bibe; bonta hem nangkelut atum akekhelan kethek longji aphan melur ke archok athaksi batpo.
Nangbang arpum amelur ke nang mek helo. Nang mek mesen ahut nang bang arpumta the-angdangpo; bonta nangmek jongsi hingno lote nangbangta ingtingkukpo.
Tangte chelang pametha, nang ning arlo akethe-ang ingtingkuk mene.
Nang bang arpum jongsi the-ang dang tangte, lapen thang akangting ave lepute, melur atur pen nangphan kepathe-ang dang ason thakthak, lake the-ang dang saidepo.”
Jisu lam keningje jutdetsi, inut a-Pharisi alangli long an kecho rap-rapji aphan phalo; lasi alangli ahem lut dunsi an kechoji aphan ingnilo.
Pharisi abang langdingsi manghuhak-lo, pima Jisu an choche ako ari chersamsedet-lo.
Lasi Hemphu alangliphan pulo, “Toh nonke, nanglitum Pharisi atum ke harlung lapen kasuta angtan anatsi ingthichot, bonta nangtum arlo ke kar-i lapen kehingno pen plengset-lo.
Kelu atum! Angtan anat kethip abang, Arnam arlo ke thipthedetma?
Bonta nangtum aharlung lapen akasu arlo kedo amar an keduk atum aphan pinon, lapen kadokave asonta nangtum aphan ingthirpo.

“Pharisi atum! Nangtum ko-an akepherememe phonangpo! Pima nangtum Podina, arud lapen han aphan ke-en abap an phan kep pen ephan Arnam aphan pilo, bonta nanglitum ahok akangsai lapen Arnam aphan akanghon matha pamemedet-lo. Ason kaprek hei heita varvera lahei heita klempon masi.
Pharisi atum! Nangtum ko-an akepherememe phonangpo! Pima Sinagog along anghoi kethe lapen hithi borwa angbong aman pen akardom kepi kelongji aphan nanglitum aning dokpik-lo.
Nangtum ko-an akepherememe pho nangpo! Pima nanglitum ke angthek kebibe atipit ason thakthak-lo. Monit atum chininedetsi la athak dongponsi damlo.”
Halatum angbong pen inut aron thekser abang Jisu aphan pulo, “Thanbang! Lahei hei alam kepuke nelitum aphan kepatherak-lo.”

Alangli thak-lo, “Aron thekser atum! Nangtum ko-an akepherememe pho nangpo! Pima nanglitum kepon kesungkrung anghor nangtum monit aphan panghorlo, bonta nanglitum methang ke ri chimun ehong pen anta labangso anghor rap dundelo.
Nanglitum ko-an akepherememe pho nangpo! Pima nanglitum montri atum atipit hei hei selamlo, latum aphan nanglitum aphusar atumsi pathilo.
Tangte nanglitum chekrong non, atheke nanglitum aphusar atum keklem akam nanglitumta nang ning dok-lo; halatum Arnam amontri atum aphan pathilo, lapen nanglitum ke halatum atipit selampilo.
Lasi Arnam agian pulo, ‘Ne halatum angbong Montri lapen Pherangke nangtoiji. Halatum manene atum aphan pathiji, lapen manene atum aphan chenekji.’
Lasi pirthe kepinchong ahut pen Arnam amontri atum aphan avi kepabutang an pen apot, atheke

Abel avi kepabu a-arni pen hala dovan lapen Kardomhemthepi kangthir angdeng angbong Jekariah aphan avi kepabu a-arni an kepabutang avi an pen apot labangso a-ove aphan aduk piji. Ne athikpetsi nanglitum aphan nangpulang, la kadokave pen apot labangso a-ove atum aduk pho nang-po.

“Aron thekser atum! Nanglitum ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo! Nanglitum kechini-i aphlok chebikok-lo. Nanglitum methangta lut damde, lapen kelutdamji aning kehang atum aphanta palutdam longlelo!”
Jisu hadak pen nangbardet aphi aron thekser atum lapen Pharisi atum jasemet aning thi-lo.
Alangliphan kopine akechokche alam pen adai kenepjisi halatum alangliphan ajat jat alam karjuji pangcheng-lo.
Suri suri armu kechingprom pen apot monit atum chedong charkanlo. Ansi aphrangsi asangho atum aphan Jisu pulo, “Pharisi atum athap, atheke aning ke-ik aphan cherehurnon!
Kedipjoi amar anta klang-etji, lapen kepatujoi amarta chinipetji.
Lasi kangtingkuk angbong nanglitum kepatu alamta anerlo akethe-ang angbong than-pachethangdetji, lapen kut arlo nangtum kepalamsojoi alam anta hem asarnung angsong pen pachethangdetji.
“Ne jirpo atum, ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, bang arpum kepathithek, bonta la apar ke thangta keklem thekthe abang aphan ke thangta phereri.

Komat aphansi phere nangjima, labangso alam ne nangtum aphan nangpaklangpo. Abang arpum pathilot aphi Chom arlo kevarchuiji ajakong kedo abang aphanle pherenon. Ne chenamsi nangtum aphan nangpulang, nanglitum labangso abang aphanle pherenon.
“Sok puru avo jonpho ador poisa hini nat, kalima? Bonsetta sok puru avo ejonnat aphanta Arnam tengnenedet-lo.
Nangtum achu ajeng anta lakhapet-lo. Lasi nangtum phereri; sok puru avo atum apar nangtum ador somu!
“Nangtum aphan nangpulang, monit angno nephan Hemphu pu kechekrong abang phutin aphan Arnam apherangke atum angno Monit a-Sopota ne pusi chekrongji.
Bonta monit angno nephan Hemphu pu kedengde abang aphan ke Arnam apherangke atum angno Monit a-Sopota ne pu chekrongkre-detji.
“Badu tame Monit a-Sopo abethursi keningje abang ke diya longji; bonta Karjong Kangthir aphan kepinrem abang aling ke diya longledetji.
“Halatum mei lapen det ahemphu lapen det keja atum angno nangtum aphan keponji ahut, kopusonsi mate kopi alam pen chethak dun nangjima, mate kopisi kepujima, lake nangtum ning biri.
Pima halabangso ahut mamat nangtum kopisi ningje nangjima, lake Karjong Kangthir nangtum aphan nangthanji.”
Armu angbong pen inut amonit Jisu aphan pulo, “Thanbang, netum kepamo tekang akhi ne pen kepachethakjile ne ik aphan putha.”
Jisu alangliphan thak-lo, “O jirpo, nangtum aphuthak kangsai, mate nangtum apo kepamo tekang akhi nangtum angbong kethakji ajakong matsi nephan piloma?”
Lapen alangli halatum kadokave aphan pulo, “Langra mek plengple ason an pen chere non. Pima alangli jonghele plang setta monit achethe ke amar atar penle keplang kalidet.”
Anke alangli halatum aphan labangso alamlir pen pulo, “Inut akiripo do; alongle asok me-o.
Alangli aning arlo chemathasi pulo, ‘Nesok kebiji adim avedet-lo, ne pisi klem poma?
Ne lasonsi klempo,’ alangli pulo; ‘Ne nesok puru phri dakpo lapen themuchot kimpo, lapen nesok lapen nemar an hadaksi chebipo.
Anke ne methang aphan pupo, kopai keme amonit! Penang aningkan aphan nang kebi amar dolo. Sangra chotha, juntha lapen ning arong chepitha!’
Bonta Arnam Alangliphan pulo, ‘Nang kelu abang! Paningve mamat nanglong pen nangpran pondetpo; lapen la nang kesiktang amar ke mat aridengsi lepoma?’ ”
Jisu kejutsi pulo, “Amethang aphan akhi kecherim, bonta Arnam anat keplang-o kalidet abang ke lapuson helo.”
Anke Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan pulo, “La apotsi ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, nangtum achethe aphan, kalite nangtum abang aphan pisi chojima, mate kopisi che-umjima, la aphan ning biri.
Pima an apar echethe themu, lapen pe, ri apar ebang themu.
Vo-ak atum aphan langtha, latum rikta rik-re, rotta rot-re; latum sok puruta ave, mar kechebiji ahemta ave; tebonta Arnam latum aphan pacho longbom!
Vo apar nangtum ador somulo; lapen matsi keningbi pen amethang achethe cherso pading muchot unjima?
Jongsi nangtum la kebinei akam anta klem un-e tangte, kopi athesi la akaprek hei hei aphan ningbiloma?
Mir tado aphan langtha: latum honta jengje, pe ta thakthe, bonta ne nangtum aphan nangpulang. Solomon kadokave ape, ari chingthang-ra adak atur pen setta la nampi amir ason thakthak alon kedo ave.
Tangte Arnam jongsi la pini do, penap ave, lapen melikbui along kephrindut ji ahidi abap aphan lapu-an alon padolo tangte, la apar nangtum aphan ko-an alon padojima? Nangtum akekroi ko-an akekom!
“La apotsi kopisi choji, kopisi junji, lale ning biri.
Pima pirthe athak Arnam aphan kekroikre atum ke lahei hei aphan mathaver. Lahei hei nangtum nangji puke nangtum a-Po chinilo.
Bonta alangli rat aphanle mathanon, lapen lahei hei nangtum aphan nangpidetji.
“Phereri, O bihek asong, pima nangtum aphan Rat kepijisi nangtum a-Po aning dok-olo.
Nangtum amar atar jorra keduk kelak atum aphan pinon. Kaiketa kerak-redet athia lapen ke-ik un-e akhi sining athak chebirti non. Hadak ke kanghuta vangve, lapen angkita cho un-e.
Pima nangtum akhi kedo adimsi nangtum aningta do-eji.
“Nangtum avam chingtinra kekeitang amelur pen chesik et-le donon.
Piso kepangri amei pen nangkechevoi ahemphu nanglesi inghap kepacheng pen mamat alangliphan kangpuji aphan kanghong phrong aban atum asonle nangtum donon.

Ahemphu hem nangkechevoi ahut aban atum ano kechepang-ar pen kedo thek-long lote, halabangso aban atum ko-an akerengme! Ne chenamsi nangtum aphan nangpulang, alangli avam chingtinsi halatum aphan an kepachoji aphan pangniji, lapen adung vangsi halatum aphan ru-thaiji.
Lapen alangli ancho mekbur ahut, kalite voku ethe ahut-le vang setta halatum aphan lasonle thek-long lote, halabangso atum ko-an akerengme!
Kanghu komantu vangjima, lale hem ahemphu abang chini asonte alangli hondingsi hem nangpatuk longledetji apot-lo, lake nangtum chinilo.
Nangtumta chesikdingle donon. Pima alangli vangvejibon pu nangtum kematha ahutsi Monit a-Sopo vangji.”
Pitor pulo, “Hemphu, labangso alamlir ke netum aphanchotma, mate kadokave atum aphanta loma?”

Hemphu thakdunsi pulo, “Tangte athikpet lapen athikpetpe aban komatma? Labangso abang ke la helo: hem kepalangji aphan lapen anut kaprek aban atum aphan athikpet apor ahut an kepacholongji aphan alangliphan akam anghor pekji.
Ahemphu kechevang ahut alangliphan lapuson keklembom nang-thek-long lote, halabangso aban ko-an akerengme!
Ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, ahemphu amar do-an kepalangji aphan halabangso aban aphan akam anghor pidetji.

Bonta halabangso aban jongsi, ‘Ne hemphu kevang pader-oji’ pu mathara akaprek aban atum aphan chok-theng lote, atheke arloso pinso atum aphanta chok-theng lote, lapen kecho-kejun, kangri-kangkrang pangcheng lote,
vangvejibon pu kematha lapen kechinine ahutsi ahemphu abang vangji. Ahemphu abang alangliphan thupetji, lapen alam kekroikre atum aphan asonthotsi alangliphan paphoji.
“Ahemphu aning kehang akam chini setta keklemkle abang ke areng so-oji.

Bonta a-Hemphu aning kehang kechinine abang ke areng someme akam klem setta areng soparpedetji. Komat aphanma kepi ke-ong, labangso abang pen kehangta hang-oji; Komat aphansi ansose kepi ke-ongma, labangso abang pen kehangta ansose kehang pa-ong muchotji.
“Ne pirthe me kekaiji aphansi vang-lo. Lapen non mamat-le ame kar-ang asonte ko-an nening arong doji!
Ne eson abaptisom en nangjilang. La plangpletik ke ko-an nening aduk doloma!
Ne pirthe athak ning kangsam kevangjisi vang-lo pusi nangtum mathaloma? Lapu kali, bonta kethak-etji aphansi vang-lo.
Non pen apar ke hem ehumpet kedo bangpho amonit chethaksi bang kethom abe bang hini lapen bang hini abe bang kethom thurji;
asopo abe apo, lapen apo abe asopo; asopi abe apei lapen apei abe asopi; amunpi abe anipi; anipi abe amunpi thurji.”
Lapen ke Jisu armu atum aphan pulo, “Nichi anat pen inghun ethan kethur thek long lote nangtum pupo, ‘Arve jangji,’ lapen lapusonsi chekok-lo.
Lapen nirep anat pen tomon kevang thek longsi nangtum pupo, ‘Arni so-oji,’ lapen la chekok-lo.
Angthin ke-ik atum! nangtum sining lapen pirthe a-arje langsi abotor thanmek thek; tangte nangtum kopi apotsi non ahut alam chini thekthedetma?
“Kolo abangsi ahokma, lake nangtum methang mamat kopi apotsi ingsaisedetma?

Jongsi nangphan kekhinde abang nangphan kangsai ahem nangponlo tangte, tovar mamat-le alangli pen jasemetle chingsaira alam kepajutji aphan bor-i-non; lapu kalite alangli nangliphan kangsai abang angno nangsanthorji tahai, lapen kangsai abang ke polis arideng nanghodaiji, lapen polis nangli-phan phatek nangbengthotji.
Ne nangthanlo, kadokave adai an nang tute tik ke nang hadak pen jokje detji.”
Halabangso ahut manene atum vangsi Galili asor Arnam aphan kethok kejir ahut Pilat kepathi atum alamjir Jisu aphan thanlo.
Jisu halatum aphan thak-lo, “Lapuson kethinang apotsi labangso a-Galili asor ke kadokave a-Galili asor apar hingno muchot apapi pusi nangtum matha loma?
Chenamsi lapu kali, lapen ne nangpulang, nangtum apap pen ning chiruirete nangtumta lasonthotsi thinangpo.
Hala Siloam apaisong keklijap ahut bang kre nerkep amonit atum thikoilo; latum ke Jerusalem kedo atum an apar hingno muchot pusi nangtum mathaloma?
Chenam, lapu kali, ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, nangtum pap pen ning chiruirete latum ason thak-thaksi kadokaveta thi nangpo.”
Lapen Jisu lamlir pen thanlo: “Inut amonit adrakha apai beri angbong thebo erong dolo. Alangli athe kerijisi vang-lo, bonta longle det-lo.
Lasi alangli beri kehon abang aphan pulo, ‘Langtha, ne ningkan kethom dak vangbomlo, lapen labangso athebo athe ribom setta longledet-lo, la pipetnon!’
Bonta kehon abang alangliphan pulo, ‘Hemphu, paningkan isi ke pado sinang. Ne akung arei tuksi orpo lapen ho-or pipo.
La athe patheji mene. Jongsi pathethe tangte nangli pipet tamelo.’ ”
Arni isi Sabbath arni Jisu Sinagog ahem arlo lam thanbomlo.
Hadak inut arloso hi-i kepho pen ajok ningkan kre nerkep akeso dolo. Alangli ingkupdisi arjap thekthedet-lo.
Jisu alangliphan thek longsi alangliphan hang-lo, “Pei! Nangli keso pen joktang-lo!”
Jisu alangli phuthak ari bat-lo, lapen hala mamat alangli karjap pakengdong-lo, lapen Arnam aphan kero pilo.

Bonta Jisu Sabbath arni keso abang aphan keso kepame apotsi Sinagog ahemphu aningthisi rat atum aphan pulo, “Nithrok kam keklemme arni do; labangso angbongle vang-ra keso chepamenon, bonta Sabbath arni kali!”
Hemphu alangliphan thak-lo, “Nang angthin ke-ik atum, nangtum abangphutin setta Sabbath arni amethang methang achainong, mate agadha aroi pen losi lang kepajun damjisi ponbom.
Tangte, ningkan kre nerkep pen Soitan kekokdong, Abraham asupi Sabbath arni kejok kelongji aron avema?”
Alangli kethakdun alam pen apot ahotur atum an therakduk-lo, lapen rat atum do-an alangli keklem akemanghumeme akam pen apot aning arong chepilo.
Jisu arjulo, “Arnam arat kopuson? Ne kopi pensi pangbar-i poma?
Lake hanjang emu asonlo. Inut amonit hanjang amu ponsi arit rikdamlo. Arong vangsi thengpi cheplang-lo, lapen nampi avo atum aro along atar chepatarlo.”
Puthot Jisu puthulo, “Ne kopi pensi Arnam Arat pangbar poma?
Lake thap asonlo. Inut arloso thap ensi him tonthom kangpet petik ke patip bomlo.”
Ansi Jisu rongsopi rongsopi lapen arong arong damsi monit atum aphan thanponbomsi Jerusalem anat dambomlo.
Mane abang alangliphan arjulo, “Hemphu, kejokji atum ong-e ma?”
Jisu halatum aphan thak-lo,
“Nanglitum anghap angho bihek anat kelut damjile jasemet chepaduknon; pima penang atum kelut damjisi bor-iji bonta un-edetji.

Hem ahemphu thursi inghap inghapdetpo; anke nangtum ingtan arjapthersi inghap pachengpo, ‘Hemphu, nelitum aphan inghap ingpu iktha!’ pusi nangtum pupo, alangli nanglitum aphan thakpo, ‘Nanglitum konat pensi kevangma, neli chinine!’
Ansi nanglitum thakthupo, ‘Ilitum chorap rap-lo, junrap rap-lo, lapen nangli nelitum arongsopi angbong lam ta thanlo!’
Bonta alangli puthuji, ‘Nanglitum konat pensi kevang, lake neli chinine! Nedung pen damnon, kehingno keklem atum!’
Hadak Abraham, Isaak lapen Jakob lapen montri atum do-an Arnam Arat angbong doji, lapen nangtum aphan ke ingtansi varchorji; lason kechethek-long ahut nangtum chiru chernapsi aso chardengji!
Monit atum nihang, nichi lapen nirep, nitur pen vangsi Arnam arat angbong kechopi amei along ingniji.
Lapen non kepaphi atum paphrangji, lapen non kepaphrang atum paphiji.”
Halabangso ahut mamat manene a-Pharisi atum Jisu along vangsi pulo, “Nangli dak pen katnon, pima Herod nangliphan kepathiji aning hang-lo.”
Jisu halatum aphan thak-lo, “Damra halabangso asirung aphan than non: ‘Neli pini panapta hi-i atum aphan phlungbom, lapen keso atum aphan pamebom jilang, lapen nithom arni anke neli kam plengpo.’
Bonsetta neli pini, penap lapen penapdik angbong damnangji, pima Jerusalem along apar ke akaprek adim ke badu amontrita thi nangne.

“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Nang montri atum aphan pathilo, Arnam nang ketoitang atum aphanta nangtum arlong pen arbubop-lo! Vopi avengkong arum amethang asomar kechenom asonthotsi ne batai ko-ansi nang somar atum aphan kepangrumbomjisi nening hang-lo, bonta nang ne paklem longle!
La apotsi nang a-Kardom ahem aphan ke obup po. Ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, ‘Hemphu amen pen kevang abang ahirjume atheng-lo’ pu nangtum pupetik ke nangtum nephan thekthu longledetji.”
Arnisi Sabbath arni Jisu Pharisi amonit keja abang ahem anke-choji aphan damlo; lapen monit atum Jisu aphan lang pamelo.
Alangli ingno inut ari akeng kekang abang dolo,
lapen Jisu aron thekser lapen pharisi atum aphan arjulo, “Sabbath arni keso kepameji aron doma avema?”
Bonta halatum doklip-lo. Jisu hala keso amonit abang otsi pamelo, lapen toijuilo.
Anke alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum angbong mane abang asopo, kalite achainong Sabbath arni lang jangchok lote la aphan Sabbath arni amat ke-en-edetji abang doma?”
Bonta halatum thakdun thek thedet-lo.
Manene alohi atum akemenei adim kechongvai thek-longsi Jisu halatum aphan eson alamlir pen pulo.
“Piso kepangri akecho amei along mane abang nangphan nang kepha ahut akemenei adim ingniri; pima nang par mane the muchot abang aphan phalo tahai,
lapen nangtum banghini aphanta kepha abang vangsi nangpupo, ‘Bangso adim alangliphan pektha.’ Anke nang therak duksi aman kave adim ingni nangkokpo.

Bonta nangphan nangkepha ahut aman kavenei adimle ingni damnon. Lasi nangphan kepha abang kevang ahut nangphan ‘Memuchot adim ingnidam iktha’ pusi nangpuji. Ansi nang long kangni rap-rap alohi atum angno nang man doji.
Pima amethang kechepathe abangphutin aphan pabihekji, lapen amethang kechepabihek abang aphan pathedetji.”

Lapen ke alangliphan kepha abang aphan Jisu pulo, “Anerlo kalite ajo apor kecho kejun amei kepathik ahut, nangjirpo atum, kalite nangkorte atum, kalite nang chepho chero atum, kalite tebok terei akeplang-o atum aphan phari; pima halatum nang-phathupo, lapen nang alar long thupo.
Nang Kecho kejun kepathik ahut keduk, ketekok, kengkok, lapen amek kave atum aphanle phanon;
lapen nang ahirjume longpo, pima halatum nangphan nangpithu thekthelo. Arnamsi mo monit keme atum kethi pen kethur ahut nangphan nangpi thudetpo.”
Bangso alam arju longsi kangni rap-rap atum angbong pen inut abang Jisu aphan pulo, “Arnam Arat angbong an kecho kangni dunlongji atum ko-an akerengme!”
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Inut amonit kechopi amei pathik-lo, lapen alangli penang amonit aphan phalo.
Ansi an kechoji aphan kadokave siktang-etsi alangli kephatang atum along aban aphan toisi papulo, ‘Vang iktha, kadokave nonke siktang-et-lo!’
Bonta halatum kadokaveta diya kechohangji pangcheng-lo. Aphrangsi abang ban aphan pulo, ‘Ne longle emo namlo, lapen ne langdamvek nangji; ne kechoningri dengtha.’
Anut kaprek abang pulo, ‘Ne chainong haipho namtang-lo, lapen ne la anem endam nangjilang; ne kechoningri dengtha.’
Akaprek inut abang pulo, ‘Ne nonhetsi piso kechepangrilang; la apotsi ne nangdun thekthelo.’

“Aban hem vangsi kadokave alam ahemphu aphan than-et-lo. Ansi ahemphu aning thihaksi aban aphan pulo, ‘Rongsopi atovarpi lapen atovarso an damserak-ra, keduk kelak, ketekok, amek kave lapen kengkokjok atum an aphan van-etnon.’
Malomso aphi aban pulo, ‘Hemphu, nang hukum ateng akam klemtang-lo, bonta adim do-o lang.’
Lasi ahemphu abang aban aphan pulo, ‘Nehem kepaplengsetjile rat atovar lapen rit atovar damra monit atum nang kepalutjile bor-i non.’
Ne nangtum aphan nang pulang, kephatang atum angbong pen inut natta ne kepathik akecho kejun chomat longledetji!”
Armu ake-ongpi Jisu along kedun bom ahut, alangli chepangnosi halatum aphan pulo.
“Badutame amethang apo lapen apei, apiso lapen asomar, akorte lapen angjirmar atum, lapen amethang aphan chinghonmunak lote nelong vang setta alangli ne sangho plang un-e.
Badutame amethang athengparpan cheponra ne phi phi nang dundete, alangli ne sangho plang un-e.
“Jongsi nangtum angbong mane abang hem chardon kekimji aning hang-lote, alangli aphrangke ingnisi, ko-an atangka nangjima, lapen kepatang-iji apoisa doloma avema, la lakhaji.
Lapu kalite ahemthur chamdetsi patang thekthedette, kethek dun long atum ingnekchoisi puhurpo,
‘Labangso amonit kekim pang-cheng-lo, bonta patang thekthedet lohe!’

Jongsi inut arecho akaprek arecho pen ron kechedanjisi damlo, lapen bang surikep amonit ponsi hala bang suri ingkoi kevan abang aphan parem unjima, un-ema, labangso alam aphan alangli aphrangsi ingnisi mathaji.
Lapen un-edetji tangte, alangli pherangke atum aphan toisi, heloving kedo ahutsi kechepame thuji aphan choningri damji.”
Jisu pajutsi pulo, “Lasonthotsi nangtum angbong badutame amethang amar atar che-o edette nesangho plang-un-e.”
“Ingti ke mesen, bonta, ingti jongsi lamdak tangte, la kopi pensi padokthumejima.
Lake longle aphan kalite ho-or aphanta meme; la ingtan varchor chotpo. Tangte, karjuji ano kedo abang parjunang!”
Arni isi midu kerung lapen papi atum Jisu adung vang-lo.
Pharisi lapen aron thekser atum pasimuhursi pulo, “Labangso amonit ke papi atum aphan chakbom, lapen chota chorap-rapbom!”
Lasi Jisu halatum aphan labangso alamjir thanlo:

“Bisar alam, nangtum angbong mane abang jon pharo isi abiresak dolo, lapen ejon abang ingbodet-lo, alangli pisi klempo? Hala jon throksirkep-ra sirkep atum aphan kechopan adim otekangsi longletik ke hala kangbodet abang aphan ridam bomji.
Lapen long-lote aning arong pensi aphang athak chebatsi

hem chevangpo. Anke alangli ajirpo lapen tebok terei atum aphan hangsi lapen pangrumsi halatum aphan pupo, ‘Ne ning arongpik-lo, pima ne kangbodet abiresak longthutang-lo. Toh, ning arong chepilonang!’

Lasonthotsi, ne nangtum aphan nang pulang, bang throksirkep-ra sirkep aning kecherui nangne, dhoromi amonit atum pen apot apar inut aning kecherui apapi pen apot sining athak pherangke atum aning arongmuchotji.
“Kalite, inut arloso aduli kep dolo, lapen aduli isi abang ingbodet-lo, alangli pisi klempo? Alangli, melur keisi hem arkokpo, lapen longletik ke ri pameji.
Alangli long-lok lote ajirpi lapen tebok terei atum aphan hang pangrumsi pupo, ‘Ne ning arongpik-lo, pima ne kepangbotang aduli isi longthulo. Toh, ning arong chepilonang!’
Ne nangtum aphan nang pulang, lasonthotsi, inut apapi aning kecherui pen apot Arnam apherangke atum aning arong chepi.”
Lapen Jisu pulo, “Inut amonit asopo banghini dolo.
Akebi abang apo aphan pulo, ‘Po, ne nang mar kelongvek nangji, nepharman an nonle ne pinon.’ Lasi alangli halatum aphan amar thak-lo.
Malomso arni aphi akebi abang alangphan ketang amar an jordamsi kehelo adet damjuilo. Hadak thangta mathathesi atangka hijikthap-et-lo.
Alangli kadokave khorot-et aphi halabangso adet adang jasemet akhim thurlo, lapen alangli long thangnatta avedet-lo.
Lasi alangli halabangso adet amonit inut ahem damsi dodun bor-ilo, lapen phak kepaviji aphansi alangliphan ha rit toilo.
Alangli phak atum kecho, kharop pu athengpi athe ahu pen apok kechepangkrangji aphan aning hang-lo, bonta baduta alangliphan thangta pipedet-lo.
Padu alangli bidi vangthusi pulo, ‘Mai! Ne po aban atum bang ko-anma, latum an kecho dorphlup, bonta neke ladak an ingchirsi thiji dok dok-lo!
Ne thursi ne po along damsi pudampo, Po, sining lapen nang abethursi ne pap klemtang-lo.
Non pen apara nang sopo puke nephan kehangji ne ot avelo; nang ban inut asonle nebinon.’
Lapen alangli thursi apo along kechedam pangcheng-lo.
“Alangliphan achar pen apo chethek-long-lo; alangli ingjinsosi munduk-lo, lapen katvirsi asopo achethok bamlo, lapen ingjup-lo.
Asopo alangliphan pulo, ‘Po, sining lapen nangbe thursi ne pap klem tang-lo. Non pen apar nang sopo puke nephan kehangji ne-ot avelo.’
Bonta apo amethang aban atum aphan pulo, ‘Serak non! Menei ape vanra pindeng non. Ari chimun arnan lapen keng-op nangthon non.
Damra, kepangtutang achainong aso thunon, lapen ili chora ning arong chepi lonang!
Pima la nesopo thilot-lo, bonta nonke rengthulo; alangli ingbodet-lo, bonta non longthu tang-lo.’ Lapen ke halatum aning arong kechepiji pangcheng-lo.
“Halabangso ahut asopo akleng abang ritsi dolang. Alangli rit pen hem nanglesi kelun kekan arki arju long-lo.
Lasi alangli ban inut aphan adung chehangsi, ‘Kopi plang loma?’ pusi arjulo.
Aban thak-lo, ‘Nangli mu vangthutang-lo, lapen nangli po kepangtutang achainong aso thutang-lo; pima alangliphan thang thesi longthulo.’
“Akleng abang aning thisusi hem kelutji molo. Lasi apo vangsi hem kelutji aphan choningrilo.

Bonta apo aphan thaksi pulo, ‘Ne lapu-an aningkan ban ason thak-thaksi kam nangklempilo, lapen nang hukum eson natta kekroikre avepinlang. Nang kopisi nephan pilo? Ne jirpo atum pen nening arong kechepiji aphan bi aso ejon anta nang nepipepinlang!
Bonta la nang sopo, akhat kave arloso atum pen pen nangmar nangtar kechorapdet abang kevang ahut nang alangphan kepangtutang achainong thupitang-lo!’
Apo thak-lo, ‘Po, nangke kaiketa nelong doverlo, lapen ne kedo-an amarta nangmarlo.
Bonta ening arong kechepiji, lapen kechehokji lake akenangsot-lo, pima nangmu thilot-lo, bonta rengthulo, lapen alang ingbodet-lo, bonta non longthutang-lo.’”
Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan pulo, “Ahut isi inut akiripo ahemari chebilo. Ansi alangli kechobi ahemari alanglimar-atar akejoijepisi hijikthap varet-lo pusi akaprek atum kiripo aphan thanlo.
Lasi alangliphan hangsi pulo, ‘La ne nanglamjir karjulongbom alam kopuson mati? Nang hemari akam alakha nangchepi non, pima non pen apara nang hemari akam longle lo.’
Hemari aning arlo chepulo, ‘Nephan ke kam nepaklem longlelo. Ne kopisi klem poma? Neke ku ta tak-un-e, lapen kechohang chorek ke ne therakduk.
Toh! Ne kopisi klem nangjima, ne chinilo! Nemen thandet setta hem nephan kechakji ajirpo ne cheripo.’
“Lasi ahemphu along apreng kedo an atum aphan amethang adung inut inut hangsi alangli aphrang abang aphan pulo, ‘Nehemphu along ko-ansi nangpreng doma?’
Alangli thak-lo, ‘Oliv ajangthu mon pharo isi.’ Hemari pulo, ‘Ho! Lahelo nangpreng alakha aloh; ingnira phokep-le toknon.’
Ansi alangli anut kaprek aphan arjulo, ‘Lapen nangke nangpreng ko-an doma?’ Alangli thak-lo, ‘Thoila suri isi asoktipli.’ Hemari pulo, ‘Ho! Nangpreng aloh, enra pharo nerkeple toknon.’

“Labangso pen ajok ahemphu abang hala ahok-he ahemari aphan rolo. Pima alangli chepareset pen klemlo. Atheke kethe-ang asomar atum apar labangso apirthe amonit atum amethang akam keklem ahut remuchot.”
“Ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, nangtum pirthe akhi pen jirpo cheri-inon. Anke la ikdet lote nangtum aphan kevirvepin ahem along nang-chakpo.
Bihek akam ahokpet pen keklem abang ke akethe akamta ahokpet pen klemji, lake ning thek-long. Bihek akam keklem pameme abang ke akethe akamta klem pamemedetji.
Lasi, nangtum jongsi labangso apirthe akhi pen klem-i pameme tangte, nangtum akhi binong pen klem pameji puke kopusi ning nangchethepoma!
Nangtum jongsi bang amar atar pen klem-i pameme tangte, komatsi nangtum aphan nangmethang akhi nangpipoma?

“Badu abanta hemphu banghini ingduk un-e, alangli inut aphan lang-seletji, lapen anut kaprek aphan inghonji. Alangli inut abang aphan alam kroikriji, lapen anut kaprek aphan ke alam arjujedetji. Nangtum la sonni, atheke Arnam lapen tangka aphan ingduk rappet un-e.”
Pharisi atum la arjulongsi Jisu aphan meng-lo, pima halatum ke tangka chinghon-o.
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum monit atum angno ke dhoromi amonit asonsi chepaklang-lo, bonta Arnam nangtum aning chinilo. Pima monit atum ador kepathe amar hei hei Arnam angno ke thangta kalilo.
“Jon Baptist vangve ako ke aron lapen Arnam amontri atum alam ajakong dolang. Halabangso ahut pen Arnam a-Rat a-Birta Keme alam than-pachethang bomlo, lapen monit atum la kelutdunji aphan bor-ilo.
Bonta aron angbong ketok amek atokbor isi kevirdet apar sining longle kevir joimulo.
“Badutame, amethang apiso chetisi akaprek pen kechepangri abang ke beisa klemtang-lo; lapen ketitang arloso pen kechepangri abangta beisa klemtang-lo.
“Ahut isi inut akiripo dolo. Alangli arnivangta ador kesopik ape chepin-deng-lo lapen ador kesopik a-ansi cholo.
Lapen Lazarus pu inut keboidet abang dolo. Alangli bang bithe bitha areng amek saide, lapen kiripo atebul pen keklo a-an-chore kepacholongjisi,
alangliphan inghap angho alongsi bidet-lo. Methan atumta vangsi areng amek chonglek-lo.
“Aphisi la keboidet abang thilot-lo, lapen sining apherangke atum alangliphan ponsi Abraham adung bidamlo. Kiripo thilot-lo, lapen pipdet-lo.
Lapen ha chom, kethitang atum kedo adim arlo jasemet aduk phosi alangli angsong anat langsi Abraham lapen adung Lazarus kangni thek-long-lo.

Lasi alangli hangsersi pulo, ‘O po, Abraham! Nephan ingjinsora, Lazarus ari chimun ehong angchun lang panimra nede kepachamjile alangliphan nangtoitha; pima ne labangso ame ade angkang along sungpik-lo!’

“Bonta Abraham pulo, ‘Chematha-thutha, po, nangke kerengbom ahut kadokave kemesen amar an longpet-lo, lapen Lazarus-ke kehingno amar an long-lo. Bonta non alang ke dak aning arong chepilo, lapen nangke sungpik-lo.
Lapen aparta, netum lapen nangtum adak herangpi bitang-lo, lapen ajok nangtum along kekapji aning kehang atum kap un-e, lapen hadak pen netum alongta kap un-e.’
Ansi kiripo pulo, ‘Tangte po Abraham, ne choningrilo, Lazarus aphan nepo ahem toitha,
hadak nekorte bangpho dolang. Halatum labangso akesungpik adim kevangvedetji aphan alangliphan toira halatum aphan jasemetle than pare damtha.’
“Abraham pulo, ‘Nang korte atum aphan kepacheretoiji aphan Moses lapen montri atumta dolo; nang korte atum halatum kethan alam parjunang.’
Kiripo thak-lo, ‘La anvetke chokchelang, po Abraham! Bonta kethitang atum angbong pen inut abang halatum along damlote halatum apap hei hei pen aning chiruiji.’
Bonta Abraham pulo, ‘Latum jongsi Moses lapen montri atum alam arjuje tangte, kethitang atum angbong pen inut thur setta halatum aphan pakroi thekthe.’ ”
Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan pulo, “Pap kepaplang-i amar hei hei dovek-lo, kepaplangji aning kehang abang ko-an akephere-meme akesung pho nangpo!
Alangli la bihek atum angbong pen inut aphan pap kepaklem long aparte, alangli chethok him kekoi-i a-arlong homdongra langthepi along varchui memu.
Lasi nangtum kopisi keklem, lale cherenon!
“Jongsi nangkorte pap klem lote, alangliphan ingcheknon, lapen aning chirui tangte, alangliphan diya non.
Lapen arni isi angbong nangliphan alangli batai throksi pap klemlo, lapen abataitin nangli long vang-ra ‘Nening chiruilo’, pulote alangliphan nangli diya vek nangji.”
Ketoitang atum Hemphu aphan pulo, “Netum akekroi pathe muchot-tha.”

Hemphu thak-lo, “Nangtum akekroi hanjang emu athek anle do asonte, nangtum la ingle arong aphan, ‘Nangmethangle chephujokra ha lang-thepi angbongle che-e damnon’ pusi puthekji apot-lo, lapen la nangtum alam arjuji apot-lo.
“Bisar alam, nangtum angbong mane aban abang hai bai damlo, kalite biresak vidamlo. Alangli rit pen vang lote, ‘Non amat vang-ra an chonon,’ pusi nangtum pujima?
Lapu pupe! Alar nangtum alangphan pulo, ‘Ne an kechoji aphan sik koinon, lapen nangvam chingtinra ne an kecho ahut nephan ru thai non; la an aphile nangke an chonon,’ pusi puji.
Ban abang hukum kekroi apot akero longle kalima?
Lasonthotsi nangtum jokta hukum kelong an klemdet aphita lasonle punon, ‘Netum ke thangta kalidet aban atumchot; netum keklem nangji adengsi keklemlo.’ ”
Jisu Jerusalem anat kedam ahut alangli Samaria lapen Galili adet ahoi keng keng damlo.
Alangli erong kelut dam ahut bang kep si-i kelong atum alangli pen chetong-lo.
Halatum achar arjapphrongsi alangliphan hangjosi pulo, “O Hemphu, Jisu! Nelitum aphan ingjinsotha!”
Jisu halatum aphan thek-longsi pulo, “Damnon, lapen kurusar atum asat nang-palang lonang.”
Tovar kedam ahut halatum ingthir-et-lo.
Halatum angbong inut ke medet-lo pu chethek-longsi, hang cherbu pen Arnam aphan rosi vangthulo.
Alangli Jisu akeng-ri domkhrupsi alangliphan chorolo. Halabangso amonit ke Samaria asorlo.
Jisu pulo, “Bangkep atum medet-lo; hala bang sirkep atum konatma?
Kopi apotsi la bang adet amonit apar akaprek atum ke nang chiruira Arnam aphan keroji aphan baduta vangvedet loma?”
Lapen Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Thurra damnon, nang akekroisi nangphan pametang-lo.”
Arnam Arat mantu vangjima pusi Pharisi atum Jisu aphan arjulo. Alangli halatum aphan thaksi pulo, “Arnam Arat ke kethek longphrong pen vangve.
‘Langtha, daksi do,’ kalite ‘Hadaksi do!’ pusi baduta pupedetji; pima Arnam Arat nangtum angbongsi do.”
Anke alangli asangho atum aphan pulo, “Monit a-Sopo a-arni hei hei angbong pen isi a-arni nangtum kethek longji ingtungji, bonta nangtum thek longledetji, lason ahut vangji.
Lapen monit atum lason nangtum aphan puji, ‘Langtha, ladak ho!’ Kalite ‘Langtha, hadak jaho!’ Bonta hong barra ridunri.
Pima sining kebirlak ahut ihi pen ihi kekhelan asonthotsi Monit a-Sopo amethang kevang arni plangji.
Bonta aphrangke alangli penang akesung chechak nangjilang, lapen labangso a-ove amonit atum alangliphan chakchedetji.
Noah arni asonthotsi Monit a-Sopo arnita plangji.
Noah telongpi kechethap lapen langthepi vangsi monit atum aphan kepavirkoi ahut anta monit atum chobom, junbom, piso enbom, penan dobomlang.
Lapen Lot arni ason thakthak plangji; abangphutinta chobom, junbom, lapen nambom, jorbom; lapen sok ebom lapen hem kimbomlang.
Lot Sodom pen nangkebar arni, sining pen cheter lapen me ke-et nangklosi halatum aphan pavir-et-lo.
Lasonthot helo, Monit a-Sopo keklang arni keplangji.
“Halabangso arni mane abang hem asarnung athaksi do tangte, amar atar ke-enji aphan hir nangnelo; lason thak-thaksi rit kedam abangta hem chevang nangnelo.
Lot apiso alam chemathathutha!
Baduta amethang achethe kechepajokji aphan bor-i lote la ingbodetji; badutame achethe pangbolote, alangli la chepajokji.
Ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, halabangso ajo, banghini amonit hongplang isinat irap rapji: inut aphan pondetji, lapen anut kaprek aphan otekangbupji.
Bang hini arlosomar atum him koi rap-rapji: inut aphan pondetji, lapen anut kaprek aphan otekangbupji.
Banghini amonit atum ritsi doji: inut aphan pondetji, anut kaprek aphan otekangbupji.”
Asangho atum alangliphan arjulo, “Konatma, Hemphu?” Jisu halatum aphan thak-lo, “Kethitang arpum kedo aling, hadak takun atumta chingrumji.”
Lapen latum kaiketa ning runhuphedet-ra ardomver nangji pu kethanjisi Jisu lamlir eson thanlo.
“Erong arongsopi inut kangsai abang dolo; alangli Arnam aphan pherere lapen monit aphanta aman pipe.
Lapen halabangso arongsopi angbong inut ahemepi alangli long vang versi pulo, ‘Nephan kekosor abang pen nepajoknon.’
Penang ahut an alangli la keklemji aning hanghe det-lo, bonta aphisi alangli amethang aning arlo chepulo, ‘Ne Arnam aphan pherere, lapen monit aphan aman pipe setta
labangso ahemepi nephan pasungver apotsi ne alangliphan kepajokji aphan langpo. Jongsi ne klemklete alangli vangbomsi nephan pasiksak pikji!’”
Lapen Hemphu pulo, “Hala kehingno akangsai abang kepu alam arjutha.
Tangte nonke, Alangli methang amonit atum ajo, anerlota Alangliphan kechoningriver atum aphan Arnam abe dundedetsi ingsaise-detjima? Mate Alangli halatum aphan kerapji pader poma?
Ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, Alangli abe dunsi ingsai dapprangji lapen halatum aphan pajokji. Bonta Monit a-Sopo kevangji ahut alangli pirthe athak kekroi longjima?”
Lapen amethang mamat mesen pu kechematha lapen bang aphan kehijim atum aphan Jisu labangso alamlirta thanlo,
“Ahut isi bang hini amonit Kardomhemthepi arlo kardom damjisi damlo: inut ke Pharisi lapen inut ke midu kerung abang.

“Pharisi achar arjapthersi ame-thang aphan chardom pilo, ‘O Arnam, neke bang atum ason thakthak, bang amar kethi, kechobei, mate beisa keklem abang kali apotsi ne nangphan nangchorolo. Ne nangphan nang-chorolo atheke, neke labangso amidu kerung abang asonta kali.
Ne, erui angbong nini an humbomlo, lapen nemar kelong an angbong phan kep pen ephan nangphan pilo.’
“Bonta midu kerung abang achar arjapsi lapen sining anat langhaihe-detsi aning chetengbomsi pulo, ‘O Arnam, neke papi abang, nephan ingjinsotha!’ ”

Jisu puthulo, “Ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, la midu kerung abang aphan helo, lapen Pharisi abang aphan kali, hem kechevoi ahut ke Arnam angno dhoromi pusi lakha det-lo. Pima amethangsi kechepathe abang aphan pabihekji, lapen kechepabihek abangphutin aphan pathedetji.”
Jisu kepa-otjisi manene atum osomar alangli long vanlo. Sangho atum halatum aphan thek longsi ingchek-lo,
bonta Jisu osomar atum aphan hangsi pulo, “Osomar atum aphan nedung pavang longnon, latum aphan khangri, pima Arnam Arat ke lapuson atum arat-lo.
Labangso alam ning chebi non! Oso ason thakthak Arnam Arat kedengde abang aling ke jonghe setta Arnam arat lutdun longledetji.”
Inut a-Jihudi keja abang Jisu aphan arjulo. “ O kemesen a-Thanbang, kejut un-e achethe kelongji aphan neli kopi klemvek nangji?”
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Nephan kopisi kemesen abang pule nehang loma? Arnam apar ke baduta kemesen abang ave.
Nangli hukum an chinipet-lo, ‘Beisa akam klemri; Pran ke-en akam klemri; Chonghuri, kechobei pen badu aphanta adai nep-ri, nangpi nangpo aphan anong pathenon.’”
Halabangso amonit thak-lo, “Neli oso chedap ahut penta la kadokave ahukum kroipetbomlo.”

Jisu labangso alam arjulongsi alangliphan pulo, “Nangli eson klem nangjilang. Nangli mar do-an jor-et-ra keduk kelak atum aphan tangka pinon, lapen sining athak nangli khi do-oji; anke vang-ra neli phi phi nangdun non.”
Bonta labangso alam arju longsi alangli ning dukparlo, pima alangli keplang-o abang-lo.
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Keplang-o atum Arnam Arat kelutji aphan ko-an akesung!
Pima keplang-o amonit Arnam Arat kelut aparte, ka-ut ingprim arme kelut joimu.”
Karjulong atum alangliphan pulo, “Mai! Ante matsi jokthekpoma?”
Jisu thak-lo, “Monit ke-un-e akam Arnam klem un.”
Lapen ke Pitor pulo, “Lang iktha! Nangli phi phi kedunjisi netum me-thang methang ahem che-o tang-lo.”
Lapen Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Ahok-lo, lapen ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, Arnam Arat pen apot ahem, mate apiso mate akortemar, mate api, apo mate asomar aphan che-o det-lo,
tangte labangso akai kedo ahut long-oji, lapen mo kevangji akai alangli kejut ahut un-e achethe longji.”
Jisu la bang krehini asangho atum aphan cheponsi halatum aphan pulo, “Arjutha! Ili Jerusalem arlu dampo; hadak Monit a-Sopo alamjir montri atum ketok alam an chekokpetji.
Alangliphan Jihudi kalidet atum arideng hodai detji lapen halatum alangliphan pinremji, patherakji lapen abang athak ingthokji.
Halatum champre abu pen choksi alangliphan pathiji, bonta nithom arni aphi alangli kethi pen thur thuji.”
Sangho atum lahei hei alam thangta chinine det-lo; labangso alam athe hei hei halatum pen patu det-lo.
Jisu Jeriko kele ahut amek kave abang inut tovar akung ingnisi chohang-lo.
Alangli armu ake-ongpi kedam arki arjulongsi, athe kopima pusi arjulo.
Nazareth a-Jisusi labangso atovar kevang, pusi halatum alangliphan thanlo.
Alangli hang charbusi pulo, “David a-Sopo! Jisu! Nephan ingjinsotha!”
Aphrang kedam atum alangliphan ingchek-lo, lapen dojoinon pusi thanlo. Bonta alangli ase pathe muchot pen hang charbulo, “David a-Sopo! Nephan ingjinsotha!”
Lasi Jisu sangkok-lo, lapen amek kave abang alangli dung kevangji aphan hukum pilo. Alangli Jisu adung nanglesi alangli arjulo,
“Nangli neliphan kopi kepaklemjisi nangli ning kehangma?”
Alangli pulo, “Hemphu, neli kechechar thuji aphan ning hang-lo.”
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Tangte, checharnon! Nangli akekroisi nangli-phan pame tang-lo.”
Halabangso ahut mamat alangli chechar unlo. Armu atum la thekdun longsi Arnam aphan anong pathelo.
Jisu Jeriko nanglesi rongsopi angbong dong ponputsi damlo.
Hadak midu kerung akethe abang dolo. Alangli menke Jakaias puhelo. Alangli inut keplang-o abang-lo.
Jisu komatma, la kethek longjisi alangli bor-i bomlo, bonta alangli kebi-kethi amonit pinak, lapen armu do-o apotsi alangli Jisu aphan thek long un-e det-lo.
Lasi alangli armu aphrang katvirsi Jisu aphan kethek longji aphan ingle athengpi arong arlu krak-lo, pima alangli halabangso atovarsi vangbomlo.
Halabangso adim nanglesi Jisu angsong anat langsi Jakaias aphan pulo, “Hir serak non, Jakaias, pima pini neli nangli hemsi do nangji.”
Jakaias hir seraksi aning arong pen alangliphan chak-lo.
Lapen kethek dunlong atum an pasimuhursi pulo, “Labangso amonit papi ahemsi alohi cho damlo!”

Malomso aphi Jakaias thursi Hemphu aphan pulo, “Arju iktha, Hemphu! Neli mar do-an achitim neli keduk kelak atum aphan pipo, lapen jongsi neli kechobei pen mane abang pen kopine enlote, halabangso abang aphan neli phan phli pithupo.”
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Labangso ahem arlo pini kejok vang tang-lo, pima labangso amonitta Abraham asupolo.
Monit a-Sopo ke kangbotang aphan keriji lapen kepajokjisi vang-lo.”
Monit atum labangso alam karjubom ahut Jisu thanbomsi eson alamlir thanlo. Alangli non Jerusalem nang tebok-het-lo, lapen Arnam Arat non amat nang klangpo pusi halatum mathalo.
Lasi alangli pulo, “Ahut isi inut arleng kethe, recho kecho longji aphan heloving adet damlo, la aphi hem kechevoithuji aphan chepathik-lo.
Alangli damde ako amethang aban bang kep atum aphan chehang-lo, lapen anut-tin aphan ser ingkleng isi si pitekangsi halatum aphan pulo, ‘Neli vangve tik ke la pen bepar klem-inon.’
Bonta alangli arat aso atum alangliphan hijimpet-lo, lapen alangli phi keng keng pherangke atum toidunsi papulo, ‘Nelitum aphuthak labangso amonit recho kechoji aphan nelitum ning hanghe.’
“Halabangso amonit recho akam long-lo lapen hem chevoilo. Lapen alangli ban atum ko-an ale long-lo, labangso kechinijisi amethang adung kevangji ahukum pilo.
Aphrang abang vangsi pulo, ‘Hemphu, nangli nekepi ingkleng isi aser pen neli ser ingkleng kep long-lo.’
Alangli pulo, ‘Me-ongchot-lo! Nang ke mesen abanlo! Bihek akamta nangli keklem pame apot nangliphan neli long kep arongsopi kechepahemphuji ajakong nangpipo.’
Adunthu aban vangsi pulo, ‘Hemphu, nangli ingkleng isi aser nekepi pen neli ser ingkleng pho long-lo.’
Labangso abang aphan alangli pulo, ‘Nangli rongsopi longpho kechepahemphuji ajakong longpo.’”
“Anut kaprek aban vangsi pulo, ‘Hemphu, nangli ser angkleng daksi do; neli piban pen thitsi bikok-lo.
Nangliphan neli pherelo, pima nanglike haijai amonit. Nanglike kebibe amarta humlok lapen kerikre adimsi kerot.’
Alangli alangliphan pulo, ‘Nangli kehingno aban! Nangli methang keningje alamthe pen neli nangli dai padopo! Neli ke haijai amonit, kebibe amar humlok lapen kerikre adimsi kerot pu nangli chinilo.
Toh, tangte, nangli kopi apotsi neli tangka bank along thap damde det-loma? Anlote neli kechevang thu ahut ale pen chelong thuji apot-lo.’
“Lapen ke hadak karjapphrong atum aphan alangli pulo, ‘Alang long kedo aser angkleng ponra hala ingkleng kep kedo aban aphan pidamnon.’
Bonta halatum alangliphan pulo, ‘Hemphu, alangli ke ser ingkleng kep dotang-lo!’
‘Ne nangtum aphan nang pulang, amar kedo abangphutin aphan pidetji lapen thangta kavedet abang pen asap kedo amar anta ponthudetji.
Lapen ke neliphan halatum aphuthak recho kepachoji aning kehanghe atum aphan neli long vanpet non, lapen neli ingnole latum aphan pathi-etnon.’”
Jisu labangso alam pudetsi alangli Jerusalem anat dambomlo.
Alangli Oliv anglong akung kedo Bethphage lapen Bethani pu arong nangleji dokdok ahut alangli bang hini asangho atum aphan toisi pulo,
“Nangtum kepangno arongle damnon; hadak kelut pen mamat baduta kardonde pinlang agadha aso kekokdong thekdam longji. Phlok-ra dak-le vannon.
Mane jongsi, nangtum kopi apotsi la phlok-lo pu arjulote. Hemphu nangji pura punon.”
Halatum damlo lapen halatum aphan Jisu kethan ateng kadokave long-lo.
Halatum gadha aso kephlok-bom ahut ahemphu atum latum aphan arjulo, “Nanglitum kopi apotsi gadha aso phlok-loma?”
Halatum thak-lo, “Hemphu nangji,”
lapen halatum gadha aso Jisu along vanlo. Anke latum amethang methang ape gadha athak limsi amoi athak Jisu aphan pardonlo.
Alangli kedam ahut monit atum amethang methang ape tovar athak limlo.

Alangli Jerusalem nangleji dokdok adim, Oliv anglong anat kehir kecheng adim along, halatum kethek long akemanghumeme akam an pen apot asangho atum ake-ongpi Arnam aphan rosi ase kethe pen anong pathelo:
“Hemphu amen pen kevang a-Recho aphan Arnam hirjume papinang! Sining athak ning kangsam padonang, lapen Arnam aphan anong pathe nang!”
Lapen armu atum angbong pen manene a-Pharisi atum Jisu aphan pulo, “Thanbang, nangli sangho atum aphan kepadojoi jile hukum pinon!”
Jisu thak-lo, “Neli nanglitum aphan nangthan lang, jongsi latum dojoilo tangte, arlong atum amethangsi hangjoji.”
Alangli ha rongsopi nanglesi la thek long-lo lapen la pen apot aning duk-lo,
lapen pulo, “Mai! Pini nang ning kangsam kelongji aphan kopi nangji, lale chini asonte mesenji apot-lo! Bonta nonke nangtum thek longlelo!
Nang hotur atum nangphan bithe bitha paisong buichenji, nangkompetji, lapen bithe bitha penta nang khang thipji; lason ahut vangji.
Halatum nangphan lapen paisong arlo kedo amonit atum an pavirkoiji; arlong isinatta kangrei-redet avedetji, pima Arnam nangphan kepajokji aphan kevang ahut nang apor chininedet-lo.”
Ansi Jisu Kardomhemthepi lutdamsi mar kejor atum aphan kephlungji pangchengsi,
halatum aphan pulo, “Hastro along toktang-lo, atheke Arnam pulo, ‘Ne hem ke Arnam kardom ahem pusi puji,’ bonta nangtum la kanghu atum kechepatu angthor paman tang-lo!”
Arnivangta Jisu Kardomhemthepi arlo lam thanbomlo. Kurusar akethe atum, Aron thekser atum, lapen rat aphan keja atum alangliphan kepathiji aning hang-lo,
bonta halatum atovar long thekthe det-lo, pima kadokave arat atum mon-e pensi alangli lam arjudunlo.
Arni isi Jisu rat atum aphan Kardom a-Hem arlo kethanbom lapen Birta Keme kepachethangbom ahut, kurusar akethe atum lapen Akesar atum pen pen Aron thekser atum vang-lo,
lapen alangliphan pulo, “Lahei akam keklemji nangli kopi ajakong doma? Matsi labangso ajakong nangliphan pilo? Nelitum aphan thantha.”
Jisu halatum aphan thak-lo, “Toh! Nonke neli nanglitum aphan eson alam arjulang. Neliphan thantha,
Jon baptisom kepi ajakong Arnam pentong kevangma, mate monit penma?”
Halatum angbong chedanseisi chepulo, “Etum pisi pupoma? Etum jongsi ‘Arnam pen’ pulote alangli ke, ‘Kopi apotsi tangte nanglitum Jon aphan kroikredet loma,’ pusi puji.
Bonta etum jongsi ‘Monit pen’ pulote, labangso arat atum do-an etum aphan arlong pen arbupo, pima, Jon ke inut Arnam amontrilo pusi halatum kroipet-lo.”
Lasi halatum thak-lo, “Alangli konat pensi kevangma, lake nelitum chinine.”
Lapen Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Neli kopi ajakong pensi lahei akam klem loma, neli jokta nanglitum aphan thanthelo.”
Anke Jisu labangso alamlir rat atum aphan thanlo: “Ahut isi inut amo-nit drakha aberi tikilo. Alangli kehon atum aphan bi tekangsi arni dingklui aphan ahem che-osi damlo.
Lapen drakha athe kepangrumji ahut nanglesi, alangli pharman kelongji aphan aban inut aphan beri kehon atum along nangtoilo. Bonta kehon atum ban aphan areng paso-osi areng angse nangtoijuilo.
Lasi puthot alangli anut kaprek aban aphan toilo; bonta beri kehon atum alangliphanta areng paso-olo, patherak-lo, lapen areng angsesi nangtoijuilo.
Anke alangli kethom aphong ban aphan toilo; beri kehon atum laphanta areng amek padolo, lapen ingtan varchorlo.
Ansi drakha aberi ahemphu pulo, ‘Ne kopisi klempoma? Ne methang kechinghon asopo aphan ne toipo; halatum alangliphan aman pivekji!’
Bonta kehon atum alangliphan thek longsi, halatum hijan chepulo, ‘Lake ahemphu asopolo. La aphan pathilot lonang; anke amar atar etum chepahemphu longpo!’
Lasi halatum alangliphan beri angtan varchorlo, lapen pathilot-lo.
“Tangte, drakha aberi ahemphu hala-tum aphan kopisi klemjima” pusi Jisu arjulo.
“Alangli vangsi halabangso amonit atum aphan pathipo, lapen drakha aberi ke akaprek kehon atum aphan pidetpo.”
Monit atum labangso alam arju longsi pulo, “Lapuson paplang nang!”
Jisu halatum aphan langdingsi pulo, “Tangte, labangso ahastro alamthe kopilo?
‘Thangta me-me pusi kekim atum ke-en-e a-arlongsi
Kadokave apar akenangsotnei a-arlong cheplang tang-lo.’
Halabangso a-arlong athak keklo abang aling chebengniji; lapen jongsi mane aphu athak bangso a-arlong klo lote, alangliphan padukniji.”
Aron thekser atum lapen kurusar atum hadak mamat Jisu aphan kenepji aphan bor-ilo; pima alangli halatum aputhak labangso alamlir thanlo pusi chinilo; bonta halatum rat aphan phereduk-lo.

Lasi halatum ahut keme rilo. Halatum kelang dunjoiji aphan monit toilo, dhoromi ason cheplangsi damlo, atheke, alangli keningje alam kenepdun thekji aphan lapen labangso pen ajok Jisu aphan Roman detpangri lapen govornor arideng kehodai thekji aphansi halatum lapuson klemlo.

La kelangjoi atum Jisu aphan pulo, “Thanbang, nangli keningje lapen kethan alam ke chok pu nelitum chini. Nangli monit amahang langle, bonta monit aphan Arnam aning kehang kopi, labangso alamjir ahokpet alamsi nangli thanlo pu nelitum chinilo.
Nelitum aphan thantha, ili Roman a-Recho aphan midu kepi aron doma, avema?”
Bonta halatum akepacherei abidi chinisi halatum aphan pulo,
“Neliphan rup apoisa isi nepaklangtha. Komat a-arjan lapen amensi la athak kedoma?” “Recho” pusi halatum thak-lo.
Lasi Jisu pulo, “Toh tangte, Recho amar Recho aphan pinon, lapen Arnam amar Arnam aphan pinon.”
Hadak halatum rat angno thangta alangli lam akechokche nep thekthedet-lo, lapen alangli kethak alam pen apot manghuphrongsi halatum doklip-lo.
Ansi manene a-Saduki atum, atheke kethitang atum thurthuthe pu kepu atum, Jisu along vangsi pulo,

“Thanbang, Moses labangso aron ilitum aphan etokpilo: ‘Jongsi inut amonit aso ave akole thilot-ra apiso pamo tekang-lo tangte, hala kethitang abang apoton kedoji aphan akorte abang la hemepi aphan patengvek nangji.’
Ahut isi korte bang throksi dolo; aklengsi abang piso ensi aso ave ako thilot-lo.
Anke halabangpi aphan adakvam abang pateng-lo,
lapen ke adakvam abangta pateng dunlo. Lasonthotsi la kadokave bang throksita cheplang-lo-asomar ave ako thi-et-lo.
Kadokave aphi arlosota thilot-lo.
Tangte, mo kethitang atum kethur arni, alangli komat apiso cheplangpo? Pima la bang throksita labangpi pen chepangri pet-lo.”
Jisu halatum aphan thak-lo, “Labangso akai apinso lapen arloso atum chepangri,
bonta kethi pen kethur dunlongji a-ot kedo atum, lapen mo kevangji akai kedo dunlongji atum ke piso-en-e, penanta dode,
Halatum ke sining pherangke atum ason thakthakpo lapen thi un-elo. Halatum ke Arnam asomarlo, pima halatum kethi pen thurtang-lo.
Lapen kethitang atum kethurji pu angthek Moses paklangdak-lo. Thengplum along me ketot-ang ahastro angdeng along alangli Hemphu aphan ‘Abraham a-Arnam, Isaak a-Arnam, lapen Jakob a-Arnam,’ pusi pulo.
Alangli ke kethitang atum a-Arnam kali, Alangli ke kereng-et atum a-Arnamlo. Pima alangli long kadokave atum rengver.”
Manene aron thekser atum pulo, “Thanbang, nangli kethak alam mesen!”
Hala pen apar halatum karjuji haihedet-lo.
Jisu halatum aphan arjulo, “Khristo ke David asopolo pu monit atum kopusonsi puthekma?
Pima David amethangsi Lun aloh along tok-lo;
‘Hemphusi ne-Hemphu aphan pulo:
ne nang hotur atum aphan nang keng kedong-i anghoi ason bibe tik ke nang ne ar-ele ingnitha.’
David alangliphan ‘Hemphu’ pusi hang-lo; tangte, kopusonsi Khristo ke David asopo jilangma?”
Rat atum alangliphan karju phrong ahut, Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan pulo,

“Aron thekser atum aphan cherehurnon! Latum choi keding chingchoisi kephurijisi aning hangpik, lapen hithi borwa along man kepi akardom kelongji aphan aning dokpik; Sinagog along anghoi keme lapen kecho kejun amei ahut akemenei adim kangniji aphan chongvai;
lapen latum hemepi atum akhi cho-et-lo, lapen ke athak kechepaklang aphan Arnam kardom ajir pading pik pik-lo! Latum aphan aduk so muchotji!.”
Ansi Jisu aphu chingthursi adung arei langsi keplang-o amonit atum kardom ahem apuru along dan kethap thek long-lo,
lapen alangli inut keboidet ahemepi pai-ni apoisa kethapta thek-long-lo.
Alangli pulo, “Ne nangtum aphan nangthanlang, kadokave atum apar labangso keboidet ahemepi kethap ongmuchot-lo.
Pima kadokave atum ke kedortang ahin angbong pensi thap-lo; bonta labangpi ke boidet-lo setta kereng-iji aphan kedo-an asonta choche selesi pidet-lo.”

Sangho atum angbong pen manene atum Kardomhemthepi alam chethanseilo. Atheke Kardomhemthepi a-arlong kelang ko-an alon kedo, lapen Arnam aphan kepi adan hei heita ko-an alon kedo pusi halatum chethanseilo.
Jisu pulo, “La nangtum kethek-long an, atheke lahei hei a-arlong isinatta mo arni isi ke non adim bibedetji; kadokave a-arlongta var-etji.”
Halatum alangliphan arjulo, “Thanbang la komantu plangjima? lapen la plangji dokdok ahut pi pi cheplangjima?”
Jisu pulo, “Cherenon, nangtum aphan nangpamanghu longri. Ne men pen penang atum vangsi pupo, ‘Ne helo alanglilo, lapen ahut nangletang-lo!’ Bonta nangtum halatum along dunri.
Nangtum ron kechedan lapen kehorisei alam hei hei karjulong ahut phereri, aphrangke lahei hei plangvek nangjilang. Bonta lahei hei apot-le kejut tebok-het-lo, lapu kali.”
Ansi Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Det ahotur det, lapen rat ahotur rat chethurji.
Kepherememe achikli hei hei vangji, akhim thurji, lapen adim pen adim mavur doji. Kephere meme lapen angthek kethe hei hei sining angsong pen nangklangji.

La kadokave chekok ke ako halatum nanglitum aphan aling pen setta nangnepji lapen nangchenekji. Nangtum aphan sinagog hei hei along nangkepangsaiji aphan hodaidetji, lapen nangtum aphan phatek nangbengji. Ne pen apot nangtum aphan recho atum angno lapen det keja atum angno nangpondetji.
Nangtum aphan lake Birta Keme kethanji aphan apor keme cheplangji.
Nangtum kopusi chethakdun thek-jima pura aphrang pen ning biri; nangtum aning chepathirnon.
Pima nangtum keningje alam nangtum ahotur atum baduta khang un-e, lapen nangchethakdun thekthe, lason alamthe lapen agian ne nangtum aphan nangpiji.
Nangtum api apo, nangtum akorte atum, chepho chero atum, lapen nangtum ajirpo atum nangtum aphan hotur arideng nanghodaiji: lapen nangtum angbong manene aphan pathiji.
Ne pen apot abangphutinta nangtum aphan hijimji.
Bonta nangtum achu ejengnatta ingbobedetji.
Nangtum dothipnon, lapen nangtum reng-longji.
“Chedanbang armu atum Jerusalem kekompet nangtum thek-long-lo tangte, bangso arongsopi pavir dapprangpo pu nangtum chiniji.
Anke Judia adet kedo atum inglong kat nangji; Jerusalem arlo kedo atum nangbar vek nangji, lapen ke rit-le kedo atum rongsopi palut-le nang.
Pima hastro alam kechekokji aphan halabangso arni hei hei ‘Aduk kepi arni’, plangji.

Halabangso arni areng angsesedet a-arlosomar atum lapen oso thi-i kedo apei atum ko-an kepherememe akesung pho nangpo! Pima labangso adet aphan pherememe akesung vangji, lapen labangso arat atum aphuthak Arnam aduk-kepi vangji.
Penang atum aphan nokjir pen pathi-etji, lapen penang atum aphan phatek kebengji aphan adet kaprek kaprek pondetji; lapen ahut chokche tik ke akaprek atum Jerusalem dongthipji.

“Arni, chiklo, lapen chiklo longso athak manghumeme angthek klangji. Pirthe athak kadokave adet hei hei aning runhupji, lapen lang thepi arki lapen angsum kethur arki ingreng klung klang apotsi phere-oji.
Pirthe athak pi cheplangjima pu kephere pen ajok monit atum a-ok ainiruisi kliji, pima sining ajakong hei hei aphan hijukji.
Anke Monit a-Sopo aphan ajakong kethe pen lapen adak atur akethe pen inghun athak kecheklang halatum thek longji.
Lapen la hei hei keplang kecheng ahut, nangtum thurra nangphu chingthur non, pima nangtum akejok tebok-het-lo.”
Ansi Jisu halatum aphan bangso alamlir thanlo: “Thebo arong lapen kadokave athengpi aphan mathatha.
Arvo kechingjokmi kethek long pen barla apor tebok-het-lo pu nangtum chinilo.
Lasonthotsi lahei hei keplang nangtum thek-long-lote, Arnam Arat tebok-het-lo pusi nangtum chiniji.
“La hei hei kadokave chekok ketik ke labangso a-ove dojilang pura ning chebinon.
Sining lapen pirthe avedetji, bonta nelam hei hei ke kaiketa doverji.
“Cherehurnon! Kecho kejun-o lapen pirthe aningbi an pen nangtum aning chepabuiklui hak huk-ri, kalite halabangso arni pham ketot ason thakthak nangtum aphan padan chekji.
Pima pirthe adang monit an aphuthak la vangji.
Mo kechekokji alam an pen kejokji ajakong kelongji lapen Monit a-Sopo angno karjapji aphan nangtum chesikding non, lapen kai ahutta Arnam ardomvernon.”
Halabangso arni ahut Jisu Kardom ahem alongsi lam thanbom, lapen arni ingsam lote, alangli Oliv pu anglong damsi ajojo hadaksi dokok titilo.
Lapen adapvang rat atum Jisu alam karjuji aphan Kardom ahem damlo.
Lapen Thap kave Ahim Amei nang leji dokdok-lo. Bangso amei aphan ke Kejok Amei puta pulo.
Kurusar akethe atum lapen Aron thekser atum rat aphan pherelo, la apotsi halatum Jisu aphan kepathijoiji abidi rilo.
Anke bang krehini asangho atum angbong pen inut, Iskariot pu a-Judas, aning arlo Soitan lutchok-lo.
Lasi Judas nangbarlo, lapen halatum arideng Jisu aphan kehodaiji abidi Kurusar lapen Kardom ahem ahemphu atum pen pen chingvailo.
Halatum aning arong-lo lapen alangliphan tangka kepiji aphan chepathik-lo.
Judas halatum kechingvai alam chedondunlo, lapen Jisu aphan kehodaiji aphan, rat atum nang kechini dunde pin ahut keme ribomlo.
Thap kave Ahim Arong aje Amei ahut Kejok Amei a-An kechoji aphan biresak aso kethuji arni nanglelo.
Pitor lapen Jon aphan Jisu toisi pulo, “Damra etum Kejok Amei a-an kechoji aphan sik damnon.”
Halatum arjulo, “Konatsi kesikdam nangjima? Nangli ning kehang kodakma?”
Alangli thak-lo, “Nangtum rongsopi kelut pen mamat inut pinso amonit lang atebuk kepon abang pen nangtum chetongji. Alangli phi phi dunra, alangli kelutdam ahemle lut damnon,
lapen hem ahemphu aphan lapule punon: ‘Thanbang lapusonsi nangliphan pulo, neli lapen neli sangho atum pen Kejok Amei a-an kechoji aphan hem angdeng konatma?’
Lapen nangtum aphan alangli angsong angdeng kangni adim kedotang adim nang paklangji; hadak-le siknon.”
Halatum damsi kadokave Jisu kethan ateng long-lo, lapen halatum Kejok Amei a-an sik-lo.
Ahut nang choksi, Jisu ketoitang atum pen an kechojisi ingnilo.
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Ne kesung kepho aphrang nangtum pen labangso Kejok Amei a-an kechojisi ne ning hang-lo!
Pima ne nangtum aphan nangthanlang, Arnam Arat angbong labangso chekok ke tik ke ne bangso a-an chothuthedetji.”
Anke Jisu harlung enlo lapen Arnam aphan rosi pulo, “La enra nangtum angbong chebengnon,
pima ne nangtum aphan nangthanlang, non pen mo Arnam a-Rat vangvetik-ke ne labangso adrakha ahorlang junjedetji.”
Ansi alangli him eplang enlo, Arnam aphan rolo, beng-lo, lapen ha-latum aphan pisi pulo, “La nangtum aphan kepitang ke nebang arpumlo. Nephan kechemathathujile, la klem-non.”
Lasonthotsi an chodet aphi alangli harlung ehong enlo, lapen la halatum aphan pisi pulo, “Bangso aharlung ke nevi pen sap kethengtang Arnam akechechak kemilo, lake nangtum aphansi dungpitang-lo!
“Bonsetta, langtha! Nephan hotur arideng kehodaiji abang ne pensi an chorap rap-lo!
Arnam kepathiktang asonthotsi Monit a-Sopo thinangpo, bonta alangliphan kehodaiji abang ko-an akepherememe aduk pho nangpo!”
Anke halatum angbong komat abangsi labangso akam klempoma pusi halatum kecharjuji pangcheng-lo.
Halatum angbong komat abang theneima, pusi halatum lam kechedanji pangcheng-lo.
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Ajat kaprek kaprek arecho atum ke halatum arat ahemphulo, lapen det keja atum aphan ke ‘Rat ajirpo atum’, pusi pulo.
Bonta nangtum aphan ke lapuson kali; la alar nangtum angbong kethenei abang ke akebinei ason thakthak nangji, lapen keja abang ke ban ason thakthak nangji.
Komat abang themu? An kechoji aphan kangni abang helo. Bonta neke nangtum angbong inut keru kethai abang ason thakthak-lo.
“Nephan asat hei hei kelang ahut nangtum nelong doverlo;
lapen ne-Po nephan isi a-Rat ne kepi ason thak-thaksi neta nangtum aphan nangpipo,
atheke, nangtum ne Rat angbong kecholongji lapen kejun longji aphan, lapen Israel kur krehini aphan kangsaijisi nangtum recho anghoi athak ingniji.
“Simon, Simon! arjutha! Nangtum aphan sok ason aphe-e pen asok kepaprekji aphan kangrapji aphan, Soitan hukum long-lo.
Bonta Simon, nangtum akekroi ke-ik edetji aphan ne nangphan Arnam nang ardom pilo. Lapen mo nang nangning chiruidet lote nang korte atum ajakong pathevek nangji.”
Pitor thak-lo, “hemphu, nanglong phatek kejangdunji lapen kethi dunji aphan anta ne chesik ding-lo!”
“Ne nangphan nangpulong, Pitor, paningve vo kuke aphrang nang nephan batai kethom chinine pusi pudetji.”
Anke Jisu amethang asangho atum aphan pulo, “Tangka athia, jarong lapen keng-op pacheponpepin pen ne nangtum aphan nangketoi ahut nangtum kopine akedorde doloma?”
Halatum thak-lo, “Thangta akedorde ave.”
“Bonta nonke tangka athia, jarong kedo abang pachepon nang; lapen nokjir kavedet abang amethang achoi dingpo chejorra nokjir epak pachenam nang,” pusi Jisu halatum aphan pulo.
“Pima ne nangtum aphan nangpulang, hastro along ketok ason, atheke, ‘Alangli adai kedo atum ason phonang-lo,’ labangso alam nephan chekokvek nangji, pima nelamjir ketoktang an chekokbomlo.”
Asangho atum pulo, “Langtha! Hemphu! dak nokjir pakni do!”
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “La anta dorpo!”
Jisu halabangso arongsopi o-kangsi, kai ason ha Oliv anglong damlo; lapen asangho atum alangli long dunlo.
Halabangso adim nanglesi Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum asat keklokle detjile Arnam ardomnon.”
Arlong pen kevar pale un-chit an akehelo alangli damlo, lapen akengphu patongruisi Arnam ardomlo.
Alangli pulo, “Nang ning hangte nang labangso aharlung nelong pen pontha po! Bonta ne ning kehang kali, nang ning kehangle papleng nang.”
Sining angsong pen inut apherangke alangliphan cheklangsi alangliphan ajakong pathe muchot-lo.
Alangli aning dukpiksi ansose Arnam ardomlo, lapen ang-i vi asonthak thaksi longle athak nangklodop dop-lo.
Arnam kardom patangdet aphi alangli thursi asangho atum along chedamlo, lapen halatum aning aduk pen amek kejangklip alangli thek-long-lo.
Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum kopisi nangmek kejangklip-loma? Thurnon, lapen nangtum asat keklokledetjile Arnam ardomnon.”
Jisu lam keningjebom ahut armu atum vang-lo. Jisu asangho bangkrehini angbong pen inut, Judas pu abangsi halatum aphan nangjalo. Alangli Jisu aphan kangjupjisi adung an vang-lo.
Bonta Jisu pulo, “Judas, nang kangjup pensi Monit a-Sopo aphan hotur arideng hodaipoma?”
Asangho atum la keplangji dokdok alam chinisi arjulo, “Netum nokjir che-en nonma, Hemphu?”
Halatum angbong inut abang ke Kurusar kethenei aban ano ar-e chorphlak-lo.
Bonta Jisu pulo, “La apar klem-rinon!” Alangli ano otsi pamethulo.

Ansi alangliphan kenepjisi kevang, kurusar kethe atum, kardom ahem keton aron-aso atum ahemphu atum lapen akesar atum aphan Jisu pulo, “Nangtum nephan kenepji aphan dokait aphan asonsi kaibong pen lapen nokjir pen vang nangkok-loma?
Arni arni neli nanglitum pen Kardomhemthepi along dorap rap-lo setta nanglitum neliphan kenepji mathathedet-lo. Bonta nonke nanglitum aphan aporlo; kangting ajakongsi kehailo.”
Halatum Jisu aphan nepsi Kurusar Kethenei ahem ponlo. Pitorta achar achar pen halatum aphi phi dunlo.
Thekup angbongchit me thorsi halatum me chinghip-lo, lapen Pitorta halatum along chinghipdunlo.
Lapen banpi inut alangli me kechinghip thek longsi Pitor aphan langdingsi labangpi pulo, “Labangso amonit jokta Jisu along dolo!”
Bonta alangli chekrongkre detsi pulo, “Neli alangliphan chinita chinine, pei!”
Malomso aphi inut amonit alangliphan thek longsi pulo, “Nangli jokta halatum angbong pen inut-lo!”
Bonta Pitor thak-lo, “Neli kali, koh!”
Lapen porphai isi aphi anut kaprek amonit pu pasodaksi pulo, “Ahok-lo, labangso amonitta Jisu along dolo, pima alangli amatta Galili asorlo!”
Bonta Pitor thak-lo, “Nangli kopi alamthesi keningjema, neli chinine.”
Halabangso ahut mamat alangli keningje ahut vo ejon kulo.
Lapen Hemphu chetevarlo, lapen Pitor aphan langsap-lo, lapen Pitor, Hemphu alangliphan kepu, “Paningve vo kuke aphrang, nang nephan batai kethom chinine pusi puji” pu alam chemathalo.
Pitor hong barsi chiru pik-lo.
Jisu aphan kehon amonit atum alangliphan pinremlo, lapen chok-lo.
Halatum amek phungthipsi alangliphan arjulo, “Matsi nangphan teng-lo? Thantha!”
Lapen halatum penang kepinrem alam pen alangliphan pulo.
Lapen kethe-ang pen mamat akesar atum, Kurusar akethe atum lapen aron thekser atum chingrumpet-lo, lapen Jisu aphan kangsai a-Meipi angno vandet-lo.
Halatum pulo, “Nelitum aphan thannon, nangli heloma Khristo loma?”
Alangli thak-lo, “Neli nanglitum aphan thansetta nanglitum kroikre-detji;
lapen neli nanglitum aphan arju setta, nanglitum neliphan thakthedetji.
Bonta non pen apar ke Monit a-Sopo, jakong theparpik a-Arnam ar-esi ingnipo.”
Halatum kadokave pulo, “Tangte, nangli Arnam a-Sopoloma?” Alangli halatum aphan thak-lo, “neli helo pusi nanglitum pulo.”
Lapen halatum pulo, “Ansose kopi ahaki nangjilangma! Pima ilitum methang methangsi alangli ingho pen keningje arjulong tang-lo!”
Armu thurpetsi Jisu aphan Pilat angno ponlo,

hadak halatum alangliphan adai ketinjisi pangcheng-lo: “Labangso amonit rat aphan kechorung, Koisor Recho aphan midu pinangne pu halatum aphan kethan lapen amethangsi Khristo Recho pu kechekrong nelitum thek long-lo.”
Pilat alangliphan arjulo, “Jihudi atum arecho nangli heloma?”
Alangli thak-lo, “La si nangli puloke.”
Anke Pilat Kurusar akethe atum lapen armu aphan pulo, “Labangso amonit adai neli thangnatta thek longle.”
Bonta halatum aphrang apar jasemetsi pulo, “Alangli Judia adet adang an thanbomsi monit atum aphan chorung chojarlo. Alangli Galili pen pangchengsi non ladak anta vang-lo.”
Pilat labangso alam arjulongsi arjulo, “Alangli Galili amonitma?”
Alangli Herod recho kecho adim pu chinisi, alangli Jisu aphan Herod along toithulo. Herodta halabangso ahut Jerusalemsi dolo.

Herod Jisu aphan thek-longsi aning arong pik-lo, pima alangli lamjir aphrang pen arjulong-lo, lapen ajirdingklui pen kethek-longji aphan aning hang-olo. Jisu kopine manghu meme akam keklem kethek-longji aphan alangli aning thelo.
Lasi Herod Jisu aphan ason ason alam arjulo, bonta Jisu thangta thakthedet-lo.
Kurusar kethe atum lapen aron thekser atum arjap phrongsi Jisu aphan jasemet lam bok-lo.
Herod lapen alangli chedanbang atum Jisu aphan pinremlo, langrop-lo; anke halatum alangliphan lir-lir lor-lor, mesen ape pindengsi puthot Pilat along toithujuilo.
Halabangso arni mamatsi Herod lapen Pilat jirpo jalang-lo; labangso aphrangke halatum angbong hoturlo.
Ansi Pilat Kurusar kethe atum, kangsai amei keja atum, lapen rat atum aphan pangrumsi,

halatum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum labangso amonit aphan neli long vanlo, lapen pulo, alangli rat atum aphan chorung chojarlo. Non, neli nanglitum angnosi alangliphan asat langtang-lo, lapen nanglitum alangliphan kebok alam an angbong pen neli thangnat adai longledet-lo.
Herod jokta alangliphan adai longthekthedet-lo, pima alangli laphan nelitum along nangtoi thujuilo. Labangso amonit kethi nangji atheng, lapuson adai kedo akam keklem thangta ave.
Lasi neli alangliphan pachoksi lophlotpo.”
Kejok Amei Arong-aje abatai tin halatum aphan Pilat inut akoidi lophlot nangji.
Armu do-an angdi isi hangjo josi pulo, “Pathinon alangliphan! Netum aphan Barabbasle lophlotnon!.”
Rongsopi angbong kehurisei kedo lapen monit kepathi pen apotsi Barabbas aphan ke phatek bengthot-lo.
Pilatke Jisu aphan kelophlotji aning hangsi rat atum aphan puthot choningrithulo.
Bonta halatum hangjobomsi pulo, “Alangliphan theng-parpan athak pathinon! Alangliphan thengparpan athak pathinon!”
Pilat batai kethom aphong halatum aphan pulo, “Bonta alangli kopi adai kethesi klem tang-loma? Alangli kethi nangji atheng pu neli thangta thek longle! Neli alangliphan pachok chotsi lophlotpo.”
Bonta halatum Jisu aphan thengparpan athak pathi nangji pusi ase kethe dotik an hangjobomlo, lapen kejutsi halatum akehangjo chepahailo.
Lasi halatum kehang atengsi Pilat Jisu aphan kepathiji ahukum pilo.

Lapen halatum kehang, kehorisei lapen monit kepathi pen apot phatek kebeng thot abang aphan Pilat lophlot-lo, lapen alangli halatum aning kehang aling Jisu aphan keviji aphan halatum arideng hodaidet-lo.

Chedanbang atum Jisu aphan pondet-lo, lapen halatum kedambom ahut ha havar pen kevang Kirene asor, Simon pu abang pen halatum chetong-lo. Halatum alangliphan nepcheksi aphang athak thengparpan batkok-lo, lapen Jisu aphi phi papondunlo.
Armu ake-ongpi alangli phi phi dunlo; halatum angbong arlosomar atumta dunsi aning dukpiksi chiru charhelo.
Jisu halatum aphan chepangnosi pulo, “Jerusalem asor a-arlosomar atum! Neliphan chiru nangne, bonta nanglitum methang methang aphan lapen nanglitum asomar atum aphanle chirunon.
Pima langtha! halatum lapuson kepuji arni vangbomlo, ‘Aso kave pinlang, osomar kepathe thelang lapen osomar kelana longlelang a-arlosomar atum ko-an akerengme!’
Halabangso ahut monit atum inglong hei hei aphan puji, ‘Netum aphuthak klonon!’ lapen inglongso aphan puji, ‘Netum aphan dipthip non!’
Pima halatum theng kerengseng ahut lapuson akam klem lote, mo theng kekrengklang ahut kopisi cheplang poma?”
Anut kaprek banghini amonit, adai thedung atumta Jisu aphan pen pen kepathi rap-rapji aphansi ponlo.
Halatum “Phu bongkok” pu adim nanglesi hadak Jisu aphan thengparpan athak sak-lo, lapen hala banghini adai thedung atum aphanta sak-lo, inut aphan ke ar-e anat lapen inut aphan ke arvi anatsi bilo.
Jisu pulo, “O Po, latum aphan diya non! Pima latum kopisi keklem, lake latum chechinine,”
Halatum khadot pathusi alangli pe chethakdet-lo.

Rat atum arjap phrong pen langdunlo, lapen Jihudi atum angbong keja atum alangliphan putot-lo: “Alangli bang aphan pajok-lo; alangli jongsi Arnam kangvaitang abang, Khristo tangte, amethangle pachepajoknang!”
Chedanbang atumta alangliphan pinremlo: halatum alangli dung vangsi drakha ahorlang kethor pilo,
lapen pulo, “Nangli jongsi Jihudi atum arecho tangte, nangli methangle chepajok non!”
Alangli thak anat lahei hei alamthe tok-lo: “lake Jihudi atum a-Recho.”
Hala kejangling banghini, adai thedung atum angbong pen inut abangta alangliphan kepinrem pen pulo, “Nangli helo Khristo, kalima? Chepajok-ra nelitum aphanta pajoknon!”
Bonta anut kaprek abang alangli-phan thaksi ingchek-lo, “Nang Arnam aphan phererema? Nangta alangli son esonpet aduk pholo.
Ili kephonang ke athikpet-lo, pima ilike keklemtang akam pen apot kepho nangji aduk binongsi long-lo; bonta alangli ke thang akechokcheta avepin.”
Lapen alangli Jisu aphan pulo, “Nangli nangli methang arat angbong kelut damji ahut neliphan tengneri, Jisu!”
Jisu alangliphan pulo, “Neli nangliphan alam chak-lo, pini nangli nelilong ha Kerengme adim dolongpo.”
Halabangso ahut nerlo chitim anbak pen arni atur avedet-lo, lapen ha baji kethom anta det adang an ingtingkuk-lo;
lapen Kardom ahem kebeng ape chingsek pahini dak-lo.
Jisu jasemet ase kethe pen hangsersi pulo, “O Po! Ne nekarjong nangrideng nangchehodailo!” Alangli la pudetsi thilot-lo.
Chedanbang bangpharo ahemphu la keplangtang alam thek-longsi Arnam aphan anong pathesi pulo, “Chenam, labangso amonit adai ave!”
Lapen kelangdunji aphan kechingrumpet a-armu atum an keplangtang alam an thek-longsi halatum kadokaveta ningduk pen aning cheteng ponbomsi hem chevoilo.
Bonta kadokave Jisu pen kechechini atum an, lapen Galili adet pen aphi phi nangkedun arlosomar atum anta, achar arjapphrongsi langding-lo.
Judia adet angbong Arimathea arongsopi pen inut amonit Joseph pu abang dolo.

Alangli ke mesen lapen aman kedo abang-lo, lapen Arnam arat kevangji aphan kanghongding abang-lo. Alanglita Kangsai amei amonit-lo setta alangli halatum keklemtang lapen kepathiktang akam kroidundelo.
Alangli Pilat along damsi Jisu abang arpum hangdamlo.
Anke alangli abang arpum nangpehirsi, linen ape pen perhetsi, arlongsi kerok atipit arlo pe-i damlo, lapen hadak badu aphanta pe-i damde pinlang.
Halabangso arni ke Bhomta arnilo, lapen Sabbath arni chengji dokdok-lo.
Jisu aphi phi Galili adet pen nang kedun arlosomar atum Joseph along dunsi, tipit lapen Jisu abang arpum kosonsi pe-i loma, la lang damlo.
Anke halatum hem chevoilo, lapen kenemprujin amar hei hei lapen kenempru ajangthuta sik-lo.
Hukum atengsi Sabbath arni halatum sang-lo.
Bhomkuru arni adapprang arlosomar atum kesiktang kenemprujin amar ponsi tipit along damlo.
Tipit pen arlong kepakong-longtang halatum thek-long-lo,
lasi halatum tipit arlo lut damlo; bonta halatum hadak Hemphu Jisu abang arpum thek longledet-lo.
Halatum labangso alam pen apot manghuphrongsi karjapphrongbom ahut men men mamat lir lir lor lor ape kelokkling kechingthang banghini amonit halatum adung arjapphrong-lo.
Arlosomar atum kephere pen amahang longle anat ketongjuibom ahut halabangso amonit atum halatum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum kopi apotsi Kereng-et abang aphanle kethitang atum angbong riloma?
Alangli dak avelo; Alangliphan pathurtang-lo. Galili adet kedo ahut alangli nanglitum along keningje kopi, lale chemathathutha:
‘Monit a-Sopo aphan papi atum arideng hodaidet nangji, thengparpan athak pathi nangji, lapen nithom aphi alangli thurthuji.’”
Ansi halatum alangli lam chema-thathusi tipit pen nangchevoilo,
lapen hala bangkre-isi lapen kedo-an atum aphanta lahei hei alam thanlo.
Labangso arlosomar atum ke Megdalene a-Meri, Joanna lapen Jems apei Meri; latum lapen halatum along kedun arlosomar atum ketoitang atum aphan la-hei hei alam thanlo.
Bonta ketoitang atum lahei hei alam ke lam jong-jong chot pusi mathalo, lapen halatum aphan kroikredet-lo.
Bonta Pitor thurphlutsi thiri anat kat-lo; alangli tipit ardik damlo, lapen keper-i alinen ape pen apar thangta thek longledet-lo. Ansi alangli keplangtang alam pen apot manghuhaksi hem chevoilo.
Halabangso arni mamat halatum angbong pen banghini amonit Jerusalem pen kilomitar kre isi anbak akehelo, Emmaus pu arong anat damlo,
lapen halatum keplangtang alamsi chingki ponbomlo.
Halatum kechingki, kechingvai ahut Jisu amethang halatum adung patebok-lo, lapen halatum pen dam rappet-lo;
halatum alangliphan thek long-lo, bonta kopuson lone alangliphan chinine det-lo.
Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum tovar kedambom ahut kopi alamsi chingki ponbomloma?”
Halatum sangkoksi amahang jang ik-ak-lo.
Lapen inut Kleopas pu abang alangliphan arjulo, “Jerusalem kevang alohi atum angbong pen nangli anchot loma non malom keplangtang alam hei hei kechinine abang ke?”
Alangli arjulo, “Kopi pi alamlo?”

Lapen halatum alangliphan thak-lo, “Najareth a-Jisu aphan keplangtang alamjir hei-hei. Labangso amonit ke inut Arnam amontrilo, lapen alangli Arnam lapen rat atum do-an angnota alam tame, akam tame ajakong kedo abang-lo.
Nelitum a-Kurusar kethe atum lapen kangsai amei keja atum alangliphan kepathiji aphan hodaidet-lo, lapen alangliphan theng parpan athak pathilot-lo.
Lapen Israel aphan kepajok abang alangli helo pusi nelitum ning thelo! La kadokave apar, nonke halabangso arni pen non an nithom arnilo.
Nelitum angbong a-arlosomar atum nelitum aphan pamanghuhak-lo; halatum todap adapprang thiri damlo,
bonta alangli bang arpum longledet-lo. Halatum vangthusi pulo, alanglitum amang ben asonsi pherangke atum aphan thek-long-lo, lapen pherangke atum pulo, Jisu ke rengthutang-lo.
Lapen nelitum angbong pen manene atum thiri along damlo, lapen arlosomar atum kethan asonthotsi halatum thekdam long-lo, bonta halatum alangliphan thek longle det-lo.”
Anke Jisu halatum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum ko-an akelu! Montri atum keputang alam an kekroiji aphan nanglitum ko-an panglen loma!
Khristo lahei hei akesung chechakdet aphisi alangli adak atur angbong kelut damji a-ot dolo, kalima?”
Moses ketok aloh hei hei lapen montri do-an aketok hei hei pen pangchengsi, alangli halatum aphan amethang alamjir Hastro along keputang alam an than-pachinilo.
