Ijip atum agian alam an alangliphan thanpet-lo. Alangli lam, kam anatta inut thedung abang cheplang-lo.
“Moses arta ningkan phlikep ahut alangli Israel akorte atum aphan kelangdamjisi aning mathalo.
Ansi inut Ijip amonit Israel amonit inut aphan aduk kanghoi alangli thek-long-lo. Lasi alangli dunsi Israel amonit aphan rapdunlo, lapen Ijip amonit aphan alar huisi pathilot-lo.
Israel atum aphan kepajokji aphansi Arnam Moses aphan ingvaitang-lo pu Israel atum chiniji pusi alangli mathalo, bonta halatum la chininedet-lo.

Puthot arni alangli bang hini a-Israel atum kechebohong thek-long-lo. Alangli halatum angbong aning kechepangsamji aphan bor-isi pulo, ‘Arjuthaho, komarli atum! Nangtum ke kortetelo. Nangtum kopi chonghoisi lason chebohong-loma?’
Bonta hala anut kaprek aphan kepasungbom abang Moses aphan ingbailaksi pulo, ‘Nangphan komatsi netum ahemphu lapen netum aphan kangsai abang nangpaplang-lo?
Patumi nang inut Ijip amonit aphan kepathi asonthak thaksi nephanta kepathiji ning hang-loma?’
Moses labangso alam arjulongsi Ijip adet pen katjuisi Midian adet dodamlo. Hadak alangli asopo banghini dolo.
“Ningkan phlikep aphi Sinai anglong adung kejejangtang ajo ingsu arong along kekar-ang ame angkang angbong sining apherangke inut Moses aphan cheklang-lo.
Moses la thek-longsi manghuhak-lo, lapen la kelangpamejisi ingsu arong adung patebok-lo. Bonta alangli Hemphu ase arjulong-lo:
‘Nangphusar atum a-Arnam nehelo; Abraham, Isaak lapen Jakob a-Arnam nehelo.’ Lasi Moses kephere pen a-ok klemhursi kelangdingji haihedet-lo.
Lapen Hemphu alangliphan pulo, ‘Nang keng-op chephloknon, pima nang karjap adim ke kangthir alonglelo.
Ijip adet nerat atum akeduk ne thek-long-lo, lapen halatum akar-em ne arjulong-lo. Halatum aphan kepajokji aphansi ne nanghirlo. Tangte non ne nangphan Ijip adet nangtoipo.’

“Labangso a-Moses aphansi Israel amonit atum chakchedet-lo. Halatum alangliphan pulo, ‘Nangphan komatsi netum aphuthak kepangri abang, lapen kangsai abang nangpaplang-lo?’ Hala ingsu arong along kekar-ang ame angkang along kecheklang, sining apherangke akerap pen ajok Moses halatum aphan kepangriji lapen kepajokji aphansi Arnam la Moses aphan nangtoilo.

Alangli halabangso amonit atum aphan Ijip adet pen japonlo, lapen alangli Ijip adet along, Talo Ke-er along lapen Kejejangtang ajo ningkan phlikep an kemanghumeme akam lapen kematha abidi kejutdet akam hei hei klemlo.
‘Arnam nangtum aphan nangtum akorte angbong pen ne son thak thak inut Arnam amontri nangpaklangji’ pu Israel atum aphan kepu abang Moses helo.

Hala kejejangtang ajo kechingrumpet a-Israel atum pen kedo rap rap abangta alangli helo. Hadak alangli ephusar atum pen lapen hala Sinai anglong along alangliphan kepu abang, sining apherangke pen dorap rap-lo, lapen nanglitum aphan nangkepiji aphan alangli Arnam akereng-et alam long-lo.
“Bonta ephusar atum alangliphan kekroiji aning hanghedetsi halatum adung pen alangliphan ingbailap-lo, lapen halatum Ijip adet kechevoithujisi aning hang-lo.
Lasi halatum Aaron aphan pulo, ‘Netum aphan nekeja ponji aphan netum aphan arnam hei hei nethippinon. Hala Ijip adet pen ekevan abang, Moses ke kopi cheplangdet-lone, netum chinine.’
Ansi halabangso ahut halatum chainong alo a-arjan thip-lo, labangso arjan aphan thok-lo, lapen amethang ari pen keselam amar aphan kero karchojisi chojun amei bilo.

Lasi Arnam halatum pen chetevarsi, lapen sining achiklo longso hei hei aphan keparchoji aphansi Arnam halatum aphan obup-lo. Lake hala Arnam amontri atum ketok aloh along ketok asonthot-lo, atheke hadak tok-lo,
‘Oh Israel amonit atum!
Nangtum kejejangtang ajo ningkan phlikep kedo ahut nephansi marat api athok hei hei thok-loma?
Nangtum Molek pu a-arnam ape ahem,
lapen Rephan pu chiklolongso a-arnam a-arjansi nangtum rungsi ponlo.
Lasi ne nangtum aphan Bebilon apar akehelo adet nangtoipo.’
“Kejejangtang ajo ephusar atum along Arnam kedo ape ahem dolo. Arnam Moses aphan kepu lapen kepaklang asonthotsi Moses labangso ape ahem roilo.

Aphi ephusar atum labangso ape ahem halatum apo atum pen long-lo, lapen Arnam halatum angno pen akhei kaprek kaprek atum aphan arphlungsi halatum Joshua pen pen halatum adet damsi kechepahemphu ahut halatum labangso ape ahem ponlo. David arni ahut anta labangso ape ahem hadak dolo.
David Arnam akangjinso longsi Jakob a-Arnam kedoji adim kekimpilongji aphan Arnam aphan choningrilo.
Bonta Solomonsi alangliphan labangso ahem kimpilo.
“Bonta kangtuinei Arnam ke monit atum ari pen kekim ahem along dode. Arnam amontri kepu asonthotsi,
‘Siningke ne kangni anghoilo,
lapen pirthe ke nekengpak anghoilo.
Nangtum nephan kopuson ahem nekimpithekjima?
Ne kedo adim konatma?
Nemethangsi la kadokave amar selamlo, kalima?’

“Mai, nangtum ko-an keching-kinodak atum loma? Nangtum aning ke hala Arnam aphan kekroikre atum aning-lo. Arnam alam aphan nangtum ano ingthongjong-lo! Nangtumta nangtum aphusar atum asonthot-lo; nangtumta Karjong Kangthir aphan khangverlo.

Nangtum aphusar atum Arnam amontri inutbak aphan cheneknedet, doloma? Hala Arnam dhoromipet Aban abang kevangji alamjir aphrang pen kethan atum aphan, atheke Arnam apherangke atum aphan halatum pathikoilo. Lapen nonke nangtum la dhoromipet Aban aphan hotur arideng hodaisi pathilot-lo.
Nangtumsi sining apherangke atum arideng pen Arnam Aron kelong atumlo, setta nangtum la kroikredet-lo!”
Kangsai amei abangphu atum labangso alam arjulongsi jasemet aning thisi Stephan aphan aso chingkrit-lo.
Bonta Stephan Karjong Kangthir pen plengsetsi, lapen sining anat langdingsi Arnam adak atur lapen Jisu ke Arnam ar-e anat karjapther alangli thek-long-lo.
Ansi alangli pulo, “Langtha! Neli sining kangpudang lapen Monit a-Sopo Arnam ar-e anat karjapther thek-long-lo!”
Kangsai Ameipi abangphu atum jasemet hangsi ari pen ano chetok-lo, lapen halatum hala mamat alangli dung vangpaksi,
alangliphan rong-sopi angtan chithurponlo, lapen arlong pen arbulo. Haki atum Sol pu inut ariso akeng-risi amethang methang ape chebilo.
Halatum arlong pen karbu un ahut Stephan hangsersi pulo, “Hemphu Jisu, nekarjong dengtha!”
Anke alangli akengphu patongruisi ase kethe pen hangsi pulo, “Hemphu, labangso apap apot nang halatum aphuthak adai padori.” Alangli labangso alam pudetsi thilot-lo.
Lapen Sol jokta alangliphan kepathi ke aning hangdunlo.

Halabangso arni pen mamat Jerusalem arongsopi kedo amondoli mate kroi-asong aphan jasemet kechenekji pangcheng-lo. Ketoitang atum aphan apar ke, kekroitang atum an aphan Judia adet lapen Samaria adet adang an papratseilo.
Dhoromi amonit penang atum Stephan abang arpum pipdamlo, lapen alangli pen apot jasemet chiru chernap-lo.
Bonta Sol ke mondoli kepavirjisi bor-ilo. Alangli adon adon damsi pinso-arloso atum aphan chethurponsi phatek bengdamlo.
Hala kepratsei, kekroitang atum bithe bitha damsi than-Pachethangponbomlo.
Philipta Samaria adet kedo akethenei arongsopi damsi hadak kedo amonit atum aphan Khristo alamjir thanlo.
Philip kethan alam arjulongsi lapen alangli kemanghumeme akam keklem thek dunlongsi halatum alangli kethan alam arjudun pamelo.
Kangthirthe ahi-i kepho amonit penang atum pen hi-i atum jasemet hangsi nangbarlo. Kethiklak lapen akeng ketekok penang atum medet-lo.
Lasi halabangso arongsopi kedo atum aning arongparlo.
Hadak Simon pu inut amonit dolo. Alangli maja kanghoi akam klemsi Samaria amonit atum aphan pamanghuphrong-lo. Alangli ke inut thedung amonit-lo pusi alangli chekrong-lo.
Thedung lapen bihek amonit atum anta alangli kepu alam arjudunsi pulo, “‘Jakong Kethe’ pu a-Arnam ajakong alangli helo.”
Halatum alangli kepu alam arjudun-hurlo, pima arni dingklui pen alangli maja kanghoi akam klemsi halatum aphan pamanghuphrong-lo.
Bonta Philip Arnam a-Rat lapen Jisu Khristo alamjir a-Birta Keme kethan alam arjulongsi pinso lapen arloso atum kroilo, lapen baptisom enlo.
Simon jokta kroilo, lapen alangli baptisom endet aphi Philip along dunkrilo, lapen kematha abidi jutdet akam lapen kemanghumeme akam hei hei thek dunlongsi manghuhak-lo.
Ansi Samaria adet amonit atum Arnam alam deng-lo pu arjulongsi Jerusalem kedo, ketoitang atum Pitor lapen Jon aphan halatum along toilo.
Halatum hadak nanglesi kekroitang atum Karjong Kangthir kelongji aphan Arnam ardomlo.
Pima halabangso ahut anta halatum badu aphuthakta Karjong Kangthir hirhelang. Halatum aphan Hemphu Jisu amen pensi baptisom pichotlang.
Ansi Pitor lapen Jon halatum aphuthak ari bat-lo, lapen halatum Karjong Kangthir long-lo.
Ketoitang atum ari kebat pen ajok kekroitang atum aphan Karjong Kangthir kepi thek dunlongsi Simon ke Pitor lapen Jon aphan tangka pisi pulo,
“Neli komane abang aphuthak neli ri bat-lote, halabangso abang Karjong Kangthir kelongjile neliphan jakong nepitha.”
Bonta Pitor thakdunsi pulo, “Nangli pen nangli tangka pavirnang! Pima tangka pen Arnam adan nam unji pusi nangli mathalo!
La nelitum keklem akam along nangli nangli deng, kalite nangli pharman ave. Pima Arnam angno nangli ning ahok kali.
Tangte nangli labangso akehingno akematha pen ning chiruinon, lapen nangli lason akehingno akematha apot diya kelongjile Hemphu aphan choningrinon.
Pima nangli ning hodak-lo, lapen pap pen plengset-lo, lake neli chinilo.”
Pitor lapen Jon aphan Simon thakdunsi pulo, “La nanglitum kepu alam angbong isi natta neliphan keplangpledetjile Hemphu aphan choningritha.”
Pitor lapen Jon haki pidet aphi, lapen Hemphu alam than-pachethangdet aphi halatum Jerusalem chevoithulo. Tovar kedam un ahut halatum Samaria adet panangbak arong birta keme pachethang ponlo.
Ansi Hemphu apherangke inut Philip aphan pulo, “Thurra, nitur anat, Jerusalem pen Gaja arongsopi kedam atovarle damnon.” (Nonke monit atum labangso atovar chehelat-lelo.)

Lasi Philip thursi damlo. Lapen tovar kedam un ahut inut Ethiopia kasi-entang aphan chetong-lo. Alangli ke Kandasi pu Ethiopia adet arechopi atangka apuru kelang lapen kerimpi abang-lo. Alangli Jerusalem arongsopi along Arnam aphan ingduk ardomdamlo,
lapen halabangso ahut ke alangli hem nangchevoisi amethang ahemkonglong athak ingnilunsi Arnam amontri, Isaiah ketok aloh porhebomlo.
Ansi Karjong Kangthir Philip aphan pulo, “Nang damra halabangso ahemkonglong along dunnon.”
Philip katponsi halabangso ahemkonglong along dunlo. Halabangso amonit Isaiah aloh keporhekong alangli arjulong-lo. Alangli labangso amonit aphan arjulo, “Nangli keporhe alam athe nangli chiniloma?”
Alangli pulo, “Mai, komane abangle neliphan than pachininete neli la kopusonsi chini-un poma?” Lasi alangli Philip aphan hangsi hemkong-long athak alanglidung kangniji aphan choningrilo.
Alangli keporhe hastro angdeng lahelo:
“Kethuji aphan kepon abiresak aso asonthak thaksi,
lapen angmi kangtip ahut kangrengrepin abiresak asonthak thaksi,
alangli lam ethenatta ningjejedet-lo.
Alangliphan pabihek-lo,
lapen athikpet pen ingsaisedet-lo.
Alangli ove alam komatsi thanjima?
Pima alangli pran pirthe athak pen entang-lo.”
Hala kasi-entang abang Philip aphan arjulo, “Neliphan nethantha, Arnam amontri labangso alam ke komat alamjirsi pudamloma? Amethang alamjirma, mate komane abang alamjirma?”
Ansi Philip halabangso ahastro angdeng pen kethan pangcheng-lo. Alangli la kasi-entang aphan Jisu alamjir a-Birta Keme thanlo.
Alanglitum tovar dambom dambomsi elong lang kedo adim nanglelo. Lasi halabangso kasi-entang abang pulo, “Langtha! Ladak lang dolo. Neli baptisom ke-en un-edetji kopi ason dolangma?”
Philip alangliphan pulo, “Nangli jongsi nangli ning aklong pen kroilo tangte, nangli baptisom en setta chok-lo.”
Alangli thakdunlo, “Neli kroilo, Jisu Khristo ke Arnam a-Sopolo pu neli kroilo.”
Ansi kasi-entang abang hem-konglong kepasangji ahukum pilo. Philip lapen alangli lang sunlo, lapen Philip alangliphan baptisom pilo.
Bonta alanglitum lang pen kora nangkarlu ahut Hemphu a-Karjong Philip aphan pondet-lo. Kasi-entang abang alangliphan puthot thek-longledet-lo. Bonta alangli ning arong pen amethang atovar chedamlo.
Ansi Philip Asdop pu arongsopi along cheklangdamlo. Alangli hadak pen barsi kadokave arongsopi an damtup-lo, lapen Birta Keme pache-thang-ponbomsi Sijeria arongsopi nanglelo.
Halabangso ahut Sol ke hemphu asangho atum aphan apran enji pusi jasemet papherelo. Alangli Kurusar Kethenei along damsi,

Damaskas arongsopi along Hemphu a-Tovar kekroi atum aphan long-lok-lote, pinso arloso aphanta kenep-ra Jerusalem kevanthekji aphan, Damaskas arongsopi along kedo asinagog atum aphan loh nang-kepalodunjisi choningrilo.
Sol damsi Damaskas arongsopi nangleji dok dok ahut, men men sining pen atur vangsi alangli dung arei turphlak-lo.
Ansi alangli longle athak krepbup-lo, lapen alangliphan kepu ase alangli arjulong-lo, “Sol, Sol! Nang kopi apotsi nephan chenek-loma?”
Alangli thakdunsi pulo, “Hemphu, nangli komatma?”
Ansi halabangso ase pulo, “Nang kechenekbom a-Jisu ne helo.
Bonta thurra rongsopi damnon. Nang keklem nangji akam an hadaksi nangphan than-etpo.”
Sol pen kedam rap rap amonit atum doklipsi arjapphrong-lo. Hala-tum labangso ase arjulong-lo, bonta badu aphanta thek-longledet-lo.
Sol longle athak pen thursi amek chingpulo, bonta alangli thangta thek-longledet-lo. Lasi halatum alangli ri otponsi Damaskas arongsopi ponlo.
Jothom nithom anta alangli thangta thek-longledet-lo, lapen thangta choche-junjelo.
Damaskas arongsopi along Ananias pu inut a-Khristian dolo. Alangli ning arjan thek-long-lo. Labangso aning arjan pen Hemphu alangliphan pulo, “Ananias!”
Alangli thakdunsi pulo, “Kopima, Hemphu!”
Hemphu alangliphan pulo, “Thurra, Kengset pu atovarle damra Judas ahem along Tarsas arongsopi asor Sol pu abang aphan ridamnon. Alangli Arnam ardombomlang,
lapen alangli ning arjan thek-long-lo; Ananias pu inut amonit vangsi alangli mek kechecharji aphan alangli phu athak ari bat-lo.”
Ananias thakdunsi pulo, “Hemphu, penang amonit atum labangso amonit alamjir, lapen Jerusalem arongsopi kedo, nang methang amonit atum aphan alangli kehingno keklem alam neliphan thanlo.
Lapen nangphan kangduk atum an aphan kenepjisi alangli kurusar kethe atum pen hukum longsi ladak Damaskasta vang-lo.”
Hemphu alangliphan pulo, “Damnon! Pima alangli ke Jihudi kalidet atum angbong, recho atum aphan lapen Israel amonit atum angbong ne men kepachethangji aphan ne kangvaitang arisimlo.
Lapen ne men pen apot alangli kopi pi akesung chechak nangjima, lata ne alangliphan paklangpo.”

Lasi Ananias damsi Sol kedo ahem lutdamlo lapen Sol aphuthak ari batsi pulo, “Korte Sol! Nang nangmek kechecharthuji lapen Karjong Kangthir pen keplengsetji aphansi, nang ladak kevang ahut tovar nangphan kecheklang a-Jisu nephan ladak nangdung netoilo.”
Hala mamat lang a-ok alip asonthak thak kopine amar Sol amek pen ingjuiruilo; lapen alangli amek checharthulo. Alangli thursi baptisom enlo;
lapen labangso aphi alangli an chosi ajakong longthulo.
Sol Damaskas kedo kekroitang atum along penang arni an dodunlo.
Hala pen mamat alangli Sinagog hei hei along damsi Jisu ke Arnam a-Sopolo pu kethanji pangcheng-lo.

Sol alamjir karjulong atum anta manghuphrongsi pulo, “Ha Jerusalem arongsopi along, la Jisu pu amonit aphan kangduk kardom atum an aphan kepavirklung abang alangli helo, kalima? Lapen alangli lason amonit atum aphan nepsi kurusar kethe atum along keponjisi non ladakta vang-lo, kalima?”

Bonta Sol kethan ajakong ansose thebomlo, lapen Jisu helo Khristolo pu alangli aporman kepi pen kethan alam monit atum aphan pakroimemelo. Lasi Damaskas arongsopi kedo a-Jihudi atum thangta thak dundedet-lo.
Penang arni aphi Jihudi atum chingrumsi Sol aphan kepathiji abidi rilo.
Bonta halatum kechingvai alam alangliphan pachinidet-lo. Alangliphan kepathijisi halatum ajo anerlota rongsopi anghap along tonlo.
Bonta ningve isi Sol asangho atum alangliphan pondet-lo, lapen dur arlo alangliphan thapsi rongsopi apaisong angkrak pen pahirtuk-lo.
Sol Jerusalem arongsopi damsi sangho atum along kejelangdunji bor-ilo. Bonta halatum kadokaveta alangliphan pherelo, pima alangli sangho plangtang-lo puke halatum kroikredet-lo.

Ansi Barnabas vangsi alangliphan ketoitang atum along ponlo. Lapen Sol tovar kedam un ahut kopusonsi Hemphu aphan thek-long-loma, lapen kopusonsi Hemphu alangliphan puloma, lahei hei kadokave alam alangli halatum aphan than pajirmilo; lapen Sol kopusonsi phererepin pen Damaskas arongsopi along Jisu amen pen than loma, lata alangli halatum aphan thanlo.
Lasi Sol halatum along dodunlo, lapen Jerusalem adang an damsi phererepin pen Hemphu amen pen than-pachethang-lo.
Alangli Grik alam keningje a-Jihudi atum pen chingki-chethanlo, lapen lam chedanlo. Bonta halatum alangliphan kepathijisi bor-ilo.
Ansi Sangho atum labangso alam chinisi alangliphan Sijeria arongsopi an thondunsi Tarsas toijuilo.
Lapen ansi Judia, Galili, lapen Samaria adang an Mondoli ningkangsam dolo. Hemphu aphan kepherepen dosi, Mondoli Karjong Kangthir akerap pen ajok Mondoli ingtang-lo lapen armu ongponbomlo.
Pitor bithe bitha adim damlo, lapen kopine akam dosi alangli Lidia arongsopi kedo Arnam amonit atum along damlo.
Hadak alangli Anias pu inut thi-klak abang aphan chetong-lo. Labangso amonit ningkan nerkep an tiroksi dolo.
Pitor alangliphan pulo, “Anias, Jisu Khristo nangphan pamelo, thurra nangli pe chelimnon.” Alangli hala mamat arjaptherlo.
Lidia arongsopi lapen Sharon athoi amonit atum an alangliphan thek dunlongsi Hemphu anat aning chetevarlo.

Joppa arongsopi along Tabitha pu inut kekroi mesen abangpi dolo. (Grik alam penke alangli men Dorkas pusi pulo. Labangso alam atheke “Bi thijok” puhelo.) Labangpi kaike ahutta keme akamsi klemverlo, lapen keduk keboi atum aphan rapdun-olo.
Halabangso ahut labangpi sodetsi thilot-lo. Halatum alangli bang arpum lang panglusi angsong angdeng along bidamlo.

Lidia arongsopi ke Joppa arongsopi pen tebok-het-lo. Ansi Pitor Lidia arongsopisi do pu sangho atum arjulong-lo. Lasi halatum bang hini amonit toisi Pitor aphan papudamlo. “Nangli paderdera nelitum along nangduntha.”

Lasi Pitor halatum along dunlo. Alangli hadak lesi alangliphan angsong angdeng ponlo. Hadak hemepi atum an alangliphan komsarsi chirujolo, lapen Dorkas kereng-etlang ahut keroi tekang achoi lapen achoi keding hei hei Pitor aphan paklang-lo.

Ansi Pitor halatum kadokave aphan ingtan toilo, lapen alangli akengphu patongruisi Arnam ardomlo. Anke alangli hala kethilot abang abang arpum anat chetevarsi pulo, “Tabitha, thurnon!” Labangpi amek chingpulo lapen Pitor aphan thek-longsi ingnilunlo.
Pitor labangpi aphan ari pen ingthursi parjaptherlo. Ansi alangli kekroitang atum an aphan lapen hala hemepi atum an aphan hem arlo hang-lo, lapen akerengsi labangpi aphan halatum arideng hodailo.
Labangso alam Joppa adang an chethangphlup-lo, lapen ake-ongpi amonit Hemphu aphan kroilo.
Pitor penang arni an Simon pu inut ok-reng akam keklem amonit along dodunlo.
Sijeria arongsopi along Kornelias pu inut amonit dolo. Alangli ke, “Itali a-Ron-aso” pu kepu Roman aron-aso bang pharo ahemphulo.
Alangli inut dhoromi amonit-lo, lapen alangli lapen alangli hem ehum amonitta Arnam aphan kephere atumlo. Alangli keduk-keboi atum aphan dan pi olo, lapen kaiketa Arnam ardomverlo.
Arnisi arni kangsam baji kethom apor ahut alangli ning arjan thek-long-lo: Arnam apherangke inut vangsi alangphan pulo, “Kornelias!”
Alangli kephere pen pherangke aphan langdingsi pulo “Kopima, Hemphu?”
Arnam apherangke alangliphan thakdunsi pulo, “Nangli kardom an lapen nangli kepi adan an Arnam aningdok-lo, lapen alangli lahei hei alam mathalo.
Nonke nang Joppa arongsopi along monit toira Pitor pu a-Simon aphan pavannon.
Alangli ha talo akung kedo, Simon pu inut ok-reng akam keklem abang ahemsi alohi dodamlo.”
Halabangso aphi pherangke damjuilo, lapen Kornelias amethang aban banghini, lapen alangli-tor kedo atum angbong pen inut dhoromi aron-aso aphan hang-lo.
Alangli halatum aphan la keplangtang alam an thanpetsi Joppa arongsopi toilo.
Puthot arni, halatum dambom dambomsi Joppa arongsopi leji dok dok ahut, nerlo chitim anbak apor ahut Pitorke kardomdamjisi hem asarnung athak arludamlo.
Alangli an ingchirsi an kechoji aning hang-lo; lapen an ketun un ahut alangli mek rengjengsi ning arjan thek-long-lo:
Alangli sining kangpudang lapen pe akethepi ano phli pen longle athak nangkepahir, lason kopine ahormu nangkesun thek-long-lo.
Labangso arlo akeng hongphli api an, longle athak keklim api ajat do-an, lapen angsong kangjar avo ajat do-an ta dolo.
Ansi isi ase vangsi alangliphan pulo, “Thurnon, Pitor! pathira chonon!”
Bonta Pitor thakdunsi pulo, “Jonghe setta lapu kali, Hemphu! Pima chokertang ahormu, kalite kangthirthe ahormu ke ne chochepinlang.”
Ako batai hini aphong halabangso ase alangliphan pulo, “Arnam kepangthirtang amar aphan ingthirthe puri.”
Lason batai kethom plang-lo, lapen hala mamat halabangso ahormu sining athak chirungpon-thudet-lo.
Labangso aning arjan alam athe kopima pusi Pitor kematha un ahut Kornelias nangketoi amonit atum, arju arjusi Simon kedo ahem anghap angno an nanglelo.
Halatum monit hangsi arjulo, “Simon Pitor pu inut alohi ladaksi do maho?”
Pitor hala ning arjan alam athe kechiniji aphan kebor-i un ahut Karjong alangliphan pulo, “Langnon! Bang kethom amonit atum nangphan risi vang-lo.
Nang thurra, hirnon, lapen nang halatum along dunmori. Pima nesi halatum aphan nangtoilo.”
Lasi Pitor nanghirlo, lapen halabangso amonit atum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum keri amonit neli helo. Nanglitum ladak kevang athe kopima?”

Halatum thakdunsi pulo, “Kornelias pu inut chedanbang bang pharo ahemphusi netum aphan ladak netoilo. Alangli inut dhoromipet lapen Arnam aphan kephere amonit-lo. Jihudi amonit atum an alangliphan aman pi olo. Nangli kepu nangji alam an alangli karjulongjisi, nangliphan amethang ahem along kephaji aphan pherangke kangthir hukum pilo.”
Pitor halatum aphan hem arlo hangponlo, lapen halabangso aningve halatum aphan hadaksi padokok-lo.
Puthot arni Pitor halatum along dunlo, lapen Joppa arongsopi along kedo kekroitang manene atumta alangli long dunlo.
Puthot arnithu alangli Sijeria arongsopi lelo. Hadak Kornelias amethang adon arap amonit atum, lapen alangli kepha tang, kechinghon ajirpo atum pen pen chingrumsi alangliphan inghong-phrong-lo.
Pitor hem arlo kelut ahut Kornelias alangli pen chetongsi alangli Pitor akeng-ri dombaksi alangliphan ardomkhrup-lo.
Bonta Pitor alangliphan parjapsi pulo, “Arjapnon, nelita monitchot-lo.”
Ansi alangli pen lam chethanponbomsi Pitor hem arlo lutdamlo. Hadak alangli monit kechingrum dopik thek-long-lo.

Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Jihudi amonit atum ke Jihudi kalidet atum pen dorap rap longle, lapen halatum ahem lut dun kertang pu alam nanglitum chinipamelo. Bonta badu amonit aphan setta kopine akertang do pu, kalite, ingthirthe pu punangne pusi Arnam neliphan paklang-lo.
Lasi neliphan nepahang ahut neli thangta kroimomedetsi ladak vang-lo. Tangte neli nanglitum aphan arjulang, nanglitum kopi athesi neliphan nephaloma?”

Kornelias pulo, “Nithom aphrang, non labangso-asonthot apor ahut, atheke arni kangsam baji kethom apor ahut, neli neli hem arlo Arnam kardom un ahut inut klarbong ape kechepingdeng amonit, men men neli ingno arjapthersi,
neliphan pulo, ‘Kornelias! Arnam nang kardom alam arjutang-lo, lapen nang keduk-keboi atum aphan dan kepi alam an Arnam chinilo.
Joppa arongsopi along monit toira Pitor pu Simon aphan pahangdamnon. Talo akung kedo Simon pu inut ok-reng akam keklem amonit ahemsi alangli alohi dodamlo.’
Hala mamat neli nangli long monit nangtoilo. Lapen nangli ingjinso si vangtang-lo. Arnam nangliphan kepaputoi alam an nelitum karjulongjisi ladak Arnam angno chingrumsi nelitum inghongphrong-lo.”
Ansi Pitor kepuji pangcheng-lo. “Non neli chinilo, Arnam ke abangphutin aphanta kelang pachingbarpet-lo.
Ajat akhei setta me, Arnam aphan kangduk, lapen dhoromi akam keklem atum an aphan ke Arnam deng-lo.
Arnam Israel amonit atum aphan kepi alam, kadokave a-Hemphu, Jisu Khristo pen ajok ningkangsam Abirta Keme kepachethang alam nanglitum chinilo.
Jon baptisom alamjir than-pachethang-det aphi Galili adet pen pangchengsi Judia adet bithe bitha adim keplangtang alam nanglitum chinihurlo.

Najareth a-Jisu alamjir, lapen Arnam alangli phuthak Karjong Kangthir lapen jakong kepi alam nanglitum chinilo. Jisu kadokave adim damsi keme akam klem lo, lapen soitan kechenek atum aphan pamebom lo, pima Arnam alangli long dolo.
Neli ke Judia adet lapen Jerusalem arongsopi along Jisu keklem akam an ahakilo. Halatum alangliphan thengparpan athak saksi pathilot-lo.
Bonta nithom aphi Arnam alangliphan kethi pen pathurlo, lapen monit atum angno pacheklang-lo.

Alangli kadokave atum aphan cheklang-lo, lapu kali, bonta Arnam aphrang pen kangvaitang ahaki atum, atheke alangli kethi pen thurdet aphi, alangli pen kecho rap rap, kejun rap rap, la nelitum aphansi cheklangchot-lo.

Monit atum aphan birta keme kepachethangji aphan, lapen kerenglang lapen kethitang amonit atum aphan kangsaiji aphan Arnam Jisu aphansi kangsai abang bat-lo pu alam haki kepiji aphansi Arnam nelitum aphan hukum pilo.
Arnam amontri atum an alangli lamjirsi pulo, atheke alangliphan kekroi atum an alangli men ajakong pen ajok apap hei hei diya longji pusi halatum pulo.”
Pitor lam keningje un ahut karjudun atum an aphuthak Karjong Kangthir hirlo.
Arnam Jihudi kalidet atum aphuthakta Karjong Kangthir adan dung-lo, la thek-longsi Joppa pen Pitor along nangkedun kekroitang Jihudi atum manghuhurlo.
Pima halatum ajat kaprek kaprek alam pen kepu lapen Arnam anong kepathe halatum arjulong-lo.
Ansi Pitor pulo, “Netum asonthak thaksi labangso amonit atumta Karjong Kangthir longtang-lo. Tangte latum baptisom ke-en longledetji athe kopima?”
Lasi halatum Jisu Khristo amen pen baptisom ke-enji aphan alangli hukum pilo. Ansi latum halatum along penang arni kedoji aphan halatum latum aphan choningrilo.
Jihudi kalidet atumta Arnam alam dengtang-lo pu alam ketoitang atum lapen Judia adet adang kedo kekroitang atum arjulong-lo.
Pitor Jerusalem arongsopi kedam ahut, Jihudi kalidet atumta reng-rot ennangji pu kepu atum alangliphan sorsarsi pulo,
“Nangli kopi apot si hala reng-rot ke-en-e, Jihudi kalidet ahem alohi do damlo, lapen halatum pen chorap rap-lo!”
Lasi Pitor kecheng pen keplangtang alam an halatum aphan than pamesi pulo:

“Neli Joppa arongsopi along Arnam kardom un ahut neli mek rengjengsi ning arjan thek-long-lo. Sining pen pe akethepi ano phli pen nangkepahir ason kopine ahormu nang kesun neli thek-long-lo, lapen la nelidung bikok-lo.
Neli la lang pamesi thek-long-lo, labangso arlo pirthe athak kedo akeng hongphli api, nampi api, keklim api, lapen angsong kangjar avo hei hei dolo.
Ansi neliphan kepu ase neli arjulong-lo, ‘Thurnon, Pitor, nang la pathira chonon!’
Bonta neli pulo, ‘Jonghe setta lapu kali, Hemphu! Chokertang, kalite kangthirthe ahormu ne ingho lut-lepinlang.’
Bonta sining pen ase neliphan puthot batai hini aphong pulo, ‘Arnam kepangthirtang ahormu ingthirthe puri.’
Lason batai kethom plang-lo. Aphisi ke la kadokave ahormu sining angsong chirungponthudet-lo.
Halabangso ahut mamat bang kethom amonit neli kedo ahem along nanglelo. Halatum aphan Sijeria pensi neli long nangtoilo.
Ansi nang dunmomepin pen halatum along dunnon pusi Karjong neliphan pulo. Joppa pen la bang throk atumta neli long Sijeria nangdunlo, lapen nelitum kadokave Kornelias ahem damlo.
Alangli nelitum aphan thanlo: Sining apherangke inut alangli hem along arjapthersi alangliphan pulo, ‘Komane aphan Joppa arongsopi toira Pitor pu a-Simon aphan pavannon.
Alangli nangliphan lam thanji, lapen labangso alam pen ajok nangli lapen nangli hem asor atum an jokpetji.’
Lapen neli lam kethan kepangcheng ahut, halatum aphuthak Karjong Kangthir hirlo, lapen lake kechengsi ahut nelitum aphuthak Karjong Kangthir nangkehir asonthot-lo.
Ansi neli Hemphu kepu alam chematha damlo, atheke alangli pulo, ‘Jon ke lang pensi baptisom pilo, bonta nangtum aphan ke Karjong Kangthir pensi baptisom pipo.
Lasi etum Hemphu Jisu Khristo aphan kekroicheng ahut Arnam ekepi adan asonthot adan hala Jihudi kalidet atum aphanta pitang-lo, lake klangdak-lo. Arnam aphan kekhangji, neli komatma!”

Halatum labangso alam arjulongsi hala pen apar alangliphan sorsarse-det-lo, lapen Arnam aphan anong pathesi puhurlo: “Tangte Jihudi kalidet atumta aning chiruisi kejut-un-e achethe kelongji aphan Arnam halatum aphanta ahut keme pitang-lo!”

Stephan aphan kepathi ahut, kekroitang atum aphan kechenek pen ajok kekroitang penang atum ke pratseisi Phonisia adet, Saipras alanglompi lapen Antiok arongsopi anta damsi than-pachethang-lo; bonta Jihudi atum aphan apar ke halatum badu aphanta birta keme thanthedet-lo.
Tebonta akaprek atum, atheke Saipras alanglom along lapen Sairen adet kedo kekroitang atum Antiok arongsopi damsi Jihudi kalidet atum aphanta thansi Hemphu Jisu alamjir a-Birta Keme thanlo.
Hemphu halatum aphan rapdunlo lapen ake-ongpi amonit atum kroisi Hemphu anat chetevarlo.
Jerusalem arongsopi amondoli mate kroi-asongta labangso abirta arjulong-lo. Lasi halatum Barnabas aphan Antiok arongsopi toilo.
Alangli hadak nanglelo, lapen Arnam halatum aphan kepi akangjinso thek-longsi aning arong-lo; lapen ning aklong pen Hemphu aphan kekroi thirklong non pusi alangli halatum aphan choningrilo.
Barnabas ke inut mesen, Karjong Kangthir pen keplengset lapen kekroi thirklong abang-lo, lapen ake-ongpi amonit atum Hemphu aphan kroilo.
Ansi Sol aphan keridunjisi Barnabas Tarsas arongsopi damjuilo.

Alangli Sol aphan longsi alangliphan Antiok vandet-lo, lapen alanglitum banghini ningkan kangthim hadak amondoli mate kroi-asong amonit atum pen chingrumbomsi ake-ongpi amonit atum aphan thanlo. Ladak Antiok helo kekroitang atum aphan Khristian pu kepu paphrangcheng adimlo.
Halabangso ahut Jerusalem pen Arnam amontri penang atum Antiok vang-lo.
Halatum angbong pen Agabas pu inut abang thursi Karjong ajakong pen ajok mo aphi keplangji alam paklangsi pulo, “Pirthe adang akhim thurji.” (Anke Klodias recho ahut si labangso alam chekok-lo.)
Ansi Judia adet kedo kekroitang atum aphan kerapjisi sangho atum abangphutinta un an dan kelojisi pathik-lo.
Halatum lapusonsi klemlo, lapen labangso atangka Barnabas lapen Sol arideng pisi mondoli akesar atum aphan lolo.
Halabangso ahut Herod recho mondoli amonit manene atum aphan kechenekji pangcheng-lo.
Alangli Jon akorte, Jems aphan nokjir pen pathilot-lo.
Jihudi atum labangso akam aning dok-lo, la thek-longsi alangli Pitor aphanta nep-lo. (Halabangso ahut ke thap kave ahim Achojun a-Meipi ahut-lo)
Pitor aphan nepsi phatek beng-lo. Hadak alang-liphan chedanbang bang krethrok atum arideng hodaisi alangliphan patonlo. Halatum bangphli bangphli chelarsi honverlo.
Kejok achojun a-Meipi aphisi Pitor aphan rat atum angno kangsaiji aphan Herod mathalo. Lasi Pitor aphan phatek arlo bilo, bonta mondoli amonit atum alangliphan jasemet Arnam ardom pilo.

Herod Pitor aphan rat angbong keponji aphan kepathik a-arni aphrang ajo Pitorke chedanbang banghini adaksi amek jang-lo. Alangliphan ingchin ari rini pen kok-het-lo, lapen phatek anghap along chedanbang atum tonding-lo.

Ansi hadak men men Hemphu apherangke vangsi arjaptherlo, lapen phatek angdeng kethe-ang turdang-lo. Alangli Pitor aphangkor along otsi alangliphan hijuk-lo, lapen alangliphan ingthursi pulo, “Thurseraknon.” Halamamat ingchin ari alangli ri pen kloruilo.
Ansi Hemphu apherangke alangliphan pulo, “Nang vam chekoknon, lapen nang keng-opta chethonnon!” Pitor lason si klemlo, lapen pherangke alangliphan pulo, “Nang choi chingchoira ne phi phi nangdunnon.”
Pitor phatek pen nangbarsi pherangke aphi phi dunlo, bonta pherangke keklem akam ahok puke alangli chininedet-lo; pima alangli ning arjansi thek-long-lo pusi mathalo.

Halatum vangsi aphrang keton aron-aso aphan lit-lo lapen adun keton aron-aso aphanta lit-lo, lapen aphisi ke rongsopi anat kedam ingchin anghap along nanglelo. Inghap amethangsi chingpudang-lo, lapen halatum ingtan nangbarlo. Halatum tovar penangbak kedam aphi pherangke alangliphan men men otekangbup-lo.

Ansi Pitor amethang aphan keplangtang alam chemathasi pulo, “Lake ahok-lo pu nonke ne chinipame lo. Herod arideng pen lapen Jihudi atum keklemjisi kechesik an pen neli-phan kepajokjisi Hemphu amethang apherangke nangtoilo.”
Halabangso alam chinipamesi alangli Mark pu a-Jon apei, Meri ahem damjuilo. Hadak penang amonit atum chingrumsi Arnam ardombomlo.
Pitor ingtan anat kedo anghap pacheng-lo, lapen Rodha pu inut abanpi la kechinijisi vang-lo.
Alangli Pitor ase chinisi aning arong parpik-lo. Lasi alangli inghap ingpupedetsi hem arlo katvirsi halatum along damthujuilo, lapen Pitor inghap angtan alongsi do pu halatum aphan thanlo.
Halatum alangliphan pulo, “Nanglike kepangchamlo!” Bonta lake ahok-lo pusi labangpi pubomlo. Lasi halatum pulo, “Lake alangliphan kerai apherangkelo.”
Halabangso ahut Pitorta inghap pachengbomlo. Aphisi halatum inghap ingpulo, lapen alangliphan thek-longsi halatum manghuphrong-lo.

Ansi halatum kedoklipji aphan alangli ari pen asin paklang-lo, lapen Hemphu kopusonsi alangliphan phatek arlo pen ingtan vanloma, labangso alam alangli halatum aphan than parjirmilo. Alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Jems lapen kekroitang atum an aphan labangso alam thandamnon.” Ansi alangli ingtan barsi akaprek adim damjuilo.
Adap kethe-ang pen mamat Pitor kopi cheplangdet-loma pusi chedanbang atum huriseilo.
Herod Pitor aphan kepariji ahukum pilo, bonta halatum alangliphan longthekthedet-lo. Lasi alangli hala keton aron-aso atum aphan alam hutsi halatum aphan kepathiji ahukum pilo.
Labangso aphi Herod Judia adet otekangsi Sijeria arongsopi penang arni an dodamlo.

Herod Tair lapen Sidon arongsopi amonit atum aphan jasemet aning thilo. Lasi halatum aning isipet pen alangli ingno damlo. Aphrangsi halatum Blastas pu inut recho asirkut ahemphu aphan abe cheponsi halatum aphan keparapji aphan choningrilo. Ansi halatum Herod adung damsi alangli halatum pen kejelangthuji aphan choningrilo, pima halatum adet kecho-kejun ahormu labangso arecho adet pensi longverlo.
Kepathiktang arni, Herod recho achoi chingchoisi recho anghoi athak chingnilo, lapen monit atum aphan lam thanlo.
Lapen rat atum alangliphan rosi pulo, “Lake arnam aselo, monit ase kali.”
Hala mamat Hemphu apherangke Herod aphan theng-lo, pima alangli Arnam aphan aman pipedet-lo. Ansi ingthan atum alangliphan chobomsi alangli thilot-lo.
Bonta Arnam alam chethangbomsi chanponbomlo.
Barnabas lapen Sol kam keklem patangdetsi Jerusalem pen nang-chevoilo. Alanglitum Mark pu a-Jon aphanta chevanlo.

Antiok amondoli mate kroi-asong along Arnam amontri lapen kuru penang atum dolo, atheke Barnabas, Simeon (abang ke-ik pu abang), Sairen adet a-Lusias, bihek pen Herod recho pen kethe-keding rap rap abang Manaen, lapen Sol hadak dolo.

Alanglitum Hemphu aphan kangduk kardom lapen an kehum un ahut Karjong Kangthir halatum aphan pulo, “Ne kam kepaklemji aphansi Barnabas lapen Sol aphan phatang-lo. Halabangso akam kepaklemjile nangtum Barnabas lapen Sol aphan papreknon.”
Lasi halatum an humsi Arnam ardomlo, lapen alanglitum aphuthak ari batsi toilo.
Karjong Kangthir Sol lapen Barnabas aphan toisi, latum bang hini Seleusia arongsopi damlo, lapen hadak pen latum telongpi pensi Saipras alanglompi damlo.
Ansi halatum Salamais arongsopi lesi sinagog along Arnam alam than-pachethang-lo. Mark pu a-Jon alanglitum aphan kam rapdunlo.
Alanglitum halabangso alanglom soding damsi Paphos arongsopi nanglelo. Hadak alanglitum Bar-Jisu pu inut maja kanghoithek a-Jihudi amonit pen chetong-lo. Alangli ke inut kechobei amontrilo.
Labangso amonit ke halabangso alanglom a-Govornor, Sergias Paulas alongsi dolo. Sergias ke inut abidi dopik amonit-lo, lapen Sol aphan phalo, pima alangli Arnam alam karjuji aning hang-lo.

Bonta hala Elimas (lake Grik alam pen alangliphan kehang amenlo) pu inut maja kanghoithek abang alanglitum aphan khang-lo, lapen halabangso alanglom a-Govornor aphan kekroi anat pen kepasuijuiji aphan bor-ilo.
Tebonta Sol (alangliphan Pol puta pu) Karjong Kangthir pen plengsetsi alangliphan langdingsi pulo,
“Soitan aso! Nang ke kam keme an ahoturlo. Nang ke kepacherei alam lapen kehingnodak akam pen plengset-lo. La Hemphu ahok alam aphanta chobei alam pu kepaklangjisi nangke kaiketa bor-ilo.
Mathanon, non Hemphu ari nang phuthaksi dolo; nang penang arni ahut anta nang mek checharchedetsi arni akethe-ang thek-longledetpo.”
Hala mamat men men kangtingkuk anghun alangli mek kebinkuk alangli chethek-long-lo, lapen alangli ri ke-ot-ra keriponji aphan alangli monit risi artingrok-lo.
Halabangso alanglom a-Govornor la keplangtang alam thek-longsi kroilo; pima Hemphu alamjir kethan alam alangli arjulongsi manghuhak-lo.
Pol lapen ari asangho atum telongpi chethapsi Paphos pen ha Pamphilia adet, Perga arongsopi damlo. Hadak Mark pu a-Jon alanglitum aphan otekangsi Jerusalem chevoilo.
Halatum Perga arongsopi pen damthusi Pisidia adet Antiok arong-sopi nanglelo. Hadak Sabbath Arni Sinagog arlo dunsi ingnidunlo.

Moses aron lapen Arnam amontri atum ketok alam porhedet aphi Sinagog kechepahemphu atum alanglitum aphan phasi pulo, “Kortemarli atum, nanglitum jongsi rat atum aphan ning kepatheji alam do tangte, punon.”
Pol thursi ari pen asin paklang si pulo, “Israel akorte marli atum, lapen Arnam aphan kangduk, Jihudi kalidet atum; nanglitum arjutha!

Israel atum a-Arnamsi ephusar atum aphan ingvailo, lapen Israel atum Ijip adet kedo un ahut Arnam halatum aphan isi thedung akhei paplang-lo, lapen Arnam methang ajakong pensi halatum aphan halabangso adet pen vanlo.
Lapen kejejangtang ajo alangli halatum aphan ningkan phlikep anta lanalo.
Alangli Kanaan adet kedo khei throksi aphan pavirsi halatum adet Israel atum aphan pachepahemphu long-lo.
Lahei kadokave kepaplengji aphan ningkan pharo phli ra phokep an nang-lo.
“Labangso aphi Arnam amontri, Samuel arni nangleletik ke Arnam halatum aphan kangsai atum pilo.
Ansi halatum recho nangji pusi choningri lo, lapen Arnam Benjamin akur Kush asopo Sol aphan recho bat-lo. Alangli ningkan phlikep an recho cholo.

Alangliphan recho pen pasuntuk aphi David aphan halatum arecho bat-lo. Arnam alangli lamjir pulo: ‘Ne nening amonit long-lo, lake Jesse asopo David helo. Ne kepaklemji ning kehang akam an alangli klempo.’
Arnam amethang kechaktang asonthotsi David aso-asu angbong pen Jisu aphan Israel atum aphan kepajok abang paplangtang-lo.
Israel atum amethang methang apap pen aning chiruisi baptisom en nangji pusi Jon Israel atum an aphan thanlo. Jisu kam keklem kepangchengche akosi Jon labangso alam than pachethang-lo.

Jon kam keklem kepajutji dok dok ahut alangli rat atum aphan pulo, ‘Nanglitum neliphan komat pusi kemathama? Neli ke hala nanglitum kanghongphrong abang kali. Bonta mathanon, halabangso abang neliphi vangpo. Neli ke alangli keng-op ari kephriji aphan anta neli ot ave’.
“Israel akortemarli atum, Abraham aso-asu atum, lapen Arnam aphan kangduk Jihudi kalidet atum! Ilitum aphansi la kejok alam epilo!

Pima Jerusalem arongsopi kedo amonit atum, lapen halatum aphan keja atumta alangli helo kepajok abang-lo puke chininedet-lo, lapen Sabbath Arnini keporhihi, hala Arnam amontri atum alam hei heita halatum chininedet-lo. Tebonta halatum alangliphan ado padosi Arnam amontri atum kethan alam pachekok-lo.
Alangli kethinangji, lason ado halatum longthekthedet-lo setta, alangliphan kepathilongjisi halatum Pilat aphan choningrilo.
Hastro along alangli lamjir ketok ason an halatum klemdet aphi alangliphan thengparpan pen pasunsi thiri along bidamlo.
Bonta Arnam alangliphan kethi pen pathurlo,
lapen alangli Galili adet pen Jerusalem kedam ahut alangli long kedun atum aphan alangli penang arni an cheklang-lo. Alanglitum nonke Israel atum angno haki plang-lo.
Nelitum nanglitum aphan Birta Keme kethanjisi ladak vang-lo, atheke

Jisu aphan kethi pen kepathur pen ajok, Arnam klemji pu ephusar atum aphan kechak alam non ephusar aso-asu atum aphan, atheke ilitum aphan eklempitang-lo. Lake hini ajir alun along ketok asonthot-lo, atheke hadak tok-lo:
‘Nang ke ne Sopolo;
pini ne nang-Po plangtang-lo.’
Alangliphan kethi pen pathurji lapen abang arpum kaiketa thuthedetji pu alamjir Arnam kepu lapuson helo:
‘Ne David aphan kechaktang,
Kangthir lapen kelongvekji ahirjume hei hei ne nangtum aphan nangpiji.’
Lapen chenamsi ajir kaprek alun alongta Arnam puthulo,
‘Nang nangmethang Aban kangthir aphan atipit arlo pathu longledetji.’
Pima David amethang akai ahut Arnam aning kehang akam klemdet aphi thilot-lo, lapen alangli phusar atum along alangliphan pipdundet-lo, lapen alangli bang arpum thulo.
Bonta Arnam kethi pen kepathur tang abang arpum ke thuthedet-lo.
Lahelo Israel akortemarli atum, nanglitum la kechinijisi nelitum aning hang-lo: atheke Jisu Khristo pen ajoksi pap hei hei akediya longji pu nelitum nanglitum aphan thanlo.
Alangliphan kekroi atum anke, Moses Aron kepajok un-e apap an pen kejok long-lo.
Tangte Arnam amontri atum kepu alam nanglitum aphan keplangpledetjile nanglitum lang pamenon. Atheke Arnam amontri atum pulo:
‘Nangtum, kangnekchoi amonit atum!
Nangtum manghumangramra thilotnon!
Pima mane abangle nangtum aphan than pachinipame setta,
nangtum kroikre det ji, lason akamsi pini ne klembomlo!’ ”
Ansi Pol lapen Barnabas sinagog pen nang kebar ahut monit atum alanglitum aphan choningrisi pulo, “Puthot a-Sabbath Arnita vangthura labangso alamjir ansose thanthutha.”

Mei chekakdet aphi, Jihudi lapen Jihudi adhorom ke-endun a-Jihudi kalidet ake-ongpi atum Pol lapen Barnabas along dunlo. Alangli halatum pen chingkilo, lapen Arnam akangjinso angkangle kedo chepathir-klongnon pusi halatum aphan aning parung-lo.
Puthot a-Sabbath Arni Hemphu alam karjudunjisi rongsopi kedo an amonit thak thak amonit vang-lo.
Jihudi atum la armu ake-ongpi thek-long si jasemet lang un-elo, lapen pinrem pinremsi Pol keningje alam ke ahok kali pusi pulo.

Bonta Pol lapen Barnabas ke ansose phererepin pen pulo, “Nelitum nanglitum aphansi Arnam alam nangthan paphrang vek nangkok-lo. Bonta nanglitum methangsi la dengdelo, lapen nanglitum methang methangsi kejut un-e achethe kelongmeme a-ot kali pu chemathalo apotsi nonke nelitum nanglitum aphan osi, Jihudi kalidet atum angbong dampo.
Pima Hemphu nelitum aphan lasonsi hukum nepitang-lo:
‘Pirthe adangta kejok kelongji aphan,
Jihudi kalidet atum aphan ajok,
ne nangphan kethe-ang nangpaplang-tang-lo.’ ”
Jihudi kalidet atum labangso alam arjulongsi aning arong-lo, lapen Hemphu alam adak atur pathelo, lapen Kejut un-e achethe kelongji aphan kangvaitang atum an kroilo.
Halabangso alongri adang an hemphu alam chethangphlup-lo.

Bonta Jihudi atum hala rongsopi angbong aman kedo amonit atum aphan lapen Arnam aphan kangduk, Jihudi kalidet arloso aman kedo atum aphan hoisi Pol lapen Barnabas aphan pachenek-lo, lapen halabangso alongri pen paphlungphit-lo.
Alanglitum halatum abe pathurjisi akengpak aduk cheho tekangsi Ikoniam arongsopi damjuilo.
Antiok arongsopi along kedo kekroitang atum aning arongpik-lo, lapen halatum Karjong Kangthir pen plengset-lo.
Ikoniam arongsopi alongta lasonthotsi plang-lo. Pol lapen Barnabas Jihudi atum a-Sinagog along dunsi lam than pajume-olo. Lasi Jihudi atum lapen Jihudi kalidet ake-ongpi atum kroilo.
Bonta kekroikre a-Jihudi atum hala Jihudi kalidet atum aphan chorung chojarsi kekroitang atum aphan palangselet-lo.

Pol lapen Barnabas hadak penang arni keding dosi phererepin pen Hemphu alamjir thanbomlo, lapen Hemphu alanglitum aphan kemanghumeme akam lapen kematha thekthedet akam keklemji ajakong pisi, alanglitum Hemphu akangjinso alamjir kethan alam ke ahok-lo pu aporman paklang-lo.
Rongsopi amonit atum angbong abe hini dokok-lo. Penang atum ke Jihudi atum abe dunlo, lapen akaprek atum ke Pol lapen Barnabas abe dunlo.
Ansi Jihudi atum lapen Jihudi kalidet atum hala keja atum pen pen la ketoitang atum aphan kepatherakjisi lapen arlong pen karbujisi chepathik-lo.
Bonta ketoitang atum labangso alam chinisi Likonia adet Listra lapen Derbe arongsopi lapen tebok terai alongri katjuilo.
Haladak alanglitum Birta Keme than-pachethang-lo.
Listra arongsopi inut akeng ketekok amonit dolo. Alangli amahang kethek ahut penta akeng tekokjoksi kengkam chejor thekthepinlo.
Alangli hadak ingnilunsi Pol kethan alam arju dun lo. Pol alangliphan langding-lo, lapen alangli kroilo lapen me unpo thek-longsi,
Pol alangliphan ase kethe pen pulo, “Thurra arjapthernon!” Ansi alangli chonkang kangsi akengkam kechejorji pangcheng-lo.
Armu atum Pol keklem akam thek-longsi Likonia alam pen hangjo si pulo, “Arnam atum monit arje cheparjansi etum angbong nanghirtang lo.”
Halatum Barnabas aphan Zeus pusi amen irlo, lapen Pol aphan ke Harmes pusi irlo, pima alangli ke lam kethan ahut keja abang-lo.

La Zeus pu arnam aphan kardom ahem ke rongsopi angtan si dolo. Halabangso akurusar abang ke chainong alo, lapen mir alek hei hei inghap an vanlo, pima alangli lapen armu atum la ketoitang atum aphan athok kethokjisi aning hang-lo.
Pol lapen Barnabas labangso alam arjulongsi amethang methang ape chingsek-lo, lapen armu atum angbong katvirsi, hangsi pulo,

“Nanglitum kopichonghoisi lapuson keklemloma? Nelitumta nanglitum asonthak thak monitchot-lo! Nanglitum la thangta kalidet a-arnam hei hei aphan o-ra hala sining, pirthe, talo lapen lahei hei angbong kedo amar an kepinchong abang, kerengver Arnam anatthu kechetevarji aphansi nelitum nanglitum aphan Birta Keme kethan-jisi ladak vang-lo.
Hako ahut ke alangli kadokave amonit aphanta amethang methang aning kehang aling paklem long-lo.

Bonta alangli keme akam hei hei klem si amethang kerengver angthek paklangbomlo: atheke alangli nanglitum aphan sining pen arve pajang-lo lapen abotor ahut sok sang nangpi olo, lapen kecho ahormu padorphlupsi nanglitum aning parong-lo.”
Lapu-an alam pudet aphita armu atum latum aphan athok kethokji aning hang-lo. Lasi ketoitang atum la armu atum aphan khang chetorok-lo.

Antiok lapen Ikoniam arongsopi pen penang a-Jihudi atum vangsi armu atum aphan amethang abe cheponlo. Halatum Pol aphan arlong pen arbulo, lapen alangli thilot-lo pu mathasi alangliphan rongsopi angtan chethurponlo.
Bonta kekroitang atum alangliphan kekomjai ahut alangli thursi rongsopi lutdamthulo. Puthot arni alangli Barnabas pen Derbe arongsopi damlo.
Pol lapen Barnabas Derbe arongsopi Birta Keme than-pache-thangsi sangho ake-ongpi paplang-lo. Ansi alanglitum Listra, Ikonia, lapen Pisidia adet Antiok arongsopi chevoilo.

Alanglitum kekroitang atum aning pathirbomlo, lapen halatum kekroi angkang kedobomji aphan aning pathelo. Alanglitum thansi pulo, “Arnam a-Rat angbong kelutdunji aphan ilitum jasemet kesung pho nangji.”
Alanglitum mondoli alongtinta mondoli akesar atum battekang-lo, lapen alanglitum Arnam ardomsi lapen an humsi halatum aphan halatum kekroi a-Hemphu arideng hodai tekang-lo.
Alanglitum Pisidia adet dongpon-putsi Pamphilia adet damlo.
Hadak Perga arongsopi along alanglitum than-pachethang-lo, lapen labangso aphi Atalia arongsopi damlo.
Hadak pen alanglitum telongpi pen Antiok arongsopi damlo. Hadaksi aphrangke non alanglitum keklem akam kepaklemji aphan alanglitum aphan Arnam akangjinso angkang hodailo.

Alangli Antiok arongsopi nanglesi mondoli amonit atum aphan pangrumpet-lo, lapen Arnam alangli-tum pen ajok keklemtang akam, lapen alangli kopusonsi Jihudi kalidet atum aphan kekroi atovar ingpupitang-loma, la kadokave alam halatum aphan thanlo.
Lapen hadak alanglitum sangho atum along penang arni keding dodunlo.
Bonta penang amonit atum Judia adet pen Antiok arongsopi vangsi kekroitang atum aphan thansi pulo, “Moses Aron ateng pen reng-rot en-ete nanglitum jok un-e.”

Labangso alam pen apot Barnabas lapen Pol halatum pen jasemet lam chedanlo. Lasi Pol, Barnabas lapen Antiok arongsopi kedo kekroitang penang atum Jerusalem damsi hadak ketoitang atum lapen mondoli akesar atum pen labangso alam kechingvaiji aphan pathik-lo.

Halabangso amondoli mate kroi-asong alanglitum aphan tovar thondunlo. Alanglitum Phonisia lapen Samaria adet angbong kedam ahut Jihudi kalidet atum aning kecherui alam thanponlo. Labangso abirta kekroitang atum an aning arongparpik-lo.
Ansi alanglitum Jerusalem nanglesi, mondoli, ketoitang atum lapen mondoli akesar atum alanglitum aphan chak-lo, lapen alanglitum pen ajok Arnam keklem alam an alanglitum latum aphan thanlo.
Bonta Pharisi abe atum angbong pen kekroitang penang atum thursi pulo, “Jihudi kalidet atum aphan reng-rot pivek nangji, lapen halatum Moses Aron kroinangji pura hukum pi nangji.”
Kekroitang atum lapen mondoli akesar atum labangso alam keching-vaijisi chingrumlo.

Lam penang chedandet aphi Pitor thursi pulo, “Korte marli atum, Jihudi kalidet atum Birta Keme arjulongsi kekroiji aphan, neli Birta Keme than kepachethangji aphansi Arnam nanglitum angbong pen neliphan ingvailo, lake nanglitum chinilo.
Abangphutin aning kechini abang, Arnam ilitum aphan asonthak thaksi Jihudi kalidet atum aphanta Karjong Kangthir pisi alangli halatum aphan dengtang-lo pu angthek paklang-lo.
Alangli halatum lapen ilitum angbong thang akeprekta bibelo. Bonta halatum kroilo apotsi alangli halatum apap hei hei diyalo.
Tangte non nanglitum kopi apotsi ephusar atum lapen ilitumta keparphang un-epinlang ajuali hala kekroitang atum achethok athak kebatra, Arnam aphan asat kelangji mathaloma?
Bonta Hemphu Jisu Khristo pen ajoksi halatum kejok long-lo asonthot, lasonthotsi etumta kejok long-lo pusi ilitum kroilo.”
Pol lapen Barnabas pen ajok Arnam Jihudi kalidet atum angbong keklem akemanghumeme akam lapen kematha abidi kejutdet akam an alamjir kethan arjulongsi mei along kedo atum an doklip-lo.
Alanglitum lam thandet aphi Jems thakdunsi pulo, “Kortemarli atum, neli lam arjutha!

Arnam Jihudi kalidet atum aphanta amethang amonit kepaplangjisi alangli kopu sonsi aphrangke Jihudi kalidet atum angbong pen penang amonit ensi halatum aphan mathaloma, la kadokave alam Simon nanglitum aphan thanjirlo.
Lake Arnam amontri atum kepu alam asonthot-lo, atheke halatum lasonsi pulo,
‘Hemphu pulo, labangso aphi ne vangthuji,
lapen David akeruhup ape ahem ne kimthuji.
La kerutang hei hei ne kimthuji,
lapen la ne paparjapthuji.
Ansi labangso pen ajok ahin kedolang amonit atum an,
lapen nemethang amonit kepaplangjisi ne kephatang,
Jihudi kalidet atum an nephan roji.
Hako ahut pen labangso alam kepaklang abang,
Hemphusi lapuson pulo.’
“La apotsi neli ning keparai alam lahelo, la Arnam anat kepangnobom, Jihudi kalidet atum aphan pasungbom nangnelo.
Bonsetta ilitum halatum aphan lo tok-ra, halatum kumlin aphan kethok amar hei hei cho nangne, beisa klem nangne, kokthat api a-ok chonangne lapen avi cho nangne pule halatum aphan thanlonang.
Pima hako ahut penta Sabbath Arnitin sinagog along Moses Aron porhesi paparjubomlo, lapen Moses kepu alam hei hei rongsopitin alongta than pachethangbomlo.”

Ansi ketoitang atum, lapen mondoli akesar atum hala mondoli amonit atum pen pen chingvaisi halatum angbong pen manene atum aphan ingvaisi Pol lapen Barnabas atum along Antiok arongsopi ketoidunji aphan pathik-lo. Halatum Barnabas pu a-Judas lapen Silas aphan ingvailo. Alanglitumke kekroitang atum angbong keja atumlo.
Halatum alangtum along la aber ketok aloh lodunlo:
“Nelitum, atheke ketoitang atum lapen mondoli akesar atum, atheke nanglitum akorte atum nanglitum aphan, atheke Siria lapen Silisia adet kedo, Jihudi kalidet atum an aphan kardom pilo.

Nelitum angbong pen manene atum nelitum pen thang ahukum longlepin pensi nanglitum along vang-lo, lapen halatum kethan alam pen ajok nanglitum aning pasiksak-lo lapen nanglitum aning aduk pilo pusi nelitum arjulong-lo.
Lasi nelitum chingvailo, lapen nelitum manene atum aphan ingvaisi nanglitum along ketoiji aphan alam chekroilo. Ilitum kechinghon ajirpo, Pol lapen Barnabas atum along alanglitum nangdunpo.
La Pol lapen Barnabas ke e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo akam aphan amethang methang akai kechepanong atumlo.
Lasi nelitum Judas lapen Silas aphan nanglitum along nangtoilo. Alanglitum amethangta la ketok alam an nangthanpo.
La aber ketok, kenangsot aron apar ke nanglitum aphan akaprek anghor pinangnelo pusi Karjong Kangthir lapen nelitumta alam chekroilo.
Atheke lahelo, nanglitum sekarkli amar, vi, lapen kokthat api a-ok chonangnelo, lapen beisa klem nangnelo. Nanglitum lahei hei klemkledet-lote mesenpo. Kardom.”
Ansi alanglitum aphan toilo, lapen alanglitum Antiok damsi mondoli amonit atum an aphan pangrumlo, lapen halatum arideng labangso aloh pilo.
Halatum labangso aloh porhelo, lapen labangso aloh along ning kepathe alam longsi halatum aning arongparpik-lo.
Judas lapen Silas penang lam thansi hala korte atum aning pathelo, lapen aning pathirlo, atheke alanglitum methang amatsi Arnam amontri atumlo.
Penang arni aphi kekroitang akorte atum alanglitum aphan ning kangsam pen nangtoilo. Ansi alanglitum aphan nangketoi atum along alanglitum nangchevoilo.
Bonta Silas ke hadak dokok-lo.
Bonta Pol lapen Barnabas ke Antiok arongsopisi dokok-lo. Hadak alanglitum hala akaprek penang atum pen pen Hemphu alam than-pachethangbomlo.
Penang arni aphi Pol Barnabas aphan pulo, “Etum Hemphu alam kepachethangtang arongsopi an chedamthura, korte atum kopusonsi dobomloma, lale langdamlonang.”
Barnabas ke Mark pu a-Jon aphanta ari kecheponji aning hang-lo.
Bonta Pol ke alangliphan ari kechepon ke mesen kali pusi mathalo; pima alangli halatum aphan Pamphilia adet otekangsi alanglitum along kam keklem pajutdundedet-lo.
Ansi alanglitum alam chetontedetsi jasemet lam chedanlo, lapen alanglitum chekakdak-lo. Barnabas ke Mark aphan ari cheponsi telongpi pen Saipras alanglom damlo.
Bonta Pol ke Silas aphan ingvailo, lapen kekroitang atum alanglitum aphan Hemphu ahirjume hangpidunsi alanglitum damlo.
Alangli Siria lapen Silisia adet angbong vurdamsi mondoli pathirponbomlo.
Ansi Pol ke Derbe lapen Listra arongsopi anta damlo. Hadak Timothi pu inut a-Khristian dolo. Alangli peita Khristianlo. Labangpi ke Jihudi amonit-lo, bonta Timothi apo ke Grik amonit-lo.
Listra lapen Ikoniam arongsopi kedo kekroitang atum anta alangliphan aningdoksi rohurlo.
Pol Timothi aphan ari kecheponji aning hang-lo. Lasi alangliphan reng-rot pilo; athe pima, Timothi apo ke Grik amonit-lo pu hadak malom kedo a-Jihudi atum an chinihurlo.
Alangli-tum rongsopi hei hei angbong kedam un ahut, kekroitang atum lapen mondoli akesar atum Jerusalem along keparaitang aron hei hei halatum aphan pisi lahei hei kekroiji aphan pulo.
Lasi mondoli atum akekroi thebomlo, lapen arnivangta mondoli abangphuta nangbatbomlo.
Pol lapen ari asangho atum Phrigia adet lapen Galasia alongri angbong dongponputsi damlo, pima Karjong Kangthir alanglitum aphan Asia adet ke pathan longledet-lo.
Alanglitum Maisia adet ahoi lesi Bithinia adet kedamji aphan mathalo, bonta Jisu a-Karjong alanglitum aphan khang-lo.
Lasi alanglitum Maisia adet dongponputsi Troas arongsopi damjuilo.
Ajo Pol ning arjan thek-long-lo. Alangli thek-long-lo, Masedonia adet amonit inut arjapthersi alangliphan choningrisi pulo, “Masedonia adet vang-ra nelitum aphan neraptha!”
Pol labangso aning arjan thek-longdet aphi nelitum Masedonia adet kedamjisi chesik-lo, pima hadak kedo amonit atum aphan Birta Keme kepathandamjisi Arnam nelitum aphan nephalo pu nelitum chinipamelo.
Troas pen telongpi chethapsi nelitum Samothresk alanglom damphit-lo, lapen puthot arni Neapolis arongsopi lelo.
Hadak pen nelitum Philipi arongsopi damlo. Lake Mesedonia adet isi alongri angbong kedo aphrangsi arongsopi lo, lapen Roman aron-aso isi asong kedo adimlo. Hadak nelitum penang arni dolo.

Arni isi, Sabbath Arni nelitum halabangso arongsopi pen barsi langroi akung damlo, pima hadak Jihudi atum kardom adim doji pusi nelitum mathalo. Nelitum ingnisi hadak kechingrum arloso atum pen chingkilo.

Hadak nelitum alam nangkarjudun atum angbong Lidia pu inut Thiatira arongsopi arlosopita inut-lo. Alangli ke hepi arje ape kejor lapen Arnam aphan kangduk abangpilo. Lasi Pol kethan alam kedengjisi Hemphu labangpi aning ingpulo.

Labangpi lapen ahem amonit atum an baptisom endet aphi labangpi nelitum aphan nephalo. Alangli pulo, “Nanglitum jongsi neliphanta Hemphu aphan kekroi binong abangpilo pu mathalo tangte, vang-ra neli hemle donon.” Alangli nelitum aphan jasemet arneponlo.

Arni isi nelitum kardom adim kedam un ahut inut abanpi nelitum pen chetong-lo. Labangpi ke inut alodeppilo, lapen kehingno akarjong ajakong pen ajok mo aphi keplangji alam thanmeksi ahemphu atum aphan tangka palongpi-olo.
Labangpi Pol lapen nelitum aphi phi nangdunlo, lapen hangkongsi pulo, “Labangso amonit atum ke kangtuinei a-Arnam aban atumlo! Kejok kelongji atovarsi alanglitum nanglitum aphan nangthanlo!”

Labangpi penang arni lasonsi klembomlo. Lasi Pol aning oisi, chetevarsi hala kehingno akarjong aphan pulo, “Jisu Khristo amen pen ne nangphan hukum pilo, nang labangpi pen nangbarnon!” Hala mamat kehingno akarjong labangpi pen nangbarlo.
Ansi ahemphu atum tangka kelongji atovar avedet thek-longsi halatum Pol lapen Silas aphan nep-lo, lapen chethurponsi hithi adim rongsopi ahemphu atum angno ponlo.
Halatum kangsai atum angno Pol lapen Silas aphan vansi pulo, “Latum ke Jihudi amonit-lo. Latum labangso arongsopi angbong jasemet pahuriseilo.
Ili Roman amonit atum ke-en longle lapen kekroilongle aron hei hei si latum than pachethang-lo.”
Ansi armu atumta halatum along jalangdunsi Pol lapen Silas aphan thurpak-lo, lapen kangsai atum alanglitum ape palumsi kechokji ahukum pilo.
Halatum alanglitum aphan jasemet choksi phatek beng-lo, lapen alanglitum aphan ton pametu pusi phatek ahemphu aphan hukum pilo.
Lason sodak ahukum longsi phatek ahemphu abang alanglitum aphan phatek angbong angdengsi bilo, lapen alanglitum akeng kapat pang-omruilo.
Bonta ajo achitim malom Pol lapen Silas Arnam ardomsi Arnam aphan kero alun lunkong-lo, lapen phatek arlo kedo atum arjudun phrong-lo.
Ansi tongsekot pen chikli thepi vangsi phatek ahemthur paklemhurlo. Hala mamat phatek anghap do-an chingpudang-lo lapen hala phatek kejang atum aphan kekok-i ingchin ari anta klo-et-lo.
Phatek ahemphu amek prangsi phatek anghap do-anta kechingpudang thek-long-lo, lapen phatek kejang atum an kat-et-lo pusi alangli mathalo. Lasi alangli anokjir chesatsi amethang chepathiji dok dok-lo.
Bonta Pol un an ase kethe pen hangsi pulo, “Nangmethang chephangnori! Nelitum kadokaveta ladaksi do!”
Phatek ahemphu melur hei hei hangsi phatek arlo damlo, lapen kephere pen a-ok klemhursi Pol lapen Silas akeng-ri domkhrup-lo.
Ansi alangli alanglitum aphan phatek arlo pen ponsi arjulo, “Akehai atum! Kejok kelongji aphan neli kopi klem nangjima?”
Alanglitum thakdunsi pulo, “Hemphu Jisu aphan kroinon, anke nangli lapen nanglitum hem isi amonit kejok longpo.”
Ansi alangliphan lapen alangli hem amonit an aphan Hemphu alam thanlo.
Halabangso ajo lapen halabangso apor ahut mamat alangli, alanglitum aphan ponsi areng amek an chamlo; lapen alangli lapen ahem amonit atum an baptisom enlo.
Ansi alangli Pol lapen Silas aphan amethang ahem cheponsi an pacholo. Alangli lapen alangli hem amonit atum aning arongpik-lo, pima nonke halatum Arnam aphan kroilo.
Puthot adap kangsai atum chedanbang atum aphan toisi phatek ahemphu aphan papulo, “Halabangso amonit atum aphan padamlongnon.”
Lasi phatek ahemphu abang Pol aphan pulo, “Kangsai atum nanglitum aphan kelophlotji ahukum pilo. Nonke nanglitum dak pen barra ningkangsam pen damnon.”

Bonta Pol chedanbang atum aphan pulo, “Nelitum ke Roman amonit-lo setta nelitum aphan ingsai-sepin pen rat angno nechok-lo lapen phatek nebeng-lo. Lapen nonke halatum nelitum aphan dak pen padamjoipoma? Lapu ke chokche! Halatum amethang vangsi nelitum aphan pabarvek nangji.”
Ansi chedanbang atum kangsai atum aphan labangso alam thandamlo, lapen Pol lapen Silas ke Roman amonit-lo pu arjulongsi halatum pherelo.
Lasi halatum vangsi alanglitum aphan choningrisi phatek pen vanlo, lapen rongsopi pen damnon pusi choningrilo.
Pol lapen Silas phatek pen barsi Lidia ahem lutdamlo. Hadak alanglitum kekroitang atum pen chetong-lo, lapen halatum aphan ning kepathe alam pusi damjuilo.
Pol lapen Silas Amphipolis lapen Apolonia arongsopi ke-dongponput atovar damsi Thessalonika lelo. Hadak Jihudi atum asinagog dolo.
Pol kai asonthotsi sinagog along dunlo, lapen Sabbath Arni panithom alangli monit atum pen hastro alam chedanlo.

Alangli halatum aphan hastro paklang-lo, lapen hastro alam athe than pajirmisi Khristo ke kesung chechak nangkok-lo lapen kethi pen thur nangkok-lo pu thanlo. Pol pulo, “Labangso a-Jisu alamjirsi neli nanglitum aphan thanlo. Alangli helo Khristolo.”
Ansi halatum angbong penang atum Arnam aphan kangduk a-Grik amonit ake-ongpi atum, lapen arloso atum angbong kejabom atum labangso alam kroisi Pol lapen Silas abe dunlo.

Bonta Jihudi atum alanglitum aphan lang un-elo, lasi amethang atum along penangbak kehingnodak khangjang lapen monit jong jong pinso amonit atum aphan pangrumsi Pol lapen Silas aphan pathurpaksi rongsopi pahuriseilo. Halatum Pol lapen Silas aphan rat angno kevanji aphan ridamsi Jemon ahem vangpak-lo.

Bonta hadak Pol lapen Silas aphan longledetsi halatum Jeson lapen kekroitang penangbak atum aphan nangchethursi rongsopi kechepahemphu atum angno vanlo, lapen hangjosi pulo, “Labangso amonit atum helo pirthe kepharleppharlo atumlo. Lapen nonke latum ladakta vangtang-lo.
Lapen Jeson halatum aphan amethang ahem chak-lo. Latum recho Kethe ahukum hei hei kroikrelo, atheke Jisu pu inut akaprek arecho do pusi latum than pachethang-lo.”
Labangso alam arjulongsi armu atum lapen rongsopi kechepahemphu atum aning jangjesi huriseilo.
Ansi halatum Jeson lapen hala akaprek atum aphan adai patusi lophlot-lo.
Keningve pen mamat kekroitang atum Pol lapen Silas aphan Berea arongsopi toijuilo. Alanglitum hadak lesi Sinagog arlo dunlo.

Thessa-lonika arongsopi asor mute la Berea arongsopi amonit atum aning memulo, lapen kechiniji aning kehang pensi halatum kethan alam arjudunlo, lapen Pol kethan alam ahokma, mate ahok kalima, la kechinijisi alanglitum arnivangta hastro langsi pangbarverlo.
Halatum angbong keja atum ake-ongpi atum kroilo; lapen Grik arloso atum angbong lapen Grik apinso atum angbongta kekroi atum do-olo.

Bonta Pol Berea arongsopi alongta Arnam alam pachethangbomlo pu alam arjulongsi Thessalonia arong-sopi kedo a-Jihudi atum hadak vangsi Berea arongsopi asor atum aphan chorung chojarlo, lapen aning pajangjesi pathurpak-lo.
Ansi hala mamat kekroitang atum Pol aphan talo akung toijuilo; bonta Silas lapen Timothi ke Berea arongsopisi dokok-lo.
Pol aphan kethondun atum Athens arongsopi anta dunlo; lapen Pol halatum aphan pulo. “Silas lapen Timothi nelong pavang serakrak-non.” Ansi halatum kethondun atum Berea arongsopi nangchevoilo.
Pol Athens arongsopi along Silas lapen Timothi aphan kanghong un ahut, halabangso arongsopi angbong kumlin hei hei do-o thek-longsi aning aduk dolo.
Lasi alangli sinagog along Jihudi atum pen lapen Arnam aphan kangduk, Jihudi kalidet atum pen lam chethanlo; lapen arnivangta hithi adim, hadak kevang amonit atum penta lam chethanlo.

Epikurian pu isi asong lapen Stoik pu athek-kere atumta alangli pen lam chedanlo. Halatum angbong manene atum arjulo, “La kesoibok abang kopisi kepumati?” Akaprek atum thakdunlo, “Alangli kopine akaprek arnam atum alamsi kepubon.” Jisu lapen alangli kethi pen kethur alamjirsi Pol thanlo apotsi halatum lapuson pulo.
Lasi halatum Pol aphan Areopagas pu rongsopi amei along ponsi pulo, “La Nangli kethanmi alam kopima, la nelitum kechinijisi ning hang-lo.
Nelitum karjulongle pinlang alamsi nangli nelitum aphan thanlo. Lasi lahei hei alam athe kopima, la kechinipamejisi nelitum ninghang-lo.”
Pima Athens arongsopi asor lapen hadak kedo akaprek adet amonit atum anta akemi kemi alamsi kethanji lapen akemi kemi alam karjudunloksi apor kepadamji aning hang-lo.
Pol Areopagas amei angbong arjapthersi pulo, “Athens kedo akorte marli atum! Neli thek-long-lo, nanglitum kadokave alam anat setta dhoromipik-lo.

Pima neli nanglitum arongsopi angbong kedam kevang ahut nanglitum kangduk amar hei hei aphan langcharsi isi adovan thek-long-lo. Halabangso adovan athak ‘KECHININEDET ARNAM APHAN’ pu alam ketok dolo. Tangte nanglitum chininedet setta la aphan ingduk ardomlo, labangso alamsi non neli nanglitum aphan thanpo.
Pirthe lapen labangso athak kedo amar an kepinchong a-Arnam helo sining lapen pirthe a-Hemphulo. Alangli ke monit atum kekim akardom ahem thepi kangthir-heihei arlo dode.
Lapen alangli kopine amar nangjilang apotsi monit atum alangliphan ruthailo, lapu kali. Pima alangli methangsi kadokave amonit aphan apran lapen achethe lapen kadokave amar piverlo.

Inut amonit pensi alangli monit akhei an paplang-lo, lapen alangli halatum aphan pirthe adang padothip-lo. Alangli halatum aphan aphrang pen athikpet apor hei hei thikpilo, lapen halatum kedoji adim ahoi hei heita thik-lo.
Monit atum Arnam aphan nangji lapen aning kethe dosi alangliphan ri pen longji pu mathajimene pu aphansi alangli la klemlo. Bonta alangli ke ilitum abangphutin pen heloving-lo, lapu kali.
Atheke komane abang kepu asonthotsi,
‘Alangli pen ajoksi ili reng-lo,
chetevarlo lapen dobomlo.’
Lake nanglitum angbong manene lunjir ketok atum kepu asonthot-lo,
‘Ilitumta alangli somar atumlo.’
Ilitumke Arnam asomar atumlo apotsi, Arnam ke monit atum amethang abidi pen lapen agian pen keselam aser, kalite arup, kalite a-arlong akumlin asonthak thak-lo pu matha nangnelo.
Hako ahut ke monit atum Arnam aphan akechinine alam Arnam mathathedet-lo setta nonke kadokave adim kedo amonit atum an kehingno akam hei hei pen aning kecheruijisi alangli hukum pilo.

Pima alangli kangvaitang amonit inut pen ajok alangli pirthe adang aphan athikpet pen kangsaiji aphan isi arni pathiktang-lo. Alangli halabangso amonit aphan kethi pen pathursi kadokave amonit aphan labangso alam aporman pitang-lo.”
Kethi pen kethur alam Pol keningje arjulongsi manene atum alangliphan ingnekchoilo. Bonta anut kaprek atum pulo, “Nelitum labangso alam nangli pen arjuthu ingtungduk lang.”
Ansi Pol halatum angbong pen damjuilo.
Bonta manene amonit atum alangli long chelangdunsi kroilo. Halatum angbong Dionisias pu inut Areopagas amei amonit, Damaris pu inut arloso lapen akaprek penang amonit atumta chelangdunsi kroilo.
Labangso aphi Pol Athens arongsopi otekangsi Korinth arongsopi damlo.

Hadak alangli Akuila pu inut Jihudi amonit pen chetong-lo. Alangli ke Pontas adetsi amahang thek-lo. Alangli amethang apiso, Prisilla pen pen Itali adet pen vangmirak-lang. Pima Jihudi atum an Rom arongsopi pen dam nangji pusi Klodias Recho hukum pilo. Pol halatum pen kechetongjisi damlo,
lapen alangli halatum pen dorap rap lapen klem rap rap-lo. Pima alanglita halatum asonthak thak ok-reng akamsi klemlo.
Alangli Sabbath Arnitinta sinagog arlo lam thansi Jihudi lapen Grik atum aphan kepakroiji bor-ilo.
Bonta Silas lapen Timothi Masedonia adet pen hadak nangkele ahut Pol Birta Keme kepachethang-loksi apor padamlo. Jisu helo Khristolo pusi alangli Jihudi atum aphan haki pilo.

Bonta Jihudi atum Pol aphan khamkhelo lapen pinremlo. Lasi Pol amethang ape chehejirsi halatum aphan pulo, “Nanglitum avi nanglitum methang aphuthak padonang! Lake neli dai ave! Non pen apara neli Jihudi kalidet atum alongsi dampo.”
Lasi alangli halatum aphan otekangsi Taitas Jemtas pu inut Jihudi kalidet ahem do damlo. Labangso amonit ke Arnam aphan kangduk abang-lo, lapen alangli hem ke sinagog adungsi dolo.
Bonta sinagog ahemphu, Krispas lapen alangli hem amonit atum an Hemphu aphan kroilo; lapen Korinth asor ake-ongpi atum alangli kethan alam arjudunsi kroilo lapen baptisom enlo.
Ningve isi Pol ning arjan thek-long-lo. Ning arjan along Hemphu alangliphan pulo, “Phereri, nang lam thanvernon lapen orinon,
pima ne nanglong do. Badu amonitta nangphan pasung un-edetji, pima labangso arongsopi angbong nemethang amonit do-o.”
Lasi Pol hadak ningkan isi ra ebeng an dosi monit atum aphan Arnam alam thanbomlo.
Gallio aphan Akaia adet a-Govornor batdet aphi, Jihudi atum aning isipetpen Pol aphan vangpak-lo, lapen alangliphan nepsi Kangsai anghoi angno ponlo.
Halatum pulo, “Aronre abidi pen Arnam aphan kepangdukjisi labangso amonit ke, monit atum aphan kepakroiji bor-ibomlo!”
Pol ningjeji dok dok ahut Gallio Jihudi atum aphan pulo, “Kopine kehingnodak, kalite kechokche akam apotsi neli ingsai nangji pu asonte neli nanglitum alam karjuji athe doji apot-lo, Jihudi atum!
Bonta nonke lam hei hei, amen hei hei lapen nanglitum methang aron alam chot apotsi, lake nanglitum methangle chingsaidamnon. Neli lason alam ke ingsaise.”
Ansi alangli halatum aphan kangsai anghoi angno pen padamjuilo.
Hala kadokave atum Sosthenes pu sinagog ahemphu aphan nepsi kangsai anghoi angno chok-lo. Bonta Gallio-ke labangso alam aphan thangta mathathedet-lo.

Pol hadak kekroitang atum along penang arni dolo. Ansi alangli hala-tum pen chepadisi telongpi pen Siria adet kedamji aphan barlo. Prisilla lapen Akuillata alangli long dunlo. Alangli Senkiria arongsopi pen barbe ako hadak achu chingtip-lo, pima alangli aphrang pen aseme dolo.
Ansi alanglitum Ephesas arongsopi nanglelo. Pol hadak Prisilla lapen Akuilla aphan otekangbup-lo. Hadak alangli sinagog arlo dunsi Jihudi atum pen lam chethanlo.
Lapen penangbak arni hadak kedoji aphan monit atum alangliphan choningrilo, bonta alangli kroikredet-lo.
Alangli halatum pen chepadisi pulo, “Jongsi Arnam aning hang tangte, neli nanglitum along vangthujilang.” Ansi alangli telongpi chethapsi Ephesas arongsopi pen damlo.
Alangli Sijeria arongsopi nanglesi Jerusalem Arongsopi damlo, lapen hadak mondoli atum pen kardom chepisi Antiok arongsopi damlo.
Hadak penang arni dodet aphi alangli hadak pen damlo lapen Galasia adet lapen Phrigia adet arong arong damsi kekroitang atum akekroi pathirlo.
Halabangso ahut Apollos pu inut Alekjendria arongsopisi amahang kethek a-Jihudi Ephesas arongsopi vang-lo. Alangli inut lam ningje thekser lapen hastro alam kechinipame abang-lo.
Alangli Hemphu atovar charlitang-lo, lapen athikpetsi Jisu alamjir monit atum aphan thanbomlo. Bonta alangli Jon abaptisomsi chinichot-lang.

Alangli phereredetsi sinagog arlo lam kethanji pangcheng-lo. Bonta Prisilla lapen Akuilla alangli kethan alam arjudun longsi alangliphan amethang ahem cheponlo, lapen alangliphan athikpetsi Arnam atovar than pamelo.

Ansi Apollo Grik adet kedamji aning hang-lo. Lasi Ephesas arongsopi kedo kekroitang atum alangliphan rapdunlo. Alanglitum Grik adet kedo kekroitang atum aphan loh toksi alangliphan chak asonte mepar pusi choningrilo. Apollos hadak lesi, Arnam akangjinso pen ajok kekroi atum alangli pen akerap long-olo.
Pima alangli rat angno Jihudi atum pen jasemet lam chedansi, lapen Jisu helo Khristolo pu hastro pen aporman paklangsi halatum aphan paremlo.
Apollos Korinth arongsopi kedo un ahut Pol heloving adet vurdamsi Ephesas arongsopi vang-lo. Hadak alangli sangho penang atum pen chetong-lo,
lapen alangli halatum aphan arjulo, “Nanglitum kekroi ahut Karjong Kangthir long-loma?”
Halatum thakdunsi pulo, “Longlelang, Karjong Kangthir do puke nelitum arjuta arjulonglelang!”
Pol halatum aphan arjulo, “Tangte nanglitum kopi abaptisomsi enlo?”
Halatum thakdunsi pulo, “Jon abaptisom.”
Pol Pulo, “Jon ke pap pen ning kecherui abaptisomsi pilo; lapen alangli phi kevangji abang aphansi kroi masi pusi Jon Baptist Israel amonit atum aphan thanlo. Halabangso abang ke Jisu helo.”
Labangso alam arjulongsi halatum aphan Hemphu Jisu amen pen baptisom pilo.
Pol halatum aphuthak ari batsi halatum aphuthak Karjong Kangthir hirlo. Ansi halatum adet kaprek kaprek alam pen keningjeji pangcheng-lo, lapen Arnam alam pachethang-lo.
Halatum kadokave pinso amonit bang krehini anbak dolo.
Pol sinagog along dunsi chiklo jonthom anta phereredet pen lam thanlo, lapen monit atum pen lam chedansi halatum aphan Arnam a-Rat alamjir kepakroiji bor-ilo.

Bonta halatum angbong manene atum aning chepangtangsi kroikredet-lo; lapen rat angnosi Hemphu a-Tovar aphan pinremlo. Lasi Pol halatum aphan otekangsi kekroitang atum cheponlo, lapen Tirannas pu lam kethan ahem along arnivangta lam thanlo.
Lasonsi alangli ningkan hini anta klemverlo. Labangso pen ajok Asia adet kedo atum an, Jihudi lapen Jihudi kalidet atumta Hemphu alam arjulong-lo.
Arnam Pol pen ajok akemang-humemepik akam hei hei klembomlo.
Lasi Pol ke-en apoho lapen apevenso hei hei anchot setta keso atum along ponsi halatum akeso melo, lapen karjong langno atum halatum pen barlo.

Bithe bitha adim damsi karjong langno kephlungbom a-Jihudi penang atumta Hemphu Jisu amen pen karjong langno atum aphan kephlungji bor-ilo. Halatum karjong langno atum aphan pulo, “Pol kethanbom a-Jisu amen pen ne nangtum aphan hukum pilo.”
Seba pu Jihudi atum akurusar Kethenei asopo bangthroksi atumsi lason klembomlo.
Bonta hala karjong langno halatum aphan pulo, “Ne Jisu aphan chini, lapen ne Pol aphanta chini; bonta nangtum ke komat-lo?”
Ansi hala karjong langno kepho abang halatum athak chonkrap-lo, lapen halatum kadokave aphan haidet-lo. Lasi halatum areng solo lapen areng angsesi halabangso ahem pen kat-lo.
Ephesas arongsopi kedo a-Jihudi atum lapen Jihudi kalidet atum anta labangso alam arju longsi pherehurlo, lapen Hemphu Jisu anong pathemuchot-lo.
Ansi kekroi-tang penang atum rat angno vangsi amethang methang keklemtang, akehingno akam an chethanlo.
Maya Kanghoithek ake-ongpi atumta aloh athui an pangrumpetsi kadokave amonit angno me phrinlo. Halatum aloh an anam lakhapetsi rup atangka suri phokep an pleng-lo.
Lasonsi Hemphu alam chethang ponbomlo, lapen ajakongta theponbomlo.
Lahei hei plangdet aphi Pol Masedonia lapen Grik adet angbong vurponsi Jerusalem arongsopi kedamji mathalo. Alangli pulo, “Hadak damdet aphi ne Rom arongsopita langdamvek nangji.”
Lasi alangli amethang ari asangho atum angbong pen Timothi lapen Erastas aphan Masedonia adet toilo, lapen alangli methang ke Asia adetsi penang arni dobomlo.
Labangso ahutsi Hemphu a-Tovar alam pen apot Ephesas arongsopi angbong huripik-lo.
Pima Demetrias pu inut Abeni rup pensi Artemis pu arnampi akardom ahemthepi a-arjan selamlo, lapen labangso pen ajok beni atum aphan ale palong-olo.
Lasi alangli halatum lapen lason keklem atum aphan pangrumpetsi pulo, “Komarli atum! Labangso akam pen ilitum ale long-olo, lake nanglitum chinihurlo.

Nonke nanglitum la Pol keklembom akam thek-longhurlo, lapen arjulonghurlo. Monit atum keselamchot a-arnam hei hei ke arnam kali binong pusi alangli pulo. Lapusonsi alangli Ephesas asor atum aphanchot kali, bonta Asia adet ongdung amonit atum aphanta pakroisi ilitum angbong pen terek ponlo.

Lake kepherememe alamlo, atheke, monit atum ilitum akam hingno pusi pupo. La anchotta kali, la thepik arnampi, Artemis akardom ahemthepita thangta kalidet cheplangpo, lapen la Asia adet lapen pirthe adang amonit an kangdukhur arnampi anong ketheta avedetpo.”
Armu atum labangso alam arjulongsi jasemet aning thi-lo, lapen hangjo josi pulo, “Ephesas a-Artemis ke thepik binong!”

Rongsopi adang an huripik-lo. Ansi monit atum Gaias lapen Aristarkhas pu Masedonia adet amonit banghini aphan nepsi mei ahem along ponserak rak-lo. La Gaias lapen Aristarkhas ke Pol bithe bitha kedam ahut kejalang dun atumlo.
Pol amethangsi rat angno kedamji aning hang-lo; bonta kekroitang atum alangliphan khang-lo.
Halabangso alongri keja atum angbong penang atum ke Pol ajirpolo. Halatum Pol along monit toisi mei ahem along cheklangdunri pusi choningrilo.

Ansi mei along kechingrum amonit atum alam chetontedetsi huriseilo. Manene atum ke eson alam pulo lapen akaprek atum ke ason kaprek alam pusi hangjolo, pima halatum angbong ake-ongpi atum ke, hadak kopi apotsi chingrumloma, lata chininelo.

Jihudi atum Alekjendar aphan rat angno paparjap-lo apotsi manene atum ke Alekjendar aphansi adai kedo abang tinkok-lo. Ansi Alekjendar monit atum aphan kepadoklipjisi ari pen asin paklang-lo, lapen kechethakdunji pangcheng-lo.
Bonta alangli ke Jihudi amonit-lo pu chinisi monit atum aphrang asonthak thaksi porphai hini anbak hangjo josi pulo, “Ephesas a-Artemis ke thepik binong!”

Aphisi rongsopi amei aloh ketok abang halatum aphan padoklipsi pulo, “Ephesas kedo akortemarli atum! Ephesas arongsopi helo Artemis thepi akardom ahemthepi lapen sining pen nangkeklo a-arlong kangthir aphan kerai abang-lo, lake kechinine abang matsi dolangma?
Lahei hei alam ahok-he puke baduta pu-un-e. Lasi nanglitum doklip nangji lapen kematha pameme penke klem nangnelo.
Labangso amonit atum kardomhemthepi amar thangta inghuhe lapen ilitum a-arnampi aphanta thangta pinremre setta nanglitum alanglitum aphan ladak vantang-lo.
Demetrias lapen alangliphan keklempi atum jongsi komane abang aphan adai ketinji alam do tangte, lake kangsai atum do lapen det ahemphu atumta do. Alanglitum hadak-le pachingsainang.
Bonta nanglitum jongsi la aparta kopine kechoningriji alam do tangte, lake kai ateng, rat atum ameisi parai unji.
Pima pini kehurisei apot ilitum aphan adai ketinmeme alam do: Labangso akehurisei athe thangta avedet apotsi ilitum chethak dun atovar avedetji.”
La pudetsi alangli mei pachekak-lo.
Halabangso akehurisei hamdet aphi Pol kekroitang atum aphan hangpetsi halatum aphan ning kepathe alam pulo, lapen halatum pen chepadisi Masedonia adet kedamji aphan barlo.
Alangli halabangso alongri bithe bitha adim damsi monit atum aphan penang alam pen aning pathelo. Ansi alangli Grik adet vang-lo.

Hadak alangli chiklo jonthom an dolo. Ansi hadak pen Siria adet telongpi pen kedamji dok dok ahut, Jihudi atum alangliphan kepathiji abidi rilo pu alangli chinilo. Lasi alangli Masedonia adet vurponsi kechevoiji pathik-lo.
Berea arongsopi asor, Pirhas asopo Sopater, Thessalonika asor Aristar-khas lapen Sekundas, Derbe asor Gaias, Asia adet amonit, Taikikas lapen Trophimas lapen Timothi alangli long dunlo.
Alanglitum dam patenosi Troas arongsopi along nelitum aphan inghongphrong-lo.

Thap kave ahim Achojun a-Meipi aphi nelitum te-longpi chethapsi Philipi arongsopi pen barlo, lapen nipho aphi nelitum Troas arongsopi lesi alanglitum pen chetong-lo. Hadak nelitum ni throksi an dokok-lo.

Hithi arui aphrangsi arni nelitum him kebengji aphansi chingrumpet-lo. Pol monit atum aphan lam thanlo, lapen alangli puthot arni adapprang kedamji aphan pathiktang-lo apotsi alangli ajo achitim ahut anta lam thanlo.
Angsong angdeng, nelitum kechingrum along melur do-olo;

Pol lam kethan un ahut Eutikhas pu inut ariso hem anghapso along ingnisi mek-ilo. Aphisi alangli amek jang-lotsi, hem angsong kethom angdeng pen longle athak nangklolo. Halatum alangliphan kerungdam ahut ke alangli thi-ettang-lo.
Bonta Pol angsong pen nanghirsi lapen abang arbaksi pulo, “Nanglitum mathari, pima alangli chethe dolang!”
Ansi alangli angsong angdeng che-damthulo lapen him bengsi halatum la cholo. Alangli halatum pen adap arni kevang ahut anta lam chethanlo. Ansi alangli hadak pen damlo.
Halatum halabangso ariso aphan akerengsi ahem ponlo, lapen halatum aning rengme-olo.
Nelitum telong along dam patenosi telongpi pen arongsopi damlo. Hadak nelitum Pol aphan telongpi kepachethapjisi mathalo, pima alangli hadak anke akeng pen kevangjisi pathik-lo.
Alangli Asos arongsopi along nelitum pen chetongsi nelitum alangliphan telongpi pachethap-lo, lapen Mitailen arongsopi damlo.

Ansi nelitum telongpi chethapsi hadak pen barlo lapen puthot arni Kaios alanglom akung nanglelo. Puthot arni nelitum Samos alanglom akung lelo, lapen halabangso pen puthot arnithu nelitum Miletas arongsopi nanglelo.
Pol Asia adet apor kepadamdedetji aphansi Ephesas arongsopi kevur ponpedetjisi pathik-lo. Pima alangli unte pentakost Arni Jerusalem kepaleji aphansi kedam pachingkhanlo.
Miletas pen Pol Ephesas arongsopi amondoli mate kroi-asong akesar atum aphan pahangdamlo.
Alanglitum nanglesi Pol alanglitum aphan pulo, “Neli Asia adet neli kengpak kebicheng arni penta neli nanglitum angbong kopusonsi dobomloma, lake nanglitum chinilo.
Jihudi atum abidi langno pen neliphan pasung pik-lo setta neli ning chepabihek pen lapen mekri-mek-lang pen Hemphu akam klempibomlo.
Neli nanglitum aphan rat angno lapen nanglitum ahem adon adon damsi kethan ahut, nanglitum aphan ale kedoji alam esonnatta khangkhedetsi than-pet-lo, lake nanglitum chinilo.
Amethang methang apap pen aning chiruisi Arnam adung kevangji lapen e-Hemphu Jisu aphan kepakroiji aphansi neli Jihudi atum lapen Jihudi kalidet atum aphanta than pachinibomlo.
Lapen nonke, mathanon, neli Karjong Kangthir ahukum longsi, Jeru-salem dampo. Hadak neliphan kopi pi plangpone, lake neli chininedet-lo.
Neli eson alamsi chinichot-lo, atheke phatek lapen kesung hei hei neliphan inghongphrong-lo pusi rongsopitin alongta Karjong Kangthir neliphan pachinilo.
