Bonta neli jongsi neli keklem nangji akam klem patang-lote, lapen Hemphu Jisu neliphan kepek akam, atheke Arnam akangjinso a-Birta Keme kepachethang akam klem papleng unlote, la neli methang apran ke neliphan thangta kali pusi neli mathalo.
“Neli nanglitum kadokave angbong damsi Arnam a-Rat alam than pachethangtang-lo. Lapen nonke neli chinilo, non pen apara nanglitum baduta neliphan nethek-longledetpo.
Lasi pini neli nanglitum aphan thandak-lo: nanglitum angbong mane abang jongsi virdet-lo tangte, lake neli dai avelo.
Pima Arnam aning kehang alam an neli esonnat alamta khangkhedetsi nanglitum aphan than-pet-lo.

Nanglitum methang methang lapen mondoli amonit atum an aphan langpamenon. Halatum aphan kepalangji aphansi Karjong Kangthir nanglitum aphan nangbattang-lo. La Arnam amethang avi pen kenamtang amondoli mate kroi-asong aphan japamenon.
Neli chinilo, neli damjui aphi ajat kelangno amahar atum nanglitum angbong vangsi labangso asong aphan un an phangnoji.
Nanglitum methang angbong penta penang amonit atum thursi halatum amethang methang aphi kepadunji aphan kekroitang atum aphan chobei alam thanji.
Tangte nanglitum cherenon! Nanglitum chemathanon, neli ningkan kethom anta arnivang ajo-anerlota mekri mek-lang pen nanglitum aphan than pacheretoilo.

“Lapen nonke neli nanglitum aphan Hemphu arideng lapen alangli akangjinso alam angbongsi hodailo. Lake nanglitum a-ot adur kepameji lapen Arnam amonit atum an kechepahemphuji ahirjume nanglitum aphanta kechepahemphuji ajakong do.
Neli badu amonit arup kalite aser, kalite ape-ari konkedet-lo.
Neli nelimethang ari pen kam klemsi neli lapen neli ri asangho atum akenangji amar anta long-lo, lake nanglitum chinihurlo.

Neli keklem akam hei hei pen ajok, ilitum kam klem chepaduksi jakong kekom atum aphan rapdun nangji pu alam nanglitum aphan paklang-lo. Lapen Hemphu Jisu amethang kepu alam nanglitum chematha nangji, atheke alangli pulo, ‘Kelong apar kepi ahirjume domu.’ ”
Pol labangso alam pudetsi hala kadokave atum pen akengphu patongruisi Arnam ardomlo.
Hala-tum Pol achethok bamsi lapen kechinghonpik pen alangliphan ingjupsi kadokaveta chirulo.
Pima halatum alangliphan puthot thek-longledetpo pu Pol kepu alam apot halatum aning aduk dopik-lo. Ansi halatum alangliphan telongpi along anta thondunlo.
Nelitum halatum pen chepa-didetsi damlo. Ansi telongpi pen kekengset atovar damsi nelitum Kos alanglom lelo. Puthot arni nelitum Rods alanglom lelo, lapen hadak pen damthusi Patara lelo.
Hadak nelitum Phinis atum adet kedamji atelongpi phodunlo. Lasi nelitum telongpi chethapsi hadak pen barlo.

Nelitum Saipras pu alanglompi thek-longchit an nangkele ahut telongpi Saipras anitur anat tevarsi Siria adet anat damlo. Ansi nelitum Tair arongsopi nanglelo, pima hadak halabangso atelongpi amar otekang-lo.
Hadak kekroitang penang atum aphan nelitum chetongsi halatum along erui an dodunlo. Halatum Karjong pen jakong longsi Pol aphan pulo, “Nangli Jerusalem damri.”

Bonta hadak kedo nangji arni an choksi nelitum hadak pen barlo. Halatum do-an, apiso lapen asomar atum pen pen nelitum aphan rongsopi angtan an nethon dunsi, talo akung nelitum kadokave kengphu patongruisi Arnam ardomlo.
Ansi nelitum halatum pen lahin lahin chepadisi telongpi chethap-lo, lapen halatumta amethang ahem chedamlo.
Nelitum Tair arongsopi pen dam-thusi Tolemais pu arongsopi an telongpi pen lelo. Hadak kekroitang atum pen nelitum kardom chepilo, lapen halatum along arni isi dokok-lo.

Puthot arni nelitum hadak pen barsi Sijeria arongsopi lelo, lapen hadak nelitum Philip pu inut Birta Keme kepachethang abang ahem dodamlo. Alangli ke Jerusalem amondoli mate kroi-asong along kam kepacherapdunji aphan kangvaitang bangthroksi angbong pen inut abang-lo.
Alangli asopi bangphli dolo. Halatum okarjang-lang lapen halatum ke Arnam alam kemontri atumlo.
Nelitum hadak penang arni kedo ahut, Agabas pu inut Arnam alam kemontri abang Judia adet pen vang-lo.

Alangli nelitum along vang-lo, lapen Pol avamkok ensi amethang akeng lapen ari chingnangsi pulo, “Karjong Kangthir lasonsi pulo, Jerusalem along Jihudi atum labangso avamkok ahemphu aphan lason ingnangsi Jihudi kalidet atum arideng hodaiji.”
Labangso alam arjulongsi, nelitum lapen hadak kedo amonit atum Pol aphan Jerusalem dam nangnelo pusi choningrilo.

Bonta alangli nangthak-dunsi pulo, “Nanglitum lason kechiru lapen neli ning aduk kepi athe kopima? Pima Jerusalem along neliphan kangnangji aphan neli chesik-lo, lapu anchot kali, bonta Hemphu Jisu aphan ajok hadak neli kethiji aphan anta chesik-lo.”
Alangli nelitum alam kekroiji aning hanghedet-lo, lasi nelitum alangliphan kepakroiji bor-i-edetsi pulo, “Hemphu aning kehangle paplengnang.”
Hadak nelitum penang arni padamdet aphi nelitum ahormu kedo an chesiksi Jerusalem kedamji aphan barlo.

Sijeria pen kevang, sangho penang atumta nelitum along nangdunlo. Saipras alanglom along kedo Manason pu abang ahem halatum nethondunlo. Alangli hem kedoji aphansi nelitum aphrang pen pathik-lo. Manason ke sangho keplang paphrangcheng atum angbong pen inut-lo. Alangli nelitum aphan chak-lo.
Nelitum Jerusalem nanglesi kekroitang atum aning arong pen nelitum aphan chak-lo.
Puthot arni Pol lapen nelitum kadokave Jems along damlo. Hadak mondoli akesar atum anta dopet-lo.
Pol halatum pen kardom chepilo, lapen alangli keklem akam pen ajok Arnam Jihudi kalidet atum angbong keklem alam an halatum aphan thanpet-lo.

Hala-tum labangso alam arjulongsi Arnam anong pathelo. Ansi halatum Pol aphan pulo, “ Korte Pol, Jihudi atum angbongta kekroi atum suri suri dolo, lapen halatum kadokaveta Aron aphan chemathapik-lo, lake nangli thek-long-lo.

Bonta Moses Aron kroinangne, atheke halatum amethang asopo atum aphan reng-rot pi nangne lapen Jihudi atum aron-atang hei hei kroi nangnelo pusi nangli hala Jihudi kalidet atum adet angbong kedo a-Jihudi atum aphan thanlo pusi latum arjulong-lo.
Nangli ladak vangtang-lo pu halatum jonghe setta arjulongji. Tangte ilitum kopisi klem apot-loma?
Nelitum nangliphan kethan asonthot-le nangli klemnon. Ladak seme kedengtang amonit bangphli do.

Nangli latum along dunra, latum pen pen nangmethang chepangthir damnon, lapen latum achu kechesoiji anam pinon. Anke latum achu chesoi thekpo. Lasonsi nangliphan kebok alam eson natta ahok kali, bonta nanglike ahokpetsi Moses Aron kroibomlo pu kadokave atum chinipo.

Bonta Jihudi kalidet atum angbong pen kekroitang atum aphan ke loh toksi ilitum keparaitang alam, atheke Sekarkli amar, avi lapen kokthat api a-ok chonangne lapen beisa akam klemkledet nangji pusi thanlo.”

Lasi Pol halabangso amonit atum aphan ponsi puthot arni halatum pen pen chepangthirlo. Ansi alangli Kardomhemthepi Kangthir arlo dunlo, lapen halatum abangphutin kechepangthir arni komantu jutjima, lapen kopi a-arnisi halatum abang-phutin aphan ajok athok thok nangjima, lahei hei alam thandunlo.
Bonta ni throksi jutji dok dok ahut Asia adet pen kevang a-Jihudi atum Pol aphan Kardomhemthepi arlo thek-long-lo. Halatum armu atum aphan chorung chojarsi Pol aphan panep-lo,

lapen halatum hangjosi pulo, “Israel amonit atum, nelitum aphan nerap dunnon! Bithe bitha adim damsi ilitum amonit atum aphan, Moses Aron lapen la Kardomhemthepi Kangthir kephangnodakji alam kadokave atum aphan kethan abang labangso amonit helo. Lapen nonke alangli Jihudi kalidet amonit atum aphanta Kardomhemthepi arlo vansi la kangthir adim pahijimlo.”
(Pima halabangso aphrang, rongsopi angbong Pol along Ephesas asor, Trophimas aphan halatum thek-long-lo. Lasi Pol alangliphan Kardomhemthepi arlo ponlo pu halatum mathasi labangso alam pulo.)

Rongsopi adang an huriseilo, lapen monit atum bithe bitha pen nangkat phro phrosi Pol aphan nep-lo, lapen alangliphan Kardom a-Hemthepi arlo pen ingtan chethurponlo. Hala mamat Kardom a-Hemthepi anghap inghap-et-lo.
Halatum alangliphan kepathijisi bor-ilo. Bonta Jerusalem angbong huriseilo pu alam halabangso ahut mamat Chedanbang bang suri isi ahemphu aphan thandamlo.

Hala mamat alangli chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu atum aphan, lapen chedanbang atum aphan ponsi rat atum anglum vang-lo. Armu atum alangliphan lapen chedanbang atum aphan thek-longsi Pol aphan kechok obup-lo.

Chedanbang ahemphu abang Pol adung vangsi alangliphan nepchek-lo, lapen ingchin ari rini pen Pol aphan kekokji ahukum pilo. Ansi alangli arjulo, “Labangso amonit komatma, lapen alangli kopi akam klemtang-loma?”

Armu atum hangjosi, manene atum ke eson alam thanlo, lapen akaprek atum ke ason kaprek alam thanlo. Lasi kehorisei apot ahok alam chini un-edetsi alangli Pol aphan chedanbang atum ahem arlo keponji ahukum pilo.
Pol don don an kele ahut armu atum jakong pen kethur pangtang pik-lo apotsi chedanbang atum alangliphan rungponrin nangkok-lo.
Armu atum an alangli phi phi dunlo lapen hangjo josi pulo, “Alangliphan pathinon!”
Chedanbang atum Pol aphan chedanbang ahem arlo keponji dok dok ahut Pol chedanbang bang suri ahemphu aphan pulo, “Neli nangliphan kopine alam arjulongjima?”
Chedanbang ahemphu abang pulo, “Nangli Grik alam ningjethekma?
Labangso aphrangke inut Ijip adet amonit det kephangnodakji aphan thursi bang suri phli amonit aphan kejejangtang ajo japonlo. Tangte nanglike halabangso abang kalima?”

Pol thakdunsi pulo, “Neli ke Jihudi amonit-lo, lapen Silisia adet Tarsas arongsopi si neli mahang thek-lo. Neli ke la anong kethedung arongsopi amonit-lo. Neli armu aphan kepuji ahukum neli pitha. Neli nangliphan kechoningri alam lahelo.”
Chedanbang ahemphu abang alangliphan hukum pilo, lasi Pol don don athak arjapsi armu atum aphan kepadoklipjisi ari pen asin paklang-lo. Halatum doklip-lo lapen Pol Ibri alam pen kepuji pangcheng-lo:
“Korte marli, lapen po marli atum, non neli kechethakdunji alam arjutha!”
Alangli halatum aphan Ibri alam pen kepu arjulongsi halatum doklip muchot-lo. Ansi Pol puthulo:

“Neli ke Jihudi amonit-lo, lapen Silisia adet Tarsas arongsopisi neli mahang thek-lo. Bonta neli Jerusalem arongsopi alongsi the-ding-lo lapen Gamalielsi neliphan athikpet pen ephusar atum Aron nelithanpet-lo. Pini ladak kedo, nanglitum abangphutin asonthotsi nelita Arnam aphan matha-elo.
Labangso atovar kekroi atum aphan ne cheneksi pathilot anta klemlo, lapen pinso, arloso atum aphanta nepsi phatek beng-lo.

Ne ahok alamsi thanlo, lake Kurusar Kethenei abang lapen Jihudi Ameipi amonit atum anta haki nangchodun un. Alanglitum Damaskas arongsopi kedo a-Jihudi atum aphan ketok aloh neli ponsi hadak kedo, labangso amonit atum aphan kenepji, kekokji lapen aduk kepiji aphan neli latum aphan Jerusalem kevanjisi neli hadak damlo.”
“Neli damsi Damaskas arongsopi leji dokdok ahut, nerlo chitim apor malom sining pen men men kethe-ang atur vangsi nedung bithe bitha turphlak-lo.
Neli longle athak krepbup-lo, lapen neliphan kepu ase neli arjulong-lo, ‘Sol, Sol! Nang kopi apotsi nephan chenek-loma?’
Ne arjudunlo, ‘Nangli komatma, Hemphu?’ Hemphu nephan pulo, ‘Neke Najareth a-Jisulo, hala nang kechenekbom abang-lo.’
Neri asangho atumta halabangso akethe-ang atur thek-long-lo, bonta halatum ke nephan kepu ase arjulongledet-lo.
Neli arjudunlo, ‘Neli kopisi klem nangjima, Hemphu?’ Hemphu neliphan pulo, ‘Thurra Damaskas damnon. Nang keklem nangji akam Arnam kopi pi pathiktang-loma, lake hadaksi nangphan thanpetpo.’
Halabangso akethe-ang atur neliphan keturphlak pen ajok nelimek checharchedet-lo. Lasi neliri-asangho atum neliphan neri-ponsi Damaskas arongsopi neliponlo.
“Halabangso arongsopi along Ananias pu inut dhoromi amonit dolo. Alangli ke ilitum Aron kekroi thirklong abang-lo lapen hadak kedo a-Jihudi atum an alangliphan aman pi-olo.
Alangli nedung vangsi arjaptherlo, lapen pulo, ‘Korte, Pol, nangli mek checharthunon!’ Hala mamat nelimek checharthulo, lapen neli alangliphan langding-lo.
Ansi alangli pulo, ‘Nangli ephusar atum a-Arnam aning kehang alam kechiniji, Arnam Aban, dhoromi abang aphan kethek-longji lapen alangli kepu ase karjulongji aphansi Arnam nangliphan ingvaitang-lo.
Pima nangli kethek-longtang lapen karjulongtang alam an kadokave amonit aphan kethanji aphan nangli alangli haki plangji,
lapen nonke nangli kopisi paderbom nangjilangma! Thurra, baptisom ennon, lapen alangliphan ardombomra nangli pap hei hei chepakak-etnon!’
“Ansi neli Jerusalem chevoithulo, lapen ne Kardomhemthepi arlo Arnam kardom ahut ning arjan thek-long-lo.
Neli ning arjan along neli Hemphu aphan thek-long-lo. Hemphu neliphan pulo, ‘Paprapnon! Jerusalem pen barseraknon. Pima nang nelamjir kethan alam ladak kedo amonit atum dengdedetji.’
Neli thakdunsi pulo, ‘Hemphu,’ neli sinagog hei hei along damsi nangliphan kekroi atum aphan nep-lo, phatek beng-lo lapen chok-lo, lake halatum chinihurlo.
Lapen nangli haki keplang abang, Stephan aphan kepathi ahut nelita hadaksi dolo, lapen alangliphan kepathi che-dondunlo, lapen alangliphan kepathi atum ape-ari honpilo!
Ansi Hemphu neliphan pulo, ‘Damnon, pima ne nangphan heloving kedo, Jihudi kalidet atum angbong nangtoipo.’”
Armu atum Pol lapu-an kepu alam ansi arjudunchot-lo; labangso aphi ke halatum ase dotik pen hangsi pulo, “Alangli pen chepahelonon! Alangliphan pathinon! Alangli kereng nangji a-ot ave!”
Halatum jasemet hangjo josi amethang methang ape lapen sangti aduk angsong varlo.

Ansi chedanbang bang suri isi ahemphu abang Pol aphan chedanbang ahem arlo kepaponji ahukum pilo, lapen monit atum kopi apotsi alangliphan la-an hangjo joloma, la kechiniji aphansi alangli amethang aron-aso atum aphan Pol aphan champre abu pen kepachokji ahukum pilo.
Bonta kepachokjisi Pol aphan kekokhet ahut, Pol hadak karjapther, chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu aphan pulo, “Ado kechiniji aphan ingsaise ako Roman amonit aphan kechokji aron doma?”
Labangso alam arjulongsi chedan-bang bang pharo ahemphu abang hala chedanbang bang suri isi ahemphu aphan thandamsi pulo, “Nangli kopisi keklemloma? Labangso amonit ke Roman amonit-lo.”
Lasi chedanbang bang suri isi ahemphu abang Pol adung vangsi arjulo, “Neliphan nethantha, nangli Roman amonitma?”
Pol thakdunsi pulo, “Kalang.”
Chedanbang bang suri ahemphu abang pulo, “Neli ke tangka pi-o pensi Roman amonit plang-lo.”
Pol thakdunsi pulo, “Bonta neli ke mahang kethek penta Roman amonit-lo.”

Anke alangliphan lam karjuji dok dok amonit atumta hala mamat alangli dung pen dam et-lo. Lapen Chedanbang bang suri isi ahemphu abangta Pol ke Roman amonit-lo pu chinisi lapen alangliphan pakokdet-lo apotsi pherelo.

Jihudi atum Pol aphan kopi apotsi adai tinloma, labangso alam chedanbang bang suri isi ahemphu abang kechini pameji aning hang-lo. Lasi puthot arni alangli Pol aphan kekok ari phlokjok-lo, lapen kurusar kethe atum, lapen Jihudi atum kangsai Ameipi amonit atum an kechingrumji ahukum pilo.
Pol Kangsai-Amei amonit atum aphan langdingsi pulo, “Israel Akorte-marli atum! Pini arni anta neli ke Arnam angno neli Ning-ingthin klar-et pensi dobomlang.”
Ansi Pol angho along kepatengji aphan Anna-nias pu akurusar kethenei abang hala Pol adung karjapphrong atum aphan hukum pilo.

Pol alangliphan thakdunsi pulo, “Oh, Saini kevittang a-arpong! Arnam chenamsi nangphan nangchokpo. Aron ateng pen neliphan kangsaiji aphansi nang hadak ing-nilo, bonta nangmethang ke nephan kepachokji ahukum pisi Aron ingdilo!”
Pol adung kedo amonit atum alangliphan pulo, “Nang kopusi Arnam a-Kurusar kethenei aphan lason alam kepu hailoma?”
Pol thakdunsi pulo, “Alangli kurusar kethenei abang-lo puke neli chininedet-lo, Israel akorte marli atum! Pima ‘rat ahemphu aphan putot-ri pu hastro along ketok do.’”

Armu angbong penang atum ke Pharisi atumlo, lapen akaprek atum ke Saduki atumlo pu chinisi Pol Mei angbong kehang pen pulo, “Israel Akorte marli atum! Neli ke Pharisi amonit-lo, lapen Pharisi atum aso lo. kethitang atum rengthusi thurji pu nening kethe kedo apotsi nephan ladak ne ingsailo!”
Alangli labangso alam pudet aphi Pharisi lapen Saduki atum angbong kechebohongji pangcheng-lo, lapen halatum angbong abe hini dokok-lo.
(Pima Saduki atum ke kethitang atum akethur ave, sining apherangke lapen karjongta ave pusi pulo; bonta Pharisi atum ke la kadokaveta do pusi kroilo.)

Kehangjo ase thethumuchot-lo, lapen Pharisi abe atum angbong pen aron thekser penang atum thursi lam kechedan pen pulo, “Labangso amonit aphan nelitum thang adaita thek-longle. Karjong kalite sining apherangkesi alangliphan kethan binong tahailo!”

Halatum angbong lam chedanseisi huripik-lo apotsi Pol aphan ingsek-ipo pusi chedanbang bang suri isi ahemphu abang pherelo. Lasi alangli chedanbang atum aphan armu atum angbong toisi halatum arideng pen Pol aphan vansi chedanbang ahem arlo kepaponji ahukum pilo.
Halabangso aningve Hemphu Pol adung arjapthersi pulo, “Phereri! Nang ladak Jerusalem along nehaki kepi asonthotsi Rom arongsopi angbongta nehaki pinangji.”
Puthot adap Jihudi penang atum chingvaisi alam pathik-lo. Halatum Pol aphan pathithe tik ke thangta choche, junje pusi semetang-lo.
La kehingno abidi kechepathik atum bang phlikep soselo.
Halatum kurusar kethe atum lapen akesar atum along damsi pulo, “Netum Pol aphan pathithetik ke thangta choche pusi semetang-lo.

Tangte nonke nanglitum lapen Jihudi atum kangsai amei amonit atum Chedanbang bang suri ahemphu along monit toira, nanglitum Pol aphan ansose kangsai pamejisi ning hang-lo apotsi alangliphan nanglitum angno van nangji pule kepalemlem pen pathan damnon. Anke Pol nanglitum adung nanglele ako nelitum alangliphan kepathiji aphan chesikdingpo.”
Bonta Pol angjirpi asopo labangso kepathiktang alam arjulong-lo, lasi alangli chedanbang ahem arlo damsi Pol aphan labangso alam thandamlo.
Ansi Pol chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu inut aphan hangsi pulo, “Labangso ariso aphan chedanbang bang suri ahemphu along pontha. La alangliphan kopine kethanji alam do.”

Ansi alangli halabangso ariso aphan chedanbang bang suri ahemphu adung ponsi pulo, “Hala phatek arlo kedo a-Pol neliphan hangsi labangso ariso aphan nanglidung pontha pusi neliphan choningrilo; pima labangso ariso nangliphan kopine kethanji alam do pusi pulo.”
Chedanbang bang suri ahemphu abang halabangso ariso aphan ari otponsi ihi anat ponlo, lapen arjusi pulo, “Nangli neliphan kethanji alam kopima?”

Halabangso ariso pulo, “Jihudi atum angbong keja atum penap nanglidung vangsi Pol aphan Jihudi atum Kangsai Amei angno vantu pusi nangliphan kechoningriji aphan pathiktang-lo. Kangsai Amei amonit atum Pol aphan ansose kangsai pamejisi aning hang-lo pusi halatum kepalem lem pen nangliphan thanji.

Bonta nangli halatum alam kroiri; pima halatum angbong pinso amonit bangphlikep sose atum ke Pol aphan pathithetik ke thangta choche-junje pusi semetang-lo. Lasi halatum alangliphan kepathiji aphan chepatujoisi tondingji. Non halatum labangso akam keklemjisi chesikding-lo, lapen nangli keparaiji alam aphansi inghongphrong-lo.”
Chedanbang bang suri ahemphu abang halabangso ariso aphan pulo, “Nangli neliphan labangso alam thanlo puke nangli badu aphanta thanri.” Ansi alangli halabangso ariso aphan padamjuilo.

Ansi chedanbang bang suri ahemphu abang hala chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu aphan hukum pisi pulo, “Sijeria arongsopi kedamji aphan akeng pen kedam aron-aso bang pharo hini, losei kardon aron-aso bang throksi kep lapen chir kejor aron-aso bang pharo hini pathiknon, lapen hadak kedamji aphan chesiknon.
Pol kardonponji aphan losei kalite gadha hei hei pathiknon, lapen thang akesung avepin pen alangliphan Felix Govornor akeng-ri ponnon.”
Ansi chedanbang bang suri ahemphu abang loh tok-lo. Alangli ketok lapuson helo:
“Neli Klodias Laisiassi labangso aloh, nangli, Felix govornor akehai aphan tok-lo: Kardom deng-iktha.
Jihudi atum labangso amonit aphan nepsi pathiji dok dok-lo. Halabangso ahut neli chedanbang atum ponsi alangliphan halatum arideng pen pajok-lo. Alangli ke Roman amonit-lo pusi neli arjulong-lo.
Halatum alangliphan adai ketin alamthe neli kechinijisi ning hang-lo; lasi neli alangliphan halatum akangsai amei along ponlo.
Halatum amethang aron kopine alam apotsi alangliphan adai tinlo. Bonta alangli kethi nangji, kalite phatek kedo nangji, lason adai kedo akam ke alangli thangta klemklelo, lake neli thek-long-lo.

Lapen alangliphan kepathiji abidi pathiktang-lo pusi neliphan thanlo; lasi hala mamat neli alangliphan nangli kengri nangketoiji aphansi pathik-lo. Alangliphan adai ketin atum nangli ingnosi alangliphan kebok alam kepaklangji aphan neli hukum pilo.”
Alangli hukum kepi asonthotsi chedanbang atum klemlo. Pol aphan endamsi, halabangso aningve mamat alangliphan Antipatris arongsopi an ponlo.
Puthot arni akeng pen kedam aron-aso atum ke chedanbang ahem along nangchevoilo, bonta Pol along kepadun losei kardon aron-aso atum aphan ke hadaksi otekang-lo.
Ansi halatum Sijeria arongsopi lesi Govornor aphan halabangso aloh pilo, lapen Pol aphan alangli rideng hodailo.
Govornor halabangso aloh porhesi Pol aphan arjulo, “Nangli kolobangso adet amonit-lo?” Ansi Pol ke Silisia adet amonit-lo pu chinisi,
alangli pulo, “Nangliphan adai ketin atum ladak nangle lote neli nangli lam arjupo.” Ansi Pol aphan Herod recho ahem along bidamsi alangliphan honpametu pu ahukum pilo.
Nipho aphi Annanias pu kurusar kethenei abang akesar penang atum aphan lapen Tartullas pu inut a-Ukir cheponsi Sijeria arongsopi damlo, lapen halatum govornor angno Pol aphan kebok alam paklang-lo.
Ansi alangli Pol aphan hangdet-lo, lapen Tartullas Pol aphan lam kebokji pangcheng-lo.
Alangli pulo, “Felix akehai! Nangli pen ajoksi nelitum rengdok rengni pen dolong-lo, lapen nangli kemathamek akam pen ajoksi labangso adet akeme aphan, pinene alam larponbomsi pameponbomlo.
Labangso akam apot nelitum kadokave adimta lapen kaike ahutta ning arong-lo, lapen nangliphan ning aklong pen choro-verlo.
Neli nangli por ke-en-oji ning hanghelo. Lasi neli nangliphan choningrilo, nangli ingjinsora nelitum alam arju iktha.
Labangso amonit ke kesung kevan abang-lo; alangli pirthe adang kedo a-Jihudi atum aphan pahuriseibomlo, lapen alangli helo Najaren pu isi asong aphan keja abang-lo, lake nelitum thek-long-lo.
Alangli Jihudi atum Kardomhemthepi Kangthir kepangthirthejisi bor-ilo. Bonta nelitum alangliphan nepchek-lo.
Bonta chedanbang bang suri ahemphu vangsi alangliphan nelitum angbong pen pon bor-idet-lo.
Nangli alangliphan arjulote, la nelitum alangliphan kebok alam an nangli methangta chinipo.”
Ansi Jihudi atumta la kadokave alam ahok pusi pudunlo.
Ansi govornor Pol aphan asin paklangsi lam paningjetoilo. Lasi Pol pulo, “Nangli labangso arat aphuthak kangsai abang keplang aningkan do-olo; lasi neli nangli ingno ning arong pen chethakdunpo.
Neli Arnam aphan kangdukdamjisi Jerusalem arongsopi kedam arni pen non an ni krehini parpelang, lake nangli methangta chini unji.
Neli Kardomhemthepi arlo komane pen lam kechedan, kalite sinagog along, lapen rongsopi angbong armu aphan lam hoisi kepahurisei, Jihudi atum nethekdunlonglepinlang.
Lapen alanglitum non neliphan kebok alam hei heita ahok pu aporman nangliphan pithekthelo.

Bonta neli nangli ingno eson alam chekrongpo: atheke lahelo, neli halabangso a-Tovar aron atengsi nelitum aphusar atum a-Arnam aphan ingdukverlo. Halatum labangso a-Tovar aphan ke isi kecheprek asong pusi pulo. Bonta Moses Aron along ketok alam an lapen Arnam amontri atum aloh along ketok alam an nelita kroipet-lo.
Halatum Arnam along ning kethe kedo asonthotsi nelita Arnam along ning kethe dolo, atheke dhoromi lapen dhoromime atum anta kethi pen thurji pusi nelita ning kethe dolo.
Lasi neli kaiketa Arnam angno lapen monit atum angnota akelet kavedet pen dosi neli ning ingthin klar-et pen kedoji aphan bor-ilo.
“Ansi Jerusalem arongsopi pen damjui aphi penang aningkan aphisi neli neli methang akhei amonit atum aphan dan atangka kethondamji lapen Arnam aphan athok kethokdamjisi Jerusalem damthulo.
Neli aron ateng pen chepangthirtangdet aphi, lahei hei akam keklem un ahutsi halatum neliphan Kardomhemthepi arlo nethek-long-lo. Hadak neli long armu avelo, lapen hadak thang akehoriseita avelo.
Bonta Asia adet pen kevang manene a-Jihudi atum hadak dolo. Halatum jongsi neliphuthak kopine kebokji alam do tangte halatum methangsi nangli ingno vang-ra neliphan kebok alam paklang nangji apot-lo.
Kalite neli Jihudi atum kangsai amei angno karjap ahut neliphan kopi pi adai long-loma, labangso alam ladak non kedo atum papunang.
Bonta eson alam do tahai, atheke lahelo, neli halatum angbong karjapther ahut neli hangsi pulo, ‘Kethitang atum rengsi thurji pu neli kekroi apotsi pini nanglitum neliphan ingsailo.’ ”
Ansi Felix halabangso a-Tovar alamjir chini pamelo apotsi, alangli kangsai lapu ansi ingtonkoksi pulo, “Mo chedanbang bang suri ahemphu, Laisias nanglelote neli nangli lam ingsaipo.”

Lapen Pol aphan honpametu, bonta alangliphan asapso akejokvan pitu, lapen alangliphan kenangsot ahormu hei hei nangkethon ajirpo atum aphan khangri pusi Felix hala Pol aphan kehon aron-aso bang pharo ahemphu aphan hukum pilo.
Penang arni aphi Felix amethang apiso, Drusilla pen vangsi Pol aphan pahang damlo. Drusillake inut Jihudipilo. Jisu Khristo aphan kekroi alamjir Pol kethan alam Felix arjudunding-lo.

Bonta Pol dhoromi alam, ning kecheber alam lapen non kevangji a-Kangsai Arni alam hei hei kethan ponbom ahut Felix ke phereduksi pulo, “Nonke nangli damtamelo. Mo apor kelong ahut neli nangliphan pahangthupo.”
Bonta Pol alangliphan tangka piji tahai pusi Felix aning thelo, lasi alangli Pol aphan abatai batai pahangdamsi alangli pen chingkilo.
Ningkan hini aphi Porkias Festassi Felix adim govornor cholo. Bonta Felix ke Jihudi atum aning kepadokji aning hang-lo apotsi alangli Pol aphan phatek arlosi bitekangkok-lo.
Festas halabangso alongri nangledet pen nithom aphi alangli Sijeria pen Jerusalem damlo.
Hadak kurusar kethe atum lapen Jihudi atum angbong keja atum alangli ingno Pol aphan kebok alam paklang-lo.
Ansi Pol aphan Jerusalem kepavanjisi halatum Felix aphan choningrilo. Pima Pol vang-lote tovar ebeng alangliphan kepathijisi hala-tum pathik-lo.
Festas thakdunsi pulo, “Pol ke Sijeria arongsopi phatek arlosi do, lapen hadak neli chedamthu dapprangji.
Nanglitum angbong keja atum neli long Sijeria arongsopi nangpadunra alangli phuthak kopine alam dolote hadak-le alangliphan padin-nang.”
Festas halatum along ni nerkep, kalite ni kep anbak dodet aphi Sijeria arongsopi chevoilo. Puthot arni alangli kangsai anghoi ingnisi Pol aphan kepavanji ahukum pilo.
Pol nanglesi, Jerusalem pen kevang a-Jihudi atum alangliphan chekompetsi alangliphan kehingnopik alam hei hei bok-lo, bonta la kebok alam-heihei ahok pu aporman pithekthedet-lo.
Pol chethakdunsi pulo, “Jihudi atum Aron aphuthak tame, kalite Kardomhemthepi aphu-thak tame, kalite Rom a-Recho aphuthak tame neli thang akechokche akamta klemkle.”

Bonta Festas Jihudi atum aning kepadokjisi aning hang-lo. Lasi alangli Pol aphan pulo, “Nangli Jerusalem damsi hadak neli ingno nangliphan kebok alam hei hei apot nangliphan kangsaiji aphan nangli ning hangma?”
Pol thakdunsi pulo, “Neli Rom a-Recho akangsai anghoi angnosi arjap-lo. Neliphan kangsai nangji adim ladak helo. Neli Jihudi atum aphan thang akechokcheta klemkle, lake nangli methangta chinipamelo.

Neli jongsi aron ingdidet-lo, lapen kethi nangji, lapen lason adai kedo akam klemdet-lo, tangte, neli kethiji mome. Bonta jongsi latum neliphan kebok alam hei hei ahok kali, tangte, neliphan baduta halatum arideng kehodaiji ajakong ave. Neliphan kepangsaiji aphan neli Rom a-Recho aphansi choningrilo.”
Ansi Festas kangsai amei amonit atum pen chingvaisi pulo, “Nangli Rom a-Recho aphansi choningrilo apotsi nangli Rom a-Recho along dam nangji.”
Penang arni aphi Agripa recho lapen Barnis atum Festas aphan kedengjisi alangli pen kardom kechepiji aphan Sijeria arongsopi vang-lo.
Alanglitum hadak penang arni dolo. Lasi Festas, Agripa recho aphan Pol alamjir thansi pulo, “Felix phatek arlo ke-o-tekang amonit inut do.
Neli Jerusalem kedam ahut Jihudi atum akurusar kethe atum lapen akesar atum alangli phuthak lam bok-lo; lapen alangliphan ingsaisi aduk inghoitu pusi neliphan choningrilo.

Bonta nelitum Roman amonit atum ke, lam kedin atum lapen lam kepho atum angbong lam pachetokphroksi alam pachethakdun longletik ke, badu aphan tame, hala kedin atum arideng kehodaiji aron ave pusi neli halatum aphan thakdunlo.
Lasi halatum ladak kevang pen mamat neli apor padamdedetsi puthot arni kangsai anghoi ingnilo, lapen halabangso amonit aphan neli ingno kevanji ahukum pilo.

Alangliphan lam kedin atum thursi alangliphan kebok alam paklang-lo. Halatum alangliphan kopine kehingno alam hei hei bokji pusi neli mathalo. Bonta lason akehingno alam ke alangliphan thangta bokbedet-lo.
Halatum amethang adhorom alamjir, lapen Jisu pu inut kethitang amonit alamjirsi halatum chedansailo. Pima labangso amonit ke reng-et pusi Pol pulo.

Neli labangso alam ingsaisi alam keparaiji abidi chininedet-lo. Lasi Alangli Jerusalem damsi, alangliphan lahei hei kebok alam apot hadak alangliphan kangsaiji aphan ning hangma pusi neli Pol aphan arjulo.

Bonta alangliphan chedanbang patonbom nangji, lapen alangliphan kebok alam apot Rechosi alangliphan ingsai nangli pusi alangli choningrilo. Lasi neli alangliphan Rom a-Recho along toithekthetik-ke alangliphan phatek kebengbomji ahukum pilo.”
Ansi Agripa, Festas aphan pulo, “Neli methangta labangso amonit kechethakdun alam arju ingtungduk.”
Ansi Festas pulo, “Nangli alangliphan penap arjulongpo.”

Puthot arni Agripa lapen Barnis ahir asang pen vangsi kangsai ahem angdeng lutdamlo. Chedanbang ahemphu atum lapen rongsopi angbong keja atumta halatum along nangdunlo. Festas hukum pisi Pol aphan pavanlo.

Festas pulo, “Agripa recho akehai, lapen kechetong amonit atum! Nanglitum labangso amonit aphan thek-longhurlo! Alangliphan ingsai nangji pusi ladak lapen Jerusalem kedo a-Jihudi atum an neliphan choningrilo. Labangso amonit non pen apara reng longledet nangji pusi halatum hangjo josi pulo.

Bonta alangli kethi nangji lason ado kedo akam keklem neli thek-longledet-lo. Lapen alangliphan Rom a-Recho angnosi ingsai nangji pusi alangli methang choningrilo apotsi neli alangliphan Rom a-Recho along ketoijisi pathik-lo.

Bonta neli alangli lamjir Recho aphan ketokdunji alam thangta longthekthedet-lo. Lasi alangliphan karju patinidet aphi ketokdunji alam kelongji aphansi alangliphan nanglitum angno, lapen jasemet ke nangli Agripa recho angno vanlo.
Pima kedin alam ketok pachinidundakde pen phatek kejang aphan ketoi ke mesen kali pusi neli mathalo.”
Ansi Agripa, Pol aphan pulo, “Non nangli kechethakdunji aphan apor nanglipilo.” Anke Pol ari chejarsi chethakdunlo:
“Akehai, Agripa recho! Pini neli nangli ingno Jihudi atum neliphan kedin alam an kechethakdunlong apot, neli baha mepik-lo pusi neli mathalo.
Pima jasemet ke Jihudi atum aron-atang lapen halatum kechehilisei alam an nangli chinipamelo. Lasi neli nangliphan choningrilo, nangli ning chepadingra neli kechethakdun alam arju iktha.

“Neli bihek ako penta kopusonsi do-thak-loma, lapen neli kai arjon, atheke aphrangke neli nelimethang adet, lapen labangso aphi Jerusalem arongsopi kedo ahut neli kopusonsi dothak-loma, lake kadokave a-Jihudi atumta chinipet-lo.

Neli ke aphrang ahut penta Pharisilo, atheke nelitum adhorom angbong aron kepasonei abe amonit-lo, lapen Pharisi amonit asonthotsi do-thak-lo pu halatum aphrang penta chinilo. Halatum jongsi aning hangte labangso alam ahaki nangcho dun un.
Lapen nonke nelitum aphusar atum aphan Arnam kechaktang alam neli ning kethe kedo apotsi pini ladak neliphan kangsaiji aphansi neli arjap-lo.

Nelitum akhei kur-krehini atum Arnam aphan ajo-anerlota ingduk ardombomsi la kechaktang ason kelongji aphan aning chethelo. Nelita labangso aning kethe kedo apotsi Jihudi atum neliphan lam nelidinlo, Recho Akehai!
Arnam kethitang atum aphan pathurji pu alam ke kekroimeme alam kali pu nanglitum kopusi kemathama?
“Ahok-lo, Najareth a-Jisu amen aphan kekhamkhe dunji aphan un an klem nangji pusi neli methangta aphrangke mathalo.

Lasi neli kematha asonthotsi neli Jerusalem arongsopi along klemlo. Neli kurusar kethe atum pen hukum longsi kangthir ake-ongpi atum aphan phatek beng-lo; lapen neli methangta halatum aphan kepathi ahut alam chedondunlo.

Neli along along asinagog damsi halatum aphan aduk panghoilo, lapen Arnam aphan papinremtoilo. Neli halatum aphan neli ning sopik-lo. Lasi halatum aphan kechenekji aphansi neli along kaprek kaprek arongsopi anta damlo.
“Kurusar kethe atum pen hukum longsi, lapen halatum neketoi atengsi neli labangso akam aphan Damaskas arongsopi damlo.
Ansi Recho Akehai, neli kedam un ahut nerlo chitim apor malom arni apar kethe-angmu atur sining pen vangsi neli lapen neli ri asangho atum aphan turphlak-lo.

Nelitum kadokaveta longle athak kliruilo, lapen Ibri alam pen neliphan kepu ase neli arjulong-lo, ‘Sol, Sol! Nang kopisi nephan chenek-loma? Kechut-i achin aphan chainong atum kardak asonthak thaksi lake nangmethangsi soji.’
Ansi ne thakdunsi pulo, ‘Nang komatma, Hemphu?’ Lapen Hemphu nangthakdunsi pulo, ‘Neke nang kechenek a-Jisulo.
Bonta thurra, arjapnon. Nangphan neban akam kepaklemjisi ne nangphan cheklang-lo. Pini nang nephan kethek-long lapen mo aphi ne nangphan kepaklangji alam an nang anut kaprek atum aphan than nangji.
Ne nangphan Jihudi lapen Jihudi kalidet atum angbong nangtoipo, lapen ne halatum arideng pen nangphan pajokpo.

Nang halatum amek ingpusi halatum aphan kangting angbong pen kethe-ang anatthu, lapen Soitan ajakong aber pen pajoksi Arnam anatthu van nangji. Anke halatum nephan kekroi pen ajok halatum apap hei hei diya longji, lapen Arnam kangvaitang amonit atum angbong halatum adim longji.’
“Lasi Agripa Recho, neli kethek-long, sining pen kevang aning arjan neli kroikre-unedet-lo.

Aphrangke neli Damaskas arongsopi along, labangso aphi Jerusalem arongsopi along lapen Judia adet adang an lapen Jihudi kalidet atum angbong than pachethangsi halatum amethang methang apap pen aning chiruisi Arnam anat kepangno nangji, lapen aning kecherui a-ot kedo akam hei hei keklem nangji alam neli thanlo.
Labangso alam apotsi Jihudi atum neliphan Kardomhemthepi arlo nelinep-lo, lapen neliphan kepathiji bor-ilo.
Bonta pini arni anta neli Arnam akerap longbomlo, lapen lasi neli ladak thedung lapen bihek atum an angno arjapsi haki chepilo. Arnam amontri atum lapen Moses kepu alam,

atheke Khristo ke keduk kesung chechak nangji, lapen kethi pen kerengthucheng abang cheplangsi Jihudi lapen Jihudi kalidet atum angbong kethe-ang alamjir than-pachethangji pu alam apar ke neli thangta thanthedet-lo.”
Pol lapuson lam kechethak dun ahut Festas alangliphan ase kethe pen pulo, “Pol, nanglike ingchamjam cheplangtang-lo! Nangli kethekthu-ong amatsi pangchamdet-lo.”
Pol thakdunsi pulo, “Festas akehai, neli ke kepangcham kali! Neli ahok lapen ning kematha parsik pame pensi ningjelo.

Agripa Recho! Nanglita lahei hei alam chinilo apotsi neli nangli ingno pherere pin pen la puhailo. Pima lahei hei akam ke konatne atoksi keplangdamjoi kalidet apotsi, lahei hei angbong esonnatta nangli nangkethekdunde ave pusi neli kroipamelo.
Akehai Agripa Recho, nangli Arnam amonit atum aphan kroi ikma? Nangli kroi, lake neli chinilo!”
Agripa, Pol aphan pulo, “Non malomsopet tong nangli neliphan Khristian kepadunji puma?”

Pol thakdunsi pulo, “La malom-sopet angbong tame, kalite mo ajir dingklui aphi settame, nangli anchot kali, pini ladak neli lam nangkarjudun atum anta nelisonthot keplangji aphansi neli Arnam aphan choningrilo. Tebonta la ingchin ani pen kekok alam neli pudamde!”
Ansi recho, govornor, Barnis lapen akaprek atum anta thurpak-lo,
lapen hadak pen barsi halatum lahin lahin chepulo, “Labangso amonit ke kethimeme, kalite phatek kejangmeme akam thangta klemkle.”
Agripa, Festas aphan pulo, “Labangso amonit Rom a-Recho aphan choningrire asonte alangliphan pajokphlot unji apot-lo.”

Ansi nelitum telongpi pen Itali adet kedamji aphan pathik-lo. Lasi halatum Pol lapen phatek kejang amonit atum aphan Julias pu inut Chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu arideng hodailo. Julias ke, “Recho Kethe Chedanbang Asong,” pu Roman aron-aso asong ahemphulo.

Nelitum Adramittiam arongsopi along Asia adet alongkam hei hei along kedamji dok dok atelongpi chethapsi barlo. Masedonia adet Thessalonika arong-sopi asor Aristarkhas pu inut amonitta nelitum along nangdunlo.
Puthot arni nelitum Sidon arongsopi lelo. Julias ke Pol aphan ingjinsosi ajirpo atum alangliphan alangli kenangji ason kepapijisi alangliphan ajirpo atum along padamlong-lo.
Hadak pen nelitum damthulo, lapen tomon nelitum aphan japsi khang-lo. Lasi nelitum Saipras alanglom, tomon abin anatthu telongpi pen damlo.
Nelitum Silisia adet lapen Pamphilia adet kedai atalo kapsi Lisia adet Mira arongsopi lelo.
Hadak Chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu Alekjendria pen kevang atelongpi Itali adet kedamji dok dok phodunsi alangli nelitum aphan halabangso atelongpi along nepachethap-lo.

Nelitum penang arni dam pajo pajosi Noidas arongsopi le bor-i bor-a-lo. Nelitum aphan tomon japsi khang-lo apotsi nelitum aphrang anat ke damthekthedet-lo. Lasi nelitum Krit alanglom tomon atebin anatthu damsi Salmone kedai atalo kapponlo.
Nelitum labangso alanglom akung kungsi damlo, lapen bor-i bor-a pen Lasia arongsopi adung kedo Fair Havens pu adim nanglelo.
Hadak nelitum penang arni keding dolo, pima An Kehum Amei littang-lo apotsi telongpi pen kedam ke pherememelo.

Lasi Pol halatum aphan paresi pulo, “Akehai atum, neli thek-long-lo, ilitum ladak pen talo atovar kedam ke pherememelo, pima ilitum ladak pen damlote kethap amar lapen telongpi anchot kali, ilitum methang amatta virji.”
Bonta Chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu Pol kepu alam arjujedetsi telongpi kevekpon abang lapen telongpi ahemphu kepu alamsi kroirong-lo.

Halabangso alongkam ke ningkreng ahut kedo mesen adim kalidet apotsi ongmuchot atum ke telongpi pen kedamjisi aning hang-lo. Lasi hadak pen damsi, unte ningkreng esek ke Phonix pu adim kedoji aphansi hadak pale nangji pu kepu atum ongmunak-lo. Pima Phonix ke Krit alanglompi along kedo Nichi-nitur lapen nichi-nirep anat kepangno alongkamlo.
Ansi nitur anat pen tomonso kevangji pangcheng-lo. Lasi halatum aning kematha alam pleng unpo pu mathasi telongpi kekok ari phlok-lo lapen Krit alanglompi dailap damlo.
Bonta malomso aphi lang-lompi anat pen, Nirep-Nihang pu atomonthepi vangphlut-lo.
Ansi telongpi hala-bangso atomon thepi pholok-lo, lapen telongpi aphrang anat dam un-edet-lo. Lasi nelitum telongpi lophlotsi tomonpi kejap aling nelitum aphan papondet-lo.
Ansi nelitum Kada pu alanglomso anitur anat damsi tomonpi asapso chetebin long-lo. Hadak nelitum telongpi atelongso van bor-i bor-alo.

Hala telongpi athak rungsi phamri kethe pen telongpi pen phan-rapthip-lo. Bonta Libia adet akung asangti ajo anat damra telongpi chingthang-lokna pu mathasi halatum pherelo. Lasi halatum telongpi ape parunlo, lapen lapusonsi telongpi aphan tomon paponlo.
Tomon jasemet japsi telongpi aphan paleng-longtong-lo. Lasi puthot arni halatum telongpi along kethap penang amar talo along kevarji pangcheng-lo.
Lapen puthot arnithu halatum amethang ari pen telongpi ajehak ajoton talo along var-et-lo.
Penang arni nelitum arni lapen chiklolongso hei heita thek-longledet-lo, lapen tomon jasemet japbomlo. Lasi aphi ke nelitum kejokji aphan ning chethethepinlo.

Hala monit atum kecho longle kejun longle ajirdingkluilo apotsi Pol halatum angbong arjapsi pulo, “Komarli atum, nanglitum neli lam arjura Krit alanglom pen vangvedet asonte lahei hei akesung phojokphlotji, lapen hormu hortar anta virvedetji apot-lo.
Bonta nonke neli nanglitum aphan choningrilo, nanglitum ning chepathirklong pen donon! Pima nang-litum angbong baduta thithedetji, la telongpi ansi virchotji.
Pima tove neli Arnam, atheke neli kangdukbom a-Arnam apherangke nelidung arjap-thersi,
neliphan pulo, ‘Phereri, Pol! Nang Rom a-Recho angno arjap nangjilang. Lapen Arnam nangphan ingjinsosi nang pen telongpi kechethap rap rap atum an aphanta pajoktang-lo.’
Lahelo komarli atum, nanglitum ning thirklong pen donon. Pima neliphan kepu asonthotsi la plangpo pu neli Arnam aphan kroithip-lo.
Bonta ilitum aphan konatne alanglom an epondetpo.”
Ni krephli kechok aningve tomon-thepi nelitum aphan Adria atalo an nepondet-lo. Jirlo malom telong kevekpon atum langkung nanglelobon pusi mathalo.
Lasi halatum lang punlo, lapen la karnuk lam ingkoi long-lo. Malomso aphi halatum punthusi lang karnuk lam krepho dolang pu chinilo.
Ansi nelitum atelong arlong phodaina pu pheresi halatum telongpi akandar anat pen ingchin akongvek phli paklolo, lapen adap kepangthang dapji aphan Arnam ardomlo.
Ansi telong kevek atum telongpi pen kekatji abidi rilo. Lasi halatum telongso lang along pasunlo, lapen palem lemsi telongpi aphrang anat pen ingchin akongvek penangbak kepakloji ason paklang-lo.
Bonta Pol chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu lapen chedanbang atum aphan pulo, “Telong kevek atum telongpi arlo dodete, nanglitum jok un-e.”
Lasi chedanbang atum telongso ari hei hei chorpetsi la lophlot-lo.
Adap the-ang prinprele ahut halatum kedo an aphan kechoji ason pachotoisi pulo. “Nanglitum pini an ni krephli thangta choche junjesi inghongphrongbomlo.
Lasi neli nanglitum aphan choningrilo, nangli-tum an chotha. Nanglitum kerengji aphan lake akenangsot-lo. Nanglitum angbong baduta achu ejeng natta virvedetji.”
Pol labangso alam pudet aphi penangbak ahim enlo, lapen kadokave angno Arnam aphan kero pisi la beng-lo, lapen kechoji pang-cheng-lo.
Halatum kadokaveta aning chepathir si cholo.
Telongpi arlo nelitum kadokave bang pharo hinira throksi kep-ra throk dolo.
Ansi halatum ingkrangling an cholo, lapen telongpi keparjangji aphan sok tepli do an talo along var-et-lo.
Adap the-angdang aphi telong kevek atum halabangso adim chini-nedet-lo, bonta talo akung asangti mili thek-long-lo, lapen unte hadak telongpi kepachingthang-lokji aphansi halatum pathik-lo.

Lasi halatum ingchin akongvek ari an chor-etsi talo arlo lotekangphlot-lo. Halabangso ahut mamat halatum telongpi kepakeng-i alongpi hini kekok-i arita phlok-lo, lapen telongpi aphrang anat ape tarthusi halabangso asangti mili anat damlo.
Bonta telongpi sangti survuksi longle phorok-lo. Telongpi aphrang akandar ke tongrutsi chingthang-lok-lo, lapen aphi akandar abang ke talo alang angsum ketong pen ajok rurailo.
Ansi hala phatek kejang atum an lang vek-ra kat-etna pu mathasi chedanbang atum halatum kadokave aphan kepathijisi mathalo.

Bonta chedanbang bang pharo ahemphu Pol aphan kepajokji aning hang-lo. Lasi alangli halatum aphan labangso akam paklemlongledet-lo. Tebonta lang kevekthek atum aphan ke telong pen lang pachonchui chuisi talo akung anat pakaptoilo.
Lapen kedolang atum aphan ke kapat achet kalite telongpi abeng achet athak pachiripsi pakapduntoilo. Ansi halatum do-anta kora kapsi jokpet-lo.
Nelitum joksi talo akung lepet-lo. Halabangso alanglom amen ke Malta puhelo pu nelitum aphi ansi chinilo.
Hadak asor nelitum aphan inghon parpik-lo. Halabangso ahut arve jang-lo apotsi ingsampik-lo. Lasi halatum nelitum aphan me nethorpilo, lapen nelitum aphan deng-lo.
Pol theng epeng pangrum damsi me kethek ahut me angtang keso pen apot pherui ke-ik ejon nangbarsi Pol ari perhet-lo.

Halabangso alanglom amonit atum Pol ari along pherui kejangling thek-longsi lahin lahin chepulo, “Labangso amonit ke monit kepathi abangvek tahailo. Alangli talo along pen jok-lo setta kepho nangji ang-ang dokok apotsi alangliphan pareng longledetpo.”
Bonta Pol halabangso apherui me along hijirphit-lo, lapen alangli thangta cheplangpledet-lo.

Alangli bang kangji, kalite alangli menmen krepphitsi thilotji pusi halatum mathalo. Bonta kanghong ajir dingklui aphita alangli phan thangta plangpledet thek-longsi halatum aning kematha chelarsi pulo, “Alangli ke inut a-arnamlo!”
Halabangso adim adung arei alongleke halabangso alanglom ahemphu, Publias alonglelo. Alangli kanghon pen nelitum aphan nithom anta amethang ahem alohi chak-lo.
Alangli po aphu keso lapen apok kangsir pen ajok tiroksi dolo. Pol alangli dung damsi Arnam ardomlo, lapen alangli phu athak ari batsi keso melo.
La plangdet aphi halabangso alanglom keso atum an alangli long vang-lo, lapen alangli halatum aphan pamelo.
Halatum nelitum aphan ason ason ahormu nemanlo, lapen nelitum hadak pen kedamthu ahut nelitum kenangji ason an telongpi along nangthapdunlo.
Chiklo jonthom aphi hadak ningkreng esek kedo, Alekjendria adet atelongpi chethapdunsi nelitum damlo. Halabangso atelongpi aphrang akandar along ke “Kecherop Arnam” pu akumlin dolo.
Nelitum Sirakia arongsopi kethe nanglelo, lapen hadak nelitum nithom dokok-lo.
Hadak pen nelitum damthusi Rigiam arongsopi nanglelo. Puthot arni nitur anat pen tomon kevang pangcheng-lo, lapen puthot arnithu nelitum Puteoli arong-sopi lelo.
Hadak nelitum kekroi akorte atum pen chetong-lo, lapen halatum along hithi erui dotu pusi halatum nelitum aphan choningrilo. Lapusonsi nelitum Rom arongsopi vang-lo.

Rom arongsopi kedo kekroi akorte atum nelitum abirta arjulongsi nelitum aphan nangkangthum-dunjisi Appias a-Hithi lapen Boha kethom pu arongsopi an vang-lo. Pol halatum aphan thek-longsi Arnam aphan kero pilo, lapen aning theklong-lo.
Nelitum Rom arongsopi nanglesi Pol aphan ke alangliphan keton aron-aso pen padorapchomlo.

Nithom aphi Pol Jihudi atum angbong keja atum aphan phalo. Halatum chepangrumpet aphi alangli halatum aphan pulo, “Kortemarli atum, neli nelimethang akhei aphan, kalite elitum aphusar atum ekepite-kang aron atang aphan thangnat akehingnota klemklepin setta neliphan Jerusalem along phatek nebengsi Roman atum arideng nehodailo.
Halatum nephan ingsaisi nephan kelophlotji aning hang-lo, pima nepran kedammeme akehingno akam neli thangta klemklelo, lake halatum chinilo.
Bonta Jihudi atum labangso alam kroidundedetsi Rom a-Recho nekepangsaiji aphan neli choningri nangkok-lo. Bonta nemethang akhei aphan kopine alam kedinji, lapu aphan kali.
Lasi nanglitum pen kechetongji lapen kechingki-chethanjisi neli nanglitum aphan phalo, pima Israel atum aning kechethedam abang aphan ajoksi nephan lason ingchin ari pen nekoktang-lo.”

Halatum alangliphan pulo, “Nelitum Judia adet pen nangli lamjir thang abirta alohta longle, lapen hadak pen kevang badu akorteta nangli lamjir thang akehingno alam thanthe, lapen alam kechethanta arjudun longle.
Bonta nangli kepuji alam nelitum arju ingtung-lo. Pima la nanglitum asong ke hingno pusi kadokave adimta monit atum puhurlo, lake nelitum chinilo.”

Lasi halatum Pol pen arni chepathik-lo. Hala kepathik arni monit ake-ongpi atum Pol kedo adim vang-lo. Adap pen ha ajo an alangli halatum aphan Arnam a-Rat alamjir thanpajirmilo, lapen Moses Aron lapen Arnam amontri atum ketok alam hei hei paklangsi alangli halatum aphan Jisu alamjir kepakroiji bor-ilo.
Alangli kethan alam pen ajok penang atum ke kroilo, bonta akaprek penang atum ke kroikredet-lo.

Lasi Pol eson alam thandet aphi halatum angbong alam chekroikredetsi chekakphunlo. Pol kethan alam lapuhelo: “Arnam amontri, Isaiah pen ajok Karjong Kangthir nangtum aphusar atum aphan athikpetsi pulo, atheke alangli pulo:
‘Damra labangso amonit atum aphan punon:
Nangtum arjubom arjubom setta chininedetji;
Nangtum langphrongbom setta thek-longledetji.
Pima labangso amonit atum aning buikluihak-huk-lo,
lapen halatum anota chetokthip tang-lo,
lapen halatum amekta selokthiptang-lo.
Lapu kali asonte, halatum amek pen thek-longji apot-lo,
halatum ano pen arjulongji apot-lo,
halatum aning pen chinithekji apot-lo,
lapen halatum nelong nangchiruisi ne halatum aphan pameji apot-lo pusi Arnam pulo.’”
Pol padusi pulo, “Tangte mathanon, Arnam akepajok alam Jihudi kalidet atum aphan pitang-lo, lapen halatum la arjuji”
Pol labangso alam thandet aphi Jihudi atum jasemet lam chehilisi pratphunlo.
Pol tangka pi pensi bang ahem ningkan hini an dolo. Alangli dung kevang atum an aphan alangli ning arong pen deng-lo.
Alangli phererepin pen, lapen alangliphan kekhang abang ave pin pen alangli Arnam a-Rat alamjir than pachethang-lo, lapen Hemphu Jisu Khristo alamjir thanlo.
Jisu Khristo aban, lapen ketoitang abang, atheke Arnam a-Birta Keme kepachethangji aphan Arnam kangvaitang lapen kephatang abang, neli Polsi labangso aloh tok-lo.
Arnam amethang amontri atum pen ajok labangso a-Birta Keme alam aphrang pen chak-lo, lapen la kechaktang alam halatum hastro kangthir along tok-lo.
Labangso a-Birta Keme ke Arnam a-Sopo, e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo alamjirlo. Ok anat ke alangli inut David asulo,

lapen alangli long kedo Arnam Kangthir a-ot anat penke alangli Arnam a-Sopolo. Arnam alangliphan kethitang atum angbong pen pathursi ajakong paklang-lo, lapen labangso pen ajok alangli ke Arnam a-Sopolo pu paklangdak-lo.

Kadokave akhei amonit atum aphan kepakroiji lapen ahukumta kepakroiji aphan neliphan Jisu Khristo akam kepaklemjisi Arnam amethang akangjinso pen Jisu Khristo pen ajok neliphan ketoitang abang nepaplang-lo.
Lake nanglitum aphan, atheke Jisu Khristo asangho kepaplangjisi Arnam kephatang, la Rom arongsopi kedo atum aphanta lo.
Lasi nanglitum aphan, atheke Arnam kechinghon, lapen kangthir atum keplangjisi Arnam kephatang, la Rom arongsopi kedo atum aphan neli labangso aloh tok-lo.
E-Po, Arnam lapen e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo nanglitum aphan kangjinso lapen ning kangsam nangpapinang.
Aphrangsi neli nanglitum pen apot Jisu Khristo pen ajok Arnam aphan chorolo. Pima nanglitum akekroi alam pirthe adangta chethangphlup-lo.

Neli Arnam a-Sopo a-Birta Keme than pachethangsi neli ning aklong pen Arnam aphan klempibomlo, lake Arnam neli hakilo. Lapen neli kardom abataitinta nanglitum aphan chematha-ponverlo, lake Arnam chinilo.
La an arni aphi non Arnam amethang aning kehang pen neliphan nanglitum along kepavang unji aphansi neli Arnam aphan choningrilo.
Pima karjong anat nanglitum ajakong kangtangrak thekji aphan neli nanglitum aphan kopine karjong adan nangkepijisi nanglitum along kevangji aphan ning hang-olo.
Neli kepudam alam lahelo, labangso pen ajok ilitum cherap seroi longpo, atheke neli methang akekroi pen ajok nanglitum aphan, lapen nanglitum akekroi pen ajok neliphan ning pathe unpo.

Kortemarli atum, nanglitum chinitha: neli nanglitum along kevangji aphan abatai batai chesik-lo setta kopine ason pen ajok vangthekthedet titilo. Jihudi kalidet, akaprek atum angbong neli athe kelong asonthotsi nanglitum angbongta athe kelongji aphan neli ning hang-lo.
Pima Grik lapen Grik kalidet atum, giani lapen keludet atum aphan neli keklempi nangji adeng dolang.
Lasi nanglitum la Rom arongsopi kedo atum aphanta neli Birta Keme kepachethangji ingtung-olo.
Birta Keme pen apot neli therak-re: Pima kekroi abang aling aphan, aphrangke Jihudi atum, labangso aphisi Jihudi kalidet atum aphan Birta Keme ke Arnam akepajok ajakong-lo.

Arnam monit atum aphan kopusonsi dhoromi paplang-loma, lake birta keme paklangdak-lo: lake kecheng pen kejut anta kekroi pen ajoksi plang-lo. Lake hastro along ketok asonthot-lo, atheke hastro along tok-lo, “Kekroi pen ajok dhoromi keplang abang rengji.”

Monit atum apap lapen ake-hingno akamsi Arnam ahok alamjir akepachinidakji aphan khangthipsi la pachinidak un-edet-lo. Lasi halatum apap lapen akehingno akam apot sining angsong pen Arnam aning kethi halatum aphuthak klolo.
Pima monit atum Arnam alamjir kechini unji abidi ke halatum aphan klangdak-lo. Arnam amethangsi la halatum aphan paklangdak-lo.

Arnam pirthe kepinchong ahut penta, kethek-long un-edet Arnam a-ot, atheke Arnam kejut un-epin ajakong lapen a-ot thek-longdak-lo. Monit atum Arnam kepinchong amar hei hei along lahei hei thek-long unlo. Lasi halatum kechethakdunji atovar avelo.

Halatum Arnam aphan chinilo setta alangliphan kepi nangji anong pipedet-lo, lapen kerota pipedet-lo. Tebonta halatum akematha ke ale kave saidelo, lapen halatum kematha pamethekthe aning ke ingtingthip-lo.
Halatum giani pusi chepulo, bonta halatum ke kelu atumlo.
Halatum kereng-et Arnam aphan ingduk ardomdesi kethidetji api, atheke monit, vo, marat api, pherui hei hei asonthot keselam akumlin aphansi ingduk-ardomrong-lo.

Monit atum lapuson akelu apotsi, Arnam halatum aphan odunbupsi halatum amethang aning kehang aling kangthirthe akam lapen lahin lahin aketherakmeme akam cheklem setta Arnam halatum aphan panungdunkuk-lo.

Halatum Arnam alamjir ahok alam kroikresi ahok-he alam kroirong-lo. Halatum Arnam, atheke kepinchong abang aphan ingduk-ardomdesi Arnam kepinchongtang amar aphansi ingduk-ardomrong-lo. Bonta la Kepinchong a-Bang aphansi kejut un-e akai anta ro-archo nangji apot-lo! Amen.
Labangso apotsi halatum aning kehang aling aderi-mate akamle klem setta Arnam halatum aphan panung-dunkuk-lo. So-arlo atumta aronre pensi amethang hijan angbong akhat kave akam cheklemlo.

Lasonthak thaksi pinso atumta arloso penke a-ok-avi kechepapho akam klemklesi pinso hijan angbong aderi-mate kedo akam kecheklemji aphan halatum aning me kangdak ason ingdak-lo. Lapusonsi halatum hijan angbong ketherakmeme akam cheklemlo, la apotsi halatum amethang methang akechokche akam apot halatum kepho nangji aduk pholo.
Monit atum Arnam alamjir ahok agian amethang aning arlo kechebiji aning hanghedet apotsi, halatum aning kehingno pen a-ot-e akamle klem setta Arnam halatum aphan panungdunkuk-lo.

Halatum akai angbong ot kelangno akam an, kehingno akam an, mekplengple akam an lapen kechelang selet akam an halatum klempet-lo. Halatum angbong kechelang selet, monit apran ke-en, kecharvo, kepa-chobei lapen kechelang un-e akam hei heisi plengset-lo.

Halatum lahin lahin chesorsarlo lapen anong chejolo. Halatum ke Arnam aphan kehijim lapen kepinrem, ane kechepathe lapen kechepindak atumlo; halatum aphrang apar kehingno keklem muchotji aphan aning mathalo; halatum api apo alam kroikre;
halatum kechoklem hingno, halatum amethang kechechak alam ateng klemkle, lapen halatum anut kaprek atum aphan akanghon lapen akangjinso ave.

Lason keklem atum kethi nangji a-ot do pusi Arnam aron thanlo pu halatum chini. Tebonta halatum amethang mamat lahei hei akam keklembom anchot kali, lahei hei akam keklem atum aphanta mesen pusi rodunlo.

Lahelo badu setame, nangli jongsi bang aphan ingsailo tangte, nangli jonghe setta nangli methang ado chepajok un-edetji. Pima nangli bang aphan ingsailo setta halatum keklem akamthotsi klembomlote nangli methangta ado chepadobomlo.
Lapuson keklem amonit atum aphan Arnam kangsai ke kechok pame akamlo.
Bonta O monit, halatum keklem akam apotsi nangli halatum aphan ingsailo setta nangli methang amatta halatum keklem akamthotsi klembomlo! Nangli Arnam akangsai pen jokji pusi chemathama?

Kalite Arnam akechingkimepik, kangsai kepader lapen aning kechepading apotsi nangli Alangliphan langremrok tahailo. Arnam ke chingkime-o, pima alangli nangliphan aning kepachiruijisi bor-ilo, lake nangli chini binong-lo, kalima?
Bonta nangli ning ingtangrak lapen buikluihak-lo. Tangte lahelo, mo Arnam aning kethi lapen athikpet akangsai keklangji Arni nangli methang aduk kechepapho muchotji aphansi nangli klembomlo.
Pima amethang methang akam atengsi Arnam abangphutin aphan anam piji.
Penang amonit atum ke akeme akam klembomsi anong kejume, aman lapen kejut un-e achethe ribomlo. Arnam halatum aphan kejut un-e achethe piji.
Bonta akaprek atum ke amethang alesi rilo lapen kehingno akam keklemji aphansi akeme akam aning dokdedet-lo; Arnam halatum aphan aning kethi pen ingsaiji.
Kehingno keklem amonit atum an keduk kesung phoji, Jihudi atum paphrangsi Jihudi kalidet atumta la phoji.
Bonta keme keklem atum an aphan Arnam anong kejume, aman lapen ning kangsam piji; Jihudi atum aphan paphrangsi Jihudi kalidet atum aphan la piji.
Pima Arnam ke kadokave aphanta kangsai pachingbarpet.

Jihudi kalidet atum ke Moses kepi-tekang Aron ave; halatum pap klemlo lapen Aron avedet setta halatum virkoilo. Jihudi atum ke labangso Aron dolo; halatum pap klemlo lapen Aron along ketok atengsi halatum aphan ingsailo.
Pima Aron alamthe karjulong apot-le monit atum aphan dhoromi pu kelakha kali, bonta Aron ahukum ateng keklem atum aphansi dhoromi pu lakhalo.
Jihudi kalidet atum ke Aron ave, bonta halatum amethang aning arlo akematha pen Aron alam ateng keklem ahut halatum Aron ave setta amethang methang mamatsi halatum aphan aron cheplang-lo.

Halatum aning arlo Aron ahukum hei hei tokdet-lo, lake halatum a-ot pen klangdak-lo. Labangso alam ke ahok pusi halatum aning angthin haki chodunlo, pima halatum akematha, ahut pen ahut ke amethang aphan adai chepadolo, lapen ahut pen ahut ke mesen pusi chepulo.
Lasi mo Jisu Khristo pen ajok Arnam monit atum aning arlo kemathajoi alam kangsaiji Arni ahut la neli kepachethang a-Birta Keme asonthotsi plangji.
Tangte nanglitum Jihudi atum ke? Nanglitum Jihudi pusi chepulo; nanglitum Aron aphan chikilo lapen nanglitum ke Arnam kangvaitang amonit atumlo pusi chepindak-lo;
nanglitum Arnam aning kehang akam chinilo; lapen ahokpet alam kangvaiji aphan nanglitum Aron along pen charlitang-lo.
Nanglike amek kave abang aphan keja abang, kangting angbong kedo atum aphan kepathe-ang abang,
kelu abang aphan kethan kepare abang, lapen osomar atum aphan kethan abang-lo, pusi nangli puthip-lo. Aron along gian lapen ahok alam longpet-lo pusi nanglitum mathathip-lo.
Nangli anut kaprek atum aphan thanlo, tangte nangli kopi apotsi nanglimethang aphan ke chethanthedetma? “Chong-huri” pusi nangli thanlo; bonta nangli methang amatta chonghulo.
“Beisa Klemri” pusi nangli pulo, bonta nangli methang amatta beisa klemlo, kalima? Nangli kumlin aphan hijimpik-lo, bonta nangli methang amatsi kumlin kebi ahem along kedo amar inghulo, kalima?
Arnam aron nanglitum along do apotsi nangli chepindak-lo, bonta nangli Arnam aron kroikresi Arnam aphan patherak-lo, kalima?
Hastro pulo, “Nanglitum Jihudi atum pen apotsi Jihudi kalidet atum Arnam aphan pinremlo.”
Nangli jongsi Aron ateng klemlo tangte, nangli reng-rot ke-en ale do; bonta nangli jongsi Aron ateng klemkle tangte nanglike reng-rot ke-en-edet ateng-lo.
Jihudi kalidet atum reng-rot en-e det setta halatum jongsi Aron ahukum ateng klemlo tangte Arnam halatum aphan reng-rot ke-en atum asonthotsi lakhadetji, kalima?

Lasi Jihudi kalidet atum nangli-tum Jihudi atum aphan ado padoji, pima nanglitum along Aron ketoktang dolo lapen nanglitum reng-rot enlo setta nanglitum Aron ateng klemklelo; bonta halatum ke reng-rot en-edet setta Aron ateng klemlo.
Tangte ahok areng-rot ke-en, Jihudi binong abang komat-lo? Lake abang athak reng-rot ke-en, athak kechepaklangchot a-Jihudi abang kali.

Tebonta aning arlo pen Jihudi amonit keplang abang, atheke aning arlo reng-rot ke-en abangsi Jihudi binong-lo; lapen lake Arnam a-Karjong keklem akamlo. Ketoktang Aron pen ajok keplang akam kali. Labangso amonit ke Arnam pen akero long, monit pen kali.
Tangte Jihudi kecheplang pen kopi ale doma? Kalite reng-rot ke-en pen kopi ale doma?
Ale do, kadokave ahin pen setta lake ale do binong! Aphrangsi ale ke lahelo, Arnam Jihudi atum aphansi amethang alam pilo.
Bonta halatum angbong manene atum jongsi kekroi thirklongklelo tangte, kopilo keplangpo? Labangso pen apot Arnamta kekroi thirklongkle detjima?
Jonghe setta lapu kali, abangphutin amonit-le kechobei abang plang setta Arnam ke kaiketa ahokpet abang-lo. Atheke hastro pulo,
“Nangli keningje pen ajok nanglike ahokpet abang-lo pu klang nangji;
lapen nangliphan kangsai ahutta nangli lam hai nangji.”

Bonta jongsi ilitum akechokche pen ajok Arnam ahokpet akam klangdak muchot-lo tangte ilitum pisi pupoma? Arnam ilitum aphan kepasungke Arnamsi akechokche loma? (Monit atum kepu pu asonthotsi neli la pulo.)
Lapu kali! Arnam jongsi dhoromi abang kali tangte, alangli kopusi pirthe aphan ingsaithek poma?
Bonta komane abang pu tahai, “Neli keklem akechokche pen ajok jongsi dhoromipet akam klangdaksi Arnam adak atur klangdak muchot-lo tangte, kopi apotsi neliphan papi pu ado ne padolangma?”

Tangte “Akeme keklangji aphan ilitum kehingno klem lonang,” putong ilitum punangma? Chenamsi, neli labangso alam pulo pusi manene atum neliphan adai tinsi nepinremlo. Halatum kepho nangji asonthotsi halatum aphan ado padovekji.
Tangte Arnam angno ili Jihudi atum hala Jihudi kalidet atum apar memuchot-loma? Jonghe setta lapu kali! Neli aphrangta pulo, Jihudi lapen Jihudi kalidet atum kadokaveta pap ajakong abersi dolo.
Atheke hastro pulo:
“Dhoromi abang inutta ave,
kechini abang inutta ave,
lapen Arnam aphan keri abang inutta ave.
Kadokave amonitta Arnam pen sui-ettang-lo,
halatum chokchepet-lo,
akeme keklem abang apakta ave; inutnatta ave.
Halatum alangjoi ke kangpudang atipit asonthak thak-lo;
halatum ade pen chobeilo,
lapen halatum angtur along ruiphe abi dolo;
halatum angho ke kehingno ahirjuno pen plengset-lo.
Halatum bang avi kepabu prap-olo;
halatum kedam aling monit atum aphan pavirlo lapen pasung-lo.
Halatum ning kangsam atovar chinine,
lapen halatum Arnam aphan kephere charlile.”
Lasi ilitum chinilo, kadokave amonit atum aphan kepachethak dunji atovar pavedetsi Arnam kadokave amonit aphan kangsai longji aphansi Aron along ketok alam anke Aron aber kedo atum aphanlo.
Pima Arnam angno ke, Aron ateng keklem apot-le inut amonit aphan dhoromi pu kelakha kali. Pima Aron ke monit atum aphan amethang methang apapsi pachechinichot.
Bonta nonke Arnam monit aphan dhoromi kepaplang akam paklangdak-lo, lapen lake aron-atang pen ajok kalipinlo. Tebonta Aron lapen Arnam amontri atumta labangso alamjir ahaki pilo.

Monit atum Jisu Khristo aphan kekroi ajoksi Arnam halatum aphan dhoromi paplang-lo. Khristo aphan kekroi atum an aphan Arnam lapuson klemlo, pima Jihudi lapen Jihudi kalidet atum angbong thangnat akeprekta avelo,
atheke kadokave amonitta pap klemtang-lo lapen Arnam adak atur pen chingbarbedettang-lo.
Bonta Arnam akangjinso pen ajok Arnam halatum aphan akejoisi dhoromi paplang-lo, lapen lake halatum aphan kepajok abang Jisu Khristo pen ajoksi alangli klemlo.

Monit atum Khristo aphan kroisi alangli vi pen ajok amethang apap hei hei diya kelongji aphansi Arnam Khristo aphan athok ajir ason paplangsi thokdet-lo. Arnam monit atum aphan dhoromi kepaplang akam kepaklangji aphansi alangli la klemlo. Aphrang ahut ke Arnam aning chepadingsi monit atum apap hei hei alakha en-edet-lo,

bonta nonke alangli monit aphan dhoromi kepaplang akam kepaklangjisi monit apap hei hei alakha enlo. Lapusonsi alangli amethang dhoromipet akam chepaklang-lo, lapen Jisu aphan kekroi atum an aphan dhoromi pusi lakhalo.

Tangte ilitum kechepindakji ason doma? Thangta ave! La kopi apotma? Ilitum Aron ateng klemsi dhoromi plang-lo pu chepindak unma? Un-e. Pima Aron ateng keklem apot kali, bonta kekroi pen ajoksi ilitum dhoromi plang-lo.
Pima monit ke Aron ateng keklem pen ajok-le dhoromi keplang kali, kekroi pen ajoksi dhoromi plang-lo pu ilitum kroilo.
Kalite Arnam ke Jihudi atum a-Arnamchotma? Alangli ke Jihudi kalidet atum a-Arnamta-lo, kalima? Chenamsi alangli ke Jihudi kalidet atum a-Arnamta lo.
Arnam ke inutnat, lapen alangli Jihudi atum aphanta halatum akekroi apotsi dhoromi pu lakhaji, lapen Jihudi kalidet atum aphanta halatum akekroi apotsi dhoromi pu lakhaji.
Tangte labangso akekroi pen ajok ilitum Aron ale pavedet-loma? Lapu kali; bonta ilitum Aron pathirlo.
Tangte Jihudi atum aphusar, Abraham alamjir ilitum kopisi pu apot-loma?
Amethang keklem akam apotsi Arnam Abraham aphan dhoromi pu lakhalo asonte alangli kechepindakji athe doji apot-lo, bonta Arnam angno ke kali.
Hastro pulo, “Abraham Arnam aphan kroilo, lapen labangso apotsi Arnam alangliphan dhoromi pu lakhalo.”
Kam keklem abang anam long; alangli kelong anam ke dan kali, lake alangli keklem apot kelong nangji anamlo.
Bonta ame-thang akam aphan chikikesi Arnam aphan kechiki amonit, atheke ado kedo abang aphan ado ave pu kehok a-Arnam aphan kekroi amonit amethang akekroi apotsi Arnam alangliphan dhoromi pu lakhalo.
Amethang akam pen apot kalidet pen Arnam angno dhoromi keplang abang rengme pu David kepu alamta labangso alam aphansi pudamlo: Atheke David pulo,
“Amethang akechokche hei hei Arnam pen diya kelongtang,
lapen apap hei hei Arnam kediptang abang rengme!
Apap hei hei Hemphu lakhakhedetji,
lason abang rengme!”

Tangte la David kepudam akerengme ke reng-rot ke-en atum aphanchotma? Lapu kali. Lake reng-rot ke-en-e aphantalo. Pima ilitum hastro alam paklangsi pulo, “Abraham Arnam aphan kroilo, lapen alangli methang akekroi apotsi Arnam alangli-phan dhoromi pu lakhalo.
Tangte la komantusi plang-loma? Abraham reng-rot ke-en aphrangma, mate aphima? Lake Abraham reng-rot ke-en aphrang-lo, aphi kali.

Aphisi alangli reng-rot enlo, lapen labangso areng-rot alangli akekroi kedo apotsi alangli reng-rot ke-en-e ako Arnam alangliphan dhoromi pu lakhalo pu angthek-lo. Lasi karjong anat penke Abraham ke areng-rot-redet setta Arnam aphan kekroi pen ajok Arnam angno dhoromi keplang atum an apolo.

Alangli ke reng-rot ke-en atum aphanta apolo. Lake halatum reng-rot ke-en apotchot kali, bonta Abraham reng-rot en-e ako Arnam aphan kekroi pen kedo kethak asonthotsi halatumta Arnam aphan kekroi pen do-thak-lo apotsi lason plang-lo.

Abraham lapen aso asu atum pirthe chepahemphu longji pu Arnam Abraham aphan kechak ke Abraham Aron ateng keklem apot kali, bonta alangli Arnam aphan kekroi apot Arnam alangliphan dhoromi pu lakhalo apotsi Arnam alangliphan la chak-lo.
Pima jongsi Aron kekroi atum aphan ansi Arnam kechaktang ason pichotji pulote kekroi ke thangta kalidet-lo, lapen Arnam akechakta thang ale avedet-lo.
Aronsi Arnam aning kethi vanlo; bonta Aron avedette Aron akekroikreta avelo.

Tangte Abraham aso asu atum an aphan, atheke, Aron kekroi atum aphan chot kali, bonta Abraham kekroi asonthot Arnam aphan kekroi atum an aphan Arnam labangso akechak akejoi adan ason kepithekjisi, labangso akechak ke kekroi pensi vang-lo. Pima Abraham ke karjong anat ilitum kadokave apolo.

Lake hastro ketok asonthot-lo, “Neli nangliphan ake-ongpi akhei apo nangpaplangtang-lo.” Lasi Abraham kekroi a-Arnam, atheke, kethitang aphan kepareng thek, lapen hukum pisi kavedet amarta kepadothek a-Arnam angno ke labangso akechak mesenlo.
Abraham aning kechethedamji ason avedet setta alangli kroilo lapen aning thelo. Lasi hastro along ketok, “Nangso nangsu chan-oji” pu asonthotsi alangli “ake-ongpi akhei apo plang-lo.”

Alangli arta ningkan pharo isi anbak dolo apotsi, alangli bang arpum ke kethitang asonthak thak-lo, lapen Sarahta aso kechopatheji arta littang-lo pu alangli chechini pamelo setta alangli kai ateng kroibomlo.
Alangli kekroi che-o-edet-lo, lapen Arnam kechak alam aning bibedet-lo, bonta amethang akekroi pen ajok jakong longsi Arnam aphan ingduk-ardombomlo.
Arnam amethang kechaktang ason pachekok un pu alangli kroipamelo.
Abraham labangso akekroi kedo apotsi Arnam alangliphan dhoromi pu lakhalo.
“Alangliphan dhoromi pu lakhalo,” pu ketok alam ke alangliphanchot kali,
bonta lake ilitum aphantalo. Pima ilitum aphan, atheke e-Hemphu Jisu aphan kethitang atum angbong pen kepathur abang aphan kekroi atum an aphanta dhoromi pu lakhadetji.
Ilitum apap hei hei apot alangli thi nangji pusi Arnam pathikdet-lo, lapen ilitum aphan dhoromi atum ekepaplangji aphansi alangliphan parengthulo.
Lasi ilitum akekroi pen apot nonke ilitum aphan dhoromi pu lakhalo apotsi e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo pen ajok ilitum Arnam pen ning kechingsam dolo.
Ilitum Khristo aphan kroilo apotsi alangli pen ajok ilitum Arnam akangjinso longdunlo, lapen ilitum Arnam adak-atur longdunji pu ening kechethedam pen apot ili ning arong-lo.
Lapen kesung ahutta ilitum aning arong do, pima kesung kepho pen ajok kechechak un muchot ajakong long,
kechechak-un ajakong pen ajok e-ot-edur me-i, e-ot-edur keme pen ajok ning ketheta do-i pu ilitum chini.
Labangso aning kethe ilitum aphan ning epabibe, pima Karjong Kangthir pen ajok Arnam amethang akanghon ilitum aning arlo dungtang-lo. La Karjong Kangthir ke Arnam ekepi adanlo.
Pima ilitum ajakong kavedet ahutsi ilitum aphan ajok, atheke dhoromime atum aphan ajok Khristo athikpet apor ahut thi-lo.
Inut dhoromi amonit aphan ajok amethang apran kechepi abang penang penung ave, bonta inut akeme amonit aphan ajok ke komane abang amethang apran chepi haidet tahai.
Bonta Arnam ilitum aphan ko-an e-inghonloma, lake alangli ilitum aphan epaklangtang-lo; atheke, ilitum papibomlang ahutsi Khristo ilitum aphan ajok thilo.
Alangli vi pen ajok Arnam ilitum aphan nonke dhoromi pu elakhalo; la aparta alangli ilitum aphan Arnam aning kethi pen epajokji.

Aphrangke ilitum Arnam ahotur atumlo, bonta alangli Sopo apran kechepi pen ajok nonke ilitum aphan Arnam pen epajalangthulo. Nonke ilitum aphan Arnam pen epajalangthu-tang-lo; tangte la aparta Khristo achethe pen ajok ilitum aphan ko-an pajokpoma!
Bonta la anchot kali; ilitum aphan Arnam pen kepajalangthu abang e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo pen ajok Arnam keklemtang akam pen apot ilitum chehok-lo.
Inut amonit pen apotsi pirthe athak pap vang-lo, lapen alangli papsi kethi vanlo. Labangso apot kadokave amonitta kethi nangji a-ot dolo, pima kadokave amonitta pap klemlo.
Moses pen ajok Arnam Aron bibe ako penta pirthe athak pap dolo, bonta aron kavedet adim ke pap alakha bibedet-lo.
Tebonta Adam arni ahut pen ha Moses arni ahut anta monit atum thi nangkok-lo, lapen Adam Arnam ahukum kroikresi keklem apap asonthot apap keklemkle atumta thi nangkok-lo.
Adam helo hala kevangji abang a-arjanlo.

Bonta Arnam kepi akejoi adan ke Adam apap asonthak thak kali. Hala inut amonit apap pen apotsi monit atum thi-lo, lake ahok-lo. Bonta inut amonit, atheke Jisu Khristo pen ajok Arnam monit atum aphan kepi akejoi, akangjinso adan ke la apar ajakong themulo.
Lapen Arnam adan ke hala inut amonit apap pen akeprek do. Hala ephong apap pen aphi kangsai vangsi ado padolo, bonta pap do-o aphi kangjinso adan vangsi dhoromi paplang-lo.

Inut amonit apap pen ajok, atheke halabangso abang pen apot pap parechodet-lo, bonta la apar inut amonit, atheke Jisu Khristo akam ajakong themulo. Arnam ake-ongpi akangjinso longsi akejoisi dhoromi keplanglong atum anke Khristo pen ajok rengsi parechoji.
Tangte lahelo, inut amonit apap pen apotsi kadokave amonit atum aphan ado padolo asonthotsi inut amonit dhoromipet akam pen apot kadokave amonit aphan adai pen pajoksi chethe pilo.
Lapen inut amonit Arnam ahukum akekroikre ajoksi kadokave amonit atum papi plang-lo asonthotsi inut amonit Arnam ahukum akekroi pen apot Arnam monit atum aphan dhoromi pu lakhaponji.
Pap kepa-ongmuchotji aphansi Aron bilo; bonta pap ke-ongbom ahut Arnam akangjinso ansose ongmuchot bomlo.
Tangte lahelo, kethi pen ajok pap keparechodet asonthotsi, Arnam akangjinsota e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo pen ajok ilitum aphan dhoromi epaplangsi lapen kejut un-e achethe episi parecholo.
Tangte ilitum kopisi pu apot-loma? Arnam akangjinso kepa-ongmuchot bomji aphan ili pap klemthubom nangjima?
Lapu kali! Ilitum pap anat ke kethitang-lotle kopusi pap keklemthu bomjilangma?
Ilitum Jisu Khristo pen kechelangpetji aphan baptisom ke-en ahut ilitum alangli long thidunlottang-lo, lake nanglitum chinilo.

Lahelo Po adak atur ajakong pen Khristo aphan kethi angbong pen keparengthu asonthotsi ilitumta e-ot kemi pen kedo thekji aphansi ilitum abaptisom pen ajok ilitum aphan alangli long pipdundet tang-lo, lapen ilitum alangli long thidunlottang-lo.
Pima ilitum jongsi alangli kethi asonthot thisi alangli pen isipet plang-lo tangte, alangli phan kethi pen keparengthu asonthotsi ilitum aphanta parengthusi ilitum alangli pen isipet plangji.

Pima ilitum chinilo: ilitum pap aban keplangthuthedetji aphan pap keklemji ning kehang ajakong kepavirdetjisi ilitum aphrang a-ot adur, aphanta Khristo aphan thengparpan athak kepathi along pathidun tang-lo.
Pima inut amonit thilot-lote alangli ke pap ajakong pen joktang-lo.
Ilitum jongsi Khristo along thiduntang-lo tangte, ilitum alangli long rengta rengdunji pu ili kroilo.
Pima ilitum chinilo, Khristo aphan kethi angbong pen pathurtang-lo, alangli kaita thithuthelo. Hala pen apara kethi alangli phuthak ajakong avelo.
Pap anat alangli eboipetsi kaike aphan thilo; la apotsi kaiketa pap alangli phuthak ajakong avelo; lapen nonke alangli rengthusi Arnam pen do rap rap-lo.
Lasonthotsi nanglitumta pap anat ke akethitang-lo, bonta Khristo Jisu pen ajok nonke nanglitum Arnam aphansi rengpilo pule chemathanon.
Lahelo nanglitum akehingno aning kehang ateng keklemkledetjile la nanglitum kethidetji abang arpum aphuthak pap parecho longrinon.

Lapen nanglitum a-ok athan hei hei kehingno keklem-i arisim keplang-bombe detjile nanglitum la pap aphan hodaithubomrinon. Bonta nanglitum ke kethi angbong pen kethurtang atum asonthak thak-le Arnam aphan nangmethang methang chehodainon, lapen dhoromi akam keklem-iji aphanle nanglitum a-ok athan anta Arnam arideng hodainon.
Nanglitum aphuthak pap parecho longledet nangji: nanglitum ke aron angbongle kedo kali, bonta Arnam akangjinso angbongsi dolo.
Tangte kopilo? Ilitumke Aron angbongle kedo kalidet apot ilitum pap klembom tamema? Lapu kali!

Nanglitum jongsi komane abang aban keplangjisi halabangso abang arideng chehodailo, lapen lasonsi alangli hukum kroilo tangte nanglitum ke chenamsi halabangso abang abanlo. Lasi nanglitum pap aphan kroilote nanglitum pap aban cheplangsi kethi nangji a-ot dolo, kalite Arnam aphan kroilote, la pen ajok nanglitum aphan dhoromi pu lakhapo, lake nanglitum chinibinong-lo, kalima?
Bonta ilitum Arnam aphan choro nangji! Pima aphrangke nanglitum pap aban atumlo, setta nonke nanglitum aphan nangkethan ahok alam nanglitum aning aklong pen kroilo.
Nanglitum aphan pap ajakong pen pajokphlotsi nanglitum dhoromi akam aban plang-lo.

Nanglitum kechinithek ajakong doparpedet apotsi neli la monit atum kepu pu asonsi pulo. Pima aphrangke nanglitum kehingno muchot muchot akam keklem-ijisi nanglitum methang methang abang a-ok athan hei hei chehodailo, lapen lasonsi kangthirthe lapen kehingno akam aban paplang-lo. Lasonthak thaksi nonke nanglitum kangthir akam keklem-iji aphanle nanglitum methang methang abang a-ok athan hei hei chehodaira dhoromi akam aban paplangnon.
Nanglitum pap aban keplang ahut ke nanglitum dhoromi akam aber dodelo.
Halabangso ahut nanglitum keklem akam pen nanglitum kopi ale long-loma? Halabangso akam pen apot nonke nanglitum therak nanghur anhelo. Hala hei hei akam ale ke kethi helo.

Bonta nonke nanglitum aphan pap pen pajokphlot-tang-lo, lapen nonke nanglitum Arnam aban atumlo. Labangso pen nanglitum ale kelong ke kangthir helo, lapen labangso pen apot kelongthu ke kejut un-e achethe helo.
Pima pap anam ke kethi, bonta Arnam kepi akejoi adan ke e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok kejut un-e achethe helo.
Korte marli atum, neli kepuji alamthe nanglitum chiniji binong, pima nanglitum kadokaveta aron alam chinihurlo. Inut amonit rengtik ansi aron alangli phuthak ajakong dochot.

Pima inut penan kedotang arloso apenan rengtik anke aron pen ajok alangliphan amethang apenan pen kok-rap-het-lo. Bonta apenan thilot lote, hala apenan pen alangliphan kekok-rap-het aron pen alangli jokphlot-tang-lo.

Tangte lahelo, apenan kereng un ahut labangpi jongsi anut kaprek apinso pen dorap rap-lo tangte, alangliphan beisapi pusi pudetji; bonta alangli penan thilot-lote labangpi halabangso aron pen jokphlottang-lo, lapen alangli anut kaprek apinso aphan penan dokok setame, lake beisa keklem kalilo.

Nanglitumta lasonthak thak-lo, korte marli atum. Atheke nanglitum ke Khristo abang a-ok athan hei heilo apotsi, Aron anat ke nanglitumta thilot-tang-lo, lapen ilitum Arnam aphan athe kepathe pithekji aphan nonke nanglitum hala kethi pen kerengthutang abang amonit atumlo.
Pima ilitum ok aning kehang atengle dolote ilitum pap keklemji aning kehangke Aron pen ajok ilitum abang arlo prungdutsi kam klemvoi titilo; lapen ilitum keklem akam an pen ajok ilitum thi-lo.

Bonta nonke ilitum Aron pen jokphlottang-lo, pima aphrang ahut ilitum aphan kekokhet amar anat ke ilitum thilot-tang-lo. Nonke ilitum aphrang asonthot ke, atheke hala ketoktang aban-aron ekethan ateng ke klembombelo, bonta Karjong ekeja atengsi ning kemi pen ilitum klemlo.

Tangte ilitum kopisi pu apot-loma? Aron ke pap ma? Lapu kali! Bonta Aron ave asonte neli pap chininedetji apot-lo. Pima “Bang amar konri” pule Aron pupe asonte neli bang amar kekon chininedetji apot-lo.
Bonta papke halabangso ahukum pen ajok neli kadokave amar kekonji aphan neli ning keparungji asoi long-lo. Aron avete papke akethitang-lo.
Aphrang aron kave akoke neli methang amatta reng-etsi dolo. Bonta hukum vangsi pap ke cherengthusap-lo, lapen neli ke thilot-lo.
Lapen hukum ke kepareng-iji aphansi pilo, setta neliphan ke la kethi-i asonsi nangcheplangdet-lo.
Hukum pen ajok papke asoi longsi neliphan chobeilo lapen labangso ahukum pen ajok pap ke neliphan pathilot-lo.
Tangte lahelo, Aron ke ingthir-et, lapen hukumta ingthir-et, chokpet lapen mesen.

Tangte la akeme amarsi neliphan kepathi-i amar plangdet-loma? Lapu kali! Papsi la klemlo; pap amethang a-ot binong keklangdakji aphan papke akemesen amar pen neliphan pathilo. Lasi papke hukum pen ajok hingnomuchot cheplang-lo.
Pima ilitum chinilo, Aron ke Karjong amarlo; bonta neli ke kethidetji amonit-lo, pap aphan kejordet abanlo.
Neli kopisi klem loma, lake neli chechinine; pima neli keklemji ning kehang akam neli klemkle, bonta neli kehijim akamsi neli klem rong titilo.
Bonta neli jongsi neli ning kehanghe akamsi klemlo tangte, neli ke aron mesen pusi kroidunlo.
Lasi labangso akam ke neli methangle keklem kali, bonta neli long kedo apapsi la klemlo.
Neli chinilo, neli ning arlo, atheke neli ot along thangnat akemeta ave. Pima neli keme keklemji ning hang setta neli la keklemji ajakong avelo.
Pima neli keklemji ning kehang akeme akam ke neli klemklesi neli ning kehanghe, akehingno akamsi neli klemrong titilo.
Jongsi neli keklemji ning kehanghe akamsi neli klemrong-lo tangte, lake neli methangle keklem kali, bonta neli ning arlo kedo apapsi la klemlo.
Lasi neli thek-long-lo: labangso aron lasonsi kam klemvoilo, atheke neli keme keklemji ning hang-lo setta neli kehingnosi klem rong titilo.
Neli ning arlo ke neli Arnam aron ning dok binong-lo.
Bonta akaprek aron neli bang arlo kam keklemvoi neli chethek-long-lo. Labangso aronsi neliphan nelibang arlo kam keklemvoi apap aron akoidi nepaplang-lo.
O ko-an keduk kepho abang la neli! La neliphan kethi anat nekeponbom abang arpum pen neliphan matsi nepajokpoma?
Neli Arnam aphan chorolo, pima Hemphu Jisu pen ajok alangli nepajok-lo.
Tangte neli ke lapuson helo: Nelining pensi neli Arnam aron ateng klem unchot-lo, bonta ok penke neli pap aron atengsi klembomlo.
Lasi nonke Jisu Khristo pen kechelangpet atum an aphan ke aduk ahukum avelo.
Pima ilitum Jisu Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok ilitum aphan chethe ekepi a-Karjong aronsi neliphan pap lapen kethi aron angbong pen nepajoktang-lo.

Pima okke ajakong avedet apotsi Aron keklem un-e akam Arnamsi klemlo. Alangli methang a-Sopo aphan nangtoisi monit a-ot along kedo apap aphan aduk ahukum pilo. Alangli Sopo ke pap kepakak-i athok keplangjisi papi amonit a-arje ensi vang-lo.
Dhoromi pen akenang, atheke ilitum akai along aron kepaplengji aphan, lake ok aning kehang ateng kengkam kechejorjedetji, bonta Karjong aningkehang ateng pen kengkam kechejorji aphan.
Ok aning kehang ateng kedo-kethak atum anke ok aning kehang akam keklemjisi aning do-e. Bonta Karjong aning kehang ateng kedo-kethak atum anke Karjong aning kehang akam aphansi aning do-e.

Nangli jongsi ok aning kehang akam aphansi nangli ning do-elo tangte, nangli thilotji, bonta nangli jongsi Arnam a-Karjong aning kehang akam ning do-elo tangte, nangli rengji lapen ning kangsam longji.
Lasi inut amonit jongsi ok aning kehang akam aphansi ning do-elo tangte, alangli ke Arnam ahoturlo; pima alangli Arnam aron kroikrelo, lapen kroi thekthe.
Ok aning kehang akam keklem atum ke Arnam aning padok un-e.

Bonta nanglitum aning arlo jongsi Arnam a-Karjong do binong tangte, nanglitum ok aning kehang ateng klemkle, bonta Karjong aning kehang alingsi klemlo. Mane abang jongsi Khristo a-Karjong avelo tangte alangli ke Khristo amonit kali.
Bonta Khristo jongsi nanglitum aning arlo do tangte, pap pen apot nanglitum abang arpum thilotji setta, Karjong nanglitum aphan parengji, pima Arnam nanglitum aphan dhoromi pusi lakhatang-lo.

Jisu aphan kethitang atum angbong pen parengthusi kepathur a-Arnam a-Karjong jongsi nanglitum along dolo tangte, la Khristo Jisu aphan kethitang atum angbong pen keparengthu abang a-Karjong nanglitum along kedo pen ajok alangli nanglitum kethidetji abang arpum aphan parengji.
Tangte lahelo, kortemarli atum, ilitumke epreng kedo atumlo, bonta ok aning kehang ateng keklemji aphan ok alongle ilitum apreng kedo kali.
