Pima nanglitum ok aning kehang atengle do-thak lote nanglitum thikoiji; bonta nanglitum Karjong pen ajok ok akam an pathikoilote, nanglitum rengji.
Pima Arnam a-Karjong kejapon long atum anke Arnam asomarlo.

Pima Arnam nanglitum aphan kepi a-Karjong ke nanglitum aphan ban nangpaplangple, lapen kephere aningta nangpipe; bonta Karjong ke nanglitum aphan Arnam asomar nangpaplang-lo, lapen Karjong ajakong pen ajok ilitum Arnam aphan, “O po! O Po!” pu hang-lo.
Ilitumke Arnam asomarlo pu Arnam a-Karjong mamatsi ilitum akarjong pen pen haki chodunlo.

Ilitumke alangli somar atumlo apotsi alangli amethang amonit atum aphan kebirtipi ahirjume hei hei ilitum chepahemphudun longji, lapen Arnam Khristo aphan kebirtipi ason ilitum Khristo pen pen chepahemphu longrap rapji; pima ilitum jongsi Khristo pen sung rap rap-lo tangte, ilitumta alangli pen adak atur long rap rapji.
Non ilitum kephobom akesung aphan ke mo aphi ilitum aphan ekepaklangji adak atur pen thangnatta pangbardam un-e pusi neli mathalo.
Kepinchongtang ason an Arnam amethang asomar kechepaklangji aphan ingtungpik pen inghongphrong-lo.

Pima kepinchongtang ason an thangta kalidet keplangji aphansi Arnam la aphan ado padolo, lapen lake kepinchongtang ason amethang aning kehang apot kali, bonta la lapuson keplangji aphan Arnam aning hang-lo. Tebonta aning kethe lahelo,
Mo arni isi kepinchongtang amar an akevir nangji pen jokphlotsi Arnam asomar atum kelong adak atur lapen akejok longdunji.
Pima ilitum chinilo, arloso atum oso pirthe kepahache ahut akesung asonthotsi la Arnam kepinchongtang ason an nonputa sungsi ar-emjolo.

Bonta la kepinchongtang amar anchot kali, ili la Arnam aphrangsi adan, atheke Karjong kelong atumta Arnam kur kepon asomar ekepaplangji lapen ilitum abang arpum aphan kepajokji aphan kanghong phrongbom ahut ening arlo ar-emjolo:

Pima ilitum labangso aning kethe kedo apotsi ilitum jok-long-lo; bonta ilitum jongsi kethek-longtang-lok ason aphansi mo aphi longji pu ning thelo tangte, lake ning kethe binong kalilo; pima kethek-long-lok ason aphan ke matsi mo aphi longji pu aning thebom jilangma?
Bonta ilitum jongsi kethek-longle ason aphan mo aphi longji pu ning chethedamlo tangte, ilitum ning chepading pen la aphan inghongphrong bompo.

Lasonthak thaksi Karjongta ili la jakong kave atum aphan erapdunlo. Pima ilitum kopusonsi ardom nangjima, lake ilitum chinine; bonta elamthe pen kepachinidak un-e akar-em pen Karjong amethangsi ilitum aphan Arnam angno echoningripi-bomlo.
Monit aning kepherei abang, Arnam ke Karjong akematha alam chini; pima Karjong ke Arnam aning kehang atengsi kangthir atum aphan Arnam angno choningripibom.
Kadokave asonta Arnam ke akeme aphansi keklem athema Arnam aphan kanghon, atheke alangli kam aphan alangli ning kehang ateng kephatang atum pen kam klem rap rap-lo, pu ilitum chinilo.
Pima akorte ake-ongpi atum angbong Soposi aklengsi abang keplanglongji aphan Arnam aphrang pen kangvaitang atum Arnam a-Sopo asonthak thak keplangji aphan Arnam aphrang pen pathik-lo.

Lapen Arnam aphrang pen kepathiktang atum an aphan alangli phalo; lapen alangli kephatang atum aphan dhoromi pusi lakhalo; lapen alangli dhoromi pu kelakhatang atum aphan alangli amethang adak aturta pilo.
Tangte la kadokave alam pen apot ili kopisi pu apot-loma? Arnam jongsi ilitum abe tangte, matsi ephan hai unjima?

Alangli amethang asopo aphan anta cherairesi ilitum kadokave aphan ajok alangliphan athok ason paplangsi thokdet-lo. Alangli ilitum aphan amethang a-Sopo epidet-lo, tangte alangli ilitum aphan kadokave amarta akejoi pen epipedetjima?
Arnam kangvaitang atum aphan matsi adai tin unjima? Arnam amethang amatsi halatum aphan dhoromi pu lakhalo.

Tangte halatum aphan komatsi ado padojima? Baduta ave. Jisu Khristota halatum aphan ado padode. Alangli thilot-lo, lapen la aparta rengthusi Arnam ar-e anat dolo, lapen ilitum aphan Arnam angno echoningripiverlo.
Tangte ilitum aphan Khristo akanghon pen matsi epaprek unjima? Keduk ma, kesung ma, akhim ma, akephereduk ason ma, mate nokjirma?
Hastro along ketok asonthotsi,
“Nanglitum pen apot nelitum ke kaiketa kethinangji,
lason akepherememe dolo;
netum aphan ke kethuji abiresak asonsi nepinchongdet-lo.”
Bonta la kadokave do setta ilitumke ephan ekanghon abang pen ajok haithorlo!

Pima ilitum aphan alangli akanghon pen thangta epaprek un-e pu neli chinilorlo. Kethi tame, kalite reng-etbom settame; sining aphe-rangke atum tame, kalite sining angsong kepangri atum, mate ajakong kedo atum settame; non keplangbom ason tame, kalite mo aphi keplangji ason settame;

ilitum athak kedo apirthe tame, kalite ilitum arum kedo apirthe settame, kepinchongtang amar angbong pen thangnatta ilitum aphan la e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo pen ajok Arnam ekepi akanghon pen epaprek un-e.
Neli ahok alamsi pulo, neli ke Khristo amonit-lo lapen neli pachobeibelo: neli ning-ingthinta Karjong Kangthir akeja pen ajok neli pachobeibe pu neliphan pachinidak-lo,
atheke neli methang akorte atum, atheke neli methang akhei amonit atum pen apot neli ning dukpik-lo, lapen neli kaiketa matha-it-lo pu neli kepu alam neli kepachobei kali.
Halatum aphan ale doji pu asonte neli Arnam ahirjuno longnangkok settame lapen Khristo pen nepaprekdak settame, lake meparji pusi neli mathalo.

Pima halatum ke Arnam kangvaitang amonit atumlo; alangli halatum aphan amethang asomar paplang-lo lapen amethang adak atur halatum aphan paklang-lo; alangli halatum pen lamchak chebilo lapen halatum aphan Aron pilo; Arnam aphan ahokpet pen kardom kangduk aron halatum chinilo; halatum Arnam akechak long-lo.

Halatum ke Jihudi atum aphusar atum aso asulo lapen monit aron penke Khristo ke halatum akhei amonit-lo. Arnam, la kadokave aphan kepangri abang ke kejut un-e akai apar akai anta kero karcho kelongver nangji abang-lo! Amen.
Arnam kechak alam chekok un-edet-lo pule neli kepudam kali. Pima Israel amonit aso asu atum anke Arnam kangvaitang amonitpet-lo, lapu kali.
Lapen ke Abraham aso asu atum anke Arnam asomarpet-lo, lapu kali. Arnam Abraham aphan pulo, “Isaak pen ajoksi ne nangphan kechaktang aso-asu plangji.”
Labangso alam athe lahelo, api apo pen ajok amahang kethekchot a-osomar atum ke Arnam asomar kali, bonta Arnam kechak ateng pen amahang kethek atum aphansi Arnam asomar binong pu lakhaji.
Pima Arnam kechak lapuson helo, “Muning labangso apor ahut neli vangthuji lapen Sarah asopo amahang thekji.”
Lapen la anchot kali, inut amonit, atheke ephusar Isaak pen ajok Rebeka kecherop asopo dolo.
Bonta Arnam aning kehang atengsi asopo inut aphan ingvailo, pu alam kepachekokji aphansi Arnam Rebeka aphan pulo, “Akleng abang akebi aphan ingdukji.”
Halatum amahang thekthe ako, halatum akeme akehingno thangta klemkle akosi Arnam labangso alam pulo. Lasi Arnam amethang akepha pen apotsi alangli ingvailo, halatum keklem akam apot kali.
Atheke hastro along tok-lo, “Ne Jakob aphan inghonlo, bonta Iso aphan hijimlo.”
Tangte ilitum pisi pu apot-loma? Arnam keklem chokchedet-loma? lapu kali.
Pima alangli Moses aphan pulo, “Neli methang aning kehang aling aphansi neli ingjinsoji lapen neli methang aning kehang aling aphansi neli inghonji.”
Tangte lahelo, monit aning kehang kalite keklem akam apot-le Arnam kangvai kali, bonta Arnam kangjinsoji aning hang-lo apotsi alangli ingvailo.

Pima Arnam Ijip adet arecho Pharoh aphan kepu alam hastro along ketok lapuson helo, “Nangli pen ajok neli methang ajakong kechepaklangji lapen pirthe adang neli men kepachethangji aphansi neli nangliphan recho nangpaplang-lo.”
Tangte lahelo, Arnam ke amethang aning kehang aling aphan ingjinso lapen amethang aning kehang aling aphan aning pangtang.
Bonta nanglitum angbong mane abang neliphan puji tahai, “Jongsi lake lapusonlo tangte, Arnam kopusi monit aphan adai ketin thek langma? Arnam aning kehang matsi khang unjima?”
Bonta, oh jirpo, Arnam aphan kehili dunji abang nangli komatma? Longle aphule ke kethip abang aphan “Nephan kopi apotsi lason nethiprong-loma?” pu pupe.

Phule kethip abang isipet alongle angkleng pen amethang aning kehang aling kethipji lapen isipet alongle angkleng pen hini aphule, isi ke aman kedo aphan lapen isi ke kaike ke-en-iji aphan kethipji ajakong do, kalima?

Arnam keklemta lasonthot-lo. Alangli amethang aning kethi lapen amethang ajakong kechepaklangji aning hang-lo. Lasi kevirdet nangji atum, atheke alangli ning kethi kepho nangji atum aphan alangli aning chepading-lo.

Lapen alangli amethang kethepik adak atur kechepaklangji aning hang-lo. Ilitum aphan, atheke aphrang pen kepathiktang, la alangli akangjinso kelongji atheng, lapen alangli methang adak atur kepalongjisi kepathiktang atum aphan alangli labangso adak atur pilo.
Pima ilitumke alangli kepha tang amonit atumlo, atheke Jihudi atum angbong penchot kali, bonta Jihudi kalidet atum angbong penta alangli phalo.
Hosea aloh along Arnam kepu alam ketok lapuson helo,
“Ne nemethang amonit kalidet atum aphan
‘Ne methang amonit’ pusi pupo.
Ne kechinghonhedet akhei aphan ‘ne kechinghon abang’ pusi ne pupo.
Lapen halatum aphan, ‘Nangtum ke ne methang amonit kali,’
pu kepu adimsi,
halatum aphan kereng-et a-Arnam asopo atum pusi pudetji.”
Lapen Isaiah hangsersi Israel alamjir pulo, “Israel amonit atum talo akung asangti asonthak thak dopik setta halatum angbong pen ong-e atumsi jokchotji;
pima Hemphu amethang alam atengsi pirthe athak pachekok dapprangji, lapen eboipetsi kaike aphan pachekok pameji.”

Lake Isaiah aphrang pen kepu asonthak thak-lo, atheke alangli pulo, “Jakong theparpik abang, Hemphule ilitum aphan eso-esu epitekang ke asonte ilitum Sodom lapen Gomorrah arongsopi asonthak thak cheplangdetji apot-lo.”
Tangte ilitum kopisi pu apot-loma? Alam ke lahelo: Jihudi kalidet atum Arnam angno dhoromi keplangji aphan bor-i-elo setta halatum Arnam aphan kroilo apotsi Arnam halatum aphan dhoromi pu lakhalo.
Bonta Israel atum ke Arnam angno dho-romi keplangji aphan aron rilo setta halatum la longledet-lo.
Kopi apotma? Pima halatum kekroi penle kebor-i kali, bonta amethang akam pensi bor-ilo. “Kepatekung-i a-arlongsi” halatum pate-kung-lo.
Atheke hastro pulo,
“Langtha, Zaion athak ne monit atum kepatekung-i lapen kepachingkoi-i a-arlong bipo.
Bonta alangliphan kekroi abang ke therakjokplotpo.”
Korte marli atum, neli methang amonit atum kejok kelongji aphan neli ning hangpik-lo, lapen neli halatum aphan Arnam angno choningripiverlo!
Halatum Arnam aphan matha-elo pu neli haki chodun un, bonta halatum kechinipame penle kematha-e kali.

Arnam monit atum aphan dhoromi kepaplang aron halatum chininedetsi dhoromi keplangji aphan amethang methang abidi pen kebi aron kepathirjisi bor-ilo. Lasi Arnam monit aphan dhoromi kepaplang aron halatum dengdedet-lo.
Pima kekroi abangphutin dhoromi keplang longji aphan Khristosi Aron pajutdet-lo.
Monit atum Aron kekroi pen ajok dhoromi keplang alam Moses ketok lapuson helo: “Aron ahukum ateng keklem abangphutin labangso Aron pen ajok rengji.”
Bonta kekroi pen ajok dhoromi keplang alam hastro kepudam lapuson helo: “Sining angsong matsi arlu dampoma pu nangmethang aning arlo chepuri.” (Atheke, Khristo aphan nangkepahirji aphan).
Lapen ke, “Aklong kave aherangpi along matsi hirdamjima puta puri.” (Atheke, Khristo aphan kethitang atum angbong pen kevanji aphan.)
La hastro kepudam alam lahelo: “Arnam alam ke nanglitum adungsi dolo, nangde nangingtur along lapen nangning arlosi dolo.” Netum kepachethang akekroi alam lahelo.
Nanglide, nangli ingho pen “Jisu helo Hemphulo,” pu chekobirlote, lapen Arnam alangliphan kethitang atum angbong pen pathursi parengthulo pule nangli ning arlo pen kroilote nangli jokji.
Pima monit atum aning pen kroisi dhoromi plangji, lapen ade-angtur pen chekobirsi jokji.
Hastro pulo, “Alangliphan kekroi abang aling aphan ke patherak-re-detji.”

Labangso alam ke kadokave aphansi pudamlo. Pima Jihudi lapen Jihudi kalidet atum angbong thangnat akeprekta avelo, atheke kadokave a-Hemphu inutpet, lapen alangliphan kehang atum an aphan alangli ahirjume pi-o.
Atheke hastro pulo, “Hemphu amen aphan kehang abangphutin jokji.”

Bonta halatum jongsi kroikre tangte, halatum kopusi alangliphan hangthekjima? Lapen halatum jongsi alangli lamjir arjulongle tangte, halatum kopusi kroithekjima? Lapen alamjir thanthete halatum kopusonsi arjulongjima?
Lapen toite-te kopusi thandam thekjima? Atheke, hastro along ketok asonthotsi, “Birta Keme kevan atum akam ke ko-an alon kedo!”
Bonta halatum kadokave amat Birta Keme kroipettang-lo, lapu kali. Isaiah amethangsi pulo, “Hemphu, netum alam matsi kroiloma?”
Tangte lahelo, alam karjulong pen ajoksi monit atum kroithekji, lapen Khristo alamjir kepachethang pen ajoksi monit atum la arjulongji.
Bonta neli arjulang: Tangte labangso akepachethang alam halatum arjulonglelangma? Lapu kali! Atheke hastro pulo:
“Halatum ase pirthe adangta umphlup-lo,
halatum kepu alam pirthe kejut hei hei anta ledampet-lo.”
Lapen neli arjuthupo: Tangte Israel amonit atum chininedetma? Mosessi labangso alam thakdun paphrang-lo:
“Khei binong kalidet amonit atum pen ajoksi ne nangtum aphan kelang-un-e atum nangpaplangji,
lapen keludet akhei atum pen ajoksi ne nangtum aning pathiji.”
Lapen Isaiah ansose phereresi pulo,
“Nephan keriredet atumsi nephan long-lo,
nephan kehumrire atum aphansi ne cheklang-lo.”
Bonta Israel atum alamjir alangli lapusonsi pulo, “La kekroikre lapen kechingkinodak arat aphan ne losini neri deng-elo.”
Tangte neli arjulang: Arnam amethang amonit atum aphan obup-loma? Lapu kali! Neli methangta Israel amonit, Abraham asu lapen Benjamin akur amonit-lo.
Arnam aphrang pen kangvaitang, amethang amonit atum aphan obup-lo, lapu kali. Hastro along ketok, Elija Arnam angno Israel atum apharman kechoningri alam nanglitum chinilo, kalima?
Atheke Elija pulo, “Hemphu, halatum nang montri atum aphan pathikoilo, lapen nangdovan hei hei phri-et-lo; non kedo ke ne inutpet-lo, lapen halatum nephanta kepathijisi bor-ibomlo.”
Bonta Arnam alangliphan kopisi thakdunloma? Arnam thakdunsi pulo, “Kechobei arnam, Baal aphan kangdukde pinso amonit bang suri throksi aphan ne nemethang akam aphan chebilo.”
Lasonthak thaksi non ahutta Arnam amethang akangjinso pen kangvaitang penang an amonit dolang.

Arnam halatum aphan amethang akangjinso pensi ingvailo, halatum keklem akam apot kali. Pima jongsi monit atum amethang akam apotsi Arnam halatum aphan ingvailo tangte, alangli akangjinso ke ahok akangjinso kalilo.
Tangte kopilo? Israel atum ke amethang keri ason longledet-lo. Arnam kangvaitang, ake-ong-e asong atumsi la long-lo; akaprek atum an aphan ke aning pangtangrak-lo.
Atheke hastro along tok-lo, “Arnam halatum aning angthin pabuikluihak-lo; pini arni anta halatum amek pen thek-longle, ano pen arjulonglelo.”
Lapen David pulo,
“Halatum Achojun a-Mei ke halatum aphan ketot apham lapen alan lapen halatum aphan kepajang ahilik lapen aduk kanghoi-i ason paplang nang!
Halatum kethek-longledetji aphan halatum amek pangtingthip nang,
lapen halatum aphan kaike ahutta kesung anghor pen pamoikukjuknang.”

Tangte neli arjulang: Jihudi atum kepatekung ahut halatum chingkoisi virdet khangjang-loma? Lapu kali! Bonta Jihudi atum apap pen apotsi Jihudi kalidet atum aphan kepalang un-ejisi Jihudi kalidet atum along kejok vang-lo.

Jihudi atum apap pen apotsi pirthe athak hirjume vang-olo, lapen Jihudi atum karjong anat akedukdet pen apotsi Jihudi kalidet atum along hirjume vang-olo. Anke mo Jihudi atum anta kejok long lote, ko-an ahirjume ongpo!
Nonke neli nanglitum, Jihudi kalidet atum aphan nangpulang: Neli Jihudi kalidet atum angbong ketoitang abang keplanglong apot chepindakpo.
Neli methang akhei amonit atum nangpalangdun un-esi latum angbong pen penang atum aphan pajok unji tahai pusi neli mathalo.
Pima Arnam halatum aphan kekoirok pen ajok pirthe amonit Arnam pen chepajirpo long-lo. Tangte mo halatum aphan dengdet-lote kopi cheplangpo! Lake kethitang atum kerengthu asonthak thakpo.
Lapen Arnam aphan kepanong, aphrangsi ahim achet jongsi ingthir-et-lo tangte, ahim kangthimta ingthirlo, lapen erong athengpi angkur hei hei jongsi ingthir-et-lo tangte, aro hei hei anta ingthirlo.

Ke-e ajit athengpi arong penang aro ing-lokpettang-lo, lapen nampi ajit athengpi aro ladak pa-ok duntang-lo. Nanglitum, Jihudi kalidet atum ke nampi ajit athengpi asonthak thak-lo, lapen hala ke-e ajit arong along nampi ajit athengpi aro ale kelongdun asonthotsi nonke nanglitum Jihudi atum along karjong achethe longdunlo.
Tangte nanglitum hala kang-loktang aro atum aphan langrop-ri. Nanglitum kopusi chepindak unjima? Nanglita arochot; nanglile angkur aphan kepareng kali, angkursi nanglitum aphan parengtang-lo.
Bonta nanglitum puji tahai, “Lake ahok-lo, bonta arong along neliphan kepa-okdunji aphansi halabangso aro hei hei inglok-ettang-lo.”

Lake ahok tema. Halatum akekroikre apotsi halatum aphan ing-lokpet lo, bonta nanglitum ke akekroi kedo apotsi nanglitum hadak dothip-lo. Bonta labangso pen apot ke nanglitum chepindakri, bonta pherenon.
Arnam jongsi hala thengpi aro asonthakthak a-Jihudi atum aphan rairedet-lo tangte, alangli nanglitum aphanta rairedet binongji.

Tangte Arnam ke ko-an akechingkime lapen ko-an aning kesedeng abang-loma, lake ilitum thek-long-lo. Alangli hala pap keklem atum aphan amethang aning kesedeng paklang-lo, bonta nanglitum jongsi alangli akangjinso angkangsi dobom tangte, alangli nanglitum aphan ingjinsobomji, bonta nanglitum jongsi alangli akangjinso angkang dobombe tangte, nanglitum aphan jokta ing-lokpetji.
Lapen hala Jihudi atum amethang methang akekroikre che-olote, halatum aphan hala aphrang adim pa-okdunthudetji. Pima Arnam halatum aphan aphrang adim kepa-okdunthuji ajakong do.

Pima nanglitum aphan jongsi nampi ajit athengpi arong along pen ing-lokpetsi ke-e a-Jit athengpi arong along, aron kalidet setta pa-okdunlo tangte, hala aro binong aphan arong binong along pa-okdun-thuthedet jima!

Kortemarli atum, nanglitum ane kechepathethedetji aphan, nanglitum labangso akepatu ahok alam kechinijisi neli ning hang-lo. Alam ke lahelo, Israel atum aning kangtang kedoverji kali: bonta Jihudi kalidet atum Arnam adung kevang nangji aphai chokchetik ke halatum lapusonsi dobomjilang.
Lapen lapusonsi Arnam kadokave a-Israel atum aphan pajokji. Atheke hastro pulo,
“Zaion pensi Kepajok abang vangji,
alangli Jakob aso asu atum apap hei hei pakak-etji.
Lapen ne halatum apap hei hei kepakak ahut,
ne halatum pen labangso akechechak chebiji.”

Jihudi atum Birta Keme dengdedet-lo apotsi nanglitum Jihudi kalidet atum pen apot halatum Arnam ahotur plang-lo. Bonta Arnamsi halatum aphan ingvailo apotsi, halatum aphusar atum pen apot Arnam halatum aphan inghonbomlo.
Pima Arnam ke amethang kepi ahirjume lapen akepha chelarle.
Nanglitum, Jihudi kalidet atum aphrangke Arnam aphan kroikrelo; bonta nonke hala Jihudi atum akekroikre apotsi nanglitum Arnam akangjinso long-lo.
Lasonthotsi nanglitum kelong akangjinso pen ajok Jihudi atumta Arnam akangjinso kelongji aphansi halatum non Arnam aphan kroikrelo.
Kadokave amonit atum Arnam aphan akekroikre apotsi Arnam halatum aphan koidi asonthak thak paplang-lo. Halatum kadokave aphan kangjinso kepaklangthekji aphansi alangli la klemlo.
Arnam akangjinso ko-an akethe lapen agian lapen akechini ko-an akarsik! Alangli keparai alam hei hei matsi than pachinidak unjima? Alangli keklem athe matsi chini-unma?
Atheke hastro pulo,
“Hemphu aning matsi chini un ma?
Alangliphan matsi than pare thekjima?
Alangli kechetu nangji, lason aphan,
komatsi alangliphan paramloma?”
Pima alanglisi kadokave amar pinchong-lo, lapen alangli pen ajoksi lapen amethang aphansi kadokave amar padolo. Arnam adak atur kaiketa padonang! Amen

Tangte lahelo, kortemarli atum, Arnam ilitum aphan ekangjinso apot neli nanglitum aphan choningrilo: kereng-et a-Arnam akam aphan kepanongtang lapen Arnam aningkedok athok asonthak thak-le nanglitum Arnam aphan chehodainon. Nanglitum ahokpet kangduk akardom ke lahelo.

Nanglitum labangso apirthe amonit atum ason ke cheplangdunri; bonta nanglitum aning kechepami pen nanglitum chekirlanon. Anke Arnam aning kehang ason, atheke, kopisi akeme ma. Arnam aning kedok kopima, lapen kopisi akechok pamema, la nanglitum chini unpo.

Lapen Arnam neliphan nekepi akangjinso adan pen apot neli nangli-tum abangphutin aphan nang pulang: nanglitum methang a-ot pen apar ke nanglitum the-o pu chemathari, bonta Arnam nanglitum aphan kepi akekroi atengle nanglitum methang chemathanon.
Ilitum abangphutin abang arpum aro-arim do-o, lapen la aro-arim tinta akam prekjam.

Lason thak-thaksi ilitum abangphu ke do-o setta Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok ilitum abang arpum ke isipet-lo, lapen isi abang arpum along hala aro arim hei hei kecherap-het asonthak-thaksi ilitumta lahin lahin cherap-het-lo.
Lasi Arnam akangjinso ateng pen ilitum aphan ekepi akaprek kaprek adan pensi ilitum klem nangji; Ilitum jongsi Arnam alam kemontri adan do tangte, ilitum methang akekroi ateng pen la than nangji.
Ilitum jongsi keru-kethai adan do tangte, ilitum ru-thai nangji, kethan adanle do tangte, ili la than nangji.

Jongsi bang atum aphan aning kepathethek adan do tangte, aning pathenangji. Dan kepi abang aning keme pensi pi nangji. Jongsi keja abang tangte alangli kematha-e pensi klem nangji. Jongsi anut kaprek atum aphan kangjinso kepaklang abang tangte aning arong pensi la klem nangji.
Kanghon ke ning aklong pen nangji. Kehingno hijimra keme otthipnon.
Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok nanglitum akorte hijan angbong kechinghon asonthot-le lahin lahin chinghon seroinon. Nangmethang aphan apar lahin lahin aphan aman pimunon.
Selet-ledet-ra klem chepa-duknon. Hemphu aban asonthak thak-le ning aklong pen Hemphu akam klempinon.
Ningkethe kedo apot-le chehoknon, keduk-kesung ahut ning chepadingnon, lapen kaike ahutta Arnam ardomnon.
Kedo an amar pen kangthir atum akedorde ason rapdunnon, lapen nanglitum ahem alohi chaknon.
Nanglitum aphan kechenek atum aphan Arnam ahirjume hangpinon; ahok-lo, halatum aphan ahirjuno kepiji aphan kali, bonta ahirjume kepiji aphanle Arnam angno choningrinon.
Ning arong atum along ning chepa-rongdun non, kechiru atum along chirudunnon.
Nanglitum ning isipet penle donon. Thedung thedung akam riredet-ra bihek akam hei hei keklemjile ninghangnon. Nanglitum ane chepathiri. Nanglitum methang giani pu chemathari.
Komane abang nanglitum aphan kehingno klem setta nanglitum alangliphan kehingno pen alar huiri. kadokave angno akeme alingle klemnon.
Nanglitum methang ke, unte kadokave atum pen ning kang-sam pen kedojile kadokave asonta klem non.
Neli kechinghon atum, nanglitum alar chehuiri, bonta Arnam aning kethi aphan dim peknon. Pima hastro along tok-lo, “Hemphu pulo, alar kehui ke nekam, nesi alar huiji.”

Bonta hastro kepu asonthak thak-le, “Nangli hotur an kangchir ahut, nangli alangliphan an pinon; alangli lang kang-it ahut alangliphan lang pinon. Pima nangli lapuson keklem pen ajok nangli alangli phuthak me akri batpo.”
Kehingno nangliphan nangparem longri, bonta keme klemra kehingno aphan haivernon.
Abangphutinta det keja atum alam kroi masi. Pima Arnam aning kehang kalite baduta keja abang plang un-e, lapen non kedobom det keja atum aphan Arnamsi bat-lo.
Lasi keja abang ahukum kekroikre abang ke Arnam kepathiktang alamsi kekroikrelo, lapen lapuson keklem abang aling ke amethang aphuthak kangsai chevanpo.

Pima akeme keklem atum ke det kepangri atum aphan kephere nangji ason ave, bonta kehingno keklem atum ke halatum aphan phere nangji. Nangli Keja abang aphan kephere nangnedetji aphan ning hangma? Tangte akemele klemnon, anke nangli alangli pen akero longpo.

Pima alangli ke nanglitum aphan kepameji aphan Arnam aban kecheplang abang-lo. Bonta nangli jongsi kehingno klemlo tangte, nangli pherenon, pima alangli akejoijepi ke nokjir en-e. Alangli ke Arnam abanlo, kehingno keklem atum aphan Arnam aning kethi ateng kepasung abang-lo.
Lasi Arnam nangpasungdet-na pu aphanchot kali, bonta lake nanglitum keklem nangji akamlo pusi nanglitum aning-angthinta pulo apotsi nanglitum det keja atum alam kroi nangji.
Labangso apotsi nanglitumta midu pibomlo, pima det keja atum ke Arnam aban atumlo, labangso akam aphansi halatum chehodailo.

Tangte nanglitum halatum aphan kepi nangji ason an pinon: Jongsi midu kepi nangji do tangte, midu pinon, khajona kepi nangji do tangte, khajona pinon, kephere nangji abang aphan pherenon, man kepi nangji abang aphan man pinon.
Kanghon apreng apar ke badu alongta nanglitum apreng pado longri. Anut kaprek aphan kanghon abang ke Aron kroipet-lo.

Pima beisa klemri, bang apran enri, chonghuri, bang amar konri pu ahukum hei hei, lapen la apar akaprek ahukumta isipet ahukum along, atheke, “Nangmethang aphan kechinghon asonthot-le tebok abang aphan chinghonnon,” pu ahukum angbongsi dopet-lo.
Anut kaprek aphan kanghon abang ke alangli halatum aphan kehingno klemkle. Lasi kanghon helo Aron kekroi binong-lo.

Nanglitum la klemvek nangji, pima nonke kopi ahut-loma, lake nanglitum chinilo: nanglitum mek keprang nangji ahut nangle tang-lo. Pima Arnam ilitum aphan kepajokji arni ke, aphrang ilitum kekroicheng arni pen apar non tebok muchot-lo.
Ajo jutji dokdok-lo, non the-angji dokdok-lo. Tangte ilitum kangting angbong keklem akam che-olonang lapen kethe-ang angbong ron kechedanji aphan erisim che-en lonang.

Akejoijepi akecho kejun, kalite, hor kangri pen kali; beisa lapen ketherakmeme akam pen kali, kechebohong lapen kechelang un-e pen kali, bonta anerlo akethe-ang angbong kedo atum asonthak thak-le ilitum e-ot keme pen dolonang.
Bonta nanglitum Hemphu Jisu Khristole chepindengnon, lapen ok aning kehang kepaplengji aphan ke adim pek-rinon.
Kekroi ajakong kave abang aphan dengnon, bonta alangli akematha alam hei hei pen apot ke alangli pen lam chehiliri.
Mane abang ke pholok aling cho tame pusi mathaji, bonta kekroi ajakong kave abang ke ajat a-okta choche.
Pholok aling kecho abang hala kechorupre abang aphan ingsai nangnelo, lapen ajat a-ok kechoche abang hala kechorup abang aphan ingsai nangnelo, pima Arnam alangliphan dengtang-lo.

Bang aban aphan kangsaiji abang, nangli komatma? Alangli arjap setta, kalite krep setta, alangli amethang a-Hemphu angnosi krepji mate arjapji. Lapen alangli arjapji, pima Hemphu alangliphan keparjapji ajakong do.

Akaprek arni hei hei apar isi a-arni abang memu pusi komane abang matha, bonta anut kaprek atum ke, kadokave a-arnita chingbarpet-lo pusi matha. Abangphutinta amethang methang akematha alam chokpamelo pu cheputhek pame nangji.

Hala isi a-arni abang memuchot pu kematha abangta hemphu anong aphansi la mathalo, hala kechorup abangta Hemphu anong aphansi la klemlo, pima alangli Hemphu aphan kero pilo. Ok kechoche abangta Hemphu anong aphansi la klemlo, lapen alanglita Hemphu aphan kero pilo.
Ilitum baduta emethang methang aphan rengchot nangnelo, ilitum baduta emethang methang aphan thichot nangnelo.

Ilitum jongsi reng-lo tangte, ilitum Hemphu anong aphansi reng-lo, lapen ilitum jongsi thilo tangte, ilitum Hemphu anong aphansi thilo. Tangte ilitum thi tame, kalite reng settame, ilitumke Hemphu amonit atumlo.
Pima kereng-etlang lapen kethitang atum a-Hemphu kecheplangjisi Khristo thilo, lapen rengthusi thurlo.
Tangte nangli kopi apotsi nangli korte aphan ingsailoma? Lapen nangli kopi apotsi nangli korte aphan langremloma? Pima ilitum kadokaveta Arnam akangsai angno arjapji.
Pima hastro pulo,
“Hemphu pulo, neke reng-et binong-lo,
asonthotsi abangphutinta ne ingno akengphu patongji.
Lapen ne helo Arnamlo pu abangphutinta chekobirji.”
Lasi ilitum abangphutinta Arnam angno emethang methang akam alakha chepinangji.

Tangte lahelo, non pen apara ilitum lahin lahin aphan chingsai nangnelo. Labangso alar nanglitum akorte atovar along kepatekung-i athengtut, kalite kekhang-i amar kaiketa bibelo pule nangning mathathipnon.

Neli Hemphu Jisu pen kechelangpet pen ajok, neli chinipamelo, thangnat amarta amethang amat ke thangnat akangthirtheta ave, bonta inut abang jongsi isi amar aphan ingthirthe pusi kroilo tangte, alangliphan ke labangso amar ingthirthedettang-lo.

Nangli jongsi nangli kecho amar pen ajok nangli korte aphan aning aduk pilo tangte, nanglike kanghon penle keklem kalilo. Nangli kopine amar kecho pen ajok hala Khristo amethang apran kechepidet abang aphan pavirlongri.
Anut kaprek atum nangli mesen pu kehok ason aphan hingno pu papinrem longlenang.
Pima Arnam a-Rat ke kecho kejun alam kali, bonta lake Karjong Kangthir pen ajok dhoromipet pen kedo, ning kangsam lapen ning arong helo.
Lapen Khristo aphan lapuson keklempi abang ke Arnam aning padok, lapen monit aphanta aning padok.
Tangte, ilitum angbong ning akechingsam kevanji lapen lahin lahin akekroi kechepathirjile ilitum kaiketa bor-ilonang.
Kecho amar pen ajok Arnam keklemtang akam pavirri, kado-kave amarta chotame tema, tebonta kecho amar pen ajok bang aphan pap kepaklo ke hingno.
Nangli korte jongsi pap klodetji tangte, nangli ok choche, hor junje, kalite lason akaprek akamta klemkledetsi keme.

Lahei hei alam aphuthak nangli methang akekroi alam ke nangli lapen Arnam angbongle pachinichotnang. Inut amonit eson akam mesen pu mathasi klemdet aphi amethang aphan ado kechepado movedet abang rengme.
Bonta choji choche, lason aning ketekuk-rem abang ke, cholote Arnam alangliphan ado pado. Pima alangli kekroi penle kecho kalilo. Klem aling setta kekroi penle paklongra keklem kalite pap-lo.
Ili kekroi ajakong kedo atum hala kekroi ajakong kave atum akesung anghor endunsi rapdun nangji. Ilitum emethang aning kedok akam klemchot nangnelo.
Bonta ilitum akorte atum akekroi kepathirjile, halatum akeme aphan, ilitum halatum aphan aning kepadok akam klem nangji.
Pima Khristota amethang aning kedok akam klemchotchelo. Bonta hastro kepu asonthotsi plang-lo, atheke la pulo, “Nangliphan kepinrem atum akepinrem an nephuthak klotang-lo.”
Hastro ilitum aphan ning ekepading lapen ning ekerung pen ajok ilitum aning kethe kedoji aphansi, hastro along ketok alam anke ilitum aphan ekethanji aphansi tok-lo.
Lapen nanglitum Jisu Khristo along kecharlidun pen ajok nanglitum ning isi pet pen kedoji aphan ning kepading lapen ning kepathe a-Arnam nanglitum aphan nangparapnang.
Anke nanglitum ning isipet pen lapen angdi isipet pen Arnam, atheke e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo a-Po aphan ro-archothekpo.
Tangte, Arnam adak atur kepatheji aphan Khristo nanglitum aphan kedeng asonthot-le nanglitum lahin lahin aphan dengnon.
Pima neli nanglitum aphan thanlo, Arnam ke kekroi thirklong abang-lo pu kepaklangji, Arnam Jihudi atum aphusar atum aphan kechak alam kepachekokji,
lapen Arnam akangjinso apot Jihudi kalidet atumta Arnam aphan kero karchothekji aphansi Khristo Jihudi atum aban cheplang-lo. Atheke hastro along tok-lo,
“Lasi Jihudi kalidet atum angbong ne nangphan roji.
ne nangphan lun pen ro-archoji.”
Lapen pulo,
“Jihudi kalidet atum,
Nanglitum hala Arnam kangvaitang amonit atum pen pen chehoknon!”
Lapen ako pulo,
“Jihudi kalidet atum an, nangtum Hemphu aphan ro archonon;
kadokave akhei atum, nangtum alangliphan ro-archonon!”
Lapen Isaiah puthulo,
“Jesse asu angbong pen inut nangklangji;
Jihudi kalidet atum aphuthak recho kechojisi alangli vangji,
lapen halatum alangliphansi aning chethepetji.”
Karjong Kangthir ajakong pen ajok nanglitum aning kethe ke-ongbomji aphan, ning kepathe a-Arnam aphan nanglitum akekroi pen ajok alangli nanglitum aning arong lapen aningkangsam paplengsetnang.
Korte marli atum, nanglitum ke keme-o atumlo, nanglitum kadokave alam chini, lapen nanglitum lahin lahin chepare seroi un pu neli kroi pamelo.

Bonta nanglitum aphan penang alam kepachematha-thujisi neli phererepin pen aphrang ketoktang penang alam tokthusi non nanglitum aphan nang-lolo. Neli Jihudi kalidet atum aphan keklempiji aphan Arnam akangjinso pen Khristo aban keplanglong apotsi neli lapuson phererepin pen tok-lo.

Jihudi kalidet atum Arnam aning kedok athok, atheke Karjong Kangthir pen ajok Arnam aphan kepanongtang athok keplangthekji aphansi neli Arnam pen kevang a-Birta Keme kepachethang akurusar ason klembomlo.
Tangte, neli Jisu Khristo pen chelangpetsi Arnam akam keklem apot neli kechepindakji athe do.

Pima Jihudi kalidet atum aphan Arnam ahukum kepakroiji aphan, lam lapen kam pen, angthek hei hei ajakong pen lapen kemanghumeme akam hei hei pen, lapen Karjong Kangthir ajakong pen Khristo neli pen ajok keklemtang akam alamjirsi neli thanhaichotji.
Lasi Jerusalem pen than pangchengsi Illirikam adet anta neli damsi Khristo alamjir a-Birta Keme pachethang tang-lo.
Lasi bang kepangnitang ahemthur athak neli kekimji ning hanghedetsi Khristo alamjir karjulonglepinlang adimsi Birta Keme kepachethangji neli ning hang-lo.
Atheke hastro along tok-lo,
“Alangli lamjir kethan karju longlepinlang atumsi thek-longji,
lapen alangli lamjir karju longlepinlang atumsi chinipameji.”
Labangso apotsi neli nanglitum along abatai bataita vangthekthedet titilo.
Bonta nonke neli labangso ahavar hei hei angbong kam keklem patangtang-lo, lapen penang aningkan pen neli nanglitum along kevangji aphan ning hang-olo apotsi,

non neli Spein adet kedamji ahut nanglitum along vang unpo pusi ning thelo. Spein adet kedam ahut tovar neli nanglitum along nangvurthekji lapen nanglitum pen neli penang arni dorap rap det aphi neli Spein adet kepaleji aphan nanglitum neliphan nerap dunji pusi neli ning thelo.
Tebonta non amat ke neli kangthir atum aphan keru kethaiji aphan Jerusalem kedamjisi barpo.
Pima Jerusalem kedo kangthir atum angbong keduk kelak atum aphan kerapdunjisi Masidonia lapen Grik adet kedo amondoli mate kroi-asong atum aning arong pen dan kepiji aphan cheparaitang-lo.

Halatum amethang aning kehang pensi halabangso alam cheparailo. Lapen ahok-lo, halatum ke hala keduk kelak atum aphan kerapdun nangji atumlo; pima Jihudi kalidet atumta Jihudi atum along Arnam pen kelong karjong ahirjume longdunlo; lasi Jihudi kalidet atum ke amethang akhi pen halatum aphan rapdun nangpo.
Neli labangso akam klem patangdet lote lapen halatum aphan kerungpi adan an halatum arideng hodaidet lote, neli Spein adet dampo, lapen kedam ahut tovar nanglitum along nangvurpo.
Lapen neli chinilo, mo neli nanglitum along kevangji ahut neli Khristo ahirjume keplengset pensi vangpo.

Korte marli atum, e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo aphan ili kekroi apot lapen Karjong ilitum aphan kepi akanghon pen apot neli nanglitum aphan choningrilo; neli Arnam cho-ardombomlo; nanglitumta neliphan Arnam neardompitha.
Judia adet kedo Khristo aphan kekroikrelang atum arideng pen neli kejokji lapen Jerusalem arongsopi along kedo kangthir atum neli keponpi adan longsi aning arong kedojile Arnam ardomtha.
Lapen Arnam jongsi aning hangte, lapusonsi, neli ning arong plengset pen nanglitum along vangji, lapen nanglitum pen chetongsi neli ning arongji lapen jakong mithulongji.
Ningkangsam kepi a-Arnam nanglitum kadokave along padonang! Amen.
Neli nanglitum aphan pachinilo, ilitum angjir, Phobe ke inut mesen abangpilo. Alangli ke Senkria arongsopi kedo amondoli mate kroi-asong adikonpilo.

Arnam amonit atum keklem nangji asonthot-le nang-litum Hemphu amen pen alangliphan chaknon, lapen alangli nanglitum pen akerap kenangji ason an nanglitum alangliphan rapdunnon; pima alangli methangta ake-ongpi amonit atum aphan rapdunlo lapen neliphanta nerapdunlo.
Neli pen Khristo akam keklem rap rap atum, Prisilla lapen Akkuila aphan neli kardom pi iktha.
Alanglitum neliphan ajok kethi aphan anta phereredet-lo. Neli alanglitum aphan chorolo, lapen neli anchot kali, Jihudi kalidet atum amondoli mate kroi-asong anta alanglitum aphan chorolo.

Hala amethang ahem along kechingrumbom amondoli mate kroi-asong aphanta neli kardom pi iktha. Neli kechinghon abang, Epanetas aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha. Asia adet Khristo aphan kekroicheng abang alangli helo.
Nanglitum aphan jasemet nangkechepadukpi abang, Meri aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha.

Neli sonthak thak a-Jihudi atum, Andronikas lapen Junias aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha. Alanglitumke neli pen phatek jang rap rap-lo. Alanglitumke Khristo aketoitang atumlo, lapen alanglitum aphan kadokave atum chinipamelo. Neli Khristo aphan kekroikre ako penta halatum ke Khristian planget-lo.
Neli kechinghon a-Khristian, Ampliatas aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha.
Neli pen Khristo akam keklem rap rap abang, Urbanas lapen neli kechinghon ajirpo, Stekhis aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha.
Apellas aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha. Alangli ke Khristo aphan kekroi thirklong abang-lo pusi monit atum puhurlo. Aristobulas ahem ehum amonit atum aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha.
Herodian aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha; alanglita neli sonthak thak a-Jihudilo, lapen Narkisas ahem amonit atum angbong pen Khristian keplangtang atum aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha.

Hemphu akam jasemet keklem kechepaduk atum, Triphana lapen Traiphas aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha, lapen Hemphu aphan jasemet kam keklem kechepadukpi abang neli kechinghon a-Parsis aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha.
Hemphu akam keklem anong kethedung abang, Rufus aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha, lapen alangli pei aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha. Alangli neliphan amethang asopo asonthotsi chemathalo.
Asinkritas, Phlegon, Harmes, Patrobas, Harmas, lapen halatum along kedo Khristian akorte atum an aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha.
Philologas lapen Julia, Nereus lapen alangli ingjirpi, Olimpas lapen halatum along kedo Arnam amonit an aphanta neli kardom pi-iktha.
Kangthir akar-u pen nanglitum kardom chepiseroinon. Khristo amondoli mate kroi-asong atum an nanglitum aphan kardom nangpi-dunlo.

Korte marli atum, neli nanglitum aphan choningrilo: nanglitum kecharlitang alam pen kechingbarbe alam thansi monit atum angbong abe abe kethak, lapen monit atum aphan pap kepaklem atum aphan pangtheknon, lapen halatum pen chepahelonon.

Pima lason keklem atum ke e-Hemphu Khristo aphan keklempi atum kalilo, bonta amethang methang apok aphansi klemlo. Halatum alam kedok pen lapen kero parlin alam pensi thangta kechinine atum aphan chobeibomlo.

Pima nanglitum birta keme kekroi thirklong-lo, lake kadokave atum angno klangdak-lo. Lasi nanglitum pen apot neli ning arong-lo. Nanglitum keme alam anat giani keplangji, bonta kehingno anat ado kavedetjisi neli ning hang-lo.
Lapen ning kangsam ekepi a-Arnam prapjin pen Soitan aphan pavirsi nanglitum akengpak arum biji.
E-Hemphu Jisu Khristo akangjinso nanglitum along padonang.
Neli long kam keklem nangkeche-rapdun abang, Timothi, lapen neli sonthak thak a-Jihudi atum, Lusias, Jemon lapen Sosipater jokta nanglitum aphan kardom nangpidunlo.
Labangso aloh ketok abang, neli, Tortias jokta nanglitum aphan Khristian akardom nangpidunlo.

Neliphan lapen mondoli amonit atum aphan amethang ahem kechak abang, Gaias jokta nanglitum aphan kardom nangpidunlo. Labangso arong-sopi atangka kerim abang, Erastas lapen ekorte Kuartas jokta nanglitum aphan kardom nangpidunlo.
E-Hemphu Jisu Khristo akang-jinso nanglitum kadokave along padonang! Amen.

Tangte ilitum Arnam adak atur pathelonang! Neli kepachethang a-Jisu Khristo alamjir a-Birta Keme, lapen suri suri aningkan pen kepatu, bonta nonke keklangtang, akedip joi ahok alam ateng pen Arnam ke nanglitum akekroi pathir un.

Bonta nonke Arnam amontri atum ketok alam pen ajok labangso ahok alam klangdak-lo; lapen kadokave amonit atum Arnam aphan kroisi ahukumta kekroijisi kaita kerengver a-Arnam hukum pisi labangso alam kadokave akhei aphan pachinidak-lo.
Arnam ke inutnat; alangli ke kadokave asonta gianilo. Jisu Khristo pen apot ilitum labangso Arnam aphan kejut un-e akai apar akai anta adak atur pathelonang! Amen.
Jisu Khristo aketoitang abang keplangji aphan Arnam aning kehang pen kephatang abang, neli Pol-si, ekorte, Sosthenes pen pen labangso aloh

Korinth arongsopi kedo Arnam amondoli mate kroi-asong, atheke Khristo Jisu pen kechelangpet pen ajok, Arnam amethang aphan kechepanongtang lapen kangthir atum keplangjisi Arnam kephatang atum aphan tok-lo. Lapen lake bithe bitha kedo, ilitum lapen halatum a-Hemphu Jisu Khristo aphan kangduk kardom atum aphantalo.
Epo Arnam lapen Hemphu Jisu Khristo nanglitum aphan kangjinso lapen ningkangsam nangpapinang.
Arnam nanglitum aphan Jisu Khristo pen ajok kangjinso nangkepi apot neli Arnam aphan kaiketa roverlo.
Pima nanglitum Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok, nanglitum lam kethan lapen kechini un ajakong pen pen ajat ason anatthuta plang-otang-lo.
Khristo alamjir kepachethangtang alam nanglitum kroithiptang-lo.
Lasi e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo kecheklangji ahut aphan nanglitum kanghongphrong ahut nanglitum karjong adan an longpettang-lo.
E-Hemphu Jisu Khristo a-Arni nanglitum thang adota kavedetji aphan, mo kejut anta alangli nanglitum akekroi pathirji.
Amethang a-Sopo, atheke e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo pen ilitum aphan kepachelangpetji aphan ilitum aphan kepha a-Arnam ke kechiki ening thek-long abang-lo.

E-Hemphu Jisu Khristo amen pen neli nanglitum aphan choningrilo, kortemarli atum, nanglitum angbong abe abe kavedetjile nanglitum lahin lahin alam chekroinon. Nanglitum isipet akematha lapen aning kehang pen dora chelangpetnon.
Pima, kortemarli atum, nanglitum angbong kechebohong dolo pusi ingjir Kloh ahem penang amonit atum neliphan thanlo.

Neli kepudam alam lahelo, nanglitum abangphutinta kepu prek-jamlo. Inut abang pulo, “Neli ke Pol asangho”, anut kaprek abang pulo, “Neli ke Apollos asangho,” lapen hala anut kaprek abang pulo, “Neli ke Pitor asangholo,” lapen hala anut kaprekthu abang pulo, “Neli ke Khristo asangholo.”
Tangte Khristo aphan thakdak tang-loma? Nanglitum aphan thengparpan athak nangkethipi abang ke Pol heloma? Mate, Pol amen pensi nanglitum aphan baptisom nangpiloma?
Neli Gaias lapen Khrispas aphan apar ke badu aphanta baptisom pipelang; la apotsi neli Arnam aphan chorolo.
Tangte nanglitum aphan neli men pensi baptisom pilo pu baduta pu un-e.
(Oh ahok-lo, neli Stephanas lapen alangli hem ehum amonit aphanta baptisom pilo; bonta la pen apar ke neli komane aphan baptisom kepi chethek-longle.)

Pima Baptisom kepiji aphanle Khristo neliphan neketoi kali, bonta Birta Keme kepachethangji aphansi Khristo neliphan netoilo. Khristo thengparpan athak akethi ke thang ajakongta ave, lason keplangpledetjisi neli monit agian pen Birta Keme thanthedet-lo.
Pima kevirbom atum aphan ke, Khristo thengparpan athak kethi ke kelu alamlo; bonta ili kejok kelongbom atum aphan ke, lake Arnam ajakong-lo.
Pima hastro along tok-lo,
“Neli giani atum agian pavirji,
lapen abidi kedo atum abidi thangta kalidet paplangji.”
Tangte giani abang konat-lo? Aron thekser abang konat-lo? Kalite, labangso apirthe athak lam kechedan thekser atum konat-lo? Labangso apirthe agian ke akelu alamlo pusi Arnam paklangtang-lo, kalima?

Pima monit atum amethang agian pen Arnam aphan kechini un-edetji aphansi Arnam amethang agian pen la klemlo. Bonta la nelitum kepache-thang, atheke akelu alam pen ajoksi Arnam ke kekroi atum aphan kepajokji aning hang-lo.
Pima Jihudi atum ke ahok aporman kelongji aphan kemanghumeme angthek hei hei hang-lo, lapen Grik atum ke giansi rilo.
Bonta nelitum ke thengparpan athak kethi abang, Khristo alamjirsi than-pachethang-lo. Jihudi atum aphan ke lake kepatekung-i amarlo, lapen Jihudi kalidet atum aphan ke lake kelu alamlo.
Bonta Arnam kephatang atum aphan ke, Jihudi tame kalite, Jihudi kalidet atum settame, Khristo ke Arnam ajakong lapen agianlo.
Pima monit atum agian apar Arnam akelu remulo, lapen monit atum ajakong apar Arnam ajakong kave ingtangmulo.

Kortemarli atum, Arnam nanglitum aphan nangkepha ahut nanglitum kopuson amonit loma, lale chemathanon. Monit atum akematha anat penle langdamlote nanglitum angbong giani, jakong kedo lapen kur kangtui atum ong-e.
Bonta giani atum aphan kepatherakjisi pirthe athak akelu atum aphan Arnam ingvailo lapen ajakong kedo atum aphan kepatherakjisi pirthe athak ajakong kave atum aphan ingvailo.
Pirthe aron ateng pen kethe kechekrong atum aphan thangta kalidet kepaplangjisi pirthe athak akur kangdei, kelangremrok lapen thangta kalidet atum aphan Arnam ingvailo.
La apotsi Arnam angno baduta chepindak un-elo.
Bonta Arnamsi nanglitum aphan Jisu Khristo pen nangpachelangpet-lo, lapen Arnam Ilitum aphan Jisu Khristo pen ajoksi giani, dhoromi epaplang-lo, epangthirlo, lapen pap pen epejok-lo.
Lasi hastro along ketok asonthotsi, “Kechepindakji aning kehang abang ke Hemphu keklemtang akam apot-le pachepindaknang.”
Korte marli atum, neli nanglitum along vangsi Arnam alamjir akepatu ahok alam kepachethang ahut, neli lam kangtui pen, kalite kangtuiving agian pen thanthelo.
Pima neli nanglitum angbong kedo ahut Jisu Khristo alamjir lapen jasemet ke alangli thengparpan athak kethi alamjir apar ke, kadokave alamta ketengne-etjisi neli ning chepathik-lo.
Lasi neli nanglitum along kevang ahut neli jakong avelo, lapen kephere pen neli ok klemhurlo.

Monit agian pen kepu akereset alam pen neli thanthedet-lo lapen pache-thangthedet-lo, bonta neli kethan lapen kepachethang alam ke ahok alamlo, lake Arnamsi amethang a-Karjong ajakong pen aporman pilo.
Tangte, nanglitum akekroi ke monit atum agianle kepaklong kalilo, bonta Arnam ajakongsi paklong-lo.

Tebonta karjong anat kangtang pame atum aphan nelitum eson agian alam thanlo. Bonta lake labangso apirthe agian kali, mate labangso apirthe kechepahemphu atum, atheke ajakong nangkavebom atum agian alam kali.

Arnam akepatu agian alamsi neli pachethang-lo. Arnam monit atum aphan labangso alam pachininedet-lo, bonta ilitum Arnam adak atur kelongdunji aphan Arnam pirthe pinchongche ako pen labangso agian ingvailo.

Labangso apirthe kechepahemphu atum ke baduta labangso agian chininedet-lo. Halatum chini asonte, Arnam adak atur kedo abang aphan, atheke keplangcheng a-Hemphu aphan thengparpan athak pathithedetji apot-lo.
Bonta hastro along ketok asonthotsi,
“Baduta kethek-longlepinlang,
kalite, karjulonglepinlang lapen lason plangji pu baduta kemathathepinlang asonsi.
Arnam aphan kanghon atum aphan Arnam ke thikpilo.”
Bonta Arnam amethang a-Karjong pen ajoksi ilitum aphan labangso ake-patu alam epaklang-lo. Pima Karjong ke kadokave alamta rithei, Arnam akematha akarsik alam anta ridam.
Monit amethang akematha alam ke amethangsi chechini; lasonthotsi Arnam akematha alam ke Arnam a-Karjongsi chinichot.
Ilitum labangso apirthe akarjongle kelong kali; bonta Arnam kangjinso pen ekepi adan hei hei ilitum kechinithekji aphan Arnam pen kevang a-Karjongsi ilitum long-lo.
Tangte lahelo, Karjong Kangthir kelongtang atum aphan nelitum karjong alam kethan ahut monit agian pen kevang alam hei hei penke thanthelo, bonta Karjong pen kevang alam hei hei pensi thanlo.

Bonta Karjong Kangthir kelongle abang ke Arnam kepi adan hei hei deng un-e: Lason amonit ke hala hei hei alam chinine binong; lahei hei alam ke kelu alamlo pusi alangli matha, pima hala hei hei alam ke karjong ajakong pensi chini unchot.
Bonta Karjong Kangthir kedo abang ke kadokave alamta chini un, bonta alangliphan ke baduta ingsai un-e.
Hastro along ketok asonthotsi,
“Hemphu aning kematha alam matsi chinima?
Alangliphan matsi than-pare unma?
Bonta nelitum ke Khristo aning kematha asonthotsi mathalo.”

Bonta kortemarli atum, Karjong Kangthir kedo atum aphan asonthak thak-ke neli nanglitum aphan pu un-edet-lo, bonta ok aphan kematha atum, atheke Khristo aphan akekroi anat osoheklang atum aphan asonthak thaksi neli nanglitum aphan nangpu nangkok-lo.
Neli nanglitum aphan moklangsi nangpi nangkok-lo, an kangtang kali, pima nanglitum an kangtang ke chothekthelang.

Nanglitum non anta ok aphansi mathabomlang. Nanglitum angbong kechelang un-e lapen kechebohong do. La apotsi nanglitum ke ok aning kehang atengsi dobomlang, lapen Arnam aphan kechinine amonit atum asonthak thaksi klembomlang, kalima?
Nanglitum angbong inut abang pulo, “Neli ke Pol asangho,” lapen anut kaprek abang pulo, “Neli ke Apollos asangho;” lasi nanglitum ke Arnam aphan kechinine amonit atum asonsi klembomlo, kalima?

Tangte Apollos komat-lo? Lapen Pol komat-lo? Nelitumke Arnam aban atumchot; nelitum pen ajoksi nanglitum Khristo aphan kroilo. Hemphu nelitum abangphutin aphan nekepaklemtoi akamsi nelitum abangphutinta klembomlo.
Neli elo; Apollos lang chorlo; bonta Arnamsi la pachingjok-lo.
Lasi ke-e abang thangta kali, lapen lang kechor abangta thangta kali, bonta akenangsot ke Arnam helo, pima alanglisi la paching-jok-lo.
Ke-e abang pen lang kechor abang ke thang akeprekta avelo; amethang methang keklem akam atengsi Arnam abangphutin aphan anam piji.
Pima nelitum ke Arnam aphan kam keklempi rap rap atumlo, lapen nanglitum ke Arnam arit, lapen ahemlo.

Neli Arnam nekepi adan pen hem kekim thekser abang asonthak thaksi hemthur pangnilo, lapen anut kaprek abang labangso ahemthur athak kimlo. Bonta abang-phutinta kopusonsi kekim ma, lale pachematha pamenang.
Pima Arnam kepangnitang ahemthur apar ke akaprek ahemthurke baduta pangni un-elo. Labangso ahemthurke Jisu Khristo helo.
Komane abang jongsi ser, rup, adorkeso a-arlong, thengpi, phelang, kalite sok anar pensi labangso ahemthur athak kimlo tangte,

alangli keklem akam klangdakji, pima mo Khristo a-Arni ahut la paklangdakji. Thangbakma halabangso Arni mesi abangphutin akam paklangji. Me halatum akam aporman ensi abangphutin akam kopusonma, lake paklangdakji.
Hala hemthur athak kekim ahem jongsi me chodetde tangte, alangli anam longji.
Bonta inut abang kekim ahem jongsi me chodet tangte, alangli klemnakpo; alangli methang ke jokphlotji, bonsetta me pen kejokchit asonthak thakji.
Arnam aphan kardom-kangduk adim, kardom ahem kangthir ke nang-litum helo, lapen Arnam a-Karjong nanglitum along do, pu nanglitum chini binong-lo, kalima?
Mane abang jongsi labangso ahem pavirlo tangte, Arnam alangliphan pavirji. Pima kardom ahem ke ingthir-et, lapen labangso akardom ahem ke nanglitum helo.
Nanglitum baduta chepaluri. Nanglitum angbong mane abang jongsi labangso akai aron ateng pen mathara giani pu chemathalo tangte, alangli giani binong keplangjile kelu pacheplangnang.
Pima labangso apirthe amonit atum gian pu kematha alam ke Arnam angno ke kelu alamlo. Atheke hastro along tok-lo, “Giani atum akere pen ajoksi Arnam halatum aphan nepchekji;”
lapen hastro along puthot tok-lo, “Giani atum akematha hei hei thangta kali pu Hemphu chini.”
Tangte lahelo, baduta monit atum pen apot ke chepindak nangnelo. Pima kadokaveta nanglitum aphanlo:
Pol tame, Apollos tame, Pitor tame; pirthe tame, kereng tame, kethi tame, non kedo amar tame, mo kevangji amar tame; la kadokaveta nanglitum aphanlo,
lapen nanglitum ke Khristo aphanlo, Khristo ke Arnam aphanlo.
Lasi nelitum ke Khristo aban atumchot, atheke Arnam akepatu ahok alam kepachethang akam kechepahemphu atumchot pule abangphutinta pamathanang.
Lason kechepahemphu abang kedo nangji akenangsot a-ot lahelo, alangli amethang ahemphu aphan kekroi thirklong nangji.
Nanglitum, kalite komane abang monit aron ateng pen neliphan kangsai ke aso alam pusi neli matha. Neli nelimethang aphanta chingsaise.
Pima neli nelimethang adai thangta chethek longle, bonta labangso alam pen ajok neli nelidai avepin pule kepudam kali. Neliphan kangsai abang Hemphu helo.

Lasi athik apor nangleletik ke, atheke Hemphu vangvetik-ke nanglitum badu aphanta ingsairi. Non kangtingkuk angbong kepatujoi alam hei hei alanglisi paklangpetji, lapen alangli monit atum aning arlo kematha ason an pachinipetji. Ansi abangphutinta amethang kelong nangji akero Arnam pen longji.

Korte marli atum, nanglitum nelitum along nangcharlidunsi, “Ketok-tang ateng pen apar ke klemri” pu alam asonthot nanglitum, nangli hemphu mute neli hemphu themu, pu kechepindakdedetji aphansi, nangli-tum ale kelongji aphan neli lahei hei alam nelimethang lapen Apollos alamjir pen pangbarsi la kadokave alam nangthanlo.
Hala anut kaprek atum apar nangli themu pu matsi puloma? Nangli kedo amar an Arnamsi nangpilo, kalima? Tangte nangli kopusi la kedo an amar ke dan kelong kalidet asonthot chepindak hailoma?

Nanglitum kenangji ason an longtang-loma? Nanglitum plang-otang-loma? Nelitumke recho chochelang setta nanglitum ke recho chotang-loma? Bai nanglitum recho cheplang binong tang-lo asonte ko-an meparji, pima nelitumta nanglitum along recho nangchodun rap rap longpo.

Pima kethi nangji adai-kedo ahukum kepho atum asonthak thaksi Arnam nelitum aphan, atheke ketoitang atum aphan kadokave atum aphi nebilo pusi neli mathalo. Pima pirthe angno, sining apherangke atum angno, lapen monit atum angnota nelitum ke bang kelangphrong amar plangtang-lo.

Khristo pen apot nelitum ke kelu atumlo, bonta Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok nanglitum ke giani atumlo. Nelitumke nejakong avelo, bonta nanglitum ke nangjakong dolo! Nanglitum anong thelo, bonta nelitum anong junolo!
Non labangso apor ahut anta nelitum ke kangchir-kelangit pensi dolo; nelitum ape ari rakthang-lo; nelitum aphan chok-lo, lapen nelitum ahem-arit avelo,
lapen nelitum methang ari pen kam klem chepaduk-lo. Nelitum aphan kepinrem ahut nelitum ahirjume pidunlo; nelitum aphan kechenek ahut nelitum chechak-lo:
nelitum aphan kepinrem ahut nelitum lam kangsam pensi thakdunlo. Non labangso apor ahut anta nelitum ke kevartang alohban lapen karkok kekoitang abun asonlo.
Neli nanglitum aphan kepatherakji aphansi labangso alam tok-lo, lapu kali; bonta neli kechinghon asomar atum aphan asonthak thaksi neli nanglitum aphan kethan-keparejisi labangso alam tok-lo.

Pima nanglitum a-Khristian akai angbong nanglitum aphan kethan-kepare atum suri suri do settame, nanglitum apo ke inutnat. Pima neli Birta Keme kepachethang pen ajok nanglitum Jisu Khristo pen chelangpetsi neli nanglitum apo plangtang-lo.
Lasi neli nanglitum aphan choningrilo, nanglitum neli long nangcharliduntha.

Labangso alam apotsi neli nanglitum along Timothi nangtoipo. Khristian akai anat alangli ke neli sopolo, lapen kekroi thirklong abang-lo. Neli Jisu Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok ning kemi pen keklem aron hei hei alamsi alangli nanglitum aphan pachematha thupo. Labangso aron hei hei alamsi neli kadokave adim kedo amondoli mate kroi-asong atum aphan thanlo.
Nanglitum angbong manene atum ke neli nanglitum along vangvedetji pu mathasi ane chepathelo.
Bonta jongsi Hemphu aning hang tangte neli prapjin pen nanglitum along vangji. Anke la ane kechepathe amonit atum kaningje alam neli kechini anchot kali, alanglitum ajakongta chinilongpo.
Pima Arnam arat ke alam pen kali, bonta ajakong pensi chiniji.
Tangte, nanglitum aning kehang kopilo? Neli kaibong vansi vang nangjima, kalite kanghon lapen asotdut a-ot pensi vang nangjima?
Nanglitum angbong beisa akam do pusi neli arjulong-lo. Khristian kalidet atum angbongta lason an kehingnopik abeisa alam ave. Pima inut abang apo apiso pen irap rap-lo pusi neliphan thanlo.
Tangte kopisi nanglitum ane chepathehailoma! Nanglitum aning aduk do-o nangji apot-lo, kalima? Labangso akam keklem amonit aphan nanglitum angbong pen phlungjuinon.

Nelibangle nanglitum pen heloving setta neli ning arlo ke neli nanglitum alongsi dolo; lapen neli methang nanglitum angbong kedo asonthotsi neli Hemphu amen pen la kehingnopik akam keklem amonit aphan ado padotang-lo.
Nanglitum kechingrum ahut, lapen nelita neli ning arlo ke nanglitum along nangkechingrumdun ahut,
labangso amonit Hemphu Arni ahut akarjong kejokji aphan abang arpum kepavirdetjile ilitum along kedo Hemphu Jisu ajakong pen alangliphan Soitan arideng hodaidetnon.
Nanglitum kechepindak ke mesen kali. “Asapnat athapta him aplang kangthim pakangpet-thek,” pu kepu alam nanglitum chinilo.

Nanglitum thap kave ahim asonthotsi dolo, lasonthak thak-le nanglitum him aplang kemi keplangjile thapban an varchornon. Pima Kejok a-Mei Achojun a-Biresak a-So thoktang-lo. Labangso a-Biresak a-So ke Khristo helo.

Tangte, thapban kedo ahim pen, atheke kechelangselet lapen kehingno aning pen kali, bonta thap kave ahim, atheke ning ingthir-et pen lapen ahokpet aning penle ilitum la Kejok Achojun a-Mei talon lonangho!
Nanglitum beisa keklem atum along chelangdunri pusi neli nangli-tum aphan aphrang ketok aloh along nangpulo.

Tebonta Khristian kalidet atum angbong beisa keklem kalite, mek plengple, kalite bang amar kethipon, kalite kumlin kardom atum along chelangdun nangne pule neli la kepudam kali. Latum along chelang dundepinji pulote nanglitum pirthe athak pen damvek nangkokji.

Neli kepudam ke lahelo, inut abang Khristian pu chepulo setta beisa klembom, kalite amek plengple dobom, kalite kumlin ardombom, kalite bang aphan sorsarbom, kalite hor ingribom, kalite bang amar thiponbom tangte, nanglitum alangli long chelangdun nangnelo; kecho anta chorap nangnelo.
Pima Khristian kalidet atum aphan kangsai ke neli kam kali. Khristian hijan angbong ke nanglitum chingsai nangji, kalima?
Khristian kalidet atum aphan Arnamsi ingsaiji. Hastro along ketok asonthotsi, “Kehingno amonit aphan nanglitum angbong pen phlungphitnon.”
Nanglitum angbong inut abang Khristian akorte pen lam kecharvo dolote, labangso alam kangsaiji aphan alangli kopusi kangthir atum along damdera, Khristian kalidet atum along kedamhailoma?
Kangthir atum pirthe aphan ingsaiji, lake nanglitum chininema? Jongsi nanglitumsi pirthe aphan ingsaiji tangte, nanglitum la bihek alam kangsaiji abidi avema?
Ilitumsi sining apherangke atum aphan ingsaiji, lake nanglitum chinine-detma? Tangte ilitum la bihek alam ke ingsai unthu muchot nangji.
Tangte, lason alam dolote, labangso alam nangkepangsaiji aphan nanglitum kopusi hala mondoli angbong thangta kalidet amonit atum along labangso alam ponloma?
Nanglitum aphan kepatherakjisi neli labangso alam pulo. Khristian atum angbong akecharvo alam kangsaithek abang, giani amonit nanglitum angbong avedetma?
Bonta inut a-Khristian anut kaprek a-Khristian pen kecharvo alam chedansi Khristian kalidet atum nangpangsailo!

Nanglitum angbong kecharvo alam kechedan ke nanglitum akerem binong-lo. Labangso alar nanglitum aphan kehingno klem setta nanglitum chechakding abangsi memuji apot-lo, kalima? Nanglitum amar chonghu pondet setta, nanglitum chechak-ding abangsi memuji apot-lo, kalima?
Bonta labangso alar nonke nanglitum, Khristian hijan setta lahin lahin aphan kehingno klemlo lapen chobeilo.

Kehingno atum Arnam a-Rat chepahemphudun longledetji, lake nanglitum chininema? Nanglitum chepaluri. Beisa keklem, kalite, kumlin kardom, bang apiso kalite apenan pen beisa kecheklem, kalite pinso hijan lapen arloso hijan angbong beisa akam kecheklem, kalite
kechonghu, kalite mekplengple, kalite hor kangri, kalite bang aphan kesorsar, kalite bang amar kethipon atum ke Arnam a-Rat chepahemphudun longledetji.

Nanglitum angbong manene atumta aphrangke lason amonit atumlo. Bonta nonke Hemphu Jisu Khristo lapen e-Arnam a-Karjong nanglitum aphan cham pangthirtang-lo, Arnam aphan panongtang-lo, lapen dhoromi pusi lakhatang-lo.

Komane abang puji tahai, “Neli ke neli ning kehang aling klemlong.” Ahok-lo; bonta asontin akam amat ke nangliphan ale dopetpe. Neli ke neli ning kehang aling klemlong pu neli pu-un, bonta neli ke thangnat amar setta neliphan ban nepaplanglongledetji.

Komane abang puji, “An ke pok aphanlo, lapen pok ke an aphanlo.” Ahok-lo; bonta Arnam la hinita pavir-detji. Ebang arpum ke beisa akam keklem-iji aphan kali, bonta Hemphu akam keklem-iji aphanlo; lapen Hemphu ilitum abang arpum pen amethang akam klem-iji.
Arnam, Hemphu aphan kethitang atum angbong pen pathurlo, lapen alangli ilitum aphanta amethang ajakong pen pathurji.
Nanglitum abang arpum ke Khristo abang a-ok athan hei heilo, lake nanglitum chinilo. Tangte Khristo abang a-ok athan ensi la beisa abang a-ok athan paplangjima? Lapu kali!

Inut amonit beisapi pen amethang abang arpum pacherap-het lote alangli bang arpum ke beisapi abang arpum pen isipet plangtang-lo, lake nanglitum chininedetma? Pima hastro along tok-lo, “La banghini atum abang arpum isipet plangji.”
Bonta Hemphu pen kecheraphet abang ke karjong anat Hemphu pen isipet plangtang-lo.
Inut amonit akaprek apap keklem ke amethang abang arpum angtansi klemlo; bonta beisa akam keklem abang ke amethang abang arpum aphansi pap klemlo.

Nanglitum abang arpum ke Karjong Kangthir kedo adim, kardom ahemlo, lake nanglitum chininedetma. Labangso a-Karjong Kangthir nanglitum aning arlo do lapen Arnamsi nanglitum aphan la nangpilo. Nanglitum ahemphu ke nanglitum methang kali, bonta Arnamsi nanglitum ahemphulo;
alangli anam pisi nanglitum aphan namtang-lo. Tangte nanglitum abang arpum pen Arnam anong pathenon.
Nanglitum neliphan lo nangketok alam lahelo. Inut amonit piso en-edet asonte mepar.
Bonta beisa akam do-o apotsi abangphutinta piso pa-en nang lapen abangphutin arlosota penan pado nang.
Apiso abang apenan pen kelong nangji an apenan abang pi nangji lapen lasonthak thaksi apiso abangta apenan aphan pi nangji.
Apiso abang arpum ahemphu ke amethang kali, bonta apenansi apiso abang arpum ahemphulo: lasonthak thaksi apenan abang arpum ahemphu ke amethang amat kali, bonta apisosi apenan abang arpum ahemphulo.

Nanglitum penang arni an Arnam kardom apor ke-enji aphan aphrang pen kechekroi avete nanglitum angbong lahin lahin kelong nangji ason chepiperi. Bonta nanglitum methang aning kehang kecheber un-e pen ajok Soitan nanglitum aphan kechomosoidet, lason keplangpledetjile nanglitum dothurap rapnon.
Bonta neli nanglitum aphan hukumle nangkepi kali, nanglitum la klem tame pusi neli puchot.
Nangli-tum kadokaveta nelisonthot kedojisi neli ning hang-lo; bonta abangphutinta Arnam pen kelong adan do, inut ke lason adan anut kaprek ke akaprek adan long-lo.
Bonta achor kave atum lapen hemepi atum aphan neli kepuji lapu-helo, nanglitumta nelisonthak thak inutpet-le dobom asonte meparpo.

Bonta nanglitum jongsi nangning kehang cheber un-e tangte, nanglitum piso enkok, penan dokok non; pima ning kehang-e pen ajok me kangdak ason ning kekru-ang pen kedo apar piso enkok, penan dokok abang memu.
Piso ke-entang lapen penan kedo-tang atum aphan neli eson ahukum pipo, setta lake neli hukum kali, Hemphu ahukumlo: Apiso abang apenan cheti nangnelo.
Bonta alangli jongsi apenan chetilo tangte, alangli penan dothuthedet nangji, kalite apenan binong pen jalangthu nangji. Lapen apenan abangta apiso cheti nangnelo.
Akaprek atum aphan neli pupo; (Hemphu kali, nelisi pupo:) Inut a-Khristian apiso jongsi kroikrelang setta alangli long kedodunji aning hang-lo tangte, labangpi aphan cheti nangnelo.
Lapen inut Khristian arloso jongsi kekroikrelang apenan dolo, lapen alangli labangpi pen kedorap rapji aning hang-lo tangte labangpi alangli-phan cheti nangnelo.

Pima Khristian kalilang apenan abang Khristian apiso pen kechelangpet pen ajok alangliphan Arnam aphan panong-lo, lapen kekroikrelang apiso abang Khristian apenan pen kechelangpet pen ajok labangpi aphan Arnam aphan panongtang-lo. Lapu kalite halatum asomar atum Khristian kalidet atum asomar atum asonthak thak ingthirthedetji, bonta nonke halatum ingthirlo.

Bonta kekroikrelang abang jongsi Khristian apenan kalite apiso aphan kechetiji aning hang-lo tangte, alangli pachitinang. Lapuson alam dolote, Khristian apiso kalite apenan aphan thang akekhang avelo. Ning kangsam pen kedoji aphansi Arnam ephalo.
Nangli penan aphan nangli pajok unji pu kopusi chini unjima? Kalite nangli piso aphan nangli pajok unji pu nangli kopusi chini unjima?

Muthe abangphutin aphan Hemphu kepi asonthot-le, lapen Arnam alangliphan kepha ahut alangli kedo asonthot-le abangphutinta padobomnang. Neli kadokave amondoli mate kroi-asong alongta labangso aron atangsi thanbomlo.

Mane abang jongsi Arnam akepha kedeng ahut reng-rot entang-lo tangte alangli reng-rot ke-en angpram kepapraiji aphan bor-i nangnelo. Mane abang jongsi Arnam akepha kedeng ahut reng-rot en-e-lang tangte, alangli reng-rot en nangnelo.
Akenangsot ke Arnam ahukum kekroi helo.
Arnam kepha ahut kopusonsi doloma, lasonthot-le abangphutinta padobomnang.
Arnam nangkepha ahut nangli inut aban loma? Nangli thangta mathari; bonta ban kalidet keplangji atovar dolote, la dengnon.
Pima ban setta Hemphu akepha kedengtang abang ke Hemphu ator kedo kejok abang-lo; lasonthotsi ban kalidet setta Khristo akepha kedengtang abang ke Khristo abanlo.
Anam pisi nanglitum aphan nangnamlo; lasi nanglitum monit atum aban cheplangri.
Korte marli atum, Arnam kepha ahut kedo asonthot-le abangphutinta Arnam pen chelangpetra padobomnang.

Lapen achor kave atum alam lahelo: alanglitum aphan neli Hemphu ahukum ave, bonta neli Hemphu akangjinso kelongtang abang asonthotsi neli ning kematha alam thanpo; lasi neli lam ke kekroi ning theklong alamlo.
Tangte neli ning kematha lahelo, non akai akesung apotsi inut amonit non kedobom asonthot-le dobom asonte meparpo.
Nangli piso entang-loma? Tangte, nangli piso kechetiji abidi ririnon, Nangli piso en-elangma? Tangte, nangli piso ke-enji abidi ririnon.
Bonta nangli piso en setta, lake nangli pap keklem kalilo. Bonsetta piso ke-en, penan kedo atum akesung pho nang-oji, lapen nanglitum labangso akesung kephojokphlotjisi neli ning hang-lo.
Kortemarli atum, neli kepudam alam lahelo; nonke apor thihek-lo; lasi non pen apara piso ke-entang atum piso ke-en-e asonthotsi dobom nangji:
Kechiru atum kechirure asonthot, aning arong atum aning arong kave asonthot, mar kenam atum la kenamtang amar amethang amar kalidet asonthot,
lapen labangso apirthe amar ke-en atum la ke-en-edet asonthotsi donangji. Pima labangso apirthe non kedobom a-arje nang avebomlo.
Nanglitum aningbi kavedetjisi neli ning hang-lo. Piso ke-en-e abang ke Hemphu akam aphansi aning matha-ever, pima Hemphu aning kepadok thekji aphansi alangli bor-iver.
Bonta piso ke-en abang ke pirthe alam anatsi aning mathadam-ever, pima apiso aphan aning kepadokjisi alangli aning matha-ever;

lasi alangli aning kehang pahinidak. Penan kedode arloso, mate kangthir-etlang animsopi ke Hemphu akam aphansi aning matha-ever, atheke alangli amethang abang arpum lapen aning ingthirjir pen kedojisi matha-ever, bonta penan kedotang arloso ke pirthe alamsi aning matha-ever, pima apenan aphan aning kepadokthekji aphansi alangli matha-ever.

Nanglitum ale kelongji aphansi neli labangso alam pulo. Nanglitum aphan kekhangji aphan kali; bonta nanglitum ot keme pen dosi nanglitum aning eleppet pen Hemphu akam aphan kechehodaiji aphansi neli la pulo.

Bonta kechepangriji aphan pathiktang-lo setta piso ke-en-edetjisi aning kehang abang aphan neli kepuji alam lahelo: alangli jongsi hala kepathiktang arloso aphan mesen a-ot pen klemklelo, lapen aning cheber une-elo lapen labangpi aphan enkok masilo pule mathalo tangte, alangli aning kehang asonthotsi alanglitum chepangrikok nangji. Lapuson keklem ke pap kalilo.

Bonta inut amonit klemvek nangji, lason thang athe avera, amethang aning kehang pen piso ke-en-ejisi aning arlo cheparailo, lapen amethang aning kecheber un pame ajakong do, lapen lason keklemjisi aning arlo chepathiktang-lo tangte, alangli halabangso arloso aphan ke-en-edetke mesen akamsi klemlo.
Lasi hala kepathiktang arloso aphan ke-en kok abang ke mesen akamsi klemlo, bonta piso ke-en-e abang ke la apar memuchot akamsi klemlo.
Apenan rengtik anke apiso aphan apenan pen kok rap-het-lo. Bonta apenan thilot lote alangli aning kehang aling aphan penan do long-lo, bonta apenan abang Khristian nangji.
Bonta alangli non ason inutpet dobom lote akerengme ongmuchotji. Lake neli kematha alamlo, lapen neli long Arnam a-Karjong do pusi neli mathalo.
Lapen sekarkli ahut kethok kejir amar alam lahelo: Ilitum kadokaveta gian do pu ilitum chini, tebonta lason agian ke monit aphan pachepindakchot, bonta kanghon ke monit a-ot adur pamever.
Mane abang jongsi asapbak charlilo pu chemathalo tangte, alangli kecharli nangji asonthot charlilelang.
Bonta Arnam aphan kechinghon abang aphan ke Arnam chini.
Tangte, sekarkli ahut kethok kejir amar kecho alam lahelo; kumlinke kopine kedo binong arnam a-arjanlo, lapu kali, lake ilitum chinilo, lapen Arnam ke inutnat, lata ilitum chinilo.
Sining athak, mate, pirthe athak arnam pu atum do settame, (labangso “arnam” pu atum lapen “hemphu” pu atum kedo ke do.)

ilitum aphan ke Arnam, atheke Po inutnat. Kadokave amar kepinchong abang alangli helo, lapen alangli phansi ilitum reng-lo; lapen Hemphu, Jisu Khristota inutnat. Alangli pen ajoksi kadokave amar pinchong-lo, lapen alangli pen ajoksi ilitum reng-lo.

Bonta kadokave atum labangso alam chini, lapu kali. Penang amonit atum ke hako ahut kumlin aphan kangduk abesi pini arni anta halatum lason amar cholote, lake kumlin aphan kethok kejir amar binongsi ahokpet pen kechodunlo pusi mathalo; lapen halatum aning kematha ajakong avedet apotsi lason amar kecho pen ajok halatum ingthirthedet-lo pusi halatum mathalo.
Bonta kecho amar pen ajoksi Arnam etum aphan aning edokmuchotji, lapu kali. Pima chochete ilitum Arnam angno hingno muchotji, lapen cholote memuchotji, lapu kali.
Bonta nanglitum lason keklemlong pen ajok kekroi ajakong kave atum aphan kepatekung-i amar keplang-pledetjile cherenon.
Pima hala aning kematha ajakong kave abang nangli akechini abang aphan kumlin kebi ahem along kecho nangthekdunlong lote, alanglita kumlin aphan kethok kejir amar chohaidetji, kalima?
Lasi nangli methang akechini pen ajok la kekroi ajakong kave abang aphan pavirlo; bonsetta la nangli korte aphan ajoksi Khristo thi-lo.
Lapen nanglitum Khristian akorte aphan lason pap keklem pen ajok lapen halatum aphan aning angthin aduk kepibom pen ajok nanglitum chenamsi Khristo abethursi pap klembomlo.
Tangte lahelo, neli kecho amar pen ajok jongsi neli korte aphan pap paklemlo tangte, neli korte aphan pap kepaklemkledetji aphan neli kumlin aphan kethok kejir amar kaiketa chochedetji.
Neli ke jokvanlo, kalima? Neli ke ketoitang abang inut-lo, kalima. Neli ke e-Hemphu Jisu aphan theklong-lo, kalima? Neli Hemphu aphan keklempi akam athe nanglitum helo, kalima?
Neliphan anut kaprek atumle ketoitang abang pu kroikre setta, chenamsi nanglitum ke kroilo. Pima nanglitum Hemphu pen kechelangpet pen ajok nanglitum helo, neli ke ketoitang abang-lo pu apormanlo.
Monit atum neliphan kesorsar ahut neli kechethakdun alam lahelo:
Nelitum kecho kejun amar kelongji a-ot avema?
Hala ketoitang akaprek atum, Hemphu a-Korte atum lapen Pitor ason nelita kaprek kaprek adim kedam ahut neli piso cheponlong, kalima?
Kalite, kerengji aphan kam kechoklem nangji ke neli lapen Barnabas anchotma?

Amethang akhi pen polton akam keklem abang avepinlang, Kalima? Kalite drakha aberi along drakha arong esi amethang ke labangso athe kechochedetji, lason abang avepinlang, kalima? Biresak ahur visi, amethang ke labangso abiresak amok-lang kejunje det, lason abang ave, kalima?
Neli monit kepu asonthotsi labangso alam puloma? Aronta la esonpet alamsi pulo, kalima?

Pima Moses ketok Aron along ilitum porhelong-lo, “Sok kepasi achainong angtur rak-ri.” Tangte Arnam chainong atum aphan mathasi labangso alam pudamloma? Jasemetke ilitum aphansi alangli labangso alam pudamlo, kalima?

Ahok-lo, ilitum aphansi labangso alam tok-lo. Pima hai kebai abangta sok athe kelongdunji aning kethe kedo pensi hai bainangji, lapen sok kerot abangta sok athe kelongdunji aning kethe kedo pensi sok rot masi.
Nelitum nanglitum angbong karjong achilisi rik-lo. Tangte nelitum methang a-ok aphan nanglitum pen ale longjibon pu nelitum kematha ke kechokcheloma?
Bang kaprek atum jongsi nanglitum pen lason kelongji aron dolo tangte, nelitum ke nanglitum pen la apar kelongji aron dolo., kalima?
Bonta nelitum labangso aron en-edet-lo. Khristo alamjir a-Birta Keme kekhangkhedetji aphansi nelitum kadokave akesung chechak-lo.
Kardomhemthepi along kam keklem atum Kardomhemthepi pensi kecho kejun ahormu longbom, lapen dovan along kethok kejir atum kethok kejir amar apharman longdunbom, lake nanglitum chinilo, kalima?
Lason-thotsi Hemphuta hukum pisi pulo, “Birta Keme kepachethang atum birta keme pen kecho kejun amar long nangji.”

Bonta neli la kadokave aron isi natta en-edet-lo. Lapen neli lason kelong nangji amar nanglitum nepi masi pu kepudamji aphansi neli labangso alam tok-lo, lapu kali. Pima la alar neli thilot memu pusi neli mathalo. La neli kechepindak alam baduta pavir longledetji.
Birta Keme kepachethang apot ke neli kechepin-dakji ajakong ave. Pima neli birta keme thanvek nangji. Neli jongsi birta keme pachethangthe tangte, neli dai do.

Pima neli nelimethang aning kehang pensi labangso akam klemlo asonte neli anam kelongji a-ot do. Bonta lake neli keklem nangji akamlo apotsi neli klemlo; pima Arnamsi neliphan labangso akam nepaklemtoilo.

Tangte neli kopi anam longma? Neli anam en-epin pen Birta Keme pachethang long-lo, lapen birta keme kepachethang apot neli anam kelongji a-ot do setta neli anam hanghedet-lo; neli anam kelong ke lahelo.
Neli ke badu amonit aban kali setta un an ongmuchot amonit kelongji aphan kadokave amonit aban cheplang-lo.

Jihudi atum aphan kelongjisi, Jihudi atum angbong kam keklem ahut neli Jihudi amonit asonthak thak cheplang-lo; lapen neli methang ke Moses Aron ator dode setta Aron ator kedo atum aphan kelongjisi neli Aron ator kedo atum angbong kam keklem ahut neli Aron ator kedo amonit atum asonthak thak cheplang-lo.

Lasonthak thaksi Jihudi kalidet atum aphan kelongjisi, neli Jihudi kalidet atum angbong kam keklem ahut Jihudi kalidet atum asonthak thak dolo. Bonta neli Arnam aron kekroikre kali; neli Khristo aron ator dolo.

Kekroi ajakong kave atum aphan kelongjisi neli kekroi ajakong kave atum angbong kam keklem ahut ke halatum asonthak thak cheplang-lo. Lasi ajat abidi pen settame neli penang amonit aphan kepajok thekji aphansi la kaprek kaprek atum angbong kedo ahut kaprek kaprek atum asonthak thak cheplang-lo.
Nelita Birta Keme ahirjume kelongdunji aphansi birta keme ajok neli la kadokave klemlo.
Kekat kechebai ahut ake-ongpi atum kekat chebaidun setta inut abangsi anong-e longchot, lake nanglitum chinilo, kalima? Tangte, nong-e kelongvekji aphanle nangli katnon.

Jakong kang-tang kechebaidunji aning kehang atum ke aphrang pen jasemet abe chinghoi kevir undet aphukup avaikang anong-e kelongjisi halatum chebai dunlo; bonta kevir un-e-det aphukup avaikang anong-e kelongdunji aphansi ilitum ke ebe chinghoilo.
Lasi neli ke suisedetsi kejut ang-ang anat kekat pakengding-lo; lasi neli ke ketengthap thedet akecheteng abang asonthak thak-lo,

bonta bang atum aphan Birta Keme pachethangdet aphi neli methang ke thang a-ot ave, lason neliphan kelakhakhedetjisi neli nelimethang abang chetengsi nelibang a-ok chepangtang-lo, lapen neli ning kehang aling chekhang unlo.

Ephusar atum Moses kejapon aling kedun ahut halatum aphan kopi plang-loma, la nanglitum aphan kepachematha-thujisi neli ning hang-lo, korte marli atum. Inghun ethan halatum angsong dosi halatum aphan japonlo, lapen kadokaveta Talo Ke-er angbong damsi kap-lo.
Moses kejapon aling dunsi kadokaveta inghun arlo lapen talo arlo baptisom entang-lo.
Halatum kadokaveta esonpet akarjong a-an cholo,
lapen esonpet akarjong alang junlo. Pima halatum along kedunkri, karjong a-arlong pen kangbop alang halatum junlo. Halabangso arlong helo Khristolo.
Bonta halatum angbong ongmuchot atum aphan Arnam aning dokdedet-lo, lasi halatum aphan kejejangtang ajo pavirkoilo.
Bonta halatum kehingno akam keklem aning kehang asonthot ke, ilitumke ning kehanghedetjisi, la kadokave alam ilitum aphan ekepare alam plang-lo.
Halatum angbong penang atum kumlin aphan kangduk asonthot ke nanglitum klemri. Atheke hastro along tok-lo: “Rat atum kecho-kejunjisi ingnilo, lapen kekanjisi chonphrolo.”
Halatum angbong penang atum beisa akam klemsi arni isipet bang suri ingkoira kethom thikoilo; halatum ason ke ilitum klem nangnelo.
Halatum angbong penang atum Hemphu aphan asat langsi pherui pen ajok thikoilo; halatum ason ke ilitum Hemphu aphan asat lang nangnelo.
Lapen halatum angbong penang atum Arnam aphan pasimulo, lapen lasi kepathi apherangke halatum aphan pathikoilo; halatum ason ke ilitum pasimu nangnelo.
Anut kaprek atum aphan kepache-retoiji aphansi halatum aphan lahei hei plang-lo, lapen ilitum aphan ekepacherejisi la hei hei alam tok-lo. Pima non ilitumke kejutji dok dok akai angbongsi dolo.
Ne arjapthipsi dolo pu kechematha abang aling kekrep-kredetjile pacherenang.

Monit atum kephohur asatsi nanglitumta phobomlo. Arnam ke amethang kechak alam ateng klemvek, lapen nanglitum karchak un-edetji, lason asat nanglitum aphan palang longledetji. Lapen nanglitum aphan asat kelang ahut setta nanglitum kechechak unji aphan alangli jakong nangpiji, lapen lasonsi nanglitum la pen kejokphlotji aphan alangli tovar nangpaklangji.
Lahelo, neli kechinghon atum, nanglitum kumlin aphan karcho pen chepahelo non.
Abidi kedo atum aphan asonthotsi neli nanglitum aphan pulo; la neli kepu alam nanglitum methangle ingsainon.

Hemphu a-An kecho ahut ke-en aharlung, lapen labangso pen apot Arnam aphan kero akardom kepi athe lahelo: Ilitum la pen kejun ahut Khristo avi along epharman longdunlo, kalima? Lapen ilitum kebeng ahim alamthe lahelo: Khristo abang arpum along ilitumta epharman longdunlo, kalima?
Ahim ke eplangvet-lo apotsi ilitum ongdung setta ilitum abang arpum ke isipet-lo, pima ilitum kadokaveta la eplangvet ahimsi chodunlong-lo.
Israel atum alamle mathatha: kethok kejir amar kecho atum anke dovan along Arnam aphan kethok kejir akam klemdunlo, kalima?
Tangte kumlin aphan kethok kejir amar, kalite kumlinke ilitum aphan kopine ale do pusi neli kepudamma?
Lapu kali! Neli kepudam alam lahelo: Honghari atum ke hi-i atum aphansi athok ajir thok-lo, Arnam aphan kali. Lapen nanglitum hi-i atum pen kechelang atum keplangji, lake neli ning hanghelo.
Nanglitum Hemphu aharlung penta jundet, lapen hi-i atum aharlung penta jundet, lason klem un-e; nanglitum Hemphu atebul athakta chodundet, lapen hi-i atebul athakta chodundet, lason klem un-e.
Kalite, Hemphu ekepalang un-ejisi ili ning hang-loma? Alangli mute ilitum ajakong themu putong kemathama?
“Thangnatta kertangte;” pu alam ahok, bonta kadokave ason amat ke mepetpe. “Thangnatta kertangte,” bonta kadokave ason amat ke ale dopetpe.
Baduta amethang ale cherirera bang aphanle ale paripinang:
Nanglitum aning thangta matha-damdera hithi along kejor a-ok aling chonon.
Pima hastro along ketok asonthotsi, “Pirthe lapen la athak kedo amar anke Hemphu amarlo.”
Inut Khristian kalidet amonit nanglitum aphan nangphalote matha damdedetra nanglitum angno kebi amar aling chonon.
Bonta mane abang jongsi nanglitum aphan, “Labangso amar ke kumlin aphan kethok amarlo,” pu nangpulo tangte labangso amonit pen apot lapen alangli ning akematha pen apot la chori.

Nanglitum methang aning kematha apot-le neli kepudam kali, bonta halabangso amonit aning akematha pen apotsi neli la pudamlo. Mane abang pulo, “Tangte kopi apotsi anut kaprek aning kematha pen apot-le neli ning kehang aling keklemlong akam neli klemkledet nangjima?
Neli jongsi Arnam aphan rosi cholo tangte, la neli kero amar pen apot neliphan kepinrem athe kopima?”
Tangte, nanglitum cho aling tame, jun aling tame, lapen klem aling settame, Arnam anong aphanle klemnon.
Jihudi atum aphan tame, Jihudi kalidet atum aphan tame, kalite Arnam amondoli mate kroi-asong aphan settame, nanglitum badu aphanta pap kepaklem-i amar cheplangri.

Neli keklem asonthot-le nanglitumta klemnon; neli ke klem aling setta, kadokave atum kejok kelongji aphan neli methang ale aphan mathathesi, bonta kadokave atum ale kelongji aphan mathasi abangphutin aphan aning kepadokjisi klemlo.
Neli Khristo along ke charlidun asonthot-le nanglitumta neli long nangcharlidunnon.
Nanglitum kaiketa neliphan chema-thaverlo, lapen neli nanglitum aphan kethan alam larledetsi kroipamelo apotsi neli nanglitum aphan rolo.

Bonta Khristo ke anut-tin aphuthak ajakong do, pinso atum amethang methang apiso atum aphuthak ajakong do lapen Khristo aphuthak Arnam ajakong do; labangso alam nanglitum kechinijisi neli ning hang-lo.
Lasi pinso amonit aphu chekurkisi Arnam ardomlote, kalite Arnam alam thanlote alangli Khristo aman pavirlo.
Lapen inut arloso aphu chekurkikesi Arnam ardomlo, kalite Arnam alam thanlote labangpi ke amethang apenan aman pavirlo. Labangpi ke inut achu kechesoilong arloso pen thang akeprekta avelo.
Inut arloso aphu chekurkikete alangli achuta pachesoilong nang. Bonta inut arloso achu kechingtip, kalite achu kechesoi ke ketherakmeme alamlo. La apotsi alangli aphu pachekurkinang.
Pinso amonit ke aphu chekurki nangnelo, pima alanglisi Arnam a-arje lapen adak atur paklang-lo. Bonta arloso ke pinso adak atur paklang-lo.
Pima arloso penle pinso aphan kepinchong kali, bonta pinso pensi arloso aphan pinchong-lo.
Lapen arloso aphan ajok-le pinso aphan kepinchong kali, bonta pinso aphan ajoksi arloso aphan pinchong-lo.
