Bonta Arnam Pitor aphan reng-rot ke-en atum angbong Birta Keme kepachethang akam kepek asonthotsi Arnam neliphanta reng-rot ke-en-e atum aphan Birta Keme kepachethang akam nepak-lo pu halatum chinilo.
Pima Pitor reng-rot ke-en atum angbong ketoitang abang akam keklem along kam keklemdunvoi a-Arnamsi neli reng-rot ke-en-e atum angbong ketoitang abang akam keklem alongta kam nangklemdunvoilo.

Keja pu kepu longtang atum, atheke Jems, Pitor lapen Jon ke Arnamsi neliphan labangso akam nepek-lo pu chinilo. Lasi nelitum kadokaveta kam keklem rap rap atumlo pu angthek ason kepaklangjisi halatum Barnabas lapen neli pen kardom chepilo. Barnabas lapen neli ke Jihudi kalidet atum angbong kam keklemji lapen halatum ke Jihudi atum angbong kam keklemji aphan nelitumta alam chedondunlo.
Muthe halatum angbong keduk kelak atum aphan mathadun nangji pusi halatum pulo, lapen neli aphrang pen keklemji ning kehang-e akamta la helo.
Bonta Pitor Antiok arongsopi kevang ahut alangli akechokche alam chinilorsi neli alangliphan rat angno pu-ak-lo.

Pima Jems along pen kevang manene atum hadak nanglele akoke Pitor Jihudi kalidet akorte atum pen chorap rap-lo. Bonta halatum nangledetke alangli halatum along chekakdundaksi Jihudi kalidet atum pen cho rap rap jun rap-rap-redet-lo, pima reng-rot en nangji pu kepu aphan alangli pherelo.
Kaprek Jihudi akorte atumta kephereju abang asonthak thaksi Pitor asonthot klemdunlo. Barnabas amatta la kephereju akam charlidunlo.

Halatum Birta Keme ahok alam atengle keklem kali pu chinisi neli kadokave atum angno Pitor aphan pulo, “Nangli jongsi Jihudi amonit-lo setta Jihudi kalidet atum asonsi do thak-lo tangte, Jihudi kalidet atum aphan Jihudi ason kepadoji aphan nangli kopusi toi bor-iloma?”
Ilitumke emahang kethek pen Jihudi amonit-lo; “Jihudi kalidet apapi” atum kali.

Aron ateng keklem apot kali, bonta Jisu Khristo aphan kekroi pen apotsi monit aphan dhoromi pu lakhapon. Ilitum amatta Aron ateng keklem pen ajok kali, bonta Jisu Khristo aphan kekroi pen ajok dhoromi pu ekepalakhaji aphansi ili Jisu Khristo aphan kroilo. Pima Aron ateng keklem pen apot ke badu aphanta dhoromi pu lakha ponpe.

Jongsi ilitum Jisu Khristo pen chelangpetsi dhoromi pu ekepalakhaji aphan kebor-i ahut ilitumta hala Jihudi kalidet atum asonthak thak papi atumlo pu chethek long-lo tangte Khristo ke pap keklem-i ajotonma? Lapu kali!
Neli jongsi kephritang Aron puthot kimthulo tangte neli methang amatsi Aron kekroikre abang pu cheklangdak-lo.
Pima neli Arnam aning kehang ateng keklem thekji aphan Aron anat ke neli akethitang-lo, lapen Aron amethangsi neliphan nepathilo. Neliphan Khristo along theng parpan athak nepathidunlottang-lo.
Lasi nonke nelile kereng kali. Khristosi neli long reng-lo. Non neli kerengbom ke neliphan nekanghon lapen neliphan ajok amethang apran kechepi abang, Arnam a-Sopo aphan kekroi pen ajoksi reng-lo.
Neli Arnam akangjinso varchorche. Bonta jongsi Aron ateng keklem apotsi komane aphan dhoromi pu lakhaponlo tangte, Khristo ke thinak-lo.
O kelu a-Galasia asor! Nanglitum amek angden thengparpan athak Jisu Khristo kethi klangdak-lo; tangte komatsi nanglitum aphan nang kemoidet-loma?
Neliphan eson alam nethantha: nanglitum Aron ateng keklem apotsi Arnam a-Karjong kelongma, mate Birta Keme karjura alam kekroi apotma?
Nanglitum kopu-sonsi la an kechepaluma! Nanglitum Arnam a-Karjong pensi pangcheng-lo; nonke nanglitum methang ajakong pensi pajutpoma?
Nanglitum kephotang an thangta kalidet-loma? chenamsi lake ale kavedet kali!
Arnam nanglitum aphan Karjong nang kepi lapen nanglitum angbong kemanghu meme akam keklem ke nanglitum Aron ateng keklem apotma, mate nanglitum Birta Keme karjura kekroi apot-loma?
Abraham alamle mathadamtha. Hastro pulo, “Abraham Arnam aphan kroilo, lapen alangli akekroi pen apotsi Arnam alangliphan dhoromi pu lakha ponlo.”
Tangte nanglitum chini nangji, kekroi kedo atum helo Arnam asomar binong-lo.

Jihudi kalidet atum aphanta amethang methang akekroi pen apotsi dhoromi pu lakha ponji pusi hastro aphrang pen thanmek-lo. Lasi hastro ke Abraham aphan Birta Keme thanmeksi pulo, “Nangli pen ajoksi Arnam kadokave akhei aphan hirjume piji.”
Abraham kroilo, lapen ahirjume long-lo. Lasi kekroi atum anke alangli sonthak thak ahirjume long-lo.
Aron ateng keklem akam aphan kechiki atum an aphuthak ahirjuno do. Pima hastro pulo, “Badutame, Aron aloh along ketoktang alam an kekroipetpe atum an aphuthak ke Arnam ahirjuno do.”
Aron pen ajok ke Arnam badu aphanta dhoromi pu lakhakhe, lake klangdak-lo. Pima hastrosi pulo, “Kekroi pen ajok dhoromi keplangtang abangsi reng binongji.”
Bonta Aron ke kekroi pen thangta chetonte. Labangso alar hastro ke pulo, “Aron akam an keklempet abangsi hala hei hei pen ajok rengji.”
Bonta Khristo ilitum apharman ahirjuno kepho abang cheplangsi Aron ahirjuno pen epajokphlot-lo. Pima hastro pulo, “Thengpi athak kejangrem abang aling ke Arnam ahirjuno kepho abang-lo.”
Jisu Khristo pen ajok Jihudi kalidet atum aphan Abraham aphan kechaktang ahirjume kepijisi Khristo lason klemdet-lo. Lake kekroi pen ajok ilitum Arnam kechaktang a-Karjong kelong thekji aphanlo.
Neli korte atum, arnivang abisar alam pen neli pulang: bang hini amonit jongsi alam chedonlo, lapen kechechak aloh along sohi chepilo tangte, badu amonita la lar un-e, kalite kopine alam batdun un-e.

Nonke Abraham aphan lapen Abraham aso asu atum angbong pen inut aphansi Arnam lam chechak-lo. Hastro ke nangso nangsu atum pu, atheke amonit ongdung alam pudamde, bonta “Nangso nangsu angbong pen inut,” atheke inut alamsi pudamlo, lapen labangso abang ke Khristo helo.

Neli kepudam athe lahelo, Arnam Abraham pen kechechak chebilo, lapen kechechak ateng akam keklemjisi alam chechak-lo. Labangso Aron, atheke ning kan pharo phli ra thomkep aphi kevang Aron ke halabangso kechepathik akechechak pavir un-e, lapen Arnam klemji pu kechak alamta pavedet un-e.
Pima jongsi Aron ateng keklem pen ajoksi Arnam adan long-lo tangte, lake Arnam akechak pen apot kalidet-lo. Bonta Abraham ke Arnam akechak pen apotsi Arnam adan long-lo.

Tangte Aron ke kopi aphanchot-lo? Lake monit atum akechokche akelele kepaklangji aphanlo, lapen lake kechak-tang abang, atheke Abraham aso asu angbong pen inut abang vangvetik an aphanchot. Inut amonit adak do dunsi Arnam apherangke akerap pen ajok Aron pilo.
Abe hini nang kedo ahutsi adak kedo abang nangkokchot. Bonta Arnam ke inutnat.
Tangte Aron ke hala Arnam ake-chak pen chetontema? Cheton! Pima chethe kepithek aronsi monit atum long-lo asonte aron kekroi pen apotsi abangphutin aphanta dhoromi pu lakhadetji apot-lo.
Bonta hastro pulo, Pirthe adangta pap ajakong abersi do. Lasi Jisu Khristo aphan kekroi atum aphan kepiji pu akechak adan ke kekroi atum aphansi pidet-lo.
Bonta kekroi nanglele akoke Aron ilitum aphan koidi atum aphan asonsi kekroi nangleletik an aphan ebengkoisi bilo.
Lasi Khristo vangvetik-ke Aron ephan kelangchari abang plang-lo, lapen lake kekroi pen ajoksi ilitum aphan dhoromi pu ekelakhapon longji aphanlo.
Nonke kekroi nangletang-lo apotsi non pen apara Aron ke ephan kelang-chari abang kalilo.
Pima kekroi pen ajok, atheke Khristo Jisu pen kechelangpet pen ajok nanglitum kadokaveta Arnam asomar cheplang-lo.
Nanglitum Khristo pen chelangpetsi baptisom ke-entang atum anke Khristo chepindengtang-lo.
La apotsi Jihudi lapen Jihudi kalidet, ban lapen ban kalidet, lapen pinso lapen arloso atum angbong thang akeprekta avelo: Khristo Jisu pen kechelangpet pen ajok nanglitum kadokaveta isipet-lo.
Nanglitum jongsi Khristo amonit-lo tangte, nanglitum ke Arnam asomar atumlo, lapen Arnam akechak ason kechepahemphu longji atumlo.
Neli kepudam alam la helo, apo akhi kechepahemphuji asopo abang arta ave akoke, alangli kado-kave amar ahemphulo setta ban pen thang akeprekta ave.
Alangli po kepathiktang arni nangleletik, alangli arta kavedetlang ahut ke alangliphan kerai abang lapen ahemari akeng-risi alangli do.
Lasonthak thaksi ilitumta ahok aphan kechinine, bihek akoke sining pirthe aphan kepangri akarjong atum abanlo.
Bonta ahut nangchoksi Arnam amethang a-Sopo aphan nangtoilo. Alangli inut arloso pen amahang theksi inut arloso asopo ason vang-lo, lapen Jihudi Aron abersi dolo.
Aron aber kedo atum aphan kepajokjisi la plang-lo; lapen lake ilitumta Arnam kur kepon asopo atum keplangthekji aphanlo.
Nanglitumke Arnam asopo atumlo pu keklangdakji aphansi Arnam ke amethang a-Sopo a-Karjong aphan nanglitum aning arlo nangtoilo. Labangso a-Karjong ke. “O Po,” pusi hang-lo.
Tangte lahelo, nangli non pen apara ke ban kalilo, bonta Arnam asopolo. Lapen nanglike alangli sopolo apotsi Arnam amethang asomar atum aphan kebipi amar nanglita chepahemphudun longpo.
Aphrangke nanglitum Arnam aphan chininedet-lo; lasi nanglitum arnam kalidet akarjong atum aban cheplang-lo.

Bonta nonke nanglitum Arnam aphan chinilo, mate la aparta Arnam nanglitum aphan nangchinilo, tangte nanglitum kopusi hala ajakong kave lapen keboidet kepangri akarjong atum anat chiruithuvoiphak-loma? Nanglitum kopi apotsi halatum aban kecheplangthuji ninghang-loma?
Nanglitum penang a-arni, achiklo, abotor lapen aningkan hei hei ketalon kroidunbom.
Neli nanglitum aphan nang chepadukpinak lobon pusi neli ning bilo.
Korte marli atum, neli nanglitum aphan choningrilo, nanglitum neli sonthot-le cheplangtha, pima neli methangta nanglitum asonthak thak-lo. Nanglitum neliphan thang akehingnota klemkle.
Neli kesodet pen apotsi neli nanglitum angbong Birta Keme kepachethangcheng asoi long-lo, lake nanglitum chinilo.

Bonta neli ok kerengno pen ajok nanglitum aphan asat the-olo setta nanglitum neliphan nelangselet-le lapen nehijimjedet-lo. Bonta nanglitum Arnam apherangke aphan lapen Khristo Jisu aphan kechak asonthotsi neliphanta chak-lo.
Aphrangke nanglitum aning arong-pik! Nonke kopisi kecheplangdet-loma? Nanglitum un asonte, nanglitum methang amek chehekjoksi neliphan nekepidetji anbak-lo, lake neli pudak un.
Tangte nanglitum aphan ahok alam nangkethan apotsi nonke neli nanglitum ahotur cheplangdet-loma?

Hala anut kaprek atum ke nanglitum aphan ning nangdokpik asonsi chepaklang-lo, bonta halatum aning akeme pen kali. Halatum aning kehang binong ke, nanglitum aphan neli pen pachekaksi halatum aphan aning kepadokji aphanchot.
Jongsi labangso aning kedokpik ke kepameji aphanlo tangte, lake mesenlo; neli nanglitum along kedo ahutchot kali, lake kaiketa mesenlo.
Neli keching-hon asomar atum, nanglitum along Khristo a-ot dodetik ke, neli ke inut arloso oso amahang kepathek ahut aduk kedo asonsi nanglitum aphan ajok puthot neli ning aduk dolo.
Neli non amat nanglitum along dosi nanglitum aphan nang kethan a-ot kepaprek muchotjisi ning hang-lo. Pima nanglitum pen apot neli ning siksak-lo.
Aron aber kedoji aning kehang atum an aphan neli arjulang; nanglitum Aron alam arju longlelangma?
Pima ketok lapuson helo, Abraham asopo bang hini do. Inut abang ke banpi pen aso lapen anut kaprek abang ke banpi kalidet pen aso.
Banpi pen aso abang ke kadokave atum ason ok pensi amahang thek-lo, bonta banpi kalidet pen asopo abang ke Arnam akechak pen apotsi amahang thek-lo.

Isi alamlir pen la hei hei alam chini unji: La bang hini arloso ke hini akechechak asonlo. Ban kedoji asomar aphan amahang kepathek abang ke Hagar helo, lapen alangli ke Sinai anglong athak kepathik akechechak asonlo.
Hagar ke Arobia adet ang-bong a-Sinai anglong ason lapen non kedo Jerusalem arongsopi asonlo, pima labangso a-Jerusalem ke asomar atum pen pen ban dolo.
Bonta sining athak a-Jerusalem ke ban kali, lapen lake ilitum apei asonlo.

Pima hastro pulo, “Chehoknon, O aso kavedet arloso! Ning arongra kehang ase pathenon, O oso amahang kepathek aduk kephophepinlang abangpi! Pima apenan ke-o-epin arloso aparte apenan ke-obup arloso asomar ongmuji.”
Neli korte marli atum, nonke nanglitum Isaak asonthotsi Arnam akechak pen apot Arnam asomarlo.
Halabangso ahut hala kadokave atum ason ok pen amahang kethek abang ke Arnam a-Karjong ajakong pen amahang kethek abang aphan chenek-lo. Nonta lason thak thak-lo.
Bonta hastro kopisi pulo? Hastro pulo, “Banpi arloso lapen asopo aphan toijuinon; pima banpi arloso asopo ke banpi kalidet arloso asopo pen apo amar chepahemphu long rap rap-redetji.”
Tangte lahelo, neli korte marli atum, ilitumke banpi arloso asomar kali, bonta banpi kalidet asomarlo.
Ili ban keplangpledetji aphansi Khristo epajokphlottang-lo. Lasi nanglitum ban kalidet atum asonle donon, lapen nanglitum aphan ban nangpaplang longrinon.
Arju iknon, neli Pol mamatsi nanglitum aphan nang thanpo, nanglitum jongsi reng-rot enduntang-lo tangte, Khristo ke nanglitum aphan thang ale avedet-lo.
Neli puthot thanthupo, reng-rot ke-en abang aphan neli kepu pasodak-lo, alangli Aron alam an kroipetvek nangji.
Nanglitum angbong Aron kekroi pen ajok dhoromi keplangji kebor-i atum anke Khristo pen chekakdak-lo. Nang-litumke Arnam akangjinso angtansi dolo.
Bonta nelitum aning kethe la helo, Arnam nelitum aphan dhoromi pu nelakha ponji, lapen kekroi pen ajok Arnam a-Karjong ajakong pen nelitum labangso aning kethedam ason aphan chonghongphrong-lo.
Pima Khristo pen chelangpet lote reng-rot ke-en lapen reng-rot ke-en-eke thang akeprekta avelo; akenangsot ke kanghon akam pen ajok keklang akekroi helo.
Aphrangke nanglitum keklem mesenlo. Nanglitum ahok alam aphan kekroi keche-obup ke komat pen ajok-loma? Kopusonsi alangli nanglitum aphan nangpakroidet-loma?
Lake nanglitum aphan nang kepha abang, Arnamle keklem kali.
“Asapnat athap penta him adum pakangpet thek,” pusi hastro pulo.

Bonta neli nanglitum aphan non anta ning thek-longsi dolo. Hemphu pen kechelangpet pen apot nanglitum neli lam apar akaprek alam ke mathathelo pu neli ning thelo. Badutame, nanglitum aphan nang kepasiksak abang aphan ke Arnam pasungvekji.

Bonta korte marli atum, jongsi reng-rot ke-enke akenangsot pusi neli than pachethang-lo tangte, neliphan kopi apotsi nekechenekbom langma? Jongsi reng-rot ke-en nangji alamsi neli than pachethang-lo pu alamle ahok tangte neli kethan kepachethang, Khristo atheng parpanke kechingkoi-i atheng-long cheplangpledet-lo.
Nanglitum aphan nang kepasiksak atum ke kasi che-endet khangjangsi keme pusi neli matha.

Pima korte marli atum, nanglitum kejokphlotji aphansi nanglitum aphan nangpha tang-lo. Bonta nanglitum labangso akejok phlotke ok aning kehang kechepapleng-i abidi pinchongri. Nanglitum kanghon penle lahin lahin aban cheplangnon.
Pima, “Nangmethang aphan kechinghon asonthot-le nang tebok abang aphan chinghon non.” pu ahukum alongsi kadokave Aron plengtang-lo.
Bonta nanglitum jongsi chekor seroi, checho seroi lote, cherenon, kalite nanglitum hijan chepavirdetna.
Neli kepudam alam la helo: nanglitum Karjong nang keja atengle kengkam chejornon. Ok aning kehang kechepaplengji aphan klemri.

Pima ok aning kehang anke Karjong aning kehang pen chetonte, lapen Karjong aning kehangke ok aning kehang pen chetonte. La sonni ke kaita chetonte, lapen lasi nanglitum aning kehang aling klem longle.
Nanglitum jongsi Karjong nang keja atengsi klemlo tangte, nanglitum Aron aber dodelo.
Tangte ok aning kehang akam ke la helo: beisa, kangthirthe lapen ketherakmeme akam hei hei,.
kumlin aphan kangduk kardom lapen maja kanghoi, hotur kechebi, kechebohong, kechelang un-e, aning kesedeng, amethang kechemathalokchot, abe abe kedo, asong asong kechethak;

kechelang selet, hor kangri, kecho pajoi hei hei lapen akaprek lasonthak thak akam an helo. Neli nanglitum aphan aphrang kepacheretoi asonthotsi nonta neli nanglitum aphan puthupo: lason akam keklem atum anke Arnam arat chepahemphu longledetji.
Bonta Karjong athe ke la helo: kanghon, ning arong, ning kangsam, ning keding, ning keme, keme a-ot, kekroi thirklong atheng,
kechepabihek, ning kecheber hei hei helo. La hei hei aputhak akaprek aron ave.
Khristo Jisu amonit atum anke amethang akar-i lapen aning kehang akam pen pen ok aning kehang an thengparpan athak pathilottang-lo.
Ilitum jongsi Karjong pen reng-lo tangte, ilitum Karjong ekeja atengle kengkam chejor lonang.
Ili chepindak nangnelo, kaita lahin lahin aphan bek nangnelo; lahin lahin aphan lang un-e nangnelo.

Korte marli atum, komane abang jongsi kopine akechokche akam klemdet-lo tangte, nanglitum, Karjong nang keja ateng keklem atum alangliphan pamethu nangji, bonta nanglitum ingsamjin pensi alangliphan pamethu nangji. Lapen nanglitum methangta chelangpontu, pima nanglitum methang amatta asat angbong klobup tahai.
Nanglitum lahin lahin anghor chinghorpi seroi nangji. Lapuson atovar pensi nanglitum Khristo Aron kroithekpo.
Komane abang jongsi thangta kalidet setta, neta inut amonit pusi chemathalo tangte, alangli ke amethangsi che-chobeilo.
Abangphutinta amethang akam aporman pache-en nang. Jongsi mesen tangte bang akam pen pachepangbarbepin pen amethang akam pen apot chepindak longji.
Pima abangphutinta amethang anghorsi chinghor nangji.
Khristian alam kecharli abang ke akeme ason kedo anta alangliphan kethan abang pen pachethak nang.
Arnam aphan chobei un pu mathara nangli methang chechobeiri. Pima monit kopima kerik, kerotta lasi rot longji.
Ok aning kehang kerik abang ke la ok aning kehang pen kevirsi rot longji, bonta Karjong aning kehang kerik abang ke, la Karjong aning kehang pen kejut un-e achethe rot longji.
Lasi ili akeme akam keklem lak-ledet lonang, pima ili keklem o-edet lote, mo arnisi athikpet apor ahut ili rot longji.
Lasi ahut keme kelong aling ili kadokave atum aphan akeme klem lonang, jasemet ke kekroi akorte atum an aphan akeme klem lonang.
Neli methang ari pen neli ko-an ahi kethe pen labangso aloh tok-lo, langtha!

Amethang kechepindakji lapen athak kechepaklangji aning kehang atumsi nanglitum aphan reng-rot nang pa-en bor-ilo. Bonsetta Khristo athengparpan aphan ajok kephonang akesung halatum kephojokphlotji aphansi halatum lason klemlo.
Hala reng-rot ke-en atum amatta Aron kroikrelo. Nanglitum reng-rot ke-enke halatum aning kehang akamlo, pima nanglitum reng-rot en lote halatum chepindak longpo.
Bonta neli ke Hemphu Jisu athengparpan pen apotsi chepindakchotji; pima alangli thengparpan pen ajok neliphan ke pirthe ke akethitang-lo, lapen pirthe aphan ke neli ke akethitang-lo.
Reng-rot ke-en, mate ke-en-eke thangta kali; akenangsot ke kepinchong kemi abang kecheplang helo.
Amethang akai arjon labangso aron ateng kengkam kechejor atum an, atheke Arnam a-Israel kemi atum an aphuthak ning kangsam lapen kangjinso padonang.
Non pen apar ke baduta neliphan nepasungse nang, pima neli bang athak Jisu angthek do.
E-Hemphu Jisu Khristo akangjinso nanglitum akarjong along padonang! Amen.

Arnam aning kehang pen Jisu Khristo ketoitang abang, neli Polsi nanglitum aphan, atheke, Ephesas arongsopi kedo, Khristo Jisu pen chelangpetsi kekroi kethirklong, kangthir atum an aphan labangso aloh tok-lo.
E-Po Arnam lapen Hemphu Jisu Khristo nanglitum aphan kangjinso lapen ning kangsam nangpapinang!
E-Hemphu Jisu Khristo a-Arnam lapen a-Po aphan ili ro archo lonang! Pima ilitum Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok alangli ilitum aphan sining asonthak thak adim ahirjume an pen hirjume epitang-lo.
Arnam angno ilitum kangthir-et lapen kedin move-det atum keplangji aphan, ilitum Jisu Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok amethang amonit ekepaplangjisi pirthe pinchongche ako pen Arnam e-ingvailo.
Kanghon pen
Arnam Jisu Khristo pen ajok ilitum aphan kur kepon asopomar atum ekepaplangji aphan Arnam aphrang pen pathiktang-lo. Lake Arnam aning kehang lapen kemang akamlo.
Amethang adak atur keplengset akangjinso ekepi apot ili Arnam aphan ro archo lonang!
Ilitum alangli pen chelangpetsi alangli vi pen ajok kejok long-lo, atheke Arnam ilitum apap hei hei diyatang-lo. Arnam akangjinso ko-an akethe!
Arnam ilitum aphan labangso akangjinso epi-olo.
Arnam amethang agian lapen abidi an pen
alangli ning kehang akam klemtang-lo, lapen alangli Khristo pen ajok keklem kepatangji pu kepa-thiktang kedipjoi alam non ilitum aphan epachinilo.
Arnam athik apor ahut labangso kemangdam akam keklem patangji. Labangso akam ke la helo: sining lapen pirthe athak kedo, kepinchongtang an aphan pangrumpetsi Khristo aphan halatum ahemphu paplangji.

Arnam amethang kemang lapen aphrang pen kepathiktang atengsi, nelitum Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok nelitum aphan amethang amonit nekepaplangjisi neingvailo. Lake Arnam amethang aning kehang ateng aphrang pen kepathiktang akamlo.
Nelitum, Khristo aphan ning kethe kedo paphrangcheng atum Arnam, adak atur kepathe thekji aphansi Arnam lason klemlo.

Arnam alamjir ahok alam, atheke nanglitum kejok kelong-i a-Birta Keme arjulongsi nanglitumta Arnam amonit plang-lo. Nanglitum Khristo aphan kekroi pen ajok Arnam nanglitum aphan amethang kechaktang a-Karjong Kangthir nangpisi amethang amonit angthek asap nanglitum athak theng-tang-lo.

Arnam amethang amonit atum aphan kechaktang ason ilitum longvekji pu angthek ke la Karjong helo, lapen Arnam amethang amonit atum aphan pajokphlot binongji pu ilitum labangso pen ajok chini. Ilitum alangli dak atur pathe lonang!
Labangso apotsi nanglitum Hemphu Jisu aphan kekroi lapen kangthir atum aphan kanghon alamjir neli karjulong ahut pen
nanglitum pen apot kaita Arnam aphan kero piverlo. Neli Arnam kardom abataitinta nanglitum aphan nangmathaponverlo,

lapen nanglitum Arnam aphan kechini thekji aphan, nanglitum aphan Karjong nangkepapijisi neli Hemphu Jisu Khristo a-Arnam, atheke adak atur kedo a-Po aphan choningrilo, atheke Karjong ke Arnam aphan kechini ajakong lapen kechini ajakong kepi abang-lo.
Arnam nanglitum aphan nangkepha apot nanglitum ning kechethedam ason kopima, kangthir atum alangli long pen kechepahemphu longji adak atur kedo akhi ko-an ale kethema,

lapen ilitum along kedo alangli jakong, atheke kekroitang atum along kedo alangli jakong ko-an akethema, la hei hei nanglitum kechini thekji aphan nanglitum alangli akethe-ang kethek-longjisi nanglitum aning amek nangkepangpuji aphan neli Arnam ardomlo. La ilitum along kedo alangli jakong ke
Khristo aphan kethitang atum angbong pen kepathur-i ajakong lapen alangliphan sining athak amethang ari ar-e anat kepangni-i ajakong kethe pen isipet-lo.

Sining asonthak thak adim kepangri atum an, kepangriji ajakong kelong atum an, ajakong kedo atum an lapen ahemphu atum kelong ajakong apar Khristo kelong ajakong themu, lapen labangso ajakong pensi alangli hadak pangrilo; lapen non kedobom akai anchot kali, mo kevangji akai angbong kedo atum kelong amen an apar alangli kelong amen themulo.
Arnam kadokave amarta Khristo akengpak arum bilo, lapen alangliphan kadokave amar a-Hemphu kethenei paplangsi mondoli aphan hodailo.
Mondoli ke Khristo abang arpumlo, lapen alangli kadokave adim kedo amar aphan kepachok lim asonthotsi amethangta mondoli pen ajok chok limlo.
Ahut isi ke nanglitum Arnam aphan kekroikre lapen nang methang apap hei hei apot Karjong anat ke akethitang-lo.

Halabangso ahut ke nanglitum labangso apirthe akehingno a-ot atengsi do thak-lo, lapen tomon angbong kedo kehingno akarjong atum aphan kepangri abang, kehingno akarjong aphansi nanglitum kroilo. Labangso kehingno akarjongsi Arnam aphan kekroikre atum aphan non charibomlo.

Aphrangke ilitum kadokaveta halatum asonthak thak-lo. Ilitum a-ok aning kehang atengsi ili klemlo, ebang, ening ekepaklemtoi alingsi ili klemlo. Lasi kadokave atum asonthotsi ilita Arnam aning kethi kephovek nangji atumlo.
Bonta Arnam akangjinso theparpik-lo, lapen alangli ilitum aphan e-inghonparpik-lo.
Atheke ilitum Arnam aphan kekroikre pen ajok Karjong anat ke akethitang-lo setta, alangli Khristo aphan pen pen ilitum aphan eparengthulo. Arnam akangjinso pen ajoksi nanglitum kejok long-lo.
Ilitum Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok Arnam ilitum aphan Khristo aphan pen pen epathursi sining athak Khristo along epangnidunlo.
Arnam Jisu Khristo pen ajok ilitum aphan e-inghon alangli ketheparpik akangjinso chepaklang-lo. Alangli akangjinso theparpik-lo pu mo mo akai an aphanta kepachiniji aphansi alangli lason klemlo.
Nanglitum akekroi apot Arnam akangjinso pen ajoksi nanglitum kejok long-lo. Lake nanglitum methang akam pen apot kali, bonta Arnam akangjinso adanlo.
Baduta kechepindak longledetji aphan lake kam keklem pen apot kali.

Arnam ilitum aphan non lapuson epaplang-lo. Ilitum keklemji aphan Arnam aphrang pen akeme akam hei hei ethikpilo, lapen ilitum Jisu Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok alangli ilitum aphan non lapuson ekepajalang ke ili la hei hei akam keklem thekji aphanlo.

Hala Jihudi atum, atheke “Rengrot ke-en atum,” pu kechepu atum ke (Rengrot ke-enke aron atang ateng pen abang a-ok kerot akamchot) nanglitum aphan, atheke mahang kethek penta Jihudi kalidet atum aphan “Rengrot ke-en-e atum,” pusi nangpulo. Ahut isi ke nanglitum kopuson amonit atum loma, lale chemathanon.

Halabangso ahut ke nanglitum Khristo aphan chininedetsi alangli pen chepaheloving-lo; nanglitum Israel amonit kalidet-lo, atheke nanglitum Arnam kangvaitang amonit kalidet-lo. Nanglitumke kaprek adet amonit pinak-lo, lasi Arnam amethang amonit atum aphan kechak akechechak along nanglitum apharman avedet-lo. Nanglitum ning kethe avepin pen lapen Arnam aphan chininepin pensi labangso apirthe athak dodunlo.
Aphrang ahut ke nanglitum Arnam pen chepaheloving-lo, bonta nonke nanglitum Khristo Jisu pen kechelangpet pen apot nanglitum aphan Khristo avi pen ajok Arnam adung nangvantang-lo.

Jisu Khristo amethangsi Jihudi lapen Jihudi kalidet atum aphan isipet paplangsi ilitum angbong lahin lahin ning kechingsam padolo. Halatum aphan hini akhei kepaplang-i lapen kepachelang un-e ahoi arpong alangli phridak-lo.

Alangli pen kechelangpet pen ajok la hini akhei aphan isi khei kemi kepinchongjisi alangli Jihudi atum kekroi Aron, Aron ahukum hei hei lapen aron atang hei hei kekroi akenang pavedet-lo; lapen lapusonsi alangli halatum angbong lahin lahin ning akechingsam padolo.

Khristo thengparpan athak amethang apran kechepi pen ajok la kheini angbong kedo akhet pavirdetsi halatum aphan isipet akhei paplang-lo, lapen halatum aphan Arnam along vanthusi Arnam pen pachepamethulo.

Khristo vangsi nanglitum Arnam pen keheloving atum aphan, atheke Jihudi kalidet atum aphan lapen hala Arnam pen ketebokhet atum aphan, atheke Jihudi atum aphan ning kangsam alamjir a-Birta Keme thanlo.
Khristo pen ajoksi ilitum kadokaveta, atheke Jihudi lapen Jihudi kalidet atumta isipet a-Karjong akerap pen ajok Arnam along vanglong-lo.
Labangso apotsi nonke nanglitum bang adet asor, mate bang adet pen vangsi nangkedo amonit atum kalilo; nonke nanglitum kangthir atum pen isipet adet amonit atumlo, lapen Arnam ahem asangho atumlo.
Ketoitang atum lapen Arnam amontri atum kepangnitang ahemthur athaksi nanglitum aphanta nangkimtang-lo; lapen labangso ahem kepathir-i akenangsotnei a-arlong ke Jisu Khristo helo.
Alanglisi labangso ahem pache-rapplang-lo, lapen pathebomsi Hemphu aphan kepanongpitang akardom ahem kangthir paplangbomlo.
Arnam a-Karjong kedo ahem kepaplangji aphansi nanglitum Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok nanglitum aphanta anut kaprek atum aphan pen pen labangso ahem along nang pacherapdunbomlo.
Labangso apotsi nanglitum Jihudi kalidet atum aphan ajok Khristo pen apot phatek kejangnang abang, neli Arnam aphan choningrilo.
Nanglitum ale kelongji aphan Arnam akangjinso pen neliphan labangso akam nepek-lo pu alam nanglitum arjulong binong-lo pusi neli mathalo.
Arnam neliphan kedip alam nepaklangsi nepachinilo. (Aphrangta neli nanglitum aphan labangso alamjir nangtok-lo.
Nanglitum halabangso aloh along ketok alam hei hei porhe lote Khristo akedip alamjir neli kechinidam alam nanglitum chini unpo.)
Arnam amethang a-Karjong pen ajok ketoitang lapen Arnam amontri atum aphan labangso akedip alam non kepaklang asonthot ke aphrang a-ove atum aphan ke pachininepinlang.

Kedip alam la helo: Jihudi kalidet atumta birta keme pen ajok Jisu Khristo pen chelangpetsi Jihudi atum pen Arnam ahirjume chepahemphulong rap rap-lo, halatum isipet abang arpum a-ok athan hei hei cheplang-lo lapen Arnam kechaktang ason long rap rap-lo.
Arnam amethang ajakong neli long kepado pen ajok Arnam akangjinso adan nepisi neliphan labangso a-Birta Keme aban nepaplang-lo.

Kangthir atum angbong pen akebinei ke neli helo setta kechini un-e Khristo akhi alamjir abirta keme Jihudi kalidet atum angbong kethan kepachethangji aphansi Arnam akangjinso pen neliphan labangso akam nepek-lo.

Arnam kepatujoi akemang akam non keklem kepaplengji alam monit atum aphan kepachinita neli keklem nangji akamlo. Kadokave kepinchong a-Arnam kedamtang akai anke labangso kepatujoi akemang alam dipjoilo.
Sining asonthak thak adim kepangri atum lapen ajakong kedo atum non mondoli pen ajok Arnam alep kedo-o abidi kechini longji aphansi non monit atum aphan hala kepatujoi akemang alam pachinilo.
Arnam aphrang pen kemang atengsi non lapuson klemlo, lapen lake e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo pen ajoksi akam papleng-lo.
Ilitum Khristo pen kechelangpet lapen alangliphan kekroi pen ajok ning thek-long pen Arnam along damhai.
Lasi neli nanglitum aphan choningrilo, nanglitum aphan ajok neli keduk kesung kephonang apot ke nanglitum aning cheparunhup-ri; lake nanglitum adak aturlo.
Labangso apotsi neli Po angno neli kengphu patongruilo.
Sining athak lapen pirthe athak kedo ahemtuntin aphanta la Posi amen irlo.
Arnam amethang a-Karjong pen ajok alangli methang adak atur akhi angbong pen nanglitum aphan jakong nangpisi nanglitum aning ajakong kepatheji,
nanglitum akekroi pen ajok Khristo nanglitum aning arlo kedoverji lapen nanglitum klem aling setta kanghon paklongsi keklemji,
Khristo akanghon ko-an avar thema, ko-an dingma, ko-an ingtuima lapen ko-an arnukma, la nanglitumta hala kangthir atum an pen pen kechini thekji,
lapen nanglitum chenamsi alangli kanghon kechini thekji, tebonta alangli akanghon ke chini pame un-e lapen lasi nanglitum Arnam a-ot pen keplengsetji aphansi neli Arnam ardomlo.
Ilitum along kam keklemvoi abang, atheke alangli methang a-Karjong pen ajok, ili kechohang pen apar lapen ili kemathadam pen apar ekepi un abang aphan,
atheke Arnam aphan mondoli pen ajok lapen Khristo Jisu pen ajok a-ovetin kejut un-e akai apar akai anta adak atur pathenang! Amen.
Lasi, Hemphu aphan keklempi apot phatek kejangnang abang, neli nanglitum aphan choningrilo, Arnam nanglitum aphan nangkepha ahut nanglitum aphan kepadotoi asonthot-le nanglitum do thak non.
Nanglitum kaiketa kechepabihek a-ot pen, asotdut a-ot pen lapen kechepaningding penle do non. Nanglitum lahin lahin aphan dengra nanglitum akanghon chepaklangnon.
Ning kangsamsi nanglitum aphan nangkok-rappet-lo, lapen labangso aning kangsam pen ajok Karjong nanglitum aphan ning isi nangpaplang-lo. Nanglitum aning isi kedoverjile un-an bor-inon.
Ilitum aning kethedam ason isinat. La isinat aning kethe kedoji aphansi Arnam nangphalo. Ning kethedam ason isinat asonthotsi bang arpumta isinat lapen Karjongta isinat.
Hemphu inutnat, kekroi isinat lapen baptisomta isinat;
lapen Arnam, atheke kadokave a-Po inutnat. Alangli ke kadokave atum a-Hemphulo. Alangli kadokave atum pen ajok klem lapen kadokave atum along do.
Khristo ilitum aphan ekepi atengsi ilitum abangphutin kenangsot adan long-lo.
Lasi hastro pulo,
“Alangli kangtuipik adim kedam ahut keneptang atum aphan ponlo,
lapen monit atum aphan dan hei hei pilo.”
Tangte, “Alangli angsong arludamlo,” pu kepu athe kopilo? Labangso alamthe kepudam athe la helo: aphrangke alangli pirthe abernei adim hirdamlo.
Lasi arum nangkehir abangthotsi, kadokave asonta kepachok limji aphan kadokave asining apar kangtuimu adim arludamlo.

Alanglisi monit atum aphan kenangsot adan hei hei pilo. Komanene atum ke ketoitang atum, komanene atum aphan ke Arnam amontri atum, komanene atum aphan ke Birta Keme kepachethang atum, komanene atum aphan ke mondoli keja mate pastor atum lapen komanene atum aphan ke kethan atum kecheplangji aphan Alangli kenangsot adan hei hei pilo.
Khristo abang arpum kepathirklongji aphan kangthir atum keklem nangji akam keklem thekji aphan kepachesik pameji aphansi alangli la klemlo.

Tangte la ko-an ahut anta doji? Ilitum akekroi lapen Arnam a-Sopo aphan kechini pen ajok ilitum isipet plangpletik, lapen ilitum arta dosi Khristo akrom ajon ateng plangpletik ke lahei hei do nangjilang.
Anke ilitum osomar atum ason kalidetsi kehingno akere atum kechomosoi alam alang angsum lapen atomon kepon aling ke dunthapthedetsi leng long tongtedetpo.
Bonta ilitum kanghon pen ahok alam ningjera kadokave asonta Khristo ason kecheplangjile thebom lonang. La Khristo ke bang arpum aphulo.

Alangli pen ajoksi abang athantin pachechulo, lapen labangso akepachechu akechechu an pen ajok abang arpum pacherapplang-lo. Lasi abang athantin keklem nangji akam cheklem pame lote kanghon pen ajok abang arpum thepo lapen ajakong thepo.
Lasi Hemphu amen pen neli nanglitum aphan nangpupo: nanglitum non pen apara hala thangta kalidet aning kematha pen kedo, Arnam aphan kekroikre atum ason ke do thak-rinon.
Halatum kechini ajakong ingtingkuk-lo. Halatum aning buikluihak huksi kechinine pen apot Arnam kepi achethe pen chepahe-loving-lo.
Halatum thangta therak thekthe; halatum ke kehingno akam keklemlokjisi aning kehang, lapen aning thang akechak-hik ave pin pen kehingno akam an klembom.
Bonta nanglitum Khristo alamjir kecharli long ke lapuson kali!
Nanglitum alangli lamjir arjulong binong-lo, lapen nanglitum ke alangliphan kekroi atumlo apotsi nanglitum aphan Jisu alamjir ahok alam nangthan binong-lo pusi neli mathalo.
Lasi nanglitum aphrang amonit a-ot adur barim che-onon. Ok aning kehang, kar-ithapsi labangso amonit barim aphan ke pavirbomlo.
Nanglitum aning angthin chepamithunon,
lapen Arnam a-ot ason kepinchongtang a-ot kemi chepindengnon. Labangso a-ot kemi ke ahok pen keplang adhoromipet akam lapen kangthir akam along klangdak-lo.
Lasi nanglitum non pen apara ke pachoreirinon. Tebok abang aphan ahok alamle ningjenon, pima ilitumke kadokaveta Khristo abang a-ok athan hei heilo.
Nanglitum ning thi setta pap klemri. Nanglitum aning kethi arni kechi an padoverri.
Hi-i Sarpo aphan asoi keme pek-ri.
Kechonghu abang non pen apara chonghurinon, bonta nang methang kereng-iji aphan lapen keduk kelak atum aphan kerapdun thekji aphan nang methang ari pen kam keme choklemnon.
Nanglitum angho pen kehingno alam ethe natta pabar longri, bonta karju atum ahirjume kelongjile halatum aphan kepame alam lapen halatum akenangji atengle akeme alam ningjenon.

Nanglitum Arnam a-Karjong Kangthir aning pa-oiri. Pima la Karjong kedo ke Arnam amonit-lo pu angthek-lo. Lapen mo kepajokji Arni ahut Arnam nanglitum aphan nang pajokvekji pu angthek aphan Karjong aphan sap ason paplangsi nanglitum athak sap thengtang-lo.
Ning keho, ning kesedeng lapen ning kethi a-ot an che-onon. Non pen apara nanglitum hang pangtarrinon, chepusit-rinon lapen chelangselet-ri non.
Nanglitum lahin lahin cherap seroinon, chejinso seroinon lapen Jisu Khristo pen ajok Arnam nanglitum aphan nang kediya asonthot-le nanglitum lahin lahin chediya seroinon.
Nanglitumke Arnam asomarlo apotsi alangli sonle charlidunnon.

Khristo ilitum aphan e-inghonlo, lapen kenemprujin lapen Arnam aning kedok athok ason cheplangsi ilitum apharman amethang apran chepidet-lo. Lasonthot-le nanglitumta klem aling setta kanghon penle kengkam chejorra klemnon.
Nanglitum angbong beisa akam, kangthirthe akam an lapen mek plengple akam anke alam anta pinpurpedet nangji. Pima kangthir atum angbong ke lahei hei avedet nangji.
Nanglitum angbong ke ketherakmeme alam kechethan, thangbakbe alam kechethanthap lapen lam jong jong kaningje hei hei avedet nangji. Bonta la hei hei alar Arnam aphan kerole pinon.
Beisa keklem abang, kangthirthe akam keklem abang lapen mek plengple abang ke, (Mek plengple akam ke eson ase karklilo) Khristo lapen Arnam arat angbong dim longdunde, lale nanglitum chinipamenon.
Baduta nanglitum aphan thang-bakbe alam pen nang pachomosoi longri, pima lapuson akam pen apot Arnam alam kekroikre atum aphan Arnam aning thiji.
Lasi nanglitum lason amonit atum along ke chelangdunri.
Ahut isi ke nanglitum kangting angbongsi dolo. Bonta nonke nanglitum Hemphu pen chelangpetsi kethe-ang angbongsi dolo. Lasi nanglitum kethe-ang asomar asonthot-le kengkam chejorra do thaknon.
Pima kethe-ang atheke akeme, kechok lapen ahok alongsi klang.
Hemphu aning kedok kopima, lale langpamenon.
Thangta ale kave akangting akam ke klemdunri, bonta la alar la paklangdaknon.
Halatum keklem kanghu akam ke alam kechethan anta therakmeme.
Bonta kethe-ang angbong vansi paklangdak lote a-ot binong thek-longdakpo. Pima keklangdak ason anke kethe-ang plang
Lasi pulo,
“O mek kejang abang, mek prangnon,
lapen kethitang atum angbong pen thurnon,
lapen Khristo nanglithak tur-angpo.”
Lasi nanglitum kopusonsi keng-kam chejor pen do thak-loma, lale chelang pamenon. Kelu atum ason kali, bonta kere atum asonle do thaknon.
Nanglitum asoi keme kelong aling kam keme klemnon, pima non akai ke hingno.
Nanglitum chepaluri, bonta Hemphu aning kehang kopima, la kechinijile bor-inon.
Nanglitum hor ingriri. Lake akhat kave abang nangpaplangchot. Bonta la alar nanglitum Karjong chepa-plengsetnon.
Hastro alun, dhorom alun lapen karjong alun hei hei penle lahin lahin chingki chethannon. Nanglitum aning aklong pen lun lapen ate-ot kejume penle Hemphu aphan ro archonon.
Ajat akam alam tame kaiketa Hemphu Jisu Khristo amen pen Po Arnam aphan kero pinon.
Nanglitum Khristo amahang langra lahin lahin alam chekroinon.
Apiso atum, Hemphu aphan asonthot-le nanglitum methang apenan atum alam kroinon.
Pima Khristo ke mondoli aphu asonthotsi apiso aphu ke apenan helo. Mondoli ke Khristo abang-lo lapen alanglisi la aphan pajok-lo.
Lasi mondoli Khristo aphan kekroi asonthotsi apiso atumta ajat asonta amethang methang apenan atum alam chekroi nangji.
Apenan atum, Khristole mondoli aphan chinghonsi mondoli aphan ajok amethang apran kechepi asonthot-le nanglitumta nang methang methang apiso aphan chinghonnon.
Mondoli aphan lam pen ajok lang pen cham pakaksi kepangthir-etji;

lapen mondoli aphan alon kepado parpik pen, atheke thang aphik kero, kechekedu lapen thang akehingno kepavedet pen amethang arideng kechehodaiji aphansi, lapen mondoli kangthir-etji lapen thangta kedin movedetji aphansi alangli lason amethang apran chepilo.
Lasonthotsi apenan atumta amethang abang aphan kechinghon asonthotsi amethang methang apiso aphan chinghon nangji. Amethang apiso aphan kechinghon abang ke amethang aphansi kechinghonlo.
Badu amonitta amethang abang aphan ke chehijimje. Bonta Khristo mondoli aphan keklem asonthotsi abangphutinta amethang methang abang aphan che-ora lapen chelana.
Pima ilitumke Khristo abang a-ok athan hei heilo.
Hastro along tok-lo, “Labangso apotsi monit ke api apo che-osi apiso pen chelangpetji, lapen bang hini a-ok isipet cheplangji.”
Labangso ahastro alam along eson karsikkrung akepatu alam do; bonta lake Khristo lapen mondoli alamjirsi kepudam pusi neli kechini.
Tebonta abangphutin apenanta amethang aphan kechinghon asonthotsi ame-thang methang apiso aphan chinghon nangji; lapen abangphutin apisota amethang methang apenan aphan aman pi nangji.
Osomar atum, Hemphu pen chelang pet-ra nangpi nangpo alam chekroinon. Pima lason keklem ke kechokpame akamlo.
“Nangpi nangpo aphan aman pinon,” pu ahukum helo kechak alam pen kepi aphrangsi ahukumlo.
Kechak alam ke la helo, “Anke nangtum akai mesenpo, lapen pirthe athak nangtum achethe dingpo.”
Apo atum, nanglitum asomar atum aning pathiri, bonta Hemphu alam kethan pen parera lapen pakengra halatum aphan pathe padingnon.
Ban atum, Khristo aphan asonthot-le kephere pen, ok klemhur pen lapen ning elep pet pen pirthe athak kedo nanglitum ahemphu alam kroinon.
Halatum aning nangkepadokji aphan halatum nangkethekdunlong ahut keklemchot ke chokche; bonta Khristo aban atum asonthot-le nang ning aklong pen Arnam aning kehang ateng klemnon.
Monit atum aphanle keklempi kali, bonta Hemphu aphansi keklempi asonthot-le ning arong pen ban akam klemnon.
Pima ban tame, mate ban kalidet abang settame, abangphutinta kam keme keklem apot Hemphu pen nong-e longji, lale chininon.

Ban ahemphu atum, nanglitumta lasonthot-le ban atum aphan klemnon. Nanglitum halatum aphan ther-ri, pima sining athak kedo nanglitum lapen halatum a-Po ke inutnat. Alangli ke langret lang-ai pen klemkle.
Kejutsi, nanglitum Hemphu pen chelangpet-ra alangli akethe parpik ajakong pen chepangtang-rak non.
Hi-i Sarpo kemang, akehingno akam aphan kekhang unjile Arnam nangkepi arisim an ennon.

Pima ilitumke monit atum penle kechedan kali, bonta sining asonthak thak adim kedo kehingno akarjong atum pen, kepangri atum pen, ajakong kelong atum pen lapen non kangtingkuk akai apirthe kepangri akarjong atum pensi chedanlo.
Lasi mo kehingno arni ahut nanglitum karjapthip thekji lapen kadokave klemdet aphita karjap kechepathirthip thekjile Arnam nangkepi arisim an ennon.
Tangte, Arnam alamjir ahok alam ke nanglitum avam kechingtin-i avamkok ason, dhoromi akam ke nanglitum aning kecheden-i achong-plang ason,
lapen ning kangsam alamjir a-Birta Keme kepachethangji kechesikding ke keng-op asonle enra arjapthipnon.
Lahei hei aparta kekroi ke chong asonle ennon. La pen ajok Hi-i Sarpo nang ke-ap athai aso akekar-ang ame pamep unpo.
Kejok ke phutup ajakhor asonle ennon.

Arnam kardom penle la kadokave klemnon, lapen Arnam pen akerap kelongji aphan kechoningri penle Arnam ardomnon. Nanglitum klem aling setta karjong nangkeja ateng pen Arnam ardomra klemnon. Labangso apotsi nanglitum arjuton dingra chesikdingnon: lapen nanglitum Arnam kardom aling kangthir atum aphanta ardom pinon.

Lapen neli pherere pin pen Birta Keme akepatu alam kethan kepachethang thekji lapen kethan kepachinidak thekji aphan neli kaningjeji ahut neli keningje nangji alam Arnam neliphan nekepachinidunjile neliphanta Arnam ne-ardompinon.

Neli ke labangso a-Birta Keme Kepachethang apherangkelo, lapen labangso pen apotsi neli non phatek jang nang-lo. Neli keklem nangji akam ateng phererepin pen Birta Keme kepachethang thekji aphan neliphanta Arnam ne ardompitha.
Lasi neli kopusonma, lapen kopisi keklembomma, la nanglitum kechiniji aphan ilitum akorte, Hemphu akam keklem pame abang, Taikikas nanglitum aphan kadokave alam nangthanpo.
Lasi nanglitum aphan nelitum alamjir nangkepathanji lapen ning nang kepatheji aphansi neli alangliphan nanglitum along nangtoilo.
Po Arnam lapen Hemphu Jisu Khristo Khristian akorte atum an aphan ning kangsam lapen kekroi pen pen kanghon papinang.
E-Hemphu Jisu Khristo aphan kejut un-epin akanghon kedo atum an along Arnam akangjinso padonang.

Jisu Khristo aban atum, atheke Timothi pen pen neli Polsi nanglitum aphan, atheke mondoli keja atum lapen kerapdun atum aphan pen pen Philipi arongsopi kedo Jisu Khristo pen kechelangpet akangthir atum an aphan labangso aloh tok-lo.
Epo Arnam lapen e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo nanglitum aphan kangjinso lapen ningkangsam nangpapinang.
Neli nanglitum aphan nangkeche-matha abataitinta nanglitum pen apot Arnam aphan roverlo,
lapen neli nanglitum kadokave aphan Arnam nang kardompi abataitinta neli ning arong pensi Arnam ardomlo,
pima kecheng arni pen nonputa nanglitum neli long Birta Keme kepachethang akam keklem nangcherapdunlo.
Lapen nanglitum along kam keme keklem kepangcheng abang, Arnam labangso akam klemponbomsi mo Jisu Khristo a-Arni ahut patang pameji pu neli kroi pamelo.

Neli nanglitum kadokave aphan lapuson nang kematha ke kechokpame akamlo, pima nanglitum kaiketa neli ning arlo doverlo, atheke lahelo, non neliphan ingchin ani pen kekok ahut tame, mate neli kejokvan pen Birta Keme kerai lapen kepathir ahut settame, nanglitum kadokaveta Arnam neliphan nekepi akangjinso apharman nanglong-dunhurlo.
Jisu Khristo akechinghon asonsi neli nanglitum kadokave aphan ko-an chinghon loma, lake Arnam neli hakilo.
Kopi alam meneima, la kangvai pame thekji aphan nanglitum akechini lapen akangvai pamethek ajakong pen pen nanglitum akanghon patheponbomnang pusi neli Arnam ardomverlo.
Anke mo Khristo a-Arni ahut nanglitum akechokche lapen adai avedetpo,
lapen Arnam aphan kero—karcho lapen adak atur kepatheji aphan Khristo pen ajoksi kelong unchot adhoromipet a-ot athe pen nanglitum plengsetpo.
Neliphan keplangtang ason an pen Birta keme chan-ilo, la nangli-tum kechinijisi neli ning hang-lo, kortemarli atum,
Pima labangso pen ajok, neli Khristo akam keklempi apotsi neliphan ingchin ani pen ne-kok-lo pu alam recho ahem kehon aron-aso atum an lapen ladak kedo akaprek atum anta chini pamelo.
Neliphan kekok pen apot Khristian akorte atum angbong ongmuchot atum ke Hemphu aphan ansose chikithu-muchot-lo. Lasi halatum aphrang apar pherere-muchotbom pen Arnam alam pachethang hailo.
Ahok-lo, manene atum ke kelang un-e lapen kechebohong aning pensi Khristo alamjir than-pachethang-lo, bonta manene atum ke aning keme pensi than-pachethang-lo.
La aphi atum ke kanghon pensi klemlo, pima Arnam neliphan Birta Keme kerai akam nepek-lo pu alanglitum chinilo.

Hala aphrang atum ke ahok aning penle Khristo alamjir kethan kali, bonta amethang methang ale kelongji aphansi thanlo; pima labangso pen ajok non neliphan ingchin ani pen kekok ahut neliphan pasung dunthu muchot longpo pusi halatum mathalo.

Tangte kopilo? Ajat ason pen settame, atheke ahok-he aning pen tame, mate ahokpet aning pen settame, Khristo alamjir ke than-pachethangdet-lo anhelo. Lapen labangso pen apot neli ning arong-lo. Lapen chenamsi neli ning arongbomji.
Pima nanglitum Arnam kardom lapen Jisu Khristo akarjong akerap pen ajok lake neli kejok-i ason plangpo pu neli chinilo.

Neli ning kehang-o lapen neli ning kethe lahelo, son suri alam settame, neli therak-redetji, bonta kai atengsi non ahutta, neli rengbom tame, mate thi settame, neli phereredetsi nelibang arpum pen Khristo anong patheji.
Pima neliphan ke, neli kereng-bom ke Khristo aphanlo, lapen neli kethi ke neliphan alelo.
Bonta neli kerengbom pen ajok jongsi neli ale kedo akam klem unpo tangte neli kolobangso abangsi ingvai apot-loma, lake neli puthekthe.
La, sonni alam angbong neli pa-ing-ang-lok-lo. Neli labangso apirthe pen che-osi Khristo along kedodunji ninghangpik-lo; pima neli methang aphan ke la memulo,
bonta nanglitum pen apot neli kerengbom helo ansose akenangsot-lo.
Neli labangso alam chini pamelo; lasi neli rengbomjilang pu neli chinilo. Neli nanglitum akekroi pen keplang aning arong nang kepa-ong muchotji aphan neli nanglitum kadokave angbong dobomjilang.
Anke mo neli nanglitum angbong kevangthu ahut nanglitum Khristo Jisu pen chelangpetsi neli pen apot kechepindakji athe do muchotpo.

Non kenangsot alam ke lahelo, neli nanglitum angbong vangsi nanglitum aphan nangchehumri un tame, mate vang un-e-detsi neli nanglitum angbong avedet settame, nanglitum ning isipet pen lapen ning kehang isipet pen dothipsi chelangpet pen birta keme pen keplang akekroi aphan ajok ron chedan bomlo pu neli karjulongji aphan Khristo alamjir a-Birta Keme atengle nanglitum a-ot-adur chepadonon.
Nanglitum ahotur atum aphan phereri. Kaiketa phererepin-non, anke labangso pen ajok halatum remji lapen nanglitum haiji pu halatum chiniji; thangbakma Arnamsi nanglitum aphan pahaiji.
Pima Khristo aphan kekroichot pen kali, bonta alangliphan ajok keduk-kesung kechechak pen setta nanglitum keklemji aphansi Arnam amethang akangjinso pen nanglitum aphan Khristo akam paklem long-lo.
Aphrang neli ron kechedan nang-litum nangthekdunlong-lo, lapen nonta neli chedanbomlo, lake nanglitum arjulong-lo; labangso aron kechedan akamsi nanglitumta pholo.

Nanglitum Khristo pen kechelang-pet pen ajok jongsi kedo kechepathirklongji ajakong long-lo, alangli akanghon jongsi nanglitum aning paplilo, nanglitum jongsi Karjong pen chelangpet-lo, lapen nanglitum jongsi lahin lahin kechejinso lapen kechematha seroi dolo tangte,
nanglitum ning isipet pen dora, isipet akanghon pen chinghon seroira, lapen isipet aning kehang pen lapen isipet aning kematha pen dora neli ning arong paplengsetnon.
Nanglitum nang methang methang ale kelongji aphanchot, kalite kecheparoka penke thangta klemri, bonta chepabihek-ra nangli par bang memu pule mathanon.
Nanglitum nang methang methang ale cherichot-ri, bonta bang aphanta ale ripinon.
Nanglitum akematha ke Jisu Khristo akematha asonthot nangji;
Alangli ke Arnam asonthot-lo,
setta Arnam pen chingbarchit keplang,
lake kehung nangji akam puke mathathedet-lo.
Bonta alangli amethang aning kehang pen thangta kalidet abang cheplangsi ban asonthot cheplang-lo.
Alangli monit a-arje ensi monit asonthak thaksi nangcheklang-lo.
Alangli chepabihek pen kethi anta,
atheke ha thengparpan athak kethi anta kroilo.
Labangso apotsi Arnam alangliphan akethenei aman palong-lo,
lapen alangliphan kadokave amen apar akethemu amen pilo.
Lasi sining athak, pirthe athak
lapen pirthe arum kedo atum an Jisu anong kepathejisi akengphu patongpetji,
lapen Po Arnam adak atur kepathejisi Jisu Khristo helo Hemphu pu abangphutinta pupetji.

Lahelo, neli kechinghon atum, nanglitum kaiketa kekroiver asonthotsi nanglitum angbong neli bang kedo ahutchot kali; non nanglitum angbong neli bang kave ahutta nanglitum aphrang apar kroithumu-chotnon. Nanglitum methang akejok kepaplengjile kephere lapen ok klemhur pen klemponbomnon,
pima Arnam aning kehang ateng nanglitum aning kehangji lapen keklemji aphan Arnam nanglitum along kaiketa klemverlo.
Nanglitum klem aling setta pasimuturtedet pen lapen alam chehili-seisepin penle klemnon.

Anke la kehingno lapen kechingkino atum apirthe angbong nanglitum adai kavepin, akelet kavepin lapen kechok lim Arnam asomar plangsi sining angsong keturbong achiklolongso atum asonsi nanglitum halatum angbong turdangpo.

Nanglitum halatum aphan chethe alamjir kethan ahut lasonle klemnon. Nanglitum lapuson klemlote mo Khristo a-Arni ahut neli nanglitum pen apot chepindak-longpo, pima neli kat chebai nakne lapen klem chepaduk naknelo pu la nanglitum akam pen ajok klangdakpo.
Nanglitum akekroi pen ajok nanglitum kepi athok athak lapen akardom-kangduk along, neli chethe avi dungnangdetji setta neli ning arong do, lapen nanglitum kadokave pen pen neli chehok rap rappo.
Lapuson thak thaksi nanglitumta chehok-ra neli pen chehoktha.
Jongsi Arnam aning kehang do tangte, neli nanglitum abirta longsi neli ning ke-arong-longji aphan neli Timothi aphan nanglitum along nangtoi dapprang unpo pusi ningthelo.
Neli sonthot nanglitum akeme aphan aning aklong pen nang kematha-e abang ke alangli anhelo, neli long baduta avelo.
Akaprek atum ke abangphutinta amethang methang alamsi chematharepchot-lo, Jisu Khristo aning kehang akam keklemji aphan ke mathavangve.
Lapen Timothi a-ot keme alam nanglitum methangta chinilo, asopole apo along kam keklem kecherapdun asonthotsi alanglita neli long birta keme kepachethang akam nangcherapdunlo.
Lasi neliphan kopi plangjima, la neli kechinilong pen mamat neli alangliphan nanglitum along nangtoi longpo pusi neli ningthelo.
Lapen jongsi Hemphu aning kehang do tangte, neli methang amatta nanglitum along vang longdap prangpo pusi ningthelo.

Neliphan nekeparapdunji aphan nanglitum neli long nangketoitang abang, atheke neli ri asangho lapen polton asonthak thak neli long kam nangkecherapdun abang, ilitum akorte Epaprodaitas aphan neli nanglitum along nangtoithuveknangji pusi neli mathalo.
Pima alangli nanglitum kadokave aphan nangchingtung pik-lo lapen alangli keso alam nanglitum karjulong apot alangli ningdukpik-lo.
Ahok-lo, alangli sodet-lo, lapen thiji dok dok anlo. Bonta neli ningduk apar ningduk kephophedetji aphan Arnam alangliphanchot kali, neliphanta ne-ingjinsolo.
Lasi nanglitum alang-liphan thekthu longsi nanglitum aning arong kedoji lapen neli ning adukta kedobombedetji aphan neli alangliphan nanglitum along nangketoiji ning hang-olo.
Hemphu aphan langra nanglitum ning arong pen alangliphan dengnon. Alangli son son amonit aphan aman pitu,
pima Khristo akam aphan ajok alangli thiji dok dok anlo, lapen nanglitum neliphan nekerapdun un-e akam alangli keklem kepaplengjisi alangli kethi kerengta chemathathedet-lo.
Kejutsi, kortemarli atum, Hemphu amen pen chehoknon. Neli nang-litum aphan nangketoktang alam nangketokthu lethotji momelo, lapen neli lapuson klemlote nanglitum jokvan muchotpo.
Hala kehingno keklem atum, halabangso amethan atum, hala abang a-ok kecherot akam anat alam kepathevaret atum aphan cherenon.

Ahok areng-rot ke-en atum ke ilitum helo, halatum kali, pima ilitumke Arnam a-Karjong pensi Arnam aphan ingduk-ardomlo, lapen Khristo Jisu pen chelangpetsi chehok-lo. La athak keklemphrui aron-atang akam aphan ke ilitum chikikelo.
Lason akam aphanle kechikijile pute neli ke chiki un. Komane abang jongsi lason ok akam aphan kechikiji athe do pule matha lote, nelisi kechikiji athe ke-ongchot-lang.

Neli arta ni nerkep kepleng ahut neliphan reng-rot pilo; neli ke mahangkethek penta inut a-Jihudilo; neli kur ke Benjaminlo; neli phusar atum anta Jihudilo. Jihudi atum Aron kekroi anat-le langdam setta neli ke inut a-Pharisilo,

lapen neli Arnam aning kehang ateng keklemji aphan ning hangpik-lo apotsi neli mondoli aphanta chenek-lo. Aron ahukum kekroi pen ajok-le dhoromi plang un pulote, neli ke kroipamesi neliphan nedin movepinlo.
Hala hei hei ason neliphan ale do pusi aphrangke neli lakhalo, setta nonke Khristo pen apot lahei hei ason ke neliphan ale ave pusi neli lakhadet-lo.

Hala hei hei ason anchot kali, ne Hemphu Khristo Jisu aphan kechini pen apot kadokave asonta ale avepin pusi neli lakhadet-lo; pima kadokave ason apar la ne Hemphu Khristo Jisu aphan kechini ale domu pusi neli mathalo. Neli kadokave asonta che-o-et-lo, Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok neli ale kelongji lapen alangli pen isipet kecheplangji aphan la kadokave ason ke kevartang alohban asonthak thak-lo pusi neli mathalo.

Nonke neli methang akam, atheke Aron kekroi pen apotsi neliphan dhoromi pu nelakhaponlo, lapu kali, bonta neli Khristo aphan kroilo apotsi neliphan dhoromi pu nelakhaponlo, lapen lake neli kekroi apot-lo.

Neli Khristo aphan kechiniji lapen alangli kethitang atum angbong pen kethur ajakongta neli kechiniji, alangli keduk-kesung kechechak asonthotsi nelita keduk-kesung kechechakji, lapen alangli kethi asonthot nelita kecheplangjisi neli ning hang-lo.
Lasi neliphanta kethitang atum angbong pen pathursi parengthuji pu neli ning thelo.
Neli longtang-lo, mate neli chok-limtang-lo pule neli kepudam kali, bonta nong-e kelongji aphan neli bor-i ponbomlo, pima labangso aphansi Khristo Jisu neliphan nechepahemphu tang-lo.
Kortemarli atum, chenamsi neli longtang-lo pule kemathadam kali, tebonta eson akam klemlo, neli neliphi chelangledetsi neliphrang kedo ason aphan matha-elo.
Lasi anong-e kelongji aphan neli ahot-he anat kat pakengding-lo. Labangso anong-e aphansi Khristo Jisu pen ajok Arnam neliphan angsong anat nehang-lo.

Ilitum Karjong anat kedo pame atum anke lapusonsi mathapet nangji. Bonta nanglitum angbong komanene atum akematha jongsi lapuson ake-matha pen prekdak-lo tangte, Arnam labangso alamta nanglitum aphan paklangdakji.
Tebonta ilitum non an kevangtang asonthot-le ephrang anat dambom lonang.
Kortemarli atum, nanglitum neli long nangcharlidunnon. Nelitum nanglitum aphan nangkepaklang ateng kengkam kechejor atum aphan lang pangthekdunnon.
Aphrangta neli nanglitum aphan abatai batai nangthanlo, lapen nonke neli mekkri-mek-lang pensi nanglitum aphan puthupo: Khristo athengparpan ahotur ason kengkam kechejor atum do-o.
Halatum kepho paduji ke kevir helo, pima halatum a-arnam ke halatum apok helo. Ketherak-meme akam pensi halatum ane chepathe-ilo, lapen halatum ke pirthe alam loksi matha-elo.
Bonta ilitum adet ke sining helo, lapen e-Kepajok a-Bang, Hemphu Jisu Khristo hadak sining pen kevangji aphan ilitum tovar cholang-lorlo.
Alangli kadokave aphan amethang aber kechebi un ajakong pen ilitum akevir undet lapen ajakong kavedet abang arpum aphan larsi amethang abang arpum ason adak-atur kedo abang arpum paplangji.

Lasi neli kechinghon akorte marli atum, nanglitum Hemphu pen chelangpetra chepathirthipnon. Neli nanglitum aphan nangchinghonpik-lo, lapen nangchingtungpik-lo. Nanglitum neliphan ning neparongpik-lo, lapen nanglitum helo neliphu avaikang anong-elo, kechinghon akortemarli atum!
Eudia lapen Sintiki, neli nanglitum aphan choningrilo, nanglitum Hemphu aphan langra ning isipet penle donon.
Lapen nangli, atheke ahokpet pen neli pen kam keklem rap rap abang, nangli labangso arlosomar atum aphan rapduntha.
Nanglitum Hemphu pen chelang-pet-ra kaiketa chehoknon. Neli puthulo; chehoknon!
Nanglitum kadokave angno ke-chingkime a-ot paklangnon. Hemphu vangdap-prangpo.
Son suri alam setta ning biri, bonta kardom lapen kechoningri pen pen kero penle nanglitum akenangji anta Arnam aphan pachininon.
Anke nanglitum Khristo Jisu pen kechelangpet pen ajok monit atum kechinipet un-e Arnam kepi aning kangsam nanglitum aning lapen akematha aphan honpo.

Kejutsi, kortemarli atum, nanglitum keme ason an lapen keromeme atheng an: atheke ahok ason an, ot keme an, kechok ason an, kedin movedet ason an, inghonmeme ason an lapen aman kepimeme ason an alamle mathanon.
Nanglitum neli long pen kecharlitang, kelongtang, karjulongtang lapen neli long nangkethek dunlongtang ason an klemnon. Anke ning kangsam ekepi a-Arnam nanglitum along dopo.

Arni dingklui pen aphi nanglitum neliphan kemathathu apot neli Hemphu pen chelangpetsi ning arong-lo. Nanglitum neliphan kematha ingtonkok-lo pule neli kepudam kali, bonta nanglitum neliphan kerapji aphan asoi keme longledet apotsi nanglitum neliphan akematha alam chepaklang longledet-lo.
Neli akedorde kedo apotsi labangso alam pudamlo, lapu kali, pima neli kedo ason an pen ning kechepangsamji aphan charlitang-lo.

Neli akedorde ahut lapen kedorchit pen apar kedo ahut kopusonsi do nangjima, lake neli chinilo. Neli do-dam aling tame, kadokave ahut tame, neli ingkrangling tame, mate ingchirduk settame; do-o tame, mate avedet settame, pho aling setta neli ning kechepangsamji aphan charlitang-lo.
Neli pho aling settame, Khristo nekepi ajakong pen kadokave asonta keklemji ajakong do.
Tebonta nanglitum neli akesung apharman nangke-endunke mesenlo.

Lapen neli nanglitum ahavar birta keme kepachethang kepangcheng ahut malom, neli Masedonia ke-otekang ahut neliphan nekerapdun amondoli mate kroi-asong ke nanglitum anchot, akaprek ave, lake nanglitum Philipi asor atum chinipamelo. Ale kedo lapen ale kave akam along neli pen keche-langrap atum ke nanglitum anchot;
neli ha Thessalonika arongsopi kedo ahutta nanglitum neliphan batai isi-hini akerap ason nang-lolo.
Neli danle keri kali, bonta nanglitum ale longsi nanglitum alakha kechanbomjisi neli ning hang-lo.

Neli longpet-lo, lapen lake kenangji pen aparlo. Nanglitum Epaphrodaitas along nangkelodun akerap ason neli kelong pen neli dorphlup-lo. Halabangso akerap ason ke Arnam aphan kethok kenemprujin, Arnam kedengmeme lapen aning kedok athok asonthakthak-lo.
Lapen Khristo Jisu pen ajok ne-Arnam amethang adak-atur akhi angbong pen nanglitum akenangji anta nangpipo.
Kejut un-e akai apar akai anta e-Po Arnam adak atur pathenang! Amen.
Khristo Jisu amen pen neli kangthir atum an aphan kardom pilo. Ladak neli long kedo akorte atumta nanglitum aphan kardom nangchepidunlo.
Ladak kedo kangthir atum an, jasemet ke Koisor Recho ahem kedo amonit atum nanglitum aphan kardom nangpidunlo.
Hemphu Jisu Khristo akangjinso nanglitum kadokave along padonang.
Arnam aning kehang pen ajok Jisu Khristo aketoitang abang keplang abang neli Polsi ekorte Timothi pen pen
labangso aloh nanglitum atheke Kolosa arongsopi kedo Arnam amonit atum aphan, atheke Khristo pen kechelangpet, kekroi kethirklong akorte atum aphan tok-lo.
E-Po Arnam nanglitum aphan kangjinso lapen ning kangsam nangpapinang.
Nelitum Arnam kardom ahut Arnam aphan, atheke e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo a-Po aphan kaiketa kero piverlo.
Pima nanglitum Jisu Khristo aphan kekroi lapen Arnam amonit atum aphan kechinghon alam nelitum arjulong-lo.

Ahok abirta, atheke Birta Keme nanglitum along kevangcheng ahut nanglitum labangso abirta keme kepi aning kethe alam arjulongtang-lo. La apotsi nanglitum akekroi lapen akanghon atiri hei hei ke nanglitum aning kethe helo, lapen la nanglitum aning kechethedam ason ke nanglitum aphan sining athak nangbipi pametang-lo.

Birta keme ke ahirjume vanbom lapen pirthe adang bithe bitha adimta chethangbomlo. Lake nanglitum Arnam akangjinso alamjir karjulongcheng lapen kechini pame ahut pen non an nanglitum angbong ahirjume kevanbom lapen alam kechethangbom asonthot-lo.
Nelitum kechinghon, kam keklem rap rap aban lapen nelitum apharman Khristo akam keklem pame abang, Epaphras pen nanglitum la Arnam akangjinso alam chinilong-lo.
Karjong nanglitum aphan nangkepi akanghon alamta alanglisi nelitum aphan nethanlo.

La apotsi nanglitum alam karjulong pen amat nelitum nanglitum aphan Arnam nang ardompiverlo. Karjong nanglitum aphan nangkepi agian lapen kechinithek ajakong an pen nanglitum Arnam aning kehang alam kechinithekji aphansi nelitum Arnam nang ardom pilo.

Anke nanglitum Hemphu aning kehang ateng do-thak thekpo, lapen Hemphu aning kehang aling nanglitum klem thekpo. Nanglitum akai angbong kam keme an athe pathepo, lapen nanglitum Arnam aphan chini muchot muchotbompo.
Nanglitum Kechepaningding pen kadokave alamta kechechak unji aphan Arnam nanglitum aphan amethang adak atur ajakong pen jakong horang nangpapinang.
Anke Kethe-ang a-Rat angbong Arnam amethang amonit atum aphan kethikpitang ason kelongdunji a-ot nangkepado abang aphan, atheke Po Arnam aphan nanglitum ning arong pen kero pithekpo.
Alangli ilitum aphan kangting ajakong angbong pen epajoktang-lo, lapen alangli kechinghon asopo arat angbong evan pametang-lo.
La alangli Sopo pen ajoksi ilitum aphan epajoktang-lo, atheke ilitum apap an diyatang-lo.
Kethek-long un-e a-Arnam a-arje ke Khristo helo. Alangli ke sopo aklengsilo, lapen kepinchongtang an angbong akethemu abang-lo.

Pima alangli pen ajoksi sining-pirthe athak kedo ason anta pinchong-lo, atheke kethek-long-lor lapen kethek longledet ason an, lapen ajakong kedo akarjong atum aphan, hemphu atum aphan, kepangri kepangdon atum aphan lapen ajakong horang kedo atum aphanta alangli pen ajoksi Arnam pinchong-lo. Arnam la kadokaveta alangli pen ajoksi pinchong-lo, lapen alangliphansi pinchongpilo.
Kadokave amar kave ako penta Khristo ke dolo, lapen alangli methang pen la kadokave amar cherap hetsi dolo.
Khristo ke mondoli aphulo, lapen mondoli ke Khristo abang arpumlo. Kadokave asonta alanglisi akethenei abang keplangthekji aphan alangli ke sopo aklengsilo, lapen alangliphan kethi pen parengthulo.
Pima Sopo along Arnam a-ot an kedo ke Arnam aning kehang-lo.

Tangte amethang a-Sopo pen ajok sining longle aphan amethang along kechevanthujisi Arnam pathik-lo. Thengparpan athak alangli Sopo avi kebu pen ajok la kadokave ason pen Arnam chepamethulo, lapen lasonsi kadokave ason, atheke pirthe athak lapen sining athak kedo ason an aphan Arnam amethang along chevanthulo.
Ahut isi ke nanglitum Arnam pen heloving-lo, lapen nanglitum akehingno akam keklem lapen akematha pen apot nanglitum Arnam ahotur cheplang-lo.

Bonta nonke nanglitum aphan akangthir-et pen, thang adai kavepin pen lapen thang nangdin movepin pen Arnam angno nangkevanjisi amethang a-Sopo abang arpum akethi pen ajok Arnam nanglitum pen chepajirpothulo.

Bonta nanglitum kekroi chepathirklong-bom non, lapen nanglitum karjulong abirta keme pen ajok nanglitum kelong aning kethe penle nanglitum dothipnon. Pirthe athak abangphutin aphanta labangso abirta keme pachethangtang-lo, lapen neli Pol ke labangso abirta keme abanlo.

Lapen nonke nanglitum aphan pen ajok neli kesung hei hei kepho nang apot neli chehok-lo, pima Khristo amethang abang arpum apharman, atheke mondoli apharman kechechak akeduk kesung keplengple anta nelimethang abang arpum akeduk kesung hei hei pen ajok neli paplengbomlo.
Nanglitum aphan ale nangkepalongpiji aphansi Arnam neliphan mondoli aban nepaplangtang-lo. Lapen akam ke lahelo, neli alangli birta keme an pachethang-et nangji.
Kedamtang akai anke Arnam a-ovetin aphanta labangso abirta keme alam pachininedetsi dipjoilo, bonta nonke Arnam amethang amonit atum aphan la paklangdak-lo.

Arnam kepathik ke lahelo, labangso akhi lapen adak atur akepatu alam alangli amethang amonit atum aphan pachinidakji, lapen lake kadokave amonit aphanlo. Labangso akedipjoi alam lahelo, Khristo nanglitum aning arlo do, atheke nanglitum Arnam adak atur longdunpo.

Lasi nelitum Khristo alamjir than pachethang-lo. Abangphutin amonitta Khristo pen kechelangpet pen ajok Arnam angno kechok-lim thekji aphan nelitum kadokave agian pen kadokave amonit aphan than parelo.
Neli labangso akam keklem kepatangjisi Khristo nekepi ajakong pen, atheke neli long kam keklemvoi ajakong pen neli klem bor-i bor-abomlo.
Pima nanglitum aphan, Laodesia asor atum aphan lapen neli pen kechetongtelang atum aphan neli ko-an chepadukpiloma, la nanglitum aphan nangkepachinijisi neli ning hang-lo.

Halatum lahin lahin kechinghon pen kedorappet thekji, aning kerungsetji lapen ningtheklong akhi an kechini thekji aphansi neli lason klemlo. Lapusonsi halatum Arnam kedipjoi alam chiniji, atheke Khristo aphan chiniji.
Khristo alongsi Arnam agian lapen akechini ason an dopet-lo.
Tangte neli nanglitum aphan nangpulang, baduta nanglitum aphan alam kedok pen setta nangpamanghu longri.
Pima neli bangle nanglitum along ave setta neli ningke nanglitum alongsi dolo, lapen ke nanglitum Khristo aphan kekroi kethirklong lapen kedo kethak pame nangthek longsi neli ning arong-lo.
Nanglitum Jisu Khristo aphan Hemphu pu kroitang-lo apotsi alangli pen chelangpet-ra donon.

Nanglitum aphan nangkethantang asonthot-le nanglitum alangli long angkur chesakthipnon, alangli thak-le nanglitum akai cheparjapthipnon, lapen nanglitum akekroi chepathir muchot muchotbomnon. Lapen ke alangliphan kero kepi o-edetnon.

Khristo penle kevang kalidet, bonta monit atum a-ove ove pen kethantekang alam pen lapen pirthe-sining angbong keja ahi-i atum pensi kevangchot, monit atum akepachobei abidi pen kethan, ale kave alam pen ajok ke baduta nanglitum aphan nangpamanghu longri.
Pima Khristo pirthe athak monit asonthak thak kedo ahut alangli long Arnam a-ot adur an dolo.
Lapen nanglitumta alangli pen chelangpetsi plenglim tang-lo. Alangli ke kepangri akarjong an lapen jakong horang kedo atum aphuthak ajakong dolo.

Nanglitum Khristo pen keche-langpet pen ajok nanglitum aphan reng-rot nangpitang-lo. Lake monit ari pen keklem areng-rot kali, bonta Khristosi kepathik areng-rot-lo, atheke nanglitum aphan pap ajakong angbong pen nang pajokphlottang-lo.

Pima nanglitum baptisom ke-en ahut nanglitum aphan Khristo along nangpipdundet tang-lo, lapen nangli-tum Khristo aphan kethitang atum angbong pen kepathur a-Arnam ajakong kekroi pen ajok, nanglitum baptisom ke-en ahut nanglitum aphan Khristo along nangpathurdun tang-lo.

Nanglitum apap hei hei pen apot lapen reng-rot ke-en-e pen apot ahut isi ke nanglitum karjong anat ke akethitang-lo. Bonta Arnam nanglitum aphan Khristo pen nang-parengthurappet-lo. Arnam ilitum apap an diyatang-lo,
lapen ilitum apreng kechetu nangji alamchak aloh, atheke ilitum aphan ekekok-i aron an thanpettang-lo. Alangli lahei hei thengparpan athak kesak pen ajok pavirdettang-lo.

Khristo halabangso athengparpan athak keja akarjong atum ajakong angbong pen lapen ajakong kedo atum ajakong angbong pen chepajokphlot-lo, lapen alangli kehai kechepaklang ajengtoi jengni along halatum aphan koidi ason ponsi halatum aphan rat angno patherak-lo.
Lasi badu amonitta kecho kejun, mate kangthir arni hei hei ketalon nangji aron, mate chiklo kemi arong-aje ketalon nangji aron, mate Sabbath arni ketalon nangji aron hei hei nangpabi longri.
Lahei hei ke mo a-Phi keplangji ason hei hei abinchot; bonta abinong ke Khristo helo.

Hala prekjek aning arjan kethek-long apot bang apar themu pu kechekrong, kechepabi palemlem lapen sining apherangke atum aphan kangduk atum nanglitum aphan nangpapinrem longri. Lapuson amonit atum ke monit kematha atengsi ane kechepathechot,

lapen alangli ke bang arpum aphu, atheke Khristo aphan ake-ot-hetta obuptang-lo. Khristo kechepahemphu pen ajoksi bang arpum ke reng-lo, lapen asek lapen artho athan hei hei pen ajoksi la aphan pacherapplang-lo, lapen ke Arnam aning kehang atengsi la thebomlo.
Nanglitum Khristo along thidunlottang-lo, lapen Pirthe sining kechepahemphu akarjong hei hei penta jokphlottang-lo. Tangte nanglitum kopi apotsi pirthe amonit asonthak thak dobomloma?
Atheke, “La klemri, hala ot-ri, la chomat-ri”, pu aron hei hei nanglitum kopisi kekroibom langma?
Lahei hei ke ke-en pen virdetji, pima lahei hei ke monit kepathik lapen akethan alamchot.

Lahei hei aron ke agian pensi keplang nangnak, atheke sining apherangke atum aphan kangdukji lapen kechepabi palemlemji lapen amethang a-ok abang aduk kechinghoi-iji aphan kepathik aron nangnak; bonta ok akar-i kechekhangji aphan ke lahei hei thang ale ave.
Nanglitum aphan jongsi Khristo pen pathurrappet tang-lo tangte, sining athak amar hei hei aphanle rinon, Khristo hadak Arnam ar-e anat recho anghoi athak chingnilo.
Pirthe amar hei hei aphan kali, bonta sining amar hei hei aphanle matha-enon.
Pima nanglitum thilot-tang-lo, lapen nanglitum achethe ke Khristo pen Arnam along patujoilo.
Nanglitum achethe binong ke Khristo helo lapen mo alangli kecheklangji ahut nanglitum jokta alangli long adak atur pen cheklangdun longpo.

Tangte nanglitum along kedo, pirthe athak akehingno aningkehang an, atheke mek-langno, kangthirthe akam, kar-ithap, kehingno akam aning kehang, lapen mekplengple akam an che-o-etnon. (Pima mekplengple akam ke kumlin aphan kardom-kangduk asonlo.)
Lahei hei akam keklem apotsi Arnam ahukum kekroikre atum aphuthak Arnam aning kethi vangpo.
Ahut isi ke nanglitum lahei heisi nangning hangdunlo, lapen klemta klemdunlo.

Bonta nonke nanglitum la kadokave pen, atheke ningkethi, ning kesedeng lapen bang aphan ning keso hei hei pen chepahelo non. Bang aphan anong kejothap, mate lamjuno nanglitum angho pen nangpabar longri.
Nanglitum lahin lahin aphan chechobei bomrinon, pima nanglitum aphrang phrang a-ot lapen akam hei hei che-otang-lo lapen ot kemi chepadotang-lo.
Nanglitum Arnam aphan kechini pamethekji aphan kepinchong abang, atheke Arnam labangso a-ot kemi pamithuponbomsi amethang a-arje ason paplangponbomlo.

Labangso apotsi nonke Jihudi lapen Jihudi kalidet atum, reng-rot ke-en lapen reng-rot ke-en-e atum, kepaphihup atum, ban lapen ban kalidet atum angbong thang akeprekta avelo, bonta Khristo ke la kadokavelo, lapen kadokave along dolo.

Nanglitumke Arnam amonit atumlo; alangli nanglitum aphan nangchinghonlo, lapen amethang akam aphansi nang-ingvailo. Tangte nang-litum kanghon, kangjinso, kechepabi, asotdut, lapen ning keding a-ot chepindengnon.
Mane abang jongsi anut kaprek pen kechepuseroi do tangte ning cheberra chediyaseroi non. Hemphu nanglitum aphan nangkediya asonthotsi nanglitum lahin lahin chediya nangji.
Lapen la kadokave a-ot aparta kanghon chepindengnon. La kanghonsi kadokave asonta kok-rappetsi pachingripet-lo.

Lapen Khristo nangkepi aningkangsamle nanglitum aning aphan paja nang, pima nanglitum labangso aning kangsam kelong thekji aphansi Arnam nanglitum aphan nangphalo, lapen nangpangrumpetsi isipet abang arpum nangpaplang-lo. Lasi nanglitum kero pivernon.
Nanglitum aning arlo Khristo alam pachan nang. Nanglitum kadokave agian pen chethan chepare seroinon.
Lapen nanglitum klem aling, mate ningje aling setta Hemphu Jisu amen penle klemra alangli pen ajok Po Arnam aphan kero pinon.
Apiso atum, nanglitum nangmethang methang apenan aphan chehodainon. Pima lake Khristian atum keklem nangji akamlo, lapen lake Hemphu aning kehang akamlo.
Apenan atum, nanglitum nangmethang methang apiso aphan chinghonnon, lapen halatum aphan dongthip-ri.
Osomar atum, nangtum kaita nangpi nangpo alam kroinon, pima lake Khristian atum keklem nangji akamlo, lapen lake Arnam aphan aning padok.
Api, apo atum, nanglitum nangsomar atum aphan kaningje paselurturri, halatum aning rundetji.
Ban atum, pirthe athak kedo nangtum ahemphu atum alam kroinon. Monit atum aning nangkepadokji aphan halatum amek angden klemchot-ri, bonta ning eleppet pen Arnam aphan kephere penle klemnon.
Nanglitum klem aling setta monit aphan kali, bonta Arnam aphan keklempi asonthot-le klempametu.
Hemphu amethang amonit atum aphan kebirtipi ason nangtum nong-e asonthak thak alangli pen longji, lale ning chebinon. Pima nanglitum Hemphu Khristo aphansi klempilo.
Lapen kehingno keklem abang aphan ke kehingno keklem atengsi anam piji. Arnam ke isinat aron pensi ingsai, langret lang-ai pen klemkle.
Ban ahemphu atum, nanglitum aban atum aphan kemesen a-ot pen lapen athikpet penle klemnon, pima nanglitum jokta sining athak nanglitum a-Hemphu do, lale ning chebinon.
Kaita Arnam ardomvernon. Arnam kardom ahut no chepangarnon lapen Arnam aphan kero pinon.
Lapen nelitumta hala kepatu alam, atheke Khristo alamjir kethan longji aphan ahut keme kelongjile Arnam ne-ardompinon. Pima labangso pen apotsi non neli phatek jangnang-lo.
Tangte neli keningje nangji asonthotsi neli keningje kepachinidak thekjile Arnam ne-ardompinon.
Asoi keme kelong an enpamera, kekroikrelang atum angno chepareset penle klemnon.
Nangli keningje alam kangjinso plengset nangji, lapen ingti ason dokjin nangji; lapen abangphutin aphan kenangji alam ateng thakdunthek nangji.
Ilitum kechinghon akorte, angthikdut aban lapen neli long kam nangkeklemdun abang, Hemphu aban, Taikikas si nanglitum aphan neli lam do-an nangthanpo.
Lasi nelitum alam do-an nanglitum aphan kepachiniji lapen nanglitum aphan ning nangkeparungjisi neli non nanglitum along Taikikas aphan nangtoilo.
Nanglitum angbong angthikdut lapen kechinghon akorte, Onesimas aphanta alangli long nangtoidunlo. Alanglitum ladak keplangbom alam an nangthanpo.

Neli long phatek nangkejangdun abang, Aristarkas lapen Barnabas pen melin popo abang, Markta nanglitum aphan kardom nangpidunlo. (Mark nanglitum along vang lote alangliphan chaknon pu alam nanglitum aphrang pen longtang-lo.)
Jemtas pu a-Jisuta nanglitum aphan kardom nangpidunlo. Arnam arat kepachanji aphan neli long kam nangkeklemdun atum angbong Jihudi amonit ke la bang kethomnat helo. Alanglitum neliphan kerap the-olo.

Nanglitum asor lapen Khristo Jisu aban, Epaphrasta nanglitum aphan kardom nangpidunlo. Nanglitum kekroi kethirpame lapen kechini pame a-Khristian ason Arnam aning kehang ateng kedo kepathirthip thekji aphansi Epaphras ke kaiketa nanglitum aphan kematha-e pen Arnam nang ardompiverlo.
Alangli nanglitum aphan lapen Laodesia asor lapen Hirapolis asor atum aphan keklem chepadukpi-olo, lake neli haki chodun un.
Neli kechinghon, se kelang abang Luk lapen Demasta nanglitum aphan kardom nangchepidunlo.
Laodesia kedo akorte atum aphan lapen Nimpha lapen labangpi ahem kechingrumbom amondoli mate kroi-asong aphanta nelitum akardom pi-iktha.
Nanglitum labangso aloh porhedet lote Laodesia amondoli mate kroi-asong alongta paporhe-tha. Lapen Laodesia pen nangkeloji alohta nanglitum porhenon.
Lapen Hemphu pen kelong akam keklem patang pamejile matha pamenon pule Arkipas aphan putha.
Neli Polsi neli methang ari pen labangso akardom kepi alam tok-lo. Neliphan ingchin ani pen kekok alam nanglitum tengneri.
Nanglitum along Arnam akangjinso padonang.
Silas lapen Timothi pen pen neli Polsi nanglitum aphan, atheke e-Po Arnam lapen Hemphu Jisu pen kechelangpet, Thesalonika amondoli mate kroi-asong aphansi labangso aloh tok-lo.
Nanglitum along kangjinso lapen ning kangsam padonang.
Nelitum nanglitum pen apot Arnam aphan kaiketa kero piverlo, lapen nelitum Arnam kardom ahut nanglitum aphan kaiketa chemathaponverlo.

Pima nanglitum kekroi asonthot kopusonsi akamta klemloma, nanglitum akanghon kedo pen apot kopusonsi keklem chepaduk-loma, lapen kopusonsi nanglitum Hemphu Jisu Khristo aphan aning kethe thir-klong-loma, lahei hei alam nelitum e-Po Arnam angno chemathaponverlo.
Korte marli atum, nanglitum aphan Arnam amonit nangkepaplangji aphansi Arnam nanglitum aphan nang inghonsi nang ingvaitang-lo.

Nelitum nanglitum angbong Birta Keme kevan ahut, Birta Keme alam jong jongchotsi vanlo, lapu kali, bonta ajakong pen, Karjong kangthir pen lapen lake ahok pu akekroi pame kedo pensi la vanlo. Nelitum nanglitum angbong kedo ahut nelitum kopusonsi do-thak-loma, lake nanglitum chinilo. Lake nanglitum methang akeme aphanlo.
Nanglitumke nelitum lapen Hemphu a-arje cheparjanlo; lapen nanglitum kesung pho-olo setta Karjong Kangthir pen kelong aning arong pen nanglitum labangso a-Birta Keme deng-lo.
Lasi Masedonia lapen Grik adet kedo kekroi atum an nanglitum ason nangcharlidunlo.

Pima nanglitum pen ajok Hemphu alamjir Masedonia lapen Grik adet adang chethangphlup-lo, lapuchot kali, bonta nanglitum akekroi alamta kadokave adim ledamtang-lo. Lasi nelitum labangso alam ke thangta pu nangnedet-lo.

Nelitum nanglitum angbong kevang ahut nanglitum nelitum aphan kopusonsi chak-loma, lahei hei alam hala kadokave atumsi nelitum aphan thanlo. Nanglitum kerengver lapen Arnam binong aphan karchojisi kumlin aphan kangduk akam che-olo,

lapen Arnam a-Sopo Jisu sining pen kevangthuji aphan inghongphrong-lo pu alamta latum nelitum aphan thanlo. Arnam labangso a-Jisu aphan kethitang atum angbong pen pathurtang-lo, lapen labangso a-Jisu helo ilitum aphan mo kevangji Arnam aning kethi pen ekepajokji abang-lo.
Korte marli atum, nelitum nang-litum angbong kevang thangta ale avedet-lo, lapu kali, lake nanglitum methangsi chinilo.

Nelitum Thesalonika arongsopi kevang aphrang Philipi arongsopi along nelitum aphan kopusonsi pasung-loma, lapen patherak-loma, lake nanglitum chinilo. Bonta nelitum aphan kepasung atum do-o setta Arnam akerap pen ajok nelitum ingthin chepathesi nanglitum angbong Arnam a-Birta Keme than-pachethangthek-lo.
Nelitum kechokche alam, kalite kehingno aning kehang paklongsi nanglitum aphan choningrilo, kalite nanglitum aphan kepachereijisi bor-ilo, lapu kali.

Bonta nelitum kaiketa Arnam aning kehang atengsi ningjelo, pima Arnam nelitum aphan aporman nelangsi nelitum Birta Keme kepachethangji a-ot do pu chinilo. Monit atum aning nekepadokjisi nelitum bor-ilo, lapu kali, bonta ilitum aning asat kelangver a-Arnam aning nekepadokjisi nelitum bor-ilo.
Nanglitum chinilo, nelitum kaiketa kero parlin alam ningjejelo, kalite mekplengple alam kepatuji abidi rirelo, lake Arnam nelitum ahakilo.
Nelitum nanglitum pen tame, mate anut kaprek atum pen settame, badu amonit penta akero kelongji aphan bor-i-edet-lo.

Bonta nelitum ke Khristo ketoitang atumlo apotsi nelitum nanglitum pen hang-o setta thang akehingno avedetji apot-lo. Bonta nelitum nanglitum angbong kedo ahut, apeile asomar atum aphan kelana asonthak thaksi nelitum asotdut cheplang-lo.

Nelitum nanglitum aphan nangchinghonlo. Lasi nanglitum aphan Birta Keme nangkethanchot kali, nanglitum pen apot nelitum methang apran kechepiji aphanta nelitum chesik-lo. Nanglitum aphan nelitum lapu-an akechinghon!

Korte marli atum, nelitum kam keklem chepaduk-lo, lake nanglitum chini binong-lo! Nanglitum angbong badu aphanta kepasungsedetjisi nelitum ajo anerlota kam choklemsi nanglitum aphan Arnam pen kelong a-Birta Keme nangpachethang-lo.
Nanglitum, kekroi atum angbong nelitum a-ot ingthir-et, athikpet lapen thang adai avelo, lake nanglitum lapen Arnam hakilo.
Pima nangli-tum chinilo, apole amethang asomar atum aphan kechepare asonsi nelitumta nanglitum aphan than-parelo.

Nanglitum aphan amethang arat lapen adak-atur angbong nangkepha a-Arnam aning kehang ateng nanglitum kedo kethak thekji aphansi nelitum nanglitum aphan ning nangpathelo, ning nangpaplilo, lapen nangchoningriverlo.

Lapen akaprek alam apotta nelitum Arnam aphan roverlo. Atheke nelitum nangli-tum angbong Arnam alam kevan ahut nelitum kethan alam ke monit alam kali, bonta Arnam alamlo pusi nanglitum la arjulo lapen deng-lo, lapen ahok-lo, lake Arnam alam binong-lo. Pima nanglitum, kekroi atum along Arnam kam klemvoilo.

Korte marli atum, Judia adet kedo Arnam amondoli mate kroi-asong, atheke Jisu Khristo amonit atum kepho asonthotsi nanglitumta pholo. Halatum Jihudi atum arideng kechenek kepho asonthotsi nanglitumta nangmethang adet amonit atum arideng kechenek pholo.
La Jihudi atum Hemphu Jisu lapen Arnam amontri atum aphan pathilo, lapen nelitum aphanta chenek-lo. Halatum Arnam aning padokdelo, lapen kadokave amonit aning pangsamselo.
