Bonta Khristo nanglitum aphu-thak Karjong Kangthir nangdung-lo apotsi nanglitum kadokaveta ahok alam chini.
Tangte lahelo, nanglitum ahok alam kechininedet apotsi neli labangso alam nangtok-lo, lapu kali, bonta lake nanglitum kechini apot-lo; lapen ahok alam pen kaita kechobei alam nangklangkle.
Tangte kechobei abang komat-lo? Lake Khristo ke Jisu helo pu kepupe abang helo. Lason amonit ke Khristo ahoturlo. Alangli Po lapen Sopo aphan Hemphu pu dengdelo.
Pima Sopo aphan kedengde abang along ke Arnam ave. Sopo aphan kedeng abang along ke Arnam do.

Tangte nanglitum kecheng pen karjulongtang alam nanglitum aning arlo kechebijile matha pamenon. Nang-litum la karjulongtang alam nanglitum aning arlo chebilote nanglitum kaita Sopo lapen Po pen chelangpetverpo.
Lapen Po etum aphan piji pu ekechak ke kejut un-e achethe helo.
Nanglitum aphan kepamanghujisi kebor-i atum alamjirsi neli nanglitum aphan nangtok-lo.

Bonta nanglitum aphan ke, Khristosi nanglitum aphuthak amethang a-Karjong nangdung tang-lo. Alangli Karjong nanglitum aning arlo dotik ke baduta nanglitum aphan nangthan nangnelo. Pima alangli Karjongsi nanglitum aphan kadokave alam nangthanlo. Lapen alangli kethan alam ke ahokpet alamlo, kechobei alam kali. Tangte Karjong nangkethan alam kroira Khristo pen chelangpet-bomnon.

Tangte kechinghon osomar atum, mo Khristo kevangthuji Arni alangli kecheklangji ahut ilitum kepherere-pinji lapen ketherak nangnedet pen ajok alangli ingno pen kechepatu nangnedetjile alangli pen chelangpet-le dobomnon.
Khristo ke dhoromipet abang-lo, lake nanglitum chinilo. Tangte akeme keklem abang aling ke Arnam asolo, lale chininon.

Po ilitum aphan ko-an e-inghon-loma, lale mathanon! Ilitum aphan Arnam asomar pusi ehang-lo. Alangli akanghon lapu-an akethe! Lapen ahokta ahok-lo, ilitumke Arnam asomarlo. La apotsi pirthe ilitum aphan chininelo, pima pirthe ke Arnam aphan chininelo.

Neli kechinghon atum, nonke ilitum Arnam asomar atumlo. Bonta ilitum kopisi cheplangjima, lake non amat ke chini pamemelang. Bonta Khristo nangcheklang lote ilitum alangli son thak thakpo, lake ilitum chini, pima alangli kopusonma, lake ilitum thek-long pamepo.
Khristo pen ajok labangso aning kethe kedo abang aling ke Khristo kangthir-et asonthotsi amethang kechepangthir-et pensi do.
Pap keklem atum anke Arnam aron kekroikre adai do. Pima papke aron kekroikre helo.
Ilitum apap hei hei kepakakji aphansi Khristo vang-lo puke nanglitum chinilo, lapen alangli ke thang apap ave.
Lasi Khristo pen kechelangpet atum anke pap klembombe. Pap keklem atum anke Khristo aphan thek-longlepinlang, mate chininepinlang.
Kechinghon osomar atum, badu amonitta nanglitum aphan nangpa-manghu longri. Khristo ke dhoromipet abang asonthotsi dhoromi akam keklem abang aling ke dhoromipet abang-lo.
Pap keklembom abang ke Hi-i Sarpo arat-lo. Pima Hi-i Sarpoke kecheng ahut penta pap klemlo. Lasi Hi-i Sarpo akam kepavirjisi Arnam a-Sopo nangcheklang-lo.
Arnam aso atum anke pap klem-bombe, pima Arnam a-ot alanglitum along do. Lapen alangli ke Arnam asolo apotsi pap klembom un-e.
Lapusonsi, komat mat atumsi Arnam asomarma, lapen komat mat atumsi Hi-i Sarpo asomarma, ilitum chini un. Akeme akam keklemkle, mate akorte aphan kechinghonhe abang ke Arnam aso kali.
Nanglitum kecheng pen karjulong alam la helo: ilitum lahin lahin chinghon nangji.

Ilitum Kein ason ke cheplang nangne. Alangli ke Kehingno abang arat-lo. Alangli amethang amu Abel aphan pathilo. Kein kopi apotsi amu aphan pathi loma? Lake alangli kam ke hingnodak lapen amu akam ke mesen apot-lo.
Lasi korte marli atum, pirthe amonit atum nanglitum aphan nangke-langselet apot ke nanglitum manghu nangne.
Ili kethi otekangsi chethe angbong vangtang-lo puke ili chinilo. Pima ilitum ekorte atum aphan chinghonlo. Kanghon kave atum anke kangting angkangsi dolang.
Akorte aphan kechelang selet abang aling ke pran ke-en abang-lo, lapen pran ke-en abang aling along ke kejut un-e achethe ave pu nanglitum chinilo.
Ilitum aphan ajok Khristo amethang apran kechepi pen ajok ilitum kanghon alam chinilo. Lasi ilitumta ekorte atum aphan ajok emethang apran chepi nangji.
Badu tame, inut pirthe akhi adat kedo abang jongsi akorte abang akenang do pu thek-long setta alangliphan aning anghap chingpupe tangte alangli ke kopusi Arnam aphan chinghon pu kepu unjima?
Neli kechinghon osomar atum, ilitum akanghon ke ede ingtur lapen elam penchot kalidet nangji, bonta lake ekam pen lapen ahokpet pen nangji.
Lasonsi ilitumke ahok abe atumlo pu ilitum chiniji: lapen lasonsi ilitum Arnam angno ning theklongji.
Ilitum aning angthinle ilitum aphan edin setta ening ingthin apar Arnam themu, lapen alangli ke kadokave alam chinipet pu ilitum chini.
Lasi neli kechinghon atum, ening-ingthinle ilitum aphan edindete ilitum Arnam angno thang akephere ave.
Alangli long kechohang aling ili long, pima ili alangli hukum hei hei kroilo, lapen alangli aning kehang atengsi ili klemlo.
Alangli hukum la helo: ilitum alangli Sopo, Jisu Khristo aphan kroi nangji, lapen Khristo hukum ekepi asonthotsi ili lahin lahin chinghon nangji.
Arnam ahukum kekroi abang aling ke Arnam pen chelangpetsi do lapen Arnam alangli pen chelangpetsi dolo. Arnam ilitum pen chelangpetsi dolo pu ilitum Arnam ekepi a-Karjong pen ajok chini.

Neli kechinghon atum, amethangsi Karjong do pu kechepu atum an aphan kroipet-ri, bonta halatum kelong akarjong Arnam pensi kevang kalima, kalangma, la kechiniji aphan halatum aphan asat langnon. Pima kechobei akethanmek atum pirthe athak nangklang-olo.
Arnam a-Karjong aphan kechini thekjike lapu helo: Jisu Khristo monit ason cheplangsi vang-lo pu kepu abang aling along ke Arnam pen kevang a-Karjong do.

Bonta Jisu aphan lason kepupe abang ke Arnam pen kevang a-Karjong ave. Alangli kelong akarjong ke Arnam ahotur along pensi kevang. La vangji pu nanglitum arjulong-lo, lapen la non pirthe athak dotang-lo.

Bonta neli kechinghon osomar atum, nanglitum ke Arnam asomar atumlo, lapen nanglitum hala ahok-he akethanmek atum aphan haitang-lo, pima nanglitum along kedo a-Karjong ke hala pirthe amonit atum along kedo akarjong atum apar ajakong themulo.
Hala ahok-he akethanmek atum ke pirthe asolo. Lasi halatum ke pirthe alam hei heisi ningjelo, lapen pirthe aso atum halatum alam hei heisi ningjelo, lapen pirthe aso atum halatum alam arjudunlo.
Bonta ilitumke Arnam asomarlo. Arnam aphan kechini abang ke ilitum alam arju, Arnam aso kalidet abang ke ilitum alam arjuje. La pen ajok ilitum ahok a-Karjong lapen ahok-he akarjong chini un.
Kechinghon atum, ilitum lahin lahin chinghon lonang, pima kanghon ke Arnam pensi vang-lo. Kanghon kedo abang ke Arnam asolo, lapen alangli ke Arnam aphan chini.
Kanghon kave abang ke Arnam aphan chinine, pima Arnam ke kanghon.
Ilitum alangli Sopo pen ajok chethe kelongji aphan Arnam amethang a-Sopo po epumpet aphan pirthe athak nangtoisi ilitum aphan amethang akanghon epaklang-lo.
Kanghon la helo: ilitumsi Arnam aphan inghonlo, lapu kali, bonta alanglisi ilitum aphan e-inghonlo lapen ilitum apap ekediya-iji aphan alangli amethang a-Sopo aphan nangtoilo.
Kechinghon atum, Arnam ilitum aphan lapu-an e-inghonlo apotsi ilitumta lahin lahin chinghon nangji.
Baduta Arnam aphan thek-longle-pinlang, bonta ilitumle lahin lahin chinghon lote Arnam ilitum pen chelangpetsi dolo, lapen ilitum aning arlo alangli kanghon chok-limlo.
Ilitum Arnam pen chelangpetsi dolo lapen alangli ilitum pen chelang-petsi dolo pu ilitum chini, pima alangli amethang a-Karjong ilitum aphan epitang-lo.
Pirthe aphan kepajok abang kepaplangjisi Po Arnam amethang a-Sopo aphan nangtoilo, lake ilitum thek-long-lo, lapen anut kaprek atum aphan thanlo.
Jisu ke Arnam a-Sopolo pu kethan abang aling ke Arnam pen chelangpetsi dolo, lapen Arnam alangli pen chelangpetsi dolo.
Lasi Arnam ilitum aphan ekanghon do pu ilitum chini lapen kroi.
Arnam ke kanghon, lapen kanghon angbong kedo abang aling ke Arnam pen chelangpetsi do lapen Arnam alangli pen chelangpetsi dolo.
Mo Kangsai Arni ilitum akephere kavedetji aphansi ilitum along Arnam akanghon chok-limlo, lapen ilitum akephere avedetji, pima ilitum pirthe athak dotik Khristo asonthak thaksi cheplang-lo.

Kanghon along ke kephere ave, pima kechok-lim akanghon ke kephere anta pave-et. Tangte kephere kedo abang along ke kanghon chok-limlelang, pima kesung kepho nangji angring kedo apotsi kephere ke kedo.
Ilitum inghon, pima Arnam ilitum aphan e-inghon paphrang-lo.

Komane abang Arnam aphan inghon pule pu setta akorte aphan chelangse-letbom lote alangli ke kechobei abang-lo. Pima kethek-long-lok akorte aphan jongsi inghonhe tangte kethek-longle-det Arnam aphan ke inghon thekthe.
Khristo ilitum aphan ekepi ahukum la helo: Arnam aphan kanghon abang ke akorte aphanta chinghonvek nangji.
Jisu helo Khristolo pu kekroi abang aling ke Arnam asolo, lapen apo aphan kanghon abang aling ke asopo aphanta inghon.
Ilitum Arnam aphan kanghon lapen alangli hukum hei hei kekroi pen ajoksi ilitum Arnam asomar atum aphan kanghon do pu ilitum chini.
Pima ilitum Arnam aphan kanghon puke Arnam ahukum hei hei kekroi helo, lapen alangli hukum hei hei ke ilitum aphan la an akesungpik kali.
Pima Arnam asomar atum anke pirthe aphan hai un, lapen ilitum akekroi pen ajoksi ilitum pirthe aphan hailo.
Pirthe aphan keparem un abang komatma? Lake Jisu ke Arnam a-Sopolo pu kekroi abang anchot.
Lang lapen vi pen ajok kevang abang ke Jisu Khristo helo. Lang pen anchot kali, bonta lang lapen vi pen ajoksi alangli vang-lo.
Lapen haki kechodun abang ke Karjong helo, pima Karjong ke ahokpet.
Haki kechodun atum bang kethom do: lake Karjong, lang lapen vi helo, lapen la bang kethomta isipet ahakisi pilo.
Ilitum monit atum kepi ahaki kroi, bonta la apar Arnam kepi ahaki themulo: lapen amethang a-Sopo alamjirsi Arnam labangso ahaki pilo.

Lasi Arnam a-Sopo aphan kekroi abang aning arlo labangso ahaki do, bonta Arnam aphan kekroikre abang ke alangliphan kechobei abang paplangtang-lo. Pima Arnam amethang a-Sopo alamjir kepu alam alangli kroikredet-lo.
Labangso ahaki la helo: Arnam ilitum aphan kejut un-e achethe epilo, lapen labangso achethe ke alangli Sopo alongsi do.
Sopo kedo abang aling labangso achethe do; Arnam a-Sopo kave abang aling ke chethe ave.
Nanglitum, atheke Arnam a-Sopo aphan kekroi atum ke Kejut un-e achethe do pu nanglitum kechiniji aphansi neli nanglitum aphan labangso alam nangtok-lo.
Arnam aphan ilitum ning kechetheklong athe la helo: Alangli ning kehang atengle ilitum kopine chohang lote alangli ilitum alam arju.
Ilitum kechohang ahut aling alangli e-arju, lake ilitum chini, lasi ilitum alangli long kechohang ason aling alangli ilitum aphan epi, lata ilitum chini.

Nangli korte abang kethi kepa-plangple apap keklem nangli thek dunlong lote nangli Arnam aphan choningri nangji. Anke Arnam alangli-phan chethe piji. Bonta lake kethi kepaplangple apap keklem abang aphanchot. Bonta kethi kepaplangdet apap do, lapen labangso apot ke Arnam aphan choningri nangji pu neli pupe.
Kehingno akam anke pap-lo, bonta kethi kepaplangple apapta do.
Arnam asomar atum anke pap klembombe, lake ilitum chinilo, pima Arnam a-Sopo alangliphan railo lapen kehingno abang alangliphan phangno un-e.
Ilitumke Arnam asomarlo, lapen pirthe adang anke kehingno a-Bang aridengsi do, lake ilitum chinilo.

Ilitum ahok Arnam aphan kechini thekji aphansi Arnam a-Sopo vang-lo, lapen ilitum aphan kechini ajakong epitang-lo, lake ilitum chinilo. Ilitum ahok abang pen, atheke alangli Sopo Jisu Khristo pen chelangpetsi dolo. Ahok Arnam lapen kejut un-e achethe la helo.
Kechinghon osomar atum, nangli-tum ahok-he arnam akumlin hei hei pen chepahelonon.

Neli mondoli akesarsi nangliphan, atheke neli kechinghon binong arloso lapen nanglisomar atum aphansi labangso aloh tok-lo. Nangliphan nang kanghon abang ke neli inutnat, lapu kali. Ahok alam kechini atum anke nangliphan nang inghonlo.
Pima ahok alam ilitum aning arlo do lapen lake kaiketa doverpo.
Ahok lapen kanghon pen Po Arnam lapen alangli Sopo, Jisu Khristo ilitum aphan kanghon, kangjinso lapen ning kangsam epapinang.
Nangli somar manene atum ke Po ilitum aphan hukum ekepi asonthot, ahok alam atengsi do thak-lo, la thek-longsi neli ning arong apar arong-lo.
Lasi neli kechinghon abangpi, neli nangliphan choningrilo, ilitum lahin lahin chinghon lonang. Neli nangliphan nangkepi ahukumke hukum kemi kali, lake ilitum kecheng pen kelongtang ahukumlo.
Kanghon ke Arnam ahukum kekroi helo. Nanglitum kecheng pen karjulong ahukumke la helo: nanglitum kadokaveta lahin lahin kechinghon seroi pen do nangji.
Jisu Khristo monit ason cheplangsi pirthe athak vang-lo pu kekroikre, kechobei ake-ongpi atum pirthe adang damtang-lo. Lason amonit ke kepacherei abang lapen Khristo ahoturlo.
Tangte nanglitum keklem-naknedetji, bonta nanglitum keklem akam an apot nanglitum kelong nangji anong-e kelongpetjile lang-pamenon.
Khristo akethan alam angkang kedode, bonta la apar kedam abang along ke Arnam ave. Alangli akethan alam angkang kedo abang along ke Po lapen Sopota do.
Lasi la Khristo akethan alam ateng kethanthe abang nanglitum along vang-lote, alangliphan nanglitum ahem chakri, kardom anta chepiri.
Pima alangliphan kardom kechepi abang aling ke alangli keklem akehingno akam hei heisi kekroidunlo.

Neli nangliphan nangkethanji alam do-olang. Bonta neli loh lapen sahi pen la nangkethanji ning hanghelo. Neli methang nanglitum along vangsi nanglitum pen kechingki chethan longji aphan ning thelo! Anke ilitum aning arong plengsetpo.
Nangli kechinghon amu asomar atumta nanglitum aphan kardom nangchepidunlo.
Neli mondoli akesarsi nangliphan, atheke neli kechinghon binong a-Gaias aphansi labangso aloh nangtok-lo.
Neli kechinghon abang, nangli ning kemesen asonthotsi kadokave ason anatta lapen nangli ok nangli pranta kemephunbomji aphan neli Arnam nang ardom pilo.
Khristian akorte manene atum neli long vangsi nangli ahok pen kedo kethakbom lapen nangli ahok aphan kekroi kethirklongbom alam neliphan nekethan pen ajok neli ning arongparpik-lo.
Neli somar atum ahok angkangsi dobom pu karjulong helo neli ning ke-arongnei alamlo: la pen apar ning ke-arong-i muchotji ason thangta avelo.
Neli kechinghon abang, nangli Khristian akorte atum aphan, jasemet ke nangli kechinine a-Khristian atum aphan keklempi akam ke kekroi atum keklem nangji akamlo.
Halatum nangli akanghon alam ladak mondoli angno thanlo. Halatum tovar kedam ahut nangli Arnam aning kehang asonthot halatum aphan rapdun lote me-opo.
Halatum Khristo akam keklemjisi nangbarlo, lapen halatum Khristian kalidet atum along thangnat akerapta en-elo.
Lasi alanglitum ahok alam kepachethang akam along ili Khristian atumta keklem kecherapdun thekji aphan alanglitum aphan rapdun nangji.
Neli mondoli aphan pathihek pen epak aloh tok-lo, bonta halatum angbong keja abang kecheplangji aning kehangpik abang, Diotrephaske neli kepu alam dengde.

Lasi mo neli vang lote, alangli keklem akam, atheke alangli nelitum aphan nekeputot, nekepusit alam an lapen alangli kepacherei alam hei hei neli paklangji. Bonta la anchot ke aning jangremresi alangli Khristian akorte atum aphan chakchelo, lapen kechakji aning kehang atum aphanta pachak longlelo, lapen halatum aphan mondoli angtan kebiji bor-ilo.
Neli kechinghon abang, nangli kehingno akam ke charlidunri, bonta akeme akamle charlidunnon. Keme keklem abang ke Arnam asolo, bonta kehingno keklem abang ke Arnam thek-longlelang.
Abangphutinta Demetrias aphan rohurlo. Ahok amatta alangliphan rolo. Nelitumta haki chodunlo, lapen nelitum keningje alam ke ahok alamlo, lake nangli chinilo.
Neli nangliphan nangkethanji alam do-olang. Bonta neli nangliphan sibu-alang lapen kolom pen nangkethanji ning hanghelo.
Neli nangli pen chetong long dapprangpo pusi neli ning thelo. Anke ilitum chepangnonosi chingki chethan longpo.
Nangli long ning kangsam padonang.
Nangli jirpo atum an nangliphan kardom nangchepi dunlo. Nelitum ajirpo abangphutin aphan nelitum akardom pi-iktha.
Jems akorte lapen Jisu Khristo aban, neli Judsi nanglitum aphan, atheke Po, Arnam kephatang lapen kechinghon, lapen Jisu Khristo kerai atum an aphan labangso aloh tok-lo.
Nanglitum along kangjinso, ning kangsam lapen kanghon pa-ongbomnang.

Neli kechinghon atum, neli nangli-tum aphan ilitum kelong akejok alamjir ketokji ning hang-olo. Bonta non amat ke Arnam amethang amonit atum aphan kepi, kelar un-epin akekroi nanglitum kerai thekji aphan ning nangkeparung alam ketoksi akenangsot pusi neli mathalo.

Pima manene adhorom kave amonit atum ilitum angbong vangjoitang-lo. Latum amek kelangno a-ot hei hei pen ajok Arnam akangjinso alam phalangnodet-lo. Lapen latum Jisu Khristo, atheke ilitum inutnat a-Recho lapen a-Hemphu aphan dengdedet-lo. Latum akevirji alam hako ahut pen Hastro along thanmek tang-lo.

Lasi nanglitum la kadokave chinipet-lo setta nanglitum aphan la nangkepachematha-thujisi neli ning hang-lo. Atheke ahut isi Israel amonit atum aphan Ijip adet pen pajok-lo, bonta aphi ke Hemphu hala kekroikre atum aphan pavirdet-lo.

Amethang kedo nangji ateng kedode, bonta amethang kedo adim keche-obup asining apherangke atum aphan mathadamtha. Kangsai kethe Arni nangleletik ke latum aphan kevir un-epin angchin ani pen kok-hetsi kangting angbong bitang-lo.

Sodom lapen Gomorrah lapen adung arei kedo arongsopi hei hei alamle mathadamtha, halabangso amonit atum labangso apherangke atum asonsi klemlo; latum beisa akam klemtang-lo, lapen latum a-ot kalile akam klemlo. Lasi latum kemep un-epin ame pen aduk phonang-lo. Lake ilitum aphan kepacheretoi alamlo.

Lasonthak thaksi labangso amonit atum amang hemanlo, lapen laso atengsi amethang abang arpum aputhak pap klemlo. Latum Arnam ajakong aphan thangta kali ason pinchong-lo, lapen sining angsong adak atur kedo atum aphan pinremlo.

Bonta sining apherangke akethenei abang Maikel jokta lason ke klemklelo. Alangli Hi-i Sarpo pen kecharvo ahut, atheke halatum Moses abang arpum kechithi ahut Maikel ke Hi-i Sarpo aphan kepusit pen kepinremji haihedet-lo, bonta “Hemphu nangliphan nang pangcheknang,” pusi puchot-lo.
Bonta labangso amonit atum ke kechinine alingsi pinremvaret-lo. Halatum akechini ke kematha thekthe api atum akechinidam asonthak thak-lo, lapen halatum amethang kechinidam ason pensi chepavirpo.

Latum ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nangpo! Latum Kein keklem asonthak thaksi choklemlo. Pima latum amethang ale kelongji aphan Balaam kechoklem asonsi kechokche akam choklemdunlo. Latumta Kora ason kechesong pensi chepavirlo.

Latum ke amethang ketherak thekthe akangri kangkrang pen ajok nanglitum achojun amei along ke kesa-ur anglur asonthak thak-lo. Latum ke phereredetsi amethang aphansi chemathalokchot-lo. Latum ke tomon kevan arve kave anghun asonlo. Latum ke abotor ahutta athe kepathethe, lapen angkur pen purdutsi phongni kethitang athengpilo.

Latum ke talo alang angsum kethur angpip kechonpui asonthak thaksi amethang methang aketherakmeme akam hei hei chepaklang-lo. Latum ke kedamtap achiklo longso atum asonlo. Arnam latum aphan kejut un-epin akangting adim thikpitang-lo.
Adam pen ove throksi nang kechok amonit Enok latum alamjir thanmeksi pulo, “Hemphu amethang apherangke kangthir suri suri atum pen pen vangji.
Halatum dhoromime akam keklem apot lapen dhoromime, papi atum alangli be-thursi kepu alam an pen apot halatum kadokave aphan ingsaisi ado kepadoji aphansi alangli vangji.”

Labangso amonit atum ke kaita keningje paselurtur lapen bang atum aphan kekoilok atumlo. Latum ke amethang kehingno aning kehang atengsi klembom, amethang methang pen apot chepindak varet lapen amethang ale kelongji aphan bang atum aphan kepalem-lem pen rovaret-lo.
Bonta kechinghon atum, nanglitum hala e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo aketoitang atum aphrang pen kethantang alam hei hei chemathadamnon.
Halatum nanglitum aphan pulo, “Mo kejut arni hei hei ahut nanglitum aphan nang kangnekchoi lapen amethang kehingno aning kehang ateng keklem amonit atum nangklangji.”
Labangso amonit atum helo abe abe kepado atumlo. Latum amethang aning kehang atengsi klemlo. Latum along Arnam a-Karjong ave.
Bonta kechinghon atum, nanglitum akangthirnei akekroi athak-le nanglitum methang methang kekim chepathir-bomnon. Nanglitum Karjong Kangthir ajakong penle Arnam ardomnon.
Lapen nanglitum Arnam akanghon angkangle dora e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo amethang akangjinso pen nanglitum aphan kejut un-e achethe nangkepiji ahut aphanle inghongphrongnon.
Keningbi atum aphan kangjinso paklangnon.

Penang atum aphan ke me angkang along pen vungdunphit-ra pajoknon, akaprek atum aphan ke kephere penle kangjinso paklangnon, bonta halatum ok aning kehang pen keklem akam pen apot pap aphik kerotang ape hei hei aphan hijimnon.
Nanglitum kechingkoikedetji aphan nanglitum aphan nangkerapthek lapen nanglitum apap kavepin pen lapen nanglitum aning arong pen nanglitum aphan amethang adak atur angno nangkevanthek abang, atheke

ekepajok abang, la inutnat Arnam adak atur, aman apeng, kepangri ajakong lapen jakong horang aphrang ateng nonta lapen mo kejut un-e akai apar akai anta e-Hemphu Jisu Khristo pen ajok padovernang! Amen.

Labangso aloh along Jisu Khristo Kepaklang alam hei hei ketok do. Arnam aban atum aphan Jisu Khristo kepaklangji aphansi Arnam alangli phan la keplangji dokdok alam hei hei pachinilo, lapen Jisu Khristo amethang apherangke aphan alangli ban, Jon adung toisi labangso alam hei hei pathanlo.
Jon Arnam pen kelong alam lapen Jisu Khristo kepaklang ahok alam an Jon haki cholo, atheke alangli kethek-long ason an thanpet-lo.
Labangso alam keporhera keparju abang rengme, lapen labangso alam karjulong atum lapen labangso aloh along ketok alam kekroi atum rengme! Pima la hei hei kechekokji tebok-het-lo.
Neli Jon si Asia alongri kedo mondoli throksi aphan labangso aloh tok-lo:
Non, lapen aphrangta kedo, lapen kevangthuji a-Arnam, lapen alangli anghoi angno kedo bang throksi akarjong,

lapen kekroi thirklong ahaki, kethitang atum angbong pen kethur paphrangcheng abang, lapen pirthe athak kedo arecho atum ahemphu, la Jisu Khristo nanglitum aphan kangjinso lapen ningkangsam nangpapinang.
Alangli ilitum aphan e-inghonlo, lapen amethang apran chepisi ilitum aphan epap hei hei pen epajoktang-lo,

lapen alangli Po, atheke Arnam aphan kepaklem pijisi alangli ilitum aphan kurusar atum lapen recho arat epaplang tang-lo. Labangso a-Jisu Khristo adak-atur lapen ajakong, kejut un-e akai apar kai anta padonang! Amen.

Jo langtha, alangli inghun athak pen vangbomlo. Alangliphan chir pen ketok atum lapen abangphutin amonitta alangliphan thek longphrongji. Pirthe athak kedo amonit atum an alangli pen apot chirusi aning chetengji. Ahok lo, Amen.
Non lapen aphrangta kedo lapen mo kevangji abang la Jakongkethe Hemphu Arnam pulo, “Ne helo Kecheng lapen Kejut.”

Neli nanglitum akorte Jon ta Jisu aphan kekroi ajok nanglitum pen pen keduk kesung kepho rap-rap, alangli rat aso keplanglong rap-rap, lapen ning keding pen kechechak rap rap abang-lo. Neli Arnam alam lapen Jisu kepaklang ahok alam kethan apot neliphan Patmos pu alanglom along nebilo.
Ansi Hemphu arni neli mek rengjeng-lo, lapen neli nung anat Pongut arki ason thakthak ase akethepi neli arjulong-lo.

Labangso ase pulo, “Nangli kethek long ason an epak aloh along tok-ra longthroksi arongsopi along kedo amondoli mate kroi-asong aphan atheke, Ephesas, Smyrna, Pergamam, Thiatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, lapen Laodesia amondoli mate kroi-asong aphan lonon.”
Neliphan nekangki abang aphan kethek longjisi neli chetevarlo lapen neli hongthroksi Ser amelur archok thek long-lo,
lapen archok angbong monit nangnak inut aphan thek long-lo. Alangli akengpak an kephorok achoi keding chingchoilo, lapen alangli ning angden Ser achepan chingtinlo.
Alangli chu kelok biresak angmi ason thakthak, mate ar-e kelok ason thakthak-lo, lapen amek ke me ade ason thakthak-lo;
alangli keng ke kepherangtang lapen kangthitang abitoi asonsi klarbong lapen ase ke langsun arki asonlo.
Ari ar-e along chiklo longso throksi do, lapen alangli ingho pen rangso hini kedo kereset anokjir barlo, lapen alangli mahang ke nerlo chitim a-arni ason thak-thaksi tur-ang-lo.
Alangliphan thek-longsi neli kethitang ason thak-thaksi alangli kengri klibup-lo. Alangli ari ar-e neli bang athak batsi alangli pulo, “Phereri! Kecheng lapen Kejut neli helo.
Kerengver abang neli helo. Neli thilot-lo, bonta chini iktha neli ke kejut un-e akai apar akai anta rengver. Neli ridengsi kethi lapen chom Arong aphlok do.
Tangte nangli kethek long, la non kedobom lapen mo aphi keplangji alam hei hei toknon.

Neli ri ar-e along nangli kethek-long achiklo-longso throksi, lapen Ser amelur archok hong throksi akepatu alamthe lahelo: hala chiklo longso throksi ke long throksi amondoli mate kroi-asong apherangke atum lo, lapen hala melur archok hong throksi ke long throksi amondoli mate kroi-asonglo.
“Ephesas amondoli mate kroi-asong apherangke aphan lasonle toknon:
“Ari ar-e pen chiklolongso throksi ke-otthip lapen Ser amelur archok hong throksi angbong kehelatvoi abang pulo,

Nangli kam hei hei neli chinilo; nangli kechepaduk lapen nangli kechechakthek ajakong neli chini lo. Lapen nangli kehingno amonit atum aphan chechak un-e, lapen kalidet setta amethang methangsi Khristo aketoitang abang pu kechepu atum aphan asat lang patini pamesi nangli halatum aphan kechobeichot atum pu thek-long-lo; la kadokave neli chinilo.
Nangli ning chepading-lo, neli joine pen nangli kesung chechak lo, lapen nangli lak-lelo.
Bonta neli nangli phan labangso alam kepuji do: Nangli aphrang asonthot ke non nephan ne inghonhedet-lo.

Tangte nangli konat pensi klotang-loma, lale chemathathutha. Nangli ning chiruira aphrang keklem akam cheklemthunon. Nangli ning chiruirete neli nanglilong vangsi nangli melur archok kebi adim pen ponpo.
Bonta nangli la akemesi klemlo: atheke neli Nikolaitan atum akam hei hei kehijim asonthotsi nanglita hijimlo.
“Ano kedo abang mondoli atum aphan Karjong kepu alam parjunang!
“Kehaibom atum aphan neli Arnam a-Beri along kedo chethe athengpi athe pacho longji.
“Smyrna amondoli mate kroi-asong apherangke aphan lasonle toknon:
“Kecheng lapen kejut abang, thilot-lo setta kerengthu-et abang pulo,
Neli nangli kesung lapen keboi chinilo; bonta nangli plang-olo! Lapen kalidet setta, amethang methangsi Jihudi pu kechepu, Soitan amonit asongchot atum nanglitum aphan kepinrem alam neli chinilo.

Nangli kephoji dokdok akesung aphan phereri. Nanglitum aphan asat kelangjisi Hi-i Sarpo nanglitum angbong pen manene atum aphan phatek bengji dokdok-lo. Nanglitum nikep an kesung phoji. Ha kethi an pin setta nangli neliphan kekroi thirklong pen donon, lapen neli nangliphan chethe avaikang nangpiji.
“Mondoli atum aphan karjong kepu alam ano kedo abang parjunang!
“Kehaibom abang aphan batai hini aphong akethi an tame thangnat adukta pipedetji.
“Pergamam amondoli mate kroi-asong apherangke aphan lasonle toknon:
“Rangso hini kedo, akereset anokjir kedo abang pulo,

Neli chinilo, Soitan arecho anghoi kedo adimsi nangli dolo. Nangli neliphan kekroi thirklong-lo, lapen hala Soitan kedo adim ahokpet pen neli lamjir kepachethang abang Antipas aphan kepathi ahut anta nangli neliphan kekroi o-e det-lo.

Bonta neli nangliphan ningke-oi ason asap do: Nanglitum angbong manene atum Balaam kethan alam ke-otthip atum do. Labangso a-Balaam Israel amonit atum aphan pap kepaklemjisi Balaak aphan atovar thanlo. Halatum aphan kumlin along kethok ahormu kepachoji, lapen beisa akam kepaklemji atovar thanlo.
Lasonsi nanglitum angbongta Nikolaitan atum kethan alam ke-otthip atum dolo.
Tangte, ning chiruinon. Lapu kalite neli nangli long vangdap-po, lapen neli ingho pen nangkebar anokjir ensi neli halatum pen ron chedanji.
“Mondoli atum aphan karjong kepu alam ano kedo abang parju nang!
“Kehaibom atum aphan ke kepatu amanna neli piji, lapen neli abangphu-tin aphan arlong kelokta piji. Labangso arlong athak amen kemi ketok do. La kelong abang apar ke la baduta chini un-e.
“Thiatira amondoli mate kroi-asong apherangke aphan lasonle toknon:
“Me ade ason thakthak amek kedo lapen kangthilor abitoi ason thakthak kedoilor akeng kedo, Arnam a-Sopo pulo,
Nangli keklem akam neli chinilo. Nangli akanghon, nangli akekroi, nangli keru-kethai akam keklem lapen nangli akechechakthek ajakong neli chinilo. Aphrang apar nangli non keklem ongmuchot-lo.

Bonta nangliphan neli ning ke-oi ason lahelo: nanglitum hala Jezebel pu arloso aphan pado longbomlo. Alangli amethangsi inut amontripi pu chepulo. Alangli kethan alam pen ajok neban atum aphan beisa akam paklemlo lapen kumlin aphan kethok kejir ahormu pacho pamanghulo.
Alangli ning kecheruijisi neli alangliphan apor pitang-lo, bonta beisa akam pen aning kecheruiji alangli ning hanghelo.
Mathanon, neli alangliphan keso atum ke-i ahongplang athak vanpo, lapen alangli pen beisa keklem atum, alangli pen kechoklem akehingno akam pen aning chiruirete halatum aphan pasung-oji.

Neli alangli somar atum aphan pathi-etji. Anke abangphutin aning kematha lapen aning kehang alam neli chini pu kadokave amondoli mate kroi-asong atumta chinipo. Nanglitum abangphutin aphan nangli methang methang keklem akam asonthotsi neli anam piji.

“Bonta Thiatira angbong kedo nanglitum akaprek atum ke labangso kethan akehingno alam akaprek atum chethansei, Soitan akepatu karsik ason pu hei-hei nanglitum charliledet-lo. Neli nanglitum aphan nangpulang: neli nanglitum aphan akaprek anghor pen pardikdedet-lo.
Bonta neli vang-vetik-ke nanglitum kedotang ason an otthip masi.
Kehaibom abang lapen kejut anta neli kam keklembom abang aphan neli neli po pen kelong ajakongthot piji:
Neli alangliphan adet kaprek atum aphuthak ajakong piji; ingchin achin pen alangli halatum aphan pangriji lapen longle aphule hei hei ason thak-thaksi alangli halatum aphan paphuk-rairaidetji.
Lapen ke neli alangliphan klirdap achiklolongso piji.
“Mondoli atum aphan karjong kepu alam ano kedo abang parjunang!
“Lapen Sardis amondoli mate kroi-asong apherangke aphan toknon:
“Arnam akarjong throksi lapen chiklolongso throksi kedo abang pulo. Nangli kam hei hei neli chinilo; atheke nanglike akethitang-lo setta reng-et pusi nangli nong chethang-lo.
Mek prangra thurnon lapen non kedolang, kethiji dokdok aphan jakong kemi pinon. Pima neli thek-long-lo, nangli keklem akam hei hei Arnam angno kechok-lim kalilang.

Tangte nangliphan nangkethantang alam lapen nangli karjulongtang alam chemathathunon; labangso alam kroira nang ning chiruinon. Nangli jongsi mek prangpre tangte, neli kanghu ason nanglilong vangji, lapen neli kevangji apor anta nangli chininedetji.
Bonta nanglitum atheke Sardis kedo atum angbong penang atum ke nanglitum ape chepangthir-etsi bilo. Nanglitum pe kelok chepindengsi neli pen kengkam chejorji, pima nanglitum lapuson keklemji a-ot do.

Kehaibom abang aphan lapusonsi pe kelok pindengji lapen chethe aloh along pen neli halatum amen paprai-predetji. Neli Po angno lapen ke alangli pherangke atum angno neli halatum anke neliphan kekroi atum pusi chekrongji.
“Mondoli atum aphan Karjong kepu alam ano kedo atum parjunang!
“Philadelphia amondoli mate kroi-asong apherangke aphan lasonle toknon:
“Ahok lapen kangthir abang kepu alam lahelo. Alangli ridengsi David aphlok do, lapen alangli ingpulote baduta la ingkir un-e detji, lapen alangli ingkir lote baduta la ingpu un-e detji.
Neli nangli kam chinilo. Nangli jakong asapnat-lo; tebonta nangli neli lam patepekpedetlo, lapen neliphan kroi pamelo. Neli nangli ingno kangpudang anghap bitang-lo lapen lake baduta inghap un-e lo.

Mathanon: Hala kalidet setta amethangsi Jihudi atum pu kechepu, kepachobaichot, Soitan amei amonit atum aphan neli nangli kengri pavangsi nangliphan pardom khrupji. Ansi neli nanglitum aphan inghon pu halatum kadokaveta chiniji.

Pima ningkeding pen kechechakjisi neli nanglitum aphan kepi ahukum nanglitum kekroi apot, kevangji dokdok akesungpik pen pirthe amonit kedo-an aphan asat kelang-i-ji ahut neli nangliphan abang nangpajokji.
Neli vangdap-prangpo. Nangli kehai apot kelong anong-e baduta kethiponpe-detjile nangli kedo ahormu an ot-thipnon.

Kehaibom abang aphan neli Arnam aphan kardom-kangduk ahemthepi kangthir anujok paplangji, lapen alangli kaiketa ladak pen barbedetji. Alangli phuthak neli neli-Arnam amen, lapen Arnam arongsopi amen, lapen neli men kemita neli tokji. Atheke ha sining angsong Arnam pen nangkehir a-Jerusalem kemi helo.
“Mondoli atum aphan karjong kepu alam ano kedo abang parju nang!
“Laodesia amondoli mate kroi-asong apherangke aphan lasonle toknon:
“Ha Amen, atheke kekroi thirklong lapen ahok ahaki, lapen Arnam kadokave kepinchong kecheng-i abangsi pulo,
Nangkam hei hei neli chinilo, nangke sodakta kali, lapen ingsamhekta kalilo. Nangli ingsam-hek, kalite sodak asonte me-oji apot-lo!
Nang ke sodakta kali, ingsamhekta kali, bonta sopoi chot-lo apotsi neli ingho pen ning kevang asonsi neli nangliphan ching-ok-phlotji.

Nangli pulo, ‘Neli plang-o lapen neli kenangji ason an neli long do; neli kedorde ason thangta ave.’ Bonta nangli ko-an akeduk loma, ko-an akangjinsomeme abang-loma, lake nangli chechininelo! Nanglike keboidet, reng-angse lapen mek kave abang-lo.

Neli nangliphan than paresi pupo, nangli keplang-o thekji aphan neli pen kepherangtang aser nam non. Nangli methang kechepindengji lapen ketherak meme areng-angjang abang kechedipji aphan neli long pen akelok ape namnon. Lapen nangli mek kechecharji aphan nangli mek kechehijile neli pen bap amolomta nam non.
Neli kechinghon atum an aphan neli ingchekbom, lapen arengta pasobom. Lasi mathapamera ning chiruinon.
Langnon! Neli inghap angno arjapthersi pachengbomlo. Neli se karjulong lapen inghap kangpu abang ahem neli lutdampo lapen neli alangli pen, lapen alangli neli pen cho rap rappo.
Neli methangta haidetsi neli Po pen recho anghoi athak ingnisi kangsai rap rap asonthot, lason thak-thaksi kehaibom abang aphan neli, neli kangni arecho anghoi athak neli long nangpangni dunlongji.
“Mondoli atum aphan Karjong kepu alam ano kedo abang parju nang!”

Labangso aphi neli langsi thek-long-lo, Sining athak inghap isi ingpudangsi dolo. Lapen aphrang neli karjulongtang, Pong-ut nangnak ase neliphan pulo, “Ladak an vangnon, labangso aphi kopipi plangjima, neli nangliphan paklangpo.”
Tongsekotsi neli phuthak Karjong pen plengset-lo, lapen neli thek-long-lo, Sining angsong recho anghoi isi athak inut amonit ingnilunsi dolo.
Hadak kangni abang a-arje ke Jempar pu a-arlong ason thakthak lo, lapen recho anghoi bithe bitha ke emerald a-arlong ason kelirseng amukaksi hingkomchenlo.

Lapen akaprek ingkoira phli arecho anghoi ke, halabangso arecho anghoi aphan komjaisi dolo, lapen halabangso arecho anghoi hei hei athak bang ingkoira phli akesar atum ingnilo. Halatum pe kelok chepindeng-lo, lapen Ser avaikang chekup lo.
Recho anghoi pen Sining ame, lapen ase arki hei hei lapen Sining kangreng ase hei hei vangbomlo. Recho anghoi angno kekar-ang athengtom throksi dolo. Lake Arnam akarjong throksi lo.
Lapen recho anghoi angno kechithing-lor a-arlong ason, loji atalo nangnak kopine dolo lapen recho anghoi hihi anat kereng api jonphli komsarlo.
Halatum angno lapen anung anatta ameksi dothip lo.

Aphrangsi api ke hingho ason thakthak lo, adun api ke chainong alo ason thakthak-lo, adunthu api ke monit amahang ason thakthak amahang do, lapen aphisi api ke kangjar patelang avomupi ason thakthak-lo.
Halabangso jonphli api ke ajontinta arveng pak throk pak throk dolo, lapen arveng aber athak bithe bitha ameksi dothip-lo. Nerlosini-jopangthangta halatum lun kelun o-e det-lo:
“Kangthir, kangthir, kangthir, Hemphu Arnam,
Kadokave keklem un abang; kedotang, kedobom lapen kevangji abang alangli helo.”
Lapen jonphli api atum hala recho anghoi athak kangni, lapen kejut un-e akai kerengver abang aphan Lun pen adak atur lapen aman, lapen kero pilo. Lapuson keklem ahut aling

hala akesar bang ingkoira phli atum ke recho anghoi athak kangni abang angno domkhrupsi kejut un-e akai anta kerengver abang aphan ingduk-ardomlo. Halatum amethang methang aphu avaikang chephloksi recho anghoi angno bikoksi pulo,
“Nang helo netum a-Hemphu lapen netum a-Arnam. Nangsi kadokaveta pinchong-lo, lapen nangning kehang asonthotsi halatum aphan paplang-lo lapen pinchong-lo,
Lasi nang adak-atur, lapen man lapen jakong kelongji a-ot do.”
Recho anghoi athak kangni abang ari ar-e along isi aloh athui neli thek long-lo. Labangso aloh athui anung lapen angno anatta ketok do, lapen la Sap throksi pen thengthip-lo.
Lapen neli thek long-lo, inut ajakong kethe apherangke, ase kethe pen pulo, “Labangso asap hei hei kephlokji lapen loh athui kepurji matsi a-ot doma?”
Bonta Sining athak, kalite pirthe athak, kalite pirthe arum kedo atum baduta labangso aloh athui pur un-e, kalite arlo lang un-e det-lo.
Loh athui kepurji, kalite labangso arlo kelangji a-ot kedo abang aphan long thekthedet apotsi neli chirupik-lo.
Ansi akesar atum angbong pen inut abang neli phan pulo, “Chiruri! chininon, Judah akhei pen Hingho, David asu inut abang haitang-lo. Alangli hala throksi asap phlok un, lapen kethui alohta pur un.”

Lapen neli thek long-lo, recho anghoi lapen hala kereng-et jonphli api lapen akesar atum angbong ejon kethutang asonthot a-Biresak aso arjaptherlo. Lake anu hongthroksi lapen amek throksi do. La hei hei ke pirthe athak nangketoitang Arnam akarjong throksilo.
Labangso a-Biresak aso damsi recho anghoi athak kangni abang ari ar-e along pen loh athui enlo.

Alangli loh athui ke-en aphijong hala jonphli kereng-et api lapen akesar bang ingkoiraphli atum Biresak aso angno domkhrup-lo. Halatum abangphutinta kum isi-si lapen Ser aharlung dolo. Harlung along hijungsi plengset-lo. Lake kangthir atum Arnam aphan akardomlo.
Halatum lun kemi eson lun lo:
“Nang hala kethui aloh ke-enji lapen asap hei hei kephlokji a-ot do.
Pima nangliphan thu tang-lo,
lapen nangli vi pen nangli Arnam aphan panongsi akurtin pen, alamtin pen,
ajattin pen lapen adettin pen monit aphan namlo.
Arnam aphan kepaklempijisi nang halatum aphan kurusar arat paplang-lo,
lapen halatum pirthe aso aphan pangriji.”
Ansi neli thek long-lo, lapen suri suri, lak lak apherangke atum ase arju long-lo. Halatum recho anghoi, kereng-et api jonphli lapen akesar atum aphan komjailo,
lapen ase kethe pen lun lunlo:
“Kethutang a-Biresak a-So ke jakong, akhi, gian, jakong kethe, man, adak-atur lapen ahirjume kelongji a-ot do!”
Ansi sining athak, pirthe athak, pirthe arum lapen talo arlo kedo api an, atheke, la kadokave adim kedo akereng api an lun kelun neli arjulong-lo:
“Recho anghoi athak kangni abang aphan lapen Biresak a-So aphan, ahirjume, man, adak-atur lapen ajakong kejut un-e akai apar akai anta padonang,”
Kereng-et api jonphli atum pulo, “Amen!” Lapen akesar atum domkhrupsi ingduk ardomlo.

Ansi Biresak a-So hala throksi asap angbong pen sap isi kangpu neli thek-long-lo, lapen hala jonphli api atum angbong pen ejon abang sining kangreng ason thakthak ase pen “Vangnon!” pu kepu neli arjulong-lo.
Neli langsi hadak losei kelok ejon thek long-lo. Kardon abang arideng thai do, lapen alangliphan phu avaikang pilo. Alangli kehaibom abang asonthotsi kehaiji aphan barlo.
Lapen Biresak a-So adun asap kephlok ahut adun akereng-et api “Vangnon!” pu kepu neli arjulong-lo.
Akaprek ake-ang alosei ejon nangbarlo, Monit atum lahin lahin kechepathijisi labangso alosei athak kardon abang aphan pirthe athak ron kangthurji ajakong pilo. Alangliphan nokjir aketheta pilo.

Lapen Biresak a-So kethom asap abang kephlok ahut kethom akereng-et api abang “Vangnon!” pu kepu neli arjulong-lo. Neli langsi losei ke-ik ejon thek-long-lo. Labangso alosei athak kardon abang arideng thuli isi do.

Lapen hala kereng-et api jonphli atum angbong pen kevang nangnak ase neli arjulong-lo. La pulo, “Sok tepli elin anam arni isi kangdat anam pen chingbarchit lapen Barli linthom anam arni isi kangdat anam pen isipet lo. Bonta jangthu lapen drakha ahorlang phangnori.”
Ansi Biresak a-So phli asap abang kephlok ahut phli kereng-et api abang “Vangnon!” pu kepu neli arjulong-lo.

Neli langsi lok-hik alosei thek-long-lo. Kardon abang amen ke “Kethi” puhelo, lapen chom arong alangli phi phi dunkrilo. Lapen nokjir pen, akhim pen, avur pen, lapen nampi api pen pirthe phanphli angbong pen ephan aphan kepathijisi halatum aphan ajakong pidet-lo.
Lapen Biresak a-So pho asap abang kephlok ahut dovan arum kethitang atum akarjong neli thek-long-lo, thangbakma, Arnam alam kepachethang lapen haki kepi apotsi halatum aphan pathilot-lo.

Halatum ase kethe pen hangjolo, “Hemphu, Jakong kethe parpik abang, kangthir lapen ahokpet abang! Nelitum aphan nekepathi apot nangli pirthe athak amonit atum aphan kangsaiji lapen ado kepadoji a-arni nangkeleji non ni ko-an dolangma?”

Halatum abangphutin aphanta choi keding akelok pirep lo, lapen halatum aphan pulo, “Nangtum aphan ason thak-thaksi nangtum pen keklem rap rap, Arnam aban atum aphan lapen nanglitum akorte atum aphanta pathiji; labangso kethi nangji aphai chokchetik ke malomso ahut an nangtum dokliptha.”
Ansi Biresak a-So throk asap abang kephlok ahut neli thek long-lo, hadak chikli thepi vang-lo, lapen arni ke pe-thoila ason thakthak ik-lunlo, lapen chiklo kepleng ke vi ason thak-thak erhang-lo.
Tomonpile thebo arong kejap-ra akevai athe kepangjui ason thak-thaksi sining achiklolongso atum pirthe athak nangkloprelo.
Lo athui kethui ason thak-thaksi sining avejun-jun avedet-lo, lapen inglongtin lapen lang-lomtin aphan adim pen terekphit-lo.

Ansi pirthe arecho atum arleng kethe atum, lapen chedanbang bangpharo ahemphu atum, keplang-o lapen, ajakong kethe atum, lapen ban abangphutin lapen ban kalidet atum an longku hei hei arlo lapen inglong a-arlong hei hei arum chepatulo.

Halatum hangjojosi inglong hei hei lapen arlong hei hei aphan pulo, “Netum athak nang ingreibupra hala recho anghoi athak kangni abang angno pen, lapen Biresak a-So aning kethi pen netum aphan patutha!
Halatum aning kethi akepherememe a-arni nangletang-lo! Labangso abang angno matsi arjap unjima?”

Labangso aphi pirthe atok phli along karjapphrong, sining aphe-rangke bangphli atum aphan neli thek long-lo. Pirthe, kalite talo athak, kalite thengpi arong athak tomon kepavang vedetjisi halatum pirthe atomon phli khangpamelo.

Lapen nihang arni kevang anat pen akaprek apherangke kevang neli thek long-lo. Arideng kereng-et Arnam asap do, lapen hala pirthe lapen talo aphan kephangnoji ajakong kelongtang apherangke bangphli aphan ase kethe pen hangsi pulo,
“Nelitum Arnam aban atum atehang athak sap thengthetik-ke pirthe, kalite talo, kalite thengpi arong hei hei phangnori.”
Lapen Israel akurtin angbong pen ensi sap kethengtang atum aphai kadokave bang 144,000 dolo pusi neliphan thanlo.
Judah akur angbong pen sap kethengtang atum aphai bang 12,000, Reuben akur angbong pen bang 12,000, Gad akur angbong pen bang 12,000,
Asher akur angbong pen bang 12,000, Naphtali akur angbong pen bang 12,000, Manase akur angbong pen bang 12,000,
Simon akur angbong pen bang 12,000, Levi akur angbong pen bang 12,000, Issakar akur angbong pen bang 12,000,
Zebulun akur angbong pen bang 12,000, Joseph akur angbong pen bang 12,000, Benjamin akur angbong pen sap kethengtang atum aphai bang 12,000 dolo.

Labangso aphi neli armu ake-ongpi thek-long-lo. Halatum aphan baduta lakha un-edet-lo. Halatum ke akheitin, akurtin, adettin lapen alamtin pen kechingrum atumlo. Halatum akelok ape keding chepindengsi, lapen ari pen sotele arvo otkreisi recho anghoi angno lapen Biresak a-So angno arjap phrong-lo.
Halatum ase kethe pen hangsi pulo, “Nelitum a-Arnam, atheke, recho anghoi athak kangni abang lapen Biresak a-So alongsi kejok dochot.”

Arnam apherangke kadokave atum hala recho anghoi lapen akesar atum aphan, lapen kereng api jonphli aphan komjaisi arjapphrong-lo. Ansi halatum recho anghoi angno domkhrupsi Arnam aphan ingduk-ardomlo,
lapen pulo, “Amen! Kejut un-e akai apar akai anta nelitum a-Arnam along ahirjume, lapen adak-atur, lapen gian lapen kero, lapen man lapen jakong hei hei padonang! Amen!”
Akesar atum angbong pen inut abang neliphan arjulo, “La kelok ape keding kechepindeng atum komat atum ma, lapen konat pensi kevangma?”
Neli alangliphan thakdunsi pulo, “Neli chinine hemphu, Nanglisi chinilo.”
Alangli neliphan pulo, “Latum ke hala kesungpik akechenek angbong pen joksi kevang atumlo. Latum Biresak a-So avi pen amethang methang ape keding choksi palokphlanlo.
Lasi latum Arnam anghoi angno arjapphrong-lo lapen alangli kardom ahem thepi arlo alangliphan ingdukbomlo. Recho anghoi athak kangni abang halatum along do dunsi halatum aphan raiji.
Non pen apara halatum kaiketa an ingchirche, lang ing-it-epinpo; arni, kalite kesopik angtang ta halatum aphan pasungsedetpo,

pima la recho anghoi angbong kedo a-Biresak a-Sosi Biresak kevi abang ason thakthak halatum aphan viji, lapen kaiketa kelivoi alang kangbop along alangli halatum aphan japonji. Lapen Arnam halatum amek pen amek-kri an venji.”
Biresak a-So throksi asap abang kephlok ahut porphai ebeng anbak sining athak ingsamrilo.
Ansi neli Arnam angno bang throksi apherangke karjapphrong thek-long-lo. Halatum aphan pong-ut throksi pidet-lo.

Lapen sining apherangke anut kaprek abang vangsi dovan adung arjaptherlo. Alangli long methek kebi-i aser aharlung do. Recho anghoi angno kedo, ser adovan athak kangthir atum akardom along kepangvuidunjisi alangliphan hijung pi-olo.
Kekai ahijung amehi kangthir atum akardom pen pen sining apherangke arideng pen Arnam angno arludamlo.
Ansi pherangke methek aharlung enlo, lapen dovan athak kedo ame akri pen la paplengsi pirthe athak varchorlo. Ansi sining ingderlo, arki thepik-lo, sining birlak-lo, lapen chikli vang-lo.
Ansi pong-ut throksi kedo aphe-rangke bang throksi atum pong-ut kebutjisi chesikding-lo.

Aphrang apherangke abang apong-ut chebut-lo, lapen vi pen kepangvuisai aherai lapen ame pirthe athak nangklolo. Pirthe phanthom angbong pen ephan, thengpi arong an phanthom angbong pen ephan lapen lirseng abap kereng an me cho-et-lo.
Ansi adun apherangke abang apong-ut chebut-lo, lapen me kekar-ang anglong nangnak kopine ason talo along varchuilo.
Langthepi phanthom angbong pen ephan vi cheplangdet-lo, talo arlo kedo akereng api phanthom angbong pen ephan thi-lo, lapen telong an phanthom angbong pen ephan virdet-lo.

Ansi kethom sining apherangke abang apong-ut but-lo. Thengtom ason thakthak kekar-ang achiklolongso akethepi sining athak pen nangklolo, lapen lake langroi an phanthom ang-bong pen ephan athak lapen lang amek athak klolo.
(Achiklolongso amen ke “Akeho” puhelo.) Lang phanthom angbong pen ephan hodak-lo, lapen ake-ongpi amonit atum labangso alang kejun pen ajok thi-lo, thangbakma, la hodak cheplang-lo.

Ansi phli apherangke abang apong-ut chebut-lo. Arni phanthom angbong pen ephan, chiklo phanthom angbong pen ephan lapen chiklolongso phanthom angbong pen ephan aphan chok-lo. Lasi latum phanthom angbong pen ephan ke klarkledet-lo, anerlo phanthom angbong pen ephan akethe-ang avedet-lo lapen ajo phanthom pen ephan ke lapuson thakthak cheplang-lo.

Lapen neli thek-long-lo, lapen arjulong-lo; kangtuiving kangjar avomu ase kethe pen pulo, “Mai! Nahokdet-ong! Nahokdet-ong! Hala akaprek bang kethom apherangke atum kebutji dokdok apong-ut kebutji ahut pirthe athak kedo atum an ko-an akesung pho nangpoma!”
Ansi pho apherangke abang apong-ut chebut-lo. Sining pen pirthe athak nangkeklotang achiklolongso neli thek-long-lo, lapen Aklong kave aherangpi ahilik aphlok la aphan pidet-lo.
Labangso achiklolongso la herangpi ahilik ingpulo, lapen me herangpi amehi ason thak-thaksi labangso ahilik pen mehi nangbar-osi arni lapen tomon aphan opthip-lo.
Mehi angbong pen longvur atum pirthe athak nanghirlo lapen chehe langbong apivo ajakong ason thakthak ajakong halatum aphan pilo.
Atehang athak Arnam asap ketheng kave atum an aphan ansi kepasungjisi halatum aphan hukum pichot-lo, bonta bap kereng, thengpi arong lapen thengpiso arong hei hei aphan kephangnoji ahukum pipelo.

Labangso amonit atum aphan kepathiji ahukum longvur atum aphan pipedet-lo, bonta chiklo jonpho an halatum aphan aduk kanghoiji ahukumsi pichot-lo. Labangso aduk kanghoi akesung ke chehe langbong kechek akeso ason thakthak-lo.
La chiklo jonpho ang-bong monit atum kethiji abidisi riji setta longledetji, halatum kethiji ingtung-oji, bonta kethi halatum pen katji.

Longvur atum ke ron kechedanji aphan kesiktang alosei atum nangnak-lo. Halatum aphu athak ser avaikang nangnak avaikang dolo, lapen halatum amahang ke monit atum amahang nangnak-lo. Halatum aphu athak ser avaikang nangnak avaikang dolo, lapen halatum amahang ke monit atum amahang nangnak-lo.
Halatum achu ke arlosomar atum achu ason thakthak, lapen halatum aso ke hingho aso ason nangnak-lo.
Halatum ingchin ajakhor nangnak pen aning chedenlo, lapen halatum arveng arki-ke ron kechedan along ronhemkonglong kevungpon alosei atum kangplong arki nangnak-lo.
Halatum chehe langbong apivo arme lapen ajokkasu nangnak arme lapen ajokkasu dolo, lapen halatum arme dongsi monit atum aphan chiklo jonpho an aduk kanghoiji ajakong do.
Halatum aphuthak recho inut do. Labangso abang ke hala herangpi ahemphu helo. Alangli men Ibri alam penke Abaddon, lapen Grik alam penke Apollyon puhelo. (Alam atheke “Kepavir abang” puhelo.)
Aphrang ingdeng isi akesung ke juttang-lo; labangso aphi ingdeng hini akesung vangjilang.
Ansi throk apherangke abang apong-ut chebut-lo. Arnam angno kedo ser adovan anu hongphli pen kevang ase neli arjulong-lo.
Labangso ase throk apherangke abang aphan pulo, “Hala Euphratis alangroithepi akung kekokhet apherangke bangphli aphan lophlotnon!”

La bangphli apherangke aphan lophlot-lo. Pima, halabangso apor, lapen a-arni, lapen achiklo lapen aningkan ahut monit kedo an phanthom angbong pen ephan aphan kepathijisi halatum aphan pathik tang-lo.
Losei athak kardon aron-aso atum aphai neliphan thanlo, lake lahelo: suri kep pabatai suri ingkoi.

Lapen neliphan kepaklang alam angbong neli losei atum lapen latum athak kardon atum aphan thek long-lo. Halatum me ason thakthak ke-er, Saphire a-arlong ason thakthak kelir lapen meplum ason thakthak ke-et a-ingchin achepan chepindeng-lo. Losei atum aphu ke hingho atum aphu nangnak-lo, lapen halatum angho pen me, mehi, lapen meplum nangbarlo.
La sonthom avur, atheke losei atum angho pen nangkebar ame, amehi, lapen me-aplum pen monit atum aphan phanthom angbong pen ephan aphan pathilo.
Pima losei atum ajakong ke angho lapen arme alongsi dolo. Halatum arme ke pherui nangnak-lo, lapen la anglongpi-heihei ke aphuta dolo. Lahei hei pensi halatum monit atum aphan aduk inghoilo.

Kedolang amonit atum an, atheke, labangso akesung pen kethithelang atum ke amethang methang ari pen kethip ahormu pen aning chiruiredet-lo. Halatum hi-i aphan lapen Ser, Rup, Bitoi, arlong, lapen thengpi pen keselam, amek kechecharchedet, karjulongledet lapen kengkam kechejor thekthedet akumlin hei hei aphan kangduk-kardom o-edet-lo.
Halatum pran ke-en, kalite, maja kanghoi akam, kalite beisa, kalite kanghu akam pen aning chiruiredet-lo.

Ansi neli sining pen nangkehir ajakong kethedung apherangke kaprek thek-long-lo. Alangli phan inghun ephar pen tomthip-lo, lapen aphu athak mukak dolo; alangli mahang ke arni nangnak-lo, lapen akeng ke me anujok nangnak-lo.
Alangli rideng kepurtang aloh athuiso dolo. Alangli akeng ar-e ke talo athak bilo lapen akeng arvi ke longle athak bilo,
lapen alangli hingho kangrong ason thakthak ase kethe pen hang-lo. Alangli hangdet aphi sining batai throksi ingreng-lo.

Sining kangder batai throksi ase jutdet pen amat neli loh tokji dokdok-lo. Bonta neli sining pen kevang ase arjulong-lo. Labangso ase pulo, “Sining kangder pabatai throksi pen keningje alam an patujoi non; labangso alamthe tok-ri!”
Ansi la neli kethek-long talo lapen longle athak karjapther apherangke sining anat ari ar-e chirungsi,

Arnam amen pen seme tang-lo. Labangso a-Arnam helo kejut un-e pin akai apar akai anta kerengver, sining lapen labangso arlo kedo amar an kepinchong, pirthe lapen labangso athak kedo amar an, lapen talo lapen labangso arlo kedo api aphan kepinchong abang-lo. Halabangso apherangke pulo, “Der-o-elo!”
Bonta mo throksi apherangke abang pong-ut but-lote Arnam amethang aban, atheke montri atum aphan kethan asonthotsi alangli kemathatang akepatu akam paplengji.
Ansi sining pen kevang neli karju longtang ase neliphan puthot puthulo, “Damra talo lapen longle athak karjapther apherangke arideng pen hala kepurtang aloh athuiso ennon.”

Neli pherangke along damsi pulo, “labangso aloh athuiso neliphan neli-pitha.” Alangli neliphan pulo, “Enra chodetnon; la nangli pok arlo hodak cheplangji, bonta nangli ingho arlo ke la pijo alang ason thakthak dokjinji.”
Pherangke arideng pen loh athuiso neli ensi chodet-lo, lapen neli ingho arlo lake pijo alang ason thak-thak dokjinlo. Bonta neli la joilut aphi neli pok arlo hodak cheplang-lo.
Ansi neliphan puthot pulo, “Ake-ongpi akhei, adet, alam lapen arecho atum alamjir nangli puthot montri nangji.”

Ansi kepun-i achin nangnak arpik atharlon ehong neliphan pilo, lapen neliphan pulo, “Damra Arnam kardom ahem thepi kangthir lapen dovan punnon, lapen kardom ahem thepi kangthir arlo kangduk kardom atum aphan lakhanon.
Bonta kardom ahem thepi kangthir atikup punri, thangbakma lake Jihudi kalidet atum aphan pitang-lo. Halatum chiklo jonphlikep-ra hini an Rongsopi kangthir doji.
Pe thoila kechepindeng neli haki banghini aphan neli nangtoiji, lapen halatum 1,260 arni an Arnam alam kemontriji ajakong piji.”
Pirthe a-Hemphu angno karjapphrong, hala Oliv athengpi arong rongni lapen melur archok hongni helo banghini ahaki atumlo.

Komane abang jongsi halatum aphan kephangnoji aning hang-lote, halatum angho pen me nangbarsi ahotur atum aphan chodet titilo; lapen lapusonsi halatum aphan kephangnoji aning kehang atum an aphan ke pathi-et po.

Halatum Arnam alam kepachethang ahut arve kejangjedetji aphan halatum sining kangkirhetji ajakong do, lapen lang an vi kepaklangji lapen aning kehang aling avur-akrem akesung hei hei pen pirthe aphan aduk kanghoiji ajakongta do.
Halatum lam kepachethang jutdetsi herang thepi pen nangkebar Anampi api halatum pen ron chedanpo. La nampi api atum haidetsi halatum aphan pathipo,

lapen halatum akethitang abang arpum rongsopi kethe atovarpi along tilaipo. Labangso arongsopi alongsi halatum a-Hemphu aphan thengparpan athak pathilot-lo. Lamlir penke halabangso arongsopi aphan Sodom, mate Ijip pusi amen hang-lo.
Do-an akhei, akur, alam lapen adettin amonit atum hala kethitang arpum aphan langphrongpo lapen halatum aphan thiri arlo pabidam longledetpo.

La banghini Arnam amontri kethi apot pirthe amonit atum chehokji, aning arong apar arong chepipikji lapen halatum lahin lahin hormu adan cheloseroiji. Pima, la banghini amonit atum pirthe amonit aphan pasungpik-lo.
Bonta nithomra ebeng aphi Arnam pen kepareng achethe vangsi halatum along lutdamlo, lapen halatum thursi arjapphrong-lo; lapen halatum aphan kethek-long atum an phere-olo.

Ansi hala montri banghini atum sining pen ase kethe pen kehang charjulong-lo: La pulo, “Ladak vangnon ho!” Lapen halatum ha inghun pen sining athak damlo, lapen halatum ahotur atum halatum aphan langdunphrong-lo.

Halabangso ahut mamat chikli thepi vang-lo; rongsopi phan-kep angbong pen ephan rulo, lapen bang suri throksi amonit thi-lo. Kedolang amonit atum an pheresi sining athak kedo Arnam aphan adak atur pathelo.
Hala hini angdeng akesung juttang-lo. Bonta kethom angdeng akesung nangledappo.

Ansi throksi apherangke abang apong-ut chebut-lo, lapen sining athak ase akethe hei hei dolo lapen pulo, “Pirthe arat nonke e-Hemphu lapen Khristo arat cheplangtang-lo; lapen Alangli kejut un-e akai apar akai anta recho choji!”
Ansi Arnam angno, recho anghoi athak kangni akesar bang ingkoira-phli atum Arnam aphan ardomkhrupsi,
pulo:
“Nelitum nangliphan rolo Hemphu Jakongtheparpik Arnam,
kadokave keklemthek abang,
non lapen aphrangta kedo abang,
pima nangli methang kethepik ajakong pensi,
nangli recho kechoji pangcheng tang-lo!
Adet kaprek atum ke aning thihurlo,
pima nangli ning kethiji,
lapen kethitang atum aphan kangsaiji ahut nangletang-lo.
Nangli ban atum,
atheke montri atum aphan,
lapen methang amonit atum, atheke,
nangliphan kangduk a-arleng kethe lapen arlengso atum an aphan nong-e kepiji ahut,
nangle-tang-lo, lapen pirthe aphan kepavir atum aphan kepavirji ahuta nangletang-lo!”

Ansi sining athak Arnam akardom ahem thepi kangthir ingpudet-lo, lapen halabangso kardom ahem thepi kangthir arlo kechechak aloh kedo, ser pen ketop Asinduk thek long-lo. Lapen hadak sining birlak-lo, arki kethe dolo, sining ingderlo, chikli vang-lo lapen herai klo-olo.

Ansi sining athak isi kethedung lapen kelang kemanghumeme angthek nangklang-lo: Hadak arloso inut arni che-umsi, chiklo athak akengpak arumsi chiklo do, lapen aphu athak chiklolongso krehini avaikang chekup-lo.
Alangli pok arlo aso chopathelo, lapen aso amahang kepathekjisi aduk kedo-ong hang-kongbomlo.

Sining athak akaprek akemang-humeme angthek nangklang-lo. Pherui nangnak, Chehangthepi pu araiko ake-er akethepi nangklang-lo. Labangso api aphu throksi, anu hongkep, lapen aphutin athak phu avaikang isi-si dolo.

Arme pen chiklolongso phanthom angbong pen ephan vungsi pirthe athak nangpaklolo. Lapen amahang kethek pen mamat oso aphan kechojisi halabangso a-Chehangthepi ke oso amahang kepathekji dokdok a-arloso angno tondunding-lo.
Ansi labangpi pinso a-oso amahang pathek-lo. Labangso a-oso ingchin achin pen det do-an pangriji. Bonta labangso a-oso aphan Arnam along lapen alangli inghoi along rungpondet-lo.
Labangpi arloso kejejangtang ajo katsi Arnam kethikpi adim do damlo. Hadak alangliphan 1,260 arni an lanaji.
Ansi sining athak ron thurlo. Maikel pu apherangke, lapen alangli pherangke atum hala Chehangthepi pen ron chedanlo. Chehangthepi lapen apherangke atumta ron chedan dunlo.
Bonta Chehangthepi lapen apherangke atum remdet-lo, lapen latum aphan sining athak pado long-ledet-lo.
Chehangthepi ke hako apherui, atheke, pirthe adang aphan kepamanghu a-Hi-i sarpo, mate, asoitanlo. Alangli lapen apherangke atum aphan pirthe athak nangpaklolo.

Ansi sining athak ase akethe neli arjulong-lo. La pulo, “Arnam non amethang amonit aphan pajokpo! Alangli non amethang ajakong chepaklangpo lapen recho asonsi pangripo! Non alangli Khristo ajakong chepaklangpo! Pima ilitum a-Arnam angno karjaptherra ilitum akorte atum aphan nerlosini lapen jopangthang adai ketinbom abang sining pen nangpaklotang-lo!
Biresak a-So avi pen lapen halatum kepachethang, ahok alam pen ajok ilitum akorte atum alangliphan haitang-lo, pima halatum amethang methang apran kechepiji lapen kethiji aphan anta aning hang-lo.

Lahelo, oh sining lapen la athak kedo atum, ning arongnon! Bonta, oh pirthe lapen talo, nangtum ko-an akesung phonangpo! Pima Hi-i sarpo aning kethi parpik pen nangtum along nanghir tang-lo; pima alangli chinilo, non malomso ahut ansi alangli dolongchotpo.”
Alangliphan pirthe athak nang-paklotang-lo pu chethek longsi Chehangthepi hala pinso a-oso amahang kepathek a-arloso aphan hungdunlo.

Bonta labangpi aphan kethikpi adim, ha kejejangtang ajo kangjardamji aphan Vomupi arveng hini labangpi aphan pidet-lo. Hadak Chehangthepi arideng pen pajoksi ningkan kethomra-achitim an alangliphan lanaji.
Lapen halabangpi arloso aphan langkethe kepaponjisi alangli phi phi langroi asonthot alang Chehangthepi angho pen pachonlo.
Bonta pirthe alonglesi labangpi arlosopi aphan rapdunlo; la chingpudangsi Chehangthepi angho pen nangkechon alang an ingsipdun-et-lo.
Arloso aphan Chehangthepi aning thihak-lo lapen labangpi kedolang asomar an, atheke, Arnam ahukum kekroi lapen Jisu alamjir kekroi thirklong atum an pen ron kechedanjisi damjuilo.
Lapen Chehangthepi talo asangti along arjaptherlo.
Ansi neli thek-long-lo, nampi api ejon talo pen arlulo. Labangso api anu hongkep lapen aphu throksi do. Anu ahongtin along isi si phu kekup avaikang lapen aphutin athak Arnam aphan kepinrem amen do.

La neli kethek-long Anampi api ke bongkrui nangnaklo; akengpak ke thokvam akengpak nangnak, lapen angho ke hingho angho nangnak-lo. Hala Chehangthepi labangso Anampi api aphan amethang ajakong, ame-thang anghoi, lapen akam kethe pilo.
Aphu isi abang ke kethi nangji, lason areng amek long-lo, bonta labangso amek medet-lo. Pirthe adang an manghuphrongsi labangso api aphi phi dunhurlo.

Halatum Chehangthepi aphan ingduk-ardomlo, pima alangli hala nampi api aphan kam ajakong pilo. Halatum nampi api aphanta ingduk-ardomsi pulo, “La nampi api ason thakthak matsi doma? Matsi la pen ron chedan unjima?”
Lam kangtang pen kechepindak-iji, Arnam aphan kepinrem-iji angho la nampi api aphan pidet-lo, lapen chiklo jon 42 an aning kehang aling keklemji ajakong la aphan pidet-lo.
La Arnam aphan, alangli men aphan, alangli kedo adim aphan, lapen sining athak kedo atum an aphan kepinremjisi angho chingpulo.
La Arnam amonit atum pen ron kechedanji lapen halatum aphan kehaiji avarsai long-lo, lapen la akurtin, akheitin, alamtin lapen adettin aphuthak ajakongta pilo.

Pirthe kepinchong aphrang pen chethe abohi along amen ketoktang atum pen apar pirthe athak kedo amonit atum an labangso Anampi api aphan ingduk ardomji. Labangso achethe abohi ahemphu ke kethutang a-Biresak aso helo.
“Tangte ano kedo abang parju nang!

Mane abang aphan jongsi kenepchek nangji do tangte, alangliphan nepchekji; mane abang jongsi nokjir pen kethi nangji do tangte alangli nokjir pen thivekji. Lasi Arnam amonit atum kechechakthek ajakong pen lapen kekroi thirklong pen do nangji.”
Ansi neli longle pen nangkebar akaprek Anampi api thek-long-lo. Labangso api ke biresak aso ason thakthak anu hongni do, lapen Che-hangthepi ason thakthak lam ningjelo.

Aphrang Anampi api ajakong an longsi, angnosi labangso api kadokave klemlo. Lake pirthe lapen pirthe athak kedo atum an aphan hala aphrang Anampi api, atheke kethi nangji areng amek long-lo setta kemedet api abang aphan pardomlo.
La aphi Anampi api bidi jutdet angthek kethe hei hei paklang-lo; lapen kadokave amonit angnosi sining pen pirthe athak me nangpahirlo.

Lapen hala aphrang Anampi api angno angthek hei hei kepaklangji ajakong longsi, lapen angthek hei hei paklangsi pirthe athak kedo amonit atum an aphan pamanghulo. Labangso api halabangso amonit atum aphan pulo, “Hala nokjir pen ajok areng amek kelong setta kereng-etlang Anampi api a-arjan selamnon.”

La aphi Anampi api abang aphrang Anampi api a-arjan aphan chethe kepiji ajakong long-lo; lasi hala nampi api a-arjanta ningjethek-lo, lapen halabangso a-arjan aphan kardomde atum an aphan pathithek-lo.
Labangso api bihek lapen thedung amonit, keplang-o lapen keboidet, ban lapen ban kalidet, kadokave atum aphan ari ar-e along, kalite atehang athak angthek pachebitoilo.
Badu amonit setta labangso angthek, atheke, halabangso api amen, kalite amen anombor avete nam longle, kalite jor longledet-lo.
Labangso alam kechinijite gian do nangji. Kechini ajakong kedo atum an ha nampi api anombor lakhanon, pima, lake monit anomborlo. Labangso anombor ke 666 helo.
Ansi neli langsi Zaion anglong athak Biresak a-So karjapther thek-long-lo. Alanglilong monit bang 144,000 atumta do. Halatum atehang athak alangli men lapen apo amen ketok do.

Lapen langsun arki ason thakthak ase lapen sining jasemet kangder arki ason thakthak sining pen kevang ase neli arjulong-lo. La neli karjulong ase ke kum kerot atum amethang methang akum kerot arki ason thakthak-lo.

Recho anghoi angno lapen hala jon phli akereng api lapen akesar atum angno halatum lun kemi lunlo. Pirthe athak amonit atum angbong pen kepajoktang hala bang 144,000 atum apar ke baduta halabangso alun charli un-e det-lo.

Latum ke arloso atum pen kangthirthe akam kecheklemkle atumlo; halatum ingthirjirlo. Halatum Biresak a-So kedam aling dunkrilo. Arnam lapen Biresak a-So aphan kepi athe atikong ason thak-thaksi monit atum angbong pen halatum aphan pajok tang-lo.
Halatum kaita chobei alam ningjeje, halatum adai avepinlo.

Ansi neli thek-long-lo, sining aphe-rangke anut kaprek abang angsongsi ingjarlo. Pirthe athak kedo amonit atum an aphan, atheke, adettin, akurtin, akheitin lapen alamtin aphan kepachethangji aphan kaiketa kedover a-Birta keme alanglilong dolo.

Alangli ase kethe pen pulo, “Arnam aphan pherera alangliphan adak-atur pathenon! Pima alangli monit aphan kangsaiji apor nangletang-lo. La sining, pirthe, talo, lapen kangbop alangso kepinchong abang aphan ingduk ardomnon!”
Aphrang apherangke aphi adun apherangke abang vangsi pulo, “Bebilon kethe rutang-lo, rutang-lo! Alangli amethang abeisa akam ahor kadokave amonit aphan pajuntang-lo!”

La banghini apherangke aphi kethom apherangke abang vangsi ase kethe pen pulo, “ Mane abang jongsi hala nampi api, lapen a-arjan aphan ingduk-ardom lote, lapen amethang atehang lapen ari athak angthek dolo tangte,

alangli Arnam aning kethi ahor junji. Lake Arnam aning kethi aharlung along kedung kepangvuivedet ahorlo. Labangso amonit atum anke pherangke kangthir atum lapen Biresak a-So angnosi meplum ame akar along aduk pho-oji.

Halatum aphan aduk kanghoi-i ame amehi kejut un-e akai apar akai anta tokmonji. Hala nampi api lapen a-arjan aphan kangduk-kardom atum lapen labangso api amen angthek kedo atum an ajo-nerlota sanglongledetji.”
Lasi Arnam ahukum hei hei kekroi lapen Jisu aphan kekroi kethirklong atum, atheke Arnam amonit atum anke chechak-ding nangji.
Ansi neli sining pen kevang ase arjulong-lo. La pulo, “Labangso alam toknon. Non pen apara Hemphu pen chelangpetsi kethiji atum rengme!”
Karjong thaksi pulo, “Kalang-lo, ahok-lo! Halatum amethang methang akam che-o pen sanglongpo, pima halatum keklem akam ale halatum along chedunkripo.”
Ansi neli inghun kelok lapen labangso anghun athak monit nangnak inut kangnilun thek-long-lo. Alangli phu athak ser avaikang lapen ari along nokek-rangso akerepi do.

Ansi kardom ahem thepi arlo pen akaprek apherangke nangbarsi hala inghun athak kangnilun abang aphan ase kethe pen pulo, “Nokek-rangso pen nangli sok kerot pangchengnon, pima sok kerot apor nangletang-lo, atheke pirthe asok kemen phudang-lo!”
Ansi inghun athak kangnilun abang anokek-rangso pen pirthe asok rot-lo.
Ansi sining athak kardom ahem thepi arlo pen akaprek apherangke nangkebar neli thek-long-lo. Alangli ridengta akerepi anokek-rangso do.

Ansi dovan pen akaprek apherangke vang-lo. Alangli ke me aphuthak ajakong do. Alangli hala akerepi anokek rangso kedo abang aphan ase kethe pen hangsi pulo, “Nokek rangso pen nangli pirthe adrakha athe pangrumnon; pima, drakha athe men tang-lo.”
Lasi hala-bangso apherangke anokek rangso pirthe athak nang pahirsi drakha athe rot-lo, lapen adrakha athe Arnam aning kethi adrakha kesor adim arlo varchorlo.
Rongsopi angtansi drakha kesor ajoton arlo drakha athe athak dongsi sorlo, lapen drakha kesor ajoton pen vi nangchonsi mali 200 an akehelo lilo, lapen la karnuk mali pho dolo.

Ansi sining athak akaprek kelang kemanghumeme angthek kethe neli thek-long-lo; atheke sonthroksi avur-akrem akesung pen kepasungjisi hadak bang throksi apherangke atum dolo. Labangso akesung ke kejutsi akesung-lo, pima lahei hei pensi Arnam aning kethi paplengpo.

Ansi neli thek-long-lo, hadak me pen kepangvui loji nangnak atalo dolo, lapen hala nampi api lapen labangso api a-arjan lapen amen anombor aphan kehai atum Arnam pen kelong akum hei hei otding dangsi loji atalo akung arjapphrong-lo.
Halatum Arnam aban Moses alun lapen Biresak a-So alun lunkong-lo:
“Oh Hemphu Jakongtheparpik Arnam,
kadokave keklem un abang,
nangli kam hei hei ke theparpik lapen manghumeme binong!
Oh kejut un-e akai anta kedover a-Recho,
nangli keklem akam an chok-pame lapen ahok binong!
Nang men aphan kephereredetji,
lapen adak-atur kepathethedetji abang komatsi kedoma, O Hemphu?
Pima, kangthir abang nang inut nat.
Kadokave adet amonit atum vangsi nangphan ingduk-ardomji,
Pima, nang keklem akangsai akam an kadokave atum thek-longdak-lo.”
Labangso aphi neli thek-long-lo, sining athak Kardomhemthepi kang-thir, atheke Haki ape ahem ingpudet-lo.

Ansi Kardomhemthepi kangthir pen hala sonthroksi avur-akrem pen kepasungji apherangke bang throksi atum nangbarlo. Halatum lir-lir, lor-lor alinen ape kangthir che-umlo, lapen aning ke ser achepan pen chingtinlo.
Ansi hala jonphli api angbong pen ejon abang throksi apherangke atum aphan kejut un-e akai anta kerengver a-Arnam aning kethi pen keplengset aser aharlung hong throksi pilo.

Lapen Arnam adak-atur lapen ajakong amehi Kardomhemthepi kangthir arlo plengset-lo, lapen hala bang throksi apherangke atum kepasung son throksi avur-akrem jutje tik ke baduta kardom ahem thepi arlo lutdam un-edet-lo.
Ansi kardomhemthepi kangthir pen kevang ase akethepi neli arjulong-lo. La pherangke bang throksi aphan pulo, “Damra Arnam aning kethi pen keplengset aharlung hong throksi pirthe athak dungnon!”
Aphrang apherangke abang damsi aharlung longle athak dung-lo. Ansi hala nampi api angthek kelong lapen a-arjan aphan kardom atum an kehijim meme lapen kesopik areng amek long-lo.
Labangso aphi adun apherangke abang aharlung talo athak dung-lo. Talo alang kethitang amonit avi ason thakthak cheplang-lo, lapen talo arlo kedo kereng api an thikoilo.
Ansi kethom apherangke abang aharlung langroi lapen kangbop alangso athak dung-lo lapen la hei hei vi cheplang-lo.
Lang hei hei kechepa-hemphu apherangke kepu neli arju long-lo, “Non lapen aphrangta kedo kangthir abang, Nang akangsai anke dhoromipet akangsai binong.
Pima halatum Arnam amonit lapen amontri atum avi pabulo. Lasi nangli halatum kepajunji aphan vi pilo. Halatum lapuson kepho nangji a-ot dolo.”
Ansi dovan pen kevang ase neli arjulong-lo. La pulo, “Hemphu Arnam, Jakongtheparpik abang! Nang akangsai hei hei ke ahokpet lapen dhoromipet binong!”
Ansi phli apherangke abang aharlung arni athak dung-lo, lapen la monit atum aphan me pen kepase-kringji ajakong pilo.

Kesopik ame angtang pen halatum aphan pasek ring-lo, lapen lahei hei avur-akrem nangketoi ajakong kedo a-Arnam amen aphan halatum pinremlo. Bonta halatum aning chiruire lapen Arnam anong pathethedet-lo.
Ansi pho apherangke abang aharlung hala nampi api kangni anghoi athak dung-lo. Nampi api adet adang an ingtingkuk-lo, lapen kesung apot monit atum amethang methang ade chekorlo,
lapen halatum kesung lapen areng amek keso apot sining athak kedo a-Arnam aphan pinremlo. Bonta halatum kehingno akam an pen aning chiruiredet-lo.
Ansi throk apherangke abang aharlung Euphratis alangroi kethe athak dung-lo, lapen nihang anat pen kevang arecho atum aphan tovar kesikpijisi labangso alangroi thep hak-lo.
Ansi ha Chehangthepi angho pen lapen nampi api angho pen lapen kechobei amontri angho pen chongho nangnak bangkethom kangthirthe akarjong nangkebar neli thek-long-lo.

Halatum ke manghumeme angthek hei hei kepaklang ahi-i langno atumlo. Jakongtheparpik a-Arnam a-Arni ahut ron kechedanji aphan kepangrumjisi karjong bangkethom atum pirthe athak kedo kadokave arecho atum along damlo.
Chini iknon! Kanghu ason thak-thaksi neli vangpo! Areng angse kedam nangnedet lapen ketherak nangnedetji aphan no kechepang-ar pen lapen pe-ri pen kechesikding pen kedo abang rengme.
Ansi hala karjong atum Ibri alam pen kepu Armageddon pu adim recho atum aphan pangrumlo.
Ansi throksi apherangke abang aharlung tomon angbong dung-lo, lapen Kardomhemthepi arlo kedo recho anghoi pen ase kethe vangsi pulo, “La plang tang-lo!”
Sining birlak lo, arki kethe dolo, lapen sining ingderlo, chikli thepi vang-lo, pirthe athak monit atum kedo cheng ahut pen non an lapuson achikli vangve pinlang; labangso achiklile theneilo!

Rongsopi kethe inghangsi bengthom cheplang-lo, lapen kadokave adet arongsopi hei hei ru-et-lo. Arnam hala Bebilon kethe aphan chemathathusi amethang aharlung along kedo aning kethi ahor la aphan pajunlo.
Kadokave alanglompi lapen inglong avedet-lo.
Lin phokep phokep anbak ardi kedo aherai hei hei sining angsong pen monit athak nangklolo. Herai pen akesung apot labangso amonit atum Arnam aphan pinremlo, pima, labangso akesung thepik-lo.

Ansi harlung throksi kedo bang throksi apherangke atum angbong pen inut neli long vangsi pulo, “Neli long nangdun non, lapen hala lang ake-ongpi athak kangni kehing-nopik abeisapi aphan kepasung neli nangpaklangpo.
Labangpi pen pirthe arecho atum beisa akam cheklemlo lapen pirthe amonit atum labangpi kechoklem abeisa akam ahor junsi ingrilo.”

Lapen mekrengjeng pen alangli neliphan kejejangtang ajo neponlo, lapen nampi api ake-er athak kangni inut arloso neli thek-long-lo. Labangso api abang athak ke bithe bitha Arnam aphan kepinrem amen ketok dolo, lapen lake aphu throksi lapen anu hongkep dolo.

Labangso a-arloso hepi arje lapen ersip ape chepindeng-lo. Alangli ser, ador keso a-arlong lapen mukut-abor apindeng hei hei chingthangsi matlep lo. Alangli rideng ser aharlung do lapen lake alangli kechoklem aketherakmeme lapen akehijim meme akam hei hei pen plengset-lo.
Alangli tehang athak ke kepatu alam ketok do; “Oh Bebilon kethe, beisapi atum an lapen pirthe athak akehijim meme akam an apei”.
Lapen neli thek-long-lo, Arnam amonit atum avi lapen Jisu pen apot kethinang atum avi junsi labangso arloso ingrilo.
Labangpi aphan thek-longsi neli manghu parpik-lo.

Ansi pherangke neliphan arjulo, “Nangli kopi apotsi manghu loma? Labangpi arloso lapen alangli kardon Anampi api, atheke aphu throksi lapen anu hongkep kedo Anampi api alamjir akepatu alam neli nangliphan nangthanpo.

La nangli kethek-long Anampi api aphrangke reng-et-lo, bonta nonke thitang-lo. Labangso api malomso aphi aklong kave aherang thepi pen nangbarsi kevir adim damji. Pirthe athak kedo amonit atum, atheke pirthe kepinchong ahut pen chethe abohi along amen ketok kave atum an labangso Anampi api aphan thek-longsi manghuphrongji. Pima aphrangke la renget-lo, lapen nonke thilot-lo, bonta la puthot rengthuji.
“Lasi gian lapen kechinithek ajakong do nangji. La aphu throksi ke inglong throksilo, lapen labangso athaksi halabangso arloso ingnilo. Lapen la aphu throksi ke recho bang throksilo,
latum angbong pen bangphoke thitang-lo, inut abang non recho chobomlang, lapen kaprek inut abang ke non anta vangvelang, lapen alangli vang-lote malomso ahut ansi recho chochotji.
Hala aphrangke kereng-et, bonta nonke kethilot Anampi api ke nerkep aphong arecholo. Lake hala bang throksi angbong pen inut abang-lo, lapen la kevirjisi dambomlo.
“Nangli kethek-long hongkep anu-ke recho bangkep-lo. Halatum non anta rat aso pangrirelang, bonta halatum nampi api pen pen porphai isi aphan recho ason thakthak kepangriji ajakong longji.
Halatum keklemji aning kematha esonnat, lapen halatum ajakong lapen akam hala nampi api aphan pidetji.

Halatum Biresak a-So pen ron chedanji, bonta Biresak a-So halatum aphan paremji pima Alangli ke hemphu atum a-Hemphu lapen recho atum apar arecholo, lapen alanglilong kedo atum ke hala kephatang, kangvaitang, lapen alangliphan kekroithip atumlo.”
Pherangke neliphan puthulo, “Me lang hei hei athak beisapi kangnilun nang thek-long-lo; halabangso alang ke det hei hei, monit ake-ongpi atum, khei hei hei, lapen alam kaprek kaprek asong atumlo.

Nang kethek-long anu hongkep lapen nampi api hala beisapi aphan hijimji. Halatum labangpi kedo an ason pon-etji, lapen labangpi aphan areng angse bitekangkokji, halatum labangpi a-ok chodetji lapen labangpi aphan me pachodetji.

Halatum lapuson klemji, pima Arnam amethang aning kehang akam kepaklemjisi halatum aphan aning pahangtang-lo. Lasi halatum ning isipet pen klem rap-rapji, lapen Arnam alam hei hei chekok ketik ke rat aso kepangrijisi halatum amethang ajakong nampi api aphan pidetji.
“Mo nang kethek-long a-arloso helo hala pirthe athak arecho atum aphuthak recho kecho arongsopi kethelo.”
Labangso aphi neli thek-long-lo, kaprek apherangke inut sining pen nanghirlo. Alangli keklemji ajakong kethe do, lapen alangli methang atur pen pirthe pathe-ang-lo.

Alangli ase kethe pen hangsi pulo, “Rutang-lo! Hala Bebilon kethe rutang-lo! Nonke la hi-i atum lapen kangthirthe ahi-i atum an athireng vangreng adim cheplangtang-lo, lapen kangthirthe lapen kehijim meme avo atum an kedo adim cheplangtang-lo.

Pima kadokave adet amonit atum labangpi ahor juntang-lo, lake labangpi beisa akam aning kehang ahorlo. Pirthe arecho atum labangpi pen beisa klemlo. Labangpi rengdok rengni ahormu aning kehang kaita jut un-elo, la pen ajok pirthe abepari atum plang-i-olo.”
Ansi sining pen akaprek ase kevang neli arjulong-lo, la pulo,
“Nerat aso atum, nanglitum labangpi apap hei hei apharman kecho-en dundedetjile,
lapen labangpi akesung hei hei kephodun nangnedetjile,
labangpi along pen nangbarnon!
Pima labangpi apap hei hei sining an buipangtui tang-lo,
lapen Arnam labangpi akehingno akam hei hei aning chebi-elo.
Labangpi nanglitum aphan keklem asonthot-le;
nanglitum labangpi aphan klemnon;
labangpi keklem apar phanni labangpi aphan alar huinon.
Labangpi nanglitum aphan kepajun-i aharlung along phanni ahor pangvuira,
labangpi aphan pinon.
Labangpi amethangsi adak-atur kechepathe lapen aning kehang kechepapleng asonthot,
labangso atengthot-le labangpi aphan aduk inghoinon,
lapen aning aduk pinon.
Pima labangpi amethangsi aning arlo chepulo:
‘Neli inut arechopisi ladak ingnilo!
Neli hemepi kali,
neli kaita ningduk nangnedetji!’
Lasi arni isivet angbongsi labangpi avur-akrem hei hei phoji,
atheke keso, kechiru-chernap lapen akhim phoji.
Lapen labangpi aphan me pachodetji,
pima labangpi aphan kangsai abang, Hemphu Arnam ajakong thepik binong.”
Labangpi pen beisa keklem lapen aning kehang kechepapleng pirthe arecho atum labangpi aphan kecho ame amehi thek-longsi labangpi pen apot aning chetengsi chiruji.

Labangpi kepho akesung apot pheresi halatum achar si, arjap phrongji. Halatum puji, “La-an arongsopi kethe! Bebilon, la-an ajakong kethe arongsopi! Nang kepho akesung ko-an akepherememe! Porphai isivet angbongsi nangliphan pasungdet tang-lo!”
Pirthe athak abepari atum labangpi pen apot chiruji, pima hala-tum telong pen kevan ahormu non pen apar ke kenam abang avelo,

telongpi pen kevan aser lapen arup, adorkeso a-arlong lapen mukut-abor, linen kephirso ape, hepi arje ape, silik ape lapen ersip ape; kenempru athengpi abeng, ingnar aso pen keselam ahormu an, adorkesopik athengpi pen kesemar ahormu an lapen bitoi pen, ingchin pen lapen marbol pu a-arlong chething pen keselam ahormu an;

lapen ke thengkeching, lapen mosola, hijung methek, adorsopik kenem-prujin ajangthu, hijung aphik, hor alang, jangthu, soktepli aduk keme, soktepli, chainong lapen biresak, losei lapen ahemkonglong hei hei, ban atum lapen monit apran anta kenam abang avedet-lo.

Bepari amonit atum pulo, “Nangli ningkehang akeme ahormu an nanglilong pen damtang-lo, lapen nangli khi kedo an lapen alon kedo, lirlir-lorlor amar an virdet-lo lapen nangli hala hei hei kaita longthuthepin po!”
Halabangso arongsopi along bepar keklem pen ajok keplang-o abepari atum akehelosi arjapphrongpo, pima halatum labangpi kepho akesung pen pherepik-lo.

Halatum chirusi aning aduk pen pupo, “Mai! La rongsopi ketheke kepherememe akesung pho nang-olo! Labangpi ke linen kephirso ape, hepi arje ape, ersip ape kechepindeng lapen ser, ador keso arlong lapen mukut-abor hei hei apindeng kechingthang abang-lo!
Lapen porphai isivet angbong labangso akhi an virdet-lo!”
Telongpi ahemphu atum lapen telongpi kevek lapen kechethapdun atum lapen talo along bepar keklem pen ajok kerengbom atum an achar akehelosi arjapphrong-lo.
Lapen labangpi aphan kecho ame amehi thek-longsi halatum hangjosi pulo, “Labangso arongsopi kethe ason thakthak akethe arongsopi avepin-lang!”

Halatum longle aduk aphu athak chevarsi lapen chirusi keningri pen pulo, “Mai! Labangso arongsopi kethe ko-an akepherememe akesung pho nang-lo! Talo along telongpi pen bepar keklem atum an labangpi akhi pen ajoksi plang-olo! Bonta porphai isivet angbong alangli mar an virdet-lo!”
Labangpi kevir apot ning arong-non, Oh sining, Arnam amonit atum, ketoitang atum lapen amontri atum! Pima labangpi nanglitum aphan keklem apot Arnam labangpi aphan ingsaisi alar huitang-lo.

Ansi ajakong kethe apherangke abang sok kekoi-i a-arlong ason thak-thak ardi kedopik a-arlong enlo lapen talo along varchuisi pulo, “Lasonthotsi ajakong kethe pen Bebilon arongsopi kethe aphan varchuisi paruraiji, lapen la puthot klangthuthedetji.
