Non pen apara nangli methang angbong kum kerot arki, lun kelun atum ase, pongsi lapen pong-ut arki arjulongledetji. Ason kaprek kaprek akam keklem thekser atum nangli methang angbong klangthuthedetji. Sok kekoi akor arkita puthot arjulongledetji.

Nangli methang angbong melur ame atur thekthu longledetji; piso kechepangri apinso lapen a-arloso ase puthot arjulongledetji. Pima nangli methang abepari atum helo pirthe athak ajakong kethenei atumlo, lapen nangli maja kanghoi akam pen pirthe adang amonit atum aphan pamanghu-et-lo!”
Pima, Bebilon arongsopi angbong Arnam amontri atum avi, Arnam amonit atum avi lapen pirthe athak bang kepathitang atum an avi thek-long-lo apotsi Bebilon aphan aduk inghoilo.
Labangso aphi sining athak armu ake-ongpi atum ase nangnak ase neli arjulong-lo. La pulo, “Arnam aphan ro-archonon! Ilitum aphan ekepajok abang Arnam helo! Alangli adak atur lapen ajakong the-o!

Alangli akangsai ke ahok lapen dhoromi! Beisa akam pen ajok pirthe aphan kephangno abeisapi kethe aphan alangli ingsaitang-lo. Arnam aban atum aphan kepathi apot alangli labangpi aphan alar huitang-lo.”
Halatum puthot hangjosi pulo, “Arnam aphan ro-archonon! La rongsopi kethe aphan kecho ame amehi kejut un-e akai apar akai anta tokdungbom!”
Hala akesar bang ingkoiraphli atum lapen kereng api jon phli atum domkhrupsi recho-anghoi athak kangni a-Arnam aphan ingduk ardomlo. Halatum pulo, “Amen! Arnam aphan ro-archo lonang!”
Ansi recho anghoi pen ase vangsi pulo, “Alangli ban atum an, alangli-phan kephere atum, atheke kethe-kebi amonit atum an alangliphan ro-archonon!”

Ansi armu ake-ongpi atum ase, langsun kangreng-u arki lapen sining kangder akethepi arki ason thakthak arki neli arjulong-lo. Halatum kepu neli arjulong-lo, “Arnam aphan ro-archonon! Pima Hemphu Arnam, atheke Jakongtheparpik abang recho chotang-lo!

Ilitum chehok-ra ning arong chepilonang! Ilitum alang-liphan adak atur pathelonang! Pima Biresak a-So aphan piso kepangri a-arni nangletang-lo, lapen piso kechepangriji arloso amethangsi chesiktang-lo.
Labangpi lirlir-lorlor linen phirsoni ape kangthir chepindengtang-lo.” (La linen ape ke Arnam amonit atum keklem akeme akam hei hei helo.)
Ansi pherangke neliphan pulo, “Toknon: Biresak a-So aphan piso kepangri akecho-kejun amei along kephatang atum rengme!” Lapen pherangke puthulo, “Lahei hei ke Arnam ahok alamlo.”

Neli alangliphan kangduk-kardomjisi alangli kengri domkhrup-lo, bonta alangli neliphan pulo, “Lapuson klemri! Nanglitum lapen nangli korte, atheke Jisu kethan alam kekroithip atum asonsi nelita inut Arnam abanchot-lo. Arnam aphanle ingduk ardomnon!”
Pima Jisu kethan ahok alam pensi Arnam amontri atum lam kethanji ajakong long-lo.

Ansi sining kangpudang, lapen hadak losei kelok ejon neli thek-long-lo. Labangso alosei athak kardon abang amen ke Kekroi thirklong lapen a-Hok puhelo. Alangli akangsai ke dhoromipet, lapen dhoromi pensi alangli ron chedanlo.
Alangli mek ke me ade nangnak lapen alangli phu avaikang chekup-lo. Alangli thak amen isi ketok do, bonta lake alangli methang apar baduta chinine.
Vi along karnimtang achoi keding alangli chingchoilo. Alangli phan kehang amen ke “Arnam a-Lam” puhelo.
Sining athak pen ron kechedan aron-aso atum losei kelok athak ardonsi lapen linen ape kelok kangthir chepindengsi alangli phi phi dunlo.

Adet kaprek kaprek akhei atum aphan kethuji aphan alangli ingho pen nokjir akerepi nangbarlo. Ingchin achin pen alangli halatum aphan pangriji; lapen halatum aphan drakha kesor ajoton along dongsi sorji. Labangso ajoton ke kadokave keklemthek a-Arnam aning kethi aphansi pudamlo.
Alangli choi keding athak lapen akengtham athak amen ketok dolo. Ketok lapu helo: “Recho atum a-Recho lapen hemphu atum a-Hemphu.”
Ansi neli arni athak karjapther apherangke inut aphan thek-long-lo. Alangli angsong kangjar avo atum an aphan ase kethe pen hangsi pulo, “Arnam akecho-kejun Ameipi aphan chingrumnon!

Vang-ra recho atum a-ok, chedanbang ahemphu atum a-ok, ron kechedan aron-aso atum a-ok, losei lapen la athak kardon atum a-ok, kadokave amonit atum, atheke ban atum, lapen ban kalidet atum, kethe lapen kebi atum an a-ok chonon!”
Ansi neli thek-long-lo, hala losei athak kardon lapen alangli methang aron-aso atum pen ron kechedanjisi hala nampi api, lapen pirthe arecho atum lapen halatum ron kechedan aron-aso atum chingrumlo.

Bonta nampi api lapen alangli ingno angthek kethe hei hei kepaklang akechobei amontri aphan nepcheksi phatek bengthot-lo. Labangso angthek kethe hei hei pen ajoksi alangli hala nampi api angthek kedo, lapen nampi api a-arjan aphan kardom atum aphan pamanghulo. La nampi api lapen montri aphan meplum pen kekar-ang ame atalo along varchuilo.
Kedolang atum an aphan ke hala losei athak kardon abang angho pen nangkebar anokjir pen thu-et-lo. Vo atum an halatum a-ok un-an chosi chepangkrang-lo.
Ansi inut apherangke sining pen nangkehir neli thek-long-lo. Alangli rideng herang thepi aphlok lapen ingchin ari do.
Alangli hala hako apherui, Chehangthepi, atheke Hi-i sarpo, mate Soitan aphan nep-cheksi ningkan suri isi an aphan kok-het-lo.

Pherangke la aphan herang thepi arlo varthot-lo lapen ningkan suri isi pleng pletik ke adet adet amonit atum aphan kepamanghu longledetjisi labangso aherang thepi ingkirhet-lo lapen asap thenghet-lo. Labangso aphisi alangliphan cherso ahut an lophlotji.

Ansi neli recho-anghoi lapen la athak kangni atum aphan thek-long-lo. Halatum kangsaiji ajakong long-lo. Jisu kethan tekang ahok alam lapen Arnam alam kepachethang apot angphun kangthantang atum akarjongta neli thek-long-lo. Halatum hala nampi api lapen a-arjan aphanta ardomdelo; lapen atehang athak, kalite ari athak nampi api angthek en-edet-lo. Halatum rengthusi Khristo along ningkan suri isi an recho chodunlo.
Akaprek kethitang atum an ningkan suri isi plengpletik ke rengthuthedet-lo. Kethitang atum aphrangsi akethur la helo.

La aphrangsi akethur ahut kethur dunlong atum rengme lapen ahirjume atheng-lo. Latum aphuthak hini aphong akethi thang ajakong ave; halatum Arnam lapen Khristo akurusar plangji lapen alanglilong ningkan suri isi an rat aso pangri dunji.
La ningkan suri isi jutdet aphi Soitan aphan phatek kebeng pen lophlotji,

lapen pirthe athak bithe bitha kedo adet amonit atum an aphan, atheke Gog lapen Magog pu adet atum aphan kepamanghujisi alangli barji. Ron kechedanjisi Soitan halatum kadokave aphan pangrumji, lapen halatum aphai talo asangti ason thak-thakji.
Halatum pirthe akethepi athoi along damsi Arnam amonit atum amukam lapen Arnam kechinghon arongsopi kompet-lo. Bonta sining pen me nangklosi halatum aphan chodet-lo.

Ansi halatum aphan kepamanghu a-Hi-i sarpo aphan hala nampi api lapen kechobei amontri aphan kevartang adim atheke me lapen meplum atalo arlo varchuiji. Lapen kejut un-e akai apar akai anta halatum aphan jo pangthang nerlosoni aduk inghoiji.
Ansi neli recho-anghoi kelok, akethe lapen la athak kangni abang aphan thek-long-lo. Alangli ingno pen pirthe lapen sining kat-lo, lapen latum aphan thekthu longle-det-lo.

Ansi kethitang atum an, thedung lapen bihek amonitta recho-anghoi angno arjapphrong-lo. Halatum aphan neli thek-long-lo. Bohi hei hei purlo, lapen akaprek abohita purdet-lo, lake chethe abohilo. Amethang methang keklemtang akam an labangso abohi hei hei along tokpet-lo, lapen ketok asonthotsi kethitang atum aphan ingsaidet-lo.

Ansi Arnam kepang-saijisi talota amethang angbong kedo akethitang atum aphan hodaidet-lo. Lasonthotsi kethi lapen kethitang atum kedo apirtheta amethang methang angbong kedo akethitang atum aphan hodaidet-lo. Lapen halatum keklemtang akam asonthotsi halatum kadokave aphan ingsaidet-lo.
Ansi kethi lapen kethitang atum kedo apirthe aphan me atalo along varchuilo. (Labangso ame atalo helo batai hini aphong akethilo.)
Chethe abohi along amen ketok kave atum an aphan ke me atalo along varchuilo.
Ansi neli sining kemi lapen pirthe kemi thek long-lo. Aphrang asining lapen aphrang apirthe ke avedet-lo, lapen talota avedet-lo,

lapen sining athak Arnam along pen Rongsopi Kangthir, atheke Jerusalem kemi nang kehir neli thek-long-lo. Labangso Arongsopi ke piso kepangriji a-arlosole hala piso kechepangriji apinso pen kechetongjisi kechepindengpame pen kechesikding ason thakthak-lo.

Lapen Recho anghoi pen kevang ase akethepi neli arjulong-lo. La pulo, “Non pen apara Arnam kedo adim monit atum angbongsi dolo. Alangli halatum pen dorap rap-po, lapen halatum alangli arat aso plangpo. Arnam amethang mamat halatum along dopo, lapen alangli halatum a-Arnam cheplangpo.
Alangli halatum amek along pen amekkri an venpo; kethi hala pen apara kaita avedetpo, aning keduk, kechiru chernap lapen kesung kaita avedetpo. Aphrang amar an damtang-lo.”

Ansi recho anghoi athak kangni abang pulo, “Langnon, ne kadokave amar akemi pinchong-lo!” Alangli puthulo, “La toknon, pima labangso alam ke ahok lapen labangso alam aphan kechiki, lake ningtheklong.”
Lapen alangli neliphan pulo, “La plangtang-lo! Ne helo Alpha lapen Omega, Kecheng lapen Kejut. Neke lang kang-it abang aphan akejoisi chethe kangbop alang pipo.
Kehai abang aling ne pen lahei hei chepahemphu longji, pima ne alangli a-Arnam cheplangji, lapen alangli ne sopo cheplangji.

Bonta kephereju atum, kekroi kave atum, keche-pangthirthe atum, pran ke-en atum beisa keklem atum, maja kanghoi atum, kumlin aphan kardom atum, lapen kechobei atum an aphan ke hala me lapen meplum pen kekar-ang atalo along var-etpo. La helo batai hini aphong akethilo.”

Ansi kejut avur-akrem throksi pen keplengset aharlung hong throksi kedo, bang throksi apherangke atum angbong pen inut abang neli long vangsi pulo, “Vangnon, Biresak a-So pen piso kechepangriji dokdok a-arloso neli nangliphan paklangpo.”

Ansi neli mek rengjeng cheplang-lo lapen pherangke neliphan kangtuipik anglong aphuchong along nepondet-lo. Alangli neliphan sining athak Arnam along pen Rongsopi Kangthir, atheke Jerusalem nangkehir nepaklang-lo.
Labangso a-Rongsopi ke Arnam adak atur pen turbong-lo, lapen lake ador keso a-arlong ason thakthak lapen loji nangnak kechithingkling a-arlong ason thak-thaksi khelanbong-lo.
Lake isi kethe-o lapen kangtuipik apaisong do, anghap krehini do, anghaptin along inut nut apherangke keton do, lapen anghaptin athak Israel atum akur isi-si amen toksi kur-krehini amen tok-lo.
Nihang anat anghap kethom, nitur anat anghap kethom, nirep anat anghap kethom lapen nichi anat anghap kethom dolo.
Arlong ahemthur krehini athaksi rongsopi apaisong kimlo, lapen labangso ahemthur athak ke Biresak a-So ketoitang atum amen krehini tok-lo.
Neliphan nekepu apherangke arideng rongsopi anghap lapen apaisong kepunji aphan ser abarlon dolo.
Labangso arongsopi atok-ano-phli dolo lapen la arpan arjonta chingbarchit-lo. Alangli barlon pen rongsopi punlo: lake arjon kilometar 2400 dolo; arpan lapen kangtuita lapuson thakthak-lo.
Alangli hala apaisongta punlo. La kangtui ingrup 144 an dolo. Monit atum kepun-ihur apun pensi pherangke la punlo.
Jemper pu a-arlong pensi paisong selamlo lapen rongsopi ke loji ason thakthak kechithing-lor aser pensi selamlo.

Rongsopi apaisong ahem-thurke arlong ajat do-an pen selamsi alon padolo. Aphrangsi a-arlong ke Jemper pu a-arlong kelir, adun abang ke Saphire, kethom abang ke Agate, phli abang ke Emerald pu a-arlong.

Pho abang ke Onex, throk abang ke Karnelien, throksi abang ke Khrisolait, nerkep abang ke Berail, sirkep abang ke Topaz, kep abang ke Chalsedoni, kre-isi abang ke Jeminth, lapen kre-hini abang ke Amethist pu a-arlong-lo.
Hala anghap kre-hinike mukut-abor saidelo; anghap tinta isi-si amukut-abor pensi selamlo. Rongsopi atovarpi ke loji ason thakthak kedoilor, aju kavepin aserlo.
Rongsopi angbong kardom ahemthepi kangthir neli thek-longlelo, pima Hemphu Arnam Jakongtheparpik abang lapen Biresak a-So helo rongsopi angbong akardom ahem thepi kangthirlo.
Rongsopi angbong arni lapen chiklo ketur thangnat akenang avedet-lo, pima Arnam adak atursi labangso athak turdang-lo, lapen labangso arongsopi amelur ke Biresak a-So helo.
Labangso atur pen ajoksi adet kaprek kaprek atum doji, damji, lapen pirthe arecho atum amethang methang akhi ladak chevanji.
Rongsopi anghap nerlosinita ingpudangji; lahei hei kaita inghaphedetji; pima hadak ajo avedetji.
Adet kaprek kaprek atum adak atur lapen aman rongsopi along vanji,

Kangthirthe amar an hadak pon longledetji lapen kangthirthe akam keklem lapen kechobei abang labangso arongsopi angbong lut longledetji. Bonta Biresak a-So alohthui, atheke chethe abohi along amen ketok kedo atum ansi rongsopi lut-longchotji.
Pherangke neliphan chethe alang alangroi nepaklang-lo. Lake loji ason thakthak chething-lorlo lapen Arnam lapen Biresak a-So kangni-anghoi pen ingbopsi,

rongsopi atovarpi angbong chitimchit lilo. Langroi parai haraita chethe athengpi arong do. Lake chiklo ajontinta eboi boi athe pathesi ningkan isi angbong batai krehini athe pathelo, lapen arvo ke adet kaprek kaprek atum areng amek kepame-iji aphanlo.
Rongsopi angbong Arnam ahirjuno kepho amar isi natta avedetji. Arnam lapen Biresak a-So anghoi rongsopi angbongsi dopo, lapen aban atum alangliphan ingduk-ardompo,
Halatum alangli mahang thek-longji lapen alangli men halatum atehang athak tokdetji.

Hadak kaita ajo avedetji, lapen halatum melur lapen arni atur nangnedetji, pima Hemphu Arnamsi halatum aphan turdangji; lapen kejut un-e akai apar akai anta halatum recho ason thak-thaksi rat pangriji.

Ansi pherangke nephan pulo, “La hei hei alam ahok lapen kekroi ning theklong. Lapen Hemphu Arnam, atheke amontri atum aphan amethang akarjong kepi abang amethang aban atum aphan la keplangji dokdok alam kepaklangjisi amethang apherangke nangtoilo.”
Jisu pulo, “chini iknon! Ne vangdap-prangpo! Labangso aloh along kedo, kemontri alam hei hei kekroi abang rengme!”

Neli Jongsi lahei hei alam arjulong-lo lapen thek-long-lo. Lapen lahei hei alam arjulongdet lapen thek-longdet aphi neliphan lahei hei nekepaklang apherangke aphan kangduk-kardomjisi neli alangli kengri domkhrup-lo.

Bonta alangli neliphan pulo, “Lapuson klemri! Nanglitum lapen nanglitum akorte, atheke Arnam amontri atum, lapen labangso aloh along kedo alam hei hei kekroi atum ason thak-thaksi nelita Arnam aban chot-lo. Arnam aphanle ingduk-ardomnon!”
Lapen alangli neliphan pulo, “Labangso aloh along kedo kemontri alam hei hei paturi, pima lahei hei plangji dokdok-lo.
Kehingno keklem abang kehingno paklembomnang, aning kangthirthe abang pachepangthirthe bomnang, dhoromi abang dhoromi akam paklembomnang lapen kangthir abang pachepangthir-etbomnang!”
Jisu pulo, “chininon! Ne vangdap-prangpo! Abangphutin aphan amethang methang keklem akam asonthotsi nong-e kepiji aphan ne nong-e vanji.
Ne helo Alpha lapen Omega, Aphrangsi lapen Aphisi, Kecheng lapen Kejut.”
Chethe athengpi athe kecho longji lapen anghap pen rongsopi kelut longji aphan amethang methang achoi keding kechechok abang rengme.

Bonta a-ot kelangno atum, maja kanghoi akam keklem atum, beisa akam keklem atum, pran ke-en atum, kumlin kardom atum lapen kechobeiji aning kehang lapen kechobei akam hei hei keklem atum an rongsopi angtansi dolo.

“Mondoli atum aphan kepachinijisi nangliphan la hei hei alam nangke-pathanji aphan neli Jisusi neli methang apherangke nangtoilo. Neli ke David asu lapen ahem asangholo; neli helo keturbong Aklirdap achiklolongsolo.”
Karjong lapen nonhetsi keche-pangritang a-arloso pulo, “Vangnon, Hemphu Jisu!” Labangso alam karjulong abang “Vangnon!” pule papunang.
Lang kang-it abang aling pavang-nang; aning kehang abang aling chethe alang akejoile pajunnang.

Labangso aloh along ketok akemontri alam hei hei karjulong abangphutin aphan neli pacheretoilo: mane abang jongsi labangso alam pachan lote alangli phan Arnam labangso aloh along kepaklangtang akesung hei hei pisi pasungthu muchotji.

Lapen mane abang jongsi labangso aloh akemontri alam hei hei angbong pen kopine alam pavedet lote Arnam alangli long pen labangso aloh along kechaktang ahirjume hei hei cheponthudetji. Alangliphan chethe athengpi athe pacho longledetji, lapen Rongsopi Kangthir angbongta padodun longledetji.
Labangso alam hei hei kethan kepachini abang pulo, “Ahok-lo! Neli vangdap-prangpo!”
Lapule paplang nang. Vangnon, Hemphu Jisu!
Hemphu Jisu akangjinso kadokave atum along pado nang! Amen.
